Matthew: Yei pa ndaaŋoŋ Jishɔ *Krishto mbɔ muuŋ *Devi ŋa a ni mbɔ muuŋ Abrahaŋ nɛ.
Abrahaŋ ni mbɔ tǎa Aiji, Aiji pɔ tǎa Jakɔ, Jakɔ pɔ tǎa Juda pugu pa lǐŋ pi.
Juda pɔ tǎa Pɛrɛ pugu Shera, mǔuŋ vugu ni mbɔ Tama, Pɛrɛ pɔ tǎa Hɛshroŋ, Hɛshroŋ pɔ tǎa Raŋ.
Raŋ pɔ tǎa Aminada, Aminada pɔ tǎa Nashoŋ, Nashoŋ pɔ tǎa Shalmoŋ.
Shalmoŋ pɔ tǎa Boa, mǔuŋ vi ni mbɔ Raha, Boa pɔ tǎa Obɛ, mǔuŋ vi ni mbɔ Ru, Obɛ pɔ tǎa Jeshe.
Jeshe pɔ tǎa Fùoŋ Devi.
Devi pɔ tǎa Sholomu, ni mbhi vi pi pugu miŋgwɛ yɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋgwɛ Yuria nɛ.
Sholomu pɔ tǎa Rehoboaŋ, Rehoboaŋ pɔ tǎa Abija, Abija pɔ tǎa Asha.
Asha pɔ tǎa Jehoshafa, Jehoshafa pɔ tǎa Joraŋ, Joraŋ pɔ tǎa Ujia.
Ujia pɔ tǎa Jotaŋ, Jotaŋ pɔ tǎa Aha, Aha pɔ tǎa Hɛjɛkaya.
Hɛjɛkaya pɔ tǎa Manashɛ, Manashɛ pɔ tǎa Amo, Amo pɔ tǎa Joshaya.
Joshaya pɔ tǎa Jɛkonia pugu pa lǐŋ pi. Yei ni mbɔ pɨɨ ndɨɨ yɛ ŋa ŋgwa Babiloŋ ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ puoŋ laʼataoŋ Ishrae ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ laʼataoŋ pugu nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa puoŋ Ishrae ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ Babiloŋ nɛ, Jɛkonia ni mbɔ tǎa Shɛatie, Shɛatie pɔ tǎa Shɛrubabɛ.
Shɛrubabɛ pɔ tǎa Abihu, Abihu pɔ tǎa Eliakiŋ, Eliakiŋ pɔ tǎa Asho.
Asho pɔ tǎa Shadɔ, Shadɔ pɔ tǎa Akiŋ, Akiŋ pɔ tǎa Eliu.
Eliu pɔ tǎa Eliasha, Eliasha pɔ tǎa Mataŋ, Mataŋ pɔ tǎa Jakɔ.
Jakɔ pɔ tǎa Joshɛ mbɔ ndaoŋ Meri ŋa a ni mbhi Jishɔ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.

Nɛnnɛ ŋguoŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ llɔ thɔ Abrahaŋ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ mbɨŋ Devi ni mbɔ khwɛnchrɔ, llɔ thɔ Devi ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ puoŋ Ishrae ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ Babiloŋ nɛ pɔ khwɛnchrɔ, llɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ puoŋ Ishrae ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ Babiloŋ nɛ, ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni mbhi Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, pɔ khwɛnchrɔ.
Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ nnu phi Jishɔ Krishto ni ntɔgɔ nɛ. Pi ni ŋga nōoŋ Meri mǔuŋ vi ni Joshɛ nɔ ŋgwɛ vi, ŋkaoŋ pugu yu maa nchwīe láŋ ti nji noŋ, a kwo thi pi ni shūu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ghrɨ́ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Joshɛ ndaoŋ vi ni mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ ki lɔ ntāʼa nu māʼaŋ lrithɔ thɔ yu, nnɛ a lɔ̄gɔ nthí mi nɔ shāaŋ nu pugu yu pi njiŋnjiŋ.

A ni ŋga ŋguʼɔ nthɔ mbīʼi nnu yei njùʼɔ yu, ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, *ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi ghɔ moŋ njə̀ɨŋ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Joshɛ, muuŋ Devi, kiʼi mbɔgɔ nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu Meri nɔ ŋgwɛ ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa muuŋ ŋa a shūu nɛ tɔgɔ pi moŋ ghrɨ́ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
A shi mbhi muuŋ mimbia, ɔ chhɔ̄ ligi yi ni Jishɔ
nthɛ ŋa a shi ŋkwe ŋgwa pi moŋ phɨ yugu.”
Ŋguoŋ nnu pei ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa Taathɔ ni nchhu ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ yi nɛ pɔ nnu shini ŋa:
“Līi njəɨ, Miŋgwɛ haʼaŋ a shi yaʼa ji mimbia nɛ
shi nshūu mbhi muuŋ mimbia
Pi chhɔ̄ ligi yi ŋa Emanue, njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa,
‘Minnwi pɔ pia pugu kaʼa.’ ”
Joshɛ ni ŋga ŋgūʼu lɔgɔ, nchwīe nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ ghɔ chhu nɛ, ndɔ̄gɔ ŋgwɛ vi.
Ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nji vi nɔ ŋgwɛ vi ti a nuʼuŋ mbhi muuŋ mimbia, Joshɛ chhɔ̄ ligi yi ni Jishɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni ŋkwo phi Jishɔ Bɛtɛlɛhɛiŋ moŋ Judia nɛ, moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ŋa Hɛrɔ ni mbɔ fùoŋ nɛ, ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, ghaŋ shiethɔ
llɔ ŋgei shaʼa minaoŋ thɔ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Mbie ŋa, “Ju vɛ ŋa pi phi vi mbɔ fùoŋ pa Juu nɛ hɨŋ? Nthɛ ŋa pigi ni njəɨ fɨ́nəɨ ŋa a nōoŋ ŋa pi phi vi nɛ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ŋkuʼɔ ŋgei shaʼa minaoŋ nɛ, nthɔ lɨʼɨ ghaʼo vi.”
Fùoŋ Hɛrɔ ni ŋga njaʼo yei, nnu ghɔ ghana vi pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Jerushalɛiŋ.
A mɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ pa *thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi, mbie vugu ni lɨʼɨ ŋa pi ni mfāʼo nɔ phi nu Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋkhwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Bɛtɛlɛhɛiŋ moŋ Judia nthɛ ŋa yei yaoŋ ŋa *njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nāʼaŋ nɛ:
‘Ndɔ gɔ̀ ma Bɛtɛlɛhɛiŋ shhɛ Juda,
ɔ lɔ njiʼi ŋkɨgəɨ shɨna pa ŋguoŋ mmɛ laʼataoŋ moŋ Juda,
nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ nthishɨ ŋgwa shi ntaoŋ laʼa ghɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi ŋgwa paŋ puoŋ Ishrae.’ ”
Nɛnnɛ Hɛrɔ mɛ̄iŋ pa ghaŋ shiethɔ pighɔ njiŋnjiŋ ntou vugu ti nji ndɨɨ ŋa fɨ́nəɨ ghɔ ni ŋkuʼɔ nɛ.
Ntaoŋ vugu Bɛtɛlɛhɛiŋ, nchhu nu ŋa, “P̂əɨ ghə̄ɨ ntāʼa muuŋ ghɔ pɔpɔrɔ, ŋga njəɨ vi, pəɨ chwīe ǹji. Nnɛ ŋa mmu ŋkaa mu nthɛ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ ŋgaʼo vi.”

Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa fùoŋ Hɛrɔ ni nchhu nɛ, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ndaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ. Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, fɨ́nəɨ yɛ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ ŋgei laʼataoŋ shaʼa minaoŋ nɛ ghə̄ɨ nu shhɨ pugu ti nuʼuŋ ŋgə̄ɨ ntithi nɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ muuŋ ghɔ ni mbɔ nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga njəɨ fɨ́nəɨ ghɔ tithi, njùʼɔ yugu pwa ti ŋgaʼa.

Pugu ni ŋga nii nda ghɔ, njəɨ muuŋ ghɔ pugu Meri mǔuŋ vi, ntuʼu noŋ yugu ŋgɨnɔ vi, mfuʼu pa maoŋ tɨnɨnchuoŋ pìɛŋ pugu, mbɔ pa laoŋgo, ni yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ lěi pi mɛ̄iŋ ni fraŋkishɛŋ, ni laminda ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni məə nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkwo shūu tə́nə yugu moŋ njə̀ɨŋ ŋa kiʼi pugu nuʼuŋ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ Fùoŋ Hɛrɔ nɛ, pugu tɔgɔ ndaoŋ nduoŋ mbɨnɨ laʼa pugu.

Ndɨɨ ŋa ghaŋ shiethɔ pighɔ ni ŋgə̄ɨ nɛ, Joshɛ gha njəɨ nu nɛ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi ghɔ moŋ njə̀ɨŋ, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Lɔllɔ tɔthɨ ndɔ̄gɔ muuŋ vei pugu mǔuŋ vi ntei pəɨ pugu ghə̄ɨ Ijipti, ŋkɨna fɔ ti ǹshi nuʼuŋ nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ kwəɨ pəɨ maa ŋkwəɨ. Nthɛ ŋa Hɛrɔ shi ntāʼa muuŋ ghɔ nɔ jwi nu vi.”
A lɔllɔ tɔthɨ, ndɔ̄gɔ muuŋ ghɔ pugu mǔuŋ vi ni tuʼu pugu tei ŋgə̄ɨ Ijipti.
Ŋkɨna fɔ ti Hɛrɔ nuʼuŋ ŋkhu. Yei ni mbɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa Taathɔ ni nchhu ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ njəɨlɨʼɨ yi nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, a ni nchhu ŋa, “Mi ni mɛ̄iŋ Muuŋ a, a taoŋ Ijipti.”

Hɛrɔ ni ŋga ndugwi nji ŋa ghaŋ shiethɔ pighɔ chwīe a gū na nɛ, a lɨnaoŋ ni pɨgɨtua, mfɛ gɨ́ pa shoogɛ pi taoŋ njwi ŋguoŋ puoŋ pimbia ŋa pugu pɔ jɛ̄ moŋ paa ŋgaʼo mbɨnɨ nu njiŋ nɛ, moŋ Bɛtɛlɛhɛiŋ pugu pa ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghɔ ghao. A ni nchwīe yei pi llɔ ŋkuoŋ nnu ŋa a ni njaʼo mbhɔ ghaŋ shiethɔ nɔ ndɨɨ ŋa fɨ́nəɨ ghɔ ni mfǔoŋ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ.
Yei nnu ni nchwīe nnu ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi Jɛrimaya ni nchhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ. Njəɨ lɨʼɨ Minnwi ghɔ mbɔ Jɛrimaya ni nchhu ŋa:
“Pi yaʼo ŋggì kuʼɔ nu Rama
mbɔ ŋggì lwillwi kə̄ɨ nu,
Rashe thɔ ŋkə̄ɨ puoŋ pi
ndɔ ndāa ŋa kiʼi pi māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yi
nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa Hɛrɔ ni ŋkhu nɛ, ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi ni Joshɛ moŋ laʼataoŋ Ijipti.
Nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Yrɛi shhɛ, ndɔ̄gɔ muuŋ vinɛ pugu mǔuŋ vi mbɨnɨ moŋ laʼataoŋ Ishrae nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntāʼa nu njwi muuŋ ghɔ nɛ khu.”
A lɔllɔ ndɔ̄gɔ muuŋ ghɔ pugu mǔuŋ vi mbɨnɨ laʼataoŋ Ishrae.
A ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa a jɨ Akɛlao njɨ nda Hɛrɔ tǎa vi nɔ fùoŋ Judia, a pɔgɔ nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu fɔ. Nthɛ ŋa pi ni ŋkwo shūu tə́nə yi moŋ njə̀ɨŋ nɛ, a pɨ̄nɨ moŋ krao ŋgei Galili.
A ni ŋgə̄ɨ ndaʼa moŋ laʼataoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Nasharɛ nɛ, nnɛ nnu ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nchhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ: “Pi lɛ mɛ̄iŋ vi ni ŋoŋ Nasharɛ.”
Moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ, Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ ni nthɔ, nchhɔ nchīi chrà Minnwi moŋ ŋkǔnu njó moŋ Judia,
“P̂əɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ nthɛ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Po
kwo para.”
Jouŋ ni mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Ishaya ni nchhu nthɛ vi ndɨɨ ŋa a ni nchhu ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ chəɨ thɔ mfɛ gɛ̀ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó, nchhu nu ŋa:
‘Pīri shɛndaoŋ Taathɔ,
chwīe pa lɨʼɨ tɔgɔ yi pɔ yi tithi.’ ”
Jouŋ ni māʼaŋ ndhwí ŋa pi chwīe pi ni ŋgì yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ minyieŋ pi mɛ̄iŋ ni kamela
, ni ŋkandaŋ ŋgrào minyieŋ nɔ ntuʼu yi. Maoŋ jɨ pi ni mbɔ ŋgwíŋ pugu pa llɔ̌ ŋkǔnu.
Ŋgwa Jerushalɛiŋ pugu pa ŋgwa llɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ Judia pugu pa ŋguoŋ laʼataoŋ ŋkɨŋ Jodaŋ taoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ mbara vi,
a kwe vugu ni ŋkhǐ moŋ nɨnəɨ Jodaŋ pugu yūa phɨ yugu.
Ndɔ a ni ŋga njəɨ ntou pa ŋgwa *Farashi pugu pa ŋgwa *Shadushi thɔ nu ŋa a kwe vugu ni ŋkhǐ nɛ, a chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pa Mbhɛ mitwɛʼi! A shūu gɔ̌ tə́nə yəɨ ŋa pəɨ tei pɨgɨtua Minnwi ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ?
P̂əɨ chwīe nnu pɛ ŋa a shi nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni pəɨ nɛ.
Kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ nyīeŋ mbiʼi nu ŋa pəɨ shi ndūgu nthɛ ŋa pəɨ chhu nu ŋa, ‘Abrahaŋ tǎa vigi.’ Ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa mimfɛ Minnwi pɨʼɨ ŋgùʼɔ pei nchwīe puoŋ nɔ ghɔ mfɛ ni Abrahaŋ.
Pi kwo pīri njiɛŋ nɔ kəʼɨ nu thɨ nɔ ghɔ llɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋǐeŋ yi, nthɛ yie ghɔ sheshe thɨ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi njuŋ ntíɛŋ shiʼi nɛ, pi shi ŋkəʼɨ māʼaŋ moŋ móŋoŋ.”

“Ŋ̀guʼɔ ŋkwe vəɨ ni ŋkhǐ pi moŋ ŋkhǐ nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa pəɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ. Ndɔ yichəɨ ŋoŋ thɔ nu ŋa a chaa a, ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo fɨʼɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a nthɛ ǹtiɛŋ tra yi nɛ. A shi ŋkwe vəɨ ni ŋkhǐ moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi pugu pa móŋoŋ.
A tuo yaoŋ fɨgəɨ reshi mbhɔ yu, mfɨgəɨ mfuʼu ŋkiɛŋ reshi moŋ ŋkuʼu maoŋ nūʼɔŋ shaoŋ yu, ntūoŋ ŋkuʼu maoŋ ghɔ moŋ móŋoŋ ki phɛ.”
Ndɨɨ ghɔ Jishɔ chəɨŋ ŋkɨŋ nɨnəɨ Jodaŋ llɔ Galili. Nthɔ njəɨ Jouŋ ŋa a kwe vi ni ŋkhǐ.
Jouŋ paʼo nɔ lāa nu, nchhu nu ŋa, “A kāʼo ŋa a kwe gɔ̀ ŋkwe a ni ŋkhǐ, ɔ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nthɔ nu njəɨ pi mmu ŋa ŋ̀kwe ghɔ ni ŋkhǐ?”
Ndɔ Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Mieŋ a pɔ nɛnnɛ ndwɛ, nthɛ ŋa yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pia shi nchwīe ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ Jouŋ piŋ kiʼɛ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga ŋkwe ŋkhǐ, ntaoŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ chomilaoŋ ghɔ. Ŋga njəɨ po ŋaʼaŋ, a yəɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi taoŋ po nɔ mintuʼɔlibuŋ ndia mbɨŋ yu.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, yichəɨ ŋggì chhu po ŋa, “Yei muuŋ a ŋa ŋ̀khwā ǹja mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ vi.”
Nɛnnɛ Jijwɛ Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju moŋ ŋkǔnu njó ŋa devɨ mōoŋ vi fɔ.
A ni ŋga njī ŋkhǐ nɔ khwɛ wuŋ naoŋchɨ pugu pa khwɛ wuŋ tuʼu, njì yia vi.
Nnɛ devɨ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ mōoŋ ŋoŋ thɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ̈ mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ, ɔ fɛ nɛ gɨ́ pa ŋgùʼɔ pei kara ŋgū brɛi pia.”
Ndɔ a khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa, ‘Ŋoŋmishua shiʼa ŋguʼɔ njru pi ŋkuoŋ brɛi təʼɨ vi, ndɔ a ghà mbɨnɨ njru ŋkuoŋ ŋguoŋ chrà ŋa a taoŋ nchò Minnwi nɛ.’ ”
Nnɛ devɨ lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ pugu yu Jerushalɛiŋ, mbɔ mmɛ laʼataoŋ taoŋtaoŋ, ntigi vi ŋkuoŋ nchwɛrɛ *Nda Minnwi,
nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ̈ mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi, ɔ thi nɛ hɛiŋ ndhi nchəɨŋ shhɛ nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa,
‘Minnwi shi mfɛ gɨ́ ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi nthɛ ghɔ,
pugu jā ghɔ tɔthɨ ni mbhɔ,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ɔ chhwi kwò yɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋgùʼɔ.’ ”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Pi pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa, ‘Kiʼi ma njwɛʼi Taathɔ mbɔ Minnwi yɔ.’ ”
Devɨ lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋkamuʼɔŋ ŋkuʼɔ ni ju ŋkuoŋ thɔ ŋkiɛŋ ntaaŋ mbra, nōoŋ ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi ghɔ pugu pa ndighaʼo yugu,
nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ǹshi mfɛ ŋguoŋ yi vɛ ghao nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ̈ ŋgū shhɛ ŋgaʼo a.”
Nnɛ Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Lɔllɔ shhɨ a, ma Shata! Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa, ‘Ghaʼo Taathɔ mbɔ Minnwi yɔ, ŋguʼɔ mfāʼa pi mbhɔ yu təʼɨ vi.’ ”
Nɛnnɛ devɨ mieŋ vi ŋgə̄ɨ, ŋga njəɨ nu, pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi thɔ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yi.
Ndwɛ Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa pi kwo wɛ̄iŋ Jouŋ, a pɨ̄nɨ njiŋ nii Galili.
A ni ndhɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ Nasharɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ nthɔ nchhɔ nu Kapanuŋ, mbɔ laʼataoŋ ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ, ŋgei laʼataoŋ Shɛbuluŋ pugu Naftali,
nɛnnɛ ŋa nnu ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, mbɔ Ishaya, ni nāʼaŋ nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ:
“Laʼataoŋ Shɛbuluŋ pugu laʼataoŋ Naftali,
shɛndaoŋ ghə̄ɨ nu cho mmɛ ŋkhǐ, mfərə Jodaŋ,
ŋgwa ŋa pugu laʼa nu krao ŋgei Galili ŋa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ.
Ŋgwa ŋa pugu chhɔ nu moŋ njiŋ nɛ
yəɨ mmɛ líʼɛ.
Ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu chhɔ pi moŋ miliʼi gu nɛ,
líʼɛ kwo thɛ mbɨŋ pugu.”
Jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ghɔ, Jishɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ nchīi chrà Minnwi ŋa,
“P̂əɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ, nthɛ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Po kwo para.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nyīeŋ nu ŋkɨŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ Galili, njəɨ paa pimbia mbɔ pa lǐŋ. Shemu, ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Pita nɛ, pugu Andru ndǐŋ vi, pugu thɔ māʼaŋ ndáŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pi ghaŋ ŋgunu.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ yōu njiŋ a, ǹchwīe pəɨ pɔ ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ ŋgwamishua.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pugu mieŋ ndáŋ pugu njōu njiŋ yi.
A gha ndɔllɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu, mbɨnɨ njəɨ pichəɨ paa pa lǐŋ, Jɛiŋ mbɔ muuŋ Shebedi pugu Jouŋ ndǐŋ vi moŋ kikuoŋ pugu pa Shebedi tǎa vugu, pugu chhɔ ntaʼa pa ndáŋ yugu. A gɛ̄ vugu.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pugu mieŋ kikuoŋ yugu pugu pa tǎa vugu njōu njiŋ yi.
Jishɔ nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ Galili ghao, nthɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa moŋ pa *nda luoŋ Minnwi, nthɔ nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ mbɔ yi Shaʼafuoŋ, nthɔ njɨ̄gɨ ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ pugu pa chəɨchəɨ mbɨŋ ŋgwa.

Nnɛ ndighaʼo yi ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ Shiria. Pi thɔ ni ŋguoŋ ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ, pa ghaŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ pugu pɔ yúʼɔ pɔ mbɨŋ pugu nɛ, pa ŋgwa ŋa miŋwɛiŋ ni mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu, ghaŋ guthɔ, pa ŋgwa ŋa pichəɨ lɨʼɨ noŋ yugu khu nɛ, a yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋguoŋ yugu ghao.
Ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yú ŋgwa yōu njiŋ yi llɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ Galili pugu pa moŋ Dekapoli
pugu pa moŋ Jerushalɛiŋ ni Judia ti ŋgə̄ɨ ti mfərə nɨnəɨ Jodaŋ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga njəɨ ntou yú ŋgwa, ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra ŋga nchɔchhɔ shhɛ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ mbara vi.
A ŋaʼaŋ nchò yi njɛʼi vugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Mbɔrɔ yi ghaŋ pou moŋ jijwɛ,
nthɛ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Po pɔ pi yugu.
Mbɔrɔ yi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ ni tuʼuthɔ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa Minnwi shi māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yugu.
Mbɔrɔ yi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ juju nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ lɛ mbɔ yugu.
Mbɔrɔ yi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo njì pugu pa yaoŋ njùʼɔ nthɛ nnu ndɨndɨ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa pi shi nchwīe pugu yru.
Mbɔrɔ yi ghaŋ kwoshɨnɨ,
nthɛ ŋa pi shi nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ni pugu.
Mbɔrɔ yi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa njùʼɔ yugu yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa pugu shi njəɨ Minnwi.
Mbɔrɔ yi ghaŋ chwīe taʼaŋggi,
nthɛ ŋa pi shi mɛ̄iŋ vugu ni pa puoŋ Minnwi.
Mbɔrɔ yi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu nthɛ nnu ndɨndɨ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Po shi mbɔ yugu.
“Mbɔrɔ yəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa wɛʼi vəɨ, mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ, ndɔ ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ nchhu ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu pɨphɨ thɔ pəɨ nthɛ a nɛ.
P̂əɨ tɛnɛ ndɔ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ ŋa ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ kɨ̀nɛiŋ pɔ ni pəɨ po, nthɛ ŋa a wuʼɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋa pugu ni mfǔoŋ nthɔ shhɨ pəɨ nɛ.
“Pəɨ pa khí
ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, ndɔ ti khí mbhɛ̌ ghrɨ́ yi nɔ chwīe nu yaoŋ pwa, ɔ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkwəɨ ni ghrɨ́ yi ghɔ pi nɛiŋ? A lɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ nɔ sheshe yaoŋ, ŋkiɛŋ ŋa pi mīʼaŋ vi ŋgwamishua nɨ̄ɨ ni kwò yugu.
“Pəɨ pɔ nɔ líʼɛ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi. Mmɛ laʼataoŋ ŋa pi krao ŋkuoŋ mbra nɛ shiʼa njiʼi ndə̄ɨŋ noŋ yi.
Ŋoŋ shiʼa nchuʼu truka niʼiŋ laʼo mikuo, pi ghà ntigi pi ŋkuoŋ lɨʼɨ tigi truka, a fɛ líʼɛ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ nda nɛ.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, a pie ŋa líʼɛ yəɨ thɛ shhɨ ŋgwamishua, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pugu yəɨ pa fàʼa pəɨ pi shiʼi, ŋgaʼo Tǎa vəɨ ŋa a pɔ po nɛ.
“Kiʼi pəɨ pīʼi ŋa ǹthɔ pi nɔ lāa nu gɨ́ ki pa nnu ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi yɛʼi nɛ, ǹshini ndɔ nthɔ pi nɔ lāa nu, ŋki thɔ pi nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa pugu yɛʼi nu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.

Nthɛ ŋa shishini ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa, nɔ haʼaŋ po pugu shhɛ wuʼɔ mbɔ nɛ, mbaʼa taʼa muuŋ mi ligi yaoŋ, ki taʼa pra ligi yaoŋ yiʼi ntɔgɔ ghagha moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ ki lɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pəʼɨ taʼa muuŋ mi kɨ̀na shɨna pa kɨ̀na pei, ndɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa nduoŋ nɔ chwīe nu nɛnnɛ ŋkaa pugu nɛ, pi shi ma mɛ̄iŋ vi ni ndugwi muuŋ mi ŋoŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po, ndɔ ti shesheŋoŋ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ pighɔ ndɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa nduoŋ ŋa pugu nūʼɔŋ nɛ, pi shi ma mɛ̄iŋ vi ni ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa n̈dɨndɨ yəɨ mieŋ ki lɔ nchaa yi pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi, paʼa pəɨ lɔ nii moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po.
“Pəɨ yaʼo ŋa pi ni nchhu ni ŋgwa llɛshhɨ ŋa, ‘Kiʼi pəɨ ma njwi ŋoŋ, ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a jwi ŋoŋ nɛ shi nthi sháʼa

Ndɔ ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pɨgɨtua ni ndǐŋ vi nɛ shi nthi sháʼa, ɔ̈ nchhu ni ndǐŋ ghɔ ŋa, ‘Ŋoŋ ghagha yei,’ kaŋ pi shi ŋgə̄ɨ ni gɔ nda nchaʼo, ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chhu ni ndǐŋ vi ŋa, ‘Ɔ na,’ minthɛ a pɔ moŋ lwilwiʼi nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ.
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ɔ̈ nthɔ nu lɨʼɨ mfɛ yaoŋ fɛ́ yɔ ŋkuoŋ *lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋkwiŋ fɔ ŋa ndǐŋ ghɔ fāʼo nnu njùʼɔ yu nthɛ ghɔ,
ɔ̂ mieŋ yaoŋ fɛ́ yɔ fɔ shhɨ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ mfǔoŋ mbɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ ndugwi, nchīni ŋggì pəɨ ndǐŋ ghɔ, nnɛ mbɨnɨ kiʼɛ mfɛ yaoŋ fɛ́ yɔ.
“Ŋ̈oŋ nchhu nnu thɔ ghɔ pəɨ yu fāʼo nɔ thi nu sháʼa ndashaʼa, kə̄nə pəɨ yu lūgwi ŋkaoŋ maa nchəɨŋ ndashaʼa, kaŋ a shi nchaʼa ghɔ nɛ mfɛ ni brushi pi niʼiŋ ghɔ chə́ɨŋ.
Shishini, ǹshwei ghɔ, mbaʼa ɔ ma ntaoŋ ki lɔ naa mbe ŋguoŋ njɔ́ yɔ ghao.
“Pəɨ yaʼo ŋa pi ni nchhu ŋa, ‘Kiʼi ŋgaŋ láŋ kwoshuoŋ.’
Ndɔ ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, sheshe mimbia ŋa a pɛʼi miŋgwɛ nshɔ̄rɔ nūaŋ nu pugu yu nɛ, kwo nūaŋ pugu yu moŋ njùʼɔ yu.
Nɛnnɛ, ŋ̈gei ligi yɔ yi jɨ nchwīe ŋa ɔ gū moŋ phɨ, ɔ̂ fīʼa mfuʼu mīʼaŋ nthɛ ŋa a pwa ŋa a phɛ taʼa ghrà noŋ yɔ nchaa ŋa ŋguoŋ noŋ yɔ ghə̄ɨ moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ.
Ti ŋgei mbhɔ yɔ yi jɨ nchwīe ŋa ɔ chwīe phɨ, ɔ̂ yaʼa mīʼaŋ, a pwa ŋa a phɛ taʼa ghrà noŋ yɔ nchaa ŋa ŋguoŋ noŋ yɔ ghə̄ɨ moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ.
“Pi ni mbɨnɨ nchhu ŋa, ‘Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shāaŋ láŋ pugu ŋgwɛ vi nɛ, a pie ŋa a fɛ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ shāaŋ láŋ ghɔ.’

Ndɔ ndwɛ ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shāaŋ láŋ pugu ŋgwɛ vi nthɛ sheshe nnu ŋkiɛŋ pi nnu shúoŋ nɛ, ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋgushaʼa nɔ chwīe nu miŋgwɛ ghɔ kwo shúoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a mbɨnɨ ndaŋ, ndɔ mimbia ŋa a laŋ miŋgwɛ ŋa a taoŋ láŋ nɛ kwo shúoŋ ŋkaa yu.
“Pəɨ ni mbɨnɨ njaʼo ŋa pi ni nchhu ni pa ŋgwa llɛshhɨ ŋa, ‘Kiʼi ma shwrɛ̄i nnu ni mbe, ndɔ chwīe nnu ŋa ɔ shwrɛ̄i ni Taathɔ ŋa ɔ shi nchwīe nɛ.’
Ndɔ ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa kiʼi nshwrɛ̄i nnu kaŋ shɨgɛi, kiʼi nshwrɛ̄i po nthɛ ŋa a faaŋ Minnwi,
ki shhɛ, nthɛ ŋa a krɨ́ tigi kwò Minnwi, ki Jerushalɛiŋ, nthɛ ŋa a laʼataoŋ Fùoŋ ndiɛŋ.
Kiʼi njiʼi ndɔ nshwrɛ̄i pi thɔ yɔ nthɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa ɔ lɔ nchwīe taʼa ŋgiithɔ a pɔ pi yi fhu ki yi shhi.
Ndɔ a pie ŋa, ‘Ooŋ’ yəɨ pɔ ‘Ooŋ’ ki ‘Ŋga’ yəɨ pɔ ‘Ŋga.’ Sheshe nnu nduoŋ ntɔgɔ yei llɔ pi mbhɔ ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ.
“Pəɨ ni njaʼo ŋa pi chhu ŋa, ‘Ŋ̈oŋ mfuʼu taʼa ligi ŋoŋ pi fuʼu ji, ti ŋoŋ nchuʼɔ taʼa shua ŋoŋ pi chuʼɔ ji.’
Ndɔ ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa kiʼi nduʼu phɨ ŋoŋ ni phɨ. Ŋ̈oŋ ŋgwie ŋgei ghə̀ʼɨ yɔ yi jɨ, ɔ kara ŋgei mbhɔ ŋkwrɛi a wie ŋkaa yu.
Ŋ̈oŋ mburu ghɔ ŋkwe muuŋ ndhwí yɔ, ɔ̂ mieŋ a kwe mmɛ ndhwí yɔ ŋkaa yu.
Ŋ̈oŋ ŋɨ ghɔ ŋa ɔ nyīeŋ taʼa ŋkaŋ ni tiɛŋ ŋkɨɨ kwò, ɔ̂ ghə̄ɨ trɛi ŋkaŋ kwò pəɨ yu.
Ŋ̈oŋ nduoŋ yaoŋ mbhɔ ghɔ, ɔ̂ fɛ ghɔ, ŋ̈oŋ mfōo yaoŋ mbhɔ ghɔ, kiʼi ɔ lāa fɛ nu ghɔ.
“Pəɨ ni njaʼo ŋa pi chhu ŋa, ‘Ɔ khwā taakuo yɔ, mbɨ̄na mbɨ̌na yɔ.’
Ndɔ ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, P̂əɨ khwā pa mbɨ̌na pəɨ, nduoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ nɛ,
nnɛ ŋa pinthɛ pəɨ pɔ puoŋ Tǎa vəɨ ŋa a pɔ po nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ghà nchwīe minaoŋ yi thɛ mbɨŋ pa ŋgwa pɨphɨ pugu pa ŋgwa shiʼi, mfɛ mbɨ̀ ni ŋgwa ndɨndɨ pugu pa ŋgwa təɨtəɨ.
Minnwi shi ŋkɨnɛiŋ ghɔ nthɛ pi khɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ̈ ŋguʼɔ ŋkhwā pi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khwā ghɔ nɛ? Njiʼi nthɛ pi pa ŋgwɛ̄iŋ taashi
ghà ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi nnɛ.
Ti p̈əɨ ŋguʼɔ nthɔ nchrā pi ni lǐŋ pəɨ, nnu ghaghaʼa fɔ pɔ pi khɔ? Njiʼi nthɛ pi ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi shiʼa nchwīe nɛnnɛ?
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ pɔ ŋgwa tithi nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa vəɨ po ŋoŋ tithi nɛ.
“Pəɨ lɨna nu nɔ fāʼa nu fàʼa ndɨndɨ yəɨ shhɨ ŋgwa pi ŋa pugu yəɨ vəɨ, nthɛ ŋa p̈əɨ nchwīe nɛnnɛ, paʼa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo kɨ̀nɛiŋ mbhɔ Tǎa vəɨ ŋa a pɔ po nɛ.

Nɛnnɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ fɛ yaoŋ ni ghaŋ pou nɛ, kiʼi ɔ tua ntàŋ nɔ chwīe nu ŋgwa ji nɔ haʼaŋ ghaŋ mifɨɨ ghà nchwīe moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi pugu pa taʼandaoŋ, nnɛ ŋa pa ŋgwamishua piŋ vugu. Shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, pugu kwo fāʼo kɨ̀nɛiŋ yugu ti a kāʼo.
Ndɔ ti ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ fɛ yaoŋ ni ghaŋ pou nɛ, kiʼi nchwīe ŋgei mbhɔ yɔ yi ŋkwrɛi yəɨ yaoŋ ŋa ŋgei mbhɔ yɔ yi jɨ chwīe nu nɛ,
nnɛ ŋa fɛ́ yɔ pɔ yi lə̄ɨŋ, Tǎa ghɔ ŋa a ghà njəɨ nnu ŋa pi chwīe lə̄ɨŋ nɛ shi ŋkɨnɛiŋ ghɔ.

“Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ luoŋ Minnwi nɛ, kiʼi pəɨ pɔ nɔ ghaŋ mifɨɨ, nthɛ ŋa pugu khwā nɔ thi nu nduoŋ Minnwi moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi pugu pa ŋkɨŋ ndaoŋ, nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa yəɨ vugu. Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, pugu kwo fāʼo kɨ̀nɛiŋ yugu.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ luoŋ Minnwi nɛ, ghə̄ɨ moŋ njiɛŋ nda yɔ, nchri chonda nduoŋ ni Tǎa ghɔ ŋa a pɔ lɨʼɨ lə̄ɨŋ nnɛ kaŋ Tǎa ghɔ ŋa a ghà njəɨ nnu ŋa pi chwīe lə̄ɨŋ nɛ shi ŋkɨnɛiŋ ghɔ.

“Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ luoŋ Minnwi nɛ, kiʼi nthɔ nchrā mbiʼi pa nnu ghagha ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo njiŋ yi ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pa ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi ghà nchwīe nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pugu pīʼi ŋa Minnwi shi ŋkhwɛ̄ luoŋ yugu nthɛ pi ntou chrà pighɔ.
Nɛnnɛ, kiʼi mbɔ nɔ pugu nthɛ ŋa Tǎa vəɨ ji yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ pou nu nɛ ŋkaoŋ pəɨ maa ndɔ mbie vi nɔ ghɔ.
Yei kiʼɛ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ shi nduoŋ nɛ:
Tǎa vigi ŋa a chhɔ po nɛ,
ghaʼo nu pɔ ni ligi yɔ.
Shaʼafuoŋ yɔ thɔ,
nnu ŋa ɔ tāʼa nu nɛ pɔ,
ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ po nɛ.
Fɛ maoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pigi yru ŋkuoŋ ghɔ shiʼa nɛ ni pigi.
Ndɔ ndīʼɛ phɨ yigi,
nɔ haʼaŋ pigi ŋkaa pigi ghà ndīʼɛ phɨ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāaŋ mbɨŋ pigi nɛ.
Kiʼi nchwīe pigi nii moŋ tɨtɨnɨ mōoŋ nu
ndɔ kwe vigi mbhɔ ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ.
“Nthɛ ŋa p̈əɨ ndīʼɛ phɨ ŋa ŋgwa nduoŋ chwīe mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ, kaŋ Tǎa vəɨ ŋa a pɔ po nɛ shi ndīʼɛ yəɨ.
Ndɔ ti p̈əɨ mieŋ ki līʼɛ phɨ ŋa ŋgwa nduoŋ chwīe mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ, kaŋ mbaʼa Tǎa vəɨ po yiʼi ndīʼɛ yəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ.

“Sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ jī ŋkhǐ nɛ, kiʼi pəɨ chwīe ligi yəɨ kūo nɔ pa ghaŋ mifɨɨ, nthɛ ŋa pugu ghà nchwīe ligi yugu fūŋ nnɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ji ŋa pugu jī ŋkhǐ. Shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, pugu kwo fāʼo kɨ̀nɛiŋ yugu.
Ndɔ gɔ̀, ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ jī ŋkhǐ nɛ, shiri thɔ yɔ ni wru, nshɨ̄gao ligi yɔ,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ŋgwa yəɨ ŋa ɔ thɔ njī ŋkhǐ, ndɔ a wuʼɔ njəɨ Tǎa ghɔ ŋa a pɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ lə̄ɨŋ nɛ, nnɛ Tǎa ghɔ ŋa a ghà njəɨ nnu ŋa ɔ chwīe nu lə̄ɨŋ nɛ shi ŋkɨnɛiŋ ghɔ.
“Kiʼi pəɨ lə̄ɨŋ pa fāʼo ni noŋ pəɨ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa shə́ʼɨ pugu pa wrukiɛŋ shi mbɨrɨ nɛ, lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pa ŋgɨna shi mbəʼɨ nii njōo nɛ.
Ndɔ pəɨ lə̄ɨŋ pa fāʼo ni noŋ pəɨ pi po, mbɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ mbaʼa shə́ʼɨ, ki wrukiɛŋ yiʼi mbɨrɨ nɛ, ndɔ mbɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ mbaʼa pa ŋgɨna pəʼɨ nii njōo.
Nthɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ ŋa fāʼo yɔ pɔ nɛ, a lɨʼɨ ŋa njùʼɔ yɔ shi mbɔ ŋkaa yu nɛ.
“Ligi yɔ pɔ pi laŋ noŋ yɔ, nɛnnɛ l̈igi yɔ mbɔ shiʼi
, mbɔ ŋa mbhɔ yɔ ghà ntaoŋ, ŋguoŋ noŋ yɔ lɨnaoŋ ni líʼɛ.
Ndɔ l̈igi yɔ mieŋ ki pɔ shiʼi, mbɔ ŋa ɔ ŋgaŋ ghìʼɛ, ŋguoŋ noŋ yɔ lɨnaoŋ ni njiŋnjiŋ. Ä mbɔ ŋa líʼɛ ŋa ɔ pīʼi ŋa ɔ fāʼo nɛ pɔ pi njiŋnjiŋ, kaŋ njiŋnjiŋ ghɔ ghaʼo pi ŋkwaŋ nɛiŋ!
“Mbaʼa taʼa ŋoŋ pɔ muuŋ fàʼa mbhɔ paa masha, nthɛ ŋa a shi mbɨ̄na taʼa yi ŋkhwā vichəɨ, ki nɛ, a fɛ noŋ yi ni taʼa yi nchɨ̄ʼə vichəɨ. Mbaʼa pəɨ fāʼa mbhɔ Minnwi pugu mbɨŋ.

“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo ghana njùʼɔ nthɛ chɔmbhi yəɨ ŋa pəɨ shi njɨ pi khɔ ki nnu khɔ, ki nthɛ ŋgrào noŋ yəɨ ŋa pəɨ shi māʼaŋ pi khɔ? Chɔmbhi lɔ nchaa maoŋ jɨ, noŋ yəɨ chaa ndhwí?
Pɛʼi pa mishi ŋa pugu ghà njei tɔthɨ njəɨ, pugu shiʼa mbhi maoŋ, ki kwōo, ki nūʼɔŋ maoŋ shaoŋ, ndɔ Tǎa vəɨ po ghà ŋkugwi vugu ghao. Pəɨ lɔ ŋgāʼo nchaa pa mishi?
Minthɛ shesheŋoŋ vəɨ pɨnɨ mbīgi chɔmbhi yi wuʼɔ shɨgɛi nthɛ ŋa a wie noŋ yi?
“Ti pəɨ fāʼo ghana njùʼɔ nthɛ ndhwí pi nɔ khɔ? Pīʼi mbɨŋ pa frawa moŋ trǔ, pugu shiʼa mfaʼa ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ntuŋ ndhwí,
ndɔ ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi Sholomu moŋ ŋguoŋ ndighaʼo yi ghao shini ndɔ mbwa ti nchəɨŋ nɔ taʼa frawa.
Ti M̈innwi māʼaŋ fɨʼɨ ndìpwa yei mbɨŋ pa trǔ ŋa a yi maoŋ shiʼa, yua gha mbɔ nu a kwo yaoŋ ti pi tūoŋ nɛ, pəɨ pīʼi ŋa a shi ndɨna ni pəɨ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ? Ŋgwa piŋ kikɛʼi pei?
“Kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo ghana njùʼɔ, nthɔ nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Ti pigi shi njɨ pi khɔ, ki pigi shi nnu pi khɔ, ki pigi shi māʼaŋ pi khɔ?’
Nthɛ ŋa pa ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi thɔ ntei pi njiŋ pa maoŋ pei, Tǎa vəɨ po ji ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ fāʼo maoŋ pei.
Pəɨ ka shigi pi Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi pugu pa ndɨndɨ yi, kaŋ Minnwi shi mfɛ ŋguoŋ maoŋ pei ghao ni pəɨ.
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, kiʼi njùʼɔ yɔ ghana nthɛ llɛmbhi yua, nthɛ ŋa llɛmbhi yua fāʼo ji pa nnu nɔ ghana nu nɔ ghɔ. Sheshe llɛ́ fāʼo pa ji ghaghaʼa.
“Kiʼi pəɨ shaʼa pa ŋgwa nduoŋ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pi shaʼa vəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ shaʼa ŋgwa nduoŋ nɛ, a ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi shi nshaʼa vəɨ nɛ, nthɨŋkwo haʼaŋ pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ nɔ shaʼa nu ŋgwa nɔ nɛ, pi shi nshaʼa vəɨ pi wuʼɔ ni fɨʼɨ nthɨŋkwo ghɔ.
“A chwīe khɔ ɔ yəɨ muuŋ ŋkuʼu thɨ ŋa a pɔ ligi ndǐŋ ghɔ, ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo ndɨɨ ni mmɛ mbɨɨ ŋkwɛiŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ jɔ ligi nɛ?
Ki minthɛ ɔ kie nɛiŋ nchhu ni ndǐŋ ghɔ ŋa, ‘Naʼaŋ mfuʼu ŋkuʼu thɨ ligi ghɔ,’ ndɔ mmɛ mbɨɨ ŋkwɛiŋ lɔ mbɔ nɔ jɔ ligi?
Ŋgaŋ mifɨɨ vei, fǔoŋ mfuʼu mmɛ mbɨɨ ŋkwɛiŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ jɔ ligi nɛ ŋkaoŋ, kaŋ ɔ shi njəɨlɨʼɨ shishiʼi nɔ fuʼu nu muuŋ ŋkuʼu thɨ ŋa a pɔ ligi ndǐŋ ghɔ nɛ.
“Kiʼi mfɛ yaoŋ ŋa a yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ ni pa miŋgu, kaŋ pugu shi ŋkara nshāa ghɔ paapaa, ndɔ kiʼi pəɨ māʼaŋ pa ŋgùʼɔ tɨnɨnchuoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni pəə nɛ shhɨ pa miŋkunyaŋ, kaŋ pugu shi nɛ nɨ̄ɨ ni kwò.
“P̂əɨ pie, kaŋ Minnwi shi mfɛ ni pəɨ, p̂əɨ taʼa, kaŋ Minnwi shi nchwīe pəɨ yəɨ, p̂əɨ kwēi kaŋ Minnwi shi nchuʼɔ chonda ni pəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pie nɛ, ghà mfāʼo, ŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nɛ yəɨ, ni ŋoŋ ŋa a kwēi nɛ, pi shi nchuʼɔ chonda ghɔ.
“Ki a gɔ̌ ŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ ŋa m̈uuŋ vi mbie kəɨŋ brɛi mbhɔ yu, a fɛ pi kəɨŋ ŋguʼɔ ghɔ,
ki mbie vi ni shhu, a fɛ pi mitwɛʼi ghɔ?
Ti pəɨ kiʼɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà nchwīe phɨ nɛ nji fɛ nu maoŋ shiʼi ni puoŋ pəɨ, ti Tǎa vəɨ ŋa a chhɔ po nɛ shi mfɛ pa ŋkiɛŋ maoŋ ni ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu pie nɛ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ?
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, moŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ghao, chwīe mbɨŋ ŋgwa nduoŋ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā ŋa pi chwīe mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa yei nnu ŋa gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi chhu nu nɛ.
“Tɔgɔ pi choŋkaʼa kikɛʼi nii, nthɛ ŋa choŋkaʼa ŋa a tɔgɔ nii moŋ móŋoŋ ŋguʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ nɛ ghaʼo ndɔ njiʼɛ, ntou ŋgwa tɔgɔ nu fɔ nii nu.
Nthɛ ŋa choŋkaʼa pugu pa ndaoŋ ŋa a tɔgɔ nii moŋ chɔmbhi nɛ yi kikɛʼi, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yəɨ ntɔgɔ fɔ nɛ pɔ shɨgɛi.
“P̂əɨ chhɔ ndɨna pa njəɨlɨʼɨ mifɨɨ ŋa pugu thɔ ni pəɨ moŋ ŋgrào pa minjɨɨ ndɔ moŋ ghɔ pugu pɔ pa miŋaŋieŋ
pɨgɛi lɨʼɨ.
Pəɨ shi nji vugu ŋkuoŋ ntíɛŋ yugu. Pi shiʼa ndɨ̄ga ŋguuŋ laʼo shǐe ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋka chìa ŋkuoŋ mbiembie.
Nɛnnɛ sheshe thɨ ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo ghɨ̌nɔ nɛ ghà njuŋ ntíɛŋ shiʼi, ndɔ thɨ ŋa a fāʼo ghɨ̌nɔ nɛ yuŋ ntíɛŋ pɨphɨ.
Mbaʼa thɨ ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo ghɨ̌nɔ nɛ yuŋ ntíɛŋ pɨphɨ, ki thɨ ŋa a fāʼo ghɨ̌nɔ nɛ yuŋ ntíɛŋ shiʼi.
Sheshe thɨ ŋa a lɔ njuŋ ntíɛŋ shiʼi, pi shi ŋkəʼɨ māʼaŋ shhɛ ndɔ māʼaŋ moŋ móŋoŋ.
Nɛnnɛ, ɔ shi nji vugu ŋkuoŋ ntíɛŋ yugu.
“A lɔ mbɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a mɛ̄iŋ a ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, Taathɔ,’ nɛ ŋa a lɛ ma nii moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po, a wuʼɔ ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a ghà nchwīe nnu ŋa Tǎa a po tāʼa nu nɛ ŋa a shi nii.
Llɛmbhi ghɔ, ntou pa ŋgwa ma nchhu vəɨ ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, Taathɔ, pigi shini ndɔ njəɨ pa nnu chhu nɔ ligi yɔ, mfuʼu pa miŋwɛiŋ nɔ ligi yɔ, mfāʼa pa mɛmmɛ tɨtɨnɨ fàʼa nɔ ligi yɔ?’
Ǹchhu kiʼɛ ni pugu ŋa, ‘Ǹshini ndɔ nji vəɨ, pəɨ lɔllɔ, pa ŋgūo nnu mbɨmbhɨ pei.’
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a yaʼo pa chrà paŋ pei ndɔ nchwīe nɛ pɔ nɔ ŋgaŋ shiethɔ ŋa a ni ŋkrao nda yi ŋkuoŋ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgùʼɔ,
mbɨ̀ ghà ndhɔ, ŋkhǐ shwiʼi, fɨfrəɨ thɔ ntuŋ nda ghɔ, paʼa a lɔ ŋgū nthɛ ŋa pi ni krao pi ŋkuoŋ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgùʼɔ.
Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a yaʼo chrà a yei ki lɔ nchwīe nɛ, shi mbɔ nɔ nàna ŋa a ni ŋkrao nda yi pi ŋkuoŋ shíshhɛ.
Mbɨ̀ ni ŋga ndhɔ, ŋkhǐ shwiʼi, fɨfrəɨ thɔ ntuŋ ŋkuoŋ nda ghɔ, a gū nwīʼiŋ ghao.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ chhu nu nnu pei, pa yú ŋgwa pighɔ fɔ nɛ ghrāo ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni njɛʼi nu nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ njɛʼi vugu pi nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo ghrɨ́, ki lɔ mbɔ pi nɔ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi.
Jishɔ ni ŋga nshwiʼi ŋkuoŋ mbra, yú ŋgwa yōu njiŋ yi.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, ŋgaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ chəɨ thɔ njəɨ vi, ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɨ yu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ̈ ntāʼa nu, ɔ chwīe m̀bɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ.”
Jishɔ fɛ mbhɔ yi ŋkāoŋ vi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ǹtāʼa nu, pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ.”
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, ghɨnɔmbaluŋ mmɛ mbɨŋ yu.
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Kiʼi nshwei shesheŋoŋ, ndɔ ghə̄ɨ nōoŋ noŋ yɔ ni *ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi, a līi ghɔ nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa Minnwi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ. Fɛ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ Mushi chhu nɛ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni nii Kapanuŋ nɛ, yichəɨ nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ thɔ njəɨ vi ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa,
“Taathɔ, muuŋ fàʼa a nūaŋ kúoŋ, taʼa ŋgei noŋ yi khu, a thɔ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ǹshi nthɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yi.”
Ndɔ nthishɨ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo fɨʼɨ ŋoŋ ŋa minthɛ ɔ nii nda mu nɛ, wuʼɔ fɛ pi gɨ́ ghɨ̌nɔ muuŋ fàʼa a tɔgɔ.

Nthɛ ŋa mmu nduthɔ a, ŋ̀ga mfāʼa mbhɔ ŋgwa ndɔ nthɔ nshaʼa pa shoogɛ ŋkaa mu. Ŋ̀ga mfɛ gɨ́ ni taʼa yi ŋa, ‘Ghə̄ɨ,’ a ghə̄ɨ, mfɛ gɨ́ ni yichəɨ ŋa, ‘Thɔ,’ a thɔ. Mfɛ gɨ́ ni muuŋ fàʼa a ŋa chwīe yei, a chwīe.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei ŋgrāo, nchhu ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ njōu njiŋ yi nɛ ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, ǹdɔ naa njəɨ ŋoŋ ni fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ piŋ yei moŋ laʼataoŋ Ishrae.
Ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa ntou ŋgwa shi ndhɔ ŋgei laʼataoŋ shaʼa minaoŋ ni ŋgei nii minaoŋ nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi pugu pa Abrahaŋ ni Aiji ni Jakɔ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po.
Ndɔ pi māʼaŋ puoŋ Shaʼafuoŋ mbhi moŋ njiŋnjiŋ mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa kə̄ɨ nu pugu pa kru nu shua shi mbɔ fɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni nthishɨ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ghə̄ɨ, nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ piŋ nɛ, a nɔ haʼaŋ a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ vɛ nɛ.”
Ghɨ̌nɔ muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ kāʼo ndɔ ntɔgɔtɔgɔ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga nii nda Pita, njəɨ mǔuŋ ŋgwɛ vi nūaŋ kúoŋ nthɔ ŋgɨ̄nɔ shɨ̀gao.
Jishɔ kāoŋ mbhɔ yi shɨ̀gao ghɔ taoŋ mbɨŋ yu, a lɔllɔ nchwīe maoŋ mfɛ ghɔ.
Fanaoŋ ni ŋga mbɔ, pi thɔ ni ntou pa ŋgwa ni miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ pugu njəɨ vi nɔ ghɔ, a fuʼu pa jijwɛ pighɔ ni taʼa chrà, ndɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni ŋgɨ̄nɔ nu nɛ.
Yei ni mbɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Ishaya ni nchhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ:
“Ju nduthɔ yi ni ŋkwe pa noŋ kikie yia
ndɔ nchwīe pa ghɨ̌nɔ pia tɔgɔ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga njəɨ yú ŋgwa yəɨ yu, mfɛ gɨ́ ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa pugu shāʼa nɔ njiɛŋ ŋkhǐ nduoŋ.
Yichəɨ masha ŋgaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi thɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, ǹshi njōu njiŋ yɔ sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ shi ŋgə̄ɨ nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Pa mimbaaŋguo fāʼo pa pùo pugu, pa mishi fāʼo pa nda pugu, ndɔ *Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo lɨʼɨ lɛ̄rɛ thɔ yi.”
Yichəɨ taʼa *ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, fǔoŋ mieŋ ŋgə̄ɨ ntwei tǎa a ŋkaoŋ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Thɔ njōu njiŋ a, mieŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu khu
nɛ twei khu ŋgwa pugu.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nii moŋ kikuoŋ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi yōu njiŋ yi.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, mmɛ fiŋ gū moŋ ŋkhǐ ti kikuoŋ tāʼa nu njīe, ndɔ Jishɔ ka thɔ ndɛllɛ.
Pugu ghə̄ɨ ŋgūʼu vi lɔgɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Kwe vigi, ma Taathɔ, pia chhɔ nɛ ŋkukhu.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ chhɔ mbɔgɔ pi khɔ, ghaŋ piŋ kikɛʼi pei?”
Ndɔllɔ kiʼɛ mbɨ̄ga fɨfrəɨ ghɔ pugu pa ŋkhǐ, mmɛ juju gū moŋ ŋkhǐ.
Ŋgwa pighɔ ghrāo, nchhu nu ŋa, “Yei pɔ pi yəɨ ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ nɛiŋ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi fɨfrəɨ pugu pa ŋkhǐ yaʼo nchò yi?”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nshāʼa ŋkhǐ ntaoŋ krao ŋgei laʼataoŋ Gadara, mbāoŋ pugu pa paa ŋgwa ŋa miŋwɛiŋ ni mbɔ mbɨŋ pugu, pugu taoŋ nu moŋ fúŋ moŋ ŋgùʼɔ, pugu ni nchɨgəɨ ti minthɛ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ ntɔgɔ ndaoŋ ghɔ.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, pugu paʼo ŋgòu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Yo! Muuŋ Minnwi, pia fāʼo pi khɔ? Ɔ thɔ hɛiŋ nɔ fɛ nu ŋgəʼɨ ni pigi ki ndɨɨ lɔ naa ŋkāʼo?”
Kwíe ntou ŋkunyaŋ ni nthɔ njɨ nu ni ŋgei lɨʼɨ ghɔ yəɨ pugu.
Pa miŋwɛiŋ pighɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ ndɨ̄gəɨ vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ä mbɔ ŋa ɔ shi mfuʼu vigi, ɔ taoŋ vigi pigi nii mbɨŋ kwíe ŋkunyaŋ pinɛ.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ghə̄ɨ!”
Pugu taoŋ kiʼɛ nii mbɨŋ pa ŋkunyaŋ pighɔ. Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, ŋguoŋ kwíe ŋkunyaŋ ghɔ tei llɔ ŋkɨŋ mbra ghɔ nshwiʼi ŋgū moŋ ŋkhǐ ŋkhu.
Ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi ŋkunyaŋ pighɔ tei, ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ laʼa, nshwei ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, mīʼɛŋ mbɔ nnu ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ paa ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo miŋwɛiŋ nɛ.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ taoŋ nthɔ lɨʼɨ para Jishɔ, ŋga njəɨ vi, ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a taoŋ moŋ krao ŋgei laʼa yugu ŋgə̄ɨ.
Jishɔ nii moŋ kikuoŋ nshāʼa ntaoŋ moŋ ji laʼataoŋ.
Ŋgaŋ njəɨ nu, pichəɨ ŋgwa thɔ ni yichəɨ ŋkwíni ŋkuoŋ kúoŋ. Jishɔ ni ŋga njəɨ fɨʼɨ piŋ yugu, nchhu ni ŋkwíni ghɔ ŋa,
“Fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ, ma muuŋ a, pi līʼɛ pa phɨ pɔ.”
Ŋga njəɨ nu, pichəɨ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei chrā chrà nchɨʼəshə nɔ ligi Minnwi!”
Jishɔ ni nji nnu ŋa pugu ni mbiʼi nu nɛ nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ thɔ mbīʼi nnu pɨphɨ njùʼɔ pəɨ nthɛ khɔ?
A yīʼɛ yəɨ: Chhu nu ŋa, ‘Pi līʼɛ pa phɨ pɔ,’ ki chhu nu ŋa, ‘Lɔllɔ, nyieŋ’?
Ndɔ nɔ chwīe nu pəɨ ji ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua fāʼo ghrɨ́ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɔ līʼɛ nu pa phɨ,”
a chhu ni ŋkwíni ghɔ ŋa,
“Lɔllɔ, lɔ̄gɔ kúoŋ yɔ ŋgə̄ɨ laʼa.”
A lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ laʼa.
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋga njəɨ nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, mbɔgɔ gu ŋgaʼo Minnwi ŋa a fɛ ŋkwaŋ ghrɨ́ ghɔ ni ŋgwamishua nɛ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga ndɔllɔ fɔ, njəɨ ŋoŋ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Matio, a chhɔ moŋ ntǎa kwe taashi, a chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Yōu njiŋ a!”
A yrɛi shhɛ njōu njiŋ yi.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nchhɔ yəɨ taprɛi nthɔ njɨ maoŋ nda Matio nɛ, ntou pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa ghaŋ chwīe phɨ thɔ nthɔ njɨ maoŋ pugu pa Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.
Pa ŋgwa Farashi ni ŋga njəɨ nnu yei, nchhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa, “A chwīe khɔ masha vəɨ jɨ yaoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ?”
A ni ŋga njaʼo, nchhu ŋa,
“Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ shiʼi nɛ lɔ mfāʼo chà ŋgaŋ fhɔ̌, a fāʼo ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghɨ̌nɔ nu nɛ.

Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ ntāʼa njiŋ nnu yei ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ ŋa, ‘Ǹtāʼa nu ŋa ŋgwa nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mfɛ pi yaoŋ *fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ.’ Nthɛ ŋa ǹshini ndɔ nthɔ pi nɔ gɛ̄ nu ŋgwa ndɨndɨ, ǹthɔ nthɛ pi ghaŋ phɨ.
Nnɛ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ thɔ njəɨ Jishɔ mbie vi ŋa, “A chwīe khɔ pigi pa ŋgwa Farashi jī ŋkhǐ, ndɔ paʼa pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ lɔ njī?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Mimfɛ pa ghaŋ gɛ̀ lɨʼɨ láŋ pɔ ni tuʼuthɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu pa mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ kaʼa nɛ? Ndɔ pa llɛ́ pighɔ shi nthɔ ŋa pi shi mfuʼu mimbia láŋ ghɔ shɨna pugu, nɛnnɛ pugu shi njī ŋkhǐ.
“Mbaʼa ŋoŋ chri paʼo ŋkuoŋ ndunu ndhwí ni pra ndhwí fhi, nthɛ ŋa pra ndhwí fhi ghɔ shi ŋga ŋɨnɛiŋ, a ka mīʼɛŋ māʼaŋ pi mmɛ mbo ŋkuoŋ ndhwí ghɔ.

“Ŋgwa shiʼa niʼiŋ làʼo fhi moŋ ndunu mikei ŋgrào, p̈i niʼiŋ, làʼo fhi ghɔ fāʼo ntūgu mikei ŋgrào ghɔ ŋkwrī shhɛ, ŋgrào ghɔ pɨrɨ. Ndɔ pi ghà niʼiŋ làʼo fhi moŋ mikei ŋgrào fhi, nɛnnɛ ŋguoŋ yi ghao pɔ shiʼi.”

Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni ŋguʼɔ nthɔ nchhu nnu pei ni pugu nɛ, a gha njəɨ nu, yichəɨ nthishɨ pa Juu nii ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɨ yu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Muuŋ a yi miŋgwɛ khu wuʼɔ ndwɛ yei. Thɔ nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yɔ mbɨŋ yu nnɛ ŋa a ywiŋ.”
Jishɔ lɔllɔ njōu njiŋ yi pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.
Ŋga njəɨ nu, yichəɨ miŋgwɛ ŋa a ni ŋkwo yəɨ ndɨɨ yi ki a lɔ ntithi nɔ paanchrɔ ŋgaʼo thɔ njiŋ yu, ŋkāoŋ po ndhwí yi.
Nthɛ ŋa a ni nchhu ni noŋ yi ŋa, “M̈i ŋguʼɔ ŋkāoŋ pi po ndhwí yi, ghɨ̌nɔ a tɔgɔ.”
Ndɔ Jishɔ gha ŋkara njəɨ vi, nchhu ŋa,
“Fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ, ma muuŋ a, piŋ yɔ chwīe ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ tɔgɔ.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pi ni nchwīe ghɨ̌nɔ miŋgwɛ ghɔ tɔgɔ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ nda nthishɨ ghɔ, njəɨ pa ghaŋ tua ndua pugu pa yú ŋgwa pugu yɔ̄nɔ nu moŋ fiŋthɔ.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋguoŋ vəɨ taoŋ! Muuŋ miŋgwɛ yei lɔ ŋkukhu, a chhɔ ndɛllɛ.”
Pugu gwɛ̄ vi.
Ndɔ pi ni ŋga mfuʼu ŋguoŋ yú ŋgwa pighɔ mfɛ mbhi, a nii nda ŋgwɛ̄iŋ muuŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ nɔ mbhɔ yi, a lɔllɔ.
Shaaŋga nnu yei nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ krao laʼataoŋ ghɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni ndhɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, paa pa nchriligi yōu njiŋ yi, mbaʼo ŋgòu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Muuŋ Devi, fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pigi.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nii nda, paa pa nchriligi pighɔ thɔ njəɨ vi, a pie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ piŋ ŋa a nthɛ ǹchuʼɔ ligi yəɨ?”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ooŋ, ma Taathɔ.”
Nnɛ Jishɔ kāoŋ ligi yugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“A pɔ ni pəɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ piŋ yəɨ pɔ nɛ.”
Ligi yugu chuʼɔ. Jishɔ shūu tə́nə yugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Kiʼi pəɨ chwīe ŋoŋ ji nnu yei.”
Ndɔ pugu taoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nchīi pa nnu ŋa Jishɔ chwīe nɛ moŋ ŋguoŋ krao laʼataoŋ ghɔ ghao.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, pi thɔ nu ni ŋoŋ chəɨ ŋa miŋwɛiŋ ni mbɔ mbɨŋ yu, a pɔ fhɨncho, njəɨ vi ni ju.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni mfuʼu miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ nɛ, fhɨncho ghɔ chrā. Yú ŋgwa pighɔ ghrāo, nchhu nu ŋa, “Pi lɔ naa ma njəɨ ŋkwaŋ nnu yei moŋ Ishrae!”
Ndɔ pa ŋgwa Farashi chhu ŋa, “A fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ pi ni ghrɨ́ nthishɨ pa miŋwɛiŋ.”
Jishɔ nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa mɛmmɛ laʼataoŋ pugu pa puoŋ mi laʼataoŋ, njɛʼi ŋgwa moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi, nthɔ nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ mbɔ yi Shaʼafuoŋ, nthɔ njɨ̄gɨ ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ pugu pa chəɨchəɨ.
A ni ŋga njəɨ yú ŋgwa pighɔ, mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pugu, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ moŋ ŋgəʼɨ ndɔ mbou ghrɨ́ nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu noŋ pugu nɔ pa minjɨɨ ki ŋkɛ̄ʼi yi.
Nnɛ a chhu ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Maoŋ kwōo yiɛŋ ndɔ ghaŋ kwōo pi kɨgəɨ,
nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ luoŋ ni taʼanjuʼɔ mbhɔ Taathɔ ŋa a fāʼo maoŋ pighɔ nɛ, a taoŋ pa ghaŋ fàʼa pugu ghə̄ɨ ŋkwōo maoŋ pi.”
Jishɔ mɛ̄iŋ paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, mfɛ ghrɨ́ ni pugu ŋa pugu fuʼu pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ nɔ ghɔ, ndɔ njɨ̄gɨ ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ pugu pa chəɨchəɨ.
Yei ligi paanchrɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi pighɔ: fǔoŋ yi, Shemu, ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Pita nɛ, ni Andru ndǐŋ vi, ni Jɛiŋ muuŋ Shebedi, ni Jouŋ ndǐŋ vi,
Fili pugu Batolomiu, Toma ni Matio mbɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ taashi, ni Jɛiŋ muuŋ Afioshi, ni Tadio,
ni Shemu mbɔ kwìni laʼa, ni Judashi Ishikario ŋa a ni mfīni vi nɛ.
Jishɔ ni ntaoŋ paanchrɔ pei, ni ntɨ́gɨ yei,
“Kiʼi pəɨ ghə̄ɨ laʼa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ki moŋ sheshe laʼa pa ŋgwa Shamaria.
Pəɨ ka ghə̄ɨ pi wuʼɔ moŋ mbaanda Ishrae, ŋa pugu pɔ nɔ minjɨɨ ŋa a kwo phɛ nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nu nɛ, p̂əɨ chīi nu ŋa, ‘Shaʼafuoŋ Po kwo para!’

P̂əɨ yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋgwa, njwiŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu khu nɛ, njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ghaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ, mfuʼu pa miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ ŋgwa. Pəɨ ni ŋkwe ghrɨ́ chwīe nu nnu pei mbhɔ mu pi ki lɔ mbe, nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ chwīe pa nnu pei mbɨŋ ŋgwa pi ki pugu lɔ mbe.
“Kiʼi pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ sheshe laoŋgo, ki mbɨŋ ntɨʼə ki yi kikɛʼi moŋ pìɛŋ mbɨŋ yəɨ,
Kiʼi pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ pìɛŋ kra, ki kwri ndhwí, ki tra, ki mbìe, nthɛ ŋa a pie ŋa ŋgaŋ fàʼa fāʼo maoŋ jɨ pi.
“Sheshe mmɛ laʼataoŋ ki muuŋ laʼataoŋ ŋa pəɨ nii fɔ nɛ, p̂əɨ līi ŋoŋ ŋa a kāʼo ndɔ ŋkhwā nɔ tuo nu vəɨ nɛ, ndaʼa pəɨ pugu ti shi nuʼuŋ ŋgə̄ɨ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ nii moŋ nda ghɔ nɛ, pəɨ chrā ni pugu ŋa, ‘Ghɨghrɨ pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ.’
Ti ghaŋ nda pighɔ ŋkāʼo, ghɨghrɨ yəɨ kɨna nda ghɔ, ti pugu mieŋ ki kāʼo ghɨghrɨ yəɨ pɨ̄nɨ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Ti sheshe nda mieŋ ki lɔ mbiŋ vəɨ, ki mbiŋ chrà yəɨ, pəɨ krū kwò məɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ taoŋ nu nda ghɔ ki laʼataoŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa a shi ndɛ njiʼɛ ni laʼataoŋ Shodoŋ pugu Gomora moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa nchaa yie laʼataoŋ ŋa pugu lāa vəɨ nɛ!
“Pəɨ līi njəɨ, ǹtaoŋ vəɨ nɔ pa minjɨɨ shɨna pa miŋaŋieŋ. Nnɛ pəɨ chhɔ ni lɨna məɨ nɔ pa mitwɛʼi ndɔ njū nɔ pa mintuʼɔlibuŋ.
P̂əɨ chhɔ ndɨna pichəɨ ŋgwa nthɛ ŋa pugu shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ nchaʼa mfɛ moŋ pa ndashaʼa, pi wie vəɨ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi yugu.
Pi shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ ghaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa pugu pa fùoŋ nthɛ a, p̂əɨ pɔ pa miŋkwentie shhɨ pugu, pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi wɛ̄iŋ vəɨ nchaʼa mfɛ ŋa pi shaʼa vəɨ nɛ, kiʼi njùʼɔ yəɨ ghana vəɨ ni ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ shi nchrā nɛ pugu pa nnu ŋa pəɨ shi nchhu nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa pi shi mfɛ yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ shi nchu nɛ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa a lɔ nchrā pəɨ, a chrā Jijwɛ Tǎa vəɨ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
“Ŋoŋ shi nchaʼa ndǐŋ vi mfɛ ŋa pi jwi, Tǎa fɛ muuŋ vi ŋa pi jwi, pa puoŋ kara mbara pa tǎa, pugu pa ma ni nchhɔ̀, nchwīe pi jwi vugu.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa shi mbɨ̄na vəɨ nthɛ a, ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a shi ntīi shii ti ŋgə̄ɨ ndugwi nɛ shi ndūgu.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ moŋ taʼa laʼataoŋ nɛ, pəɨ tei ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ yichəɨ laʼataoŋ. Nthɛ ŋa shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, mbaʼa pəɨ yiʼi mīʼɛŋ fàʼa yəɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ laʼataoŋ moŋ Ishrae ki Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua lɔ nthɔ.
“Mbaʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ ŋoŋ chaa masha vi, ndɔ paʼa muuŋ fàʼa lɔ nchaa ju nchaa masha vi.
A kāʼo ni ŋgaŋ younjiŋ ŋoŋ nɔ pɔ nu nɔ masha vi, muuŋ fàʼa pɔ nɔ masha vi. Ti pi mɛ̄iŋ masha nda ni Bɛjɛbu
kaŋ pi shi ŋka mɛ̄iŋ pa ŋgwa nda ghɔ pi ni ligi ŋa a pɨgɨ nchaa yie nɛ.
“Nnɛ kiʼi mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu nthɛ vugu, nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ yaoŋ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ fɔ ŋa pi pūoŋ ŋa mbaʼa Minnwi mieŋ ki nōoŋ páa. Paʼa yichəɨ nnu lə̄ɨŋ lɔ mbɔ ŋa mbaʼa pi yiʼi mieŋ ki ji.
Nnu ŋa ǹchhu ni pəɨ moŋ njíŋ nɛ, pəɨ chhu nthɛ minaoŋ, yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ yaʼo pi chūuŋ nɛ, pəɨ thi ŋkuoŋ pa thɔnda nchīi.

“Ndɔ kiʼi pəɨ pɔgɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa mimfɛ pugu wuʼɔ njwi pi frɛinoŋ yəɨ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ jwi nu nchə̌ɨ yəɨ nɛ. Pəɨ ka pɔgɔ pi Minnwi ŋa minthɛ a pɨrɨ frɛinoŋ pugu pa nchə̌ɨ yəɨ moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ.
Pi shiʼa fīni paa puoŋ milunu pi wuʼɔ ni taʼa muuŋ mi mbɨŋ? Ndɔ mbaʼa taʼa ŋoŋ vugu gū shhɛ ki a lɔ mbiŋ Tǎa.
Njiʼi nthɛ pi ŋguoŋ ŋgiithɔ yɔ yi shia ghao.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, kiʼi mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu, nthɛ ŋa ɔ ghaʼo mbhɔ Minnwi nchaa ntou milunu.
“Nnɛ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chhu shhɨ ŋgwamishua ŋa a nyaŋ nɛ, mummu ŋkaa mu shi nchhu shhɨ Tǎa a po ŋa a nyaŋ.
Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lāa a shhɨ ŋgwamishua, mummu shi ndāa vi shhɨ Tǎa a ŋa a chhɔ po nɛ.
“Kiʼi njiʼi mbīʼi ŋa ǹthɔ pi nɔ fɛ nu taʼaŋggi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ. Ǹdɔ nthɔ pi nɔ fɛ ni taʼaŋggi, ǹthɔ pi ni kafa.
‘Ǹthɔ pi nɔ chwīe nu muuŋ mimbia kara ŋkǔnu yi ni tǎa vi,
muuŋ miŋgwɛ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yi ni mǔuŋ vi,
muuŋ miŋgwɛ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yi ni maŋgaoŋ vi.
Mbɨ̌na ŋoŋ shi ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi pa ndǎa pi.’
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a khwā tǎa vi ki mǔuŋ vi nchaa a nɛ lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo ŋgaŋ younjiŋ a. Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a khwā muuŋ vi yi mimbia ki vi miŋgwɛ nchaa a nɛ lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo ŋgaŋ younjiŋ a.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ntiɛŋ wáʼa yi njōu njiŋ a nɛ lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo ŋgaŋ younjiŋ a.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a yəɨ chɔmbhi yi nɛ shi mbhɛ chɔmbhi yi ghɔ, ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a phɛ chɔmbhi yi nthɛ a nɛ shi njəɨ chɔmbhi yi ghɔ.
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ ghɔ ŋa ɔ thɔ a pwa nɛ piŋ pi mmu. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ a nɛ piŋ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.

Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nthɛ ŋa a njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nɛ shi mfāʼo ŋkwaŋ kɨ̀nɛiŋ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nthɛ ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nɛ shi mfāʼo ŋkwaŋ kɨ̀nɛiŋ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fɛ ndua ŋkhǐ ghɨghrɨ ni taʼa muuŋ mi ŋgaŋ younjiŋ a yei nthɛ ŋa a ŋgaŋ younjiŋ a nɛ, shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, mbaʼa a yiʼi nshiɛŋ kɨ̀nɛiŋ yi.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga ŋkwo mīʼɛŋ tɨgɨ nu paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, ndɔllɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nthɔ ntɨgɨ nu ndɔ nchīi nu moŋ pa laʼa pugu.
Ndwɛ Jouŋ ni ŋga nchhɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ njaʼo fàʼa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, ntaoŋ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni Jishɔ
ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ mbie vi ŋa, “A gɔ̀ mbɔ ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋa a shi nthɔ nɛ, ki pigi ywɛrɛ ŋoŋ nduoŋ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jouŋ ŋa,
“P̂əɨ pɨ̄nɨ shwei Jouŋ ni yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ yaʼo ndɔ njəɨ nɛ,
pa nchriligi yəɨ lɨʼɨ, pa ŋkwíni nyīeŋ, ghaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ pɔ shiʼi, pa fhɨtənə yaʼo lɨʼɨ, pi pɨʼɨ pa ŋgwa khu moŋ gu, pi chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni ghaŋ pou.
Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ moŋ piŋ yugu nthɛ a nɛ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jouŋ ni ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɛ, Jishɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ nchrā nu ni yú ŋgwa pighɔ nthɛ Jouŋ,
“Pəɨ ni ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó njəɨ pi khɔ fɔ? Trǔ ŋa fɨfrəɨ chɨ̄ʼɨ nu? Ŋga!
Pəɨ ni ŋgə̄ɨ kiʼɛ njəɨ pi khɔ fɔ? Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni māʼaŋ mbwa ndhwí? Ŋga! Līi njəɨ, ŋgwa ŋa pugu ghà māʼaŋ mbwambwa ndhwí nɛ ghà mbɔ pi moŋ ntuʼɔ pa fùoŋ.
Ti pəɨ ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu kiʼɛ njəɨ pi khɔ fɔ? Njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi? Ooŋ, ǹshwei vəɨ, ŋoŋ ŋa a chaa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Jouŋ ŋoŋ ŋa chrà Minnwi chrā nɔ ligi yi ŋa,
‘Līi njəɨ, ǹshi ntaoŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ a,
a ghə̄ɨ shhɨ pəɨ mbīri ndaoŋ ni pəɨ.’
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, shɨna ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa piŋgɛ kwo ma mbhi nɛ, yichəɨ taʼa yi lɔ mbɔ ŋa a ghaʼo nchaa Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ, ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a kɨgəɨ nchaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po nɛ, ghaʼo nchaa Jouŋ.
Llɔ ndɨɨ Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ ndwɛ, Shaʼafuoŋ Po kwo yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ mbhɔ kɨkrɨ, ghaŋ kɨkrɨ kwe ni ghrɨ́.
Ŋguoŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pugu pa gɨ́ ni nthɔ nchrā nthɛ pi Shaʼafuoŋ Po ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ thɔ Jouŋ,
ti ɔ̈ ŋkhwā nɔ piŋ nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ yugu, kaŋ Jouŋ nduthɔ yi Elaija ŋa a ni mfāʼo nɔ thɔ nu nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo!
“Mimfɛ m̀āʼaŋ fɨʼɨ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yei pi ni khɔ? A pɔ nɔ pa mikəʼɨ ŋa pugu chhɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ taŋ, nthɔ mɛ̄iŋ pakwo michwe pugu ŋa,
‘Pigi māʼaŋ ŋkhǐ pwanjuʼɔ ni pəɨ ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbini,
pigi yrāo ŋkhǐ gu ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ ŋkə̄ɨ.’
Jouŋ ni nthɔ paʼa ndɔ njɨ maoŋ ki nnu yaoŋ pugu chhu ŋa, ‘A fāʼo miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ yu.’

Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua nthɔ njɨ maoŋ ndɔ nnu nu pugu chhu ŋa, ‘Līi njəɨ, a njru mmɛ yaoŋ, ndɔ mbɔ mbaa làʼo, mbɨnɨ mbɔ shúoŋ ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ.’ Ndɔ shiethɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi ŋa a kāʼo pi ni ŋkwaŋ ntíɛŋ ŋa a yuŋ nɛ.”
Jishɔ jɛ̄ nchhɔ mbɨ̄ga ŋgwa pa laʼataoŋ pɛ ŋa a ni njiɛŋ nchwīe pa nnu ghraoghrao fɔ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ.

“Ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pəɨ, ma ŋgwa Korashiŋ! Ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pəɨ, ma ŋgwa Beshaida! Nthɛ ŋa pa nnu ghraoghrao pei ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ hɛiŋ nɛ kaŋ ni mbɔ pi Tairɛ pugu Shidoŋ, pugu kaŋ ni ŋkwo māʼaŋ ndhwí ywei gu nchhɔ moŋ phu nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ.
Ndɔ ǹshwei vəɨ, a shi ndɛ njiʼɛ ni ŋgwa Tairɛ pugu Shidoŋ moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa nchaa vəɨ.

Ndɔ ni pəɨ, ma ŋgwa Kapanuŋ, pəɨ pīʼi ŋa Minnwi shi ndɔ̄gɔ vəɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɔ po? Ŋga! A shi nshwiʼi vəɨ moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋgwa khu. Pa nnu ghraoghrao pei ŋa ǹchwīe nu shhɨ pəɨ nɛ kaŋ ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi Shodoŋ, pugu kaŋ ni ŋkwri nnɛ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ shiʼa.
Ndɔ ǹshwei vəɨ, a shi ndɛ njiʼɛ ni ŋgwa laʼataoŋ Shodoŋ moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa nchaa vəɨ.”
Moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Tǎa, a gɔ̀ mbɔ Taathɔ po pugu pa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ. Ǹtōo ghɔ nthɛ ŋa yaoŋ ŋa ɔ lə̄ɨŋ ni ghaŋ shiethɔ pugu pa ghaŋ lɨna nɛ, ɔ nōoŋ ni pa puoŋ fhu.
Ooŋ, ma Tǎa, yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ɔ ni ŋkhwā ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.

“Tǎa a kwo chaʼa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ mfɛ mbhɔ mu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ nji ŋoŋ ŋa Muuŋ yie ghɔ nɛ ŋkiɛŋ Tǎa, ndɔ paʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ nji ŋoŋ ŋa Tǎa yie ghɔ nɛ ŋkiɛŋ Muuŋ pugu pa shesheŋoŋ ŋa muuŋ chuʼɔ nɔ nōoŋ nu Tǎa ghɔ nɛ.
“P̂əɨ thɔ njəɨ a, ŋguoŋ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ wie noŋ pəɨ ndɔ ntiɛŋ lrì nɛ, m̀fɛ fɛrɛ noŋ ni pəɨ.
Tiɛŋ shhɔ̀ a mbəʼɨ ghɔ, njɛʼi mbhɔ mu nthɛ ŋa mi ŋoŋ mbɔmbɔrɔ ndɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ juju llɔ moŋ njùʼɔ mu, nnɛ, kaŋ ǹshi mfɛ fɛrɛ ni nchə̌ɨ yɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa shhɔ̀ a yīʼɛ, lrì a pɔ yi yīʼɛ yīʼɛ ŋkaa yu.”
Moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ Jishɔ nyīeŋ nu *Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu moŋ nyìeŋ shíe gɛ. Njì yia ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, pugu ka shíe gɛ ŋkru nu.
Pa ŋgwa Farashi ni ŋga njəɨ, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ thɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa gɨ́ lɔ mbiŋ ŋa pi chwīe Llɛ́ Ji nɛ.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ naa mɛ̄iŋ nnu ŋa Devi ni nchwīe ndɨɨ ŋa njì ni njia vugu pa ŋgwa pi nɛ?

Ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nii Nda Minnwi pugu pa ŋgwa pi, ndɔ̄gɔ brɛi ŋa pi ni mfɛ ni Minnwi nɛ ŋkru, mbɔ nnu ŋa gɨ́ shini ndɔ mbiŋ ŋa a kru, ki ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ nɛ kru, ŋkiɛŋ pa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi.
Ki pəɨ lɔ mɛ̄iŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ moŋ Nda Minnwi ghà mbəʼɨ Llɛ́ Ji
ndɔ paʼa gɨ́ lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu?
Ǹshwei vəɨ, yaoŋ ŋa a chaa Nda Minnwi nɛ pɔ hɛnɛiŋ.
P̈əɨ kaŋ nji njiŋ nnu yei ŋa, ‘Ǹtāʼa nu ŋa ŋgwa nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mfɛ pi yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ,’ pəɨ shi kaŋ ndɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ ŋa mbhɔ yi yi woo nɛ nɔ ŋgushaʼa.
Nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua Taathɔ Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu.”
Jishɔ lɔllɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nii moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi yugu.
Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ mbɔ ŋkwíni mbhɔ. Pugu pie Jishɔ ŋa, “Gɨ́ piŋ ŋa pi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋoŋ Llɛ́ Ji?” nnɛ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu mi.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A gɔ̌ shɨna pəɨ ŋa ä mfāʼo minjɨɨ a gū moŋ tiɛŋ llɛ́ ji, paʼa a lɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi ŋkə̄rə mfuʼu?
Ŋoŋmishua ghaʼo nchaa minjɨɨ kiʼɛ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ? Nɛnnɛ gɨ́ piŋ ŋa pi chwīe shiʼi llɛ́ Ji.”
Nnɛ a chhu ni ŋkwíni mbhɔ ghɔ ŋa,
“Shwīi mbhɔ yɔ.”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ shwīi mbhɔ yi, a kiʼi ndɔ mbɔ pi shiʼi nɔ yichəɨ taʼa ŋgei mbhɔ yi.
Ndɔ pa ŋgwa Farashi taoŋ mbhi ŋgə̄ɨ nyiaŋ ntáŋ nthɛ Jishɔ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu shi njwi vi nɛ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga nji ntáŋ yei, nshūu mbɨnɨ njiŋ llɔ fɔ. Ntou ŋgwa younjiŋ yi, a yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu ghao,
ndɔ fɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu chwīe pichəɨ ŋgwa ji vi.
Yei ni mbɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa Ishaya, mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, ni nchhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ:
“Līi njəɨ, muuŋ fàʼa a yei ŋa ǹchuʼɔ,
mbɔ muuŋ yɛ ŋa ŋ̀khwā nɛ, m̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ mbɨŋ yu.
Ǹshi nūʼɔŋ Jijwɛ a mbɨŋ yu,
a shi nchīi ndɨndɨ
ni ŋgwa pa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Mbaʼa a yiʼi mfɛ̄ʼi fɛ̀ʼi ki mbaʼo ŋgòu thɔ ŋgwa,
mbaʼa ŋoŋ yiʼi njaʼo ŋggì yi moŋ pa taʼandaoŋ.
Mbaʼa a yiʼi mbəʼɨ kàʼa ŋa a kwo fāʼo lə̄ɨŋ nɛ,
ki mbɨgɛi truka ŋa a ŋkɨɨ nu nɛ ti a shi nuʼuŋ nchwīe ndɨndɨ ghaʼa lɨʼɨ
Ŋgwa pa laʼataoŋ nduoŋ shi mfāʼo kwàʼa pi mbiŋ yu.”
Nɛnnɛ ŋgwa pichəɨ ghə̄ɨ njəɨ Jishɔ ni ŋoŋ chəɨ ŋa miŋwɛiŋ ni mbɔ mbɨŋ yu, paʼa a lɔ nthɔ njəɨ lɨʼɨ, mbɨnɨ mbɔ fhɨncho. Jishɔ chwīe a pɔ shiʼi, nnɛ mfāʼo njɨ nɔ chrā nu ndɔ mbɨnɨ njəɨ lɨʼɨ.
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋgrāo nthɔ nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei nthɛ a pɔ muuŋ Devi?”
Ndɔ pa ŋgwa Farashi ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, nchhu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei wuʼɔ mfuʼu miŋwɛiŋ pi ni ghrɨ́ Bɛjɛbu mbɔ nthishɨ pa miŋwɛiŋ.”
Jishɔ ni nji nnu ŋa pugu ni mbīʼi nu nɛ, nnɛ nchhu ŋa,
“Sheshe laʼataoŋ ŋa ŋgwa chhɔ māʼaŋ noŋ pugu ni nchhɔ̀ fɔ nɛ shi ŋguʼɔ ŋgū, ndɔ mbaʼa sheshe laʼa ki nda ŋa a pɔ pi ni minduoŋnduoŋ yiʼi ntithi.
Ti S̈hata mfuʼu Shata, kaŋ a thi pi moŋ minduoŋnduoŋ ni noŋ yi, shaʼafuoŋ yi lara pi nɛiŋ?
Ti ä mbɔ ŋa m̀fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ pi ni ghrɨ́ Bɛjɛbu, kaŋ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pəɨ ghà, mfuʼu yugu kiʼɛ pi ni ghrɨ́ gɔ̌? Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pugu shi mbɔ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu shi nshaʼa vəɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ ä mbɔ ŋa m̀fuʼu pa miŋwɛiŋ pi ni Jijwɛ Minnwi, kaŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi thɔ shɨna pəɨ.
“Ki minthɛ ŋoŋ kie nɛiŋ nii nda ŋgaŋ ghrɨ́ ntiɛŋ maoŋ pi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ ki lɔ mfǔoŋ ŋkrao ŋgaŋ ghrɨ́ ghɔ. A wuʼɔ kəʼɨ ghɔ, ŋa minthɛ a tiɛŋ maoŋ pi ntaoŋ nɔ nda yu.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ ŋgei mu nɛ mbɨ̌na a, ŋoŋ ŋa pigi yu lɔ ŋkɨrɨ nu kaʼa nɛ thɔ nshaaŋshaaŋ.
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshwei vəɨ, pi shi ndīʼɛ sheshe phɨ pugu pa chrà nchɨʼəshə ŋa ŋgwa chrā nɛ, ndɔ ti shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shi nchrā chrà nchɨʼəshə nɔ ligi Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ, mbaʼa pi līʼɛ phɨ yi.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shi nchrā nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua nɛ pi shi ndīʼɛ phɨ yi, ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chrā phɨ nthɛ Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ, mbaʼa pi līʼɛ phɨ yi moŋ yei mbhi ndwɛ ki moŋ yɛ ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ.
“Chwīe thɨ pwa kaŋ ntíɛŋ yi shi mbwa, ndāa nnɛ ɔ chwīe a pɔ yi pɨphɨ, ntíɛŋ yi pɔ yi pɨphɨ, nthɛ ŋa pi ghà nji thɨ pi ŋkuoŋ ntíɛŋ yi.
Mbhɛ mitwɛʼi pei! Pəɨ nthɛ pəɨ kie pi nɛiŋ nchrā nnu shiʼi ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi ŋgwa pɨphɨ nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa nchò ghà nchrā pi yaoŋ ŋa a pɨgəɨ llɔ moŋ njùʼɔ nɛ.
Ŋoŋ shiʼi ghà nthɔ ni maoŋ shiʼi llɔ moŋ pìɛŋ maoŋ shiʼi pi, ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ thɔ ni maoŋ pɨphɨ llɔ moŋ pìɛŋ maoŋ pi pi pɨphɨ.
Ǹshwei vəɨ, moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa, ŋgwa shi mfɨ̄ʼɨ sheshe muuŋ mi chrà ki tou ŋa a taoŋ nchò pugu nɛ.
Pi shi ndɔ̄gɔ chrà yɔ nshaʼa ghɔ nɔ ghɔ, nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa ɔ tɔgɔ sháʼa ki ŋa ɔ gū sháʼa.”
Nnɛ pichəɨ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi chhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Masha, pigi tāʼa nu ŋa ɔ nōoŋ lì pigi yəɨ.”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ pɨphɨ pugu pa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ ŋkɨna pugu Minnwi ghà ntāʼa pi lì, ndɔ mbaʼa pi nōoŋ kaŋ taʼa lì ghɔ ŋkiɛŋ yi njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Jona.
Nthɛ ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Jona ni mbɔ puŋ mmɛ shhu nɔ trɛi naoŋchɨ ni trɛi tuʼu nɛ, a wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mbɔ moŋ njùʼɔ shhɛ nɔ trɛi naoŋchɨ ni trɛi tuʼu nɛ.

Moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa, ŋgwa Nineve shi ma ntithi pugu pa ŋgwrɛiŋgwa yei ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ ndɨɨ ŋa Jona ni nchu chrà Minnwi ni pugu nɛ, ndɔ ti līi njəɨ, yaoŋ ŋa a chaa Jona nɛ pɔ hɛiŋ.

Moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa, Ŋgwafuoŋ llɔ mbiɛŋ shi ma ntithi pugu pa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yei ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa nthɛ ŋa a ki nyīeŋ ŋkiɛŋ ntaaŋ ndaoŋ llɔ laʼataoŋ yu nthɔ njwɛrɛ ntɨ́gɨ shiethɔ mbhɔ Fùoŋ Sholomu, ndɔ līi njəɨ, yaoŋ ŋa a chaa Sholomu nɛ pɔ hɛiŋ.
“Ndɨɨ ŋa jijwɛ miŋwɛiŋ taoŋ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ nɛ, a nyīeŋ moŋ pa lɨʼɨ yó nthɔ ntāʼa lɨʼɨ fɛrɛ noŋ yi, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ sheshe yi.
Nnɛ nchhu ŋa, ‘Ǹshi mbɨnɨ nda mu lɨʼɨ ŋa mi ni ndhɔ nɛ.’ A ghà mbɨnɨ, njəɨ moŋ nda a pɔ yi yo ki yaoŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ, pi kwo yɨ̄gɨ ndɔ nchwīe a kāʼo.

Nɛnnɛ, a pɨ̄nɨ kiʼɛ ndɔ̄gɔ khwachəɨ pichəɨ jijwɛ haʼaŋ pugu pɨgɨ nchaa vi nɛ pugu pugu thɔ nii ndaʼa nu fɔ, chɔmbhi ŋoŋ ghɔ pɨnɨ mbɨgɨ nchaa nɔ haʼaŋ a ni fǔoŋ mbɔ nɛ. A nɔ haʼaŋ a shi mbɔ ni ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ pɨphɨ yei nɛ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni ŋguʼɔ nthɔ nchrā nu ni ŋgwa pighɔ nɛ, ŋga njəɨ nu mǔuŋ vi pugu pa lǐŋ pi pi pimbia thi mbhi nthɔ ntāʼa nu nchrā pugu pugu.
Nɛnnɛ, pichəɨ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, mǔuŋ ghɔ pugu pa lǐŋ pɔ pi pimbia pɔ nɛ mbhi ntāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ pugu chrā.”
Ndɔ Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni nchhu ghɔ nɛ ŋa,
“Mǔuŋ a pɔ pi gɔ̌, pa lǐŋ paŋ pɔ pa gɔ̌?”
Mfɛ mbhɔ yi nshwɛ̄ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nchhu ŋa,
“Līi njəɨ, mǔuŋ a pugu pa lǐŋ paŋ pɔ nɛiŋ!
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe nnu ŋa Tǎa a po tāʼa nu nɛ, ndǐŋ a yi mimbia pugu yi miŋgwɛ ni mǔuŋ a.”
Wuʼɔ llɛ́ ghɔ, Jishɔ taoŋ nda ŋgə̄ɨ nchhɔ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ.
Mmɛ yú ŋgwa kɨrɨ yəɨ yu ti a nii pi moŋ kikuoŋ nchɔchhɔ fɔ, yú ŋgwa pighɔ thi ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ.
A chhu ntou pa nnu ni pugu moŋ luʼɔ chrà ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni ma mbɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ māʼaŋ mbhɛ̌ maoŋ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni māʼaŋ nu nɛ, pichəɨ gū shhɛmbua, pa mishi shwiʼi ŋkru.
Pichəɨ gū moŋ shhɛ ŋkwá lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ntou nchíʼa shi ki lɔ mbɔ nɛ, njiʼa ŋkhɛkhɛ nthɛ ŋa nchíʼa shi ki lɔ njiɛŋ fɔ.
Ndɔ minaoŋ ghà nthɛ ntūoŋ vugu, nthɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mfāʼo ŋǐeŋ yugu nɛ, pugu kāʼo mbraoprao ŋkhu.
Pichəɨ mbhɛ̌ gū moŋ shishaʼa, shishaʼa yīʼɛ ŋkuʼɔ mfīgi maoŋ pighɔ pugu khu.
Pichəɨ mbhɛ̌ maoŋ pighɔ gū moŋ shhɛ shiʼi, mbūgu fɔ ŋkuʼɔ nja njuŋ: pichəɨ yuŋ taʼa ŋkɨɨ yi, pichəɨ yuŋ ntɨgao wuŋ yi, pichəɨ yuŋ trɛi wuŋ.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo.”
Nnɛ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “A chwīe khɔ ɔ chrā nu ni pugu pi moŋ luʼɔ chrà?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pi fɛ njɨ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ ji pa nnu lə̄ɨŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po nɛ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfɛ ni pugu.
Nthɛ ŋa ni ŋoŋ ŋa a kwo fāʼo nɛ, pi shi mbīgi ntou yi a fāʼo a yiɛŋ, ndɔ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo nɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi shɨgɛi yɛ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ, pi shi ŋka kwekwe.
A chwīe yie ǹchrā ni pugu pi moŋ luʼɔ chrà nthɛ ŋa,
Pugu shi njəɨ nu ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ,
njaʼo nu ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njaʼo ki nji.
Nnɛ nnu ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Ishaya ni nchhu nɛ wɛ̄iŋ vugu, nnu ghɔ ni mbɔ ŋa,
‘Pəɨ shi nja njaʼo ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nji njiŋ yi,
Pəɨ shi nja ndīi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa njùʼɔ ŋgwa pei kwo fɨ̄nɨ,
tə́nə yugu chri ki lɔ nuʼuŋ njaʼo lɨʼɨ,
pugu kwo kwiri ligi yugu
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pugu yəɨ ni ligi yugu,
njaʼo ni tə́nə yugu,
nji ni njùʼɔ yugu
ŋkara mbara a, ǹchwīe pugu pɔ shiʼi.’
“Ndɔ ni pəɨ, pəɨ fāʼo mbɔrɔ, nthɛ ŋa ligi yəɨ yəɨ lɨʼɨ tə́nə yəɨ yaʼo lɨʼɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, ntou pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pugu pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ni njūa nu nɔ yəɨ nu nnu ŋa pəɨ yəɨ nɛ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ, njūa nɔ yaʼo nu nnu ŋa pəɨ yaʼo nɛ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njaʼo.
“Yaʼo nɛ njiŋ luʼɔ chrà nthɛ ŋgaŋ māʼaŋ mbhɛ̌.
Ndɨɨ ŋa shesheŋoŋ yaʼo chrà Shaʼafuoŋ Po ki lɔ nji njiŋ yi nɛ, ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ thɔ mfuʼu yaoŋ ŋa pi phi njùʼɔ yu nɛ. Yei pɔ nɔ yɛ mbhɛ̌ ŋa pugu ni ŋgū pi shɛmbua nɛ.
Pɛ mbhɛ̌ maoŋ ŋa pugu ni ŋgū pi moŋ shhɛ ŋkwá nɛ pɔ pi pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi njiʼɛ ŋkwe ni pwanjuʼɔ
ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo ŋǐeŋ yugu yi tɨtɨnɨ, ŋguʼɔ ntithi pi nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ, mōoŋ nu pugu pa ŋgəʼɨ gha nthɔ nthɛ chrà ghɔ ŋa pugu yaʼo nɛ, pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni chrà ghɔ.
Pɛ mbhɛ̌ ŋa pugu ni ŋgū moŋ shishaʼa nɛ, pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi, ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ, pa ghaghana ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei, pugu pa mifɨɨ ŋa pa fāʼo ghà nthɔ nɔ nɛ fīgi chrà ghɔ paʼa a lɔ ma njuŋ ntíɛŋ.
Pɛ mbhɛ̌ ŋa pi ni mbhi moŋ shhɛ shiʼi nɛ pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi ndɔ nji njiŋ yi, nja njuŋ ntíɛŋ, pichəɨ yuŋ ti nchəɨŋ taʼa ŋkɨɨ yi, pichəɨ pɔ ntɨgao wuŋ, pichəɨ pɔ trɛi wuŋ.”
Jishɔ pɨnɨ nchhu yichəɨ luʼɔ chrà ni pugu:
“A nthɛ pi māʼaŋ fɨʼɨ Shaʼafuoŋ Po ni ŋoŋ ŋa a ni māʼaŋ mbhɛ̌ maoŋ shiʼi moŋ nyìeŋ yu
ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgwa pi ni ndhɛ nu nɛ, mbɨ̌na vi thɔ māʼaŋ mbhɛ̌ trǔ shɨna pa shíe gɛ pighɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni vhi.
Maoŋ pighɔ gha ŋkhɛ̄ ti njuŋ nu, pa trǔ pighɔ khɛ̄ ŋkaa pugu.
“Pa puoŋ fàʼa ŋoŋ ghɔ thɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Masha, ɔ ni māʼaŋ pi ŋkiɛŋ mbhɛ̌ moŋ nyìeŋ, ti a kie pi nɛiŋ pa trǔ pɔ moŋ ghɔ?’
“A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, ‘Nnu yei chwīe Mimbɨna.’
“Puoŋ fàʼa pighɔ pie vi ŋa, ‘Ɔ tāʼa nu kiʼɛ ŋa pigi ghə̄ɨ shūʼɔ pa trǔ pighɔ?’
“Ndɔ a khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, ‘Ŋga! A nthɛ pəɨ gha nthɔ nshūʼɔ pa trǔ, nshūʼɔ pa shíe gɛ ŋkaa pugu.
Pəɨ mieŋ ŋguoŋ yi ghao kuʼɔ kaʼa ti ndɨɨ kwōo nuʼuŋ nthɔ, moŋ ndɨɨ kwōo, ǹshi nshwei ni ghaŋ kwōo ŋa, p̂əɨ fǔoŋ nshūʼɔ pa trǔ, ŋkrao moŋ pa káʼa ntūoŋ, ndɔ nshūʼɔ shíe gɛ kiʼɛ nūʼɔŋ shaoŋ mu.’ ”
Jishɔ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchhu yichəɨ luʼɔ chrà ni pugu,
“Shaʼafuoŋ Po pɔ pi nɔ mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ yi gɛ, ŋa ŋoŋ lɔ̄gɔ ŋgə̄ɨ māʼaŋ moŋ nyìeŋ yu.
A lɔ mbɔ ŋgɨgɛi nchaa ŋguoŋ pa pichəɨ mbhɛ̌ maoŋ, ndɔ a gha ŋkuʼɔ, mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yi nchaa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ moŋ nyìeŋ, ŋgū thɨ, nnɛ pa mishi thɔ ŋkrao pa nda pugu ŋkuoŋ pa mbhɔ mi.”
A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchhu yichəɨ luʼɔ chrà ni pugu ŋa,
“Shaʼafuoŋ Po pɔ pi nɔ yaoŋ chwīe prupɨna kuʼɔ, haʼaŋ miŋgwɛ lɔ̄gɔ niʼiŋ moŋ taʼa brumaʼa prupɨna, a chwīe ŋguoŋ prupɨna ghɔ kuʼɔ ghao.”
Jishɔ ni nchhu ŋguoŋ nnu pei ni pa yú ŋgwa pighɔ moŋ luʼɔ chrà, a shini ndɔ nchhu kaŋ taʼa nnu ni pugu ki lɔ mbɔ pi moŋ luʼɔ chrà.
Yei ni mbɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nchhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa,
“Ǹshi ŋaʼaŋ nchò a nchrā moŋ pa luʼɔ chrà.
Ǹshi nchhu pa nnu ŋa pi shi ki lɔ nji llɔ moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni nchwīe mbhi nɛ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga mieŋ yú ŋgwa pighɔ nii nda, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ njəɨ vi, nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa, “Fɨ̄ʼɨ njiŋ luʼɔ chrà nthɛ trǔ moŋ nyìeŋ ni pigi.”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a māʼaŋ ŋkiɛŋ mbhɛ̌ maoŋ nɛ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua.
Moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ pɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi, mbhɛ̌ maoŋ shiʼi pɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu puoŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po nɛ, pa trǔ pɔ pa puoŋ ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ,
mimbɨna ŋa a phi trǔ ghɔ nɛ pɔ devɨ, maoŋ kwōo pɔ ndɨɨ ŋa mbhi shi ndugwi nɛ, ghaŋ kwōo maoŋ pɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi.
“Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ghà ŋkɨrɨ trǔ ntūoŋ ni móŋoŋ nɛ, a wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a shi mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa mbhi lūgwi nɛ.
Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi ntaoŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi pugu kɨrɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà nchwīe ŋgwa chwīe phɨ ndɔ mbəʼɨ kɨna nɛ mfuʼu moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ yi,
māʼaŋ vugu moŋ nda móŋoŋ ŋguʼɔ liɛŋ. Moŋ lɨʼɨ ghɔ, kə̄ɨ pugu pa kru shua shi mbɔ fɔ.
Nnɛ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ thɛ nɔ minaoŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Tǎa vugu. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo.
“Shaʼafuoŋ Po pɔ nɔ fàʼo ŋa pi lə̄ɨŋ moŋ nyìeŋ ŋa yichəɨ ŋoŋ ghə̄ɨ njəɨ mbūoŋ. Nnɛ moŋ pwanjuʼɔ yi, a ghə̄ɨ mfīni ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ ŋgə̄ɨ njuoŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ.
“Ŋkamuʼɔŋ, Shaʼafuoŋ Po pɔ nɔ ŋgaŋ piʼɛ taŋ ŋa a ni nthɔ ntāʼa ŋkiɛŋ ŋgùʼɔ
tɨnɨnchuoŋ,
ŋga njəɨ taʼa ŋkiɛŋ ŋgùʼɔ tɨnɨnchuoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni pəə nɛ, a ghə̄ɨ mfīni ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ njuoŋ nɔ ghɔ.
“Nɔ pigi nu, yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po pɔ nɛ. A pɔ nɔ ndáŋ ŋa pi māʼaŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ shhu ghao.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ndáŋ ghɔ lɨnaoŋ nɛ, ŋgwa shūu ŋkuʼɔ nɔ ghɔ mbhi nchɔchhɔ ntɛrɛ pa ŋkiɛŋ shhu niʼiŋ moŋ pa mikuo mīʼaŋ pi pɨphɨ.
A ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a shi mbɔ moŋ ndugwi mbhi yei nɛ. Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi shi nthɔ ntɛrɛ ŋgwa pɨphɨ, mfuʼu moŋ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ,
māʼaŋ vugu moŋ nda móŋoŋ ŋguʼɔ liɛŋ. Moŋ lɨʼɨ ghɔ, kə̄ɨ shi mbɔ fɔ pugu pa kru shua.
“Thɔ yəɨ shie ni ŋguoŋ nnu pei?”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ooŋ.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, sheshe ŋgaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi ŋa a ŋgaŋ younjiŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po nɛ pɔ nɔ ŋgaŋ nda ŋa a fuʼu pa maoŋ fhi pugu pa ndunu maoŋ llɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ nūʼɔŋ pugu.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ pa luʼɔ chrà pei, ndɔllɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ

ŋga nchəɨŋ moŋ ji laʼataoŋ, nthɔ njɛʼi vugu moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi yugu. Pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni njaʼo nɔ haʼaŋ a yɛʼi nu nɛ ghrāo nchhu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei yəɨ fɨʼɨ shiethɔ yei pugu pa ghrɨ́ pi hɨŋ nɔ fāʼa nu tɨtɨnɨ fàʼa pei nɔ ghɔ?
Yei lɔ mbɔ muuŋ kaminda? Ligi mǔuŋ vi lɔ mbɔ Meri? Jɛiŋ, Joshɛ, Shemu pugu Judashi shi lɔ mbɔ pa lǐŋ pi?
Pia pa lǐŋ pi pi piŋgɛ shi lɔ mbɔ hɛiŋ kaʼa? Ti a yəɨ shiethɔ pugu ghrɨ́ pi hɨŋ nɔ chwīe nu ŋkwaŋ nnu pei nɔ ghɔ?”
Nnɛ pugu lāa vi.
Ndɔ Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pi shiʼa nchɨ̄ʼə njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋkiɛŋ laʼa pugu shɨna ŋgwa pi.”
A shini ndɔ nchwīe ntou pa nnu ghraoghrao fɔ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ ghaŋ ki piŋ.
Hɛrɔ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ shaʼa Galili, ni ŋga njaʼo fɨʼɨ ndighaʼo Jishɔ,
nchhu ni puoŋ fàʼa pi ŋa, “Yei Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ. Pi kuʼɔ vi llɔ moŋ gu, a chwīe yie a fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu ghraoghrao pei.”
Nthɛ ŋa Hɛrɔ ni ŋkwo wɛ̄iŋ Jouŋ ŋkrao vi māʼaŋ moŋ chə́ɨŋ nthɛ nnu Herodia mbɔ ŋgwɛ Fili ndǐŋ vi.
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ ni nthɔ nchhu nu ni Hɛrɔ ŋa, “A lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo vɛ ŋa ɔ laŋ Herodia!”
Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ Hɛrɔ ni ntāʼa nu njwi vi ndɨɨ ghɔ nɛ, a ni mbɔgɔ pa ŋgwa Juu nthɛ ŋa pugu ni ndɔ̄gɔ Jouŋ nɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.
Pi ni ŋga nthɔ njɨ llɛ́ phi Hɛrɔ, muuŋ Herodia yi miŋgwɛ pini pini shhɨ ŋgwa, túa Hɛrɔ pwa.
Nnɛ, a kāʼa vi ndɔ nshwrɛ̄i ŋa a shi ŋkɨnɛiŋ vi ni sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a shi mbie vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Mǔuŋ vi chwīe a pie ŋa, “Fɛ thɔ Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ vəɨ hɛiŋ ŋkuoŋ pashinja yei.”
Fùoŋ ni mbɔ ni tuʼuthɔ, ndɔ nthɛ kɨna ŋa a ni ŋkwo shwrɛ̄i shhɨ ghaŋ gɛ̀ pi nɛ, a fɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi thɔ ni thɔ Jouŋ mfɛ ghɔ.
A taoŋ ŋgwa pi yaʼa thɔ Jouŋ moŋ chə́ɨŋ,
nthɔ ni thɔ yi ghɔ ŋkuoŋ pashinja, mfɛ ni muuŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ, a ghə̄ɨ njəɨ mǔuŋ vi nɔ ghɔ.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jouŋ thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ khu Jouŋ ŋgə̄ɨ ntwei, ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nshwei Jishɔ nɔ ghɔ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, ndɔllɔ fɔ moŋ kikuoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋgwa lɔ mbɔ nɛ. Ndɔ pa ŋgwa ni njaʼo, njōu njiŋ yi ni kwo llɔ moŋ pa laʼa.
A ni ŋga ntaoŋ ŋkaoŋ mbhi, njəɨ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yú ŋgwa, mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pugu, njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni fanaoŋ, ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ njəɨ vi nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Yei pɔ pi lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋgwa lɔ mbɔ, ndɨɨ lɔ ŋkwo ya ŋgə̄ɨ, chhu yú ŋgwa pei ghə̄ɨ moŋ pa laʼa, njuoŋ maoŋ jɨ pugu fɔ njɨ.”
Ndɔ Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu, p̂əɨ fɛ yaoŋ ni pugu pugu jɨ.”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi wuʼɔ mfāʼo pi tiɛŋ kəɨŋ brɛi hɛiŋ ni paa shhu.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ thɔ nɔ hɛiŋ.”

Nɛnnɛ a fɛ gɨ́ ni yú ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu chɔchɔ ŋkuoŋ trǔ. A lɔ̄gɔ tiɛŋ kəɨŋ brɛi ni paa shhu pighɔ, ŋga mbɨʼɨ ligi yi ndīi po, mfɛ tōo nu ni Minnwi. Mbəʼɨ brɛi pighɔ kiʼɛ mfɛ ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi. Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi fɛ ni yú ŋgwa pighɔ.
Ŋguoŋ yugu kru ti njru. Pugu ni ndɨ̄ga pa pəʼɨ pəʼɨ pɨgəɨ pi, a lɨnaoŋ paanchrɔ mikuo.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkru nɛ ni mbɔ tiɛŋ ŋkaŋ pimbia maa ndɔ̄gɔ piŋgɛ pugu pa puoŋ.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ Jishɔ chwīe ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nii moŋ kikuoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nɔ shaʼa nu ntaoŋ njiɛŋ hiŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchhu nu ni kɨrɨ ghɔ ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ nɛ.
A ni ŋga ŋkwo chhu ni kɨrɨ ghɔ ti pugu ghə̄ɨ, a kuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra lɨʼɨ luoŋ Minnwi təʼɨ vi. Fanaoŋ ni ŋga nthɔ, Jishɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ fɔ təʼɨ vi.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ yei, kikuoŋ ghɔ ni ŋkwo ya ŋgə̄ɨ ndaoŋ shɨga moŋ ŋkhǐ, fɨfrəɨ thɔ ndɨʼɨ vi nthɛ ŋa a ni ntaoŋ pi ŋgei yɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni ndaʼa mbhi laŋ, moŋ shɨna trɛi minaoŋ pugu ntɨgao minaoŋ, a nyīeŋ nu ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ nthɔ nu yəɨ pugu.
Ndɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni ŋga njəɨ vi a nyīeŋ nu ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ nthɔ nu nɛ, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu pugu chhu ŋa, “A pɔ pi ŋkhushɛ!” mbaʼo ŋgòu moŋ pɔgɔ gu.
Ndɔ wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ Jishɔ chrā ni pugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ, a mmu, kiʼi pəɨ pɔgɔ gu.”
Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ä mbɔ gɔ̀, ɔ fɛ gɨ́ vəɨ ŋa nthɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ mbara ghɔ.”
A chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Thɔ.”
Nnɛ, Pita taoŋ moŋ kikuoŋ nyīeŋ ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ para Jishɔ.
Ndɔ a ni ŋga njəɨ fɨfrəɨ, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vi, a jɛ̄ yie nu, ŋkə̄ɨ ŋa, “Taathɔ, kwe a!”
Jishɔ fɛ mbhɔ yi chomilaoŋ ghɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi, nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa,
“Yo, ŋgaŋ piŋ kikɛʼi vei! A ni nchwīe khɔ ɔ fāʼo khuthɔ?”
Pugu yu gha nii moŋ kikuoŋ, fɨfrəɨ ghɔ tithi.
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ moŋ kikuoŋ nɛ ghaʼo vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Shishini, ɔ Muuŋ Minnwi!”
Pugu ni ŋga nshaʼa, ntaoŋ mbhi lɨʼɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Gɛnɛsharɛ nɛ,
pa ŋgwa lɨʼɨ pighɔ gha nji ŋa a Jishɔ, ntaoŋ ŋgwa moŋ ŋguoŋ krao ŋgei ghɔ, pugu thɔ ni pa ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ njəɨ vi nɔ ghɔ.
Pugu lɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a mieŋ ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ wuʼɔ ŋkāoŋ pi po ndhwí yi. Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni ŋkāoŋ ndhwí yi nɛ, noŋ yugu tɔgɔ.
Nnɛ, a gha ndara pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi thɔ llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ njəɨ Jishɔ nchhu ŋa,
“A chwīe khɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ pəʼɨ nùʼɔŋ pa tǎa? Pugu shiʼa njiʼi nshɨ̄gao mbhɔ yugu maa njɨ maoŋ.”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ti a chwīe khɔ pəɨ pəʼɨ kɨ̀na Minnwi nthɛ nùʼɔŋ yəɨ?
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi fɛ gɨ́ ŋa, ‘Ghaʼo tǎa ghɔ pugu mǔuŋ ghɔ,’ ndɔ ‘Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chrā nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ tǎa vi, ki mǔuŋ vi nɛ yiʼi ŋa pi shi njwi vi.’
Ndɔ pəɨ chhu yəɨ ŋa, ‘Ŋ̈oŋ nchhu ni tǎa vi ki mǔuŋ vi ŋa, “Yaoŋ ŋa ŋ̀ka ni mfɛ vɛ nɛ, mfɛ ni Minnwi,”
ŋoŋ ghɔ lɔ mfāʼo nɔ ghaʼo nu tǎa vi.’ Nnɛ nthɛ nùʼɔŋ yəɨ, pəɨ chwīe chrà Minnwi pɔ gha.
Pa ŋgwa mifɨɨ pei! Njəɨlɨʼɨ mbɔ Ishaya ni nchhu shini ndɨɨ ŋa a ni nchrā nthɛ vəɨ ŋa,
‘Ŋgwa pei ghà ŋgaʼo a pi ni nchò yugu,
ndɔ paʼa njùʼɔ yugu lɔ mbara yəɨ mu,
Ghɛ̀rɛ lɔ mbɔ ni pugu moŋ ghaʼo nu ma,
nthɛ ŋa pugu yɛʼi nūʼɔŋ ŋgwamishua nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ pi gɨ́ a!’ ”
Jishɔ mɛ̄iŋ ŋgwa pighɔ pugu thɔ njəɨ vi, a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ ywɛrɛ ndɔ njaʼo.
A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa a ghà nii nchò ŋoŋ nɛ ŋa a ghà mfuo vi, a pɔ pi yaoŋ ŋa a taoŋ nchò yu nɛ. A yie ghɔ mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa a ghà mfuo ŋoŋ nɛ.”
Nnɛ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ njəɨ vi nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ ji ŋa pa ŋgwa Farashi fāʼo pɨgɨtua ndɨɨ ŋa pugu yaʼo ɔ chhu nnu yei nɛ?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Sheshe thɨ ŋa a lɔ mbhi Tǎa a po nɛ, pi shi nshūʼɔ.
Kiʼi pəɨ wie noŋ yəɨ nthɛ vugu. Pugu pa nchriligi nthɔ nōoŋ ndaoŋ ni pa nchriligi. Ndɔ ti n̈chriligi nōoŋ ndaoŋ ni nchriligi, ŋguoŋ vugu gū moŋ tiɛŋ.”
Ndɔ Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Shwei njiŋ luʼɔ chrà ghɔ ni pigi.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ wuʼɔ mbou pi lɨna ŋkaa pəɨ?
Pəɨ lɔ naa njəɨ ŋa sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a nii nchò nɛ tiri nii moŋ puŋ, ntiri ntaoŋ nii moŋ krao?
Ndɔ ti yaoŋ ŋa a taoŋ moŋ nchò nɛ, llɔ pi moŋ njùʼɔ, nchwīe ɔ pɔ yi fuo.
Nthɛ ŋa pa kwàʼa pɨphɨ, jwi nu ŋoŋ, nnu shúoŋ mbhɔ ghaŋ láŋ, ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu kwoshuoŋ ghao, ŋgɨna, kwe nu ntie ni mbe pugu pa chrā nu phɨ nɔ ligi ŋoŋ, llɔ pi moŋ njùʼɔ ŋoŋ.
A pa pie ghɔ mbɔ pa maoŋ pɛ ŋa a ghà mfuo ŋoŋ nɛ. Ndɔ jɨ nu yaoŋ ki lɔ nshɨ̄gao mbhɔ shiʼa njiʼi mfuo ŋoŋ.”
Jishɔ lɔllɔ fɔ nshūu mbɨnɨ njiŋnjiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ krao ŋgei Tairɛ pugu Shidoŋ.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, miŋgwɛ Kanaŋ chəɨ llɔ krao ŋgei ghɔ taoŋ mbaʼo ŋgòu nchhu ŋa, “Fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ mu, yo Taathɔ, Muuŋ Devi, muuŋ a yi miŋgwɛ thɔ mfāʼo ŋgəʼɨ llɔ mbhɔ pa miŋwɛiŋ.”
Ndɔ paʼa Jishɔ lɔ njiʼi ŋkhwɛ̄ taʼa chrà ghɔ. Ndɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ njəɨ vi ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa, “Yōu vi a ghə̄ɨ nthɛ ŋa a nyīeŋ mbaʼo ŋgòu nthɔ nu njiŋ pia!”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Pi ni ntaoŋ a pi wuʼɔ ni pa puoŋ Ishrae ŋa pugu pɔ nɔ pa minjɨɨ ŋa pugu phɛ nɛ.”
Ndɔ miŋgwɛ ghɔ thɔ ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɨ yu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Taathɔ, ghɛ̄rɛ a.”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“A lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu maoŋ jɨ puoŋ māʼaŋ ni pa miŋgu.”
Miŋgwɛ ghɔ chhu ŋa, “Ooŋ, ma Taathɔ, ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi pa miŋgu ghà njɨ pa ŋkuʼu maoŋ ŋa a gū llɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi taathɔ vugu nɛ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ kiʼɛ ŋa,
“Yo, miŋgwɛ vei! Ɔ fāʼo mmɛ piŋ! Nnu ŋa ɔ tāʼa nu nɛ pi shi nchwīe mfɛ vɛ.” Chomilaoŋ ghɔ noŋ muuŋ vi ghɔ kiʼi ndɔ ntɔgɔtɔgɔ.
Jishɔ lɔllɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nyīeŋ nu ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ Galili. Ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra nchɔchhɔ fɔ.
Ŋkiɛŋ ntou yú ŋgwa thɔ njəɨ vi ni pa ŋkwíni kwo, pa nchriligi, pa sheshe ŋkwaŋ ŋkwíni, pa fhɨncho, pugu pa ntou pichəɨ ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ, nūʼɔŋ vugu shhɨ Jishɔ a yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu.
Pa yú ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋgrāo ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ fhɨncho chrā nu, pa sheshe ŋkwaŋ ŋkwíni pɔ nu shiʼi, pa ŋkwíni kwò nyīeŋ nu, pa nchriligi yəɨ lɨʼɨ. Pugu ghaʼo Minnwi ŋgwa Ishrae.
Jishɔ mɛ̄iŋ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi yəɨ yu nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“M̀fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ yú yei nthɛ ŋa pugu kwo pɔ pigi pugu ndwɛ ni trɛi llɛ́ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo yaoŋ njɨ. Ǹdɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu mieŋ pugu ghə̄ɨ ni njì, kaŋ minthɛ shɔnɔ ŋgū ndaoŋ.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pia shi njəɨ ntou brɛi pi hɨŋ moŋ lɨʼɨ yó yei ti fɨʼɨ mmɛ yú ŋgwa pei kru njru?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fāʼo pi ndigi brɛi yi khɔ?”
Pugu chhu ŋa, “Yi khwachəɨ, ni shɨgɛi puoŋ mi shhu.”
Jishɔ chhu ni yú ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu chɔchɔ shhɛ.
A lɔ̄gɔ khwachəɨ ndigi brɛi ghɔ pugu pa shhu ghɔ, ŋga ŋkwo tōo Minnwi, mbəʼɨ mfɛ ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi fɛ ni yú ŋgwa pighɔ.
Ŋguoŋ vugu ghao kru ti njru. Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi lɨ̄ga pa pəʼɨpəʼɨ pɨgəɨ pi, a lɨnaoŋ moŋ khwachəɨ mɛmmɛ mikuo.
Ŋguoŋ pimbia pɛ ŋa pugu ni njɨ maoŋ pighɔ nɛ ni mbɔ khwɛ ŋkaŋ yugu, ŋkaoŋ maa ndɔ̄gɔ piŋgɛ pugu pa puoŋ.
A gha ŋkwo chhu pa yú ŋgwa pighɔ ghə̄ɨ, a nii moŋ kikuoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ krao ŋgei Magadaŋ.
Pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ŋgwa Shadushi thɔ njəɨ Jishɔ, ntāʼa nu mōoŋ vi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa a nōoŋ lì ni pugu llɔ po.
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“A ghà ŋga mbɔ ni fanaoŋ, pəɨ chhu ŋa mbhi shi mbwa nthɛ ŋa pəɨ līi ghaa mbhi njəɨ ŋa a pie.
A ghà mbɔ ni tutuʼu, pəɨ chhu ŋa, ‘mbɨ̀ shi ndhɔ nthɛ ŋa mbhi pie nshishini.’ Pəɨ ya nji līi nu ghaa mbhi nshwei njiŋ yi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nji njiŋ pa lì ŋa a thɔ nōoŋ nu moŋ mbhi nɛ.
Ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ pɨphɨ pugu pa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ ŋkɨna pugu Minnwi ghà ntāʼa pi lì, ndɔ mbaʼa pi yiʼi nōoŋ kaŋ taʼa lì ghɔ ŋkiɛŋ lì Jona.”
Nnɛ a mieŋ vugu ŋgə̄ɨ ni vhi.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ni ŋga nshāʼa ntaoŋ njiɛŋ hiŋ, ndīʼɛ nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu brɛi.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ lɨna yishi
pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ŋgwa Shadushi.”
Pugu jɛ̄ nthɔ nchrā nu ni noŋ pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Pia lɔ nthɔ ni brɛi, a chwīe yie a chhu nnɛ.”
Ndɔ Jishɔ ni ŋga nji nnu pei, nchhu ŋa,
“Yo, ghaŋ fāʼo piŋ kikɛʼi pei, A chwīe khɔ pəɨ chrā nu ni noŋ pəɨ ŋkuoŋ nnu pou brɛi?
Thɔ yəɨ lɔ naa nshie yaʼa? Pəɨ lɔ ŋkwiŋ tiɛŋ ndigi brɛi yɛ ni tiɛŋ ŋkaŋ pimbia, ni fɨʼɨ mikuo yɛ ŋa pɨgəɨ yi ni ndɨnaoŋ nɛ?
Ki ŋkwiŋ khwachəɨ ndigi brɛi ni khwɛ ŋkaŋ pimbia, ni fɨʼɨ pa mɛmmɛ mikuo ndɨnaoŋ ŋa pəɨ ni ndɨ̄ga nɛ?
A pɔ pi nɛiŋ ŋa pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nchrā nthɛ pi brɛi? P̂əɨ chhɔ ndɨna yishi pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ŋgwa Shadushi.”
Nɛnnɛ thɔ yugu shie kiʼɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ nchhu pi ŋa pugu chhɔ ndɨna yishi brɛi, a ni nchhu pi ŋa pugu lɨna yaoŋ ŋa pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ŋgwa Shadushi ghà ntɨgɨ nɛ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga nthɔ moŋ krao ŋgei Kaisharia Filipai, mbie ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Ŋgwa ghà nchhu ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Pugu chhu ŋa, “Pichəɨ chhu ŋa Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ, pichəɨ chhu ŋa Elaija, pichəɨ ŋa Jɛrimaya ki taʼa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ti pəɨ chhu ŋa mi pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Shemu Pita khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi maoŋ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Mbɔrɔ pɔ vɛ, ma Shemu muuŋ Jona. A lɔ njiʼi nōoŋ ŋoŋmishua nōoŋ yinɛ nnu vɛ, a nōoŋ Tǎa a ŋa a chhɔ po nɛ.
Ndɔ ǹshwei ghɔ, ɔ Pita (njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa ŋgùʼɔ), ndɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋgùʼɔ yei ǹshi ŋkrao chɔshi a, ndɔ ti mbaʼa njɨ gu lɛ ŋgaʼa vi.
Ǹshi mfɛ chuʼɔ nda Shaʼafuoŋ Po vɛ, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa ɔ krao ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ nɛ shi mbɔ yi krao po, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa ɔ fēi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ shi mbɔ yi fēi po.
Nnɛ, Jishɔ fɛ gɨ́ ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa kiʼi pugu shwei shesheŋoŋ ŋa a Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.

Jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ghɔ Jishɔ jɛ̄ nōoŋ nu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa a yiʼi ŋa a ghə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ, njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ ntou pa nnu llɔ mbhɔ pa thishɨ pugu pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi, pi jwi vi, a gha mbɔ trɛi llɛ́, a kuʼɔ.
Pita lɔ̄gɔ vi pugu yu ghə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ təʼɨ vugu njɛ̄ pɨ̄ga nu vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Mbaʼa a yiʼi mbɔ nnɛ vɛ, ma Taathɔ. Mbaʼa nnu yei ma ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ghɔ.”
Ndɔ a kara nchhu ni Pita ŋa,
“Lɔllɔ yəɨ mu, ma Shata. Ɔ pɔ pi kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ vəɨ nthɛ ŋa ɔ lɔ njiʼi nūʼɔŋ njùʼɔ yɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa nnu Minnwi, ɔ ka nūʼɔŋ pi ŋkuoŋ nnu ŋgwamishua.”
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Shesheŋoŋ ntāʼa nu njōu njiŋ a, a mieŋ phi nnu haʼaŋ a khwā nɛ, ntiɛŋ wáʼa yi njōu njiŋ a.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu ndūgu ni chɔmbhi yi nɛ shi shiɛŋ chɔmbhi yi ghɔ, ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a mīʼaŋ chɔmbhi yi nthɛ a nɛ, shi ndūgu ni chɔmbhi yi ghɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋmishua nthɛ a shei pi khɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ä mfāʼo ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao nɔ ji ndɔ nshiɛŋ chɔmbhi yi, ki ŋoŋmishua nthɛ a kwri chɔmbhi yi ŋkwe pi khɔ?
Nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi nthɔ pugu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi moŋ ndighaʼo Tǎa vi, ŋkɨnɛiŋ shesheŋoŋ wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ fāʼa nɛ.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, pichəɨ ŋgwa thi hɛiŋ ŋa mbaʼa pugu yiʼi ŋkhu ŋkaoŋ maa njəɨ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua a thɔ nɔ fùoŋ.”
Ntɨgao llɛ́ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ Pita, ni Jɛiŋ, ni Jouŋ ndǐŋ vi, pugu pugu kuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ ntaaŋ mbra mbɔ fɔ wuʼɔ pugu.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ndīi Jishɔ nɛ, a kwri ligi pugu, miŋi mi thɛ nɔ minaoŋ, ndhwí yi fugu ti nchīa nɔ líʼɛ.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, Mushi pugu Elaija nōoŋ noŋ yugu, pugu pa Jishɔ chrā nu.
Pita chhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, a pwa nɔ haʼaŋ pia pɔ hɛiŋ nɛ. Ɔ̈ ŋkhwā, ŋ̀krao trɛi ntǎa hɛiŋ, taʼa yi vɛ, taʼa yi ni Mushi, taʼa yi ni Elaija.”
A ni ŋguʼɔ nchrā nu ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, lúluŋ chiachia kuru vugu, ŋggì chhu moŋ lúluŋ ghɔ ŋa, “Yei ŋkiɛŋ Muuŋ a ŋa ŋ̀khwā, m̀fāʼo pwatua nthɛ vi. P̂əɨ yaʼo mbhɔ yu.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, mfūŋ ni thɔ yugu shhɛ, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu.
Ndɔ Jishɔ thɔ ŋkāoŋ vugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔllɔ, kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu.”
Pugu gha mbɨʼɨ thɔ yugu, paʼa ndɔ njəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋkiɛŋ Jishɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nthɔ nshwiʼi mbra nɛ, Jishɔ fɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa,
“Kiʼi pəɨ shwei ŋoŋ ni nnu ŋa pəɨ yəɨ nɛ ti Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pie vi ŋa, “Ti a ni nchwīe khɔ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi chhu ŋa Elaija shi fǔoŋ nthɔ?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Elaija thɔ nu, ndɔ shi mbīri ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao a kāʼo nɔ haʼaŋ a ni fǔoŋ mbɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa Elaija kwo thɔ, ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ nji vi, pugu fāʼa mbɨŋ yu ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu khwā nɛ. A haʼaŋ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua ŋkaa yu shi njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ mbhɔ pugu nɛ.”
Thɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shie kiʼɛ ŋa a thɔ nchhu pi Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ.
Pugu ni ŋga nthɔ njəɨ yú ŋgwa pighɔ, chəɨ ŋoŋ thɔ njəɨ vi ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɛ shhɨ yu,
nchhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ muuŋ a, a ghà ŋgū thɔ, nthɔ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi. A ghà ŋgū moŋ móŋoŋ pugu pa moŋ ŋkhǐ ŋgɛŋgɛ.
Mi ni ndɔ̄gɔ vi nthɔ njəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ nɔ ghɔ, ndɔ pugu yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yi kikie.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋgwrɛiŋgwa ki fāʼo piŋ ndɔ mbɔ ŋgwa təɨtəɨ moŋ kwāʼa nu məɨ, mi shi mbɔ pia pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ? Mi shi mfāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ nthɛ vəɨ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ? Pəɨ thɔ nu muuŋ ghɔ hɛiŋ.”
Jishɔ pɨ̄ga miŋwɛiŋ, ghɔ a taoŋ mbɨŋ muuŋ ghɔ, ghɨ̌nɔ muuŋ ghɔ mmɛ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ thɔ njiŋnjiŋ mbara vi mbie vi ŋa, “A ni nchwīe khɔ pigi fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ kikie?”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,

“Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo pi puoŋ mi piŋ. Nthɛ ŋa shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, p̈əɨ mfāʼo piŋ, a wuʼɔ ŋkɨgəɨ ti mbɔ pi nɔ ŋkiɛŋ muuŋ mi mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ gɛ, pəɨ chhu ni mbra yei ŋa, ‘Lɔllɔ hɛiŋ nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ hiŋ,’ kaŋ a shi nyīeŋ, ndɔ mbaʼa yichəɨ nnu ghaʼa vəɨ.”
[Ndɔ yei ŋkwaŋ miŋwɛiŋ shiʼa ntaoŋ, kaŋ a nɛiŋ pi luoŋ Minnwi ni jī ŋkhǐ.]
Nɔ haʼaŋ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni ŋkɨrɨ nu Galili nɛ, Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pi tɔthɔ nchaʼa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua mfɛ mbhɔ ŋgwamishua.
Pugu shi njwi vi, a gha mbɔ moŋ trɛi llɛ́, Minnwi kuʼɔ ni ju moŋ gu.”
Nnu ghɔ ghana vugu ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga nthɔ nchəɨŋ Kapanuŋ, pa ghaŋ kwe taashi moŋ Nda Minnwi
thɔ njəɨ Pita, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha yɔ shiʼa mbe taashi moŋ Nda Minnwi?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “A ghà mbe.”
Pita ni ŋga nii nda, a fǔoŋ Jishɔ nchrā ghɔ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ɔ pīʼi jɔ ŋa, Shemu? Pa fùoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei ghà ŋkwe shebe ki taashi pi mbhɔ pa gɔ̌? Llɔ mbhɔ puoŋ pugu ki llɔ mbhɔ pa ŋgwa nduoŋ?”
Pita khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pa ŋgwa nduoŋ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“A nōoŋ ŋa pa puoŋ lɔ mfāʼo nɔ pe nu.
Ndɔ nɔ chwīe nu ŋa kiʼi túa yugu pɨgɨ, ghə̄ɨ moŋ ŋkhǐ māʼaŋ mbaʼa. Fǔoŋ shhu ŋa ɔ wɛ̄iŋ nɛ, ŋaʼaŋ nchò yi, ɔ shi nɛ njəɨ mbɨŋ fɔ. Fuʼu ŋgə̄ɨ mbe ni pugu nɔ ligi yɔgɔ.”
Ndɨɨ ghɔ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ thɔ njəɨ vi mbie vi ŋa, “A gɔ̌ mbɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po?”
Nnɛ, Jishɔ gha mɛ̄iŋ muuŋ mbrɔ ntigi vi shɨna pugu
nchhu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, p̈əɨ mieŋ ki lɔ njiʼi ŋkara mbɔ nɔ puoŋ prɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ ma nii moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a jū noŋ yi mbɔ nɔ muuŋ vei nɛ pɔ ju ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ taʼa muuŋ nɔ yei nɔ ligi a nɛ piŋ pi mmu.
“Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe taʼa yi shɨna puoŋ mi puoŋ pei ŋa pugu piŋ a nɛ kɔ̄rɔ ŋgū moŋ phɨ nɛ, a nì mbwa ŋa pi chu mmɛ ŋgùʼɔ wuʼɔ yaoŋ mmi yu njīe vi laʼo ŋkhǐ nchaa ŋa a thi sháʼa Minnwi.

“Wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni ŋkuoŋ mbhi nthɛ ŋa pa yaoŋ ŋa a nthɛ a chwīe ŋgwa gū moŋ phɨ nɛ pɔ moŋ ghɔ. Ndɔ a yiʼi ŋa pa yaoŋ nɔ chwīe nu ŋgwa gū moŋ phɨ shi nthɔ. Ndɔ ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni ŋoŋ ŋa pa nnu pighɔ kie pi mbhɔ yu maa nthɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ ti kwò yɔ ki mbhɔ yɔ nchwīe ɔ gū moŋ phɨ, ɔ yaʼa vi mīʼaŋ. A pwa ŋa ɔ nii moŋ chɔmbhi nɔ ŋkwíni ki ŋkwíni kwò, nchaa ŋa ɔ fāʼo paa mbhɔ yɔ pugu paa kwò yɔ, pi lɔ māʼaŋ ghɔ moŋ móŋoŋ ki ndugwi yi.
L̈igi yɔ nchwīe ɔ gū moŋ phɨ, ɔ fuʼu vi mbɨŋ ghɔ mīʼaŋ. A pwa ŋa ɔ nii chɔmbhi ni taʼa ligi nchaa fāʼo nu paa ligi pi lɔ māʼaŋ ghɔ moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ.
“Paʼo nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa pəɨ lɔ nchɨ̄ʼə taʼa puoŋ mi ŋgwa pei, nthɛ ŋa ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pugu ghà ŋguʼɔ mbɔ shhɨ Tǎa a po.
[Nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua ni nthɔ pi nɔ kwe nu ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu phɛ nɛ.]
“Pəɨ pīʼi yəɨ ŋa? Ŋ̈oŋ mfāʼo taʼa ŋkɨɨ minjɨɨ, taʼa yi ghə̄ɨ mbhɛ, paʼa ŋoŋ ghɔ lɔ mieŋ ndipuʼu wuŋ ni ndigi ndipuʼu ŋkuoŋ ŋkǔnu, ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ tāʼa nu taʼa yi yɛ ŋa a phɛ nɛ?
Ti ä njəɨ, shishini ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, a shi mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nɔ ghɔ nchaa ndipuʼu wuŋ ni ndigi ndipuʼu ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbhɛ nɛ.
Nnɛ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ khwǎ njùʼɔ Tǎa a ŋa kaŋ taʼa yi shɨna puoŋ mi ŋgwa pei phɛ gha.
“N̈dǐŋ ghɔ nchwīe phɨ mbɨŋ ghɔ, ɔ ghə̄ɨ njəɨ vi nshwei fàŋ yi ghɔ, wuʼɔ shɨna pəɨ yu pi paa. Ti a njwɛrɛ nnu ŋa a chhu nu nɛ, kaŋ ɔ ghɛ̄rɛ ndǐŋ ɔ ŋkwəɨ ni ju.
Ndɔ ä mieŋ ki lɔ njaʼo nnu ŋa ɔ chhu nɛ, ɔ lɔ̄gɔ taʼa ŋoŋ ki paa ŋgwa mbīgi mbɨŋ ghɔ nnɛ ŋa paa ŋgwa ki trɛi ŋgwa shi mbɔ pa miŋkwentie moŋ nnu ŋa pugu chhu nɛ nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa nnu ghɔ nnu shini.
Ndɔ ti ä ndāa ki lɔ njaʼo vugu, ɔ shwei chɔshi nɔ ghɔ. Ti ä mieŋ ki yaʼo njiʼi nthɛ pi mbhɔ chɔshi, pəɨ tuo vi nɔ haʼaŋ pi ghà ntuo ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ pugu pa ŋgwɛ̄iŋ taashi.
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ krao ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ nɛ shi mbɔ yi krao po, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ fēi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ shi mbɔ yi fēi po.
“Ŋkamuʼɔŋ ǹshwei vəɨ, p̈əɨ pi paa mbiŋ nnu ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ŋa pəɨ luoŋ nu ŋa Minnwi chwīe nɛ, Tǎa a po shi nchwīe mfɛ ni pəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ ŋa paa ŋgwa ki trɛi ŋgwa kɨrɨ nɔ ligi a nɛ, m̀bɔ fɔ pigi pugu.”
Nnɛ Pita thɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ndǐŋ a nthɛ a chwīe phɨ mbɨŋ a pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ ŋ̀guʼɔ ndīʼɛ phɨ yi liʼɛ? Khwachəɨ ŋgɛ?”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋga, ǹdɔ njiʼi nchhu ŋa khwachəɨ ŋgɛ. Ǹchhu pi ŋa khwachəɨ wuŋ ŋgɛ́ ti nchəɨŋ khwachəɨ lɨʼɨ!
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, minthɛ m̀āʼaŋ fɨʼɨ Shaʼafuoŋ Po pi ni yichəɨ fùoŋ ŋa a ni ntāʼa nu ŋka ŋkrù yi mbhɔ puoŋ fàʼa pi.
Ŋga njɛ̄ pīʼi nu, pi thɔ ni yichəɨ taʼa muuŋ fàʼa yi ghɔ njəɨ vi nɔ ghɔ ŋa ŋkrù taathɔ yi ghɔ ni mbɔ puŋ yu fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa m̈uuŋ fàʼa mfāʼa a tɔgɔ paa ŋkɨɨ ŋkaŋ ŋgaʼo pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a kaŋ mfɛ paʼa a lɔ mbe nɛ, taathɔ yi fɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi fīni vi pugu pa ŋgwɛ vi, ni puoŋ pi pugu pa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a ni mfāʼo nɛ nɔ kɛ̄ʼi nu ŋkrù ghɔ.
“Nnɛ muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ gū ni kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɨ taathɔ yi ghɔ ndɨ̄gəɨ, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ mbɨŋ mu, nji ŋa ǹshi ŋkɛ̄ʼi ŋguoŋ ŋkrù yɔ ghao!’
Nthɛ kwoshɨnɨ, taathɔ muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ, līʼɛ ŋkrù yi ghɔ mieŋ vi a ghə̄ɨ.

“Ndɔ muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ gha ntaoŋ mbhi, njəɨ yichəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa ŋkrù yi ni mbɔ puŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa m̈uuŋ fàʼa mfāʼa nɔ taʼa ŋkɨɨ llɛ́ pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ. Ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi njɛ̄ kiɛŋ nu mmi yi, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Kɛ̄ʼi ŋkrù a.’
“Ndɔ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa nɔ ju nɛ gū shhɛ, ndɨ̄gəɨ vi, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ mbɨŋ mu, nji ŋa ǹshi ŋkɛ̄ʼi ŋkrù yɔ.’
A lāa, ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ ndɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ niʼiŋ chə́ɨŋ ti a shi nuʼuŋ ŋkɛ̄ʼi ŋkrù yi.
“Pichəɨ pa puoŋ fàʼa ni ŋga njəɨ nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, a pɨgɨ vugu nshāʼa laʼa muŋu. Pugu ghə̄ɨ mfɨ̄ʼɨ ŋguoŋ nnu ghao ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ ni fùoŋ ghɔ.
Nɛnnɛ, a gɛ̄ muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Muuŋ fàʼa mbɨmbhɨ vei! Ǹdīʼɛ ŋguoŋ ŋkrù yɔ nthɛ ŋa ɔ lɨ̄gəɨ a.
A ka ni mfɛ paʼa ɔ lɔ mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ muuŋ fàʼa nɔ gɔ̀ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ?’
Moŋ pɨgɨtua, fùoŋ ghɔ chaʼa vi mfɛ ŋa pi niʼiŋ vi chə́ɨŋ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ ti a shi nuʼuŋ mbe ŋguoŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ.
“A haʼaŋ Tǎa a po shi nchwīe ni shesheŋoŋ vəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ p̈əɨ mieŋ ki līʼɛ phɨ pa lǐŋ pəɨ llɔ moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni ŋkwo mīʼɛŋ chhu nu pa nnu pei nɛ, a lɔllɔ Galili ŋgə̄ɨ krao ŋgei Judia njiɛŋ ŋkhǐ Jodaŋ.
Ntou yú ŋgwa yōu njiŋ yi, a yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu fɔ.
Pa ŋgwa Farashi thɔ njəɨ vi, mōoŋ vi ni pie nu ŋa, “Gɨ́ Mushi piŋ ŋa ŋoŋ shāaŋ láŋ pugu ŋgwɛ vi nthɛ sheshe nnu?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ naa mɛ̄iŋ ŋa ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa a ni nchwīe vugu llɔ moŋ njɛ̄ yi nɛ ni nchwīe mimbia pugu miŋgwɛ
nchhu ŋa, ‘Nthɛ yie ghɔ, mimbia shi mieŋ tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi nchīni mbɨŋ ŋgwɛ vi. Pugu pi paa gū taʼa frɛinoŋ’?
Nnɛ pugu lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi paa ŋgwa. Pugu pɔ pi taʼa frɛinoŋ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi chīni nɛ, kiʼi ŋoŋ fɛ̄nɛ.”
Pugu pie vi ŋa, “Ti a ni nchwīe khɔ Mushi fɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi fɛ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ shāaŋ láŋ mbhɔ miŋgwɛ ghɔ njōu vi a ghə̄ɨ?”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Nthɛ ŋa thɔ yəɨ ni ŋkwei nɛ, Mushi ni mieŋ ŋa pəɨ shāaŋ láŋ pəɨ pa ŋgwɛ pəɨ. Ndɔ llɔ moŋ njɛ̄ yi a shini ndɔ mbɔ pi nɛnnɛ.
Ndɔ ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shāaŋ láŋ pugu ŋgwɛ vi ŋkiɛŋ ŋa a kwo shúoŋ mbɨnɨ ndaŋ miŋgwɛ nduoŋ nɛ, kwo shúoŋ.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Shɨ̀na mimbia pugu ŋgwɛ vi mbɔ pi nɛnɛiŋ, a pwa ŋa ŋoŋ chhɔ ki laŋ.”
Ndɔ Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Yei ntɨ́gɨ lɔ mbɔ pi ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao, a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Minnwi fɛ ni pugu nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa ntou pa nnu pɔ fɔ ŋa a chwīe ki ŋgwa lɔ ndaŋ, pichəɨ pɔ nthɛ ŋa pi ni mbhi vugu ŋa pugu pɔ nɛnnɛ, pichəɨ pɔ nthɛ ŋa ŋgwamishua chwīe ŋa pugu pɔ nɛnnɛ, pichəɨ chwīe noŋ yugu mbɔ nɛnnɛ nthɛ Shaʼafuoŋ Po. Ŋoŋ ŋa a nthɛ a piŋ ntɨ́gɨ yei nɛ chwīe nɛnnɛ.”
Nnɛ pi thɔ ni pa puoŋ prɔ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ pugu nduoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ni pugu, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pɨ̄ga vugu.
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ mieŋ pa puoŋ prɔ thɔ njəɨ a, kiʼi pəɨ pɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni pugu nthɛ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Po pɔ pi ni ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa pei.”
A gha nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ pugu, ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ.
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ ni nthɔ njəɨ Jishɔ nchhu ŋa, “Masha, a yəɨ ŋkwaŋ nnu shiʼi ŋa minthɛ ǹchwīe nɔ fāʼo nu chɔmbhi ki mmɛ?”
A khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“A chwīe khɔ ɔ pie a ni nnu ŋa a yi shiʼi nɛ? A wuʼɔ Taʼa ŋoŋ shiʼi. Ndɔ ɔ̈ ntāʼa nu nii moŋ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ, ɔ nūʼɔŋ pa kɨ̀na.”
Nnɛ a chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Mbɔ pa pəɨ kɨna?”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“ ‘Kiʼi njwi ŋoŋ, kiʼi ŋgaŋ láŋ kwoshuoŋ, kiʼi njōo, kiʼi ŋkwe ntie ŋoŋ ni mbe.
Ghaʼo tǎa ghɔ pugu mǔuŋ ghɔ, ŋkhwā taakuo yɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā noŋ yɔ nɛ.’ ”
Maʼaŋ mikhwa ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ŋ̀kwo nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ yei ghao, ti mi pou pi khɔ ŋkamuʼɔŋ?”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ̈ ntāʼa mbɔ yi kaʼokaʼo, ɔ ghə̄ɨ mfīni maoŋ pɔ mfɛ ni ghaŋ pou, kaŋ ɔ shi mfāʼo fàʼo po, ndɔ nthɔ njōu njiŋ a.”
Ndɔ maʼaŋ mikhwa ghɔ ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ tuʼuthɔ nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgaŋ fàʼo.
Jishɔ chhu ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, a shi ŋguʼɔ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ ghaghaʼa ŋgaŋ fàʼo maa nii moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Po.
M̀bɨnɨ nshwei vəɨ ŋa, a yīʼɛ ni minyieŋləɨ
nɔ tɔgɔ nu moŋ mbo mitaʼa nchaa ŋgaŋ fàʼo nɔ nii nu moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo yei, ŋgrāo ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi nchhu ŋa, “A nthɛ a lūgu gɔ̌ kiʼɛ?”
Ndɔ Jishɔ līi vugu nchhu ŋa,
“Ni ŋoŋmishua, minthɛ paʼa a lɔ mfāʼa, ndɔ ni Minnwi, minthɛ a fāʼa.”
Nnɛ Pita khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, pigi mieŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao njōu njiŋ yɔ, ti pigi shi mfāʼo pi khɔ?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,

“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ ŋa pəɨ yōu njiŋ a nɛ, a shi ŋga mbɔ moŋ mbhi fhi ndɨɨ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ndighaʼo yi nɛ, pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ shi nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ paanchrɔ faaŋ nthɔ shaʼa paanchrɔ laʼataoŋ Ishrae.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu mieŋ pa laʼa pugu, pa lǐŋ pugu pi pimbia pugu pa piŋgɛ, ki tǎa vugu, ki mǔuŋ vi, ki pa puoŋ pi, ki pa shhɛ pi nthɛ a nɛ, shi mbɨnɨ mfāʼo taʼa ŋkɨɨ lɨʼɨ, mbɨnɨ mfāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.
Ndɔ ntou ŋgwa ŋa pugu thi shhɨ nɛ shi mbɔ ndugwi njiŋ, pa ndugwi njiŋ thi shhɨ.”
“Shaʼafuoŋ Po pɔ pi nɔ yichəɨ ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ŋa a taoŋ ni muuŋ tutuʼu ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ tāʼa pa puoŋ fàʼa pugu fāʼa moŋ nyìeŋ yu.
A ni ŋga ŋkwo chrā fɨʼɨ nchuoŋ fāʼa nu taʼa llɛ́, mbɔ fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋoŋ ghà mfāʼa pi pe vi nɔ taʼa llɛ́ nɛ, ntaoŋ vugu moŋ nyìeŋ yu.
“A gha ntaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ taŋ moŋ ndipuʼu minaoŋ ni tutuʼu, njəɨ pichəɨ ŋgwa thi fɔ ki lɔ nthɔ nchwīe yaoŋ;
a chhu ni pugu ŋa, ‘Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ghə̄ɨ moŋ nyìeŋ a, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a kāʼo nɛ ǹshi mbe vəɨ nɔ ghɔ.’
Nnɛ pugu ghə̄ɨ. A gha mbɨnɨ mbɔ moŋ paanchrɔ minaoŋ pugu trɛi minaoŋ, a wuʼɔ mbɨnɨ nchwīe pi nɛnnɛ.
“A gha ŋgə̄ɨ pi tiɛŋ minaoŋ, a pɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ pichəɨ ŋgwa pugu tithi moŋ taŋ, a chhu ni pugu ŋa, ‘A chwīe khɔ pəɨ thi hɛiŋ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ki lɔ nthɔ nchwīe yaoŋ?’
“Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ lɔ mbe vigi ni fàʼa.’
“Ŋoŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, ‘Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ ŋkaa pəɨ.’
