“Fanaoŋ gha nthɔ, ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ chhu ni ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà ndɨna ni puoŋ fàʼa nɛ ŋa, ‘Mɛ̄iŋ puoŋ fàʼa mbe mbɨŋ yugu llɔ ŋkuoŋ pa ndugwi pi ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ŋkuoŋ pa fǔoŋ pi.’
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni ndɔ̄gɔ vugu moŋ tiɛŋ minaoŋ ni ŋga nthɔ, pi pe vugu ni fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋoŋ ghà mfāʼa taʼa llɛ́ pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ki fǔoŋ ndɔ̄gɔ vugu nɛ ni ŋga nthɔ, mbīʼi nu ŋa yugu pe shi njiɛŋ, ndɔ shesheŋoŋ vugu ŋkaa pugu fāʼo pi fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋoŋ ghà mfāʼa taʼa llɛ́ pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga ŋkwe mbɨŋ yugu, nduo nu ni ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ,
nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu thɔ ni njiŋ nɛ wuʼɔ mfāʼa pi nɔ taʼa awa, ɔ lɔ̄gɔ vigi pugu ŋkuoŋ taʼa nthɨŋkwo, pigi lɔ mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pigi fāʼa nɔ taʼa llɛ́ ghɔ ghao, minaoŋ tūoŋ vigi.’
“Ndɔ ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ni taʼa yi ŋa, ‘Taannu a, ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāaŋ yichəɨ nnu mbɨŋ ghɔ, pɔgɔ shini ndɔ nchrā ŋa ǹshi mbe ghɔ ni fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋ̈oŋ mfāʼa taʼa llɛ́ pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ?
Kwe yaoŋ ŋa a jɔ nɛ ŋgə̄ɨ. Ndɔ ŋ̀khwā nɔ fɛ nu ni ndugwi njiŋ muuŋ fàʼa wuʼɔ fɨʼɨ yaoŋ ŋa m̀fɛ vɛ nɛ.
A lɔ ŋkāʼo vəɨ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa ŋ̀khwā nɛ ni yaoŋ ŋa a nyaŋ nɛ, ki ɔ thɔ mfāʼo kighɨʼə nthɛ ŋa ǹōoŋ pwapuŋ nɛ?’
“Nnɛ, ŋgwa ŋa pugu lūgwi njiŋ nɛ shi nthi shhɨ, pɛ ŋa pugu thi shhɨ nɛ, lūgwi njiŋ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni ŋkuʼɔ nu Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ, a gɛ̄ paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi njiŋnjiŋ, pugu pugu gha mbɔ shɛndaoŋ a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ līi njəɨ, pia kuʼɔ nu nɛ Jerushalɛiŋ. Pi shi nchaʼa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua mfɛ mbhɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi, pugu fɛ njɔ́ gu ghɔ,
nchaʼa vi mfɛ mbhɔ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, pugu māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ, ŋgwie vi ndɔ ŋkwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, a gha mbɔ moŋ trɛi llɛ́ a pɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.”
Nnɛ, mǔuŋ Jɛiŋ pugu Jouŋ, mbɔ puoŋ Shebedi, ghə̄ɨ njəɨ Jishɔ ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɨ yu nduoŋ yaoŋ mbhɔ yu.
Jishɔ pie vi ŋa,
“Ɔ tāʼa pi khɔ?”
A chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Kāʼa ŋa paa puoŋ paŋ pei shi nchhɔ, taʼa yi ŋgei mbhɔ yɔ yi jɨ, taʼa yi ŋgei mbhɔ ŋkwrɛi, ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ thɔ nshaʼa fùoŋ yɔ nɛ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ pie nu nɛ, minthɛ pəɨ nnu ndua ŋgəʼɨ ŋa ǹshi nnu nɛ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “A nthɛ pigi nnu.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ shi nnu llɔ moŋ ndua a, ndɔ chhɔ nu ŋgei mbhɔ a yi jɨ pugu pa ŋkwrɛi lɔ mfāʼo mmu njɨ nɔ fɛ nu, ndɔ a pɔ pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Tǎa a kwo pīri ni pugu nɛ.”
Ndɔ pɨgəɨ wuŋ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, mbɨgɨ túa ni paa pa lǐŋ pighɔ.
Ndɔ Jishɔ mɛ̄iŋ vugu, pugu thɔ njəɨ vi, a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ji ŋa pa thishɨ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei ghà nshaʼa ŋgwa pugu shaʼa, pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa pugu nōoŋ pi nnu ghrɨ́ ni pugu.
Ndɔ mbaʼa a yiʼi mbɔ pi nnɛ ni pəɨ. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu nɔ pɔ nu ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ shɨna pəɨ nɛ fāʼo nɔ pɔ nu muuŋ fàʼa vəɨ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu mbɔ nthishɨ shɨna pəɨ nɛ, fāʼo nɔ pɔ nu ŋkǔna vəɨ.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shini ndɔ nthɔ pi ŋa pi fāʼa mbhɔ yu, a ni nthɔ pi nɔ fāʼa nu ndɔ mfɛ chɔmbhi yi nɔ nchúoŋ yuoŋ thɔ ntou ŋgwa.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni ntaoŋ nu Jeriko nɛ, mmɛ yú ŋgwa yōu njiŋ yi.
Paa pa nchriligi ni nchhɔ ŋkɨŋ ndaoŋ, pugu ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa Jishɔ tɔgɔ nu shɛndaoŋ ghɔ, mbaʼo ŋgòu ŋa, “Taathɔ, fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pigi, ma Muuŋ Devi!”
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ pɨ̄ga vugu, nshwei vugu ŋa pugu lɛrɛ laŋ, pugu pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mbaʼo pi ŋgòu ni njɨ ŋa, “Taathɔ, fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pigi, ma Muuŋ Devi!”
Jishɔ gha ntithi, mɛ̄iŋ vugu mbie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ tāʼa nu ŋa ǹchwīe khɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ?”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ŋaʼaŋ ligi yigi, pigi yəɨ lɨʼɨ.”
Jishɔ fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pugu, ŋkāoŋ ligi yugu. Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ ligi yugu chuʼɔ, pugu yəɨ lɨʼɨ, njōu njiŋ Jishɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga mbara nu Jerushalɛiŋ, ti ŋkwo chəɨŋ Bɛfɛgɛ ŋkuoŋ Mbra pa Thɨ Olive nɛ, Jishɔ taoŋ paa pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shhɨ,
nchhu nu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ moŋ laʼataoŋ yinɛ shhɨ pəɨ, pəɨ shi ŋga nchəɨŋ fɔ, pəɨ kiʼɛ njəɨ ŋkwɛ́iŋ yəɨ ni muuŋ vi yəɨ yu. Pəɨ kɨ̄gɛi vugu, nthɔ ni pugu mfɛ vəɨ.
Ti s̈hesheŋoŋ nchhu sheshe nnu ni pəɨ, pəɨ chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Taathɔ fāʼo chà nɔ ghɔ’ kaŋ a shi mieŋ vugu ni pəɨ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.”
Yei ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa Minnwi ni nchrā ni njəɨlɨʼɨ yi nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa,
“Chhu ni puoŋ laʼataoŋ Shayaoŋ,
‘Līi njəɨ, fùoŋ vəɨ thɔ nu nɛ njəɨ vəɨ moŋ juju,
ndɔ nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ,
mbɔ muuŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ.’”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ghə̄ɨ ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nchhu ni pugu ŋa pugu chwīe nɛ.
Pugu ghə̄ɨ nthɔ ni ŋkwɛ́iŋ pugu muuŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ, nūʼɔŋ pa ndhwí pugu mbɨŋ pugu a kuʼɔ nchhɔ fɔ.
Ntou ŋgwa moŋ yú ghɔ shɛ̄iŋ pa ndhwí pugu shɛndaoŋ, pichəɨ yaʼa pa mbhɔthɨ nshɛ̄iŋ shɛndaoŋ.
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ yu, pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthɔ nu njiŋ yu nɛ ni nthɔ mbaʼo ŋgòu ŋa,
“Ndighaʼo pɔ ni Muuŋ Devi!
Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ju ŋa a thɔ nɔ ligi Taathɔ nɛ!
Ndighaʼo pɔ ni Minnwi ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ fie moŋ ndugwi po!”
A gha nii Jerushalɛiŋ, ŋguoŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ chɨ̄ʼɨ ghao, ŋgwa pie nu ŋa, “Yei pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Yei njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ moŋ Galili.”
Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ Nda Minnwi njōu ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthɔ mfīni yaoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yuoŋ yaoŋ moŋ Nda Minnwi, nshrī taprɛi ghaŋ kwri mbɨŋ pugu pa lə̌ɨ ghaŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni thɔ mfīni pa mintuʼɔlibuŋ nɛ.
Nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pi nāʼaŋ ŋa, ‘Nda a shi mbɔ lɨʼɨ luoŋ Minnwi,’ ndɔ pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ a pɔ pùo pa ŋgɨna.”
Pa nchriligi pugu pa ŋkwíni kwò thɔ njəɨ vi moŋ Nda Minnwi, a chwīe pugu pɔ shiʼi.

Ndɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi ni ŋga njəɨ pa mbwambwa nnu ŋa a chwīe, pugu pa mikəʼɨ ŋa pugu ni mbaʼo ŋgòu moŋ Nda Minnwi ŋa, “Ndighaʼo pɔ ni Muuŋ Devi!” nɛ, pugu pɨgɨtua.
Nchhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Ɔ yaʼo nnu ŋa ŋgwa pei chhu nu nɛ?”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Ooŋ, pəɨ lɔ naa mɛ̄iŋ ŋa, ‘Llɔ nchò pa puoŋ fhu pugu pa puoŋ prɔ ɔ pīri ndighaʼo ŋa pi ghaʼo ghɔ nɔ ghɔ.’ ”
Jishɔ mieŋ vugu ntaoŋ moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ Betani ndaʼa fɔ.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni tutuʼu, nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɨnɨ nu laʼataoŋ ghɔ nɛ, njì yia vi.
A gha njəɨ thɨ wùnu ŋkɨŋ shɛndaoŋ, ŋgə̄ɨ fɔ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ sheshe yaoŋ ŋkiɛŋ wuʼɔ pa fhɔthɨ. A chhu ni thɨ ghɔ ŋa,
“Mbaʼa kaŋ taʼa ntíɛŋ ma nuʼuŋ njuŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ ŋkamuʼɔŋ,” thɨ wùnu ghɔ wuʼɔ mbrāo pi ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi gha njəɨ, ŋgrāo, nchhu nu ŋa, “A kie pi nɛiŋ thɨ wùnu ghɔ kiʼi mbraoprao taʼa ŋgɛ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,

“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, p̈əɨ mfāʼo piŋ ki lɔ mfāʼo khuthɔ, paʼa pəɨ lɔ ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi nnu ŋa pi chwīe mbɨŋ thɨ wùnu yei nɛ, p̈əɨ njiʼi nchhu pi ni mbra yei ŋa, ‘Shūʼɔ hɛiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ ŋgū moŋ ŋkhǐ,’ a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nnɛ.
Sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ pie moŋ luoŋ nɛ, pəɨ shi ŋguʼɔ mfāʼo nɔ haʼaŋ p̈əɨ mfāʼo piŋ.”

Jishɔ ni ŋga nii moŋ Nda Minnwi, pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa pichəɨ thishɨ thɔ mbara vi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni njɛʼi nu nɛ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ thɔ nchwīe nnu pei pi ni ghrɨ́ gɔ̌, a lɔ mfɛ gɔ̌ mfɛ ghrɨ́ ghɔ vɛ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Mummu ŋkaa mu shi mbie vəɨ ni taʼa píe, ti p̈əɨ mfɛ khwɛ̀ vəɨ, kaŋ ǹshi nshwei vəɨ ni ghrɨ́ ŋoŋ ŋa ǹthɔ nchwīe nnu pei nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Kwe ŋkhǐ Jouŋ ni ndhɔ pi hɨŋ? A ni ndhɔ pi po ki mbhɔ ŋgwamishua?”
Pugu chrā nnu yei shɨna pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, “P̈ia nchhu ŋa a ni ndhɔ pi po, a chhu ni pia ŋa ti a ni nchwīe khɔ paʼa pia lɔ mbiŋ vi?
Ndɔ p̈ia nchhu ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ ŋgwamishua, pia thɔ mbɔgɔ nnu ŋa yu ŋgwa pei shi nchwīe nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ vugu ji ŋa Jouŋ ni mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.”
Nnɛ pugu khwɛ̄ ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Pigi lɔ njiʼi nji.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Kaŋ mbaʼa mummu shwei vəɨ ni lɨʼɨ ŋa m̀fāʼo ghrɨ́ nthɔ nchwīe nnu pei nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
“Pəɨ pīʼi yəɨ ŋa? Yichəɨ ŋoŋ ni mfāʼo paa puoŋ pi mimbia, ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ fǔoŋ yi nchhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Muuŋ a, ghə̄ɨ mfāʼa fàʼa moŋ nyìeŋ shiʼa.’
“Muuŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘M̀baʼa njiʼi ŋgə̄ɨ,’ ndɔ a gha ndara shɨgɛi yi, a kwri njùʼɔ yi, nnɛ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ.
“Ŋoŋ ghɔ ghə̄ɨ mbara yichəɨ muuŋ vi ŋguʼɔ nchhu pi taʼa nnu ghɔ. Muuŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Ǹshi ŋgə̄ɨ, ma baba,’ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ.
A yəɨ shɨna paa puoŋ pei ŋa a chwīe nnu ŋa tǎa vi ni ntāʼa nu nɛ?”
Pugu chhu ŋa, “Fǔoŋ yi.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa shakhɨ thɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi shhɨ pəɨ.

Nthɛ ŋa Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ ni nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ, nōoŋ ndaoŋ ndɨndɨ ŋa pəɨ tɔgɔ, ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ vi, ndɔ pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa shakhɨ piŋ vi, ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ ni njəɨ nnu pei nɛ, paʼa ndɔ ndaʼa ŋkwri njùʼɔ yəɨ mbiŋ vi.”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,

“Pəɨ pɨnɨ njaʼo yichəɨ luʼɔ chrà. Yichəɨ ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ni mbɔ fɔ ŋa a ni mbhi faaŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni grape nɛ. A ni ŋkrao ŋkaʼa ŋgɨ̄ŋ nɔ, ndɔ ntuo ŋkuʼɔ nɨ̄ɨ ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ ŋkhǐ yi taoŋ nɔ chwīe nu làʼo, ndɔ ŋkrao muuŋ nda tɔthɨ nɔ chhɔ nu fɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi nyìeŋ ghɔ. Mfɛ nyìeŋ ghɔ ni ghaŋ fàʼa ŋa pugu lɨna nu nɔ ghɔ ŋga ŋkwōo maoŋ, pugu pugu ghrā, ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ laʼataoŋ nduoŋ.
Ndɨɨ kwōo ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ ni ŋga ŋkāʼo, a taoŋ puoŋ fàʼa pi ni ghaŋ fàʼa moŋ nyìeŋ ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ ŋkwe ji ghrà ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ.
“Pa ghaŋ fàʼa pighɔ wɛ̄iŋ puoŋ fàʼa pi pighɔ ŋa a ni ntaoŋ nɛ, ŋgwie taʼa yi, njwi taʼa yi, ntuŋ yichəɨ ni ŋgùʼɔ.
Ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ pɨnɨ ntaoŋ pichəɨ puoŋ fàʼa ŋa pugu yiɛŋ nchaa fǔoŋ pi pɛ ŋa a ni ntaoŋ nɛ, ghaŋ fàʼa moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ wuʼɔ nchwīe mbɨŋ pugu pi nɛnnɛ.
“Ndugwi yi ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ taoŋ muuŋ vi, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Pugu shi ŋgaʼo muuŋ a.’
“Ndɔ pa ghaŋ fàʼa moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ ghà njəɨ muuŋ vi thɔ nu, pugu chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, ‘Yei muuŋ ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ ŋa ŋguoŋ maoŋ shi mbɔ ji nɛ, pəɨ thɔ pia jwi vi nshīŋ maoŋ pi.’
Pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi mfuʼu vi moŋ faaŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ māʼaŋ vi mbhi, njwi vi.
“Ndwɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgaŋ faaŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ shi nthɔ kiʼɛ nɛ, a shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ ni ghaŋ fāʼa moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “A shi njwi ŋgwa pɨphɨ pighɔ, mfɛ faaŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ ni pa ghaŋ fàʼa nduoŋ ŋa pugu shi mfɛ ji ntíɛŋ thɨ ndɨɨ ŋa ndɨɨ kwōo kāʼo nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ naa mɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi nchhu nɛ yaʼa?
‘Muuŋ nchíʼa yɛ ŋa pəɨ ghaŋ krao nda ni ndāa ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ nɛ,
pɨnɨ nɛ ŋkara ju mbɔ muuŋ nchíʼa kwonda.
Yei fàʼa llɔ mbhɔ Taathɔ,
ndɔ mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ nnu pwapwa ligi pia.’
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshwei vəɨ, pi shi ŋkwe Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi mbhɔ pəɨ mfɛ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yuŋ ntíɛŋ ŋa a kāʼo nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a gū ŋkuoŋ ŋgùʼɔ yei shi shɨna kraokrao, ndɔ ti a ŋgū ŋgùʼɔ ghɔ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ a nwīʼiŋ vi.”
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi ni ŋga njaʼo pa luʼɔ chrà pi pei, nji ŋa a ni nchrā nthɛ pi pugu.
Ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nthɔ ntāʼa nu ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɛ, pugu ni mbɔgɔ pa ŋgwa nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa pighɔ ni ndɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ ŋa a njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.
Jishɔ pɨnɨ nchrā ni pugu ŋkamuʼɔŋ moŋ pa luʼɔ chrà, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Minthɛ pi māʼaŋ fɨʼɨ Shaʼafuoŋ Po pi ni yichəɨ fùoŋ ŋa a ni mbīri jɨ nɔ nnu tini muuŋ vi yi mimbia.
Ntaoŋ puoŋ fàʼa pi ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ mɛ̄iŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni ŋgɛ̄ vugu nɔ nnu jɨ tini ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ ŋkhwā nɔ thɔ nu.

“A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ pichəɨ puoŋ fàʼa, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Pəɨ chhu ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi gɛ̄ vugu nɛ ŋa ŋ̀kwo pīri maoŋ jɨ nɛ, ŋ̀kwo sho pa fua pugu pa naʼaŋ fuʼu, ti mbīri ŋguoŋ yaoŋ a kāʼo. Pəɨ thɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ tini ghɔ.’
Ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ ndīi a fhi nnu, nnɛ pugu ghə̄ɨ ni vugu, taʼa yi moŋ nyìeŋ yu, yichəɨ taʼa yi lɨʼɨ taŋ yi.
Pɨgəɨ yi wɛ̄iŋ puoŋ fàʼa pi pighɔ, mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu, njwi vugu.
“Túa fùoŋ ghɔ pɨgɨ, a fɛ gɨ́ ni pa shoogɛ pi pugu ghə̄ɨ njwi ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu ni njwi puoŋ fàʼa pi pighɔ nɛ ndɔ ntūoŋ laʼa muŋu mfɛ shhɛ.
Nnɛ fùoŋ ghɔ chhu ni puoŋ fàʼa pi ŋa, ‘Maoŋ jɨ tini ghɔ kāʼo nɛ, ndɔ paʼa pa ŋgwa ŋa ŋki gɛ̄ nɛ lɔ ŋkāʼo ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa ŋa minthɛ pugu jɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ taoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ pa taʼandaoŋ fɨʼɨ ŋgwa ŋa pəɨ yəɨ fɔ nɛ, pəɨ gɛ̄ vugu ŋa pugu thɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ tini ghɔ.’
Nnɛ pa puoŋ fàʼa pighɔ ghə̄ɨ moŋ pa shɛndaoŋ, ŋkɨrɨ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni njəɨ nɛ, ŋgwa shiʼi pugu pa pi pɨphɨ. Nnɛ nda jɨ tini ghɔ ni ndɨnaoŋ ni ŋgwa ŋa pi gɛ̄ vugu nɛ.
“Ndɔ fùoŋ ghɔ gha nthɔ lɨʼɨ yəɨ pa ghaŋ gɛ̀ pighɔ, njəɨ yichəɨ ŋoŋ fɔ paʼa a lɔ mfāʼo ndhwí tini.
A chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Taannu a, ɔ kie pi nɛiŋ maa nii hɛiŋ ki lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ndhwí tini?’ Ŋoŋ ghɔ pou chrà.
Nnɛ fùoŋ ghɔ chhu ni pa ghaŋ fàʼa lɨʼɨ tini ghɔ ŋa, ‘Pəɨ krao kwò yi pugu pa mbhɔ mi māʼaŋ vi mbhi moŋ njiŋ. Moŋ lɨʼɨ ghɔ, kə̄ɨ pugu pa kru shua shi mbɔ fɔ.’
“Nthɛ ŋa pi gɛ̄ ntou ŋgwa, ndɔ ŋguʼɔ ntɛrɛ pi shɨgɛi yi.”
Nnɛ pa ŋgwa Farashi nyiaŋ ntáŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a nthɛ pugu pīri Jishɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi ŋkuoŋ chrà yi nɛ.

Nnɛ pugu taoŋ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pugu pugu pa ŋgwa fùoŋ Hɛrɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Masha, pigi ji ŋa ɔ ghà nchrā nnu shini, njɛʼi nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ moŋ nnu shini ki lɔ mbɔgɔ ligi shesheŋoŋ nthɛ ŋa ɔ shiʼa njiʼi ndīi pi ŋa ŋoŋ pɔ pi moŋ yəɨ ŋkwaŋ nthɨŋkwo.
Ndwɛ shwei vigi, ɔ pīʼi jɔ ŋa? A kāʼo ŋa pi māʼaŋ taashi ni Kaisha ki ŋga?”
Jishɔ kwo ji ntáŋ pɨphɨ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo nɛ, nnɛ nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ tāʼa nu njwɛʼi a ŋa pa ŋgwa mifɨɨ pei?
Pəɨ nōoŋ ndigi mbɨŋ ŋa pi ghà māʼaŋ taashi nɔ nɛ vəɨ.”
Pugu thɔ ni ndigi mbɨŋ ghɔ mbɔ fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋoŋ ghà mfaʼa taʼa llɛ́ pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Jishɔ pie vugu ŋa,
“Yei thɔ gɔ̌ pugu pa ligi gɔ̌ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ?”
Pugu chhu ŋa, “A yi Kaisha.”
A chhu ni pugu kiʼɛ ŋa,
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ fɛ yaoŋ ŋa a yi Kaisha nɛ ni Kaisha, mfɛ yi Minnwi ni Minnwi.”
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, a ghrāo vugu, pugu lɔllɔ mieŋ vi ŋgə̄ɨ.
Wuʼɔ llɛ́ ghɔ, pa ŋgwa Shadushi ŋa pugu ghà nchhu ŋa ŋoŋ ghà ŋkhu paʼa ndɔ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ thɔ njəɨ vi mbie vi ni taʼa pie ŋa,
“Masha, Mushi ni nchhu ŋa, ‘Ŋoŋ ŋkhu ki lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo muuŋ, a yiʼi ŋa ndǐŋ vi lɔ̄gɔ ŋkugu yi ghɔ mbhi muuŋ nɔ ghɔ nɔ ligi ndǐŋ vi ŋa a khu nɛ.’
Ndwɛ khwachəɨ puoŋ pimbia pichəɨ ni mbɔ shɨna pigi mbɔ taʼa puŋ. Fǔoŋ yi ni ndaŋ ŋkhu ki lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo muuŋ, nnɛ mieŋ ŋgwɛ vi ndǐŋ vi lɔ̄gɔ.
Mbra yi, pugu yichəɨ mbra yi wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɛnnɛ ti ŋguoŋ vugu pi khwachəɨ nuʼuŋ mmɛ.
A ni ŋga ndugwi, miŋgwɛ ghɔ khu ŋkaa yu.
Ndwɛ, moŋ llɛmbhi ŋa ŋgwa lɛ mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu nɛ, miŋgwɛ ghɔ shi mbɔ pi ŋgwɛ gɔ̌ shɨna pugu pi khwachəɨ pei, nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yugu ghao ni ndaŋ vi?”
Ndɔ Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fāaŋ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ nji Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nji njɨ Minnwi.
A lɛ ŋga mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu khu lɛ mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ, paʼa ŋgwa lɔ ndaŋ ki ŋgə̄ɨ láŋ. Ŋgwa lɛ mbɔ pi nɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi po.
“Ndɔ nthɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu shi ndɛ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu nɛ, pəɨ lɔ naa mɛ̄iŋ nnu ŋa Minnwi ni nchhu ni pəɨ nɛ:
‘A mmu mbɔ Minnwi Abrahaŋ, mbɔ Minnwi Aiji, mbɔ Minnwi Jakɔ’? A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi Minnwi pa ŋgwa khu, a pɔ pi yi ŋgwa maoŋ.”
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, ŋgrāo ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni njɛʼi nu nɛ.
Ndɔ pa ŋgwa Farashi ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa Jishɔ chri nchò pa ŋgwa Shadushi, ŋkɨrɨ noŋ yugu taʼa lɨʼɨ.
Yichəɨ taʼa yi shɨna pugu ŋa a ni nji gɨ́ Mushi ŋgaʼa pie Jishɔ ni taʼa pie nɔ mōoŋ nu vi.
“Masha, a yəɨ mbɔ mmɛ kɨ̀na ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ yi moŋ gɨ́ nɛ?”
A chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“ ‘Khwā Taathɔ mbɔ Minnwi yɔ ni ŋguoŋ njùʼɔ yɔ ghao, ŋguoŋ nchə̌ɨ yɔ ghao, ni ŋguoŋ kwāʼa nu mɔ ghao.’
Yei mmɛ kɨ̀na ndɔ mbɔ fǔoŋ yi.
Mbra yi pɔ nɔ yie ghɔ: ‘Khwā taakuo yɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā noŋ yɔ nɛ.’
Ŋguoŋ gɨ́ Mushi ghao pugu pa yaoŋ ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi yɛʼi nɛ yɨʼə pi ŋkuoŋ paa kɨ̀na yei.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa pa ŋgwa Farashi ni ŋkɨrɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ nɛ, Jishɔ pie vugu ni taʼa pie,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pəɨ pīʼi yəɨ ŋa nthɛ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ? A pɔ pi muuŋ gɔ̌?”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Muuŋ Devi.”
Jishɔ pie vugu kiʼɛ ŋa,
“Ti a ki pɔ pi nɛiŋ kiʼɛ Devi moŋ njɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa ‘Taathɔ,’ nchhu nu ŋa,
‘Taathɔ ni nchhu ni Taathɔ a ŋa,
Chɔchɔ hɛiŋ ŋgei mbhɔ a yi jɨ
ti ǹshi nuʼuŋ nchwīe pa mimbɨna pɔ pɔ laʼo kwò yɔ.’ ”
“Ti nɔ haʼaŋ Devi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni ‘Taathɔ,’ ti a pɨnɨ ŋkie pi nɛiŋ mbɔ pi muuŋ vi?”
Kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ shini ndɔ mfāʼo khwɛ̀ nɔ fɛ nu ghɔ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nuʼuŋ mbie vi ni kaŋ taʼa pie jɛ̄ llɛ́ ghɔ.
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni kɨrɨ ghɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi pɔ pi ŋgwa ŋa pi ji vugu nɔ ghaŋ tūgu gɨ́ Mushi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ yaʼo nchò yugu ndɔ nchwīe ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa pugu shwei vəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ ki lɔ mbīni vugu. Nthɛ ŋa pugu ghà nchhu ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa pugu chhu nɛ.
Pugu ghà ŋkrao pa lrì ŋa a ghaʼa nɔ tiɛŋ nu nɛ nūʼɔŋ mbəʼɨ ŋgwa, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋkhwā nɔ fɛ nu muuŋshɨmbhɔ yugu nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu ŋgwa pighɔ ni lrì ghɔ.

“Pugu ghà mfāʼa ŋguoŋ yugu fàʼa pi ŋa ŋgwa yəɨ vugu, nthɛ ŋa yugu ŋgrào ŋa pugu ghà nāʼaŋ chrà Minnwi ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nchu nɔ pa yéi yugu pugu pa ŋgei mbhɔ yugu yi ŋkwrɛi nɛ ghaʼo ŋgaʼa ndɔ nchwīe pa yugu shɨ̌gəɨ ŋkuoŋ pa ndhwí pugu shɨga ŋgaʼa.
Pugu khwā pa lə̌ɨ chɨɨchɨɨ lɨʼɨ jɨ pugu pa lə̌ɨ ŋgwa liɛŋ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi,
ndɔ ŋkhwā ŋa pi tuʼu noŋ nchrā ni pugu moŋ lɨʼɨ taŋ pugu pa ŋa ŋgwamishua mɛ̄iŋ vugu ŋa ‘Masha.’
“Ndɔ kiʼi pi mɛ̄iŋ vəɨ ŋa ‘Masha,’ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo pi wuʼɔ taʼa Masha ndɔ ŋguoŋ vəɨ ghao pɔ pi pa lǐŋ.
Kiʼi pəɨ mɛ̄iŋ shesheŋoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ ni tǎa vəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ wuʼɔ fāʼo pi taʼa Tǎa, mbɔ ju ŋa a pɔ po nɛ.
Kiʼi pi mɛ̄iŋ vəɨ ni ‘pa ghaŋ fɛ ntɨgɨ,’ nthɛ ŋa ŋgaŋ fɛ ntɨ́gɨ wuʼɔ taʼa yi, mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.
Ndɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ shɨna pəɨ shi mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa vəɨ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kə̄rə noŋ yi nɛ, pi shi nshwiʼi vi shhɛ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shwiʼi noŋ yi nɛ, pi kə̄rə vi.

“Ndɔ ŋgəʼɨ shi nii vəɨ ma pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi. Pəɨ ŋgwa mifɨɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ fɨ̄nɨ Shaʼafuoŋ Po ni ŋgwa, ndɔ pəɨ nduthɔ yəɨ lɔ nii moŋ ghɔ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mieŋ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu nii nu nɛ ŋa pugu nii.

[Ŋgəʼɨ shi nii vəɨ ma pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi, pa ŋgwa mifɨɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà nchīgi pa piŋgɛ kugu ŋkwe maoŋ pugu, ŋkuru nnu ŋa pəɨ chwīe nɛ ni pa ntaaŋntaaŋ luoŋ Minnwi lɨʼɨ kaʼa, nthɛ yie ghɔ, yəɨ sháʼa shi mbɔ yi wuwuru.]

“Ŋgəʼɨ shi nii vəɨ, ma pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi pəɨ ŋgwa mifɨɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà nshāʼa ŋkhǐ pugu pa ndaoŋ ntou nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu kara ŋoŋ a younjiŋ nnu Minnwi yəɨ, ndɔ a gha njōu njiŋ yəɨ, pəɨ chwīe vi a pɨnɨ mbɨgɨ nchaa vəɨ paa lɨʼɨ nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ.

“Ŋgəʼɨ shi nii vəɨ, ma pa ghaŋ chriligi ŋa pəɨ thɔ nōoŋ ndaoŋ ni ŋgwa nɛ, ŋa pugu chhu ŋa, ‘Ŋ̈oŋ nshwrɛ̄i ligi Nda Minnwi, paʼa nnu lɔ mbɔ, ndɔ ti ŋ̈oŋ nshwrɛ̄i pi laoŋgo ŋa a pɔ moŋ Nda Minnwi nɛ, a yiʼi vi.’
Pa na ŋa ligi yugu yi chri! A ghaʼo yəɨ? Laoŋgo ki Nda Minnwi ŋa a chwīe laoŋgo ghɔ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ?
Pəɨ ghà mbɨnɨ nchhu ŋa ŋ̈oŋ nshwrɛ̄i lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ paʼa nnu lɔ mbɔ, ndɔ ŋ̈oŋ nshwrɛ̄i yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋkuoŋ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, kaŋ a yiʼi vi.
Pəɨ pa ghaŋ chriligi, a ghaʼo yəɨ nchaa yichəɨ, yaoŋ fɛ́, ki lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa a ghà nchwīe yaoŋ fɛ ghɔ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shwrɛ̄i lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɛ, shwrɛ̄i lɨʼɨ ghɔ pugu sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Nnɛ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shwrɛ̄i Nda Minnwi nɛ, shwrɛ̄i Nda ghɔ pugu Minnwi mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a pɔ Nda ghɔ nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shwrɛ̄i po nɛ, shwrɛ̄i faaŋ Minnwi pugu Minnwi mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a chhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ.

“Ŋgəʼɨ shi nii vəɨ, ma pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi. Pəɨ pa ŋgwa mifɨɨ. Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà mfɛ shwéi pa mishwrɛi pugu pa pichəɨ pa puoŋ mi mbhɛ ŋa pi ghà niʼiŋ moŋ maoŋ jɨ, ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo ndɨɨ nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu pa mɛmmɛ ntɨ́gɨ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ nɔ pa ndɨndɨ, ni kwoshɨnɨ pugu pa yaʼo nu nchò Minnwi, ndɔ yei pa nnu pɛ ŋa pəɨ kaŋ ni nchwīe ndɔ ki lɔ nchɨ̄ʼə pi ni.
Ghaŋ chri ligi pei ŋa pugu nōoŋ ndaoŋ ni ŋgwa, pəɨ ghà nde minjinji mfuʼu moŋ làʼo yəɨ, ndɔ mmi minyieŋləɨ
“Ŋgəʼɨ shi nii vəɨ, ma ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi. Pəɨ ghaŋ mifɨɨ! Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ shɨ̄gao ŋkuoŋ ndua pugu pa kumbu ndɔ mooŋ yi lɨnaoŋ ni pɨ̀ga pugu pa pou wɛ̄iŋ nu noŋ.
Pa ghaŋ chri ligi pei mbɔ pəɨ Farashi, pəɨ fǔoŋ nshɨ̄gao pa mooŋ ndua pugu pa mooŋ kumbu nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋkuoŋ yi gū yi taoŋtaoŋ ŋkaa yu.

“Ŋgəʼɨ shi nii vəɨ, ma pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi. Pəɨ pa ghaŋ mifɨɨ! Pəɨ pɔ nɔ fúŋ ŋa pi shini njùʼɔ ni yaoŋ fhu ŋa a pwa mbhi, ndɔ mooŋ yi lɨnaoŋ ni kwéi khu ŋgwa pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ maoŋ tɔtrɔ.
A haʼaŋ pi līi vəɨ mbhi pəɨ pɔ nɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ, ndɔ mooŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ lɨnaoŋ ni nnu mifɨɨ pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ phɨ.
“Ŋgəʼɨ shi nii vəɨ, ma pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi. Pəɨ pa ghaŋ mifɨɨ, pəɨ krao fúŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, nchwīe fúŋ pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ a pwa,
nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Pigi kaŋ ni mbɔ mbhi pi ndɨɨ pa tǎa pigi, pigi shi kaŋ ndɔ nchɨ kwò pigi pugu nɔ jwi nu pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.’
“Nnɛ pəɨ pa miŋkwentie ni noŋ pəɨ ŋa pəɨ pa puoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njwi pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nɛ.
Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nɛ shhɨ mīʼɛŋ nnu pɛ ŋa pa ŋkhu tǎa pəɨ ni njɛ̄.
Pa mitwɛʼi, pa mbhɛ̌ mitwɛʼi mbɨmbhɨ pei, pəɨ shi ŋkie pi nɛiŋ maa ntei njɔ́ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ?

“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshi ntaoŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni pa ghaŋ shiethɔ ni pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi ni pəɨ. Pəɨ shi njwi pichəɨ, ŋkwīŋ pichəɨ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, ŋgwie pichəɨ ni ŋgwàŋ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi pəɨ, mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pichəɨ llɔ moŋ taʼa laʼataoŋ nii moŋ yichəɨ laʼataoŋ.

Ǹshi ntaoŋ vugu nɛnnɛ, nji ŋa chhǐ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ŋa pi ni nshrāo vugu njwi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, llɔ thɔ Abe ŋa mbhɔ yi ni mbɔ yi woo nɛ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ thɔ jwi nu Shakaria, mbɔ muuŋ Bɛrɛkia, shɨna Nda Minnwi pugu lɨʼɨ Fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi.
Shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, ŋguoŋ nnu pei shi nshwiʼi mbɨŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yei.

“Yo, Jerushalɛiŋ, Jerushalɛiŋ! Laʼataoŋ ŋa a jwi pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, ntuŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pɛ ŋa pi taoŋ vugu ghɔ nɛ ni ŋgùʼɔ. A fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ ŋa mi ni ntāʼa nu ŋkɨrɨ puoŋ pɔ taʼa lɨʼɨ nɔ haʼaŋ miŋguo ghà ŋkɨrɨ puoŋ pi laʼo prǎ yi nɛ, ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ ntāʼa nu!
Līi njəɨ, nda yəɨ kuʼɔ fùŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, jɛ̄ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, mbaʼa pəɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ a, ti nuʼuŋ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ shi nchhu ŋa, ‘Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ju yɛ ŋa a thɔ nɔ ligi Taathɔ nɛ!’ ”
Jishɔ ni ntaoŋ Nda Minnwi ŋgə̄ɨ nu, ndɨɨ ghɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ njəɨ vi nthɔ nōoŋ pa nda ghɔ moŋ Nda Minnwi.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ yəɨ ŋguoŋ maoŋ pei hɛiŋ ghao? Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, mbaʼa taʼa ŋgùʼɔ hɛiŋ yiʼi ŋkɨna ŋkuoŋ ndǐŋ vi ki pi lɔ mbūo mfɛ shhɛ.”

Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nchɔchhɔ ŋkuoŋ Mbra pa Thɨ Olive nɛ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ njiŋnjiŋ njəɨ vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Shwei vigi, pa nnu pei shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi ndɨɨ khɔ? Lì thɔ nu yɔ pugu pa yi ndugwi mbhi yei shi mbɔ pi khɔ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɨna nu kiʼi ŋoŋ fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa ntou ŋgwa shi nthɔ nɔ ligi a, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Mbɔ pi Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ,’ mfɨ̄ɨ ntou ŋgwa.
Pəɨ shi njaʼo pa nchhɔ̀ pugu pa pishaʼakhɔ nnu nchhɔ̀. Ndɔ kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu nthɛ ŋa pa nnu pighɔ shi ŋguʼɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, ndɔ yinɛ lɔ naa mbɔ ndugwi yi.
Pa laʼataoŋ shi ndɔllɔ māʼaŋ yichəɨ ni nchhɔ̀, ŋgwa taʼa fùoŋ māʼaŋ ŋgwa yichəɨ ni nchhɔ̀. Njì shi ŋgū moŋ pa lɨʼɨlɨʼɨ, shhɛ shi nchɨʼɨ ti shɨna moŋ pa lɨʼɨlɨʼɨ.
Ŋguoŋ nnu pei pɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ muuŋ ghà njɛ̄ naoŋ nu miŋgwɛ shūu nɛ.
“Nnɛ pi shi nchaʼa vəɨ mfɛ ŋa pi fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ ndɔ njwi vəɨ. Ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ shi mbɨ̄na vəɨ nthɛ a.
Ntou ŋgwa shi ŋgū moŋ piŋ yugu, mfīni noŋ pugu, mbɨ̄na noŋ pugu.
Ntou pa njəɨlɨʼɨ mifɨɨ shi nthɔ mfɨ̄ɨ ntou ŋgwa.
Nthɛ ŋa phɨ shi mbīgi nɛ, khwǎ ŋa ntou ŋgwa fāʼo nɛ shi ŋkɛrɛ.
Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a tīi shii ti nchəɨŋ nɔ ndugwi yi nɛ shi ndūgu.
Ndɔ pi shi nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ yei ŋa Minnwi shaʼa fùoŋ yi moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi yei nnɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ghao yaʼo, ndugwi yi thɔ kiʼɛ.
“Nnɛ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ shi njəɨ nnu wuwuru yɛ ŋa a fuo Nda Minnwi nchwīe pi tei nɛ, a thi Lɨʼɨ Taoŋtaoŋ,
mbɔ nnu ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Dania ni nchhu nɛ, (shesheŋoŋ ŋa a mɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ yei nɛ pīʼi, nji ŋa a shi nji njiŋ nnu yei),
nnɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ Judia nɛ tei ŋkuʼɔ thɔ pa mbra.
Kiʼi ŋoŋ ŋa a chhɔ thɔnda nɛ nuʼuŋ nshwiʼi shhɛ lɨʼɨ lɔ̄gɔ yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ nda nɛ,
kiʼi shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ nyìeŋ nɛ nuʼuŋ mbɨnɨ laʼa lɨʼɨ lɔ̄gɔ mmɛ ndhwí yi.
Ndɔ a shi mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ ni pa piŋgɛ shūu pugu pa mapuoŋ haʼaŋ pugu thɔ nuʼɔŋ puoŋ nɛ moŋ llɛ́ pighɔ!
Pəɨ luoŋ ni Minnwi ŋa kiʼi nnu pei lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi moŋ laoŋ ki llɛ́ ji.
Nthɛ ŋa moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ, ŋgəʼɨ shi mbɔ ti nchəɨŋ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a lɔ naa ma mbɔ, jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni mbuoŋ mbhi nɛ ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ ndwɛ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbiʼi piʼi ma nuʼuŋ mbɔ.
Ti pi kaŋ ni mieŋ ki kɛrɛ fɨʼɨ llɛ́ pighɔ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ ndūgu. Ndɔ nthɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Minnwi ni nchuʼɔ vugu nɛ, Minnwi shi ŋkɛrɛ fɨʼɨ llɛ́ pighɔ.
“Nɛnnɛ s̈hesheŋoŋ nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, ‘Līi njəɨ, Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ pɔ nɛiŋ,’ ki ŋa, ‘A pɔ ni hiŋ!’ Kiʼi pəɨ piŋ,

nthɛ ŋa pa mifɨɨ ŋa pugu chhu nu ŋa pi chuʼɔ vugu ntaoŋ nɔ ŋkwe nɛ, pugu pa njəɨlɨʼɨ mifɨɨ shi nōoŋ noŋ yugu, nōoŋ ntou pa mɛmmɛ lì pugu pa nnu ghraoghrao nɔ fɨ̄ɨ nu pa ŋgwa ti mfɨ̄ɨ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ Minnwi chuʼɔ nɛ nɔ haʼaŋ a kaŋ njiʼɛ.
Pəɨ līi njəɨ, ŋ̀kwo shwei vəɨ ŋkaoŋ ndɨɨ maa ŋkāʼo.
“Nɛnnɛ, p̈ugu nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, ‘Līi njəɨ, a pɔ nɛ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó!’ Kiʼi pəɨ ghə̄ɨ fɔ. Ti p̈ugu nchhu ŋa ‘Līi njəɨ, a pɔ nɛ hɛiŋ moŋ njiɛŋ nda,’ kiʼi pəɨ piŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ fiembɨ ghà nshei llɔ ŋgei shaʼa minaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nii ŋgei nii minaoŋ nɛ, a haʼaŋ thɔ nu Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mbɔ nɛ.
Sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa khu miyaoŋ pɔ nɛ, pa mishi ŋa pugu ghà ŋkru khu miyaoŋ nɛ shi ŋkɨrɨ fɔ.
“Pa ŋgəʼɨ pei shi ŋga ntɔgɔ, wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ,
minaoŋ shi ŋgū njiŋ,
paʼa fhú lɔ nuʼuŋ mfɛ líʼɛ,
pa fɨ́nəɨ gū llɔ po,
Minnwi chɨ̄ʼɨ pa njɨ moŋ tɔthɨ.
“Lì Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi nōoŋ noŋ yi po, nnɛ ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ shi njūa, njəɨ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua a thɔ nu moŋ lúluŋ po ni ghrɨ́ pugu pa mmɛ ndighaʼo.
Pi shi ntua ntàŋ ŋggì ya ŋkuʼɔ, a taoŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi pugu kɨrɨ pa ŋgwa pi ŋa a chuʼɔ nɛ moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi moŋ khwɛ ghaa mbhi, llɔ moŋ taʼa ŋgei po ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ yichəɨ.
“Yɛʼi ntɨ́gɨ llɔ ŋkuoŋ thɨ wùnu: Nɔ haʼaŋ fhɔ̌ yi nuʼuŋ njɛ̄ tua nu ŋkuoŋ mbhɔ yi nɛ, ɔ ji ŋa ŋkwəɨ mbɨ̀ para.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ yəɨ ŋguoŋ nnu pei nɛ, pəɨ ji ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua kwo para ti mbɔ chonda.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, mbaʼa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yei yiʼi ŋkhu mmɛ ki ŋguoŋ nnu pei lɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
Po pugu shhɛ shi ntɔgɔ gha, ndɔ mbaʼa pa chrà paŋ yiʼi ntɔgɔ gha.
“Ndɔ nɔ llɛ́ ghɔ pugu pa ndɨɨ ghɔ, ŋoŋ lɔ nji, njiʼi nthɛ pi ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi po, ki nduthɔ Muuŋ ni noŋ yi. A wuʼɔ nji Tǎa təʼɨ vi.
Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ Noa nɛ, a haʼaŋ thɔ nu Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mbɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋkhǐ shini ndɔ naa ŋkuʼɔ mfīgi mbhi nɛ, ŋgwa ni njɨ maoŋ ndɔ nnu nu, ndaŋ nu ndɔ mfɛ ŋgwa nda láŋ, ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa Noa ni nii moŋ mmɛ pie ŋa a pɔ nɔ nda nɛ.
Pugu shini ndɔ nji ti ŋkhǐ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ mfīgi njɨ̄gɨ vugu ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ. A haʼaŋ thɔ nu Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mbɔ nɛ.
“Paa ŋgwa shi mbɔ moŋ nyìeŋ, pi lɔ̄gɔ taʼa yi, taʼa yi kɨna.
Paa piŋgɛ shi nthɔ ŋguʼɔ maoŋ, pi lɔ̄gɔ taʼa yi, taʼa yi kɨna.
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ chhɔ ni lɨna məɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji llɛ́ yɛ ŋa Taathɔ vəɨ thɔ nu nɛ.
Ndɔ p̂əɨ ji yei nnu ŋa, ŋ̈gaŋ nda kaŋ nji ndɨɨ yɛ ŋa ŋgɨna thɔ nu ni tuʼu nɛ, a kaŋ nchhɔ ni lɨna mi, ndɨna nu ni nda yi ŋa kiʼi pi pəʼɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ pīri noŋ yəɨ, nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua thɔ nu moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa mbaʼa pəɨ yiʼi mbīʼi nɛ.
“A gɔ̌ kiʼɛ mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa taʼanjuʼɔ, mfāʼo shiethɔ ŋa masha vi nūʼɔŋ vi ŋa a lɨna nu ni pichəɨ puoŋ fàʼa moŋ mbaanda yi, mfɛ maoŋ jɨ moŋ ndɨɨ kaʼokaʼo.
Mbɔrɔ shi mbɔ ni muuŋ fàʼa yɛ ŋa masha vi yəɨ vi a fāʼa nu shiʼi ndɨɨ ŋa a thɔ nɛ.
Shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, a shi nūʼɔŋ vi a lɨna nu ni ŋguoŋ maoŋ pi.
Ndɔ ti ä mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa mbɨmbhɨ, kaŋ a shi nchhu ni noŋ yi ŋa, ‘Mbaʼa masha a yiʼa ŋkwəɨ,’
njɛ̄ wie nu pichəɨ puoŋ fàʼa, njɨ maoŋ ndɔ nnu nu pugu pa mbaa làʼo.
Taathɔ muuŋ fàʼa yei shi ŋkwəɨ moŋ llɛ́ yɛ ŋa muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ shini ndɔ mbīʼi nɛ, pugu pa ndɨɨ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi nji nɛ
nchrɛi vi kaoŋkaoŋ, mīʼaŋ vi lɨʼɨ ŋa pa ŋgwa mifɨɨ shi ŋgə̄ɨ nɛ. Nɔ lɨʼɨ ghɔ kə̄ɨ pugu pa kru shua shi mbɔ fɔ.”
“Nnɛ Shaʼafuoŋ Po shi mbɔ nɔ wuŋ puoŋ piŋgɛ ŋa pugu lɔ naa nji mimbia, ŋa pugu ni ndɔ̄gɔ pa laŋ pugu ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ para mimbia láŋ.
Yi tiɛŋ ni mbɔ pa na, yi tiɛŋ pɔ pa ndɨna.
Pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa na nɛ ni ŋga ndɔ̄gɔ laŋ yugu paʼa ndɔ ntuo yichəɨ krashi
ndɔ pɛ ŋa pugu ni ndɨna nɛ lɔ̄gɔ tuʼɔ krashi yugu pugu pa laŋ yugu.
Nɔ haʼaŋ mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ ni nthɔ njiyiri nɛ, lɔ̄gɔ wɛ̄iŋ vugu pugu llɛ.
“Ndɔ a gha mbɔ moŋ ntuŋ mbhi pi paʼo ŋgòu ŋa, ‘Mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ pɔ nɛiŋ! Pəɨ taoŋ nthɔ mbara vi.’
“Wuŋ puoŋ piŋgɛ pighɔ lɔllɔ mbīri laŋ yugu.
Pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa na nɛ chhu ni pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa ndɨna nɛ ŋa, ‘Pəɨ fɛ yichəɨ krashi yəɨ ni pigi nthɛ ŋa laŋ yigi thɔ mbɛphɛ.’
“Ndɔ pa pi shiethɔ pighɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Ŋa minthɛ paʼa yɛ ŋa pigi fāʼo nɛ lɔ ŋkāʼo ni pia nɛ, pəɨ ghə̄ɨ moŋ nda taŋ njuoŋ yəɨ fɔ.’
“Ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ yuoŋ nɛ, mimbia láŋ ghɔ thɔ, pɛ tiɛŋ piŋgɛ ŋa pugu ni mbīri noŋ yugu mbɔ fɔ nɛ ghə̄ɨ pugu pa mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ láŋ, pi fɨ̄nɨ nda.
A gha ndara pichəɨ nchǔʼɔ mbɨnɨ pighɔ thɔ ŋkaa pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, taathɔ, chuʼɔ nda ni pigi.’
“Ndɔ a khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, ǹdɔ njiʼi nji vəɨ.’ ”
Jishɔ lūgwi ŋa,
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ chhɔ ni lɨna məɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ nji llɛ́ ki ndɨɨ.
“Ndɨɨ ghɔ, Shaʼafuoŋ Po shi ma mbɔ pi nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu ŋgə̄ɨ kra, nnɛ mɛ̄iŋ pa puoŋ fàʼa mfɛ maoŋ pi ni pugu ŋa pugu tiʼi nchhɔ ndɨna nu nɔ ghɔ.

A ni mfɛ tiɛŋ pìɛŋ mbɨŋ ni taʼa yi. Taʼa pìɛŋ pɔ fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋ̈oŋ mfaʼa nɔ paa wuŋ ŋgaʼombhi, pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, ni vichəɨ, a fɛ paa pìɛŋ mbɨŋ, ni vichəɨ a fɛ taʼa pìɛŋ mbɨŋ. A ni mfɛ mbɨŋ ni shesheŋoŋ vugu nɔ fɨʼɨ njɨ yi ndɔllɔ kiʼɛ ŋgə̄ɨ kra yi.
“Chomilaoŋ ghɔ, yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni ŋkwe tiɛŋ pìɛŋ mbɨŋ nɛ ghə̄ɨ ni ji mbɨŋ mbiʼɛ taŋ nɔ ghɔ nshei tiɛŋ pìɛŋ mbɨŋ mbīgi.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa ji mbɨŋ ni mbɔ paa pìɛŋ nɛ shei paa pìɛŋ mbɨŋ mbīgi.
Ndɔ yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa ji mbɨŋ ni mbɔ taʼa pìɛŋ nɛ ghə̄ɨ ntou tiɛŋ ndə̄ɨŋ mbɨŋ taathɔ yi moŋ ghɔ.
“A ni ŋga ndaʼa nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ, taathɔ pa puoŋ fàʼa pighɔ pɨnɨ, pugu pugu pīʼi ŋkrù yi.
Yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni mfɛ tiɛŋ pìɛŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ thɔ njəɨ taathɔ vi ni tiɛŋ pìɛŋ mbɨŋ nduoŋ mbīgi, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, ɔ ni mfɛ tiɛŋ pìɛŋ mbɨŋ vəɨ. Njəɨ, m̀bɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nshei tiɛŋ pìɛŋ mbīgi.’
“Taathɔ vi chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Ɔ ya mfāʼa, ma muuŋ fàʼa shishiʼi ndɔ mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa taʼanjuʼɔ. Ɔ tɔgɔ ndaoŋ ntou ni shɨgɛi yaoŋ, ǹshi mfɛ ntou yi vɛ ɔ lɨna nɔ ghɔ, thɔ pɔgɔ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ kaʼa!’
“Vɛ ŋkaa yu ŋa pi ni mfɛ paa pìɛŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ thɔ nchhu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, ɔ ni mfɛ paa pìɛŋ mbɨŋ vəɨ. M̀bɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nshei paa pìɛŋ mbɨŋ mbīgi.’
“Taathɔ yi chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Ɔ ya mfāʼa, ma muuŋ fàʼa shishiʼi ndɔ mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa taʼanjuʼɔ. Ɔ tɔgɔ ndaoŋ ntou ni shɨgɛi yaoŋ, shi mfɛ ntou yi vɛ ɔ lɨna nɔ ghɔ, thɔ pɔgɔ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ kaʼa.’
“Yɛ ŋkaa yu ŋa pi ni mfɛ taʼa pìɛŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ thɔ nchhu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, ǹji ghɔ ŋa ɔ ŋoŋ tɨtɨnɨ, ŋkwōo nu lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ɔ shini ndɔ njiʼi mbhi, ŋkɨrɨ nu lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ɔ shini ndɔ njiʼi māʼaŋ kaŋ taʼa mbhɛ̌.
Ŋki mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu ŋgə̄ɨ ndə̄ɨŋ mbɨŋ yɔ moŋ shhɛ. Njəɨ, yaoŋ yɔ pɔ nɛiŋ.’
“Ndɔ taathɔ yi khwɛ̄ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Muuŋ fàʼa mbɨmbhɨ, muuŋ fàʼa lɨʼəlɨʼə, ɔ ni nji ŋa ŋga ŋkwōo lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ǹshini ndɔ njiʼi mbhi nɛ, ŋkɨrɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ǹshini ndɔ njiʼi māʼaŋ mbhɛ̌ nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, ɔ ni mfāʼo nɔ niʼiŋ nu mbɨŋ a moŋ bəɨŋ, ŋ̀ga mbɨnɨ ŋ̀kwe mbɨŋ a pugu pa thɔ yi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ kwe mbɨŋ ghɔ mbhɔ yu mfɛ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a ni mfāʼo wuŋ pìɛŋ mbɨŋ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kwo fāʼo nɛ, pi shi mbīgi ntou yi ghɔ nji ŋa a shi mfāʼo a ya njiɛŋ ti ŋgaʼa, ndɔ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi shɨgɛi yɛ ŋa a pɔ mbhɔ yu nɛ, pi shi ŋkwe.
Pəɨ māʼaŋ muuŋ fàʼa ghagha yinɛ mbhi moŋ njiŋnjiŋ, moŋ lɨʼɨ ghɔ, kə̄ɨ pugu pa kru shua shi mbɔ fɔ.’
“Ndɨɨ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi nthɔ moŋ ndighaʼo yi, pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi po, kaŋ a shi nchhɔ kiʼɛ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ndighaʼo yi.
Ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ghao shi ŋkɨrɨ shhɨ yu, a shɛrɛ vugu pugu taoŋ lɨʼɨ yi paa, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋkɛ̄ʼi pa minjɨɨ ghà shɛrɛ pa minjɨɨ mfuʼu shɨna pa mimbhi nɛ.
A shi nūʼɔŋ pa minjɨɨ ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ, pa mimbhi pɔ yugu ŋgei mbhɔ ŋkwrɛi.
“Nnɛ fùoŋ ghɔ shi nchhu ni pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ nɛ ŋa, ‘Pəɨ ŋa mbɔrɔ Tǎa a pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ thɔ, pəɨ shi nshei Shaʼafuoŋ ŋa pi ni mbīri ni pəɨ moŋ njɛ̄ mbhi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa njì ni njia a, pəɨ fɛ maoŋ jɨ vəɨ, njùʼɔ a yaoŋ pəɨ fɛ yaoŋ nnu vəɨ, ŋki pɔ ŋgɨ̀nɨ, pəɨ chuʼɔ chonda vəɨ.
Ŋki pɔ ntii, pəɨ gwɛ ndhwí mbɨŋ mu, ŋki ghɨ̌nɔ nu, pəɨ kra a, ŋki pɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ, pəɨ thɔ njəɨ a.’
“Pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shi khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, pigi ni njəɨ ghɔ pi yəɨ ndɨɨ nji yia ghɔ pigi fɛ maoŋ jɨ vɛ, ki njùʼɔ yɔ yaoŋ pigi fɛ yaoŋ nnu vɛ?
Ndɔ pigi ni njəɨ ghɔ pi yəɨ ndɨɨ ɔ pɔ ŋgɨ̀nɨ pigi chuʼɔ nda yigi ŋa ɔ nii fɔ, ki ɔ pɔ ntii pigi māʼaŋ ndhwí mbɨŋ ghɔ?
Pigi ni njəɨ ghɔ pi yəɨ ndɨɨ ɔ ghɨ̌nɔ nu ki mbɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ pigi thɔ ŋkra ghɔ?’
“Fùoŋ ghɔ shi ŋkwe nchhu ni pugu ŋa, ‘Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ni nchwīe nnɛ ni taʼa miŋkwasha shɨna pa lǐŋ paŋ pei nɛ, pəɨ ni nchwīe pi vəɨ!’
“Nnɛ a shi nchhu ni pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi ŋkwrɛi nɛ ŋa, ‘Pəɨ lɔllɔ yəɨ mu, pəɨ ŋa nchɔ̀nɔ Minnwi pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ móŋoŋ ki ndugwi yi ŋa pi ni mbīri ni Devɨ pugu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa njì ni njia a paʼa pəɨ lɔ mfɛ maoŋ jɨ vəɨ, njùʼɔ a ni njaoŋ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mfɛ yaoŋ vəɨ ŋa ǹnu,
ŋki pɔ ŋgɨ̀nɨ paʼa pəɨ lɔ nchuʼɔ chonda yəɨ vəɨ ŋa ǹii fɔ, ŋki pɔ ntii paʼa pəɨ lɔ māʼaŋ ndhwí mbɨŋ mu, ŋgɨ̄nɔ ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ paʼa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi ŋkra a.’
“Pugu ŋkaa pugu shi ŋkhwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, pigi ni njəɨ ghɔ pi ndɨɨ khɔ nji yia ghɔ, ki njùʼɔ yɔ yaoŋ, ki ɔ pɔ ŋgɨ̀nɨ, ki ɔ pɔ ntii, ki ŋgɨ̄nɔ nu ki mbɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ ki pigi lɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ ghɔ?’
“Nnɛ a shi ŋkhwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, ‘Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ shini ndɔ nchwīe nɛnnɛ ni miŋkwasha shɨna ŋgwa pei nɛ, pəɨ shini ndɔ njiʼi nchwīe vəɨ.’
“Nnɛ pi shi mfɛ pei moŋ ŋgəʼɨ ki mmɛ ndɔ pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ, pi fɛ vugu moŋ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ yɛʼi nu ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei, nchhu ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pəɨ ji ŋa paa llɛ́ shi ŋga ntɔgɔ, a pɔ Jɨ *Lli Njiʼa, ndɔ pi shi nchaʼa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua mfɛ ŋa pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.”
Nnɛ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa thishɨ pa ŋgwa Juu paoŋ ntuʼɔ Kaifa, mbɔ *taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ,
ntáŋ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu Jishɔ njiŋnjiŋ ki ŋgwa lɔ nji ndɔ njwi vi.
Ndɔ pugu ni nchhu nu ŋa, “Kiʼi a pɔ pi ndɨɨ Jɨ Lli Njiʼa, kiɛŋ nnɛ kaŋ ŋgwa shi nsha mighei.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga mbɔ Betani nda Shemu mbɔ ŋgaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ,
nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni njɨ maoŋ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi fɔ nɛ, miŋgwɛ chəɨ thɔ njəɨ vi ni yichəɨ nchɨ́ŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni ŋgùʼɔ, laminda tɨnɨnchuoŋ lɨnaoŋ moŋ ghɔ, a shāʼo thɔ Jishɔ nɔ pɔrɔ nu vi nɔ ghɔ.
Ndɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni mbɨgɨ túa ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ nnu yei nɛ, nnɛ nchhu ŋa, “Láʼo yei phɛ pɔ pi ŋa?
Nthɛ ŋa a ka ni mfɛ pi fīni laminda yei ni ŋkiɛŋ ntou mbɨŋ ŋgɛ̄rɛ pa ghaŋ pou nɔ ghɔ.”
Ndɔ Jishɔ ji nnu ŋa pugu chhu nu nɛ, nnɛ, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ghana miŋgwɛ vi nɛ ŋa? A chwīe pi nnu shiʼi vəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà ŋguʼɔ mfāʼo pa ghaŋ pou ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ, ndɔ mbaʼa pəɨ yiʼi mfāʼo a ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.
A shāʼo laminda yei mbɨŋ mu nɔ pīri nu noŋ a nɔ twei nu.
Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa pi shi nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ yei moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi nɛ, nnu ŋa miŋgwɛ vei chwīe nɛ, pi shi nchhu nɔ kwiŋ nu vi.”
Taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna paanchrɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ mbɔ Judashi Ishikario ghə̄ɨ njəɨ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ,
nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ shi mfɛ pi khɔ vəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ mi mfīni vi ni pəɨ?” Nnɛ pugu pe vi ni trɛi wuŋ ndigi mbɨŋ.
Llɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ a taʼa shɨna nɔ fīni nu vi.
A ni mbɔ fǔoŋ llɛ́ jɨ Jɨ Brɛi Ki Kuʼɔ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ thɔ njəɨ vi, nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa pigi pīri maoŋ jɨ Lli Njiʼa vɛ pi hɨŋ?”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ nii moŋ laʼa, nchhu ni ŋoŋ chəɨ ŋa pəɨ shi njəɨ vi nɛ ŋa, ‘Masha chhu ŋa ndɨɨ a kwo para, ǹshi njɨ Lli Njiʼa nda ghɔ pigi pa ghaŋ younjiŋ paŋ.’ ”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chwīe wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nchhu ni pugu nɛ, mbīri maoŋ jɨ Lli Njiʼa ghɔ.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni fanaoŋ, a chɔchɔ yəɨ taprɛi nthɔ njɨ maoŋ pugu pa paanchrɔ ghɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni njɨ nu nɛ, Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ shi mfīni a.”
Nnu ghɔ wīni vugu ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi, pugu jɛ̄ nchhu nu ghɔ pa taʼa yi taʼa yi ŋa, “Taathɔ, ŋa a lɔ mbɔ mmu?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ ŋa mbhɔ yigi yu shi mbāoŋ moŋ pɛiŋ nɛ, a ju ŋa a shi mfīni a nɛ.
Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi ŋguʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nthɛ vi nɛ, ndɔ ŋgəʼɨ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa a fīni vi nɛ. A ni mbwa ghɔ ŋa kiʼi pi phi vi.”
Judashi, ŋa a ni mfīni vi nɛ, chhu ŋa, “Masha, ŋa a lɔ mbɔ mmu?”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“A chhu gɔ̀ ni noŋ yɔ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nchhɔ njɨ nu nɛ, Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ brɛi, ŋga ŋkwo tōo Minnwi, mbəʼɨ mfɛ ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ kwe ŋkru, yei frɛinoŋ a.”
A lɔ̄gɔ ndua, ŋga ŋkwo tōo Minnwi mfɛ ni pugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ŋguoŋ yəɨ ghao nnu.
Nthɛ ŋa làʼo yei chhǐ a ŋa a krao *kɨ̀na yɛ ŋa Minnwi wrā pugu pɔ ŋgwa pi nɛ, ŋa a ni ŋkwrī nthɛ ntou ŋgwa nɔ līʼɛ nu pa phɨ.
Ndɔ ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa m̀baʼa nuʼuŋ nnu làʼo yei pia, ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa ǹshi mbɨnɨ nnu pia kaʼa fifhi moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Tǎa a nɛ.”
Pugu gha njrāo taʼa ŋkhǐ ntaoŋ kəʼɨ ghɔ ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ Mbra pa Thɨ Olive.
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ni tuʼu yei, pəɨ shi ntei mieŋ a nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa,
‘Ǹshi njwi ŋkɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ,
pa minjɨɨ sha.’
Ndɔ pi shi ŋga ŋkwo kuʼɔ ni mmu moŋ gu, ŋ̀gə̄ɨ shhɨ pəɨ Galili.”
Ndɔ Pita chhu ŋa, “Njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pi shi ntei njiŋ yɔ ghao nɛ, m̀baʼa njiʼi ntei.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Shishini ǹshwei ghɔ ŋa ni tuʼu yei ŋkaoŋ miŋkəʼɨ maa ŋkhwɛ, ɔ shi ŋkwo lāa a ni trɛi ŋgɛ.”
Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ä njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa pɔgɔ khu kaʼa, paʼa ǹdɔ ndāa ghɔ.” Ŋguoŋ pichəɨ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi wuʼɔ nchhu pi nnɛ.
Jishɔ lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ pugu pugu lɨʼɨ chəɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Geshemani, nchhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pəɨ chɔchɔ hɛiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ hiŋ nduoŋ Minnwi.”
A lɔ̄gɔ Pita pugu pa paa puoŋ Shebedi, njɛ̄ nthɔ mfāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ.
Nnɛ, a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Njùʼɔ a ya mbəʼɨ ti minthɛ ŋka kukhu, pəɨ kɨna hɛiŋ pia yra nu kaʼa.”
A chənə ŋgə̄ɨ shɨgɛi yi shhɨ, mfūŋ thɔ yi shhɛ nduoŋ Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Tǎa a, ä njiʼɛ, ɔ pəɨ ndua ŋgəʼɨ yei vəɨ, ndɔ kiʼi a pɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ǹtāʼa nu nɛ, a pɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ tāʼa nu nɛ.”
A gha nthɔ, njəɨ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pugu thɔ ndɛllɛ. A chhu ni Pita ŋa,
“Nnɛ minthɛ paʼa pəɨ lɔ nchhɔ tɔthɨ pia kaʼa nɔ taʼa awa?
Pəɨ chhɔ tɔthɨ nduoŋ Minnwi nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ gū moŋ mōoŋ nu. Jijwɛ yəɨ khwā nu, ndɔ frɛinoŋ yəɨ pou ghrɨ́.”
Nɔ mbra ŋgɛ, a pɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nduoŋ Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Tǎa a, ä mbɔ ŋa minthɛ paʼa ndua ŋgəʼɨ yei lɔ tɔgɔ ki ǹdɔ njiʼi nnu, a pɔ nɛ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ tāʼa nu nɛ.”
Jishɔ pɨ̄nɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ njəɨ vugu pugu llɛ nu, nthɛ ŋa lɔ̄gɔ ni ndɨnaoŋ ligi pugu.
A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mieŋ vugu ŋgə̄ɨ nduoŋ Minnwi, a pɔ trɛi ŋgɛ, ŋguʼɔ nchhu pi taʼa nnu ghɔ ŋa a ni ŋkwo fǔoŋ nchhu nɛ.
Nnɛ a thɔ njəɨ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ wuʼɔ nchhɔ ndhɛ nu mfɛrɛ noŋ yəɨ?
Njəɨ, ndɨɨ kāʼo nɛ, pi fīni Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua nɛ ni pa ghaŋ phɨ.
Pəɨ lɔllɔ pia ghə̄ɨ. Pəɨ līi njəɨ, ŋoŋ ŋa a fīni a nɛ pɔ nɛiŋ!”

Jishɔ ni ŋga ŋguʼɔ nchrā nu, Judashi, mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chəɨŋ pugu pa ntou yú ŋgwa, pugu tuo pa kafa pugu pa wrɛ́i, llɔ mbhɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa pichəɨ pa thishɨ pa ŋgwa moŋ laʼa.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni mfīni vi nɛ ni ŋkwo fɛ lì ni pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ ŋa nshi mbaŋ vi nɛ, ju, pəɨ wɛ̄iŋ vi.”
Judashi kuʼɔ nthɔ mbara Jishɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ǹchrā vɛ, ma Masha,” mbaŋ vi nɔ chrā nu ghɔ.
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Taannu a, chwīe yaoŋ ŋa ɔ ni nthɔ nɔ chwīe nu nɛ.”
Nnɛ ŋgwa pighɔ thɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ nshūu vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, yichəɨ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa pugu pa Jishɔ ni mbɔ nu nɛ shua kafa ŋkəʼɨ muuŋ fàʼa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ ghɔ njaʼa tə́nə yi.
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Pɨnɨ niʼiŋ kafa yɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ fuʼu nɛ. Ghaŋ wie ŋkrɔ̀ ndɔ njwi ŋgwa ni kafa ghà ŋguʼɔ ŋkhu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kafa.
Ki ɔ pīʼi ŋa minthɛ paʼa ndɔ ǹjūa ni Tǎa a ŋa a ghɛ̄rɛ a, a wuʼɔ ntaoŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ po ŋa pugu ghà māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ nɛ pugu tɔgɔ khwachəɨ wuŋ ŋkaŋ yugu ni ŋkaŋ yi paa wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ?
Ndɔ ä mbɔ nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, nnu ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ shi ŋkie pi nɛiŋ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, ŋa a yiʼi ŋa a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɛnnɛ nɛ?”
Moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ Jishɔ chhu ni yú ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa,
“M̀bɔ pi ŋgɨna minwi ŋa pəɨ thɔ nu ŋgwɛ̄iŋ a ni pa kafa pugu pa wrɛ́i? Pa lɛllɛ ŋga nchhɔ Nda Minnwi njɛʼi nu paʼa pəɨ lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ a.
Ndɔ ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nnɛ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nāʼaŋ nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.”
Nnɛ ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi mieŋ vi ntei ni vugu.
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ nɛ lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ Kaifa, mbɔ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa pichəɨ pa thishɨ ni ŋkɨrɨ nɛ.
Pita ni thɔ nu njiŋ pugu ndɔ mbɔ pi fie hiŋ, mbɔ nɔ haʼaŋ yɨna taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni mbɔ nɛ nii nchɔchhɔ pugu pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi lɨʼɨ nɔ yəɨ nu nnu ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa kúŋ ghao ni nthɔ ntāʼa lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa minthɛ pugu shwiʼi thɔ Jishɔ nnɛ ŋa pugu jwi vi nɛ.
Ndɔ pugu shini ndɔ fāʼo sheshe yi, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ntou pa ghaŋ piŋ nnu mbe ni ntaoŋ nthɔ nɛ. Ndugwi yi, yi paa taoŋ nthɔ shhɨ
nchhu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei ni nchhu ŋa, ‘Mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ shaʼa nu Nda Minnwi mfɛ shhɛ mbɨnɨ ŋkrao moŋ trɛi llɛ́.’ ”
Ndɔ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ lɔllɔ ntithi tɔthɨ nchhu ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ mfāʼo khwɛ̀ nɔ fɛ nu? Nnu ŋa ŋgwa pei wɛ̄iŋ ghɔ ŋa ɔ chwīe nɛ pɔ pi khɔ?”
Ndɔ paʼa Jishɔ lɔ nchrā. Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “M̀fɛ gɨ́ vɛ nɔ ligi Minnwi maoŋ ŋa ɔ shwei vigi ŋa ɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ?”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ chhu nɛnnɛ. Ndɔ ǹshwei ghɔ, llɔ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, pəɨ shi njəɨ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua a chhɔ ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ ju ŋa a fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chwīe nu sheshe nnu nɛ, ndɔ nshwiʼi nu moŋ lúluŋ llɔ po.”

Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni ŋga njaʼo yei, nshāa ndhwí yi nchhu ŋa, “A chɨ̄ʼə ligi Minnwi. Pia nuʼuŋ ntāʼa pa miŋkwentie mbīgi nchwīe khɔ nɔ ndwɛ? Līi njəɨ, pəɨ yaʼo chrà nchɨʼəshə yei ni noŋ yəɨ.
Pəɨ pīʼi yəɨ ŋa?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “A pie ŋa a khu.”
Nnɛ pugu thu thwɛ nɔ ligi yi ndɔ ŋgwie vi, pichəɨ chrə̄ɨ vi ni lrì
nchhu ŋa, “Gɔ̀ ŋa pi Chuʼɔ ghɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, yəɨ nɛ lɨʼɨ nshwei vigi, ŋoŋ ŋa a chhwi ghɔ nɛ gɔ̌?”
Pita ni nchhɔ mbhi moŋ yɨna, muuŋ fàʼa chəɨ, mbɔ miŋgwɛ, thɔ njəɨ vi nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Gɔgɔ ŋkaa ghɔ ni mbɔ pəɨ Jishɔ ŋoŋ Galili.”
Ndɔ Pita lāa shhɨ pugu ghao, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ǹdɔ njiʼi nji njiŋ nnu ŋa ɔ chhu nu nɛ.”
A gha nchəɨŋ cho yɨna, yichəɨ muuŋ fàʼa mbɔ miŋgwɛ yəɨ vi nchhu ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei ni mbɔ pugu Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ.”
A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ndāa ti nshwrɛ̄i ŋa, “Ndɔ nji ŋoŋ ghɔ.”
A gha ndara shɨgɛi, ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ kuʼɔ mbara Pita nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Shishini, ɔ taʼa pakwo pugu, nthɛ ŋa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ɔ chrā nu nɛ fīni ghɔ.”
Nnɛ a jɛ̄ chɔ̄nɔ nu noŋ yi nshwrɛ̄i nu ŋa, “Ndɔ njiʼi nji ŋoŋ ghɔ.” Ndɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ miŋkəʼɨ khwɛ.
Nnɛ Pita kwiŋ nnu ŋa Jishɔ ni nchhu nɛ ŋa,
“Ŋkaoŋ miŋkəʼɨ ma ŋkhwɛ, ɔ shi ndāa a ni trɛi ŋgɛ.”
Ǹtaoŋ mbhi ŋkə̄ɨ a ghaʼa.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni muuŋ tutuʼu, ŋguoŋ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa thishɨ pa ŋgwa Juu nyiaŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu shi njwi Jishɔ nɛ.
Pugu krao vi, ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju nchaʼa mfɛ ni Pailɛ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa.
Nnɛ ndɨɨ ŋa Judashi, ŋa a ni mfīni Jishɔ nɛ, ni njəɨ ŋa pi fɛ njɔ́ gu ni Jishɔ nɛ, a kwri njùʼɔ yi mbɨnɨ nduʼu trɛi wuŋ ndigi mbɨŋ pighɔ ni pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa pichəɨ thishɨ,
nchhu nu ŋa, “Ǹchwīe phɨ nɔ fīni nu ŋoŋ ŋa mbhɔ yi yi wo nɛ pi jwi vi.”
Ndɔ pugu chhu ŋa, “Yinɛ pɔ pi khɔ ni pigi? Yinɛ yəɨ pi gɔ̀!”
Judashi māʼaŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ moŋ Nda Minnwi ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkrə̄ɨ noŋ yi.
Ndɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ lɔ̄gɔ mbɨŋ ghɔ nchhu ŋa, “Gɨ́ lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ ŋa pia niʼiŋ moŋ lɨʼɨ nūʼɔŋ mbɨŋ Nda Minnwi nthɛ ŋa a pɔ pi mbɨŋ chhǐ.”
Nnɛ pugu pini, njuoŋ lɨʼɨ shhɛ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni shhɛ ŋgaŋ puoŋ pa kɨ̌ŋ, ndɔ̄gɔ nɔ lɨʼɨ twei pa ghɨ̀nɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pi mɛ̄iŋ shhɛ ghɔ ni Shhɛ Chhǐ ti nchəɨŋ thɔ pa shiʼa.
Nnɛ nnu ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Jɛrimaya ni nchhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa,
“Ndɔ pugu lɔ̄gɔ trɛi wuŋ ndigi mbɨŋ ghɔ,
mbɔ fɨʼɨ nchuoŋ thɔ ju yɛ ŋa pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Ishrae ni nūʼɔŋ nɔ pe nu nɔ thɔ yi nɛ,
Mfɛ mbɨŋ ghɔ nɔ yuoŋ nu lɨʼɨ shhɛ yɛ ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ ni shhɛ ŋgaŋ puoŋ yaoŋ,
nɔ haʼaŋ Taathɔ ni nōoŋ vəɨ nɛ.”
Jishɔ thi shhɨ ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa, ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa ghɔ pie vi ŋa,
“Ɔ Fùoŋ pa Juu?”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“A haʼaŋ ɔ chhu nɛ.”
Ndɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa pichəɨ pa thishɨ ni ŋga nchhu pa nnu thɔ yu, paʼa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkhwɛ̄.
Nnɛ Pailɛ chhu ghɔ kiʼɛ ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ njaʼo fɨʼɨ pa nnu ŋa pugu chhu nu thɔ ghɔ nɛ?”
Ndɔ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkhwɛ̄ sheshe nnu ghɔ ki taʼa ndigi nnu ŋa pi chhu thɔ yu nɛ, nnɛ ti ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa ghɔ ghrāo ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi.
A ghà mbɔ nùʼɔŋ ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa moŋ sheshe ndɨɨ Jɨ Lli Njiʼa nɔ chuʼɔ nu sheshe ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ ŋa ŋgwa chhu ŋa a chuʼɔ nɛ.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pugu fāʼo yichəɨ wuwuru ŋgaŋ nchəɨŋ ŋa pi ya nji vi, ligi yi pɔ Baraba.
Nnɛ pugu gha ŋkɨrɨ, Pailɛ chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ tāʼa nu ŋa ǹchuʼɔ pi gɔ̌ mfɛ ni pəɨ, Baraba ki Jishɔ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ?”
Nthɛ ŋa a ni nji ŋa a ni nchwīe nnu kighɨʼə pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi nchaʼa mfɛ ghɔ.

Nɔ pigi nu, a ni ŋga mbɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ju Pailɛ ni nchɔchhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ yi nchhɔ shaʼa nu nɛ, ŋgwɛ vi taoŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ghɔ ŋa, “Kiʼi nchwīe nnu mbɨŋ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ yinɛ, nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀kwo yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ shiʼa ntou yi moŋ njə̀ɨŋ nthɛ vi.”
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa pichəɨ pa thishɨ kwo niʼiŋ puŋ yú ŋgwa pighɔ fɔ nɛ ŋa pugu pie pi ŋa pi fɛ Baraba ni pugu njwi Jishɔ.
Ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa ghɔ pɨnɨ mbie vugu ŋkamuʼɔŋ ŋa, “Pəɨ tāʼa nu ŋa ǹchuʼɔ yəɨ ŋoŋ shɨna paa ŋgwa pei mfɛ ni pəɨ?”
Pugu ŋa, “Baraba!”
Pailɛ pie ni pugu ŋa, “Ti mi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ ni Jishɔ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.”
Ŋguoŋ yugu chhu ŋa, “Pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa!”
A chhu ŋa, “Nthɛ khɔ? Nnu pɨphɨ ŋa a chwīe nɛ khɔ?”
Ndɔ pugu pɨnɨ mbaʼo ŋgòu mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ ŋa, “Pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa!”

Pailɛ ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa ghɛ̀rɛ lɔ mbɔ nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu shhɨ ndōu nu, ndɔ njəɨ ŋa minthɛ ŋgwa pighɔ sha mighei nɛ, a kwe ŋkhǐ nshɨ̄gao mbhɔ mi nɔ ghɔ shhɨ yú ŋgwa pighɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Mbhɔ ma yi wo nɔ chhǐ ŋoŋ vei, yei pɔ pi fàʼa yəɨ.”
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pighɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Chhǐ yi shi mbɔ thɔ pigi pugu pa thɔ puoŋ pigi!”
Nnɛ, a chuʼɔ Baraba mfɛ ni pugu, ŋga ŋkwo wie Jishɔ, nchaʼa vi mfɛ ŋa pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Nnɛ pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa ghɔ lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju moŋ ntuʼɔ, ŋkɨrɨ kwíe ntɨgao ŋkɨɨ pa shoogɛ yəɨ yu.
Pugu shrāo ndhwí yi māʼaŋ pɨ̀rɨ pipie mbɨŋ yu.
Pugu ni ŋga ŋkra ŋkie michwɛʼichwɛʼi, ŋgwɛ thɔ yu, niʼiŋ mbìe pa fùoŋ ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ, ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yugu shhɨ yu māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Chrá njɨ yɔ, ma fùoŋ pa ŋgwa Juu!”
Pugu thu thwɛ mbɨŋ yu, ŋkwe mbìe ghɔ ndɔ ŋgwie vi nɔ thɔ yi.
Pugu ni ŋga ŋkwo māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ, nshrāo pɨ̀rɨ pipie ghɔ mbɨŋ yu māʼaŋ ji ndhwí mbɨŋ yu, ndɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ntaoŋ nu mbhi nɛ, njəɨ ŋoŋ chəɨ llɔ Shiriŋ, ligi yi pɔ Shemu, pugu ŋɨ vi ŋa a tiɛŋ wáʼa Jishɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga nchəɨŋ lɨʼɨ chəɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Gogota, njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa Lɨʼɨ Kwéi Thɔ.
Pugu fɛ làʼo ghɔ ŋa pi nyāaŋ ni yaoŋ lwilwi ŋa a nnu, ndɔ a gha njwɛʼi, paʼa ndɔ nnu.
Pugu ni ŋga ŋkwo kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, māʼaŋ pɛʼi nɔ ghrā nu ndhwí yi shɨna pugu.
Nnɛ pugu chɔchɔ shhɛ nchhɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi vi fɔ.
Pugu nāʼaŋ yaoŋ ŋa pi ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa thɔ yu ŋa, “Yei Jishɔ, mbɔ Fùoŋ pa Ŋgwa Juu.”
Pi ni ŋkwīŋ vugu pa paa ŋgɨna minwi kaʼa, taʼa yi ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ, taʼa yi ŋgei mbhɔ ŋkwrɛi.
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntɔgɔ nu fɔ nɛ ni nthɔ ŋgwɛʼi vi, nchɨʼɨ thɔ yugu,
nchhu nu ŋa, “Gɔ̀ ŋa ɔ kaŋ ni nthɛ ɔ shāʼa Nda Minnwi mbɨnɨ ŋkrao moŋ trɛi llɛ́ nɛ, kwe nɛ noŋ yɔ pia! Ä mbɔ ŋa ɔ Muuŋ Minnwi, ɔ shwiʼi nɛ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa yinɛ pia.”
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa pichəɨ thishɨ māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ ŋkaa pugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“A ni ŋkwe ŋgwa ndɔ minthɛ paʼa a lɔ ŋkwe noŋ yi. A pɔ pi Fùoŋ pa ŋgwa Ishrae, a shwiʼi nɛ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa ndwɛ pigi piŋ vi.
A ni njɨʼə noŋ yi pi mbɨŋ Minnwi, Minnwi kwe nɛ vi ndwɛ nɔ haʼaŋ ä ŋkhwā vi, nthɛ ŋa a ni nchhu ŋa, ‘M̀bɔ pi Muuŋ Minnwi.’ ”
Pa ŋgɨna minwi ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ vugu pugu nɛ ni māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ ŋkaa pugu.
A ni ŋga mbɔ moŋ ntuŋ minaoŋ, njiŋnjiŋ gū moŋ ŋguoŋ laʼa ghao ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ trɛi minaoŋ ni naoŋchɨ.
A gha mbɔ moŋ trɛi minaoŋ ghɔ, Jishɔ kə̄ɨ ŋa,
“Eli, Eli, lema shabatani?”
njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa,
“Minnwi a, Minnwi a, ɔ mīʼaŋ a ŋa?”
Pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ gha njaʼo, nchhu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei thɔ mɛ̄iŋ pi Elaija.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, yichəɨ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu kɛ̄ʼi ntei tei ŋgə̄ɨ ndɔ̄gɔ kusha niʼiŋ làʼo chəchɨgəɨ fɔ nchwɛʼi thɔ muuŋ thɨ mfɛ ghɔ ŋa a nnu.
Ndɔ pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ chhu ŋa, “Mieŋ vi pia yəɨ ŋa Elaija shi nthɔ ŋkwe vi.”
Ndɔ Jishɔ pɨnɨ ŋkə̄ɨ ŋkiɛŋ ni njɨ, jijwɛ yi taoŋ.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, ndhwí kɨʼɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ moŋ Nda Minnwi shāa ntaoŋ yi paa llɔ thɔ ghɔ nshwiʼi mfɛ làʼo ghɔ, shhɛ chɨ̄ʼɨ, pa ŋgùʼɔ shɨna.
Pa fúŋ moŋ ŋgùʼɔ chuʼɔ ŋkaa pugu, ntou khu ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ ŋa pugu ni ŋkwo khu nɛ kuʼɔ moŋ gu,
ntaoŋ moŋ fúŋ moŋ ŋgùʼɔ, Jishɔ ni ŋga ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu, pugu pugu ghə̄ɨ moŋ mmɛ laʼataoŋ taoŋtaoŋ nōoŋ noŋ yugu ni ntou ŋgwa.

Ndɨɨ ŋa nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ, pugu pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ nchhɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi Jishɔ ni njəɨ shhɛ nchɨʼɨ pugu pa nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu, pugu chhu ŋa, “Shishini, ŋoŋ vei ni mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi.”
Ntou pa piŋgɛ ni mbɔ fɔ ŋkaa pugu nthi fie hini nchhɔ mbɛʼi nu. Yei ni mbɔ piŋgɛ pɛ ŋa pugu ni njōu njiŋ Jishɔ llɔ Galili nchhɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ vi nɛ.
Shɨna pugu ni mbɔ Meri Madaliŋ, ni Meri mǔuŋ Jɛiŋ ni Joshɛ, ni mǔuŋ puoŋ Shebedi.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni fanaoŋ, ŋgaŋ fàʼo chəɨ llɔ Arimatia, ligi yi pɔ Joshɛ, ŋa juju ŋkaa yu ni mbɔ ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ nɛ thɔ.
A ni ŋgə̄ɨ mbara Pailɛ mbie vi ŋa a fɛ khu Jishɔ ghɔ. Nnɛ Pailɛ fɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi fɛ ghɔ.
Joshɛ lɔ̄gɔ khu Jishɔ ndiŋ moŋ mbhɔ ndhwí fhu, mbɔ yi fhi,
niʼiŋ vi moŋ ji fúŋ ŋa a ni ŋguʼɔ ŋka fiʼifiʼi moŋ ŋgùʼɔ, ŋkə̄nə ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ ŋgùʼɔ nchri chofuŋ ghɔ nɔ, ŋgə̄ɨ ni vhi.
Meri Madaliŋ pugu yichəɨ taʼa Meri ni mbɔ fɔ nchɔchhɔ njɨna chofuŋ moŋ ŋgùʼɔ ghɔ.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, llɛ́ pīri noŋ kwo tɔgɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi kɨrɨ shhɨ Pailɛ,
nchhu ŋa, “Masha, pigi kwiŋ ŋa ŋgaŋ mifɨɨ yinɛ ni ŋga ŋguʼɔ mbɔ yi maoŋ, nchhu ŋa, ‘Trɛi llɛ́ shi ŋga ntɔgɔ, m̀bɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.’

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, mfɛ gɨ́ pi thɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi chofuŋ ti trɛi llɛ́ nuʼuŋ ntɔgɔ kaŋ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shi nthɔ njōo khu yi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ nchhu ni pa ŋgwa ŋa, ‘A kuʼɔ moŋ gu.’ Ndugwi njiŋ fɨ̄ɨ nu yei wūru nchaa fǔoŋ yi.”
Pailɛ chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ pa shoogɛ kɛ̄ʼi lɨʼɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nchwīe pugu ya ndɨna ni fúŋ ghɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ tāʼa nu nɛ.”
Nnɛ pugu fɨ̄nɨ chofuŋ ghɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mbaʼa ŋoŋ nii fɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ lēi nu pugu pa mieŋ nu ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi lɨʼɨ fɔ.
Llɛ́ ji pa Juu ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, mbhi jɛ̄ laŋ nu, mbɔ fǔoŋ llɛmbhi moŋ shwiʼi taŋ ghɔ, mbɔ Shonde, Meri Madaliŋ pugu yichəɨ taʼa Meri ghɔ ghə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ yəɨ fúŋ.
Ŋga njəɨ nu, shhɛ chɨ̄ʼɨ ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ nthɛ ŋa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ ni nshwiʼi llɔ po ŋkə̄nə ŋguʼɔ chofuŋ mbɨnɨ nɔ njiŋ nchɔchhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ.
Miŋi mi ni nshei nɔ fiembɨ, ndhwí yi fugu nɔ wěi.
Pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi lɨʼɨ pɔgɔ vi ŋgrū ti noŋ yugu khu.
Ndɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ chhu ni piŋgɛ pighɔ ŋa, “Kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu, ǹji ŋa pəɨ thɔ ntāʼa pi Jishɔ ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nɛ.
A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ hɛiŋ, nthɛ ŋa a kwo kuʼɔ moŋ gu nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchhu nɛ, pəɨ thɔ njəɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi ni ntwei vi nɛ.
Nnɛ, pəɨ yiʼa ŋgəɨghəɨ nchhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa a kwo kuʼɔ moŋ gu, ndɔ pəɨ līi njəɨ, a ghə̄ɨ nu nɛ shhɨ pəɨ moŋ Galili, ndɔ pəɨ shi njəɨ vi fɔ! Pəɨ kwiŋ nnu ŋa ǹshwei vəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ.”
Nnɛ pugu lɔllɔ chofuŋ ni tei moŋ pɔgɔ gu pugu pa mmɛ pwanjuʼɔ, ntei ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ shwei pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nɔ ghɔ.
Ndɔ ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, Jishɔ paoŋ pugu pugu nchhu ŋa,
“Nchrā ni pəɨ!”
Ndɔ pugu thɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ kwò yi ŋgaʼo vi.
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu, pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nchhu ni pa lǐŋ paŋ ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ Galili kaŋ pugu shi njəɨ a fɔ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ piŋgɛ pighɔ ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, ŋga njəɨ nu, pichəɨ pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi fúŋ ghɔ thɔ moŋ laʼa mfɨ̄ʼɨ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ ni pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ.
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pighɔ kɨrɨ pugu pa pichəɨ pa thishɨ, mbini ntaoŋ mfɛ ntou mbɨŋ ni pa shoogɛ pighɔ,
nchhu ŋa, “Pəɨ fāʼo nɔ chhu nu pi ŋa, ‘Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ ni tuʼu njōo vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pigi ni ndhɛ nu nɛ.’
Ndɔ ti ÿei nchəɨŋ tə́nə ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa, pigi ji ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pigi shi ŋkara vi nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo ŋgəʼɨ.”
Pugu kwe mbɨŋ ghɔ nchwīe nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni nchhu ni pugu nɛ. Chrà yei nyīeŋ wuʼɔ nnɛ shɨna pa Juu ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ thɔ pa shiʼa.
Taʼanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pighɔ ghə̄ɨ Galili ŋkuoŋ mbra nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nshwei vugu nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga njəɨ vi, ŋgaʼo vi ndɔ pichəɨ fāʼo khuthɔ.
Jishɔ thɔ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pi kwo fɛ ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ po pugu pa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ vəɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ ghə̄ɨ nchwīe ŋgwa pugu pɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ paŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ghao nchhɔ ŋkwe vugu ni ŋkhǐ moŋ ligi Tǎa ni Muuŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi,
nchhɔ njɛʼi vugu ŋa pugu nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa ǹchhu ni pəɨ nɛ ghao. Pəɨ līi njəɨ, pia shi mbɔ kaʼa ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ti mbhi shi nuʼuŋ ndugwi.”
Mark: Yei njɛ̄ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Jishɔ, mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi.
Pi nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Ishaya ŋa,
“Līi njəɨ, ǹshi ntaoŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ a,
a ghə̄ɨ shhɨ pəɨ mbīri ndaoŋ ni pəɨ,
Ŋoŋ chəɨ thɔ mfɛ gɛ̀ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó ŋa: ‘Pīri shɛndaoŋ Taathɔ,
chwīe pa lɨʼɨ tɔgɔ yi pɔ yi tithi.’ ”
Nɛnnɛ, Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ ni nthɔ mbɔ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó nthɔ mfɛ ŋkhǐ ni ŋgwa, ndɔ nchīi nu ŋa, “Pəɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ, m̀fɛ ŋkhǐ ni pəɨ, Minnwi līʼɛ phɨ yəɨ.”
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ laʼataoŋ Judia, pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Jerushalɛiŋ taoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ vi, a kwe vugu ni ŋkhǐ moŋ nɨnəɨ Jodaŋ. Pugu yūa phɨ yugu.
Jouŋ ni māʼaŋ ndhwí ŋa pi chwīe pi ni ŋgì yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ minyieŋ pi mɛ̄iŋ ni kamela,
ni ŋkandaŋ ŋgrào minyieŋ nɔ ntuʼu yi, maoŋ jɨ pi ni mbɔ ŋgwíŋ pugu pa llɔ̌ ŋkǔnu.
A ni nchīi nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ ŋa a shi nthɔ njiŋ a nɛ ghaʼo nchaa a, paʼa ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo ŋoŋ ŋa minthɛ ǹtuʼu noŋ a mfēi ŋkɨ̌ɨ tra yi nɛ.
Mi ni ŋkwe vəɨ pi ni ŋkhǐ, ndɔ a shi ŋkwe vəɨ pi ni Jijwɛ Minnwi.”
A ni mbɔ moŋ llɛ́ pighɔ, Jishɔ thɔ llɔ Nasharɛ moŋ Galili, Jouŋ kwe vi ni ŋkhǐ moŋ nɨnəɨ Jodaŋ.
Jishɔ gha mbɨʼɨ noŋ yi ntaoŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ ghɔ nɛ, njəɨ po ŋaʼaŋ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, Jijwɛ Minnwi shwiʼi nu mbɨŋ yu mbɔ nɔ mintuʼɔlibuŋ.
Ŋggì taoŋ po, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ɔ muuŋ a ŋa ŋ̀khwā, ǹja mfāʼo pwatua nthɛ ghɔ.”
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, Jijwɛ ghɔ chwīe a ghə̄ɨ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó.
A ni mbɔ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó ghɔ nɔ khwɛ wuŋ llɛ́, Shata thɔ mōoŋ vi. A ni mbɔ fɔ pugu pa mimaoŋ mooŋ trǔ, ndɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chhɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ vi.
Pi ni ŋga ŋkwo wɛ̄iŋ Jouŋ ti mfɨ̄nɨ, Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ Galili nthɔ nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Minnwi,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ kwo kāʼo, Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi kwo para, pəɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ, ŋkara mbiŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nyīeŋ nu ŋkɨŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ Galili, njəɨ Shemu pugu Andru ndǐŋ vi, pugu thɔ māʼaŋ ndáŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa ghaŋ ŋgunu.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ yōu njiŋ a, ǹchwīe pəɨ pɔ ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ ŋgwamishua.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ pugu mieŋ ndáŋ pugu njōu njiŋ yi.
A ni ŋga nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ shɨgɛi, njəɨ Jɛiŋ mbɔ muuŋ Shebedi pugu Jouŋ ndǐŋ vi, pugu pɔ moŋ kikuoŋ yugu ntaʼa pa ndáŋ pugu.
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ Jishɔ mɛ̄iŋ vugu, pugu mieŋ tǎa vugu, mbɔ Shebedi, moŋ kikuoŋ pugu pa puoŋ fàʼa, njōu njiŋ Jishɔ.
Pa Jishɔ ni ŋgə̄ɨ Kapanuŋ, wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, a gha mbɔ llɛ́ ji, a nii moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi nthɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa.
Pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo a yɛʼi nu nɛ ghrāo ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni njɛʼi nu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ni njɛʼi nɔ mmɛŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo ghrɨ́, a shini ndɔ njɛʼi pi nɔ ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, yichəɨ ŋoŋ ni jijwɛ pɨphɨ nii moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi yugu, ŋkə̄ɨ nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pia fāʼo pi khɔ Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ? Ɔ thɔ pi nɔ pɨrɨ nu vigi? Ǹji ŋoŋ ŋa ɔ yie nɛ, ɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.”
Jishɔ pɨ̄ga vi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Lɛrɛ laŋ ndɔ ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu.”
Jijwɛ pɨphɨ ghɔ shwiʼi miprɨligi mbɨŋ yu, ŋga ŋkə̄ɨ ŋkiɛŋ ni njɨ, ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu kiʼɛ.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pighɔ ghrāo ti mbie noŋ pugu ŋa, “Yei pɔ pi khɔ? A pɔ pi yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ yɛʼi yaoŋ fhi! A fɛ gɨ́ nɔ mmɛŋoŋ ni ghrɨ́, njiʼi nthɛ pi ni pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ, pugu yaʼo vi.”
Nthɛ pa nnu pei, ligi Jishɔ nɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ ni nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ Galili ghao.
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ Jishɔ taoŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ŋgə̄ɨ pugu pa Jɛiŋ ni Jouŋ nda Shemu pugu Andru.
Ndɨɨ ghɔ, ŋguŋ Shemu ni nthɔ ŋgɨ̄nɔ shɨ̀gao, pi shwei Jishɔ nɔ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
A thɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨʼɨ vi tɔthɨ, shɨ̀gao ghɔ kiʼi ndɔ ntaoŋtaoŋ, ŋguŋ shemu ghɔ fɛ maoŋ ni pugu.
Ni fanaoŋ ghɔ moŋ nii minaoŋ, pi thɔ ni ŋguoŋ ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ pugu pa ŋgwa ŋa pa miŋwɛiŋ ni ŋgana vugu nɛ.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ mmɛ laʼataoŋ ghɔ kɨrɨ chonda ŋa a ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ.
A yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ntou ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ ŋgɨ̌nɔ ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ nɛ, mfuʼu ntou pa miŋwɛiŋ. A shini ndɔ mfɛ shɨna ni sheshe miŋwɛiŋ nɔ chrā nu nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nji vi.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ni tutuʼu ki lɨʼɨ lɔ naa nja mfēi shiʼi, Jishɔ lɔllɔ ntaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋoŋ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ fɔ nɛ, nduoŋ Minnwi.
Shemu pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ kaʼa nɛ taoŋ nthɔ ntāʼa vi.
Pugu ni ŋga njəɨ vi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa thɔ nɛ ntāʼa ghɔ.”
Ndɔ a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pia ghə̄ɨ moŋ pichəɨ pa laʼataoŋ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ǹchīi chrà ni pugu fɔ ŋkaa pugu, nthɛ ŋa mi ni nthɔ nthɛ pi yie.”
Nnɛ, a nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ Galili ghao, nthɔ nchīi chrà Minnwi moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi ndɔ mfuʼu pa miŋwɛiŋ.
Ŋgaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ thɔ njəɨ vi, ndɨ̄gəɨ vi, ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɛ nchhu ŋa, “Ɔ̈ ŋkhwā, ɔ chwīe mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ.”
Nthɛ kwoshɨnɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni mfāʼo nɛ, Jishɔ shwīi mbhɔ yi ŋkaoŋ vi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋ̀khwā. Pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ.”
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ mmɛ mbɨŋ yu, a gū yi taoŋtaoŋ.
Nnɛ Jishɔ gha ŋkwo shūu tə́nə yi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Kiʼi nchhu ni shesheŋoŋ, ndɔ ghə̄ɨ nōoŋ noŋ yɔ ni ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi a līi ghɔ, ndɔ mfɛ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ Mushi chhu nɛ, nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa Minnwi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ.”

Ndɔ a taoŋ njɛ̄ chrā nu nnu pighɔ ki lɔ ŋgīʼɛ, nthɔ nchīi nnu pighɔ. Nchrā ti nchəɨŋ moŋ nthɨŋkwo ŋa Jishɔ kaŋ ni mfɛ paʼa a lɔ nuʼuŋ nii moŋ laʼa shhɛnte, a ni ŋkɨna pi moŋ pa lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋgwa shi ki lɔ mbɔ fɔ nɛ, ŋgwa llɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ ntəʼɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nthɔ njəɨ vi.
Shɨgɛi llɛ́ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ pɨ̄nɨ Kapanuŋ pa chrà nyīeŋ ŋa a pɔ laʼa.
Ntou pa ŋgwa thɔ ŋkɨrɨ ti paʼa shɨ̀na lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ, njiʼi nthɛ pi chonda. Jishɔ ni nthɔ nchhu chrà Minnwi ni pugu.
Ŋgwa chəɨŋ pugu pa ŋkwíni kwò, khwɛ pimbia tiɛŋ vi nthɔ nu ni ju lɨʼɨ yəɨ Jishɔ.
Shɨ̀na ni ŋga mieŋ ki lɔ mbɔ ni pugu nɔ para nu yəɨ Jishɔ nthɛ yú ŋgwa pighɔ, pugu kuʼɔ thɔnda ŋaʼaŋ mbo fɔ
, nshwiʼi ŋkwíni ghɔ ŋkuoŋ kúoŋ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga njəɨ fɨʼɨ piŋ yugu, nchhu ni ŋkwíni ghɔ ŋa,
“Muuŋ a, pi līʼɛ pa phɨ pɔ.”
Pichəɨ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi ni nchhɔ fɔ, mbie nu moŋ njùʼɔ pugu ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ vei kie nɛiŋ nchrā nɛiŋ? Yei pɔ pi chrà nchɨʼəshə! Mimfɛ a līʼɛ gɔ̌ ndīʼɛ phɨ ŋkiɛŋ Minnwi təʼɨ vi?”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, Jishɔ ni nji nnu ŋa pugu ni mbīʼi nu moŋ njùʼɔ pugu nɛ moŋ jijwɛ yi, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ kie nɛiŋ nthɔ mbīʼi ŋkwaŋ nnu pei nɛiŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ?
A yīʼɛ yəɨ, chhu nu ni ŋkwíni ŋa, ‘Pi līʼɛ pa phɨ pɔ,’ ki chhu nu ŋa, ‘Lɔllɔ, lɔ̄gɔ kúoŋ yɔ, nyīeŋ’?
Ndɔ nɔ chwīe nu pəɨ ji ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua fāʼo ghrɨ́ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɔ līʼɛ nu pa phɨ.”
A chhu ni ŋkwíni ghɔ ŋa,
“Ǹchhu vɛ, lɔllɔ, lɔ̄gɔ kúoŋ yɔ ŋgə̄ɨ laʼa.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, a lɔllɔ, ndɔ̄gɔ kúoŋ yi, ntaoŋ ni vhi ligi ŋguoŋ yugu ghao, nɛnnɛ, ŋguoŋ yugu ghrāo, ŋgaʼo Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Pigi lɔ naa ma njəɨ sheshe nnu nɔ yei!”
Jishɔ pɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkɨŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ ŋkamuʼɔŋ, ŋguoŋ yú ŋgwa ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu lɨʼɨ yəɨ vi, a thɔ njɛʼi vugu.
Ndɔ haʼaŋ a ni nyīeŋ nu nɛ, a yəɨ Levi, muuŋ Afioshi, a chhɔ moŋ ntǎa kwe taashi, a chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Yōu njiŋ a.”
A yrɛi shhɛ njōu njiŋ yi.
Ndɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nchhɔ yəɨ taprɛi nthɔ njɨ maoŋ nda Levi nɛ, ntou pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ chhɔ yəɨ yu pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, nthɛ ŋa ntou ŋgwa ni nthɔ njōu njiŋ Jishɔ.

Pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa ŋgwa Farashi nɛ ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa a thɔ njɨ maoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ chwīe phɨ pugu pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi, nchhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa, “A chwīe khɔ a jɨ maoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ?”
Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, nchhu ŋa,
“Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ shiʼi nɛ lɔ mfāʼo chà ŋgaŋ fhɔ̌, a fāʼo ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghɨ̌nɔ nu nɛ. Ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ pi nɔ gɛ̄ nu pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ, ǹthɔ nthɛ pi ghaŋ phɨ.”

Ghaŋ younjiŋ Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ, pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi ni nthɔ njī ŋkhǐ. Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa thɔ mbara Jishɔ mbie vi ŋa, “A chwīe khɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pa ŋgwa Farashi jī ŋkhǐ, ndɔ paʼa pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ lɔ njī?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Mimfɛ pa ghaŋ gɛ̀ lɨʼɨ láŋ jī ŋkhǐ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu pa mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ kaʼa nɛ? Ndɔ haʼaŋ pugu pa mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ kaʼa nɛ, mbaʼa pugu jī ŋkhǐ.
Ndɔ pa llɛ́ pighɔ shi nthɔ ŋa pi shi mfuʼu mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ moŋ shɨna pugu, nɛnnɛ, pugu shi njī ŋkhǐ moŋ llɛ́ ghɔ.
“Mbaʼa ŋoŋ taʼa paʼo ŋkuoŋ ndunu ndhwí ni pra ndhwí fhi. Ä nchwīe nɛnnɛ, kaŋ ndhwí fhi ghɔ shi ŋɨnɛiŋ, nshūu ndunu ndhwí ghɔ nshāa mbɨnɨ ŋka chwīe a taoŋ pi mmɛ mbo.

“A wuʼɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ ni mikei ŋgrào nɛ. Mbaʼa ŋoŋ niʼiŋ làʼo fhi moŋ ndunu mikei ŋgrào, ä nchwīe nɛnnɛ, làʼo ghɔ fāʼo ntūgu mikei ŋgrào ghɔ, nnɛ kaŋ làʼo ghɔ pugu pa mikei ŋgrào ghɔ shi mbɨrɨ gha. A yiʼi ŋa ŋgwa niʼiŋ làʼo fhi moŋ mikei ŋgrào fhi.”
A ni mbɔ Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu chəɨ, Jishɔ nyīeŋ ntɔgɔ nu moŋ nyīeŋ shíe gɛ. Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ki tɔgɔ nu nɛ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ka shíe gɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, pa ŋgwa Farashi pie ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, a chwīe khɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ thɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa gɨ́ lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ ŋa pi chwīe Llɛ́ Ji nɛ?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ naa mɛ̄iŋ nnu ŋa Devi ni nchwīe ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mbou yaoŋ jɨ, njì ni njia vugu pa ŋgwa pi nɛ?

Ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nii Nda Minnwi, ndɨɨ ŋa Abiata ni mbɔ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɛ? A ni nii ŋkru brɛi ŋa pi ni mfɛ ni Minnwi, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mfɛ yi ŋgwa pi, mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa kɨna lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ ŋa a nthɛ shesheŋoŋ kru ŋkiɛŋ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi.”
Jishɔ lūgwi ŋa,
“Minnwi ni nūʼɔŋ Llɛ́ Ji nthɛ pi ŋoŋmishua, a lɔ nchwīe ŋoŋmishua nthɛ pi Llɛ́ Ji.
Nɛnnɛ, Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua taathɔ, njiʼi nthɛ pi Llɛ́ Ji.”
Jishɔ ni mbɨnɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi, ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ mfāʼo mbɔ kwikwi.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa ni mbɔ fɔ mbɛʼi vi nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa a shi njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋoŋ ghɔ Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa a chwīe nnu ŋa a lɔ ŋkāʼo.
Jishɔ chhu ni ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa mbhɔ yi ni ŋkwikwi nɛ ŋa,
“Taoŋ nthɔ hɛiŋ.”
Nɛnnɛ, a pie vugu ŋa,
“Gɨ́ piŋ ŋa pi chwīe pi yəɨ Llɛ́ Ji, nnu shiʼi ki nnu pɨphɨ, kwe nu ŋoŋ ki jwi nu ŋoŋ?”
Ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ nchhu nnu.
A kara noŋ yi mbɛʼi vugu moŋ pɨgɨtua, mfāʼo pəʼɨ njùʼɔ nthɛ tɨnɨthɔ yugu, nchhu ni ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa,
“Shwīi mbhɔ yɔ.”
A shwīi, mbhɔ yi kiʼi ndɔ mbɔ pi shiʼi.
Pa ŋgwa Farashi taoŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ chomilaoŋ ghɔ nyiaŋ ntáŋ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ fùoŋ Hɛrɔ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu shi njwi Jishɔ nɛ.
Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shūʼu mbɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ, mmɛ yú ŋgwa llɔ Galili yōu njiŋ yi pugu pa ŋgwa llɔ Judia,

pugu pa Jerushalɛiŋ pugu Idumia pugu pa llɔ njiʼa Jodaŋ pugu pa llɔ ŋgei pa laʼataoŋ Tairɛ pugu Shidoŋ. Ŋguoŋ mmɛ yú ŋgwa pei ni nthɔ lɨʼɨ yəɨ Jishɔ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo pa nnu haʼaŋ a ni nchwīe nu nɛ.
A chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa pugu pīri pie ghɔ nthɛ yú ŋgwa pighɔ, kiɛŋ nɛnnɛ kaŋ pugu shi nwīʼiŋ vi.
A ni ŋkwo yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ntou ŋgwa, nɛnnɛ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni mfāʼo ghɨ̌nɔ nɛ, ni ŋɨ nu nɔ kāoŋ nu vi.
Sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ ki yəɨ vi nɛ, pugu gū shhɛ shhɨ yu mbaʼo ŋgòu ŋa, “Ɔ Muuŋ Minnwi!”
A fɛ tɨtɨnɨ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu chwīe pi ji vi.
Jishɔ kuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra, ŋgɛ̄ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a ni ntāʼa nu ŋa pugu thɔ mbara vi nɛ ŋa pugu thɔ, pugu thɔ mbara vi.
A chuʼɔ paanchrɔ ŋa a ni nchhɔ̄ ligi yugu ni ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi nɛ, ŋa pugu pugu pɔ nu, ŋa a nthɛ a shi ntaoŋ vugu pugu chīi chrà Minnwi,
ndɔ mfāʼo njɨ nɔ fuʼu nu pa miŋwɛiŋ.
Yei paanchrɔ ŋgwa pɛ haʼaŋ a ni nchuʼɔ nɛ:
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ laʼa, yú ŋgwa pɨnɨ ŋkɨrɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ ti paʼa a lɔ mfāʼo shɨna pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nɔ jɨ nu maoŋ.
Pa ndaaŋoŋ yi ni ŋga njaʼo, ntaoŋ mbhi lɨʼɨ wɛ̄iŋ vi, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nchhu nu ŋa, “A paapaa.”
Pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi ŋa pugu ni shwiʼi llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ chhu ŋa, “Bɛjɛbu
pɔ mbɨŋ yu, a fuʼu pa miŋwɛiŋ pi ni ghrɨ́ nthishɨ pa miŋwɛiŋ.”
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ gɛ̄ vugu pugu thɔ yəɨ yu, a chrā ni pugu moŋ luʼɔ chrà,
“Mimfɛ Shata kie nɛiŋ mfuʼu Shata mbɨŋ ŋoŋ?
T̈aʼa laʼataoŋ ŋgrā noŋ yi moŋ pa kwíe, nthɔ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ ni noŋ pugu, kaŋ mbaʼa laʼataoŋ ghɔ yiʼi ntithi.
Ti ẗaʼa nda mbɔ pi moŋ minduoŋnduoŋ, kaŋ mbaʼa nda ghɔ yiʼi ntithi.
Ti S̈hata ndɔllɔ nɔ māʼaŋ nu noŋ yi ni nchhɔ̀, ndɔ mbɔ moŋ minduoŋnduoŋ, kaŋ lūgwi nu mi para.
Ndɔ mbaʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ nii nda ŋgaŋ ghrɨ́, ntiɛŋ maoŋ pi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ, ki lɔ mfǔoŋ ŋkrao ŋgaŋ ghrɨ́ ghɔ. A wuʼɔ kəʼɨ ghɔ ŋa minthɛ a tiɛŋ maoŋ pi ntaoŋ nɔ nda yu.
“Shishini ǹshwei vəɨ, Minnwi shi ndīʼɛ ŋguoŋ phɨ ŋa ŋgwamishua chwīe nɛ, pugu pa sheshe chrà nchɨʼəshə ŋa a taoŋ nchò pugu nɛ,
ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chɨ̄ʼə Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ, mbaʼa Minnwi ma ndīʼɛ phɨ yi, nthɛ ŋa a chwīe phɨ ki līʼɛ.”
A ni nchhu nnɛ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nchhu nu ŋa, “A fāʼo jijwɛ pɨphɨ.”
Mǔuŋ Jishɔ pugu pa lǐŋ pi pi pimbia thɔ nthi mbhi ntaoŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ.
Yú ŋgwa ni nchɔchhɔ yəɨ yu, nnɛ pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Mǔuŋ ghɔ pugu pa lǐŋ pɔ pi pimbia pɔ nɛ mbhi ntāʼa nu njəɨ ghɔ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Mǔuŋ a pugu pa lǐŋ paŋ pɔ pi pa gɔ̌?”
A pɛʼi pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chɔchɔ ŋgɨ̄ŋ vi mbāoŋ nɛ, nchhu ŋa,
“Mǔuŋ a pugu pa lǐŋ paŋ pi pimbia pɔ nɛiŋ hɛiŋ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ, a ndǐŋ a vi mimbia pugu pa ndǐŋ a vi miŋgwɛ ni mǔuŋ a.”
Jishɔ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ njɛ̄ yɛʼi nu ŋkɨŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ ŋkamuʼɔŋ, ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yú ŋgwa kɨrɨ yəɨ yu, nnɛ a ni nii nchɔchhɔ pi moŋ kikuoŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ, yú ŋgwa pighɔ pɔ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ lɨʼɨ yó.
A ni njɛʼi vugu ni ntou pa nnu moŋ luʼɔ chrà, moŋ pa nnu haʼaŋ a ni njɛʼi nu nɛ, a ni nchhu ni pugu ŋa.
“P̂əɨ yaʼo! Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni ma mbɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ māʼaŋ mbhɛ̌.
Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni māʼaŋ nu nɛ, pichəɨ gū shhɛmbua, pa mishi shwiʼi ŋkru.
Pichəɨ gū moŋ shhɛ ŋkwá, lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ntou nchíʼa shi ki lɔ mbɔ nɛ, njiʼa ŋkɛkhɛ nthɛ ŋa nchíʼa shi ki lɔ njiɛŋ fɔ,
ndɔ minaoŋ ghà nthɛ, ntūoŋ vi, nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ mfāʼo ŋǐeŋ yi nɛ, a kāʼo mbraoprao ŋkhu.
Pichəɨ mbhɛ̌ gū moŋ shishaʼa, shishaʼa yīʼɛ ŋkuʼɔ mfīgi vi, paʼa a lɔ ŋkuʼɔ ti njuŋ ntíɛŋ.
Ndɔ pichəɨ pa mbhɛ̌ gū moŋ shhɛ shiʼi, ŋkhɛ̄ ŋkuʼɔ njuŋ. Pichəɨ yuŋ trɛi wuŋ, pichəɨ ntɨgao wuŋ, pichəɨ taʼa ŋkɨɨ.”
Jishɔ lūgwi ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni mbɔ təʼɨ vi nɛ, ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni mbɔ yəɨ yu nɛ, pugu pa paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ njəɨ vi mbie vi ni njiŋ pa luʼɔ chrà pighɔ.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Minnwi tūgu pa nnu ŋa a ni mbɔ yi lə̄ɨŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ yi ni pəɨ, ndɔ ni ŋgwa nduoŋ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ nɛ, ŋguoŋ nnu pɔ pi moŋ pa luʼɔ chrà,
nnɛ ŋa,
‘Pugu shi nja ndīi
ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ,
Pugu shi nja njwɛrɛ,
ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njaʼo nji
kiɛŋ nɛnnɛ, kaŋ pugu shi mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ,
Minnwi līʼɛ phɨ yugu.’ ”
Jishɔ pie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ nji njiŋ luʼɔ chrà yei? Ti pəɨ shi ŋkie pi nɛiŋ nji njiŋ ŋguoŋ pa luʼɔ chrà?
Ŋgaŋ māʼaŋ mbhɛ̌ māʼaŋ pi chrà Minnwi.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi nɛ pɔ pi nɔ mbhɛ̌ ŋa a gū shɛmbua. Pugu gha njaʼo, Shata kāʼo ndɔ ntɔthɔ mfuʼu chrà ghɔ ŋa pi chhu ni pugu nɛ.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, pichəɨ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi nɛ pɔ nɔ pɛ mbhɛ̌ ŋa a gū moŋ shhɛ ŋkhwā nɛ. Pugu gha njaʼo chrà Minnwi, ŋkiʼi mbiŋ piŋ ni pwatua.
Ndɔ paʼa ŋǐeŋ yugu lɔ ntɨnɨ, piŋ yugu wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɔ kuo ndɨɨ, nnɛ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgəʼɨ pugu pa mōoŋ nu thɔ nthɛ chrà Minnwi nɛ, pugu kāʼo mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu paʼa nɔ ghɔ.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi nɛ pɔ nɔ pɛ mbhɛ̌ ŋa pi māʼaŋ a gu moŋ shishaʼa nɛ,
ndɔ pa ghaghana nthɛ maoŋ nɔ yru nu moŋ yei chɔmbhi, pugu pa mifɨɨ ŋa pa fāʼo ghà nthɔ nɔ nɛ pugu pa shɔ̄rɔ nu pichəɨ pa maoŋ nduoŋ, nii njùʼɔ pugu mfīgi chrà ghɔ pugu kara mbɔ nɔ thɨ ki yuŋ ntíɛŋ.
Ndɔ pɛ mbhɛ̌ maoŋ ŋa pi ni māʼaŋ moŋ shhɛ shiʼi nɛ pɛ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi, mbiŋ ndɔ njuŋ ntíɛŋ, pichəɨ trɛi wuŋ, pichəɨ ntɨgao wuŋ, pichəɨ taʼa ŋkɨɨ nɛ.”
Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Yichəɨ ŋoŋ pɔ fɔ ŋa a ghà nii ni truka nda niʼiŋ laʼo mikru, ki laʼo kúoŋ, ki lɔ nūʼɔŋ pi ŋkuoŋ lɨʼɨ thi truka?
“Yichəɨ yaoŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ ŋa pi lə̄ɨŋ ŋa mbaʼa pi ma mieŋ ki nōoŋ lɨʼɨ wo, ki nnu ŋa pi kuru ŋa mbaʼa a ma mieŋ ki taoŋ lɨʼɨ liʼɛ.”
Jishɔ lūgwi ŋa,
“S̈hesheŋoŋ mfāʼo tə́nə, â yaʼo.”
A pɨnɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ywɛrɛ nnu haʼaŋ pəɨ yaʼo nɛ shiʼi. Yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ fɨʼɨ yaoŋ nɔ ghɔ mfɛ ni ŋoŋ nɛ, Minnwi shi ŋguʼɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ pi moŋ ghɔ mfɛ ni pəɨ, ndɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɨnɨ mbīgi ntou yi ni pəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa ni ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ, Minnwi shi mbīgi ntou yi, ndɔ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo nɛ, Minnwi shi ŋkwe shɨgɛi yɛ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ mbhɔ yu.”
Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Yei nɔ haʼaŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi pɔ nɛ. Ŋoŋ lɔ̄gɔ mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ māʼaŋ,
ndhɛ nu ŋgūʼu nu moŋ pa tuʼu pugu pa naoŋchɨ, moŋ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ, mbhɛ̌ ghɔ khɛ̄ ŋkuʼɔ ndɔ paʼa a lɔ nji ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a kie nɛ.
Shhɛ ghɔ chwīe mbhɛ̌ ghɔ kuʼɔ njuŋ, fǔoŋ yaoŋ pɔ ŋa a tua, mbra yi pɔ ŋa ŋkwéi yi taoŋ, nɛnnɛ ntíɛŋ yuŋ ŋkuoŋ ŋkwéi yi ghɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ntíɛŋ ghɔ tɨnɨ nɛ, a kāʼo njɛ̄ pi kwōo nu nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ kwōo kāʼo.”
Jishɔ pie ŋa,
“Mimfɛ pia māʼaŋ fɨʼɨ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi pi ni khɔ, pia shi mfɨ̄ʼɨ pi ni yəɨ luʼɔ chrà?
A pɔ pi nɔ mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ yi gɛ, ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa pi thɔ mbhī vi nɛ, a pɔ ndugwi mbhɛ̌ ŋa a yi gɛ nɛ ŋkuoŋ mbhi.
Ndɔ ti ndɨɨ ŋa pi phi vi nɛ, a kuʼɔ ŋgū ŋkiɛŋ ndugwi mmɛ thɨ, ŋgāʼo nchaa ŋguoŋ maoŋ phi ghao moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ, mfuʼu mɛmmɛ mbhɔ pi, nnɛ pa mishi thɔ ŋkrao nda pugu ŋkuoŋ pa mbhɔ pi.”
Jishɔ shwei chrà Minnwi ni pugu moŋ ntou pa luʼɔ chrà nɔ pei, nɔ fɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a nthɛ pugu yaʼo nji nɛ.
Jishɔ ni nshwei chrà Minnwi ni yú ŋgwa wuʼɔ moŋ pa luʼɔ chrà, ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nɛ, a fɨ̄ʼɨ ŋguoŋ nnu ntūgu ni pugu.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni fanaoŋ llɛ́ ghɔ, Jishɔ chhu ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pia shāʼa ntaoŋ njiɛŋ hiŋ.”
Pugu mieŋ yú ŋgwa pighɔ ndɔ̄gɔ vi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ nɛ moŋ kikuoŋ pugu pugu ghə̄ɨ. Pichəɨ pa kikuoŋ nduoŋ ni mbɔ fɔ.
Mmɛ fiŋ gū moŋ ŋkhǐ, ntuŋ ŋkhǐ niʼiŋ moŋ kikuoŋ ti kikuoŋ thɔ ndɨnaoŋ lɨnaoŋ.
Jishɔ ni mbɔ laʼo
kikuoŋ, nūʼɔŋ thɔ yi ŋkuoŋ nuʼɔŋthɔ nthɔ ndhɛ nu, pugu thɔ ŋgūʼu vi nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, pia ŋkhu paʼa a lɔ mbɔ nnu vɛ?”
Jishɔ lɔllɔ tɔthɨ mbɨ̄ga fiŋ ghɔ, nchhu ni ŋkhǐ ŋa,
“Ghɨghrɨ pɔ! Tithi!”
Fɨfrəɨ ghɔ tithi, lɨʼɨ ya njū.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ pɔgɔ pi gu khɔ? Pəɨ wuʼɔ mbiʼi ki lɔ mfāʼo piŋ?”
Pɔgɔ gu nii vugu, pugu chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei pɔ pi gɔ̌ kiʼɛ ŋa fiŋ pugu pa ŋkhǐ yaʼo nchò yi nɛ?”
Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shāʼa ŋkhǐ Galili ntaoŋ njiɛŋ hini moŋ krao ŋgei laʼataoŋ pa ŋgwa Gerasha.
A ni ŋga ntaoŋ moŋ kikuoŋ ghɔ nchəɨŋ mbhi, mbāoŋ pugu ŋoŋ chəɨ chomilaoŋ ghɔ ni jijwɛ pɨphɨ mbɨŋ yu. Ŋoŋ ghɔ ni ntaoŋ moŋ pa lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pi ghà ntwei ŋgwa nɛ.
Ŋoŋ ghɔ ni ndaʼa pi moŋ lɨʼɨ twei ŋgwa. A kaŋ ni mfɛ paʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ ŋkrao vi, njiʼi nthɛ pi ni chɛiŋ,
nthɛ ŋa moŋ yiɛŋ ndɨɨ pi ni nthɔ ŋkrao mbhɔ mi ni chɛiŋ, ŋgwɛ kipaʼo nɔ kwò mi, ndɔ a tɨnɨ chɛiŋ ghɔ, mbɨnɨ mbəʼɨ kipaʼo ghɔ kɨkrɨ, ndɔ paʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ mbɔ ŋa a kaŋ ni mfɛ a wɛ̄iŋ vi.
A ni nthɔ mbaʼo ŋgòu ni tuʼu pugu pa naoŋchɨ moŋ pa lɨʼɨ twei ŋgwa pugu pa ŋkuoŋ mbra, nthɔ nshe noŋ yi ni ŋgùʼɔ.
A ni ŋga njəɨ Jishɔ fie hiŋ, ntei ŋgə̄ɨ ŋgū ni kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɨ yu.
Mbaʼo ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ ŋgòu nchhu ŋa, “Pia fāʼo pi khɔ, Jishɔ Muuŋ Minnwi ŋa a chaapifuoŋ nɛ, m̀baʼo mbhɔ shhɨ ghɔ ni ligi Minnwi, kiʼi niʼiŋ moŋ ŋgəʼɨ.”
Nthɛ ŋa Jishɔ ni nthɔ nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa,
“Taoŋ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ vei, ma gɔ̀ jijwɛ pɨphɨ yei.”
Jishɔ pie vi ŋa,
“Ligi yɔ khɔ?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ligi a Káʼa Yi, nthɛ ŋa pigi ntou yigi.”
A ghə̄ɨ shhɨ ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi ŋa kiʼi a fuʼu vugu moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ.
Ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ kwíe ŋkunyaŋ ni njɨ nu ŋkɨŋ mbra fɔ.
Nɛnnɛ, pugu lɨ̄gəɨ Jishɔ ŋa, “Ntaoŋ vigi ni pa ŋkunyaŋ pinɛ, pigi nii mbɨŋ pugu”.

Nɛnnɛ, a fɛ shɨna ni pugu, pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ pighɔ taoŋ nii mbɨŋ pa ŋkunyaŋ pighɔ. Ŋguoŋ kwíe ŋkunyaŋ pighɔ, pugu ni mbɔ yaoŋ nɔ paa ŋkaŋ yugu, ntei ntaoŋ thɔ mbra ghɔ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ nɛ nshwiʼi ŋgū moŋ ŋkhǐ, ŋkhu.
Pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi ŋkunyaŋ pighɔ tei ŋgə̄ɨ nchhu moŋ laʼa pugu pa moŋ ŋgunu. Ŋgwa taoŋ lɨʼɨ thɔ njəɨ nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Pugu thɔ mbara Jishɔ, njəɨ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ pighɔ ni mbɔ mbɨŋ yu nɛ a chhɔ fɔ, māʼaŋ ndhwí, lɨna yi pɔ shiʼi, mbɔ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni mfāʼo kaʼa jijwɛ pɨphɨ pighɔ nɛ, pugu fāʼo pɔgɔ gu.
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ nnu ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ fɨ̄ʼɨ nnu ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋgaŋ miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ pugu pa ŋkunyaŋ nɛ ni pugu.
Pugu jɛ̄ nthɔ ndɨ̄gəɨ Jishɔ ŋa a mieŋ krao lɨʼɨ yugu ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni vhi.
Ndɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni ndɔllɔ nii nu moŋ kikuoŋ nɛ, ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni mfāʼo miŋwɛiŋ nɛ lɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a mieŋ a thɔ pugu yu ghə̄ɨ kaʼa.
Jishɔ lāa, nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ghə̄ɨ mbara pa taannu pɔ laʼa, nshwei vugu ni fɨʼɨ nnu ŋa Taathɔ chwīe mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ, pugu pa fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ vɛ nɛ.”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ Dekapoli
nthɔ nchīi fɨʼɨ nnu ŋa Jishɔ chwīe mbɨŋ yu nɛ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghrāo.
Jishɔ ni ŋga ŋkwo pɨnɨ shāʼa moŋ kikuoŋ ntaoŋ njiɛŋ hiŋ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ, ŋkiɛŋ ntou yú ŋgwa kɨrɨ yəɨ yu.
A gha ndara, Jairu, mbɔ taʼa mmɛŋoŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi chəɨŋ. A ni ŋga njəɨ Jishɔ, ŋgū shhɛ shhɨ yu,
ndɨ̄gəɨ vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Muuŋ a yi miŋgwɛ chhɔ ŋkhu nu. Thɔ nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yɔ mbɨŋ yu, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ ghɨ̌nɔ yi mmɛ a pɔ yi maoŋ.”
A ghə̄ɨ pugu yu. Ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yú ŋgwa yōu njiŋ yi, nthɔ mfra vi moŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgei ghao.
Shɨna ŋgwa pei, miŋgwɛ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ ŋa a ki yəɨ ndɨɨ yi ni njɨ nɔ paanchrɔ ŋgaʼo.
A ni ŋkwo yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ ntou yi mbhɔ ntou pa ghaŋ fhɔ̌, ŋkwo tūoŋ ŋguoŋ mbɨŋ yi ghao, paʼa noŋ yi lɔ njo, a ka wɛʼiwɛʼi.
A ni ŋkwo yaʼo pa nnu nɔ ligi Jishɔ, nthɔ njiŋ Jishɔ moŋ yú ŋgwa pighɔ ŋkāoŋ ndhwí yi.
Nthɛ ŋa a ni chhu ŋa, “M̈i njiʼi ŋguʼɔ ŋkaoŋ pi ndhwí yi, noŋ a tɔgɔ.”
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, ndɨɨ yi ghɔ kāʼo ti pi thi, a yaʼo moŋ noŋ yu ŋa ghɨ̌nɔ yi tɔgɔ.
Jishɔ yaʼo moŋ noŋ yu ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ghrɨ́ taoŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ, ŋkiʼi nshrī noŋ yi shrī moŋ yú ghɔ mbie ŋa,
“A kāoŋ gɔ̌ ndhwí a?”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ yəɨ yú ŋgwa thɔ mfra ghɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgei, ɔ pɨnɨ mbie nu ŋa, ‘A kāoŋ gɔ̌ ŋkāoŋ a?’ ”
A kara ligi yi ndīi nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa a chwīe gɔ̌ nnu ghɔ.
Miŋgwɛ ghɔ gha njaʼo nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ moŋ noŋ yu nɛ, ntaoŋ nthɔ shhɨ Jishɔ moŋ pɔgɔ gu ndɔ ŋgrū nu, nshwei vi ni ŋguoŋ nnu shini ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Muuŋ a, piŋ yɔ chwīe ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ tɔgɔ, ghə̄ɨ ni gɔ̀ moŋ ghɨghrɨ Minnwi, pi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ.”
Ndɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋguʼɔ nchrā nu nɛ, ŋoŋ llɔ nda mmɛŋoŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ghɔ thɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Muuŋ ghɔ kwo khu. Ɔ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋgana Masha ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ pi ŋa?”
Ndɔ paʼa Jishɔ lɔ mfāʼo ndɨɨ ni nnu ŋa pugu chhu nɛ, ŋka chhu ni mmɛŋoŋ ghɔ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi nɛ pi ŋa,
“Kiʼi mbɔgɔ, wuʼɔ nthɔ mfāʼo pi piŋ.”
Paʼa a lɔ mbiŋ shesheŋoŋ thɔ njiŋ yu ŋkiɛŋ Pita, ni Jɛiŋ pugu Jouŋ ndǐŋ Jɛiŋ ghɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga nchəɨŋ moŋ nda mmɛŋoŋ ghɔ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi nɛ, Jishɔ yəɨ vuvuʼu fiŋthɔ pugu pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ŋkə̄ɨ nu ndɔ njūa nu ŋkiɛŋ ni njɨ.
Jishɔ gha nii nda, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A chwīe khɔ pəɨ thɔ fāʼo vuvuʼu fiŋthɔ ndɔ ŋkə̄ɨ nu, muuŋ ghɔ lɔ ŋkukhu, a lɛllɛ.”
Pugu gwɛ̄ vi, ndɔ a fuʼu vugu ghao mfɛ mbhi, ndɔ̄gɔ wuʼɔ tǎa muuŋ ghɔ pugu mǔuŋ vi pugu pa trɛi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pugu ni nthɔ nɛ, pugu pugu nii moŋ njiɛŋ nda ŋa muuŋ ghɔ ni nūaŋ nɛ.
A wɛ̄iŋ mbhɔ yi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Talita kumi,”
njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa,
“Miyaa, ǹchhu vɛ ŋa lɔllɔ.”
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, muuŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ ŋa a ni mbɔ paanchrɔ ŋgaʼo nɛ lɔllɔ njɛ̄ nyīeŋ nu. Yei nnu ni ŋga ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, ŋguoŋ yugu ghao ghrāo.
Ndɔ Jishɔ shūu tə́nə yugu ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ ŋa kiʼi pugu chwīe shesheŋoŋ ji, ndɔ nchhu ni pugu ŋa pi fɛ yaoŋ ghɔ a jɨ.
Jishɔ lɔllɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ yugu laʼataoŋ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi yōu njiŋ yi.

A gha mbɔ llɛ́ ji pa Juu, a jɛ̄ yɛʼi nu moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi, ntou ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni njaʼo vi nɛ ghrāo, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei yɛʼi yei nnu pi hɨŋ? A fāʼo fɨʼɨ shiethɔ yei pi llɔ hɨŋ? A fāʼo yei ghrɨ́ pi hɨŋ nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu ghraoghrao pei nɔ ghɔ?
Yei lɔ mbɔ kaminda, mbɔ muuŋ Meri, mbɔ ndǐŋ Jɛiŋ ni Joshɛshi
ni Judashi ni Shemu? Pia pa lǐŋ pi pi piŋgɛ lɔ mbɔ hɛiŋ kaʼa?” Nnɛ pugu lāa vi.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pi shiʼa nchɨ̄ʼə njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋkiɛŋ laʼa pugu shɨna ŋgwa pi, pugu pa ji ndaaŋoŋ.”
A kaŋ ni nthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi nchwīe pa nnu ghraoghrao fɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋa a ni nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ shɨgɛi ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu.
A ni ŋgrāo nthɛ fɨʼɨ ki piŋ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo nɛ.
A ni nyīeŋ njīŋ moŋ laʼa nthɔ njɛʼi nu.
Jishɔ gɛ̄ paanchrɔ pighɔ, ntaoŋ vugu ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ pa pi paa, mfɛ njɨ ni pugu nɔ fuʼu nu pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ.
Mfɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa, “Kiʼi pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ sheshe yaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nu nɛ, ŋkiɛŋ mbìe, kiʼi pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ brɛi, ki pìɛŋ kra, ki ntuo mbɨŋ moŋ pìɛŋ pəɨ.”
Mbɨnɨ mbīgi ŋa,
“Pəɨ gwɛ tra ndɔ kiʼi pəɨ tuo kwri ndhwí.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Sheshe nda ŋa pəɨ nii fɔ nɛ, pəɨ laʼa fɔ ti shi nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ.
Sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa pi lɔ mbiŋ vəɨ fɔ nɛ, ki njwɛrɛ nnu ŋa pəɨ chhu nu nɛ, pəɨ ŋga ntaoŋ nu fɔ, pəɨ krū kwò məɨ nɔ nōoŋ nu ni pugu ŋa Minnwi pɨ̄na nnu ŋa pugu chwīe nɛ.”
Pugu ni ntaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ, nchīi nu ŋa ŋgwamishua pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ.
Pugu ni nthɔ mfuʼu pa miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ ŋgwa, njùʼɔ wru mbɨŋ ntou ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ, nthɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu.
Fùoŋ Hɛrɔ ni njaʼo nnu yei, nthɛ ŋa ligi Jishɔ ni nyīeŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ. Ŋgwa chhu nu ŋa, “Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu, a chwīe yie a fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu ghraoghrao pei.”
Ndɔ pichəɨ chhu nu ŋa, “A Elaija.” Pichəɨ ni nthɔ nchhu yugu ŋa, “A njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, nɔ taʼa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi llɛshhɨ.”
Ndɔ Hɛrɔ ni ŋga njaʼo nnu pei, nthɔ nchhu nu ŋa, “Jouŋ, ŋa mi ni njaʼa thɔ yi nɛ, pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ!”
Nduthɔ Hɛrɔ ni ŋkwo taoŋ ŋgwa pugu ghə̄ɨ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ Jouŋ mfɨ̄nɨ moŋ chə́ɨŋ nthɛ nnu Herodia mbɔ ŋgwɛ Fili ndǐŋ vi, nthɛ ŋa Hɛrɔ ni ŋgugwɛi vi.
Jouŋ ni nthɔ shwei Hɛrɔ ŋa, “A lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo vɛ nɔ wugwɛi nu ŋgwɛ ndǐŋ ghɔ.”
Herodia ni mfāʼo kipɨna njùʼɔ yu nthɛ Jouŋ, nthɔ ntāʼa shɛndaoŋ nɔ jwi nu vi, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo shɨna,

nthɛ ŋa Hɛrɔ ni mbɔgɔ Jouŋ nthɛ ŋa a ni nji ŋa Jouŋ ŋoŋ taoŋtaoŋ, nnɛ, nūʼɔŋ vi nɔ haʼaŋ mbaʼa kàʼa kēe vi nɛ. A ni ŋkhwā nɔ yaʼo nu pa nnu mbhɔ Jouŋ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa a ni njaʼo vi nɛ, nnu pighɔ tāra vi ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi nɛ.
Ndugwi yi shɨna taoŋ llɛ́ ŋa Hɛrɔ ni nthɔ njɨ llɛ́ phí yi pugu pa kúŋ pi, ni pa thishɨ pa shoogɛ pi, pugu pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa moŋ Galili.
Ndɨɨ ŋa muuŋ Herodia yi miŋgwɛ ni ntaoŋ shhɨ mbini pini nɛ, a pwa Hɛrɔ pugu pa ghaŋ gɛ̀ pi, fùoŋ chhu ni muuŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ ŋa, “Pie sheshe yaoŋ ŋa ɔ khwā nɛ vəɨ m̀fɛ vɛ.”
Nshwrɛ̄i pa kɨna shhɨ yu ŋa, “Sheshe yaoŋ ŋa ɔ shi mbie nɛ, njiʼi nthɛ ä nchəɨŋ pi ghrà laʼataoŋ a ǹshi mfɛ vɛ.”
Muuŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ taoŋ mbhi, nchhu ni mǔuŋ vi ŋa, “Mi shi mbie pi khɔ?”
A chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Thɔ Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ.”
A kiʼi mbɨ̄nɨ pɨ̄nɨ moŋ kɔkɔnɔ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ njəɨ fùoŋ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ǹtāʼa nu ŋa ɔ fɛ thɔ Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ vəɨ wuʼɔ ndwɛ ŋkuoŋ pashinja yei.”
Fùoŋ ni nja mbɔ ni tuʼuthɔ, ndɔ nthɛ kɨ̀na ŋa a ni ŋkwo shwrɛ̄i shhɨ ghaŋ gɛ̀ pi nɛ, a shini ndɔ ntāʼa nu mbəʼɨ chrà ŋa a ni ŋkwo fɛ ghɔ nɛ.
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ fùoŋ taoŋ taʼa ŋkɛ̄ʼi vi, mfɛ gɨ́ ghɔ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nthɔ ni thɔ Jouŋ. A ghə̄ɨ njaʼa thɔ yi moŋ chə́ɨŋ,
nthɔ ni thɔ yi ghɔ ŋkuoŋ pashinja, mfɛ ni muuŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ, muuŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ fɛ ni mǔuŋ vi.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jouŋ ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, nthɔ ndɔ̄gɔ khu yi ŋgə̄ɨ niʼiŋ moŋ fúŋ moŋ ŋgùʼɔ.
Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ gha mbɨnɨ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ntaoŋ vugu nɛ, ŋkɨrɨ yəɨ yu, nshwei vi ni ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa pugu ni nchwīe ndɔ ntɨgɨ.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋgwa lɔ mbɔ fɔ nɛ, pia ghə̄ɨ fɔ mfɛrɛ noŋ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ.”
Nthɛ ŋa ntou ŋgwa ni nthɔ nu ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu pugu shini ndɔ mfāʼo shɨna fɛrɛ noŋ ti njɨ maoŋ.
Pugu nii moŋ kikuoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋgwa lɔ mbɔ nɛ nɔ pɔ nu fɔ təʼɨ vugu.
Ndɔ ntou ŋgwa ni njəɨ vugu nji ŋa a pugu, ntei yugu ŋkuoŋ shhɛ llɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ghao, mfǔoŋ pugu nchəɨŋ fɔ shhɨ Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.
Jishɔ ni ŋga ntaoŋ ŋkaoŋ mbhi, njəɨ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yú ŋgwa, mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pugu nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ nɔ pa minjɨɨ ki ŋkɛ̄ʼi yugu. Nnɛ a jɛ̄ nthɔ njɛʼi vugu ni ntou nnu.
Njiʼa ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ njəɨ vi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Yei lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋgwa lɔ mbɔ, ndɨɨ lɔ ŋkwo ya ntɔgɔ.
Chhu ŋgwa pei ghə̄ɨ, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pugu ghə̄ɨ moŋ pa mbàŋ mbambara pugu pa moŋ laʼa njuoŋ yaoŋ fɔ njɨ.”
Ndɔ a khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fɛ yaoŋ pugu jɨ.”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi shi ŋgə̄ɨ njuoŋ brɛi ni fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa mimfɛ ŋoŋ fāʼa nɔ paa ŋkɨɨ llɛmbhi nɛ nthɔ mfɛ ni pugu pugu kru?”
A pie ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fāʼo ndigi brɛi yi khɔ? Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ ndīi!”
Pugu ni ŋga ndīi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ndigi yi tiɛŋ ni paa shhu.”
Jishɔ fɛ gɨ́ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pighɔ chɔchɔ ŋkuoŋ trǔ moŋ pa kwiekwie.
Pugu chɔchɔ moŋ pa kwíe, pichəɨ pɔ taʼa ŋkɨɨ, pichəɨ pɔ tiɛŋ wuŋ.
Nɛnnɛ a lɔ̄gɔ kəɨŋ brɛi ghɔ ni paa shhu, mbɨʼɨ ligi yi ndīi po, ntōo Minnwi, mbəʼɨ brɛi ghɔ mfɛ ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa pugu fɛ ni pa ŋgwa pighɔ, ŋgrā paa shhu ghɔ shɨna pugu ghao.
Ŋguoŋ yugu kru ti njru.
Pugu ni ndɨ̄ga pa pəʼɨ pəʼɨ pɨgəɨ brɛi, pugu pa shhu a lɨnaoŋ paanchrɔ mikuo.
Fɨʼɨ pa pimbia haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋkru brɛi ghɔ nɛ ni mbɔ tiɛŋ ŋkaŋ yi.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ Jishɔ chwīe pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nii moŋ kikuoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nɔ shāʼa nu ntaoŋ njiɛŋ hiŋ moŋ Beshaida, a lara shɨgɛi nɔ chhu nu ni yu ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ laʼa.
A gha ŋkwo chaʼa vugu, ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra lɨʼɨ luoŋ Minnwi.
A ni ŋga nchəɨŋ ni fanaoŋ, kikuoŋ ni mbɔ titri ŋkhǐ, Jishɔ ni mbɔ mbhi təʼɨ vi.

Jishɔ yəɨ ŋa pugu paʼo nu ni prǎ nɔ chhwi nu kikuoŋ a ghə̄ɨ shhɨ, nthɛ ŋa fɨfrəɨ ni ntaoŋ pi shhɨ pugu. A gha mbɔ ni ndaʼa mbhi laŋ, moŋ shɨna trɛi minaoŋ pugu ntɨgao minaoŋ, a nyīeŋ nu ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ nthɔ nu yəɨ pugu, ntāʼa nu mfərə vugu.
Ndɔ pugu gha njəɨ vi a nyīeŋ nu ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ, pugu gɛ̄ ŋa a pɔ pi ŋkhushɛ, mbaʼo ŋgòu.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yugu ni njəɨ vi, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu, ndɔ a chrā ni pugu nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ, a mmu, kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu.”
Nɛnnɛ, a nii moŋ kikuoŋ mbara vugu, fɨfrəɨ ghɔ tithi, nnu ghɔ llwi nchò yugu.
Nthɛ ŋa thɔ yugu shini ndɔ njiʼi nshie ni nnu kugwi nu ŋgwa ni brɛi, ndɔ pugu ni mbɔ pa fɨ̄nɨ thɔ nɔ ji nu.
Pugu ni ŋga nshāʼa, ntaoŋ mbhi lɨʼɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Gɛnɛsharɛ nɛ, nchu kikuoŋ yugu ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ.
Pugu gha ntaoŋ moŋ kikuoŋ, pa ŋgwa yəɨ vi ŋkiʼi njiji,
ntei moŋ ŋguoŋ yie krao lɨʼɨ ghao, nthɔ nu ni ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋkuoŋ pa kúoŋ pugu nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo ŋa Jishɔ pɔ nɛ.

Sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni ŋgə̄ɨ nɛ, moŋ puoŋ mi laʼataoŋ pugu pa mɛmmɛ laʼataoŋ pugu pa mooŋ ŋgunu, pugu nūʼɔŋ pa ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ moŋ pa taŋ, ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a mieŋ pa ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ pighɔ kāoŋ pi wuʼɔ muuŋ thɔ ndhwí yi. Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkāoŋ nɛ, ghɨ̌nɔ yugu tɔgɔ.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi ŋa pugu ni ndhɔ Jerushalɛiŋ ni ŋkɨrɨ yəɨ Jishɔ.
