Pugu ni njəɨ ŋa pichəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ thɔ njɨ yaoŋ ni mbhɔ ki shɨ̄gao moŋ ŋkwaŋ shɛndaoŋ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ chhu nɛ.
Pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Juu ghao shiʼa njɨ yaoŋ ki lɔ nshɨ̄gao mbhɔ yugu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a pie nɛ, nnɛ nchhɔ nūʼɔŋ nùʼɔŋ pa thishɨ pugu,

ki njɨ sheshe yaoŋ ki lɔ nshɨ̄gao noŋ nɔ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ chhu nɛ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu kwəɨ taŋ nɛ. Ntou pichəɨ pa nùʼɔŋ pɔ fɔ ŋa pugu ghà nūʼɔŋ, nɔ shɨ̄gao nu pa ndua pugu pa kɨ̌ŋ pugu pa pichəɨ kɨ̌ŋ tɨ́nɨ pugu pa ŋgrào ŋa pi ghà nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ njɨ maoŋ nɛ.
Pa Farashi pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pie vi ŋa, “A ghà nchwīe khɔ paʼa pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ lɔ nchhɔ chɔmbhi yugu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ pa thishɨ chhu nɛ, nthɔ njɨ yaoŋ ni mbhɔ ki shɨ̄gao?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“A ŋkiɛŋ nnu shini nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nōoŋ ni Ishaya a chhu nthɛ vəɨ ma pa ghaŋ mifɨɨ pei, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nāʼaŋ ŋa, ‘A chhu ju Minnwi ŋa,
Ŋgwa pei ghà ŋgaʼo a pi ni nchò yugu
ndɔ paʼa njùʼɔ yugu lɔ mbara yəɨ mu,
Ghɛ̀rɛ lɔ mbɔ ni ŋgwa pei moŋ ghaʼo nu ma,
nthɛ ŋa pugu yɛʼi nùʼɔŋ ŋgwamishua, pi nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ pi gɨ́ a.’
Pəɨ mieŋ kɨ̀na Minnwi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ pi nùʼɔŋ ŋgwamishua.”
A pɨnɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fāʼo ŋkiɛŋ shɛndaoŋ nɔ lāa nu kɨ̀na Minnwi nnɛ ŋa pəɨ nūʼɔŋ yəɨ nùʼɔŋ.
Mushi ni nchhu ŋa, ‘Yaʼo nchò tǎa ghɔ pugu mǔuŋ ghɔ,’ ndɔ ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa a wɛʼi tǎa ki mǔuŋ vi nɛ, yiʼi ŋa pi shi njwi vi.’
Ndɔ pəɨ chhu yəɨ ŋa, ‘Ŋ̈oŋ nchhu ni mǔuŋ vi ki tǎa vi ŋa yaoŋ ŋa m̀fāʼo nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu ghɔ nɔ nɛ pɔ pi Kobaŋ (njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa yaoŋ fɛ́ ni Minnwi)’,
nnɛ pəɨ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiŋ ŋa a ghɛ̄rɛ tǎa vi ki mǔuŋ vi.
Nnɛ nthɔ ndāa chrà Minnwi ni nùʼɔŋ yəɨ ŋa pəɨ tɨgɨ ŋgwrɛiŋgwa pəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ. Pugu pa pichəɨ ntou ŋkwaŋ nnu pi nɛ ŋa pəɨ chwīe.”
Jishɔ mɛ̄iŋ ŋgwa pighɔ pugu thɔ njəɨ vi, a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ ywɛrɛ nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ ndɔ njaʼo.
Yichəɨ yaoŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ ŋa ä nii mbɨŋ ŋoŋ llɔ mbhi a fuo vi, a ka pɔ pi yaoŋ ŋa a taoŋ moŋ noŋ ŋoŋ nɛ ŋa minthɛ a fuo vi.”
[“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə yaʼo.”]
A ni ŋga mieŋ yu ŋgwa pighɔ nii nda, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa a shwei njiŋ luʼɔ chrà ghɔ.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ wuʼɔ mbou pi lɨna ŋkaa pəɨ? Pəɨ lɔ naa njəɨ ŋa sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a llɔ mbhi nii mbɨŋ ŋoŋ nɛ nthɛ paʼa a lɔ mfuo vi.
Nthɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋgə̄ɨ pi njùʼɔ yu, a ghə̄ɨ pi puŋ yu ntiri ntaoŋ nii moŋ krao.”
(Nnɛ nchīi ŋa ŋguoŋ maoŋ jɨ yi taoŋtaoŋ.)
Nchhu ŋa,
“A yaoŋ ŋa a taoŋ moŋ noŋ ŋoŋ nɛ ŋa a fuo vi.
Nthɛ ŋa llɔ moŋ ghɔ, moŋ njùʼɔ ŋoŋmishua, pa kwàʼa pɨphɨ ghà ntaoŋ, nɔ pa kwoshuoŋ, ŋgɨna, jwi nu ŋoŋ,
shúoŋ mbhɔ ghaŋ láŋ, lúa, mbha nnu pɨphɨ, mifɨɨ, pa nnu tɔtrɔ, kighɨʼə, chhu nu phɨ thɔ ŋgwa, ntitaʼo, mbha nnu na.
Ŋguoŋ pa nnu pɨphɨ pei ghà ntaoŋ pi moŋ noŋ ŋoŋ, mfuo ŋgaŋ vi.”
Jishɔ ni ndhɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ krao ŋgei Tairɛ
. A ni nii moŋ nda paʼa ndɔ ntāʼa nu ŋa shesheŋoŋ ji, ndɔ paʼa shɛndaoŋ lɔ mbɔ ŋa a kaŋ ni mfɛ a lɛrɛ.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, miŋgwɛ chəɨ ŋa jijwɛ pɨphɨ ni mbɔ mbɨŋ muuŋ vi yi miŋgwɛ nɛ ni njaʼo ŋa a pɔ, nthɔ ŋgū laʼo kwò Jishɔ.
Miŋgwɛ vei ni mbɔ miŋgwɛ taoŋ nduoŋ, llɔ krao ŋgei Fonishia moŋ Shiria. Ndɨ̄gəɨ Jishɔ ŋa a fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ muuŋ vi.
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“A pie ŋa pi fǔoŋ kugwi pa puoŋ ŋkaoŋ nthɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu maoŋ jɨ puoŋ māʼaŋ ni pa miŋgu.”
Miŋgwɛ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ooŋ, ma Taathɔ, ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi pa miŋgu ghà njɨ ŋkuʼu maoŋ puoŋ laʼo taprɛi.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Nthɛ yinɛ ndigi chrà, minthɛ ɔ ghə̄ɨ ni gɔ, miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ kwo taoŋ mbɨŋ muuŋ ghɔ.”
A pɨ̄nɨ laʼa, njəɨ muuŋ ghɔ a nūaŋ kúoŋ, miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ kwo taoŋ mbɨŋ yu.
A pɨ̄nɨ llɔ moŋ krao ŋgei Tairɛ, nyīeŋ ntiri moŋ Shidoŋ nchəɨŋ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ Galili, moŋ krao ŋgei Dekapoli.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa lɔ̄gɔ yichəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni mbɔ fhɨtənə ndɔ ki lɔ nchrā nu shiʼi, nthɔ mbara vi ni ju, ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ yu.
Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ təʼɨ vi, niʼiŋ mbhɔ yi tə́nə yu, ŋga nthu thwɛ, ŋkaoŋ lɨŋ yi.
Jishɔ pɨʼɨ ligi yi ndīi po, nshɔnɔ nchhu ni ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɛfata
, njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa,
“Chuʼɔ!”
Tə́nə yi chuʼɔ, lɨŋ yi kɨ̄gɛi, a chrā ki kɔ̀rɔ.
Jishɔ fɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pəɨ chhu ni shesheŋoŋ. Ndɔ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni mbīgi gɨ́ ŋa kiʼi pugu chhu ni ŋgwa nɛ, wuʼɔ mbɔ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu ni nchhu mbīgi nɛ.
Pa ŋgwa ni ŋgrāo ti a ghaʼa, nchhu nu ŋa, “A chwīe ŋguoŋ pa nnu ghao shishiʼi. A chwīe fhɨtənə yaʼo lɨʼɨ, fhɨncho chrā.”
Moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ, ntou yú ŋgwa ni ŋga mbɨ̄nɨ ŋkɨrɨ ki lɔ mfāʼo yaoŋ nɔ jɨ nu, Jishɔ mɛ̄iŋ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“M̀fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ ŋgwa pei nthɛ ŋa pigi pugu kwo chhɔ nɔ trɛi llɛ́ ki lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yaoŋ nɔ jɨ nu.
M̈i mfɛ vugu laʼa ni njì, pugu taoŋ shɛndaoŋ njì māʼaŋ vugu, nthɛ ŋa pichəɨ llɔ a shɨga.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Ŋoŋ shi njəɨ maoŋ jɨ pi hɨŋ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó yei nɔ kugwi nu fɨʼɨ ŋgwa pei nɔ ghɔ?”
Jishɔ pie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fāʼo pi ndigi brɛi yi khɔ?”
Pugu chhu ŋa, “Yi khwachəɨ.”
A fɛ gɨ́ ni ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu chɔchɔ shhɛ. Ndɔ̄gɔ khwachəɨ brɛi ghɔ ŋga ntōo Minnwi, mbəʼɨ mfɛ ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa pugu fɛ ni pugu. Nnɛ pugu fɛ ni ŋgwa pighɔ.
Pugu ni mfāʼo shɨgɛi puoŋ mi shhu, Jishɔ gha ŋkwo tōo Minnwi nɔ ghɔ, mbɨnɨ mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi fɛ ni pugu.
Pugu kru ti njru, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi lɨ̄ga pa pəʼɨ pɨgəɨ pi a lɨnaoŋ moŋ khwachəɨ mɛmmɛ mikuo.
Yaoŋ nɔ khwɛ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa ni mbɔ fɔ. Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ laʼa.
Ŋkiʼi ndɔ nii nii ndɨɨ ghɔ moŋ kikuoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nshāʼa ntaoŋ Dalmanuta.
Pa Farashi thɔ njɛ̄ lōu nu pugu pa Jishɔ, nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa a nōoŋ lì llɔ pɔ, nnɛ nɔ mōoŋ nu mi.
A shɔnɔ ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ moŋ njùʼɔ yu, nchhu ŋa,
“Ŋgwrɛiŋgwa pei tāʼa lì nthɛ khɔ? Shishini ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa mbaʼa pi nōoŋ taʼa lì ni pugu.”
A mieŋ vugu ŋga mbɨnɨ nii moŋ kikuoŋ ŋkamuʼɔŋ nshāʼa ntaoŋ njiɛŋ hiŋ.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ līʼɛ nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu brɛi, ŋguʼɔ mfāʼo pi taʼa yi mbhɔ pugu moŋ kikuoŋ.
Jishɔ shūu tə́nə yugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɨna yishi
llɔ mbhɔ pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa Hɛrɔ.”
Pugu jɛ̄ nthɔ nchrā nu shɨna pugu nthɛ nnu brɛi ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mfāʼo nɛ.
Jishɔ ji nnu ŋa pugu ni nchrā nu nɛ, nɛnnɛ mbie vugu ŋa,
“A chwīe khɔ pəɨ chrā nu ŋkuoŋ nnu pou brɛi? Pəɨ lɔ nji, ki mfāʼo shiethɔ pa nnu yaʼa? Thɔ yəɨ kweikwei?
Pəɨ fāʼo ligi ki lɔ njəɨ lɨʼɨ, mfāʼo tə́nə ki lɔ njaʼo lɨʼɨ? Pəɨ shiʼa ŋkwiŋ nnu?
Ndɨɨ ŋa mi ni mbəʼɨ tiɛŋ brɛi ŋkugwi tiɛŋ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa nɔ ghɔ nɛ, pɨgəɨ pəʼɨ brɛi ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkɨrɨ nɛ ni mbɔ mikuo yi khɔ?”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Paanchrɔ.”
“Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki pəʼɨ yi khwachəɨ ŋkugwi khwɛ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa nɔ ghɔ nɛ, pɨgəɨ pəʼɨ brɛi ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkɨrɨ nɛ ni mbɔ njòu yi khɔ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Yi khwachəɨ.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Thɔ yəɨ wuʼɔ mbiʼi ki lɔ naa nshie?”
Pugu ghə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ Beshaida, pichəɨ ŋgwa lɔ̄gɔ nchriligi nthɔ njəɨ vi ni ju ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a kāoŋ vi.
A wɛ̄iŋ mbhɔ nchriligi ghɔ, ntaoŋ ni ju moŋ laʼa, ŋga kwo thu thwɛ nɔ ligi yi ndɔ mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ yu mbie vi ŋa,
“Ɔ yəɨ sheshe yaoŋ?”
A pɨʼɨ ligi yi tɔthɨ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Njəɨ pa ŋgwa ndɔ pugu fhi pi pa thɨ nyīeŋ nu.”
Nnɛ Jishɔ pɨnɨ nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ mi nɔ ligi yi, a fēi ligi yi, ligi yi shie, a yəɨ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ shishiʼi.
Jishɔ chhu kiʼɛ a ghə̄ɨ nda yu, mfɛ gɨ́ ghɔ ŋa,
“Kiʼi nii moŋ laʼa.”
Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ghə̄ɨ moŋ pa laʼataoŋ moŋ Kaisharia Filipai. Pugu pugu ni ŋga mbɔ shɛndaoŋ, a pie pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pa ŋgwa ghà nchhu ŋa mi pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ, pichəɨ chhu ŋa ɔ Elaija ndɔ pichəɨ chhu ŋa ɔ yichəɨ taʼa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.”
A ghə̄ɨ shhɨ mbie vugu ŋa,
“Ti pəɨ chhu yəɨ ŋa mi pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Pita khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ shūu tə́nə yugu ŋa kiʼi pugu shwei shesheŋoŋ nɔ ghɔ.

Jishɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ njɛʼi vugu ŋa a yiʼi ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ ntou pa nnu, pa thishɨ pa Juu pugu pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi lāa vi, pi jwi vi, a gha ndaʼa trɛi llɛ́, a pɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.
Nchwīe thɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ya nshie ni yei nnu. Pita lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ njiŋnjiŋ nthɔ mbɨ̄ga vi.
Jishɔ gha ŋkara noŋ yi, mbɛʼi ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, mbɨ̄ga Pita nchhu ŋa,
“Lɔllɔ yəɨ mu, ma Shata! Ɔ lɔ njiʼi nūʼɔŋ kwāʼa nu mɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nnu Minnwi, ɔ ka nūʼɔŋ pi ŋkuoŋ pa nnu ŋgwamishua.”
Jishɔ mɛ̄iŋ kɨrɨ ŋgwa pighɔ fɔ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“S̈hesheŋoŋ ntāʼa nu njōu njiŋ a, a mieŋ phi nnu haʼaŋ a khwā nɛ, ntiɛŋ wáʼa yi, njōu njiŋ a.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu ndūgu ni chɔmbhi yi nɛ shi shiɛŋ chɔmbhi yi ghɔ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a mīʼaŋ chɔmbhi yi nthɛ a pugu pa nthɛ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Minnwi nɛ shi ndūgu ni chɔmbhi yi ghɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋmishua shi nshei pi khɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ä mfāʼo ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao ndɔ shiɛŋ chɔmbhi yi?
Minthɛ ŋoŋ fɛ pi khɔ nɔ kwri nu chɔmbhi yi nɔ ghɔ?

S̈hesheŋoŋ mfāʼo lrithɔ nthɛ a pugu pa chrà a moŋ mbhi ŋgwrɛiŋgwa ki fāʼo pɔgɔ Minnwi, pugu pa ŋgwrɛiŋgwa pɨphɨ yei, kaŋ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mfāʼo lrithɔ nthɛ vi ndɨɨ ŋa a thɔ moŋ ndighaʼo Tǎa vi pugu pa yi ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa thi hɛiŋ ŋa mbaʼa pugu khu ki lɔ njəɨ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi thɔ moŋ ghrɨ́.”
Ntɨgao llɛ́ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ Pita, pugu Jɛiŋ ni Jouŋ, pugu pugu kuʼɔ təʼɨ vugu ŋkuoŋ mmɛ ntaaŋ mbra. Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni mbɛʼi vi nɛ, a kwri ligi pugu,
ndhwí yi gu yi fufhu, nchīa ti ŋgaʼa, mfugu nchaa fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ minthɛ shesheŋoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi shɨ̄gao nɛ.
Elaija pugu Mushi nōoŋ noŋ yugu ni trɛi ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ pighɔ, nthɔ nchrā nu pugu pa Jishɔ.
Pita chhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Masha, a pwa ŋa pia pɔ hɛiŋ nɛ. Pigi shi ŋkrao trɛi ntǎa, taʼa yi vɛ, taʼa yi ni Mushi, taʼa yi ni Elaija.”
Nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ nji nnu ŋa a nthɛ a chhu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pɔgɔ gu ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu ŋgaʼa.
Lúluŋ kuru vugu, ŋggì taoŋ moŋ lúluŋ ghɔ ŋa, “Yei ŋkiɛŋ Muuŋ a ŋa ŋ̀khwā, p̂əɨ yaʼo mbhɔ yu.”
Pugu gha ndīi nɛ, ŋgwīʼi ki lɔ nuʼuŋ njəɨ shesheŋoŋ ŋkiɛŋ Jishɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nthɔ nshwiʼi mbra ghɔ nɛ, Jishɔ fɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu shwei shesheŋoŋ ni nnu ŋa pugu yəɨ, ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu nɛ.
Pugu wɛ̄iŋ ndigi chrà ghɔ, nthɔ nchrā nu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Njiŋ kuʼɔ nu moŋ gu yei pɔ pi ŋa?”
Pugu pie Jishɔ ŋa, “A chwīe khɔ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi chhu nu ŋa Elaija shi fǔoŋ nthɔ ŋkaoŋ?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini Elaija shi fǔoŋ nthɔ nɔ pīri nu pa nnu a kāʼo. Ndɔ a chwīe khɔ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi njəɨ ntou ŋgəʼɨ, ndɔ pi lāa vi?
Ndɔ ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa Elaija kwo thɔ ŋgwa fāʼa mbɨŋ yu nɔ haʼaŋ pugu khwā nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nthɛ vi nɛ.”
Pugu ni ŋga mbɨnɨ, njəɨ pɨgəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pugu pa ntou yú ŋgwa pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi lōu nu.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, ŋguoŋ yú ŋgwa pighɔ gha njəɨ Jishɔ, ŋgrāo ti a ghaʼa, ntei ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ vi nchrā ghɔ.
A pie ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pəɨ pugu lōu pi khɔ?”
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ moŋ yú ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Masha, ǹthɔ ni muuŋ a, njəɨ ghɔ nɔ ghɔ, ŋa miŋwɛiŋ pɔ mbɨŋ yu, nchwīe ŋa kiʼi a chrā.
Sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa a ghà ncho vi nɛ, a ghà māʼaŋ vi shhɛ, faʼofaʼo taoŋ nu nchò yu, a kru shua yi, noŋ yi tii. Ǹchhu ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ ŋa pugu fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ, pugu paʼo kie.”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Yo ŋgwrɛiŋgwa ki fāʼo piŋ, mi shi mbɔ pia pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ? Mi shi mfāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ ni pəɨ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ? Pəɨ thɔ ni ju mfɛ vəɨ.”
Pugu thɔ ni muuŋ ghɔ njəɨ vi nɔ, jijwɛ ghɔ gha njəɨ Jishɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ muuŋ ghɔ ni miprɨligi, a gū shhɛ ŋkə̄nə nu faʼofaʼo taoŋ nu nchò yu.
Jishɔ pie tǎa muuŋ ghɔ ŋa,
“Nnu yei kwo lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ yu nɔ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ nɛiŋ?”
A khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Jɛ̄ kəʼɨ prɔ.
A ghà njiɛŋ māʼaŋ vi kíe pugu pa mooŋ ŋkhǐ nɔ jwi nu mi. Ndɔ ä mbɔ ŋa minthɛ ɔ chwīe nnu, ɔ fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pigi ŋgɛ̄rɛ vigi!”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ chhu vəɨ ŋa, ‘Ä mbɔ ŋa minthɛ ɔ chwīe nnu?’ Sheshe nnu yīʼɛ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo piŋ nɛ.”
Tǎa muuŋ ghɔ kiʼi ŋkəɨkəɨ ni njɨ ŋa, “Ooŋ m̀biŋ, ghɛ̄rɛ ki piŋ a!”
Jishɔ gha njəɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ntou yú ŋgwa tei nthɔ nu taʼa lɨʼɨ nɛ, a pɨ̄ga jijwɛ ghɔ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Jijwɛ fhɨncho pugu pa fhɨtənə, taoŋ mbɨŋ yu ki lɔ ma nuʼuŋ nii mbɨŋ yu ŋkamuʼɔŋ.”
Nɛnnɛ jijwɛ ghɔ kə̄ɨ ni njɨ, māʼaŋ vi moŋ ŋkiɛŋ miprɨligi, ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu. Muuŋ ghɔ pɔ nɔ khu ŋoŋ, nnɛ ntou yugu ni nchhu ŋa, “A khu!”
Ndɔ Jishɔ wɛ̄iŋ vi ŋgɛ̄rɛ vi, a lɔllɔ tɔthɨ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga nii nda, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ mbie vi ŋa, “A ni nchwīe khɔ pigi fuʼu kikie?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Yaoŋ ŋa minthɛ a fuʼu yei ŋkwaŋ nɛ wuʼɔ luoŋ
Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi lɔllɔ fɔ ntiri moŋ Galili. Paʼa a lɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu ŋa shesheŋoŋ ji,
nthɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ njɛʼi ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pi shi nchaʼa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua mfɛ liɛŋ mbhɔ ŋgwamishua pugu njwi vi. Pi gha njwi vi, a laʼa trɛi llɛ́, a kuʼɔ.”
Ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ njiʼi nji njiŋ chrà yei, ndɔ mbɔgɔ nɔ pie nu vi nɔ ghɔ.
Pugu ghə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ Kapanuŋ, a gha nii nda, mbie ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pəɨ ni nthɔ nchrā pi khɔ shɛndaoŋ?”
Pugu lɛrɛ pi laŋ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋga mbɔ shɛndaoŋ, ndōu nu ni noŋ pugu ŋa a gɔ̌ mbɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ nchaa pichəɨ ghao.
A chɔchɔ shhɛ, mɛ̄iŋ paanchrɔ pighɔ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“S̈hesheŋoŋ vəɨ ntāʼa nu mbɔ nthishɨ, a pie ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ noŋ yi nɔ miŋkwasha, mbɔ nɔ muuŋ fàʼa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao.”
A lɔ̄gɔ muuŋ mbrɔ ntigi vi shɨna pugu, mbaŋ vi, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ taʼa mikəʼɨ nɔ yei nthɛ a nɛ piŋ pi mmu, ki shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ a nɛ lɔ mbiŋ pi mmu, a piŋ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.”
Jouŋ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, pigi yəɨ yichəɨ ŋoŋ a fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ ni ligi yɔ, pigi ka nɔ lāa nu ghɔ nthɛ ŋa pigi pugu lɔ nthɔ njōu njiŋ yɔ kaʼa.”
Ndɔ Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Kiʼi pəɨ lāa ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe nnu ghraoghrao ni ligi a nɛ pɨnɨ ŋkara nchrā nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ a.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ ndāa via nɛ, pɔ ŋgei pia.
Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fɛ ndua ŋkhǐ ŋa pəɨ nnu nthɛ ŋa pəɨ yi Krishto nɛ, nthɛ paʼa a lɔ shiɛŋ kɨ̀nɛiŋ yi.
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe muuŋ mi muuŋ vei ŋa a piŋ a nɛ gū moŋ phɨ nɛ, a nì mbwa pi chu mmɛ ŋgùʼɔ wuʼɔ yaoŋ nɔ mmi yi njīe vi ŋkhǐ, nchaa ŋa a thi sháʼa shhɨ Minnwi.
Ti m̈bhɔ yəɨ nchwīe pəɨ gū moŋ phɨ, pəɨ yaʼa mīʼaŋ. A pwa pəɨ nii moŋ chɔmbhi nɔ ŋkwíni nchaa fāʼo nu paa mbhɔ yɔ ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ, mbɔ móŋoŋ ki phɛ,
[lɨʼɨ ŋa mbaʼa nthrɨshie khu, ndɔ mbaʼa móŋoŋ lɛ ma mbhɛ nɛ.]
Ti k̈wo yɔ nchwīe ɔ gū moŋ phɨ, ɔ yaʼa mīʼaŋ, nthɛ ŋa a pwa ɔ nii moŋ chɔmbhi nɔ ŋkwíni nchaa ŋa pi māʼaŋ ghɔ moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ ni paa kwò yɔ,
[lɨʼɨ ŋa mbaʼa nthrɨshie khu, ndɔ mbaʼa móŋoŋ lɛ ma mbhɛ nɛ.]
Ti l̈igi yɔ nchwīe ɔ gū moŋ phɨ, ɔ fīʼa mfuʼu mīʼaŋ, a pwa nɔ nii nu moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi ni taʼa ligi nchaa ŋa pi māʼaŋ ghɔ moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ ni paa ligi yɔ,
lɨʼɨ ŋa mbaʼa nthrɨshie khu, ndɔ mbaʼa móŋoŋ lɛ ma mbhɛ nɛ.
“Pi shi niʼiŋ móŋoŋ mbɨŋ shesheŋoŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi ghà niʼiŋ khí moŋ yaoŋ nɛ.
Khí pwa, ndɔ g̈hrɨ́ yi nɔ chwīe nu yaoŋ pwa mbhɛ, ɔ pɨnɨ ŋkwəɨ ni ghrɨ́ yi ghɔ pi nɛiŋ? A yiʼi ŋa pəɨ pɔ nɔ khí ni noŋ pəɨ, nchhɔ moŋ taʼaŋggi pəɨ pa ŋgwa.”
Jishɔ lɔllɔ Kapanuŋ ŋgə̄ɨ krao ŋgei Judia, ntiri Jodaŋ, yú ŋgwa pɨnɨ ŋkɨrɨ yəɨ yu ŋkamuʼɔŋ. Nɔ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ yi ni mbɔ nɛ, a jɛ̄ nthɔ njɛʼi vugu.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi thɔ mbara Jishɔ ntāʼa nu mōoŋ vi, mbie ŋa, “Gɨ́ Mushi piŋ ŋa ŋoŋ nthɛ a shāaŋ láŋ pugu ŋgwɛ vi?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Mushi ni nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa moŋ gɨ́?”
Pugu chhu, “Mushi ni mieŋ ŋa ŋoŋ nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ shāaŋ láŋ mfɛ ni ŋgwɛ vi, mfuʼu vi ŋa a ghə̄ɨ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A ni nāʼaŋ yie kɨ̀na mfɛ ni pəɨ nthɛ pi ŋa thɔ yəɨ tɨnɨ ni njɨ.
Ndɔ nɔ njɛ̄ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni mbuoŋ mbhi nɛ, ‘Minnwi ni nchwīe pi mimbia pugu miŋgwɛ.’
‘Nthɛ yie ghɔ, mimbia shi mieŋ tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi, nchīni pugu ŋgwɛ vi.
Paa ŋgwa pighɔ chīni ŋgū taʼa frɛinoŋ.’ Nnɛ pugu lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi yi paa, pugu pɔ pi taʼa yi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi chīni nɛ, kiʼi ŋoŋ shɛ̄rɛ.”
Pugu pugu gha mbɨnɨ nda pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pɨnɨ mbie vi ni nnu yei.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shāaŋ láŋ pugu ŋgwɛ vi ndaŋ yi nduoŋ nɛ chwīe phɨ mbɨŋ ŋgwɛ vi. Mbɔ phɨ shúoŋ.
Ti m̈iŋgwɛ nshāaŋ láŋ pugu ndaoŋ vi, ndaŋ ŋoŋ nduoŋ kaŋ a kwo shúoŋ.”
Pa ŋgwa ni nthɔ nu ni pa puoŋ ŋa a kāoŋ vugu, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pɨ̄ga ŋgwa pighɔ.
Jishɔ gha njəɨ, mbɨgɨ túa nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ mieŋ puoŋ pighɔ thɔ njəɨ a, kiʼi pəɨ pɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni pugu nthɛ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi pɔ pi ni ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa pei.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi moŋ chɔmbhi yi nɔ muuŋ mbrɔ nɛ nthɛ paʼa a lɔ nii moŋ ghɔ.”
A paŋ vugu nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ shesheŋoŋ vugu, mfɛ mbɔrɔ ni pugu.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni ndhɔ nyìeŋ nɛ, ŋoŋ chəɨ tei ŋkuʼɔ ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɨ yu, mbie vi ŋa, “Ŋkiɛŋ Masha, a yiʼi ŋa ǹchwīe khɔ nɔ fāʼo nu chɔmbhi ki mmɛ?”
Jishɔ pie ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ mɛ̄iŋ a ni ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ nthɛ khɔ? A wuʼɔ Minnwi mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ.
Ɔ ji yaoŋ ŋa pa kɨ̀na chhu nɛ, ‘Kiʼi njwi ŋoŋ, kiʼi ŋgaŋ láŋ kwoshuoŋ, kiʼi njōo, kiʼi ŋkwe ntie ŋoŋ ni mbe, kiʼi nchīgi, yaʼo nchò tǎa ghɔ pugu muuŋ ghɔ.’ ”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Masha, ŋguoŋ kɨ̀na pei ŋ̀kwo nūʼɔŋ llɔ ndɨɨ ŋa mi ni mbɔ maʼaŋ mikhwa nɛ.”
Jishɔ līi vi, mfāʼo khwā mbɨŋ yu, nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ pou taʼa yaoŋ. Ghə̄ɨ fīni ŋguoŋ maoŋ pɔ ghao ŋgrā ni ghaŋ pou, kaŋ fāʼo yɔ shi mbɔ po, nnɛ nthɔ njōu njiŋ a.”
A ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, noŋ yi shwiʼi, a ghə̄ɨ moŋ pəʼɨ njùʼɔ nthɛ ŋa a ni mfāʼo ŋgaʼa.
Jishɔ kara ligi mbɛʼi pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A ya ŋgaʼa ni ghaŋ fàʼo nɔ mieŋ nu Minnwi shaʼa fùoŋ yi moŋ chɔmbhi yugu.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ghrāo pa chrà pi pei ndɔ Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Pa puoŋ paŋ, a ya ŋgaʼa nɔ nii nu moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.
A yīʼɛ ni minyieŋləɨ
nɔ tɔgɔ nu moŋ mbo mitaʼa nchaa ŋgaŋ fàʼo nɔ mieŋ nu Minnwi shaʼa fùoŋ yi moŋ chɔmbhi yi.”
Pugu ghrāo ti a ghaʼa, nchhu ghɔ
ŋa, “Ti minthɛ a lūgu gɔ̌ kiʼɛ?”
Jishɔ pɛʼi vugu nchhu ŋa,
“Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ mfāʼa ni ŋgwamishua ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋgaʼa pi ni Minnwi. Ŋguoŋ pa nnu ghao yīʼɛ ni Minnwi.”
Pita jɛ̄ nthɔ nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, pigi mieŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao njōu njiŋ yɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,

“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ fɔ ŋa ä mieŋ mbaanda yi, ki lǐŋ pi pi pimbia pugu pa piŋgɛ, ki mǔuŋ vi, ki tǎa vi, ki puoŋ pi, ki nyìeŋ yi, nthɛ a pugu pa nthɛ ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ,

ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi mieŋ ki fāʼo pa nda, pa lǐŋ pi pi pimbia pugu pa piŋgɛ, pa mǔuŋ, pa puoŋ, pa nyìeŋ, a yiɛŋ ti mbɔ ŋkɨɨ ŋgɛ́ moŋ yei chɔmbhi ndɔ mbɨnɨ mfāʼo ŋgəʼɨ ŋa pi shi mfɛ ghɔ nthɛ a. Moŋ mbhi yɛ ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ, a pɨnɨ mfāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.
Ndɔ ntou ŋgwa ŋa pugu thi shhɨ nɛ shi mbɔ ndugwi njiŋ, pa ndugwi njiŋ thi shhɨ.”

Pugu ni mbɔ shɛndaoŋ ŋkuʼɔ nu Jerushalɛiŋ, Jishɔ nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ pugu. Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ghrāo, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ nu njiŋ pugu nɛ. Ŋkamuʼɔŋ Jishɔ kɨrɨ paanchrɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi lɨʼɨ təʼɨ vugu, nchhu pa nnu ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ yu nɛ ni pugu,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pəɨ līi njəɨ, pia kuʼɔ nu Jerushalɛiŋ pi chaʼa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua mfɛ mbhɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi, pi fɛ njɔ́ gu ghɔ nchaʼa vi mfɛ ni ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Pugu lɛ māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ, nthu thwɛ mbɨŋ yu, ŋgwie vi, njwi vi, a gha ndaʼa trɛi llɛ́, a pɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.”
Jɛiŋ pugu Jouŋ, mbɔ pa puoŋ Shebedi thɔ njəɨ Jishɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, pigi tāʼa nu ŋa ɔ chwīe nnu yɛ ŋa pigi shi mbie vɛ nɛ ni pigi.”
A pie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ tāʼa nu ŋa ǹchwīe khɔ mfɛ ni pəɨ?”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Fɛ shɨna ni pigi, pigi chhɔ yəɨ ghɔ, taʼa ŋoŋ vigi ŋgei mbɔ yɔ yi jɨ, yichəɨ taʼa yi ŋgei mbɔ ŋkwrɛi yɔ, ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ pɔ moŋ ndighaʼo yɔ nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ nji yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ pie nu nɛ. Minthɛ pəɨ nnu ndua ŋgəʼɨ ŋa shi nnu nɛ? Ki ŋkwe ŋkwaŋ kwe ŋkhǐ yɛ ŋa a yiʼi ŋa ŋkwe nɛ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Ooŋ, pinthɛ pigi tɔgɔ moŋ ghɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ndua ŋgəʼɨ ŋa ǹshi nnu nɛ pəɨ shi nnu, kwe ŋkhǐ ŋa ǹshi ŋkwe nɛ pəɨ kwe.
Ndɔ nɔ chhɔ nu ŋgei mbhɔ a yi jɨ ki ŋgei ŋkwrɛi, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ lɨʼɨ a nɔ fɛ nu. A pɔ pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Minnwi kwo pīri ni pugu nɛ.”
Ndɔ pɨgəɨ wuŋ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, mfāʼo pɨgɨtua mbɨŋ Jɛiŋ pugu Jouŋ.
Jishɔ gɛ̄ vugu pugu thɔ njəɨ vi, a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ji ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ji vugu ŋa a ghaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa moŋ mbhi nɛ ghà nshaʼa ŋgwa pugu shaʼa, pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa pugu nōoŋ pi nnu ghrɨ́ ni pugu.
Ndɔ mbaʼa a yiʼi mbɔ pi nnɛ ni pəɨ. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu nɔ pɔ nu ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ shɨna pəɨ nɛ fāʼo nɔ pɔ nu muuŋ fàʼa vəɨ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu mbɔ nthishɨ shɨna pəɨ nɛ fāʼo nɔ pɔ nu ŋkǔna ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.
Nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shini ndɔ njiʼi nthɔ pi ŋa pi fāʼa mbɔ yu, a ni nthɔ pi nɔ fāʼa nu mbhɔ ŋgwa, ndɔ mfɛ chɔmbhi yi nɔ nchúoŋ thɔ ntou ŋgwa.”
Pugu thɔ Jeriko, Jishɔ lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pugu pa mmɛ yú ŋgwa, ŋgaŋ luoŋ chəɨ mbɔ nchriligi, ligi yi pɔ Batimau, muuŋ Timau, chhɔ ŋkɨŋ shɛndaoŋ.
A ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa a Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ ntɔgɔ nu, a jɛ̄ paʼo nu ŋgòu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Jishɔ, Muuŋ Devi, fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ mu!”
Ntou ŋgwa pɨ̄ga vi, nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa a lɛrɛ laŋ.
A ka mīʼɛŋ mbaʼo pi ŋgòu ni njɨ mbīgi, “Muuŋ Devi, fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ mu!”
Jishɔ tithi nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ mɛ̄iŋ vi hɛiŋ.”
Nɛnnɛ pugu mɛ̄iŋ nchriligi ghɔ, nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa, “Wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yɔ, lɔllɔ tɔthɨ, a thɔ nɛ mɛ̄iŋ ghɔ.”
A mīʼaŋ mmɛ ndhwí yi, ndhi tɔthɨ nthɔ njəɨ Jishɔ.
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa ǹchwīe nɛiŋ vɛ?”
Nchriligi ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, ǹtāʼa nu mbɨnɨ njəɨ lɨʼɨ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ghə̄ɨ ni gɔ, piŋ yɔ chwīe ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ tɔgɔ.”
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, ligi yi chuʼɔ a yōu njiŋ Jishɔ shɛndaoŋ.
Pugu ni ŋga mbara nu Jerushalɛiŋ, ŋkɨŋ Bɛfɛgɛ pugu Betani ŋkuoŋ Mbra pa Thɨ Olive nɛ, Jishɔ taoŋ paa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi,
nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ moŋ muuŋ laʼataoŋ yinɛ shhɨ pəɨ nɛ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ nii nɛ, pəɨ shi njəɨ muuŋ mi ŋkwɛ́iŋ pi chu ŋa ŋoŋ shi lɔ naa nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ yu. Pəɨ fēi nthɔ nɔ ghɔ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, ‘Pəɨ fēi nu ŋa?’ pəɨ chhu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ fāʼo fàʼa nɔ ghɔ, a shi mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nduʼu hɛnɛiŋ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ.’ ”
Pugu lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ, njəɨ muuŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ pi chu chonda mbhi ŋkɨŋ shɛndaoŋ, pugu fēi.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ pie ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ chwīe pi khɔ? Pəɨ fēi pi ŋkwɛ́iŋ yinɛ?”
Pugu chhu nnu ŋa Jishɔ ni nshwei vugu nɛ ni pugu, ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu ni nju fɔ nɛ mieŋ vugu pugu ghə̄ɨ.
Pugu thɔ ni muuŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ ghɔ mfɛ ni Jishɔ, māʼaŋ pa mɛmmɛ ndhwí pugu ŋkuoŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ ghɔ, Jishɔ chhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ.
Ntou ŋgwa shɛ̄iŋ pa mɛmmɛ ndhwí pugu shɛndaoŋ, pichəɨ shɛ̄iŋ pa mbhɔthɨ ni fhɔthɨ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ ŋa pugu ni njaʼa moŋ pa nyìeŋ.
Pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ shhɨ nɛ pugu pa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ njiŋ nɛ paʼo ŋgòu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ndighaʼo pɔ ni Minnwi,
mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ju ŋa a thɔ nɔ ligi Taathɔ nɛ!
Minnwi nūʼɔŋ mbɔrɔ yi ŋkuoŋ Shaʼafuoŋ fùoŋ Devi tǎa via, ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ.
Ndighaʼo pɔ ni Minnwi ŋa a chhɔ po nɛ.”
A nii Jerushalɛiŋ, ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ Nda Minnwi, ŋga ndīi ŋguoŋ yaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ njiʼa ni ŋkwo tɔgɔ nɛ, ntaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ Betani pugu pa paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋkwəɨ nu llɔ Betani nɛ, njì yia Jishɔ.

A thi hini njiʼɛ njəɨ thɨ ŋa a ghà njuŋ nɛ a ya ntəʼɨ, a ghə̄ɨ nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa minthɛ a fāʼo ntíɛŋ llɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ. A gha nthɔ nchəɨŋ yəɨ thɨ ghɔ, paʼa ndɔ njəɨ sheshe yaoŋ ŋkiɛŋ pa fhɔthɨ, nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pa thɨ ghɔ ghà njuŋ nɛ.
A chhu ni thɨ ghɔ ŋa,
“Kiʼi ŋoŋ ma nuʼuŋ njɨ ntíɛŋ llɔ mbɨŋ ghɔ.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi yaʼo.

Pugu ni ŋga nchəɨŋ Jerushalɛiŋ, Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ Nda Minnwi njōu ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mfīni yaoŋ pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njuoŋ nu Nda Minnwi nɛ, nshrī taprɛi ghaŋ kwri mbɨŋ pugu pa ghaŋ fīni mintuʼɔlibuŋ,
paʼa ndɔ nuʼuŋ mbiŋ ŋa shesheŋoŋ mfɛ a tiɛŋ yaoŋ ntiri nɔ yɨna Nda Minnwi.
A ni nthɔ njɛʼi vugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pi shi lɔ nāʼaŋ ŋa, ‘Pi shi mɛ̄iŋ nda a ni nda luoŋ Minnwi ni ŋguoŋ pa taoŋ taoŋ ghao,’ ndɔ pəɨ kara a gū pùo pa ŋgɨna minwi.”

Nnɛ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi yaʼo nthɔ ntāʼa shɛndaoŋ njwi vi, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔgɔ vi, nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yú ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ ni ŋgrāo ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni njɛʼi nu nɛ.
Fanaoŋ ni ŋga nthɔ, pugu taoŋ moŋ laʼa.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ntɔgɔ nu ni tutuʼu nɛ, pugu yəɨ thɨ wùnu yɛ, a kwo yaoŋ ti nshwiʼi nchəɨŋ moŋ ŋǐeŋ pi.
Pita kwiŋ, nchhu ŋa, “Masha, līi njəɨ! Thɨ wùnu yɛ ŋa ɔ ni nchɔ̄nɔ nɛ kwo yaoŋ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fāʼo piŋ mbɨŋ Minnwi.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shi nchhu ni mbra yei ŋa, ‘Lɔllɔ tɔthɨ ŋgū moŋ ŋkhǐ’, ki lɔ mfāʼo khuthɔ moŋ njùʼɔ yu nɛ, ndɔ mbiŋ ŋa nnu ŋa a chhu nɛ shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, pi shi nchwīe mfɛ ghɔ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshwei vəɨ, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ pie moŋ luoŋ Minnwi nɛ, pəɨ mfāʼo piŋ ŋa pəɨ kwo fāʼo yaoŋ ghɔ, kaŋ a shi mbɔ yəɨ.
Ndɔ sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ tithi nduoŋ Minnwi nɛ, ɔ̈ mfāʼo sheshe yaoŋ moŋ njùʼɔ ghɔ nthɛ yichəɨ ŋoŋ, ɔ līʼɛ phɨ yi, nnɛ ŋa Tǎa ghɔ ŋa a chhɔ po nɛ ŋkaa yu nthɛ a līʼɛ jɔ phɨ.”
[Ndɔ p̈əɨ mieŋ ki lɔ njiʼi ndīʼɛ phɨ yichəɨ ŋoŋ, kaŋ mbaʼa Tǎa vəɨ po līʼɛ pa yəɨ phɨ.]
Pugu pɨnɨ nthɔ Jerushalɛiŋ. Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nyīeŋ nu Nda Minnwi nɛ, pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi thɔ mbara vi,
nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ fāʼo pi yəɨ ghrɨ́ nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu pei ki a fɛ gɔ̌ ghrɨ́ yei vɛ nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu pei nɔ ghɔ?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ǹshi mbie vəɨ ni taʼa píe, p̈əɨ mfɛ khwɛ̀ vəɨ, ǹshwei vəɨ ni yɛ ghrɨ́ ŋa ǹchwīe nnu pei nɔ nɛ.
Pəɨ shwei a, Jouŋ ni ŋkwe ghrɨ́ nɔ fɛ nu ŋkhǐ pi llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi ki ŋgwamishua?”
Pugu chrā nnu ghɔ ni noŋ pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, “P̈ia nchhu ŋa, ‘Llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi’, a chhu ŋa, ‘Ti a ni nchwīe khɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ Jouŋ?’
Ti p̈ia nchhu ŋa, ‘A llɔ pi mbhɔ ŋgwamishua?’ ” nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ mbɔgɔ pa ŋgwa nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ni nji ŋa Jouŋ ni nja mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.
Nnɛ pugu khwɛ̄ ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Pigi lɔ nji.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Kaŋ mbaʼa mummu ŋkaa mu shwei vəɨ ni lɨʼɨ ŋa ghrɨ́ a lɔ nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ nchrā nu ni pugu moŋ luʼɔ chrà.
“Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni ma mbhī faaŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ

yi, ŋkrao ŋkaʼa ŋgɨ̄ŋ nɔ ghɔ, ntou ŋkuʼɔ nɨ̄ɨ ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ ŋkhǐ yi taoŋ nɔ chwīe nu laʼo, ndɔ ŋkrao muuŋ nda tɔthɨ nɔ chhɔ nu fɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi nyìeŋ. Nnɛ mfɛ ni ghaŋ fàʼa ŋa pugu lɨna nɔ ghɔ ŋga ŋkwōo maoŋ pugu pugu ghrā, ndhɔ kiʼɛ ŋgə̄ɨ laʼataoŋ nduoŋ.
Ndɨɨ ni ŋga ŋkāʼo nɔ kwōo nu ntíɛŋ thɨ yɛ, Ŋoŋ ghɔ taoŋ muuŋ fàʼa ni pa ghaŋ fàʼa pɛ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ ŋkwe ji ghrà ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ.
Ndɔ pa ghaŋ fàʼa pighɔ wie muuŋ fàʼa yi ghɔ nduʼu vi ni mbhɔ yó.
“A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ muuŋ fàʼa nduoŋ, pugu wie vi nɔ thɔ yi, nchwīe nnu lrithɔ mbɨŋ yu.
A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ yichəɨ pugu jwi vi, ŋguʼɔ nchwīe mbɨŋ ntou pichəɨ pi nɛnnɛ, ŋgwie pichəɨ, njwi pichəɨ.
A pɨnɨ mfāʼo taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a nthɛ a taoŋ, mbɔ muuŋ vi ŋa a khwā nɛ, ndugwi yi a taoŋ vi ni pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Pugu shi mfāʼo pɔgɔ yɔ.’
“Ndɔ ghaŋ fàʼa pighɔ chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, ‘Yei njɨnda yi, pia chīri njwi vi maoŋ pi gū yia!’
Pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi, njwi vi, mfuʼu khu yi moŋ nyìeŋ mīʼaŋ.
“Ti ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ kiʼɛ? A shi nthɔ njwi pa ghaŋ fàʼa pighɔ, mfɛ faaŋ ghɔ ni ŋgwa nduoŋ.
Pəɨ lɔ naa mɛ̄iŋ lɨʼɨ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi yei ŋa a chhu ŋa,
‘Ŋgùʼɔ yɛ ŋa ghaŋ nūʼɔŋ nda ni ndāa ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ nɛ
pɨnɨ nɛ ŋkara ju mbɔ ndugwi ŋguʼɔ shiʼi nchaa ŋguoŋ yi.
Yei fàʼa Taathɔ
ndɔ mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ nnu ghraoghrao ligi pigi’?”

Pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu pighɔ ni nthɔ ntāʼa shɛndaoŋ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu mi, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nji ŋa a chhu luʼɔ chrà yei nthɛ pi pugu, ndɔ pugu fāʼo pɔgɔ gu nthɛ yú ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ, nnɛ mieŋ vi ŋgə̄ɨ ni vugu.
Pugu taoŋ pa pichəɨ ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa pichəɨ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Hɛrɔ, ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ mbīri Jishɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi ni pa nnu ŋa a shi nchhu nɛ.

Pugu thɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, pigi ji ŋa ɔ ghà nchrā nnu shini ki lɔ ndīi pi nnu ŋa ŋgwa pīʼi nu nɛ, ɔ shiʼa nōoŋ shieligi ni shesheŋoŋ, ɔ ghà njɛʼi nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu ŋa ŋgwa chwīe nɛ moŋ ndɨndɨ. A kāʼo ŋa pi pe taashi ni Kaisha ki ŋga? Pigi pe ki kiʼi pigi pe?”
Ndɔ Jishɔ kwo yəɨ mbe yugu, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ mōoŋ a ŋa? Pəɨ thɔ ni taʼa ndigi mbɨŋ nōoŋ njəɨ.”
Pugu thɔ ni taʼa yi. A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Yei thɔ gɔ̌ pugu ligi gɔ̌ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “A yi Kaisha.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fɛ yaoŋ ŋa a yi Kaisha nɛ ni Kaisha, mfɛ yi Minnwi ni Minnwi.”
Pa ŋgwa Shadushi, ŋa pugu ni mbīʼi ŋa ŋoŋ shiʼa ŋkhu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ thɔ mbara Jishɔ, mbie vi ŋa,
“Masha, Mushi ni nāʼaŋ gɨ́ yei mfɛ ni pigi ŋa, ŋoŋ ŋkhu mieŋ ŋgwɛ vi ki lɔ mfāʼo muuŋ, a yiʼi ŋa ndǐŋ vi, yi mimbia, tiʼi ndɔ̄gɔ ŋkugu ghɔ mbhi puoŋ nɔ ghɔ nɔ ligi ndǐŋ vi.
Pa lǐŋ pichəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ pi khwachəɨ mbɔ pimbia, fǔoŋ yi laŋ, ŋkhu ki lɔ mfāʼo puoŋ,
mbra yi laŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ, ŋkhu ki lɔ mfāʼo puoŋ. Yichəɨ mbra yi wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ.
Ti ŋguoŋ yugu pi khwachəɨ khu ki lɔ mfāʼo puoŋ. Ndugwi yi miŋgwɛ ghɔ khu ŋkaa yu.
Ndwɛ, a lɛ ŋga mbɔ ndɨɨ yɛ ŋa ŋgwa lɛ mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ, miŋgwɛ ghɔ pɔ pi yi gɔ̌, ŋa ŋguoŋ yugu pi khwachəɨ ni ŋkwo laŋ vi nɛ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Yei lɔ mbɔ nnu ŋa a chwīe pəɨ fāaŋ nɛ? Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ nji Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nji ghrɨ́ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa ghà ŋga ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu paʼa ndɔ ndaŋ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ láŋ, mbɔ pi nɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi po.

“Ndɔ nthɛ nnu ŋgwa nɔ khu nu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu, pəɨ lɔ naa mɛ̄iŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Mushi moŋ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a chrà nɔ nnu móŋoŋ thɔ muuŋ thɨ yuyuʼu nɛ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nchrā ni Mushi fɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Mi Minnwi Abrahaŋ, mbɔ Minnwi Aiji, ni Minnwi Jakɔ?’
A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi Minnwi ŋgwa khu, a pɔ pi yi ŋgwa maoŋ. Pəɨ ya fāaŋ.”
Yichəɨ taʼa masha pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi, ŋa a ni nthi fɔ njaʼo nnu ŋa pugu ni nchrā nu nɛ, gha njəɨ ŋa Jishɔ ŋkhwɛ̄ pa nnu pighɔ shiʼi, mbie vi ŋa, “A yəɨ kɨ̀na ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ yi ghao?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Yei kɨ̀na ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ yi nɛ, ‘Yaʼo, ma Ishrae, Taathɔ mbɔ Minnwi yia wuʼɔ ju təʼɨ vi mbɔ Taathɔ.
A yiʼi ŋa ɔ khwā Taathɔ, mbɔ Minnwi yɔ, ni ŋguoŋ njùʼɔ yɔ ghao, ni ŋguoŋ nchə̌ɨ yɔ ghao, ni ŋguoŋ kwāʼa nu yɔ ghao, ni ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ yɔ ghao.’
Mbra yi pɔ yei, ‘Ɔ shi ŋkhwā taakuo yɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā noŋ yɔ nɛ.’ Yichəɨ kɨ̀na nduoŋ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ fɔ ŋa a chaa pa pei.”
Ŋgaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ chhu a kāʼo, ma Masha. Ɔ ya nchhu shini ŋa Minnwi wuʼɔ ju təʼɨ vi ndɔ paʼa yichəɨ lɔ mbɔ nɔ Ju.

A yiʼi ŋa ɔ khwā vi ni ŋguoŋ njùʼɔ yɔ pugu pa ŋguoŋ kwāʼa nu mɔ, ni ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ yɔ ndɔ ŋkhwā taakuo yɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā noŋ yɔ nɛ. A pwa paa kɨ̀na yei nchaa fɛ nu minyieŋ ŋkuoŋ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nduoŋ ni Minnwi.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa a khwɛ̄ ni shiethɔ, a chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ kwo para mieŋ nu Minnwi shaʼa fùoŋ yi moŋ chɔmbhi yɔ.”
Jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ghɔ, paʼa shesheŋoŋ lɔ nuʼuŋ moŋ mbie vi ni sheshe píe.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni njɛʼi nu Nda Minnwi nɛ, a ni mbie ŋa,
“Mimfɛ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi kie pi nɛiŋ nchhu ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ pɔ pi muuŋ Devi?
Jijwɛ Minnwi ni ŋkaoŋ njùʼɔ Devi a chhu ŋa,
‘Minnwi Taathɔ chhu ni Taathɔ a ŋa,
“Chhɔ hɛiŋ ŋgei mbhɔ a yi jɨ
ti ǹshi nuʼuŋ nchwīe pa mbɨ̌na pɔ gū yaoŋ tigi kwò yɔ.” ’
Nduthɔ Devi mɛ̄iŋ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ ni Taathɔ vi, a nthɛ a kie pi nɛiŋ mbɔ muuŋ vi?”
Mmɛ kɨrɨ ŋgwa pighɔ yaʼo nnu ŋa Jishɔ ni nchhu nɛ ni pwanjuʼɔ.
Moŋ nnu ŋa Jishɔ ni njɛʼi nu nɛ, a ni nchhu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ lɨna pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi a pwa, pugu khwā nɔ nyīeŋ nu moŋ pa mɛmmɛ ndrawaʼa ndɔ ŋkhwā ŋa pi tuʼu noŋ nchrā ni pugu lɨʼɨ kaʼa,
ŋkhwā chhɔ nu nɔ pa lɨʼɨ liɛŋ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi pugu pa lɨʼɨ jɨ.
Pugu ghà nchīgi pa piŋgɛ kugu ŋkwe maoŋ pugu, luoŋ Minnwi yugu shɨga ni njɨ nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa yəɨ vugu nɔ pa ŋgwa taoŋtaoŋ. Yugu ŋgəʼɨ shi mbɔ yi wuwuru.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nchhɔ yəɨ ŋkùŋ niʼiŋ pa yaoŋ fɛ́ Nda Minnwi nɛ, a ni chhɔ mbɛʼi ŋgwa nɔ haʼaŋ pugu niʼiŋ mbɨŋ moŋ ŋkùŋ niʼiŋ pa yaoŋ fɛ́ nɛ.
Ntou pa ghaŋ fāʼo ni nthɔ niʼiŋ ntou mɛmmɛ mbɨŋ moŋ ŋkùŋ ghɔ. Miŋgwɛ ŋkugu chəɨ ŋa a ki ya mbou niʼiŋ paa puoŋ mi mbɨŋ ŋa p̈i nchīri a pɔ nɔ taʼa ndola.
A mɛ̄iŋ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi yəɨ yu nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, miŋgwɛ ŋkugu vei ŋa a pɔ pi mbou nɛ, fɛ nchaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu niʼiŋ pa mbɨŋ moŋ ŋkùŋ yaoŋ fɛ́ nɛ,
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nduoŋ fuʼu maoŋ fɛ yugu shɨna ntou maoŋ ŋa pugu fāʼo nɛ, ndɔ miŋgwɛ vei moŋ pou yi fɛ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a fāʼo nɔ yru nu ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni ntaoŋ nu Nda Minnwi nɛ, taʼa pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, līi njəɨ pa ŋgùʼɔ pwapwa pugu pa nda pwapwa njəɨ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ yəɨ mbwambwa nda pei? Mbaʼa taʼa ŋgùʼɔ nuʼuŋ nūaŋ ŋkuoŋ ndǐŋ vi ki pi lɔ mbūo mfɛ shhɛ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchɔchhɔ ŋkuoŋ Mbra pa Thɨ Olive njiɛŋ pɨprəɨ llɔ yəɨ Nda Minnwi nɛ, Pita ni Jɛiŋ pugu Jouŋ ni Andru pie vi njiŋnjiŋ ŋa,
“Shwei vigi pa nnu pei shi mbɔ pi ndɨɨ khɔ? Pa lì nɔ nōoŋ nu ndɨɨ ŋa nnu pei shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ pɔ pa khɔ?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɨna nu, kiʼi ŋoŋ fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ.
Ntou ŋgwa shi nthɔ nɔ ligi a, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘A mmu mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ!’ mfɨ̄ɨ ntou ŋgwa.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ yaʼo pi thɔ māʼaŋ nchhɔ ki pa pishaʼakhɔ nnu nchhɔ̀, kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu. A yiʼi ŋa ŋkwaŋ nnu pei shi ŋguʼɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ndɔ a lɔ naa mbɔ ndugwi mbhi yaʼa.

Pa laʼataoŋ shi ndɔllɔ māʼaŋ pichəɨ ni nchhɔ̀, ŋgwa yichəɨ taʼa fùoŋ māʼaŋ ŋgwa yichəɨ ni nchhɔ̀. Shhɛ shi nchɨʼɨ ti shɨna moŋ pa lɨʼɨlɨʼɨ, njì gū. Pa nnu pei pɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ muuŋ ghà njɛ̄ naoŋ nu miŋgwɛ shūu nɛ.

“Ndɔ p̂əɨ chhɔ ni lɨna məɨ. Nthɛ ŋa pi shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ pa kúŋ, ŋgwie vəɨ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi, ntigi vəɨ pəɨ thi sháʼa shhɨ pa ghaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa pugu pa fùoŋ nthɛ a ŋa pəɨ pɔ pa miŋkwentie paŋ shhɨ pugu.
Ndɔ pi shi ŋguʼɔ mfǔoŋ nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni ŋguoŋ taoŋ taoŋ ghao ndugwi mbhi ma nthɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi wɛ̄iŋ vəɨ nchaʼa mfɛ lɨʼɨ sháʼa nɛ, kiʼi njùʼɔ yəɨ ghana vəɨ ni nnu ŋa pəɨ shi nchhu nɛ, ndɔ pəɨ chhu sheshe nnu ŋa pi fɛ ni pəɨ nɛ ndɨɨ ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa a lɔ nchrā pəɨ, a chrā Jijwɛ Minnwi.
“Ŋoŋ shi nchaʼa ndǐŋ vi mfɛ ŋa pi jwi, tǎa fɛ muuŋ vi ŋa pi jwi, pa puoŋ kara mbara pa tǎa pugu pa maa ni nchhɔ̀ nchwīe pi jwi vugu.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa shi mbɨ̄na vəɨ nthɛ a. Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a tīi shii ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ nɔ ndugwi yi nɛ shi ndūgu.
“Ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ shi njəɨ nnu wuwuru ŋa a shi nchwīe pi tei Nda Minnwi thi lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a shini ndɔ mfāʼo nɔ thi nu nɛ
(shesheŋoŋ ŋa a mɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ yei nɛ pīʼi, nji ŋa a shi nji njiŋ nnu yei!)
nnɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ Judia nɛ tei ŋkuʼɔ thɔ mbra.
Kiʼi ŋoŋ ŋa a chhɔ thɔnda nɛ nuʼuŋ shwiʼi shhɛ ki nii nda yu nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu sheshe yaoŋ ntaoŋ nɔ.
Kiʼi shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ nyìeŋ nɛ nuʼuŋ mbɨnɨ lɨʼɨ lɔ̄gɔ mmɛ ndhwí yi.
Ndɔ a shi mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ ni pa piŋgɛ shūu pugu pa mapuoŋ haʼaŋ pugu thɔ nuʼɔŋ puoŋ moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ nɛ!
Pəɨ luoŋ ni Minnwi ŋa kiʼi nnu pei lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi moŋ mbɨ̀,
nthɛ ŋa moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ pighɔ, ŋgəʼɨ shi mbɔ ti nchəɨŋ fɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a lɔ naa ma mbɔ jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni mbuoŋ mbhi nɛ ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ ndwɛ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbiʼi piʼi ma nuʼuŋ mbɔ.
Ndɔ a kaŋ mieŋ ki pɔ ŋa Taathɔ kɛrɛ fɨʼɨ llɛmbhi pighɔ, yichəɨ ŋoŋmishua shi kaŋ ndɔ ndūgu, ndɔ, nthɛ pi pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a chuʼɔ vugu nɛ, a kɛrɛ llɛmbhi pighɔ.
“Nɛnnɛ s̈hesheŋoŋ nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, ‘Pəɨ līi njəɨ, Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ pɔ nɛiŋ hɛnɛiŋ!’ ki ŋa, ‘Pəɨ līi njəɨ, a pi ni hini,’ kiʼi pəɨ piŋ.

Nthɛ ŋa pa ŋgwa shi nthɔ ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ ŋa pugu Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, pa njəɨlɨʼɨ mifɨɨ shi nōoŋ noŋ yugu, nōoŋ ntou pa lì pugu pa nnu ghraoghrao, nɔ fɨ̄ɨ nu pa ŋgwa ti mfɨ̄ɨ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ Minnwi chuʼɔ nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ a njiʼɛ ni pugu.
Ndɔ pəɨ chhɔ ni lɨna məɨ! Ŋ̀kwo chhu ŋguoŋ nnu ni pəɨ ŋkaoŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ ma nthɔ.
“Ndɔ moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgəʼɨ pei shi ŋkwo tɔgɔ nɛ,
‘Minaoŋ shi ŋgū njiŋnjiŋ,
ndɔ paʼa fhú lɔ nuʼuŋ nthɛ.
Pa fɨ́nəɨ shi ŋgū nu shhɛ llɔ po,
pa njɨ ŋa a pɔ moŋ tɔthɨ nɛ chɨ̄ʼɨ.’
“Nɛnnɛ, pi shi njəɨ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua, a thɔ nu moŋ lúluŋ ni mmɛ ghrɨ́ pugu pa ndighaʼo.
A shi ntaoŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, pugu kɨrɨ pa ŋgwa pi ŋa a chuʼɔ nɛ llɔ moŋ khwɛ ghaa mbhi ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ ndugwi tɔthɨ.
“Yɛʼi ntɨ́gɨ llɔ ŋkuoŋ thɨ wùnu, nɔ haʼaŋ fhɔ̌ yi nuʼuŋ njɛ̄ tua nu ŋkuoŋ mbhɔ yi nɛ, ɔ ji ŋa ŋkwəɨ mbɨ̀ para.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ yəɨ pa nnu pei thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, pəɨ ji ŋa a kwo para ti mbɔ chonda.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, mbaʼa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yei yiʼi ntɔgɔ ki ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei lɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
Po pugu shhɛ shi ntɔgɔ, ndɔ mbaʼa pa chrà paŋ yiʼi ntɔgɔ gha.
“Ndɔ a mbɔ pi nɔ llɛ́ ghɔ pugu pa ndɨɨ ghɔ, yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ nji, njiʼi nthɛ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi po, ki Muuŋ, a wuʼɔ nji Tǎa təʼɨ vi.
Pəɨ lɨna nu, mbīri noŋ yəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ nji ndɨɨ ŋa ndɨɨ ghɔ shi nthɔ nɛ.
“A pɔ pi nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a chhɔ ŋgə̄ɨ kra, ŋga ndɔllɔ laʼa, nūʼɔŋ puoŋ fàʼa pi ŋa pugu tiʼi ndɨna ni pa yaoŋ, shesheŋoŋ fāʼo ji fàʼa, mfɛ gɨ́ ni ŋgaŋ lɨna ni chonda ŋa kiʼi a llɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ pīri noŋ pəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ nji ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgaŋ nda ghɔ shi ŋkwəɨ nɛ. Ki a pɔ pi ni fanaoŋ, ki ni ntuŋ mbhi, ki moŋ ŋkhwɛmiŋkəʼɨ, ki ni tutuʼu.
Ä ŋgwīʼi nchəɨŋ, kiʼi a yəɨ ghɔ ɔ llɛ nu.
Nnu ŋa ǹchhu ni pəɨ nɛ, ǹchhu ni ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa nduoŋ: P̂əɨ pīri noŋ pəɨ.”
A ni mbiʼi paa llɛ́, llɛ́ Lli Njiʼa pugu llɛ́ Jɨ Brɛi ki Kuʼɔ kāʼo. Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi thɔ ntāʼa shɛndaoŋ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu Jishɔ njiŋnjiŋ njwi vi.
Pugu ni nchhu ŋa, “Mbaʼa a yiʼi mbɔ pi moŋ ndɨɨ jɨ yei kaŋ ŋgwa shi mbaʼo ŋgòu.”

Jishɔ ni ŋga mbɔ Betani nda Shemu ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋgaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ a ni njɨ maoŋ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi nɛ, miŋgwɛ chəɨ nii ni nchɨ́ŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni ŋgùʼɔ, laminda taoŋtaoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni nadi, mbɔ yi tɨnɨnchuoŋ lɨnaoŋ moŋ ghɔ. A pəʼɨ cho nchɨ́ŋ ghɔ, nshāʼo laminda ghɔ thɔ Jishɔ.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa chhu ni noŋ pugu fɔ moŋ pɨgɨtua ŋa, “A pɨrɨ wru laminda yei nɛnɛiŋ ŋa?
P̈i ka nì mfīni wru ghɔ, a tɔgɔ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋoŋ mfāʼa a tɔgɔ trɛi ŋkɨɨ llɛ́ pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, mfɛ mbɨŋ ghɔ ni ghaŋ pou.” Nnɛ pugu fɛ̄ʼi vi.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ mieŋ vi, pəɨ ghana vi ŋa? A chwīe pi nnu shiʼi vəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pa ghaŋ pou shi ŋguʼɔ mbɔ nu kaʼa, ti sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ khwā nɛ, pinthɛ pəɨ chwīe shiʼi ni pugu, ndɔ mbaʼa pia pɔ pi ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.
A chwīe nnu ŋa a kaŋ nthɛ a chwīe nɛ. A pīri noŋ a nɔ twei nu ŋkaoŋ ndɨɨ maa ŋkāʼo.
Ndɔ shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa pi chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ fɔ moŋ mbhi nɛ, yaoŋ ŋa miŋgwɛ vei chwīe nɛ pi shi nchhu nɔ kwiŋ nu vi.”
Nnɛ Judashi Ishikario, ŋa a ni mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ nɛ, ghə̄ɨ mbara pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nnɛ nɔ fīni nu Jishɔ ni pugu.
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo mfāʼo pwatua, ŋkāʼa nɔ fɛ nu mbɨŋ ghɔ. Nnɛ a tāʼa shɨna nɔ fīni nu vi ni pugu.
A ni ŋga mbɔ fǔoŋ llɛ́ Jɨ Brɛi ki Kuʼɔ, mbɔ llɛ́ ŋa pi ghà njwi muuŋ minjɨɨ Jɨ Lli Njiʼa nɛ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pie ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa pigi ghə̄ɨ mbīri maoŋ jɨ Lli Njiʼa vɛ pi hɨŋ?”
A taoŋ paa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, nchhu nu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ moŋ laʼa, pəɨ shi mbāoŋ pəɨ pa mimbia, a tiɛŋ kɨ̌ŋ ŋkhǐ thɔ yu, pəɨ yōu njiŋ yi.
Sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa a nii nɛ, pəɨ chhu ni ŋgaŋ nda ghɔ ŋa, ‘Masha chhu ŋa, njiɛŋ nda pa ghɨ̀nɨ hɨŋ, mbɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a nthɛ ǹjɨ maoŋ Lli Njiʼa fɔ pigi pa ghaŋ younjiŋ paŋ nɛ?’
A shi nōoŋ mmɛ njiɛŋ nda tɔthɨ ni pəɨ pi kwo chwīe ti a kāʼo, pəɨ pīri fɔ.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi taoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ laʼa, njəɨ wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a nì nuʼuŋ nchhu ni pugu nɛ, mbīri maoŋ jɨ Lli Njiʼa ghɔ fɔ.
A gha mbɔ ni fanaoŋ, Jishɔ thɔ pugu pa paanchrɔ ghɔ fɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nchɔchhɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi njɨ maoŋ nɛ, Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, taʼa ŋoŋ vəɨ shi mfīni a, taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa pigi yu jɨ maoŋ kaʼa nɛ.”
Pugu jɛ̄ nthɔ mfāʼo pəʼɨ njùʼɔ, nchhu nu ghɔ pa taʼa taʼa ŋa, “A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ mmu, ki khɔ?”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna paanchrɔ yei, yɛ ŋa pigi yu chrū brɛi moŋ pɛiŋ kaʼa nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi ŋguʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nthɛ vi nɛ, ndɔ ŋgəʼɨ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa a fīni vi nɛ. A ni mbwa ghɔ ŋa kiʼi pi phi vi.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni njɨ nu nɛ, a lɔ̄gɔ brɛi, ŋga ŋkwo tōo Minnwi, mbəʼɨ mfɛ ni pugu, nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ kwe, yei frɛinoŋ a.”
A lɔ̄gɔ ndua làʼo ŋga ŋkwo tōo Minnwi, mfɛ ni pugu, ŋguoŋ yugu nnu.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Yei chhǐ a, mbɔ yi kɨ̀na ŋa a shi ŋkwrī nthɛ ntou ŋgwa nɛ.
Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, mbaʼa ma nuʼuŋ nnu làʼo yei ŋkamuʼɔŋ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ llɛ́ yɛ ŋa ǹshi nnu fifhi moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi nɛ.”
Pugu gha njrāo taʼa ŋkhǐ, ntaoŋ kəʼɨ ghɔ ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ Mbra pa Thɨ Olive.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ shi ntei njiŋ a ghao nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa,
‘Ǹshi njwi ŋkɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ,
pa minjɨɨ sha.
Ndɔ pi shi ŋga ŋkwo kuʼɔ ni mmu moŋ gu, ŋ̀gə̄ɨ shhɨ pəɨ Galili.”
Ndɔ Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa shi ntei njiŋ yɔ ghao nɛ, m̀baʼa njiʼi ntei.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei ghɔ, ni tuʼu yei ŋkaoŋ miŋkəʼɨ ma ŋkhwɛ̄ ni paa ŋgɛ́, ɔ shi ŋkwo lāa ni trɛi ŋgɛ́.”
Ndɔ Pita chhu tɨtɨnɨ ŋa, “Ä njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa pɔgɔ khu paʼa ǹdɔ njiʼi ndāa ghɔ.”
Ŋguoŋ yugu ghao wuʼɔ nchhu pi taʼa nnu ghɔ.
Pugu ghə̄ɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ chəɨ pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Geshemani. Jishɔ chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pəɨ chɔchɔ hɛiŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹduoŋ Minnwi nɛ.”
A lɔ̄gɔ Pita, Jɛiŋ ni Jouŋ pugu pugu ghə̄ɨ. Ghaghana pugu pa yuʼɔ njùʼɔ shwiʼi mbɨŋ yu.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Njùʼɔ a ya mbəʼɨ ti minthɛ ŋka kukhu. Pəɨ kɨna hɛiŋ njra nu.”
Nchənə noŋ yi ŋgə̄ɨ shɨgɛi shhɨ, nshāoŋ ni puŋ yi shhɛ nduoŋ Minnwi ŋa a njiʼɛ, ndɨɨ ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ tɔgɔ vi.
Nchhu ŋa,
“Baba, Tǎa a, ŋguoŋ nnu yīʼɛ mbhɔ ghɔ. Pɨʼɨ ndua ŋgəʼɨ yei ki ǹdɔ nnu. Ndɔ ti kiʼi a pɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ǹtāʼa nu nɛ, a pɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa a pɔ nɛ.”
Nthɔ njəɨ vugu pugu llɛ nu, a chhu ni Pita ŋa,
“Shemu, ɔ lɛllɛ? A nthɛ paʼa ɔ lɔ nchhɔ tɔthɨ nɔ taʼa awa?
Pəɨ chhɔ tɔthɨ nduoŋ Minnwi nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ gū moŋ mōoŋ nu. Jijwɛ yəɨ khwā nu ndɔ frɛinoŋ yəɨ pou ghrɨ́.”
Mbɨnɨ ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nduoŋ Minnwi, ŋguʼɔ mbiʼi pi nnu yɛ ŋa a ŋkwo luoŋ nɛ.
A gha mbɨnɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ njəɨ vugu pugu llɛ nu, nthɛ ŋa lɔgɔ ni ndɨnaoŋ ligi pugu, paʼa pugu lɔ nji nnu ŋa minthɛ pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ nɛ.
A gha mbɨnɨ nthɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ nɔ trɛi ŋgɛ, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ wuʼɔ nthɔ ndhɛ nu mfɛrɛ noŋ yəɨ? A kāʼo, ndɨɨ ghɔ kāʼo nɛ. Pi fīni Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua liɛŋ mbhɔ pa ghaŋ phɨ.
Pəɨ lɔllɔ pia ghə̄ɨ. Pəɨ līi njəɨ, ŋoŋ ŋa a fīni a nɛ pɔ nɛiŋ!”

Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋguʼɔ nchrā nu nɛ, Judashi, mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna paanchrɔ ghɔ thɔ pugu pa yú ŋgwa, pugu tuo kafa pugu pa wrɛ́i llɔ mbhɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa pichəɨ thishɨ.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni mfīni vi nɛ ni ŋkwo fɛ lì ni pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ ŋa ǹshi mbaŋ vi nɛ, ju. Pəɨ wɛ̄iŋ vi, ŋkɛ̄ʼi vi ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju.”
Judashi ni ŋga nthɔ nchəɨŋ, ŋkuʼɔ mbara vi wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, nchhu ŋa, “Masha!” Mbaŋ vi.
Nɛnnɛ pugu wɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ, nshīŋ vi ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju.
Ndɔ yichəɨ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nthi fɔ nɛ shua kafa yi, nchhwi muuŋ fàʼa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ ghɔ, nche tə́nə yi.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“M̀bɔ pi ŋgɨna minwi ŋa pəɨ thɔ nu ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ni pa kafa pugu pa wrɛ́i?
Pa lɛllɛ pia ghà ŋguʼɔ mbɔ Nda Minnwi, ǹjɛʼi nu, ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ a. Ndɔ nnu pei lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɔ chwīe nu chrà Minnwi thi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchhu nɛ.”
Ndɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi kwiɛŋ ghao ntei.
Muuŋ chəɨ pɔrɔ njōu njiŋ yi ki lɔ māʼaŋ sheshe yaoŋ ŋkiɛŋ mbhɔ ndhwí ŋa a ni ŋgwara mbɨŋ yu, pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi.
A shrāo mbhɔ ndhwí ghɔ mieŋ mbhɔ pugu ntei ntontii.
Pi lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ. Ŋguoŋ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa thishɨ ni pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi kɨrɨ.
Pita ni njōu njiŋ yi mbɔ fie hini, nii moŋ yɨna taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ. Nchhɔ pugu pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi lɨʼɨ nthɔ njɨgɔ móŋoŋ.
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa kúŋ ghao thɔ ntāʼa thɔ nnu haʼaŋ minthɛ pugu wɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ nɔ nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pugu jwi vi, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo.
Nthɛ ŋa ntou pa ŋgwa ni nthɔ nchhu pa nnu mbe thɔ yu. Ndɔ pa nnu pighɔ ŋa pugu ni nchhu nɛ taoŋ pi nduoŋnduoŋ.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa lɔllɔ ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ yei thɔ yu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pigi ni njaʼo a chhu ŋa, ‘Ǹshi nshāʼa Nda Minnwi yei ŋa pi chwīe pi ni mbhɔ nɛ, ndɔ̄gɔ trɛi llɛ́ ŋkrao yi nduoŋ, ki lɔ mbɔ yi krao ni mbhɔ.’ ”
Ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ yei nnu, paʼa nchò yugu lɔ mbɔ taʼa yi.
Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ lɔllɔ ntithi shhɨ mbie Jishɔ ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ ŋkhwɛ̄ nnu pei ŋa ŋgwa pei chhu nthɛ ghɔ nɛ?”
Jishɔ wuʼɔ ndɛrɛ pi laŋ ki lɔ nchrā kaŋ taʼa nnu. Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ghɔ pɨnɨ mbie vi ŋa, “A gɔ̀ mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, mbɔ Muuŋ Ŋoŋ ŋa pigi ghà ŋgaʼo nɛ?”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“MI JU! Pəɨ shhi njəɨ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua pi chərə vi ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ Ŋoŋ ŋa a Fāʼo Ŋguoŋ Ghrɨ́ nɛ, a thɔ nu pugu pa lúluŋ po.”
Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ shāa ndhwí yi nchhu ŋa, “Pia nuʼuŋ ntāʼa pa miŋkwentie nchwīe khɔ nɔ?
Pəɨ yaʼo chrà nchɨʼəshə yei. Nthí məɨ pɔ pi ŋa?” Pugu kwaʼa nchhu ŋa, “A ŋgushaʼa, mbie ŋa pi jwi vi.”
Pichəɨ jɛ̄ thu nu thwɛ mbɨŋ yu, mbūoŋ ligi yi nchwi vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Tha ŋa a chhwi gɔ̌ nchhwi ghɔ.” Pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi lɨʼɨ lɔ̄gɔ vi nchrə̄ɨ lrì thɔ yu.
Pita ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ mbɛmbiɛŋ moŋ yɨna. Yichəɨ taʼa muuŋ fàʼa, mbɔ miŋgwɛ mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ thɔ,
njəɨ Pita thɔ njɨgɔ móŋoŋ. Mbɛʼi Pita nchhu ŋa, “Gɔgɔ ŋkaa ghɔ ni mbɔ pəɨ Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ.”
Ndɔ a lāa, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ǹdɔ nji, ndɔ paʼa thɔ a lɔ nshie ni nnu ŋa ɔ chhu nu nɛ.” Ndɔ Pita ghɔ lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkuoŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a taoŋ choŋkaʼa nɛ. Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ miŋkəʼɨ khwɛ
Muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ pɨnɨ njəɨ vi njɛ̄ chhu nu ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei taʼa ŋoŋ vugu.”
Ndɔ a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ndāa ŋkamuʼɔŋ.
A gha ndara shɨgɛi, ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ jɛ̄ chhu nu ni Pita ŋa, “Shishini, ɔ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu. Ɔ ŋoŋ Galili.”
A jɛ̄ chɔ̄nɔ nu noŋ yi nshwrɛ̄i nu ŋa, “Ndɔ nji ŋoŋ vei ŋa pəɨ chrā nu nthɛ vi nɛ.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, miŋkəʼɨ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkhwɛ. Pita kwiŋ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋkaoŋ miŋkəʼɨ ma ŋkhwɛ̄ ni paa ŋgɛ, ɔ shi ndāa a ni trɛi ŋgɛ.”
Pita wɛ̄iŋ noŋ yi kie nshaʼa ni kə̄ɨ.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ni tutuʼu, pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa pichəɨ thishɨ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi ni ŋguoŋ pa kúŋ ghao paoŋ mbini. Ŋkrao Jishɔ ndɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nchaʼa vi mfɛ ni Pailɛ.
Pailɛ pie vi ŋa, “Ɔ fùoŋ pa Juu?”
A khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“A haʼaŋ ɔ chhu nɛ.”
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ tigi ntou pa nnu thɔ yu.
Pailɛ pɨnɨ mbie vi ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo khwɛ̀ nɔ fɛ nu? Līi njəɨ fɨʼɨ pa nnu ŋa pugu chhu nthɛ ghɔ nɛ.”
Ndɔ paʼa Jishɔ lɔ nuʼuŋ ŋkhwɛ̄ sheshe nnu, nnɛ Pailɛ ghrāo.
A ghà mbɔ llɛ́ Jɨ Lli Njiʼa, Pailɛ chuʼɔ taʼa ŋgaŋ chəɨŋ ŋa ŋgwa pie ghɔ nɛ.
Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ shɨna pa ghaŋ tɨnɨthɔ pɛ ŋa pugu ni njwi ŋoŋ ndɨɨ ŋa minduoŋnduoŋ ni ŋgū moŋ laʼa nɛ, ligi yi pɔ Baraba.
Pa yú ŋgwa pighɔ ghə̄ɨ mbara Pailɛ, mbie vi ŋa a chwīe nɔ haʼaŋ a ghà mbīgi nchwīe nɛ ni pugu.
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ tāʼa nu ŋa nchuʼɔ ‘Fùoŋ pa Juu’ mfɛ ni pəɨ?”
Nthɛ ŋa a ni nji ŋa pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nthɔ mfɛ ghɔ nthɛ pi kighɨʼə.
Ndɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ kāoŋ yú ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu pie ŋa Pailɛ chuʼɔ pi Baraba.
Pailɛ pɨnɨ nchhu ŋa, “Ti mi shi mbɔ pi nɛiŋ ni ŋoŋ ŋa pəɨ mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Fùoŋ pa Juu nɛ?”
Pugu paʼo ŋgòu ni njɨ ŋa, “Kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa!”
Pailɛ pie ŋa, “Nthɛ khɔ? Nnu pɨphɨ ŋa a chwīe nɛ pɔ pi khɔ?”
Ndɔ pugu pɨnɨ mbaʼo ŋgòu mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ, “Kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa!”
Nnɛ Pailɛ tāʼa nu nchwīe ŋa túa yú ŋgwa pighɔ pwa, nchuʼɔ Baraba mfɛ ni pugu, ŋga ŋkwo wie Jishɔ, nchaʼa vi mfɛ ŋa pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Pa shoogɛ lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ nii nɔ moŋ yɨna ntuʼɔ ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa, mɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ kwíe ntɨgao ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ghao lɨʼɨ muʼɔŋ.
Pugu māʼaŋ pɨ̀rɨ mbɨŋ yu, mbaʼa ŋkie ni pa michwɛʼichwɛʼi shhɔ̄ thɔ yu.
Pugu jɛ̄ nthɔ ŋgɨnɔ vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Nduunya! Ma Fùoŋ pa Juu!”
Nthɔ ŋkwāʼa thɔ yi ni muuŋ thɨ, nthɔ nthu thwɛ mbɨŋ yu, ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yugu ŋgaʼo vi.
Pugu ni ŋga ŋkwo māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ ti mīʼɛŋ, nshrāo pɨ̀rɨ ghɔ mbɨŋ yu, māʼaŋ ji ndhwí mbɨŋ yu, ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju lɨʼɨ kwīŋ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Pugu ŋɨ ŋoŋ chəɨ ŋa ligi ni mbɔ Shemu llɔ Shiriŋ ŋa tiɛŋ wáʼa yi. Ŋoŋ ghɔ ni mbɔ tǎa Alɛshanda pugu Rufushi, ŋa a ni nii nu moŋ tri laʼa llɔ moŋ ŋgunu.
Pugu lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pi mɛ̄iŋ ŋa Gogota. Njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa, “Lɨʼɨ Kwéi Thɔ.”
Pugu fɛ làʼo ghɔ ŋa pi nyāaŋ ni yichəɨ fhɔ̌ yúʼɔ pi mɛ̄iŋ ni məə, ndɔ a lāa ki lɔ nnu.
Pugu kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, ŋgrā ndhwí yi shɨna pugu, māʼaŋ yaoŋ nɔ pɛʼi, nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa shesheŋoŋ vugu shi njɨ pi yəɨ pra ndhwí yi.
A ni mbɔ ndipuʼu minaoŋ ni tutuʼu ŋa pugu ni ŋkwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Pi nāʼaŋ nnu ŋa pugu ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ ŋkwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nɛ ŋa, “Fùoŋ pa Juu.”
Pi kwīŋ vi pugu pa paa ŋgɨna. Taʼa yi ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ, taʼa yi ŋgei mbhɔ ŋkwrɛi.
[Nɛnnɛ chrà Minnwi yɛ ŋa pi ni nāʼaŋ ŋa pi ni shia vi shɨna ghaŋ chwīe phɨ nɛ ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ].
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntɔgɔ nu nɛ ni nthɔ ŋgwɛʼi vi, nchɨʼɨ thɔ yugu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Hoho! Ɔ ni ntāʼa nu shāʼa Nda Minnwi mbɨnɨ ŋkrao moŋ trɛi llɛ́.
Kwe nɛ noŋ yɔ nshwiʼi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa pia.”
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ shɨna pugu ni noŋ yugu nchhu ŋa, “A ni ŋkwe ŋgwa nduoŋ, ndɔ minthɛ paʼa a lɔ ŋkwe noŋ yi.
Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe, mbɔ Fùoŋ ŋgwa Ishrae, shwiʼi nɛ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pigi yəɨ mbiŋ vi.” Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ vugu pugu kaʼa nɛ māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ ŋkaa pugu.
A ni ŋga mbɔ moŋ ntuŋ minaoŋ, njiŋnjiŋ gū moŋ ŋguoŋ laʼa ghao ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ trɛi minaoŋ ni naoŋchɨ.
A gha mbɔ moŋ trɛi minaoŋ ghɔ, Jishɔ chhu ŋkiɛŋ ni njɨ ŋa,
“Eloi, Eloi, lema shabatani?”
njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa,
“Minnwi a, Minnwi a, ɔ mīʼaŋ a ŋa?”
Pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ gha njaʼo nnu ghɔ nchhu ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, a chhɔ mɛ̄iŋ pi Elaija.”
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ tei ŋgə̄ɨ niʼiŋ kusha moŋ làʼo chəchɨgəɨ, nchwɛʼi thɔ muuŋ thɨ, mfɛ ghɔ ŋa a nnu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Pəɨ tithi pia yəɨ ŋa Elaija shi nthɔ nshwiʼi vi shhɛ!”
Jishɔ paʼo ŋgòu ndɔ ŋkhu.
Ndhwí kɨʼɨ lɨʼɨ Nda Minnwi shāa ntaoŋ yi paa, llɔ tɔthɨ nshwiʼi mfɛ shhɛ.
Nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ŋa a ni nthi fɔ nthɔ mbɛʼi vi nɛ, gha njəɨ ŋa yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a khu nɛ, nchhu ŋa, “Shishini, ŋoŋ vei ni mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi!”
Pichəɨ piŋgɛ ni nthi hini njiʼɛ mbɛʼi nu. Shɨna piŋgɛ pighɔ ni mbɔ Meri Madaliŋ pugu Meri mǔuŋ Jɛiŋ mikəʼɨ pugu Joshɛshi, ni Shalome.
Ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ Galili nɛ, pugu yōu njiŋ yi ŋgɛ̄rɛ vi. Ntou pa piŋgɛ nduoŋ ŋa pugu pa Jishɔ ni ŋkuʼɔ Jerushalɛiŋ kaʼa ni mbɔ fɔ.

Fanaoŋ ni ŋkwo thɔ nu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ ligi yi pɔ Joshɛ llɔ Arimatia chəɨŋ. A ni mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ nda pa kúŋ, ni nthɔ njwɛrɛ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi ŋa a thɔ. A ni mbɔ llɛ́ pīri nu noŋ (mbɔ llɛ́ ŋa a fɛ ni llɛ́ Ji pa Juu nɛ). Joshɛ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yi, ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ Pailɛ nduoŋ khu Jishɔ mbhɔ yu.

Fanaoŋ ni ŋkwo thɔ nu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ ligi yi pɔ Joshɛ llɔ Arimatia chəɨŋ. A ni mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ nda pa kúŋ, ni nthɔ njwɛrɛ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi ŋa a thɔ. A ni mbɔ llɛ́ pīri nu noŋ (mbɔ llɛ́ ŋa a fɛ ni llɛ́ Ji pa Juu nɛ). Joshɛ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yi, ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ Pailɛ nduoŋ khu Jishɔ mbhɔ yu.
Pailɛ ni ŋgrāo nɔ yaʼo nu ŋa Jishɔ kwo khu. Mɛ̄iŋ nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ mbie vi ŋa Jishɔ kwo khu.
A ni ŋga njaʼo mbhɔ nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ghɔ ŋa a kwo khu, mfɛ khu yi ni Joshɛ.
Joshɛ yuoŋ mbhɔ ndhwí fhu, nshwiʼi khu Jishɔ shhɛ, ndiŋ vi moŋ ndhwí fhu ghɔ, niʼiŋ moŋ fúŋ ŋa pi fīʼi moŋ ŋgùʼɔ nɛ. Ŋkə̄nə ŋgùʼɔ nchri chofuŋ ghɔ nɔ.
Meri Madaliŋ, ni Meri mǔuŋ Joshɛshi yəɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi ni ntwei vi nɛ.
Llɛ́ Ji ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Meri Madaliŋ pugu Meri muuŋ Jɛiŋ ni Shalome yuoŋ pa wru laminda, nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu nshāʼo mbɨŋ Jishɔ.
A gha mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ni muuŋ tutuʼu ndɨɨ ŋa minaoŋ ni ŋkwo shaʼa moŋ fǔoŋ llɛmbhi, mbɔ Shonde, pugu ghə̄ɨ chofuŋ Jishɔ.
Pugu chhu nu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “A shi ŋkə̄nə gɔ̌ ŋgùʼɔ mbɨʼɨ chofuŋ mfɛ ni pia?”
Ŋga ndīi nu nɛ, njəɨ pi kwo ŋkə̄nə ŋgùʼɔ ghɔ. A ni mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ ŋgùʼɔ.
Pugu gha nii moŋ fúŋ ghɔ, njəɨ yichəɨ maʼaŋ mikhwa chhɔ fɔ ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ, māʼaŋ shalaoŋ fhu, pugu ghrāo.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ ŋgrāo, pəɨ tāʼa pi Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nɛ. A kwo kuʼɔ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ hɛiŋ. Līi njəɨ, yei lɨʼɨ yɛ ŋa pi ni nūʼɔŋ vi nɛ.
Ndɔ pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nchhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, pugu pa Pita ŋa, ‘A ghə̄ɨ nu nɛ shhɨ pəɨ moŋ Galili. Pəɨ shi njəɨ vi fɔ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nshwei vəɨ nɛ.’ ”
Thɔ yugu ni fiŋ, pugu wrū nu nthɛ pɔgɔ gu, ntaoŋ moŋ fúŋ ghɔ ntei. Pugu shini ndɔ nchhu kaŋ taʼa nnu ni shesheŋoŋ nthɛ ŋa pɔgɔ gu ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu.
[Pichəɨ pa fǔoŋ ndunu Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi llɛshhɨ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo jɛ̄ moŋ ghrà ndipuʼu ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ nɔ ndugwi yi.]
[Ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni ŋkwo kuʼɔ ŋkiɛŋ ni muuŋ tutuʼu ni Shonde nɛ, mfǔoŋ nōoŋ noŋ yi pi ni Meri Madaliŋ, mbɔ miŋgwɛ yɛ ŋa a ni mfuʼu khwachəɨ miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ.
A ghə̄ɨ nshwei ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pa Jishɔ ni mbɔ nu kaʼa nɛ, ŋa pugu ni nthɔ ŋkə̄ɨ nu ndɔ njūa nu nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa Jishɔ yi maoŋ, Meri Madaliŋ ghɔ kwo yəɨ vi nɛ, paʼa ndɔ mbiŋ.
Pa nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi moŋ shɛndaoŋ nduoŋ ni paa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ shɛndaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu moŋ laʼa nɛ.
Pugu pɨnɨ nchhu ni pichəɨ, ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ mbiŋ nnu ŋa pugu ni nchhu nɛ.

Pa nnu pei gha ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi ni taʼanchrɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni njɨ maoŋ nɛ, mbɨ̄ga vugu nthɛ pou piŋ yugu pugu pa tɨnɨthɔ nɔ piŋ nu nnu ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yəɨ vi a pɔ yi maoŋ chhu nɛ.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao, nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwamishua ghao.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ ndɔ ŋkwe ŋkhǐ nɛ shi ndūgu. Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbiŋ nɛ shi mfāʼo njɔ́ nɔ ŋgushaʼa.
Pa lì pei shi njōu njiŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu piŋ nɛ. Ni ligi a pugu shi mfuʼu pa miŋwɛiŋ, nchrā moŋ pa chrà fhi.
Pugu shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ pa mitwɛʼi, ti p̈ugu nnu sheshe njɨʼɨ, paʼa kàʼa lɔ ŋkēe vugu. Pugu shi nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yugu ŋkuoŋ pa ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ, noŋ yugu tɔgɔ.”
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ Taathɔ ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ chrā nu ni pugu, pi lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋkuʼɔ nɔ po, nchərə ŋgei mbhɔ Minnwi yi jɨ.
Pugu taoŋ chhu chrà Minnwi ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ, Taathɔ fāʼa pugu pugu nōoŋ ŋa chrà ŋa pugu chhu nu nɛ yi shini ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa lì.]
Luke: Ndɔ haʼaŋ ntou ŋgwa paʼo nɔ nāʼaŋ nu pa nnu pɛ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ shɨna pia nɛ,
wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pia nuʼuŋ njaʼo mbhɔ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni mbɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi, njəɨ mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchīi chrà Minnwi,
nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀kwo ya ntou ŋguoŋ pa nnu shishiʼi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ki kie llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ, a pwa ŋa ǹāʼaŋ nnu pighɔ mfɛ vɛ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ki ya ntɔgɔ nɛ, ma Tiofilu ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ,
nɛnnɛ ŋa mimfɛ ɔ ya nji shishiʼi pa nnu haʼaŋ pi shwei ghɔ nɔ nɛ.

A ni mbɔ thɔ Hɛrɔ, mbɔ fùoŋ Judia, yichəɨ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ni mbɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Shakaria. A ni ndhɔ moŋ ghrà ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi, llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Abija. A ni mfāʼo ŋgwɛ vi llɔ moŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Ɛroŋ
, ligi yi ni mbɔ Ɛlishabe.
Ŋguoŋ vugu ni mbɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi, nthɔ nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ kɨ̀na pugu pa gɨ́ Taathɔ ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo ntəɨ.
Ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ njiʼi fāʼo muuŋ, nthɛ ŋa Ɛlishabe ni mbɔ pi ŋkhwɛ̄, ndɔ pugu ni ŋkwo ya ndunu.
A ni ŋga mbɔ llɛ́ chəɨ, a pɔ ndɨɨ ghrà pa Shakaria nɔ fāʼa nu nɔ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi, Shakaria fɛ̄ʼi nu,

ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Nda Minnwi ni mbɔ nɛ, pugu māʼaŋ yaoŋ nɔ yəɨ nu ŋoŋ ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ ŋa a tūoŋ *lěi nɛ. A gū mbɨŋ yu ŋa a nii ju Nda Minnwi lɨʼɨ tūoŋ yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ lěi nɔ ghaʼo nu Minnwi.
Ntou ŋgwa ni mbɔ mbhi nchhɔ nduoŋ Minnwi moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋa pi ni nthɔ ntūoŋ lěi nɛ.
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi yəɨ yu, nthi ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa pi ni ntūoŋ lěi nɛ.
Shakaria ni ŋga njəɨ vi, njùʼɔ yi taoŋ, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vi.
Ndɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ chhu ŋa, “Kiʼi mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu, ma Shakaria. Minnwi yaʼo luoŋ yɔ. Ɛlishabe ŋgwɛ ghɔ shi mbhi muuŋ mimbia ɔ chhɔ̄ ligi yi ni Jouŋ.
Muuŋ vei shi mbɔ pwanjuʼɔ ni pwatua vɛ, ntou ŋgwa pɨnɨ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ŋa pi phi vi.
A shi mbɔ mmɛŋoŋ shhɨ Taathɔ. Kiʼi a ma nnu làʼo ki sheshe làʼo tɨtɨnɨ. A shi ndɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi llɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a pɔ moŋ puŋ nɛ.
A shi nchwīe ntou puoŋ Ishrae pɨ̄nɨ mbara Taathɔ vugu, mbɔ Minnwi.

A shi ŋgə̄ɨ ju nɔ likiɛŋ Taathɔ moŋ jijwɛ pugu pa ghrɨ́ nɔ yi njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Elaija, nɔ chīni nu njùʼɔ pa tǎa pugu pa yi puoŋ, ŋkara pa ntɨnɨthɔ pugu kwəɨ ŋkuoŋ mbha shiethɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ nɛnnɛ nɔ nchwīe nu ŋgwa ŋa pugu pīri noŋ yugu ni Taathɔ.”
Shakaria pie ni ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ ŋa, “Mi shi ŋkie pi nɛiŋ mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ni nnu pei ŋa ŋ̀kwo lulunu ŋgaʼa, ŋgwɛ a kwo lulunu ŋkaa yu nɛ?”
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Mi Gabreya. Ǹthi shhɨ Minnwi, ŋa a taoŋ a ŋa ǹchrā vɛ ndɔ nshwei ghɔ ni pwa pishaʼakhɔ yei.
Līi njəɨ, nthɛ ŋa ɔ lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ chrà a nɛ, ɔ shi ŋgū fhɨncho ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ llɛ́ yɛ ŋa nnu pei shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.”
Pa ŋgwa ni nchhɔ njwɛrɛ Shakaria, nthɔ ŋgrāo nu ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a yiyiri Nda Minnwi nɛ.
A gha ntaoŋ mfɨfhɨ, pugu yəɨ kiʼɛ ŋa a yəɨ pi nnu Nda Minnwi, a thɔ nōoŋ nnu pi ni mbhɔ ŋkɨna mbɔ fhɨncho.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ndɨɨ fàʼa yi Nda Minnwi ni mmɛ nɛ, a pɨ̄nɨ laʼa.
Pa llɛ́ gha ntɔgɔ, Ɛlishabe ŋgwɛ vi shūu, ndə̄ɨŋ noŋ yi nɔ tiɛŋ nàoŋ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Yei nnu ŋa Taathɔ fāʼa mbɨŋ mu, Taathɔ līi a ni pwapuŋ nɔ pɨʼɨ nu lrithɔ mbɨŋ mu shɨna ŋgwamishua.”
A ni ŋga mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Ɛlishabe ni ŋkwo shūu nɔ ntɨgao nàoŋ nɛ, Minnwi taoŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ vi, mbɔ Gabreya, ŋa a ghə̄ɨ Nasharɛ, mbɔ yichəɨ lɨʼɨ Galili,
njəɨ muuŋ miŋgwɛ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Meri, ŋa a shi yaʼa ji mimbia nɛ. Pi ni nōoŋ vi ni Joshɛ nɔ ŋgwɛ vi. Joshɛ ni mbɔ ŋoŋ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ fùoŋ Devi.
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ ghə̄ɨ nchhu ni Meri ghɔ ŋa, “Ǹchrā vɛ, ma mbrɔthɔ miŋgwɛ, Taathɔ pɔ pəɨ yu kaʼa!”
Meri fāʼo fiŋthɔ, mbɨnɨ ŋgrāo ŋa yei pɔ pi yəɨ ŋkwaŋ chrā nu nɛiŋ.
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Kiʼi mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu, ma Meri, Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ nthi mi nɔ nōoŋ nu pwapuŋ vɛ.
Līi njəɨ, ɔ shi nshūu mbhi muuŋ mimbia nchhɔ̄ ligi yi ni Jishɔ.
A shi mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛŋoŋ ndiɛŋ, pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Muuŋ Minnwi ŋa a Chaapifuoŋ nɛ. Minnwi Taathɔ shi nchərə vi ŋkuoŋ faaŋ tǎa vi, mbɔ Devi.
A shi nshaʼa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Jakɔ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ, mbaʼa ndugwi Shaʼafuoŋ yi ma njiʼi mbɔ.”
Meri pie ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ ŋa, “Mimfɛ a kie pi nɛiŋ mbɔ nnɛ, ŋa ǹdɔ naa nji mimbia nɛ?”
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Jijwɛ Minnwi shi nshwiʼi mbɨŋ ghɔ. Njɨ ju ŋa a Chaapifuoŋ nɛ kuru ghɔ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, muuŋ ŋa ɔ shi mbhi nɛ, shi mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ. Pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa Muuŋ Minnwi.
Līi njəɨ, ndǐŋ ghɔ Ɛlishabe pɔ ni shūu muuŋ mimbia ŋkaa yu nɔ ntɨgao nàoŋ moŋ ndilunu, mbɔ ju ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni ŋkhwɛ̄ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ nnu shiʼa ŋgaʼa Minnwi.”
Meri chhu ŋa, “M̀bɔ nɛiŋ, mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa Taathɔ, a pɔ vəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ɔ chhu nɛ.” Nɛnnɛ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ ghə̄ɨ ni vhi.
A gha ndaʼa shɨgɛi llɛ́, Meri lɔllɔ ŋkɔnɔ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ yichəɨ laʼataoŋ moŋ Juda, laʼataoŋ ntou mbra.
A ghə̄ɨ nii nda Shakaria nchrā ni Ɛlishabe.
Ɛlishabe ni ŋga njaʼo chrà Meri, muuŋ ŋāna ni njɨ moŋ puŋ yu. Ɛlishabe ni ndɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi,
nɛnnɛ nchhu ni njɨ ŋa, “Ɔ mbrɔthɔ shɨna ŋguoŋ piŋgɛ ghao, ndɔ mbrɔthɔ pɔ muuŋ ŋa ɔ shi mbhi nɛ!
Mi pɔ pi gɔ̌, ŋa yei ŋkwaŋ nnu chwīe a, ŋa mǔuŋ Taathɔ a thɔ ŋkra a?
Nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa mi nì njaʼo ɔ chrā vəɨ nɛ, muuŋ ŋa a pɔ puŋ mu nɛ ŋāna ni njɨ nthɛ pwatua.
Mbɔrɔ pɔ vɛ nthɛ ŋa ɔ piŋ nnu ŋa Taathɔ chhu vɛ nɛ!”
Meri khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ǹchhu ni ŋguoŋ njùʼɔ a ŋa ndighaʼo pɔ ni Taathɔ.
Mbɨnɨ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ Minnwi mbɔ ŋkwe a,
nthɛ ŋa a kwiŋ muuŋ fàʼa yi, yi juju.
Līi njəɨ, llɔ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwrɛiŋgwa shi mɛ̄iŋ a ni mbrɔthɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa ju ŋa a tɨnɨ ŋgaʼa nɛ,
chwīe pa mɛmmɛ nnu vəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Ŋoŋ Ki Fhi Yi.
Llɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ nshwiʼi ŋkuoŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ,
a nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔgɔ vi nɛ.
A chwīe pa nnu tɨtɨnɨ ni mbhɔ mi,
nshāaŋ pa ghaŋ ntitaʼo moŋ pa kwāʼa nu muŋu.
A shwiʼi pa mɛmmɛ fùoŋ llɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ yugu,
ŋkə̄rə pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa yugu lɔ mbɔ nɛ tɔthɨ.
A nɨʼɨŋ pa ghaŋ njì ni pa maoŋ shiʼi,
njōu pa ghaŋ fāʼo pugu ghə̄ɨ ni mbhɔ yó.
A ghɛ̄rɛ muuŋ fàʼa vi mbɔ Ishrae,
nthɔ ŋkwiŋ pi kwoshɨnɨ yi,
ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkāʼa ni pa tǎa pia,
ni Abrahaŋ pugu pa mbhɛ̌ ŋoŋ yi nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao nɛ.”
Meri chhɔ pugu Ɛlishabe nɔ trɛi nàoŋ, maa mbɨnɨ kiʼɛ laʼa yu.
Ndɨɨ phi Ɛlishabe ni ŋga ŋkāʼo, a phi muuŋ mimbia.
Pa taakuo pi pugu pa ndaaŋoŋ yi ni ŋa njaʼo fɨʼɨ ntou kwoshɨnɨ ŋa Taathɔ nōoŋ ni Ɛlishabe nɛ, pugu pugu fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ.
Fúoŋ llɛmbhi ni ŋga ŋkāʼo, pi thɔ lɨʼɨ niʼiŋ vi ŋgunu mbrɛi, ntāʼa nu nchhɔ̄ ligi yi ni Shakaria, mbɔ ligi tǎa vi.
Mǔuŋ vi lāa, nchhu ŋa, “Pi fāʼo nɔ mɛ̄iŋ nu vi pi ŋa Jouŋ.”
Ndɔ pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Yichəɨ ndaaŋoŋ yɔ lɔ mbɔ fɔ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni ligi yi nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ, pugu nōoŋ ni mbhɔ nɔ pie nu tǎa vi ni ligi ŋa a khwā ŋa muuŋ ghɔ fāʼo nɛ.
Shakaria chhu pi thɔ ni yaoŋ nāʼaŋ yaoŋ, a nāʼaŋ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ ŋa, “Ligi yi Jouŋ.” Nnu ghɔ ghrāo vugu.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, nchò Shakaria chuʼɔ, lɨŋ yi kɨ̄gɛi, a chrā, njɛ̄ ghaʼo nu Minnwi.
Pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ pa taakuo pugu. Shaaŋga nnu pei nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ laʼataoŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ Judia, mbɔ laʼataoŋ mbra.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ni njaʼo nnu yei nɛ ywɛrɛ moŋ njùʼɔ yu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Muuŋ vei ma mbɔ pi ŋkwaŋ khɔ? Nthɛ ŋa mbhɔ Taathɔ ni nja mbɔ mbɨŋ yu.”
Shakaria tǎa Jouŋ ni ndɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi, nɛnnɛ nchhu nnu ŋa Minnwi nōoŋ ghɔ nɛ:
“Ghaʼo Taathɔ mbɔ Minnwi Ishrae,
nthɛ ŋa a kra ŋgwa pi nɔ njaʼandiʼi yugu,
Mfɛ tɨtɨnɨ Ŋkwe ni pia
llɔ moŋ nda Devi muuŋ fàʼa vi.
Wuʼɔ ndɔ haʼaŋ a ni mfɛ kàʼa yi
ni pa njəɨlɨʼɨ pi pi taoŋtaoŋ llɔ llɛshhɨ ŋa pugu chīi ni ŋgwa,
ŋa pia shi ndūgu mbhɔ pa mimbɨna pia pugu pa ŋguoŋ
pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu pɨ̄na via nɛ.
A ni ŋkāʼa ŋa a shi nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ni pa tǎa pia
ndɔ mbɨnɨ ŋkwiŋ kɨ̀na yi yi taoŋtaoŋ,
kɨ̀na ŋa a ni nshwrɛ̄i ni tǎa via Abrahaŋ nɛ.
A ni ŋkāʼa ŋa a shi ŋkwe via mbhɔ pa mimbɨna pia,
nɛnnɛ ŋa mimfɛ pia fāʼa fàʼa yi ki lɔ mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu,
moŋ taoŋtaoŋ pugu pa ndɨndɨ shhɨ yu moŋ ŋguoŋ chɔmbhi yia ghao.
Ndɔ gɔ̀, muuŋ a,
ɔ shi mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋa a Chaapifuoŋ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa ɔ shi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ Taathɔ mbīri ndaoŋ yi.
Ɔ shi nshwei ŋgwa pi, mbɔ ŋgwa Juu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ mimfɛ pugu kie ndūgu nɛ,
ŋa Minnwi shi ndīʼɛ phɨ yugu.
Nthɛ pi juju kwoshɨnɨ Minnwi ni pia,
ndɨɨ ŋa líʼɛ llɔ tɔthɨ shi nthɛ mbɨŋ pia,
nɔ fɛ nu líʼɛ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ moŋ njiŋnjiŋ pugu pa miliʼi gu nɛ,
ŋkɛ̄ʼi via ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shɛndaoŋ ghɨghrɨ.”
Jouŋ muuŋ ghɔ ni ŋkuʼɔ ntɨnɨ moŋ jijwɛ, ndaʼa pi moŋ pa ŋkǔnu njó ti nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni njɛ̄ chīi nu chrà Minnwi ni ŋgwa Ishrae nɛ.
A ni ŋga mbɔ moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ, Kaisha Agɔshtu pɔ fùoŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi Roma, mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ligi ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Roma ghao nɔ nnu shia ŋgwa.
Yei ni mbɔ fǔoŋ nāʼaŋ nu ligi nɔ nnu shia ŋgwa ndɨɨ ŋa Kwirinu ni nthɔ shaʼa Shiria nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ni mbɨnɨ moŋ ji laʼataoŋ nɔ nāʼaŋ nu ligi yi nɔ nnu shia ŋgwa ghɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa Joshɛ ni mbɔ pi ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ fùoŋ Devi nɛ, a kuʼɔ llɔ Nasharɛ moŋ Galili, ŋgə̄ɨ Bɛtɛlɛhɛiŋ moŋ Judia mbɔ laʼataoŋ Devi.
A ghə̄ɨ fɔ lɨʼɨ nāʼaŋ ligi yugu Meri ŋa pi ni nōoŋ vi ghɔ nɔ ŋgwɛ vi, a ni mbɔ ni shūu nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ, muuŋ kāoŋ vi.
A phi fǔoŋ muuŋ vi, mbɔ muuŋ mimbia, mbara vi moŋ ndhwí, niʼiŋ moŋ ŋkuʼɔ jɨ khí pa minjɨɨ, nthɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ shi ki lɔ mbɔ ni pugu moŋ nda ghɔ ŋa pa ghɨ̀nɨ ghà nthɔ ndaʼa nɛ.
Moŋ ŋkǔnu moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ pa ŋkɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ ni mbɔ fɔ nthɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi pa minjɨɨ pugu ni tuʼu.
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi shɨna pugu, ndighaʼo Taathɔ thɛ ŋgɨ̄ŋ vugu, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu.
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu, ǹthɔ ni ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ pwatua, mbɔ yi ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao.
Shiʼa moŋ laʼataoŋ Devi pi phi ŋkwe vəɨ mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe, ŋa a Taathɔ nɛ.
Yei shi mbɔ lì ni pəɨ: Pəɨ shi njəɨ muuŋ pi para vi moŋ ndhwí, a nūaŋ moŋ ŋkuʼɔ jɨ khí pa minjɨɨ.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, yú pichəɨ shoogɛ llɔ po wīʼi nchəɨŋ, pugu pa yie ghɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa:
“Ndighaʼo pɔ ni Minnwi ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ fie moŋ ndugwi po,
ghrɨnjuʼɔ pɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ŋa pwapuŋ Minnwi pɔ mbɨŋ pugu nɛ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pighɔ mieŋ vugu mbɨnɨ po nɛ, pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ pighɔ chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Pia ghə̄ɨ Bɛtɛlɛhɛiŋ njəɨ nnu yei ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ Taathɔ chwīe pia ji nɛ.”
Nnɛ pugu kɔnɔ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ Meri ni Joshɛ, ni muuŋ ghɔ a nūaŋ moŋ ŋkuʼɔ jɨ khí pa minjɨɨ.
Pugu ni ŋga njəɨ muuŋ vei nchīi nnu ŋa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pighɔ ni nchhu nthɛ muuŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ni njaʼo nnu ghɔ nɛ ghrāo nnu ŋa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ pighɔ ni ǹchhu nɛ.
Meri lə̄ɨŋ ŋguoŋ nnu pei njùʼɔ yu nthɔ njwɛrɛ nu.
Pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ pɨ̄nɨ ni vugu, nthɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi ndɔ mbɨnɨ ntōo vi nthɛ ŋguoŋ nnu pɛ ŋa pugu yaʼo ndɔ njəɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi shwei vugu nɛ.
Fúoŋ llɛmbhi ni ŋga ŋkāʼo, pi niʼiŋ muuŋ ghɔ ŋgunu mbrɛi nchhɔ̄ ligi yi ni Jishɔ, mbɔ ligi ŋa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ni mfɛ ŋkaoŋ pi maa nshūu vi nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa fɨʼɨ llɛmbhi ŋa a ni mbie ŋa Joshɛ pugu Meri chwīe mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ Mushi chhu nɛ ni ŋkāʼo nɛ
, pugu kuʼɔ ni Jishɔ Jerushalɛiŋ lɨʼɨ fɛ vi ni Taathɔ.
Yei ni mbɔ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ moŋ gɨ́ Taathɔ nɛ, “Sheshe fǔoŋ phi ŋa a mimbia nɛ, pi nūʼɔŋ vi lɨʼɨ təʼɨ vi ni Taathɔ.”
Ndɔ mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ Taathɔ chhu nɛ, “mbɔ paa minthɔ ki paa puoŋ mintuʼɔlibuŋ.”
Moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ, ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ Jerushalɛiŋ, ligi yi pɔ Shimioŋ. A ni mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ ndɔ mbɔgɔ Minnwi. A ni nthɔ njwɛrɛ nu ŋa lūgu nu thɔ ni puoŋ laʼataoŋ Ishrae, Jijwɛ Minnwi ni mbɔ mbɨŋ yu.
Jijwɛ Minnwi ni ŋkwo nōoŋ ghɔ ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi ŋkhu ki lɔ njəɨ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe, ŋa Taathɔ ni ŋkāʼa nɛ.
Jijwɛ Taathɔ kāoŋ vi ŋa a ghə̄ɨ Nda Minnwi ndɨɨ ŋa Meri pugu Joshɛ ni nthɔ ni muuŋ ghɔ fɔ nɔ chwīe nu nùʼɔŋ mbɨŋ yu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ gɨ́ ni nchhu nɛ.
Shimioŋ kwe muuŋ ghɔ ntuo mbhɔ yu, ntōo Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ndwɛ, Taathɔ, ɔ mieŋ nu ŋa muuŋ fàʼa yɔ khu ndwɛ moŋ ghɨghrɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ chrà yɔ chhu nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa ligi a yəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa ɔ taoŋ vi ŋa a thɔ ŋkwe ŋgwa nɛ,
ŋa ɔ pīri vi ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa yəɨ nɛ,
mbɔ líʼɛ nɔ nōoŋ nu nnu ŋa ɔ tāʼa nu nɛ ni pa taoŋ nduoŋ,
mbɨnɨ nthɔ ni ndighaʼo ni ŋgwa pɔ, mbɔ puoŋ Ishrae.”
Tǎa Jishɔ ghɔ pugu mǔuŋ vi ghrāo pa nnu ŋa Shimioŋ chhu nthɛ Jishɔ nɛ.
Shimioŋ fɛ mbɔrɔ ni pugu, nchhu ni Meri mǔuŋ vi ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, Minnwi chuʼɔ muuŋ vei ŋa nthɛ vi, ntou ŋgwa shi mbhɛ gha ntou pi lūgu Ishrae, ndɔ mbɔ lì ŋa mbaʼa pi piŋ nɛ,
nɛnnɛ nɔ nōoŋ nu pa nnu haʼaŋ ŋgwa pīʼi nu njùʼɔ pugu nɛ. Ndɔ ni gɔ̀, ɔ shi mfāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi she njùʼɔ yɔ pi ni kafa.”

Ndunu miŋgwɛ ŋkugu chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Ana, ni mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, mbɔ muuŋ Fanue, llɔ moŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Asha. A ni ndaŋ nchwīe khwachəɨ ŋgaʼo ndaoŋ vi khu, a kɨna ŋkugu ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ fúoŋ wuŋ ŋgaʼo ni yi khwɛ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni njəɨ Jishɔ nɛ. Nɔ ŋkugu, a shi ki lɔ nchaʼa nu Nda Minnwi lɨʼɨ ghaʼo Minnwi moŋ jī ŋkhǐ pugu pa luoŋ nu, ni tuʼu pugu pa naoŋchɨ.

Ndunu miŋgwɛ ŋkugu chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Ana, ni mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, mbɔ muuŋ Fanue, llɔ moŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Asha. A ni ndaŋ nchwīe khwachəɨ ŋgaʼo ndaoŋ vi khu, a kɨna ŋkugu ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ fúoŋ wuŋ ŋgaʼo ni yi khwɛ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni njəɨ Jishɔ nɛ. Nɔ ŋkugu, a shi ki lɔ nchaʼa nu Nda Minnwi lɨʼɨ ghaʼo Minnwi moŋ jī ŋkhǐ pugu pa luoŋ nu, ni tuʼu pugu pa naoŋchɨ.

Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, a chənə mbara yəɨ Joshɛ pugu Meri, nthɔ ntōo Minnwi, ndɔ nthɔ nchhu pa nnu nthɛ muuŋ ghɔ ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchhɔ njwɛrɛ nu ŋa Minnwi taoŋ njaʼandiʼi ŋa a thɔ ŋkwe Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ.
Joshɛ pugu Meri ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ Taathɔ chhu nɛ, mbɨnɨ laʼa pugu Nasharɛ moŋ Galili.
Muuŋ ghɔ ni ŋkuʼɔ ntɨnɨ, ndɨnaoŋ ni shiethɔ, mbhɔ Minnwi pɔ nu mbɨŋ yu.
Sheshe ŋgaʼo pa tǎa Jishɔ ghà ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ nnu jɨ Lli Njiʼa.
Jishɔ ni ŋga mbɔ paanchrɔ ŋgaʼo, pugu kuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ yugu chhu nɛ lɨʼɨ jɨ Lli Njiʼa.
Jɨ ghɔ gha ndugwi ti pugu chhɔ mbɨnɨ nu, Jishɔ kɨna njiŋ Jerushalɛiŋ ki pugu lɔ nji.
Pugu ni mbīʼi ŋa a pɔ shɨna pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɨnɨ nu nɛ, nyīeŋ nɔ taʼa llɛmbhi njɛ̄ tāʼa nu vi shɨna ndaaŋoŋ yugu pugu pa shuoŋ pugu.
Pugu ni ŋga mieŋ ki yəɨ vi, mbɨnɨ kiʼɛ Jerushalɛiŋ nchhɔ ntāʼa vi.
Ŋga ntāʼa vi nɔ trɛi llɛ́, ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ vi Nda Minnwi, a chhɔ shɨna pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa nthɔ njwɛrɛ nnu haʼaŋ pugu chhu nu nɛ, ndɔ mbie vugu ni pa píe.
Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni njaʼo vi nɛ ni ŋgrāo fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ji nnu nɛ pugu pa khwɛ̀ ŋa a ni mfɛ nu nɛ.
Pa tǎa pi ni ŋga njəɨ vi, nja ŋgrāo. Mǔuŋ vi chhu ŋa, “Muuŋ vei, ɔ kie nɛiŋ mfāʼa mbɨŋ pigi nɛiŋ? Līi njəɨ, pigi tǎa ghɔ nì nthɔ ntāʼa ghɔ ni shǐgi.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ nì nthɔ ntāʼa a ŋa? Pəɨ shi ki lɔ nji ŋa m̀fāʼo nɔ pɔ nu nda Tǎa a?”
Ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ nji njiŋ chrà ghɔ ŋa a ni nchhu nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ pugu pa Jishɔ pɨ̄nɨ Nasharɛ a ya njaʼo nchò yugu. Mǔuŋ vi lə̄ɨŋ ŋguoŋ nnu pei ghao njùʼɔ yu.
Jishɔ ni ŋkuʼɔ nu ŋgū mmɛŋoŋ moŋ shiethɔ pugu pa fɨʼɨ noŋ yi. Minnwi pugu pa ŋgwamishua piŋ vi mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ.

Ndɨɨ ŋa Tiberu Kaisha ni ŋkwo pɔ fùoŋ Roma nɔ tiɛŋnchrɔ ŋgaʼo nɛ, Pontiu Pailɛ thɔ shaʼa krao Roma ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Judia nɛ, Hɛrɔ ni nthɔ shaʼa yichəɨ krao, mbɔ Galili. Ndǐŋ vi, mbɔ Fili, ni nthɔ shaʼa yichəɨ krao, pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Iturea pugu Trakoniti, Lishania ni nshaʼa ji pi Abilɛnɛ.
Ndɨɨ ghɔ, Anaŋ pugu Kaifa ni mbɔ pa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi. Ndɨɨ ghɔ, chrà Minnwi ni nthɔ ni Jouŋ, muuŋ Shakaria moŋ ŋkǔnu njó.
A ghə̄ɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ ŋkɨŋ Jodaŋ nchhɔ nchīi nu ŋa, “Pəɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ, m̀fɛ ŋkhǐ ni pəɨ, Minnwi līʼɛ phɨ yəɨ.”
A ni ŋga nchhɔ nchhu yei, nthɔ nchwīe pi nnu ŋa Ishaya nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, mbɔ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Ishaya ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ chəɨ thɔ mfɛ gɛ̀ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó, nchhu nu ŋa,
‘Pīri shɛndaoŋ ni Taathɔ,
Chwīe pa lɨʼɨ tɔgɔ pi pɔ pi tithi.
Pi shi māʼaŋ ŋguoŋ wə́ɨŋ ghao
nshə̄rə ŋguoŋ puoŋ mi mbra pugu pa mɛmmɛ pi,
njuʼu ŋguoŋ ndaoŋ təɨtəɨ,
Ndwēe ŋguoŋ ndaoŋ chəɨŋchəɨŋ.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa shi njəɨ ŋa Minnwi ghà ŋkwe ŋgwa moŋ phɨ pugu.’ ”
Yú ŋgwa taoŋ nthɔ ŋa a fɛ ŋkhǐ ni pugu. A chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pa Mbhɛ mitwɛʼi! A shūu gɔ̌ tə́nə yəɨ ŋa pəɨ tei pɨgɨtua Minnwi ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ?
Pəɨ chwīe pa nnu pɛ ŋa a kāʼo nɛ, nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa pəɨ kwri, ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nyīeŋ nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Abrahaŋ tǎa vigi.’ Ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa mimfɛ Minnwi pɨʼɨ ŋgùʼɔ pei nchwīe puoŋ nɔ ghɔ mfɛ ni Abrahaŋ.
Pi kwo pīri njiɛŋ nɔ kəʼɨ nu thɨ nɔ ghɔ, llɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋǐeŋ yi, nthɛ yie ghɔ, sheshe thɨ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi njuŋ ntíɛŋ shiʼi nɛ, pi shi ŋkəʼɨ māʼaŋ moŋ móŋoŋ.”
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ pie vi ŋa, “Ti pigi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo paa ndhwí fɨgəɨ nɛ fɛ taʼa yi ni ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɛ, ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo maoŋ jɨ nɛ, fɛ yi pichəɨ ŋgwa.”
Pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi thɔ ŋkaa pugu ŋa a fɛ ŋkhǐ ni pugu, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, pigi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ?”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkwe mbɨŋ taashi a tɔgɔ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a kāʼo ŋa pəɨ kwe nɛ.”
Pichəɨ shoogɛ pie vi ŋa, “Ti pigi nɛ?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, “Kiʼi pəɨ kwe mbɨŋ ŋoŋ ni nchei. Kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ thɔ ŋgwa nɔ fāʼo nu mbɨŋ. Pəɨ yru ni fɨʼɨ yaoŋ ŋa pi ghà mbe vəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ.”
Pa ŋgwa ni nchhɔ njwɛrɛ nu ndɔ mbīʼi thɔ yugu ŋa kəʼɨchəɨ a pɔ nɛnnɛ a pɔ Jouŋ mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.
Jouŋ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, “Ŋ̀guʼɔ mfɛ pi ŋkhǐ ni pəɨ, ndɔ yichəɨ ŋoŋ thɔ nu ŋa a chaa a, ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ fēi nu ŋkɨ̌ɨ tra yi, a shi ŋkwe vəɨ ni ŋkhǐ moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi, pugu pa móŋoŋ.
A tuo yaoŋ fɨgəɨ reshi mbhɔ yu, mfɨgəɨ mfuʼu ŋkiɛŋ reshi moŋ ŋkuʼu maoŋ nūʼɔŋ shaoŋ yu, ntūoŋ ŋkuʼu maoŋ ghɔ moŋ móŋoŋ ki phɛ.”
Moŋ ntou puoŋ shɛndaoŋ, Jouŋ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ nchhu pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pugu, ŋkaa nu ŋa pugu piŋ.
Jouŋ ni mbɨ̄ga Hɛrɔ, mbɔ fùoŋ Galili, ŋa a wugwɛi Herodia ŋgwɛ ndǐŋ vi pugu pa pichəɨ nnu pɨphɨ nduoŋ ŋa ju Hɛrɔ ni ŋkwo chwīe nɛ.
Hɛrɔ pɨnɨ mbīgi phɨ yi nɔ fɨ̄nɨ nu Jouŋ.
Ŋkaoŋ Jouŋ maa ŋgə̄ɨ chə́ɨŋ, ndɨɨ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ni ŋkwo kwe ŋkhǐ nɛ, Jishɔ kwe ŋkaa yu, ŋga nchhɔ nduoŋ Minnwi, po ŋaʼaŋ,
Jijwɛ Minnwi shwiʼi mbɨŋ yu mbɔ nɔ mintuʼɔlibuŋ, ŋggì taoŋ po, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋkiɛŋ muuŋ ŋa ŋ̀khwā, m̀fāʼo pwatua nthɛ ghɔ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga njɛ̄ fàʼa yi, mbɔ trɛi wuŋ ŋgaʼo.
Ŋgwa ni mbiʼi ŋa a muuŋ Joshɛ, ŋa a ni mbɔ muuŋ Heli,
mbɔ muuŋ Matate, mbɔ muuŋ Levi, mbɔ muuŋ Mɛlɛki, mbɔ muuŋ Janai, mbɔ muuŋ Joshɛ,
mbɔ muuŋ Matatia, mbɔ muuŋ Amo, mbɔ muuŋ Nahuŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Eshu, mbɔ muuŋ Nagai,
mbɔ muuŋ Maa, mbɔ muuŋ Matatia, mbɔ muuŋ Shɛmɛiŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Joshɛke, mbɔ muuŋ Joda,
mbɔ muuŋ Joanaŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Resha, mbɔ muuŋ Shɛrubabɛ, mbɔ muuŋ Shɛatie, mbɔ muuŋ Neri,
mbɔ muuŋ Mɛlɛki, mbɔ muuŋ Adi, mbɔ muuŋ Koshaŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Elemadaŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Erɛ,
mbɔ muuŋ Joshua, mbɔ muuŋ Eliɛja, mbɔ muuŋ Joriŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Matate, mbɔ muuŋ Levi,
mbɔ muuŋ Shimioŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Juda, mbɔ muuŋ Joshɛ, mbɔ muuŋ Jonaŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Eliakiŋ,
mbɔ muuŋ Melea, mbɔ muuŋ Mɛna, mbɔ muuŋ Matata, mbɔ muuŋ Nataŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Devi,
mbɔ muuŋ Jeshe, mbɔ muuŋ Obɛ, mbɔ muuŋ Boa, mbɔ muuŋ Shamoŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Nashoŋ,
mbɔ muuŋ Aminada, mbɔ muuŋ Adamiŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Ani, mbɔ muuŋ Hɛshroŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Pɛrɛ, mbɔ muuŋ Juda,
mbɔ muuŋ Jakɔ, mbɔ muuŋ Aiji, mbɔ muuŋ Abrahaŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Tera, mbɔ muuŋ Nahɔ,
mbɔ muuŋ Shɛru, mbɔ muuŋ Ruu, mbɔ muuŋ Pɛlɛ, mbɔ muuŋ Eba, mbɔ muuŋ Shela,
mbɔ muuŋ Kainaŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Arafaka, mbɔ muuŋ Shɛiŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Noa, mbɔ muuŋ Lame,
mbɔ muuŋ Metushela, mbɔ muuŋ Enoke, mbɔ muuŋ Jarɛ, mbɔ muuŋ Mahalale, mbɔ muuŋ Kainaŋ,
mbɔ muuŋ Ɛnoshe, mbɔ muuŋ Shhɛnte, mbɔ muuŋ Adaŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Minnwi.
Jishɔ ni ndhɔ Jodaŋ ndɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi. Jijwɛ ghɔ lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó.
Shata mōoŋ vi fɔ nɔ khwɛ wuŋ llɛmbhi. Moŋ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ, a shini ndɔ njɨ sheshe yaoŋ, nɛnnɛ njì ni njia vi ndɨɨ ŋa yie ndɨɨ ni mmɛ nɛ.
Devɨ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ̈ mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi, ɔ chhu ŋgùʼɔ yei kara ŋgū brɛi.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa, ‘Ŋoŋmishua shiʼa ŋguʼɔ njru pi ŋkuoŋ brɛi təʼɨ vi.’ ”
Devɨ lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋkuʼɔ nɔ tɔthɨ nōoŋ ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi ghɔ taʼa ŋgɛ́ ŋa ŋməɨŋ!
Nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ǹshi mfɛ njɨ vɛ nɔ shaʼa nu ŋguoŋ taoŋ, fàʼo yugu pɔ jɔ ti ɔ̈ ŋgaʼo a, m̀fɛ vɛ, nthɛ ŋa pi kwo fɛ vəɨ, ti m̈i ŋkhwā m̀fɛ ni shesheŋoŋ ŋa ŋ̀khwā nɛ.”
Nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ǹshi mfɛ njɨ vɛ nɔ shaʼa nu ŋguoŋ taoŋ, fàʼo yugu pɔ jɔ ti ɔ̈ ŋgaʼo a, m̀fɛ vɛ, nthɛ ŋa pi kwo fɛ vəɨ, ti m̈i ŋkhwā m̀fɛ ni shesheŋoŋ ŋa ŋ̀khwā nɛ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa, ‘Ghaʼo Taathɔ mbɔ Minnwi yɔ, ŋguʼɔ mfāʼa pi mbhɔ yu təʼɨ vi.’ ”
Shata lɔ̄gɔ vi kəʼɨ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ pugu yu Jerushalɛiŋ, ntigi vi ŋkuoŋ nchwɛrɛ Nda Minnwi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ̈ mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi, ɔ thi hɛiŋ ndhi nchəɨŋ shhɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa,
‘Minnwi shi mfɛ gɨ́ ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi nthɛ ghɔ nɔ kɛ̄ʼi nu ghɔ.’
Mbɨnɨ nāʼaŋ ŋa, ‘Pugu shi njā ghɔ tɔthɨ ni mbhɔ,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ɔ chhwi kwò yɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋgùʼɔ.’ ”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa, ‘Kiʼi ma njwɛʼi Taathɔ mbɔ Minnwi yɔ.’ ”
Ndɨɨ ŋa devɨ ni mīʼɛŋ mōoŋ nu Jishɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ shɛndaoŋ nɛ, a mieŋ vi, nchēi shɨna nduoŋ.
Jishɔ pɨ̄nɨ Galili moŋ ghrɨ́ Jijwɛ Minnwi. Pa chrà nɔ ligi yi nyīeŋ ŋkwe ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghɔ ghao.
A yɛʼi nu moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi. Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghaʼo vi ghao.
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ Nasharɛ, mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni ŋkuʼɔ nɛ. A gha mbɔ Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu, a ghə̄ɨ nda luoŋ Minnwi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ghà mbīgi nchwīe nɛ. Ndɔllɔ ntithi tɔthɨ lɨʼɨ mɛ̄iŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi.
Pi ni mfɛ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, mbɔ Ishaya, ni nāʼaŋ nɛ. A ŋaʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ, njəɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi ni nāʼaŋ fɔ ŋa,
“Jijwɛ Taathɔ pɔ mbɨŋ mu,
nthɛ ŋa, a chuʼɔ a ŋa ǹchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni ghaŋ pou.
A taoŋ a ŋa ǹchīi lūgu nu ni ghaŋ chə́ɨŋ,
ŋa pa nchriligi shi njəɨ lɨʼɨ,
nchwīe ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi fɛ vugu ni ŋgəʼɨ nɛ lūgu,
ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchīi ŋa, ndɨɨ thɔ ŋa Taathɔ shi ŋkwe ŋgwa pi.”
Jishɔ gha mīʼɛŋ, ŋkra ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ, mfɛ ni muuŋ fàʼa moŋ nda ghɔ, nchɔchhɔ shhɛ, ligi ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nda luoŋ Minnwi chu mbɨŋ yu.
A jɛ̄ nthɔ nchhu nu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shiʼa, chrà Minnwi yei lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ligi pəɨ!”
Ŋgwa ni nchrā nnu shiʼi nthɛ vi. Pugu ghrāo pa ŋkwaŋ chrà shiʼi ŋa a ni ntaoŋ nu nchò yu nɛ, mbie nu ŋa, “Yei shi lɔ mbɔ muuŋ Joshɛ?”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ndɔ njiʼi mfāʼo khuthɔ ŋa pəɨ shi nchhu yei luʼɔ chrà vəɨ ŋa, ‘Ŋgaŋ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ, ghɛ̄rɛ noŋ yɔ pia. Ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa pigi yaʼo ŋa ɔ chwīe Kapanuŋ nɛ, pɨnɨ nɛ nuʼuŋ nchwīe hɛiŋ shhɛ laʼa pəɨ.’ ”
Jishɔ pigi ŋa,
“Shishini, pi shiʼa ma mbiŋ sheshe njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi laʼa pugu.
“Ndɔ, moŋ nnu shini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa ntou pa ŋkugu ni mbɔ Ishrae moŋ ndɨɨ Elaija, ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni mfɨ̄nɨ po nɔ trɛi ŋgaʼo ni ntɨgao nàoŋ, ndɨɨ ŋa ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ njì ni ŋgū moŋ ŋguoŋ laʼa ghao.
Ndɔ paʼa Minnwi lɔ njiʼi ntaoŋ Elaija ni kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu, ŋkiɛŋ miŋgwɛ ŋkugu chəɨ Sharafa moŋ laʼataoŋ Shidoŋ.
Ntou pa ghaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ ni mbɔ Ishrae moŋ ndɨɨ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi Elaisha, ndɔ paʼa Minnwi lɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ kaŋ taʼa yi, ŋkiɛŋ Nemaŋ mbɔ ŋoŋ Shiria.”
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ni ŋga njaʼo yei, ndɨnaoŋ ni pɨgɨtua,
njrɛi shhɛ nshūu vi ntaoŋ nɔ moŋ laʼa, ŋkuʼɔ ni ju thɔ nchwɛrɛ mbra ghɔ ŋa pugu ni ŋkrao laʼa muŋu fɔ nɛ, ntāʼa nu māʼaŋ vi moŋ wə́ɨŋ.
Ndɔ a shoo shɨna yú ŋgwa pighɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni vi.
Jishɔ shwiʼi Kapanuŋ, mbɔ yichəɨ laʼataoŋ Galili, nthɔ njɛʼi vugu Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu.
Pugu ni ŋgrāo ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni njɛʼi nu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ni njɛʼi ni ghrɨ́.
Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ghɔ, mfāʼo jijwɛ miŋwɛiŋ, a ni mbaʼo ŋgòu ni njɨ ŋa,
“Yo! Pia fāʼo pi khɔ, Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ? Ɔ thɔ pi nɔ pɨrɨ nu vigi? Ǹji ŋoŋ ŋa ɔ yie nɛ, ɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.”
Jishɔ pɨ̄ga vi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Lɛrɛ laŋ ndɔ ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu!”
Miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ gha māʼaŋ vi shhɛ shɨna pugu, ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu kiʼɛ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ndəɨŋ vi.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pighɔ ghrāo nchhu ŋa, “Yei pɔ pi yəɨ ŋkwaŋ chrà nɛiŋ? A fɛ gɨ́ ni pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ ni ghrɨ́ pugu pa njɨ pugu taoŋ!”
Pi fɨ̄ʼɨ pa nnu nthɛ vi njīŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgei laʼataoŋ ghɔ ghao.
Jishɔ taoŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ laʼa Shemu. Ndɨɨ ghɔ, mǔuŋ ŋgwɛ Shemu thɔ ŋgɨ̄nɔ shɨ̀gao ndiɛŋ, pugu shwei Jishɔ nɔ ghɔ.
A ghə̄ɨ ntithi yəɨ yu mbɨ̄ga shɨ̀gao ghɔ, a taoŋ mbɨŋ yu. Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ a lɔllɔ, nchwīe maoŋ, mfɛ ni pugu.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni fanaoŋ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo ŋgwa, pugu ghɨ̌nɔ ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ nɛ thɔ ni pugu, a nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ pugu njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu.
Pa miŋwɛiŋ taoŋ mbɨŋ pichəɨ ŋgwa, mbaʼo ŋgòu ŋa, “Ɔ Muuŋ Minnwi!” A pɨ̄ga vugu paʼa ndɔ njiʼi mieŋ ŋa pugu chrā, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nji ŋa a Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, Jishɔ taoŋ moŋ laʼa ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó, ŋgwa jɛ̄ nthɔ ntāʼa vi, ŋga njəɨ vi nthɔ ndɨʼɨ vi ŋa kiʼi a mieŋ vugu.
Ndɔ a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A pie ŋa ǹchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ nthɛ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi ni pichəɨ pa laʼataoŋ ŋkaa pugu, nthɛ ŋa a nnu ŋa Minnwi taoŋ a ŋa ǹthɔ nchwīe nɛ.”
A ni nthɔ nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghɔ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi Judia.
A ni mbɔ llɛ́ chəɨ, Jishɔ thi ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ chəɨ, pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Gɛnɛsharɛ, ŋgwa thɔ fra nu mbɨŋ yu nɔ yaʼo nu chrà Minnwi.
A yəɨ paa kikuoŋ a kaoŋ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ, ghaŋ ŋgunu pighɔ kwo taoŋ moŋ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nthɔ shɨ̄gao ndáŋ yugu.
Jishɔ nii moŋ taʼa kikuoŋ ghɔ, mbɔ yi Shemu, nchhu ghɔ ŋa a tūʼɔ a nii moŋ ŋkhǐ shɨgɛi. A chhɔ pi moŋ kikuoŋ ghɔ nthɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa.
Jishɔ gha mīʼɛŋ chrā nu, nchhu ni Shemu ŋa,
“Chhwi kikuoŋ a pɨnɨ nii lɨʼɨ shishhi. Pəɨ māʼaŋ ndáŋ yəɨ ŋkhǐ nɔ kwo nu shhu.”
Shemu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Masha, pigi kwo ya māʼaŋ ŋguoŋ tuʼu paʼa ndɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ, ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a chhu gɔ̀ nɛ, ǹshi māʼaŋ ndáŋ pighɔ ŋkhǐ.”
Pugu ni ŋga māʼaŋ ndáŋ yugu, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋkiɛŋ ntou shhu ti pa ndáŋ yugu jɛ̄ shāa nu.
Pugu krao pichəɨ pakwo ŋgunu pugu ŋa pugu thɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ vugu. Pugu thɔ mfuʼu shhu niʼiŋ moŋ paa kikuoŋ ghɔ, a lɨnaoŋ ti ntāʼa nu njīe.
Shemu Pita ni ŋga njəɨ yei nnu, ŋgū ni kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɨ Jishɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Lɔllɔ shhɨ a, ma Taathɔ, m̀bɔ pi ŋgaŋ nchwīe phɨ.”
Nduthɔ Shemu pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ nɛ ghrāo nthɛ fɨʼɨ ntou shhu ŋa pugu ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ nɛ.
Jɛiŋ pugu Jouŋ mbɔ puoŋ Shebedi ni ŋgrāo ŋkaa pugu, mbɔ pakwo ŋgunu Shemu.
Jishɔ chhu ni Shemu ŋa,
“Kiʼi nuʼuŋ mbɔgɔ, jɛ̄ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, ɔ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ pi ŋgwamishua.”
Pugu ni ŋga ntaoŋ ŋkaoŋ pa kikuoŋ yugu mbhi, mieŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao njōu njiŋ Jishɔ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga mbɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ chəɨ, ŋga njəɨ nu, ŋoŋ chəɨ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ kwo kru vi ti ŋgaʼa yəɨ vi, ŋgū ni puŋ yi shhɛ ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ̈ ŋkhwā, ɔ chwīe m̀bɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ.”
Jishɔ fɛ mbhɔ yi ŋkāoŋ vi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ǹtāʼa nu, pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ!”
Chomilaoŋ ghɔ, ghɨnɔmbaluŋ mmɛ mbɨŋ yu.
Jishɔ fɛ gɨ́ ghɔ ŋa,
“Kiʼi nshwei ŋoŋ, ndɔ ghə̄ɨ nōoŋ noŋ yɔ ni ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi a līi ghɔ nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa Minnwi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ, ndɔ mfɛ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ Mushi chhu nɛ.”
Ndɔ pa pishaʼakhɔ nthɛ vi ka mīʼɛŋ nyieŋnyieŋ mbīgi moŋ ntou lɨʼɨ, ntou yú ŋgwa kɨrɨ nɔ yaʼo nu pa nnu llɔ mbhɔ yu, a lɔ mbɨnɨ njɨ̄gɨ pa ghɨ̌nɔ yugu.
Ndɔ a thɔ mfuʼu noŋ yi, ŋgə̄ɨ nu lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋoŋ shi ki lɔ mbɔ nɛ, nthɔ nduoŋ Minnwi.

Llɛ́ chəɨ ni ŋga mbɔ Jishɔ thɔ njɛʼi nu nɛ, pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ chhɔ yəɨ yu. Pugu ni ndhɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ Galili, ni Judia, ni Jerushalɛiŋ. Ghrɨ́ Taathɔ ni mbɔ mbɨŋ Jishɔ nɔ yɨ̄gɨ nu ghɨ̌nɔ.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pichəɨ pa ŋgwa tiɛŋ ŋkwíni ŋkuoŋ kúoŋ nthɔ nu nɔ ghɔ, mbaʼo nɔ nii nu ni ju nda, nūʼɔŋ vi shhɨ Jishɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa ni njiɛŋ ni njɨ nɛ, paʼa pugu lɔ mfāʼo shɛndaoŋ nɔ nii nu ni ju. Nɛnnɛ pugu tiɛŋ vi ŋkuʼɔ nɔ thɔnda, ŋaʼaŋ mbo fɔ, nshwiʼi vi ŋkuoŋ kúoŋ ghɔ tri kɨrɨ shhɨ Jishɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni njəɨ fɨʼɨ piŋ ŋa pugu fāʼo nɛ, a chhu ni ŋkwíni ghɔ ŋa,
“Taannu a, pi līʼɛ pa phɨ pɔ.”
Pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi jɛ̄ nchhu nu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Yei pɔ pi gɔ̌ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ noŋ yi nɔ lɨʼɨ Minnwi? Mimfɛ a līʼɛ gɔ̌ ndīʼɛ phɨ ŋkiɛŋ Minnwi təʼɨ vi?”
Jishɔ ni nji nnu ŋa pugu ni mbīʼi nu nɛ mbie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ kie nɛiŋ nthɔ mbīʼi ŋkwaŋ nnu pei nɛiŋ?
A yīʼɛ yəɨ, chhu nu ŋa, ‘Ǹdīʼɛ phɨ yɔ’, ki chhu nu ŋa, ‘Lɔllɔ nyieŋ’?
Yei pɔ nɔ chwīe nu ŋa pəɨ ji ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ līʼɛ nu pa phɨ.”
A chhu ni ŋkwíni ghɔ ŋa,
“Ǹchhu vɛ ŋa lɔllɔ, lɔ̄gɔ kúoŋ yɔ ŋgə̄ɨ laʼa.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, a lɔllɔ ligi pugu, ndɔ̄gɔ yaoŋ ŋa a ni nūaŋ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ laʼa nchhɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi.
Ŋguoŋ yugu ni ŋgrāo, wiwini wɛ̄iŋ vugu, pugu ghaʼo Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Pigi yəɨ ŋkiɛŋ nnu ghraoghrao shiʼa!”
Ŋguoŋ nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ taoŋ mbhi njəɨ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ taashi chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Levi, a chhɔ moŋ ntǎa kwe taashi, Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Thɔ njōu njiŋ a.”
A mieŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao, ndɔllɔ njōu njiŋ yi.
Levi pīri mmɛ jɨ nda yu nɔ ghaʼo nu Jishɔ. Ntou pa ŋgwɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa ŋgwa nduoŋ ni nthɔ jɨ ghɔ ŋkaa pugu.
Pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi luo nu ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “A chwīe khɔ pəɨ jɨ yaoŋ ndɔ nnu nu pəɨ pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ shishiʼi nɛ lɔ mfāʼo chà ŋgaŋ fhɔ̌, a fāʼo ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ghɨ̌nɔ nu nɛ.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ pi nɔ gɛ̄ nu ŋgwa ndɨndɨ, ǹthɔ nthɛ pi ghaŋ phɨ, ŋa pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ.”
Pa thishɨ Nda Minnwi pie vi ŋa, “Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jouŋ ghà njiɛŋ njī ŋkhǐ nduoŋ Minnwi, ghaŋ younjiŋ pa ŋgwa Farashi wuʼɔ nchwīe pi nɛnnɛ. Ti a chwīe khɔ pa jɔ jɨ maoŋ ndɔ nnu nu?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Mimfɛ ɔ lāa maoŋ jɨ ni ghaŋ gɛ̀ lɨʼɨ láŋ ndɨɨ ŋa mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ pugu pugu nɛ?
Llɛ́ shi nthɔ ŋa pi shi mfuʼu mimbia láŋ ghɔ moŋ shɨna pugu, nɛnnɛ, pugu shi njī ŋkhǐ moŋ llɛ́ pighɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu luʼɔ chrà yei ni pugu,
“Mbaʼa ŋoŋ shāa ndhwí fhi nchri paʼo ŋkuoŋ ndunu ndhwí nɔ ghɔ. Ä nchwīe nɛnnɛ, kaŋ a pɨrɨ ndhwí fhi ghɔ ndɔ mbaʼa pra ndhwí fhi ghɔ yiʼi nyīeŋ ŋkāʼo pugu yi ndunu.

A wuʼɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ ni mikei ŋgrào nɛ. Mbaʼa ŋoŋ niʼiŋ laʼo fhi moŋ ndunu mikei ŋgrào. Ä nchwīe nɛnnɛ làʼo fhi ghɔ fāʼo ntūgu mikei ghɔ nthɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa a lɔ nuʼuŋ shwīi mbīgi, kaŋ làʼo ghɔ shi ŋkwrī, mikei ŋgrào ghɔ pɨrɨ gha.
A lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nnɛ. Pəɨ wuʼɔ fāʼo nɔ niʼiŋ nu làʼo fhi moŋ mikei ŋgrào fhi.
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ ŋa a ghà ŋga ŋkwo nnu ndunu làʼo mbɨnɨ ntāʼa làʼo fhi. Nthɛ ŋa a shi nchhu ŋa a pwa ndunu làʼo.”
