A ni mbɔ Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu chəɨ, Jishɔ nyīeŋ ntɔgɔ nu moŋ nyìeŋ shíe gɛ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ka shíe gɛ, nchiʼi ŋkrù nu.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi pie ŋa, “A kie pi nɛiŋ pəɨ thɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa gɨ́ lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ ŋa pi chwīe Llɛ́ Ji nɛ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ naa mɛ̄iŋ nnu ŋa Devi ni nchwīe ndɨɨ ŋa njì ni njia vugu pa ŋgwa pi nɛ?
A ni nii Nda Minnwi, ndɔ̄gɔ brɛi ŋa pi ni mfɛ ni Minnwi ŋkru ndɔ mbɨnɨ fɛ ni ŋgwa pi, mbɔ nnu ŋa gɨ́ shini ndɔ mbiŋ ŋa minthɛ shesheŋoŋ kru, ŋkiɛŋ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi.”
Jishɔ lūgwi nchhu ŋa,
“Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua taathɔ Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu.”
A ni mbɔ yichəɨ Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu, Jishɔ nii nda luoŋ Minnwi njɛʼi nu. Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ pɔ yi kwikwi.
Ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi ni nthɔ ntāʼa shɨna nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu Jishɔ ŋa a chwīe nnu ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɛ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pugu pɛʼi vi, njəɨ ŋa a shi njwiŋ mbhɔ ŋoŋ ghɔ Llɛ́ Ji.
Ndɔ a ni nji nnu ŋa pugu ni mbīʼi nu nɛ, nchhu ni ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa mbhɔ yi ni kwikwi nɛ ŋa,
“Lɔllɔ ntithi shhɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.”
A lɔllɔ ntithi.
Jishɔ pɨnɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Mfāʼo píe yei ni pəɨ. Gɨ́ piŋ ŋa pi chwīe pi yəɨ Llɛ́ Ji, nnu shiʼi ki nnu pɨphɨ? Kwe nu ŋoŋ ki jwi nu mi?”
Jishɔ kara noŋ yi mbɛʼi ŋguoŋ yugu ghao, nchhu ni ŋgaŋ ŋɨnɛiŋ mbhɔ ghɔ ŋa,
“Shwīi mbhɔ yɔ.”
A shwīi, mbhɔ yi kiʼi ndɔ mbɔ pi shiʼi.
Túa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pighɔ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi pɨgɨ ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi, pugu jɛ̄ nthɔ ŋkri nnu ŋa mimfɛ pi chwīe mbɨŋ Jishɔ nɛ.
Moŋ llɛ́ pighɔ, Jishɔ taoŋ ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra lɨʼɨ luoŋ Minnwi. Ŋkɨna fɔ nduoŋ Minnwi ŋguoŋ tuʼu ghao.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, a gɛ̄ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, ntɛrɛ paanchrɔ shɨna pugu, mɛ̄iŋ vugu ni ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi;
Shemu, ŋa a ni nchhɔ̄ ligi yi ni Pita, ni Andru ndǐŋ vi, ni Jɛiŋ, pugu Jouŋ, ni Fili, ni Batolomiu,
ni Matio, pugu Toma, ni Jɛiŋ mbɔ muuŋ Afioshi, ni Shemu ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni kwìni laʼa nɛ,
ni Judashi, mbɔ muuŋ Jɛiŋ, ni Judashi Ishikario ŋa a ni mfīni vi nɛ.
Jishɔ shwiʼi pugu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi moŋ pɨprəɨ pugu pa ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yú ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pugu pa ntou ŋgwa llɔ Judia ni Jerushalɛiŋ, ni ŋgwa llɔ ŋkɨŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ Tairɛ pugu Shidoŋ.
Pugu ni nthɔ lɨʼɨ yaʼo pa nnu mbhɔ yu, a lɔ mbɨnɨ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu. Ŋgwa ŋa jijwɛ miŋwɛiŋ ni ŋgana vugu nɛ ni nthɔ ŋkaa pugu a kwe vugu.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pighɔ ni mbaʼo nu nɔ kāoŋ nu vi nthɛ ŋa njɨ ni ntaoŋ nu mbɨŋ yu nthɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu ghao.
A kə̄rə ligi yi mbɛʼi ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Mbɔrɔ yəɨ mbɔ ghaŋ pou,
nthɛ ŋa shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi shi mbɔ yəɨ.
Mbɔrɔ yəɨ ŋa njì yia vəɨ ndwɛ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɛ njru.
Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ kə̄ɨ nu nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɛ ŋgwɛ̄.
Mbɔrɔ yəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa pɨ̄na vəɨ, mfuʼu vəɨ shɨna pugu ndɔ ŋgwɛʼi vəɨ,
ndɔ mɛ̄iŋ ligi yəɨ ŋa pəɨ ŋgwa pɨphɨ nthɛ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua.
“Pəɨ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ ndɔ ndhi ni pwatua nnɛ nthɛ ŋa kɨ̀nɛiŋ yəɨ yiɛŋ po. A wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pa tǎa pugu ni nchwīe ni pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nɛ.
“Ndɔ ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ ghaŋ fàʼo nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ kwo fāʼo yəɨ nchhɔ́ shiʼi.
Ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ yru ndwɛ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa njì lɛ njia vəɨ,
Ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ gwɛ̄ nu ndwɛ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɛ ŋkə̄ɨ ndɔ njūa.
Ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa piŋ vəɨ piŋ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa a wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pa tǎa pugu ni mbiŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ mifɨɨ nɛ.
“Ndɔ ni gɔ̀ ŋa ɔ yaʼo nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ, khwā mbɨ̄na yɔ, nchwīe shiʼi mbɨŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɨ̄na ghɔ nɛ.
Luoŋ mbɔrɔ mbhɔ Minnwi mfɛ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chɔ̄nɔ ghɔ nɛ, nduoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ni ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu fɛ ŋgəʼɨ vɛ nɛ.
Ŋ̈oŋ ŋgwie ghɔ nɔ ghə̀ʼɨ yɔ, ɔ nōoŋ ŋgei nduoŋ ghɔ a pɨnɨ ŋgwie, ŋ̈oŋ nshiri mmɛ ndhwí fɨgəɨ yɔ ŋkwe, ɔ mieŋ fɔ a kwe muuŋ ndhwí yɔ ŋkaa yu.
Ŋ̈oŋ nduoŋ yaoŋ mbhɔ ghɔ, ɔ fɛ ghɔ, ti ŋ̈oŋ nshiri yaoŋ yɔ ŋkwe, ɔ mieŋ ghɔ.
Chwīe mbɨŋ ŋgwa nduoŋ nnu haʼaŋ ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa pugu chwīe mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ.
“Ä mbɔ ŋa ɔ wuʼɔ ŋkhwā pi ŋgwa ŋa pugu khwā ghɔ nɛ, ɔ fāʼo mbɔrɔ kiʼɛ nthɛ pi khɔ? Nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi pa ghaŋ phɨ ghà ŋkhwā pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khwā vugu nɛ.
Ä mbɔ ŋa ɔ wuʼɔ nchwīe shiʼi pi mbɨŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu chwīe shiʼi mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ, ɔ fāʼo mbɔrɔ kiʼɛ nthɛ pi khɔ? Njiʼi nthɛ ghaŋ nchwīe phɨ ghà ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi nɛnnɛ.
Ɔ̈ ŋguʼɔ fōo yaoŋ pi ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu shi mbɨnɨ nduʼu nɛ, ɔ fāʼo mbɔrɔ nthɛ pi khɔ? Njiʼi nthɛ ghaŋ chwīe phɨ ghà mfōo pichəɨ ghaŋ chwīe phɨ ni yaoŋ, nji nu ŋa pugu lɛ nduʼu.

“Ndɔ khwā ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɨ̄na ghɔ nɛ, nchwīe shiʼi mbɨŋ pugu, mfōo ŋoŋ ni yaoŋ ki lɔ njwɛrɛ nu ŋa a pɨnɨ nduʼu, nnɛ kaŋ kɨ̀nɛiŋ yɔ shi njiɛŋ, a lɔ nōoŋ ŋa ɔ muuŋ Minnwi ŋa a Chaapifuoŋ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ghà nōoŋ pwapuŋ ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ nji shiʼi nɛ pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ.
Fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi Tǎa ghɔ fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ nɛ.
“Kiʼi nshaʼa ŋgwa nduoŋ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pi shaʼa ghɔ. Kiʼi ntuo ŋoŋ nɔ ŋgushaʼa, kaŋ mbaʼa ŋoŋ tuo ghɔ nɔ ŋgushaʼa. Līʼɛ phɨ ŋgwa, kaŋ pi shi ndīʼɛ jɔ.

Fɛ yaoŋ ni ŋgwa nduoŋ, kaŋ pi shi mbɨnɨ mfɛ jɔ. Yaoŋ ŋa ɔ fɛ nɛ shi mbɨnɨ mbɨnɨ mbhɔ ghɔ pi niʼiŋ ti mfrɛ̄i, nchɨʼɨ ŋa a lɨnaoŋ ti ŋkwrī. Yaoŋ ŋa ɔ fɨ̄ʼɨ yaoŋ moŋ ghɔ mfɛ nɛ, ki a ghaʼo ki a kɨgəɨ, pi shi ŋguʼɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ pi moŋ ghɔ nduʼu vɛ.”
Jishɔ shwei luʼɔ chrà yei ni pugu:
“Mbaʼa nchriligi nōoŋ shɛndaoŋ ni yichəɨ nchriligi, ä nōoŋ, kaŋ ŋguoŋ vugu shi ŋgū moŋ tiɛŋ.
Mbaʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ ŋoŋ chaa masha vi, ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋoŋ mīʼɛŋ yɛʼi nu yaoŋ nɛ, a fhi Masha vi.
“A chwīe khɔ ɔ yəɨ muuŋ ŋkuʼu thɨ ŋa a pɔ ligi ndǐŋ ghɔ, ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo ndɨɨ ni mmɛ mbɨɨ ŋkwɛiŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ jɔ ligi nɛ?

Ki minthɛ ɔ kie nɛiŋ nchhu ni ndǐŋ ghɔ ŋa, ‘Ǹaʼaŋ mfuʼu ŋkuʼu thɨ ŋa a pɔ ligi ghɔ nɛ’, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ mmɛ mbɨɨ ŋkwɛiŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ jɔ ligi nɛ. Ŋgaŋ mifɨɨ yei, fǔoŋ mfuʼu mmɛ Kuo thɨ ŋa a pɔ ligi ghɔ nɛ, nnɛ kaŋ ɔ shi njəɨ lɨʼɨ shishiʼi nɔ fuʼu nu ŋkuʼu thɨ ŋa a pɔ ligi ndǐŋ ghɔ nɛ.
“Nthɛ ŋa thɨ shiʼi shiʼa njuŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ pɨphɨ, ndɔ paʼa thɨ pɨphɨ lɔ njuŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ shiʼi.
Pi ghà nji ŋkiɛŋ thɨ pi ŋkuoŋ ntíɛŋ yi. Pi shiʼa ndɨ̄ga ŋguuŋ laʼo shǐe, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋka chìa ŋkuoŋ mbiembie.
Ŋoŋ shiʼi ghà nchrā nnu shiʼi llɔ shɨna pa nnu shiʼi ŋa a lɨnaoŋ njùʼɔ yu nɛ, ŋoŋ pɨphɨ chrā nnu pɨphɨ llɔ shɨna pa nnu pɨphɨ ŋa a lɨnaoŋ njùʼɔ yu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa njùʼɔ ghà ŋga ndɨnaoŋ, nchò chrā.
“A chwīe khɔ ɔ thɔ mɛ̄iŋ a ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, Taathɔ,’ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa ǹchhu vɛ nɛ?

Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a thɔ njəɨ a njaʼo nchrā a nchwīe ndɔ haʼaŋ ǹchhu nɛ, ǹshi nshwei ghɔ ni ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ ŋa a fhi nɛ. A pɔ nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a gha nthɔ ŋkrao nda, nja ntou kwò yi a shhi, a nūʼɔŋ ŋkuoŋ ŋgùʼɔ. Nɨnəɨ gha mbɨ̄gəɨ, ŋkhǐ thɔ mbɨŋ nda ghɔ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nchɨʼɨ vi nthɛ ŋa pi ni nja ŋkrao vi shiʼi.

Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a thɔ njəɨ a njaʼo nchrā a nchwīe ndɔ haʼaŋ ǹchhu nɛ, ǹshi nshwei ghɔ ni ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ ŋa a fhi nɛ. A pɔ nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a gha nthɔ ŋkrao nda, nja ntou kwò yi a shhi, a nūʼɔŋ ŋkuoŋ ŋgùʼɔ. Nɨnəɨ gha mbɨ̄gəɨ, ŋkhǐ thɔ mbɨŋ nda ghɔ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nchɨʼɨ vi nthɛ ŋa pi ni nja ŋkrao vi shiʼi.
Ndɔ ti ŋoŋ ŋa a yaʼo chrà a ki lɔ nchwīe nɛ pɔ nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a krao nda shhɛ ndɔ ki lɔ nūʼɔŋ kwò yi, nɨnəɨ gha mbɨ̄gəɨ, ŋkhǐ thɔ mbɨŋ nda ghɔ, a gū wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ nwīʼiŋ ghao.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ chhu nu ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei ni ŋgwa pighɔ, ŋgə̄ɨ Kapanuŋ.
Nthishɨ taʼa ŋkɨɨ pa shoogɛ Roma ni mfāʼo muuŋ fàʼa vi ŋa a ni nja ŋkhwā vi. Muuŋ fàʼa vi ghɔ ni nja ŋgɨ̄nɔ nu ti mbiʼi shɨgɛi ŋkhu.
Ndɨɨ ŋa a ni njaʼo pa nnu nɔ ligi Jishɔ nɛ, a taoŋ pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu ghɔ ŋa a thɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ muuŋ fàʼa vi.
Pugu ni ŋga nthɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ ni Jishɔ, ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei kāʼo ŋoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa ɔ ghɛ̄rɛ vi,
nthɛ ŋa a khwā ŋgwa pia, ŋkrao ju nda luoŋ Minnwi yia.”
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ pugu pugu. A ni ŋga nthɔ ti mbara chonda, nthishɨ ghɔ taoŋ taannu pi ŋa pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, kiʼi ŋgwie noŋ yɔ, ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa mimfɛ ɔ nii nda a nɛ.

Ndɔ paʼa ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ thɔ nu njəɨ ghɔ nduthɔ a. Wuʼɔ fɛ pi gɨ́ noŋ muuŋ fàʼa a tɔgɔ. Nthɛ ŋa mmu nduthɔ a, ŋ̀ga mfāʼa mbhɔ ŋgwa, ndɔ nthɔ nshaʼa pa shoogɛ ŋkaa mu. Ŋ̀ga mfɛ gɨ́ ni yei ŋa, ‘Ghə̄ɨ!’ a ghə̄ɨ. Mfɛ gɨ́ ni vini ŋa, ‘Thɔ!’ a thɔ. Mfɛ gɨ́ ni muuŋ fàʼa a ŋa, ‘Chwīe yei!’ a chwīe.”

Ndɔ paʼa ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ thɔ nu njəɨ ghɔ nduthɔ a. Wuʼɔ fɛ pi gɨ́ noŋ muuŋ fàʼa a tɔgɔ. Nthɛ ŋa mmu nduthɔ a, ŋ̀ga mfāʼa mbhɔ ŋgwa, ndɔ nthɔ nshaʼa pa shoogɛ ŋkaa mu. Ŋ̀ga mfɛ gɨ́ ni yei ŋa, ‘Ghə̄ɨ!’ a ghə̄ɨ. Mfɛ gɨ́ ni vini ŋa, ‘Thɔ!’ a thɔ. Mfɛ gɨ́ ni muuŋ fàʼa a ŋa, ‘Chwīe yei!’ a chwīe.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, ŋgrāo, nchhu ni yú ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njōu njiŋ yi nɛ ŋa,
“Njiʼi nthɛ pi Ishrae ǹdɔ naa njəɨ ŋoŋ a fāʼo fɨʼɨ piŋ yei.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni ntaoŋ vugu ni mbɨnɨ nda nthishɨ pa shoogɛ ghɔ nɛ, pugu yəɨ muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ, ghɨ̌nɔ yi kwo tɔgɔ.
A gha ndara, Jishɔ lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ laʼataoŋ chəɨ pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Naiŋ. Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pugu pa mmɛ yú ŋgwa pɔ njiŋ yu.
A ni ŋga mbara nu choŋkaʼa laʼataoŋ ghɔ, ŋga njəɨ nu pi tiɛŋ khu ŋoŋ ntaoŋ nu nɔ, mbɔ fiɛŋ muuŋ mimbia mbhɔ mǔuŋ vi, ndɔ mbɔ miŋgwɛ ŋkugu. Yú ŋgwa, llɔ laʼataoŋ ghɔ, pɔ pugu pa miŋgwɛ ghɔ.
Taathɔ ni ŋga njəɨ miŋgwɛ ghɔ, mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ yu nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Kiʼi nuʼuŋ ŋkə̄ɨ,”
ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkaoŋ ŋkuŋkhu ghɔ, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntiɛŋ nɛ tithi. A chhu ŋa,
“Maʼaŋ mikhwa, ǹchhu vɛ ŋa, lɔllɔ.”
Ŋkukhu ghɔ lɔllɔ nchɔchhɔ njɛ̄ chrā nu, Jishɔ fɛ vi ni mǔuŋ vi.
Pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ yugu ghao, pugu ghaʼo Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Mmɛ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi chəɨŋ shɨna pia.” Mbɨnɨ nchhu ŋa, “Minnwi thɔ nɔ kwe nu ŋgwa pi.”
Pishaʼakhɔ yei nɔ ligi Jishɔ nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ Judia ghao pugu pa laʼataoŋ ŋkɨŋ Judia.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jouŋ ni ŋga shwei vi ni ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa Jishɔ ni nchwīe nɛ, a mɛ̄iŋ yi paa shɨna pugu
ntaoŋ vugu ni Taathɔ ŋa pugu pie vi ŋa, “A gɔ̀ mbɔ ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋa a shi nthɔ nɛ, ki pigi ywɛrɛ ŋoŋ nduoŋ?”
Paa ŋgwa pighɔ gha ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ Jishɔ, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ taoŋ vigi vɛ ŋa pigi pie ŋa ‘A gɔ̀ mbɔ ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋa a shi nthɔ nɛ, ki pigi ywɛrɛ ŋoŋ nduoŋ?’ ”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, Jishɔ yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ntou ŋgwa pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa jijwɛ pɨphɨ ni mbɔ mbɨŋ pugu nɛ, ŋaʼaŋ ligi pa nchriligi.
A khwɛ̄ ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jouŋ ŋa,

“Pəɨ pɨ̄nɨ shwei Jouŋ ni yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ yəɨ ndɔ njaʼo nɛ, pa nchriligi yəɨ lɨʼɨ, pa ŋkwíni nyīeŋ, ghaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ pɔ shiʼi, pa fhɨtənə yaʼo lɨʼɨ, pi pɨʼɨ pa ŋgwa khu moŋ gu, pi chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni ghaŋ pou.
Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ moŋ piŋ yugu nthɛ a nɛ.”
Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jouŋ ni ŋga ŋkwo ghə̄ɨ, Jishɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ nchrā nu ni yú ŋgwa pighɔ nthɛ Jouŋ,
“Pəɨ ni ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó njəɨ pi khɔ fɔ? Trǔ ŋa fɨfrəɨ chɨ̄ʼɨ nu? Ŋga!
Ti pəɨ ni ŋgə̄ɨ kiʼɛ njəɨ pi khɔ fɔ? Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni māʼaŋ ŋkiɛŋ ndhwí chɨgəɨ nchuoŋ? Ŋga! Līi njəɨ, ŋgwa ŋa pugu ghà māʼaŋ ŋkwaŋ ndhwí pighɔ nɛ ndɔ mbɔ moŋ nchhɔ shiʼi nɛ ghà mbɔ pi moŋ ntuʼɔ pa fùoŋ.
Shwei a nɛ, ti pəɨ ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu kiʼɛ njəɨ pi khɔ fɔ? Njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi? Ooŋ, ǹshwei vəɨ, ŋoŋ ŋa a chaa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Jouŋ ŋoŋ ŋa chrà Minnwi chrā nɔ ligi yi ŋa,
‘Līi njəɨ, ǹshi ntaoŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ a,
a ghə̄ɨ shhɨ pəɨ mbīri ndaoŋ ni pəɨ.’ ”
Jishɔ pɨnɨ mbīgi ŋa,
“Ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa Jouŋ ghaʼo nchaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa piŋgɛ kwo ma mbhi nɛ, ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a kɨgəɨ nchaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi nɛ ghaʼo nchaa Jouŋ.”
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pugu pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, mbiŋ ŋa nnu ŋa Minnwi chwīe nɛ yi ndɨndɨ, mbɔ ŋgwa ŋa Jouŋ ni mfɛ ŋkhǐ ni pugu nɛ.
Ndɔ pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ lāa nnu ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa nthɛ vugu nɛ, nnɛ ki lɔ ntɔgɔ moŋ kwe ŋkhǐ Jouŋ.
Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Mi nthɛ m̀āʼaŋ fɨʼɨ ŋgwa mbhi shiʼa pi ni khɔ? Pugu fhi pi khɔ?
Pugu pɔ nɔ pa mikəʼɨ ŋa pugu chhɔ taŋ, taʼa kwíe chhu nu ni vichəɨ ŋa, ‘Pigi māʼaŋ ŋkhǐ pwanjuʼɔ ni pəɨ, ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbini, pigi yrāo ŋkhǐ gu ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ ŋkə̄ɨ.’
Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ ni nthɔ, ki lɔ ŋkru brɛi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nnu làʼo pəɨ chhu ŋa ‘a fāʼo miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ yu.’
Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua thɔ njɨ maoŋ ndɔ nnu nu, pəɨ ŋa, ‘a njru mmɛ yaoŋ ndɔ mbɔ mbaa làʼo, mbɨnɨ mbɔ taannu ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ.’
Ndɔ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu piŋ shiethɔ Minnwi nɛ nōoŋ ŋa shiethɔ ghɔ yi shini.”
Yichəɨ taʼa Farashi ni mɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ ŋa a thɔ pugu yu jɨ maoŋ, a ghə̄ɨ nda Farashi ghɔ nchɔchhɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ maoŋ.
Miŋgwɛ chəɨ ni mbɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ, mbɔ nchwīe phɨ, ŋga njaʼo ŋa Jishɔ pɔ nda ŋoŋ Farashi ghɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ maoŋ, a thɔ ni yichəɨ nchɨ́ŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni ŋgùʼɔ, laminda tɨnɨnchuoŋ lɨnaoŋ moŋ ghɔ,
nthi njiŋ Jishɔ, yəɨ kwò yu ŋkə̄ɨ nu, ŋkwrī ŋkhǐ ligi yi nɔ kwò yi, njɨ̄gɨ ni ŋgiithɔ yi, nthɔ nuaŋ kwò yi, mbɔrɔ kwò yi ni laminda ghɔ.
Ŋoŋ Farashi ghɔ ni ŋga njəɨ yei nnu nchhu ni noŋ yi ŋa, “Ŋ̈oŋ vei kaŋ nja mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, a kaŋ nji ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ ŋa miŋgwɛ vei ŋa a chhɔ ŋkāoŋ vi yie ghɔ nɛ, ŋkwaŋ chɔmbhi pɨphɨ ŋa a ghà nchhɔ nɛ.”
Nɔ khwɛ̄ nu Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Shemu, m̀fāʼo nnu nɔ chhu nu vɛ.”
Shemu pie ŋa, “Mbɔ khɔ, ŋgaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa?”

“Yichəɨ ŋgaŋ fōo ŋgwa ni mbɨŋ ni mbɔ fɔ mfāʼo paa ghaŋ ŋkru pi. Ŋkrù yi pɔ puŋ taʼa yi mbɔ fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋ̈oŋ mfāʼa nɔ tiɛŋ ŋkɨɨ llɛ́ pi pe vi nɔ nɛ, yichəɨ pɔ fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋ̈oŋ mfāʼa nɔ tiɛŋ wuŋ llɛ́, pi pe vi nɔ nɛ.
Paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu lɔ mfāʼo mbɨŋ ghɔ nɔ pe nu ni ŋoŋ ghɔ, nthɛ yie, a chiʼi ŋkrù yugu ghɔ. A yəɨ shɨna pugu ŋa a shi ŋkhwā vi nchaa vichəɨ?”
Shemu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “M̀bīʼi ŋa a yɛ ŋa ji ŋkrù ni njiɛŋ nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ chhu a kāʼo.”
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ kara ndīi miŋgwɛ ghɔ, nchhu ni Shemu ŋa,
“Ɔ yəɨ miŋgwɛ vei? Mi nì nii nda ghɔ paʼa ɔ lɔ mfɛ ŋkhǐ shɨ̄gao kwò vəɨ, ndɔ miŋgwɛ vei shɨ̄gao kwò ma ni ŋkhǐ ligi yi, ndɔ njɨ̄gɨ ni ŋgiithɔ yi.
Ɔ shini ndɔ nchhu ŋa ǹthɔ a pwa ni paŋ nu ma, ndɔ jɛ̄ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹthɔ hɛiŋ nɛ, a lɔ naa mieŋ nuaŋ nu kwò ma yaʼa.
Ɔ shini ndɔ njiʼi mbɔrɔ thɔ a ni wru, ndɔ ti a pɔrɔ kwò ma ni laminda chɨgəɨ nchuoŋ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹchhu vɛ ŋa fɨʼɨ ntou khwǎ ŋa a nōoŋ nɛ, nōoŋ ŋa pi līʼɛ phɨ yi ŋa a yiɛŋ nɛ. Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a wuʼɔ nchwīe pi shɨgɛi phɨ, pi līʼɛ nɛ, nōoŋ khwā pi shɨgɛi yi.”
Jishɔ chhu kiʼɛ ni miŋgwɛ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ǹdīʼɛ phɨ yɔ.”
Pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi nɛ, jɛ̄ nchhu nu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Yei pɔ pi gɔ̌ ŋa a pɔ ti ndīʼɛ pi phɨ ŋoŋ?”
A chhu ni miŋgwɛ ghɔ ŋa,
“Piŋ yɔ chwīe ɔ lūgu, ghə̄ɨ ni gɔ moŋ ghɨghrɨ.”
A ni ŋga ndaʼa, Jishɔ nyīeŋ moŋ pa mɛmmɛ laʼataoŋ pugu pa puoŋ mi laʼataoŋ, nthɔ nshwei pwa pishaʼakhɔ mbɔ yi Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi. A ni mbɔ pugu pa paanchrɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi,
pugu pa pichəɨ piŋgɛ, ŋa a ni mfuʼu jijwɛ pɨphɨ mbɨŋ pugu, mbɨnɨ njɨ̄gɨ pa ghɨ̌nɔ mbɨŋ pugu. Piŋgɛ pighɔ ni mbɔ Meri, ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Madaliŋ, ŋa khwachəɨ miŋwɛiŋ ni ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ,
ni Joana, mbɔ ŋgwɛ Kusha, mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa Hɛrɔ, ni Shushana, pugu pa ntou pichəɨ piŋgɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi llɔ moŋ yugu ŋkaa nu nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ntou yú ŋgwa ni nthɔ ŋkɨrɨ nu, pichəɨ llɔ moŋ ntou pa lɨʼɨ nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu yəɨ Jishɔ nɛ, a chhu yei luʼɔ chrà ni pugu:
“Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni ma mbɔ fɔ, ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ māʼaŋ mbhɛ̌ maoŋ. Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni māʼaŋ nu nɛ, pichəɨ gū shɛmbua, ŋgwa tie ni kwò yugu, pa mishi llɔ tɔthɨ shwiʼi kru.
Pichəɨ gū moŋ shhɛ ŋkwá, ŋga ŋkhɛ̄, ŋkiʼi ndɔ njaoŋ yaoŋ nthɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ŋkhǐ.
Pichəɨ gū moŋ shishaʼa, shishaʼa yīʼɛ ŋkuʼɔ mfīgi maoŋ pighɔ pugu khu.
Pichəɨ mbhɛ̌ maoŋ pighɔ ni ŋgū moŋ shhɛ shiʼi mbūgu fɔ ndɔ nja njuŋ, nchaa mbhɛ̌ yi ni ŋkɨɨ ŋgɛ.”
Jishɔ ghà ŋga nchhu nnu pei mīʼɛŋ, mfɛ gɛ̀ ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pie vi ŋa, “Njiŋ luʼɔ chrà ghɔ pɔ pi ŋa?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Minnwi chwīe pəɨ ji pa nnu lə̄ɨŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ yi. Ndɔ ni pichəɨ ŋgwa, a pɔ pi moŋ luʼɔ chrà nnɛ ŋa:
‘Pugu shi ndīi,
ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ;
Njwɛrɛ ndɔ paʼa,
ndɔ njaʼo nji.’
“Yei njiŋ luʼɔ chrà ghɔ: Mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ ghɔ chrà Minnwi.
Pɛ mbhɛ̌ ŋa a ni ŋgū shɛmbua thɔ nōoŋ pi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi, ndɔ devɨ thɔ fuʼu chrà ghɔ njùʼɔ pugu, nnɛ ŋa mbaʼa pugu piŋ ndɔ ndūgu.
Pa mbhɛ̌ pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋgū moŋ shhɛ ŋkwá nɛ pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà ghɔ, mbiŋ ni pwatua ndɔ paʼa ŋǐeŋ yugu lɔ ntɨnɨ. Pugu piŋ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ, mōoŋ nu gha nthɔ pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu.
Pa mbhɛ̌ ŋa pugu ni ŋgū moŋ shishaʼa nɛ, ŋgwa ŋa pugu piŋ chrà Minnwi, mbiŋ, ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ pa ghaghana, pa fāʼo, ni nchhɔ́ shiʼi ŋkuoŋ ŋgrào mbhi yei fīgi vugu, paʼa ntíɛŋ yugu lɔ ma ntɨnɨ.
Ndɔ ti mbhɛ̌ moŋ shhɛ shiʼi pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi ni ŋkiɛŋ njùʼɔ shiʼi, ndɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ a tɨnɨ, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ ti njuŋ ntíɛŋ.
“Ŋoŋ shiʼa nchuʼu truka ŋkuru ni mikru ki niʼiŋ laʼo kúoŋ, ŋoŋ ghà nchuʼu ntigi pi lɨʼɨ thi truka, nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu nii nu nda nɛ yəɨ liʼɛ ghɔ.
Yichəɨ yaoŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ ŋa pi lə̄ɨŋ ŋa mbaʼa pi ma mieŋ ki nōoŋ lɨʼɨ wo, ki nnu ŋa pi kuru ŋa mbaʼa pi ma mieŋ ki ji a lɔ mbɨnɨ ntaoŋ lɨʼɨ liʼɛ.
Lɨna nu kiʼɛ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ ywɛrɛ nnu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ, pi shi mbīgi ntou yi ghɔ, ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɛ, pi shi ŋkwe shɨgɛi yɛ ŋa a pīʼi ŋa a fāʼo nɛ mbhɔ yu.”
Mǔuŋ Jishɔ pugu pa lǐŋ pi pi pimbia thɔ lɨʼɨ yəɨ vi, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo shɨna nthɛ yú ŋgwa yəɨ yu.
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ chhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Mǔuŋ ghɔ pugu pa lǐŋ pɔ pi pimbia pɔ nɛ mbhi ntāʼa nu njəɨ ghɔ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Mǔuŋ a pugu pa lǐŋ paŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi ndɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa chrà ghɔ chhu nɛ.”
Llɛ́ chəɨ, Jishɔ nii moŋ kikuoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nchhu ŋa,
“Pia shāʼa ntaoŋ njiɛŋ hiŋ.”
Nnɛ pugu wɛ̄iŋ ndaoŋ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nchwi kikuoŋ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, lɔgɔ wɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ. Mmɛ fiŋ gū moŋ ŋkhǐ, ŋkhǐ jɛ̄ lɨnaoŋ nu moŋ kikuoŋ yugu, ti pugu thi pi moŋ gu.
Pugu ghə̄ɨ ŋgūʼu Jishɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Masha! Masha! Pia khu nu nɛ ma!”
A wūʼu, mbɨ̄ga fɨfrəɨ ghɔ pugu pa fiŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ, ŋguoŋ yi tithi, moŋ ŋkhǐ ju.
A chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Piŋ yəɨ pɔ pi hɨŋ?”
Pugu pɔgɔ ndɔ ŋgrāo, nchhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Yei pɔ pi yəɨ ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ, ŋa a fɛ gɨ́ ni fɨfrəɨ pugu pa fiŋ ŋa pugu tithi pugu yaʼo nnɛ?”
Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shāʼa ŋkhǐ llɔ Galili ntaoŋ krao ŋgei Gerasha.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ taoŋ moŋ kikuoŋ nɛ, mbāoŋ pugu yichəɨ ŋoŋ a fāʼo pa miŋwɛiŋ, a shini ndɔ māʼaŋ ndhwí nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ, paʼa ndɔ ndaʼa nu nda, ŋka laʼa pi moŋ lɨʼɨ twei ŋgwa.
A ni ŋga njəɨ Jishɔ, mūʼuŋ ŋgòu, ŋgū shhɛ shhɨ yu, nchhu ni njɨ ŋa, “Pɔgɔ fāʼo pi khɔ, Jishɔ Muuŋ Minnwi ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nɛ? M̀baʼo mbhɔ shhɨ ghɔ, kiʼi niʼiŋ a moŋ ŋgəʼɨ!”

A ni nchhu yei nthɛ ŋa Jishɔ ni ŋkwo fɛ gɨ́ ni miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ ŋa a taoŋ mbɨŋ yu. Yiɛŋ ndɨɨ miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ ni nthɔ ncho vi, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni ŋkrao mbhɔ mi, ŋgwɛ kipaʼo nɔ kwò mi nthɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi vi nɛ, a shi ŋguʼɔ njaʼa maoŋ pighɔ yaʼa, miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ fra vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó.
Jishɔ pie vi kiʼɛ ŋa,
“Ligi yɔ khɔ?”
A ŋa, “Ligi a Káʼa Yi,” nthɛ ŋa ntou miŋwɛiŋ ni nii mbɨŋ yu.
Pa miŋwɛiŋ pighɔ lɨ̄gəɨ Jishɔ ŋa kiʼi a fɛ vugu moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋgəʼɨ.
Ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ kwíe ŋkunyaŋ ni nthɔ njɨ nu fɔ ŋkɨŋ mbra, pugu lɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a mieŋ pugu nii moŋ pa ŋkunyaŋ pighɔ, a mieŋ vugu.
Pugu taoŋ kiʼɛ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ, nii mbɨŋ pa miŋkunyaŋ pighɔ. Ŋguoŋ kwíe ŋkunyaŋ pighɔ tei llɔ ŋkɨŋ mbra ghɔ, nshwiʼi ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ, ŋgū moŋ ghɔ ŋkhu.
Ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi ŋkunyaŋ pighɔ ni ŋga njəɨ nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, ntaoŋ tei ŋgə̄ɨ nchhu moŋ laʼa pugu pa moŋ nyìeŋ.
Ŋgwa taoŋ nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu njəɨ nnu haʼaŋ a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ. Ŋga nthɔ njəɨ Jishɔ, njəɨ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa miŋwɛiŋ pighɔ ni ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ, a chɔchɔ yəɨ yu ni ndhwí mbɨŋ yu ndɔ mbɔ shishiʼi, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu.
Pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ nnu ghɔ nɛ, shwei vugu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi kwe ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa pa miŋwɛiŋ ni mbɔ mbɨŋ yu nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa moŋ krao ŋgei Gerasha yōu Jishɔ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ, nthɛ ŋa ŋkiɛŋ pɔgɔ gu ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu.
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ nii moŋ kikuoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ.
Ŋoŋ ŋa miŋwɛiŋ pighɔ ni ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu lɨ̄gəɨ Jishɔ ŋa, “Mieŋ ǹthɔ pɔgɔ ghə̄ɨ kaʼa.” Jishɔ lāa, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pɨnɨ laʼa, nshwei ŋgwa pɔ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi fāʼa mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ.”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ laʼa nthɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ nnu ŋa Jishɔ chwīe mbɨŋ yu nɛ.
Ndɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni mbɨnɨ nɛ, pa ŋgwa ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa a thɔ a pwa, nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ vugu ni nchhɔ njwɛrɛ vi.
Ŋoŋ chəɨ ŋa ligi yi Jairu, yɨ̄ga nchəɨŋ. A ni mbɔ mmɛŋoŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi, ŋgū shhɛ shhɨ Jishɔ nchhɔ ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a thɔ nda yu,
nthɛ ŋa fiɛŋ muuŋ vi yi miŋgwɛ ŋa a ni mfāʼo, mbɔ muuŋ paanchrɔ ŋgaʼo, ni nthɔ ŋkhu nu.
Ndɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ wɛ̄iŋ ndaoŋ nɛ, yú ŋgwa ni nthɔ mfra vi moŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgei ghao.

Shɨna ŋgwa pei, miŋgwɛ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ ŋa a ki yəɨ ndɨɨ yi ni njɨ nɔ paanchrɔ ŋgaʼo, ŋkwo tūoŋ ŋguoŋ mbɨŋ yi ghao mbhɔ pa doktɔ, ndɔ paʼa pi lɔ nchwīe ndɨɨ yi yaʼa. Kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ shi ki lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋa a kaŋ ni mfɛ a chwīe ghɨ̌nɔ yi mmɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, a ni nthɔ njiŋ Jishɔ ŋkāoŋ po ndhwí yi. Ndɨɨ yi ghɔ lɔ ŋkiʼɛ njaʼa yaʼa chomilaoŋ ghɔ.
Jishɔ pie ŋa,
“A kāoŋ gɔ̌ ŋkāoŋ a?”
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ni ŋga ndāa noŋ yugu, Pita chhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, yú ŋgwa thɔ ŋkɨrɨ nu ndɔ mfra ghɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Yichəɨ ŋoŋ kāoŋ a, mi nì njaʼo ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ njɨ ntaoŋ mbɨŋ mu.”

Ndɨɨ ŋa miŋgwɛ vei ni njəɨ ŋa yichəɨ shɛndaoŋ lɔ mbɔ ŋa mimfɛ a lɛ̄rɛ nɛ, a wrū nthɔ nu, ŋgū shhɛ ni puŋ yi shhɨ Jishɔ ndɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ shhɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nnu haʼaŋ a ni nchwīe vi a kāoŋ Jishɔ nɛ, pugu pa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ yi mmɛ chomilaoŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Muuŋ a, piŋ yɔ chwīe ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ tɔgɔ, ghə̄ɨ ni gɔ moŋ ghɨghrɨ Minnwi.”
Ndɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ wuʼɔ nchhɔ nchrā nu nɛ, yichəɨ ŋoŋ llɔ nda Jairu, mmɛŋoŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi, nthɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Muuŋ ghɔ kwo khu, kiʼi nuʼuŋ ŋgana masha ghagha.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni njaʼo nnu yei nɛ, a chhu ni Jairu ŋa,
“Kiʼi nuʼuŋ mbɔgɔ gu, wuʼɔ nchhɔ mfāʼo pi piŋ, nnɛ kaŋ muuŋ ghɔ shi ndūgu.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni nchəɨŋ nda Jairu nɛ, a shini ndɔ mbiŋ ŋa ŋoŋ nduoŋ nii nda ŋkiɛŋ Pita pugu Jouŋ ni Jɛiŋ, ni tǎa muuŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ pugu mǔuŋ vi.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ni nthɔ ŋkə̄ɨ nu ndɔ njūa vi, Jishɔ ka chhu pi ŋa,
“Kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkə̄ɨ, nthɛ ŋa a lɔ ŋkhu, a lɛllɛ.”
Pugu gwɛ̄ vi nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nji ŋa a kwo khu.
Jishɔ ka wɛ̄iŋ pi mbhɔ yi, mɛ̄iŋ nchhu ni njɨ ŋa,
“Miyaa, lɔllɔ!”
A ywiŋ, ndɔllɔ jijwɛ yi pɨnɨ, a lɔllɔ tɔthɨ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ. Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa pugu fɛ maoŋ ghɔ a jɨ.
A ni ŋgrāo tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi. Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu shwei shesheŋoŋ ni nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Jishɔ gɛ̄ paanchrɔ pighɔ lɨʼɨ muʼɔŋ mfɛ njɨ pugu pa ghrɨ́ ni pugu nɔ fuʼu nu pa miŋwɛiŋ ndɔ njɨ̄gɨ pa ghɨ̌nɔ,
ntaoŋ vugu ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ nchīi Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi ndɔ mbɨnɨ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ.
Nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Kiʼi pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ sheshe yaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nyìeŋ ghɔ nɛ. Kiʼi pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ mbìe, ki pìɛŋ kra, ki maoŋ jɨ, ki mbɨŋ, ki ŋgə̄ɨ ni pa kwri ndhwí.
Sheshe nda ŋa pəɨ nii fɔ nɛ, pəɨ laʼa fɔ ti shi nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ.
Sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa pi lɔ mbiŋ vəɨ fɔ nɛ, pəɨ krū kwò məɨ, ntaoŋ ni vəɨ laʼataoŋ ghɔ nɔ nōoŋ nu ni pugu ŋa Minnwi pɨ̄na nnu ŋa pugu chwīe nɛ.”
Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi pighɔ taoŋ, nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ mi laʼataoŋ ghao, nthɔ nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghɔ ndɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghao.
Ndɨɨ ŋa Hɛrɔ, mbɔ fùoŋ Galili, ni njaʼo ŋguoŋ nnu pei nɛ, thɔ yi fiŋ nthɛ ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa ni nthɔ nchhu nu ŋa Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ ni ŋgwa pɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.
Pichəɨ chhu yugu ŋa Elaija nōoŋ noŋ yi, pichəɨ chhu yugu pi ŋa yichəɨ taʼa ndunu njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.
Hɛrɔ chhu ŋa, “Ŋki yaʼa thɔ Jouŋ, ndɔ yei pɨnɨ mbɔ pi gɔ̌ ŋa njaʼo pa nnu nɔ ligi yi nɛ?” Mbaʼo nɔ yəɨ nu Jishɔ vei.
Ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pighɔ ni ŋga mbɨnɨ, nshwei vi ni ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa pugu ni nchwīe nɛ. Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ vugu pugu pugu fuʼu noŋ yugu shɨna ŋgwa, ŋgə̄ɨ Beshaida.
Yú ŋgwa ni ŋga njaʼo, njōu njiŋ yi. Jishɔ gha nchhu ni pugu ŋa pugu thɔ a pwa, nthɔ nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi ni pugu, njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋgɨ̄nɔ nu nɛ.

Minaoŋ ni ŋga njɛ̄ nii nu, paanchrɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pighɔ thɔ njəɨ Jishɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Chhu ŋgwa pei ghə̄ɨ, nji ŋa minthɛ pugu ghə̄ɨ moŋ pa laʼa pugu pa mooŋ mbàŋ mbambara, ntāʼa lɨʼɨ laʼa pugu pa maoŋ jɨ, nthɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ yei pɔ pi ŋkǔnu njó.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ fɛ maoŋ pugu jɨ.”
Pugu chhu ŋa, “Ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa pigi fāʼo nɛ wuʼɔ tiɛŋ brɛi pugu paa shhu. Ɔ taʼa nu ŋa pigi ghə̄ɨ njuoŋ maoŋ jɨ ni mbalaŋ ŋgwa pei?”
Pimbia ni mbɔ fɔ nchəɨŋ nɔ tiɛŋ ŋkaŋ yugu.
Jishɔ chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pighɔ ŋa,
“Pəɨ chhu ni pugu ŋa pugu chɔchɔ shhɛ, taʼa kwíe pɔ nɔ tiɛŋ wuŋ ŋgwa.”
Pugu wuʼɔ nuʼuŋ njaʼo pi nɛnnɛ, nchwīe ŋguoŋ ŋgwa chɔchɔ.
A gha ndɔ̄gɔ tiɛŋ kəɨŋ brɛi ghɔ ni paa shhu ghɔ, mbɨʼɨ ligi yi ndīi po ntōo Minnwi, mbəʼɨ, mfɛ ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa pugu ghrā ni ŋgwa pighɔ.
Ŋguoŋ yugu kru ti njru, ti pugu lɨ̄ga pa pəʼɨ pi ŋa a ni mbɨgəɨ nɛ, a lɨnaoŋ paanchrɔ mikuo.
Taʼa llɛ́ chəɨ ni mbɔ, Jishɔ thɔ nduoŋ Minnwi təʼɨ vi, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ mbara vi. A pie vugu ŋa,
“Pa ŋgwa ghà nchhu ŋa mi pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pichəɨ ŋgwa ghà nchhu ŋa ɔ Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ, pichəɨ ŋa ɔ Elaija, pichəɨ ŋa ɔ taʼa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi llɛshhɨ ŋa a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ.”
A pie vugu ŋa,
“Ti pəɨ nɛ? Pəɨ chhu yəɨ ŋa mi gɔ̌?”
Pita khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.”
Jishɔ fɛ tɨtɨnɨ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu shwei nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ ni shesheŋoŋ.
Mbɨnɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi ŋguʼɔ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ ntou pa nnu, pa thishɨ pa Juu pugu pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi lāa vi, pi jwi vi, a gha ndaʼa trɛi llɛ́ a kuʼɔ.”
Mbɨnɨ nchhu ni ŋguoŋ vugu ŋa,
“S̈hesheŋoŋ ntāʼa nu njōu njiŋ a, â mieŋ phi nnu haʼaŋ a khwā nɛ, ntiɛŋ wáʼa yi sheshe llɛ́ ndɔ njōu njiŋ a.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu ndūgu ni chɔmbhi yi nɛ shi nshiɛŋ chɔmbhi yi ghɔ, ti ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a mīʼaŋ chɔmbhi yi nthɛ a nɛ, shi ndūgu ni chɔmbhi yi ghɔ.
Ŋoŋmishua nthɛ a shei pi khɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ä mfāʼo ŋguoŋ yaoŋ moŋ mbhi hɛiŋ ndɔ mbhɛ chɔmbhi yi?
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo lrithɔ mbɨŋ mu, ki ni chrà a nɛ, Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mfāʼo lrithɔ mbɨŋ yu ndɨɨ ŋa a thɔ moŋ ndighaʼo yi nɛ, pugu pa ndighaʼo Tǎa, ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ taoŋtaoŋ.
Ndɔ ǹchhu pi nnu shini ni pəɨ ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa thi hɛiŋ ŋa mbaʼa pugu khu ki lɔ njəɨ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.”
A ni ŋga nchhu nnu pei ti ndaʼa taʼa taŋ, ndɔ̄gɔ Pita, ni Jouŋ, ni Jɛiŋ pugu pugu kuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra lɨʼɨ luoŋ Minnwi.
Ndɔ haʼaŋ a ni nthɔ nduoŋ Minnwi nɛ, miŋi mi kwri mbɔ ŋkwaŋ nduoŋ, ndhwí pi fugu, nchīa ŋa ŋmɛiŋ nɔ fiembɨ.
Ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, paa ŋgwa chrā nu pugu yu, pugu ni mbɔ Mushi pugu Elaija,
nōoŋ noŋ yugu moŋ ndighaʼo pa po, nthɔ nchrā nu ŋkuoŋ nnu gu yi ŋa ju Jishɔ ni nthɔ nchwīe nu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ Jerushalɛiŋ, ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nūʼɔŋ nɛ.
Ndɔ lɔgɔ ni njiɛŋ mbɨŋ Pita pugu pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ nɛ. Pugu gha nja ŋgūʼu, njəɨ líʼɛ ndighaʼo Jishɔ, pugu pa paa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a ni nthi pugu pugu nɛ.

Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa pighɔ ni mieŋ Jishɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, a pwa nɔ haʼaŋ pia pɔ hɛiŋ kaʼa nɛ, pigi shi ŋkrao trɛi ntǎa! Taʼa yi vɛ, taʼa yi ni Mushi, taʼa yi ni Elaija.” Ndɔ a shini ndɔ njiʼi nji nnu ŋa a ni chhu nu nɛ.
A ni ŋga ŋguʼɔ nchrā nu, lúluŋ shwiʼi ŋkuru vugu, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu nɔ haʼaŋ lúluŋ ghɔ ni ŋkuru vugu nɛ.
Yichəɨ ŋggì chhu moŋ lúluŋ ghɔ ŋa, “Yei Muuŋ a ŋa ǹchuʼɔ vi, p̂əɨ yaʼo mbhɔ yu.”
Ŋggì ghɔ ni ŋga nchrā ti mīʼɛŋ, pugu yəɨ Jishɔ pi təʼɨ vi, nūʼɔŋ nnu pei shɨna pugu, ki lɔ njiʼi nshwei shesheŋoŋ ni nnu ŋa pugu yəɨ nɛ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, Jishɔ pugu pa trɛi ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi pighɔ shwiʼi llɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra ghɔ, ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ kɨrɨ ŋgwa thɔ mbara Jishɔ.
Ŋga njəɨ nu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ paʼo ŋgòu moŋ kɨrɨ ghɔ, nchhu ŋa, “Masha, m̀baʼo mbhɔ vɛ, līi muuŋ a vei njəɨ, ndɔ mbɔ fiɛŋ yi.
Yichəɨ miŋwɛiŋ ghà ncho vi, a wīʼi mbaʼo ŋgòu, miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ māʼaŋ vi shhɛ, a kwēi nu, faʼofaʼo taoŋ nu nchò yu, nja nchhɔ nwīʼiŋ vi nwīʼiŋ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mieŋ vi!
Mi ni ndɨ̄gəɨ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ ŋa pugu fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ mbɨŋ yu, pugu fuʼu kie.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Pəɨ ŋgwa ki fāʼo piŋ, ŋgwa pɨphɨ, mi shi nchhɔ pia pi fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ nɛiŋ, mfāʼo fɨʼɨ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ nɛiŋ nthɛ vəɨ? Thɔ ni muuŋ ghɔ hɛiŋ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ muuŋ ghɔ ni nthɔ nu nɛ, miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ māʼaŋ vi shhɛ, a kwēi nu, faʼofaʼo taoŋ nu nchò yu. Jishɔ pɨ̄ga miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ, njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yi, mfɛ vi ni tǎa vi.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ni ŋgrāo fɨʼɨ ghrɨ́ ŋa Minnwi fāʼo nɛ.
Ŋgwa ni ŋga ŋguʼɔ nthɔ ŋgrāo ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa Jishɔ ni nchwīe nɛ, a chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“P̂əɨ yaʼo nnu yei ŋa ǹtāʼa nchhu ni pəɨ nɛ shishiʼi! Pi tɔthɔ nchaʼa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua mfɛ liɛŋ mbhɔ ŋgwamishua.”
Ndɔ paʼa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi lɔ nji njiŋ nnu ghɔ. Pi ni ndə̄ɨŋ vugu nɔ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi thɔ yugu shie ni nnu ghɔ, ndɔ pugu pɔgɔ nɔ pie nu vi ni nnu ghɔ.
Mindoundou gū shɨna ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa a gɔ̌ mbɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ nchaa pichəɨ?
Jishɔ ni nji nnu ŋa pugu ni mbīʼi nu njùʼɔ pugu nɛ, ndɔ̄gɔ muuŋ mbrɔ nūʼɔŋ yəɨ yu,
nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ muuŋ vei nɔ ligi a nɛ piŋ pi mmu, ti shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ a nɛ, piŋ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a kɨgəɨ shɨna pəɨ nchaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nɛ, a ju mbɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ nchaa ŋguoŋ yəɨ.”
Jouŋ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Masha, pigi yəɨ ŋoŋ a fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ ni ligi yɔ, pigi lāa ghɔ nthɛ ŋa pigi pugu shiʼa njōu njiŋ yɔ kaʼa.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Kiʼi nuʼuŋ ndāa ghɔ nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ ndāa ghɔ nɛ pɔ ŋgei ghɔ.”
Pa llɛ́ ni ŋga mbara nu ŋa pi shi ndɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ po nɛ, a lɔ̄gɔ nthi mi tɨtɨnɨ nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu Jerushalɛiŋ.
A taoŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ shhɨ, pugu ghə̄ɨ nii moŋ yichəɨ laʼataoŋ moŋ Shamaria nɔ pīri nu ŋguoŋ pa yaoŋ ghɔ.
Ndɔ paʼa ŋgwa pighɔ lɔ mbiŋ vi nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ pi nnu khuthɔ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ pi Jerushalɛiŋ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, Jɛiŋ pugu Jouŋ, ni njəɨ nnu pighɔ nɛ, pugu pie vi ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa pigi mɛ̄iŋ móŋoŋ po, a shwiʼi njɨ̄gɨ vugu?”
Jishɔ shrī mbɨ̄ga vugu.
Pugu pugu kara kiʼɛ ŋgə̄ɨ laʼataoŋ nduoŋ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu shɛndaoŋ nɛ, yichəɨ ŋoŋ chhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Ǹshi njōu njiŋ yɔ sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ shi ŋgə̄ɨ nɛ”.
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Pa mimbaaŋguo fāʼo pa pùo pugu, pa mishi fāʼo pa nda pugu, ndɔ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo lɨʼɨ lɛ̄rɛ thɔ yi.”
Jishɔ kara nchhu ni yichəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa,
“Thɔ njōu njiŋ a.”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ chhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, fǔoŋ mieŋ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ ntwei tǎa a ŋkaoŋ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Mieŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu khu nɛ twei khu ŋgwa pugu. Ndɔ ni gɔ̀ ghə̄ɨ nchīi shaʼa nu fùoŋ Minnwi.”
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ pɨnɨ nchhu ŋa, “Ǹshi njōu njiŋ yɔ, ma Taathɔ, ndɔ fǔoŋ mieŋ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nchāʼa ŋgwa laʼa pigi.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ ŋa a wɛ̄iŋ ŋkɨɨ naʼaŋ fāʼa nyìeŋ ŋa a fāʼa nyìeŋ, mbɨnɨ ŋkara nthɔ ndīi njiŋ nɛ, lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.”
Pa nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Taathɔ pɨnɨ ntɛrɛ khwachəɨ wuŋ ŋgwa ni yi paa ntaoŋ vugu pa pi paa ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ shhɨ yu moŋ ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ pɛ ŋa a tāʼa nu ŋgə̄ɨ fɔ nɛ.
A ni nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Maoŋ kwōo yiɛŋ ndɔ ghaŋ kwōo pi kɨgəɨ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ luoŋ ni taʼanjuʼɔ mbhɔ Taathɔ ŋa a fāʼo maoŋ pighɔ nɛ ŋa a taoŋ pa ghaŋ fàʼa pugu ghə̄ɨ ŋkwōo maoŋ pi.
P̂əɨ ghə̄ɨ! Ǹtaoŋ vəɨ nɔ pa puoŋ minjɨɨ shɨna pa miŋaŋieŋ.
Kiʼi ntuo pìɛŋ mbɨŋ, ki pìɛŋ maoŋ jɨ, ki kwri tra. Kiʼi nchrā ni ŋoŋ shɛndaoŋ.
“Sheshe nda ŋa pəɨ nii fɔ nɛ, fǔoŋ nchhu ŋa, ‘Ghɨghrɨ pɔ moŋ nda hɛiŋ.’
Ti ŋ̈oŋ mbɔ fɔ ŋa a khwā ghɨghrɨ, kaŋ ghɨghrɨ yɔ shi nshwiʼi mbɨŋ yu. Ŋkiɛŋ nɛnnɛ, kaŋ ghɨghrɨ yɔ shi mbɨnɨ mbhɔ ghɔ.
Kɨna moŋ yie nda nthɔ njɨ nu ndɔ nnu sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pi fɛ vɛ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a pie ŋa ŋgaŋ fàʼa fāʼo pe yi. Kiʼi nyīeŋ pi nda nda.
“Sheshe laʼataoŋ ŋa pəɨ nii fɔ pi piŋ vəɨ fɔ nɛ, pəɨ jɨ sheshe yaoŋ yɛ ŋa pi fɛ ni pəɨ fɔ nɛ.
Pəɨ yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ pa ŋgɨ̌nɔ fɔ, nchhu ni pugu ŋa, ‘Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi thɔ nɛ ti mbara yəɨ pəɨ.’
Ndɔ ti p̈əɨ nii moŋ sheshe laʼataoŋ ki pugu lɔ mbiŋ vəɨ, pəɨ ghə̄ɨ taʼandaoŋ pugu nchhu fɔ ŋa,
‘Ti mfɛ pi ni pru laʼataoŋ yəɨ ŋa a kuʼɔ nɔ kwò miŋi nɛ, pigi yɨ̄gɨ nɛ mfɛ thɔ pəɨ. Ndɔ pəɨ kwiŋ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi thɔ nɛ ti mbara.’
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa, a shi njiʼɛ ni laʼataoŋ Shodoŋ nchaa yie laʼataoŋ ŋa pugu lāa vəɨ nɛ.

“Ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pəɨ, ma ŋgwa Korashiŋ! Ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pəɨ, ma ŋgwa Beshaida! Nthɛ ŋa pa nnu ghraoghrao pei ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ hɛiŋ nɛ, kaŋ ni mbɔ pi Tairɛ pugu Shidoŋ, pugu kaŋ ni ŋkwo māʼaŋ ndhwí ywei gu nchhɔ moŋ phu nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ.
Mbapa nɛnnɛ, a shi ndɛ njiʼɛ ni laʼataoŋ Tairɛ pugu Shidoŋ moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa nchaa vəɨ.
Ndɔ ni pəɨ, ma ŋgwa Kapanuŋ, pəɨ pīʼi ŋa Minnwi shi ndɔ̄gɔ vəɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɔ po? Ŋga! A shi nshwiʼi vəɨ moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋgwa khu.”
Jishɔ chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a yaʼo nnu ŋa pəɨ chhu nɛ, yaʼo pi mmu, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lāa nnu ŋa pəɨ chhu nɛ lāa pi mmu. Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lāa a nɛ lāa pi ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.”
Khwachəɨ wuŋ ŋgwa ni yi paa pighɔ pɨ̄nɨ moŋ pwanjuʼɔ, nchhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, pa miŋwɛiŋ yaʼo nchò yigi ndɨɨ ŋa pigi fɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ni ligi yɔ nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Mi nì njəɨ Shata gū llɔ po nɔ fiembɨ.
Līi njəɨ, m̀fɛ njɨ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ nyīeŋ ŋkuoŋ pa mitwɛʼi pugu pa ŋíeŋ pugu pa ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ mimbɨna ki kàʼa lɔ ŋkēe vəɨ.
Mbapa nɛnnɛ, kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ pi ŋa pa miŋwɛiŋ yaʼo nchò yəɨ. Pəɨ ka fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ pi ŋa Minnwi nāʼaŋ ligi yəɨ po.”
Moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ, Jishɔ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi nchhu ŋa,
“Tǎa, a gɔ̀ mbɔ Taathɔ po pugu pa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ. Ǹtōo ghɔ nthɛ ŋa yaoŋ ŋa ɔ lə̄ɨŋ ni ghaŋ shiethɔ pugu pa ghaŋ lɨna nɛ, ɔ nōoŋ ni pa puoŋ fhu. Ooŋ, ma Tǎa, yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ɔ ni ŋkhwā ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
“Tǎa a kwo chaʼa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ mfɛ mbhɔ mu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ nji ŋoŋ ŋa Muuŋ yie ghɔ nɛ ŋkiɛŋ Tǎa, ki nji ŋoŋ ŋa Tǎa yie ghɔ nɛ ŋkiɛŋ Muuŋ pugu pa shesheŋoŋ ŋa Muuŋ chuʼɔ nɔ nōoŋ nu Tǎa ghɔ nɛ.”
Jishɔ kara nchhu ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi njiŋnjiŋ ŋa,
“Pəɨ fāʼo ntou prɔthɔ nɔ yəɨ nu pa nnu pɛ ŋa pəɨ yəɨ nu nɛ.
Ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa ntou pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pugu pa fùoŋ ni ŋkhwā nɔ yəɨ nu pa nnu ŋa pəɨ yəɨ nu nɛ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ. Ki nɔ yaʼo nu pa nnu ŋa pəɨ yaʼo nu nɛ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njaʼo.”
Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ lɔllɔ tɔthɨ lɨʼɨ mōoŋ Jishɔ, mbie vi ŋa, “Masha, a yiʼi ŋa ǹchwīe nɛiŋ nɔ fāʼo nu chɔmbhi ki mmɛ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu pi ŋa? Njiŋ yi pɔ pi ŋa vɛ?”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Khwā Taathɔ mbɔ Minnwi yɔ ni ŋguoŋ njùʼɔ yɔ ghao, pugu pa nchə̌ɨ yɔ, pugu pa ŋguoŋ njɨ yɔ, pugu pa ŋguoŋ pīʼi nu yɔ, ndɔ mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkhwā taakuo yɔ ndɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā noŋ yɔ nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ khwɛ̄ a kāʼo. Chwīe nɛnnɛ mfāʼo chɔmbhi.”
Ŋgaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ ghɔ tāʼa nu nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ, nɛnnɛ mbie Jishɔ ŋa, “Taakuo a pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ Juu ni ndhɔ Jerushalɛiŋ nshwiʼi nu Jeriko, ŋgwīʼi mbɨŋ pa ŋgɨna minwi. Pugu wie vi, ŋkwe ndhwí yi pugu pa mbɨŋ yi, ŋgə̄ɨ ni vugu mieŋ vi a piʼi shɨgɛi ŋkhu.
“A ni ŋga mbɔ nɛnnɛ, ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi, mbɔ ŋoŋ Juu, ni shwiʼi nu shɛndaoŋ ghɔ ŋga njəɨ vi, mbəɨ ntɔgɔ po ndaoŋ nduoŋ.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ŋoŋ Levi
ni nshwiʼi nu shɛndaoŋ ghɔ ŋkaa yu, ŋga njəɨ vi, mbəɨ ntɔgɔ po ndaoŋ nduoŋ.
“Ndɔ ŋoŋ Shamaria
ŋa a ni ŋgə̄ɨ kra taoŋ ŋgwīʼi mbɨŋ yu, ŋga njəɨ vi, mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ yu,
nshwiʼi ŋgə̄ɨ mbara ŋoŋ vei, nshāʼo wru pugu pa làʼo ŋkuoŋ fɨ́ yi ndɔ ŋkrao. Ntiɛŋ vi nūʼɔŋ ŋkuoŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ yi, ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju moŋ nda pa ghɨ̀nɨ, nchhɔ ndɨna nu ni ju fɔ.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ ŋoŋ Shamaria vei fuʼu mbɨŋ mfɛ ni taathɔ moŋ nda yei, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Lɨna nu ni ju ti ǹshi mbɨnɨ. Mbɨŋ ŋa a shi mbīgi nɛ, ǹshi mbe vɛ.’ ”
Jishɔ pie ŋa,
“A yəɨ shɨna trɛi ŋgwa pei ŋa a taakuo ŋoŋ vei ŋa pa ŋgɨna minwi ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi ŋgwie vi ndəɨŋ vi nɛ?”
Ŋgaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Minnwi khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ŋoŋ ŋa a ki nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Ghə̄ɨ ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi nɛnnɛ.”
Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni ŋga nyīeŋ nu, a ghə̄ɨ nii moŋ yichəɨ laʼataoŋ. Miŋgwɛ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Mata, chhu ghɔ ŋa a thɔ a pwa nda yu.
A ni mfāʼo ndǐŋ vi, ligi yi pɔ Meri. Meri chhɔ shhɛ laʼo kwò Taathɔ nthɔ njaʼo ntɨ́gɨ yi.
Njùʼɔ Mata ni ŋgana vi nthɛ ntou pa maoŋ jɨ ŋa a ni mfāʼo nɔ pīri nu nɛ. A pie Jishɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, a lɔ ŋgana ghɔ ŋa ndǐŋ a mieŋ a ŋa mbīri ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ təʼɨ a? Chhu nɛ ghɔ a thɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ a.”
Ndɔ Taathɔ ka khwɛ̄ ghɔ pi ŋa,
“Mata, Mata, njùʼɔ yɔ ghana nu, ɔ wie noŋ yɔ nthɛ ntou pa nnu,
a wuʼɔ taʼa yaoŋ mbɔ mmɛ nnu. Meri kwo tɛrɛ ŋkiɛŋ yi ghɔ, mbɔ yɛ ŋa mbaʼa pi ma ŋkwe mbhɔ yu nɛ.”
Llɛ́ chəɨ ni mbɔ, Jishɔ thɔ nduoŋ Minnwi lɨʼɨ chəɨ, ŋga mīʼɛŋ, yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi thɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, yɛʼi vigi ni luoŋ nu Minnwi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Jouŋ ni njɛʼi ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ luoŋ Minnwi nɛ, pəɨ chhu ŋa,
‘Minnwi Tǎa vigi, ghaʼo nu pɔ ni ligi yɔ,
shaʼafuoŋ yɔ thɔ.
Fɛ maoŋ ni pigi ŋa pigi shi njru ŋkuoŋ ghɔ sheshe llɛ́ nɛ,
ndɔ ndīʼɛ phɨ yigi,
nthɛ ŋa pigi ghà ndīʼɛ phɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāaŋ mbɨŋ pigi nɛ.
Kiʼi nchwīe pigi nii moŋ tɨtɨnɨ mōoŋ nu!’ ”
Nnɛ a pɨnɨ nchhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Lɔ̄gɔ ŋa taʼa ŋoŋ vəɨ ghə̄ɨ nda taannu vi moŋ ntuŋ mbhi nchhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Taannu a, fōo a ni trɛi ndigi brɛi,
nthɛ ŋa taannu a ŋa a chhɔ ŋgə̄ɨ kra, chəɨŋ nda mu, paʼa ǹdɔ mfāʼo maoŋ jɨ nɔ fɛ nu ghɔ!’
Lɔ̄gɔ ŋa taannu yɔ ghɔ khwɛ̄ nda ŋa, ‘Kiʼi ŋgana a! Ŋ̀kwo chri nda ti pigi pa puoŋ paŋ kwo nanuaŋ. Minthɛ paʼa ǹdɔ nuʼuŋ ndɔllɔ mfɛ yaoŋ vɛ.’
Ǹchhu vɛ ŋa, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ mbaʼa a yiʼi ndɔllɔ mfɛ vɛ nthɛ ŋa a taannu yɔ nɛ, ndɔ ti a shi ndɔllɔ mfɛ vɛ nthɛ ŋa ɔ lɔ njiʼi ndrithɔ nɔ pie nu ki jwɛ.
“Ndɔ ti ǹshwei vəɨ, p̂əɨ pie, kaŋ Minnwi shi mfɛ ni pəɨ, p̂əɨ tāʼa, kaŋ Minnwi shi nchwīe pəɨ yəɨ, p̂əɨ kwēi kaŋ Minnwi shi nchuʼɔ chonda ni pəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pie nɛ ghà mfāʼo, ŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nɛ yəɨ, ni ŋoŋ ŋa a kwēi nɛ pi shi nchuʼɔ chonda ghɔ.
“A gɔ̌ shɨna pəɨ ŋa m̈uuŋ vi mbie shhu ghɔ, a fɛ pi mitwɛʼi ghɔ?
Ki mbie vi ni mbāoŋ, a fɛ pi ŋíeŋ ghɔ?
Ti p̈əɨ kiʼɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà nchwīe phɨ nɛ nji fɛ nu pi pa maoŋ shiʼi ni puoŋ pəɨ, ti Tǎa vəɨ ŋa a chhɔ po nɛ shi mfɛ Jijwɛ Minnwi pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pie vi nɛ?”
Yichəɨ ndɨɨ, Jishɔ ni nthɔ mfuʼu miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchwīe ŋoŋ ghɔ pɔ pi fhɨncho. Miŋwɛiŋ ghɔ ni ŋga ntaoŋ, fhɨncho ghɔ chrā, ŋgwa pighɔ ghrāo.
Ndɔ pichəɨ ŋgwa pighɔ chhu ŋa, “A fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ ni ghrɨ́ Bɛjɛbu, mbɔ nthishɨ pa miŋwɛiŋ.”
Pichəɨ tāʼa nu mōoŋ vi, nnɛ nchhu ghɔ ŋa â chwīe taʼa lì nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa njɨ yi llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi.
Jishɔ ni nji nnu ŋa pugu ni mbīʼi nu nɛ, nnɛ nchhu kiʼɛ ni pugu ŋa,
“Mbaʼa sheshe laʼa ŋa ŋgwa chhɔ māʼaŋ noŋ pugu ni nchhɔ̀ nɛ mieŋ ki gū, ndɔ ti sheshe nda ŋa a pɔ pi ni minduoŋnduoŋ nɛ shi ŋgū nshāaŋ.
Nnɛ ti S̈hata nthi pi moŋ minduoŋnduoŋ ni noŋ yi, shaʼafuoŋ yi lara pi nɛiŋ? Nthɛ ŋa ɔ chhu ŋa m̀fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ pi ni ghrɨ́ Bɛjɛbu.
Ti ä mbɔ ŋa m̀fuʼu miŋwɛiŋ pi ni ghrɨ́ Bɛjɛbu, kaŋ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pəɨ ghà mfuʼu pi ni ghrɨ́ gɔ̌? Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pugu shi mbɔ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu shi nshaʼa vəɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ ä mbɔ ŋa m̀fuʼu pa miŋwɛiŋ pi ni mbhɔ Minnwi, kaŋ yie nōoŋ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi kwo nyīeŋ ti mbara vəɨ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgaŋ ghrɨ́ tuo maoŋ nchhɔ̀ pi nthɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi laʼa yi nɛ, kaŋ maoŋ pi pighɔ pɔ shiʼi.
Ndɔ ti ndɨɨ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a pɨnɨ mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nchaa vi, nii vi ŋgaʼa vi nɛ, kaŋ a shi ŋkwe maoŋ nchhɔ̀ pi ŋa a yɨʼə noŋ yi ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ̄gɔ maoŋ pi pighɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ŋgra.
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ ŋgei mu nɛ mbɨ̌na a, ŋoŋ ŋa pigi yu lɔ ŋkɨrɨ nu kaʼa nɛ thɔ nshaaŋshaaŋ.
“Ndɨɨ ŋa jijwɛ miŋwɛiŋ taoŋ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ nɛ, a nyīeŋ moŋ pa lɨʼɨ yó nthɔ ntāʼa lɨʼɨ fɛrɛ noŋ yi. Ŋga mieŋ ki yəɨ sheshe lɨʼɨ, nchhu ŋa, ‘Ǹshi mbɨnɨ nda mu, lɨʼɨ ŋa mi ni ndhɔ nɛ.’
A ghà mbɨnɨ, njəɨ moŋ nda pi kwo yɨ̄gɨ ndɔ nchwīe a kāʼo.
A pɨnɨ kiʼɛ ndɔ̄gɔ khwachəɨ pichəɨ jijwɛ ŋa pugu pɨ̄nɨ mbɨgɨ nchaa vi nɛ, pugu pugu thɔ nii ndaʼa nu fɔ, chɔmbhi ŋoŋ ghɔ pɨnɨ mbɨgɨ nchaa nɔ haʼaŋ a ni fǔoŋ mbɔ nɛ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nchhu nnu yei, yichəɨ miŋgwɛ shɨna yú ŋgwa pighɔ kə̄rə ŋggì yi nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Mbɔrɔ yi puŋ yɛ ŋa a phi ghɔ nɛ, pugu pa yi pɨnɨ yɛ ŋa a nuʼɔŋ ghɔ nɛ.”
Ndɔ a khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Mbɔrɔ ka pɔ pi yi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà Minnwi ndɔ nchwīe nɛ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ yú ŋgwa ni mbīgi nu nɛ, a jɛ̄ nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yei ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ pɨphɨ, a taʼa lì llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi ndɔ mbaʼa pi nōoŋ kaŋ taʼa lì ni pugu ŋkiɛŋ nnu ghraoghrao Jona.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Jona ni mbɔ lì ni ŋgwa Nineve nɛ, a wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mbɔ lì ni ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yei nɛ.

“Moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa, Ŋgwafuoŋ Sheba shi ma ntithi pugu pa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yei ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa nthɛ ŋa a ki nyīeŋ ŋkiɛŋ ntaaŋ ndaoŋ llɔ laʼataoŋ yu nthɔ njwɛrɛ ntɨ́gɨ shiethɔ mbhɔ Fùoŋ Sholomu, ndɔ līi njəɨ, yaoŋ ŋa a chaa Sholomu nɛ pɔ hɛiŋ.

Moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa, ŋgwa Nineve shi ma ntithi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ ndɨɨ ŋa Jona ni nshwei chrà Minnwi ni pugu nɛ, ndɔ ti līi njəɨ, yaoŋ ŋa a chaa Jona nɛ pɔ hɛiŋ.
“Ŋoŋ shiʼa nchuʼu truka ndɔ ndə̄ɨŋ, ki niʼiŋ laʼo mikru, ŋoŋ ghà nchuʼu ntigi pi ŋkuoŋ ntigi, nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa gha nii nu pugu yəɨ líʼɛ.
Ligi yɔ pɔ pi laŋ noŋ yɔ. Ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ yəɨ fàʼa Minnwi mbiŋ shiʼi
nɛ ŋguoŋ noŋ yɔ lɨnaoŋ ni líʼɛ. Ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ yaʼo ŋgīʼɛ piŋ nu nɛ, noŋ yɔ lɨnaoŋ ni njiŋnjiŋ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, lɨna nu ŋa kiʼi yaoŋ ŋa ɔ pīʼi ŋa a líʼɛ mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ pɔ pi njiŋnjiŋ.
Ti ŋguoŋ noŋ yɔ ndɨnaoŋ pi ni líʼɛ ki yichəɨ ghrà lɔ mbɔ njiŋ, kaŋ ŋguoŋ noŋ yɔ shi ndiʼɛ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ truka ghà ndiʼɛ shiʼi ɔ yəɨ ŋguoŋ noŋ yɔ nɛ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ chrā nu, ŋoŋ Farashi gɛ̄ vi ŋa pugu yu jɨ maoŋ, nnɛ a nii nda nchɔchhɔ nɔ jɨ nu maoŋ pighɔ.
Ŋoŋ Farashi ghɔ ni ŋgrào ndɨɨ ŋa a ni njəɨ Jishɔ jɨ nu ki lɔ njiʼi nshɨ̄gao mbhɔ yi nɔ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ yugu ni nchhu nɛ.
Taathɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Pəɨ Farashi ghà nshɨ̄gao ŋkǔnu ndua pugu pa mikru, ndɔ ndɨnaoŋ ni pɨ̀ga pugu pa mbha nnu pɨphɨ.
Pa na pei! Minnwi ŋa a chwīe ŋkuoŋ yi nɛ, lɔ ŋguʼɔ nchwīe ju nchwīe mooŋ yi?
Ndɔ lɔ̄gɔ maoŋ pɛ ŋa a pɔ moŋ ndua pugu pa mikru nɛ ŋgɛ̄rɛ ghaŋ pou nɔ ghɔ, kaŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ shi mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ yəɨ chhu nɛ.

“Ndɔ ŋgəʼɨ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ, ma ŋgwa Farashi, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ fɛ shwéi pa mishwrɛi pugu pa laoŋ, ni pa trǔ kru, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ntuʼɔshə nɔ pɔ nu ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ni ŋgwamishua ndɔ mbɨnɨ ŋkhwā Minnwi. Pəɨ chwīe nnu pei ndɔ ki lɔ mieŋ pichəɨ.
“Ŋgəʼɨ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ, ma ŋgwa Farashi, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ khwā nɔ chhɔ nu ŋkuoŋ lə̌ɨ pa ŋgwa ndiɛŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi pugu pa ŋa pi chrā ni pəɨ ni ndighaʼo moŋ pa lɨʼɨ kaʼa.
Ŋgəʼɨ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pɔ nɔ fúŋ ŋa pi lɔ nūʼɔŋ lì yi, ŋgwa nyīeŋ nu ŋkuoŋ ghɔ ki lɔ nji.”
Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, ɔ ghà ŋga nchhu nɛiŋ ŋgwɛʼi vigi wɛʼi.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋgəʼɨ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ, ma ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà mfrɛ̄i ŋgwa ni lrì ŋa a ghaʼa nɔ tiɛŋ nu, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfɛ muuŋshɨmbhɔ yəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ndrɨ nɔ ghɔ.
Ŋgəʼɨ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà ŋkrao pa ŋkiɛŋ fúŋ ni pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, nɔ kwiŋ nu vugu, ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pɛ ŋa tǎa pəɨ ni njwi nɛ.
Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ nōoŋ nu ŋa pəɨ piŋ nnu ŋa pa tǎa pəɨ ni nchwīe nu nɛ, pugu ni njwi pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, pəɨ krao fúŋ yugu.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, shiethɔ Minnwi chhu ŋa, ‘Ǹshi ntaoŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pugu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ, pi jwi pichəɨ ndɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pichəɨ.’
“Nɛnnɛ chhǐ ŋguoŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋa pi jwi jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni mbaʼo mbhi nɛ shi nthi thɔ ŋgwa mbhi shiʼa.

Llɔ ŋkuoŋ jwi nu Abe ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ŋkuoŋ jwi nu Shakaria, ŋa pi ni njwi vi shɨna lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu lɨʼɨ Taoŋtaoŋ Nda Minnwi nɛ. A yie, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa chhǐ yugu shi nthi thɔ pəɨ. Shishini, pəɨ mbhi shiʼa fāʼo njɔ́ nɔ thɔ yugu ghao.

“Ŋgəʼɨ shi nii vəɨ, ma pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi, pəɨ lə̄ɨŋ chuʼɔ nda yɛ ŋa shiethɔ pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ nɔ nii nu moŋ ghɔ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mieŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu tāʼa nu nii fɔ nɛ ŋa pugu nii.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga ndɔllɔ fɔ, pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi thɔ ndāa chrà yi ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi, nthɔ mfra vi ni ntou pie ŋa a chrā ntou nnu.
Nnɛ nthɔ ŋkuʼɔ puŋ yi ŋa a chrā nnu ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɛ, pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi.
Ndɨɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pa ŋkaŋŋkaŋ ŋgwa ni ŋkɨrɨ nu taʼa lɨʼɨ nɛ ti pichəɨ kuʼɔ nu mbɨŋ pichəɨ nɛ, Jishɔ fǔoŋ njɛ̄ chrā nu pi ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɨna yishi pa ŋgwa Farashi mbɔ nnu mifɨɨ.
Yichəɨ yaoŋ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ fɔ ŋa pi pūoŋ ŋa mbaʼa Minnwi mieŋ ki nōoŋ páa. Paʼa yichəɨ nnu lə̄ɨŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ ŋa mbaʼa pi yiʼi mieŋ ki ji.
Nɛnnɛ, sheshe nnu ŋa ɔ chhu moŋ njíŋ nɛ, pi lɛ njaʼo lɨʼɨ líʼɛ, sheshe nnu ŋa ɔ chūuŋ moŋ njiɛŋ nda nɛ, pi lɛ nchīi mbhi.
“Ǹchhu ni pəɨ, ma pa taannu paŋ, kiʼi pəɨ pɔgɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa mimfɛ pugu wuʼɔ njwi pi frɛinoŋ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa a pɨgɨ nchaa yie nɛ.

Ndɔ ǹshi nshwei vəɨ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ pɔgɔ vi nɛ, pəɨ pɔgɔ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a pɨnɨ mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ māʼaŋ nu moŋ móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ ndɨɨ ŋa a kwo jwi nɛ. Pəɨ piŋ nnu ŋa ǹchhu ni pəɨ nɛ, a ju mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ pɔgɔ nɛ.
“Pi shiʼa fīni tiɛŋ puoŋ milunu pi wuʼɔ ni paa puoŋ mi mbɨŋ? Ndɔ ti Minnwi shiʼa ndīʼɛ kaŋ taʼa yi shɨna pugu.
Kiʼi mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu, ɔ ghaʼo mbhɔ Minnwi nchaa ntou milunu. Minnwi shia ŋguoŋ ŋgiithɔ yɔ ghao.
“Ndɔ ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chhu shhɨ ŋgwamishua ŋa a nyaŋ nɛ, Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi nchhu ŋkaa yu ŋa a ji shhɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi.
Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lāa a shhɨ ŋgwamishua nɛ, Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi ndāa vi shhɨ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shi nchhu nnu pɨphɨ nɔ ligi Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua nɛ, Minnwi shi ndīʼɛ phɨ yi, ndɔ ti shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shi ŋgwɛʼi Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ, mbaʼa Minnwi līʼɛ phɨ yi.
“Ndɨɨ ŋa pi lɔ̄gɔ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ nda luoŋ Minnwi ki shhɨ ghaŋ sháʼa, ki shhɨ pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa nɛ, kiʼi ŋgwie noŋ yɔ ni nnu ŋa ɔ shi nchhu nɛ ki ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ɔ shi ntaa noŋ yɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi shi ntɨgɨ ghɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ ni nnu ŋa a kāʼo ŋa ɔ chhu nɛ.”
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ moŋ kɨrɨ ŋgwa pighɔ chhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Masha, chhu ni ndǐŋ a ŋa a ghrā maoŋ pɛ ŋa tǎa mieŋ ni pigi nɛ, mfɛ nyaŋ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Taannu a, a nūʼɔŋ gɔ̌ nūʼɔŋ a nɔ ŋgaŋ shaʼa sháʼa ki ŋgaŋ ghrā maoŋ shɨna pəɨ ndǐŋ ghɔ?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ywɛrɛ thɔ yəɨ, nthɔ ndɨna nu ŋa kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo sheshe ŋkwaŋ pɨ̀ga nthɛ ŋa chɔmbhi ŋoŋ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi moŋ ntou maoŋ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ.”
Jishɔ shwei yei luʼɔ chrà ni pugu:
“Ŋgaŋ fàʼo chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ, maoŋ pwa moŋ nyìeŋ yu ŋgaʼa.
A pīʼi nu moŋ njùʼɔ yu ŋa, ‘Mi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ yo? Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ mfāʼo lɨʼɨ ŋa minthɛ ǹūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ maoŋ paŋ pei fɔ.’
Nɛnnɛ a chhu ŋa, ‘Yei nnu ŋa ǹshi nchwīe nɛ, ǹshi mbɨnɨ nshāʼa lɨʼɨ nūʼɔŋ maoŋ paŋ, ŋkrao pi nduoŋ mbɔ pi ghaʼoghaʼo, nūʼɔŋ maoŋ jɨ paŋ pugu pa pichəɨ maoŋ paŋ moŋ ghɔ.
Nchhu ni noŋ a ŋa, “Mbrɔthɔ ŋoŋ! Ɔ fāʼo ŋguoŋ maoŋ shiʼi ŋa a pie ŋa ɔ fāʼo nɔ ntou ŋgaʼo nɛ, fɛrɛ noŋ yɔ, njɨ, nnu, mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ.” ’ ”
“Ndɔ Minnwi chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Yaoŋ na yei! Ni tuʼu yei ǹshi ŋkwe chɔmbhi yɔ. A shi ŋga mbɔ nɛnnɛ, maoŋ pinɛ ŋa ɔ kɨrɨ nɛ pɔ yi gɔ̌?’ ”
Jishɔ lūgwi ŋa,
“Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a shi mbɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu kɨrɨ fāʼo ni noŋ pugu ki lɔ mfāʼo ligi Minnwi nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ wie noŋ yəɨ nthɛ chɔmbhi yəɨ, ŋa pəɨ shi njɨ pi khɔ ki nthɛ ŋgrào noŋ yəɨ, ŋa pəɨ shi māʼaŋ pi khɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa chɔmbhi chaa maoŋ jɨ, noŋ yɔ chaa ndhwí.
Pīʼi mbɨŋ pa mishi, pugu shiʼa mbhi, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋkwōo, paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo shaoŋ ki lɨʼɨ nūʼɔŋ maoŋ, ndɔ Minnwi kugwi vugu ghao. Ndɔ ɔ ghaʼo mbhɔ Minnwi nchaa pa mishi.
Minthɛ shesheŋoŋ vəɨ pɨnɨ mbīgi chɔmbhi yi wuʼɔ shɨgɛi nthɛ ŋa a wie noŋ yi?
Ŋa mimfɛ paʼa ɔ lɔ njiʼi nchwīe muuŋ mi nnu nɔ yinɛ nɛ, ɔ nuʼuŋ ŋgwie noŋ yɔ ni pichəɨ pa nnu nthɛ khɔ?
“Pīʼi mbɨŋ pa frawa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu ghà ŋkuʼɔ nɛ, pugu shiʼa mfāʼa ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ntuŋ ndhwí, ndɔ ǹshwei ghɔ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi Sholomu moŋ ŋguoŋ ndighaʼo yi ghao shini ndɔ mbwa ti mbɔ nɔ taʼa frawa.
Ti M̈innwi māʼaŋ fɨʼɨ ndìpwa yei mbɨŋ pa trǔ ŋa a yi maoŋ shiʼa, yua gha mbɔ nu a kwo yaoŋ ti pi tūoŋ nɛ, pəɨ pīʼi ŋa a shi ndɨna ni pəɨ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ? Ŋgwa piŋ kikɛʼi pei!
Nɛnnɛ kiʼi pəɨ wuʼɔ nthɔ ŋgwie noŋ yəɨ pi lɨʼɨ taʼa yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ shi njɨ ki nnu nɛ, ki mfāʼo ghaghana moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ.
Pa ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei thɔ ntei pi njiŋ maoŋ pei, ndɔ ni pəɨ, Minnwi Tǎa vəɨ ji ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ fāʼo maoŋ pei.
Pəɨ ka shigi pi Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi moŋ chɔmbhi yəɨ, nɛnnɛ kaŋ Minnwi shi mfɛ ŋguoŋ maoŋ pei ghao ni pəɨ.

“Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ, ghaŋ younjiŋ paŋ pɔ pi shɨgɛi nɔ muuŋ kwíe minjɨɨ nɛ, kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu ŋa mbaʼa pəɨ yiʼi mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ yru ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa Tǎa vəɨ Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ nthi Mi moŋ khwǎ njùʼɔ yi ŋa pəɨ pugu shi nshaʼa fùoŋ kaʼa.
“Pəɨ fīni maoŋ pəɨ, mfɛ mbɨŋ ghɔ ni ghaŋ pou, mbaʼo nɔ fāʼo nu pìɛŋ mbɨŋ ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi mbɨrɨ nɛ, pugu pa fàʼo po ŋa mbaʼa a ma mmɛ, lɨʼɨ ŋa mbaʼa ŋgɨna chəɨŋ fɔ, ndɔ mbaʼa shə́ʼɨ kru.
Nthɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ ŋa fàʼo yɔ pɔ nɛ, a lɨʼɨ ŋa njùʼɔ yɔ shi mbɔ ŋkaa yu nɛ.
“Pəɨ pīri noŋ yəɨ ni sheshe nnu ŋa a shi nthɔ nɛ, ŋkrao ŋkandaŋ yəɨ a tɨnɨ, nchuʼu laŋ yəɨ a kɨɨ nu,
nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ywɛrɛ taathɔ vugu a kwəɨ lɨʼɨ jɨ láŋ, nɛnnɛ ŋa a shi ŋga ŋkwəɨ ŋkwēi nda, pugu kiʼi nchuʼɔ chuʼɔ taʼa ŋgɛ.
Pwatua pɔ ni pɛ puoŋ fàʼa ŋa taathɔ vugu kwəɨ njəɨ vugu pugu wuʼɔ mbiʼi tɔthɨ nɛ. Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, a shi mbīri noŋ yi nshwei vugu ŋa pugu chhɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi, a thɔ ŋgrā maoŋ ni pugu.
Pwatua shi mbɔ ni puoŋ fàʼa pɛ ŋa taathɔ vugu gha njəɨ vugu pugu kwo pīri noŋ yugu nɔ sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa a shi nthɔ nɛ. Ki a thɔ pi moŋ ntuŋ mbhi, ki ni ndaʼambilaŋ.
“Ndɔ mimfɛ ɔ fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa ŋ̈gaŋ nda kaŋ nji ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgɨna shi nthɔ nɛ, a shi kaŋ ndɔ mieŋ nda yi a pəʼɨ.
Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ pīri noŋ yəɨ, nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua thɔ nu moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa mbaʼa pəɨ yiʼi mbīʼi nɛ.”
Pita pie ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ chrā yei luʼɔ chrà pi ni pigi ki ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa?”
Taathɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“A gɔ̌ kiʼɛ mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa tithi ndɔ mfāʼo shiethɔ, ŋa taathɔ shi nūʼɔŋ vi a lɨna nu ni nda yi ndɔ ŋgrā maoŋ jɨ ni pichəɨ ghaŋ fàʼa ndɨɨ ŋa ndɨɨ kāʼo nɛ?
Mbɔrɔ shi mbɔ ni muuŋ fàʼa yɛ ŋa masha vi yəɨ vi a thɔ fāʼa nu shiʼi ndɨɨ ŋa a thɔ nɛ.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, a shi nūʼɔŋ vi a thɔ ndɨna ju ni ŋguoŋ maoŋ pi.
Ndɔ ti m̈uuŋ fàʼa ghɔ mbīʼi moŋ njùʼɔ yu ŋa mbaʼa taathɔ vi yīʼɛ mbɨnɨ, nchhɔ ŋgwie pichəɨ ghaŋ fàʼa, mbɔ pi pimbia pugu pa pi piŋgɛ, nthɔ njɨ maoŋ ndɔ nnu mbaa nu,
kaŋ taathɔ vi shi nɛ ŋkwəɨ pi llɛ́ yɛ ŋa a shi lɔ mbīʼi nɛ pugu pa ndɨɨ ŋa a shi lɔ nji nɛ, ndɔ nchrɛi vi kaoŋkaoŋ. A yəɨ ŋkwaŋ ŋgəʼɨ ghaŋ fàʼa mbe.
“Ŋgaŋ fàʼa ŋa a ji nnu ŋa taathɔ vi tāʼa nu ŋa a chwīe nɛ, ki lɔ njiʼi mbīri noŋ yi, ki nchwīe nnu ghɔ ŋa taathɔ vi tāʼa nu nɛ, shi mfāʼo ŋkiɛŋ tɨtɨnɨ wie.

Ndɔ ti ŋoŋ ŋa a shini ndɔ nji, ndɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa a pie wie nɛ, shi ŋkwe shɨgɛi wie. Ŋoŋ ŋa pi fɛ ntou yi ghɔ nɛ, pi shi mbie ntou yi mbhɔ yu. Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa pi fɛ ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi ghɔ nɛ, pi shi mbie vi pi ni ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi.
“Ŋki thɔ pi nɔ māʼaŋ nu móŋoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ǹjūa ŋa a kaŋ ni ŋkwo kɨɨ nu.
Ndɔ, m̀fāʼo kwe ŋkhǐ nɔ tɔgɔ nu moŋ ghɔ, mbɔ ŋgəʼɨ pugu pa gu. M̀fāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ ti a shi nthɔ ntɔgɔ.
Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa ǹthɔ pi nɔ fɛ nu taʼaŋggi ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ? Ŋga, ǹthɔ pi ni minduoŋnduoŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa jɛ̄ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, moŋ nda ŋa tiɛŋ ŋgwa pɔ fɔ nɛ, pugu shi nchhɔ kikie, trɛi ŋgwa pɔ ni taʼa kwò, pi paa pɔ ni taʼa kwò.
Pugu shi nthi pi nduoŋnduoŋ, tǎa pugu muuŋ vi yi mimbia pɔ kikie, maa pugu muuŋ vi yi miŋgwɛ pɔ kikie, maŋgaoŋ pugu ŋgwɛ muuŋ vi chhɔ kikie, ŋgwɛ muuŋ chhɔ kikie pugu maŋgaoŋ vi.”
Jishɔ pɨnɨ nchhu ni yú ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ yəɨ mbɨ̀ kuʼɔ nu ŋgei nii minaoŋ nɛ, pəɨ kiʼi nchuchu taʼa ŋgɛ́ ŋa, ‘Mbɨ̀ shi ndhɔ.’ Ndɔ a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɛnnɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ yəɨ fɨfrəɨ laoŋ llɔ mbiɛŋ nɛ
, pəɨ kiʼi nchuchu ŋa, ‘Minaoŋ shi ntūoŋ.’ Ndɔ a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɛnnɛ.
Pa ŋgwa mifɨɨ pei, mimfɛ pəɨ līi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ po pugu shhɛ pɔ nɛ nchhu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ yie llɛmbhi shi mbɔ nɛ, ti a chwīe khɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ nji njiŋ pa nnu ŋa a thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ndwɛ nɛ?
“A chwīe khɔ paʼa ɔ lɔ mbīʼi ni noŋ yɔ nnu ŋa a kāʼo nɛ ndɔ nchwīe?

Nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ ghə̄ɨ nu pəɨ ŋoŋ haʼaŋ a puru ghɔ shhɨ ŋgaŋ sháʼa nɛ, kāa nɔ lūgwi nu pəɨ yu shɛndaoŋ. Ɔ̈ mieŋ ki chwīe nɛnnɛ, kaŋ a shi ndɔ̄gɔ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ ŋgaŋ sháʼa mfɛ ghɔ ni pa brushi, pugu niʼiŋ ghɔ chə́ɨŋ.
Ǹshwei ghɔ, mbaʼa ɔ ma ntaoŋ ki lɔ naa mbe ŋguoŋ njɔ́ yɔ ghao.”
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa ni mbɔ fɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋa pugu ni nshwei Jishɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Pailɛ ni njwi pichəɨ ŋgwa Galili ndɨɨ ŋa pugu thɔ fɛ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni Minnwi nɛ.
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa ŋgwa Galili pei chwīe phɨ nchaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Galili nduoŋ nthɛ ŋa pi jwi vugu nnɛ nɛ?
Ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa ŋga! Ndɔ ti p̈əɨ mieŋ ki pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ kaŋ pəɨ shi ŋkhu ghao ŋkaa pəɨ.
Ki pəɨ pīʼi ŋa fuoŋnchrɔ ŋgwa laʼataoŋ Shiloaŋ, ŋa nda tɔthɨ ni ŋgū njwi vugu nɛ, ni mbɔ pi pa ŋgwo nnu mbɨmbhɨ nchaa ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nchhɔ Jerushalɛiŋ
nɛ?
Ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa ŋga! Ndɔ ti p̈əɨ mieŋ ki pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ, kaŋ pəɨ ghao shi ŋkhu ŋkaa pəɨ.”
Jishɔ chhu yei luʼɔ chrà ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi:
“Yichəɨ ŋoŋ ni mbhi wùnu moŋ nyìeŋ yu, nthɔ lɨʼɨ ka ntíɛŋ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ paʼa a lɔ mbɔ.
Nnɛ, a chhu ni ŋgaŋ fàʼa yi ŋa, ‘Līi njəɨ, nɔ trɛi ŋgaʼo ǹthɔ nthɔ nu hɛiŋ nɔ thɔ nu ntāʼa ntíɛŋ thɨ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ sheshe yi. Kəʼɨ māʼaŋ shhɛ, kiʼi a nuʼuŋ nthɔ njɨ shhɛ gha.’
“Muuŋ fàʼa yi ghɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, pɨnɨ mieŋ fɔ nɔ taʼa ŋgaʼo, ntou laʼo yi niʼiŋ khí fɔ.
Ti ä njuŋ ntíɛŋ ŋgaʼo yini, a pwa, ti ä nchhɔ ki yuŋ, ɔ kəʼɨ vi māʼaŋ shhɛ.’ ”
Yichəɨ taʼa Llɛ́ Ji pa Juu ni mbɔ, Jishɔ thɔ njɛʼi nu moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi.
Ŋga njəɨ nu, yichəɨ miŋgwɛ chəɨŋ fɔ, mfāʼo jijwɛ pɨphɨ ŋa a ni nchwīe a ghɨ̄nɔ nu nɔ fuoŋnchrɔ ŋgaʼo. A ni ntuʼutuʼu, ti mimfɛ paʼa a lɔ ntithi tɔthɨ ndɨndɨ.
Jishɔ gha njəɨ vi, mɛ̄iŋ vi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Miŋgwɛ, ɔ lūgu moŋ ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ.”
Nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ mi mbɨŋ yu, a pɨʼɨ ntithi ndɨndɨ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, ŋgaʼo Minnwi.

Mmɛŋoŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi pɨgɨtua ŋa Jishɔ yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ Llɛ́ Ji. Nchhu ni pa ŋgwa ŋa, “Pi fāʼo nɔ fāʼa nu nɔ ntɨgao llɛmbhi, nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ thɔ pi moŋ shɨna llɛ́ pighɔ pi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yəɨ, kiʼi a pɔ pi Llɛ́ Ji.”
Taathɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ghaŋ mifɨɨ pei, shesheŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ shiʼa mfēi fua yi pugu ŋkwɛ́iŋ yi moŋ nda ŋa pugu ghà ndaʼa nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju choŋkhi mfɛ ŋkhǐ ghɔ Llɛ́ Ji?
Ti ndwɛ, m̀baʼa ŋkwe miŋgwɛ vei Llɛ́ Ji, muuŋ Abrahaŋ, ŋa Shata ŋkrao vi nɔ fuoŋnchrɔ ŋgaʼo nɛ?”
A ni ŋga nchhu nnu yei, lrithɔ wɛ̄iŋ pa mbɨ̌na pi, ndɔ ŋguoŋ pichəɨ pa ŋgwa nduoŋ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ ŋguoŋ pa mɛmmɛ nnu ŋa a chwīe nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ pie ŋa,
“Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi pɔ pi nɔ khɔ? Mimfɛ m̀āʼaŋ fɨʼɨ yi pi ni khɔ?
A pɔ pi nɔ mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ yi gɛ, ŋa ŋoŋ lɔ̄gɔ ŋgə̄ɨ māʼaŋ moŋ nyìeŋ yu, a kuʼɔ ŋgū thɨ, pa mishi thɔ ŋkrao nda pugu ŋkuoŋ pa mbhɔ pi.”
A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mbie ŋa,
“Mimfɛ m̀āʼaŋ fɨʼɨ nɔ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi pi ni khɔ?
A pɔ pi nɔ yaoŋ chwīe prupɨna kuʼɔ haʼaŋ miŋgwɛ lɔ̄gɔ niʼiŋ moŋ taʼa brumaʼa prupɨna, a chwīe ŋguoŋ prupɨna ghɔ kuʼɔ ghao.”
Jishɔ ni nyīeŋ ntɔgɔ moŋ pa mɛmmɛ laʼataoŋ pugu pa puoŋ mi puoŋ pi, nthɔ njɛʼi nu nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ntɔgɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ.
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ pie vi ŋa, “Taathɔ, a wuʼɔ shɨgɛi ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu shi ndūgu?”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ǹshwei vəɨ, pəɨ paʼo nɔ nii nu pi moŋ muuŋ chonda, nthɛ ŋa ntou ŋgwa shi mbaʼo nɔ nii nu ndɔ a ghaʼa vugu.

Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgaŋ nda shi nuʼuŋ ndɔllɔ mfɨ̄nɨ chonda nɛ, pəɨ tithi mbhi nthɔ ŋkwēi chonda, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, chuʼɔ chonda ni pigi.’ A shi ŋkhwɛ̄ nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, ‘Ǹdɔ njiʼi nji vəɨ ki lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pəɨ llɔ nɛ.’
Nɛnnɛ, pəɨ shi nchhu ŋa, ‘Pia ni njɨ ndɔ nnu kaʼa, ndɔ ɔ ni njɛʼi shɛndaoŋ laʼataoŋ pigi.’
Ndɔ a shi nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, ‘Ǹdɔ njiʼi nji vəɨ ki lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pəɨ llɔ nɛ. Pəɨ lɔllɔ, ŋguoŋ vəɨ pa ŋgūo nnu mbɨmbhɨ.’
“Pəɨ shi ŋkə̄ɨ ndɔ ŋkru shua məɨ fɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ yəɨ Abrahaŋ, ni Aiji, ni Jakɔ, ni ŋguoŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, pugu pɔ moŋ ntuʼɔ fùoŋ Minnwi ndɔ, pi māʼaŋ vəɨ mbhi.
Ŋgwa shi ma ndhɔ ŋgei laʼataoŋ shaʼa minaoŋ, ni yi ŋgei nii minaoŋ pi ma ndhɔ khwi pugu pa mbiɛŋ, nchhɔ yəɨ taprɛi moŋ ntuʼɔ fùoŋ Minnwi.
Līi njəɨ, pichəɨ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ ndugwi njiŋ nɛ ma mbɔ shhɨ, pichəɨ ŋa pugu pɔ shhɨ lūgwi njiŋ.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi thɔ mbara Jishɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Kwiɛŋ ŋkiʼɛ ŋgəɨghəɨ, nthɛ ŋa Hɛrɔ tāʼa nu njwi ghɔ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ghə̄ɨ nshwei mimbaaŋguo ghɔ fɛ a nɔ ghɔ ŋa ǹthɔ nɛ mfuʼu pa miŋwɛiŋ ndɔ njɨ̄gɨ pa ghɨ̌nɔ shiʼa pugu pa yua, ndɔ a gha mbɔ moŋ trɛi llɛ́ m̀īʼɛŋ fàʼa a.
Ndɔ a kāʼo vəɨ ŋa shiʼa, ni yua, pugu pa yua vini, m̀bɔ shɛndaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu, nthɛ ŋa mimfɛ paʼa pi lɔ njwi njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ki a lɔ mbɔ pi Jerushalɛiŋ.

“Jerushalɛiŋ, Jerushalɛiŋ, laʼataoŋ ŋa pugu jwi pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ndɔ ntuŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pi taoŋ vugu vɛ nɛ ni ŋgùʼɔ, a ŋgɛ́ yi khɔ ŋa ǹtāʼa nu ŋkɨrɨ puoŋ pɔ taʼa lɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ miŋguo ghà ŋkɨrɨ puoŋ pi laʼo prǎ yi nɛ, ndɔ paʼa ɔ lɔ ntāʼa nu.
Līi njəɨ, nda yəɨ kɨna ŋkuʼɔ fùŋ. Ndɔ ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa mbaʼa pəɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ a, kaŋ a nɛiŋ ndɨɨ thɔ ŋa pəɨ shi nchhu ŋa, ‘Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a thɔ nɔ ligi Taathɔ nɛ.’ ”
Yichəɨ Llɛ́ Ji ni mbɔ, Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ nda yichəɨ nthishɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi lɨʼɨ jɨ maoŋ, pa ŋgwa thɔ mbɛʼi vi.
Ŋga njəɨ nu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni mfāʼo ghɨ̌nɔ mikuʼɔ kwò pugu pa mbhɔ chəɨŋ.
Jishɔ pie ni pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi ŋa,
“Gɨ́ piŋ ŋa pi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋoŋ Llɛ́ Ji ki ŋga?”
Paʼa pugu lɔ ŋkhwɛ̄, Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ ŋgaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ ghɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yi mieŋ vi kiʼɛ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ.
Nɛnnɛ a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A yəɨ ŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ ŋa m̈uuŋ vi ki fua yi ŋgū moŋ tiɛŋ ŋkhǐ shishhi, paʼa a lɔ ŋkiʼi nshūu vi shūu mfuʼu Llɛ́ Ji?”
Pugu pou khwɛ̀.
Jishɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ nchrā luʼɔ chrà ni pa ghaŋ gɛ̀ pi ndɨɨ ŋa a yəɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu chhɔ ntɛrɛ pa lɨʼɨ liɛŋ yəɨ taprɛi nɛ, nchhu nu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ ŋa pi gɛ̄ ghɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ láŋ nɛ, kiʼi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ liɛŋ, nthɛ ŋa kəʼɨchəɨ pi gɛ̄ ŋoŋ ŋa a chɨ̄ɨ nchaa ghɔ.
Nnɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a gɛ̄ vəɨ nɛ shi nthɔ nchhu vɛ ŋa, ‘Fɛ lɨʼɨ yɔ ni ŋoŋ vei!’, kaŋ ɔ shi ŋgə̄ɨ kiʼɛ moŋ shhunoŋ ndɔ̄gɔ ndugwi njiŋ lɨʼɨ.

“Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi gɛ̄ ghɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, ghə̄ɨ nchhɔ nɔ ndugwi njiŋ lɨʼɨ, nɛnnɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa a gɛ̄ ghɔ thɔ nɛ, kəʼɨchəɨ a chhu vɛ ŋa, ‘Taannu a, kuʼɔ nɔ lɨʼɨ liɛŋ’. Nɛnnɛ ɔ shi nchɨɨ ligi ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pəɨ pugu pɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kə̄rə noŋ yi nɛ, pi shi nshwiʼi vi shhɛ. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shwiʼi noŋ yi shhɛ nɛ, pi shi ŋkə̄rə vi tɔthɨ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋkaa yu ŋa a ni ŋgɛ̄ vi nɛ ŋa,

“Ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ pīri ŋkiɛŋ maoŋ jɨ nɛ, kiʼi mɛ̄iŋ pi taannu pɔ, ki lǐŋ pɔ, ki ndaaŋoŋ yɔ, ki taakuo pɔ, mbɔ ghaŋ fàʼo, nthɛ ŋa pugu shi ma ŋgɛ̄ ghɔ ŋkaa pugu nnɛ a pɔ ŋa ɔ kwo fāʼo pe yɔ ni nnu ŋa ɔ ni nchwīe nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ pīri jɨ nɛ, gɛ̄ pi pa mbou, pa ŋkwíni, pa nchriligi,
nnɛ, kaŋ ɔ shi mfāʼo mbɔrɔ nthɛ ŋa mimfɛ paʼa pugu lɔ ma nduʼu vɛ. Minnwi shi nduʼu shiʼi yɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pa ŋgwa shiʼi lɛ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ gɛ̀ ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi ni njaʼo yei nnu nɛ, nchhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “A fɨʼɨ pwatua nɛiŋ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a shi mbɔ ŋgia jɨ moŋ ntuʼɔ fùoŋ Minnwi?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Yichəɨ ŋoŋ ni ma mbīri mmɛ jɨ ŋgɛ̄ ntou ŋgwa.
Ndɨɨ jɨ ghɔ ni ŋga ŋkāʼo, a taoŋ muuŋ fàʼa vi ŋa a chhu ni ghaŋ gɛ̀ pi ŋa, ‘Pəɨ thɔ, ŋguoŋ yaoŋ kwo kāʼo!’
Ŋguoŋ yugu ghao jɛ̄ nthɔ njūa shwieshwie. Fǔoŋ yi chhu ni muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ ŋa, ‘Ǹjuoŋ shhɛ, a pie ŋa ŋ̀guʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ, m̀baʼo mbhɔ ŋa a mieŋ a ǹduʼu.’
Yichəɨ chhu ji ŋa, ‘Ŋ̀kwo yuoŋ wuŋ fua fāʼa nyìeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu lɨʼɨ ywɛʼi vugu, nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹduoŋ ŋa a līʼɛ fàŋ a.’
Vichəɨ chhu ji ŋa, ‘Ŋ̀guʼɔ ŋka laŋlaŋ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, minthɛ paʼa ǹdɔ nthɔ.’

“Muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ pɨ̄nɨ nshwei taathɔ vi ni pa nnu pei. Ŋgaŋ nda ghɔ chhu ni muuŋ fàʼa vi ghɔ moŋ pɨgɨtua ŋa, ‘Taoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ pa laʼa, pugu pa fra, nchhu ni pa ghaŋ pou, pa ŋkwíni, pa nchriligi ŋa pugu thɔ.’
A gha ndara muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ chhu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, ŋ̀kwo fāʼa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ɔ chhu nɛ, ndɔ shɨna wuʼɔ mbiʼi ni pichəɨ ŋgwa moŋ nda.’
Nɛnnɛ, taathɔ pɨnɨ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Taoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ shɛndaoŋ ntou, pugu pa ndaoŋ mooŋ trǔ, nɨŋɨ ŋa ŋgwa thɔ nii nnɛ ŋa nda a lɨnaoŋ.
Ndɔ ǹshwei vəɨ, mbaʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa mi ni ŋgɛ̄ vugu nɛ ywɛʼi sheshe yaoŋ jɨ.’ ”
Ndwɛ, yú ŋgwa ni nthɔ njōu njiŋ Jishɔ, a kara nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋ̈oŋ nthɔ njiŋ a ki lɔ mbɨ̄na tǎa vi, pugu pa mǔuŋ vi, ni ŋgwɛ vi, pugu pa puoŋ pi, ni lǐŋ pi pi pimbia, pugu pa pi piŋgɛ, ooŋ, pugu pa chɔmbhi yi, kaŋ minthɛ paʼa a lɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ younjiŋ a.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ntiɛŋ wáʼa yi nthɔ njiŋ mu nɛ, nthɛ paʼa a lɔ njōu njiŋ a.
“A yəɨ ŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ ŋa ä ntāʼa nu ŋkrao nda tɔthɨ, paʼa a lɔ mfǔoŋ nchɔchhɔ shhɛ ndīi fɨʼɨ nchuoŋ yi, nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa a fāʼo fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa mimfɛ a krao nɔ ghɔ mīʼɛŋ nɛ?
Kiɛŋ nɛnnɛ, kaŋ a shi ŋga mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ kwonda tɔthɨ ghɔ ki lɔ mīʼɛŋ nda tɔthɨ ghɔ nɛ, shesheŋoŋ gha njəɨ, māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ,
nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Ŋoŋ vei ni njɛ̄ ŋkrao nu nda ki lɔ njiʼi mīʼɛŋ.’

“Ki a yəɨ fùoŋ ŋa minthɛ a ghə̄ɨ nu māʼaŋ yichəɨ fùoŋ ni wuŋ ŋkaŋ ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀, yie fùoŋ lɔ fāʼo pi paa wuŋ ŋkaŋ ghaŋ nchhɔ̀, ki a lɔ fǔoŋ nchɔchhɔ shhɛ ndīi ŋa mimfɛ a māʼaŋ vi ni wuŋ ŋkaŋ ghaŋ nchhɔ̀ pighɔ.
Ti a nchɔchhɔ njəɨ ŋa mimfɛ paʼa a lɔ māʼaŋ vi, a taoŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ mbie vie fùoŋ ŋa, ‘Pigi chwīe nɛiŋ nji ŋa mimfɛ pia fāʼo taʼaŋggi.’
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, shesheŋoŋ vəɨ nthɛ paʼa a lɔ njōu njiŋ a ki lɔ mīʼaŋ ŋguoŋ nnu pi nthɛ a.
“Khí pwa, ndɔ ghrɨ́ yi nɔ chwīe nu yaoŋ pwa mbhɛ, ɔ pɨnɨ ŋkwəɨ ni ghrɨ́ yi ghɔ pi nɛiŋ?
Nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi nuʼuŋ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ shhɛ, ki nɔ gwí ŋkuʼu maoŋ chwīe yaoŋ pwa. Pi ghà mīʼaŋ khí yɛ ŋa a lɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ nɛ mīʼaŋ. Ywɛrɛ, ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo!”
Llɛ́ chəɨ, ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi pugu pa pichəɨ ghaŋ chwīe phɨ thɔ yəɨ Jishɔ nɔ yaʼo nu nnu ŋa a ni njɛʼi nu nɛ,
pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi jɛ̄ luo nu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei piŋ pa ghaŋ chwīe phɨ ti nthɔ njɨ maoŋ jɨ pugu pugu.”
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ ni nchhu yei luʼɔ chrà ni pugu:
“A yəɨ ŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ ŋa ä mfāʼo taʼa ŋkɨɨ minjɨɨ, taʼa yi shɨna pugu phɛ, paʼa a lɔ mieŋ ndipuʼu wuŋ ni ndigi ndipuʼu moŋ ŋkǔnu, ŋgə̄ɨ njiŋ yɛ ŋa a phɛ nɛ, ntāʼa vi ti njəɨ?
Ndɨɨ ŋa a yəɨ vi nɛ, a tiɛŋ vi ŋkambəʼɨ yu, mbɨnɨ nɔ moŋ pwatua.
Ndɨɨ ŋa a pɨ̄nɨ laʼa nɛ, a gɛ̄ pa taannu pi, pugu pa taakuo pi, nchhu ni pugu ŋa, ‘Pia fāʼo pwatua nthɛ ŋa ǹjəɨ minjɨɨ a yɛ ŋa a ni mbhɛ nɛ.’ ”

Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ lūgwi ŋa, “Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ǹchhu nu vɛ ŋa ntou pwatua shi mbɔ po nthɛ taʼa ŋgaŋ phɨ ŋa a pāʼa ŋkǔnu yi ni phɨ nɛ, nchaa ndipuʼu wuŋ ni ndigi ndipuʼu ŋgwa shiʼi ŋa pugu pīʼi ŋa pugu lɔ mfāʼo nɔ paʼa nu ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ nɛ.
“Ki a yəɨ miŋgwɛ ŋa a mfāʼo wuŋ ndigi mbɨŋ, taʼa yi phɛ, a mieŋ ki lɔ nchuʼu laŋ, njɨ̄gɨ ŋguoŋ nda ghao, ntāʼa pɔpɔrɔ ti nuʼuŋ njəɨ.
Ŋga njəɨ, mɛ̄iŋ taannu pi, pugu pa taakuo pi, nchhu ni pugu ŋa, ‘P̂ia fāʼo pwatua, nthɛ ŋa ǹjəɨ ndigi mbɨŋ a yɛ ŋa a ni mbhɛ nɛ.’ ”
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ lūgwi ŋa, “Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ǹchhu nu vɛ ŋa, pwatua shi mbɔ shɨna pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi nthɛ taʼa ŋgaŋ phɨ ŋa a pāʼa ŋkǔnu yi ni phɨ nɛ.”
Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ, nchhu nu ŋa:
“Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ mfāʼo paa puoŋ pimbia.
Vi mikəʼɨ chhu ni tǎa vugu ŋa, ‘Ghrā maoŋ mfɛ nyaŋ, mbɔ maoŋ pɛ ŋa a kaŋ mbɔ nyaŋ ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ khu nɛ.’ Tǎa ghɔ ghrā maoŋ pi ni pugu.
“A ni ŋga ndaʼa shɨgɛi llɛ́, vi mikəʼɨ kɨrɨ ŋguoŋ maoŋ pi ghao, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ndaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ fie moŋ yichəɨ laʼataoŋ, nshāaŋ fɔ ghao moŋ jɨ ki tou.
A ni ŋga njɨ ŋguoŋ mbɨŋ yi ghao, nji gū moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ, a jɛ̄ pɔ nu moŋ pou.
A ghə̄ɨ mfɛ noŋ yi ni ŋoŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ nɔ ŋgaŋ fàʼa, ŋgaŋ vi taoŋ vi moŋ nyìeŋ yu ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nthɔ ŋkugwi ŋkunyaŋ.
A khwā nɔ kugwi nu noŋ yi ni maoŋ ŋa pa ŋkunyaŋ ni njɨ nu nɛ, ndɔ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ mfɛ sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a jɨ.
“Ndugwi yi, lɨna yi gha ŋkwəɨ, a chhu ni noŋ yi ŋa, ‘A fāʼo ghaŋ fàʼa tǎa a pi khɔ mfāʼo maoŋ jɨ ti a ka yiɛŋyiɛŋ ntɔrɔ, ǹthɔ ŋkhu njì hɛiŋ?
Ǹshi ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ tǎa a, njūa ghɔ ŋa, “Tǎa, m̀fāaŋ mbɨŋ Minnwi, mbɨnɨ mfāaŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ.
Ǹdɔ nuʼuŋ ŋkāʼo nɔ pɔ nu muuŋ ghɔ, lɔ̄gɔ a pi nɔ taʼa ŋgaŋ fàʼa yɔ.” ’
“Nnɛ a lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ yəɨ tǎa vi, ŋga ŋguʼɔ mbɔ fie hiŋ, tǎa vi yəɨ vi, mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ yu, ntaoŋ ntei ŋgə̄ɨ mbaŋ vi, nchrā ghɔ shiʼi.
Muuŋ ghɔ chhu ni tǎa vi ŋa, ‘Tǎa, m̀fāaŋ mbɨŋ Minnwi, mbɨnɨ mfāaŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ. A lɔ nuʼuŋ ŋkāʼo ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ a ŋa muuŋ ghɔ.’
“Ndɔ tǎa ghɔ chhu ni pa ghaŋ fàʼa pi ŋa, ‘Pəɨ kɔnɔ nthɔ ni ŋkiɛŋ ndhwí māʼaŋ mbɨŋ yu, ŋgwɛ krɛ́i nɔ mbhɔ yi, mbɨnɨ ŋgwɛ tra nɔ kwò yi.
Nthɔ ni muuŋ nàʼaŋ fuʼu njwi pia fāʼo jɨ,
nthɛ ŋa muuŋ a vei ni ŋkwo khu, mbɨnɨ njwiŋ! A ni mbhɛ, m̀bɨnɨ njəɨ vi!’ Pugu jɛ̄ jɨ nu kiʼɛ.
“Ndɨɨ ghɔ muuŋ shhɨ vi ni mbɔ moŋ nyìeŋ. Ŋga ŋkwəɨ nu ti mbara laʼa, njaʼo lōu pugu pa pini.
Mɛ̄iŋ yichəɨ taʼa muuŋ fàʼa mbie vi ŋa, ‘A lɔ̄gɔ khɔ, ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ?’
A chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Ndǐŋ ghɔ pɨnɨ, tǎa vəɨ jwi muuŋ nàʼaŋ tutru, nthɛ ŋa a kwəɨ laʼa shishiʼi.’
“A pɨgɨtua ndāa ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi nii nda. Tǎa vi taoŋ ndɨ̄gəɨ vi.
A luʼu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Līi njəɨ, m̀fāʼa mbhɔ ghɔ nɔ ntou ŋgaʼo paʼa ndɔ ma nchɨ̄ʼə nchò yɔ, ndɔ paʼa ɔ lɔ ma mfɛ muuŋ mimbhi vəɨ ŋa ŋ̀gwrā pigi pa taannu paŋ mfāʼo jɨ nɔ ghɔ.
Ndɔ ti yaoŋ muuŋ ghɔ vei, ŋa a shāaŋ maoŋ pɔ ghao ŋkuoŋ pa shakhɨ, gha ŋkwəɨ, ɔ jwi muuŋ nàʼaŋ tutru ghɔ.’
“A khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, ‘Muuŋ a, pɔgɔ ghà ŋguʼɔ mbɔ kaʼa, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a nyaŋ nɛ, a jɔ.
Ndɔ a kāʼo nɔ jɨ nu, ndɔ mfāʼo pwatua, nthɛ ŋa ndǐŋ ghɔ vei ni ŋkhu mbɨnɨ njwiŋ, a ni mbhɛ m̀bɨnɨ njəɨ vi.’ ”
Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa:
“Ŋgaŋ fàʼo chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ mfāʼo nthishɨ pa puoŋ fàʼa pi, ŋgwa thɔ ntūgu ghɔ ŋa muuŋ fàʼa yi ghɔ thɔ nshāaŋ mbɨŋ yi shāaŋ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, a mɛ̄iŋ vi nchhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Yei khɔ ŋa ǹthɔ njaʼo nu nthɛ ghɔ? Fɨ̄ʼɨ vəɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ thɔ ntuo maoŋ paŋ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa ɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi nthishɨ pa puoŋ fàʼa paŋ.’
“Nthishɨ pa puoŋ fàʼa ghɔ chhu ni noŋ yi ŋa, ‘Mi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ ndwɛ ŋa masha a tāʼa nu mfuʼu a fuʼu moŋ fàʼa a nɛ. Ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghrɨ́ fāʼa nu nyìeŋ pi pe a, ndɔ thɔ a lilri nɔ luoŋ nu.
Ǹji nnu ŋa ǹshi nchwīe nɛ ndwɛ, nji ŋa ŋgwa shi mbiŋ a nda pugu ndɨɨ ŋa pi fuʼu a moŋ fàʼa nɛ.’
“Nnɛ a gɛ̄ ŋguoŋ ghaŋ ŋkrù masha vi pa taʼa yi taʼa yi, ŋa pugu thɔ njəɨ vi. A pie ni fǔoŋ yi ŋa, ‘Ŋkrù masha a pɔ puŋ ghɔ yi khɔ?’
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Taʼa ŋkɨɨ jo wru.’ A chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Chɔchɔ ŋkwe ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋkrù yɔ ŋkɛrɛ nāʼaŋ ŋa a tiɛŋ wuŋ jo puŋ ghɔ.’
“A pɨnɨ nchhu ni yichəɨ ŋa, ‘Jɔ ŋkrù yi khɔ?’ A chhu ŋa, ‘Taʼa ŋkɨɨ pìɛŋ pilei.’ A chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Kɛrɛ nāʼaŋ fúoŋ wuŋ pìɛŋ.’
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, masha nthishɨ pa puoŋ fàʼa yei piŋ vi
nthɛ nnu shiethɔ yei ŋa a ni nchwīe nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa ghaŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei fāʼo shiethɔ ni ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu ghà nchwīe nnu pugu nchaa ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ líʼɛ nɛ.
Ndɔ ǹshwei ghɔ, lɔ̄gɔ maoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei mbwa puŋ nɔ ghɔ, nji ŋa maoŋ pighɔ shi ŋga mieŋ ki lɔ nūʼɔŋ mbɔ, Minnwi fɛ laʼa vɛ po.
“Ŋoŋ ŋa a tɔgɔ ndaoŋ ntou moŋ puoŋ mi nnu nɛ shi ntɔgɔ ndaoŋ ntou moŋ mɛmmɛ nnu. Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe nnu fifiri moŋ puoŋ mi nnu nɛ, shi nchwīe fifiri moŋ mɛmmɛ nnu.
Ti p̈əɨ mieŋ ki tɔgɔ ndaoŋ ntou ni ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ tuo fàʼo ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei nɛ, Minnwi kie pi nɛiŋ mfɛ ŋkiɛŋ fàʼo llɔ po ni pəɨ, ŋa pəɨ lɨna nɔ ghɔ?
Ti p̈əɨ mieŋ ki tɔgɔ ndaoŋ ntou ni yaoŋ ŋa a yi ŋoŋ nduoŋ nɛ, Minnwi kie pi nɛiŋ mfɛ fàʼo ŋa a shi mbɔ yəɨ nɛ ni pəɨ?
“Mbaʼa taʼa muuŋ fàʼa fāʼa mbhɔ paa masha. A shi ŋguʼɔ mbɨ̄na taʼa yi ŋkhwā vichəɨ, a shi njaʼo taʼa yi, nchɨ̄ʼə nchò vichəɨ. Mbaʼa pəɨ fāʼa mbhɔ Minnwi pugu mbɨŋ.”
Pa Farashi ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, māʼaŋ Jishɔ ni kwə̀ɨŋ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkhwā mbɨŋ.
Ndɔ a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pəɨ ghà nchwīe ŋa ŋgwamishua līi vəɨ nɔ pa ŋgwa tithi, ndɔ Minnwi ji njùʼɔ yəɨ. Nthɛ ŋa yaoŋ ŋa ŋgwamishua līi a pɔ mmɛ yi nɛ, pɔ pi yaoŋ pɨphɨ ligi Minnwi.

“Gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa nnu ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nāʼaŋ nɛ ni nthɔ fāʼa nu ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ ndɨɨ Jouŋ. Jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pi chīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi, ŋgwa ŋa pugu piŋ nɛ chhɔ mfra nu nii moŋ ghɔ ni pri.
A yīʼɛ ni po pugu shhɛ nɔ pɨrɨ nu nchaa ŋa taʼa muuŋ mi nnu ŋa a pɔ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ mieŋ ki lɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shāaŋ láŋ pugu ŋgwɛ vi ndáŋ miŋgwɛ nduoŋ nɛ kwo shúoŋ, ŋoŋ ŋa a laŋ miŋgwɛ ŋa a taoŋ láŋ nɛ kwo shúoŋ ŋkaa yu.
“Ŋgaŋ fàʼo chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ nthɔ māʼaŋ pa ndhwí tɨnɨnchuoŋ, nchhɔ njɨ ŋkiɛŋkiɛŋ maoŋ jɨ ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ghao.
Ŋgaŋ pou chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Lasharɔ, ŋa pi ni nūʼɔŋ vi choŋkaʼa ŋgaŋ fàʼo yei, noŋ yi ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi fɨfɨ ghao.
A ni ŋkhwā nu njɨ pa ŋkuʼu maoŋ pɛ ŋa a gū llɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi ŋgaŋ fàʼo ghɔ nɛ. Nɔ pigi nu, pa miŋgu ni nthɔ nchhɔ ndra fɨ́ yi.
Ŋgaŋ pou ghɔ khu, ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nūʼɔŋ shoyəɨ Abrahaŋ. Ŋgaŋ fàʼo ghɔ khu ŋkaa yu, pi twei vi,
a ghə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ghaŋ phɨ ghà ŋkhu ŋgə̄ɨ nɛ, nchhɔ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ fɔ, ŋga mbɨʼɨ ligi yi, njəɨ Abrahaŋ fie hiŋ pugu Lasharɔ shoyəɨ yu.
“Ŋgaŋ fàʼo ghɔ yūa ni Abrahaŋ ŋa, ‘Tǎa, fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ mu, ntaoŋ Lasharɔ ŋa a chrū thɔ muuŋshɨmbhɔ yi moŋ ŋkhǐ nthɔ ŋgrɨ túa a nɔ ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa m̀bɔ moŋ tɨtɨnɨ yúʼɔ moŋ móŋoŋ yei.’
“Ndɔ Abrahaŋ chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Muuŋ a, kwiŋ ŋa moŋ chɔmbhi yɔ pi ni mfɛ pa maoŋ shiʼi vɛ, Lasharɔ fāʼo ji pi pɨphɨ. Ndɔ ti ndwɛ, a pɔ moŋ nchhɔ́ shiʼi hɛiŋ, ɔ pɔ hɛnɛ moŋ tɨtɨnɨ ŋgəʼɨ.
Mbapa nɛnnɛ, pi nūʼɔŋ mmɛ wə́ɨŋ, a fɛ̄nɛ via, nɛnnɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu nshāʼa hɛnɛ nɛ nthɛ paʼa a lɔ nshāʼa, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mbaʼa ŋoŋ llɔ ŋgei pəɨ nthɔ njəɨ vigi nɛ.’
“Ŋgaŋ fàʼo ghɔ chhu ŋa, ‘Mbaʼo mbhɔ nɛ shhɨ ghɔ, ma tǎa, ŋa ɔ taoŋ nɛ Lasharɔ puŋ nda pigi.
Nthɛ ŋa m̀fāʼo lǐŋ paŋ pi pimbia pi tiɛŋ, nɛnnɛ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ shūu tə́nə yugu, kiɛŋ nɛnnɛ, kaŋ pugu ŋkaa pugu shi nii moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋgəʼɨ yei.’
“Abrahaŋ khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Pugu fāʼo gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa nnu ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nāʼaŋ nɛ, pugu yaʼo pie ghɔ.’
“A chhu ŋa, ‘Ŋga, ma tǎa vigi Abrahaŋ, ŋoŋ ŋa a khu nɛ mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nchrā ni pugu, pugu kwri.’
“Abrahaŋ chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘P̈ugu mieŋ ki yaʼo gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa nnu ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nāʼaŋ nɛ, kaŋ mbaʼa pugu yiʼi mbiŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a njiʼi nthɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a khu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ.’ ”
Jishɔ chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pa nnu ŋa a nthɛ a chwīe ŋgwa gū moŋ phɨ nɛ shi ŋguʼɔ nthɔ. Ndɔ ti wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ yi ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a kie pi mbhɔ yu maa nthɔ nɛ.
A kaŋ ni mbwa ŋa pi chu mmɛ ŋgùʼɔ wuʼɔ yaoŋ mmi yu māʼaŋ vi moŋ ŋkhǐ, nchaa ŋa a chwīe sheshe taʼa puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ pei gū moŋ phɨ.
Pəɨ lɨna ni noŋ pəɨ!
“N̈dǐŋ ghɔ nchwīe phɨ, ɔ fɛ̄ʼi vi, ndɔ ti a mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yi, ɔ līʼɛ phɨ yi.
Ndɔ ti a nchwīe phɨ mbɨŋ ghɔ ni khwachəɨ ŋgɛ́ moŋ taʼa llɛ́, sheshe ŋgɛ́ a pɨnɨ nchhu vɛ ŋa a pāʼa ŋkǔnu yi nɔ ghɔ, a yiʼi ŋa ɔ līʼɛ phɨ yi.”
Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, pigi luoŋ ŋa ɔ pigi piŋ yigi.”
Taathɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“P̈əɨ mfāʼo piŋ ti a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɔ fɨʼɨ mbhɛ̌ frushɨga, kaŋ a nthɛ pəɨ chhu ni thɨ wuŋ ŋa, ‘Mūʼuŋ ŋgə̄ɨ mbhi noŋ yɔ moŋ ŋkhǐ!’, a yaʼo nchò yəɨ.
“Lɔ̄gɔ ŋa taʼa ŋoŋ vəɨ fāʼo ŋkǔna ŋa a chhɔ mfāʼa nyìeŋ, ki ŋkɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ, a nthɛ a gha ŋkwəɨ moŋ nyìeŋ a chhu ghɔ pi ŋa, ‘Thɔ nchhɔ hɛiŋ taʼa ŋgɛ́ njɨ maoŋ?’
Ŋga! A shi ŋka chhu ghɔ pi ŋa, ‘Nyiaŋ maoŋ jɨ vəɨ, mbīri noŋ yɔ, nthɔ mfɛ vəɨ ti ŋ̀ga njɨ ndɔ nnu, ɔ ghə̄ɨ kiʼɛ njɨ jɔ ndɔ nnu.’
Mbaʼa a yiʼi ntōo ŋkǔna ghɔ nthɛ ŋa a chwīe fàʼa ŋa a chhu ghɔ ŋa a chwīe nɛ.
A haʼaŋ a pɔ ni pəɨ nɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ kwo chwīe ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa Minnwi chhu ŋa pəɨ chwīe nɛ, pəɨ chhu ni noŋ pəɨ ŋa, ‘Pigi wuʼɔ mbɔ pi pa ŋkǔna, pigi wuʼɔ nchwīe pi yaoŋ ŋa a ni ŋkwo pɔ fàʼa yigi nɛ.’ ”
Jishɔ ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu Jerushalɛiŋ, ntɔgɔ nu shɨna Shamaria pugu Galili.
Ŋga nii moŋ yichəɨ muuŋ laʼataoŋ, wuŋ ghaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ paoŋ pugu pugu. Pa ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ pighɔ ni nthi pi fie hini,
mɛ̄iŋ ni njɨ ŋa, “Jishɔ! Taathɔ! Fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pigi!”
Jishɔ ni ŋga njəɨ vugu, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nōoŋ noŋ yəɨ ni ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi, pugu līi vəɨ njəɨ ŋa ghɨ̌nɔ yəɨ mmɛ.”
Pugu ni ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ nu, Jishɔ yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu.
Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ghɨnɔmbaluŋ ghɔ ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa ghɨ̌nɔ yi mmɛ nɛ, mbɨnɨ nchhɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi ŋkiɛŋ ni njɨ,
nthɔ gū shhɨ Jishɔ ni puŋ yi nthɔ ntōo vi. Ŋoŋ vei ni mbɔ ŋoŋ Shamaria.
Jishɔ pie ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ ŋa,
“Mi nì njɨ̄gɨ pi ghɨ̌nɔ wuŋ ŋgwa, pichəɨ ndipuʼu hɨŋ?
A chwīe khɔ a wuʼɔ nthɔ ŋgɨ̀nɨ vei nɔ tōo nu Minnwi?”
Nchhu ghɔ kiʼɛ ŋa, “Lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni gɔ! Piŋ yɔ chwīe ɔ lūgu.”
Pichəɨ ŋgwa Farashi ni ŋga mbie Jishɔ ni ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi shi njɛ̄ shaʼa nu fùoŋ yi nɛ, Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi shiʼa njiʼi nthɔ pi ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ mimfɛ ɔ thɔ njəɨ yəɨ nɛ.
Mbaʼa yichəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ yiʼi nchhu ŋa, ‘Līi njəɨ, a pɔ nɛiŋ hɛiŋ!’ ki ŋa, ‘A pɔ ni hini!’, nthɛ ŋa, līi njəɨ, Minnwi thɔ nshaʼa fùoŋ yi shɨna pəɨ!”
Jishɔ chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ chhɔ nthɔ nu ŋa pəɨ shi ŋkhwā nɔ yəɨ nu taʼa llɛ́ moŋ llɛmbhi Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua, ndɔ mbaʼa pəɨ yəɨ.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa shi nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, ‘Līi njəɨ, a pɔ ni, līi njəɨ, a pɔ nɛiŋ!’ Ndɔ kiʼi mbiŋ nnu ŋa pugu chhu nu nɛ ki njōu njiŋ yugu.
Ǹchhu nɛiŋ nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mbɨnɨ nɛ, a shi mbɔ po nɔ fiembɨ ŋa a shēi llɔ moŋ taʼa ŋgei po ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ yichəɨ, shesheŋoŋ yəɨ nji.
Ndɔ a shi ŋguʼɔ mfǔoŋ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ, ŋgwa mbhi shiʼa lāa vi.
“Ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ mbhi ŋoŋ ŋa ligi yi ni mbɔ Noa nɛ, a nɔ haʼaŋ a shi mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa thɔ nu Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua kaoŋ nɛ.
Ŋgwa ni nchhɔ njɨ maoŋ, ndɔ nnu nu, ndaŋ nu, ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nda láŋ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ llɛ́ yɛ ŋa Noa ni nii moŋ mmɛ pie ŋa a pɔ nɔ nda nɛ. Ŋkhǐ thɔ kiʼɛ njwi ŋguoŋ yugu ghao.
“Wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ moŋ mbhi ŋoŋ ŋa ligi yi ni mbɔ Lɔti nɛ. Pugu ni nthɔ njɨ maoŋ ndɔ nnu nu, nchwīe taŋ, nthɔ mbhi maoŋ pugu, ŋkrao laʼa muŋu.
Ndɔ ti a ni ŋga mbɔ llɛ́ yɛ ŋa Lɔti ni ntaoŋ ni vhi Shodoŋ nɛ, móŋoŋ pugu móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ mikaŋ
llɔ vugu, njwi vugu ghao.
A ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a lɛ mbɔ llɛ́ yɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mbɨnɨ nōoŋ noŋ yi nɛ.
“A mbɔ llɛ́ ghɔ, kiʼi ŋoŋ ŋa a pɔ mbhi, maoŋ pi pɔ nda nɛ, pɨnɨ nii nda lɨʼɨ lɔ̄gɔ maoŋ pighɔ. Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ kiʼi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ nyìeŋ nɛ pɨnɨ mbɨnɨ laʼa lɨʼɨ lɔ̄gɔ sheshe yaoŋ.
Kwiŋ nnu ŋa a ni mfɨ̄ʼɨ ŋgwɛ Lɔti nɛ!
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu ŋkwe chɔmbhi yi nɛ shi nshiɛŋ chɔmbhi yi ghɔ, ndɔ ti ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a mīʼaŋ chɔmbhi yi nɛ shi ŋkwe chɔmbhi yi ghɔ.
Ǹshwei vəɨ, a lɛ ŋga mbɔ ni tuʼu ghɔ, paa ŋgwa nūaŋ kúoŋ, pi lɔ̄gɔ taʼa yi, vichəɨ kɨna.
Paa piŋgɛ lɛ nthɔ ŋgūʼɔ shíe kaʼa, pi lɔ̄gɔ taʼa yi, taʼa yi kɨna.
“[Paa pimbia shi mbɔ moŋ nyìeŋ, pi lɔ̄gɔ taʼa yi, taʼa yi kɨna.]”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pie vi ŋa, “Ɔ shi mbɨnɨ pi hɨŋ, Taathɔ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Lɨʼɨ ŋa khu miyaoŋ pɔ nɛ, pa mishi pɛ ŋa pugu gha ŋkru khu miyaoŋ nɛ shi ŋkɨrɨ fɔ.”
Jishɔ ni nshwei ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni yei luʼɔ chrà nɔ tɨgɨ nu vugu ŋa pugu fāʼo nɔ luoŋ nu Minnwi ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao ki lɔ mfāʼo lɨʼənoŋ.
A ni nchhu ŋa,
“Laʼataoŋ chəɨ, ŋgaŋ shaʼa sháʼa chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔgɔ Minnwi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ fāʼo ndɨɨ ŋoŋmishua.
Miŋgwɛ ŋkugu chəɨ ni mbɔ laʼataoŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni ŋguʼɔ nthɔ ŋgana ŋgaŋ shaʼa sháʼa ghɔ ghana, nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Ghɛ̄rɛ a nshaʼa sháʼa yigi mbɨ̌na a yei moŋ ndɨndɨ.’
Ŋgaŋ shaʼa sháʼa vei ni ndāa nɔ kuo ndɨɨ. A ni ndugwi nchhu ni noŋ yi ŋa, ‘Njiʼi nthɛ pi ndɔ haʼaŋ ǹdɔ mbɔgɔ Minnwi ki mfāʼo ndɨɨ ŋoŋmishua nɛ,
ndɔ ti nthɛ fɨʼɨ ghaghana ŋa miŋgwɛ ŋkugu vei fɛ nu vəɨ nɛ, ǹshi nshaʼa sháʼa yi moŋ ndɨndɨ, kiɛŋ nɛnnɛ, kaŋ a shi nshiɛŋ a moŋ thɔ nu ŋgana a ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao.’ ”
Taathɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ yaʼo nnu haʼaŋ ŋgaŋ shaʼa sháʼa ni mbe chhu njaʼo.
Mbaʼa Minnwi shaʼa sháʼa ŋgwa pi ŋa a tɛrɛ nɛ moŋ ndɨndɨ, ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu yūa ghɔ moŋ tuʼu pugu pa naoŋchɨ nɛ? Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa a shi ŋguʼɔ nchhɔ njīri nu nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ?
Ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa Minnwi shi nshaʼa sháʼa yugu moŋ ndɨndɨ pi ni tei. Mbapa nɛnnɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi nthɔ nɛ, pəɨ pīʼi ŋa a shi ma njəɨ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi pugu fāʼo piŋ?”
Jishɔ chhu yei luʼɔ chrà ni pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbīʼi ŋa pugu pɔ shiʼi shhɨ Minnwi, ndɔ nchɨ̄ʼə pichəɨ ŋgwa nɛ.
“Paa ŋgwa pichəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ Nda Minnwi lɨʼɨ luoŋ Minnwi. Taʼa yi ni mbɔ ŋoŋ Farashi, vichəɨ pɔ ŋgaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi.

Ŋoŋ Farashi ghɔ thi təʼɨ vi nduoŋ ŋa, ‘Ǹtōo ghɔ, ma Minnwi, ŋa ǹdɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ mbembe nɔ pichəɨ ŋgwa. Ǹshiʼa nchīgi ŋoŋ, paʼa ndɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ mbe, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbɔ ŋkwoshuoŋ, ki mbɔ nɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ taashi yini hini nɛ.
Ŋga njī ŋkhǐ paa ŋgɛ́ moŋ taʼa taŋ, mfɛ shwéi ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa ŋga mfāʼo nɛ ghao.’
“Ŋgaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi thi fie hini, paʼa ndɔ mbɨʼɨ ligi yi ndīi po, mbɔ ni tuʼuthɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Minnwi, fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ mu, nchwīe phɨ.’ ”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa, “Ǹshwei ghɔ, ŋoŋ vei ni mbɔ shiʼi shhɨ Minnwi nchaa ŋoŋ Farashi. Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kə̄rə noŋ yi nɛ, pi shi nshwiʼi vi shhɛ, ŋoŋ ŋa a shwiʼi noŋ yi shhɛ nɛ, pi kə̄rə vi.”
Pichəɨ ŋgwa ni nthɔ ni pa puoŋ prɔ njəɨ Jishɔ nɔ ghɔ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi thɔ pugu nɔ fɛ nu mbɔrɔ ni pugu. Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi gha njəɨ, mbɨ̄ga ŋgwa pighɔ.
Jishɔ mɛ̄iŋ puoŋ pighɔ pugu thɔ yəɨ yu, a chhu nu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ mieŋ puoŋ prɔ thɔ njəɨ a, kiʼi pəɨ pɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni pugu nthɛ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi pɔ pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ nɔ puoŋ prɔ nɛ.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, mbaʼa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi nɔ muuŋ mbrɔ nɛ, yiʼi nii moŋ ghɔ.”
Yichəɨ nthishɨ pa Juu pie ŋa, “Ŋkiɛŋ masha, mimfɛ ǹchwīe pi nɛiŋ mfāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ?”
Jishɔ pie ŋa,
“Ɔ mɛ̄iŋ a ni ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ nthɛ khɔ? A wuʼɔ Minnwi mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ.
Ɔ ji yaoŋ ŋa pa kɨ̀na chhu nɛ: ‘Kiʼi ŋgaŋ láŋ kwoshuoŋ, kiʼi njwi ŋoŋ, kiʼi njōo, kiʼi ŋkwe ntie ŋoŋ ni mbe, yaʼo nchò tǎa ghɔ pugu muuŋ ghɔ.’ ”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ŋguoŋ kɨ̀na pei ŋ̀kwo nūʼɔŋ llɔ ndɨɨ ŋa mi ni mbɔ maʼaŋ mikhwa nɛ.”
Jishɔ gha njaʼo nnu yei, nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ wuʼɔ mbɨnɨ mbou yichəɨ taʼa nnu. Fīni ŋguoŋ maoŋ pɔ ghao ŋgrā ni ghaŋ pou, kaŋ fàʼo yɔ shi mbɔ po, nnɛ nthɔ njōu njiŋ a.”
A ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei noŋ yi shwiʼi nthɛ ŋa a ni mfāʼo ŋgaʼa.
Jishɔ pɛʼi vi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ noŋ yi shwiʼi nɛ, nchhu ŋa,
“A ya ŋgaʼa ni ghaŋ fàʼo nɔ mieŋ nu Minnwi shaʼa fùoŋ yi moŋ chɔmbhi yugu.
A yīʼɛ ni minyieŋləɨ
nɔ tɔgɔ nu moŋ mbo mitaʼa nchaa ŋgaŋ fàʼo nɔ mieŋ nu Minnwi shaʼa fùoŋ yi moŋ chɔmbhi yi.”
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo nnu yei ŋa Jishɔ ni nchhu nɛ chhu ŋa, “Ti ŋoŋ ŋa mimfɛ a lūgu nɛ pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Nnu ŋa mbaʼa ŋoŋmishua chwīe nɛ yīʼɛ ni Minnwi.”
Pita chhu ŋa, “Līi njəɨ! Pigi mieŋ pa laʼa miŋi nthɔ njōu njiŋ yɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, yichəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ mbɔ ŋa a mieŋ nda yi, ki ŋgwɛ vi, ki ndǐŋ vi, ki tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi, ki puoŋ, nthɛ pi Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi nɛ,
ŋa a shi mieŋ ki fāʼo ntou yi moŋ yei chɔmbhi ndɔ shi mfāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ ndɨɨ ŋa ǹshi ndɛ mbɨnɨ nthɔ nɛ.”
A mɛ̄iŋ paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ līi njəɨ, pia kuʼɔ nu Jerushalɛiŋ, ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nāʼaŋ thɛ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa shi nchaʼa vi mfɛ mbhɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋgwa Juu, pi māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ, ŋgwɛʼi vi, nthu thwɛ mbɨŋ yu.
Pi shi ŋgwie vi ni ŋgwàŋ, njwi vi, a gha ndaʼa trɛi llɛ́, a pɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.”
Thɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shi ki lɔ njiʼi nshie ni nnu pei, pi ni ndə̄ɨŋ vugu ni njiŋ nnu pighɔ, paʼa pugu lɔ nji nnu ŋa a ni nchhu nu nɛ.
A ni ŋga nyīeŋ mbara Jeriko, nchriligi chəɨ chhɔ ŋkɨŋ shɛndaoŋ nduoŋ nu.
Nchriligi ghɔ gha njaʼo yú ŋgwa tɔgɔ nu, a pie ŋa, “A lɔ̄gɔ khɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ?”
Pi shwei vi ŋa, “A Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ ntɔgɔ nu.”
A mɛ̄iŋ ni njɨ ŋa, “Jishɔ! Muuŋ Devi! Fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ mu!”
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ shhɨ nɛ pɨ̄ga vi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Lɛrɛ laŋ!” A pɨnɨ mɛ̄iŋ pi ni njɨ ŋa, “Muuŋ Devi, fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ mu!”
Jishɔ tithi, mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi thɔ ni ju. A gha nthɔ mbara yəɨ yu, a pie vi ŋa,
“Ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa ǹchwīe pi nɛiŋ vɛ?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ǹtāʼa nu mbɨnɨ njəɨ lɨʼɨ!”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Pɨnɨ nɛ njəɨ lɨʼɨ! Piŋ yɔ chwīe ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ tɔgɔ.”
Wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, ligi yi chuʼɔ a yōu njiŋ Jishɔ, nchhɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi. Yú ŋgwa pighɔ fɔ nɛ gha njəɨ, mfɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi.
Jishɔ nii ntiri nu moŋ Jeriko.
Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Shakio, mbɔ mmɛŋoŋ pa ghaŋ wɛ̄iŋ taashi, mbɔ ŋgaŋ fàʼo.
A ni mbaʼo nu nɔ yəɨ nu ŋoŋ ŋa Jishɔ yie nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa ni njiɛŋ fɔ nɛ, paʼa a lɔ njiʼɛ ghɔ nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋoŋ kwikwiʼi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, a tei ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ thɨ shikamoo nnɛ ŋa a yəɨ Jishɔ, nthɛ ŋa Jishɔ shi ntɔgɔ pi ŋgei ghɔ.
Jishɔ gha nthɔ nchəɨŋ nɔ lɨʼɨ ghɔ, ndīi tɔthɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Shakio, kɔnɔ nshwiʼi shhɛ, nthɛ ŋa a yiʼi ŋa ndaʼa nda ghɔ shiʼa.”
A kɔnɔ nshwiʼi shhɛ, mbɔ ni pwanjuʼɔ nɔ chhu nu ghɔ ŋa a thɔ a pwa.
Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ nɛ jɛ̄ luo nu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ yei ghə̄ɨ nu mbɔ ŋgaŋ kra nda nchwīe phɨ.”
Shakio tithi tɔthɨ nchhu ni Taathɔ ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, Taathɔ, ǹshi mfɛ ghrà ndɨndɨ maoŋ paŋ ni ghaŋ pou, ti shesheŋoŋ ŋa mi ni nchīgi vi nɛ, ǹshi nduʼu ghɔ khwɛ lɨʼɨ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Shiʼa, lūgu nu thɔ nda hɛiŋ nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ vei ŋkaa yu muuŋ Abrahaŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua ni nthɔ nɔ tāʼa nu ndɔ ŋkwe ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu phɛ nɛ.”

Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nthɔ njwɛrɛ chrà yei nɛ, Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nɔ chhu nu luʼɔ chrà ni pugu. Nthɛ ŋa a ni ŋkwo para Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ, pugu pa ŋa ŋgwa pighɔ ni mbiʼi ŋa Minnwi shi nshaʼa nɔ fùoŋ chomilaoŋ ghɔ nɛ
a chhu kiʼɛ ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ chəɨ ni ŋgə̄ɨ fie laʼataoŋ chəɨ, ŋgə̄ɨ njɨ lə̌ɨ fùoŋ ŋkwəɨ shaʼa laʼa yugu.
Ŋkaoŋ a ni maa ŋgə̄ɨ, a mɛ̄iŋ wuŋ puoŋ fàʼa pi, mfɛ ŋkiɛŋ ntou mbɨŋ ni pugu nchhu ni pugu ŋa, ‘Pəɨ tiʼi nthɔ mbiʼɛ taŋ nɔ ghɔ ti ǹshi nuʼuŋ ŋkwəɨ.’
Ndɔ ŋgwa pi pɨ̄na vi pɨ̄na. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pugu taoŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ njiŋ yu ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ nchhu ŋa, ‘Pigi lɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu ŋa ŋoŋ vei pɔ fùoŋ vigi.’
“Ndɔ pi wuʼɔ nchərə vi chərə nɔ fùoŋ. A gha mbɨ̄nɨ, ŋgɛ̄ puoŋ fàʼa pi pɛ ŋa a ni mfɛ mbɨŋ ni pugu ŋa pugu piʼɛ taŋ nɔ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ a ji fɨʼɨ shéi yɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo nɛ.
Fǔoŋ muuŋ fàʼa thɔ nchhu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, mbɨŋ yɛ ŋa ɔ ni mfɛ vəɨ nɛ shei wuŋ lɨʼɨ.’
Ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Ɔ ya mfāʼa, ma muuŋ fàʼa a yi shishiʼi, nthɛ ŋa ɔ tɔgɔ ndaoŋ ntou moŋ puoŋ mi nnu nɛ, m̀fɛ ghrɨ́ vɛ ŋa ɔ shaʼa wuŋ laʼataoŋ a.’
“Mbra yi thɔ nchhu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, mbɨŋ yɛ ŋa ɔ ni mfɛ vəɨ nɛ shei tiɛŋ lɨʼɨ.’
Taathɔ vi ghɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, ‘Kwe tiɛŋ laʼataoŋ nshaʼa nu.’
“Nɛnnɛ, yichəɨ muuŋ fàʼa thɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, mbɨŋ yɔ pɔ nɛiŋ, ŋki krao moŋ pra ndhwí nūʼɔŋ,
nthɛ ŋa ŋki pɔgɔ, nthɛ ŋa ɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ tɨtɨnɨ. Ɔ ghà ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ shi ki lɔ nūʼɔŋ, ŋkwōo lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ shi ki lɔ mbhi.’
“Taathɔ vi chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Muuŋ fàʼa mbɨmbhɨ vei! Ǹshi ndɔ̄gɔ chrà yɔ ŋkrao ghɔ nɔ ghɔ! Ɔ ya nji ŋa mi ŋoŋ tɨtɨnɨ, ŋkwe yaoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ nyaŋ nɛ, ŋkwōo lɨʼɨ ŋa ǹshi ki lɔ mbhī nɛ.
A ni nchwīe khɔ kiʼɛ paʼa ɔ lɔ niʼiŋ mbɨŋ a moŋ bəɨŋ? Nji ŋa ǹshi ŋga ŋkwəɨ, ŋ̀kwe pugu pa thɔ yi?’
Nɛnnɛ nchhu ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ nɛ ŋa, ‘Pəɨ kwe mbɨŋ ghɔ mbhɔ yu, mfɛ ni muuŋ fàʼa yɛ ŋa a ni nshei wuŋ lɨʼɨ nɛ.’
“Ndɔ pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, kwaʼa a kwo shei wuŋ lɨʼɨ?’
“Fùoŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Ǹshwei vəɨ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kwo fāʼo nɛ, pi shi mbīgi ntou yi ghɔ, ndɔ ti ni ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɛ pi shi ŋkwe shɨgɛi yɛ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ mbhɔ yu.
Ndɔ ndwɛ pa mbɨ̌na paŋ pɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ ntāʼa nu ŋa m̀bɔ fùoŋ vugu nɛ, pəɨ wɛ̄iŋ vugu nthɔ nsho vugu ligi mu.’ ”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nchhu yei nnu ti mīʼɛŋ, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ndaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, ŋkuʼɔ nu Jerushalɛiŋ.
A ni ŋga nyīeŋ ti mbara Bɛfɛgɛ pugu Betani ŋkuoŋ mbra ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Olive nɛ, ntaoŋ paa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ moŋ muuŋ laʼataoŋ yini shhɨ pəɨ nɛ, pəɨ shi njəɨ muuŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ ŋa ŋoŋ lɔ naa ma ŋkuʼɔ nɛ, pi chu fɔ, pəɨ kɨ̄gɛi nthɔ nɔ hɛiŋ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ mbie vəɨ ŋa, ‘Pəɨ kɨ̄gɛi nu ŋa?’ pəɨ chhu ŋa, ‘Taathɔ fāʼo fàʼa nɔ ghɔ.’ ”
Nɛnnɛ ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa a ni ntaoŋ vugu nɛ ghə̄ɨ ŋguʼɔ njəɨ ŋguoŋ nnu pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni nshwei vugu nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nthɔ mfēi muuŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ ghɔ nɛ, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa minyieŋ ghɔ ni mbɔ yugu nɛ pie ŋa, “Pəɨ fēi nu ŋa?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Taathɔ fāʼo fàʼa nɔ ghɔ.”
Pugu lɔ̄gɔ muuŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ fɛ ni Jishɔ, ŋga nshɛ̄iŋ ndhwí pugu ŋkuoŋ ghɔ, ŋgɛ̄rɛ Jishɔ a kuʼɔ nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, pa ŋgwa shɛ̄iŋ pa mɛmmɛ ndhwí pugu shɛndaoŋ.
