Ndɨɨ ŋa a ni nyīeŋ mbara Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ, nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa shɛndaoŋ shwiʼi laʼo Mbra pa Thɨ Olive nɛ, mmɛ kɨrɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi jɛ̄ nthɔ ntōo Minnwi ni njɨ moŋ pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ghraoghrao ŋa pugu ni njəɨ nɛ,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni Fùoŋ ŋa a thɔ nɔ ligi Taathɔ nɛ,
Ghɨghrɨ pɔ po,
ndighaʼo pɔ ni Minnwi ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ fie moŋ ndugwi po!”
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi moŋ yú ŋgwa pighɔ chhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Masha, pɨ̄ga pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ ŋa pugu lɛrɛ laŋ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ǹshwei vəɨ, ŋgwa pei ndɛrɛ laŋ, kaŋ pa ŋgùʼɔ shi nchrā ni njɨ!”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nyīeŋ mbara ti njəɨ moŋ Jerushalɛiŋ ghɔ, ŋkə̄ɨ nthɛ vi,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ǹjūa ŋa ɔ kaŋ ni nji shiʼa yaoŋ ŋa a ghà nthɔ ni ghɨghrɨ nɛ, ndɔ ndwɛ, Minnwi chwīe ŋa kiʼi ɔ yəɨ,
nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ ndɨɨ thɔ nthɔ nu ŋa pa mbɨ̌na pɔ shi ŋgɨ̄ŋ ghɔ ni ŋkaʼa mbāoŋ, nshwiʼi mbɨŋ ghɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgei ghao.
Pugu shi nshiʼi ghɔ pəɨ pa mbaanda yɔ. Mbaʼa kaŋ taʼa yaoŋ yiʼi mbɨgəɨ mbhɔ ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa ɔ shini ndɔ nji ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni nthɔ nɔ kwe nu ghɔ nɛ.”
Jishɔ nii Nda Minnwi, njɛ̄ yōu nu ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ mfīni yaoŋ fɔ nɛ,
nchhu nu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa, ‘Nda a shi mbɔ pi nda luoŋ Minnwi,’ ndɔ pəɨ kara a gū pùo pa ŋgɨna.”
Ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ghao Jishɔ thɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa Nda Minnwi. Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa pichəɨ thishɨ taʼa shɛndaoŋ nɔ jwi nu vi.
Ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo shɛndaoŋ, nthɛ ŋa pa ŋgwa ni mfɛ ŋguoŋ tə́nə yugu nthɔ njaʼo ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa a ni nchhu nu nɛ.
Llɛ́ chəɨ, Jishɔ gha mbɔ Nda Minnwi nthɔ njɛʼi nu ndɔ nthɔ nshwei pa pwa pishaʼakhɔ, pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ni pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa thishɨ thɔ,
nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Shwei vigi, ɔ fāʼo pi yəɨ njɨ nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu pei, ki a fɛ gɔ̌ mfɛ njɨ yei vɛ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Mummu ǹshi mbie vəɨ ni taʼa nnu. Ndwɛ, pəɨ shwei a,
a ni mfɛ Minnwi mfɛ njɨ ni Jouŋ ŋa a fɛ ŋkhǐ ni ŋgwa ki a ni mfɛ ŋgwamishua?”
Pugu pini nnu ghɔ shɨna pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, “P̈ia nchhu ŋa a ni ndhɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, a pie via ŋa, ‘Ti a ni nchwīe khɔ paʼa pia lɔ mbiŋ vi?’
Ndɔ p̈ia nchhu ŋa, ‘A ni mfɛ ŋoŋmishua njɨ ghɔ’, kaŋ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa pei shi ntuŋ via ni ŋgùʼɔ nthɛ ŋa pugu ya nji ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa Jouŋ ni mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.”
Nɛnnɛ, pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi lɔ njiʼi nji lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni ndhɔ nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni pugu kiʼɛ ŋa,
“Kaŋ m̀baʼa mummu shwei vəɨ ni lɨʼɨ ŋa njɨ ŋa ǹchwīe nnu pei nɔ llɔ nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ chhu yei luʼɔ chrà ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkɨrɨ yəɨ yu nɛ:
“Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni ma mbhi kèi ntíɛŋ thɨ
yi mfɛ ni ghaŋ fàʼa ŋa pugu lɨna nɔ ghɔ, ŋga ŋkwōo, pugu pugu ghrā. Nɛnnɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ kra ndaʼa ntaaŋ ndɨɨ.
Ndɨɨ ni ŋga ŋkāʼo nɔ kwōo nu ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ, mmɛŋoŋ yɛ taoŋ muuŋ fàʼa vi ni pa ghaŋ fàʼa pɛ, ŋa a ghə̄ɨ ŋkwe ji ghrà ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ. Pa ghaŋ fàʼa pighɔ wie muuŋ fàʼa vi ghɔ nduʼu vi ni mbhɔ yó.
A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ muuŋ fàʼa nduoŋ, pugu wie vi ŋkaa yu, nshhū vi, ndɔ nduʼu vi ni mbhɔ yó.
A nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ yichəɨ muuŋ fàʼa vi, a pɔ yi trɛi, pugu lə̄ɨŋ vi, mfuʼu vi moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ māʼaŋ mbhi.
“Nɛnnɛ, ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ chhu ŋa, ‘Mi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ? Ǹshi ntaoŋ taʼa muuŋ a ŋa ŋkhwā nɛ, kəʼɨchəɨ pugu fāʼo pɔgɔ mbɨŋ yu.’
“Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pa ghaŋ fàʼa pighɔ ki yəɨ vi, pugu chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, ‘Yei ya muuŋ ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ, p̂ia jwi vi nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ nyìeŋ ghɔ gū yia!’
Pugu fuʼu vi ntaoŋ nɔ moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ njwi vi.”
Jishɔ lūgwi mbie vugu ŋa,
“Ti ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ shi nchwīe pi khɔ mbɨŋ pa ghaŋ fàʼa pei?
A shi nthɔ njwi pa ghaŋ fàʼa pei, mfɛ kèi ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ ni ŋgwa nduoŋ.”
Pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njwɛrɛ nu nɛ ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, nchhu ŋa, “Kiʼi Minnwi ma mieŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu yei.”
Jishɔ tigi ligi yi mbɨŋ pugu nchhu ŋa,
“Ti njiŋ chrà Minnwi yei pɔ pi ŋa?
‘Ŋgùʼɔ yɛ ŋa ŋgaŋ nūʼɔŋ nda ni ndāa ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ nɛ,
pɨnɨ nɛ ŋkara ju mbɔ ndugwi ŋgùʼɔ shiʼi nchaa ŋguoŋ yi.’
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a gu ŋkuoŋ ŋguʼɔ yei shi shɨna kraokrao. Ndɔ ti ä ŋgū ŋgùʼɔ ghɔ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ, a nwīʼiŋ vi.”
Pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi ni pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ paʼo nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu Jishɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nji ŋa Jishɔ chhu yei luʼɔ chrà pi ni pugu, ndɔ pugu pɔgɔ nnu haʼaŋ pa ŋgwa shi nchwīe nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ pugu tāʼa shɨ̀na, ntaoŋ pa miyra, ŋa pugu ni mfɨ̄ɨ ŋa pugu ŋgwa ndɨndɨ nɛ, nɛnnɛ ŋa pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi ŋkuoŋ chrà yi, nɔ chaʼa nu vi mfɛ ni ŋoŋ ŋa Roma ni mfɛ ŋa a shaʼa yie ŋgei lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Pa miyra pighɔ pie Jishɔ ŋa, “Masha, pigi ji ŋa ɔ ghà nchrā ndɔ njɛʼi nnu ndɨndɨ ki lɔ mbiŋ mbe, ndɔ njɛʼi pi nnu ndɨndɨ ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ.
Shwei vigi, a kāʼo ŋa pi pe taashi ni Kaisha ki ŋga?”
Jishɔ kwo yəɨ mbe yugu nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ nōoŋ ndigi mbɨŋ vəɨ. Yei pɔ pi thɔ gɔ̌ pugu ligi gɔ̌ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “A yi Kaisha.”
Nɛnnɛ, a khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Fɛ yaoŋ Kaisha ni Kaisha. Mfɛ yi Minnwi ni Minnwi.”
Fɔ shhɨ pa ŋgwa, pugu shi ki lɔ mfāʼo sheshe yaoŋ llɔ ŋkuoŋ chrà yi nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu vi nɔ ghɔ. Nɛnnɛ pugu lɛrɛ laŋ, nja ŋgrāo ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a khwɛ̄ nɛ.
Pa ŋgwa Shadushi, ŋa pugu ni ŋkwāʼa ŋa mbaʼa ŋoŋ khu mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ, thɔ mbara Jishɔ mbie vi ŋa,
“Masha, Mushi ni nāʼaŋ gɨ́ yei mfɛ ni pigi ŋa, ‘Ndǐŋ ŋoŋ ndaŋ miŋgwɛ ŋkhu ki lɔ mbhi puoŋ, ŋoŋ ghɔ lɔ̄gɔ ŋkugu ndǐŋ vi ghɔ ŋa a khu nɛ mbhi puoŋ nɔ ghɔ nɔ ligi ndǐŋ vi ghɔ.’
Pimbia pichəɨ ni mbɔ puŋ nda pugu pi khwachəɨ. Vi shhɨ laŋ ŋkhu ki lɔ mbhi muuŋ,
mbra yi lɔ̄gɔ ŋkugu ghɔ ŋguʼɔ ŋkukhu ki lɔ mbhi muuŋ,
ŋiaŋ mbra yi lɔ̄gɔ ŋkaa yu ŋguʼɔ ŋkukhu, wuʼɔ nnɛ ti ŋguoŋ vugu pi khwachəɨ nuʼuŋ mmɛ ndɔ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu lɔ mbhi puoŋ.
A ni ŋga ndugwi nu, miŋgwɛ ghɔ khu ŋkaa yu.
Ndwɛ, moŋ llɛmbhi ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu khu ma mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ, miŋgwɛ vei shi mbɔ pi ŋgwɛ gɔ̌, nɔ haʼaŋ ŋguoŋ vugu pi khwachəɨ ki lɔ̄gɔ vi nɔ ŋgwɛ vugu nɛ?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋgwa mbhi shiʼa laŋ nu ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nda láŋ.
Ndɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu shi ŋkāʼo nɔ pɨnɨ nu nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu khu nɛ ndɔ fāʼo chɔmbhi moŋ yɛ mbhi ŋa a shi nthɔ nɛ, mbaʼa pugu ma nuʼuŋ ndaŋ ki ŋgə̄ɨ nda láŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa pugu lɔ ma nuʼuŋ ŋkhu ŋkamuʼɔŋ, nthɛ ŋa pugu pɔ pi nɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ndɔ mbɔ puoŋ Minnwi, mbɔ pa ŋgwa ŋa Minnwi kwo kuʼɔ ni pugu moŋ gu nɛ.

Nɔ pīgi nu, Mushi ni nja nōoŋ ŋa ŋgwa ghà ŋkhu mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ. Moŋ lɨʼɨ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa a chrā nu nthɛ móŋoŋ thɔ muuŋ thɨ yuyuʼu nɛ, Mushi gɛ̄ Taathɔ fɔ ŋa a Minnwi Abrahaŋ, Minnwi Aiji, ni Minnwi Jakɔ.
Minnwi lɔ mbɔ pi Minnwi ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu khu nɛ. A pɔ pi Minnwi pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu pi maoŋ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ni Minnwi, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pi maoŋ.”
Pichəɨ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Masha, ɔ ya nɛ nchrā shishiʼi.”
Nthɛ ŋa pugu shi ki lɔ nuʼuŋ njwɛʼi nɔ pie nu vi ni sheshe nnu.
Jishɔ pie vugu ŋa,
“A nthɛ pi kie nɛiŋ nchhu ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, pɔ muuŋ Devi?
Nthɛ ŋa nduthɔ Devi chhu moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Ŋkhǐ ŋa,
‘Minnwi Taathɔ chhu ni Taathɔ a ŋa,
“Chhɔ hɛiŋ ŋgei mbhɔ a yi jɨ,
ti ǹshi nuʼuŋ nchwīe pa mbɨ̌na
pɔ gū krɨ́ tigi kwò yɔ.” ’
Ti nɔ haʼaŋ Devi ni mɛ̄iŋ Krishto ghɔ pi ni Taathɔ vi nɛ, a nthɛ a kie pi nɛiŋ Krishto pɨnɨ mbɔ pi muuŋ vi?”
Jishɔ chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shhɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao ŋa,

“Pəɨ lɨna pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi a pwa. Pugu khwā nɔ nyīeŋ nu moŋ pa mɛmmɛ ndrawaʼa, ndɔ ŋkhwā ŋa pi tuʼu noŋ nchrā ni pugu lɨʼɨ kaʼa, ŋkhwā chhɔ nu nɔ pa lɨʼɨ liɛŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi pugu pa lɨʼɨ jɨ.
Pugu ghà nchīgi pa piŋgɛ kugu ŋkwe maoŋ pugu, luoŋ Minnwi yugu shɨga ni njɨ nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa yəɨ vugu nɔ pa ŋgwa taoŋtaoŋ. Yugu ŋgəʼɨ shi mbɔ yi wuwuru.”
Jishɔ pɨʼɨ ligi yi njəɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pa ghaŋ fàʼo thɔ niʼiŋ pa maoŋ fɛ pugu moŋ mikuo yaoŋ fɛ́ Nda Minnwi nɛ.
A yəɨ miŋgwɛ ŋkugu chəɨ haʼaŋ a ki ya mbou niʼiŋ paa puoŋ mi mbɨŋ moŋ mikuo.
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, miŋgwɛ ŋkugu vei ŋa a pɔ pi mbou nɛ fɛ nchaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nduoŋ fuʼu yaoŋ fɛ́ yugu pi shɨna ntou maoŋ haʼaŋ pugu fāʼo nɛ, ndɔ miŋgwɛ vei moŋ pou yi fɛ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a ni mfāʼo nɔ yru nu ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ.”
Pichəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ni nchrā nu nthɛ Nda Minnwi, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi ni nchwīe vi ni pa ŋgùʼɔ pwapwa pugu pa maoŋ fɛ haʼaŋ pi ki fɛ fɔ nɛ. Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ pei ŋa pəɨ yəɨ nu nɛ, ndɨɨ thɔ nu ŋa mbaʼa taʼa ŋgùʼɔ yiʼi nuʼuŋ nūaŋ ŋkuoŋ ndǐŋ vi. Pi shi mbūo ghao mfɛ shhɛ.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ pie vi ŋa, “Masha, yei nnu shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi ndɨɨ khɔ? Lì ŋa a shi nōoŋ ŋa ndɨɨ kāʼo ni nnu yei nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu lɨʼɨ nɛ pɔ pi khɔ?”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Lɨna nu, kiʼi ŋoŋ fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ, nthɛ ŋa ntou ŋgwa lɛ nthɔ nɔ ligi a, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘a mmu mbɔ Krishto ghɔ’, pugu pa ŋa ‘ndɨɨ kāʼo nɛ’, kiʼi njōu njiŋ yugu.
Kiʼi pəɨ pɔgɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ yaʼo ŋa nchhɔ̀ pɔ ki pa yɔ̀yɔnɔ, nthɛ ŋa ŋkwaŋ nnu pinɛ shi ŋguʼɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ndɔ paʼa mbhi lɔ ndugwi pi ndɨɨ ghɔ.”
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Pa laʼataoŋ shi māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ pugu pa pichəɨ, ŋgwa taʼa fùoŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ pugu pa ŋgwa vichəɨ fùoŋ.
Shhɛ shi nchɨ̄ʼɨ ti shɨna, pa ghɨ̌nɔ pɨphɨ gū lɨlɨʼɨ, pa njì gū, pa nnu wuwuru lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, pi yəɨ pa mɛmmɛ lì llɔ po.

“Ndɔ ŋkaoŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei ma ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, pi shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ ŋgūo ŋgəʼɨ mbɨŋ pəɨ. Pi shi ŋɨ vəɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi pugu pa chə́ɨŋ, pi shi ŋgə̄ɨ ni pəɨ shhɨ pa fùoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ sháʼa lɨʼɨ nthɛ ligi a.
Yei shi mfɛ shɨna ni pəɨ nɔ shwei nu pwa pishaʼakhɔ a ni pugu.
Pəɨ nūʼɔŋ moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ ŋa pəɨ lɔ mfāʼo nɔ wie nu noŋ, ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ shi ŋkwe thɔ yəɨ nɛ, ŋkaoŋ ndɨɨ maa ŋkāʼo nu.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹshi mfɛ chrà pugu pa shiethɔ ni pəɨ ŋa mbaʼa kaŋ taʼa mbɨ̌na pəɨ yiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ pəʼɨ nu ki ndāa chrà ghɔ pugu pa shiethɔ ghɔ.
Pa tǎa pəɨ pugu pa lǐŋ pəɨ, ni pa ndaaŋoŋ pəɨ pugu pa taannu pəɨ shi mfīni vəɨ, pi jwi pichəɨ shɨna pəɨ.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa shi mbɨ̄na vəɨ nthɛ a
ndɔ mbaʼa taʼa ŋgiithɔ yəɨ phɛ.
Moŋ thi nu a tɨnɨ, pəɨ shi ndūgu.
“Ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ yəɨ pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ ghɨ̄ŋ Jerushalɛiŋ mbāoŋ nɛ, ɔ ji ŋa shiʼi nu mi para.
Nɛnnɛ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ Judia nɛ tei ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ pa mbra, pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ tri laʼa nɛ tei ntaoŋ, pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ kiʼi pugu nuʼuŋ nii.
Nthɛ ŋa yei llɛmbhi ŋgəʼɨ ni ŋgwa Ishrae, nɔ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ pi ni nāʼaŋ moŋ chrà Minnwi nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
A shi mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ ni pa piŋgɛ shūu pugu pa mapuoŋ haʼaŋ pugu thɔ nuʼɔŋ puoŋ moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ nɛ. Wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ shi mbɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ yei, pɨgɨtua Minnwi shwiʼi mbɨŋ ŋgwa pei.
Pi shi njwi pichəɨ ni kafa, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ pichəɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ moŋ pa chə́ɨŋ nɔ pɔ nu ŋkǔna nchhɔ̀ moŋ pa laʼataoŋ, pa ghɨ̀nɨ shi ŋkie ŋkuoŋ Jerushalɛiŋ ti yugu ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi nūʼɔŋ nɛ kāʼo.
“Pa lì shi nōoŋ moŋ minaoŋ pugu pa fhú ni fɨ́nəɨ. Ŋgwa pa laʼalaʼa taoŋ shi mbɔ ni fiŋthɔ nthɛ mbaʼaŋkhi ŋa a thɔ ŋgwara nu nɛ.
Pɔgɔ gu shi nchwīe njùʼɔ ŋgwa shāna nthɛ pa nnu ŋa pugu ywɛrɛ nu ŋa a thɔ nu ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pi shi nchɨ̄ʼɨ pa njɨ haʼaŋ a pɔ moŋ tɔthɨ nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, pi shi njəɨ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua thɔ shwiʼi nu moŋ tɔthɨ ni njɨ pugu pa mmɛ ndighaʼo.
Ndɨɨ haʼaŋ nnu pei jɛ̄ nthɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, lɔllɔ fēi noŋ yɔ, nthɛ ŋa lūgu nu yɔ para.”
Jishɔ chhu luʼɔ chrà yei ni pugu:
“Līi thɨ wùnu pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa thɨ nduoŋ,
nɔ haʼaŋ fhɔ̌ yugu nuʼuŋ njɛ̄ tua nu nɛ, ɔ pɛʼi ni noŋ yɔ nji ŋa ŋkwəɨ mbɨ̀ para.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ndɨɨ haʼaŋ ɔ shi njəɨ nnu pei lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, ɔ ji ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi para.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, mbaʼa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yei yiʼi ntɔgɔ nnu pei maa ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
Po pugu shhɛ shi ntɔgɔ, ndɔ mbaʼa chrà a ma ntɔgɔ gha.

“Pəɨ lɨna nu, kiʼi pəɨ nūʼɔŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ ŋkuoŋ pa jɨ pugu pa nnu nu mbaa ni pa maoŋ ŋkuoŋ ŋgrào mbhi yei pugu fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ, nnɛ ŋa kɛ̄ʼi llɛmbhi ghɔ lɛ ŋgwīʼi vəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ minyieŋ ghà ŋgwīʼi ŋkuoŋ shiʼi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa llɛmbhi ghɔ shi nthɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ.
Ndɔ lɨna nu ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ, nduoŋ nu ŋa ɔ fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ ləʼɨ nu ŋguoŋ nnu pei ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa mimfɛ ɔ thi shhɨ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua.”
Jishɔ ni njɛʼi nu ŋguoŋ llɛmbhi ghao moŋ Nda Minnwi, ndɔ tuʼu gha mbɔ, a kuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Olive nɛ.
Ŋkiɛŋ ni muuŋ tutuʼu, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa kɨrɨ yəɨ yu moŋ Nda Minnwi nɔ yaʼo nu ntɨ́gɨ mbhɔ yu.
Ndɨɨ jɨ mmɛ llɛ́ brɛi ki kuʼɔ ni ŋga mbara nu, mbɔ mmɛ llɛ́ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Lli Njiʼa nɛ,
pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi thɔ ntāʼa shɛndaoŋ nɔ jwi nu Jishɔ njiŋnjiŋ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nchhɔ mbɔgɔ nnu ŋa ŋgwa shi nchwīe nɛ.
Judashi, ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Ishikario nɛ, ŋa a ni mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ nɛ, mieŋ noŋ yi Shata nii nùʼɔŋ yu.
A ghə̄ɨ mbara pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi, nchrā pugu pugu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ minthɛ a fɛ Jishɔ ni pugu nɛ.
Túa yugu ni mbwa. Pugu chrā ŋa pugu shi mfɛ mbɨŋ ghɔ.
Nɛnnɛ, a piŋ nthɔ ntāʼa shɨna kiʼɛ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ minthɛ a fīni vi ni pugu lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ntou ŋgwa lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛ.
Llɛ́ jɨ brɛi ki kuʼɔ ni ŋga nthɔ, mbɔ llɛ́ ŋa a ki pie ŋa pi jwi minjɨɨ jɨ Lli Njiʼa nɛ,
Jishɔ taoŋ Pita pugu Jouŋ, nchhu nu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ mbīri yia maoŋ jɨ Lli Njiʼa nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia jɨ.”
Pugu pie vi ŋa, “Ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa pigi pīri pi hɨŋ?”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ shi nii moŋ laʼa Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ, pəɨ shi njəɨ mimbia, a tiɛŋ ŋkhǐ moŋ kɨ̌ŋ nchíʼa. Pəɨ yōu njiŋ yi, pəɨ pugu ghə̄ɨ nda ŋa a shi nii fɔ nɛ,
nchhu ni ŋgaŋ nda ghɔ ŋa, ‘Masha chhu ŋa pi pie ghɔ ŋa, “Njiɛŋ nda pa ghɨ̀nɨ pɔ pi hɨŋ, ŋa minthɛ pigi pa ghaŋ younjiŋ paŋ jɨ Lli Njiʼa fɔ?” ’
A shi nōoŋ mmɛ njiɛŋ nda tɔthɨ ni pəɨ ŋa pi kwo chwīe, pəɨ pīri jɨ Lli Njiʼa ghɔ fɔ.”
Pugu lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ, njəɨ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni nshwei vugu nɛ, mbīri maoŋ jɨ Lli Njiʼa ghɔ fɔ.
Ndɨɨ ni ŋga nthɔ, Jishɔ chɔchɔ yəɨ taprɛi pugu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi,
nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Mi ni ŋkwo ya nthɔ ntāʼa nu nɔ jɨ nu Lli Njiʼa yei pia ŋkaoŋ maa njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ.
Mbaʼa ǹjiʼi nuʼuŋ mbɨnɨ njɨ maoŋ pei pia ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa njiŋ yi lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi shi nshaʼa fùoŋ yi nɛ.”
A lɔ̄gɔ ndua làʼo, ŋga ntōo Minnwi, nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ kwe yei ŋgrā shɨna pəɨ.
Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa jɛ̄ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, m̀baʼa nuʼuŋ nnu làʼo yei, ti Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi thɔ.”
A lɔ̄gɔ brɛi, ŋga ntōo Minnwi, mbəʼɨ, mfɛ ni pugu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Yei frɛinoŋ a ŋa pi fɛ ni pəɨ. Pəɨ chwīe nɛiŋ nɔ kwiŋ nu ma.”
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, a pɨnɨ ndɔ̄gɔ ndua ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni ŋkwo kru nɛ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ndua làʼo yei nōoŋ kɨ̀na fhi ŋa Minnwi wrā moŋ chhǐ a ŋa pi shi ŋkwrī nthɛ vəɨ nɛ.
“Ndɔ līi njəɨ, ŋoŋ ŋa a shi mfīni a nɛ, mbhɔ yigi yu pɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi.
Nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi ŋguʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nūʼɔŋ nɛ, ndɔ ŋgəʼɨ wuwuru shi nii ŋoŋ ŋa a fīni vi nɛ.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi jɛ̄ mbie noŋ pugu ŋa a yəɨ ŋoŋ shɨna pugu ŋa a shi nchwīe yei nnu.
Mindoundou gū shɨna pugu ŋa a gɔ̌ ŋa minthɛ pi līi vi nɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pa fùoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ ghà nshaʼa ŋgwa pugu shaʼa, ndɔ pa ŋgwa pei wuʼɔ mɛ̄iŋ pa fùoŋ pighɔ pi ni tǎa ghaŋ ghɛ̄rɛ vugu.
Ndɔ ni pəɨ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi nnɛ, a ka pie pi ŋa ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ shɨna pəɨ gɛ mi pɔ nɔ mikəʼɨ, nthishɨ pɔ nɔ muuŋ fàʼa.
A gɔ̌ mbɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ, ŋoŋ ŋa a chɔchɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi nɛ ki muuŋ fàʼa? A lɔ mbɔ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a chhɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi nɛ? Ndɔ m̀bɔ shɨna pəɨ pi nɔ muuŋ fàʼa.
Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mīʼaŋ a moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa mōoŋ nu thɔ vəɨ nɛ,
wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa a fɛ ghrɨ́ vəɨ nɔ shaʼa nu nɛ, m̀fɛ ni pəɨ ŋkaa mu,
nɛnnɛ ŋa pəɨ shi njɨ ndɔ nnu ŋkuoŋ taprɛi a moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ a, ndɔ nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ pa faaŋ nshaʼa ŋgwa paanchrɔ taoŋ Ishrae.
Shemu, Shemu, līi njəɨ! Shata kwo luoŋ shɨna mbhɔ Minnwi nɔ krū nu vəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ghà ŋkrū prupɨna nɛ.
Ndɔ ŋ̀kwo luoŋ Minnwi mfɛ vɛ, ma Shemu, ŋa kiʼi piŋ yɔ chɨ̄ʼɨ. Ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ pɨnɨ ŋkwəɨ njəɨ a nɛ, ɔ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ lǐŋ pɔ.”
Pita khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Taathɔ, m̀bīri noŋ a ŋa pɔgɔ shi ŋguʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ chə́ɨŋ kaʼa, ŋkhu kaʼa.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Pita, ǹshwei ghɔ, mbaʼa miŋkəʼɨ khwɛ shiʼa ki ɔ lɔ nchhu ni trɛi ŋgɛ́ ŋa ɔ lɔ njiʼi nji a.”
Jishɔ pɨnɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ ŋa mi ni ntaoŋ vəɨ ki pəɨ lɔ ntuo pìɛŋ mbɨŋ, ki lɔ ntuo pìɛŋ, ki tra, pəɨ ni mbou yaoŋ?”
Pugu ŋa, “Ŋga.”
A pɨnɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Ndɔ ti ndwɛ, ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo mbɨŋ nɛ lɔ̄gɔ pugu pìɛŋ. Ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo kafa nɛ, fīni ndhwí fɨgəɨ yi njuoŋ nɔ ghɔ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa chrà Minnwi yei ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa, ‘pi shia vi shɨna ghaŋ chwīe phɨ nɛ
,’ shi ŋguʼɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ mu nthɛ ŋa pa nnu pɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ nthɛ a nɛ thɔ ŋguʼɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi ni nāʼaŋ nɛ.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, līi njəɨ paa kafa pɔ nɛiŋ.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Yinɛ chrà lūgwi nnɛ.”
Jishɔ taoŋ moŋ laʼa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ghà mbīgi ntaoŋ nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkuoŋ Mbra pa Thɨ Olive pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.
Ŋga nchəɨŋ fɔ, nchhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pəɨ luoŋ Minnwi nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ gū moŋ mōoŋ nu.”
Nchənə ndɔllɔ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ fɨʼɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋoŋ māʼaŋ ŋgùʼɔ a chəɨŋ nɛ, ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɛ nduoŋ Minnwi ŋa,
“Tǎa a, a mbɔ khwatua yɔ,ɔ pəɨ ndua ŋgəʼɨ pɨphɨ yei ki ǹdɔ nnu. Ndɔ ti kiʼi a pɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ǹtāʼa nu nɛ, a pɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa a pɔ nɛ.”
Yichəɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi llɔ po nthɔ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yi moŋ yúʼɔ ghɔ,
a luoŋ Minnwi ni njɨ ti lie yi taoŋ mbɔ nɔ chhǐ nchəɨŋ nu shhɛ.
A gha mīʼɛŋ luoŋ nu, ŋgə̄ɨ mbara pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pugu llɛ nu nthɛ yuʼɔ njùʼɔ.
A pie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ llɛ pi khɔ? Pəɨ lɔllɔ tɔthɨ nduoŋ Minnwi nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ gū moŋ mōoŋ nu.”
A gha ŋguʼɔ nchrā nu nɛ, yú ŋgwa chəɨŋ, ŋoŋ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Judashi, ŋa a ni mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna paanchrɔ ghɔ, pɔ ju shhɨ. Nchənə nthɔ yəɨ Jishɔ mbaŋ vi nɔ chrā nu ghɔ.
Ndɔ Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Judashi, ɔ shi mfīni a, Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua, ni paŋ nu ma nɔ chrā nu?”
Pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ yəɨ yu nɛ gha njəɨ nnu ŋa a tāʼa nu ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, p̂igi shua kafa nshāaŋ vugu nɔ?”
Yichəɨ taʼa yi shɨna pugu che tə́nə ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ muuŋ fàʼa taʼa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ.
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ nchwīe!”
Ŋkāoŋ tə́nə muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ, a tɨnɨ.
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ chhu ni pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi pugu pa thishɨ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ nu ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɛ ŋa,
“M̀bɔ pi ŋgɨna minwi ŋa pəɨ thɔ nu ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ni pa kafa pugu pa wrɛ́i?
Ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ghao pia pɔ nu moŋ Nda Minnwi, paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbaʼo nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu ma. Ndɔ yei ndɨɨ yəɨ pugu pa yi njɨ moŋ njiŋ.”
Nɛnnɛ, pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi wɛ̄iŋ vi ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju nda taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ. Pita yōu njiŋ yugu ndɔ mbɔ pi fie njiŋ.
Pugu ni ŋga mfrəɨ móŋoŋ moŋ titri yɨna, ti ŋkɨrɨ nchɔchhɔ kaʼa, Pita chhɔ shɨna pugu.
Taʼa muuŋ fàʼa mbɔ miŋgwɛ, ni ŋga njəɨ Pita a chhɔ yəɨ móŋoŋ ghɔ, a ya ligi yi mbiŋ yu, nchhu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei ni mbɔ pugu Jishɔ ŋkaa yu.”
A lāa, nchhu nu ŋa, “Maa, ǹdɔ njiʼi nji vi!”
A gha ndara, yichəɨ ŋoŋ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ vi, nchhu ŋa, “Ɔ taʼa pakwo pi!”
Pita chhu ŋa, “Tǎa, ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu!”
A ni ŋga nuʼuŋ njunu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ vi, ntīi nu ŋa, “Shishini, ŋoŋ vei ni mbɔ pugu Jishɔ nthɛ ŋa, a llɔ Galili ŋkaa yu!”
Ndɔ Pita khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Tǎa, ǹdɔ njiʼi nji nnu haʼaŋ ɔ thɔ nchhu nu nɛ!”
Nɔ haʼaŋ Pita ni ŋguʼɔ nchrā nu nɛ, miŋkəʼɨ khwɛ.
Taathɔ kara mbɛʼi Pita. A kwiŋ chrà Taathɔ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋkaoŋ miŋkəʼɨ maa ŋkhwɛ̄ shiʼa, ɔ shi ndāa a ni trɛi ŋgɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ, Pita taoŋ mbhi ŋkə̄ɨ a ghaʼa.
Pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni ŋkɛ̄ʼi Jishɔ nɛ ni njɛ̄ māʼaŋ nu vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ ndɔ mbɨnɨ nthɔ ŋgwie vi.
Pugu ni ŋkrao ligi yi ni ndhwí, mbie vi ŋa, “Nɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ, shwei vigi ni ŋoŋ ŋa a wie ghɔ nɛ!”
Pugu ni nthɔ mbɨnɨ nchhu pichəɨ ntou pa nnu, ŋgwɛʼi vi.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, pi lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ kɨrɨ pa thishɨ, mbɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi. Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ̈ mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, ɔ chhu ni pigi.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“M̈i nshwei vəɨ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ,
ndɔ mi mbie vəɨ ni taʼa nnu, paʼa pəɨ lɔ mfāʼo khwɛ̀.
Ndɔ llɔ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ pi shi nchərə Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ Minnwi ŋa a fāʼo ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ ŋguoŋ yugu pie vi ŋa, “Yie nōoŋ ŋa ɔ pɔ Muuŋ Minnwi?”
A chhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ chhu ŋa mi yie.”
Nɛnnɛ, pugu chhu ŋa, “Pia nuʼuŋ ntāʼa pi khɔ ndwɛ njaʼo, pia yaʼo ni noŋ yia llɔ mbhɔ yu.”
Ŋguoŋ kɨrɨ pa thishɨ pighɔ yrɛi ndɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ Pailɛ,

nchhu pa nnu thɔ yu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ yei thɔ nthɔ nu ni tɨtɨnɨ minduoŋnduoŋ shɨna ŋgwa pigi, ndāa nu ŋa kiʼi pigi māʼaŋ taashi ni Kaisha, ndɔ nchhu nu ŋa ju nduthɔ yi, Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, mbɔ fùoŋ.”
Pailɛ pie vi ŋa, “Ɔ fùoŋ pa Juu?”
A khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“A haʼaŋ ɔ chhu nɛ.”
Pailɛ chhu ni pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa yú ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa, “Ǹdɔ njəɨ fàŋ ŋoŋ vei.”
Pugu wuʼɔ mfrafra, nchhu nu ŋa, “A niʼiŋ puŋ ŋgwa ni yaoŋ ŋa a yɛʼi nu nɛ moŋ ŋguoŋ Judia, llɔ Galili ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ hɛiŋ.”
Pailɛ ni njaʼo mbie ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei llɔ pi Galili?”
A ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa Jishɔ llɔ pi moŋ yɛ lɨʼɨ ŋa a shaʼa fùoŋ Hɛrɔ nɛ, a taoŋ vi ghɔ. Hɛrɔ ni mbɔ Jerushalɛiŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa Hɛrɔ ni njəɨ Jishɔ nɛ, mfāʼo ntou pwatua, nthɛ ŋa a ni ŋkwo thɔ njaʼo ntou pa nnu nɔ ligi yi ŋkhwā nu nɔ yəɨ nu vi. A ni ŋkhwā nu nɔ yəɨ nu, a chwīe pa nnu ghraoghrao.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, a tou vi ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi, ndɔ paʼa Jishɔ lɔ ŋkhwɛ̄.
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi taoŋ shhɨ ntigi ntou pa nnu thɔ yu.
Hɛrɔ pugu pa ghaŋ nchhɔ̀ pi ni ŋga nshhū vi ndɔ māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ, ndɔ̄gɔ pɨ̀rɨ māʼaŋ mbɨŋ yu mbɨnɨ nduʼu vi ni Pailɛ.
Hɛrɔ pugu Pailɛ gū pa taannu yua ghɔ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mfǔoŋ mbɔ pi ni kipɨna.
Pailɛ kɨrɨ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ sháʼa, ni pa ŋgwa gha,
nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ thɔ ni ŋoŋ vei hɛiŋ nchhu ŋa a thɔ nchwīe nu ŋgwa tɨnɨthɔ, ŋ̀ga ntou vi shhɨ pəɨ, paʼa ndɔ njəɨ a fàŋ sheshe nnu moŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa pəɨ wɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ paʼa Hɛrɔ lɔ njəɨ ŋkaa yu, nnɛ a pɨnɨ nduʼu vi ni pia. Nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ yəɨ nɛ, a lɔ njiʼi nchwīe yichəɨ nnu ŋa a pie ŋa pi jwi vi,
nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshi ŋguʼɔ ŋgwie vi wie, mieŋ vi a ghə̄ɨ.”
[Sheshe llɛ́ jɨ Lli Njiʼa Pailɛ ghà nchuʼɔ taʼa ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ nɔ ligi yugu.]
Ŋguoŋ kɨrɨ ŋgwa paʼo ŋgòu ŋa, “Jwi vi, nchuʼɔ Baraba mfɛ ni pigi!”
Baraba ni mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa pi ni niʼiŋ vi chə́ɨŋ nthɛ ŋa tɨtɨnɨ minduoŋnduoŋ ni ŋgū moŋ laʼa pi jwi ŋoŋ.
Pailɛ chrā ni pugu ŋkamuʼɔŋ nthɛ ŋa a ni ntāʼa nu mieŋ vi a ghə̄ɨ nɛ.
Pugu paʼo ŋgòu ŋa, “Kwiŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa!”

Nɔ ŋgɛ́ yi trɛi, Pailɛ pie ni pugu ŋa, “Nthɛ khɔ, phɨ ŋa ŋoŋ vei chwīe nɛ pɔ pi khɔ? Ǹdɔ njəɨ sheshe fàŋ mbɨŋ yu ŋa a pie ŋa pi jwi vi jwi nɛ, nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshi ŋguʼɔ ŋgwie vi wie, nchuʼɔ vi a ghə̄ɨ.”
Ndɔ pugu lɨʼɨ, njɔ̄nɔ nu ŋkiɛŋ ni njɨ, nchhu nu ŋa pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa. Pugu yɔ̄nɔ ti yugu chəɨŋ.
Nɛnnɛ, Pailɛ shaʼa ŋa pi jwi Jishɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu taʼa nu nɛ.

A chuʼɔ ŋoŋ ŋa pugu tāʼa nu nɛ, mbɔ ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa pi ni niʼiŋ vi chə́ɨŋ nthɛ tɨtɨnɨ minduoŋnduoŋ ŋa a ni nchwīe a gū moŋ laʼa pi jwi ŋoŋ nɛ, mfɛ Jishɔ ni pugu ŋa pugu jwi vi, mbɔ nnu haʼaŋ pugu ni ntāʼa nu nɛ.

Pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ Roma wɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ. Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, pugu wɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Shemu, mbɔ ŋoŋ laʼataoŋ Shiriŋ ŋa a ni ndhɔ moŋ yichəɨ lɨʼɨ laʼataoŋ ghɔ nthɔ nu. Pugu nūʼɔŋ wáʼa mbəʼɨ yu, ŋɨ vi ŋa a tiɛŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ njiŋ Jishɔ.
Mmɛ kɨrɨ ŋgwa yōu njiŋ Jishɔ pugu pa piŋgɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ ŋkə̄ɨ vi ni njɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ Jishɔ kara nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Piŋgɛ Jerushalɛiŋ, kiʼi pəɨ kə̄ɨ a, pəɨ kə̄ɨ noŋ pəɨ pugu pa puoŋ pəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ llɛ́ thɔ nthɔ nu ŋa pi shi nchhu ŋa, ‘Mbrɔthɔ miŋgwɛ ŋa a ŋkhwɛ̄ nɛ, ni pa puŋ pɛ ŋa muuŋ shi yaʼa taoŋ fɔ nɛ, ni pa pɨnɨ pɛ ŋa pugu shi yaʼa nuʼɔŋ muuŋ nɛ.’
Nɛnnɛ, ŋgwa njɛ̄ nchhu nu ni mɛmmɛ mbra ŋa, ‘Gū mbɨŋ pigi,’ nchhu ni puoŋ mi mbra ŋa, ‘Kuru vigi!’
P̈i mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni ŋoŋ ŋa mbhɔ yi yi wo nɛ fɨʼɨ yei, kaŋ a shi mbɔ pi nɛiŋ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a fāaŋ nnu nɛ?”
Pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ Roma lɔ̄gɔ pichəɨ paa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa ŋgushaʼa ŋkaa pugu, ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ jwi vugu pugu pa Jishɔ.
Ŋga nthɔ nchəɨŋ lɨʼɨ chəɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni “Kwéi Thɔ”, ŋkwīŋ Jishɔ fɔ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa pugu pa ŋgushaʼa pighɔ, taʼa yi ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ, taʼa yi ŋgei mbhɔ ŋkwrɛi.
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Tǎa, līʼɛ phɨ yugu nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ nji nnu haʼaŋ pugu chwīe nu nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ, pugu māʼaŋ yaoŋ nɔ pɛʼi nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa a shi njɨ gɔ̌ ndhwí yi shɨna pugu.
Pa ŋgwa thi fɔ mbɛʼi nu, pa thishɨ māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ ŋa, “A ni nthɔ ŋkwe ŋgwa, a kwe nɛ noŋ yi pia nɔ haʼaŋ a mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe, llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, yɛ ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ vi nɛ.”
Pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ ŋkaa pugu mfɛ làʼo chəchɨgəɨ ghɔ.
Nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ̈ mbɔ fùoŋ pa Juu, ɔ kwe nɛ noŋ yɔ pia! Pigi yəɨ!”
Pi ni nāʼaŋ yaoŋ ŋkwīŋ ŋkuoŋ thɔ wáʼa thɔ yu ŋa, “Yei fùoŋ pa ŋgwa Juu.”
Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgushaʼa ghɔ ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ vugu pugu nɛ wɛʼi vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ? Kwe nɛ noŋ yɔ, mbɨnɨ ŋkwe vigi.”
Vichəɨ taʼa ŋgushaʼa ghɔ pɨ̄ga vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ ndou ti mbɔgɔ Minnwi, nthɛ ŋa pi yaʼa taʼa fɨʼɨ njɔ́ ni pia, mbɔ gu?
Yɔgɔ njɔ́ kāʼo nthɛ ŋa pɔgɔ khu nɔ nnu ŋa pɔgɔ tāʼa, ndɔ ti ŋoŋ vei lɔ njiʼi mfāaŋ kaŋ taʼa nnu.”
Nchhu kiʼɛ ŋa, “Jishɔ, kwiŋ a ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ nii moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ yɔ nɛ.”
Jishɔ luʼu ghɔ ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei ghɔ, shiʼa pɔgɔ shi mbɔ moŋ nchhɔ shiʼi Po.”
A ni mbɔ moŋ ntuŋ minaoŋ ŋa njiŋnjiŋ ni gū moŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghao fɔ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ trɛi minaoŋ ni naoŋchɨ,
nthɛ ŋa minaoŋ shi ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nthɛ nu. Ndhwí kɨʼɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ moŋ Nda Minnwi shāa ntaoŋ yi paa.
Jishɔ gha ŋkə̄ɨ ni njɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Tǎa a, m̀fɛ jijwɛ a mbhɔ ghɔ!”
A ni ŋga nchhu nɛnnɛ, jijwɛ yi taoŋ.
Nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ni ŋga njəɨ nnu haʼaŋ a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, ŋgaʼo Minnwi nchhu ŋa, “Shishini, ŋoŋ vei ni mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni ŋkɨrɨ fɔ nɔ yəɨ nu nnu ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ni njəɨ nnu ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, pugu wie njùʼɔ yugu mbɨnɨ laʼa moŋ tuʼuthɔ.
Ndɔ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nji Jishɔ, mbīgi pugu pa piŋgɛ ŋa pugu ni njōu njiŋ yi llɔ Galili nɛ, thi fie hiŋ nthɔ njəɨ nnu pei.
Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Joshɛ, llɔ yichəɨ lɨʼɨ Judia ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Arimatia, mbɔ ŋoŋ shiʼi ndɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ.
Njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ ŋgia pa thishɨ pighɔ nɛ, a shi ki lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ nnu ŋa pi ni ŋkāʼa ndɔ nchwīe mbɨŋ Jishɔ nɛ, ni nthɔ njwɛrɛ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.
A ni ŋgə̄ɨ mbara Pailɛ ŋa a fɛ khu Jishɔ ghɔ.
A shwiʼi khu yi shhɛ, mbara vi moŋ mbhɔ ndhwí fhu, niʼiŋ vi moŋ mbo ŋa pi fīʼi ŋkuoŋ ŋgùʼɔ nɔ fúŋ, mbɔ yɛ ŋa pi shi ki lɔ naa ma ntwei ŋoŋ fɔ.
A ni mbɔ llɛ́ pīri nu noŋ nɔ Llɛ́ Ji. Llɛ́ Ji ghɔ kwo tāʼa nu njɛ̄.
Piŋgɛ ŋa pugu pa Jishɔ ni ndhɔ Galili nɛ yōu njiŋ Joshɛ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ fúŋ ndɔ njəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi ni nūʼɔŋ khu Jishɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Ŋgə̄ɨ kiʼɛ laʼa mbīri laminda pugu pa pichəɨ pa mbwa wru nūʼɔŋ, mfɛrɛ noŋ Llɛ́ Ji nɔ haʼaŋ kɨ̀na chhu nɛ.
Moŋ fǔoŋ llɛmbhi mbɔ Shonde moŋ shwiʼi taŋ ghɔ, ŋkiɛŋ ni muuŋ tutuʼu, piŋgɛ pɛ lɔ̄gɔ laminda ŋa pugu ni mbīri nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ chofuŋ.
Ŋga nchəɨŋ fɔ, njəɨ ŋa pi kwo kə̄nə ŋgùʼɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchri chofuŋ nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga nii moŋ ghɔ, paʼa ndɔ njəɨ khu Taathɔ mbɔ Jishɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ thɔ yugu ni nthɔ mfiŋ nu ni nnu haʼaŋ a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, paa ŋgwa wīʼi nthi yəɨ pugu ndhwí yugu thɔ sheishei nɔ fiembɨ.
Pɔgɔ gu ni ŋga ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu, pugu tuʼu thɔ yugu shhɛ, pa ŋgwa pighɔ pie ŋa, “Pəɨ kie nɛiŋ nthɔ ntāʼa ŋoŋ maoŋ shɨna pa ŋgwa khu?
A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ hɛiŋ, a kuʼɔ llɔ moŋ gu! Kwiŋ nnu ŋa a ni nchhu ni pəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ Galili nɛ:
‘Pi shi nchaʼa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua mfɛ mbhɔ ghaŋ phɨ, pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa. A gha ndaʼa trɛi llɛ́, a pɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.’ ”
Piŋgɛ pighɔ kwiŋ chrà yi,
ŋkwəɨ llɔ chofuŋ ghɔ, nshwei ŋguoŋ nnu pei ni taʼanchrɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi pugu pa ŋguoŋ pichəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.
Piŋgɛ pighɔ ni mbɔ Meri Madaliŋ, Joana, ni Meri mǔuŋ Jɛiŋ, pugu pa pichəɨ pa piŋgɛ nduoŋ ŋa pugu ni nshwei pa nnu pei ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi nɛ.
Pugu līi a pɔ nɔ nnu na, nɛnnɛ paʼa ndɔ mbiŋ nnu pighɔ.
Ndɔ Pita yrɛi ntei ŋgə̄ɨ chofuŋ, ŋga ntuʼu noŋ yi mbɛʼi moŋ fúŋ, njəɨ ndhwí fhu fɔ ki yaoŋ nduoŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ. A pɨ̄nɨ laʼa, nchhɔ ŋgrāo nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Wuʼɔ llɛ́ ghɔ, paa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ nu lɨʼɨ chəɨ, pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Emao, wuŋ ŋkaŋ kwò llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Pugu ni nthɔ nshāa Shaaŋga ŋkuoŋ ŋguoŋ nnu pɛ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nchrā nu ndɔ nshāa nu nɛ, Jishɔ nyīeŋ mbara vugu, pugu pugu nyīeŋ nu kaʼa.
Yaoŋ chri ligi yugu, pugu yəɨ vi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nji ŋgaŋ vi.
A pie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ gha nyīeŋ nu, nthɔ nchrā pi khɔ?”
Pugu tithi ŋkuokuo.
Taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna pugu, ligi yi pɔ Kleopa, chhu ghɔ ŋa, “A wuʼɔ gɔ̀ təʼɨ ghɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ kra Jerushalɛiŋ ŋa a lɔ nji nnu pɛ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ fɔ moŋ llɛ́ pei nɛ?”
Jishɔ pie vugu ŋa,
“Mbɔ pa khɔ?”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pa nnu nɔ ligi Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ, a ni mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, ntɨnɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa a ni nchhu ndɔ nchwīe nɛ, nōoŋ nu ŋa Minnwi ni mbiŋ vi, ŋgwamishua ghaʼo vi.
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa pichəɨ pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa pia fɛ vi ŋa pi fɛ njɔ́ gu ghɔ pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Pigi ni ŋkwāʼa ŋa a ju mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a shi ŋkwe puoŋ Ishrae nɛ. Mbapa nɛnnɛ, a trɛi llɛ́ shiʼa ndɔ haʼaŋ nnu pei lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Nɔ pīgi nu ŋkuoŋ ghɔ, pichəɨ piŋgɛ pigi chhu nnu ghraoghrao ni pigi. Pugu ni mbɔ chofuŋ ni tutuʼu,
ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ khu yi, mbɨnɨ nchhu nu ŋa pugu yəɨ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, pugu chhu ŋa a yi maoŋ.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa ŋa pigi pugu ni mbɔ nɛ ghə̄ɨ chofuŋ ghɔ ŋguʼɔ njəɨ pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ piŋgɛ pighɔ ni nchhu nɛ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ vi fɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ kiʼi na pi nɛiŋ, a lɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi ŋgaʼa vəɨ pi nɛiŋ nɔ piŋ nu pa nnu haʼaŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nchhu nɛ.
A shi ki lɔ mbie ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ pei nii moŋ ndighaʼo yi?”
A jɛ̄ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Mushi ti ŋgə̄ɨ nii moŋ pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ pichəɨ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, ntɛrɛ ni pugu ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ni nchhu nthɛ vi nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni mbara nu laʼataoŋ ghɔ nɛ, Jishɔ chwīe nɔ haʼaŋ a fəfərə.
Pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa a kɨna, nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa, “Pia laʼa kaʼa, llɛmbhi kwo thɔ mɛmmɛ, lɨʼɨ lɔ ŋkwo shini nu.” Nɛnnɛ, a nii nda nɔ laʼa nu pugu pugu.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi lɨʼɨ jɨ maoŋ nɛ, a lɔ̄gɔ brɛi mfɛ tōo nu, mbəʼɨ ŋgrā ni pugu.
Ligi yugu ŋaʼaŋ, pugu ji vi, ndɔ a phɛ ligi pugu.
Pugu chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Njùʼɔ yɔgɔ lɔ ŋguʼɔ nthɔ ŋkɨɨkɨɨ moŋ ghɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nthɔ ntūgu Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ni pɔgɔ nɛ?”
Pugu yrɛi shhɛ ndɨɨ ghɔ mbɨnɨ Jerushalɛiŋ njəɨ taʼanchrɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu kɨrɨ fɔ pugu pa pichəɨ pi nduoŋ.
Pugu chhu ni paa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa, “Taathɔ kuʼɔ shini. A nōoŋ noŋ yi ni Shemu.”
Paa ŋgwa pighɔ fɨʼɨ pa nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ shɛndaoŋ Emao nɛ ni pugu, pugu pa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu ni nji Taathɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a pəʼɨ brɛi nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ paa ŋgwa pighɔ ni nthɔ nshwei vugu ni nnu pei nɛ, Jishɔ wīʼi nthi shɨna pugu, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ghɨghrɨ Minnwi pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ.”
Noŋ ŋguoŋ yugu wīni, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu, pugu gɛ̄ ŋa pugu yəɨ pi ŋkhushɛ.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ kie nɛiŋ mbɔgɔ gu nɛiŋ? A chwīe khɔ pəɨ thɔ mfāʼo yei fɨʼɨ khuthɔ?
Līi mbhɔ ma pugu pakwo ma, njəɨ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ mmu? Kāoŋ njaʼo, nthɛ ŋa ŋkhushɛ shiʼa mfāʼo frɛ̀i pugu pa kwéi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ yəɨ mfāʼo nɛ.”
A ni nchhu nnu yei, nōoŋ mbhɔ mi pugu pakwo mi ni pugu.
Pugu ni mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ndɔ ŋgrāo ti a fhi ni pugu pi nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ pi njə̀ɨŋ. Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ pie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fāʼo sheshe yaoŋ jɨ hɛiŋ?”
Pugu fɛ nyiʼaŋ tūoŋ ghɔ,
a kwe ŋkru shhɨ pugu.
Nchhu ŋa,

“Yei pa nnu ŋa ŋki chhu ni pəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ kaʼa nɛ, ŋa ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa pi ni nāʼaŋ nɔ ligi a moŋ gɨ́ Mushi ni yi pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pugu pa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Ŋkhǐ nɛ shi ŋguʼɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi nɛnnɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ, a ŋaʼaŋ lɨna yugu ŋa pugu ji chrà Minnwi.
Nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pi ni nāʼaŋ ŋa, ‘Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ shi njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ ndɔ ŋkhu a gha mbɔ moŋ trɛi llɛmbhi, a kuʼɔ.’
Pugu pa ŋa moŋ ligi Krishto ghɔ, pi shi nchīi ni pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi ŋa pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ, Minnwi liʼɛ mfɛ ni pugu, p̂əɨ jɛ̄ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Pəɨ yəɨ pa nnu pei, pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nshwei ŋgwa nduoŋ nɔ ghɔ.
“Ǹshi ntaoŋ kàʼa Tǎa a ni pəɨ. Ndɔ pəɨ chɔchɔ Jerushalɛiŋ hɛiŋ ti njɨ llɔ tɔthɨ shi nshwiʼi mbɨŋ pəɨ.”
Nɛnnɛ, Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ vugu llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ ti nchəɨŋ mbɨŋ laʼataoŋ Betani, mbɨʼɨ mbhɔ mi tɔthɨ nduoŋ mbɔrɔ Minnwi mfɛ ni pugu.
Ndɔ haʼaŋ a fɛ mbɔrɔ ni pugu nɛ, mieŋ vugu, Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋkuʼɔ nɔ po.
Nɛnnɛ, pugu ghaʼo vi, mbɨnɨ Jerushalɛiŋ ni ntou pwanjuʼɔ.
Pugu ni ŋkɨna moŋ Nda Minnwi ŋguoŋ llɛ́ nthɔ ntōo Minnwi.
John: Ŋkaoŋ pi maa nchwīe mbhi, Chrà ghɔ ni ŋkwo pɔ, Chrà ghɔ pɔ pugu Minnwi, Chrà ghɔ pɔ Minnwi.
A ni mbɔ pugu Minnwi kaʼa nɔ njɛ̄ yi.
Sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pi pūoŋ nɛ tɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu. A kaŋ ni ŋkiɛŋ paʼa sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pi pūoŋ nɛ lɔ mbɔ yi pūoŋ.
Chɔmbhi ni ndhɔ pi mbhɔ Chrà ghɔ, chɔmbhi ghɔ pɔ líʼɛ ŋgwamishua.
Líʼɛ ghɔ thɛ moŋ njiŋnjiŋ ndɔ paʼa njiŋnjiŋ lɔ ŋgaʼa vi.
Minnwi ni ntaoŋ yichəɨ ŋoŋ, ligi yi pɔ Jouŋ.
A ni nthɔ nɔ miŋkwentie nɔ chrà nu nthɛ líʼɛ ghɔ, nnɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nthɛ pugu piŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chrà yi.
A shini ndɔ mbɔ ju mbɔ líʼɛ ghɔ. A ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi miŋkwentie nɔ chrà nu nthɛ líʼɛ ghɔ.
Ŋkiɛŋ líʼɛ ghɔ ni nthɔ nu ŋkuoŋ mbhi, mbɔ líʼɛ ŋa a thɛ mfɛ líʼɛ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nɛ.
A ni mbɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi ndɔ pi tɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu nchwīe mbhi, ndɔ paʼa mbhi lɔ nji vi.
A ni nthɔ nthɛ ji, ndɔ paʼa ŋgwa pi pighɔ lɔ ŋaʼaŋ njùʼɔ yugu ghɔ.
Ndɔ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋaʼaŋ njùʼɔ yugu ghɔ nɛ, ŋa pugu ni mbiŋ vi nɛ, a fɛ ghrɨ́ ni pugu nɔ gū nu puoŋ Minnwi,
mbɔ puoŋ ŋa pi lɔ mbhi vugu pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋgwamishua ghà mbhi nɛ, mbɔ ŋgwa ŋa pi shi lɔ mbhi vugu pi ni khwā nu ŋgwamishua, ki ni pīʼi nu mimbia ŋa a laŋ nɛ. Minnwi nduthɔ yi chwīe pi phi vugu.
Chrà ghɔ ni ŋgū ŋoŋmishua nshwiʼi nchhɔ shɨna pia. Pia yəɨ ndighaʼo yi, mbɔ ndighaʼo yɛ ŋa a wuʼɔ fāʼo ju nɔ taʼa fiɛŋ Muuŋ Tǎa nɛ. A ni ndɨnaoŋ ni pwapuŋ pugu pa nnu shini.
Jouŋ ni mbɔ miŋkwentie yi, nchhu ni njɨ ŋa, “Yei ni mbɔ ju ŋa mi ni nchrā nthɛ vi ŋa, ‘Ju ŋa a thɔ nu njiŋ a nɛ, nthɨŋkwo yi chaa nyaŋ, nthɛ ŋa a ni ŋkwo pɔ ŋkaoŋ m̀aa mbɔ.’ ”
Llɔ moŋ lɨnaoŋ nu mi ni pwapuŋ, a fɛ mbɔrɔ ŋkuoŋ mbɔrɔ ni pia.
Nthɛ ŋa pi ni mfɛ gɨ́ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Mushi, ndɔ pwapuŋ pugu pa nnu shini thɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto.
Yichəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ naa njəɨ Minnwi, ndɔ fiɛŋ taʼa Minnwi ŋa a pɔ yəɨ Tǎa nɛ, chwīe pi ji Minnwi.
Pa ŋgwa Juu llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ ni ŋga ntaoŋ pa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi pugu pa ŋgwa Levi
ŋa pugu pie Jouŋ Ŋgaŋ Fɛ Ŋkhǐ ŋa, “Ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌?” yei pɔ nnu ŋa Jouŋ ni nchhu nɛ.
Jouŋ shini ndɔ ndāa khwɛ̄ nu, a ni nja nchrā lɨʼɨ wo ki lɔ njiʼi nchiɛŋ nchò yi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ǹshi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.”
Pugu pie vi ŋa, “Ti ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌? Ɔ Elaija?”
Jouŋ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ŋga, ǹdɔ mbɔ ju.”
“Ɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ghɔ?”
Jouŋ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ŋga.”
Nɛnnɛ, pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ gɔ̌? Pigi fāʼo nɔ pɨ̄nɨ nu ni khwɛ̀ nshwei ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu taoŋ vigi nɛ. Ɔ chhu pi ŋa nthɛ noŋ yɔ?”
Jouŋ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Mi ŋggì ŋoŋ ŋa a kə̄ɨ nu moŋ ŋkǔnu njó.
‘Pəɨ pīri Shɛndaoŋ tithi ni Taathɔ ŋa a tɔgɔ fɔ nɔ haʼaŋ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Ishaya ni nchhu nɛ.’ ”
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi ŋa pugu ni mbɔ shɨna ghaŋ ntaoŋ pighɔ
nɛ
pie vi ŋa, “Ti ɔ̈ mieŋ ki lɔ mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe, ki lɔ mbɔ Elaija, ki lɔ mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ghɔ, ɔ thɔ kwe ŋgwa ni ŋkhǐ kiʼɛ ŋa?”
Jouŋ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, “Ŋ̀ga ŋkwe ŋgwa ni ŋkhǐ pi moŋ ŋkhǐ, ndɔ yichəɨ taʼa ŋoŋ thi shɨna pəɨ ŋa pəɨ shi lɔ nji vi,
a thɔ nu njiŋ a, ndɔ ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa mimfɛ m̀fēi ŋkɨ̌ɨ tra yi.”
Ŋguoŋ nnu pei ghao ni nthɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ Betani, njiɛŋ nɨnəɨ Jodaŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa Jouŋ ni ŋkwe ŋgwa ni ŋkhǐ nɛ.
Mbhi gha ndaŋ, Jouŋ yəɨ Jishɔ a thɔ nu yəɨ yu, a chhu ŋa, “Līi njəɨ! Muuŋ Minjɨɨ Minnwi ŋa a kwe phɨ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ.
Yei pɔ pi ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa mi ni nchrā nu nthɛ vi ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki chhu ŋa, ‘Ju ŋa a thɔ nu njiŋ a nɛ nthɨŋkwo yi chaa nyaŋ, nthɛ ŋa a ni ŋkwo pɔ ŋkaoŋ m̀aa mbɔ.’
Mmu nduthɔ a shini ndɔ nji vi. Ndɔ ŋki thɔ, nchhɔ mfɛ ŋkhǐ ni ŋgwa nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa Ishrae ji vi.”
Jouŋ kwe ntie yi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Mi ni njəɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi shwiʼi nu mbɨŋ yu nɔ mintuʼɔlibuŋ llɔ po, nshwiʼi ŋkɨna mbɨŋ yu.

Mmu nduthɔ a shini ndɔ njiʼi nji vi, ndɔ ju ŋa a ni ntaoŋ a ŋa ŋ̀kwe ŋgwa ni ŋkhǐ moŋ ŋkhǐ nɛ ni nchhu vəɨ ŋa, ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa ɔ shi njəɨ Jijwɛ shwiʼi ŋkɨna mbɨŋ yu nɛ, a ju ŋa kwe nu ŋkhǐ ŋa a shi mfɛ ni ŋgwa nɛ shi mbɔ pi moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi.’
Ndɔ ǹjəɨ, ndɔ mbɔ miŋkwentie ŋa yei Muuŋ Minnwi.”
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, Jouŋ pɨnɨ ntithi pugu pa paa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi,
mbɛʼi Jishɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ntɔgɔ nu nɛ nchhu ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, Muuŋ Minjɨɨ Minnwi!”
Paa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pighɔ ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, ndɔllɔ njōu njiŋ Jishɔ.
Jishɔ kara noŋ yi njəɨ vugu pugu thɔ nu njiŋ yu, a pie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ taʼa pi khɔ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Rabai” (njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa “Masha”), “Ɔ laʼa pi hɨŋ?”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ thɔ nɛ njəɨ.”
A ni mbɔ yaoŋ nɔ khwɛ minaoŋ ni naoŋchɨ ŋa pugu pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni ndaʼa nu nɛ, pugu pugu laʼa llɛ́ ghɔ.
Taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna paa ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo Jouŋ chrā, pugu yōu njiŋ Jishɔ nɛ, ni mbɔ Andru, mbɔ ndǐŋ Shemu Pita.
Andru ghə̄ɨ ntāʼa ndǐŋ vi, mbɔ Shemu, nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi yəɨ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ” (njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa “Krishto”).
A lɔ̄gɔ vi pugu yu ghə̄ɨ njəɨ Jishɔ. Jishɔ pɛʼi vi nchhu ŋa,
“Ɔ Shemu, muuŋ Jouŋ, pi shi mɛ̄iŋ ghɔ ndwɛ pi ŋa, ‘Kefa’ njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa Pita
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ nthí mi ŋa a shi ŋgə̄ɨ Galili. Njəɨ Fili nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Thɔ njōu njiŋ a.”
Fili ni ndhɔ Beshaida mbɔ laʼataoŋ pa Andru pugu Pita.
Fili yəɨ Natania nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi yəɨ ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa Mushi ni nāʼaŋ nthɛ vi moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Gɨ́, pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pɨnɨ nāʼaŋ nthɛ vi ŋkaa pugu nɛ. A Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ, mbɔ muuŋ Joshɛ.”
Natania chhu ghɔ ŋa, “A nthɛ nnu shiʼi taoŋ Nasharɛ?”
Fili chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Thɔ nɛ njəɨ.”
Jishɔ yəɨ Natania thɔ nu yəɨ yu, a chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Līi njəɨ, yei ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ Ishrae shishini, ŋa a lɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ mifɨɨ nɛ!”
Natania pie vi ŋa, “Ɔ kie nɛiŋ nji a?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋkaoŋ Fili maa mɛ̄iŋ ghɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ ni mbɔ laʼo muuŋ thɨ wùnu nɛ, mi nì njəɨ ghɔ.”
Nnɛ Natania khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Masha, Ɔ Muuŋ Minnwi, Ɔ fùoŋ pa ŋgwa Ishrae.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ wuʼɔ mbiŋ nthɛ pi ŋa ǹshwei ghɔ ŋa mi nì njəɨ ghɔ laʼo muuŋ thɨ wùnu nɛ? Ɔ shi njəɨ pa nnu a chaa yei.”
A chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ ŋa, pəɨ shi njəɨ po ŋaʼaŋ, pəɨ yəɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi kuʼɔ nu ndɔ nshwiʼi nu mbɨŋ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua.”
Paa llɛ́ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, pi thɔ njɨ yichəɨ tini Kanaŋ moŋ Galili, mǔuŋ Jishɔ pɔ fɔ.
Pi ni ŋgɛ̄ Jishɔ ŋkaa yu lɨʼɨ tini ghɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.
Làʼo ni ŋga mmɛ, mǔuŋ Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pugu lɔ mfāʼo làʼo.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ma! Yinɛ fāʼo pi khɔ nɔ chwīe nu vəɨ? Ndɨɨ a lɔ naa ŋkāʼo yaʼa.”
Ndɔ mǔuŋ vi chhu ni pa ghaŋ fàʼa ŋa, “Pəɨ chwīe sheshe nnu ŋa a chhu ni pəɨ nɛ.”

Ntɨgao ndigi kɨ̌ŋ niʼiŋ ŋkhǐ ŋa pi chwīe ni ŋgùʼɔ nɛ ni nthi fɔ nnɛ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu ŋkhǐ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ pa Juu nɔ kie nu mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ chhu nɛ. Taʼa yi lɔ̄gɔ jɛ̄ ŋkuoŋ khwɛ jo ŋgə̄ɨ pi ntɨgao jo.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ niʼiŋ ŋkhǐ moŋ pa kɨ̌ŋ pighɔ a lɨnaoŋ.”
Pugu niʼiŋ a lɨnaoŋ ti njwɛ̄ cho ghɔ.
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ŋwaa yichəɨ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ mfɛ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a lɨna nu ni ŋgwa lɨʼɨ jɨ tini yei nɛ.”
Pugu ŋwaa.

Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni ndɨna nu ni pa ŋgwa lɨʼɨ jɨ tini ghɔ nɛ ni ŋga njwɛʼi ŋkhǐ ghɔ ŋa pi kara a gū làʼo nɛ, paʼa ndɔ nji lɨʼɨ ŋa a llɔ nɛ (ndɔ pa ghaŋ fàʼa lɨʼɨ tini ghɔ ŋa pugu ni ŋwaa ŋkhǐ ghɔ nɛ ni nji) ŋgaŋ lɨna ni ŋgwa lɨʼɨ jɨ tini ghɔ mɛ̄iŋ mimbia ŋgaŋ tini ghɔ,
nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Shesheŋoŋ ghà fǔoŋ ŋgrā pi làʼo shiʼi ti ŋgwa gha nja nnu shiʼi a maa nthɔ ni yɛ ŋa a lɔ nja mbwa nɛ. Ndɔ ɔ nūʼɔŋ làʼo shiʼi ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ ndwɛ.”
Yei ni mbɔ fǔoŋ lì ŋa Jishɔ ni nōoŋ Kanaŋ moŋ Galili, nōoŋ ndighaʼo yi, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi piŋ vi.
Tini ghɔ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ shwiʼi Kapanuŋ pugu pa mǔuŋ vi ni pa lǐŋ pi pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ndaʼa fɔ nɔ shɨgɛi llɛ́.
Ndɨɨ jɨ Lli Njiʼa pa Juu ni ŋkwo para nu, nnɛ Jishɔ kuʼɔ Jerushalɛiŋ.
A yəɨ ŋgwa Nda Minnwi, pugu chhɔ mfīni pa fua, pa minjɨɨ, pa mintuʼɔlibuŋ, ni pa ghaŋ kwri mbɨŋ pugu chhɔ ŋkuoŋ pa taprɛi pugu.
Jishɔ chwīe ŋgwàŋ ni ŋkɨɨ njōu vugu nɔ ghao Nda Minnwi mfɛ mbhi pugu pa minjɨɨ, pugu pa fua, ŋkwrī mbɨŋ ghaŋ kwri mbɨŋ ŋkara taprɛi yugu ŋkuru.
Nɛnnɛ, nchhu ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mfīni mintuʼɔlibuŋ nɛ ŋa,
“P̂əɨ pei maoŋ pei ntaoŋ nɔ ghɔ hɛiŋ, kiʼi pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ Nda Tǎa a, a gū nda taŋ.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi kwiŋ ŋa pi ni nāʼaŋ ŋa, “Niʼiŋ njùʼɔ nthɛ Nda yɔ shi njɨ a.
Nnɛ pa Juu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ nōoŋ pi yəɨ lì ni pigi nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa ɔ fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chwīe nu nnu pei?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ shāʼa Nda Minnwi yei, m̀bɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkrao moŋ trɛi llɛ́.”
Pa Juu chhu ŋa, “Khɔ nya! A lɔ̄gɔ khwɛ wuŋ ŋgaʼo ni ŋgaʼo yi ntɨgao nɔ krao nu Nda Minnwi yei, ɔ ŋa ɔ shi mbɨʼɨ tɔthɔ nɔ trɛi llɛ́ nya?”
Ndɔ Nda Minnwi yɛ ŋa Jishɔ ni chrà nu nthɛ vi nɛ ni mbɔ pi noŋ yi.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ndɨɨ yɛ ŋa Jishɔ ni mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu nɛ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi kwiŋ ŋa a ni nchhu yei nnu, mbiŋ chrà Minnwi pugu pa chrà ŋa Jishɔ ni nchrā nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ Jerushalɛiŋ lɨʼɨ jɨ Lli Njiʼa nɛ, ntou ŋgwa piŋ vi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni njəɨ ntou pa lì ŋa a ni nōoŋ nu nɛ.
Ndɔ Jishɔ shini ndɔ njɨʼə noŋ yi mbɨŋ pugu nthɛ ŋa a ni nji vugu ghao.
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ shini ndɔ mfāʼo nɔ shwei nu vi ni yaoŋ ŋa ŋoŋmishua yie ghɔ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ju nduthɔ yi ni nji njùʼɔ yugu.
Yichəɨ nthishɨ pa Juu ni mbɔ fɔ, mbɔ ŋoŋ Farashi, ligi yi pɔ Nikodemu.
Ŋoŋ vei thɔ njəɨ Jishɔ ni tuʼu nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, pigi ji ŋa ɔ ŋgaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa llɔ mbɔ Minnwi, nthɛ ŋa a nthɛ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ nōoŋ pa lì pei ŋa ɔ nōoŋ nɛ ki Minnwi lɔ mbɔ pugu yu kaʼa.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei ghɔ, ŋ̈oŋ mieŋ ki lɔ mbɔ phi ŋkamuʼɔŋ
, paʼa Minnwi lɔ nshaʼa fùoŋ yi moŋ chɔmbhi yi.”
Nikodemu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Mimfɛ pi pɨnɨ mbhi ŋoŋ pi nɛiŋ ndɨɨ ŋa a kwo pɔ mmɛŋoŋ nɛ? A nthɛ a pɨnɨ nii moŋ puŋ mǔuŋ vi pi pɨnɨ mbhi vi?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹchhu vɛ ŋa pi mieŋ ki phi ŋoŋ ni ŋkhǐ pugu pa Jijwɛ, paʼa a lɔ nii moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.
Yɛ ŋa a phi frɛinoŋ mbhi vi nɛ frɛinoŋ, yɛ ŋa a phi Jijwɛ mbhi vi nɛ, pɔ jijwɛ.
Kiʼi ŋgrāo nɔ haʼaŋ ǹchhu vɛ ŋa a yīʼi ŋa pi phi vəɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ nɛ.
Fɨfrəɨ ghà ntɔgɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu lɨʼɨ ŋa a khwā nɛ, ɔ yaʼo ŋkaoŋ yi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nji lɨʼɨ ŋa a llɔ nɛ, ki lɨʼɨ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nu nɛ. A haʼaŋ a pɔ ni shesheŋoŋ ŋa a phi Jijwɛ Minnwi mbhi vi nɛ.”
Nikodemu pie ŋa, “Pa nnu pei nthɛ a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi nɛiŋ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ ŋgaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa Ishrae ki lɔ nji nnu pei?
Shishini, ǹchhu vɛ ŋa pigi ghà nchrā pi nnu ŋa pigi ji nɛ, ŋkwe ntie yaoŋ ŋa pigi yəɨ nɛ, ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ nnu ŋa pigi chhu nu nɛ.
M̈i nshwei vəɨ ni pa nnu ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei ki pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ, pəɨ shi mbiŋ ndɨɨ ŋa ǹshwei vəɨ ni pa nnu po nɛ pi ŋkwaŋ nɛiŋ?
Yichəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ naa ŋkuʼɔ po ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a llɔ po nshwiʼi shhɛ nɛ, mbɔ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua.
Ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Mushi ni ŋkə̄rə mitwɛʼi tɔthɨ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó nɛ, wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, a yiʼi ŋa pi shi ŋkə̄rə Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua tɔthɨ,
nnɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ vi nɛ, shi mfāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.
“Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkhwā ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei ntou yi ti mfɛ taʼa fiɛŋ muuŋ vi, ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ vi nɛ, mbaʼa a yiʼi ŋkhu
, a shi mfāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi shini ndɔ ntaoŋ muuŋ vi ŋkuoŋ mbhi pi ŋa a thɔ nshaʼa mbhi shaʼa, a ni ntaoŋ vi pi ŋa a thɔ nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ kie mbɨŋ yu ndūgu.
“Mbaʼa pi yiʼi nshaʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ vi nɛ. Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbiŋ vi nɛ kwo pɔ ŋgushaʼa nthɛ ŋa a lɔ mbiŋ fiɛŋ taʼa Muuŋ Minnwi.
Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ sháʼa ghɔ pɔ nɛ: ŋa líʼɛ thɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ŋgwa mieŋ líʼɛ ghɔ ŋkhwā pi njiŋnjiŋ nthɛ ŋa mbha nnu pugu pɔ pi pa pi pɨphɨ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nchwīe pa nnu pɨphɨ nɛ pɨ̄na líʼɛ, nnɛ paʼa ndɔ nthɔ mbara yəɨ líʼɛ ghɔ nthɛ ŋa mbha nnu pi pi pɨphɨ shi ntaoŋ páa.
Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nchwīe nnu shini nɛ ghà nthɔ moŋ líʼɛ, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pi yəɨ ŋa nnu ŋa a chwīe nu nɛ a yaʼo pi nchò Minnwi.”
Nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ghə̄ɨ moŋ shhɛ Judia, nchhɔ fɔ pugu pugu, ŋkwe ŋgwa ni ŋkhǐ.
Jouŋ ŋkaa yu ni nthɔ ŋkwe ŋgwa moŋ ŋkhǐ Aenoŋ ŋkɨŋ Shaliŋ, nthɛ ŋa ŋkhǐ ni njiɛŋ fɔ, ŋgwa thɔ nu fɔ ŋkwe ŋkhǐ.
(Yei ni mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi shini ndɔ naa niʼiŋ Jouŋ chə́ɨŋ nɛ.)
Mindoundou ni ŋgū shɨna pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jouŋ pugu pa yichəɨ ŋoŋ Juu ŋkuoŋ nnu shɨ̄gao nu noŋ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ chhu nɛ.
Pugu thɔ mbara Jouŋ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, līi njəɨ, ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa pəɨ yu ni mbɔ njiɛŋ ŋkhǐ Jodaŋ, ɔ chrà nɔ ligi yi nɛ thɔ nɛ mfɛ ŋkhǐ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghə̄ɨ mbara vi.”
Jouŋ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Mbaʼa ŋoŋ fāʼo kaŋ taʼa yaoŋ kaŋ a nɛiŋ pi fɛ fɛ ghɔ llɔ po.
Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ pa miŋkwentie paŋ ŋa ŋki nchhu ŋa, ‘Ǹdɔ mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, ndɔ pi taoŋ a ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ shhɨ yu.’
Ŋoŋ ŋa a laŋ miŋgwɛ fhi nɛ, ju mbɔ mimbia láŋ. Ndɔ taannu mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ gha ntithi njaʼo ŋggì mimbia ŋgaŋ láŋ ghɔ, mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ntou yi. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pwanjuʼɔ a lɨnaoŋ ndwɛ.
A shi ŋguʼɔ ŋkuʼɔ kuʼɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ, ŋ̀guʼɔ nshwishwiʼi mbɔ ŋoŋ kikɛʼi.
Ju ŋa a llɔ pi tɔthɨ nɛ ghaʼo nchaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa, ju ŋa a llɔ pi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ pɔ ŋoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, nchrā pi nnu ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, ndɔ ju ŋa a llɔ pi po nɛ chaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.
A chhu nnu pɛ ŋa a yəɨ ndɔ njaʼo nɛ, ndɔ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ mbiŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ yi.
Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a piŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ yi nɛ frɛ̄i mbhɔ yi ŋkuoŋ yei nnu, ŋa Minnwi ŋgaŋ nnu shini.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa Minnwi taoŋ nɛ chrā pi chrà Minnwi nthɛ ŋa Minnwi fɛ Jijwɛ yi ghɔ ki fɨʼɨ.
Tǎa khwā Muuŋ vi, mfɛ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ liɛŋ mbɔ yu ghao.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ Muuŋ nɛ fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ, ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njaʼo nchò Muuŋ nɛ, mbaʼa a lɛ mfāʼo ŋkiɛŋ chɔmbhi ndɔ ŋgəʼɨ pɨgɨtua Minnwi shi ŋkɨna mbɨŋ yu.”
Jishɔ ni nji ŋa pa ŋgwa Farashi kwo yaʼo ŋa a thɔ mfāʼo ntou ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ndɔ ŋkwe vugu ni ŋkhǐ nchaa Jouŋ.
(Ndɔ Jishɔ nduthɔ yi shini ndɔ nthɔ ŋkwe ŋgwa ni ŋkhǐ, a ni ŋkwe ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋkwe ŋgwa ni ŋkhǐ.)
A ni ŋga nji nɛnnɛ, ndɔllɔ Judia mbɨnɨ Galili.
A pie ŋa a tɔgɔ Shamaria.
Nnɛ a thɔ nchəɨŋ moŋ yichəɨ mmɛ lɨʼɨ Shamaria ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Shaika, ŋkɨŋ nyìeŋ ŋa Jakɔ ni mfɛ ni Joshɛ muuŋ vi nɛ.
Tiɛŋ ŋkhǐ Jakɔ ni mbɔ fɔ. Jishɔ ni ŋkwo kɨna nthɛ fɨʼɨ nyīeŋ nu ŋa a ni ŋkwo nyīeŋ nɛ, nnɛ, nchɔchhɔ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ ghɔ. Ndɨɨ ghɔ ni mbɔ moŋ ntuŋ minaoŋ.
Miŋgwɛ Shamaria thɔ lɨʼɨ shūu ŋkhǐ, Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Fɛ ŋkhǐ vəɨ nnu.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ laʼa lɨʼɨ yuoŋ maoŋ jɨ.
Miŋgwɛ Shamaria ghɔ chhu ŋa, “A kie pi nɛiŋ, gɔ̀ mbɔ ŋoŋ Juu, pie yaoŋ nnu llɔ mbhɔ a mbɔ miŋgwɛ Shamaria?” (Nthɛ ŋa pa ŋgwa Juu shini ndɔ nthɔ mbɔ nu ni pra pugu pa ŋgwa Shamaria.)
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ kaŋ nji fɛ́ Minnwi, ki nji ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a thɔ nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Fɛ ŋkhǐ nnu nɛ’, ɔ kaŋ mbie vi, a fɛ ŋkhǐ ŋa a ghà mfɛ chɔmbhi nɛ vɛ.”
Miŋgwɛ ghɔ chhu ŋa, “Masha, ɔ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yaoŋ nɔ shūu nu ŋkhǐ nɔ ghɔ, tiɛŋ ŋkhǐ ghɔ lɔ nja nshīi. Ti ɔ shi mfāʼo ŋkhǐ fɛ chɔmbhi yei pi hɨŋ?
A ni mfɛ ŋkhu tǎa vigi Jakɔ mfɛ tiɛŋ ŋkhǐ yei ni pigi. Ju nduthɔ yi pugu pa puoŋ pi pugu pa minyieŋ pi ni ŋguʼɔ nnu ŋkhǐ pi llɔ fɔ. Ɔ tāʼa nu nchhu ŋa ɔ ghaʼoghaʼo nchaa Jakɔ tǎa vigi ghɔ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Njì ŋkhǐ shi ŋguʼɔ mbɨnɨ njia ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu nnu yei ŋkhǐ nɛ.
Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a nnu yɛ ŋkhǐ ŋa ǹshi mfɛ nɛ, mbaʼa njì ŋkhǐ ma nuʼuŋ njia vi. Ŋkhǐ ŋa ǹshi mfɛ nɛ shi ŋgū shaʼashhɛ moŋ noŋ yu ŋkuʼɔ nu mfɛ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.”
Miŋgwɛ ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, fɛ ŋkhǐ yei vəɨ nji ŋa m̀baʼa ma nuʼuŋ mfāʼo njì ŋkhǐ, ki nthɔ hɛiŋ lɨʼɨ shūu ŋkhǐ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ghə̄ɨ mɛ̄iŋ ndaoŋ ghɔ pəɨ yu thɔ.”
Miŋgwɛ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Ndɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ndaoŋ a.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ chhu a kāʼo ŋa, ‘Ǹdɔ mfāʼo ndaoŋ a’,
nthɛ ŋa ɔ kwo laŋ tiɛŋ pimbia, ndɔ ti yɛ ŋa pəɨ yu pɔ ndwɛ nɛ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ndaoŋ ghɔ, nnu ŋa ɔ chhu nɛ nnu shini.”
Miŋgwɛ ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, ǹjəɨ ŋa ɔ pɔ pi njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.
Pa tǎa pigi ni nthɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi pi ŋkuoŋ mbra yei, ndɔ pəɨ chhu ŋa a pie ŋa ŋgwa wuʼɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi pi Jerushalɛiŋ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ma! Piŋ nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ, ndɨɨ thɔ nu ŋa mbaʼa pi yiʼi ŋgaʼo Tǎa pi ŋkuoŋ mbra yei ki Jerushalɛiŋ.
Pəɨ ghaʼo yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ lɔ nji nɛ, pigi ghaʼo yaoŋ ŋa pigi ji. Nthɛ ŋa lūgu nu tɔgɔ pi mbhɔ ŋgwa Juu.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ chhɔ thɔ nu, ndɔ ŋkwo pɔ hɛiŋ, ŋa ŋkiɛŋ ghaŋ ghaʼo Minnwi shi ŋgaʼo Tǎa moŋ Jijwɛ pugu pa nnu shini. Nthɛ ŋa Tǎa tāʼa pi ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu ghaʼo vi.
Minnwi pɔ pi Jijwɛ, a pie ŋa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu shi ŋgaʼo vi nɛ, ghaʼo moŋ jijwɛ pugu pa nnu shini.”
Miŋgwɛ ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ǹji ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ thɔ nu (mbɔ ju ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Krishto nɛ). A shi ŋga nthɔ, kaŋ a shi nshwei vigi ni ŋguoŋ nnu.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Mmu ŋa ǹchrā nu vɛ nɛ ju.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pɨnɨ, ŋgrāo ŋa a chrā nu pugu miŋgwɛ, ndɔ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu lɔ mbie vi ŋa, “Ɔ tāʼa pi khɔ?” ki ŋa, “Pəɨ yu chrā nu nthɛ khɔ?”
Nnɛ miŋgwɛ ghɔ mieŋ kɨ̌ŋ ŋkhǐ yi, ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ laʼa nchhu ni pa ŋgwa ŋa,
“P̂əɨ thɔ njəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a shwei a ni ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa mi ni ŋkwo ma nchwīe nɛ. A nthɛ yei pɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ?”
Pa ŋgwa pighɔ mieŋ moŋ laʼa nthɔ nu lɨʼɨ yəɨ Jishɔ.
Ndɨɨ ghɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi lɨ̄gəɨ Jishɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Masha, jɨ maoŋ.”
Ndɔ a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“M̀fāʼo maoŋ jɨ nɔ jɨ nu ŋa pəɨ shi lɔ njiʼi nji.”
Nnɛ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu nu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Yichəɨ ŋoŋ ni nthɔ ni maoŋ jɨ mfɛ ghɔ ŋa a jɨ?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Maoŋ jɨ paŋ pɔ pi nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a khwā nɛ, ti mīʼɛŋ fàʼa yi ghɔ.
Pəɨ lɔ nchhu ŋa a wuʼɔ mbiʼi khwɛ nàoŋ pi maa ŋkwōo maoŋ? Līi njəɨ, ǹshwei vəɨ, pəɨ pɨʼɨ ligi yəɨ ndīi pa moŋ nyìeŋ. Pa maoŋ kwo tɨnɨ ŋkāʼo kwōo nu.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a kwōo maoŋ nɛ kwo nthɔ mfāʼo pe yi, nthɔ nu ni maoŋ kwōo pighɔ ŋa pugu fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ, nnɛ ŋa ŋoŋ haʼaŋ a phi nɛ pugu ŋoŋ haʼaŋ a kwōo nɛ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ kaʼa.
Nthɛ ŋa chrà yei nnu shini ŋa, ‘Yichəɨ ŋoŋ phī, ŋoŋ nduoŋ kwōo.’
Ǹtaoŋ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ ghə̄ɨ ŋkwōo yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ shini ndɔ mfāʼa. Ŋgwa nduoŋ fāʼa, pəɨ shei nɔ ghɔ.”
Ntou pa ŋgwa Shamaria moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ piŋ vi nthɛ chrà miŋgwɛ ghɔ ŋa, “A shwei a ni ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa mi ni ŋkwo ma nchwīe nɛ.”
Pa ŋgwa Shamaria ni ŋga nthɔ njəɨ vi, ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a laʼa pugu pugu. A laʼa fɔ nɔ paa llɛ́.
Ntou pa ŋgwa pɨnɨ mbīgi mbiŋ vi ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ chrà yi.
Nchhu ni miŋgwɛ ghɔ ŋa, “A lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ nthɛ pi pa nnu pɛ ŋa ɔ chhu nɛ ŋa pigi piŋ. Pigi yaʼo ni noŋ yigi llɔ mbhɔ yu, ndɔ nji ŋa a ju shini mbɔ Ŋkwe mbhi.”
Paa llɛ́ gha ntɔgɔ, a lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ Galili.
(Nthɛ ŋa nduthɔ yi ni nchhu ŋa, “Pi shiʼa ma ŋgaʼo pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi laʼa pugu.”)
Nnɛ, a gha ŋgə̄ɨ Galili, pa ŋgwa Galili piŋ vi nthɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ jɨ Lli Njiʼa Jerushalɛiŋ, njəɨ fɨʼɨ nnu pɛ ŋa a ni nchwīe lɨʼɨ jɨ ghɔ nɛ.
Nnɛ, a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nthɔ ŋkamuʼɔŋ Kanaŋ moŋ Galili, lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni ŋkara ŋkhǐ a gū làʼo nɛ. Mmɛŋoŋ ndiɛŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ Kapanuŋ ŋa muuŋ vi yi mimbia ni ŋgɨ̄nɔ nu.
A ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa Jishɔ lɔllɔ Judia nthɔ Galili, a ghə̄ɨ ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa a shwiʼi Kapanuŋ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ muuŋ vi nthɛ ŋa a ni ŋkwo chhɔ ŋkhukhu.
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“P̈əɨ mieŋ ki yəɨ pa lì pugu pa nnu ghraoghrao paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ.”
Mmɛŋoŋ ndiɛŋ ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, thɔ ŋkaoŋ muuŋ a maa ŋkhu.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ghə̄ɨ, muuŋ ghɔ shi mbɔ yi maoŋ.”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ piŋ chrà Jishɔ ndhɔ nyìeŋ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nshwiʼi nu nɛ, puoŋ fàʼa pi para vi nchhu ghɔ ŋa muuŋ ghɔ yi maoŋ.
Nnɛ a pie vugu ni ndɨɨ ŋa noŋ yi ni njɛ̄ yo nu nɛ. Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “A yua moŋ taʼa minaoŋ ni naoŋchɨ ŋa shɨ̀gao ghɔ ni ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu.”
Tǎa ghɔ ji kiʼɛ ŋa a ndɨɨ yɛ ŋa Jishɔ ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Muuŋ ghɔ shi mbɔ yi maoŋ nɛ.”
Ju nduthɔ yi pugu pa mbaanda yi gū pa ghaŋ piŋ.
Yei ni mbɔ mbra lì ŋa Jishɔ ni nōoŋ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ntaoŋ moŋ Judia ŋgə̄ɨ Galili nɛ.
Pa nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, yichəɨ jɨ pa Juu thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ Jerushalɛiŋ, Jishɔ kuʼɔ fɔ.
Yichəɨ ŋkhǐ
ni mbɔ Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ ni Choŋkaʼa Minjɨɨ nɛ, pi mɛ̄iŋ moŋ chrà Hibru ŋa Bɛjata
, ŋa a ni mfāʼo tiɛŋ lɨʼɨ fɛrɛ noŋ ŋkɨŋ ghɔ.
Ntou pa ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ ni nuaŋ fɔ: pa nchriligi, pa kwíni kwò ni pa ŋgwa ŋa ŋgei noŋ yugu khu. [Pugu ni nthɔ njwɛrɛ nu ŋa pi chɨ̄ʼɨ ŋkhǐ ghɔ
nthɛ ŋa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ ni nthɔ nshwiʼi nu moŋ ŋkhǐ ghɔ pichəɨ ndɨɨ nchɨʼɨ nu. Fǔoŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a nii moŋ ghɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi kwo chɨ̄ʼɨ nɛ, sheshe ŋkwaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋa a ghana vi nɛ tɔgɔ.]
Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ ŋa a ni ŋkwo ghɨ̌nɔ nɔ trɛi wuŋ ŋgaʼo ni yi fúoŋ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga njəɨ vi a nūaŋ fɔ, ndɔ nji ŋa ghɨ̌nɔ ghɔ ni ŋkwo laʼa mbɨŋ yu nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ, mbie vi ŋa,
“Ɔ tāʼa nu mbɔ shiʼi?”
Ŋgɨ̌nɔ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāʼo shesheŋoŋ nɔ niʼiŋ nu ma moŋ ŋkhǐ ndɨɨ ŋa pi chɨ̄ʼɨ nɛ. Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋ̀ga mbaʼo nu nɔ nii nu nɛ, ŋoŋ nduoŋ kwo fǔoŋ nii moŋ ghɔ shhɨ a.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Lɔllɔ tɔthɨ, lɔ̄gɔ kúoŋ yɔ ndɔ nyieŋ.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, ŋoŋ ghɔ pɔ shiʼi, ndɔ̄gɔ kúoŋ yi njɛ̄ nyīeŋ nu! Llɛ́ ŋa nnu yei ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ ni mbɔ llɛ́ ji.
Nɛnnɛ pa ŋgwa Juu chhu ni ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa pi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yi nɛ ŋa, “Shiʼa llɛ́ ji, paʼa gɨ́ yia lɔ mbiŋ ŋa ɔ tiɛŋ kúoŋ yɔ.”
Ndɔ a khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ a nɛ ni nchhu ŋa, ‘Lɔ̄gɔ kúoŋ yɔ nyieŋ.’ ”
Pugu pie vi ŋa, “Ŋoŋ ghɔ gɔ̌ ŋa a chhu vɛ ŋa lɔ̄gɔ kúoŋ yɔ nyīeŋ nɛ?”
Ndɔ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa pi ni njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yi nɛ shini ndɔ nji vi. Nthɛ ŋa yú ŋgwa ni mbɔ fɔ Jishɔ kwo phɛ shɨna pugu ŋgə̄ɨ.
Yichəɨ ndɨɨ ni ŋga mbɔ, Jishɔ yəɨ vi moŋ Nda Minnwi nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Līi njəɨ ŋa ɔ pɔ shiʼi. Kiʼi nuʼuŋ nchwīe phɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi nnu wuwuru nchaa yie lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ghɔ.”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ ghə̄ɨ ni vhi, nshwei pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa a ni njɨ̄gɨ Jishɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yi.
Yei nnu ŋa a ni nchwīe pugu fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni Jishɔ, nthɛ ŋa a ni nchwīe nnu yei llɛ́ ji.
Ndɔ Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Tǎa a wuʼɔ nthɔ mfāʼa fāʼa ti nchəɨŋ ndwɛ. Nnɛ, mummu fāʼa nu.”
Yei nnu ŋa a ni nchwīe pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu mīʼɛŋ ntāʼa nu njwi vi nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbəʼɨ pi llɛ́ ji. A pɨnɨ nthɔ mɛ̄iŋ Minnwi ŋa a Tǎa vi, nchwīe noŋ yi mbɔ taʼa fɨʼɨ pugu Minnwi.
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,

“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, minthɛ paʼa Muuŋ lɔ nchwīe nnu ni thɔ yi, a wuʼɔ nchwīe pi nnu ŋa a yəɨ Tǎa vi chwīe nu nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa sheshe nnu ŋa Tǎa ghà nchwīe nɛ, Muuŋ ghà ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi yie ghɔ ŋkaa yu.
Nthɛ ŋa Tǎa khwā Muuŋ nōoŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa ju nduthɔ yi chwīe nu nɛ ghɔ. Ndɔ ti Tǎa shi nōoŋ mɛmmɛ fàʼa ŋa a chaa pei nɛ ghɔ, nɛnnɛ ŋa pəɨ ghrāo.
Nthɛ ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa pɨʼɨ ŋgwa khu mfɛ chɔmbhi ni pugu nɛ, a haʼaŋ Muuŋ fɛ chɔmbhi ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a khwā nɔ fɛ nu nɛ.
Tǎa shiʼa njiʼi nshaʼa shesheŋoŋ. A fɛ ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ shaʼa nu ŋgwa pi ni Muuŋ,
nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghaʼo Muuŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ghaʼo Tǎa nɛ. Ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋgaʼo Muuŋ nɛ lɔ njiʼi ŋgaʼo Tǎa ŋa a taoŋ Muuŋ nɛ.
“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a yaʼo chrà a mbiŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ, fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ, mbaʼa pi nuʼuŋ nshaʼa vi. A kwo tɔgɔ moŋ gu nii moŋ chɔmbhi.
“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa ndɨɨ chhɔ nthɔ nu, ŋkwo thɔ ti nchəɨŋ, ŋa ŋgwa khu shi njaʼo ŋggì Muuŋ Minnwi, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yaʼo mbiŋ nɛ fāʼo chɔmbhi.
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa nduthɔ yi ŋoŋ ŋa chɔmbhi llɔ mbhɔ yu nɛ, a wuʼɔ haʼaŋ a chwīe ŋa Muuŋ vi pɔ ŋoŋ ŋa chɔmbhi shi ndhɔ mbhɔ yu nɛ.
A fɛ ghrɨ́ ghɔ nɔ shaʼa nu ŋgwa nthɛ ŋa a Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua.
Kiʼi ŋgrāo nnu yei, nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ chhɔ nthɔ nu ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ fúŋ nɛ shi njaʼo ŋggì yi,
ndɔ ntaoŋ moŋ fúŋ ghɔ. Pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchwīe pa nnu shiʼi nɛ, pugu kuʼɔ moŋ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chwīe phɨ nɛ kuʼɔ pi wɛ̄iŋ vugu nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa.

“Minthɛ paʼa ǹdɔ nchwīe yichəɨ nnu pi ni nyaŋ ghrɨ́. Ŋ̀ga nshaʼa pi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi chhu vəɨ ŋa ǹshaʼa nɛ, nnɛ shaʼa nu ma pɔ pi yi ndɨndɨ, nthɛ ŋa ǹchwīe pi nnu ŋa ŋoŋ haʼaŋ a taoŋ a tāʼa nu nɛ. Ǹdɔ njiʼi nchwīe pi nnu ŋa ǹtāʼa nu.
M̈i ŋkwe ntíe noŋ a ni noŋ a paʼa pi lɔ ndīi nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ ŋa a nnu shini.
Ndɔ yichəɨ ŋoŋ pɔ fɔ mbɔ miŋkwentie a, ǹji ŋa nnu ŋa a chhu nu nthɛ a nɛ, nnu shini.
Jouŋ, ŋoŋ ŋa pəɨ ni ntaoŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pəɨ ghɔ nɛ, a chhu nnu shini nthɛ a.
A lɔ mbɔ pi ŋa a ŋoŋmishua mbɔ miŋkwentie a. Ǹchrā pei nnu pi ŋa minthɛ pəɨ kie nnɛ ndūgu.
Jouŋ ni mbɔ nɔ laŋ ŋkɨɨ nu ndɔ ndiʼɛ nu. Pəɨ ni mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ moŋ líʼɛ yi.
“Ndɔ m̀fāʼo yichəɨ miŋkwentie ŋa a chaa pɛ nnu ŋa Jouŋ ni nchhu nthɛ a nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa pa fàʼa ŋa Tǎa fɛ vəɨ ŋa m̀fāʼa nɛ, mbɔ fàʼa pɛ ŋa m̀fāʼa nu nɛ, kwe ntie a ŋa a taoŋ Tǎa ntaoŋ a.
Tǎa ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ, kwe ntie a. Pəɨ lɔ naa ma njaʼo ŋggì yi moŋ sheshe ndɨɨ, ki njəɨ vi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ.
Pəɨ lɔ nūʼɔŋ chrà yi moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ vi nɛ.
“Pəɨ tāʼa moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pīʼi ŋa pəɨ shi ma mfāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ moŋ ghɔ. Ndɔ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi yei chrā nthɛ pi mmu.
Ndɔ pəɨ lāa thɔ nu njəɨ a nnɛ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo chɔmbhi.
“Ǹdɔ njiʼi ntāʼa ndighaʼo pi llɔ mbhɔ ŋgwa.
Ǹji ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa ŋa pəɨ yie ghɔ nɛ, ŋa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo khwǎ Minnwi mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Ǹthɔ moŋ ligi Tǎa a ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ a. Yichəɨ ŋoŋ nthɔ moŋ ji ligi pəɨ piŋ vi.
Pinthɛ pəɨ kie pi nɛiŋ mbiŋ ŋa pəɨ tāʼa ndighaʼo pi mbhɔ noŋ pəɨ nɛ. Ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ntāʼa ndighaʼo ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ fiɛŋ taʼa Minnwi nɛ.
“Kiʼi pəɨ pīʼi ŋa ǹshi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ shhɨ Tǎa. A taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ shhɨ Tǎa, mbɔ Mushi ŋa pəɨ nūʼɔŋ kwàʼa yəɨ mbɨŋ yu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ kaŋ ni mbiŋ Mushi, pəɨ kaŋ mbiŋ a, nthɛ ŋa a ni nāʼaŋ nthɛ pi mmu.
Ti pəɨ mieŋ ki piŋ pa nnu haʼaŋ a nāʼaŋ, pəɨ kie pi nɛiŋ mbiŋ chrà a?”
Pa pei nnu ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ shāʼa ntaoŋ nɔ yini njiɛŋ ŋkhǐ Galili, ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni ŋkhǐ Tiberia nɛ.
Ŋkiɛŋ ntou yu ŋgwa yōu njiŋ yi nthɛ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ fɨʼɨ pa lì ŋa a nōoŋ nu, mbɔ yɨ̄gɨ nu ghɨ̌nɔ ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ nɛ.
Jishɔ kuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra nchɔchhɔ fɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.
Ndɨɨ jɨ Lli Njiʼa, mbɔ jɨ pa Juu ni ŋkwo para.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, Jishɔ gha ŋkə̄rə ligi yi, njəɨ ŋkiɛŋ ntou yú ŋgwa thɔ nu yəɨ yu, a chhu ni Fili ŋa,
“Pia shi njuoŋ brɛi pi hɨŋ nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ fɨʼɨ ŋgwa pei kru?”
A ni nchhu yei pi nɔ ywɛʼi nu Fili nthɛ ŋa ju nduthɔ yi ni nji nnu ŋa a shi nchwīe nɛ.
Fili khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pi njiʼi njuoŋ brɛi pi ni fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋoŋ nthɛ a fāʼa nɔ paa ŋkɨɨ llɛ́ nɛ, paʼa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ fɨʼɨ brɛi ŋa a nthɛ shesheŋoŋ fāʼo shɨgɛi fɔ nɛ.”
Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi mbɔ Andru ndǐŋ Shemu Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Muuŋ mimbia chəɨ pɔ hɛiŋ ŋa a fāʼo tiɛŋ brɛi ŋa pi chwīe ni balɛ nɛ, ni paa shhu. Ndɔ yie pɔ pi khɔ ni fɨʼɨ ntou ŋgwa pei.”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Chwīe ŋgwa chɔchɔ shhɛ.”
Ntou trǔ ni mbɔ nɔ lɨʼɨ ghɔ. Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pighɔ chɔchɔ shhɛ, pimbia ni mbɔ nɔ tiɛŋ kaŋ yugu.
Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ brɛi ghɔ ŋga ŋkwo tōo Minnwi, ŋgrā ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu pi nchhɔ shhɛ nɛ. Ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi nnɛ ni shhu ghɔ, shesheŋoŋ fāʼo fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a khwā nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga njru, a chhu ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pəɨ kɨrɨ pa pɨgəɨ kuo pi, kiʼi sheshe yaoŋ phɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ pugu kɨrɨ, a lɨnaoŋ paanchrɔ mikuo pa kuo brɛi llɔ ŋkuoŋ tiɛŋ ndigi brɛi ghɔ ŋa ŋgwa pighɔ kru a pɨgəɨ nɛ.
Ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋga njəɨ yei lì ŋa a ni nōoŋ nɛ, nchhu ŋa, “Yei ya mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi shini ŋa a ni mfāʼo nɔ thɔ nu moŋ mbhi nɛ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nji ŋa pi tāʼa nu nthɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi mfra vi nūʼɔŋ vi nɔ fùoŋ, a pɨ̄nɨ njiŋnjiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkuoŋ mbra mbɔ fɔ təʼɨ vi.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni fanaoŋ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ shwiʼi ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ,
nii moŋ kikuoŋ, njɛ̄ shāʼa nu ntaoŋ Kapanuŋ. Tuʼu ni ŋkwo shini, ndɔ paʼa Jishɔ lɔ naa nthɔ mbara vugu yaʼa.
Ŋkiɛŋ tɨtɨnɨ fɨfrəɨ ni ntɔgɔ nu thɔ ŋkhǐ, moŋ ŋkhǐ gū pa ŋgwanyieŋ.
Nɛnnɛ pugu ni ŋga ŋkwo chhwi pie ŋgə̄ɨ yaoŋ nɔ tiɛŋ ŋkaŋ ki ntɨgao ŋkaŋ kwò moŋ ŋkhǐ, njəɨ Jishɔ a nyīeŋ ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ nthɔ nu yəɨ kikuoŋ ghɔ, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu.
Ndɔ a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A mmu, kiʼi pəɨ pɔgɔ.”
Nnɛ pugu ni ŋkhwā ŋa a nii moŋ kikuoŋ, wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pugu kaoŋ pie yugu nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ.

Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, yú ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkɨna nɔ yini njiɛŋ ŋkhǐ nɛ yəɨ ŋa pichəɨ pa puoŋ mi kikuoŋ shini ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ fɔ ŋkiɛŋ taʼa yi ndɔ paʼa Jishɔ lɔ nii kikuoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋgə̄ɨ kaʼa, pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ pi təʼɨ vugu.
Pichəɨ pa kikuoŋ llɔ Tiberia ni nthɔ mbara nɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋkru brɛi ghɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Taathɔ ni ŋkwo fɛ tōo nu nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ yú ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa Jishɔ shi lɔ mbɔ fɔ, ki pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nɛ, pugu ni nduthɔ yugu nii moŋ pa kikuoŋ nshāʼa Kapanuŋ nthɔ ntāʼa Jishɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga njəɨ vi moŋ yini njiɛŋ ŋkhǐ, mbie vi ŋa, “Masha, ɔ ni nthɔ hɛiŋ pi ndɨɨ khɔ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, pəɨ lɔ ntāʼa a nthɛ pi ŋa pəɨ yəɨ pa lì, pəɨ tāʼa a nthɛ pi ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkru brɛi ti njru.

Kiʼi pəɨ wie noŋ yəɨ pi nɔ maoŋ jɨ pɛ ŋa a ghà mbɨrɨ nɛ, pəɨ wie noŋ yəɨ pi nɔ maoŋ jɨ ŋa a ghà kɨna mfɛ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ nɛ, ŋa Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua shi mfɛ ni pəɨ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa Minnwi mbɔ Tǎa kwo nūʼɔŋ lì yi mbɨŋ yu ŋa a piŋ vi.”
Nnɛ pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ nɔ thɔ nu fāʼa fàʼa Minnwi?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Yei fàʼa Minnwi, ŋa pəɨ piŋ ju ŋa Minnwi taoŋ nɛ.”
Nnɛ pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ti ɔ nōoŋ pi yəɨ lì nnɛ ŋa pigi yəɨ mbiŋ ghɔ? Nnu ŋa ɔ shi nchwīe nɛ khɔ?
Pa tǎa pigi ni njɨ maoŋ jɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni mana
nɛ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa, ‘A ni mfɛ brɛi llɔ po ŋa pi kru.’ ”
Jishɔ chhu kiʼɛ ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ, a shi ki lɔ mfɛ Mushi mfɛ brɛi llɔ po ni pəɨ, ndɔ Tǎa a fɛ ŋkiɛŋ brɛi ŋa a llɔ po nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa brɛi Minnwi Ju ŋa a llɔ po nshwiʼi shhɛ mfɛ chɔmbhi ni ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ.”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, fɛ brɛi yei ni pigi ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A mmu mbɔ brɛi chɔmbhi, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a thɔ njəɨ a nɛ, mbaʼa nji ma nuʼuŋ njia vi, ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ a nɛ, mbaʼa njùʼɔ yi ma nuʼuŋ njaoŋ.
Ndɔ nchu ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ a, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ yəɨ a nɛ.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa Tǎa fɛ vəɨ nɛ shi nthɔ njəɨ a, ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shi nthɔ njəɨ a nɛ, m̀baʼa njiʼi ndāa vi.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nshwiʼi llɔ po pi nɔ chwīe nu nyaŋ nnu ŋa ǹtāʼa nu nɛ, ǹshwiʼi pi nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.
Yei nnu ŋa Minnwi ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ tāʼa nu nɛ, ŋa kiʼi m̀bhɛ sheshe yaoŋ shɨna ŋguoŋ yi yɛ ŋa a fɛ vəɨ nɛ, ŋa m̂bɨʼɨ vugu tɔthɨ moŋ ndugwi njiŋ llɛ́.
Yei nnu ŋa Tǎa a tāʼa nu nɛ, ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pɨʼɨ ligi yi ndīi Muuŋ ndɔ mbiŋ vi nɛ, fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ, ǹshi mbɨʼɨ vi tɔthɨ moŋ ndugwi njiŋ llɛ́.”
Nnɛ pa ŋgwa Juu jɛ̄ luo nu nthɛ vi, nthɛ ŋa a chhu ŋa,
“A mmu mbɔ brɛi ŋa a llɔ po nshwiʼi nɛ.”
Pugu chhu ŋa, “Yei lɔ mbɔ Jishɔ muuŋ Joshɛ, ŋa pigi ji tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi nɛ? A nthɛ a kie pi nɛiŋ nchhu ndwɛ ŋa, ‘Ndhɔ pi po nshwiʼi?’ ”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Kiʼi pəɨ luo nu shɨna pəɨ.
Minthɛ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ nthɔ njəɨ a ki Tǎa ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ lɔ nshūu vi nthɔ nɔ. Ndɔ ǹshi mbɨnɨ mbɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu nɔ ndugwi njiŋ llɛ́.
Pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nāʼaŋ ŋa, ‘A lɛ njɛʼi Minnwi njɛʼi vugu.’ Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kwo yaʼo ndɔ njɛʼi yaoŋ mbhɔ Tǎa nɛ shi nthɔ njəɨ a.
Yei lɔ mbɔ pi ŋa yichəɨ ŋoŋ kwo yəɨ Tǎa, Ju ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi nɛ wuʼɔ fiɛŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a yəɨ Tǎa nɛ.
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ nɛ fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.
A mmu mbɔ brɛi chɔmbhi.
Pa tǎa pəɨ ni njɨ mana moŋ ŋkǔnu njó, ndɔ ŋguoŋ yugu wuʼɔ ŋkhukhu.
Yei yɛ brɛi ŋa a shwiʼi llɔ po, nɛnnɛ ŋa mimfɛ ŋoŋ kru ki lɔ ŋkhu.
A mmu mbɔ brɛi maoŋ ŋa a shwiʼi llɔ po. S̈hesheŋoŋ ŋkru brɛi yei, kaŋ a shi mfāʼo chɔmbhi ki ndugwi yi. Ndɔ brɛi yɛ ŋa ǹshi mfɛ nɔ chɔmbhi ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei nɛ, pɔ pi frɛinoŋ a.”
Nnɛ pa Juu jɛ̄ mindoundou shɨna pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Mimfɛ ŋoŋ vei kie nɛiŋ mfɛ frɛ̀i yi ŋa pia kru?”
Nthɛ yie, Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, p̈əɨ mieŋ ki kru frɛ̀i Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua, mbɨnɨ nnu chhǐ yi, nthɛ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mfāʼo chɔmbhi mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kru frɛinoŋ a ndɔ nnu chhǐ a nɛ fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ, ǹdɔ mbɨnɨ mbɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu moŋ ndugwi njiŋ llɛ́.
Nthɛ ŋa frɛinoŋ a ya ŋkiɛŋ maoŋ jɨ, chhǐ a pɔ ya ŋkiɛŋ maoŋ nnu.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kru frɛinoŋ a ndɔ nnu chhǐ a nɛ ghà ŋkɨna mbɨŋ mu, ŋ̀kɨna mbɨŋ yu.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa ŋa a yi maoŋ taoŋ a, m̀fāʼo chɔmbhi nthɛ pi Tǎa ghɔ nɛ, nɛnnɛ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kru frɛinoŋ a nɛ, ju ŋkaa yu shi mbɔ yi maoŋ nthɛ a.
Yei brɛi ŋa a ni nshwiʼi llɔ po nɛ, a lɔ mbɔ pi nɔ yɛ ŋa pa tǎa ni ŋkru ndaʼa ŋguʼɔ ŋkukhu nɛ. Shesheŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a kru frɛinoŋ a yei nɛ shi nchhɔ mbhi ki ndugwi yi.”
Jishɔ ni nchhu pa nnu pei moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi nɔ haʼaŋ a ki yɛʼi nu Kapanuŋ nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ntou pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni njaʼo yei nɛ, pugu chhu ŋa, “Yei chrà tɨnɨ ŋgaʼa, a nthɛ a ywɛrɛ gɔ̀ chrà ghɔ?”
Ndɔ Jishɔ ni nji ŋa pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi thɔ nduo nu nthɛ nnu yei, nnɛ a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Nnu yei pɨgɨ vəɨ?
Ti a kaŋ ni mīʼɛŋ mbɔ pəɨ yəɨ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua kuʼɔ nu lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni fǔoŋ mbɔ nɛ?
A ghà mfɛ Jijwɛ chɔmbhi, frɛinoŋ lɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ kaŋ shɨgɛi. Chrà pɛ ŋa ǹchrā ni pəɨ nɛ pɔ pi jijwɛ pugu chɔmbhi.
Ndɔ pichəɨ shɨna pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ.”
(Nthɛ ŋa Jishɔ ni nji llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mbiŋ nɛ, ndɔ nji ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa a shi mfīni vi nɛ.)
A chhu ŋa,
“Yei nnu ŋa a ni nchwīe nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa mbaʼa ŋoŋ thɔ njəɨ a, kaŋ a nɛ a fɛ Tǎa ghrɨ́ ghɔ nɔ thɔ nu.”
Jɛ̄ ndɨɨ yei ntou pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pɨ̄nɨ ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nyīeŋ pugu pugu.
Nnɛ Jishɔ pie paanchrɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pəɨ tāʼa nu ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkaa pəɨ?”
Shemu Pita khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, pigi shi ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ pi gɔ̌? Ɔ fāʼo chrà chɔmbhi ki mmɛ,
ndɔ pigi kwo piŋ, ndɔ nji ŋa ɔ Yi Taoŋtaoŋ Llɔ Mbhɔ Minnwi.”
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A lɔ nchuʼɔ mmu nchuʼɔ vəɨ Paanchrɔ? Ndɔ taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ pɔ devɨ.”
A ni nchhu pi Judashi, mbɔ muuŋ Shemu Ishikario, nthɛ ŋa a taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna Paanchrɔ ghɔ nɛ, ni mbɔ nɔ fīni nu vi.
Nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ nyīeŋ nu moŋ Galili. A shini ndɔ ntāʼa nu nyīeŋ moŋ Judia nthɛ ŋa pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu ni ntāʼa nu njwi vi.
A ni mbiʼi shɨgɛi ndɨɨ jɨ pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni jɨ pa ntǎa nɛ kāʼo.
Pa lǐŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Lɔllɔ hɛiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ Judia nji ŋa pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pɔ shi njəɨ pa fàʼa ŋa ɔ chwīe nu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa nu ŋa pi ji vi nɛ ghà fāʼa pi lɨʼɨ wo. Ŋa ɔ thɔ nchwīe pa nnu pei nɛ, chwīe ŋkuoŋ mbhi ji ghɔ.”
Nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pa lǐŋ pi shini ndɔ mbiŋ vi.
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ a lɔ naa ŋkāʼo yaʼa. Ni pəɨ, sheshe ndɨɨ kaʼokaʼo.
Mbaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi pɨ̄na vəɨ ndɔ a pɨ̄na a nthɛ ŋa ǹchhu pa nnu nthɛ vi ŋa mbha fàʼa pi, pi pɨphɨ nɛ.
Pəɨ kuʼɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ ghɔ. Ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkuʼɔ nu
lɨʼɨ jɨ ghɔ nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ a lɔ naa nja ŋkāʼo yaʼa.”
A ni ŋga nchhu yei nnu, ŋkɨna Galili.
Pa lǐŋ pi ni ŋga ŋkwo kuʼɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ ghɔ, juju kuʼɔ ŋkaa yu, ki lɔ mbɔ pi lɨʼɨ wo, mbɔ pi njiŋnjiŋ.
Pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu ni nthɔ ntāʼa vi lɨʼɨ jɨ ghɔ, mbie nu ŋa, “A pɔ pi hɨŋ?”
Ntou pa nchǔŋ ni mbɔ nu shɨna pa ŋgwa nthɛ vi, pichəɨ ni ŋga nchhu nu ŋa, “A ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ,” pichəɨ ŋa, “Ŋga, a thɔ nchwīe nu ŋgwa fāaŋ ndaoŋ.”
Ndɔ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ nchrā nthɛ vi shhɛnte, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ mbɔgɔ pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu.
Jɨ ghɔ ni ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ ti nchəɨŋ titri, Jishɔ kuʼɔ moŋ Nda Minnwi njɛ̄ yɛʼi nu.
Pa thishɨ pa ŋgwa Juu ghrāo, nchhu nu ŋa, “A kie pi nɛiŋ ŋoŋ vei ji fɨʼɨ yaoŋ yei, ndɔ ki lɔ naa ma ŋgə̄ɨ shiku?”
Nnɛ Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Yaoŋ ŋa njɛʼi nu nɛ lɔ mbɔ pi nyaŋ, a pɔ pi yi ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.
Sheshe n̈nu ŋa ŋoŋ tāʼa nu nchwīe nɛ mbɔ pi nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ, kaŋ a shi nji ŋa yaoŋ ŋa ǹjɛʼi nu nɛ llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi ki mi chrā pi ni nyaŋ ghrɨ́?
Ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nchrā pi ni ji ghrɨ́ nɛ ghà ntāʼa pi ji ndighaʼo ni noŋ yi. Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà ntāʼa pi ndighaʼo ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ vi nɛ, ŋgaŋ nnu shini paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo kaŋ taʼa nnu mifɨɨ.
Mushi lɔ ŋkwo fɛ gɨ́ ni pəɨ? Ndɔ kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vəɨ shiʼa nūʼɔŋ. Pəɨ tāʼa nu njwi a ŋa?”
Kɨrɨ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ɔ fāʼo miŋwɛiŋ! A tāʼa gɔ̌ njwi ghɔ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋki chwīe taʼa fàʼa, ŋguoŋ yəɨ ghrāo nthɛ taʼa fàʼa ghɔ.
Mushi ni mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pəɨ niʼiŋ puoŋ pəɨ ŋgunu mbrɛi (a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋa a ni ndhɔ pi mbhɔ Mushi, a ni ndhɔ pi mbhɔ pa tǎa), nnɛ pəɨ niʼiŋ ŋoŋ ŋgunu mbrɛi llɛ́ ji.
Ti p̈əɨ niʼiŋ ŋoŋ ŋgunu mbrɛi llɛ́ ji nnɛ ŋa a pɔ ŋa pəɨ lɔ mbəʼɨ gɨ́ Mushi, pəɨ pɨnɨ mbɨgɨ túa vəɨ ŋa ǹchwīe ŋguoŋ noŋ ŋoŋ ya tɔgɔ shiʼi llɛ́ ji nthɛ khɔ?
Kiʼi pəɨ shaʼa ŋgwa pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a fhi nɔ haʼaŋ a kāʼo ligi pəɨ nɛ, pəɨ shaʼa ŋgwa pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a kāʼo ŋa pi shaʼa nɛ.”
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Jerushalɛiŋ chhu ŋa, “Yei shi lɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa pi tāʼa vi njwi nɛ?
A pɔ nɛiŋ hɛiŋ nchrā nu shhɛnte. Ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ nchhu nnu ghɔ! Pinthɛ a pɔ ŋa pa thishɨ ji ŋa a Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ?
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe thɔ nɛ, mbaʼa ŋoŋ ji lɨʼɨ ŋa a llɔ nɛ. Ndɔ pia ji lɨʼɨ ŋa vei ŋoŋ llɔ nɛ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni njɛʼi nu moŋ Nda Minnwi nɛ, a ni nchhu ni njɨ ŋa,
“Pəɨ ji a, ndɔ nji lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ǹdhɔ nɛ? Ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ pi ni thɔ a. Ju ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ ŋgaŋ chrà nnu shini, ndɔ pəɨ lɔ nji vi.
Ǹji vi nthɛ ŋa ǹdhɔ pi mbhɔ yu, a taoŋ a.”
Nɛnnɛ pugu ni nthɔ ntāʼa shɛndaoŋ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu mi, ndɔ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ ŋkāoŋ vi nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ yi shini ndɔ naa nthɔ yaʼa.
Ndɔ ntou ŋgwa ka piŋ vi piŋ nchhu ŋa, “Ndɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, shi ŋga nthɔ, a nōoŋ lì a yiɛŋ nchaa yi ŋoŋ vei?”
Pa Farashi yaʼo yú ŋgwa pighɔ thɔ nchūŋ nnu pei nthɛ Jishɔ. Nɛnnɛ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi taoŋ pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi.
Jishɔ chhu kiʼɛ ŋa,
“Pia shi mbɨnɨ mbɔ kaʼa nɔ kuo ndɨɨ, ŋ̀gə̄ɨ kiʼɛ njəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.
Pəɨ shi ntāʼa a ndɔ mbaʼa pəɨ yiʼi njəɨ a. Lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu fɔ nɛ mbaʼa pəɨ thɔ fɔ.”
Pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei tāʼa ŋgə̄ɨ pi hɨŋ ŋa mbaʼa pigi yiʼi njəɨ vi? A tāʼa nu ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ laʼataoŋ nduoŋ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋgwa pia pɔ nɛ, njɛʼi pa ŋgwa nduoŋ pighɔ?
A chhu ŋa,
‘Pəɨ shi ntāʼa a ndɔ mbaʼa pəɨ yiʼi njəɨ a’,
pugu pa ŋa,
‘Lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu fɔ nɛ mbaʼa pəɨ thɔ fɔ.’ Njiŋ nnu pighɔ pɔ pi ŋa?”
Moŋ ndugwi njiŋ llɛmbhi jɨ ghɔ, mbɔ mmɛ llɛ́, Jishɔ lɔllɔ ntithi tɔthɨ nchhu ni njɨ ŋa,
“Njùʼɔ ŋoŋ njaoŋ, a thɔ mbara a nnu yaoŋ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ a nɛ, pa nɨnəɨ ŋkhǐ fɛ chɔmbhi shi ŋkhī ntaoŋ nu njùʼɔ yu, nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ.”
A ni nchhu yei nthɛ pi Jijwɛ Minnwi ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu piŋ vi shi mfāʼo nɛ. A ni ŋga mbɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ paʼa pi lɔ naa mfɛ Jijwɛ Minnwi nthɛ ŋa Jishɔ shini ndɔ naa nii moŋ ndighaʼo yi.
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo pa chrà pei, pichəɨ pa ŋgwa pighɔ chhu ŋa, “Yei ya mbɔ pi njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi shini.”
Pichəɨ chhu ŋa, “Yei Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.” Ndɔ pichəɨ chhu yugu ŋa, “Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe ni mbɔ nɔ llɔ nu pi Galili?
Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi lɔ nchhu ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ shi ndhɔ pi moŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ fùoŋ Devi, pi phi vi Bɛtɛlɛhɛiŋ mbɔ laʼataoŋ fùoŋ Devi?”
Nnɛ minduoŋnduoŋ gū shɨna ŋgwa pighɔ nthɛ vi.
Pichəɨ shɨna pugu ni ntāʼa nu ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi ndɔ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ ŋkāoŋ vi.
Pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi ni ŋga mbɨnɨ, pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi pie vugu ŋa, “A chwīe khɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ ŋkwəɨ ni ju?”
Pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi pighɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ naa ma nchrā nɔ ŋoŋ vei.”
Pa Farashi pie vugu ŋa, “Pi fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ?
Sheshe pa thishɨ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi piŋ vi?
Yú ŋgwa pei ŋa pugu lɔ nji gɨ́ Mushi nɛ, nchɔ̀nɔ Minnwi pɔ mbɨŋ pugu.”
Nikodemu ŋa a ni mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu nɛ, ni ŋkwo ghə̄ɨ njəɨ vi ŋgɛ́ chəɨ nɛ, chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Gɨ́ yia ghà ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a ŋgushaʼa ki lɔ fǔoŋ mfɛ shɨ̀na ghɔ ŋa a chrā? Ndɔ mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ndīi nnu haʼaŋ a chwīe nɛ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ɔ llɔ pi Galili ŋkaa ghɔ? Taʼa nɛ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi njəɨ ŋa yichəɨ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni ŋkwo ma ndɔ Galili?”
[Shesheŋoŋ vugu ghə̄ɨ moŋ ji laʼa.
Ndɔ Jishɔ kuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ Mbra pa Thɨ Olive.
Ŋkiɛŋ ni muuŋ tutuʼu a pɨnɨ nthɔ moŋ Nda Minnwi ŋguoŋ ŋgwa thɔ njəɨ vi, a chɔchɔ shhɛ nthɔ njɛʼi vugu.
Pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi thɔ ni miŋgwɛ láŋ chəɨ ŋa pi ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu mimbia moŋ shúoŋ, nthɔ ni ju ntigi vi shhɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao.
Pugu chhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Masha, pigi ya ŋgwɛ̄iŋ miŋgwɛ láŋ vei pugu mimbia.
Moŋ gɨ́ Mushi, a chhu ŋa pi tuŋ ŋkwaŋ miŋgwɛ vei ni ŋgùʼɔ a khu. Ɔ chhu jɔ ŋa?”
Pugu ni nchhu yei nɔ mōoŋ nu Jishɔ nnɛ ŋa pinthɛ pugu fāʼo nnu nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu mi nɔ ghɔ. Ndɔ Jishɔ tuʼu noŋ yi nāʼaŋ yaoŋ ni muuŋshɨmbhɔ yi shhɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ ŋguʼɔ mbie vi nɛ, a lɔllɔ tɔthɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi nchwīe phɨ shɨna pəɨ nɛ, fǔoŋ ju ntuŋ vi ni ŋgùʼɔ.”
Mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ntuʼu noŋ yi ŋkamuʼɔŋ nthɔ nāʼaŋ yaoŋ shhɛ.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ ghao pa taʼa taʼa, jɛ̄ ŋkuoŋ pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa. Jishɔ kɨna fɔ təʼɨ vi, ni miŋgwɛ ghɔ, a thi shhɨ yu.
Jishɔ lɔllɔ tɔthɨ, nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Má, pugu hɨŋ? Ŋoŋ lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ghɔ nɔ ŋgushaʼa?”
A chhu ŋa, “Kaŋ taʼa yi, ma Taathɔ!”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Mummu ŋkaa mu shi lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ghɔ nɔ ŋgushaʼa, ghə̄ɨ, ndɔ jɛ̄ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ kiʼi nuʼuŋ nchwīe phɨ.”
Jishɔ pɨnɨ nchrā ni pugu ŋkamuʼɔŋ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“A mmu mbɔ líʼɛ ŋkuoŋ mbhi. Mbaʼa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a thɔ njiŋ a nɛ nuʼuŋ nyīeŋ moŋ njiŋ. A shi mfāʼo líʼɛ ŋa a ghà mfɛ chɔmbhi nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ pa ŋgwa Farashi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ thɔ ŋkwe pi ntie noŋ yɔ. Chrà yɔ lɔ mbɔ nnu shini.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,

“Ŋga, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ŋ̀kwe ntie noŋ a nɛ, nnu ŋa ǹchrā nu nɛ nnu shini. Nthɛ ŋa ǹji lɨʼɨ ŋa ǹdhɔ nɛ pugu pa lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu nɛ. Ndɔ pəɨ lɔ nji lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ǹdhɔ nɛ ki lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu nɛ.
Pəɨ shaʼa pi ni nthɨŋkwo ŋgwamishua. Ndɔ ǹdɔ njiʼi nshaʼa ŋoŋ.
Ä njiʼi ndɔ mbɔ pi ŋa ǹshaʼa, kaŋ shaʼa nu ma yi ndɨndɨ, nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nshaʼa pi təʼɨ a. Pigi Tǎa ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ pɔ kaʼa.
Pi nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ yəɨ ŋa p̈aa ŋgwa mbɔ miŋkwentie, kaŋ nnu ŋa pugu chhu nu nɛ nnu shini.
A kwe mmu ŋkwe ntie noŋ a, Tǎa ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ kwe ntie a ŋkaa yu.”
Nthɛ yie, pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Tǎa ghɔ ghɔ hɨŋ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji a ki Tǎa a, pəɨ kaŋ ni nji a, pəɨ kaŋ nji Tǎa a ŋkaa yu.”
A ni nchrā nnu pei nɔ haʼaŋ a ni njɛʼi nu nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋkùŋ niʼiŋ mbɨŋ Nda Minnwi ni nthi nɛ, ndɔ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ yi shini ndɔ naa ŋkāʼo yaʼa.
Mbɨnɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋkamuʼɔŋ ŋa,
“Ǹthɔ ŋgəɨghəɨ ni ŋwa, ndɔ pəɨ shi ntāʼa a, ndɔ ŋkhu moŋ phɨ yəɨ. Lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu fɔ nɛ mbaʼa pəɨ thɔ fɔ.”
Nnɛ pa thishɨ pa ŋgwa Juu pighɔ chhu ŋa, “A shi njwi noŋ yi nthɛ ŋa a chhu pi ŋa, ‘Lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ mbaʼa pəɨ thɔ fɔ nɛ?’ ”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ llɔ pi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei mbɛmbiɛŋ, ndɔ ǹdhɔ nyaŋ pi tɔthɨ. Pəɨ llɔ pi ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ, ǹdɔ njiʼi ndhɔ pi ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ,
ŋki chhu ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ shi ŋkhu moŋ phɨ yəɨ, nthɛ ŋa p̈əɨ mieŋ ki piŋ ŋa, ‘A Mmu mbɔ Ju,’ pəɨ khu moŋ phɨ yəɨ.”
Nnɛ pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Wuʼɔ yaoŋ ŋa mi ni nthɔ nchhu nu ni pəɨ nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ.
M̀fāʼo ntou nnu nɔ chhu nu nthɛ vəɨ, pugu pa ntou nnu nɔ shaʼa nu vəɨ nɔ ghɔ, ndɔ Ju ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ ŋgaŋ nnu shini, ndɔ nnu ŋa ǹjaʼo mbhɔ yu nɛ, ǹchīi ni ŋkuoŋ mbhi.”
Thɔ yugu shini ndɔ shie ŋa a ni nchrā nu ni pugu nthɛ pi Tǎa ghɔ.
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ shi ŋga ŋkwo ŋkə̄rə Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua, pəɨ ji kiʼɛ ŋa ‘A Mmu mbɔ ju,’ pugu pa ŋa ǹshiʼa nchwīe sheshe nnu ni nyaŋ njɨ, ŋ̀guʼɔ chhu pi nnu yɛ ŋa Tǎa tɨgɨ a nɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ ju ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ pɔ pigi yu, a lɔ njiʼi mieŋ a təʼɨ a nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀ga ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi pa yaoŋ ŋa a khwā nɛ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nthɔ nchrā pa nnu pei nɛ, ntou ŋgwa piŋ vi.
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni pa Juu pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbiŋ vi nɛ ŋa,
“P̈əɨ ŋkɨna ŋkuoŋ chrà a kaŋ pəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ paŋ shishini.
Ndɔ pəɨ shi nji nnu shini, nnu shini shi ŋkɨ̄gɛi ŋkɨɨ mbɨŋ pəɨ.”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi pɔ pi puoŋ Abrahaŋ, paʼa ndɔ naa ma mfāʼa ŋkǔna mbhɔ ŋoŋ. Ti a kie pi nɛiŋ ɔ chhu ŋa, ‘Pi shi ŋkɨ̄gɛi ŋkɨɨ mbɨŋ pəɨ’?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nchwīe phɨ nɛ ŋkǔna phɨ.
Ŋkǔna shiʼa njiʼi ŋkɨna mbɔ ŋgia ndaaŋoŋ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ndɔ muuŋ pɔ pi nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.
Nɛnnɛ ti m̈uuŋ ŋkɨ̄gɛi ŋkɨɨ mbɨŋ pəɨ, kaŋ pəɨ ya ntaoŋ moŋ ŋkɨɨ shishini.
Ǹja nji ŋa pəɨ puoŋ Abrahaŋ, ndɔ pəɨ tāʼa nu njwi a nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ chrà a.
Ǹchrā nthɛ pi pa nnu ŋa Tǎa a nōoŋ vəɨ ndɔ pəɨ chwīe pi nnu ŋa tǎa vəɨ chhu ni pəɨ nɛ.”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Abrahaŋ tǎa vigi!”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“P̈əɨ kaŋ mbɔ puoŋ Abrahaŋ, pəɨ kaŋ nthɔ nchwīe pi pa nnu haʼaŋ Abrahaŋ ni nchwīe nɛ.
Ndɔ ndwɛ pəɨ ka tāʼa nu njwi a jwi, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a shwei vəɨ ni nnu shini ŋa a yaʼo llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi nɛ. Yei lɔ mbɔ nnu haʼaŋ Abrahaŋ ni nchwīe nɛ.
Pəɨ chwīe pi nnu ŋa tǎa vəɨ ni nchwīe nɛ.”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pi shini ndɔ mbhi vigi pi moŋ shúoŋ, Minnwi nduthɔ yi Tǎa vigi.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“M̈innwi kaŋ mbɔ Tǎa vəɨ, pəɨ kaŋ ŋkhwā a, nthɛ ŋa ǹdhɔ mbhɔ Minnwi ndɔ mbɔ hɛiŋ. Ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ pi ni nyaŋ thɔ, a taoŋ Ju ntaoŋ a.
A chwīe khɔ paʼa thɔ yəɨ lɔ nshie ni nnu ŋa ǹchhu nɛ? A chwīe nthɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa pəɨ lɔ njaʼo chrà a.

Pəɨ pɔ pi puoŋ tǎa vəɨ mbɔ Shata, khwā njùʼɔ yəɨ pɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa tǎa vəɨ tāʼa nu nɛ. A ni mbɔ njwi ŋoŋ llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi, paʼa ndɔ ma mbɔ ni pra pugu pa nnu shini nthɛ ŋa nnu shini lɔ mbɔ mbɨŋ yu. A ghà ŋga ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ, kaŋ a wuʼɔ nchwīe pi nùʼɔŋ yi nthɛ ŋa a ndɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ndɔ mbɔ tǎa pa lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ.
Ndɔ nthɛ ŋa ǹchhu pi nnu shini nɛ, a chwīe yie paʼa pəɨ llɔ mbiŋ a.
Pinthɛ a nōoŋ gɔ̌ shɨna pəɨ shishini ŋa ǹchwīe phɨ? Ti m̈i nthɔ nchhu pi nnu shini, a pɔ khɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ a.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a yi Minnwi nɛ ghà njaʼo chrà Minnwi. Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yi Minnwi a chwīe yie ghɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ njaʼo chrà Minnwi.”
Pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu pighɔ pie Jishɔ ŋa, “Pigi lɔ nchhu a kāʼo ndɨɨ ŋa pigi chhu ŋa ɔ ŋoŋ Shamaria mfāʼo miŋwɛiŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāʼo miŋwɛiŋ, ŋ̀gaʼo pi Tǎa a, ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ ŋgaʼo a.
Ndɔ ǹdɔ njiʼi ntāʼa pi ndighaʼo ni noŋ a. A taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a tāʼa ndighaʼo a nɛ, mbɔ ju mbɔ ŋgaŋ shaʼa sháʼa.
Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, s̈hesheŋoŋ njaʼo chrà a nchwīe, paʼa a lɔ ma ŋkhu.”

Pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ndwɛ pigi ya njəɨ ŋa ɔ fāʼo miŋwɛiŋ! Abrahaŋ ni ŋkhu, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni ŋkhu nɛ, ndɔ ɔ chhu ŋa, ‘S̈hesheŋoŋ njaʼo chrà a nchwīe, paʼa a lɔ ma ŋkhu.’
Ɔ pɔ pi ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ nchaa Abrahaŋ tǎa vigi ŋa a ni ŋkhu nɛ, Pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi khu ŋkaa pugu nɛ? Ɔ pīʼi ŋa ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“M̈i ŋgaʼo noŋ a, kaŋ ndighaʼo a pɔ pi gha. ‘A Tǎa a ŋa a ghaʼo a,’ mbɔ ju ŋa pəɨ chhu ŋa, ‘A Minnwi yigi’
nɛ.
Ndɔ pəɨ lɔ nji vi, ǹji vi. Ŋka ni nchhu ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nji vi, kaŋ mbɔ pi ndɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ pəɨ. Ndɔ ǹji vi, ndɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa chrà yi chhu nɛ.
Tǎa vəɨ mbɔ Abrahaŋ ni mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ŋa a shi njəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa ǹshi nthɔ nɛ, a ni njəɨ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ.”
Pa Juu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ naa nchəɨŋ tiɛŋ wuŋ ŋgaʼo nchhu ŋa ɔ yəɨ Abrahaŋ pi nɛiŋ?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, ŋkaoŋ Abrahaŋ maa mbɔ, A Mmu
Nnɛ pugu lɔ̄gɔ pa ŋgùʼɔ nɔ tuŋ nu vi nɔ ghɔ. Jishɔ lɛ̄rɛ, ntaoŋ moŋ Nda Minnwi.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nyīeŋ ntɔgɔ nu nɛ, njəɨ ŋoŋ chəɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ nchriligi jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni mbhi vi nɛ.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pie vi ŋa, “Masha, a chwīe gɔ̌ phɨ, ŋoŋ vei ki tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi, ŋa a chwīe pi phi vi a taoŋ nchriligi?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“A shini ndɔ nchwīe phɨ ŋoŋ vei ki yi tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi. A ni mbɔ nɛnnɛ pi ŋa fàʼa Minnwi nōoŋ mbɨŋ yu pi yəɨ.
Pigi shi ŋguʼɔ mfāʼa fàʼa ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ nɔ haʼaŋ minaoŋ wuʼɔ nthɛ nu nɛ. Tuʼu chhɔ nthɔ nu ŋa mbaʼa ŋoŋ nuʼuŋ mfāʼa fàʼa.
Nɔ haʼaŋ m̀bɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ, a mmu mbɔ líʼɛ ŋkuoŋ mbhi.”
A ni ŋga kwo chhu nnu pei, nthu thwɛ shhɛ, ntrao titwrɛi ni thwɛ ghɔ. Njuʼɔ titwrɛi ghɔ nɔ ligi nchriligi ghɔ.
Nchhu ghɔ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ moŋ ŋkhǐ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Shiloaŋ nɛ. (Njiŋ Shiloaŋ pɔ ŋa taoŋ.) Nɛnnɛ a ghə̄ɨ nshɨ̄gao, mbɨnɨ, nthɔ njəɨ lɨʼɨ.
Pa taakuo pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkwo yəɨ vi nɔ ŋgaŋ luoŋ nɛ chhu nu ŋa, “Yei lɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ nchɔchhɔ nduoŋ nu nɛ?”
Pichəɨ ŋa, “A ju,” pichəɨ chhu ŋa, “Ŋga, ndɔ a fhi vi.”
Ndɔ ŋoŋ ghɔ wuʼɔ nthɔ nchhu nu ŋa, “A mmu mbɔ ju.”
Nnɛ pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ti ligi yɔ kie pi nɛiŋ nchuʼɔ?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa Jishɔ nɛ trao titwrɛi njuʼɔ ligi a nɔ ghɔ nchhu vəɨ ŋa, ‘Ghə̄ɨ moŋ ŋkhǐ Shiloaŋ nshɨ̄gao ligi yɔ fɔ.’ Nɛnnɛ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nshɨ̄gao ligi a, njəɨ lɨʼɨ kiʼɛ.”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “A hɨŋ?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ǹdɔ njiʼi nji.”
Ŋgwa pighɔ lɔ̄gɔ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni mfǔoŋ mbɔ nchriligi nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi.
Llɛ́ ŋa Jishɔ ni nchwīe titwrɛi nchuʼɔ ligi ŋoŋ ghɔ nɔ nɛ ni mbɔ llɛ́ ji.
Nnɛ pa ŋgwa Farashi pɨnɨ mbie vi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a kie ŋkaoŋ maa njəɨ lɨʼɨ nɛ. A chhu ni pugu ŋa, “A yuʼɔ titwrɛi nɔ ligi a, nshɨ̄gao, ǹjəɨ lɨʼɨ.”

Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi chhu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei lɔ njiʼi ndhɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi nthɛ ŋa a shiʼa nūʼɔŋ Llɛ́ Ji.” Ndɔ pichəɨ chhu ŋa, “Pinthɛ ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ kie pi nɛiŋ nōoŋ ŋkwaŋ lì pei?” Minduoŋnduoŋ gū shɨna pugu.
Nnɛ pugu pɨnɨ mbie ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ chhu ŋa a chuʼɔ ligi yɔ. Ti ɔ khwɛ̄ jɔ ŋa nthɛ vi?”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “A njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.”
Pa Juu shini ndɔ mbiŋ ŋa ŋoŋ ghɔ ni mbɔ nchriligi ŋkaoŋ maa mbɨnɨ njəɨ lɨʼɨ. Mɛ̄iŋ tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi.
Mbie vugu ŋa, “Yei muuŋ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ chhu ŋa pi ni mbhi vi a pɔ pi nchriligi nɛ? Ti a kie pi nɛiŋ ndwɛ ma njəɨlɨʼɨ?”
Tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pigi ji ŋa yei muuŋ vigi, pugu pa ŋa pi ni mbhi vi a taoŋ nchriligi.
Ndɔ ti ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a kie ŋkaoŋ maa njəɨ lɨʼɨ ndwɛ nɛ pigi lɔ njiʼi nji, ki nji ŋoŋ ŋa a chuʼɔ ligi yi nɛ. Pie vi a ntɨnɨmmɛ. A shi nchrā ni noŋ yi.”

Pa tǎa pi ni nchhu nnu pei nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ mbɔgɔ pa thishɨ pa Juu. Nthɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkwo taoŋ ni taʼa nchò ŋa shesheŋoŋ mbiŋ ŋa Jishɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, pi fuʼu vi nda luoŋ Minnwi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ chhu ŋa, “A ŋoŋ ntɨnɨmmɛ, pəɨ pie vi.”
Nɔ mbra ŋgɛ́ pugu pɨnɨ mɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni mbɔ nchriligi nɛ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Chhu nnu mbɔgɔ ligi Minnwi. Pigi ji ŋa ŋoŋ vei nchwīe phɨ.”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ki a pɔ pi nchwīe phɨ ǹshi lɔ nji! Taʼa nu ŋa ǹji nɛ pɔ ŋa mi ni mbɔ nchriligi, ndɔ ndwɛ ǹthɔ njəɨ lɨʼɨ.”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “A ni nchwīe pi nɛiŋ mbɨŋ ghɔ? A ni nchuʼɔ ligi yɔ pi nɛiŋ?”
A khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, “Ŋ̀kwo shwei vəɨ paʼa pəɨ lɔ ntāʼa nu njaʼo. Pəɨ tāʼa nu mbɨnɨ njaʼo nthɛ pi khɔ? Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ tāʼa nu ŋgū pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi?”
Pugu wɛʼi vi, nchhu ŋa, “Ɔ ŋgaŋ younjiŋ ŋoŋ yinɛ, ndɔ pigi pɔ pi pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Mushi.
Pigi ji ŋa Minnwi ni nchrā ni Mushi. Ndɔ ni ŋoŋ vei pigi lɔ nji lɨʼɨ ŋa a llɔ nɛ.”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Nthɛ khɔ, yei nnu ghraoghrao! Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a llɔ nɛ, ndɔ a chuʼɔ ligi a.
Pia ji ŋa Minnwi shiʼa njiʼi njaʼo pa ghaŋ nchwīe phɨ ndɔ s̈hesheŋoŋ mbɔ ŋgaŋ ghaʼo Minnwi, nchwīe nnu ŋa Minnwi ghɔ tāʼa nu nɛ, a yaʼo vi.
Fie nɔ haʼaŋ mbhi ni njɛ̄ nɛ pi lɔ naa njaʼo ŋa yichəɨ ŋoŋ chuʼɔ ligi ŋoŋ ŋa pi phi vi a pɔ nchriligi nɛ.
Ŋoŋ vei kaŋ mieŋ ki llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi, nthɛ paʼa a lɔ nchwīe sheshe yaoŋ.”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ ya mbɔ pi ŋgaŋ phɨ llɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni mbhi ghɔ nɛ, ɔ tāʼa nu njɛʼi vigi?” Pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi mfuʼu māʼaŋ mbhi.
Jishɔ yaʼo ŋa pi wɛ̄iŋ vi māʼaŋ mbhi, ŋga njəɨ vi, nchhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ piŋ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Masha, Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua pɔ pi gɔ̌, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ m̀biŋ vi?”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ kwo yəɨ vi, a ju ŋa a chrà nu vɛ nɛ!”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ chhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, m̀biŋ!” Ndɔ ŋgaʼo vi.
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Mi ni nthɔ moŋ mbhi yei pi nɔ shaʼa nu, ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pa nchriligi nɛ nthɛ pugu yəɨ lɨʼɨ, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa minthɛ pugu yəɨ lɨʼɨ nɛ gū nchriligi.”
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi ŋa pugu ni mbara yəɨ yu, njaʼo nnu pei nɛ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi pa nchriligi ŋkaa pigi?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ kaŋ ni mbɔ pa nchriligi paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbɔ pa ŋgushaʼa ndɔ ndwɛ ŋa pəɨ chhu ŋa, ‘Pigi yəɨ lɨʼɨ nɛ,’ pəɨ kɨna mbɔ pa ŋgushaʼa.”
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, ŋoŋ ŋa a nii moŋ ŋkaʼa minjɨɨ ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi choŋkaʼa nɛ, ŋkuʼɔ ntɔgɔ pi lɨʼɨ nduoŋ nii nɛ, ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋgɨna, mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋgɨna minwi.
Ndɔ ti ŋoŋ ŋa a nii pi choŋkaʼa nɛ, a ŋkɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ ghɔ.
