Ŋgaŋ lɨna ni choŋkaʼa ghà chuʼɔ choŋkaʼa ghɔ. Pa minjɨɨ ghà njaʼo ŋggì yi, a gɛ̄ pa phí minjɨɨ ni ligi yugu, ŋkɛ̄ʼi vugu ntaoŋ nɔ ghɔ mbhi.
Ŋga ntaoŋ ni ŋguoŋ ji minjɨɨ mbhi ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ pugu, pa minjɨɨ pighɔ younjiŋ yi nthɛ ŋa pugu ji ŋggì yi.
Ti a mbɔ ŋgɨ̀nɨ, paʼa pugu lɔ njōu njiŋ yi, pugu tei vi tei nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi nji ŋggì pa ghɨ̀nɨ.”
Jishɔ ni nchrā luʼɔ chrà yei ni pugu, ndɔ paʼa thɔ yugu lɔ nshie ni nnu ŋa a chhu nu nɛ.
Nnɛ Jishɔ pɨnɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Shishini, a mmu mbɔ choŋkaʼa pa minjɨɨ.
Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthɔ shhɨ a nɛ pɔ pi pa ŋgɨna pugu pa ŋgɨna minwi, ndɔ paʼa pa minjɨɨ lɔ njaʼo vugu.
A mmu mbɔ chonda. S̈hesheŋoŋ ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ mu nii a lūgu, ndɔ nii mbɨnɨ ntaoŋ nu mfāʼo ŋkiɛŋ trǔ ŋkru.
Ŋgɨna ghà nthɔ pi nɔ yōo nu, njwi ndɔ mbɨrɨ. Mi ni nthɔ nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pugu fāʼo chɔmbhi. Ndɔ nja mfāʼo chɔmbhi lɔlɨnaoŋ.
“A mmu mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋkɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ shiʼi. Ŋkiɛŋ ŋkɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ shiʼi ghà mfɛ chɔmbhi yi nthɛ minjɨɨ pi.
Ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa pi pe vi pe ki a lɔ mbɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ ki minjɨɨ ghɔ lɔ mbɔ pi ji nɛ gha njəɨ miŋaŋieŋ a thɔ nu, a mieŋ pa minjɨɨ ntei ni vhi, miŋaŋieŋ ghɔ wɛ̄iŋ vugu ndɔ nshāaŋ vugu.
A tei nthɛ ŋa a fāʼa pi pe, paʼa ndɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ndɨɨ ni pa minjɨɨ.
“A mmu mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋkɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ shiʼi, ǹji pa minjɨɨ paŋ pugu ji a,
wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa ji a ŋkaa yu mummu ji Tǎa nɛ. M̀fɛ chɔmbhi a nthɛ pa minjɨɨ.
M̀fāʼo pichəɨ pa minjɨɨ ŋa pugu lɔ mbɔ moŋ yei ŋkaʼa. Ǹshi ŋguʼɔ nthɔ ni pugu ŋkaa pugu, pugu yaʼo ŋggì a. Nnɛ pugu chīri mbɔ taʼa kwíe, mfāʼo taʼa ŋkɛ̄ʼi vugu.
Yei nnu ŋa a chwīe Tǎa a khwā a nɛ, ŋa m̀fɛ chɔmbhi a nɔ khu nu, nnɛ ŋa mimfɛ m̀bɨnɨ nɔ ghɔ ŋkamuʼɔŋ.
A lɔ njiʼi ŋkwe yichəɨ ŋoŋ ŋkwe chɔmbhi a mbhɔ mu. M̀fɛ pi khwatua a, m̀fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ fɛ nu ndɔ mbɨnɨ mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ pɨ̄nɨ nu nuʼuŋ ŋkwe. A nnu ŋa Tǎa fɛ gɨ́ ŋa ǹchwīe nɛ.”
Minduoŋnduoŋ ni ŋgū shɨna pa Juu nthɛ pa chrà pei.
Ntou yugu chhu ŋa, “A fāʼo miŋwɛiŋ, ndɔ mbaa paa, pəɨ ywɛrɛ pi khɔ mbhɔ yu?”
Pichəɨ chhu yugu ŋa, “Yei lɔ mbɔ ŋkwaŋ chrà ŋoŋ ŋa miŋwɛiŋ thɔ fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ nɛ. Mimfɛ miŋwɛiŋ chuʼɔ ligi pa nchriligi?”
Moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ, jɨ fɛ nu Nda Minnwi ni Minnwi ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ Jerushalɛiŋ. A ni mbɔ moŋ ndɨɨ laoŋ.
Jishɔ ni nthɔ nyīeŋ nu moŋ Varinda Sholomu moŋ Nda Minnwi.
Nnɛ pa Juu kɨrɨ yəɨ yu mbie vi ŋa, “Ɔ shi ntigi vigi moŋ mititri pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ, ɔ̈ mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, ɔ shwei vigi thɔ yigi shie.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Mi ni ŋkwo shwei vəɨ ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ. Pa fàʼa ŋa m̀fāʼa nu ni ligi Tǎa nɛ kwe ntie a ni yaoŋ ŋa mi yie nɛ.
Ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ shi lɔ mbɔ ghrà minjɨɨ paŋ.
Pa minjɨɨ paŋ ghà njaʼo ŋggì a, ǹji vugu, pugu younjiŋ a.
M̀fɛ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ ni pugu, mbaʼa pugu lɛ ma ŋkhu. Ndɔ mbaʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ fīʼa vugu mfuʼu liɛŋ mbhɔ mu.
Tǎa a ŋa a fɛ vugu vəɨ nɛ
, chaa vugu ghao, ti minthɛ paʼa shesheŋoŋ llɔ mfīʼa vugu mfuʼu liɛŋ mbhɔ Tǎa ghɔ.
Mmu pigi Tǎa a pɔ pi taʼa yi.”
Pa ŋgwa Juu lɨ̄ga pa ŋgùʼɔ shhɛ ŋkamuʼɔŋ lɨʼɨ tuŋ vi nɔ.
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋ̀kwo nōoŋ ntou fàʼa shiʼi ni pəɨ llɔ mbhɔ Tǎa, ti pəɨ tāʼa nu ntuŋ a nthɛ pi yəɨ shɨna fàʼa pei?”
Pa Juu pighɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi lɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu ntuŋ ghɔ nthɛ pi fàʼa shiʼi, pigi tāʼa nu ntuŋ ghɔ nthɛ pi nchɨʼəshə. Nthɛ ŋa ɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋoŋmishua ntāʼa nu ndɔ̄gɔ noŋ yɔ mbɔ Minnwi.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pi lɔ nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ yəɨ ŋa, Minnwi chhu ŋa, ‘Pəɨ pa nnwi!’
Ti a mɛ̄iŋ vugu ŋa chrà Minnwi ni nthɔ mbhɔ pugu nɛ ni pa nnwi, ndɔ pia ji ŋa mbaʼa pi pəʼɨ chrà ‘minnwi’,
pəɨ kie nɛiŋ nchhu ni ju yɛ ŋa Tǎa chuʼɔ vi nɔ thɔ fàʼa ntaoŋ vi moŋ mbhi nɛ ŋa, ‘Ɔ fāʼo nchɨʼəshə’ nthɛ ŋa mi ni nchhu ŋa, ‘Mi Muuŋ Minnwi’ nɛ.
Ä mbɔ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nchwīe pi fàʼa Tǎa a, kiʼi pəɨ piŋ a.
Ndɔ m̈i nchwīe pi fàʼa yi, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ a nɛ, pəɨ piŋ nɛ fàʼa pighɔ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ shi nji, thɔ yəɨ lɔ nshie ŋa Tǎa pɔ mbɨŋ mu, m̀bɔ mbɨŋ Tǎa.”
Pugu pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ntāʼa nu ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi ŋkamuʼɔŋ a lərə ntaoŋ mbhɔ pugu.
Jishɔ pɨnɨ mbɨnɨ njiɛŋ ŋkhǐ Jodaŋ, lɨʼɨ ŋa Jouŋ ni mfǔoŋ nthɔ ŋkwe ŋgwa ni ŋkhǐ nɛ, ŋkɨna fɔ.
Ntou ŋgwa thɔ njəɨ vi nchhu ŋa, “Jouŋ shini ndɔ nōoŋ sheshe lì, ndɔ ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa Jouŋ ni nchhu nthɛ ŋoŋ vei nɛ nnu shini.”
Ntou ŋgwa piŋ vi fɔ.
Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni ŋgɨ̄nɔ nu ligi yi pɔ Lasharɔ llɔ Betani, mbɔ laʼataoŋ Meri pugu ndǐŋ vi Mata.
Meri vei ni mbɔ ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a ni nshāʼo wru laminda mbɨŋ Taathɔ, njɨ̄gɨ kwò yi ni ŋgiithɔ yi nɛ, ŋa ndǐŋ vi Lasharɔ ni ŋgɨ̄nɔ nu.
Piŋgɛ pighɔ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa lǐŋ nɛ taoŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ŋkiɛŋ taannu yɔ ŋa ɔ khwā vi ŋgaʼa nɛ ghɨ̄nɔ nu.”
Ndɔ Jishɔ ni ŋga njaʼo, nchhu ŋa,
“Ghɨ̌nɔ ghɔ lɔ mbɔ yi gu. A pɔ pi nɔ fɛ nu ndighaʼo ni Minnwi nnɛ ŋa Muuŋ Minnwi tɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ mfāʼo ndighaʼo.”
Jishɔ ni ŋkhwā Mata pugu Meri ndǐŋ vi, ni Lasharɔ.
Nnɛ, ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa Lasharɔ ghɨ̄nɔ nu, mbɨnɨ ndaʼa paa llɛ́ mbīgi lɨʼɨ ŋa a ki pɔ nɛ.
Nnɛ, nchhu ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa,
“Pia pɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ Judia.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, a lɔ njiʼi shɨga nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgwa Juu ni ntāʼa nu ntuŋ ghɔ ni ŋgùʼɔ nɛ, ɔ kwo pɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nu fɔ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“A lɔ mbɔ paanchrɔ awa ŋa pi ghà mfāʼo líʼɛ? S̈hesheŋoŋ nyīeŋ moŋ liʼɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkɔ̄rɔ, nthɛ ŋa a thɔ njəɨ liʼɛ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei.
Ndɔ ti s̈hesheŋoŋ nyīeŋ pi ni tuʼu, a kɔ̄rɔ nthɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo liʼɛ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nchhu nnu pei mīʼɛŋ, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Lasharɔ taannu via gū lɔ̄gɔ, ǹshi ŋgə̄ɨ ŋgūʼu vi.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, A ŋgū moŋ lɔ̄gɔ, kaŋ noŋ yi shi ntɔgɔ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nchhu nnɛ, njiŋ yi pɔ pi ŋa a kukhu, pugu pīʼi yugu ŋa a pɔ pi wuʼɔ lɔgɔ gha nɔ fɛrɛ nu.
Nnɛ, Jishɔ shiethɔ yugu ŋa,
“Lasharɔ kwo khu!
Ndɔ, nthɛ vəɨ, m̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ŋa ǹshini ndɔ mbɔ fɔ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ shi mbiŋ. Ndɔ pia ghə̄ɨ njəɨ vi.”
Nnɛ, Toma ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni kəʼɨ nɛ chhu ni pɛ ghaŋ younjiŋ ŋa pugu pugu ni njōu njiŋ Jishɔ kaʼa nɛ ŋa, “Pia ghə̄ɨ ŋkaa pia, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia pa Masha
khu kaʼa.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nchəɨŋ, njəɨ ŋa Lasharɔ kwo pɔ moŋ fúŋ
nɔ khwɛ llɛmbhi.
A shini ndɔ njiʼi nchəɨŋ khwɛ ŋkaŋ kwò nɔ llɔ nu Betani ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Ntou pa ŋgwa Juu ni ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ kra Mata pugu Meri nɔ māʼaŋ nu njùʼɔ yugu nthɛ gu ndǐŋ vugu.
Nnɛ Mata gha njaʼo ŋa Jishɔ thɔ nu, ntaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ vi, ndɔ Meri kɨna nchɔchhɔ nda.
Mata chhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ kaŋ ni mbɔ hɛiŋ, ndǐŋ vigi shi kaŋ ndɔ ŋkhu.
Ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi ndwɛ, ǹji ŋa sheshe yaoŋ ŋa ɔ shi mbie mbhɔ Minnwi nɛ, Minnwi shi mfɛ vɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ndǐŋ ghɔ shi mbɨnɨ ndɔllɔ mfāʼo chɔmbhi.”
Mata chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Nji ŋa a shi mbɨnɨ ndɔllɔ moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa lɛ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ ndugwi llɛ́ nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“A mmu mbɔ ŋgaŋ kuʼɔ moŋ gu ndɔ mbɔ chɔmbhi.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ a nɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a shi ŋkhu nɛ, a shi mfāʼo chɔmbhi.
Ndɔ ti shesheŋoŋ ŋa a yi maoŋ ndɔ mbiŋ a nɛ, mbaʼa a yiʼi ma ŋkhu. Ɔ piŋ nnu yei?”
Mata ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ooŋ, ma Taathɔ, m̀biŋ ŋa ɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi ŋa a ni mfāʼo nɔ thɔ nu moŋ mbhi nɛ.”
A ni ŋga nchhu nnu yei, ŋgə̄ɨ mɛ̄iŋ Meri ndǐŋ vi, nchhu ghɔ njiŋnjiŋ ŋa, “Masha pɔ hɛiŋ nthɔ mɛ̄iŋ ghɔ.”
A gha njaʼo, njiʼa ndɔ pi llɔ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ vi.
Jishɔ shini ndɔ naa nchəɨŋ moŋ laʼa yaʼa. A ni ŋguʼɔ mbiʼi lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ Mata ni mbara vi nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pa Juu pɛ ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ nda pugu nthɔ māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yi yəɨ Meri lɔllɔ ni njɨ ntaoŋ mbhi nɛ, pugu younjiŋ yi, mbīʼi yugu ŋa a tāʼa ŋgə̄ɨ chofuŋ ŋkə̄ɨ fɔ.
Meri ni ŋga nthɔ nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni mbɔ nɛ njəɨ vi, ŋgū ni puŋ yi shhɨ yu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ̈ kaŋ ni ŋkwo pɔ hɛiŋ, ndǐŋ a shi kaŋ ndɔ ŋkhu!”
Jishɔ ni ŋga njəɨ a kə̄ɨ nu, mbɨnɨ njəɨ pa Juu ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ nɛ kə̄ɨ nu ŋkaa pugu, nnu ghɔ pɨgɨ vi, njùʼɔ yi ghana vi ntou yi.
A pie ŋa,
“Fúŋ ŋa pəɨ nūʼɔŋ vi fɔ nɛ pɔ pi hɨŋ?”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, thɔ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋkə̄ɨ.
Nnɛ pa ŋgwa Juu chhu ŋa, “Pəɨ līi fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a khwā vi njəɨ!”
Ndɔ pichəɨ chhu yugu ŋa, “A kaŋ ni mfɛ paʼa Ju ŋa a ni nchuʼɔ ligi pa nchriligi nɛ lɔ nchwīe ki a lɔ njiʼi ŋkhu?”
Nɛnnɛ, nnu ghɔ pɨnɨ mbɨgɨ Jishɔ, a ghə̄ɨ chofuŋ ghɔ. A ni mbɔ llù, pi nūʼɔŋ ŋgùʼɔ cho ghɔ.
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ pɨʼɨ ŋgùʼɔ ghɔ.”
Mata, ndǐŋ ŋkuŋkhu ghɔ, chhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, yɨ́ga yi shi ŋgaʼa a kwo pɔ khwɛ llɛ́ nɔ haʼaŋ pi twei vi nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ǹshi nì ndɔ nchhu vɛ ŋa ɔ̈ mbiŋ, kaŋ ɔ shi njəɨ ndighaʼo Minnwi?”
Nnɛ, pugu pɨʼɨ ŋgùʼɔ ghɔ. Jishɔ kə̄rə ligi yi tɔthɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Tǎa, ǹtōo ghɔ ŋa ɔ yaʼo a nɛ.
Ǹji ŋa ɔ ghà ŋguʼɔ njaʼo a, ndɔ ǹchhu yei nthɛ pi ŋgwa pei ŋa pugu thi hɛiŋ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa pinthɛ pugu piŋ ŋa a taoŋ gɔ̀ ntaoŋ a.”
A ni ŋga nchhu pei nnu, mbaʼo ŋgòu ni njɨ ŋa,
“Lasharɔ, taoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ!”
Ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni ŋkwo khu taoŋ mbhi, pa mbhɔ mi ni kwò mi pɔ yi liŋ ni ndhwí fhu, ligi yi wuʼɔ mbɔ yi liŋ ni ndhwí.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ fēi vi mieŋ vi a ghə̄ɨ.”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ntou pa Juu ŋa pugu ni nthɔ lɨʼɨ kra Meri, njəɨ nnu ŋa Jishɔ chwīe nɛ, piŋ Jishɔ.
Ndɔ pichəɨ ghə̄ɨ njəɨ pa ŋgwa Farashi nshwei vugu ni nnu ŋa Jishɔ chwīe nɛ.
Nnɛ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi kɨrɨ pa kúŋ nchhu ŋa, “Pia shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ? Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ vei thɔ nōoŋ ntou pa lì!
P̈ia mieŋ vi a ghə̄ɨ nu shhɨ nɛnnɛ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa piŋ vi, pa ŋgwa Roma thɔ nshāʼa Nda Minnwi yia pugu pa laʼataoŋ yia.”
Ndɔ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu, ligi yi pɔ Kaifa, mbɔ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋgaʼo ghɔ, chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ lɔ nji kaŋ taʼa nnu.
Pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa, a pwa ni pəɨ ŋa taʼa ŋoŋ khu nthɛ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nchaa ŋa ŋguoŋ laʼataoŋ shiʼi.”
A shini ndɔ nchhu yei nnu pi ni thɔ yi, ndɔ nɔ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋgaʼo ghɔ, a ni nchhu nɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋa Jishɔ shi ŋkhu nɔ thɔ pa ŋgwa laʼataoŋ pa Juu,
ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋgwa laʼataoŋ pa Juu təʼɨ vugu, mbɔ nɔ kɨrɨ nu ŋguoŋ pa puoŋ Minnwi ŋa pugu sha moŋ ghaa mbhi nɛ pugu pɔ taʼa yi.
Nnɛ, jɛ̄ yua ghɔ, pa thishɨ pa ŋgwa Juu pīri ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu shi njwi Jishɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, paʼa Jishɔ lɔ nuʼuŋ nyīeŋ lɨʼɨ wo shɨna pa Juu. A lɔllɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ krao laʼataoŋ yɛ ŋa a para moŋ ŋkǔnu njó nɛ, moŋ laʼataoŋ Ɛfrɛiŋ ndaʼa fɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.
Ndɨɨ jɨ Jɨ Lli Njiʼa pa Juu ni ŋkwo para nu, ntou ŋgwa kuʼɔ llɔ moŋ laʼa ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ chwīe nu noŋ yugu mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ chhu nɛ.
Pugu ni nchhɔ ntāʼa Jishɔ, nchhu nu ni noŋ pugu nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nthi Nda Minnwi nɛ ŋa, “Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa? Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi ndɔ nthɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ ghɔ?”
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi ni ŋkwo fɛ gɨ́ ŋa s̈hesheŋoŋ nji lɨʼɨ ŋa a pɔ nɛ, a chwīe pugu ji nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi.
A ni ŋga mbiʼi ntɨgao llɛ́ ŋkaoŋ llɛ́ jɨ Lli Njiʼa maa ŋkāʼo, Jishɔ thɔ Betani, mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa Lasharɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa Jishɔ ni mbɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu ni mbɔ nɛ.
Pugu pīri jɨ fɔ nɔ ligi Jishɔ. Mata ghɛ̄rɛ ŋgrā maoŋ pighɔ. Lasharɔ ni mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa pugu pa Jishɔ ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi lɨʼɨ jɨ maoŋ pighɔ kaʼa nɛ.
Meri lɔ̄gɔ nchɨ́ŋ laminda tɨnɨnchuoŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni nadi, mbɔrɔ kwo Jishɔ nɔ ghɔ njɨ̄gɨ ni ŋgiithɔ yi. Mooŋ nda ghɔ lɨnaoŋ ni mbwa luŋ laminda ghɔ.
Ndɔ Judashi Ishikario, taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi, mbɔ yɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ nɔ fīni nu vi nɛ chhu ŋa,
“A ni mbɔ khɔ paʼa pi lɔ mfīni laminda yinɛ mfɛ mbɨŋ ghɔ ni ghaŋ pou? Pi kaŋ ni nthɛ pi fīni ni fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋoŋ mfāʼa nɔ trɛi ŋkɨɨ llɛmbhi pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ?”
A ni nchhu yei paʼa ndɔ mbɔ pi ŋa a ni ŋkhwā lɨna nu ni ghaŋ pou. A ni nchhu nthɛ pi ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋgɨna, ni nthɔ ntuo ju ntuo pìɛŋ mbɨŋ. Ni nthɔ ŋiʼaŋ mfuʼu pichəɨ moŋ ghɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ noŋ yi nɔ ghɔ.
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Mieŋ vi təʼɨ vi, nji ŋa mimfɛ a nūʼɔŋ laminda ghɔ nɔ llɛmbhi ŋa pi shi ntwei a nɛ.
Ä mbɔ pi ni pa ghaŋ pou, pəɨ pugu shi ŋguʼɔ mbɔ kaʼa, ndɔ mbaʼa pəɨ wuʼɔ fāʼo a ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa mmɛ yú pa ŋgwa Juu ni njaʼo ŋa Jishɔ pɔ fɔ nɛ, pugu thɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋguʼɔ nthɛ pi ju, pugu thɔ nɔ yəɨ nu Lasharɔ, ŋa Jishɔ ni mbɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu nɛ.
Nnɛ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ taaŋ nɔ jwi nu Lasharɔ ŋkaa yu.
Nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ nthɛ pi Lasharɔ ŋa ntou pa Juu ni ndāa vugu ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nthɔ mbiŋ Jishɔ.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, mmɛ yú ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ lɨʼɨ jɨ ghɔ nɛ yaʼo ŋa Jishɔ thɔ nu Jerushalɛiŋ.
Nnɛ pugu lɔ̄gɔ pa ghia taŋ ntaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ mbara vi nɔ ghɔ, mbaʼo ŋgòu ni njɨ ŋa,
“Ndighaʼo pɔ ni Minnwi! Minnwi fɛ mbɔrɔ ni ju ŋa a thɔ nɔ ligi Taathɔ nɛ!
Minnwi fɛ mbɔrɔ ni fùoŋ pa ŋgwa Ishrae!”
Jishɔ yəɨ muuŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ chəɨ ŋkuʼɔ nchɔchhɔ ŋkuoŋ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ ŋa,
“Kiʼi fāʼo pɔgɔ gu, ma laʼataoŋ Shayaoŋ.
Fùoŋ yɔ pɔ nɛiŋ ŋkuʼɔ muuŋ ŋkwɛ́iŋ nthɔ nu.”
Thɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shini ndɔ mfǔoŋ nshie nɔ nnu pei, ndɔ a gha mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ nii moŋ ndighaʼo yi nɛ, pugu kwiŋ ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ni nchhu nnu pei nthɛ pi ju ndɔ pi kwo chwīe mbɨŋ yu.
Yú ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mɛ̄iŋ Lasharɔ a taoŋ moŋ fúŋ a ywiŋ vi moŋ gu nɛ wuʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ mbɔ pa miŋkwentie pi.
A ni nchwīe lì yei ŋa a ni nōoŋ nɛ, yú ŋgwa pighɔ ghə̄ɨ mbara vi.
Nnɛ pa ŋgwa Farashi chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ yəɨ ŋa pəɨ lɔ nthɔ nshei yichəɨ yaoŋ. Pəɨ pɛʼi njəɨ, ŋguoŋ mbhi ghə̄ɨ njiŋ yu.”
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Gri ni mbɔ shɨna ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ ghaʼo nu Minnwi lɨʼɨ jɨ ghɔ nɛ.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa pighɔ thɔ mbara Fili ŋa a ni ndhɔ Beshaida moŋ Galili nɛ, mbie vi ŋa, “Masha, pigi tāʼa nu njəɨ Jishɔ.”
Fili ghə̄ɨ nchhu ni Andru, Andru ghɔ pugu Fili ghə̄ɨ nchhu ni Jishɔ.
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ kāʼo ni Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua nɔ fāʼo nu mmɛ ndighaʼo.
Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ, m̈bia shíe gɛ mieŋ ki gū shhɛ ŋkhu, a kɨna taʼa yi, ndɔ ti ä ŋkhu, a khɛ̄ ŋkuʼɔ njuŋ ntou ntíɛŋ.
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khwā chɔmbhi yugu nɛ shi nshiɛŋ chɔmbhi yugu ghɔ, ndɔ ti ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɨ̄na chɔmbhi yugu moŋ mbhi yei nɛ, shi nūʼɔŋ chɔmbhi yugu ghɔ mfāʼo chɔmbhi ki ndugwi yi.
S̈hesheŋoŋ mfāʼa mbhɔ mu, a yiʼi ŋa a yōu njiŋ a, nnɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ ŋa m̀bɔ nɛ, muuŋ fàʼa a shi mbɔ fɔ ŋkaa yu. S̈hesheŋoŋ mfāʼa mbhɔ mu, kaŋ Tǎa a shi ŋgaʼo vi.
“Ndwɛ njùʼɔ a ghana a. Ti mi shi nchhu pi ŋa? Tǎa, kwe a moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ yei? Ndɔ ǹthɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei nthɛ pi tɔgɔ nu moŋ ŋgəʼɨ yei.
Tǎa ghaʼo ligi yɔ.”
Ŋggì taoŋ po ŋa, “Ŋ̀kwo ghaʼo, ndɔ shi mbɨnɨ ŋgaʼo ŋkamuʼɔŋ.”
Yú ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthi fɔ njaʼo ŋggì ghɔ nɛ chhu ŋa mbɨ̀ wara. Pichəɨ chhu ŋa, “Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chrā ghɔ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ŋggì yei thɔ nthɛ pi pəɨ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nthɛ pi mmu.
Ndwɛ ndɨɨ ŋa pi shi nshaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei nɛ. Ndwɛ pi shi mbɨʼɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a shaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei ŋkuoŋ faaŋ.
Ndɔ ni mmu, pi shi ŋga ŋkə̄rə a tɔthɨ llɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, ǹshūu ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nthɔ nɔ ghɔ mbɨŋ mu.”
A ni nchhu yei pi nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋkwaŋ gu ŋa a shi ŋkhu nɛ.

Nnɛ yú ŋgwa pighɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi yaʼo moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ ma ŋkɨna mbhi ki ndugwi yi. Ti ɔ kie pi nɛiŋ nchhu ŋa pi shi ŋkə̄rə Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua ŋkwiŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa? Yie Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Líʼɛ shi mbɔ shɨna pəɨ wuʼɔ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ mbīgi. P̂əɨ nyīeŋ ndɨɨ ŋa líʼɛ pɔ nɛ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi njiŋnjiŋ ghaʼa vəɨ. Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a nyīeŋ moŋ njiŋ nɛ lɔ njiʼi njəɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nu nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ fāʼo liʼɛ nɛ, pəɨ piŋ liʼɛ ghɔ, nji ŋa pəɨ shi mbɔ pa ŋgwa líʼɛ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga nchrā pei nnu ti mīʼɛŋ, ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ndɛrɛ.
Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ Jishɔ ni nōoŋ ntou pa lì shɨna pa Juu pighɔ nɛ, pugu shini ndɔ mbiŋ vi.
Yei ni mbɔ nɔ chwīe nu yaoŋ ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Ishaya ni nāʼaŋ nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa,
“Taathɔ, a piŋ gɔ̌ mbiŋ chrà yigi,
ndɔ ti Taathɔ nōoŋ ghrɨ́ yi pi ni gɔ̌?”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pugu kaŋ ni nthɛ paʼa pugu lɔ mbiŋ, nthɛ ŋa Ishaya pɨnɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Minnwi chri ligi yugu,
mfɨ̄nɨ njùʼɔ yugu,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pugu yəɨ lɨʼɨ ni ligi yugu,
nji ni njùʼɔ yugu ŋkara,
ǹchwīe pugu pɔ shiʼi.”
Ishaya ni nchhu pa nnu pei nthɛ ŋa a ni njəɨ ndighaʼo Jishɔ, nchrā pa nnu nthɛ vi.
Njiʼi nthɛ nɛnnɛ, ntou pa thishɨ ni mbiŋ vi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nchwīe pi ji nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔgɔ nu ŋa pa ŋgwa Farashi shi fuʼu vugu nda luoŋ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa pugu khwā ndighaʼo ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ ŋgwamishua nchaa yɛ ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.
Jishɔ chhu ni njɨ ŋa,
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ nɛ lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbiŋ pi mmu. A piŋ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a yəɨ a nɛ yəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.
Ǹthɔ moŋ mbhi nɔ líʼɛ, nnɛ ŋa mbaʼa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ a nɛ kɨna moŋ njiŋnjiŋ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ njaʼo chrà a, ndɔ ki lɔ chwīe, paʼa ǹdɔ nshaʼa vi, nthɛ ŋa ǹshini ndɔ njiʼi nthɔ pi nɔ shaʼa nu ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi. Ŋki thɔ pi nɔ kwe nu vugu.
Ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a lāa a ki lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ chrà a nɛ fāʼo yaoŋ ŋa a shi nshaʼa vi. Chrà ŋa ǹchrā nɛ shi nshaʼa vi moŋ ndugwi llɛ́.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nchrā pi ni nyaŋ njɨ. Ndɔ ti Tǎa ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ fɛ gɨ́ vəɨ ni nnu ŋa ǹshi nchrā ndɔ nchhu nɛ.
Ǹji ŋa gɨ́ yi pɔ pi chɔmbhi ki mmɛ, nnɛ yaoŋ ŋa ǹchhu nɛ, a yaoŋ ŋa Tǎa chhu vəɨ nɛ.”

Ŋkaoŋ llɛ́ jɨ Lli Njiʼa maa ŋkāʼo, Jishɔ ni ŋkwo ji ŋa ndɨɨ yi kāʼo nɔ llɔ nu ŋkwo shhɛ hɛiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ mbara Tǎa. A ni ŋkhwā pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ ndɔ ŋkhwā vugu ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ nɔ ndugwi yi.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ndɨɨ jɨ maoŋ, devɨ kwo kāoŋ njùʼɔ Judashi Ishikario muuŋ Shemu, ŋa a fīni Jishɔ.
Jishɔ gha nji ŋa Tǎa kwo fɛ ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ ghɔ ndɔ mbɨnɨ nji ŋa ju nduthɔ yi llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi ŋguʼɔ mbɨnɨ pi mbhɔ Minnwi ghɔ,
ndɔllɔ tɔthɨ moŋ lɨʼɨ jɨ maoŋ nshrāo mmɛ ndhwí yi nūʼɔŋ, ndɔ̄gɔ tawrɛi ndǐŋ laʼo ntuʼu yu
nshāʼo ŋkhǐ moŋ pɛiŋ shɨ̄gao yaoŋ njɛ̄ shɨ̄gao nu kwò ghaŋ younjiŋ pi njɛ̄ yɨ̄gɨ nu ni tawrɛi ŋa a ni ndǐŋ láʼo ntuʼu yu nɛ.
A ni ŋga nchəɨŋ mbɨŋ Shemu Pita, a chhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ tāʼa nu nshɨ̄gao kwò ma?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Thɔ yɔ lɔ naa nchuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ nnu ŋa ǹchwīe nu nɛ yaʼa, ndɔ a shi ŋga ndaʼa, thɔ yɔ chuʼɔ.”
Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Mbaʼa ɔ ma nshɨ̄gao kwò ma!”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“M̈i mieŋ ki shɨ̄gao ghɔ, paʼa pɔgɔ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ ni pra.”
Shemu Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, kiʼi ŋguʼɔ nshɨ̄gao pi kwò ma, shɨ̄gao pa mbhɔ ma pugu pa thɔ a!”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋoŋ ŋa a kwo shɨ̄gao noŋ nɛ lɔ mbie ŋa a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nshɨ̄gao noŋ ŋkiɛŋ kwò mi nthɛ ŋa a kwo pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ. Ndɔ pəɨ pi taoŋtaoŋ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbɔ pi ŋguoŋ yəɨ.”
Nthɛ ŋa a ni nji ŋoŋ ŋa a shi mfīni vi nɛ, a ni nchwīe yie a chhu ŋa,
“A lɔ mbɔ ŋguoŋ yəɨ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ.”
A ni ŋga ŋkwo shɨ̄gao kwò yugu ti mbɨnɨ māʼaŋ mmɛ ndhwí yi, nchɔchhɔ nɔ lɨʼɨ yi, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Thɔ yəɨ chuʼɔ ni nnu ŋa nchwīe ni pəɨ nɛ?
Pəɨ ghà mɛ̄iŋ a ni ‘Masha’ pugu ‘Taathɔ,’ ndɔ nchhu shini nthɛ ŋa mi yie.
Ndɔ ti ä mbɔ mmu Taathɔ vəɨ mbɨnɨ mbɔ masha vəɨ nshɨ̄gao kwò yəɨ, pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ wuʼɔ mfāʼo nɔ shɨ̄gao nu kwò noŋ pəɨ.
Ŋ̀kwo nōoŋ lì ni pəɨ, ŋa pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ chwīe wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹchwīe ni pəɨ nɛ.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, muuŋ fàʼa lɔ ŋgāʼo nchaa masha vi, ndɔ paʼa ŋoŋ ŋa pi taoŋ vi nɛ lɔ ŋgāʼo nchaa ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ vi nɛ.
Ŋa pəɨ ji nnu pei nɛ, mbɔrɔ shi mbɔ yəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ p̈əɨ nchwīe.
“Ǹdɔ nchrā nthɛ pi ŋguoŋ yəɨ ghao, ǹji ŋgwa pɛ ŋa ǹchuʼɔ vugu nɛ. Ndɔ nnu ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa, ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa pigi yu jɨ maoŋ kaʼa nɛ kara māʼaŋ a ni nchhɔ̀.’
“Ǹthɔ nchhu yei nnu ni pəɨ ndwɛ ŋkaoŋ a maa ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, nji ŋa a shi ŋga ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, pəɨ piŋ ŋa A mmu mbɔ Ju.
Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ ŋoŋ ŋa ǹtaoŋ nɛ piŋ a, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ a nɛ piŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga ŋkwo chhu nnu yei ti mīʼɛŋ, njùʼɔ yi ghana vi ntou yi, a chhu ŋa,
“Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa taʼa ŋoŋ vəɨ shi mfīni a!”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi līi noŋ pugu, ŋgrāo nu ŋa a nthɛ a chhu pi gɔ̌.
Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi ŋa Jishɔ ni ŋkhwā vi nɛ ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi yəɨ Jishɔ.
Nnɛ Shemu Pita nōoŋ ghɔ ni mbhɔ ŋa a pie Jishɔ ŋa a chhu nthɛ pi gɔ̌.
Nnɛ, yie taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi yɨʼə noŋ yi minjiŋnjiŋ mbɨŋ Jishɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, yie pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“A yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa ǹshi mfɛ brɛi ŋa ǹchrū moŋ kumbu nɛ ghɔ.”
A gha nchru brɛi ghɔ, mfɛ ni Judashi, mbɔ muuŋ Shemu Ishikario.
Judashi ni ŋga ŋkwe brɛi ghɔ, Shata nii mbɨŋ yu
Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Nnu ŋa ɔ tāʼa nu nchwīe nɛ, yiʼa kɔkɔnɔ nchwīe.”
Kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa pugu pugu ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi nɛ shini ndɔ nji nnu ŋa a ni nchwīe a chhu ghɔ nnɛ nɛ.
Pichəɨ ni mbīʼi ŋa, nthɛ ŋa Judashi ni ntuo pìɛŋ mbɨŋ nɛ, Jishɔ ni nchhu nu ghɔ pi ŋa, “Yuoŋ pa maoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pia fāʼo nɔ nnu jɨ ghɔ nɛ”, ki ŋa a fɛ yaoŋ ni ghaŋ pou.
Nnɛ, Judashi gha ŋkwo kru brɛi ghɔ, ŋkiʼi ntaoŋtaoŋ mbhi. Tuʼu ni ŋkwo shini.
Judashi ni ŋga ŋkwo taoŋ, Jishɔ chhu ŋa,
“Ndɨɨ kāʼo ni Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua nɔ nii nu moŋ ndighaʼo yi, Minnwi fāʼo ndighaʼo nthɛ vi.
Ndɔ M̈innwi mfāʼo ndighaʼo yi nthɛ muuŋ, kaŋ Minnwi nduthɔ yi shi ŋgaʼo muuŋ ŋkaa yu moŋ nduthɔ ju Minnwi. Ndɔ a shi ŋgaʼo vi wuʼɔ ndwɛ.

“Pa puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ, a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ ŋa pia shi mbɔ kaʼa. Pəɨ shi ntāʼa a ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mi ni nchhu ni thishɨ pa Juu nɛ, a haʼaŋ m̀bɨnɨ nchhu nu ni pəɨ ndwɛ, ŋa, ‘Lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu fɔ nɛ mbaʼa pəɨ thɔ fɔ.’
M̀fɛ kɨ̀na fhi ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ khwā noŋ pəɨ. P̂əɨ khwā noŋ pəɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋ̀khwā vəɨ nɛ.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa shi nji ŋa pəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ paŋ nɔ haʼaŋ p̈əɨ mfāʼo khwǎ noŋ pəɨ.”
Shemu Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ ghə̄ɨ pi hɨŋ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu nɛ minthɛ paʼa ɔ lɔ njōu njiŋ a nthɔ fɔ ndwɛ, ndɔ ɔ shi njōu njiŋ a nthɔ fɔ ndɨɨ nduoŋ.”
Pita khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Taathɔ, minthɛ paʼa ǹdɔ njōu njiŋ yɔ pɔgɔ ghə̄ɨ fɔ kaʼa nthɛ khɔ? Ǹshi ŋkhu nthɛ ghɔ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ shi ŋkhu nthɛ a nyaŋ? Shishini, ǹshwei ghɔ, mbaʼa miŋkəʼɨ yiʼi ŋkhwɛ̄ shiʼa ki ɔ lɔ naa ndāa a ni trɛi ŋgɛ!”
“Kiʼi njùʼɔ yəɨ ghana vəɨ, p̂əɨ piŋ Minnwi, mbɨnɨ mbɨŋ a ŋkaa mu.
Ntou njiɛŋ nda pɔ moŋ nda Tǎa a. A kaŋ mieŋ ki pɔ nnɛ, ŋkaŋ ŋkwo shwei vəɨ, nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ pīri lɨʼɨ ni pəɨ.
Ǹshi ŋga ŋkwo pīri lɨʼɨ ni pəɨ nɛ, ǹthɔ ndɔ̄gɔ vəɨ pia ghə̄ɨ, nnɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ ŋa m̀bɔ nɛ, pia shi ŋguʼɔ mbɔ fɔ kaʼa.
Pəɨ ji shɛndaoŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu nɛ.”
Toma chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, pigi lɔ njiʼi nji lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ ghə̄ɨ nu nɛ. Ti minthɛ pigi kie pi nɛiŋ nji shɛndaoŋ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“A mmu mbɔ shɛndaoŋ, mbɔ nnu shini mbɔ chɔmbhi. Yichəɨ ŋoŋ nthɛ paʼa a lɔ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ Tǎa ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ mu.
P̈əɨ ŋkwo ji a, kaŋ pəɨ shi ŋkwo ji Tǎa a ŋkaa yu. Llɔ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, pəɨ ji vi ndɔ njəɨ vi.”
Fili chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, nōoŋ Tǎa ghɔ ni pigi, a ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa pigi tāʼa nu nɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Pia kwo pɔ nɔ fɨʼɨ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ yei, pəɨ wuʼɔ mbiʼi ki lɔ nji a, Fili? Ŋoŋ ŋa a kwo yəɨ a nɛ kwo yəɨ Tǎa. Ti minthɛ ɔ kie pi nɛiŋ nchhu ŋa, ‘Nōoŋ Tǎa ghɔ ni pigi?’
Ɔ lɔ mbiŋ ŋa m̀bɔ moŋ Tǎa, Tǎa pɔ moŋ noŋ mu? Pa chrà ŋa ǹchrā nu nɛ, ǹdɔ njiʼi nchrā pi ni thɔ a, ndɔ Tǎa ŋa a chhɔ moŋ noŋ mu nɛ thɔ nchwīe fàʼa yi.
Piŋ a nɔ haʼaŋ ǹchhu nu ŋa m̀bɔ moŋ Tǎa, Tǎa pɔ moŋ noŋ mu nɛ, ndāa nɛ nnɛ, ɔ piŋ nthɛ fàʼa pɛ ŋa m̀fāʼa nu nɛ.
“Shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ a nɛ shi mfāʼa fàʼa ŋa m̀fāʼa nu nɛ, ndɔ ǹshi mfāʼa fàʼa ŋa a chaa yie ghɔ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu njəɨ pi Tǎa.
Sheshe yaoŋ ŋa ɔ shi mbie pi nɔ ligi a nɛ, ǹshi nchwīe nnɛ ŋa Tǎa fāʼo ndighaʼo yi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ muuŋ.
P̈əɨ mbie a
ni sheshe yaoŋ nɔ ligi a, kaŋ ǹshi nchwīe.
“P̈əɨ ŋkhwā a, kaŋ pəɨ shi nūʼɔŋ pa kɨ̀na paŋ.
Nnɛ kaŋ ǹshi mbie Tǎa a, a fɛ yichəɨ ŋgaŋ ghɛ̀rɛ ni pəɨ, pəɨ pugu chhɔ ki ndugwi yi,
mbɔ Jijwɛ nnu shini ŋa mbaʼa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi piŋ vi, nthɛ ŋa pugu shi lɔ njəɨ ki nji vi, ndɔ pəɨ ji vi nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pugu chhɔ kaʼa ndɔ shi mbɔ moŋ chɔmbhi yəɨ.
M̀baʼa njiʼi mieŋ vəɨ nɔ puoŋ minthi, ǹshi mbɨnɨ nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ.
Ndɔ nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ, mbaʼa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei nuʼuŋ njəɨ a, ndɔ pəɨ shi njəɨ a. Nthɛ ŋa mi yi maoŋ nɛ, pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ shi mbɔ yi maoŋ.
A shi ŋga mbɔ llɛ́ ghɔ, pəɨ ji ŋa m̀bɔ moŋ Tǎa, pəɨ pɔ mbɨŋ mu, mummu pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a piŋ pa kɨ̀na paŋ ndɔ nūʼɔŋ nɛ, a ju mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a khwā a nɛ. Ndɔ ti ju ŋa a khwā a nɛ, Tǎa a shi ŋkhwā vi ŋkaa yu, mummu khwā vi nōoŋ noŋ a ghɔ.”
Judashi (ki lɔ mbɔ pi Judashi Ishikario) chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, a pɔ pi nɛiŋ ŋa ɔ shi nōoŋ noŋ yɔ ni pigi, ki lɔ nōoŋ ni ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“S̈hesheŋoŋ ŋkhwā a, kaŋ a shi njaʼo nchò a, Tǎa a khwā vi, pigi thɔ njəɨ vi, nchhɔ pigi pugu.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkhwā a nɛ shiʼa nūʼɔŋ chrà a. Ndɔ chrà ŋa pəɨ yaʼo ǹchrā nu nɛ lɔ mbɔ pi nyaŋ. A yi Tǎa ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.
“Ŋ̀ki nchrā nnu pei ni pəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pia wuʼɔ mbɔ kaʼa nɛ.
Ndɔ ŋgaŋ ghɛ̀rɛ, mbɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi, ŋa Tǎa shi ntaoŋ nɔ ligi a nɛ, shi njɛʼi vəɨ ni ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao ndɔ mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkwiŋ vəɨ ni ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa ǹchhu nɛ.
M̀ieŋ ghɨghrɨ ni pəɨ; m̀fɛ ghɨghrɨ a ni pəɨ. Ǹdɔ njiʼi mfɛ ni pəɨ pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi fɛ nɛ. Kiʼi njùʼɔ yəɨ ghana vəɨ, ndɔ kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu.

“Pəɨ ni njaʼo a nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki chhu ni pəɨ ŋa ǹthɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ghə̄ɨ ndɔ mbɨnɨ nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ nɛ. P̈əɨ kaŋ ni nja nthɔ ŋkhwā a, p̂əɨ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ njəɨ pi Tǎa, nthɛ ŋa Tǎa lɔ mbɨnɨ ŋgāʼo nchaa a.
Ndɔ ndwɛ ŋ̀kwo shwei vəɨ ŋkaoŋ a maa ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, nnɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, a nthɛ pəɨ piŋ.
M̀baʼa nuʼuŋ nchrā ntou yi pia, nthɛ ŋa ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei thɔ nu. A lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghrɨ́ mbɨŋ mu.
Ndɔ ŋ̀ga nchwīe pi nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa a fɛ gɨ́ vəɨ ŋa ǹchwīe nɛ, nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi ji ŋa ŋ̀khwā Tǎa.
“Pəɨ lɔllɔ, p̂ia ghə̄ɨ.
“A mmu mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ndǎa grape
, Tǎa a pɔ ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ.
Sheshe fɨ̀ga mbhɔ ma ŋa a lɔ njiʼi njuŋ nɛ a yaʼa mīʼaŋ. Ti sheshe mbhɔ ŋa a yuŋ ntíɛŋ nɛ, a fēe ŋa a pɨnɨ njuŋ shiʼi.
Ndɔ pəɨ kwo pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nthɛ chrà ŋa mi ni nchrā ni pəɨ nɛ.

P̂əɨ kɨna mbɨŋ mu, ŋ̀kɨna mbɨŋ pəɨ. Minthɛ paʼa fɨ̀ga ndǎa grape lɔ njuŋ ntíɛŋ ni noŋ yi ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ ŋkɨna pi ŋkuoŋ ndǎa grape ghɔ. Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mbaʼa pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ yuŋ ntíɛŋ kaŋ a nɛiŋ pəɨ kɨna mbɨŋ mu.
“A mmu mbɔ ndǎa grape, pəɨ pɔ pa fɨ̀ga mbhɔ ma. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kɨna mbɨŋ mu, ŋ̀kɨna mbɨŋ yu nɛ, a ju ŋa a shi njuŋ ntou ntíɛŋ. Nthɛ ŋa m̈i ŋkiɛŋ, paʼa pəɨ lɔ nchwīe sheshe nnu.
S̈hesheŋoŋ mieŋ ki kɨna mbɨŋ mu, pi mīʼaŋ vi nɔ fɨ̀ga mbhɔ, a yaoŋ, pi kɨrɨ pa mbhɔ mi pighɔ māʼaŋ moŋ móŋoŋ pugu kɨɨ.
P̈əɨ ŋkɨna mbɨŋ mu, chrà a kɨna mbɨŋ pəɨ, pəɨ pie sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ tāʼa nu nɛ, kaŋ pi shi nchwīe mfɛ ni pəɨ.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yei nnu Tǎa a ghà mfāʼo ndighaʼo yi, ŋa pəɨ yuŋ ntou ntíɛŋ, nnɛ nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ paŋ.
“Nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa khwā a nɛ, a haʼaŋ ŋ̀khwā vəɨ nɛ. P̂əɨ kɨna moŋ khwǎ a.
P̈əɨ nūʼɔŋ pa kɨ̀na paŋ, kaŋ pəɨ shi ŋkɨna moŋ khwǎ a, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mummu nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na Tǎa a nnɛ ŋkɨna moŋ khwǎ yi nɛ.
Ŋ̀ki chrà nnu pei ni pəɨ nnɛ ŋa pwanjuʼɔ a pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ, pwanjuʼɔ yəɨ lɨnaoŋ.
Yei kɨ̀na a, ŋa pəɨ ŋkhwā noŋ pəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋkhwā vəɨ nɛ.
Yichəɨ mmɛ khwǎ lɔ mbɔ ntɔgɔ yei, ŋa ŋoŋ fɛ chɔmbhi yi nthɛ taannu pi.
Pəɨ pa taannu paŋ, nɔ haʼaŋ p̈əɨ nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na a.
Ǹdɔ nuʼuŋ mɛ̄iŋ vəɨ pi ni puoŋ fàʼa paŋ, nthɛ ŋa muuŋ fàʼa shiʼa nji yaoŋ ŋa Taathɔ vi chwīe nu nɛ. Ndɔ m̀ɛ̄iŋ vəɨ pi ni taannu paŋ nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa ǹjaʼo mbhɔ Tǎa nɛ, ǹchwīe pəɨ ji.
Pəɨ shi ki lɔ nchuʼɔ a, a ni nchuʼɔ mmu nchuʼɔ vəɨ, nūʼɔŋ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ ghə̄ɨ njuŋ ntíɛŋ, ntíɛŋ yəɨ kɨna, nnɛ ŋa sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ shi mbie Tǎa nɔ ghɔ ni ligi a nɛ, a nthɛ a fɛ ni pəɨ.
M̀fɛ kɨ̀na pei ni pəɨ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ khwā noŋ pəɨ.
“Pa ŋ̈gwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi mbɨ̄na vəɨ, pəɨ ji ŋa pugu kwo fǔoŋ mbɨ̄na a ŋkaoŋ maa mbɨ̄na vəɨ.

Pəɨ kaŋ ni mbɔ pi yi ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi kaŋ ŋkhwā vəɨ nɔ yugu. Ndɔ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yi ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ndɔ a chuʼɔ mmu nchuʼɔ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ taoŋ shɨna ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ, a chwīe yie ghɔ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi pɨ̄na vəɨ.
Pəɨ kwiŋ chrà ŋa mi ni nchrā ni pəɨ nɛ, ‘Muuŋ fàʼa shiʼa nchaa Taathɔ vi.’ P̈ugu mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ vəɨ, kaŋ pugu shi mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ. Pugu kaŋ ni nūʼɔŋ chrà a, kaŋ pugu shi nūʼɔŋ yəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ.
Ndɔ pugu shi nchwīe ŋguoŋ nnu pei ghao mbɨŋ pəɨ nthɛ ligi a, nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi nji ŋoŋ ŋa a taoŋ a nɛ.
Ŋka ni mieŋ ki lɔ nthɔ nchrā ni pugu, pi shi kaŋ ndɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu nɔ pa ghaŋ phɨ. Ndɔ ndwɛ pugu lɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo la nɔ māʼaŋ nu nthɛ phɨ yugu.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pɨ̄na a nɛ, pɨ̄na Tǎa a ŋkaa yu.
Ŋka ni mieŋ ki chwīe pa nnu shɨna pugu ŋa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ naa nchwīe nɛ, pi shi kaŋ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu nɔ pa ghaŋ phɨ. Ndɔ ndwɛ pugu yəɨ ndɔ mbɨ̄na vigi Tǎa a.
Ndɔ chrà yei ŋa pi nāʼaŋ moŋ gɨ́ yugu ŋa, ‘Pugu pɨ̄na a ki laʼo yi’, shi ŋguʼɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
“Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgaŋ ghɛ̀rɛ, mbɔ Jijwɛ nnu shini ŋa ǹshi ntaoŋ llɔ mbhɔ Tǎa shi nthɔ nɛ, kaŋ a shi ŋkwe ntie a.
Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ shi ŋkwe ntie a nthɛ ŋa pia pɔ kaʼa llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi.
“Ŋ̀kwo chhu ŋguoŋ nnu pei ni pəɨ nɔ chwīe nu kiʼi pəɨ gū moŋ piŋ.
Pi shi mfuʼu vəɨ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi. Shishini, ndɨɨ chhɔ nthɔ nu ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu shi njwi vəɨ nɛ shi mbīʼi ŋa pugu fāʼa pi mbhɔ Minnwi.
Pugu shi nchwīe pa nnu pei nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ nji Tǎa, ki nji a.
Ndɔ nchhu nnu pei ni pəɨ nnɛ ŋa ndɨɨ yugu gha ŋkāʼo, minthɛ pəɨ kwiŋ ŋa mi ni ŋkwo shwei vəɨ.
“Ǹshini ndɔ nchhu nnu pei ni pəɨ nɔ njɛ̄ yi, nthɛ ŋa pia ni mbɔ kaʼa.
Ndɔ ndwɛ ǹthɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu njəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni ntaoŋ a nɛ, ndɔ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vəɨ lɔ mbie a ŋa, ‘Ɔ ghə̄ɨ pi hɨŋ?’
Ndɔ pəɨ fāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ nthɛ ŋa ǹchhu nnu pei ni pəɨ nɛ.
Mbapa nɛnnɛ, ǹshwei vəɨ ni nnu shini. A pɔ pi shéi ni pəɨ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ. Nthɛ ŋa m̈i mieŋ ki ghə̄ɨ, paʼa ŋgaŋ ghɛ̀rɛ lɔ nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ. Ndɔ m̈i ŋgə̄ɨ, kaŋ ǹshi ntaoŋ vi ni pəɨ.
A shi ŋga nthɔ, kaŋ a shi nshrā ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi paa nthɛ phɨ yugu, pugu pa nnu ndɨndɨ pugu pa nnu sháʼa.
A shi nshrā vugu paa nɔ nnu phɨ, nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ a,
nɔ nnu ndɨndɨ nthɛ ŋa ǹthɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu njəɨ Tǎa, ndɔ mbaʼa pəɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ a ŋkamuʼɔŋ ndwɛ,
nɔ nnu sháʼa, nthɛ ŋa pi shaʼa ŋgaŋ shaʼa mbhi yei.
“Ŋ̀guʼɔ mbɨnɨ mfāʼo ntou nnu nɔ chhu nu ni pəɨ, ndɔ a chaa ghrɨ́ yəɨ nɔ yaʼo nu ndwɛ.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Jijwɛ nnu shini thɔ nɛ, a shi nōoŋ ŋguoŋ nnu shini ghao ni pəɨ, nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi nchrā pi ni thɔ yi, sheshe nnu ŋa a yaʼo nɛ a shi nchhu, ndɔ shwei vəɨ ni pa nnu ŋa a shi nthɔ nɛ.
A shi ŋgaʼo a nthɛ ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ pa yaoŋ ŋa a nyaŋ nɛ nshwei vəɨ.
Ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa Tǎa fāʼo nɛ pɔ pi nyaŋ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹchhu ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ pa yaoŋ ŋa a nyaŋ nɛ nchhu ni pəɨ.
“Nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ, mbaʼa pəɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ a, a gha nuʼuŋ ndara muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ pəɨ pɨnɨ njəɨ a.”
Nɛnnɛ pichəɨ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “A chhu pi ŋa ni pia,
‘Nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ mbaʼa pəɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ a, a gha nuʼuŋ ndara muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ pəɨ pɨnɨ njəɨ a,’
ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchhu ŋa,
‘Nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu njəɨ pi Tǎa’?”
Nnɛ, pugu chhu nu ŋa, “A gha nchhu ŋa,
‘Nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ,’
njiŋ yi pɔ pi ŋa? Pigi lɔ nji nnu ŋa a chhu nu nɛ.”
Jishɔ ni nji ŋa pugu tāʼa nu mbie vi, nnɛ a chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Yei nnu ŋa pəɨ pie noŋ pəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ mbɔ njiŋ nnu ŋa ǹchhu ŋa, ‘Nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ mbaʼa pəɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ a, a gha nuʼuŋ ndara muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ pəɨ pɨnɨ njəɨ a?’
Shishini, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, pəɨ shi ŋkə̄ɨ ndɔ njwei ndɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ. Pəɨ shi mfāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ, ndɔ yuʼɔ njùʼɔ yəɨ kara mbɔ pwanjuʼɔ.
Miŋgwɛ ghà ŋga mbhi nu, mfāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ yi kāʼo, ndɔ ti ndɨɨ ŋa a kwo phi muuŋ ghɔ nɛ, a līʼɛ yúʼɔ ghɔ nthɛ pwanjuʼɔ ŋa pi phi ŋoŋmishua ŋkuoŋ mbhi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ fāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ ndwɛ ndɔ ǹshi mbɨnɨ njəɨ vəɨ pəɨ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ, ndɔ mbaʼa shesheŋoŋ pɨnɨ mfuʼu pwanjuʼɔ yəɨ ghɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Moŋ llɛ́ ghɔ, mbaʼa pəɨ nuʼuŋ mbie sheshe yaoŋ mbhɔ mu, shishini, ǹshwei vəɨ, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ pie mbhɔ Tǎa nɔ ligi a nɛ, a shi mfɛ ni pəɨ.
Ndɔ ti nchəɨŋ ndwɛ, pəɨ shi lɔ mbie sheshe yaoŋ yaʼa nɔ ligi a. P̂əɨ pie kaŋ pəɨ shi mfāʼo nnɛ ŋa pwanjuʼɔ yəɨ lɨnaoŋ.
“Ŋ̀ki kwo chhu nnu pei ni pəɨ pi moŋ chrà luʼɔ, ndɨɨ chhɔ thɔ nu ŋa mbaʼa nuʼuŋ nchrā ni pəɨ pi moŋ chrà luʼɔ, ndɔ shi nchrā chrà shieshie nthɛ Tǎa.
Moŋ llɛ́ ghɔ, pəɨ shi mbie pa nnu nɔ ligi a, ndɔ ǹdɔ njiʼi nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa ǹshi mbie mbhɔ Tǎa nthɛ vəɨ,
Nthɛ ŋa nduthɔ Tǎa ŋkaa yu khwā vəɨ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ khwā a, ndɔ ni mbiŋ ŋa ǹdhɔ mbhɔ Minnwi
Mi ni ndhɔ pi mbhɔ Tǎa nthɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ndwɛ ǹdhɔ nu mieŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi mbɨnɨ nu njəɨ Tǎa.”
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Yo! Ndwɛ ɔ ya nchrā a shie nu ki lɔ mbɔ pi chrà luʼɔ!
Ndwɛ, pigi ji ŋa ɔ ji ŋguoŋ nnu ghao, paʼa ndɔ nuʼuŋ nchēi nu ŋa ŋoŋ pie ghɔ ni pie, a chwīe yie ghɔ pigi piŋ ŋa ɔ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Pəɨ piŋ ndwɛ?
Pəɨ līi njəɨ, ndɨɨ chhɔ nthɔ nu, ndɔ ŋkwo thɔ ŋa pi shi nshāaŋ vəɨ, shesheŋoŋ ghə̄ɨ laʼa yu mieŋ a təʼɨ a. Ndɔ ǹdɔ mbɔ pi təʼɨ a, nthɛ ŋa Tǎa pɔ pigi yu kaʼa.
“Ǹchhu nnu pei ni pəɨ nnɛ ŋa pəɨ shi mfāʼo ghɨghrɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pia kaʼa. Moŋ mbhi yei, pi shi mfɛ wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ. Ndɔ pəɨ fāʼo māʼaŋ ghrɨ́, nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀kwo ghaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga ŋkwo chrā pa nnu pei, mbɨʼɨ ligi yi ndīi po nchhu ŋa,
“Tǎa, ndɨɨ ghɔ kāʼo, ghaʼo muuŋ ghɔ nnɛ ŋa muuŋ ghaʼo ghɔ,
ŋa ɔ fɛ ghrɨ́ ghɔ mbɨŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nɛ, ŋa a fɛ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa ɔ fɛ ghɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ yei pɔ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ, ŋa pugu ji ghɔ mbɔ fiɛŋ taʼa Minnwi shini, ndɔ mbɨnɨ nji Jishɔ Krishto ŋa ɔ taoŋ nɛ.
Mi ni mfɛ ndighaʼo vɛ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ ndɨɨ ŋa mi ni ŋkwo mīʼɛŋ fàʼa ŋa ɔ ni mfɛ vəɨ ŋa m̀fāʼa nɛ.
Ndɔ ndwɛ, ma Tǎa, ghaʼo a shhɨ ghɔ ni ŋkwaŋ ndighaʼo ŋa mi ni mfāʼo pɔgɔ ŋkaoŋ mbhi maa mbɔ nɛ.
“Mi ni nchwīe ŋgwa pɛ ŋa ɔ ni mfɛ vəɨ moŋ mbhi nɛ ji ghɔ. Pugu ni mbɔ jɔ, ɔ fɛ vugu vəɨ, pugu nūʼɔŋ chrà yɔ.
Ndwɛ, pugu ji ŋa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa ɔ ni mfɛ vəɨ nɛ llɔ pi mbhɔ ghɔ.
Mi ni māʼaŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ yɛ ŋa ɔ ni mfɛ vəɨ nɛ ni pugu, pugu piŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ghɔ, ndɔ nji shishini ŋa ǹdhɔ pi mbhɔ ghɔ ndɔ mbiŋ ŋa a taoŋ gɔ̀ ntaoŋ a.
“Ǹthɔ nduoŋ mfɛ nu ni pugu, ǹdɔ njiʼi nduoŋ pi ni ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ǹduoŋ pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa ɔ ni mfɛ vugu vəɨ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pugu jɔ.
Ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa m̀fāʼo nɛ jɔ, ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa ɔ fāʼo nɛ pɔ nyaŋ, pi yəɨ ndighaʼo a ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ pugu.

Ndɔ ndwɛ, ǹthɔ mbɨnɨ nu njəɨ ghɔ, ǹdɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi ŋkuoŋ mbhi, a pugu ŋkuoŋ mbhi. Tǎa ŋa a pɔ taoŋtaoŋ nɛ, nūʼɔŋ vugu ki kàʼa lɔ ŋkēe vugu ni ghrɨ́ ligi yɔ ŋa ɔ fɛ vəɨ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa pugu pɔ taʼa yi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pɔgɔ taʼa yi nɛ.

Nɔ haʼaŋ pigi pugu ni mbɔ nɛ, mi ni ndɨna ni pugu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ghrɨ́ ligi yɔ ŋa ɔ fɛ vəɨ nɛ. Ŋ̀kɛ̄ʼi vugu ti paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu lɔ mbhɛ, ŋkiɛŋ yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni njīʼi ŋa a phɛ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa nnu ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ni ŋkwo chhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
“Ndɔ ndwɛ, ǹthɔ mbɨnɨ nu njəɨ ghɔ, ǹchhu nnu pei ŋkuoŋ mbhi nnɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ a njùʼɔ pugu ti a lɨnaoŋ.
Ŋ̀kwo māʼaŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ yɔ ni pugu, ŋkuoŋ mbhi pɨ̄na vugu nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ mbɔ yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mummu lɔ mbɔ yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi nchhu pi ŋa ɔ fuʼu vugu moŋ mbhi, ǹchhu pi ŋa ɔ kɛ̄ʼi vugu mbhɔ ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ.
Pugu lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mummu lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yi mbhi yei nɛ.
Chuʼɔ vugu nūʼɔŋ nɔ fàʼa yɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nnu shini yɔ, chrà yɔ nnu shini.
Nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ ni ntaoŋ a moŋ mbhi nɛ, a wuʼɔ haʼaŋ mummu taoŋ vugu moŋ mbhi nɛ.
Ǹchuʼɔ noŋ a nūʼɔŋ nɔ fàʼa yɔ nthɛ pi pugu, nnɛ ŋa pinthɛ pi chuʼɔ vugu ŋkaa pugu nūʼɔŋ nɔ fàʼa yɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nnu shini.
“Ǹdɔ ŋguʼɔ nduoŋ pi ni pei təʼɨ vugu, m̀bɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nduoŋ ni pɛ ŋa pugu shi mbiŋ ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ chrà yugu nɛ,
nnɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yugu shi nchīri mbɔ taʼa yi, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ gɔ̀ Tǎa pɔ mbɨŋ mu, mmu nduthɔ a pɔ mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa pugu pɔ mbɨŋ pɔgɔ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋkuoŋ mbhi piŋ ŋa a taoŋ gɔ̀ ntaoŋ a.
“Ndighaʼo ŋa ɔ fɛ vəɨ nɛ m̀fɛ ni pugu, nnɛ ŋa pugu pɔ taʼa yi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pɔgɔ taʼa yi nɛ,
M̀bɔ mbɨŋ pugu ɔ pɔ mbɨŋ mu, nnɛ ŋa pugu ya mbɔ taʼa yi shiʼi, nnɛ ŋa ŋkuoŋ mbhi ji ŋa ɔ taoŋ a ndɔ ŋkhwā vugu wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā a nɛ.
Tǎa, ŋ̀khwā ŋa pugu ŋkaa pugu ŋa ɔ fɛ vəɨ nɛ nshi mbɔ pigi pugu kaʼa lɨʼɨ ŋa m̀bɔ nɛ, nɔ yəɨ nu ndighaʼo a ŋa ɔ fɛ vəɨ nthɛ ŋa ɔ khwā a ŋkaoŋ pi maa nchwīe mbhi nɛ.
“Yo Tǎa ndɨndɨ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi lɔ njiʼi nji ghɔ nɛ, ǹji ghɔ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pei ji ŋa a taoŋ gɔ̀ ntaoŋ a.
Mi ni nchwīe pugu ji ghɔ, ndɔ shi ŋguʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nchwīe nu, nnɛ ŋa khwǎ ŋa ɔ khwā a nɔ ghɔ nɛ, pugu shi mfāʼo, mummu ŋkaa mu pɔ mbɨŋ pugu.”
Jishɔ ni ŋga ŋkwo mīʼɛŋ lúoŋ yei, ntaoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋgə̄ɨ nshāʼa Pɨprəɨ Kidroŋ. Nyìeŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ, Jishɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi nii fɔ.
Judashi, ŋa a ni mfīni Jishɔ nɛ, ni nji lɨʼɨ ghɔ nthɛ ŋa Jishɔ ni njiɛŋ mbāoŋ nu fɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi.

Nnɛ Judashi lɔ̄gɔ kwíe pa shoogɛ Roma, ni pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi ŋa pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi ni ntaoŋ nɛ, pugu pugu ghə̄ɨ moŋ nyīeŋ ghɔ. Pugu ni ntuo truka, pugu pa ŋkiʼa pugu pa maoŋ nchhɔ̀.
Jishɔ gha ŋkwo ji ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ yu nɛ, ntaoŋ nthɔ shhɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ tāʼa pi gɔ̌?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ.”
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A mmu mbɔ ju.”
Judashi, ŋa a ni mfīni vi nɛ, ni nthi fɔ pugu pugu.
Ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“A mmu mbɔ ju nɛ,”
pugu pɨ̄nɨ njiŋnjiŋ ŋgū shhɛ.
Nnɛ Jishɔ pɨnɨ mbie vugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ tāʼa pi gɔ̌?”
Pugu chhu ŋa, “Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ.”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Mi ni ŋkwo chhu ŋa a mmu mbɔ ju. Nnɛ ti p̈əɨ ntāʼa a, pəɨ mieŋ ŋgwa pei ghə̄ɨ.”
Yei nnu ni mbɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa a ni ŋkwo chhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ:
“Shɨna ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa ɔ ni mfɛ vəɨ nɛ, ǹshi lɔ mbhɛ kaŋ taʼa yi fɔ.”
Nnɛ Shemu Pita, ŋa a ni mfāʼo kafa nɛ, shua nche tə́nə muuŋ fàʼa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, tə́nə muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ yaʼa. (Ligi muuŋ fàʼa ghɔ ni mbɔ Maakushi.)
Nnɛ Jishɔ chhu ni Pita ŋa,
“Niʼiŋ kafa yɔ moŋ m̀baʼa yi. Ɔ pīʼi ŋa m̀baʼa njiʼi nnu ndua ŋgəʼɨ yɛ ŋa Tǎa fɛ vəɨ nɛ?”
Nnɛ kwíe pa shoogɛ pighɔ pugu pa thishɨ pugu ni pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi pa ŋgwa Juu wɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ ŋkrao vi,
fǔoŋ ndɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ njəɨ Anaŋ, nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ tǎa ŋgwɛ Kaifa ŋa a ni mbɔ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋgaʼo ghɔ nɛ.
A ni mbɔ Kaifa ŋa a ni ntɨgɨ pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa, “A pwa ŋa taʼa ŋoŋ khu nɔ ligi ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.”
Shemu Pita pugu yichəɨ ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ghə̄ɨ njiŋ Jishɔ. Nthɛ ŋa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni nja nji yie taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ shiʼi nɛ, a nii moŋ yɨna Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ.
Ndɔ Pita thi pi chonda mbhi. Nnɛ yɛ ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ŋa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni nji vi nɛ taoŋ mbhi nchrā pugu yɛ muuŋ miŋgwɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ choŋkaʼa nɛ, ndɔ̄gɔ Pita nii ni ju.
Muuŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ ŋa a ni mfāʼa nu choŋkaʼa nɛ chhu ni Pita ŋa, “Gɔ̀ ŋkaa ghɔ lɔ mbɔ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ ŋoŋ yinɛ?”
Pita chhu ŋa, “Ndɔ mbɔ taʼa yi.”
Ndwɛ puoŋ fàʼa pugu pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi ni frə̄ɨ móŋoŋ nthi fɔ njɨgɔ nu nthɛ ŋa fɨgəɨ ni mbɔ. Pita ni mbɔ pugu pugu nthi fɔ nthɔ njɨgɔ nu ŋkaa yu.
Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pie Jishɔ ni pa pie nthɛ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pugu pa nnu ŋa a ni njɛʼi nu nɛ.
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ŋ̀ga ŋguʼɔ nchrā pi lɨʼɨ wo ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao. Ŋ̀ga ŋguʼɔ njɛʼi moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi pugu pa Nda Minnwi lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋguoŋ pa Juu ghà ŋkɨrɨ nɛ. Ǹdɔ njiʼi nchrā sheshe nnu pi lə̄ɨŋ.
Ti ɔ pie a pi ŋa? Pie ni ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni njaʼo nnu ŋa mi ni njɛʼi nu nɛ, pugu ji nnu ŋa mi ni nchhu nɛ.”
A ni ŋga nchhu nnu pei, yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi wie Jishɔ ni mbhɔ yi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Yinɛ haʼaŋ pi ghà ŋkhwɛ̄ nnu ni taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɛ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ mieŋ ki kāʼo, ɔ chhu nɛ ntəɨ ghɔ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pei hɛiŋ. Ndɔ ti ä mbɔ ŋa nnu ŋa ǹchhu nɛ kāʼo, ɔ wie kiʼɛ ŋa?”
Anaŋ taoŋ vi kiʼɛ, a wuʼɔ mbɔ moŋ ŋkɨɨ, ni Kaifa mbɔ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ.
Shemu Pita ni ŋguʼɔ ntithi fɔ nthɔ njɨgɔ móŋoŋ. Nnɛ pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Gɔ̀ ŋkaa ghɔ lɔ mbɔ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ ŋoŋ vinɛ?”
A lāa nchhu ŋa, “Ndɔ mbɔ taʼa yi.”
Yichəɨ taʼa muuŋ fàʼa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, mbɔ ndaaŋoŋ ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa Pita ni njaʼa tə́nə yi nɛ pie ŋa, ǹshini ndɔ njəɨ ghɔ moŋ nyìeŋ pəɨ yu?
Pita pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ndāa ŋkamuʼɔŋ. Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, miŋkəʼɨ khwɛ.

Ŋkiɛŋ ni muuŋ tutuʼu, pugu lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ llɔ nda Kaifa ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ntuʼɔ mmɛ ŋgaŋ shaʼa lɨʼɨ. Nduthɔ yugu shini ndɔ nii ntuʼɔ mmɛ ŋgaŋ shaʼa lɨʼɨ ghɔ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pugu fuo noŋ yugu nji ŋa mimfɛ pugu jɨ Lli Njiʼa.
Nnɛ Pailɛ taoŋ mbhi njəɨ vugu mbie ŋa, “Pəɨ wɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ vei ŋa a fāaŋ pi khɔ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei kaŋ mieŋ ki thɔ nchwīe pi phɨ, pigi shi kaŋ ndɔ ndɔ̄gɔ vi nthɔ mfɛ vɛ.”
Pailɛ chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ vi ni noŋ yəɨ nshaʼa vi ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ yəɨ chhu nɛ.”
Pa Juu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pi lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ ŋa pigi jwi shesheŋoŋ.”
Yei nnu ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa nnu ŋa Jishɔ ni nchhu nɛ nnu shini ndɨɨ ŋa a ni nshwei ŋkwaŋ gu ŋa a shi ŋkhu nɛ.
Nnɛ Pailɛ pɨnɨ nii ntuʼɔ yu, mɛ̄iŋ Jishɔ mbie ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ fùoŋ pa Juu?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Yei pie llɔ pi mbɔ ghɔ ki a chhu pichəɨ ŋgwa vɛ nnɛ nthɛ a?”
Pailɛ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ɔ pīʼi ŋa m̀bɔ pi ŋoŋ Juu? Ŋgwa laʼa pəɨ pugu pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ chaʼa ghɔ mfɛ vəɨ. Ɔ chwīe pi nɛiŋ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,

“Shaʼafuoŋ a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei. Shaʼafuoŋ a kaŋ ni mbɔ pi yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ paŋ kaŋ nthɔ ŋgwie ŋkrɔ̀, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pi chaʼa a mfɛ ni thishɨ pa ŋgwa Juu. Njɨ a nɔ shaʼa nu lɔ ndhɔ pi ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ.”
Nnɛ Pailɛ chhu ghɔ kiʼɛ ŋa, “Yie nōoŋ ŋa ɔ fùoŋ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ɔ chhu ŋa a mmu mbɔ fùoŋ. Yei nnu ŋa pi ni mbhi a nɔ nɛ, yei nnu ŋa ǹthɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei nɔ nɛ, nɔ pɔ nu miŋkwentie nɔ nnu shini. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a yi nnu shini nɛ ghà njwɛrɛ nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ.”
Pailɛ pie ghɔ ŋa, “Nnu shini pɔ pi khɔ?”
Pailɛ ni ŋga nchhu nnu yei, ntaoŋ mbhi mbara pa ŋgwa Juu nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Ndɔ njəɨ fàŋ ŋoŋ vei.
Ndɔ pəɨ fāʼo nùʼɔŋ ŋa ŋ̀ga ŋguʼɔ nchuʼɔ taʼa ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ ndɨɨ Lli Njiʼa. Nnɛ pəɨ tāʼa nu ŋa nchuʼɔ fùoŋ pa ŋgwa Juu mfɛ ni pəɨ?”
Pugu chhu ni njɨ ŋa, “Paʼa ndɔ mbɔ pi ŋoŋ vei, mbɔ pi Baraba.” Baraba ni mbɔ ŋgɨna minwi.
Nnɛ Pailɛ lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ ŋgwie vi ni ŋgwàŋ.
Pa shoogɛ paʼa ndiʼi minduandua nɔ ŋkie, nūʼɔŋ thɔ yu, māʼaŋ pɨ̀rɨ mbɨŋ yu.
Pugu thɔ njəɨ vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Pigi ghɨnɔ ghɔ ma fùoŋ pa Juu!” Ndɔ ŋgwie vi ni mbhɔ yugu.
Pailɛ pɨnɨ ntaoŋ mbhi ŋkamuʼɔŋ nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Njəɨ, ǹtaoŋ nu ni ju mbhi mfɛ ni pəɨ nnɛ ŋa pəɨ ji ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi njəɨ sheshe fàŋ ŋa a chwīe.”
Nɛnnɛ Jishɔ taoŋ mbhi ni ŋkie minduandua thɔ yu ni pɨ̀rɨ mbɨŋ yu. Pailɛ chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ līi njəɨ, ŋoŋ ghɔ pɔ nɛiŋ!”
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi ni ŋga njəɨ vi, mbaʼo ŋgòu ni njɨ ŋa, “Kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa!”
Pailɛ chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ vi ni noŋ yəɨ ŋkwiŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi njəɨ sheshe nnu ŋa a fāaŋ.”
Pa ŋgwa Juu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi fāʼo gɨ́, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ gɨ́ ghɔ chhu nɛ, a nōoŋ ŋa a fāʼo nɔ khu nu nthɛ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ noŋ yi ŋa a Muuŋ Minnwi.”
Pailɛ ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, mbɨnɨ ŋkaa pɔgɔ pɔgɔ mbīgi.
Mbɨnɨ nii moŋ ntuʼɔ mbie Jishɔ ŋa, “Ɔ llɔ pi hɨŋ?” Ndɔ paʼa Jishɔ lɔ ŋkhwɛ̄.
Nnɛ Pailɛ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ ntāʼa nu nchrā vəɨ, ɔ lɔ nji ŋa m̀fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chuʼɔ nu ghɔ, mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ kwīŋ nu ghɔ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ fāʼo ghrɨ́ mbɨŋ mu ŋguʼɔ nthɛ pi ŋa a fɛ Minnwi vɛ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a chaʼa a mfɛ vɛ nɛ fāʼo ju mmɛ phɨ.”
Jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ghɔ, Pailɛ taʼa pa shɛndaoŋ nɔ chuʼɔ nu vi. Ndɔ pa Juu paʼo ŋgòu ŋa, “Ɔ̈ nchuʼɔ vi, kaŋ ɔ lɔ mbɔ taannu Kaisha. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ noŋ yi ŋa a fùoŋ nɛ tɨnɨ pi thɔ ni Kaisha.”
Nnɛ ndɨɨ ŋa Pailɛ ni njaʼo yei chrà nɛ, a lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ ntaoŋ nɔ mbhi, nchɔchhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ sháʼa yi nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni lɨʼɨ nūʼɔŋ ni ŋgùʼɔ nɛ (mbɔ moŋ chrà Hibru ŋa Gabata).
A ni mbɔ llɛ́ pīri nu noŋ nɔ jɨ nu Lli Njiʼa. A ni mbɔ moŋ ntuŋ minaoŋ. Pailɛ chhu ni pa Juu ŋa, “Pəɨ līi njəɨ, fùoŋ vəɨ pɔ nɛiŋ!”
Pugu paʼo ŋgòu ni njɨ ŋa, “Jwi vi jwi, kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa!”
Pailɛ pie vugu ŋa, “Ŋ̀kwīŋ fùoŋ vəɨ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa?”
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pigi lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yichəɨ fùoŋ ŋkiɛŋ Kaisha.”
Nnɛ, a chaʼa vi mfɛ ni pugu ŋa pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Nnɛ pugu lɔ̄gɔ Jishɔ,
a taoŋ mbhi ntiɛŋ wáʼa yi ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ŋa Lɨʼɨ Kwéi Thɔ, ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ moŋ chrà Hibru ŋa Gogota nɛ.
Pugu kwīŋ vi fɔ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa pugu pa pichəɨ paa ŋgwa, taʼa yi nɔ sheshe ŋgei mbhɔ yi, Jishɔ pɔ titri pugu.
Pailɛ nāʼaŋ yaoŋ ŋkwiŋ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa yi. Yaoŋ ghɔ ni mbɔ ŋa, “Jishɔ lɔ Nasharɛ, mbɔ Fùoŋ pa Juu.”
Ntou pa ŋgwa Juu ni mɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ yei, nthɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ Jishɔ nɛ ni mbara moŋ laʼa ndɔ pi ni nāʼaŋ moŋ chrà Hibru ni chrà Latiŋ ni chrà Gri.
Nnɛ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pa Juu chhu ni Pailɛ ŋa, “Kiʼi nāʼaŋ ŋa, ‘Fùoŋ pa Juu,’ ka nāʼaŋ pi ŋa, ‘Ŋoŋ vei ni nchhu ŋa, A mmu mbɔ Fùoŋ pa Juu.’ ”
Pailɛ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Yaoŋ ŋa ŋ̀kwo nāʼaŋ nɛ, ŋ̀kwo nāʼaŋ.”

Pa shoogɛ ni ŋga ŋkwīŋ Jishɔ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, ndɔ̄gɔ mmɛ ndhwí fɨgəɨ yi nshāa a taoŋ khwɛ lɨʼɨ, sheshe taʼa shoogɛ fāʼo taʼa pra yi. Mbɨnɨ ndɔ̄gɔ ndhwí ŋa a ni māʼaŋ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, paʼa lɨʼɨ yōu lɔ mbɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ, pi ni ntuŋ a pɔ pi taʼa pra yi llɔ thɔ ghɔ nshwiʼi fɛ nɔ laʼo yi.

Nɛnnɛ pugu chhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Kiʼi pia shāa, pia ka māʼaŋ pi yaoŋ nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa a shi mbɔ yi gɔ̌?” Yei ni mbɔ nɔ chwīe nu Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa a chhu ŋa, “Pugu ni ŋgrā mmɛ ndhwí fɨgəɨ a shɨna pugu, māʼaŋ yaoŋ shhɛ nɔ jɨ nu muuŋ ndhwí a,” nnɛ pa shoogɛ pighɔ chwīe nnu pei.
Ndɔ mǔuŋ Jishɔ pugu ndǐŋ mǔuŋ vi, ni Meri ŋgwɛ Klopa, Meri Madaliŋ ni nthi fɔ yəɨ wáʼa Jishɔ.
Jishɔ ni ŋga njəɨ mǔuŋ vi, pugu ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi yɛ ŋa ju Jishɔ ni ŋkhwā vi nɛ thi fɔ. A chhu ni mǔuŋ vi ŋa,
“Ma, līi njəɨ, a muuŋ ghɔ!”
Nnɛ nchhu ni ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi ghɔ ŋa,
“A mǔuŋ ghɔ.”
Jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi ghɔ lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ nda yu.
Jishɔ ni nji ndwɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ nnu kwo mmɛ, nchhu ŋa (nɔ chwīe nu chrà Minnwi pɔ nnu shini),
“Njùʼɔ a yaoŋ.”
Mikei làʼo chəchɨgəɨ ni nthi fɔ, nnɛ pugu lɔ̄gɔ kusha nchru moŋ làʼo ghɔ, nshhɔ̄ thɔ muuŋ thɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni haisho nɛ, ŋkə̄rə nūʼɔŋ nɔ nchò yi.
Jishɔ gha nnu làʼo chəchɨgəɨ ghɔ, nchhu ŋa,
“A mmɛ nɛ!”
Ntuʼu thɔ yi shhɛ Jijwɛ yi taoŋ.

Nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ Llɛ́ pīri nu noŋ nɛ, nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa khu yugu lɔ ŋkɨna ŋkuoŋ wáʼa llɛ́ Ji (mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ Llɛ́ Ji nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ Llɛ́ jɨ Lli Njiʼa) nɛ, pa Juu pie Pailɛ ŋa pi pəʼɨ kwò muŋu, nshwiʼi khu yugu ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Nnɛ pa shoogɛ thɔ mbəʼɨ kwò fǔoŋ yi pugu vichəɨ ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ vugu pugu nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga nchəɨŋ mbɨŋ Jishɔ, njəɨ ŋa a kwo khu, paʼa ndɔ nuʼuŋ mbəʼɨ kwò yi.
Ndɔ taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna pa shoogɛ pighɔ chwɛ̄ʼi mbru yi ni khwǎ, chhǐ pugu pa ŋkhǐ taoŋ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni njəɨ nnu yei lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ ni nchrā nthɛ nnu ghɔ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ nthɛ pəɨ piŋ. Nnu ŋa a ni nchhu nɛ nnu shini, a ji ŋa a chrā pi nnu shini.
Pa nnu pei ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa chrà Minnwi pɔ yi nnu shini ŋa: “Mbaʼa pi yiʼi mbəʼɨ kaŋ taʼa kwéi yi.”
Yichəɨ lɨʼɨ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi pɨnɨ nchhu ŋa, “Pugu shi ndīi ŋoŋ ŋa pugu chwɛ̄ʼi nɛ.”

Pa nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Joshɛ llɔ Arimatia, ŋa a ni mbɔ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ moŋ njiŋ nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔgɔ pa Juu nɛ, luoŋ ni Pailɛ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ khu Jishɔ. Pailɛ piŋ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ. Nnɛ a thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ khu Jishɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ.
Nikodemu ŋkaa yu, ŋa a ni ŋkwo fǔoŋ nthɔ njəɨ Jishɔ ni tuʼu nɛ, thɔ ni laminda ŋa pi nyaŋ ni yichəɨ yaoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni məə pugu aloe nɛ, a pou yaoŋ mbɔ ghrà kilu.
Nnɛ pugu lɔ̄gɔ khu Jishɔ, ndiŋ moŋ mbhɔ ndhwí fhu ni laminda ghɔ nɔ haʼaŋ nùʼɔŋ pa Juu pɔ nɛ.
Yichəɨ nyìeŋ ni mbɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ Jishɔ fɔ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nɛ, chəɨ fúŋ fhi ŋa pi fīʼi moŋ ŋguʼɔ ni mbɔ fɔ, ŋa pi lɔ naa ma ntwei ŋoŋ fɔ.
Nnɛ nthɛ nnu Pīri nu noŋ pa Juu, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋa fúŋ ghɔ ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ, pugu twei vi fɔ.
Moŋ fǔoŋ llɛ́ moŋ shwiʼi taŋ ghɔ mbɔ Shonde ni muuŋ tutuʼu, mbhi wuʼɔ njo shini nu, Meri Madaliŋ ghə̄ɨ chofuŋ njəɨ ŋa pi kwo kə̄nə ŋgùʼɔ chofuŋ ghɔ mbɨʼɨ.
Nɛnnɛ a tei ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ Shemu Pita pugu yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ŋa Jishɔ khwā nɛ, nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pi fuʼu khu Taathɔ moŋ fúŋ, paʼa pigi lɔ nji lɨʼɨ yɛ ŋa pi nūʼɔŋ vi nɛ!”
Nnɛ Pita taoŋ mbhi pugu yichəɨ ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ghɔ, ŋgə̄ɨ nu chofuŋ.
Ŋguoŋ vugu pi paa ni ntei nu, ndɔ yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ghɔ tei mfərə Pita fǔoŋ ju nchəɨŋ chofuŋ.
A ni ŋga ntuʼu noŋ yi mbɛʼi moŋ fúŋ, njəɨ ndhwí fhu ghɔ nūaŋ fɔ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nii moŋ ghɔ.
Nɛnnɛ Shemu Pita thɔ mbara vi nii moŋ fúŋ. A ni njəɨ ndhwí fhu ghɔ nūaŋ fɔ,
pugu pa ndhwí pūoŋ ligi ŋa a ni mbɔ nɔ thɔ Jishɔ nɛ, paʼa lɔ nūaŋ pi pugu pa ndhwí fhu ghɔ, pi para vi para nūʼɔŋ lɨʼɨ təʼɨ vi.
Nnɛ yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yɛ ŋa a ni fǔoŋ ju nchəɨŋ chofuŋ nɛ nii moŋ ghɔ ŋkaa yu. Njəɨ ndɔ mbiŋ,
ndɔ paʼa thɔ yugu lɔ naa nshie ni chrà Minnwi yɛ ŋa a chhu ŋa a shi ŋguʼɔ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu nɛ.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ pighɔ pɨ̄nɨ laʼa pugu.
Ndɔ Meri tithi chofuŋ ŋkə̄ɨ nu, nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkə̄ɨ nu nɛ, ntuʼu noŋ yi ndīi moŋ fúŋ
njəɨ paa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, pugu māʼaŋ ndhwí fhu, pugu chhɔ nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi ni nūʼɔŋ khu Jishɔ nɛ, taʼa yi nɔ thɔ yi, taʼa yi nɔ kwò yi.
Pugu pie vi ŋa, “Ma, ɔ kə̄ɨ pi khɔ?”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pi lɔ̄gɔ Taathɔ a ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ, ndɔ paʼa ǹdɔ nji lɨʼɨ ŋa pi nūʼɔŋ vi nɛ!”
A gha ŋkwo chhu yei nnu, ŋkara njəɨ Jishɔ a tithi, ndɔ paʼa a lɔ nji ŋa a Jishɔ.
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ma, ɔ kə̄ɨ pi khɔ? Ɔ tāʼa pi gɔ̌?”
A pīʼi nu ŋa a ŋgaŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, a mbɔ ŋa ɔ fuʼu vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ, ɔ shwei a ni lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ nūʼɔŋ vi nɛ, kaŋ ǹshi ndɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Meri.”
A kara nchhu ghɔ moŋ chrà Hibru ŋa, “Raboni.” (Njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa Masha.)
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Kiʼi nuʼuŋ mbaŋ a
, nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ naa ŋkuʼɔ njəɨ Tǎa a yaʼa. Ndɔ ghə̄ɨ njəɨ pa lǐŋ
paŋ nchhu ni pugu ŋa ǹchhɔ ŋkuʼɔ nu njəɨ Tǎa a mbɨnɨ mbɔ Tǎa vəɨ, Minnwi a mbɨnɨ mbɔ Minnwi yəɨ.”
Meri Madaliŋ ghə̄ɨ nchīi ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa, “Ǹjəɨ Taathɔ!” -pugu pa ŋa a ni nchhu nnu pei ghɔ.
A ni mbɔ ni fanaoŋ, moŋ fǔoŋ llɛ́ moŋ shwiʼi taŋ ghɔ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi kɨrɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ moŋ nda fɨ̄nɨ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ mbɔgɔ pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu. Jishɔ thɔ nthi shhɨ pugu nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ghɨghrɨ pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ.”
A ni ŋga ŋkwo chhu yei, nōoŋ mbhɔ mi pugu pa mbru yi ni pugu. Nnɛ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ Taathɔ vugu nɛ.
Jishɔ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchhu ni pugu ŋkamuʼɔŋ ŋa,
“Ghɨghrɨ pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ. Nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa taoŋ a nɛ, nɛnnɛ ǹtaoŋ vəɨ.”
A ni ŋga kwo chhu yei nnu, njwɛ̄ mbɨŋ pugu nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ kwe Jijwɛ Minnwi.
P̈əɨ ndīʼɛ phɨ shesheŋoŋ, kaŋ pi liʼɛ. Ti pəɨ mieŋ ki liʼɛ, kaŋ pi lɔ njiʼi ndīʼɛ.”
Taʼa paanchrɔ ghɔ, ligi yi pɔ Toma, ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa kəʼɨ nɛ, shini ndɔ mbɔ pugu pugu ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ ni nthɔ nɛ.
Nnɛ pichəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ shwei vi ŋa, “Pigi yəɨ Taathɔ.”
Ndɔ a chhu ni pugu ŋa, “M̈i mieŋ ki lɔ njəɨ chhɨ nthɨ nɔ mbhɔ yi ti niʼiŋ muuŋshɨmbhɔ a nɔ chhɨ nthɨ pighɔ mbɨnɨ nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ a nɔ mbru yi paʼa ǹdɔ ma mbiŋ.”
A gha ndaʼa fúoŋ llɛ́, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi pɔ moŋ nda ŋkamuʼɔŋ Toma pɔ pugu pugu. Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ chonda ni mbɔ yi fɨ̄nɨ nɛ, Jishɔ thɔ nthi shɨna pugu nchhu ŋa,
“Ghɨghrɨ pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ.”
Nnɛ nchhu ni Toma ŋa,
“Niʼiŋ muuŋshɨmbhɔ yɔ hɛiŋ ndɔ ndīi mbhɔ a njəɨ, fɛ mbhɔ yɔ nūʼɔŋ nɔ mbru a. Mieŋ fāʼo nu khuthɔ fɔ, mfāʼo piŋ.”
Toma khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Taathɔ a, ndɔ mbɔ Minnwi a!”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ piŋ nthɛ ŋa ɔ yəɨ a nɛ? Mbɔrɔ yi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu piŋ ndɔ ki lɔ njəɨ yəɨ nɛ.”
Jishɔ ni nōoŋ ntou pichəɨ pa lì shhɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi, ŋa pi lɔ nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei;
Ndɔ pi nāʼaŋ pei nnɛ ŋa mimfɛ pəɨ piŋ ŋa Jishɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi pugu pa ŋa moŋ piŋ nu mi minthɛ pəɨ fāʼo chɔmbhi.
Pa nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Jishɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi ni pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ Tiberia. Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni nōoŋ noŋ yi nɛ.
Shemu Pita pugu Toma (ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni kəʼɨ nɛ), ni Natania llɔ Kanaŋ moŋ Galili mbɔ puoŋ Shebedi, pugu pa pichəɨ paa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ni mbɔ kaʼa.
Shemu Pita chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Ŋgə̄ɨ pi ŋgunu.”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pia shi ŋgə̄ɨ kaʼa.” Pugu taoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nii moŋ kikuoŋ, ndɔ ni tuʼu ghɔ paʼa pugu lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mbhi ni ndaŋ nu nɛ, Jishɔ thi ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ. Ndɔ paʼa pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi lɔ njiʼi nji ŋa a ni mbɔ pi Jishɔ.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pa puoŋ paŋ, pəɨ fāʼo sheshe shhu?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Ŋga.”
A chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ māʼaŋ ndáŋ nɔ ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ kikuoŋ, kaŋ pəɨ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ pichəɨ.”
Nɛnnɛ, pugu māʼaŋ, a shini ndɔ njiʼi njiʼɛ nɔ shūu nu ndáŋ ghɔ niʼiŋ moŋ kikuoŋ nthɛ fɨʼɨ shhu ŋa a ni mbɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.

Yie ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ ŋa Jishɔ ni ŋkhwā vi nɛ chhu kiʼɛ ni Pita ŋa, “A Taathɔ!” Shemu Pita ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa a Taathɔ, ndɔ̄gɔ mmɛ ndhwí yi māʼaŋ nthɛ ŋa a ni nshrāo nɔ fāʼa nu fàʼa, a ni ndhi nchəɨŋ ŋkhǐ ntaoŋ nu mbhi.

Pichəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ nduoŋ taoŋ yugu mbhi pi moŋ kikuoŋ, nthɔ nshūu ndáŋ yɛ ŋa a ni ndɨnaoŋ ni shhu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ nɛ shini ndɔ nshɨga nɔ nchəɨŋ nu mbhi. A ni mbɔ yaoŋ nɔ taʼa ŋkɨɨ kwo.
Pugu ni ŋga ntaoŋ nchəɨŋ mbhi, njəɨ móŋoŋ ŋa pi frə̄ɨ ni shhu ŋkuoŋ ghɔ pugu pa brɛi.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ thɔ ni pichəɨ shhu ŋa pəɨ wuʼɔ ŋka wɛ̄iŋ wɛ̄iŋ nɛ.”

Nnɛ Shemu Pita kuʼɔ moŋ pie, nshūu ndáŋ ghɔ ntaoŋ nɔ mbhi, mɛmmɛ shhu lɨnaoŋ moŋ ghɔ. Pa shhu pighɔ ni mbɔ taʼa ŋkɨɨ ni tiɛŋ wuŋ ni ndigi yi trɛi. Njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pa shhu pighɔ ni njiɛŋ, ndáŋ ghɔ shini ndɔ nshāa.
Jishɔ chhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ thɔ njɨ maoŋ.”
Ndɔ paʼa yichəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi lɔ mōoŋ mbie vi ŋa, “Ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌?” Nthɛ ŋa pugu ni nji ŋa a Taathɔ.
Jishɔ thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ brɛi ghɔ pugu pa shhu mfɛ ni pugu.
Ndwɛ ni mbɔ ŋgɛ́ yi trɛi ŋa Jishɔ ni nōoŋ noŋ yi ni ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ŋkwo kuʼɔ moŋ gu nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ jɨ nu maoŋ, Jishɔ chhu ni Shemu Pita ŋa,
“Shemu, muuŋ Jouŋ, ɔ khwā a nchaa nɔ haʼaŋ pei ŋgwa khwā a nɛ?”
A chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ooŋ, ma Taathɔ, ɔ ji ŋa ŋ̀khwā ghɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Kugwi puoŋ minjɨɨ paŋ.”
A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchhu ghɔ mbra ŋgɛ́ ŋa,
“Shemu, muuŋ Jouŋ, ɔ khwā a?”
A chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ooŋ, ma Taathɔ, ɔ ji ŋa ŋ̀khwā ghɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Kɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ paŋ.”
A pɨnɨ nchhu ghɔ a pɔ trɛi ŋgɛ́ ŋa,
“Shemu, muuŋ Jouŋ, ɔ khwā a?”
Njùʼɔ Pita pəʼɨ nthɛ ŋa a chhu ghɔ a pɔ trɛi ŋgɛ́ ŋa, “Ɔ khwā a?” A chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ ji ŋguoŋ nnu ghao, ɔ ji ŋa ŋ̀khwā ghɔ.”
Jishɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Kugwi minjɨɨ paŋ.

Shishini, ǹchhu vɛ ŋa, ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ ni mbɔ mikəʼɨ nɛ, ɔ ni nthɔ māʼaŋ ndhwí yɔ ŋgə̄ɨ sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ tāʼa nu nɛ. Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ lūnu nɛ, ɔ shwīi mbhɔ yɔ ŋoŋ nduoŋ māʼaŋ ndhwí yɔ, ndɔ̄gɔ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ lɔ ntāʼa nu nɛ.”
(A ni nchhu yei nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋkwaŋ gu ŋa a shi ŋkhu nɔ ghaʼo nu Minnwi nɛ.) Jishɔ ni ŋga nchhu yei mīʼɛŋ nchhu ŋa,
“Yōu njiŋ a.”
Pita kara ligi yi njəɨ yɛ taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ ŋa Jishɔ ni ŋkhwā nɛ thɔ nu njiŋ pugu. Mbɔ yɛ ŋa a ni nchhɔ njɨ maoŋ yəɨ yu ŋkuoŋ taprɛi, ni nchhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, a gɔ̌ ŋa a shi fīni ghɔ?”
Pita ni ŋga njəɨ vi, nchhu ni Jishɔ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ti ŋoŋ vei nɛ?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa,
“M̈i ntāʼa nu ŋa a kɨna yi maoŋ ti ǹshi nuʼuŋ mbɨnɨ, ɔ fɛ̄ʼi khɔ yɔ nɔ ghɔ? Ndɔ ni gɔ̀, thɔ njōu njiŋ a!”
Nnɛ pa chrà nyīeŋ nu shɨna pa lǐŋ
ŋa, mbaʼa taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ yi vei khu. Ndɔ ti Jishɔ shini ndɔ nchhu ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi ŋkhu. A ni nchhu pi ŋa,
“M̈i ŋkhwā ŋa a kɨna yi maoŋ ti ǹshi nuʼuŋ nthɔ ɔ fɛ̄ʼi khɔ yɔ nɔ?”
Yei ni mbɔ ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ yɛ ŋa a thɔ nchhu nnu pei nɛ, ndɔ nāʼaŋ nnu pei nɛ, ndɔ pia ji ŋa nnu ŋa a chhu nɛ nnu shini.
Ntou pa pichəɨ nnu ni mbɔ fɔ ŋa Jishɔ ni nchwīe. A kaŋ mbɔ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ pa nnu pighɔ pa taʼa taʼa, paʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi lɔ mfāʼo lɨʼɨ nūʼɔŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yɛ ŋa pi shi nāʼaŋ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Acts: Moŋ fǔoŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ, ma Tiofilu, ŋki nāʼaŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa Jishɔ ni nchwīe ndɔ ntɨgɨ nɛ,
ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ki lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋkuʼɔ nɔ po nɛ. Ŋkaoŋ pi maa ŋkuʼɔ ni ju po, moŋ njɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi, a fɛ gɨ́ ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi ŋa a ni nchuʼɔ nɛ.

A ni ŋga ŋkwo yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ ti ŋkhu ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu, nōoŋ noŋ yi ni pugu nɔ khwɛ wuŋ llɛmbhi ntou ndɨɨ moŋ pa shɛndaoŋ ŋa a ni nōoŋ ki khuthɔ lɔ mbɔ ŋa a yi maoŋ. Pugu ni njəɨ vi, a chrà ni pugu nthɛ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.
Pugu pugu ni ŋga mbɔ taʼa lɨʼɨ, a fɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa,
“Kiʼi pəɨ lɔllɔ Jerushalɛiŋ, pəɨ kɨna fɔ njwɛrɛ fɛ́ yɛ ŋa ŋki shwei vəɨ nɔ nɛ, fɛ́ ŋa Tǎa a ni ŋkāʼa nɛ.
Kwe ŋkhǐ Jouŋ ni mbɔ pi yi moŋ ŋkhǐ, ndɔ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ, pəɨ shi mfāʼo kwe ŋkhǐ moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi.”
Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ni ŋga mbɔ taʼa lɨʼɨ pugu pa Jishɔ, pugu pie vi ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ shi nduʼu shaʼafuoŋ ndwɛ mbhɔ Ishrae?”
Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pəɨ lɔ mfāʼo nɔ ji nu ndɨɨ ki llɛ́ ŋa Tǎa nūʼɔŋ pi ni ji njɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ pəɨ shi mfāʼo ghrɨ́ ndɨɨ ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi shwiʼi mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ. Pəɨ shi mbɔ pa miŋkwentie paŋ llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ, pugu pa moŋ Judia ni Shamaria, ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ ndugwi mbhi.”
A ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ chhu nu nnu pei, Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋkuʼɔ ni ju po, ti a nuʼuŋ mbhɛ ligi pugu moŋ lúluŋ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋguʼɔ mbɛʼi po nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, ŋga njəɨ nu, paa ŋgwa thi yəɨ pugu moŋ ndhwí fhu,
nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Ŋgwa Galili, pəɨ thi hɛiŋ mbɛʼi pi khɔ po? Jishɔ vei ŋa pi lɔ̄gɔ vi ligi pəɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɔ po nɛ, shi ndɛ mbɨnɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ vi a ghə̄ɨ po nɛ!”
Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pɨ̄nɨ Jerushalɛiŋ lɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Olive nɛ, mbɔ nɔ taʼa ŋkaŋ kwò llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Pugu ni ŋga nii fɔ, ŋkuʼɔ moŋ njiɛŋ nda tɔthɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pugu ni ndaʼa nu nɛ. Pugu ni mbɔ:
Ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pei ni mbɔ ni taʼaŋggi nthɔ nduoŋ Minnwi pugu pa pichəɨ piŋgɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋgɛ̄rɛ Jishɔ nɛ, ni Meri mǔuŋ Jishɔ pugu pa lǐŋ pi pi pimbia.
Moŋ llɛ́ pighɔ Pita lɔllɔ ntithi shɨna taʼa ŋkɨɨ ni pa wuŋ ghaŋ piŋ, nchhu ŋa,
“Lǐŋ paŋ! A ni mbie ŋa nchò Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chəɨŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi ni ŋkāoŋ Devi a nāʼaŋ nthɛ Judashi ŋa a ni ŋgə̄ɨ nōoŋ Jishɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ nu ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɛ.
Judashi ni mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ via, nthɛ ŋa pi ni nchuʼɔ vi ŋkaa yu ŋa a fāʼa pia pugu.”
A ni njuoŋ shhɛ ni pe ŋa pi ni mfɛ ghɔ nthɛ mbha nnu pɨphɨ yi nɛ, ndhɔ tɔthɨ ŋgū mfūŋ ni thɔ yi, nshɨna titri, maoŋ puŋ pi taoŋ.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Jerushalɛiŋ ni njaʼo nnu ghɔ, nɛnnɛ mɛ̄iŋ shhɛ ghɔ moŋ chrà laʼa yugu ŋa Hakɛldama njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa, “Shhɛ Chhǐ.”
Pita chhu ŋa, “Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Ŋkhǐ ŋa, ‘Nda yi kuʼɔ fùŋ. Kiʼi ŋoŋ ma ndaʼa fɔ.’ Pi pɨnɨ nāʼaŋ ŋa, ‘Ŋoŋ nduoŋ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ yi.’
Nnɛ, a pie ŋa pia chuʼɔ taʼa ŋoŋ mbīgi mbɨŋ pia, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni mbɔ pia pugu jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ŋa pia pa Jishɔ Taathɔ ni nyīeŋ nu kaʼa nɛ,

mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa pia pugu ni mbɔ jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ŋa Jouŋ ni nthɔ mfɛ ŋkhǐ ni ŋgwa nɛ, ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni mfuʼu Jishɔ ghɔ shɨna pia ŋkuʼɔ nɔ po nɛ. Pia pa ŋoŋ vei pɔ pa ghaŋ kwentie ŋa Jishɔ ni mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu.”
Nnɛ pugu tɛrɛ Joshɛ, mbɔ Bashaba ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Jushitu nɛ, mbɨnɨ ntɛrɛ Matia.
Nduoŋ Minnwi nchhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, ɔ ji njùʼɔ shesheŋoŋ. Nōoŋ yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa ɔ chuʼɔ shɨna paa ŋgwa pei nɛ,
ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ fàʼa Judashi nɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ŋa a ni ŋkhu mieŋ ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni mbie ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nɛ.”
Pugu māʼaŋ yaoŋ nɔ ji nu ŋoŋ ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ nɛ, a gū mbɨŋ Matia, nnɛ pugu pigi vi mbɨŋ pa taʼanchrɔ *ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ.
Llɛ́ jɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Pentekɔ nɛ ni ŋga nthɔ, ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ piŋ kɨrɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ.
A gha ndara yichəɨ yɔ̀yɔnɔ llɔ po mbɔ nɔ ŋggì ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ fiŋ, nthɔ ndɨnaoŋ ŋguoŋ nda ŋa pa ghaŋ piŋ pighɔ ni nchhɔ fɔ nɛ.
Pugu ni njəɨ pa yaoŋ ŋa a ni mbɔ nɔ pa lɨŋ móŋoŋ, pugu taoŋ nshɛrɛ noŋ yugu nthi mbɨŋ sheshe taʼa ŋoŋ vugu.
Pugu ni ndɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi, njɛ̄ chrà nu moŋ pa ŋkwaŋ chrà taoŋ nduoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ ghɔ ni nchuʼɔ nchò yugu nɛ.
Moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo pɔgɔ Minnwi nɛ ni ndaʼa nu Jerushalɛiŋ llɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao.
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo yɔ̀yɔnɔ ghɔ, yú ŋgwa kɨrɨ, ŋgrāo nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ni njaʼo pugu chrā pi chrà laʼa yugu.
Pugu ni ŋgrāo ti a ghaʼa mbie ŋa, “Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pei ŋa pugu chrà nu nɛ lɔ mbɔ pi ŋgwa Galili?
Ti a kie pi nɛiŋ pia yaʼo nnu ŋa pugu chhu nu nɛ pi moŋ yia chrà laʼa?
Pia llɔ pi Patia, Media ni Elaŋ, pugu pa ŋgwa llɔ Meshopotemia, Judia, ni Kapadoshia, pugu pa ŋgwa llɔ Pontu ni Eshia,
pugu pa ŋgwa llɔ Fragia, Pamfilia, Ijipti pugu pa pichəɨ lɨʼɨ Libia yəɨ Shiriŋ. Pichəɨ pia llɔ pi Roma nthɔ ŋkra Jerushalɛiŋ,
pichəɨ pɔ ŋgwa Juu, pichəɨ pɔ ŋgwa nduoŋ ŋa pugu piŋ nnu Minnwi pa Juu nɛ. Pichəɨ pia llɔ Krɛtɛ, pichəɨ llɔ Arabia. Ndɔ pia yaʼo pugu chhɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ ghraoghrao nnu Minnwi moŋ pa chrà laʼa pia.”
Ŋguoŋ yugu ghao ni ŋgrào, ndɔ mbɔ ni fiŋthɔ, nchhu nu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Njiŋ yei pɔ pi ŋa?”
Pichəɨ ka māʼaŋ ghaŋ piŋ pighɔ pi ni kwə̀ɨŋ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Pugu paa pi làʼo!”

Nɛnnɛ Pita taoŋ nthɔ shhɨ pugu pa pichəɨ taʼanchrɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, ŋkə̄rə ŋggì yi nchhu ŋa, “Ŋgwa Juu pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu laʼa nu Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ, pəɨ ywɛrɛ shishiʼi, ǹshwei vəɨ ni njiŋ nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Ŋgwa pei lɔ njiʼi mbaa pi làʼo ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ pīʼi nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ndwɛ wuʼɔ ndipuʼu minaoŋ ni tutuʼu.
Yei pɔ pi nnu ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi Joɛ ni nchhu nu nɛ:
‘Minnwi chhu ŋa yei nnu ŋa ǹshi nchwīe moŋ pa ndugwi llɛ́ nɛ.
Ǹshi nshāʼo Jijwɛ a mbɨŋ shesheŋoŋ.
Puoŋ pəɨ pi pimbia pugu pa piŋgɛ shi nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ a,
pa maʼaŋ mikhwa yəɨ pa nnu,
pa lulunu ŋgwa pəɨ fāʼo pa njə̀ɨŋ.
Ooŋ, ǹshi nshāʼo Jijwɛ a
mbɨŋ puoŋ fàʼa paŋ pi pimbia pugu pa piŋgɛ,
moŋ llɛ́ pighɔ, pugu chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ a.
Ǹshi nchwīe pa nnu ghraoghrao po,
nōoŋ pa lì ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.
Chhǐ, móŋoŋ, ni gwí ndindhi shi mbɔ.
Minaoŋ shi ŋkara ŋgū njiŋnjiŋ,
fhú kara mbie nɔ chhǐ,
ŋkaoŋ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ llɛ́ Taathɔ maa nthɔ.
A shi mbɔ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a gɛ̄ ligi Taathɔ nɛ
shi ndūgu.’

“Ŋgwa Ishrae, pəɨ yaʼo chrà yei! Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ, ŋoŋ ŋa Minnwi ni nōoŋ ŋa a taoŋ ju ntaoŋ vi, ŋkie pi ŋkuoŋ pa nnu ghraoghrao pugu pa lì ŋa a ni mfɛ ghrɨ́ ghɔ a chwīe nɔ ghɔ shɨna pəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ji nɛ.
Minnwi ni ŋkwo ji ndɔ nūʼɔŋ ŋa pi shi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, njwi vi ŋkie pi ŋkuoŋ chaʼa nu vi mfɛ mbhɔ ŋgwa pɨphɨ.
Ndɔ Minnwi pɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu, ŋkwe vi mbhɔ ghrɨ́ gu, nthɛ ŋa a kaŋ ni mfɛ paʼa gu lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi a kɨna nɔ ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa Devi chhu nthɛ vi ŋa,
‘Ǹjəɨ Minnwi Taathɔ shhɨ mu ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao.
A pɔ yəɨ mu ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ,
nnɛ mbaʼa njiʼi mbɔgɔ nnu ŋa ŋoŋmishua tāʼa nu nchwīe mbɨŋ mu nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹdɨnaoŋ ni pwatua,
chrà a pɔ chrà pwanjuʼɔ.
Nɔ pīgi nu, ŋguoŋ noŋ ghao yɨʼə mbɨŋ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa ɔ yiʼi mieŋ a ŋkɨna yi khu,
mbaʼa ɔ yiʼi mieŋ Muuŋ Fàʼa yɔ yi Taoŋtaoŋ fɔ̄rɔ moŋ fúŋ.
Ɔ nōoŋ shɛndaoŋ chɔmbhi vəɨ.
Ɔ shi nchwīe ndɨnaoŋ ni pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ ŋa pɔgɔ pɔ kaʼa.’
“Lǐŋ paŋ, minthɛ ǹchhu ni pəɨ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nthɛ fàʼo via Devi. A ni ŋkhu pi twei vi, fúŋ yi pɔ shɨna pia ti nchəɨŋ shiʼa.
Ndɔ, a ni mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, nji ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkwo kāʼa vi ti nshwrɛ̄i ŋa a shi nchərə taʼa mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ yi ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ju Devi ghɔ.
Minnwi ni nōoŋ nnu ŋa a shi ndɛ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ ni Devi, nɛnnɛ a chrà ŋkuoŋ khu nu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, ŋa pi shi ki lɔ mieŋ vi a kɨna yi khu moŋ fúŋ, ki mieŋ a fɔ̄rɔ.
“Minnwi ni mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mbɨʼɨ Jishɔ vei moŋ gu, ŋguoŋ yigi pɔ pa miŋkwentie.
Minnwi Tǎa vi ni ŋkə̄rə vi nchərə ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ, mfɛ Jijwɛ yi ghɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkāʼa nɛ. Nnu ŋa pəɨ yəɨ nu ndɔ njaʼo nu ndwɛ nɛ pɔ pi fɛ́ yi ŋa a shāʼo mbɨŋ pigi
nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ ŋkuʼɔ Devi po. Ju, Devi, ka chhu pi ŋa,
‘Taathɔ chhu ni Taathɔ a ŋa,
“Chhɔ ŋgei mbhɔ a yi jɨ hɛiŋ
ti ǹshi nuʼuŋ nchwīe pa mbɨ̌na pɔ
pɔ krɨ́ tigi kwò yɔ.” ’
“Nthɛ yie, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Ishrae fāʼo nɔ ji nu ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa Minnwi chwīe vi a pɔ Taathɔ, mbɨnɨ mbɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, mbɔ Jishɔ vei ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkwīŋ vi nɛ.”
Pugu ni njaʼo nnu pei a kāoŋ njùʼɔ yugu ŋkiɛŋ yie, pugu chhu ni Pita pugu pa pichəɨ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ŋa, “Pa lǐŋ pigi, pigi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ?”
Pita chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ, ŋkwe ŋkhǐ ni ligi Jishɔ Krishto, Minnwi līʼɛ phɨ yəɨ, mfɛ fɛ́ yi ni pəɨ, mbɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Minnwi kāʼa vəɨ ni kàʼa yei pəɨ pa ŋgwrɛiŋgwa pəɨ, pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ fie hini nɛ, ni shesheŋoŋ ŋa Taathɔ, mbɔ Minnwi via, chuʼɔ vi nɛ.”
Pita pɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nchrā ntou pa chrà nduoŋ mfra vugu ni njɨ, nchhu nu ŋa, “P̂əɨ kwe noŋ yəɨ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo ŋgəʼɨ ŋa Minnwi shi mfɛ ni ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ pɨphɨ yei nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ, ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni mbiŋ chrà yi nɛ ni ŋkwe ŋkhǐ. Taʼa llɛ́ ghɔ, yaoŋ nɔ trɛi ŋkaŋ ŋgwa pigi mbɨŋ ghaŋ piŋ.
Pugu ni mfɛ ndɨɨ yugu nthɔ njɛʼi yaoŋ mbhɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, ŋkɨrɨ nu ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao ni taʼanjuʼɔ, njɨ pa maoŋ kaʼa mbɨnɨ ndɔ nduoŋ Minnwi.
Minnwi ni ntɔgɔ njiŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ mfāʼa pa nnu ghraoghrao ndɔ nōoŋ pa lì. Nɛnnɛ, shesheŋoŋ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ mbɔ nu taʼa lɨʼɨ ni taʼanjuʼɔ, maoŋ pugu pɔ taʼa yi.
Pugu jɛ̄ nthɔ mfīni kiɛŋ shhɛ pugu, pugu pa pichəɨ pa maoŋ, nthɔ ŋgrā mbɨŋ ghɔ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ chà yugu nuʼuŋ mbɔ nɛ.
Pa lɛllɛ, pugu kɨrɨ nu Nda Minnwi ni taʼaŋggi, njɨ pa maoŋ kaʼa moŋ pa nda nda. Pugu ni njɨ maoŋ pugu ni pwatua pugu pa pwapuŋ,
ŋgaʼo Minnwi, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa piŋ vugu. Pa lɛllɛ Taathɔ pigi vugu ni pa ŋgwa ŋa a ni ŋkwe vugu nɛ.
Llɛ́ chəɨ Pita pugu Jouŋ ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu Nda Minnwi moŋ trɛi minaoŋ ni naoŋchɨ, mbɔ ndɨɨ luoŋ Minnwi.

Pi tiɛŋ ŋoŋ chəɨ ŋa pi ni mbhi vi, a taoŋ ŋkwíni llɔ puŋ, ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɔ choŋkaʼa ŋa a ghə̄ɨ Nda Minnwi, pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Pwapwa nɛ. Pi ghà ŋguʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju nūʼɔŋ vi lɛllɛ choŋkaʼa ghɔ ŋa a luoŋ ghɛ̀rɛ mbhɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ nu Nda Minnwi nɛ.
A gha njəɨ Pita pugu Jouŋ nii nu Nda Minnwi, a jɛ̄ nthɔ nduoŋ ghɛ̀rɛ mbhɔ pugu.
Ndɔ Pita pugu Jouŋ tigi ligi yugu mbɨŋ yu nchhu ŋa, “Līi vigi!”
A jɛ̄ nthɔ ndīi vugu, mbīʼi nu ŋa a shi mfāʼo yaoŋ mbhɔ pugu.
Ndɔ Pita chhu ŋa, “Ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāʼo dere, ndɔ yaoŋ ŋa m̀fāʼo nɛ ǹshi mfɛ vɛ. Moŋ ligi Jishɔ Krishto llɔ Nasharɛ, lɔllɔ nyieŋ!”
Ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ ŋkə̄rə vi tɔthɨ, wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, kwò mi pugu pa mbiʼi kwò mi shwīi.
A lli ntithi, njɛ̄ nyīeŋ nu. Nii moŋ Nda Minnwi pugu pugu, nyīeŋ nu, ndhi nu, ndɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi.
Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa yəɨ vi nɔ haʼaŋ a nyīeŋ nu nthɔ ntōo Minnwi,
nji vi ŋa a ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchhɔ nduoŋ ghɛ̀rɛ choŋkaʼa yɛ Nda Minnwi ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Pwapwa nɛ. Wiwini wɛ̄iŋ vugu, pugu ghrāo nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ yu nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ ni ndia mbɨŋ Pita pugu Jouŋ moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Varinda Sholomu nɛ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ni ŋgrāo ntei nthɔ mbara vugu fɔ.

Pita gha njəɨ ŋgwa pighɔ, nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Ŋgwa Ishrae, a chwīe khɔ pəɨ ghrāo nnu yei nɛiŋ? A chwīe khɔ pəɨ chaoŋ ligi yəɨ mbɨŋ pigi nɔ haʼaŋ pigi chwīe ŋoŋ vei nyīeŋ pi ni yigi njɨ ki ni yigi pɔgɔ Minnwi?

Minnwi Abrahaŋ, Aiji ni Jakɔ, mbɔ Minnwi pa ŋkhu tǎa pia, ghaʼo muuŋ fàʼa yi mbɔ Jishɔ, mbɔ ju ŋa pəɨ ni nchaʼa vi mfɛ ni pa thishɨ, ndāa vi shhɨ Pailɛ ndɨɨ ŋa Pailɛ ni ntāʼa nu mieŋ vi ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ pəɨ lāa vi, mbɔ ŋoŋ taoŋtaoŋ ndɔ mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ, ŋka chhu pi ŋa pi chuʼɔ njwi ŋoŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ.
Pəɨ jwi ŋgaŋ fɛ chɔmbhi, ndɔ Minnwi pɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu, pigi pɔ pa miŋkwentie nnu pei!
“A tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ moŋ ligi Jishɔ ŋa ŋoŋ vei pɔ shishiʼi, ŋoŋ vei ŋa pəɨ yəɨ ndɔ nji nɛ. A piŋ moŋ ligi Jishɔ ŋa a chwīe a ya mbɔ shiʼi shhɨ pəɨ ghao.
“Ndwɛ, lǐŋ paŋ, ǹji ŋa pəɨ ni nchwīe nnu yei moŋ ki ji, pəɨ pa thishɨ pəɨ.
Yaoŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nōoŋ ni pa njəɨlɨʼɨ pi fie ma ŋgaʼo pugu chhu nɛ, ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ shi njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ, Minnwi chwīe a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ mbɨnɨ mbara Minnwi, nnɛ ŋa a līʼɛ phɨ yəɨ. P̈əɨ nchwīe nɛnnɛ, kaŋ māʼaŋ nu ghrɨ́ moŋ jijwɛ yəɨ shi nthɔ ni pəɨ lɔ mbɔ Taathɔ,
a lɔ mbɨnɨ ntaoŋ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ, mbɔ Jishɔ ŋa a ni ŋkwo chuʼɔ vi nɛ ni pəɨ.
A shi ŋkɨna po ti ndɨɨ nuʼuŋ nthɔ ŋa pi shi nchwīe ŋguoŋ pa nnu pɔ pi fhi nɔ haʼaŋ ju Minnwi ni nchhu ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ pi pi taoŋtaoŋ llɛshhɨ nɛ.
Mushi ni nchhu ŋa, ‘Minnwi Taathɔ shi nchuʼɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ yi mfɛ ni pəɨ llɔ shɨna pəɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchuʼɔ a nɛ. Pəɨ shi nchwīe ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa a chhu ŋa pəɨ chwīe nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi njaʼo nchò njəɨlɨʼɨ ghɔ nɛ, pi shi mfuʼu vi shɨna ŋgwa Minnwi, ndɔ nshiʼi vi.’
“Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ŋguoŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi llɔ mbɨŋ Shamuɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ ni nchīi pa nnu pei ŋa a thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ moŋ llɛ́ pei nɛ ŋkaa pugu.

Pa kàʼa Minnwi ŋa a ni mfɛ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ pi nɛ ni mbɔ pi ni pəɨ. Pəɨ fāʼo shɨna moŋ kɨ̀na ŋa Minnwi ni ŋgwrā pugu pa ŋkhu tǎa pəɨ nɛ. A ni nchhu ni Abrahaŋ ŋa, ‘Ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ yɔ, ǹshi fɛ mbɔrɔ ni ŋguoŋ ndaaŋoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ghao.’
Nɛnnɛ, Minnwi chuʼɔ muuŋ fàʼa vi mfǔoŋ ntaoŋ vi pi ni pəɨ, ŋa a fɛ mbɔrɔ ni pəɨ moŋ chwīe nu ŋguoŋ vəɨ ghao ntaoŋ moŋ mbha nnu pɨphɨ.”
Pita pugu Jouŋ ni ŋga ŋguʼɔ nchrā nu ni ŋgwa pighɔ nɛ, pa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi pugu pa thishɨ ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi pugu pa ŋgwa Shadushi thɔ mbara vugu,
mfāʼo pɨgɨtua ntou yi nthɛ ŋa Pita pugu Jouŋ ni nthɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa ndɔ nchīi nu ŋa Jishɔ ni ŋkhu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa ŋgwa lɛ ŋkhu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.
Pugu wɛ̄iŋ Pita pugu Jouŋ niʼiŋ vugu chə́ɨŋ ti mbhi nuʼuŋ ndaŋ nthɛ ŋa tuʼu ni ŋkwo shini nu.
Ndɔ ntou ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo chrà Minnwi nɛ piŋ. Fɨʼɨ pimbia ŋa pugu ni mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ kuʼɔ nchəɨŋ tiɛŋ ŋkaŋ yi.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, pa thishɨ pa Juu pugu pa kúŋ, pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi kɨrɨ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Anaŋ, mbɔ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, pugu Kaifa, ni Jouŋ, ni Alɛshanda, ni pa ndaaŋoŋ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ,
fuʼu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pighɔ nthigi shhɨ pugu njɛ̄ tou nu vugu ŋa, “Pəɨ chwīe yei nnu pi ni ghrɨ́ gɔ̌, ki ni ligi gɔ̌?”
Pita, lɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi, nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Thishɨ pugu pa kúŋ moŋ laʼa,
p̈i nthɔ nshaʼa vigi shiʼa nthɛ pi nnu shiʼi ŋa pigi chwīe mbɨŋ ŋkwíni vei, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a kie ŋkaoŋ maa mbɔ shiʼi nɛ,

kaŋ a pie nɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yəɨ ghao pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Ishrae ji ŋa ŋoŋ vei ti shhɨ pəɨ nja mbɔ shishiʼi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ Jishɔ Krishto llɔ Nasharɛ, ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, Minnwi pɨʼɨ vi llɔ moŋ gu nɛ.
Jishɔ vei, ju ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nthɛ vi ŋa,
‘Muuŋ nchíʼa yɛ ŋa pəɨ ghaŋ krao nda ni ndāa ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ nɛ,
pɨnɨ ŋkara ju mbɔ muuŋ nchíʼa kwonda.’
Lūgu nu wuʼɔ mbɔ pi mbhɔ yu təʼɨ vi! Moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi, yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ shɨna ŋgwamishua ŋa Minnwi fɛ ŋa minthɛ a kwe via.”

Pa thishɨ pighɔ ni ŋga njəɨ fɨʼɨ tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa Pita pugu Jouŋ fāʼo nɛ, ndɔ nji ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi nchəɨŋ nthɨŋkwo kəkərə moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ, ŋa pugu wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋgwa gha pugu ghrāo, nji kiʼɛ ŋa pugu pa Jishɔ ni mbɔ kaʼa.
Ndɔ pugu ni ŋga njəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa pi ni nchwīe vi a pɔ shiʼi nɛ thi yəɨ Pita pugu Jouŋ, paʼa pugu lɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo nnu nɔ chhu nu.
Nɛnnɛ, pugu fɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa pugu taoŋ nda pa kúŋ. Nnɛ pugu pini shɨna pugu,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pia shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ ni ŋgwa pei? Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ Jerushalɛiŋ ji ŋa mmɛ nnu ghraoghrao yei chwīe pugu. Yichəɨ shɛndaoŋ lɔ mbɔ ŋa mimfɛ pia puoŋ.
Ndɔ nɔ chwīe nu ŋa kiʼi nnu yei nuʼuŋ nyīeŋ mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ, pia shūu tə́nə yugu ŋa kiʼi pugu nuʼuŋ nchhu sheshe nnu ni ŋoŋ nɔ ligi Jishɔ.”
Nɛnnɛ, pugu mɛ̄iŋ vugu, mfɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu nuʼuŋ nchhu nnu ki ntɨgɨ nɔ ligi Jishɔ.
Ndɔ Pita pugu Jouŋ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ywɛrɛ ni thɔ yəɨ ŋa a kāʼo yəɨ ligi Minnwi, yaʼo nu nchò yəɨ ki yaʼo nu nchò Minnwi,
nthɛ ŋa mimfɛ paʼa pigi lɔ mieŋ shwei nu nnu ŋa pigi yaʼo ndɔ njəɨ ni noŋ yigi nɛ.”

Pa thishɨ pugu pa kúŋ pighɔ gha ŋgūru vugu mbīgi ŋa pugu shi mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu, mieŋ vugu ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ. Pugu ni njəɨ ŋa mimfɛ paʼa pugu lɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu nthɛ ŋa pa ŋgwa ni nchhɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi nthɛ nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa pi ni nchwīe nnu ghraoghrao yei mbɨŋ yu, noŋ yi mmɛ nɛ, ni ntɔgɔ khwɛ wuŋ ŋgaʼo.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋa pi ni nchuʼɔ vugu nɛ, pugu ghə̄ɨ njəɨ ŋgwa pugu, mfɨ̄ʼɨ nnu ŋa pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa thishɨ ni nchhu ni pugu nɛ.

Ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo nnu pighɔ nɛ, ŋkə̄rə ŋggì yugu tɔthɨ moŋ taʼanjuʼɔ nduoŋ Minnwi. Pugu ni nduoŋ nu ŋa, “Taathɔ ŋa a fāʼo ŋguoŋ njɨ, nchwīe po pugu pa shhɛ ni ŋkhǐ pugu pa ŋguoŋ maoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ,
ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi, Ɔ ni nchhu ni ŋkhu tǎa vigi Devi, mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa yɔ ŋa,
‘Pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ni ndɨnaoŋ ni pɨgɨtua ŋa,
pa ŋgwa Ishrae kāʼa pa nnu pɨphɨ ŋa a lɔ fāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ nɛ nthɛ a ŋa?
Pa fùoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ pugu pa pichəɨ pa thishɨ paoŋ
mbīri noŋ pugu nɔ māʼaŋ nu Minnwi Taathɔ
pugu *Meshaya yi ŋa a taoŋ nɛ.’
“Shishini, Hɛrɔ pugu Pontiu Pailɛ paoŋ moŋ laʼataoŋ yei pugu pa ŋgwa laʼataoŋ nduoŋ ni pa ŋgwa Ishrae nɔ nyiaŋ nu ntáŋ nthɛ muuŋ fàʼa yɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ, mbɔ Jishɔ ŋa ɔ ni nchuʼɔ vi ŋa a pɔ Meshaya
nɛ.
Pugu paoŋ nɔ chwīe nu ŋguoŋ pa nnu haʼaŋ ɔ ni ŋkwo kāʼa nūʼɔŋ ŋa a shi ŋguʼɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ ndwɛ, ma Taathɔ, ywɛrɛ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu kāʼa ŋa pugu shi mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pigi nɛ. Ghɛ̄rɛ vigi mbɔ pa puoŋ fàʼa nɔ chrà nu chrà yɔ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Ɔ chwīe yei nɛ, ghə̄ɨ mbɨʼɨ mbhɔ yɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ nɔ ghɔ, mbɨnɨ nchwīe pa nnu ghraoghrao, ndɔ nōoŋ pa lì pɔ ntɔgɔ pi nɔ ligi muuŋ fàʼa yɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ mbɔ Jishɔ.”
Pugu ni ŋga nduoŋ Minnwi ti mīʼɛŋ, lɨʼɨ ŋa pugu ni ŋkɨrɨ fɔ nɛ chɨ̄ʼɨ, pugu lɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi nshwei chrà Minnwi ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ.
Pa ghaŋ piŋ ni mfāʼo taʼaŋggi njùʼɔ pugu, pugu pa kwāʼa nu muŋu. Paʼa shesheŋoŋ vugu lɔ nchhu ŋa yaoŋ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ pɔ pi ji təʼɨ vi, yaoŋ yugu ghao pɔ pi taʼa yi.
Ntɔgɔ moŋ njɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi, pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ni nchīi ni pa ŋgwa ŋa Jishɔ, mbɔ Taathɔ, khu mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ, Minnwi nōoŋ ntou pwapuŋ yi ni pugu ghao.
Taʼa ŋgaŋ chà shini ndɔ mbɔ shɨna pugu, nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ ndɨɨ ni ntɔgɔ nu nɛ, pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo pa shhɛ ki pa laʼa nɛ fīni, nthɔ ni mbɨŋ ghɔ ŋa pugu fīni nɔ ghɔ nɛ,
nūʼɔŋ shhɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, pugu ghrā ni ŋgwa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ chà yugu nuʼuŋ mbɔ nɛ.
Nnɛ, Joshɛ ŋa pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ni nthɔ mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Banaba nɛ (njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa “Ŋgaŋ Māʼaŋ Ghrɨ́”), mbɔ ŋoŋ Levi ŋa pi ni mbhi vi Shaipru,
fīni nyìeŋ ŋa a ni mfāʼo ndɔ̄gɔ mbɨŋ ghɔ nthɔ nūʼɔŋ shhɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ.
Ndɔ ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Anania. Pugu ŋgwɛ vi, Shafira, ni mfīni yaoŋ yugu.
A lə̄ɨŋ pɨgəɨ mbɨŋ ŋa pugu ni mfīni yaoŋ ghɔ nɔ nɛ, ŋgwɛ vi ji, ŋguʼɔ nthɔ pi ni ghrà yi nūʼɔŋ shhɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ.
Ndɔ Pita chhu ŋa, “Anania, a chwīe khɔ ɔ mieŋ Shata nii njùʼɔ ghɔ, ɔ lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi, ndə̄ɨŋ pɨgəɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ɔ fīni shhɛ yɔ ghɔ nɔ nɛ?
Ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ shini ndɔ naa mfīni nɛ, a lɔɔ mbɔ jɔ? Ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ ni ŋkwo fīni nɛ, a lɔɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ jɔ? Ti a chwīe khɔ ɔ pīʼi chwīe nu ŋkwaŋ nnu yei? Ɔ lɔ ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ pi ni ŋgwamishua, ɔ lɛʼi pi ni Minnwi.”
Anania ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, ŋgū shhɛ ŋkhu, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo nnu yei nɛ.
Pa maʼaŋ mikhwa lɔllɔ ndiŋ vi moŋ ndhwí, ntiɛŋ vi ntaoŋ nɔ mbhi ŋgə̄ɨ ntwei.
A ni ŋga njo njunu, ŋgwɛ vi nii ndɔ ki lɔ nji nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Shwei a, yei fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa pəɨ ndaoŋ ghɔ fīni shhɛ ghɔ nɔ nɛ?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ooŋ, a yie.”
Ndɔ Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “A chwīe khɔ pəɨ taaŋ nɔ mōoŋ nu Jijwɛ Taathɔ? Ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu twei ndaoŋ ghɔ nɛ pɔ nɛ chonda, pugu shi ntiɛŋ ghɔ ntaoŋ nɔ.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, a gū shhɛ shhɨ yu ŋkhu, pa maʼaŋ mikhwa pighɔ nii njəɨ ŋa a kwo khu. Pugu tiɛŋ vi ntaoŋ nɔ mbhi, ntwei vi yəɨ ndaoŋ vi.
Pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ chɔshi ghɔ pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni njaʼo nnu pei nɛ.
Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ni nōoŋ pa lì ndɔ nchwīe ntou pa nnu ghraoghrao. Ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ piŋ ni mbɔ moŋ Varinda Sholomu.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shini ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋgia yugu nɛ shini ndɔ njiʼi mōoŋ nɔ tūru nu pugu pugu njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ndīi vugu nɔ pa ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa.
Ndɔ ntountou ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ki piŋ Taathɔ nɛ ka mīʼɛŋ mbīgi pīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ, mbia pugu pa piŋgɛ.

Nthɛ pa nnu haʼaŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ni nchwīe nu nɛ, pi tiɛŋ pa ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ ntaoŋ nɔ ghɔ nɔ pa shɛndaoŋ, nūʼɔŋ vugu ŋkuoŋ pa kúoŋ pugu pa ŋgrào nnɛ ŋa kəʼɨchəɨ miliʼi Pita gū mbɨŋ pugu nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ntɔgɔ nu nɛ.
Ntou yú ŋgwa pɨnɨ ŋkɨrɨ llɔ moŋ pa laʼataoŋ ŋkɨŋ Jerushalɛiŋ nthɔ nu ni pa ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ ni nthɔ ŋgana vugu nɛ, pi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu.
Ndɔ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa pakwo pi, mbɔ pa ŋgwa Shadushi, lɨnaoŋ ni kighɨʼə nthɛ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ.
Nnɛ pugu wɛ̄iŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ niʼiŋ moŋ chə́ɨŋ.
Ndɔ, a gha mbɔ ni tuʼu, ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ chuʼɔ cho chə́ɨŋ mfuʼu vugu mbhi nchhu ŋa,
“Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nthi moŋ Nda Minnwi, nshwei ŋguoŋ chrà chɔmbhi fhi yei ni ŋgwa.”
Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pighɔ yaʼo nchò yugu, a gha mbɔ ni tutuʼu pugu nii Nda Minnwi njɛ̄ yɛʼi nu.
Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ thɔ pugu pa pakwo pi mɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu ghao nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pugu fāʼo kɨrɨ pa kúŋ. Mfɛ gɨ́ moŋ chə́ɨŋ ŋa pi thɔ ni ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ lɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ.
Pa shoogɛ gha ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ chə́ɨŋ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ vugu fɔ, mbɨnɨ kiʼɛ mfɨ̄ʼɨ ni pugu ŋa,
“Pigi yəɨ cho chə́ɨŋ pi ya mfɨ̄nɨ shiʼi, pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi pi thi nɔ pa cho pi, ndɔ pigi gha nchuʼɔ, paʼa ndɔ njəɨ ŋoŋ moŋ ghɔ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa mmɛŋoŋ pa shoogɛ ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi Nda Minnwi pugu pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni njaʼo nnu yei nɛ, pugu ghrāo ŋa a nthɛ yei ŋkwaŋ nnu shi ndugwi pi hɨŋ.
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ thɔ nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ līi njəɨ! Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pəɨ ni niʼiŋ chə́ɨŋ nɛ thi Nda Minnwi nthɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa.”
Nnɛ mmɛŋoŋ shoogɛ pugu pa ŋgwa pi ghə̄ɨ nthɔ ni pugu ndɔ ki lɔ nchwīe pi nnu kɨkrɨ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔgɔ nu ŋa minthɛ pa ŋgwa tuŋ vugu ni ŋgùʼɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga nthɔ ni ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pighɔ ntigi vugu shhɨ pa kúŋ. Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ tou vugu,

nchhu nu ŋa, “Pigi ni ŋkwo ya mfɛ tɨtɨnɨ gɨ́ ni pəɨ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ njɛʼi ŋgwa ni ligi ŋoŋ vinɛ ndɔ pəɨ līi njəɨ, pəɨ kwo yɛʼi ŋgwa moŋ Jerushalɛiŋ ŋkwe lɨʼɨ ghao, nthɔ nchwīe nu a pɔ ŋa a jwi pigi njwi vi.”
Ndɔ Pita pugu pa pichəɨ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “A yiʼi ŋa pigi yaʼo nchò Minnwi nchaa nchò ŋgwamishua.
Minnwi pa tǎa pia ni mbɨʼɨ Jishɔ llɔ moŋ gu, mbɔ Jishɔ ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa njwi nɛ.
Minnwi kə̄rə vi, nchərə ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ nɔ Nthishɨ mbɨnɨ mbɔ Ŋkwe, nɔ fɛ nu shɨ̀na ni pa Ishrae nɔ pāʼa nu ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ, Minnwi līʼɛ phɨ yugu.
Pigi pa miŋkwentie nnu pei, Jijwɛ Minnwi ŋa Minnwi fɛ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yaʼo vi nɛ pɔ yichəɨ.”
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, a pɨgɨ vugu nshāʼa laʼa muŋu nnɛ pugu tāʼa nu njwi vugu.

Ndɔ yichəɨ taʼa ŋoŋ Farashi shɨna ŋgwa pighɔ, ligi yi pɔ Gamalia, mbɔ ŋgaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́, ŋa ŋgwa līi vi nɔ ŋoŋ chɨɨchɨɨ, lɔllɔ tɔthɨ mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi lɔ̄gɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pighɔ ntaoŋ nɔ mbhi nɔ kuo ndɨɨ.
Pi gha ntaoŋ ni pugu, a chhu kiʼɛ ni pa kúŋ pighɔ ŋa, “Ŋgwa Ishrae, pəɨ lɨna nu ni nnu haʼaŋ pəɨ chwīe nu mbɨŋ ŋgwa pei nɛ.

Pəɨ kwiŋ nu ŋa yichəɨ ndɨɨ ni ma mbɔ Tioda taoŋ, nchhu nu ŋa a mmɛŋoŋ ndiɛŋ. Yaoŋ nɔ khwɛ ŋkɨɨ ŋgwa younjiŋ yi. Ndɔ pi ni njwi vi, ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni njōu njiŋ yi nɛ shāaŋ, nnu ŋa a ni nthi nɔ nɛ shāna gha.
A ni ŋga ntɔgɔ ji, ŋoŋ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Judashi, mbɔ ŋoŋ llɔ Galili moŋ ŋgaʼombhi shia ŋgwa, nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ ji, nshūu ntou ŋgwa pugu younjiŋ yi. Pi jwi vi ŋkaa yu, ghaŋ younjiŋ pi shāaŋ.
“Nnɛ, moŋ yei nnu ŋa a pɔ shhɛ nɛ, kiʼi pəɨ chwīe nnu mbɨŋ ŋgwa pei, p̂əɨ mieŋ vugu təʼɨ vugu. Nnu ŋa pugu kāʼa ndɔ nchwīe nɛ, m̈bɔ ŋa a llɔ pi mbɔ ŋoŋmishua, kaŋ a shi nshāna mmɛ gha.
Ndɔ a ndhɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi, kaŋ minthɛ, paʼa pəɨ lɔ ŋgaʼa vugu. Pəɨ ka yəɨ noŋ pəɨ ŋgwie ŋkrɔ̀ pi pəɨ pa Minnwi.” Pa kúŋ pighɔ lɔ̄gɔ ntɨ́gɨ Gamalia.
Pugu mɛ̄iŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pighɔ, pugu nii nda, pugu wie vugu, mfɛ gɨ́ ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu nuʼuŋ nchrā nu ni ligi Jishɔ, nnɛ mieŋ vugu pugu ghə̄ɨ.
Nɛnnɛ, pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ taoŋ nda pa kúŋ nthɔ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ŋa Minnwi shia vugu shɨna pa ŋgwa ŋa mimfɛ pugu yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ pi shhū vugu nɔ ligi Jishɔ nɛ.
Ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ghao moŋ Nda Minnwi pugu pa laʼa pa ŋgwa, pugu ghə̄ɨ nchhɔ ntɨgɨ nu ndɔ nchīi nu ŋa, “Jishɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.”

A ni ŋga ndaʼa shɨgɛi pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ pigi nu nɛ, fɛ̀ʼi gū shɨna pa ghaŋ piŋ mbɔ ŋgwa Juu pɛ ŋa pi ni mbhi vugu pugu kuʼɔ taoŋ nduoŋ nchrā pi Gri nɛ, pugu pa pɛ ŋa pi ni mbhi vugu pugu kuʼɔ laʼa nchrā pi Hibru nɛ. Pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkuʼɔ mbhi nɛ, ni mfɛ̄ʼi nu ŋa pi lɔ ndīi pa kugu pugu shiʼi moŋ nnu ghrā maoŋ lɛllɛ.
Nnɛ paanchrɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pighɔ mɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ lɨʼɨ muʼɔŋ nchhu ŋa, “A lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo ŋa pigi mieŋ chīi nu chrà Minnwi fɔ nthɔ pi lɨʼɨ ghrā maoŋ jɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, lǐŋ paŋ, pəɨ tɛrɛ khwachəɨ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa, ŋa pugu lɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi pugu pa shiethɔ nɛ, pigi nūʼɔŋ vugu nɔ fàʼa yei.
Pigi shi mfɛ noŋ yigi pi nɔ luoŋ nu Minnwi pugu pa fāʼa chīi nu chrà Minnwi.”

Nnu ŋa pugu ni nchhu nɛ pwa ŋguoŋ kɨrɨ ghɔ. Pugu chuʼɔ Shitifiŋ ŋa a ni ntɨnɨ moŋ piŋ ndɔ ndɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ, ni Fili, ni Prokoru, ni Nikano, ni Taimoŋ, ni Pamena, ni Nikola lɔ Antiɔ ŋa a ni mbiŋ Minnwi pa Juu nɛ.
Pugu lɔ̄gɔ vugu ŋgə̄ɨ ntigi shhɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, pugu nūʼɔŋ mbɔ yugu mbɨŋ pugu nduoŋ Minnwi.
Nɛnnɛ, chrà Minnwi pɨnɨ nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ, fɨʼɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ Jerushalɛiŋ pɨnɨ njiɛŋ mbīgi ŋkiɛŋ yie, pa ntou ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi gū ghaŋ piŋ.
Shitifiŋ, ŋa mbɔrɔ pugu pa njɨ Minnwi ni ndɨnaoŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ, chwīe ntou pa nnu ghraoghrao ndɔ nōoŋ pa lì shɨna ŋgwa.

Ndɔ pichəɨ ŋgwa ni ndāa vi, mbɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ ŋgia ghaŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ ni yi ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi pa kǔna nɛ, ŋa ŋgwa Juu ni mbɔ moŋ ghɔ llɔ Shiriŋ pugu Alɛshandria, pugu pa pichəɨ Juu nduoŋ llɔ krao ŋgei Shilishia, ni Eshia. Pugu jɛ̄ lōu nu pugu pa Shitifiŋ.
Ndɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi fɛ shiethɔ ni Shitifiŋ, fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni nchrā nɛ, lāa nu chrà yi ghaʼa.
Nnɛ, pugu ŋiʼaŋ niʼiŋ puŋ ŋgwa, pugu chhu ŋa, “Pigi yaʼo a chrā chrà nchɨʼəshə nthɛ ligi Mushi pugu Minnwi.”
Nnɛ pugu chwīe pa ŋgwa pighɔ, pugu pa thishɨ pugu pa ghaŋ yɛʼi gɨ́ Mushi, pugu wɛ̄iŋ Shitifiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ pa kúŋ,
ndɔ nthɔ ni pa ŋgwa nchhu ŋa pugu lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ thɔ yu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei wuʼɔ nthɔ nchrā pi nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ Nda Minnwi yia yi taoŋtaoŋ pugu pa gɨ́ Mushi,
nthɛ ŋa pigi yaʼo a chhu ŋa, ‘Jishɔ vei llɔ Nasharɛ shi nshāʼa Nda Minnwi yei ŋkwri pa nùʼɔŋ ŋa Mushi ni mfɛ ni pia nɛ.’ ”
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ nda pa kúŋ nɛ chaoŋ ligi yugu mbɨŋ Shitifiŋ ghɔ, njəɨ ŋa miŋi mi pɔ pi nɔ yi ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi.
Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pie Shitifiŋ ŋa, “Yei nnu shini?”
Shitifiŋ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Lǐŋ paŋ pugu pa tǎa paŋ, pəɨ ywɛrɛ nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ. Minnwi ndighaʼo ni nōoŋ noŋ yi ni tǎa via Abrahaŋ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ Meshopotemia nɛ ŋkaoŋ a maa ŋgə̄ɨ ndaʼa Haraŋ,
nchhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Taoŋ mieŋ laʼa yəɨ pugu pa ndaaŋoŋ yɔ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ laʼataoŋ yɛ ŋa ǹshi nōoŋ vɛ nɛ.’
“Nnɛ, a taoŋ kiʼɛ laʼa pugu, mbɔ laʼa pa Chadiɛŋ, ŋgə̄ɨ nchhɔ Haraŋ. Tǎa vi ni ŋga ŋkhu, Minnwi fuʼu vi fɔ nthɔ ni ju laʼataoŋ yei ŋa pəɨ chhɔ fɔ nɛ.
Minnwi shi ki lɔ njiʼi mfɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi muuŋ pra shhɛ ghɔ nɔ ji. Ndɔ Minnwi kāʼa vi kāʼa ŋa a shi mfɛ shhɛ ghɔ a pɔ ji pugu pa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yi, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ a shi ki lɔ mfāʼo muuŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ nɛ.
Minnwi ni nchhu ŋa, ‘Ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yɔ shi ndaʼa nɔ pa ghɨ̀nɨ laʼataoŋ ŋgwa nduoŋ, ŋgū pa kǔna fɔ, pi fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu nɔ khwɛ ŋkɨɨ ŋgaʼo.’
Minnwi pɨnɨ nchhu ŋa, ‘Ndɔ ǹshi nshaʼa ŋgwa pighɔ, ŋa pəɨ shi fāʼa mbhɔ pugu nɔ ŋkǔna nɛ, mfɛ njɔ́
ni pugu, yei gha ntɔgɔ pugu taoŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ nthɔ ŋgaʼo a shhɛ hɛiŋ.’

Minnwi pɨnɨ ŋgwrā kɨ̀na pugu Abrahaŋ ŋa a niʼiŋ pimbia ŋgunu mbrɛi nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa pugu pɔ pi yi Minnwi ndɔ nshi nchwīe nnu ŋa a chhu ni Abrahaŋ nɛ. Nnɛ, pi ni ŋga mbhi Aiji, a laʼa taʼa taŋ, Abrahaŋ niʼiŋ vi ŋgunu mbrɛi, Aiji niʼiŋ ji muuŋ mbɔ Jakɔ ŋgunu mbrɛi, Jakɔ niʼiŋ paanchrɔ puoŋ pi ŋgunu mbrɛi, mbɔ pa tǎa pia.
“Pa tǎa pia pighɔ fāʼo kɨghɨʼə nthɛ Joshɛ ndǐŋ vugu, mfīni vi laʼataoŋ Ijipti, ndɔ Minnwi pɔ pugu yu kaʼa,

ŋkwe vi moŋ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ pi. Joshɛ ni ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ Fɛrɔ, Minnwi chwīe a fāʼo mbha nnu shiʼi ligi Fɛrɔ mbɔ fùoŋ Ijipti, ndɔ mfɛ shiethɔ ghɔ. Fùoŋ chwīe Joshɛ pɔ mmɛŋoŋ nthɔ nshaʼa Ijipti pugu pa ntuʼɔ yi.
“Nnɛ, njì gū moŋ ŋguoŋ Ijipti pugu pa Kanaŋ, njì ghɔ chwīe ŋgwa yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ ntou yi, ti paʼa pa tǎa pia lɔ mfāʼo yaoŋ nɔ jɨ nu.
Jakɔ gha njaʼo ŋa maoŋ jɨ pɔ Ijipti a fǔoŋ ntaoŋ pi pa tǎa pia fɔ.
A gha mbɔ moŋ mbra ŋgɛ, Joshɛ chwīe pa lǐŋ pi ji vi, Fɛrɔ ji ndaaŋoŋ Joshɛ kiʼɛ.
