Joshɛ māʼaŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ mɛ̄iŋ Jakɔ tǎa vi, ŋa a thɔ Ijipti pugu pa ŋguoŋ mbaanda yi ghao mbɔ khwachəɨ wuŋ ŋgwa ni yi tiɛŋ.
Nɛnnɛ, Jakɔ shwiʼi Ijipti mbɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkhu pugu pa tǎa pia.
Pi ni ntiɛŋ khu yugu mbɨnɨ nɔ ghɔ Shɛkɛŋ ntwei vugu fɔ moŋ fúŋ ŋa Abrahaŋ ni njuoŋ mbhɔ puoŋ Hamoŋ ni yichəɨ fɨʼɨ mbəʼɨ mbɨŋ nɛ.
“Nɔ haʼaŋ ndɨɨ kàʼa ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa Abrahaŋ nɔ ghɔ ni nchənə mbara nu nɛ, pa ŋgwa pia pɨnɨ njiɛŋ mbīgi Ijipti.
Ndugwi yi, yichəɨ fùoŋ ŋa a shini ndɔ nji Joshɛ nɛ jɛ̄ nthɔ nshaʼa Ijipti
A kuʼɔ thɔ pa tǎa pia, nchwīe ŋgəʼɨ mbɨŋ pugu, mfra vugu ŋa pugu nūʼɔŋ puoŋ pugu mbhi, nnɛ ŋa pugu khu.
“A ni mbɔ pi moŋ yei pɨɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni mbhi Mushi. Mushi ni mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ muuŋ pwapwa. Pi ni nūʼɔŋ vi nda wuʼɔ nɔ trɛi nàoŋ.
Pi ni ŋga mfuʼu vi nūʼɔŋ mbhi, muuŋ Fɛrɔ yi miŋgwɛ lɔ̄gɔ vi nɔ muuŋ vi ŋkuʼɔ ni ju nɔ muuŋ vi.
Pi ni njɛʼi Mushi ni ŋguoŋ shiethɔ pa ŋgwa Ijipti. A ni ŋgū ŋkiɛŋ mmɛŋoŋ ndiɛŋ moŋ chrà yi pugu pa nchwīe nu nnu mi.
“A ni ŋga ŋkwo pɔ khwɛ wuŋ ŋgaʼo, a thɔ njùʼɔ yu ŋa a kra lǐŋ pi mbɔ puoŋ Ishrae.
A ni ŋga njəɨ ŋoŋ Ijipti thɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni muuŋ Ishrae, a ghə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ ghɛ̄rɛ vi njwi ŋoŋ Ijipti ghɔ nɔ luʼu nu ŋgəʼɨ yɛ ŋa a chwīe mbɨŋ vie ŋoŋ nɛ.
A ni ŋkwāʼa ŋa pa lǐŋ pi shi nji ŋa Minnwi taoŋ vi nɔ kwe nu vugu, ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ njiʼi nji.
“Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, a yəɨ paa puoŋ Ishrae pugu wie ŋkrɔ̀, a paʼo nu ŋa pugu chīni ŋggì, nchhu ŋa, ‘Lǐŋ paŋ, pəɨ pa lǐŋ, pəɨ wie pi ŋkrɔ̀ khɔ nɛiŋ?’
“Ndɔ yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nthɔ ŋgwie ndǐŋ vi nɛ tūʼɔ Mushi mfɛ hini, mbie vi ŋa, ‘A nūʼɔŋ gɔ̌ nūʼɔŋ ghɔ ŋa ɔ shaʼa vigi?
Ɔ tāʼa nu njwi a ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ ni njwi ŋoŋ Ijipti yua nɛ?’
A ni ŋga ŋkhwɛ̄ nɛiŋ, Mushi tei ŋgə̄ɨ mbɔ ŋgɨ̀nɨ laʼataoŋ Midia, ndaŋ mbhi paa puoŋ pimbia.
“Ndwɛ Mushi ni ŋga ŋkwo laʼa Midia nɔ khwɛ wuŋ ŋgaʼo, ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi nōoŋ noŋ yi ghɔ nɔ lɨŋ móŋoŋ ŋkɨɨ nu ŋkuoŋ muuŋ thɨ yuyuʼu moŋ ŋkǔnu njó ŋkuoŋ mbra Shinai.
Mushi ni ŋgrāo yaoŋ ŋa a ni njəɨ nɛ, nchənə mbara yəɨ ghɔ nɔ yəɨ nu shiʼi, ŋga mbara njaʼo ŋggì Taathɔ:
‘Mi Minnwi pa tǎa pɔ, Minnwi Abrahaŋ, Aiji ni Jakɔ.’ Mushi wrū nthɛ pɔgɔ gu ki lɔ nuʼuŋ ntāʼa nu mbɛʼi.
“Minnwi Taathɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Shrāo tra yɔ, nthɛ ŋa lɨʼɨ ŋa ɔ thi nɛ pɔ pi shhɛ taoŋtaoŋ.
Ǹjəɨ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa pi fɛ nu ni ŋgwa paŋ laʼataoŋ pa Ijipti nɛ, ǹjaʼo kə̄ɨ yugu nshwiʼi shhɛ nɔ kwe nu vugu. Thɔ ndwɛ ǹtaoŋ ghɔ laʼataoŋ Ijipti.’

“Mushi vei ŋa ŋgwa Ishrae ni ndāa vi, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘A nūʼɔŋ gɔ̌ nūʼɔŋ ghɔ ŋa ɔ shaʼa vigi?’ A ju ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ vi ŋa a ni nōoŋ noŋ yi ghɔ ŋkuoŋ muuŋ thɨ yuyuʼu ŋa a shaʼa puoŋ Ishrae ndɔ ŋkwe vugu moŋ ŋgəʼɨ nɛ.

A ni mfuʼu pa puoŋ Ishrae laʼataoŋ Ijipti. A ni nthɔ nchwīe pa nnu ghraoghrao ndɔ nōoŋ pa lì moŋ laʼataoŋ Ijipti pugu pa mooŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Ŋkhǐ Pipie nɛ, pugu pa mooŋ ŋkǔnu njó nɔ khwɛ wuŋ ŋgaʼo.
“Yei Mushi yɛ ŋa a ni nchhu ni ŋgwa Ishrae ŋa, ‘Minnwi shi nchuʼɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ yi mfɛ ni pəɨ llɔ shɨna pəɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nuʼuŋ nchuʼɔ a nɛ.’

Mushi yei, ju yɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ pugu pa kɨrɨ ŋgwa Ishrae moŋ ŋkǔnu njó, a ni mbɔ hɛiŋ pugu pa ŋkhu tǎa pia pugu pa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, ŋa a ni nchrā ghɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra Shinai, a kwe chrà maoŋ ghɔ, mbɔ chrà Minnwi nɔ fɛ nu ni pia.
“Pa tǎa pia ni ndāa nɔ yaʼo nu nchò yi, ŋka lāa vi lāa ŋkhwā njùʼɔ pugu nɔ pɨ̄nɨ nu laʼataoŋ Ijipti,
nchhu nu ni Ɛroŋ ŋa, ‘Puoŋ yaoŋ mfɛ ni pigi nɔ Minnwi ŋa a shi mbɔ nthishɨ vigi, a mbɔ pi Mushi vei ŋa a ni mfuʼu vigi Ijipti nɛ, pigi llɔ nji nnu ŋa a chwīe vi nɛ.’
A ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋa pugu ni nchwīe yaoŋ puoŋ a pɔ nɔ muuŋ nàʼaŋ mimbia, pugu fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ghɔ, mfāʼo mmɛ jɨ nɔ ghaʼo nu yaoŋ ŋa pugu chwīe ni mbhɔ yugu.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, Minnwi pāʼa ŋkǔnu yi ni pugu, mfɛ vugu ŋa pugu thɔ ŋgaʼo pi pa maoŋ moŋ tɔthɨ nɔ pa fɨ́nəɨ, fhú, ni minaoŋ, nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋa,
‘Ŋgwa Ishrae, ŋguoŋ pa minyieŋ ŋa pəɨ ni ŋgwrā nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ
nɔ khwɛ wuŋ ŋgaʼo moŋ ŋkǔnu njó nɛ shini ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi vəɨ.
A ni mbɔ ntǎa nnwi Molokɛ ŋa pəɨ ni ntiɛŋ nyīeŋ nu nɔ ghɔ,
pugu chwīe yaoŋ nɔ fɨ́nəɨ nɔ ligi nnwi ŋa pəɨ ni mɛ̄iŋ ni Refaŋ.
Pie ghɔ ni mbɔ pa nnwi ŋa pəɨ ni nchwīe ŋgaʼo nu nɛ,
nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshi njōu vəɨ moŋ pa laʼa pəɨ,
pəɨ ghə̄ɨ ti mfərə Babiloŋ.’
“Pa tǎa pia ni mfāʼo Ntǎa ŋa a nōoŋ ŋa Minnwi pɔ pugu pugu nɛ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó. Pi ni nchwīe Ntǎa ghɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nchhu ni Mushi ŋa a chwīe ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni nōoŋ ghɔ nɛ.

A ni ŋga ndaʼa, pa tǎa pia ŋa pa tǎa pugu ni mfɛ ntǎa ghɔ ni pugu nɛ tiɛŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu pa Joshua ni ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkwe shhɛ mbhɔ pa laʼataoŋ ŋa Minnwi ni mfuʼu pa laʼataoŋ pighɔ fɔ nɛ. A ni ŋkɨna fɔ ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ thɔ Devi.
“Devi ŋa Minnwi ni nōoŋ pwapuŋ yi ghɔ nɛ, a luoŋ ni Minnwi ŋa a mieŋ a krao lɨʼɨ chhɔ ni Minnwi Jakɔ.
Ndɔ a ni ŋkrao Sholomu ŋkrao Nda ghɔ.
Mbapa nɛnnɛ, Minnwi ŋa a Chaapifuoŋ nɛ shiʼa nchhɔ moŋ nda ŋa a krao ŋoŋmishua ni mbhɔ mi nɛ nɔ haʼaŋ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa,
‘Taathɔ chhu ŋa, “Po pɔ pi faaŋ a,
shhɛ pɔ krɨ́ tigi kwò a.
Ti a yəɨ ŋkwaŋ nda ŋa minthɛ ɔ krao vəɨ?
Mimfɛ ndaʼa pi moŋ yəɨ ŋkwaŋ lɨʼɨ?
Ǹshini ndɔ nchwīe ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ pei ghao pi ni mbhɔ ma?” ’
“Pa kwéi thɔ pei, ŋgwa ŋa mbaʼa pugu piŋ chrà Minnwi ki njaʼo. Pəɨ ghà nchɨ̄ʼə nchò Jijwɛ Minnwi ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pa tǎa pəɨ ni nchwīe nu nɛ.
A yəɨ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋa pa tǎa pəɨ shini ndɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu? Pugu ni njwi pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi, ŋa pugu ni nchīi thɔ nu muuŋ fàʼa vi yi tithi nɛ. Ndwɛ pəɨ fīni vi njwi vi.
Pəɨ ni ŋkwe gɨ́ Minnwi nɔ haʼaŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ni mfɛ ni pəɨ nɛ, ndɔ ki lɔ njiʼi nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ ghɔ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ pa ŋgwa nda pa kúŋ ni njaʼo nnu ŋa Shitifiŋ ni nchhu nɛ, a shāʼa laʼa muŋu pugu kru shua muŋu moŋ pɨgɨtua.
Ndɔ Shitifiŋ lɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi, mbɨʼɨ ligi yi ndīi po njəɨ ndighaʼo Minnwi, ndɔ njəɨ Jishɔ a thi ŋgei mbhɔ Minnwi yi jɨ.
Shitifiŋ ghɔ chhu ŋa, “Njəɨ! Ǹjəɨ po ŋaʼaŋ, ǹjəɨ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua a thi ŋgei mbhɔ Minnwi yi jɨ!”
Pa ŋgwa pighɔ fɔ paʼo ŋgòu, nchri tə́nə yugu ni mbhɔ muŋu, ntei nchò vi,
mfuʼu vi ntaoŋ nɔ moŋ laʼa, tuŋ vi ni ŋguʼɔ, pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntigi pa nnu thɔ yu nɛ ni mieŋ pa mmɛ ndhwí pugu ni maʼaŋ mikhwa chəɨ ligi yi pɔ Shɔɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nthɔ ntuŋ Shitifiŋ nɛ, a luoŋ Minnwi nchhu ŋa, “Jishɔ Taathɔ, kwe jijwɛ a.”
A kwiŋ kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɛ, ŋkə̄ɨ ni njɨ ŋa, “Taathɔ, kiʼi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu nthɛ nnu pɨphɨ yei ŋa pugu chwīe nɛ.” A ni nchhu nɛnnɛ ŋkhu.
Shɔɔ ni mbiŋ ŋa pi jwi Shitifiŋ ghɔ.
Llɛ́ ghɔ ŋgwa yrɛi nthɔ mfɛ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgəʼɨ ni chɔshi Jerushalɛiŋ, pugu sha moŋ ŋguoŋ Judia pugu pa Shamaria, a twiʼa pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ.
Pa ŋkiɛŋ tɨtɨnɨ ghaŋ piŋ twei Shitifiŋ ŋkə̄ɨ vi a wūru.
Ndɔ Shɔɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ nshāaŋ chɔshi, nii nda nda nthɔ mfuʼu mbia pugu pa piŋgɛ mbɔ ghaŋ piŋ nthɔ māʼaŋ vugu chə́ɨŋ.
Ndwɛ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi shāaŋ vugu nɛ ghə̄ɨ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ nthɔ nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ fɔ.
Fili llɔ nshwiʼi moŋ laʼa Shamaria, nchīi ligi Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ ni pugu.
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ fɔ nɛ ya njwɛrɛ nnu ŋa Fili ni nchhu nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni njəɨ pa nnu ghraoghrao ŋa a ni nchwīe nu nɛ.
Pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ paʼo ŋgòu ntaoŋ mbɨŋ ntou ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ mbɨŋ pugu nɛ. Ntou pa ŋgwa ŋa pəʼɨ noŋ yugu ni ŋkhu nɛ pugu pa ŋkwíni pɨnɨ mbɔ shiʼi.
Nnɛ ntou pwanjuʼɔ pɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ.
Ŋoŋ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Shemu, ŋa a ni mbɔ ntouŋgaŋ, ni nchwīe ŋgwa Shamaria ghrāo vi ni nnu ŋgaŋ, a ni nchhu nu ŋa juju ŋkaa yu ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ laʼa, ŋgwa kikɛʼi pugu pa pi liɛŋ yaʼo vi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei pɔ pi njɨ Minnwi yɛ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni yi Liɛŋ nɛ.”
Pugu ni mfɛ ndɨɨ yugu ghɔ nɛnnɛ nthɛ ŋa nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ a ni ŋgwīni vugu ni ŋgáŋ yi ŋa a ni ntou nu nɛ.
Ndɔ pugu ni ŋga mbiŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi pugu pa Jishɔ Krishto ŋa Fili ni nchīi ni pugu nɛ, ŋkwe ŋkhǐ mbia pugu pa piŋgɛ.
Shemu piŋ ŋkaa yu, ŋga ŋkwe ŋkhǐ, nyīeŋ nu pugu Fili. A ni ŋga njəɨ pa lì pugu pa mɛmmɛ nnu ghraoghrao ŋa Fili ni nchwīe nu nɛ, ŋgrào.
Ndwɛ, pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ Jerushalɛiŋ ni ŋga njaʼo ŋa ŋgwa Shamaria piŋ chrà Minnwi, ntaoŋ Pita pugu Jouŋ,
pugu shwiʼi nduoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ni pugu nnɛ ŋa mimfɛ pugu kwe Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ naa nshwiʼi mbɨŋ shesheŋoŋ vugu, pugu ni ŋguʼɔ ŋkwe ŋkhǐ pi nɔ ligi Jishɔ Taathɔ.
Pita pugu Jouŋ nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yugu mbɨŋ pugu, pugu kwe Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Ndwɛ, Shemu ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ mbɨŋ ŋgwa pugu fāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi, a fɛ mbɨŋ ni Pita pugu Jouŋ,
nchhu nu ni pugu ŋa, “Fɛ ghrɨ́ yei vəɨ ŋkaa mu, nnɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa ǹūʼɔŋ mbhɔ a mbɨŋ yu nɛ shi mfāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi.”
Ndɔ Pita khwɛ̄ ghɔ ŋa, “Pəɨ pa mbɨŋ yɔ ghɔ shiʼi, nthɛ ŋa ɔ pīʼi ŋa minthɛ ɔ yuoŋ fɛ́ Minnwi ni mbɨŋ.
Ɔ lɔ njiʼi fāʼo shɨ̀na moŋ fàʼa yigi nthɛ ŋa njùʼɔ yɔ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yi tithi ligi Minnwi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pāʼa ŋkǔnu yɔ ni mbha nnu pɨphɨ yei nduoŋ ni Taathɔ ŋa minthɛ a līʼɛ phɨ yɔ ni pīʼi nu yei ŋkwaŋ nnu.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹjəɨ ŋa ɔ lɨnaoŋ ni kɨghɨʼə pɨphɨ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ mbhɔ phɨ.”
Shemu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pəɨ luoŋ ni Taathɔ mfɛ vəɨ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi sheshe nnu yei ŋa pəɨ chhu nthɛ a nɛ fɨʼɨ a!”

Pita pugu Jouŋ chhu pa nnu ŋa nduthɔ yugu ji nthɛ Jishɔ nɛ, ndɔ nchīi chrà Taathɔ, njɛ̄ pɨ̄nɨ nu kiʼɛ Jerushalɛiŋ. Pugu ni ŋga mbɔ shɛndaoŋ mbɨnɨ nu, nthɔ nchīi chrà Minnwi moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ mi laʼataoŋ moŋ Shamaria.
Ndɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ chhu ni Fili ŋa, “Lɔllɔ nshwiʼi mbiɛŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ Gasha nɛ.” (Yei ndaoŋ ŋa pi lɔ nuʼuŋ ntɔgɔ nu fɔ shiʼa.)
Fili lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ, ŋga njəɨ nu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ llɔ Itiopia,
ni mbɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ ndɨna nu ni mbɨŋ ŋgwafuoŋ Itiopia, thɔ Jerushalɛiŋ lɨʼɨ ghaʼo Minnwi.
A ni ŋga ŋkwəɨ nu, nchhɔ moŋ yaoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni kalɨ
nɛ nthɔ mɛ̄iŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Ishaya.
Jijwɛ Minnwi chhu ni Fili ŋa, “Kuʼɔ mbara vi yəɨ kalɨ.”
Nnɛ, Fili tei ŋgə̄ɨ mbara vi, njaʼo a thɔ mɛ̄iŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Ishaya. A pie vi ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ njaʼo nnu ŋa ɔ mɛ̄iŋ nu nɛ?”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Mimfɛ ŋ̀kie pi nɛiŋ nji ki ŋoŋ lɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ vəɨ?” Ŋgɛ̄ Fili ŋa a kuʼɔ nchhɔ pugu yu moŋ kalɨ.
Yɛ lɨʼɨ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa a ni mɛ̄iŋ nu nɛ ni mbɔ yei lɨʼɨ ŋa,
“A ni mbɔ nɔ minjɨɨ ŋa pi lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ ŋgwrā,
wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ muuŋ minjɨɨ shiʼa ŋkə̄ɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pi kiri ŋgì yi nɛ,
a shini ndɔ nchhu nnu.
Pi ni nshhū vi ndɔ ndāa ki lɔ nshaʼa vi ni ndɨndɨ.
Mimfɛ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ nchhu nnu nthɛ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yi
Nthɛ ŋa chɔmbhi yi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ kwo lūgwi.”
Mmɛŋoŋ ghɔ pie Fili ŋa, “Shwei a, njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi yei thɔ nchrā yei nnu pi nɔ ligi gɔ̌? A chrā pi nɔ ji ligi ki ŋoŋ nduoŋ?”
Nnɛ Fili jɛ̄ chrā nu kəʼɨ ghɔ, llɔ ŋkuoŋ lɨʼɨ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei, nshwei vi kəʼɨ ghɔ ni pwa pishaʼakhɔ nthɛ Jishɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga nyīeŋ nshwiʼi nu shɛndaoŋ ghɔ ntaoŋ yichəɨ lɨʼɨ ŋkhǐ pɔ fɔ, mmɛŋoŋ ghɔ chhu ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, ŋkhǐ pɔ nɛiŋ, a shi mbɨnɨ ntāra khɔ ntāra a ŋa kiʼi ŋ̀kwe ŋkhǐ?”
[Fili khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Minthɛ ɔ kwe, nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ̈ mbiŋ ni ŋguoŋ njùʼɔ yɔ.” Ŋoŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Mbiŋ Jishɔ Krishto Muuŋ Minnwi.”]
Mfɛ gɨ́ ni Kalɨ ghɔ ŋa a tithi, pugu Fili shwiʼi kiʼɛ moŋ ŋkhǐ, Fili fɛ ŋkhǐ ghɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga ntaoŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ, Jijwɛ Taathɔ lɔ̄gɔ Fili ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ. Mmɛŋoŋ ghɔ shi ki lɔ nuʼuŋ njəɨ Fili jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ghɔ, mbɔrɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu ni vhi ndɨnaoŋ ni pwanjuʼɔ.
Fili yəɨ noŋ yi laʼataoŋ Ashotu. A ni nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ Kaisharia, nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, nthɔ nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghao ti nuʼuŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ Kaisharia.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ yei Shɔɔ wuʼɔ nthɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ nchhu nu ŋa a shi njwi ghaŋ younjiŋ taathɔ. Ŋgə̄ɨ mbara taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ
nchhu ghɔ ŋa a nāʼaŋ pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ mfɛ ghɔ, nɔ shwei nu ŋoŋ ŋa ju, Shɔɔ, yie ghɔ nɛ ni ŋgwa moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi Damashiku, nnɛ ŋa ä njəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ pi ŋgwa Shɛndaoŋ
ŋa Jishɔ ni nōoŋ nɛ, mbia ki piŋgɛ, kaŋ a shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu mbɨnɨ ni pugu Jerushalɛiŋ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Shɔɔ ni nyīeŋ mbara nu Damashiku nɛ, líʼɛ wīʼi shɛiŋ mbɨŋ yu llɔ po.
A gū shhɛ njaʼo yichəɨ ŋggì chhu nu ghɔ ŋa,
“Shɔɔ! Shɔɔ! Ɔ fɛ ŋgəʼɨ vəɨ ŋa?”
Shɔɔ pie ŋa, “Ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌, Taathɔ?”
Ŋggì ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Mi Jishɔ ŋa ɔ thɔ fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ lɔllɔ nii moŋ laʼa, kaŋ pi shi nshwei ghɔ ni nnu ŋa ɔ shi nchwīe nɛ.”
Ndɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ nɛ tithi, nchò yugu llwī, njaʼo ŋggì, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ ŋgaŋ vi.
Shɔɔ lɔllɔ shhɛ, mfēi ligi yi, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ lɨʼɨ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pi wɛ̄iŋ pi mbhɔ yi nii nɔ ghɔ Damashiku.
Ndɔ a shini ndɔ njəɨ lɨʼɨ nɔ trɛi llɛ́ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njɨ yaoŋ ki nnu sheshe yaoŋ.
Ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ Damashiku, ligi yi pɔ Anania, Taathɔ chwīe a yəɨ nnu, nchhu ghɔ moŋ nnu ghɔ ŋa,
“Anania!”
A khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Līi njəɨ! Mbɔ nɛiŋ, ma Taathɔ.”
Taathɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Pīri noŋ yɔ ŋgə̄ɨ shɛndaoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Ndɨndɨ nɛ, nda Judashi, ndīi ŋoŋ chəɨ llɔ Tashɔ, ligi yi pɔ Shɔɔ. A chhɔ nɛ nduoŋ Minnwi.
Minnwi kwo chwīe a yəɨ nnu, ŋoŋ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Anania, thɔ nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ yu nnɛ ŋa a pɨnɨ njəɨ lɨʼɨ.”
Ndɔ Anania khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Taathɔ, ntou ŋgwa kwo fɨ̄ʼɨ ntou pa nnu vəɨ nthɛ ŋoŋ vei, fɨʼɨ pa nnu wuwuru ŋa a chwīe mbɨŋ ŋgwa pɔ pi taoŋtaoŋ Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ.
Ndɔ a ni ŋkwe ghrɨ́ mbhɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ thɔ nu Damashiku hɛiŋ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà njɨʼə noŋ yugu mbɨŋ ghɔ.”
Ndɔ Taathɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Ghə̄ɨ, nthɛ ŋa a yaoŋ fàʼa ŋa ǹchuʼɔ ŋa a chwīe pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ pugu pa fùoŋ ni pa ŋgwa Ishrae ji a nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa mmu nduthɔ a, shi nōoŋ ghɔ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a pie ŋa a yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ a nɛ.”

Nnɛ, Anania lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nii nda ghɔ, ŋga nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ yu, nchhu ŋa, “Ndǐŋ a Shɔɔ, Jishɔ Taathɔ ŋa a nōoŋ noŋ yi vɛ shɛndaoŋ ŋa ɔ nì ntɔgɔ fɔ nthɔ nɛ, taoŋ a nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ɔ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ lɨʼɨ ndɔ ndɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pichəɨ yaoŋ nɔ ghrǎo shadi paʼa ntaoŋ nɔ ligi yi a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ lɨʼɨ. Ndɔllɔ kiʼɛ pi kwe vi ni ŋkhǐ.
A jɨ maoŋ mfāʼo ghrɨ́ kiʼɛ.
Shɔɔ ni mbɔ pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ Damashiku nɔ ntou llɛ.
Shɔɔ yrɛi taʼa ŋgɛ́ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi njɛ̄ chīi nu chrà Minnwi fɔ, ŋa Jishɔ muuŋ Minnwi.

Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni njaʼo a thɔ nchīi nu nɛ ni ŋgrào, mbie ŋa, “Yei shi lɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nthɔ mfɛ wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ ni ŋgwa pɛ Jerushalɛiŋ, ŋa pugu ghà njɨʼə noŋ yugu mbɨŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Jishɔ nɛ? A shini ndɔ ŋguʼɔ nthɔ hɛiŋ pi nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu ŋgwa pighɔ ŋgə̄ɨ mfɛ vugu ni pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ?”
Ndɔ chīi nu chrà Minnwi Shɔɔ pɨnɨ ntɨnɨ ŋgaʼa, a llwī nchò pa Juu Damashiku nɔ nōoŋ nu ki khuthɔ ŋa Jishɔ pɔ pi Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ shini.
Ntou llɛ́ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, pa Juu paoŋ ntaŋ nɔ jwi nu vi.
Ndɔ pi tūgu ntáŋ yugu ghɔ ni Shɔɔ. Pugu ni nthɔ mbɛʼi pa choŋkaʼa ŋa pi ghà ntɔgɔ fɔ nii moŋ laʼa nɛ ni naoŋchɨ pugu pa tuʼu nɔ jwi nu vi.
Ndɔ ni tuʼu chəɨ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Shɔɔ lɔ̄gɔ vi niʼiŋ vi moŋ mikuo nshwiʼi vi moŋ mbo mbɨŋ nda, a taoŋ.
Shɔɔ ni ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ, ŋkaa nu nɔ tūru nu pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ. Ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ ŋa a taʼa ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ, ŋka pɔgɔ vi pɔgɔ.

Ndɔ Banaba thɔ nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu vi, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ mbhɔ yi ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju njəɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, nshwei vugu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni njəɨ Taathɔ shɛndaoŋ, Taathɔ ghɔ chhu pa nnu ghɔ. Mbɨnɨ mfɨ̄ʼɨ ni pugu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Shɔɔ ni nshwei chrà Minnwi nɔ ligi Jishɔ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ Damashiku nɛ.
Nnɛ Shɔɔ ni nyīeŋ nu pugu pugu kaʼa Jerushalɛiŋ, nthɔ nchīi chrà Minnwi ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ moŋ ligi Taathɔ.
A ni nchrā nu ndɔ ndōu nu pugu pa ŋgwa Juu pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchrā pi chrà Gri nɛ, ndɔ ŋgwa Juu pighɔ tāʼa nu njwi vi jwi.
Pa pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ ni ŋga nji ŋa pi tāʼa nu njwi vi, ndɔ̄gɔ vi nshwiʼi nɔ Kaisharia ntaoŋ vi Tashɔ.
Nnɛ, chɔshi moŋ ŋguoŋ Judia, ni Galili, ni Shamaria fāʼo ghɨghrɨ. Jijwɛ Minnwi ghɛ̄rɛ chɔshi pɨnɨ ntɨnɨ mbīgi ndɔ mbɨnɨ njiɛŋ mbīgi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu chhɔ chɔmbhi yugu ni pɔ́gɔ Taathɔ nɛ.
Pita ni nyīeŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghao, nɔ yichəɨ ŋgɛ́ a ghə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ kra ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ Lida,
ŋga nchəɨŋ fɔ njəɨ yichəɨ ŋoŋ, ligi yi pɔ Aenia, ŋa pəʼɨ noŋ yi ni ŋkwo khu, a kwo nūaŋ kúoŋ nɔ fúoŋ ŋgaʼo.
Pita chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Aenia, Jishɔ Krishto yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yɔ, lɔllɔ nchwīe kúoŋ yɔ.” Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ a lɔllɔ.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni ndaʼa nu Lida pugu Sharoŋ nɛ, yəɨ vi ŋkara mbiŋ Taathɔ ghao.
Ndɨɨ ghɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ Jopa, ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ chəɨ ni mbɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Tabita, mbɔ moŋ chrà Gri ŋa Dɔka.
A ni ndɔ̄gɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ yi ghao nthɔ nchwīe shiʼi ndɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ ghaŋ pou.
Moŋ llɛ́ pighɔ a gū ghɨ̌nɔ ndɔ ŋkhu. Pi ni ŋga nshɨ̄gao vi, ndɔ̄gɔ vi ŋkuʼɔ nūʼɔŋ moŋ njiɛŋ nda tɔthɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa Lida ni mbara Jopa nɛ, pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ gha njaʼo ŋa Pita ni mbɔ Jopa, ntaoŋ paa ŋgwa ghɔ, māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yi nchhu nu ŋa, “Pigi paʼo mbhɔ, kɔnɔ nthɔ njəɨ vigi ki lɔ nuʼuŋ njīri.”

Pita yrɛi ŋgə̄ɨ pugu pugu, ŋga nchəɨŋ fɔ pi lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋkuʼɔ ni ju moŋ nda tɔthɨ. Ŋguoŋ pa ŋkugu ni ŋkɨrɨ yəɨ Pita ŋkə̄ɨ ndɔ nthɔ nōoŋ pa puoŋ mi ndhwí pugu pa pichəɨ mɛmmɛ ndhwí fɨgəɨ yugu ŋa Dɔka ni nchwīe ndɨɨ ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ nɛ.
Pita chhu ŋguoŋ yugu taoŋ moŋ njiɛŋ nda ghɔ, â ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi nduoŋ Minnwi, ŋkara mbɛʼi khu ŋoŋ ghɔ nchhu ŋa, “Tabita, lɔllɔ!” A fēi ligi yi ŋga njəɨ Pita, ndɔllɔ nchɔchhɔ.
Pita fɛ mbhɔ yi ŋgɛ̄rɛ vi a lɔllɔ tɔthɨ. Nnɛ, a mɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ, pugu pa ŋkugu, mfɛ vi yi maoŋ ni pugu.
Nnu pei ni nyīeŋ ŋkwe ŋguoŋ Jopa, ntou ŋgwa kara mbiŋ Taathɔ.
Pita laʼa Jopa nɔ ntou llɛ́ pugu yichəɨ ŋoŋ, ligi yi pɔ Shemu, mbɔ ŋgaŋ chwīe ŋgrào.
Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ Kaisharia ligi yi pɔ Kɔniliu. A ni mbɔ nthishɨ taʼa ŋkɨɨ pa shoogɛ moŋ kwíe ntɨgao ŋkɨɨ pa shoogɛ llɔ Itali.
A ni mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ Minnwi. Nduthɔ yi pugu pa ŋguoŋ ndaaŋoŋ yi ni nthɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi. A ni nthɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ ntou pa ghaŋ pou, ndɔ nduoŋ Minnwi ki jwɛ.
A ni mbɔ moŋ trɛi minaoŋ ni naoŋchɨ, Minnwi nōoŋ nnu ghɔ, a yəɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, a chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Kɔniliu!”
A līi ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ ni pɔgɔ gu, mbie ŋa, “A khɔ, Taathɔ?”
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Minnwi kwiŋ luoŋ yɔ pugu pwapuŋ yɔ ni pwatua.
Ndwɛ, taoŋ ŋgwa Jopa, pugu ghə̄ɨ mɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ chəɨ ligi yi pɔ Shemu Pita.
A laʼa nu pugu Shemu mbɔ ŋgaŋ chwīe ŋgrào, ŋa nda yi pɔ ŋkɨŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ nɛ.”
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ ŋa a ni nchrā ghɔ nɛ gha ŋkwo ghə̄ɨ nɛ, Kɔniliu gɛ̄ paa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni mfāʼa nu mbhɔ yu nɛ, ni taʼa shoogɛ mbɔ ŋoŋ Minnwi shɨna pa shoogɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ nshaʼa vugu nɛ.
Ŋga mfɨ̄ʼɨ ŋguoŋ nnu pighɔ ni pugu, ntaoŋ vugu Jopa.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, pugu pɔ shɛndaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu ti ŋkwo para moŋ laʼa. Pita kuʼɔ thɔnda
lɨʼɨ luoŋ Minnwi moŋ ntuŋ minaoŋ.
Njì yia vi, a tāʼa yaoŋ njɨ, pi gha nthɔ nyiaŋ maoŋ, a yəɨ nnu.
Njəɨ po ŋaʼaŋ, a yəɨ yaoŋ shwiʼi nu shhɛ nɔ mmɛ pra mbhɔ ndhwí, pi wɛ̄iŋ vi ŋkuoŋ khwɛ ghaa pi, a shwiʼi nu.
Ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ pa minyieŋ pugu pa mimaoŋ shatei pugu pa mishi moŋ ŋgunu ni mbɔ fɔ.
Yichəɨ ŋggì taoŋ po nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pita, lɔllɔ, jwi ŋkru.”
Pita khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ŋga, ma Taathɔ! Ǹdɔ naa ma mfuo noŋ a ni maoŋ fuo ki maoŋ nchhí.”
Ŋggì ghɔ pɨnɨ nchhu ghɔ mbra ŋgɛ́ ŋa, “Kiʼi mɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi chwīe a pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ ŋa a yaoŋ nchhí.”
Yei nnu ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɔ trɛi ŋgɛ, nnɛ pi lɔ̄gɔ maoŋ pighɔ mbɨnɨ nɔ po.
Pita ni ŋga nthɔ ŋgrāo njiŋ nnu ŋa a yəɨ nɛ, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Kɔniliu ni ntaoŋ nɛ kwo pie ti njəɨ nda Shemu, nthɔ nthi choŋkaʼa,
mɛ̄iŋ nu ndɔ mbie nu ŋa Shemu ŋa ligi yi Pita nɛ laʼa pi fɔ?
Nɔ haʼaŋ Pita ni ŋguʼɔ nthɔ mbīʼi njiŋ nnu ŋa a yəɨ nɛ, Jijwɛ Minnwi chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, trɛi ŋgwa thɔ nɛ ndīi ghɔ.
Ndwɛ, lɔllɔ, nshwiʼi shhɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ pəɨ pugu ki lɔ ndōu nthɛ ŋa a taoŋ mmu ntaoŋ vugu.”
Pita shwiʼi ŋgə̄ɨ mbara ŋgwa pighɔ, nchhu ŋa, “Mi ŋoŋ ŋa pəɨ līi nu nɛ, pəɨ thɔ pi khɔ?”

Pugu chhu ŋa, “Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi yi taoŋtaoŋ chhu ni Kɔniliu, mbɔ nthishɨ taʼa ŋkɨɨ pa shoogɛ, mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ, mbɔgɔ Minnwi, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Juu nchrā shiʼi nɔ ligi yi, ŋa a gɛ̄ ghɔ nda yu, nji ŋa a shi nji nnu ŋa ɔ fāʼo nɔ chhu nu nɛ.”
Pita chhu ni ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu nii nda pugu pugu laʼa. Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ a pīri noŋ yi, pugu pugu ghə̄ɨ. Pichəɨ pa ghaŋ piŋ llɔ Jopa yōu njiŋ yi pugu pugu ghə̄ɨ kaʼa.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ a chəɨŋ Kaisharia, lɨʼɨ ŋa Kɔniliu ni nthɔ njwɛrɛ vi pugu pa lǐŋ pi, pugu pa taannu pi ŋa a ni ŋgɛ̄ vugu nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa Pita ni ntāʼa nu nii nda nɛ, Kɔniliu paoŋ pugu yu ŋgū shhɨ yu, ŋgaʼo vi.
Ndɔ Pita pɨʼɨ vi tɔthɨ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Lɔllɔ tɔthɨ mummu wuʼɔ ŋoŋmishua ŋkaa mu.”
Pita gha nchrā pugu yu nɛ, nii nda njəɨ ntou ŋgwa kɨrɨ fɔ.
Pita chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ ji ni noŋ yəɨ ŋa a lɔ mbie ŋa ŋoŋ Juu kra, ki nchīri pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Ndɔ Minnwi nōoŋ vəɨ ŋa kiʼi ǹdīi yichəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ ni māʼaŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ mɛ̄iŋ a nɛ, ǹthɔ ki lɔ njiʼi ŋkɔ̄rɔ, nɛnnɛ, m̀bie vəɨ nɛ ndwɛ ŋa ti pəɨ ni mɛ̄iŋ a pi ŋa?”
Kɔniliu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “A khwɛ llɛmbhi shiʼa wuʼɔ moŋ ndɨɨ yei ŋa mi ni nthɔ nduoŋ Minnwi nda mu moŋ trɛi minaoŋ ni naoŋchɨ. Ŋga njəɨ yichəɨ ŋoŋ thi shhɨ mu ndhwí yi thɔ nchiachia,
nchhu ŋa, ‘Kɔniliu, Minnwi yaʼo luoŋ yɔ ndɔ ŋkwiŋ pwapuŋ yɔ.
Fɛ ntaoŋ Jopa ŋgɛ̄ Shemu ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa Pita, ŋa a thɔ ndaʼa nu nda ŋoŋ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Shemu, ŋkɨŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ chwīe ŋgrào nɛ.’
Nɛnnɛ, ǹtaoŋ ŋoŋ vɛ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, ɔ ya ndɔ nchwīe a pwa nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ thɔ nɛ. Nɛnnɛ, pigi kɨrɨ hɛiŋ ndwɛ shhɨ Minnwi nɔ yaʼo nu ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa Taathɔ chhu vɛ ŋa ɔ chhu nɛ.”
Pita jɛ̄ chrà nu nchhu ŋa, “Shishini, ǹja njəɨ ndwɛ ŋa Minnwi shiʼa nōoŋ shieligi
A ghà mbiŋ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pɔgɔ vi ndɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa a kāʼo nɛ, ki lɔ ndīi ŋa a llɔ pi moŋ yəɨ laʼataoŋ.
Pəɨ ji ŋkɨ̀nɨ ŋa a ni ntaoŋ ni ŋgwa Ishrae nɛ, nthɔ nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ taʼaŋggi, ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto ŋa a Taathɔ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nɛ.
Pəɨ ji mmɛ nnu ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ Judia, jɛ̄ Galili, ndɨɨ ŋa Jouŋ ni ŋkwo jɛ̄ chīi nu chrà Minnwi ŋa ŋgwa pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ a kwe vugu ni ŋkhǐ nɛ.

Pəɨ ji Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nshwiʼi Jijwɛ yi pugu pa ghrɨ́ mbɨŋ yu nɛ. A ghə̄ɨ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ nchhɔ nchwīe pa nnu shiʼi nchhɔ njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Shata ni nthɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa Minnwi ni mbɔ pugu yu.
“Pigi pɔ pi pa miŋkwentie ŋguoŋ nnu pei ghao ŋa a ni nchwīe moŋ laʼataoŋ pa ŋgwa Juu pugu Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ. Pi jwi vi ntɔgɔ pi nɔ kwīŋ nu vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Ndɔ a gha ndaʼa trɛi llɛ́, Minnwi pɨnɨ mbɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu, nchwīe a nōoŋ noŋ yi,
ndɔ ki lɔ nōoŋ pi ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa, ŋkiɛŋ pigi mbɔ pa miŋkwentie ŋa Minnwi ni nchuʼɔ vigi, mbɔ pigi yɛ ŋa pigi pugu ni njɨ maoŋ ndɔ nnu nu kaʼa ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ŋkwo kuʼɔ nɛ.
A fɛ gɨ́ ni pigi ŋa pigi chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni ŋgwa, ndɔ nchhu ni pugu ŋa a ju mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ vi nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɛ nshaʼa ŋgwa maoŋ pugu pa ŋgwa khu nɛ.
Ŋguoŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ghao ni nchrā nthɛ vi, nchhu nu ŋa, ‘Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu piŋ vi nɛ, Minnwi shi ndīʼɛ phɨ yugu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ghrɨ́ Jishɔ.’ ”
Pita ni ŋga ŋguʼɔ nchrā nu, Jijwɛ Minnwi shwiʼi mbɨŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ njaʼo ŋkɨ̀nɨ yei nɛ.
Pa ŋgwa Juu llɔ Jopa ŋa pugu ni mbiŋ Minnwi ŋa pugu ni nthɔ pugu pa Pita nɛ ghrāo ŋa Minnwi shwiʼi fɛ́ yi, mbɔ Jijwɛ yi, mbɨŋ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa pugu yaʼo pugu chrā nu moŋ pa chrà taoŋ nduoŋ nthɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi.
Nnɛ Pita chhu kiʼɛ ŋa,
“Yichəɨ ŋoŋ nuʼuŋ mbɔ ŋa mimfɛ a lāa ŋa kiʼi ŋgwa pei kwe ŋkhǐ, haʼaŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi shwiʼi mbɨŋ pugu wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nshwiʼi mbɨŋ pia nɛ?”
A fɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi kwe vugu ni ŋkhǐ moŋ ligi Jishɔ Krishto. Nnɛ, pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa pugu laʼa nɔ shɨgɛi llɛ́.
Ndwɛ, pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu pa pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ moŋ Judia yaʼo ŋa pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ piŋ chrà Minnwi.
Pita ni ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ, pichəɨ ŋgwa Juu
ŋa pugu ni mbiŋ Jishɔ nɛ chhu ŋa Pita chwīe paʼa a lɔ ŋkāʼo
mbie nu ŋa, “A ni nchwīe khɔ ɔ ghə̄ɨ nda ŋgwa haʼaŋ pi lɔ niʼiŋ vugu ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, ti njɨ pi maoŋ pəɨ pugu?”
Ndɔ Pita jɛ̄ fɨ̄ʼɨ nu ni pugu ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ moŋ lɛiŋ.
“Mi ni mbɔ Jopa nthɔ nduoŋ Minnwi, Minnwi nduthɔ yi nōoŋ nnu vəɨ, njəɨ yaoŋ, a shwiʼi nu shhɛ nɔ mbhɔ ndhwí nshwiʼi nu ni khwɛ ghaa llɔ po, nthɔ ntithi yəɨ mu.
Ŋ̀ga ndīi moŋ ghɔ shiʼi, njəɨ pa mimaoŋ mooŋ laʼa pugu pa mimaoŋ mooŋ trǔ, pa mimaoŋ shatei pugu pa mishi mooŋ ŋgunu.
Ǹjaʼo yichəɨ ŋggì chhu ŋa, ‘P̂ita, lɔllɔ njwi ŋkru.’
“Ndɔ ŋ̀khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Ŋga, ma Taathɔ! Pa maoŋ fuo ki maoŋ nchhí lɔ naa ma nii nchò mu yaʼa.’
“Ŋggì ghɔ pɨnɨ nchrā mbara ŋgɛ́ nchhu ŋa, ‘Kiʼi mɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi chwīe a pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ ŋa a yaoŋ nchhí.’
Yei nnu ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɔ trɛi ŋgɛ, pi pɨnɨ nshūu ŋguoŋ maoŋ pighɔ ŋkuʼɔ nɔ ghɔ po.
“Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ trɛi ŋgwa chəɨŋ nda ŋa pigi ni mbɔ nɛ, pi taoŋ vugu vəɨ llɔ Kaisharia.
Jijwɛ Minnwi chhu vəɨ ŋa pigi pugu ghə̄ɨ kaʼa, kiʼi ǹjiʼi ndōu. Pigi pa ntɨgao ghaŋ piŋ pei ghə̄ɨ nda ŋoŋ ghɔ kaʼa.
A chhu ni pigi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni njəɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, a thi nda yu, nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Taoŋ ŋgwa Jopa mɛ̄iŋ Shemu ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Pita nɛ.
A shi māʼaŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ vɛ ŋa ɔ shi ŋkie fɔ ndūgu, pəɨ pa mbaanda yɔ.’
“Nɔ haʼaŋ mi ni njɛ̄ chrà nu nɛ, Jijwɛ Minnwi shwiʼi mbɨŋ pugu wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni nshwiʼi mbɨŋ pia nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ.
Nnɛ ŋ̀kwiŋ chrà Taathɔ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni nchhu ŋa,
‘Kwe ŋkhǐ Jouŋ ni mbɔ pi moŋ ŋkhǐ, ndɔ pəɨ shi mfāʼo kwe ŋkhǐ moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi.’
Ti ä mbɔ ŋa Minnwi wuʼɔ mfɛ pi taʼa fɛ́ ghɔ ni pugu nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mfɛ ni pia ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni mbiŋ Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ Taathɔ nɛ, m̀bɔ nyaŋ pi gɔ̌ ŋa ŋ̀kaŋ ni nthɛ m̀bɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni Minnwi?”
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, nchò yugu chri pugu ghaʼo Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Minnwi fɛ shɨ̀na ni ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋkaa pugu ŋa pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ mfāʼo chɔmbhi.”
Ndwɛ pa ghaŋ piŋ pɛ ŋa pugu ni nsha nthɛ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa pi ni mfɛ nu ni ghaŋ piŋ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni njwi Shitifiŋ nɛ, ghə̄ɨ ti nchəɨŋ Fonishia, Shaipru ni Antiɔ, nthɔ nshwei chrà Minnwi wuʼɔ ni pa Juu.
Ndɔ pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ llɔ Shaipru pugu Shiriŋ ghə̄ɨ Antiɔ nshwei chrà pwa pishaʼakhɔ nthɛ Jishɔ Taathɔ ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Mbhɔ Taathɔ ni mbɔ mbɨŋ pugu, ŋkiɛŋ ntou ŋgwa piŋ ŋkara mfɛ noŋ yugu ni Taathɔ.
Pishaʼakhɔ pei nyīeŋ nchəɨŋ moŋ chɔshi Jerushalɛiŋ, nnɛ pugu taoŋ Banaba Antiɔ.
A ni ŋga nthɔ njəɨ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi nōoŋ pwapuŋ yi ni pugu nɛ, mfāʼo pwatua māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yugu ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ shhɨ ŋkɨna ni taʼanjuʼɔ moŋ mieŋ nu noŋ yugu ni Taathɔ,
nthɛ ŋa Banaba ghɔ ni mbɔ pi ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ ndɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi ndɔ ntɨnɨ moŋ piŋ. Nnɛ, ntou ŋgwa piŋ Taathɔ.
Nnɛ, Banaba ghə̄ɨ Tashɔ nɔ līi nu Shɔɔ,
ŋga njəɨ vi, ndɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ Antiɔ, nɔ ŋguoŋ taʼa ŋgaʼo ghɔ, pugu pi paa paoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ chɔshi ghɔ, njɛʼi ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ kɨrɨ ŋgwa fɔ. A ni mbɔ pi Antiɔ ŋa pi fǔoŋ mɛ̄iŋ ghaŋ piŋ ni Krishitɛŋ.
Moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pichəɨ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ Antiɔ.
Taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna pugu, ligi yi pɔ Agabu, lɔllɔ, Jijwɛ Minnwi nōoŋ ghɔ a chhu ŋa, ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ njì shi ŋgū moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi. Njì ghɔ ni ŋgū ndɨɨ ŋa Klaudiu ni nthɔ nshaʼa ŋguoŋ mbhi Roma nɛ.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ nthi muŋu ŋa pugu shi ntaoŋ ghɛ̀rɛ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ shesheŋoŋ vugu fāʼo nɛ, nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ nɔ moŋ Judia.
Nɛnnɛ, nchuʼɔ ghɛ̀rɛ ghɔ ntaoŋ ni Banaba pugu Shɔɔ ŋa pugu fɛ ni pa thishɨ chɔshi ghɔ Judia nɛ.
Moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ, fùoŋ Hɛrɔ jɛ̄ nthɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pichəɨ ghaŋ chɔshi.
A ni njwi Jɛiŋ, mbɔ ndǐŋ Jouŋ, ni kafa.
Ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa nnu ghɔ pwa ŋgwa Juu, a ghə̄ɨ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ Pita ŋkaa yu. Yei ni mbɔ moŋ ndɨɨ jɨ Jɨ Brɛi ki Kuʼɔ.
A ni ŋga ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi, niʼiŋ chə́ɨŋ, mfɛ vi fɔ ni khwɛ kwíe pa khwɛ shoogɛ ŋa pugu thɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi vi. Hɛrɔ ni ŋkāʼa nu nɔ shaʼa nu vi shhɛnte ndɨɨ ŋa Jɨ Lli Njiʼa tɔgɔ nɛ.
Nnɛ, pi ni niʼiŋ Pita chə́ɨŋ, chɔshi luoŋ Minnwi ki jwɛ mfɛ nu ghɔ.
A gha mbɔ ni tuʼu yɛ ŋa Hɛrɔ ni mbɔ nɔ fuʼu nu vi nɛ, Pita ni nūaŋ shɨna paa shoogɛ, pi krao vi ni paa chɛiŋ, pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ thi choŋkaʼa chə́ɨŋ nthɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi nu.

Ŋga njəɨ nu, ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi moŋ chə́ɨŋ ghɔ, líʼɛ thɛ moŋ njiɛŋ chə́ɨŋ ghɔ. Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi kwaʼa Pita nɔ mbru yi, mbɨʼɨ vi tɔthɨ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Kɔnɔ ndɔllɔ!” Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ pa chɛiŋ pighɔ taoŋ nɔ mbhɔ Pita.
Nnɛ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Krao ŋkandaŋ yɔ, ŋgwɛ tra yɔ.” Pita chwīe nnɛ. Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pɨnɨ nchhu ŋa, “Māʼaŋ mmɛ ndhwí yɔ nthɔ pɔgɔ ghə̄ɨ.”
Pita lɔllɔ ntaoŋ njōu njiŋ yi, a shini ndɔ nji ŋa nnu ŋa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ ni nchwīe nu nɛ ni mbɔ pi ŋkiɛŋ nnu, a ni ŋgɛ̄ ŋa a thɔ njəɨ pi nnu.

Pugu ni ŋga ntaoŋ ti mfərə fǔoŋ ŋgaŋ kɛ̄ʼi lɨʼɨ pugu mbra yi, ŋgə̄ɨ nchə́ɨŋ choŋkaʼa tɨ́nɨ ŋa a ni nii moŋ laʼa nɛ, choŋkaʼa ghɔ chuʼɔ ni nōoŋ yi. Pugu taoŋ nyīeŋ shwiʼi nu shɛndaoŋ chəɨ, ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ mieŋ vi.
Lɨna Pita kwəɨ kiʼɛ a chhu ni noŋ yi ŋa, “Ndwɛ, ǹji shini ŋa Taathɔ taoŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ yi ŋa a thɔ ŋkwe a mbhɔ Hɛrɔ pugu pa ŋguoŋ nnu pɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Juu ni mbīʼi nu ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.”
Thɔ yi ni ŋga nja nshie ni nnu yɛ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ yu nɛ, a ghə̄ɨ laʼa Meri mǔuŋ Jouŋ Maaku, lɨʼɨ ŋa ntou ŋgwa ni ŋkɨrɨ nchhɔ nduoŋ Minnwi nɛ.
A ni ŋkwēi chonda ŋkaʼa mbhi, muuŋ fàʼa nda ghɔ mbɔ Rɔda thɔ lɨʼɨ chuʼɔ.
Ŋga njaʼo a pɔ ŋggì Pita, a fāʼo ntou pwatua ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nchuʼɔ choŋkaʼa, ntei mbɨnɨ nda, nshwei ŋgwa ŋa Pita thi nɛ mbhi.
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ ya mbɔ pi lɨ̀lɨŋ.” A tīi ŋa nnu ŋa a chhu nu nɛ yie ghɔ, pugu chhu kiʼɛ ŋa, “Kaŋ a pɔ pi ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ŋa a ghà ŋkɛ̄ʼi vi nɛ.”
Ndɔ Pita wuʼɔ nchhɔ ŋkwēi kwēi, pugu gha nchuʼɔ njəɨ a pɔ ju nɛ, pugu ghrāo pɨphɨ.

A nōoŋ ni mbhɔ yi ŋa p̂ugu lɛrɛ laŋ, mfɨ̄ʼɨ ni pugu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Taathɔ mfuʼu vi moŋ chə́ɨŋ nɛ, ndɔ nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ shwei Jɛiŋ pugu pa pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ ni nnu pei.” A lɔllɔ kiʼɛ ŋga ntaoŋ mbhi ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ nduoŋ.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, thɔ ŋguoŋ ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ vuʼu ni nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ Pita nɛ.
Hɛrɔ fɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi taʼa vi, ndɔ pi tāʼa vi kie. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, a tou pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ pighɔ, mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi jwi vugu. Nnɛ Hɛrɔ ghɔ lɔllɔ Judia ŋgə̄ɨ ndaʼa Kaisharia nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ.

Hɛrɔ ni mfāʼo pɨgɨtua mbɨŋ pa ghaŋ Tairɛ pugu Shidoŋ. Ŋgwa pei chrà ntaoŋ ni taʼaŋggi ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ njəɨ Hɛrɔ, mfǔoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ ndɨ̄gəɨ Blashitu mbɔ taʼa mmɛŋoŋ shɨna pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthɔ ndɨna nu ni ntuʼɔ nɛ ŋa a ghɛ̄rɛ vugu. Nɛnnɛ pugu ghə̄ɨ mbara Hɛrɔ ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa pugu pugu lūgwi nthɛ ŋa laʼa yugu ghà mfāʼo maoŋ pi llɔ laʼataoŋ fùoŋ Hɛrɔ.
A ni ŋga mbɔ llɛ́ ŋa pi ni ntigi ŋa pugu pugu paoŋ nɛ, Hɛrɔ māʼaŋ pɨ̀rɨ yi, nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ yi, mfɛ chrà ni ŋgwa.
Ŋgwa paʼo ŋgòu ŋa, “A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋggì ŋoŋmishua, a pɔ pi ŋggì nnwi!”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ wie vi a gū shhɛ nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ mfɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi. Pa ŋgɨŋgɨɨ ni ŋkru vi, a khu.
Ndɔ chrà Minnwi nyīeŋ mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ ŋgwa piŋ mbīgi nu.
Banaba pugu Shɔɔ ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ fàʼa yugu, ndɔ̄gɔ Jouŋ Maaku pugu pugu pɨ̄nɨ llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ.

Moŋ chɔshi Antiɔ, pa pichəɨ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pugu pa masha ni mbɔ fɔ. Ɔ ni mfāʼo Banaba, Shimioŋ, ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Yishhi nɛ, Lushiɔ llɔ Shiriŋ, Maneŋ, ŋa a ni ŋkuʼɔ pugu Hɛrɔ ŋa a shaʼa krao Roma nɛ, ni Shɔɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ ŋgaʼo Taathɔ ndɔ njī ŋkhǐ nɛ, Jijwɛ Minnwi chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Chuʼɔ Banaba pugu Shɔɔ nūʼɔŋ vugu nɔ chwīe nu fàʼa ŋa ŋ̀gɛ̄ vugu ŋa pugu chwīe nɛ.”
Pugu jī ŋkhǐ ndɔ nduoŋ Minnwi, nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yugu mbɨŋ pugu, ntaoŋ vugu kiʼɛ.
Jijwɛ Minnwi gha ŋkwo taoŋ vugu, pugu ghə̄ɨ Shɛlushia, nshāʼa ŋkhǐ ntaoŋ Shaipru.
Pugu ni ŋga nchəɨŋ Shalami, nchīi chrà Minnwi moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi pa Juu. Pugu ni ndɔ̄gɔ Jouŋ Maaku ŋa a ghɛ̄rɛ vugu ni fàʼa ghɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga nyīeŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ moŋ muuŋ ŋkǔnu ghɔ tri ŋkhǐ nɛ, ti nchəɨŋ Pafɔ, mbāoŋ pugu pa ŋgaŋ fhɔ̌ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Baa-Jishɔ, mbɔ ŋoŋ Juu ŋa a ni mbɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ mifɨɨ.
A ni mbɔ nuʼɔŋthɔ Shɛgiu Pɔɔ, ŋa a ni nthɔ shaʼa Shaipru nɛ, ndɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ lɨna nɛ. Ŋoŋ vei ni ŋgɛ̄ Shɔɔ pugu Banaba nthɛ ŋa a ni ntāʼa nu njaʼo chrà Minnwi.
Ndɔ Elima, mbɔ ntouŋgaŋ (nthɛ ŋa a njiŋ ligi yi), tāra vugu mbaʼo nu ŋa kiʼi ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa ghɔ piŋ.
Ndɔ Shɔɔ, ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Pɔɔ nɛ, ni ŋga ŋkwo lɨnaoŋ ni Jijwɛ Minnwi, nchaoŋ ligi yi mbɨŋ yu,
nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ muuŋ Shata, mbɔ mbɨ̌na ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa a yi ndɨndɨ nɛ. Ɔ lɨnaoŋ ni ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ mifɨɨ pugu pa nnu pɨphɨ. Ɔ ghà ŋguʼɔ ŋkɨna nchhɔ ŋkāa nu nɔ kara nu nnu shini Taathɔ a pɔ nɔ lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ!
Ndɔ līi njəɨ, mbhɔ Taathɔ gū nɛ mbɨŋ ghɔ, ɔ shi ŋgū nchriligi, ki lɔ nuʼuŋ njəɨ liʼɛ nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ mbaʼa pugu pa njiŋnjiŋ gū mbɨŋ Elima, a nyīeŋ nthɔ ntāʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a wɛ̄iŋ mbhɔ yi nōoŋ ndaoŋ ghɔ.
Nɛnnɛ, ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa ghɔ piŋ Minnwi ndɨɨ ŋa a ni njəɨ nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ni ŋgrāo pa nnu ŋa pi yɛʼi nɔ ligi Taathɔ nɛ.
Pɔɔ pugu pa pakwo pi shāʼa llɔ Pafɔ ntaoŋ Pega, mbɔ yichəɨ mmɛ lɨʼɨ Pamfilia. Jouŋ Maaku mieŋ vugu hɛnɛiŋ kəʼɨ ghɔ, mbɨ̄nɨ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Ndɔ pugu tɔgɔ llɔ Pega ŋgə̄ɨ Antiɔ moŋ Pishidia.
A gha mbɔ llɛ́ ji pa Juu, pugu ghə̄ɨ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi nchɔchhɔ fɔ.

Ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni ŋkwo mɛ̄iŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Gɨ́ ŋa Mushi ni nāʼaŋ nɛ, pugu pa yɛ ŋa pa Njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nāʼaŋ nɛ, pa thishɨ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi māʼaŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ni pugu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Lǐŋ paŋ, p̈əɨ mfāʼo sheshe chrà nɔ māʼaŋ nu ghrɨ́ ŋgwa nɔ ghɔ, pəɨ chrā.”
Nɛnnɛ, Pɔɔ lɔllɔ tɔthɨ, nōoŋ ni mbhɔ yi nchhu ŋa, “Ŋgwa Ishrae pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu pɔgɔ Minnwi nɛ, pəɨ yaʼo nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ!
“Minnwi ŋgwa Ishrae ni nchuʼɔ pa tǎa pia nchwīe pugu yiɛŋ ndɔ ntɨnɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni ndaʼa nu Ijipti nɔ pa ghɨ̀nɨ nɛ, ndɔ Minnwi fuʼu vugu fɔ ni mbhɔ tɨtɨnɨ.
A ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yi, ndɨna ni pugu nɔ khwɛ wuŋ ŋgaʼo moŋ ŋkǔnu njó.
A ni nchwīe pi pɨgɛi khwachəɨ taoŋ moŋ laʼataoŋ Kanaŋ, mfɛ shhɛ ghɔ ni ŋgwa pi nɔ yugu.
Ŋguoŋ nnu pei ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɔ khwɛ ŋkɨɨ ni tiɛŋ wuŋ ŋgaʼo.
“Ndɨɨ yei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Minnwi chuʼɔ pa thishɨ mfɛ ni pugu ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, mbɔ Shamuɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, pugu pie Minnwi ŋa a fɛ fùoŋ ni pugu, a fɛ Shɔɔ, muuŋ Kishi, ŋoŋ llɔ moŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Bɛnjamɛiŋ, a shaʼa nɔ fùoŋ vugu nɔ khwɛ wuŋ ŋgaʼo.

Minnwi ni ŋga mbɨʼɨ vi, nūʼɔŋ Devi nɔ fùoŋ vugu. Yei pɔ nnu haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nchhu nthɛ Devi nɛ, ‘Ǹjəɨ ŋa Devi, muuŋ Jeshe ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nchwīe njùʼɔ a pwa nɛ, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a shi nchwīe ŋguoŋ nnu haʼaŋ ǹtāʼa nu ŋa a chwīe nɛ.’
“Wuʼɔ llɔ moŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Devi yei, Minnwi fɛ ŋkwe ni Ishrae mbɔ Jishɔ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkāʼa nɛ.
Ŋkaoŋ Jishɔ maa njɛ̄ fàʼa yi, Jouŋ ni nchīi chrà Minnwi ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Ishrae ŋa pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ, a fɛ ŋkhǐ ni pugu.

Nɔ haʼaŋ Jouŋ ni nthɔ mīʼɛŋ fàʼa yi nɛ, a pie ŋa, ‘Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa mi pɔ pi gɔ̌? Ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa pəɨ ywɛrɛ nu nɛ. Vie ŋoŋ wuʼɔ mbɔ njiŋ nthɔ nu, paʼa ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ kɨ̄gɛi nu ŋkɨɨ tra yi, mfuʼu nɔ kwò yi.’
“Lǐŋ paŋ, mbɔ ndaaŋoŋ Abrahaŋ, pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu pɔgɔ Minnwi nɛ, pi taoŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ yei ni pia ŋa a fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi kwe ŋgwa pi nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu laʼa nu Jerushalɛiŋ, pugu pa thishɨ pugu, shini ndɔ nji ŋa a Jishɔ vei mbɔ ŋkwe, ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo shiethɔ ŋkuoŋ chrà pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ nu ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ji nɛ, moŋ fɛ nu njɔ́ gu ghɔ, pugu ka chwiechwie chrà pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pighɔ chəɨŋ.
Ti mfɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu shini ndɔ njəɨ sheshe fàŋ mbɨŋ yu ŋa a pie ŋa pi jwi vi nɛ, pugu wuʼɔ nchuchu ni Pailɛ ŋa a chwīe pi jwi vi.
“Pugu ni ŋga ŋkwo chwīe ŋguoŋ pa nnu haʼaŋ chrà Minnwi ni nchhu nthɛ vi nɛ ti mīʼɛŋ, nshwiʼi vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, niʼiŋ vi moŋ fúŋ.
Ndɔ Minnwi kuʼɔ ni ju moŋ gu,
nɔ pa ntou llɛ́, a nōoŋ noŋ yi ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pugu ni ndhɔ Galili nthɔ Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ, mbɔ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pa miŋkwentie pi ndwɛ ni ŋgwa Ishrae nɛ.
“Pigi thɔ ndwɛ ni ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pəɨ, ŋa nnu ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa ni pa ŋkhu tǎa pigi ŋa a shi nchwīe nɛ,
a chwīe nɛ ni pigi, mbɔ pa puoŋ pugu, ŋkie pi ŋkuoŋ kuʼɔ nu ni Jishɔ moŋ gu. Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ moŋ mbra njiɛŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Ŋkhǐ
ŋa,
‘Ɔ Muuŋ a,
shiʼa ŋ̀gū Tǎa ghɔ.’
Yei pɔ pi nnu ŋa Minnwi chhu nthɛ kuʼɔ nu ni ju moŋ gu ki a lɔ njiʼi mfɔ̄rɔ moŋ fúŋ nɛ: ‘Ǹshi mfɛ mbɔrɔ taoŋtaoŋ, mbɔ yi kàʼa ki fɨ̄ɨ, ŋa ŋki ŋkāʼa Devi nɔ nɛ vɛ.’
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, a chhu moŋ yichəɨ lɨʼɨ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Ŋkhǐ ŋa, ‘Mbaʼa ɔ yiʼi mieŋ Muuŋ Fàʼa yɔ yi Taoŋtaoŋ fɔ̄rɔ moŋ fúŋ.’
Nthɛ ŋa Devi ni ŋga mfāʼa fàʼa ŋa Minnwi ni nūʼɔŋ ŋa a fāʼa nɛ, moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ ti mīʼɛŋ nɛ, ŋkhu, pi twei vi lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pi ni ntwei pa tǎa pi nɛ, a fɔ̄rɔ moŋ fúŋ.
Ndɔ ju ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkuʼɔ nɔ moŋ gu nɛ shini ndɔ mfɔ̄rɔ.
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, a pie ŋa pəɨ ji ŋa ntɔgɔ njiŋ Jishɔ vei, pi chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ līʼɛ phɨ ni pəɨ.
Ndɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ nɛ shi ndūgu moŋ ŋguoŋ phɨ ŋa a kaŋ ni nthɛ paʼa gɨ́ Mushi lɔ ndūgu ni ju moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Pəɨ lɨna nu nɛ ŋa kiʼi pa nnu haʼaŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nchhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ pəɨ:
‘Līi njəɨ, pa ghaŋ nchɨʼəshə,
p̂əɨ ghrāo ndɔ ŋkhu,
nthɛ ŋa nnu haʼaŋ ǹchwīe nu shiʼa,
a kaŋ ni fɛ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mbiŋ
nɔ haʼaŋ pi kaŋ ni ndɔ nchuchu ni pəɨ ŋa a shi mbɔ.’ ”
Nɔ haʼaŋ Pɔɔ pugu Banaba ni ntaoŋ nu moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi nɛ, pa ŋgwa pighɔ lɨ̄gəɨ vugu ŋa pugu pɨnɨ mbɨnɨ llɛ́ ji kaʼashiʼa, mfɨ̄ʼɨ mooŋ nnu pei ni pugu ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ.

Ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni nshāaŋ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi nɛ, ntou pa ŋgwa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, ŋa pugu ni ŋkara mbiŋ nnu Minnwi pa Juu nɛ, yōu njiŋ Pɔɔ pugu Banaba. Pɔɔ pugu Banaba chrā ni pugu nthɔ ŋkwɛ̄nɛ vugu ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ njɨʼə noŋ yugu ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi.
Mbra llɛ́ ji nduoŋ ni ŋga nthɔ, a piʼi shɨgɛi yi ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ thɔ lɨʼɨ yaʼo chrà Taathɔ.
Pa ŋgwa Juu ni ŋga njəɨ yú ŋgwa pighɔ, ndɨnaoŋ ni kighɨʼə, ndāa nnu ŋa Pɔɔ ni nchhu nu nɛ ndɔ ŋgwɛʼi vi.

Ndɔ Pɔɔ pugu Banaba chrā ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “A ni mbie ŋa pi fǔoŋ nchhu chrà Minnwi pi ni pəɨ. Ndɔ ndwɛ ŋa pəɨ lāa, ki lɔ ndīi noŋ pəɨ ŋa pəɨ kāʼo nɔ fāʼo nu chɔmbhi ki mmɛ nɛ, pigi shi mieŋ vəɨ ŋkara nchhu ni ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa a haʼaŋ Taathɔ fɛ gɨ́ ni pigi nɛ, nchhu nu ŋa,
‘Ǹūʼɔŋ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ líʼɛ ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ,
nɛnnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pəɨ ghə̄ɨ ni lūgu nu ti nchəɨŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghao ŋkuoŋ mbhi.’ ”
Pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ni ŋga njaʼo yei, mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ, ŋgaʼo chrà Taathɔ. Nnɛ, pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkwo chuʼɔ vugu ŋa pugu fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ nɛ, gu pa ghaŋ piŋ.
Chrà Taathɔ nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ yie ŋgei lɨʼɨ.
Ndɔ pa Juu niʼiŋ puŋ pa mɛmmɛ piŋgɛ pugu pa thishɨ pimbia moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ, pugu jɛ̄ nthɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni Pɔɔ pugu Banaba, njōu vugu moŋ yugu lɨʼɨ ghɔ.
Ndɔ pugu krū pru nɔ kwò muŋu nɔ fɛ nu nduoŋ yugu thɔ pugu, ŋgə̄ɨ kiʼɛ Ikoniuŋ.
Pa ghaŋ piŋ moŋ Antiɔ ni ndɨnaoŋ ni pwanjuʼɔ pugu pa Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Pa nnu ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ Ikoniuŋ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ Antiɔ nɛ, Pɔɔ pugu Banaba nii moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi nja nchrā ni pugu shishiʼi, nnɛ, ŋkiɛŋ ntou ŋgwa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ gū ghaŋ piŋ.
Ndɔ pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa pugu ki lāa ki lɔ mbiŋ nɛ niʼiŋ puŋ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, nnɛ pugu fāʼo kipɨna mbɨŋ pa ghaŋ piŋ.

Nɛnnɛ, pugu kɨna fɔ nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ nthɔ nshwei chrà Taathɔ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ. Taathɔ nōoŋ ŋa ŋkɨ̀nɨ yugu nthɛ pwapuŋ yi nnu shini, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa lì, pugu pa nnu ghraoghrao ŋa a ni mfɛ njɨ ni pugu pugu chwīe nɛ.
Ndɔ pa ŋgwa laʼataoŋ ghɔ thi pi nduoŋnduoŋ, pichəɨ thi yugu njiŋ pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mbiŋ nɛ, pichəɨ thi yugu njiŋ paa pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pighɔ.
Nɛnnɛ, pichəɨ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ pugu pa pichəɨ ŋgwa Juu chīri pugu pa thishɨ yugu ntaaŋ ŋa pi fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ndɔ ntuŋ vugu ni ŋgùʼɔ.
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo, ntáŋ yugu ntei ŋgə̄ɨ Lishtra pugu Debi moŋ laʼataoŋ Likaonia pugu pa pichəɨ laʼataoŋ ŋkɨŋ lɨʼɨ ghɔ,
nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ fɔ.
Yichəɨ ŋkwíni ni mbɔ laʼataoŋ Lishtra ŋa pi ni mbhi vi kwò yi fāʼo ŋgəʼɨ paʼa a lɔ naa ma nyīeŋ.
A ni nthɔ njwɛrɛ nnu ŋa Pɔɔ ni nchhu nu nɛ. Pɔɔ līi vi, njəɨ ŋa a fāʼo piŋ ŋa a nthɛ a chwīe a pɔ shiʼi nɛ,
a chhu ghɔ ni njɨ ŋa, “Lɔllɔ ntithi tɔthɨ.” A lli ntithi, njɛ̄ nyīeŋ nu.
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋga njəɨ nnu ŋa Pɔɔ chwīe nɛ, ŋkə̄rə ŋggì yugu nchhu moŋ chrà Likaonia ŋa, “Pa nnwi gū nɛ shɨna pia, mbɔ nɔ ŋgwamishua!”
Pugu mɛ̄iŋ Banaba ni Yeu, mɛ̄iŋ Pɔɔ ŋa Hemeshi, nthɛ ŋa a ni nthi ju shhɨ nchrā nu.
Ŋgaŋ fɛ̄ʼi shhɨ nnwi Yeu ŋa nda nnwi ghɔ ni mbɔ mbara mbɨŋ moŋ laʼa nɛ, thɔ ni pa nàʼaŋ pimbia pugu pa frawa choŋkaʼa nthɛ ŋa pugu pa yú ŋgwa pighɔ ni ntāʼa nu fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ.
Ndɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, mbɔ Banaba pugu Pɔɔ, ni ŋga njaʼo nnu ŋa pugu tāʼa nu nchwīe nɛ, nshāa ndhwí muŋu, ntei nii tri yú ŋgwa pighɔ mbaʼo ŋgòu, nchhu nu ŋa,

“Lǐŋ paŋ, pəɨ chwīe nɛiŋ nthɛ khɔ? Pigi ŋkaa pigi wuʼɔ pa ŋgwamishua nɔ pəɨ! Pigi pɔ hɛiŋ nɔ chīi nu pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pəɨ, nɔ fuʼu nu vəɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ maoŋ mbɔmbɔnɔ pei, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ kara njəɨ Minnwi maoŋ, ŋa a chwīe po pugu shhɛ, ni ŋkhǐ pugu pa ŋguoŋ maoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Llɛshhɨ, a ni mieŋ ŋa pa taoŋ taoŋ chhɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ywɛrɛ nɛ.
Ndɔ a ghà ŋguʼɔ nōoŋ ŋa a pɔ fɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa nnu shiʼi ŋa a ghà nchwīe nɛ, a ghà mfɛ mbɨ̀ llɔ po pugu pa maoŋ kwōo moŋ ndɨɨ haʼaŋ a kāʼo, mfɛ pa maoŋ jɨ ni pəɨ, ndɨnaoŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ ni pwatua.”
Ni ŋguoŋ chrà pei, pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ wuʼɔ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ ghaghaʼa nɔ lɨʼɨ nu vugu ŋa kiʼi pugu fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni pugu.
Ndɔ pichəɨ ŋgwa Juu llɔ Antiɔ moŋ Pishidia pugu pɔ Ikoniuŋ thɔ fɨ̄ɨ ŋgwa pighɔ pugu piŋ vugu, pugu pugu chīri ntuŋ Pɔɔ ni ŋgùʼɔ, nshūu vi ntaoŋ nɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ ŋkwāʼa ŋa a khu.
Ndɔ pa ghaŋ piŋ ni ŋga nthɔ ŋkɨrɨ yəɨ yu, a lɔllɔ tɔthɨ mbɨnɨ nii moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ. Mbhi gha ndaŋ, pugu Banaba ghə̄ɨ Debi.
Pɔɔ pugu Banaba chīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ Debi ntou pa ŋgwa piŋ Jishɔ. Nnɛ pugu pɨ̄nɨ Lishtra, ndhɔ fɔ mbɨnɨ Ikoniuŋ ŋkaoŋ maa mbɨnɨ Antiɔ kiʼɛ.
Pugu māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ pa ghaŋ piŋ nchwīe nu ŋa pugu wɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ ŋa pugu piŋ nɛ tɨtɨnɨ, nchhu nu ŋa, “A yiʼi ŋa pia shi ŋguʼɔ ntɔgɔ moŋ ntou pa ŋgəʼɨ nɔ nii nu moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.”
Pugu ni ŋga ŋkwo chuʼɔ pa thishɨ moŋ sheshe chɔshi, moŋ luoŋ pugu pa jī ŋkhǐ, mieŋ vugu liɛŋ mbhɔ Taathɔ ŋa pugu ni mbiŋ nɛ.
Ntɔgɔ kəʼɨ ghɔ moŋ Pishidia ŋgə̄ɨ Pamfilia.
Ŋga nshwei chrà Minnwi Pega, ntɔgɔ shwiʼi Atalia.
Llɔ fɔ kəʼɨ ghɔ, pugu shāʼa ŋkhǐ ntaoŋ Antiɔ. Yei lɨʼɨ ŋa pa ghaŋ piŋ ni nduoŋ ni Minnwi ŋa a nōoŋ pwapuŋ yi ni pugu nthɛ fàʼa ŋa pugu mīʼɛŋ nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga nchəɨŋ Antiɔ, ŋkɨrɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa chɔshi taʼa lɨʼɨ, nshwei vugu ni ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa Minnwi fāʼa mbɨŋ pugu nɛ, pugu pa ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a chuʼɔ shɛndaoŋ ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu piŋ nɛ.
Pugu kɨna fɔ nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ pugu pa ghaŋ piŋ.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa ni ndhɔ Judia nthɔ Antiɔ, njɛʼi pa ghaŋ piŋ ŋa, “P̈əɨ mieŋ ki lɔ nii ŋgunu mbrɛi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ gɨ́ Mushi chhu nɛ, paʼa pəɨ lɔ ndūgu.”

Pɔɔ pugu Banaba nii moŋ ŋkiɛŋ tɨtɨnɨ mindoundou pugu pugu nthɛ yei nnu, nɛnnɛ, pugu taoŋ ni taʼancho ŋa Pɔɔ pugu Banaba pugu pa pichəɨ ŋgwa llɔ Antiɔ ghə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ njəɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu pa thishɨ nthɛ nnu yei.
Chɔshi taoŋ vugu, pugu tɔgɔ Fonishia pugu Shamaria nthɔ nshwei fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ piŋ Minnwi nɛ. Pishaʼakhɔ yei thɔ ni pwanjuʼɔ ni ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ piŋ.
Pugu ni ŋga nchəɨŋ Jerushalɛiŋ, chɔshi pugu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, ni pa thishɨ chhu ni pugu ŋa pugu thɔ a pwa, pugu fɨ̄ʼɨ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa Minnwi fāʼa ntɔgɔ mbhɔ pugu nɛ ni pugu.
Ndɔ pichəɨ pa ghaŋ piŋ ŋa pugu ni ndhɔ moŋ shɨna pa ŋgwa Farashi lɔllɔ tɔthɨ nchhu ŋa, “A pie ŋa pi niʼiŋ vugu ŋgunu mbrɛi, mfɛ gɨ́ pugu nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ Mushi.”
Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu pa thishɨ paoŋ nɔ līi nu nnu yei.

Pugu ni ŋga ŋkwo lōu nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ, Pita lɔllɔ tɔthɨ nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Lǐŋ paŋ, pəɨ ji ŋa fie moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ chəɨ, Minnwi ni nchuʼɔ a shɨna pəɨ nɔ māʼaŋ nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pugu yaʼo ndɔ mbiŋ.
Ndɔ Minnwi ŋa a ji njùʼɔ shesheŋoŋ nɛ, ni nōoŋ ŋa a piŋ vugu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fɛ nu Jijwɛ yi ni pugu, pi wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mfɛ ni pia nɛ.
A shini ndɔ nōoŋ ŋa kwrí pɔ shɨna pia pugu. A ni ŋka shɨ̄gao njùʼɔ yugu shɨ̄gao nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbiŋ vi.
Ti ndwɛ yei, pəɨ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ntāʼa nu njwɛʼi Minnwi nɔ khɔ, ni nūʼɔŋ nu lrì thɔ pa ghaŋ piŋ ŋa pa ŋkhu tǎa pia ki nduthɔ yia shini ndɔ ŋkāʼo nɔ tiɛŋ nu nɛ?
Ndɔ pia piŋ ŋa pia lūgu ntɔgɔ pi moŋ pwapuŋ Taathɔ, mbɔ Jishɔ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ŋkaa pugu lūgu nɛ.”
Ŋguoŋ kɨrɨ ghɔ ni ndɛrɛ laŋ njwɛrɛ nu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Banaba pugu Pɔɔ thɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ pa lì pugu pa nnu ghraoghrao haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nchwīe ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ pugu shɨna pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga mfɨ̄ʼɨ ti mīʼɛŋ, Jɛiŋ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ yaʼo vəɨ!
Shemu wuʼɔ ŋka fɨ̄ʼɨ fɨ̄ʼɨ ni pia ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni fǔoŋ ŋkra ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nɔ fuʼu nu ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu shi mbɔ ji nɛ.
Ndɔ chrà pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi piŋ nnu ŋa Shemu chhu nɛ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ moŋ chrà Minnwi ŋa,
‘A shi ŋga ndaʼa,
m̀bɨnɨ mbɨnɨ ŋkrao lɨʼɨ chhɔ Devi ŋa a kuʼɔ fùŋ nɛ.
Ǹshi mbɨnɨ ŋkrao nda shaʼoshaʼo ghɔ,
mbɨnɨ nchwīe vi, a thi tɔthɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ,
nnɛ ŋa pɨgəɨ ŋgwamishua shigi Taathɔ,
ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ haʼaŋ pi gɛ̄ vugu ŋa pugu pɔ ŋgwa paŋ nɛ.
Yei nnu ŋa Taathɔ, ŋa a ni nchwīe ŋgwa ji yei nnu fie llɛshhɨ, chhu nɛ.’
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, m̀bīʼi nyaŋ ŋa kiʼi pia fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ yɛ ŋa pugu kara mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ.

Pia ka nāʼaŋ pi ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ni pugu, nshwei vugu ŋa kiʼi pugu jɨ sheshe maoŋ jɨ ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ nɛ, ŋa pugu ləʼɨ shúoŋ, ki lɔ ŋkru minyieŋ ŋa pi nɨ̄naoŋ mmi yi a khu ki chhǐ lɔ ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ, ndɔ ndəʼɨ jɨ nnu chhǐ.
Nthɛ ŋa llɔ llɛshhɨ Mushi fāʼo ŋgwa ŋa pugu gha mɛ̄iŋ gɨ́ yi moŋ ŋguoŋ laʼataoŋ ghao, pi ghà mɛ̄iŋ chrà yi ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ji ghao moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi.”

Nnɛ, pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu pa thishɨ ni ŋguoŋ chɔshi ni njəɨ ŋa a pwa ŋa pugu chuʼɔ ŋgwa shɨna pugu ntaoŋ vugu pa Pɔɔ ni Banaba pugu ghə̄ɨ Antiɔ. Pugu ni nchuʼɔ Judashi, ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa Bashaba, pugu Shaila, mbɔ pa ŋgwa chɨɨchɨɨ shɨna pugu.
Ntaoŋ vugu ni yei ŋwaʼaŋlɨ, ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ chhu ŋa,
“Pigi, mbɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu pa thishɨ, mbɔ pa lǐŋ pəɨ, nchrā ni pəɨ, mbɔ pa ghaŋ piŋ llɔ laʼataoŋ nduoŋ nchhɔ nu moŋ Antiɔ, pugu pa Shiria ni Shilishia nɛ.
Pigi yaʼo ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa llɔ shɨna pigi ghana vəɨ ni pichəɨ pa chrà, mvūʼu thɔ yəɨ. Ndɔ nɛ, chrà ghɔ shini ndɔ nɛ ndhɔ pi mbhɔ pigi.
Pigi paoŋ nɛ, njwɛrɛ ntaoŋ ni taʼaŋggi ŋa a pwa ŋa pigi chuʼɔ pa ŋgwa, ntaoŋ vugu ŋa pugu thɔ njəɨ vəɨ. Pugu shi nthɔ pugu pa ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ pia, mbɔ Banaba pugu Pɔɔ,
mbɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu mīʼaŋ chɔmbhi yugu nthɛ ligi Taathɔ via, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto.
Nɛnnɛ, pigi taoŋ Judashi pugu Shaila ŋa pugu thɔ nshwei vəɨ ni nchò yugu ni nnu haʼaŋ pigi nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ nɛ.
Pigi pa Jijwɛ Minnwi pɔ ni taʼa nchò ŋa a pwa ŋa kiʼi pigi nuʼuŋ nūʼɔŋ yichəɨ sheshe lrì mbɨŋ pəɨ, ŋkiɛŋ ŋa pəɨ nūʼɔŋ pa mɛmmɛ nnu pei:

Kiʼi pəɨ jɨ maoŋ ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, kiʼi pəɨ jɨ chhǐ, kiʼi pəɨ kru minyieŋ ŋa pi nɨ̄naoŋ mmi yi a khu ki chhǐ lɔ ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ, kiʼi pəɨ kwoshuoŋ. P̈əɨ ndɨna pa nnu pei, kaŋ pəɨ shi mbɔ shiʼi. P̂əɨ chhɔ shiʼi.”
Pi ni ŋga ntaoŋ vugu, pugu shwiʼi Antiɔ ŋkɨrɨ pa ghaŋ piŋ taʼa lɨʼɨ mfɛ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ ni pugu.
Pugu ni ŋga mɛ̄iŋ, mbɔ ni ntou pwatua nthɛ chrà māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ ghɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ Judashi pugu Shaila, ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, fɛ ntou chrà ntɨ́gɨ ni pugu nthɔ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yugu ndɔ ntɨʼɨ vugu.
Pugu ni ŋga ndaʼa fɔ nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ, pa ghaŋ piŋ pighɔ chaʼa vugu ŋa pugu nyīeŋ shiʼi, pugu pɨ̄nɨ kəʼɨ ghɔ mbhɔ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni ntaoŋ vugu nɛ.
[Ndɔ Shaila khwā nɔ kɨna nu fɔ.]
Ndɔ Pɔɔ pugu Banaba kɨna Antiɔ, nthɔ njɛʼi nu ndɔ nchīi chrà Taathɔ pugu pa pichəɨ ntou ŋgwa nduoŋ ŋkaa pugu.
A ni ŋga ndaʼa, Pɔɔ chhu ni Banaba ŋa, “Pɔgɔ pɨnɨ mbɨ̄nɨ ŋkra pa ghaŋ piŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ŋa pɔgɔ ni nchīi chrà Taathɔ fɔ nɛ, njəɨ ŋa pugu thɔ mbɔ pi ŋkwaŋ nɛiŋ.”
Banaba ni ntāʼa nu ndɔ̄gɔ Jouŋ Maaku pugu pugu ghə̄ɨ kaʼa.
Pɔɔ ni njwɛrɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu vi nthɛ ŋa a ki tei njiŋ yugu Pamfilia ki pugu pugu lɔ mīʼɛŋ fàʼa kaʼa.
Mindoundou ni nja ntɨnɨ shɨna pugu ti ndugwi yi pugu fɛ̄nɛ noŋ, Banaba lɔ̄gɔ Jouŋ Maaku, pugu shāʼa ŋkhǐ ŋgə̄ɨ Shaipru.
Pɔɔ lɔ̄gɔ Shaila, pugu yu ghə̄ɨ, pa ghaŋ piŋ luoŋ ŋa Taathɔ nōoŋ pwapuŋ yi ni pugu.
Nnɛ, a ghə̄ɨ moŋ Shiria pugu Shilishia, nthɔ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ pa chɔshi fɔ.
Pɔɔ ghə̄ɨ Debi pugu Lishtra, njəɨ yichəɨ ŋgaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Timoti. Mǔuŋ Timoti ni mbɔ ŋoŋ Juu, mbɔ ŋgaŋ piŋ ŋkaa yu, ndɔ tǎa vi pɔ pi ŋoŋ Gri.
Pa ghaŋ piŋ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ Lishtra pugu Ikoniuŋ nɛ, ni nchrā pa nnu shiʼi nthɛ vi.
Pɔɔ ni ntāʼa nu ŋa pugu Timoti ghə̄ɨ kaʼa, nthɛ yie ghɔ, a niʼiŋ vi ŋgunu mbrɛi. A ni nchwīe nnɛ nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa pugu ni mbɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ pighɔ nɛ ni nji ŋa tǎa Timoti pɔ pi ŋoŋ Gri.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nyīeŋ nu moŋ pa laʼataoŋ pighɔ nɛ, pugu shwei pa ghaŋ piŋ ni pa nthi ŋa pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu pa thishɨ Jerushalɛiŋ ni ndɔ̄gɔ nɛ, nchhu ni pugu ŋa pugu wɛ̄iŋ nthi pighɔ a pwa.
Nnɛ, pa chɔshi pighɔ ni ntɨnɨ nu moŋ piŋ, fɨʼɨ ghaŋ piŋ pigi nu sheshe llɛ́.
Pugu nyīeŋ ntɔgɔ krao ŋgei Fragia pugu Galashia nthɛ ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi ni ŋkwo lāa ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu chīi chrà Minnwi Eshia.
Pugu ni ŋga nchəɨŋ Mishia, ntāʼa nu ŋgə̄ɨ Bitinia, ndɔ paʼa Jijwɛ Jishɔ lɔ mbiŋ ni pugu.
Nnɛ, pugu tiri moŋ Mishia ŋgə̄ɨ Troa.
Pɔɔ ni njəɨ nnu ni tuʼu ghɔ, a ni njəɨ ŋoŋ Mashedonia tithi nthɔ ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa, “Shāʼa Mashedonia ŋgɛ̄rɛ vigi!”
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Pɔɔ ni nuʼuŋ njəɨ nnu yei nɛ, pigi pīri noŋ yigi nɔ llɔ nu ŋgə̄ɨ Mashedonia nthɛ ŋa pigi ni njəɨ ŋa Minnwi gɛ̄ vigi ŋa pigi chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pa ŋgwa lɨʼɨ ghɔ.
Pigi shāʼa moŋ pie llɔ Troa ntuŋ ntaoŋ Shomatrashe, mbhi gha ndaŋ pigi ghə̄ɨ Neapoli.
Llɔ fɔ, pigi ghə̄ɨ Filipai mbɔ mmɛ laʼataoŋ ŋaʼaŋŋaʼaŋ moŋ krao ŋgei Mashedonia mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa ntou ŋgwa Roma ni nchhɔ nu nɛ. Pigi ni ndaʼa fɔ nɔ ntou llɛmbhi.
A gha mbɔ llɛ́ ji, pigi taoŋ moŋ tri laʼa ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkɨŋ nɨnəɨ, mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pigi ni mbīʼi ŋa ŋgwa Juu ghà ŋkɨrɨ fɔ nɔ luoŋ nu Minnwi nɛ. Pigi ni nchɔchhɔ shhɛ nchrā ni pa piŋgɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkɨrɨ fɔ nɛ.

Taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a ni njaʼo vigi nɛ ni mbɔ Lidia llɔ Tiatira, mbɔ ŋgaŋ fīni pa ndhwí tɨnɨnchuoŋ mbɔ miŋgwɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi. Taathɔ ŋaʼaŋ njùʼɔ yi ŋa a tigi thɔ yi ni nnu ŋa Pɔɔ ni nthɔ nchhu nu nɛ.
A ni ŋga ŋkwe ŋkhǐ, pugu pa mbaanda yi, ŋgɛ̄ vigi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Pəɨ thɔ ndaʼa nda mu nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ nja njəɨ ŋa ǹja mbiŋ Taathɔ shini.” Nthɔ ndɨ̄gəɨ vigi ti pigi piŋ ŋa pigi pugu ghə̄ɨ.

A ni mbɔ llɛ́ chəɨ pigi gha ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɔ lɨʼɨ luoŋ Minnwi, mbāoŋ pigi pa muuŋ miŋgwɛ chəɨ mbɔ ŋkǔna ŋa a ni mfāʼo jijwɛ pɨphɨ, jijwɛ pɨphɨ ghɔ ni nthɔ nchwīe a yəɨ pa nnu ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ. Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo vi nɛ ni nthɔ mfāʼo ntou mbɨŋ nthɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ njəɨ pa nnu nchhu nu.
A yōu njiŋ yigi pa Pɔɔ mbaʼo ŋgòu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋgwa pei ya mbɔ pi puoŋ fàʼa Minnwi ŋa a Chaapifuoŋ nɛ! Pugu thɔ nchīi nu ni pəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ mimfɛ pəɨ kie ndūgu nɛ.”
A ni nchwīe nɛnnɛ nɔ ntou llɛ́ ti Pɔɔ pɨgɨtua, ŋkara nchhu ni jijwɛ pɨphɨ ghɔ ŋa, “M̀fɛ gɨ́ vɛ moŋ ligi Jishɔ Krishto ŋa ɔ taoŋ mbɨŋ yu!” A wuʼɔ ntaoŋ pi chomilaoŋ ghɔ.
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo ŋkǔna ghɔ nɛ, ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa mbaʼa pugu nuʼuŋ mfāʼo shéi llɔ mbhɔ ŋkǔna ghɔ nɛ, pugu wɛ̄iŋ Pɔɔ pugu Shaila, ŋgə̄ɨ ni pugu moŋ taŋ shhɨ pa kúŋ,
ŋga nthɔ ni pugu shhɨ pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa ghaŋ shaʼa sháʼa, nchhu ŋa, “Ŋgwa pei pɔ pi ŋgwa Juu, nchhɔ nthɔ nu ni mintantara moŋ laʼa pia.
Pugu thɔ ntɨgɨ pa nùʼɔŋ ŋa a lɔ ŋkāʼo ŋa pia piŋ ki nchwīe nthɛ ŋa pia pɔ pi ŋgwa Roma.”
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ fɔ nɛ chīri pugu pugu nii nu ligi Pɔɔ pugu Shaila. Pa ghaŋ shaʼa sháʼa pighɔ shāa ndhwí Pɔɔ pugu Shaila mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi wie vugu.
Pi ni ŋgwie vugu ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ, māʼaŋ vugu chə́ɨŋ, mfɛ gɨ́ ni ŋgaŋ kɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ ŋa a kɛ̄ʼi vugu shishiʼi.
Ŋgaŋ kɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ gha njaʼo gɨ́ yei, niʼiŋ vugu moŋ ŋkiɛŋ chə́ɨŋ tɨtɨnɨ, mfɨ̄nɨ kwò muŋu ni kipaʼo.
A ni ŋga mbɔ moŋ ntuŋ mbhi, Pɔɔ pugu Shaila luoŋ Minnwi njrāo ŋkhǐ pa ghaŋ chə́ɨŋ ywɛrɛ nu.
Shhɛ wīʼi nchɨʼɨ, ti kwonda chə́ɨŋ ghɔ chɨ̄ʼɨ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, ŋguoŋ chonda chuʼɔ, ŋguoŋ chɛiŋ kɨ̄gɛi mbɨŋ ŋguoŋ ghaŋ chə́ɨŋ.
Ŋgaŋ kɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ ghɔ gha ndɔllɔ njəɨ ŋa cho chə́ɨŋ yi wo, nshūa kafa yi ntāʼa nu njwi nōoŋ yi, ŋgɛ̄ nu ŋa ghaŋ chə́ɨŋ kwo taoŋ ntei.
Pɔɔ paʼo ŋgòu ni ŋguoŋ ŋggì yi ŋa, “Kiʼi njwi noŋ yɔ, pigi pɔ hɛiŋ ghao.”
Ŋgaŋ kɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ ghɔ mɛ̄iŋ ŋa pi thɔ ni laŋ, ntei nii moŋ chə́ɨŋ ghɔ, ŋgrū nu, ŋgū nɔ kwò Pɔɔ pugu Shaila,
mfuʼu vugu ntaoŋ nɔ mbhi nchhu ŋa, “Pa masha mi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ ndūgu?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Piŋ Jishɔ Taathɔ, kaŋ ɔ shi ndūgu, pəɨ pa mbaanda yɔ.”
Pugu shwei chrà Taathɔ ghɔ pugu pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ nda yu nɛ.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ ni tuʼu ghɔ, a lɔ̄gɔ vugu ŋgə̄ɨ nshɨ̄gao fɨ́ yugu. Ŋgaŋ kɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ ghɔ pugu pa ndaaŋoŋ yi kwe ŋkhǐ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Ŋkɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ ghɔ lɔ̄gɔ Pɔɔ pugu Shaila ŋkuʼɔ nɔ nda yu mfɛ maoŋ pugu jɨ. Ŋoŋ ghɔ fāʼo pwatua pugu pa ndaaŋoŋ yi nthɛ ŋa pugu piŋ Minnwi.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, pa ghaŋ shaʼa sháʼa taoŋ pa brushi, nchhu nu ŋa, “P̂əɨ chuʼɔ ŋgwa pɛ pugu ghə̄ɨ!”
Ŋgaŋ kɛ̄ʼi chə́ɨŋ pɨnɨ, nchhu ni Pɔɔ ŋa, “Pa ghaŋ shaʼa sháʼa māʼaŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ŋa pi chuʼɔ vəɨ, pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nɛ ni vəɨ shiʼi.”

Ndɔ Pɔɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pugu wie vigi shɨna ŋgwa, ndɔ niʼiŋ vigi chə́ɨŋ ki lɔ naa nshaʼa vigi yaʼa pigi lɔ mbɔ pi ŋgwa Roma. Ti ndwɛ pugu tāʼa nu mfuʼu vigi pi njiŋnjiŋ? Ŋga! Pugu thɔ ni noŋ yugu mfuʼu vigi.”
Pa brushi pɨnɨ māʼaŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ghɔ ni ghaŋ shaʼa sháʼa pighɔ. Pugu gha njaʼo ŋa Pɔɔ pugu Shaila ni mbɔ pi ŋgwa Roma, mbɔgɔ a ghaʼa.
Nɛnnɛ pugu thɔ mbiŋ fàŋ ni pugu. Mfuʼu vugu moŋ chə́ɨŋ, nchhu ŋa pugu taoŋ ni vugu moŋ laʼa.
Nnɛ pugu taoŋ moŋ chə́ɨŋ, ŋgə̄ɨ nda Lidia. Ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ fɔ, mbāoŋ pugu pa ghaŋ piŋ, māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yugu ŋgə̄ɨ kiʼɛ ni vugu.
Pɔɔ pugu Shaila ni nyīeŋ ntɔgɔ Amfipoli pugu Apolonia nthɔ nchəɨŋ Teshalonika lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi pa Juu ni mbɔ nɛ.
Pɔɔ nii moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ghɔ ndɔ haʼaŋ a ghà mbīgi nchwīe nɛ, nnɛ nɔ trɛi taŋ moŋ pa Llɛ́ ji, nthɔ mbīʼi chrà Minnwi pugu pugu.

A fɨ̄ʼɨ nu ni pugu ndɔ nōoŋ nu llɔ moŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni ŋguʼɔ mbie ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ ndɔ ŋkhu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Jishɔ yei, ŋa ǹthɔ nchrā nu nthɛ vi nɛ pɔ pi ju ghɔ ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ vi ntaoŋ nɛ.”
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa ni mbiŋ njōu njiŋ Pɔɔ pugu Shaila, ntou pa ŋgwa Gri ŋa pugu pɔgɔ Minnwi nɛ, pugu pa ntou mɛmmɛ piŋgɛ piŋ ŋkaa pugu.

Ndɔ pichəɨ ŋgwa Juu fāʼo kighɨʼə, nnɛ, ŋkɨrɨ pa mbɨgɨ puŋ, mbɔ pa ŋgwa ghagha pugu taoŋ ni mmɛ yú, nchwīe yɔ̀yɔnɔ kuʼɔ moŋ laʼa, pugu ghə̄ɨ nii laʼa Jashoŋ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu Pɔɔ pugu Shaila mfɛ ni ŋgwa pugu.
Pugu ni ŋga mieŋ ki lɔ njəɨ vugu fɔ, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ Jashoŋ pugu pa pichəɨ pa ghaŋ piŋ ŋgə̄ɨ ni pugu shhɨ pa thishɨ moŋ laʼa, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋgwa pei haʼaŋ pugu thɔ fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ nɛ chəɨŋ nɛ hɛiŋ,
Jashoŋ lɔ̄gɔ vugu niʼiŋ nda yu. Pugu thɔ nchɨ̄ʼə ŋguoŋ gɨ́ ŋa Kaisha fɛ nɛ, nchhu nu ŋa yichəɨ fùoŋ pɔ fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Jishɔ.”
Pa ŋgwa pugu pa thishɨ moŋ laʼa ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, a ghana vugu.
Pugu chwīe Jashoŋ pugu pa pakwo pi nūʼɔŋ mbɨŋ,
nnɛ pi mieŋ vugu pugu ghə̄ɨ.
Tuʼu ni ŋga nshini, pa ghaŋ piŋ kiʼi mfɛ Pɔɔ pugu Shaila fɛ Bɛria. Pugu gha ŋgə̄ɨ ti nchəɨŋ, ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi pa Juu.
Pa ŋgwa Juu fɔ ni mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa nchaa pi Teshalonika, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbiŋ chrà Minnwi ni ntou niʼiŋ njùʼɔ, ntou mooŋ yi ŋguoŋ llɛ́ nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa a nnu shini.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ntou yugu ni mbiŋ Minnwi, ntou pa mɛmmɛ piŋgɛ ni mɛmmɛ nthɨŋkwo llɔ Gri, pugu pa ntou mbia, piŋ Minnwi.
Pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa pugu ni mbɔ Teshalonika gha njaʼo ŋa Pɔɔ shwei chrà Minnwi Bɛria ŋkaa yu nɛ, pugu ghə̄ɨ fɔ, niʼiŋ puŋ ŋgwa, ndɔ ŋkāoŋ vugu ŋa pugu tāra.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ pa ghaŋ piŋ Bɛria fɛ Pɔɔ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ ndɔ Shaila pugu Timoti kɨna Bɛria.
Pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ndɔ̄gɔ Pɔɔ nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu ntiʼi vi nɛ, ghə̄ɨ ti nchəɨŋ Atɛŋ maa mbɨnɨ mbɨ̄nɨ Bɛria ni ŋkɨ̀nɨ ŋa pugu chhu ni Shaila pugu Timoti ŋa pugu para vi wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ.
Pɔɔ ni ŋga nchhɔ njwɛrɛ Shaila pugu Timoti Atɛŋ, njùʼɔ yi ghana vi moŋ ghɔ ŋkiɛŋ yie, nthɛ ŋa laʼataoŋ ghɔ ni ndɨnaoŋ ni pa nnwi.
Nnɛ a shwei chrà Minnwi moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ni pa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu ni nthɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi nɛ. Mbɨnɨ nchhu moŋ taŋ ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ni pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthɔ njōu njiŋ Ɛpikuru
nɛ, pugu pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni ntɨgɨ ŋgwa ni yaoŋ ŋa Shitoi

ni ntɨgɨ nu nɛ, lōu nu pugu pa Pɔɔ. Pichəɨ chhu ŋa, “Yei ŋgaŋ wie nchò chhu pi ŋa?” Pichəɨ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “A fhi nɔ haʼaŋ a chrā nu nɔ ligi nnwi taoŋ nduoŋ.” Pugu ni nchhu yei nthɛ ŋa Pɔɔ ni nthɔ nchīi chrà pi nɔ ligi Jishɔ pugu pa nnu khu nu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.
Nɛnnɛ, pugu lɔ̄gɔ Pɔɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju shhɨ pa kúŋ Areopagushi
nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pigi tāʼa nu nji yaoŋ ŋa nnu fhi yei ŋa a yɛʼi nu yie ghɔ nɛ.
Pichəɨ pa nnu ŋa pigi yaʼo ɔ yɛʼi nu nɛ ghrāo vigi, nthɛ yie ghɔ, pigi tāʼa nu ŋa ɔ ya mbɨnɨ mfɨ̄ʼɨ nnu pei pigi ji.”
Pugu ni nchhu nɛiŋ nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Atɛŋ pugu pa ghɨ̀nɨ ŋa pugu laʼa nu fɔ nɛ ghà ndɔ̄gɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ yugu nɔ chhu nu ki nɔ yaʼo nu pa pishaʼakhɔ fhi.
Nɛnnɛ, Pɔɔ tithi shhɨ pa kúŋ Areopagushi nchhu ŋa, “Ŋgwa Atɛŋ, ǹjəɨ ŋa moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao pəɨ ghà ŋgaʼo pa nnwi.

Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ ǹtɔgɔ moŋ laʼa pəɨ nɛ, nthɔ mbɛʼi pa shhɨ nnwi pəɨ haʼaŋ pəɨ ghaʼo nu nɛ, ǹjəɨ yichəɨ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pi nāʼaŋ fɔ ŋa, ‘Ni nnwi ŋa pigi lɔ nji vi nɛ.’ Yaoŋ yɛ ŋa pəɨ ghaʼo pi ki lɔ nji nɛ, a yie ghɔ ŋa ǹchrā nu ni pəɨ nthɛ vi nɛ.
“Minnwi ŋa a chwīe mbhi pugu pa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, a ju mbɔ Taathɔ po pugu pa shhɛ. A shiʼa njiʼi nchhɔ pi moŋ pa Nda Minnwi haʼaŋ a krao ŋoŋmishua ni mbhɔ mi nɛ,
ki mbɔ ni chà yichəɨ yaoŋ haʼaŋ a nthɛ a fàʼa ŋoŋmishua mfɛ ghɔ nɛ, ŋa a ju nduthɔ yi ŋa a fɛ chɔmbhi pugu pa jijwɛ pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ nduoŋ ni shesheŋoŋ nɛ.

Ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ taʼa ŋoŋmishua, a chwīe ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa taoŋ taoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi, nchwīe ŋa pugu nchhɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi ghao. Ni ŋkwo nūʼɔŋ pa fiɛŋ yugu pugu pa fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ yɛ ŋa pugu shi nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ, ŋkaoŋ pugu maa mbɔ.
“A ni nchwīe yei nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pugu tāʼa vi ndɔ njəɨ vi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu mɔnɔ ntāʼa vi nɛ. Ndɔ nɛ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi fie hiŋ ni shesheŋoŋ via.
Nthɛ ŋa pia chhɔ chɔmbhi, nyīeŋ nu ndɔ mbɔ nu pi mbhɔ yu, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ ghaŋ shiethɔ shɨna pəɨ chhu nɛ ŋa, ‘Shishini ŋguoŋ via pa puoŋ pi.’
Nthɛ ŋa pia púoŋ Minnwi nɛ, kiʼi pia pīʼi ŋa Minnwi pɔ pi nɔ yaoŋ ŋa ŋoŋ chwīe ni laoŋgo, ki ni yaoŋ tɨ́nɨ ki ni ŋgùʼɔ, mbɔ pi yaoŋ ŋa a chhɔ ŋoŋmishua mbīʼi nchwīe nɛ.
Minnwi funu ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa ni nchwīe phɨ ki ji nɛ, ndɔ ndwɛ, a fɛ gɨ́ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa a chwīe taʼa llɛ́ nūʼɔŋ ŋa a shi ndɛ nshaʼa ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao moŋ ndɨndɨ ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a chuʼɔ vi nɛ. A nōoŋ lì yei ni shesheŋoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kuʼɔ nu ni ŋoŋ vei llɔ moŋ gu.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo Pɔɔ kāoŋ nnu khu nu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ, pichəɨ māʼaŋ vi ni kwə̀ɨŋ, ndɔ pichəɨ chhu ŋa, “Pigi tāʼa nu mbɨnɨ njaʼo ɔ chrà nnu yei ŋgɛ́ nduoŋ.”
Nɛnnɛ, Pɔɔ lɔllɔ mieŋ vugu ŋgə̄ɨ.
Ndɔ pichəɨ yōu njiŋ yi mbiŋ Minnwi. Dionishio mbɔ taʼa ŋkúŋ, ni yichəɨ miŋgwɛ, ligi yi pɔ Damarishi, ni mbɔ shɨna ŋgwa pei, pugu pa pichəɨ ŋgwa nduoŋ.
Pɔɔ ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ shhɨ pa kúŋ, ndhɔ Atɛŋ ŋgə̄ɨ Koriŋ.

A ni njəɨ yichəɨ ŋoŋ Juu fɔ, ligi yi pɔ Akwila, ŋa pi ni mbhi vi Pontu, a wuʼɔ ŋka llɔ pi llɔ Itali pugu ŋgwɛ vi, ligi yi pɔ Prishila, nthɛ ŋa Fùoŋ Klaudiu ni mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Juu ntaoŋ moŋ Roma. Pɔɔ ghə̄ɨ nɔ yəɨ nu vugu.
Ndaʼa pugu pugu ndɔ mfāʼa pugu pugu kaʼa nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ vugu ni mbɔ pa ghaŋ chwīe ntǎa
mfīni nu.
A ni nshwei chrà Minnwi moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ji ghao, ŋkaa nu ŋa ŋgwa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa Gri piŋ.
Shaila pugu Timoti ni ŋga ndhɔ Mashedonia nthɔ, Pɔɔ fɛ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ yi ghao nɔ chīi nu chrà Minnwi, nthɔ nshwei ŋgwa Juu ŋa Jishɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋga ndāa vi nchhu pa nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ vi, a krū pru ŋkuoŋ ndhwí pi nchhu ŋa, “Noŋ yəɨ pɔ nɛ mbhɔ pəɨ! Mbhɔ ma yi wo nɛ, llɔ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, ǹshi ŋgə̄ɨ nshwei chrà Minnwi ni pa taoŋ nduoŋ.”
A mieŋ vugu ŋgə̄ɨ nda ŋoŋ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Titiu Jushitu, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nthɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi. Nda yi ni mbɔ mbɨŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi.
Krishpu, mbɔ nthishɨ nda luoŋ Minnwi piŋ Taathɔ pugu pa mbaanda yi. Pichəɨ pa ntou ŋgwa laʼataoŋ Koriŋ yaʼo chrà Minnwi mbiŋ ndɔ ŋkwe ŋkhǐ.
A ni ŋga mbɔ ni tuʼu chəɨ, Pɔɔ yəɨ nnu Taathɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa,
“Kiʼi mbɔgɔ gu, chrā ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ, ki lɔ ŋkɨna chrā nu,
nthɛ ŋa pɔgɔ pɔ kaʼa. Mbaʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ yiʼi mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ vɛ nthɛ ŋa ntou ŋgwa moŋ lɨʼɨ yei ŋgwa paŋ.”
Nɛnnɛ, Pɔɔ laʼa fɔ nɔ taʼa ŋgaʼo ni ghrà yi nthɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa pighɔ ni chrà Minnwi.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni nūʼɔŋ Galio ŋa a shaʼa krao Roma ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Akaya nɛ, pa ŋgwa Juu pɔ ni taʼaŋggi ŋgə̄ɨ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ Pɔɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju shhɨ ghaŋ shaʼa sháʼa.
Pugu chhu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei thɔ nɨŋɨ nu ŋkara njùʼɔ ŋgwa, pugu ghaʼo Minnwi moŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa gɨ́ lɔ mbiŋ nɛ!”
Ndɔ Pɔɔ ni ŋga ntāʼa ŋaʼaŋ nchò yi lɨʼɨ chrà, Galio chhu ni ŋgwa Juu ŋa, “Yei kaŋ ni mbɔ pi yichəɨ nnu pɨphɨ, ki fàŋ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ vei chwīe, ŋ̀ka ni mfāʼo thɔ nnu nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu njùʼɔ njaʼo vəɨ.
Ndɔ, nthɛ ŋa a pɔ pi mindoundou ŋkuoŋ pa chrà, pugu pa ligi, pugu pa yəɨ gɨ́ nɛ, a nthɛ a wuʼɔ ndugwi pəɨ. Mimfɛ paʼa ǹdɔ nshaʼa ŋkwaŋ nnu yinɛ.”
Nnɛ, a yōu vugu nda sháʼa.
Ŋguoŋ vugu wɛ̄iŋ Shoshtene, mbɔ nthishɨ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi, ŋgwie vi moŋ ndashaʼa sháʼa ghɔ. Ndɔ paʼa a lɔ mfhi nnu ni Galio.
Pɔɔ chhɔ pugu pa ghaŋ piŋ Koriŋ nɔ ntou llɛ́ mieŋ vugu kiʼɛ nshāʼa ŋkhǐ pugu Prishila ni Akwila ŋgə̄ɨ Shiria. A ni ŋga mbɔ Keŋkria, ŋkuoŋ thɔ yi nthɛ kɨ̀na ŋa a ni ŋgwrā.
Pugu gha nchəɨŋ Ɛfɛshɔ, Pɔɔ mieŋ Prishila pugu Akwila fɔ. Ŋkaoŋ a maa mieŋ vugu, a ni ŋgə̄ɨ nda luoŋ Minnwi mbīʼi pa nnu pugu pa ŋgwa Juu fɔ.
Pugu ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa pugu pugu laʼa nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ, a lāa.
Ndɔ a gha ŋgə̄ɨ nu, nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “M̈innwi mbiŋ, kaŋ ǹshi mbɨnɨ mbɨ̄nɨ.” Ndhɔ kiʼɛ Ɛfɛshɔ, nii moŋ pie ŋgə̄ɨ.
A ni ŋga ŋkaoŋ Kaisharia, ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ nchrā ni chɔshi, nshwiʼi kiʼɛ Antiɔ.
A ni ŋga mbɔ fɔ nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ, ndɔllɔ nyīeŋ pa lɨʼɨlɨʼɨ moŋ Galashia, pugu pa Fragia, nthɔ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ ghaŋ piŋ.
Ndɨɨ ghɔ, ŋoŋ Juu chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Apolo, llɔ Alɛshandria thɔ Ɛfɛshɔ. A ni mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nja nji chrà, ndɔ nja nji Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi.
A ni mfāʼo ntɨ́gɨ moŋ Shɛndaoŋ Taathɔ. A ni ǹchrā ndɔ njɛʼi pa nnu ki ntəɨ nthɛ Jishɔ ni ŋguoŋ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ ghao, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋguʼɔ nji pi kwe ŋkhǐ Jouŋ nɛ.
A jɛ̄ nthɔ nchrā nu ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi. Prishila pugu Akwila ni ŋga njaʼo vi, ndɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ nda pugu mfɨ̄ʼɨ Shɛndaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ shishiʼi.

A ni ŋga ntāʼa nu nshāʼa Akaya, pa ghaŋ piŋ fɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ mfɛ ni ghaŋ piŋ Akaya, nchhu nu ŋa pi tuo vi a pwa. A ni ŋga nchəɨŋ Akaya, ŋgɛ̄rɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntɔgɔ moŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi mbɔ ghaŋ piŋ nɛ.
A ni ndōu pi tɨtɨnɨ ti ŋgaʼa pa Juu shhɛnte nɔ nōoŋ nu ni pugu moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa Jishɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ shini.
Apolo ni ŋga ŋguʼɔ mbɔ Koriŋ, Pɔɔ tɔgɔ krao khwi ŋgei ghɔ, nchəɨŋ Ɛfɛshɔ, njəɨ pichəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ fɔ,
mbie vugu ŋa, “Pi ni mfɛ Jijwɛ Minnwi ni pəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ ni mbiŋ nɛ?”
Pugu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ŋga! Pigi lɔ naa ndɔ njaʼo sheshe yaoŋ ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi.”
A chhu ŋa, “Ti pəɨ ni ntɔgɔ pi moŋ yəɨ kwe ŋkhǐ?”
Pugu ŋa, “Moŋ kwe ŋkhǐ Jouŋ.”
Pɔɔ chhu ŋa, “Kwe ŋkhǐ Jouŋ ni mbɔ pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ nɛ, Jouŋ ghɔ ni nthɔ nchhu nu ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu piŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a thɔ nu njiŋ yu nɛ, mbɔ Jishɔ.”
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo yei, ŋkwe ŋkhǐ moŋ ligi Jishɔ Taathɔ.
Pɔɔ gha nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ mi mbɨŋ pugu, Jijwɛ Minnwi shwiʼi mbɨŋ pugu, pugu chrà moŋ pa chrà taoŋ nduoŋ, ndɔ njəɨ pa nnu llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi nchhu.
Ŋguoŋ pa pimbia ni mbɔ nɔ paanchrɔ.
Pɔɔ ghə̄ɨ moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi nchrā pugu pa ŋgwa fɔ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɔ trɛi nàoŋ nchrā nu ndɔ nthɔ ndɨ̄gəɨ vugu ŋa pugu piŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.

Ndɔ pichəɨ tɨnɨthɔ ki lɔ mbiŋ, nchrā pa nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ Shɛndaoŋ Taathɔ shhɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, Pɔɔ mieŋ vugu ndɔ̄gɔ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ pugu pugu ghə̄ɨ, sheshe llɛ́ a thɔ fāʼo chrà moŋ nda yɛʼi yaoŋ Tiranu.
Yei ni ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nɔ paa ŋgaʼo, nnɛ ti ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nchhɔ pi Eshia nɛ ni njaʼo chrà Taathɔ, pa ŋgwa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Minnwi ni ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ Pɔɔ nthɔ nchwīe mɛmmɛ nnu ghraoghrao.
Nɛnnɛ pi lɔ̄gɔ pra ndhwí pugu pa ndhwí fàʼa ŋa a ni ŋkwo fāʼa nɔ nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ŋkāoŋ pa ghaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ, pa ghɨ̌nɔ pugu mmɛ, pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ taoŋ mbɨŋ pugu.
Pichəɨ ŋgwa Juu, ŋa pugu ni nthɔ nyīeŋ njōu pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ nɛ, mōoŋ nɔ yōu nu pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ ni ligi Jishɔ Taathɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “M̀fɛ gɨ́ vɛ nɔ ligi Jishɔ ŋa Pɔɔ ghà nchīi nɛ, ŋa ɔ taoŋ.”
Khwachəɨ puoŋ pimbia, mbɔ puoŋ yichəɨ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pa ŋgwa Juu, ligi yi pɔ Shikeva, ni nthɔ nyīeŋ nchwīe nnu yei.
Ndɔ jijwɛ pɨphɨ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ni pugu ŋa, “Ǹji Jishɔ, nji pa nnu nthɛ Pɔɔ, ndɔ pəɨ pɔ yəɨ pi pa gɔ̌?”
Ŋgaŋ jijwɛ pɨphɨ ghɔ lli nchəɨŋ mbɨŋ pugu ni pri, ŋgaʼa vugu ghao. Pugu tei ntaoŋ nda yu ntii ni pa lə̄ɨŋ mbɨŋ pugu.
Ŋguoŋ pa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu ni ndaʼa nu Ɛfɛshɔ nɛ ni njaʼo yei nnu, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu, pi ghaʼo ligi Jishɔ Taathɔ mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ.
Ntou pa ghaŋ piŋ thɔ shhɛnte mbiŋ fàŋ yugu ndɔ ntūgu pa nnu lə̄ɨŋ ŋa pugu ni nchwīe nu nɛ.
Ntou pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa ghaŋ shhɛ̌ nɛ thɔ ni pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ shhɛ̌ pugu pi tūoŋ shhɛnte. Pi pīʼi nchuoŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ pighɔ a taoŋ tiɛŋ wuŋ ŋkaŋ yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ mbɨŋ.
Nɛnnɛ chrà Taathɔ nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ ŋkiɛŋ tɨtɨnɨ.
Pa nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Pɔɔ lɔ̄gɔ nthi mi moŋ Jijwɛ nɔ tɔgɔ nu Mashedonia pugu Akaya ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ. A ni nchhu nu ŋa, “Ǹshi ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ fɔ, ŋ̀guʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ti nchəɨŋ njəɨ laʼataoŋ Roma ŋkaa yu.”
Pɔɔ ni ŋga ŋkwo taoŋ Timoti pugu Erashitu, mbɔ paa ghaŋ ghɛ̀rɛ pi Mashedonia, nduthɔ yi kɨna Eshia nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ.
A ni mbɔ pi moŋ yei pɨɨ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋkiɛŋ tɨtɨnɨ lwilwiʼi ni ŋgū Ɛfɛshɔ nthɛ Shɛndaoŋ Taathɔ.
Ŋgaŋ shūgu lìɛŋ chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Demetriu, līɛŋ pa yaoŋ pugu fhi nda nnwi Atɛmi, pa ghaŋ fàʼa pi fāʼo ŋkiɛŋ ntou shéi ŋkuoŋ fàʼa yugu ghɔ.
Demetriu kɨrɨ pichəɨ ghaŋ fàʼa pighɔ pugu pa pichəɨ ghaŋ ŋkwaŋ fàʼa pighɔ, nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
“Ŋgwa paŋ, pəɨ ji ŋa ŋguoŋ fàʼo pia llɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yei chofaʼa.

Pəɨ yəɨ ndɔ njaʼo ni noŋ pəɨ, nnu ŋa ŋoŋ vei ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Pɔɔ, chwīe nu nɛ. A chhu ŋa pa nnwi ŋa pi chwīe ni mbhɔ nɛ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pa nnwi kaŋ tɨgəɨ yi, ŋkwo ya mbaʼo ti ŋkara ntou ŋgwa hɛiŋ Ɛfɛshɔ pugu ŋguoŋ krao Eshia.
Nnu wuwuru moŋ ghɔ lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋa yia fàʼa yei shi ŋgū shhɛ. A pɨnɨ mbīgi ŋa nda nnwi Atɛmi shi ŋgū nnu gha, nduthɔ Atɛmi ghɔ, ŋa ŋguoŋ Eshia pugu pa ŋguoŋ mbhi ghà ŋgaʼo nɛ, shiɛŋ ndighaʼo yi.”
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo yei nnu, ndɨnaoŋ ni pɨgɨtua, njɛ̄ paʼo nu ŋgòu, nchhu nu ŋa, “Atɛmi pa ŋgwa Ɛfɛshɔ, yi ndiɛŋ!”
Mooŋ laʼa lɨnaoŋ ni fiŋthɔ ghao. Pugu tei ŋgə̄ɨ nii moŋ mmɛ lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋgwa ghà ŋkɨrɨ fɔ nɛ, nshūu Gayu pugu Arishtaku, mbɔ ŋgwa Mashedonia ŋa pugu pa Pɔɔ ni nyīeŋ nu kaʼa nɛ, nii nɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ ghɔ.
Pɔɔ ni ntāʼa nu nii shɨna kɨrɨ ghɔ, ndɔ paʼa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ lɔ mieŋ vi ŋa a nii.
Pichəɨ pa thishɨ Eshia ŋkaa pugu ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa taannu Pɔɔ nɛ, lɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa kiʼi a lɨ̄ɨ moŋ kɨrɨ ghɔ.
Kɨrɨ ghɔ thɔ mbaʼo ŋgòu, pichəɨ chhu yei nnu, pichəɨ chhu yini nnu nthɛ ŋa fiŋthɔ ni mbɔ shɨna pugu. Paʼa ntou yi lɔ nji nnu ŋa pugu ni ŋkɨrɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa moŋ Kɨrɨ ghɔ fɛ ntɨgɨ ni Alɛshanda, ŋa pa Juu ni ntuʼɔ pi ju ntigi shhɨ, nnɛ, Alɛshanda nōoŋ ni mbhɔ yi ŋa ŋgwa lɛrɛ laŋ, ŋkaa nɔ fɨ̄ʼɨ nu mooŋ nnu pighɔ.
Pugu gha njəɨ ŋa a pɔ pi ŋoŋ Juu, pugu mūʼuŋ yɔ̄nɔ nu nɔ paa awa, nchhu nu ŋa, “Atɛmi pa ŋgwa Ɛfɛshɔ, yi ndiɛŋ.”
Ndugwi yi, ŋgaŋ nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ laʼataoŋ ghɔ paʼo ndɛrɛ vugu, nchhu ni pugu ŋa, “Ŋgwa Ɛfɛshɔ! Shesheŋoŋ ji ŋa a tuo Ɛfɛshɔ ntuo nda nnwi ndiɛŋ Atɛmi pugu pa ŋgùʼɔ yi yei, ŋa a llɔ po ŋgū nɛ.
Ŋa yei lɔ mbɔ nnu ŋa mimfɛ shesheŋoŋ lāa nɛ, a pie ŋa pəɨ lɛrɛ laŋ, ki lɔ nchwīe sheshe nnu tɨtɨnɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ thɔ ni ŋgwa pei hɛiŋ, mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi njōo yaoŋ nda nnwi ki nchrā chrà pɨphɨ nthɛ vi.
Ä mbɔ ŋa Demetriu pugu pa ghaŋ fàʼa pi fāʼo pɨgɨ njùʼɔ nthɛ shesheŋoŋ, pia fāʼo pa thishɨ pia, pa ndashaʼa pia pɔ fɔ, a nthɛ pugu ghə̄ɨ mburu fɔ.
Ndɔ ti ɔ mbɨnɨ mfāʼo nnu nduoŋ pi shaʼa nda nchaʼo.
Nthɛ ŋa p̈ia shi nchwīe, pi shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ via ŋa pia thɔ ni yɔ̀yɔnɔ shiʼa moŋ laʼa ki ŋkiɛŋ laʼo yi lɔ mbɔ.”
A ni mīʼɛŋ chhu nu nnu yei, nchhu ŋgwa ghə̄ɨ.
Yɔ̀yɔnɔ ni ŋga mmɛ, Pɔɔ gɛ̄ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ taʼa lɨʼɨ, ŋga māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yugu, mieŋ vugu ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ Mashedonia.
A ni ŋga ntɔgɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa lɨʼɨ pighɔ ghao, ŋkwo māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ ghaŋ piŋ fɔ, ŋgə̄ɨ laʼataoŋ Gri.
A ni ndaʼa fɔ nɔ trɛi nàoŋ, nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbīri noŋ yi nɔ shāʼa nu ntaoŋ Shiria nɛ, njaʼo ŋa pa Juu thɔ nyiaŋ ntáŋ nthɛ vi nɛ, a lɔ̄gɔ nthí mi nɔ tɔgɔ nu Mashedonia mbɨ̄nɨ.
Shopata mbɔ muuŋ Pairu llɔ Bɛria ghə̄ɨ pugu pugu kaʼa, pugu pa Arishtaku ni Shɛkɔndɔ llɔ Teshalonika, ni Gayu llɔ Debi, ni Timoti ŋkaa yu pugu Taikiku ni Trɔfimu llɔ krao ŋgei Eshia.
Pugu ni ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nchēi vigi Troa.
Llɛ́ Jɨ Brɛi ki kuʼɔ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, pigi shāʼa llɔ Filipai, ŋga ndaʼa tiɛŋ llɛ́ pigi para vugu Troa, ndaʼa fɔ nɔ khwachəɨ llɛ́.
A ni ŋga mbɔ fǔoŋ llɛ́ moŋ shwiʼi taŋ, pigi kɨrɨ nɔ kru nu brɛi,
Pɔɔ chrà ni pugu, mbīʼi nu nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu yua, nthɛ yie ghɔ, a wuʼɔ nchrachra ti mīʼɛŋ ni ntuŋ mbhi.
Ntou laŋ ni nthɔ ŋkɨɨ nu moŋ njiɛŋ nda tɔthɨ ŋa pigi ni ŋkɨrɨ fɔ nɛ.

Yichəɨ maʼaŋ mikhwa, ligi yi pɔ Ɛutiku, ni nchhɔ nchò windu. Pɔɔ gha ŋguʼɔ nchrachra mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ nɛ, lɔgɔ ghaʼa maʼaŋ mikhwa ghɔ, a gū shhɛ llɔ moŋ trɛi yɛrɛ nda tɔthɨ, pi pɨʼɨ vi shhɛ a kwo khu.
Pɔɔ shwiʼi shhɛ, mbaŋ vi nchhu ŋa, “Kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ, a wuʼɔ mbiʼi yi maoŋ.”
Mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ njíɛŋ nda tɔthɨ kiʼɛ, mbəʼɨ brɛi ŋkru. A ni ŋga nchrā pugu pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ ti mbhi ya ndaŋ, ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ.
Pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ lɔ̄gɔ maʼaŋ mikhwa ghɔ pugu pugu pɨ̄nɨ laʼa, a wuʼɔ mbɔ yi maoŋ, pugu fāʼo ntou ghrɨnjuʼɔ.
Pigi lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nii mitu ŋkhǐ nshāʼa ntaoŋ Ashoshi, lɨʼɨ tiɛŋ Pɔɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkwo chhu ni pigi nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ni nyīeŋ pi shhɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu fɔ.
Pigi pugu ni ŋga mbāoŋ Ashoshi, pigi tiɛŋ vi moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ pigi pugu ghə̄ɨ Mitulɛnɛ.
Pigi nyīeŋ llɔ fɔ mbhi gha ndaŋ pigi chəɨŋ mbɨŋ Kiou, yichəɨ mbra llɛ́ pigi shāʼa Shamo, mbhi gha mbɨnɨ ndaŋ pigi chəɨŋ Milɛtu.
Pɔɔ lɔ̄gɔ nthí mi nɔ nyīeŋ nu moŋ ŋkhǐ mfərə Ɛfɛshɔ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi a mīʼaŋ ndɨɨ Eshia, nthɛ ŋa a ni ŋkɔnɔ nu ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ llɛ́ jɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Pentekɔ nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ a njiʼɛ.
Pɔɔ ni ŋga mbɔ Milɛtu, ntaoŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ Ɛfɛshɔ ŋa pa thishɨ moŋ chɔshi ghɔ thɔ njəɨ vi.
Pugu ni ŋga nthɔ njəɨ vi, a chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ji ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ mi ni nchhɔ chɔmbhi a shɨna pəɨ jɛ̄ nɔ fǔoŋ llɛ́ ŋa mi ni ntigi kwò a Eshia nɛ.
Mfāʼa mbhɔ Taathɔ ni ŋguoŋ junoŋ ghao, ni ŋkhǐ ligi pugu pa mōoŋ nu ŋa a ni nthɔ vəɨ llɔ ŋkuoŋ pa ntáŋ ŋa pa Juu ni ntaaŋ a nɔ nɛ.
Pəɨ ji ŋa ǹshini ndɔ ndə̄ɨŋ vəɨ ni sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a nthɛ a ghɛ̄rɛ vəɨ nɛ. Mi ni nchhu chrà Minnwi, ndɔ njɛʼi vəɨ shhɛnte pugu pa nda nda.
Mi ni nshūu tə́nə pa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ mbiŋ Minnwi, niʼiŋ njùʼɔ yugu mbɨŋ Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ Taathɔ.
“Ndɔ ndwɛ, līi njəɨ, ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu nɛ Jerushalɛiŋ, nɔ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi yiʼi a ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nɛ, ǹdɔ njiʼi nji nnu ŋa a shi nchwīe a fɔ nɛ,
ŋkiɛŋ ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi kwo shūu tə́nə a ŋa moŋ sheshe laʼataoŋ, chə́ɨŋ pugu pa ŋgəʼɨ thɔ njwɛrɛ a.
Ǹdɔ ndīi chɔmbhi a, a pɔ yichəɨ nnu vəɨ, ki a fāʼo pi yichəɨ ghɛ̀rɛ vəɨ. Ŋ̀guʼɔ ntāʼa nu mīʼɛŋ pi nnu ŋa Jishɔ Taathɔ ni mɛ̄iŋ a nɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ, mbɔ chīi nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ pwapuŋ Minnwi.
“Līi njəɨ, ndwɛ, ǹji ŋa mbaʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vəɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ a ŋkamuʼɔŋ, mbɔ pəɨ ŋa ǹyīeŋ nthɔ nchīi Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi shɨna pəɨ nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, ǹchhu ni pəɨ shiʼa yei ŋa s̈hesheŋoŋ vəɨ mbhɛ gha, kaŋ mbhɔ ma lɔ nɛ njiʼi mbɔ nɔ,
nthɛ ŋa ǹshini ndɔ njiʼi ndə̄ɨŋ nɔ chhu nu ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ nthi mi nɔ chwīe nu nɛ.
“Nɛnnɛ, p̂əɨ lɨna ni noŋ pəɨ ndɔ mbɨnɨ ndɨna ni pa ŋgwa Minnwi ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi nūʼɔŋ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ tigi ligi yəɨ mbɨŋ pugu nɛ, nɔ lɨna nu ni chɔshi Minnwi ŋa a yuoŋ ni chhǐ Muuŋ vi nɛ.
Ǹji ŋa ǹshi ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ, pa ŋgwa pɨphɨ nii shɨna pəɨ ŋgūo mbɨŋ pəɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ miŋaŋieŋ chɨgəɨchɨgəɨ ghà nchwīe ni pa minjɨɨ nɛ.
Ndɨɨ thɔ nu ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa llɔ shɨna pəɨ shi ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ nɔ fɨ̄ɨ nu pichəɨ pa ghaŋ piŋ pugu yōu njiŋ yugu.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ chhɔ ni lɨna məɨ, ŋkwiŋ nu ŋa nɔ trɛi ŋgaʼo, ǹshini ndɔ njiʼi ŋkɨna nɔ yɛʼi nu vəɨ moŋ tuʼu pugu pa naoŋchɨ ni ŋkhǐ ligi.
“Ndwɛ, ǹchāʼa vəɨ mfɛ mbhɔ Minnwi pugu pa chrà pwapuŋ yi ŋa a nthɛ a chwīe pəɨ kuʼɔ moŋ piŋ pugu pa mbɔrɔ ŋa Minnwi fɛ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pi pi taoŋtaoŋ ghao nɛ.
“Ǹshini ndɔ njiʼi nshɔ̄rɔ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ ki laoŋgo yi, ki ndhwí yi.
Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ji ŋa mbhɔ ma mei yru ju ni mmu pigi pa pakwo paŋ.
Ǹōoŋ ni pəɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ghao ŋa moŋ fāʼa nu ki jwɛ, pia ghɛ̄rɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ mfāʼo nɛ nthɔ ŋkwiŋ pi chrà Jishɔ Taathɔ ŋa a ki chhu ŋa,
‘Ntou mbɔrɔ pɔ moŋ fɛ nu nchaa kwe nu.’
A ni ŋga nchrā ti mīʼɛŋ, ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yi shhɛ nduoŋ Minnwi pugu pugu ghao.
Ŋguoŋ yugu ghao kə̄ɨ, mbaŋ vi, nɔ chaʼa vi ŋa a nyīeŋ shiʼi.
Njùʼɔ yugu lrī ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi nthɛ pa nnu ŋa a ni nchrā nɛ, ŋa mbaʼa pugu shi nuʼuŋ njəɨ vi ŋkamuʼɔŋ nɛ. Pugu lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋgə̄ɨ ntiʼi yəɨ mitu ŋkhǐ.
Pigi ni ŋga nchāʼa vugu, nii moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ nchuʼɔ shhɛ, ntuŋ ndɨndɨ ntaoŋ Koshi, mbhi gha ndaŋ pigi ghə̄ɨ Rodeshi, ndhɔ fɔ ŋgə̄ɨ Patara.
Pigi gha nchəɨŋ fɔ njəɨ mitu ŋkhǐ a ghə̄ɨ nu Fonishia, pigi nii moŋ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ.
Pigi ni ŋga nthɔ ti njəɨ Shaipru, nchhwi nshwiʼi mbiɛŋ ntaoŋ Shiria, ntaoŋ ŋkaoŋ pie Tairɛ, nthɛ ŋa a lɨʼɨ ŋa mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ ni mfāʼo nɔ fuʼu nu pa kaku fɔ nɛ.
Ŋga njəɨ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ, ndaʼa fɔ pigi pugu nɔ khwachəɨ llɛmbhi. Ntɔgɔ mbhɔ njɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi, pugu chhu ni Pɔɔ ŋa kiʼi a ghə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ.

Fɨʼɨ llɛmbhi ŋa a ni mbie ŋa pigi laʼa fɔ nɛ ni ŋga mmɛ, pigi lɔllɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ndaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu ŋguoŋ vugu ghao pugu pa ŋgwɛ pugu ni puoŋ pugu ghə̄ɨ ntiʼi vigi ti ntaoŋ moŋ laʼa, pigi kwi kwɛ́rɛ yigi ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ nduoŋ Minnwi,
nchāʼa noŋ. Nɛnnɛ pigi nii mitu ŋkhǐ ŋgə̄ɨ, pugu pɨ̄nɨ yugu laʼa.
Pigi ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ nyìeŋ llɔ Tairɛ, nchəɨŋ Tolɛmai, nchrā ni pa ghaŋ piŋ ndaʼa fɔ nɔ taʼa llɛ́.
Mbhi gha ndaŋ pigi lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ Kaisharia, ŋgə̄ɨ nda Fili ŋgaŋ chīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ, mbɔ taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna pa khwachəɨ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni nchuʼɔ vugu Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ nnu ghɛ̄rɛ ŋgwa nɛ, ndaʼa pigi pugu.
A ni mfāʼo khwɛ puoŋ piŋgɛ ŋa pugu shi yaʼa laŋ nɛ, Minnwi nōoŋ nnu ni pugu pugu chhu.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pigi ni ndaʼa nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ llɛ́ nɛ, njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi chəɨ, ligi yi pɔ Agabu, llɔ Judia nshwiʼi.

A ni nthɔ mbara vigi, ndɔ̄gɔ ŋkandaŋ Pɔɔ, ŋkrao kwò nduthɔ yi nɔ ghɔ pugu pa mbhɔ mi nchhu ŋa, “Yei nnu ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi chhu nɛ, ‘Yei haʼaŋ pa Juu Jerushalɛiŋ shi ŋkrao ŋgaŋ ŋkandaŋ yei nchaʼa vi mfɛ mbhɔ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.’ ”
Pigi ni ŋga njaʼo nnu yei, pigi pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ, ndɨ̄gəɨ vi ŋa kiʼi a kuʼɔ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Nɛnnɛ Pɔɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pəɨ chwīe pi nɛiŋ, ŋkə̄ɨ nu nthɔ mbəʼɨ njùʼɔ a? Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ ŋguʼɔ mbīri noŋ a pi nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu chə́ɨŋ, a njiʼi mbɔ pi gu ŋ̀guʼɔ ŋkukhu Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ ligi Jishɔ Taathɔ.”
Pigi ni ŋga ndɨ̄gəɨ vi kikie, mieŋ vi fɔ nchhu ŋa, “Nnu ŋa Taathɔ tāʼa nu nɛ pɔ.”
Llɛ́ pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, pigi pīri noŋ yigi ŋkuʼɔ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Pigi pa pichəɨ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ llɔ Kaisharia pugu lɔ̄gɔ vigi ŋgə̄ɨ ni pigi nda Nashoŋ llɔ Shaipru mbɔ pa fǔoŋ ghaŋ piŋ, nnɛ ŋa pigi pugu laʼa kaʼa.
Pigi ni ŋga nthɔ nchəɨŋ Jerushalɛiŋ, pa ghaŋ piŋ shwiʼi pìɛŋ pigi ni pwanjuʼɔ.
Mbhi gha ndaŋ, pigi pa Pɔɔ ghə̄ɨ njəɨ Jɛiŋ. Ŋguoŋ pa thishɨ ni mbɔ fɔ.
Pɔɔ ni ŋga nchrā ni pugu, mfɨ̄ʼɨ ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa Minnwi chwīe shɨna pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ntɔgɔ mbhɔ yu nɛ, pa taʼa yi pa taʼa yi.
Pugu ni ŋga njaʼo, ŋgaʼo Minnwi. Nchhu ghɔ kiʼɛ ŋa, “Ɔ yəɨ nu ndǐŋ vigi, fɨʼɨ ŋkaŋŋkaŋ ŋgwa Juu haʼaŋ pugu piŋ Minnwi, ndɔ mfāʼo ŋkiɛŋ ntou niʼiŋ njùʼɔ ŋkuoŋ gɨ́ Mushi nɛ.

Pi kwo chhu pa nnu ni pugu nthɛ ghɔ ŋa ɔ yɛʼi ŋguoŋ pa Juu ŋa pugu laʼa nu shɨna ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nɛ, ŋa kiʼi pugu nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ Mushi, nchhu nu ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu niʼiŋ puoŋ pugu ŋgunu mbrɛi, ki nchwīe nùʼɔŋ pa ŋgwa Juu.
Ti pi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ? Nthɛ ŋa pugu shi njaʼo ŋa ɔ thɔ.
“Yei nnu ŋa pigi tāʼa nu ŋa ɔ chwīe nɛ. Khwɛ ŋgwa pɔ hɛiŋ haʼaŋ pugu kwo lɔ̄gɔ kàʼa shhɨ Minnwi.

Ghə̄ɨ pəɨ pugu kaʼa, nchwīe pa nùʼɔŋ nɔ pɔ nu yi taoŋtaoŋ, ɔ lɔ mbe yaoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pugu fɛ nɔ chwīe nu nùʼɔŋ ghɔ nnɛ ŋa mimfɛ pi kiri thɔ yugu. Nnɛ kaŋ pugu ŋkaa pugu shi nji ŋa nnu shini lɔ mbɔ moŋ pa nnu haʼaŋ pi chhu nthɛ ghɔ, ŋa gɔ̀ nduthɔ yɔ ghà nūʼɔŋ gɨ́.

“Ndɔ ni ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu piŋ Minnwi nɛ, pigi kwo nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ mfɛ ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu jɨ maoŋ ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, kiʼi pugu jɨ chhǐ, kiʼi pəɨ kru minyieŋ ŋa pi nɨ̄naoŋ mmi yi a khu ki chhǐ lɔ ntaoŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ, kiʼi pugu kwoshuoŋ.”

Nnɛ, Pɔɔ ghə̄ɨ pugu pa ŋgwa pighɔ. Mbhi gha ndaŋ pugu pugu chwīe noŋ yugu mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ, ŋgə̄ɨ Nda Minnwi, nɔ chhu nu llɛmbhi ŋa a piʼi pugu lūgwi chwīe nu nùʼɔŋ nɔ pɔ nu yi taoŋtaoŋ, ndɔ shi nthɔ ni maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ fɛ nu nɔ thɔ shesheŋoŋ vugu.
Khwachəɨ llɛ́ ghɔ ni ŋga ŋkwo mmɛ nu, pichəɨ ŋgwa Juu llɔ Eshia gha njəɨ Pɔɔ Nda Minnwi, niʼiŋ puŋ yú ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ ndɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɛ,

mbaʼo ŋgòu ŋa, “Ŋgwa Ishrae pəɨ kwe vigi! Yei ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a nyīeŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ nthɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa ni nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ ŋgwa Ishrae pugu pa gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa Nda Minnwi yei. Nɔ pīgi nu, a lɔ̄gɔ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nthɔ mfuo lɨʼɨ taoŋtaoŋ yei.”
Pugu ni nchhu nnɛ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkwo fǔoŋ njəɨ vi pugu Trɔfimu mbɔ ŋoŋ llɔ Ɛfɛshɔ moŋ laʼa, nthɔ mbīʼi nu ŋa ju, Pɔɔ, ntiɛŋ vi nthɔ nɔ Nda Minnwi.
Fiŋthɔ gū moŋ ŋguoŋ laʼa ghao, pa ŋgwa pighɔ tei ŋgə̄ɨ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ Pɔɔ nshūu vi ntaoŋ nɔ Nda Minnwi, nchri choŋkaʼa wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni mbaʼo nu nɔ jwi nu Pɔɔ nɛ, ŋkɨ̀nɨ chəɨŋ mbhɔ taathɔ pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ Roma ŋa ŋguoŋ Jerushalɛiŋ pɔ moŋ fiŋthɔ.
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ a lɔ̄gɔ pa shoogɛ pugu pa thishɨ taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ, pugu pugu tei ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ ŋgwa pighɔ. Pa ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋga njəɨ vi pugu pa shoogɛ pighɔ, mieŋ wie nu Pɔɔ.
Taathɔ ghɔ ghə̄ɨ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ Pɔɔ, mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi krao vi ni paa ndigi chɛiŋ. Ndɔ mbie kiʼɛ ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei pɔ pi gɔ̌? A lɔ nchwīe pi nɛiŋ?”
Pichəɨ ŋgwa moŋ kɨrɨ ghɔ paʼo ŋgòu nchhu yei nnu, pichəɨ chhu yini. A gha mieŋ ki yaʼo laʼo nnu pighɔ, nthɛ ntou yɔ̀yɔnɔ a fɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi niʼiŋ vi moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pa shoogɛ ghà nchhɔ nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni nchəɨŋ ni ju ni mbɨŋ nchwi nda nɛ, pa shoogɛ pighɔ ya ntiɛŋ vi tiɛŋ nthɛ fɨʼɨ kɨkrɨ ŋa yú ŋgwa pighɔ ni nthɔ nu nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Yú ŋgwa pighɔ wuʼɔ nthɔ nu njiŋ yu mbaʼo ŋgòu ŋa, “Pəɨ mīʼɛŋ ni ju!”
Nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni ntāʼa nu nii ni Pɔɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pa shoogɛ ghà mbɔ nɛ, a chhu ni taathɔ pa shoogɛ pighɔ ŋa, “N̂chhu nnu vɛ?”
A pie vi ŋa, “Ɔ ji chrà Gri?
A lɔ mbɔ gɔ̀ mbɔ ŋoŋ Ijipti ŋa a ni nthɔ ni tɨnɨthɔ ndɔ̄gɔ khwɛ ŋkaŋ mikija pəɨ pugu nii moŋ ŋkǔnu njó nɛ?”
Pɔɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “M̀bɔ pi ŋoŋ Juu llɔ Tashɔ moŋ Shilishia, ŋoŋ llɔ moŋ mmɛ laʼataoŋ. Ǹdɨ̄gəɨ ghɔ mieŋ ǹchhu nnu ni ŋgwa pei.”
Nthishɨ pa shoogɛ ghɔ piŋ, nnɛ Pɔɔ thi ŋkuoŋ pa nchwi nda pighɔ nōoŋ ni mbhɔ yi ŋa ŋgwa pighɔ lɛrɛ laŋ. Pugu ni ŋga ndɛrɛ laŋ, Pɔɔ chrà ni pugu moŋ chrà Hibru, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Lǐŋ paŋ pugu pa tǎa paŋ, pəɨ yaʼo ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹshi ntaa noŋ a ndwɛ shhɨ pəɨ nɛ.”
Pugu gha njaʼo a chrà pi moŋ chrà Hibru, pugu pɨnɨ nja ndɛrɛ laŋ. Pɔɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhu ŋa,

“Mi ŋoŋ Juu, pi phi a Tashɔ moŋ Shilishia ndɔ ŋ̀kuʼɔ pi hɛiŋ moŋ Jerushalɛiŋ mbhɔ Gamalia mbɔ masha a. M̀fāʼo ŋkiɛŋ tɨtɨnɨ ntɨ́gɨ moŋ gɨ́ pa tǎa pia, mfɛ noŋ a ni Minnwi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋguoŋ vəɨ haʼaŋ pəɨ thi hɛiŋ shiʼa fɛ noŋ yəɨ nɛ.
Ŋki fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu younjiŋ Shɛndaoŋ yei nɛ, ti pichəɨ khu. Ŋki wɛ̄iŋ mbia pugu pa piŋgɛ niʼiŋ vugu chə́ɨŋ.

Pa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa kúŋ nthɛ pugu kwe ntie a ŋa ǹchhu pi nnu shini. Pugu ni nāʼaŋ pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ mfɛ vəɨ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ mfɛ ni pa ŋgwa Juu Damashiku, nɛnnɛ, ŋ̀gə̄ɨ fɔ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ ŋkrao vugu mbɨnɨ ni pugu Jerushalɛiŋ pi fɛ njɔ́ ni pugu.
“Nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu ti mbara mbɨŋ Damashiku nɛ, nnu ni ntuŋ minaoŋ, líʼɛ llɔ po wīʼi nshei yəɨ mu.
Ŋ̀gū shhɛ, njaʼo yichəɨ ŋggì chhu nu vəɨ ŋa,
‘Shɔɔ, Shɔɔ, ɔ thɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ vəɨ nɔ khɔ?’
“Ŋ̀khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌, Taathɔ?’
“A chhu ŋa,
‘Mi Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ ŋa ɔ thɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ nɛ.’
Ŋgwa haʼaŋ pigi pugu ni mbɔ kaʼa nɛ, ni njəɨ líʼɛ ghɔ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njaʼo nji ŋggì ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchrā nu vəɨ nɛ.
“Nchhu ŋa, ‘Mi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ, Taathɔ?’
“Taathɔ chhu vəɨ ŋa,
‘Lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ Damashiku, pi shi nshwei ghɔ fɔ ni ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa Minnwi nūʼɔŋ ŋa ɔ chwīe nɛ.’
Ligi ma nchri nthɛ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ líʼɛ ghɔ ni nthɛ nɛ, nthɛ yie ghɔ, pakwo paŋ wɛ̄iŋ mbhɔ a ŋgə̄ɨ ni mu moŋ Damashiku.
“Ŋoŋ chəɨ ni mbɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ Damashiku, ligi yi pɔ Anania, mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgaŋ pɔgɔ Minnwi ndɔ nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ gɨ́ ghao, ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Juu līi vi ŋa a ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ.
A thɔ ntithi yəɨ mu nchhu ŋa, ‘Ndǐŋ a Shɔɔ, pɨnɨ njəɨ lɨʼɨ,’ wuʼɔ chomilaoŋ ghɔ, ligi a chuʼɔ ǹjəɨ vi.
“A chhu ŋa, ‘Minnwi pa ŋkhu tǎa pia chuʼɔ ghɔ ŋa ɔ ji nnu ŋa a kāʼa nɔ chwīe nu nɛ, nɔ yəɨ nu Muuŋ Fàʼa vi yi Ndɨndɨ, ndɔ njaʼo ŋggì yi a chrà nu.
Ɔ shi mbɔ miŋkwentie yi ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nɔ nchhu nu pa nnu pɛ ŋa ɔ yəɨ ndɔ njaʼo nɛ.
Ɔ nuʼuŋ nchēi pi khɔ ndwɛ, yrɛi shhɛ, ŋkwe ŋkhǐ nduoŋ Minnwi a shɨ̄gao phɨ yɔ.’
“M̀bɨnɨ Jerushalɛiŋ ŋga nthɔ nduoŋ Minnwi moŋ Nda Minnwi, njəɨ nnu.
Moŋ nnu ghɔ ǹjəɨ Taathɔ a chhu vəɨ ŋa,
‘Kɔnɔ ntaoŋ Jerushalɛiŋ ni njɨ, nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa ŋgwa pei piŋ nnu ŋa ɔ shi nchhu nthɛ a nɛ.’
“Ŋ̀khwɛ̄ ŋa, ‘Taathɔ, pugu ni noŋ pugu ji ŋa ŋki nyīeŋ moŋ sheshe nda luoŋ Minnwi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu piŋ ghɔ nɛ, niʼiŋ vugu chə́ɨŋ ndɔ ŋgwie pichəɨ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni nchhɔ njwi miŋkwentie yɔ mbɔ Shitifiŋ nɛ, mmu nduthɔ a ni mbɔ fɔ, mbiŋ nu ŋa pi jwi vi, ndɨna nu ni ndhwí ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni thɔ njwi vi nɛ.’
“Taathɔ chhu vəɨ ŋa,
‘Ghə̄ɨ! Nthɛ ŋa ǹshi ntaoŋ ghɔ fie hini ni ŋgwa laʼataoŋ nduoŋ.’
Ŋgwa pighɔ ni ŋguʼɔ njwɛrɛ nu ti ŋga njaʼo yei, ŋkə̄rə ŋggì yugu nchhu ŋa, “Pəɨ mīʼɛŋ ni ju, a lɔ mfāʼo nɔ chhɔ nu mbhi!”
Ndɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni mbaʼo ŋgòu, nshrāo ndhwí yugu mfiri nu, ndɔ māʼaŋ pru moŋ tɔthɨ nɛ,
taathɔ pa shoogɛ Roma fɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi lɔ̄gɔ Pɔɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pa shoogɛ ghà nchhɔ nɛ, ndɔ nchhu pugu wie vi nɔ tāʼa nu laʼo nnu ŋa a chwīe pa ŋgwa Juu thɔ mbaʼo ŋgòu thɔ yu nɛ.
Ndɔ pugu ni ŋga ŋkwo krao vi nɔ wie nu, Pɔɔ pie ni taʼa nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ŋa a ni nthi fɔ nɛ ŋa, “Gɨ́ piŋ ŋa pi wie ŋoŋ Roma ki lɔ naa nshaʼa vi njəɨ ŋa a gū sháʼa?”
Ndɨɨ ŋa nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ghɔ ni njaʼo nnu yei nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ nchhu ni taathɔ pa shoogɛ ŋa, “Ɔ tāʼa nchwīe pi nɛiŋ? Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ vei pɔ pi ŋoŋ Roma.”
Taathɔ pa shoogɛ pighɔ ghə̄ɨ mbie vi ŋa, “Shwei a, ɔ ŋoŋ Roma?”
Pɔɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ooŋ.”
Taathɔ pa shoogɛ pighɔ chhu ŋa, “Njuoŋ pi ni ŋkiɛŋ ntou mbɨŋ maa mbɔ ŋoŋ Roma.”
Pɔɔ khwɛ̄ ji ŋa, “Pi phi a phi nɔ ŋoŋ Roma.”
Nnɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ nɔ tou nu mi nɛ kāʼo mbɨ̄nɨ pɨ̄nɨ ndɨɨ ghɔ. Taathɔ pa shoogɛ ghɔ pɔgɔ nthɛ ŋa a ni nji ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋa Pɔɔ pɔ pi ŋoŋ Roma a kwo lɔ ŋkrao vi.

Ndɔ mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, taathɔ pa shoogɛ pighɔ tāʼa nu nja nji nnu ŋa a chwīe pa ŋgwa Juu paʼo ŋgòu thɔ yu nɛ, ŋkɨ̄gɛi vi, ŋgɛ̄ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa kúŋ, nshwiʼi ni Pɔɔ kiʼɛ ntigi vi shhɨ pugu.
Pɔɔ chaoŋ ligi yi mbɨŋ pa kúŋ nchhu ŋa, “Lǐŋ paŋ, ŋgaŋthɔ a lɔ njiʼi ŋkhu moŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ǹchhɔ chɔmbhi a shhɨ Minnwi ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ shiʼa nɛ.”
Taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ mbɔ Anania fɛ gɨ́ ni ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni nthi mbara yəɨ Pɔɔ nɛ ŋa pugu chrə̄ɨ lrì thɔ Pɔɔ.
