Nɛnnɛ, Pɔɔ chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Minnwi shi nchrə̄ɨ ghɔ ŋkaa ghɔ, ma ŋgaŋ mbe vei. Ɔ chhɔ hɛnɛ nɔ shaʼa nu ma ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ gɨ́ chhu nɛ, ndɔ mbəʼɨ gɨ́ ghɔ ŋkaa ghɔ nɔ chhu nu ŋa pi chrə̄ɨ a?”
Ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni nthi yəɨ Pɔɔ nɛ chhu ŋa, “Ɔ kie nɛiŋ ŋgwɛʼi taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi?”
Pɔɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Lǐŋ paŋ ǹshini ndɔ nji ŋa a taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa kiʼi nchrā nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ ghaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa pəɨ.”

Ndɔ Pɔɔ ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa taʼa ghrà kɨrɨ ghɔ pa ŋgwa Shadushi yichəɨ taʼa pɔ Farashi, a paʼo ŋgòu nda pa kúŋ ŋa, “Lǐŋ paŋ, mi ŋoŋ Farashi, a phi ŋoŋ Farashi mbhi a. Pi shaʼa a hɛiŋ shiʼa nthɛ ŋa ǹjwɛrɛ nu ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ŋkhu nɛ shi mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.”
A ni ŋga nchhu yei nnu, mindoundou gū shɨna pa ŋgwa Farashi pugu pa ŋgwa Shadushi, kɨrɨ ghɔ shɨna ntaoŋ nduoŋnduoŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa pa ŋgwa Shadushi ghà nchhu ŋa ŋoŋ shiʼa ŋkhu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ, paʼa pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi lɔ mbɔ, ndɔ paʼa pa Jijwɛ lɔ mbɔ, ndɔ ŋgwa Farashi piŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei ghao.

Mmɛ yɔ̀yɔnɔ mūʼuŋ, pichəɨ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ni gɨ́ Mushi ŋa pugu ni mbɔ moŋ taʼa ghrà pugu pa ŋgwa Farashi nɛ tithi ndōu nu ŋa, “Pigi lɔ njəɨ fàŋ ŋoŋ vei, pəɨ ji nɛiŋ ŋa yichəɨ jijwɛ, ki ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chrà ghɔ?”

Minduoŋnduoŋ ghɔ ni ŋga nchəɨŋ móŋoŋ, taathɔ pa shoogɛ pighɔ pɔgɔ ŋa pi shi nshāa Pɔɔ prapra, mfɛ gɨ́ ni pa shoogɛ ŋa pugu shwiʼi mfuʼu vi ni ghrɨ́ shɨna ŋgwa pighɔ nthɔ nɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pa shoogɛ ghà nchhɔ nɛ.
Tuʼu gha shini, Taathɔ thi yəɨ yu nchhu ŋa,
“Fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ, wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ɔ chīi ligi a Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ, a wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ɔ shi nchīi moŋ laʼataoŋ Roma nɛ.”
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Juu nyiaŋ ntáŋ, ŋgwrā kɨ̀na ŋa mbaʼa pugu njɨ yaoŋ, ki nnu sheshe yaoŋ, kaŋ a nɛ pugu jwi Pɔɔ.
Ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nyiaŋ ntáŋ ghɔ nɛ ni ntɔgɔ khwɛ wuŋ yugu.
Pugu lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ mbara pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa pichəɨ pa thishɨ nchhu ŋa, “Pigi wrā kɨ̀na ŋa mbaʼa pigi jɨ sheshe yaoŋ ti nuʼuŋ njwi Pɔɔ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ pa pichəɨ pa kúŋ taoŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ni taathɔ pa shoogɛ Roma ŋa a taoŋ Pɔɔ ni pəɨ. Pəɨ chwīe nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ tāʼa nu ntou pi mooŋ nnu ghɔ shiʼi nɔ ji nu pa nnu nthɛ vi. Pigi kwo pīri noŋ yigi nɔ jwi nu vi ŋkaoŋ a maa ndɔ nchəɨŋ hɛiŋ.”
Ndɔ muuŋ mimbia mbɔ muuŋ ndǐŋ Pɔɔ yi miŋgwɛ ni njaʼo ntáŋ yei, ŋgə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pa shoogɛ ghà nchhɔ nɛ nshwei Pɔɔ nɔ ghɔ.
Nɛnnɛ, Pɔɔ mɛ̄iŋ taʼa nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Lɔ̄gɔ muuŋ vei ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ shhɨ taathɔ pa shoogɛ nthɛ ŋa a fāʼo nnu nɔ chhu nu ghɔ.”
Nɛnnɛ, nthishɨ ghɔ lɔ̄gɔ vi pugu yu ghə̄ɨ njəɨ taathɔ pa shoogɛ nchhu ŋa, “Pɔɔ, yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ, mɛ̄iŋ a nchhu vəɨ ŋa ǹdɔ̄gɔ muuŋ vei nthɔ njəɨ ghɔ nɔ, nthɛ ŋa a fāʼo nnu nɔ chhu nu vɛ.”
Taathɔ pa shoogɛ ghɔ wɛ̄iŋ mbhɔ yi pugu yu ghə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋgwa lɔ mbɔ nɛ, a pie vi njiŋnjiŋ ŋa, “Nnu ŋa ɔ tāʼa nu nchhu vəɨ nɛ pɔ pi khɔ?”
Muuŋ ghɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pa Juu taaŋ ŋa pugu shi nchhu vɛ ŋa ɔ taoŋ Pɔɔ ni pa kúŋ yua nɔ haʼaŋ pugu tāʼa nu ntou vi tou nji pa nnu nthɛ vi shishiʼi.

Ndɔ kiʼi njaʼo nnu ŋa pugu chhu nu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pugu tɔgɔ khwɛ wuŋ yugu ŋa pugu kwo taaŋ ti ŋgwrā kɨ̀na ŋa mbaʼa pugu jɨ ki nnu sheshe yaoŋ ki lɔ naa njwi vi, ŋkwo lɛrɛ nthɔ njwɛrɛ vi. Ti ndwɛ, pugu kwo pīri noŋ yugu nthɔ njwɛrɛ khwɛ̀ pi mbhɔ ghɔ.”
Nɛnnɛ, taathɔ pa shoogɛ chhu ni muuŋ ghɔ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ ni vhi ndɔ mfɛ gɨ́ ghɔ ŋa, “Kiʼi nchwīe shesheŋoŋ ji ŋa ɔ kwo chhu nnu yei vəɨ.”

Taathɔ pa shoogɛ ghɔ mɛ̄iŋ paa nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ nchhu ŋa, “Pəɨ pīri paa ŋkɨɨ pa shoogɛ nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu Kaisharia pəɨ pa khwachəɨ wuŋ ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ ni minyieŋləɨ pugu pa paa ŋkɨɨ ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ ni khwǎ, mbīri nɔ llɔ nu moŋ ndipuʼu minaoŋ ni tuʼu.
Fɛ pichəɨ pa ŋkwɛ́iŋ ni Pɔɔ a kuʼɔ pəɨ ghə̄ɨ ni ju mfɛ vi ni Feli, mbɔ mmɛ ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa shiʼi, ki kàʼa lɔ ŋkēe vi.”
Taathɔ pa shoogɛ ghɔ nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei nāʼaŋ mmu Klaudiu Lishia vɛ, ma Feli ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ, ǹchrā vɛ.
Pa ŋgwa Juu ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ vei ntāʼa nu njwi vi. Ŋ̀ga nthɔ mbara vi pigi pa shoogɛ ŋkwe vi, njaʼo ŋa a pɔ pi ŋoŋ laʼataoŋ Roma.
Ŋki tāʼa nu nji nnu ŋa pugu ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ nɛ, nɛnnɛ, ŋ̀gə̄ɨ ni ju nda pa kúŋ pugu.
Ŋki gha ntāʼa, njəɨ ŋa pa nnu haʼaŋ pi ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ lɔ mbɔ pa nnu haʼaŋ a nthɛ pi jwi vi, ki niʼiŋ vi chə́ɨŋ nɔ ghɔ, pa nnu pighɔ pɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa pie nthɛ nnu gɨ́ yugu.
Pi ni ŋga ntūgu vəɨ ŋa pi thɔ nyiaŋ ntáŋ nthɛ vi, ǹtaoŋ vi vɛ taʼa ŋgɛ, mfɛ gɨ́ ni ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi nɛ ŋa pugu shwei nnu haʼaŋ pugu wɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ vɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ, pa shoogɛ lɔ̄gɔ Pɔɔ wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni mfɛ gɨ́ ni pugu nɛ, ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju ti nchəɨŋ Antipatri ni tuʼu.
Mbhi gha ndaŋ pugu pɨ̄nɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ ghà nchhɔ nɛ, mieŋ vi pugu pa ghaŋ Minyieŋləɨ ŋa pugu pugu ghə̄ɨ kaʼa.
Pugu ni ŋga nchəɨŋ Kaisharia, mfɛ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ ni Feli mmɛ ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa, mbɨnɨ nchaʼa Pɔɔ mfɛ mbhɔ yu.
Feli mɛ̄iŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ mbie vi ŋa a llɔ moŋ yəɨ lɨʼɨ, ŋga njaʼo ŋa a llɔ pi Shilishia,
a chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ǹshi njaʼo chrà yɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu wɛ̄iŋ ghɔ thɔ nɛ.” Nɛnnɛ, mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi chhɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi Pɔɔ ntuʼɔ fùoŋ Hɛrɔ.

Tiɛŋ llɛ́ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ mbɔ Anania shwiʼi pugu pa pichəɨ pa thishɨ ni taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a shi nchrā nɔ lɨʼɨ yugu, ligi yi pɔ Tetulu. Pugu fɨ̄ʼɨ nnu ŋa pugu wɛ̄iŋ Pɔɔ nɔ nɛ ni Feli ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ.
Pi ni ŋga mɛ̄iŋ Pɔɔ a nii nda, Tetulu jɛ̄ nthɔ ntigi pa nnu thɔ yu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Nthɛ ŋa ɔ shaʼa nu ni shiethɔ nɛ, pigi fāʼo ntou ghɨghrɨ nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ nɛ, pugu pa ŋa ntou pa kwrí thɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ yei ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ ghɔ nɛ, ma Feli ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ,
moŋ ŋguoŋ shɛndaoŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghao, pigi piŋ ŋguoŋ nnu pighɔ ni ntou tōo nu vɛ, ma Feli ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ.
Ndɔ nɔ mieŋ nu ki lɔ nuʼuŋ njwi ndɨɨ yɔ, ǹdɨ̄gəɨ ghɔ moŋ pwanjuʼɔ yɔ ŋa ɔ yaʼo vigi nɔ kuo ndɨɨ.
Pigi yəɨ ŋa ŋoŋ vei ya mbɔ pi ŋkiɛŋ ŋgaŋ ndàŋ, a thɔ ni minduoŋnduoŋ shɨna pa Juu moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao, mbɔ nthishɨ pa ŋgwa kɨrɨ yɛ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Nashariŋ nɛ.
A ni ntāʼa nu mfuo Nda Minnwi, pigi wɛ̄iŋ vi. [Pigi kaŋ ni nshāʼa vi ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ yigi chhu nɛ,
ndɔ Lishia mbɔ nthishɨ pa taathɔ pa shoogɛ thɔ ni ghrɨ́ ŋkwe vi mbhɔ pigi ŋgə̄ɨ ni ju,
nchhu nu ni pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni ntigi nnu thɔ yu nɛ ŋa pugu thɔ shhɨ ghɔ.] Ɔ shi ŋga ntou vi ni noŋ yɔ, kaŋ ɔ shi nji ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa pigi wɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ nɛ mbhɔ yu.”
Pa ŋgwa Juu nii moŋ ghɔ ŋkaa pugu, nchhu nu ŋa ŋguoŋ pa nnu haʼaŋ pi wɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ nɛ nnu shini.
Feli mmɛ ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa nōoŋ ni mbhɔ yi ŋa Pɔɔ chrà. Pɔɔ chhu ŋa, “Ǹji ŋa ɔ kwo shaʼa laʼataoŋ yei nɔ ntou ŋgaʼo. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, m̀fāʼo pwatua nɔ taa nu nchò a shhɨ ghɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ nthɛ ɔ yəɨ ni noŋ yɔ nɛ, a lɔ njiʼi ntɔgɔ paanchrɔ llɛ́ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki kuʼɔ Jerushalɛiŋ lɨʼɨ ghaʼo Minnwi.
Pa Juu shi ki lɔ njəɨ nthɔ ndōu nu pigi shesheŋoŋ ki niʼiŋ puŋ ŋgwa moŋ Nda Minnwi ti mfɛ pi ni mooŋ sheshe nda luoŋ Minnwi, ki pi moŋ laʼa.
Ndɔ minthɛ paʼa pugu lɔ nōoŋ vɛ ŋa nnu ŋa pugu tigi nu thɔ mu nɛ nnu shini.

“Ndɔ m̀biŋ yei vɛ, ŋa ŋ̀ga ŋgaʼo Minnwi pa ŋkhu tǎa pigi njōu pi njiŋ Shɛndaoŋ ŋa pugu chhu ŋa a lɔ kāʼo nɛ. Ndɔ m̀bɨnɨ mbiŋ ŋa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa yi njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nɛ, yi ndɨndɨ.
M̀fāʼo kwàʼa mbɨŋ Minnwi ŋa pugu ŋkaa pugu fāʼo nɛ, ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao, ŋgwa shiʼi pugu pa pi pɨphɨ shi ndɛ mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu.
Nɛnnɛ, ŋ̀ga mbaʼo ŋa ŋgaŋthɔ a pɔ yi shishie shhɨ Minnwi pugu pa ŋgwamishua.
“Mi ni ŋga ŋkwo pɔ mbhi nɔ ntou ŋgaʼo, mbɨnɨ mbɨ̄nɨ laʼa pigi nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu ŋgwa paŋ ni mbɨŋ ndɔ mbɨnɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni Minnwi.

A ni mbɔ pi ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki thɔ nchwīe nnu pei Nda Minnwi nɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki kwo mīʼɛŋ nùʼɔŋ ŋa pi ghà nchwīe nɔ pɔ nu yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ, ŋa pugu ni njəɨ a. Pigi pa yú ŋgwa shini ndɔ mbɔ kaʼa, ndɔ paʼa minduoŋnduoŋ lɔ mbɔ.
Ndɔ pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Juu llɔ Eshia ni mbɔ fɔ ŋkaa pugu, a pie ŋa pugu thɔ ŋkaa pugu nɔ fɨ̄ʼɨ nu sheshe nnu ŋa ǹchwīe ki a lɔ ŋkāʼo nɛ.
Ndāa nɛnnɛ nɛ, pei ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ hɛiŋ nɛ fɨ̄ʼɨ nɛ nnu ŋa ŋki chwīe ki a lɔ ŋkāʼo ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki thi shhɨ pa kúŋ nɛ,
ŋkiɛŋ yei taʼa nnu ŋa ŋki paʼo ŋgòu nɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki thi shɨna pugu nɛ, ‘Ǹthi sháʼa nɛ shiʼa shhɨ pəɨ nthɛ ŋa m̀biŋ ŋa ŋgwa ghà ŋga ŋkhu, shi mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.’ ”
Ndɔ Feli ŋa a ni nja nji pa nnu nthɛ nnu Shɛndaoŋ shiʼi nɛ, chi sháʼa mfɛ shhɨ, nchhu ŋa, “Ndɨɨ ŋa Lishia mbɔ taathɔ pa shoogɛ shi nchəɨŋ nɛ, ǹdūgwi sháʼa yɔ.”
Nɛnnɛ a fɛ gɨ́ ni nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ŋa a chhɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi vi, ndɔ mfɛ shɨ̀na ghɔ nɔ haʼaŋ minthɛ pa shuoŋ pi thɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ vi ki lɔ mfāʼo kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ nɛ.
Pichəɨ pa llɛ́ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ Feli thɔ pugu ŋgwɛ vi, ligi yi pɔ Drushila, mbɔ ŋoŋ Juu, nchhu pi thɔ ni Pɔɔ, a ywɛrɛ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Pɔɔ thɔ nchrā nu nthɛ nnu piŋ mbɨŋ Jishɔ Krishto nɛ.

Nɔ haʼaŋ Pɔɔ ni nchrā nu ŋkuoŋ pa nnu ndɨndɨ, pa nnu wɛ̄iŋ nu noŋ pugu pa llɛmbhi sháʼa ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ, pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ Feli a chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Ɔ nthɛ ɔ ghə̄ɨ ndwɛ, ǹshi mbɨnɨ mɛ̄iŋ ghɔ ndɨɨ ŋa m̀fāʼo shɨ̀na nɛ.”
Wuʼɔ moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ, a kwāʼa nu ŋa Pɔɔ shi mfɛ mbɨŋ ghɔ, nthɛ yie ghɔ, a thɔ mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋgɛŋgɛ pugu yu chrā nu.
Paa ŋgaʼo ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Pokiu Feshitu lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ Feli. Feli ni ntāʼa nu nōoŋ pwapuŋ ni pa Juu, nnɛ, mieŋ Pɔɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ.
Trɛi llɛ́ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ Feshitu chəɨŋ moŋ krao lɨʼɨ ghɔ, ndhɔ Kaisharia ŋkuʼɔ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa thishɨ ŋgwa Juu chhu pa nnu thɔ Pɔɔ, ndɨ̄gəɨ Feshitu,
mbie vi ŋa a nthɛ a chwīe shiʼi ni pugu nɔ taoŋ nu Pɔɔ a shwiʼi Jerushalɛiŋ. Pugu ni nchhu nnɛ nthɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkwo taŋ nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu ŋgwa pugu lɛrɛ njwi Pɔɔ shɛndaoŋ.
Feshitu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Pi nūʼɔŋ Pɔɔ nɔ ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ Kaisharia, mbaʼa a nuʼuŋ ndaʼa ŋkaoŋ mmu nduthɔ a maa ŋgə̄ɨ fɔ.
Pəɨ chwīe pigi pa thishɨ pəɨ ghə̄ɨ Kaisharia, a mbɔ ŋa ŋoŋ ghɔ fāaŋ sheshe nnu, pugu chhu nthɛ vi.”
Feshitu chhɔ fɔ nɔ fúoŋ llɛ́ ŋgə̄ɨ pi wuŋ, ndɔllɔ kiʼɛ ŋgə̄ɨ Kaisharia. Mbhi gha ndaŋ a chɔchɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ shaʼa sháʼa, mfɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi thɔ ni Pɔɔ.
Pɔɔ ni ŋga nchəɨŋ, pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa pugu ni ndhɔ Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ, ghɨ̄ŋ vi, nthɔ nchhu ntou pa nnu thɔ yu, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nōoŋ ŋa sheshe nnu pighɔ nnu shini.
Ndɔ Pɔɔ taa noŋ yi, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ǹdɔ njiʼi nchwīe kaŋ taʼa fàŋ nthɛ gɨ́ pa ŋgwa Juu ki nthɛ Nda Minnwi, ki mbɨŋ Kaisha mbɔ fùoŋ pa Roma.”
Ndɔ Feshitu ni ntāʼa nu nɔ nōoŋ nu pwapuŋ ni pa ŋgwa Juu, nɛnnɛ a chhu ni Pɔɔ ŋa, “Ɔ khwā nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu Jerushalɛiŋ pi shaʼa ghɔ fɔ nthɛ nnu pei ŋa pi chhu vəɨ hɛiŋ nthɛ ghɔ nɛ?”
Pɔɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ǹthi hɛiŋ moŋ taʼa lɨʼɨ shaʼa sháʼa Kaisha mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa a pie ŋa pi shaʼa a nɛ. Gɔ̀ nduthɔ yɔ ji ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi fāaŋ kaŋ taʼa nnu mbɨŋ pa Juu.

Ŋ̀kaŋ ni mbɔ pi ŋgushaʼa, nchwīe sheshe nnu ŋa a pie ŋa ŋ̀khu nɛ, paʼa ǹdɔ njiʼi ntei tei. Ndɔ a mbɔ ŋa kaŋ taʼa nnu shini lɔ njiʼi mbɔ moŋ nnu ŋa pugu chhu nthɛ a nɛ, kaŋ mbaʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ fɛ a mbhɔ pugu. Ǹdɔ̄gɔ sháʼa a nda sháʼa Kaisha.”
Feshitu ni ŋga mbini pugu pa kúŋ pi, ŋkhwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ŋa ɔ chhu ŋa Kaisha shaʼa sháʼa yɔ nɛ, ɔ shi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ yu.”
A ni ŋga ndaʼa, Fùoŋ Agripa pugu Benishi ghə̄ɨ Kaisharia nɔ kra nu Feshitu, nchhu ghɔ ŋa a thɔ a pwa.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ndaʼa fɔ nɔ ntou llɛ́ nɛ, Feshitu nūʼɔŋ sháʼa Pɔɔ ghɔ shhɨ fùoŋ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Yichəɨ ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ pɔ hɛiŋ ŋa Feli ni ŋga ndɔllɔ mieŋ.
Ŋki gha ŋgə̄ɨ Jerushalɛiŋ, pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa thishɨ pa ŋgwa Juu chhu pa nnu nɔ ligi yi, nchhu nu ŋa, ŋoŋ vei ŋgushaʼa.
Ndɔ ǹchhu ni pugu ŋa, pigi, mbɔ ŋgwa Roma shiʼa njiʼi ndɔ̄gɔ ŋoŋ nɔ ŋgushaʼa ki a lɔ ntithi shhɨ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu chhu nnu thɔ yu nɛ ntaa nchò yi nthɛ nnu pɛ ŋa pi chhu thɔ yu nɛ.
“Pugu ni ŋga nthɔ hɛiŋ kəʼɨ ghɔ, paʼa ǹdɔ nuʼuŋ mbɨrɨ fɨʼɨ, ndɔ mbhi gha ndaŋ ŋ̀kiʼɛ chhɔ pi chhɔ lɨʼɨ sháʼa nchhu ŋa pi thɔ ni ŋoŋ ghɔ.
Pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchhu pa nnu thɔ yu nɛ lɔllɔ ntithi tɔthɨ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nchhu kaŋ taʼa nnu pɨphɨ haʼaŋ ŋki ywɛrɛ nu ŋa pugu chhu thɔ yu nɛ.
Ndɔ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa pugu ni nchhu nu nɛ pɔ pi mindoundou nthɛ nnu Minnwi yugu pugu pa ligi yichəɨ ŋoŋ pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Jishɔ ŋa a ni ŋkwo khu, Pɔɔ chhu nu ŋa a yi maoŋ.
Ǹshini ndɔ nji ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a nthɛ ǹtāʼa mooŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu pei nɛ, nthɛ yie ghɔ, m̀bie Pɔɔ ŋa a shi ŋkhwā nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu Jerushalɛiŋ pi shaʼa vi fɔ nthɛ nnu pighɔ.
Ndɔ Pɔɔ ni ŋga ntāʼa nu ŋa a shaʼa fùoŋ Roma nshaʼa sháʼa yi, pi nūʼɔŋ vi hɛiŋ. Nɛnnɛ, m̀fɛ gɨ́ ŋa pi chhɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi vi ti shi nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ vi ni Kaisha, mbɔ fùoŋ Roma.”
Agripa chhu ni Feshitu ŋa, “Ǹshi ŋkhwā nɔ yaʼo nu mbhɔ ŋoŋ vei nduthɔ a.”
Feshitu khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ɔ shi njaʼo vi yua.”

Mbhi gha ndaŋ Agripa pugu Benishi thɔ moŋ ndighaʼo ntintaʼo pugu pa thishɨ pa taʼa ŋkaŋ shoogɛ ni pichəɨ pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nii moŋ mmɛ fāʼo ŋa ŋgwa ghà nthɔ nchhɔ nɛ. Feshitu fɛ gɨ́ pi thɔ ni Pɔɔ faʼo ghɔ.

Feshitu chhu ŋa, “Fùoŋ Agripa pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ hɛiŋ shiʼa pigi pugu nɛ, pəɨ yəɨ ŋoŋ vei, ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa pugu pɔ hɛiŋ pugu pa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ Jerushalɛiŋ chhu pa nnu thɔ yu. Pugu paʼo ŋgòu ŋa a lɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo nɔ chhɔ nu mbhi.
Ndɔ paʼa ǹdɔ njəɨ ŋa a chwīe sheshe nnu ŋa a pie ŋa pi fɛ njɔ́ gu ghɔ, nɔ haʼaŋ nduthɔ yi chhu ŋa a shaʼa fùoŋ Roma nshaʼa vi nɛ, ǹchuʼɔ nɔ taoŋ nu vi.

“Ndɔ, ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ŋkiɛŋ thɔ nnu nɔ nāʼaŋ nu nthɛ vi mfɛ ni fùoŋ Roma. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹthɔ ni ju hɛiŋ shhɨ pəɨ, mīʼɛŋ mbɔ shhɨ ghɔ, ma Fùoŋ Agripa, nnɛ ŋa pia shi ŋga ntou mooŋ sháʼa yi ghɔ, kaŋ a nthɛ m̀fāʼo nnu nɔ nāʼaŋ nu.
Nthɛ ŋa m̀bīʼi a pɔ nnu na nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ ntaoŋ, ki lɔ nja mfɛ thɔ nnu ŋa pi wɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.”
Agripa chhu ni Pɔɔ ŋa, “A nthɛ ɔ chrà nthɛ noŋ yɔ.”
Pɔɔ shwīi mbhɔ yi njɛ̄ taa nu nchò yi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Fùoŋ Agripa, ǹjəɨ noŋ a nɔ mbrɔthɔ nɔ thi nu shhɨ ghɔ shiʼa nɔ taa nu noŋ a shhɨ ghɔ nthɛ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ŋa pa ŋgwa Juu chhu thɔ mu nɛ.
Mīʼɛŋ nthɛ ŋa ɔ ya nji nùʼɔŋ pugu pa mindoundou ŋa a pɔ shɨna pa ŋgwa Juu nɛ, nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹduoŋ ŋa ɔ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yɔ njwɛrɛ nnu ŋa ǹshi nchhu nɛ.
“Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Juu ji ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋki chhɔ chɔmbhi a llɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki pɔ maʼaŋ mikhwa nɛ, llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi laʼa pigi ti ŋgə̄ɨ fɛ ni ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki pɔ Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ.
Pugu ji nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ŋkhwā nɔ fɨ̄ʼɨ nu, llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi, ǹchhɔ chɔmbhi a nɔ taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ghà nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na Minnwi yigi tɨtɨnɨ, mbɔ pa ŋgwa Farashi.
Ndwɛ, ǹthi hɛnɛiŋ pi thɔ nshaʼa a nthɛ ŋa ǹūʼɔŋ njùʼɔ a ŋkuoŋ kàʼa ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ ni pa tǎa pigi nɛ.

Mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa paanchrɔ laʼataoŋ ŋgwa pigi kwāʼa nu nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ghaʼo Minnwi ni taʼanjuʼɔ yugu moŋ tuʼu pugu pa naoŋchɨ nɛ. A chwīe nthɛ kwàʼa yei ŋa m̀fāʼo nɛ ŋa pa ŋgwa Juu pei tigi pa nnu thɔ mu, ma Fùoŋ Agripa.
A chwīe khɔ a ghaʼa ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ thi hɛiŋ nɛ nɔ piŋ nu ŋa Minnwi ghà ŋkuʼɔ ni ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu khu nɛ?
“Mmu nduthɔ a ni mbīʼi ŋa m̀fāʼo nɔ chwīe nu ntou nnu nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa kiʼi ligi Jishɔ llɔ Nasharɛ nuʼuŋ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ.
Yinɛ nnu ŋa ŋki chwīe Jerushalɛiŋ. Pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni mfɛ njɨ vəɨ paʼa ǹdɔ ŋguʼɔ niʼiŋ ntou pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ niʼiŋ chə́ɨŋ, pi ni ŋga njwi vugu, mummu piŋ.

Mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu moŋ ntou ndɨɨ moŋ pa nda luoŋ Minnwi, mbaʼo nu nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa pugu chrā chrà pɨphɨ nthɛ nnu Minnwi. Njùʼɔ a ni mbɨgɨ mbɨŋ pugu ti nchəɨŋ fɨʼɨ ŋa ŋki ghə̄ɨ moŋ pa laʼataoŋ nduoŋ nɔ fɛ nu ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu.
“Nnɛ, mi ni ŋkwe ghrɨ́, pugu pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋa a nōoŋ ŋa pi fɛ ghrɨ́ vəɨ nɛ mbhɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ Damashiku ŋguʼɔ nthɛ pi yie ghɔ.
A gha mbɔ moŋ ntuŋ minaoŋ, ma chaapifuoŋ, ŋ̀ga mbɔ shɛndaoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, njəɨ líʼɛ ŋa a thɛ nchaa minaoŋ llɔ po thɛ ŋgɨ̄ŋ a pigi pa ŋgwa ŋa pigi pugu ni nyīeŋ nu nɛ.
Ŋguoŋ yigi gha ŋgū shhɛ, njaʼo yichəɨ ŋggì chhu nu vəɨ moŋ chrà ŋgwa Hibru ŋa,
‘Shɔɔ, Shɔɔ, ɔ thɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ vəɨ ŋa? A lɔ mbwa ŋa ɔ tuŋ kwò yɔ ŋkuoŋ thɔ muuŋ thɨ pɨ̄ga ŋa a tūʼɔ ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɔ shhɨ nɛ.’
“Nchhu ŋa, ‘Ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌, Taathɔ?’
“Taathɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa,
‘Mi Jishɔ, ŋa ɔ thɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ lɔllɔ ntithi ŋkuoŋ kwò mɔ, nthɛ ŋa ǹōoŋ noŋ a vɛ nthɛ yei nnu, ǹchuʼɔ ghɔ nɔ muuŋ fàʼa a. Ɔ shi nshwei pichəɨ pa ŋgwa nduoŋ ni yaoŋ ŋa ɔ yəɨ shiʼa nɛ, pugu pa nnu ŋa ǹshi nōoŋ vɛ nɛ.
Ǹshi ŋkwe ghɔ mbhɔ pa ŋgwa Ishrae pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa ǹshi ntaoŋ ghɔ ni pugu nɛ.

Ɔ shi nchuʼɔ ligi yugu, ŋa pugu kara ntaoŋ moŋ njiŋ nthɔ moŋ líʼɛ, pugu taoŋ moŋ ghrɨ́ Shata nthɔ njəɨ Minnwi, nnɛ ŋa pi līʼɛ phɨ yugu, pugu lɔ mfāʼo shɨ̀na, shɨna ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Minnwi kwo chuʼɔ vugu nɔ ji ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ ŋa pugu fāʼo mbɨŋ mu nɛ.’
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ma Fùoŋ Agripa, ǹshini ndɔ ntɨnɨthɔ ni nnu yei ŋa mi ni njəɨ llɔ po nɛ.

Ŋki jɛ̄ Damashiku pugu Jerushalɛiŋ ni ŋguoŋ krao ŋgei Judia pugu pa laʼataoŋ nduoŋ, nchīi nu ŋa pugu fāʼo nɔ wuʼɔ nu mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ nthɔ njiŋ Minnwi, ndɔ nchwīe pa nnu pɛ ŋa a shi nōoŋ ŋa pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ nɛ.
Yei nnu ŋa a ni nchwīe pa Juu pei wɛ̄iŋ a ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki pɔ Nda Minnwi nɛ, mbaʼo nu nɔ jwi nu ma.

Nchəɨŋ shiʼa, a Minnwi ŋa a thɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ a, ǹthi hɛiŋ shiʼa nɔ shwei nu ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa, llɔ mbɨŋ pa miŋkwasha ti ŋkuʼɔ nchəɨŋ mbɨŋ pa ŋgwa ndiɛŋ paʼa ndɔ nchhu pi nnu nduoŋ ŋkiɛŋ pa nnu ŋa pa Njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pugu pa Mushi ni nchhu ŋa a shi ndɛ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ.
Pugu ni nchhu ŋa Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ shi ŋguʼɔ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ, ndɔ mbɔ ju fǔoŋ ŋoŋ nɔ pɨnɨ nu ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu. A shi nchīi líʼɛ lūgu nu ni ŋgwa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ Pɔɔ thi fɔ nthɔ ntaa nchò yi nɛ, Feshitu paʼo ŋgòu ni njɨ ŋa, “Pɔɔ, ɔ ya mbaa paa ntou yɛʼi yaoŋ chwīe ɔ ŋgū lɨ̀lɨŋ!”
Ndɔ Pɔɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ǹdɔ njiʼi mbaa paa, ma Feshitu ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ, ǹchrā pi ŋkiɛŋ nnu shini ndɔ mbɔ chrà lɨna.
Ndɔ Fùoŋ Agripa ji nnu pei minthɛ ǹchrā pa nnu pei ghɔ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nthɛ ŋa a ji ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei ghao nthɛ ŋa pi shini ndɔ nchwīe nnu pei pi lə̌ɨŋ.
Fùoŋ Agripa, ɔ piŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi? Ǹji ŋa ɔ piŋ.”
Agripa khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Moŋ kuo ndɨɨ yei ɔ pīʼi ŋa ɔ shi nchwīe ŋ̀gū Krishitɛŋ?”

Pɔɔ khwɛ̄ ŋa, “Ki mi shi ndɔ̄gɔ pi kuo ndɨɨ ki ntaaŋ ndɨɨ, luoŋ Minnwi a pɔ ŋa kiʼi a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi gɔ̀, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pei ŋkaa pugu kara mbɔ nɔ haʼaŋ m̀bɔ nɛ, ŋkiɛŋ chɛiŋ yei ŋa pi krao mbhɔ ma nɔ ghɔ nɛ.”
Nnɛ fùoŋ pugu pa Feshitu, ni Benishi pugu pa ŋguoŋ pichəɨ ŋgwa yrɛi shhɛ.
Ŋga ŋkwo yīri, nchhu ni noŋ pugu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei lɔ njiʼi nchwīe sheshe nnu ŋa a pie ŋa a khu ki pi niʼiŋ vi chə́ɨŋ nɛ.”
Agripa chhu ni Feshitu ŋa, “Ndɔ pi kaŋ ni nchuʼɔ ŋoŋ vei mieŋ vi a ghə̄ɨ ndɔ haʼaŋ a kaŋ ni mieŋ ki naa ndɔ̄gɔ sháʼa yi shhɨ Kaisha.”

Pi ni ŋga ŋkwo chhu ŋa pigi nii mitu ŋkhǐ ŋgə̄ɨ Itali, Feshitu chaʼa Pɔɔ pugu pa pichəɨ ghaŋ chə́ɨŋ mfɛ ni Julioŋ mbɔ nthishɨ taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ moŋ kwíe ntɨgao ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkɛ̄ʼi fùoŋ Roma nɛ.
Pigi nii moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ llɔ Adramitiuŋ, ŋa a ni ŋkwo tithi nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu moŋ lɨʼɨ kaoŋ pa mitu ŋkhǐ Eshia nɛ. Nchuʼɔ kiʼɛ njɛ̄ ghə̄ɨ nu, pigi pa Arishtaku, mbɔ ŋoŋ Mashedonia lɔ Teshalonika.
Mbhi gha ndaŋ pigi chəɨŋ Shidoŋ. Julioŋ ni nōoŋ pwapuŋ ni Pɔɔ, mieŋ vi ŋa a ghə̄ɨ njəɨ pa taannu pi, nji ŋa pugu shi mfɛ pa yaoŋ ŋa a pou nɛ ghɔ.
Pigi lɔllɔ fɔ, ndɔ nthɛ ŋa fɨfrəɨ ni nthɔ nu pi llɔ ŋgei ŋa pigi ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu fɔ nɛ, pigi nyīeŋ ni pie pi ŋgei ŋkhǐ yɛ ŋa ŋkǔnu Shaipru ni ŋkɨʼɨ fɨfrəɨ ki a lɔ nchəɨŋ fɔ nɛ.
Pigi shāʼa ntiri ŋkɨŋ Shilishia pugu Pamfilia nchəɨŋ Mura moŋ Lishia.
Ŋga nchəɨŋ fɔ, nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ghɔ yəɨ mitu ŋkhǐ a llɔ Alɛshandria ŋgə̄ɨ nu Itali, a niʼiŋ vigi moŋ ghɔ.

Pigi nyīeŋ pɔpɔrɔ nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ llɛ, ntɔgɔ moŋ ghaghaʼa nchəɨŋ Kinidu. Fɨfrəɨ shini ndɔ mieŋ vigi ŋa pigi nuʼuŋ ŋguʼɔ mbīgi nyīeŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu ŋgei ghɔ, nthɛ yie ghɔ, pigi nyīeŋ ŋgei ŋkǔnu yɛ ŋa ŋkǔnu Krɛtɛ ni ŋkɨʼɨ fɨfrəɨ nɔ chəɨŋ nu fɔ nɛ, ntɔgɔ yəɨ Shalmone.
Pigi wuʼɔ nyīeŋ pi ŋkɨŋ wéi, nyīeŋ ni ghaghaʼa ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Lɨʼɨ Kaoŋ Pie Juju, yəɨ mmɛ laʼataoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Lashia nɛ.
Pigi ni nchhɔ fɔ nɔ ŋkiɛŋ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ, ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ ŋa nyīeŋ nu moŋ ŋkhǐ ya ŋgaʼa, nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi mmɛ llɛ́ jī ŋkhǐ
pa Juu ni ŋkwo tɔgɔ. Nnɛ Pɔɔ fɛ ntɨ́gɨ ni pugu,
nchhu nu ŋa, “Mmɛ ŋgwa, ǹjəɨ ŋa nyìeŋ yia llɔ hɛiŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ shi mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ. Ntou phɛ shi mbɔ, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ni pa maoŋ ŋa pia tiɛŋ nɛ, pugu pa mitu ŋkhǐ, ti mfɛ ni chɔmbhi yia.”
Ndɔ nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ ghɔ, yaʼo pi nnu yɛ ŋa ŋgaŋ shūgu mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ, pugu ŋgaŋ mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ chhu nɛ, paʼa ndɔ njaʼo pi yɛ ŋa Pɔɔ chhu nɛ.
Lɨʼɨ kaoŋ pie ghɔ shini ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ lɨʼɨ chhɔ moŋ laoŋ,

nthɛ yie ntou ŋgwa ni ŋkhwā yugu ŋa pi lɔllɔ fɔ nnɛ ŋa pugu paʼo nshāʼa ŋkhǐ ntaoŋ Foniti nɔ haʼaŋ ä njiʼɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pugu chhɔ fɔ moŋ laoŋ. Foniti lɨʼɨ kaoŋ pie moŋ laʼataoŋ Krɛtɛ ŋa a nūaŋ ŋgə̄ɨ ni ŋgei mbhɔ ŋkwrɛi pugu pa ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ ŋgei nii minaoŋ.

Muuŋ fɨfrəɨ ni ŋga njɛ̄ ntɔgɔ nu llɔ mbiɛŋ, pa ghaŋ shūgu mitu ŋkhǐ pīʼi ŋa minthɛ pugu paʼo ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ki pīʼi nɛ, nnɛ pugu fuʼu ŋgùʼɔ wɛ̄iŋ pie moŋ ŋkhǐ, nchhwi ti nja mbara ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ Krɛtɛ.
Ndɔ a ni ŋga ndara, mmɛ fɨfrəɨ ŋa a ghà ntaoŋ ŋgei mbhɔ ŋkwrɛi shaʼa minaoŋ tiri llɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋkǔnu Krɛtɛ.
Mmɛ fɨfrəɨ ghɔ ni ŋga ŋgwɛ̄iŋ mitu ŋkhǐ, a ghaʼa ni pigi nɔ yɨna nu fɨfrəɨ ghɔ ni mitu ŋkhǐ yigi, nnɛ, pigi mieŋ fɔ fɨfrəɨ ghɔ tiɛŋ vigi ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɔ.
Pigi ni ŋga nchəɨŋ mbiɛŋ njiŋ muuŋ ŋkǔnu Kauda, ŋkǔnu ghɔ kɨʼɨ fɨfrəɨ ghɔ ni pigi. Pigi paʼo fɔ moŋ puoŋ pimbia ti ŋkaa ŋkwe muuŋ pie ŋa mmɛ mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ ni nshūu nu nɛ ki a lɔ mbɨrɨ.

Pugu shūu muuŋ pie ghɔ niʼiŋ moŋ mmɛ mitu ŋkhǐ, ŋkrao mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ ni ŋkɨ̌ɨ ŋa kiʼi a shɨna. Nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔgɔ ŋa pie shi ntei ni njɨ ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ gwí ni ŋgei ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ Libia nɛ, pugu shwiʼi ŋgùʼɔ lɨʼɨ mitu ŋkhǐ moŋ ŋkhǐ. Mieŋ mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ kəʼɨ ghɔ fɨfrəɨ ghə̄ɨ nu ni ju pɔpɔrɔ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ fiŋ tɨtɨnɨ ghɔ ni ŋguʼɔ nthɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ nɛ, mbhi gha ndaŋ pugu fuʼu pa maoŋ pugu moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ māʼaŋ nu ŋkhǐ.
A gha mbɔ trɛi llɛ́, nɔ haʼaŋ fɨfrəɨ ghɔ ni njɛ̄ nɛ, pugu fuʼu pa maoŋ mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ ni yugu mbhɔ māʼaŋ nu ŋkhǐ.
Nɔ ntou llɛmbhi, paʼa pigi lɔ njəɨ ligi minaoŋ ki pa fɨ́nəɨ, fɨfrəɨ ghɔ wuʼɔ mbīgi pigi ntɨnɨ nu. Ndugwi yi, pigi khɛ noŋ yigi ki lɔ nuʼuŋ mbīʼi ŋa pigi shi ndūgu.

Nthɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkwo pɔ nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ ki lɔ mfāʼo maoŋ jɨ nɛ, Pɔɔ lɔllɔ kiʼɛ nthithi tɔthɨ nchhu ŋa, “Ŋgwa paŋ, pəɨ kaŋ ni njaʼo nnu ŋa mi ni nchhu nɛ, ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nshūgu mitu ŋkhǐ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ Krɛtɛ, yei phɛ shi kaŋ nì nuʼuŋ nii via.
P̂əɨ fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ndwɛ nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa thɔ ŋoŋ nuʼuŋ mbhɛ, a shi ŋguʼɔ mbhɛ mitu ŋkhǐ.
Nthɛ ŋa ni tuʼu yɛ ŋa a tɔgɔ nɛ, ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ŋa m̀bɔ pi ji ndɔ ŋgaʼo vi nɛ thɔ vəɨ,
nchhu ŋa, ‘Kiʼi fāʼo pɔgɔ gu, ma Pɔɔ, ɔ shi ŋguʼɔ nthi sháʼa shhɨ Kaisha. Minnwi kwo kwe ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pəɨ pugu nyīeŋ nu kaʼa moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ nɛ.’
Nɛnnɛ, p̂əɨ fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ, ma ŋgwa paŋ, nthɛ ŋa m̀fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ mbɨŋ Minnwi ŋa a shi ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pi shwei a nɛ.
Fɨfrəɨ shi ŋguʼɔ ndɔ̄gɔ via ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkaoŋ ŋkuoŋ gwí ŋkɨŋ muuŋ ŋkǔnu titri ŋkhǐ.”
Pigi ni ŋga ŋkwo pɔ moŋ ŋkhǐ nɔ khwɛnchrɔ tuʼu nthɔ nshāʼa ŋkhǐ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Adria nɛ, pa ghaŋ shūgu mitu ŋkhǐ tha ŋa pi chhɔ mbara nu mbhi.
Pugu chu ŋgùʼɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋkɨɨ, māʼaŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ, njəɨ ŋa nthi ŋkhǐ paa wuŋ mbhɔ, nɔ ŋkāoŋ nu shhɛ. Ŋga mbɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ shɨgɛi, māʼaŋ njəɨ ŋa nthi ŋkhǐ tiɛŋnchrɔ mbhɔ nɔ kāoŋ nu shhɛ.
Pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ vugu ŋa mitu ŋkhǐ shi nchhwi ŋgùʼɔ, nthɛ yie ghɔ, pugu māʼaŋ khwɛ ŋgùʼɔ lɨ̄ʼɨ pie moŋ ŋkhǐ llɔ njiŋ mitu ŋkhǐ, nduoŋ Minnwi ŋa mbhi laŋ.
Pa ghaŋ shūgu mitu ŋkhǐ ni ŋga ntāʼa nu ntei ntaoŋ moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ, pugu shwiʼi muuŋ kikuoŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ mfɨ̄ɨ nu ŋa pugu ghə̄ɨ pi thɔ mitu ŋkhǐ lɨʼɨ chu ŋgùʼɔ lɨ̄ʼɨ pie fɔ.
Ndɔ Pɔɔ chhu ni nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ pugu pa pichəɨ shoogɛ ŋa, “Ŋgwa pei mieŋ ki kɨna moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ, kaŋ mbaʼa pəɨ lūgu.”
Nnɛ, pa shoogɛ pighɔ yaʼa ŋkɨɨ kikuoŋ ghɔ mieŋ.
Ŋkaoŋ mbhi maa ndaŋ, Pɔɔ kɔnɔ ŋguoŋ yugu ghao ŋa pugu jɨ maoŋ, nchhu nu ŋa, “A khwɛnchrɔ llɛ́ shiʼa ŋa pəɨ ywɛrɛ nu moŋ fiŋthɔ, ki lɔ njɨ maoŋ ki njwɛʼi yaoŋ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ŋ̀kɔnɔ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ jɨ maoŋ nɛnnɛ ŋa a shi ŋkwe vəɨ nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi taʼa ŋgiithɔ yəɨ, mbaʼa a phɛ.”
Pɔɔ ni ŋga nchhu nnu yei, ndɔ̄gɔ brɛi, ŋga ntōo Minnwi shhɨ ŋguoŋ yugu ghao, mbəʼɨ njɛ̄ kru nu.
Njùʼɔ ŋguoŋ yugu gū, pugu jɛ̄ jɨ nu maoŋ.
Ŋguoŋ yigi ghao moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ ni mbɔ paa ŋkɨɨ ni khwachəɨ wuŋ ni ndigi yi ntɨgao.
Pugu ni ŋga njɨ ti njru, ŋkɛrɛ pichəɨ pa pìɛŋ maoŋ jɨ māʼaŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ nnɛ ŋa pie yīʼɛ.
Mbhi ni ŋga ndaŋ, paʼa pugu lɔ nji lɨʼɨ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ ghɔ, ndɔ pugu ni njəɨ muuŋ loo ŋkhǐ ni gwí fɔ nthɔ njwɛrɛ nu ŋa ä njiʼɛ pugu kuʼɔ ni mitu ŋkhǐ fɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.

Nnɛ pugu yaʼa ŋkɨɨ ŋgùʼɔ lɨ̄ʼɨ pie, mieŋ a yie moŋ ŋkhǐ. Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ pugu pɨnɨ njaʼa ŋkɨɨ ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ shūgu mitu ŋkhǐ laʼo mitu ŋkhǐ, ŋkuʼɔ mmɛ kaoŋ ndhwí fɨfrəɨ tɔthɨ, fɨfrəɨ chi vugu kiʼɛ pugu ghə̄ɨ nu ŋkɨŋ mbhi.
Ndɔ mitu ŋkhǐ ghɔ chhwi ŋkuoŋ gwí ŋkwá, ndɨʼɨ ntithi ki lɔ nchəɨŋ ŋkɨŋ mbhi. Thɔ mitu ŋkhǐ lɨʼɨ, mmɛ fiŋ ghɔ nwīʼiŋ laʼo mitu ŋkhǐ kraokrao.
Pa shoogɛ kāʼa nɔ jwi nu pa ghaŋ chə́ɨŋ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vugu paʼo ŋkhǐ ntei.

Ndɔ nthishɨ pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ shoogɛ tāʼa nu ŋkwe Pɔɔ nnɛ ndāa ŋa kiʼi pugu chwīe nnu ŋa pugu ni ŋkāʼa nu nɛ. A ka fɛ pi gɨ́ ni pɛ ŋa pugu ji paʼo nu ŋkhǐ nɛ, ŋa pugu lli nchəɨŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ mbaʼo ŋkhǐ ntaoŋ mbhi.
Pɨgəɨ ŋgwa younjiŋ yugu: pichəɨ taoŋ ŋkuoŋ pa krao pilaŋ, pichəɨ taoŋ pi ŋkuoŋ krao mitu ŋkhǐ, nɛnnɛ, ŋguoŋ yugu ghao chəɨŋ mbhi ki kàʼa.
Pigi ni ŋga ntaoŋ ti nchəɨŋ mbhi shiʼi, njaʼo ŋa ligi muuŋ ŋkǔnu ghɔ Malta.
Pa ŋgwa taoŋ pighɔ nōoŋ ŋkiɛŋ pwapuŋ ni pigi, mfrəɨ móŋoŋ ŋa pigi yɨgɔ nthɛ ŋa mbɨ̀ ni ŋkwo jɛ̄ llɔ nu, lɨʼɨ ya ŋgrɨ.
Pɔɔ ni ŋkɨrɨ puoŋ mi ŋkwɛiŋ, ŋga ntūoŋ nu kie, fifhi taoŋ moŋ ghɔ nthɛ laoŋlaoŋ móŋoŋ, naoŋ vi nchu nɔ mbhɔ yi.
Pa ŋgwa taoŋ pighɔ ni ŋga njəɨ miyaoŋ ghɔ a chu nɔ mbhɔ Pɔɔ, nchhu ni nōoŋ pugu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vei njwi ŋoŋ shini, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ a lūgu ki lɔ ŋkhu moŋ ŋkhǐ nɛ, shhɛ chhu ŋa mbaʼa a lūgu.”
Pɔɔ mīŋi fifhi ghɔ māʼaŋ moŋ móŋoŋ ndɔ paʼa kàʼa lɔ ŋkēe ju Pɔɔ.
Pugu tithi nchēi nu ŋa noŋ yi kuʼɔ ki ŋa a gū shhɛ ŋkhu. Ndɔ pugu ni nchēi nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ ki lɔ njəɨ sheshe nnu, nnɛ pugu kwri njùʼɔ yugu, nchhu nu ŋa Pɔɔ pɔ pi nnwi.
Pa nyīeŋ ni mbɔ ŋkɨŋ lɨʼɨ ghɔ mbɔ yi taathɔ moŋ muuŋ ŋkǔnu ghɔ ligi yi pɔ Publiu. Taathɔ ghɔ ni ndɔ̄gɔ vigi ntuo vigi shiʼi nɔ ghaŋ kra pi nɔ trɛi llɛ́.
Tǎa Publiu ni nūaŋ kúoŋ nthɔ ŋgɨ̄nɔ shɨ̀gao pugu pa nchə̀ɨ. Pɔɔ ghə̄ɨ njəɨ vi nduoŋ Minnwi ghɔ nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi mbɨŋ yu noŋ yi tɔgɔ.
Yei nnu ni ŋga ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pɨgəɨ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ muuŋ ŋkǔnu ghɔ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo pa ŋgɨ̌nɔ nɛ thɔ ni pugu, pi yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ yugu.
Pugu ni mfɛ ntou pa maoŋ ni pigi, pigi gha ŋgə̄ɨ nu pugu niʼiŋ ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ ŋa a ni mbie ŋa pigi fāʼo nɛ moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ.
Trɛi nàoŋ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, pigi nii mitu ŋkhǐ ŋa a ni ndhɔ Alɛshandria, pi mɛ̄iŋ ni pa “nnwi kəʼɨ” ŋa a ni ndaʼa fɔ moŋ ndɨɨ laoŋ ghɔ.
Pigi ni nchəɨŋ laʼataoŋ Shirakushɛ ndaʼa fɔ nɔ trɛi llɛ́.
Llɔ fɔ, pigi nii pie njīŋ ŋgə̄ɨ Regiuŋ. Taʼa llɛ́ gha ntɔgɔ fɨfrəɨ llɔ mbiɛŋ jɛ̄ thɔ nu, a gha mbɔ mbra llɛ́ pigi nchəɨŋ Puteoli.
Pigi gha nchəɨŋ fɔ nɛ, njəɨ pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ, pugu chhu ni pigi ŋa pigi pugu laʼa nɔ khwachəɨ llɛ́. Nɛnnɛ, yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pigi kie nchəɨŋ Roma nɛ.
Pa ghaŋ piŋ Roma ni njaʼo ŋkaoŋ yigi, ntaoŋ nthɔ nchəɨŋ moŋ laʼataoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Taŋ Apiu
pugu lɨʼɨ yɛ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Trɛi lɨʼɨ Pe Ndaʼa
nɛ, nɔ para nu miŋi. Pɔɔ gha njəɨ vugu, ntōo Minnwi, njùʼɔ yi pɨnɨ nja ŋgū.
Pigi ni ŋga nchəɨŋ Roma, pi mieŋ Pɔɔ ŋa a laʼa təʼɨ vi pugu taʼa shoogɛ ŋa a ni ŋkɛ̄ʼi vi.

Trɛi llɛ́ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, Pɔɔ mɛ̄iŋ kɨrɨ pa thishɨ pa Juu moŋ laʼa. Pugu ni ŋga ŋkɨrɨ, a chhu ni pugu ŋa, “Pa lǐŋ paŋ, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹdɔ njiʼi nchwīe sheshe nnu mbɨŋ pa ŋgwa pia ki ŋkuoŋ nùʼɔŋ yia nɛ, ndɔ pugu ni nchaʼa a mfɛ nɔ ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ Jerushalɛiŋ ni ŋgwa Roma.
Pugu ni ŋga ntou a, ntāʼa nu mieŋ ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nthɛ ŋa pugu shi ki lɔ njəɨ sheshe yaoŋ ŋa ǹchwīe ŋa a pie ŋa pi fɛ njɔ́ gu vəɨ.
Pa ŋgwa Juu ni ŋga ndāa, a yīʼi ŋa ǹdɔ̄gɔ sháʼa a ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ shhɨ Kaisha, ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo pi sheshe nnu nɔ chhu nu thɔ ŋgwa paŋ.
A chwīe yie ŋ̀gɛ̄ vəɨ, ntāʼa nu nɔ yəɨ nu vəɨ pia chrà, ŋa pi krao a ni chɛiŋ nɛiŋ nthɛ pi ŋoŋ ŋa ŋgwa Ishrae fāʼo kwàʼa mbɨŋ yu nɛ.”
Pugu chhu ghɔ ŋa, “Pi lɔ njiʼi mfɛ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ni pigi llɔ Judia nɔ ligi yɔ. Ndɔ paʼa ŋgwa pia ŋa pugu thɔ nu hɛiŋ nɛ lɔ nchrā sheshe nnu ki nchhu sheshe nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ ghɔ.
Ndɔ pigi khwā nɔ yaʼo nu mbhɔ ghɔ, jɔ nnu ŋa ɔ pīʼi nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa pigi ji ŋa pi chrà pa nnu pɨphɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghao nthɛ yɛ kɨrɨ ŋa ɔ pɔ fɔ nɛ.”

Pugu ni ntigi llɛ́, a gha mbɔ llɛ́ ghɔ ntou yugu thɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ Pɔɔ ni ndaʼa nu nɛ, a tɛrɛ nnu pighɔ ni pugu jɛ̄ ni tutuʼu ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ni fanaoŋ, nthɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ nnu Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi ni pugu, ŋkaa nu nɔ nōoŋ nu ni pugu llɔ moŋ gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ŋa pugu piŋ Jishɔ.
Pichəɨ ni mbiŋ nnu ŋa a ni nchhu nu nɛ, paʼa pichəɨ lɔ mbiŋ.
Pugu lɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ, ndōu nu ni noŋ pugu ndɨɨ ŋa Pɔɔ ni ŋkwo chhu yei taʼa nnu nɛ, “Jijwɛ Minnwi ni nchhu shini ndɨɨ ŋa a ni nchhu ni pa tǎa pəɨ ntɔgɔ pi njiŋ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi mbɔ Ishaya nɛ:
‘Ghə̄ɨ nchhu ni ŋgwa pei ŋa,
Shishini, pəɨ shi njaʼo ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nji njiŋ yi,
pəɨ shi nja ndīi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa njùʼɔ ŋgwa pei kwo fɨ̄nɨ,
tə́nə yugu chri ki lɔ nuʼuŋ njaʼo lɨʼɨ,
pugu kwo kwiri ligi yugu,
Nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pugu yəɨ ni ligi yugu,
njaʼo ni tə́nə yugu,
nji ni njùʼɔ yugu
Ŋkara mbara a,
ǹchwīe pugu pɔ shiʼi.’
P̂əɨ ji nɛ ŋa lūgu nu yei llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi ghə̄ɨ nɛ mbhɔ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, ndɔ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ shi njwɛrɛ.”
[Pɔɔ ni ŋga kwo chhu nɛiŋ, ŋgwa Juu pighɔ taoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nu, ndōu nu ni noŋ pugu.]
Pɔɔ ni ndaʼa fɔ nɔ paa ŋgaʼo moŋ nda ŋa a ni mbe nu llɔ pìɛŋ yu. A mbiŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu thɔ fɔ nɔ yəɨ nu vi nɛ,
nthɔ nchīi Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi, nthɔ njɛʼi pa nnu nthɛ Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ Taathɔ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ki ŋoŋ lɔ ntāra vi.
Romans: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ mbhɔ mu Pɔɔ, mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa Krishto Jishɔ. Pi gɛ̄ a ŋa m̀bɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Krishto, Minnwi chuʼɔ a ŋa ǹchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ yi,
ŋa a ni ŋkāʼa fie ndɨɨ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ pi moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi yi taoŋtaoŋ.
Pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghɔ pɔ nthɛ Muuŋ vi, ŋa moŋ frɛinoŋ pi ni mbhi vi moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Fùoŋ Devi nɛ.
Ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ taoŋtaoŋ, pi ni nōoŋ vi ni mmɛ ghrɨ́ ŋa a Muuŋ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi moŋ kuʼɔ nu mi moŋ gu, mbɔ ju Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ Taathɔ via.
Pia tɔgɔ mbhɔ Krishto mfāʼo shɨ̀na mbɨnɨ mbɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ, nɔ chwīe nu ŋguoŋ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ yaʼo nchò llɔ moŋ piŋ nthɛ ligi yi,
pugu pa pəɨ ŋa pi gɛ̄ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ yi Jishɔ Krishto nɛ.
Ǹāʼaŋ pi ni ŋguoŋ vəɨ ghao ŋa pəɨ pɔ laʼataoŋ Roma nɛ, ŋa Minnwi khwā vəɨ ndɔ ŋgɛ̄ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ ŋgwa pi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ.
Pwapuŋ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi mbɔ Tǎa via pugu Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ Taathɔ pɔ ni pəɨ.
M̀fǔoŋ ntōo Minnwi a ntɔgɔ mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto nthɛ vəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pi chīi piŋ yəɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi ŋa m̀fāʼa mbhɔ yu ni ŋguoŋ njùʼɔ a ghao moŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Muuŋ vi nɛ miŋkwentie a ŋa ŋga ŋguʼɔ ŋkwiŋ vəɨ,
ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao moŋ luoŋ Minnwi a, nduoŋ nu ŋa M̈innwi mbiŋ, kaŋ minthɛ ndūgu nthɔ nɔ yəɨ nu vəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀khwā nu nɔ yəɨ nu vəɨ, nnɛ nɔ ghrà nu pichəɨ fɛ́ llɔ mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi ni pəɨ nɔ māʼaŋ nu ghrɨ́ yəɨ.
Yie pɔ nɔ chhu nu ŋa minthɛ pia māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ noŋ pia ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ yia, mbɔ piŋ yəɨ pugu pa nyaŋ.

Ǹtāʼa nu pəɨ ji, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ŋa ŋ̀kwo pīʼi nɔ thɔ nu njəɨ vəɨ ŋgɛŋgɛ ndɔ pa nnu wuʼɔ ndɨʼɨ a lɨʼɨ nɔ thɔ nu, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ fàʼa a ghɛ̄rɛ ŋkara pichəɨ ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ shɨna pa pichəɨ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
M̀fāʼo ŋkrù chīi nu pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pa ŋguoŋ taoŋtaoŋ ghao, ni pa ghaŋ shieligi pugu pa ghaŋ mooŋ trǔ, ni pa ghaŋ shiethɔ pugu pa na.
Nnɛ kiʼɛ ǹthɔ ŋkhwā nu nɔ chīi nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ Roma nɛ.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāʼo lrithɔ nthɛ ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ, nthɛ ŋa a njɨ Minnwi nɔ kie nu ndūgu ni shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ nɛ, fǔoŋ yi pɔ ŋgwa Juu, ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ kiʼɛ.

Moŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghɔ, pia yəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi fāʼa nɔ chwīe nu ŋgwa kāʼo ligi yu nɛ, llɔ moŋ piŋ, ndugwi ŋkuoŋ piŋ. Nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ ŋa, “Ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ shi mfāʼo chɔmbhi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ.”
Nthɛ ŋa mmɛ pɨgɨtua Minnwi nōoŋ noŋ yi llɔ po nthɛ ŋguoŋ ki pɔgɔ Minnwi pugu pa mbha nnu təɨtəɨ ŋgwamishua, ŋa pugu tɔgɔ moŋ phɨ yugu mfrɛ̄i nnu shini.
Nthɛ ŋa yaoŋ ŋa minthɛ pi ji nthɛ Minnwi nɛ, yi shieshie ni pugu nthɛ ŋa Minnwi nōoŋ ni pugu.

Nthɛ ŋa jɛ̄ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni nchwīe mbhi nɛ, pi kwo ya nji mbha nnu Minnwi ŋa minthɛ paʼa pi lɔ njəɨ nɛ, nɔ njɨ yi ki ndugwi yi, ni púoŋ yi nɔ Minnwi, pi ya nji shishiʼi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa yaoŋ ŋa a chwīe nɛ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, mbaʼa pugu nuʼuŋ nchu ŋa, “Mi ni nji ni khɔ!”

Nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nji Minnwi nɛ, pugu shini ndɔ ŋgaʼo vi nɔ Minnwi ki mfɛ tōo nu ghɔ, pugu gū pa ŋgwa ghagha moŋ mbīʼi nu nnu yugu, nnɛ njùʼɔ nàna ŋa pugu fāʼo nɛ lɨnaoŋ ni njiŋnjiŋ.
Pugu chhu nu ŋa pugu ghaŋ shiethɔ, ntaoŋ pa na.
Fie ŋa pugu ka ni ŋgaʼo pi Minnwi ŋa a shiʼa ma ŋkhu nɛ, pugu kara ŋgaʼo pi pa maoŋ kúoŋ ŋa a fhi ŋoŋmishua ŋa a ghà ŋkhu nɛ, pugu pa mishi, ni pa minyieŋ pugu pa mimaoŋ shatei.
Nthɛ yie, Minnwi chaʼa vugu mfɛ ni shɔ̄rɔ nu pa nnu tɔtrɔ ŋa njùʼɔ yugu khwā nu nɛ, pugu chwīe pa nnu fɛfhɛ shɨna pugu.
Nthɛ ŋa pugu kwri nnu shini nthɛ Minnwi ni lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, ŋkara ŋgaʼo ndɔ mfāʼa mbhɔ yaoŋ ŋa pi chwiechwie nɛ mieŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe ju maoŋ pighɔ nɛ, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pi ghaʼo vi ki ndugwi yi nɛ. A yie.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, Minnwi chaʼa vugu mfɛ ni shɔ̄rɔ nu pa nnu tɔtrɔ. Njiʼi nthɛ pi piŋgɛ pugu kara ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a pie ŋa miŋgwɛ yəɨ mimbia nɛ mbɨnɨ njəɨ pi nōoŋ pugu.
Pimbia ŋkaa pugu kara ki lɔ nji noŋ pi pugu pa piŋgɛ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a pie nɛ, ŋka fāʼo pi tɨtɨnɨ shɔ̄rɔ nu nɔ ji nu pichəɨ pimbia, nthɛ yie ghɔ, pugu fāʼo njɔ́ ŋa a kāʼo nɛ nthɛ fàŋ yugu.
Ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu shini ndɔ mbīʼi a kāʼo nɔ ji nu Minnwi nɛ, Minnwi chaʼa vugu mfɛ ni mbīʼi nu nnu pa ŋgwa pɨphɨ ŋa pugu chwīe pa nnu pɛ ŋa a pie ŋa kiʼi pugu chwīe nɛ.
Pugu ni ndɨnaoŋ ni ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ mbha nnu təɨtəɨ, phɨ, lúa, kipɨna. Pugu lɨnaoŋ ni kighɨʼə, mbɔ pa njwi ŋgwa, minduoŋnduoŋ, mifɨɨ, mbha nnu pɨ̄na ŋgwa. Pugu pa ghaŋ nchhú,
ghaŋ chhu nnu phɨ thɔ ŋgwa, ghaŋ pɨ̌na Minnwi, ghaŋ nchɨʼəshə, ghaŋ māʼaŋ ntintaʼo, ghaŋ kwēi njùʼɔ, ghaŋ paʼo pa phɨ, ghaŋ chɨ̄ʼə nchò pa tǎa,
pa na, ki piŋ, ghaŋ ki khwǎ ŋgwa nduoŋ, ghaŋ ki nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ.
Njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ji pa gɨ́ Minnwi ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chwīe ŋkwaŋ nnu pighɔ pie ŋa pugu khu nɛ, paʼa pugu lɔ ŋguʼɔ nchwiechwie, pugu piŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chwīe ŋkwaŋ nnu pighɔ nɛ ŋkaa pugu.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, gɔ̀ haʼaŋ ɔ tuo pa ŋgwa nduoŋ nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa nɛ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo shɨna nɔ chhu nu ŋa ɔ shi lɔ njiʼi nji. Nthɛ ŋa moŋ tuo nu ŋgwa nduoŋ nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa, ɔ nōoŋ noŋ yɔ nɔ ŋgushaʼa, nthɛ ŋa gɔ̀ ŋa ɔ wɛ̄iŋ ŋgwa nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa nɛ wuʼɔ nthɔ nchwīe pi pa ŋkwaŋ nnu haʼaŋ pugu chwīe nu nɛ.
Pia ji ŋa Minnwi chwīe a kāʼo ndɨɨ ŋa a shaʼa pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu chwīe ŋkwaŋ nnu pei nɛ.
Shuoŋ a, ɔ pīʼi ŋa ɔ shi ntei sháʼa Minnwi, mbɔ gɔ̀ ŋa ɔ tuo ŋgwa nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa nthɛ pa nnu haʼaŋ pugu chwīe, ndɔ nchwīe pi pa nnu pighɔ ŋkaa ghɔ nɛ?
Ki ɔ chɨ̄ʼə mmɛ pwapuŋ yi pugu pa tiishii, ni wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yi ki lɔ nji nu ŋa pwapuŋ Minnwi fāʼo nɔ chwīe nu ɔ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yɔ ni phɨ?

Ndɔ nthɛ tɨnɨthɔ yɔ pugu pa njùʼɔ yɔ haʼaŋ ɔ lɔ ntāʼa nu ŋkwri nɛ, ɔ thɔ ŋkɨrɨ pɨgɨtua Minnwi a lɛ nshwiʼi mbɨŋ ghɔ moŋ llɛmbhi ŋa Minnwi ma nōoŋ pɨgɨtua yi pugu pa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ghà nshaʼa ŋgwa moŋ ndɨndɨ nɛ.
Minnwi ma ŋkɨnɛiŋ shesheŋoŋ wuʼɔ nɔ fɨʼɨ fàʼa yi.
A shi mfɛ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yugu nthɔ nchwīe nnu shiʼi, nthɔ ntāʼa pi ndighaʼo pugu pa liɛŋ ni chɔmbhi ki ndugwi yi ŋa Minnwi ghà mfɛ nɛ.
Ndɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu wuʼɔ ntāʼa pi yugu nnu ki lɔ mbiŋ nnu shini nɛ, nthɔ nchwīe pi pa nnu haʼaŋ a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɛ, a shi mfɛ wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu.
Ŋgəʼɨ pugu pa yúʼɔ shi mbɔ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chwīe phɨ nɛ, fǔoŋ yi ni pa ŋgwa Juu mbra kiʼɛ ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋkaa pugu.
Ndɔ Minnwi shi mfɛ ndighaʼo pugu pa liɛŋ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ ni ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu chwīe shiʼi nɛ, fǔoŋ yi ni pa ŋgwa Juu mbra kiʼɛ ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ,
nthɛ ŋa Minnwi shiʼa nōoŋ shieligi.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu chwīe phɨ ki lɔ mfāʼo gɨ́ shi ŋguʼɔ ŋkhu pi ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ gɨ́, ndɔ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu fāʼo gɨ́ ndɔ nchwīe phɨ nɛ, pi shi nshaʼa vugu ni gɨ́ ghɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi pa ghaŋ yaʼo gɨ́ ŋa pugu pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ligi Minnwi, a ghà mbɔ pi ŋgwa ŋa pugu chwīe nnu haʼaŋ gɨ́ chhu nɛ ŋa Minnwi shi nshaʼa ŋa pugu pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa njùʼɔ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo gɨ́ naʼaŋ ni pugu, pugu chwīe nnu haʼaŋ gɨ́ chhu nɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo gɨ́ nɛ, nōoŋ ŋa a gɨ́ ni pugu.
Mbha nnu pugu nōoŋ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ nnu ŋa gɨ́ tāʼa nu ŋa pi chwīe nɛ moŋ njùʼɔ pugu, ŋgaŋthɔ yugu wɛ̄iŋ vugu ŋa pugu chwīe ntəɨ ki ŋkwe ntie yugu ŋa pugu chwīe a kāʼo.
Nnɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ŋa ŋ̀ga nchīi chhu nɛ, yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a lɛ mbɔ moŋ llɛ́ ghɔ, ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ma ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ Jishɔ Krishto nshaʼa ŋguoŋ pa nnu lə̄ɨŋ haʼaŋ ŋgwa pīʼi nu njùʼɔ pugu nɛ.
Ndɔ ni gɔ̀ ɔ mɛ̄iŋ noŋ yɔ ni ŋoŋ Juu njɨʼə noŋ yɔ ŋkuoŋ gɨ́ Mushi mfāʼo titɛnɛ nthɛ shɨna yəɨ Minnwi.
Ɔ ji nnu haʼaŋ a tāʼa nu ŋa ɔ chwīe nɛ, ndɔ njɛʼi llɔ moŋ gɨ́ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ minthɛ ɔ tɛrɛ nnu ŋa a kāʼo nɛ.
Ɔ ya fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ni noŋ yɔ ŋa gɔ̀ nduthɔ yɔ ŋgaŋ nōoŋ shɛndaoŋ ni pa nchriligi, mbɔ liʼɛ ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ njiŋnjiŋ nɛ.
Ɔ pīʼi ŋa ɔ ŋgaŋ yuʼu pa na, ŋgaŋ yɛʼi pa mikəʼɨ. Nthɛ ŋa ɔ fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa gɨ́ Mushi fɛ ŋguoŋ lɨna pugu pa nnu shini vɛ.
Gɔ̀ kiʼɛ ŋa ɔ yɛʼi ŋgwa nduoŋ nɛ, a pɔ khɔ paʼa ɔ lɔ njɛʼi noŋ yɔ? Nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ chīi nu ŋa kiʼi pi yōo nɛ, ɔ ghà njōo?
Gɔ̀ ŋa ɔ chhu ŋa kiʼi ŋgaŋ láŋ kwo shúoŋ nɛ, ɔ ghà ŋkwo shúoŋ? Gɔ̀ ŋa ɔ pɨ̄na pa nnwi nɛ, ɔ ghà njōo yaoŋ moŋ nda pa nnwi?
Gɔ̀ ŋa ɔ tɛnɛ nu ni gɨ́ nɛ, chɨ̄ʼə Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pəʼɨ nu gɨ́.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa, “Pi wɛʼi ligi Minnwi shɨna pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nthɛ vəɨ.”

Nthɛ ŋa ɔ̈ nchwīe nnu ŋa gɨ́ chhu nɛ, kaŋ nii nu mɔ ŋgunu mbrɛi fāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ. Ndɔ ɔ̈ mieŋ ki chwīe nnu ŋa gɨ́ chhu nɛ, kaŋ nii nu mɔ ŋgunu mbrɛi lɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ vɛ, nnɛ ɔ pɔ nɔ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ n̈chwīe nnu haʼaŋ gɨ́ chhu nɛ, paʼa Minnwi lɔ ndīi vi nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ pi ŋoŋ ŋa pi niʼiŋ vi ŋgunu mbrɛi?

Shishini, pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ haʼaŋ pugu shi lɔ nii ŋgunu mbrɛi, ndɔ nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ Minnwi nɛ, shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vəɨ mbɔ pa ŋgwa Juu, ŋa pəɨ fāʼo gɨ́ Minnwi ŋa pi nāʼaŋ nɛ, mbɨnɨ nii ŋgunu mbrɛi, ndɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɨnɨ ŋkara mbəʼɨ gɨ́ ghɔ nɛ nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa.
Nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ ŋa a ŋoŋ Juu ŋguʼɔ nthɛ pi ŋa pa tǎa pi ni mbɔ pa ŋgwa Juu ndɔ paʼa nnu nii ŋgunu mbrɛi lɔ mbɔ pi yi frɛinoŋ haʼaŋ a nthɛ pi yəɨ nɛ.

Ndɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ Juu pɔ pi moŋ ghɔ, ndɔ nii nu ŋgunu mbrɛi pɔ pi nnu moŋ njùʼɔ, ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi, ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ gɨ́ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ nɛ. Ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ shiʼa mfāʼo ndighaʼo yi pi llɔ mbhɔ ŋoŋmishua, a ghà mfāʼo pi llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.
Ti ghɛ̀rɛ pɔ nu ŋoŋ Juu kiʼɛ pɔ pi khɔ? Ki ghɛ̀rɛ nii nu ŋgunu mbrɛi pɔ pi khɔ?
A yiɛŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ shɛndaoŋ. Fǔoŋ yi pɔ ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ ŋkɨ̀nɨ yi pi ni pugu.
Ti ä mbɔ ŋa pichəɨ shini ndɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa pugu fāʼo nɔ chwīe nu nɛ, mieŋ nu yugu ki lɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa pugu fāʼo nɔ chwīe nu nɛ shi ndɨʼɨ Minnwi nɔ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ a kāʼa nɛ?
Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ! Minnwi shi ŋguʼɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ nnu shini, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwamishua pa ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ nɛ. Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa,
“Ŋa minthɛ pi yəɨ ghɔ nɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ moŋ chrà yɔ,
ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi shaʼa ghɔ nɛ, jɔ chəɨŋ.”
“Ndɔ,” yichəɨ ŋoŋ nthɛ a chhu ŋa, “ti ä mbɔ ŋa pa ntəɨ pia ghɛ̄rɛ nɔ nōoŋ nu ndɨndɨ Minnwi kaŋ minthɛ pia chhu pi ŋa? Ŋa Minnwi fāaŋ ndɨɨ ŋa a fɛ njɔ́ ni pia nɛ?” (Ǹchrā yei pi nɔ ŋoŋmishua).
Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ! Nthɛ ŋa a mbɔ nɛnnɛ, Minnwi kie pi nɛiŋ nshaʼa mbhi kiʼɛ?
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ nthɛ a pɨnɨ nchhu ŋa, “Ndɔ, ti ä ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ a nnu shini Minnwi ya ntaoŋ páa nɔ fɛ nu ntou ndighaʼo ghɔ, pi pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nshaʼa a nɔ nchwīe phɨ pi ŋa?”
A pɔ khɔ kiʼɛ paʼa ɔ lɔ nchhu ŋa, “Pia chwīe phɨ nnɛ ŋa minthɛ a thɔ ni shiʼi?” Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa wɛʼi a ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ tigi nnu thɔ mu ŋa yei nnu ŋa ǹchhu nɛ. Pi shi mfɛ njɔ́ ni pugu nɔ haʼaŋ a pie nɛ.
Pia chhu ŋa kiʼɛ? Pia ŋa pia ŋgwa Juu nɛ pɔ shiʼi nchaa vugu? Ŋga! Pia lɔ mbɔ shiʼi nchaa vugu kaŋ shɨgɛi. Nthɛ ŋa pia kwo nōoŋ ŋa pa ŋgwa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ghao pɔ mbhɔ phɨ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ:
“Ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ lɔ mbɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi taʼa yi,
Ŋoŋ ŋa a ji nnu nɛ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ fɔ.
Paʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ mbɔ ŋa a shigi Minnwi.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa shrī ŋkǔnu yugu ni Minnwi,
pugu fāaŋ ndaoŋ ghao,
yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ njiʼi nchwīe nnu ŋa a pwa,
Njiʼi nthɛ pi taʼa yi.”
“Chrà yugu luŋ nɔ fúŋ khu ŋoŋ haʼaŋ pi fīʼi.
Pugu lɔ̄gɔ lɨŋ yugu nɔ fɨ̄ɨ nu ŋgwa nɔ ghɔ.”
“Ŋgò pa mikwiŋ pɔ laʼo ghrāo nchò yugu.”
“Nchò yugu lɨnaoŋ ni nchɔ̀nɔ pugu pa lwilwi chrà shāaŋ lɨʼɨ.”
“Kwo yugu chɨgəɨ nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu njwi ŋoŋ.
Pɨrɨ nu pugu pa ŋgəʼɨ nūaŋ nɔ pa paʼo pugu sheshe lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pugu ghə̄ɨ nɛ.
Pugu lɔ njiʼi nji ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi ghà ntɔgɔ nchhɔ ni taʼaŋggi nɛ.”
“Pugu lɔ njiʼi njəɨ ŋa pugu fāʼo nɔ fāʼo nu pɔ́gɔ Minnwi.”
Ndwɛ pia ji ŋa sheshe nnu ŋa gɨ́ Mushi chhu nɛ, a chhu pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a thɔ shaʼa vugu nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ nchò ŋguoŋ ŋgwa chri, Minnwi shi shaʼa ŋguoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi.
Nthɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa shesheŋoŋ lɔ ŋkāʼo ligi Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ gɨ́ tāʼa nu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa gɨ́ wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɔ chwīe nu pia ji phɨ yia.

Ndɔ ndwɛ, Minnwi nōoŋ shɛndaoŋ haʼaŋ mimfɛ ŋgwa kie fɔ mbɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shhɨ yu nɛ. A lɔ mfāʼo sheshe nnu nɔ chwīe nu ni nūʼɔŋ nu yaoŋ haʼaŋ gɨ́ tāʼa nu ŋa pi chwīe nɛ. Ndɔ gɨ́ Mushi pugu pa nnu pɛ ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nāʼaŋ nɛ ni nchrā nthɛ shɛndaoŋ yei.
Pi chwīe pia pɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ligi Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yɨʼə nu noŋ mbɨŋ Jishɔ Krishto ni shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa kwrí shi lɔ mbɔ,
nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa chwīe phɨ nnɛ ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nchəɨŋ nthɨŋkwo ndighaʼo Minnwi.
Ndɔ pi chwīe pia pɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ pi nɔ fɛ́ llɔ ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Krishto Jishɔ ŋa a yuoŋ via mfuʼu moŋ ŋkɨɨ phɨ nɛ.

Minnwi fɛ Jishɔ pi nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa a fuʼu pɨgɨtua ju Minnwi nthɛ phɨ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ chhǐ yi. Minnwi līʼɛ phɨ ŋgwa ndɨɨ ŋa pugu fāʼo piŋ mbɨŋ Jishɔ Krishto nɛ. Minnwi ni nchwīe yei nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ, nthɛ ŋa moŋ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ ŋa a ni mfāʼo ni ghaŋ phɨ nɛ, a ni mieŋ ki lɔ mfɛ njɔ́ phɨ ŋa pi ni ŋkwo chwīe nɛ.
A ni mbɔ nnɛ pi nɔ nōoŋ nu ndɨndɨ yi moŋ ndɨɨ yei, nnɛ ŋa a pɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ ndɔ mbɔ ju mbɔ ŋgaŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ Jishɔ nɛ, pɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ.
Minthɛ kiʼɛ pia nōoŋ noŋ yia pi ni khɔ? Yichəɨ yaoŋ lɔ mbɔ! Yei pɔ nthɛ pi khɔ? A pɔ nthɛ pi ŋa pia chwīe nnu ŋa gɨ́ chhu nɛ? Ŋga! A pɔ nthɛ pi ŋa pia piŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa pia lūgwi ŋa ŋoŋ ghà ŋkāʼo mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ ligi Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ gɨ́ chhu nɛ.
Ki Minnwi wuʼɔ mbɔ pi Minnwi pa ŋgwa Juu təʼɨ vugu? A lɔ mbɔ Minnwi pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋkaa pugu? Ooŋ, a Minnwi ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋkaa pugu,

nthɛ ŋa shishini, Minnwi taʼa yi, mbɔ ŋgaŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a shi nchhu ŋa pa ŋgwa Juu, mbɔ ghaŋ nii ŋgunu mbrɛi pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ. Pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋkaa pugu, mbɔ ghaŋ ki nii ŋgunu mbrɛi wuʼɔ mbɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ.
Yei nōoŋ ŋa ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ pia pɨgɛi gɨ́? Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ! Pia ka chwiechwie nnu ŋa gɨ́ chhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
Ti pia shi nchhu kiʼɛ ŋa Abrahaŋ ŋkhu tǎa via ni nshei pi khɔ moŋ frɛinoŋ?
Nthɛ ŋa Abrahaŋ kaŋ ni mbɔ yi ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa fàʼa, a kaŋ ni mfāʼo nnu nɔ kwēi nu njùʼɔ yi nɔ ghɔ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbɔ pi shhɨ Minnwi.
Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu pi ŋa, “Abrahaŋ ni mbiŋ Minnwi, nthɛ piŋ yi, Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ vi nɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ.”
Ndwɛ, ni ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼa, pi shiʼa mɛ̄iŋ pe yi pi ni kɨ̀nɛiŋ, a pɔ pi yaoŋ ŋa a fāʼa fàʼa mfāʼo.
Ndɔ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼa, mbiŋ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nchwīe ŋgwa ki pɔgɔ Minnwi pɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ nɛ, pi lɔ̄gɔ piŋ yi nɔ ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Devi ni nchrā nthɛ mbɔrɔ ŋa a pɔ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ ŋa Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ nɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ ki lɔ nthɛ pi sheshe yaoŋ ŋa ŋoŋ ghɔ chwīe:
“Mbɔrɔ yi pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi līʼɛ pɨphɨ yugu nɛ,
ŋa pi kuru phɨ yugu nɛ.
Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa Taathɔ lɔ njiʼi ndɔ̄gɔ pi phɨ yi nɛ.”
Mbɔrɔ yei wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ni pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pi niʼiŋ vugu ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, ki a pɔ ni ghaŋ ki nii ŋgunu mbrɛi ŋkaa pugu? Pigi chhu ŋa pi ni ndɔ̄gɔ piŋ Abrahaŋ nɔ ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi.
Pi ni ndɔ̄gɔ ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ pi ndɨɨ khɔ? A ni mbɔ pi ndɨɨ ŋa a ni nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, ki ŋkaoŋ a maa nii ŋgunu mbrɛi? A ni mbɔ pi ndɨɨ ŋa a shini ndɔ naa nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ.

A ni mfāʼo lì nii nu ŋgunu mbrɛi nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa a shini ndɔ naa nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ. Láʼo yi ni mbɔ nɔ chwīe nu a pɔ tǎa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu piŋ ki lɔ nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pi lɔ̄gɔ vugu nɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ŋkaa pugu,

ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchwīe a pɔ tǎa pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu wuʼɔ nii nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ chɔmbhi ŋkwaŋ piŋ yɛ ŋa Abrahaŋ tǎa via ni nchhɔ ŋkaoŋ maa nii nu ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa kàʼa yɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ni Abrahaŋ pugu pa ndaaŋoŋ yi ŋa ŋkuoŋ mbhi shi mbɔ ji nɛ shini ndɔ nthɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ gɨ́, a ni nthɔ nthɛ pi ŋa a ni fāʼo piŋ, Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ vi ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa a mbɔ ŋa Minnwi shi mfɛ yaoŋ ŋa a kāʼa nɛ pi ni pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu fāʼo gɨ́ Mushi nɛ, a nōoŋ ŋa piŋ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ, ndɔ kàʼa Minnwi pɔ nnu ghagha.
Nthɛ ŋa gɨ́ thɔ ni pɨgɨtua Minnwi, ndɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ gɨ́ shi lɔ mbɔ nɛ, pəʼɨ nu gɨ́ shi lɔ mbɔ ŋkaa yu.

A chwīe yie kàʼa ghɔ yɨʼə pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ kàʼa ghɔ yɨʼə pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi. Ŋguoŋ ndaaŋoŋ Abrahaŋ fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɔ fāʼo nu, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo gɨ́ Mushi nɛ, a pɨnɨ mbɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo ŋkwaŋ piŋ Abrahaŋ, mbɔ tǎa ŋguoŋ via ghao.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ, “Ǹchwīe ghɔ ŋa ɔ pɔ tǎa ntou pa laʼataoŋ,” shhɨ Minnwi ŋa a piŋ nɛ, ŋa a ghà mfɛ chɔmbhi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khu nɛ, chrà yi chwīe pa yaoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛ, pɔ.

Njiʼi nthɛ pi ndɨɨ ŋa láʼo fāʼo nu kwàʼa shini ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛ, Abrahaŋ kɨna nthɔ mfāʼo kwàʼa, mbiŋ nu ŋa a shi ŋgū tǎa ntou pa laʼataoŋ nthɛ ŋa Minnwi ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Yinɛ fɨʼɨ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ ŋa ɔ shi mfāʼo nɛ!”

Piŋ yi shini ndɔ njiʼi nchɨʼɨ njiʼi nthɛ pi ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ndīi noŋ yi a pɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a kwo kukhu, nnɛ nthɛ ŋa a ni ŋkwo pɔ nɔ taʼa ŋkɨɨ ŋgaʼo, ki ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ndīi njəɨ ŋa minthɛ paʼa Shera lɔ nuʼuŋ mbhi muuŋ nɛ.
Abrahaŋ shini ndɔ mfāʼo khuthɔ moŋ piŋ yi nthɛ kàʼa ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkwo fɛ ghɔ nɛ. A ni ŋkuʼɔ ntɨnɨ moŋ piŋ yi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mfɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi nɛ.
Nja nji nu ŋa Minnwi fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ a kāʼa nɛ.
A ni nchwīe yie ghɔ, pi lɔ̄gɔ piŋ yi nɔ ndɨndɨ.
Ndɔ chrà ghɔ ŋa, “Pi ni ndɔ̄gɔ vi nɔ ŋoŋ kakaʼo,” pi shini ndɔ nāʼaŋ nthɛ pi ju təʼɨ vi,
a ni mbɨnɨ mbɔ nthɛ via ŋkaa pia. Pi shi ndɔ̄gɔ via nɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ, pia ŋa pia piŋ vi ŋa a ni mbɨʼɨ Jishɔ Taathɔ via moŋ gu nɛ,
mbɔ ju ŋa pi ni mfɛ vi ŋa a khu nthɛ phɨ yia nɛ, pi pɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu nnɛ ŋa pia pɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, nɔ haʼaŋ pia pɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ligi Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ nɛ, pia fāʼo taʼaŋggi pia pa Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ Taathɔ via.
Ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu, pia pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo shɨ̀na ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ piŋ nɔ nii nu moŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi ŋa pia thi fɔ nɛ, mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ moŋ kwàʼa ŋa pia fāʼo nɔ ghrā nu moŋ ndighaʼo Minnwi nɛ.
Ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi yei, pia pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ moŋ ŋgəʼɨ, nji nu ŋa ŋgəʼɨ ŋa pia yəɨ nu nɛ shi nthɔ ni wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ,
wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ thɔ ni mbha nnu shiʼi, mbaa nnu shiʼi thɔ ni kwàʼa
ndɔ kwàʼa shiʼa njiʼi njɨrɨ ŋoŋ, nthɛ ŋa Minnwi shāʼo khwǎ yi moŋ njùʼɔ pia ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ Jijwɛ yi ŋa a ni mfɛ ni pia nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni ŋguʼɔ ŋkɨ̄ʼɨ nɛ, ndɨɨ ni ŋga ŋkāʼo, Krishto khu nthɛ ghaŋ ki pɔgɔ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa a ghaʼa ni ŋoŋ nɔ khu nu nthɛ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ minthɛ ŋoŋ fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɔ tāʼa nu ŋkhu nthɛ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ nɛ.
Ndɔ Minnwi nōoŋ khwǎ yi ni pia ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ taoŋ nu Krishto a thɔ ŋkhu nthɛ via ndɨɨ haʼaŋ pia ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pa nchwīe phɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, nɔ haʼaŋ pia pɔ pi ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ligi Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ Jishɔ nɛ, a fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ ŋa a shi ndūgu ni pia mbhɔ pɨgɨtua Minnwi.

Nthɛ ŋa ä mbɔ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni mbɔ ni kipɨna pia pa Minnwi nɛ, pi ni nchīni via pia pa Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ gu Muuŋ vi, ndwɛ ŋa pia kwo chīni ŋggì nɛ, pia shi ndūgu pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chɔmbhi yi.
Ndɔ yinɛ lɔ mbɔ ŋguoŋ yi, pia pɨnɨ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Taathɔ via, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa pia tɔgɔ mbhɔ yu mfāʼo chīni ŋggì pia pa Minnwi nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ phɨ ni nii ŋkuoŋ mbhi ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ taʼa ŋoŋ nɛ, gu tɔgɔ mbɨŋ phɨ nii nɛ, nnɛ, gu shɛ̄rɛ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao chwīe phɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa shishini, phɨ ni mbɔ moŋ mbhi Minnwi ma mfɛ gɨ́, ndɔ pi shiʼa nshia phɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ gɨ́ lɔ mbɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ gu ni nshaʼa nɔ fùoŋ llɔ ŋkuoŋ Adaŋ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ Mushi, njiʼi nthɛ pi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa phɨ yugu shini ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi nɔ yi Adaŋ, ŋa a ni mbɔ mifhi ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ.

Ndɔ kwrí pɔ shɨna yi paa ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa phɨ Adaŋ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi nɔ fɛ́ pwapuŋ Minnwi. Nthɛ ŋa ä mbɔ ŋa ntou ŋgwa ni ŋkhu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ phɨ taʼa ŋoŋ, kaŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi pugu pa fɛ́ pwapuŋ ŋa taʼa ŋoŋ ghɔ mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto, fɛ ni ntou ŋgwa nɛ ghaʼo nchaa yie ghɔ.

Kwrí pɔ shɨna fɛ́ Minnwi pugu nnu ŋa a llɔ ŋkuoŋ phɨ taʼa ŋoŋ ghɔ, mbɔ Adaŋ nɛ. Adaŋ ni ŋga nchwīe taʼa phɨ ghɔ, yie ghɔ chwīe pi shaʼa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pugu gū sháʼa, ndɔ fɛ́ ŋa a ni thɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni ŋkwo chwīe ntou phɨ nɛ ni nchwīe ŋgwa pugu taoŋ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ.

Nthɛ ŋa phɨ taʼa ŋoŋ vei ni nchwīe, gu jɛ̄ shaʼa nu nɔ fùoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ taʼa ŋoŋ ghɔ. Ndɔ pwapuŋ Minnwi pugu pa fɛ́ yi, mbɔ ndɨndɨ ka chaa yie ghɔ chaa nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu kwe nɛ shi nchhɔ chɔmbhi yugu moŋ shaʼa nu nɔ fùoŋ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ taʼa ŋoŋ vei, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, nɔ haʼaŋ taʼa phɨ ni nchwīe ŋguoŋ ŋgwa gū sháʼa nɛ, wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, taʼa nnu ndɨndɨ nchwīe ŋgwa gū ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi mbɨnɨ nthɔ ni chɔmbhi ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ ni nchɨ̄ʼə nchò ntou ŋgwa gū ghaŋ phɨ nɛ, nɛnnɛ yaʼo nchò taʼa ŋoŋ chwīe ŋa ntou ŋgwa shi ŋgū ŋgwa ndɨndɨ.
Ndwɛ gɨ́ Mushi ni nthɔ pi nɔ pigi nu phɨ, ndɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ phɨ pigi nɛ, pwapuŋ Minnwi pɨnɨ mbīgi njiɛŋ ŋgaʼa.
Nnɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ phɨ ni shaʼa nu nɔ fùoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ gu nɛ, pwapuŋ Minnwi ŋkaa yu nthɛ a shaʼa nɔ fùoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ndɨndɨ nthɔ ni chɔmbhi ki mmɛ ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ Taathɔ via.
Pia shi nchhu pi ŋa ndwɛ? Pia shi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ moŋ phɨ nnɛ ŋa pwapuŋ Minnwi pigi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ ŋgaʼa?
Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ! Pinthɛ pia ŋa pia kwo khu nɔ chwīe nu phɨ nɛ kie pi nɛiŋ mbɨnɨ nthɔ nchhɔ chɔmbhi yia pi moŋ phɨ?
Ki pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa ŋguoŋ yia ŋa pia ni ŋkwe ŋkhǐ mbɔ taʼa yi pia pa Krishto Jishɔ nɛ, kwe ŋkhǐ ghɔ ni nchwīe pia pugu pɔ taʼa yi moŋ gu yi?
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pi ni ntwei via pugu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kwe ŋkhǐ. Nnɛ ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni ŋkuʼɔ ni Krishto llɔ moŋ gu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ndighaʼo Tǎa nɛ, minthɛ pia ŋkaa pia chhɔ moŋ chɔmbhi fhi.
Nthɛ ŋa p̈ia pugu mbɔ taʼa yi moŋ ŋkwaŋ gu yi, kaŋ shishini pia pugu shi mbɔ taʼa yi moŋ ŋkwaŋ kuʼɔ nu mi moŋ gu.
Pia ji ŋa pi kwo jwi ndunu noŋ yia pia pa Krishto kaʼa ŋkuoŋ wáʼa yi, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa phɨ lɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo ghrɨ́ mbɨŋ pia, ki pia lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ ŋkǔna mbhɔ nduthɔ phɨ ghɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a khu nɛ, pi fuʼu vi mbhɔ phɨ.
Ndwɛ, ä mbɔ ŋa pia pa Krishto khu kaʼa, pia fāʼo piŋ ŋa pia pugu shi mbɔ yi maoŋ kaʼa.
Pia ji ŋa, moŋ kuʼɔ nu ni Krishto moŋ gu, mbaʼa a ma nuʼuŋ ŋkhu ŋkamuʼɔŋ, gu lɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo ghrɨ́ mbɨŋ yu.
Nthɛ ŋa gu ŋa a ni ŋkhu taʼa ŋgɛ́ ndɔ mbɔ ndugwi yi nɛ, a khu pi nɔ nnu chwīe phɨ, ndɔ chɔmbhi ŋa a chhɔ nu nɛ, a chhɔ pi nɔ pɔ nu pugu Minnwi.
Nɛnnɛ p̂əɨ ŋkaa pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ noŋ yəɨ ŋa pəɨ ŋgwa khu nɔ nnu chwīe phɨ, mbɔ ŋgwa maoŋ pi nɔ tɔgɔ nu mbɨŋ Krishto Jishɔ mbɔ kaʼa pəɨ pa Minnwi.
Kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ mieŋ phɨ shaʼa nu nɔ fùoŋ moŋ noŋ yəɨ, ŋa minthɛ a khu nɛ, nɔ chwīe nu pəɨ yaʼo pi nchò pa nnu tɔtrɔ ŋa a tāʼa nu nɛ.

Kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ nchaʼa pa ghrà noŋ pəɨ mfɛ ni phɨ nɔ pa yaoŋ chwīe pa nnu təɨtəɨ, ndɔ p̂əɨ chaʼa noŋ pəɨ mfɛ ni Minnwi nɔ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi kwo fuʼu vugu moŋ gu nii nɔ ghɔ moŋ chɔmbhi, mfɛ pa ghrà noŋ pəɨ ni Minnwi nɔ pa maoŋ fàʼa nnu tithi.
Nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa phɨ nuʼuŋ nshaʼa vəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ nuʼuŋ nchhɔ chɔmbhi njaʼo pi mbhɔ gɨ́, pəɨ chhɔ chɔmbhi yəɨ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ pwapuŋ Minnwi.
Yie pɔ kiʼɛ ŋa? A pɔ ŋa pia chhɔ nthɔ nchwīe pi phɨ nthɛ ŋa pia lɔ njiʼi nchhɔ chɔmbhi yia njaʼo pi mbhɔ gɨ́, pia chhɔ chɔmbhi yia pi mbhɔ pwapuŋ Minnwi nɛ? Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ!

Pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa pəɨ nchaʼa noŋ yəɨ mfɛ ni shesheŋoŋ nɔ pa ŋkǔna yaʼo nchò, kaŋ pəɨ ŋkǔna ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa pəɨ chhɔ njaʼo nchò yi nɛ? Ki pəɨ pɔ pi yi phɨ, ndugwi yi pɔ gu, ki yi yaʼo nchò, ndugwi yi pɔ fāʼo nu chɔmbhi ndɨndɨ?
Ndɔ pia tōo Minnwi ŋa pəɨ ŋa pəɨ ni mfǔoŋ mbɔ ŋkǔna phɨ nɛ gū pa ghaŋ yaʼo nchò yaoŋ yɛʼi pɛ ŋa pi ni mfɛ ni pəɨ nɛ llɔ njùʼɔ pəɨ,
ndɔ pi ni ŋga kwo fuʼu vəɨ moŋ phɨ, pəɨ gū pa ŋkǔna mbhɔ nnu ndɨndɨ.

Ǹthɔ nchrā nu ni pəɨ, māʼaŋ fɨʼɨ pi nɔ ŋoŋmishua nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋmishua fāʼo kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ nɔ ji nu pichəɨ nnu. Nthɛ ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ yichəɨ ndɨɨ pəɨ fɛ pa ghrà noŋ pəɨ nɔ ŋkǔna pa nnu tɔtrɔ pugu nnu pɨphɨ nɛ, a chwīe pəɨ nii moŋ pɨphɨ mbīgi nɛ, nnɛ ndwɛ pəɨ chaʼa pa ghrà noŋ pəɨ mfɛ nɔ ŋkǔna mbhɔ nnu ndɨndɨ ŋa a shi nchwīe pəɨ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ ni mbɔ pa ŋkǔna mbhɔ phɨ nɛ, a shini ndɔ mbɔ pi yiʼi ni pəɨ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ndɨndɨ.
Ndɔ pəɨ ni nshei pi khɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ llɔ ŋkuoŋ pa maoŋ pɛ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo lrithɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ ndwɛ nɛ? Ŋguoŋ nnu pighɔ ni nthɔ pi ni gu,
ndɔ ndwɛ ŋa pi kwo fuʼu vəɨ mbhɔ phɨ nɛ, pəɨ gū pa kǔna mbhɔ Minnwi nɛ, shéi ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɛ a chhɔ nu mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nchwīe pəɨ fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pa pe llɔ mbhɔ phɨ pɔ pi gu, ndɔ fɛ́ Minnwi pɔ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ moŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pəɨ pa Krishto Jishɔ Taathɔ via.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, ǹthɔ nchrā pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ji gɨ́ nɛ, pəɨ shi lɔ njiʼi nji ŋa gɨ́ ghà ŋguʼɔ ŋkrao ŋoŋ pi ndɨɨ ŋa a yi maoŋ nɛ?
Gɨ́ krao láŋ shɨna miŋgwɛ pugu ndaoŋ vi pi ndɨɨ haʼaŋ ndaoŋ vi wuʼɔ mbiʼi yi maoŋ nɛ, ndɔ n̈daoŋ vi ŋkhu, kaŋ gɨ́ láŋ lɔ nuʼuŋ ŋkrao vi.

Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, n̈daoŋ vi mbɔ yi maoŋ a ji mimbia nduoŋ, kaŋ pi shi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni miŋkwoshuoŋ, ndɔ ti n̈daoŋ vi ŋkhu, kaŋ gɨ́ lɔ nuʼuŋ ŋkrao vi, nnɛ ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi nuʼuŋ mbɔ miŋkwoshuoŋ njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a laŋ mimbia nduoŋ nɛ.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ kwo khu nthɛ nnu gɨ́ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ noŋ Krishto, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ pɔ yi ŋoŋ nduoŋ, mbɔ ju ŋa pi pɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia yuŋ ntíɛŋ ni Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni ŋguʼɔ nchhɔ pi moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ, shɔ̄rɔ nu pa nnu pɨphɨ, ŋa gɨ́ chwīe pia fāʼo nɛ, ni nthɔ mfāʼa nu moŋ noŋ pia nthɔ nu ni gu.

Ndɔ ndwɛ, pi kɨ̄gɛi via mbhɔ gɨ́, ntɔgɔ pi moŋ khu nu mbhɔ ju ŋa a ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ via nɔ ŋkǔna nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia fāʼa moŋ shɛndaoŋ fhi, mbɔ yi Jijwɛ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi yi moŋ ndunu shɛndaoŋ, mbɔ yi kɨna ŋa pi nāʼaŋ nɛ.

Pia shi nchhu pi ŋa kiʼɛ? Ŋa gɨ́ Mushi pɔ pi phɨ? Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ. Ndɔ gɨ́ kaŋ ni ŋkiɛŋ ǹshi kaŋ nji yaoŋ ŋa phɨ yie ghɔ nɛ. Ǹshi kaŋ ndɔ nji yaoŋ ŋa shɔ̄rɔ nu yie ghɔ nɛ nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ kaŋ ni mieŋ ki chhu ŋa, “Kiʼi nshɔ̄rɔ yaoŋ ŋoŋ nduoŋ.”
Ndɔ phɨ lɔ̄gɔ shɨna ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kɨna, nchwīe m̀fāʼo ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ shɔ̄rɔ nu moŋ noŋ a ghao. Nthɛ ŋa gɨ́ kaŋ mieŋ ki kiɛŋ phɨ, kaŋ mbɔ pi yaoŋ khu.
Ŋ̀ki pɔ yi maoŋ ndɨɨ ŋa gɨ́ shini ndɔ naa mbɔ nɛ, ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa kɨna ni nthɔ nɛ, phɨ gū yi maoŋ, ŋ̀khu.
Ya kɨ̀na ghɔ ŋa a ni ŋkāʼa fɛ nu chɔmbhi vəɨ ni ŋka thɔ pi ni gu vəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa phɨ ni mfɨ̄ɨ a, ntɔgɔ pi moŋ lɔ̄gɔ nu shɨ̀na mbhɔ kɨ̀na, ntɔgɔ moŋ ghɔ njwi a.
Nnɛ gɨ́ yi taoŋtaoŋ, kɨ̀na pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ, mbɔ yi ndɨndɨ ndɔ mbwa.

Yie ghɔ nōoŋ pi ŋa yaoŋ ŋa a yi shiʼi nɛ pɨnɨ nthɔ pi ni gu vəɨ? Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ! A phɨ ŋa a thɔ ni gu vəɨ ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a pwa nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pi nōoŋ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwrà phɨ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, ndɔ ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ kɨ̀na minthɛ pia yəɨ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ phɨ pɨgɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pia ji ŋa gɨ́ Mushi llɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi, ndɔ m̀bɔ pi yi frɛinoŋ, pi fīni a nɔ ŋkǔna ni phɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nji nnu haʼaŋ ǹthɔ nchwīe nu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ nthɔ nchwīe pi pa nnu pɛ haʼaŋ ŋ̀khwā nɔ chwīe nu nɛ, ndɔ ǹchwīe pi ya wuʼɔ pa nnu pɛ ŋa m̀bɨ̄na nɛ.
Ndɔ ti m̈i nchwīe ya wuʼɔ nnu haʼaŋ ǹdɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu nchwīe nɛ, pigi gɨ́ pɔ ni taʼa nchò, ǹthɔ mbiŋ nu ŋa gɨ́ pwa.
Nɛnnɛ, a lɔ njiʼi nthɔ nchwīe mmu nchwīe ntəɨ ghɔ, a thɔ nchwīe phɨ haʼaŋ a chhɔ mbɨŋ mu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹji ŋa sheshe yaoŋ shiʼi lɔ njiʼi nchhɔ mbɨŋ mu, mbɔ moŋ frɛinoŋ a, nthɛ ŋa m̀fāʼo khwǎ nɔ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ a yi kaʼokaʼo nɛ, ndɔ paʼa njɨ chwīe nu nnu kaʼokaʼo ghɔ lɔ mbɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nchwīe nnu shiʼi haʼaŋ ǹtāʼa nu nɛ, ndɔ phɨ ŋa ǹshi lɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu nɛ ka pɔ ju yaoŋ haʼaŋ ǹthɔ nchwīe nu nɛ.
Ndɔ ti m̈i nthɔ nchwīe ya wuʼɔ nnu haʼaŋ ǹdɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu nɔ chwīe nu nɛ, kaŋ a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ mmu mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa ǹthɔ nchwīe nnu ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ a ka thɔ nchwīe phɨ haʼaŋ a chhɔ mbɨŋ mu nɛ nchwīe nnu ghɔ.
Nnɛ, ǹjəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ gɨ́ yei chhɔ mfāʼa nu nɛ: Ŋa ndɨɨ haʼaŋ ǹtāʼa nu nchwīe nnu haʼaŋ a kāʼo nɛ, phɨ wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋkiɛŋ yəɨ mu.
Nthɛ ŋa fie moŋ njùʼɔ mu, m̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ni gɨ́ Minnwi.
Ndɔ ǹjəɨ gɨ́ nduoŋ fāʼa nu moŋ pa ghrà noŋ a, a thɔ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ pugu gɨ́ yɛ ŋa thɔ a shwei a ŋa a kāʼo nɛ, nchwīe m̀bɔ ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ mbhɔ gɨ́ phɨ haʼaŋ a fāʼa nu moŋ noŋ a nɛ.
Mi pɔ pi yəɨ ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ gha nɛiŋ! A shi ŋkwe gɔ̌ ŋkwe a moŋ noŋ gu yei?
Ndɔ pia tōo Minnwi ntɔgɔ mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ Taathɔ via! Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, mmu nduthɔ a fāʼa mbhɔ gɨ́ Minnwi ni pīʼi nu ma, ndɔ ni frɛinoŋ a m̀fāʼa pi mbhɔ gɨ́ phɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, gū nu sháʼa lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ ndwɛ ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu taʼa yi pugu pa Krishto Jishɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa moŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pəɨ pa Krishto Jishɔ, gɨ́ Jijwɛ chɔmbhi kwo fuʼu ghɔ, ɔ lūgu mbhɔ gɨ́ phɨ pugu gu.

Nthɛ ŋa yaoŋ ŋa a kaŋ ni nthɛ paʼa gɨ́ lɔ nchwīe nthɛ ŋa frɛinoŋ ni nchwīe a pou ghrɨ́ nɛ, Minnwi ni nchwīe ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ taoŋ nu Muuŋ vi moŋ púoŋ frɛinoŋ ŋoŋmishua nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nthɛ phɨ, nnɛ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ phɨ nɔ ŋgushaʼa moŋ frɛinoŋ,
nnɛ ŋa nnu ndɨndɨ ŋa gɨ́ tāʼa nu nɛ pɔ yi nūʼɔŋ moŋ chɔmbhi yia, mbɔ pia ŋa pia chhɔ chɔmbhi yia,
ki lɔ mbɔ pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ tāʼa nu nɛ, mbɔ pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ tāʼa nu nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ chɔmbhi yugu pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ tāʼa nu nɛ ghà nūʼɔŋ njùʼɔ yugu pi ŋkuoŋ pa maoŋ frɛinoŋ ndɔ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ chɔmbhi yugu pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ tāʼa nu nɛ, ghà nūʼɔŋ njùʼɔ yugu pi ŋkuoŋ pa maoŋ moŋ Jijwɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋ̈gwa nūʼɔŋ njùʼɔ yugu ŋkuoŋ pa nnu frɛinoŋ a nthɔ pi ni gu, ndɔ nūʼɔŋ nu njùʼɔ ŋkuoŋ Jijwɛ, ghà nthɔ pi ni chɔmbhi pugu pa ghɨghrɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu nūʼɔŋ njùʼɔ yugu pi ŋkuoŋ pa nnu frɛinoŋ nɛ pɔ ni kipɨna pugu pa Minnwi nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ mfɛ noŋ yugu ni gɨ́ Minnwi, shishini, minthɛ paʼa pugu lɔ ndɔ mfɛ.
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà njaʼo pi mbhɔ frɛinoŋ yugu nɛ, nthɛ paʼa pugu lɔ nchwīe túa Minnwi pwa.

Ndɔ ni pəɨ, pəɨ lɔ njiʼi njaʼo pi mbhɔ frɛinoŋ yəɨ, pəɨ yaʼo pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ nɔ haʼaŋ ä nja mbɔ ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi chhɔ njùʼɔ pəɨ. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo Jijwɛ Krishto moŋ chɔmbhi yi nɛ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yi Krishto.
Ndɔ ti K̈rishto mbɔ moŋ chɔmbhi yəɨ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ noŋ yəɨ yi khu nthɛ phɨ nɛ, Jijwɛ Minnwi fɛ chɔmbhi ni pəɨ nthɛ ŋa pi kwo chwīe pəɨ pɔ yi ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi.
Jijwɛ ju ŋa a ni mbɨʼɨ Jishɔ moŋ gu nɛ n̈chhɔ mbɨŋ ghɔ, kaŋ ju ŋa a ni mbɨʼɨ Krishto llɔ moŋ gu shi mbɨnɨ mfɛ chɔmbhi ni frɛinoŋ yəɨ ŋa a ghà ŋkhu nɛ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ Jijwɛ yi ŋa a chhɔ mbɨŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, pia fāʼo yaoŋ ŋa a yīʼi via, ki lɔ mbɔ pi ni frɛinoŋ nɔ chhɔ nu chɔmbhi yia ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ tāʼa nu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ nchhɔ chɔmbhi yəɨ pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ tāʼa nu nɛ, kaŋ pəɨ shi ŋkhu, ndɔ ti pəɨ ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi njwi mbha nnu noŋ, pəɨ fāʼo chɔmbhi.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a nōoŋ Jijwɛ nōoŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu shi nchhɔ chɔmbhi yugu nɛ pɔ pi puoŋ Minnwi.

Nthɛ ŋa Jijwɛ ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ ni pəɨ nɛ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi Jijwɛ ŋkǔna ŋa a shi nchwīe pəɨ pɨnɨ mbɔgɔ gu, a pɔ pi Jijwɛ ŋa a chwīe pəɨ gū puoŋ Minnwi, mbɔ Jijwɛ ŋa pia tɔgɔ mbhɔ yu ŋkə̄ɨ ni Minnwi ŋa, “Baba, Tǎa via!”
Jijwɛ Minnwi nduthɔ yi pɔ pi miŋkwentie ni jijwɛ yia ŋa pia pɔ pi puoŋ Minnwi.

Ŋa pia puoŋ pi nɛ, nnɛ pia shi mfāʼo pa yaoŋ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ ni puoŋ pi nɛ, mbɨnɨ mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa ju, Minnwi, nūʼɔŋ ni Krishto nɛ, pia pa Krishto kaʼa, nɔ haʼaŋ p̈ia pa Krishto njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ kaʼa nnɛ ŋa pia pugu fāʼo ndighaʼo kaʼa.
Ǹja mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa ŋgəʼɨ ŋa a pɔ ndwɛ nɛ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yichəɨ yaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ mbīʼi fɨʼɨ ndighaʼo yɛ ŋa Minnwi thɔ nu nōoŋ ni pia nɛ.
Ŋguoŋ maoŋ pɛ ŋa Minnwi ni mbuoŋ nɛ thɔ njūa nu njwɛrɛ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi shi nōoŋ puoŋ yi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa pi ni mbuoŋ nɛ shini ndɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ, paʼa ndɔ mbɔ pi khwatua yugu, mbɔ nthɛ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchwīe pugu pɔ nnɛ nɛ. Ndɔ pugu ni ŋguʼɔ mfāʼo kwàʼa,
ŋa nduthɔ maoŋ pɛ ŋa pi puoŋ puoŋ nɛ, pi shi mfuʼu vugu moŋ ŋkɨɨ fɔ̄rɔ nu pugu nii mbara puoŋ Minnwi moŋ ndighaʼo pɔ nu ni thɔ yugu.
Nthɛ ŋa pia ji ŋa ŋguoŋ maoŋ ŋa Minnwi puoŋ nɛ chhɔ nshɔnɔ nu kaʼa moŋ yúʼɔ ti nchəɨŋ ndwɛ nɔ yi miŋgwɛ ŋa muuŋ naoŋ vi nɛ.

A lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi pa maoŋ ŋa Minnwi puoŋ nɛ ŋa pugu shɔnɔ nu, njiʼi nthɛ pi nduthɔ yia ŋa pia fāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi nɔ fǔoŋ fɛ nɛ shɔnɔ nu moŋ njùʼɔ pia nɔ haʼaŋ pia ywɛrɛ nu ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ ŋa Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ via nɔ puoŋ pi, ŋkɨ̄gɛi noŋ yia mfuʼu moŋ ŋkɨɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kwàʼa yei ŋa pia lūgu. Ndɔ ti kwàʼa ŋa pi yəɨyəɨ nɛ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ kwàʼa, nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ shiʼa mbɨnɨ mfāʼo pi kwàʼa ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a yəɨ nu nɛ.
Ndɔ p̈ia mfāʼo kwàʼa nthɛ yaoŋ ŋa pia lɔ njiʼi njəɨ nɛ, pia ywɛrɛ yaoŋ ghɔ ni wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ.

Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, Jijwɛ Minnwi ghà ŋgɛ̄rɛ via moŋ pa ndɨɨ ŋa pia lɔ njiʼi ntɨnɨ nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa pia lɔ njiʼi nji pa nnu ŋa pia fāʼo nɔ luoŋ nu Minnwi nɔ ghɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni mbie ŋa pia ji nɛ, ndɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi nduthɔ yi ghà ŋgɛ̄rɛ ndɨ̄gəɨ Minnwi mfɛ via nɔ ghɔ ni luo nu ŋa minthɛ paʼa chrà lɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ ti Minnwi ŋa a ghà njəɨ njùʼɔ yia nɛ, ji yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ njùʼɔ Jijwɛ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa Jijwɛ ghɔ ghà ndɨ̄gəɨ nthɛ ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ pi ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ju, Minnwi, tāʼa nu nɛ.
Ndɔ pia ji ŋa Minnwi ghà mfāʼa moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ghao pi ŋa a pɔ shiʼi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khwā vi nɛ, ŋa pi gɛ̄ vugu ŋa pugu fāʼa ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi kāʼa nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkwo ji fie ndɨɨ ŋa pugu shi mbiŋ vi nɛ, a pɨnɨ ndɔ̄gɔ nthí mi ntɛrɛ vugu nchwīe pugu pɔ fhi Muuŋ vi, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ Muuŋ pɔ fǔoŋ phi shɨna ntou pa ghaŋ piŋ.

Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ nthí mi nchuʼɔ vugu nūʼɔŋ nɛ, a ni mbɨnɨ ŋgɛ̄ vugu, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a gɛ̄ vugu nɛ, a pɨnɨ nchwīe pugu pɔ yi tithi shhɨ yu, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a chwīe pugu pɔ yi tithi shhɨ yu nɛ, a pɨnɨ nchwīe pugu fāʼo ŋkwaŋ ndighaʼo yi.
Ti pia shi nchhu pi ŋa nthɛ ŋguoŋ nnu pei ghao? Ti M̈innwi mbɔ pia pugu kaʼa, a ghaʼa gɔ̌ ŋgaʼa via?
Ju ŋa a shini ndɔ ŋgīʼɛ Muuŋ vi ni mfɛ vi nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nthɛ via ghao nɛ, a shi ŋkie pi nɛiŋ mieŋ ki fɛ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao ni pia ki lɔ ŋgīʼɛ, pugu pa Muuŋ vi ghɔ?
A gɔ̌ ŋa minthɛ a wɛ̄iŋ ŋgwa ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ nɛ ŋa pugu chwīe ntəɨ? Ŋoŋ lɔ mbɔ. A Minnwi mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe vugu pugu pɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shhɨ yu nɛ.

Ti minthɛ a wɛ̄iŋ gɔ̌ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa? Ŋoŋ lɔ mbɔ! Nthɛ ŋa Krishto Jishɔ ni ŋkhu, nɔ pigi nu ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ, pi ni mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ ni ju a pɔ yi maoŋ, a chhɔ ŋgei mbhɔ Minnwi yi jɨ nthɔ ndɨ̄gəɨ Minnwi nɔ ligi yia.

Minthɛ a fɛ̄nɛ gɔ̌ mfɛ̄nɛ via moŋ khwǎ Krishto? Minthɛ a pɔ mmɛ pa ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ ki mmɛ yúʼɔ, ki ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ ŋa ŋgwa fɛ nu ni pia nthɛ piŋ yia, ki njì ŋa a gū, ki pou ndhwí nɔ māʼaŋ nu, ki cho ndua, ki nnu khu nu?
Nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa, “Nthɛ ghɔ, pigi chhɔ ntɔgɔ nu moŋ cho ndua gu ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao, pi līi vigi nɔ minjɨɨ ŋa pi ghə̄ɨ nu lɨʼɨ wrā.”
Ndɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu pei ghao, pia chaa pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa ntɔgɔ mbɔ ju ŋa a khwā via nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹja mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi gu, chɔmbhi, ki ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, ki ghaŋ ghrɨ́ shaʼa lɨʼɨ, ki pa nnu ndwɛ ki pa nnu ŋa a piʼi shhɨ nɛ, ki pa pichəɨ ghrɨ́,
ki ŋguoŋ mbhi tɔthɨ ki mbhi mbɛmbiɛŋ, nthɛ paʼa pugu lɔ mfɛ̄nɛ via moŋ khwǎ Minnwi ŋa pia fāʼo moŋ Krishto Jishɔ Taathɔ via nɛ.
Ǹthɔ nchrā pi nnu shini moŋ pɔ nu ŋa mi taʼa yi pigi Krishto, ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ ndɛʼi pi ŋgiɛŋ, ŋgaŋthɔ a ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi shaʼa nu nɛ fɛ tɨnɨnjuʼɔ vəɨ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ ndɛʼi pi ŋgiɛŋ,
ŋa m̀fāʼo mmɛ yuʼɔ njùʼɔ pugu pa yúʼɔ ki ndugwi yi moŋ njùʼɔ mu,
ŋa ŋ̀kaaŋ njūa ŋa mmu nduthɔ a kaaŋ mfāʼo nchɔ̀nɔ Minnwi, pi fɛ̄nɛ a mbɨŋ Krishto nthɛ lǐŋ paŋ, ŋgwa paŋ moŋ frɛinoŋ.

Pugu pɔ pi ŋgwa Ishrae, pi lɔ̄gɔ vugu ŋa pugu pɔ puoŋ Minnwi, Minnwi ni nōoŋ ndighaʼo yi ni pugu, ŋgwrā pa kɨ̀na pugu pugu, mfɛ gɨ́ yi ni pugu, mfɛ shɨ̀na ni pugu nɔ ghaʼo nu, kàʼa yi thɔ pi mbhɔ pugu.

Pugu pɔ pi pa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ pa mɛmmɛ ŋkhu tǎa moŋ laʼataoŋ Hibru, Krishto moŋ frɛinoŋ llɔ pi moŋ yugu ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ. Krishto yei pɔ pi Minnwi, mbɔ ju ŋa a shaʼa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao nɛ, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pi ghaʼo vi ki ndugwi yi nɛ. A yie ghɔ!
Ndɔ a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ kàʼa Minnwi mieŋ mieŋ ki lɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ. Nthɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pi phi vugu moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Ishrae nɛ ŋa pugu puoŋ Ishrae.
Ndɔ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao mbɔ puoŋ Abrahaŋ nthɛ ŋa pugu mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ yi, nthɛ ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa, “A shi ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Aiji ŋa ɔ shi mfāʼo ŋgwrɛiŋgwa ŋa mi ni ŋkāʼa nɛ.”

Yei nōoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi puoŋ ŋa pi phi vugu pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋgwamishua ghà mbhi nɛ, ŋa pugu puoŋ Minnwi, a pɔ pi puoŋ pɛ ŋa pi phi vugu ntɔgɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa nɛ, ŋa pugu ŋkiɛŋ puoŋ Abrahaŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa yei nnu ŋa kàʼa ghɔ ni nchhu nɛ: “A shi ŋga mbɔ moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ yei ŋgaʼo yini, kaŋ ǹshi mbɨ̄nɨ, Shera phi muuŋ mimbia.”
A lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi yei, Rebeka ŋkaa yu, ndɨɨ ŋa a ni nshūu paa puoŋ pugu Aiji mbɔ tǎa via nɛ,

njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pi shini ndɔ naa mbhi puoŋ pighɔ ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ naa nchwīe sheshe nnu ki a pɔ pi pwa ki phɨ nɛ, nɔ pɔ nu ŋa kàʼa Minnwi moŋ chuʼɔ nu ŋgwa ghə̄ɨ shhɨ, ki lɔ mbɔ nthɛ pi fàʼa ŋa ŋoŋ fāʼa, mbɔ nthɛ pi khwatua Minnwi,
Minnwi ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Muuŋ ghɔ yi shhɨ shi mfāʼa mbɔ muuŋ vugu.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ ŋa, “Mi ni ŋkhwā Jakɔ mbɨ̄na Ɛshɔ.”
Ti pia shi nchhu pi ŋa? Minnwi pɔ pi ŋgaŋ mbe? Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ!
Nthɛ ŋa a ni nchhu ni Mushi ŋa,
“Ǹshi mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ shesheŋoŋ ŋa ŋ̀khwā nɛ,
ndɔ ǹshi nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ni ŋgaŋ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa ŋkhwā nɛ.”
Nɛnnɛ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nthɛ pi nnu ŋa ŋoŋmishua tāʼa nu, ki nnu haʼaŋ a chwīe nɛ, ndɔ a yɨʼə pi mbɨŋ Minnwi ŋa a nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa Minnwi ni nchhu ni Fɛrɔ ŋa, “Mi ni nchərə ghɔ nɔ fùoŋ nthɛ pi yei nnu, ŋa ǹōoŋ ghrɨ́ a mbɨŋ ghɔ pugu pa ŋa pi chīi ligi a ŋkwe ŋguoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ghao.”
Nɛnnɛ a ghà mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a khwā nɛ, mfɨ̄nɨ njùʼɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a khwā nɛ.
Ɔ shi mbie vəɨ kiʼɛ ŋa, “A kaŋ mbɔ nɛnnɛ Minnwi pɨnɨ ŋkrɛ̄i shesheŋoŋ kiʼɛ ŋa? Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa minthɛ a lɨʼɨ nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu ŋa a pɔ nɛ pɔ pi gɔ̌?”
Ndɔ ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌, ŋoŋmishua, nɔ khwɛ̄ nu chrà nchò Minnwi? Yaoŋ ŋa pi puoŋ puoŋ nɛ nthɛ a chhu ni ŋoŋ ŋa a puoŋ vi nɛ ŋa, “Ɔ puoŋ a pi nɛiŋ nthɛ khɔ?”
Ŋgaŋ puoŋ kɨ̌ŋ lɔ mfāʼo ghrɨ́ ŋkuoŋ mbə́ɨŋ nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu taʼa gwí mbə́ɨŋ nchwīe kɨ̌ŋ ŋa pi shi nchwīe nnu nɔ pi wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ŋa mɛmmɛ nnu taoŋ nɛ, nchwīe nnu ni pichəɨ pi lɛllɛ moŋ nda?

Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a lɨʼɨ Minnwi nɔ nōoŋ nu pɨgɨtua yi ndɔ mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchwīe pi ji njɨ yi nɛ, a tīi shii moŋ ntou wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a ni mfāʼo nɔ shāʼo nu pɨgɨtua yi mbɨŋ pugu nɛ, mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni mbīri vugu nɔ shiʼi nu nɛ.
A ni nchwīe yei nɔ chwīe nu pi ji fɨʼɨ fàʼo yi moŋ ndighaʼo yi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a shi nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ yi ni pugu nɛ, mbɔ ŋgwa ŋa a ni ŋkwo pīri nūʼɔŋ fie ndɨɨ ŋa pugu fāʼo ndighaʼo,
ti mfɛ ni pia ŋa a gɛ̄, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋgwa Juu, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ shishini, a chhu moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Hoshia ŋa,
“Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mbɔ ŋgwa paŋ nɛ, ǹshi mɛ̄iŋ vugu ni ŋgwa paŋ,
ju yɛ ŋa ǹshini ndɔ ŋkhwā nɛ, ǹshi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni ŋkhwā a.”
“Moŋ ya lɨʼɨ ghɔ ŋa pi ni nchhu ni pugu ŋa,
‘Pəɨ lɔ mbɔ ŋgwa paŋ nɛ,’
fɔ pi shi mɛ̄iŋ vugu ŋa,
‘puoŋ Minnwi ŋa a yi maoŋ nɛ.’ ”
Ishaya ni mbaʼo ŋgòu nthɛ puoŋ Ishrae ŋa,
“Njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ fɨʼɨ pa puoŋ Ishrae pɔ nɔ shíshhɛ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ nɛ,
a wuʼɔ shɨgɛi mbɨgəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu shi ndūgu.
Nthɛ ŋa Taathɔ shi mfɛ njɔ́ yi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pi shishiʼi pi ki lɔ njīri.”
A wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ Ishaya ni ŋkwo chhu nɛ,
“Taathɔ ŋa a Taathɔ pa shoogɛ po nɛ, kaŋ ni mieŋ ki pɨgəɨ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ ni pigi,
pi kaŋ ni nshiʼi vigi nɔ Shodoŋ pugu Gomora.”
Ti pia shi nchhu pi ŋa kiʼɛ? Ŋa pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mbaʼo nɔ pɔ nu pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ nɛ, ni mfāʼo ndɨndɨ, mbɔ ndɨndɨ haʼaŋ a tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ nɛ,
ndɔ pa ŋgwa Ishrae haʼaŋ pugu ni mbaʼo nu nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ ŋa a shi nchwīe pugu pɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ nɛ, pugu shini ndɔ njiʼi nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ ghɔ.
Ti a chwīe khɔ? A ni nchwīe nthɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mbaʼo nɔ pɔ nu ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ piŋ nɛ, pugu ni mbaʼo pi nɔ haʼaŋ a fāʼo nɔ tɔgɔ nu pi moŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́. Pugu kɔ̄rɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋgùʼɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ,
wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ,
“Līi njəɨ, ǹthɔ nūʼɔŋ muuŋ ŋgùʼɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ Shayaoŋ,
mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋgùʼɔ ŋa a shi nchwīe ŋgwa kɔ̄rɔ ŋgū,
ti shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ vi nɛ,
mbaʼa pi māʼaŋ lrithɔ thɔ yu.”
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, khwā njùʼɔ a pugu luoŋ a ni Minnwi nthɛ vugu pɔ ŋa minthɛ pugu lūgu.
Nthɛ ŋa mi miŋkwentie yugu ŋa pugu fāʼo ŋkiɛŋ ntou niʼiŋ njùʼɔ mbɨŋ Minnwi, ndɔ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ yugu ghɔ pou ya ji nu nnu.

Pugu ni ŋga mieŋ ki lɔ nji ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ghà nchwīe ŋgwa pɔ yi ndɨndɨ shhɨ yu nɛ, mbaʼo nu nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu yugu shɛndaoŋ, nnɛ paʼa ndɔ mfɛ noŋ yugu ni yi Minnwi shɛndaoŋ nɔ chwīe nu ŋgwa pɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shhɨ yu.
Nthɛ ŋa Krishto kwo chwīe thɔ nnu haʼaŋ pi ni mfɛ gɨ́ nɔ ghɔ nɛ, nnɛ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ Krishto nɛ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi.
Mushi ni nāʼaŋ ŋkuoŋ pɔ nu ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ ŋa: Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe ŋguoŋ nnu haʼaŋ gɨ́ chhu nɛ shi mfāʼo chɔmbhi.
Ndɔ nnu ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nthɛ pɔ nu ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ nɛ pɔ ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ mfāʼo nɔ pie nu noŋ yɔ ŋa, ‘A shi ŋkuʼɔ gɔ̌ tɔthɨ po, nɔ shwiʼi nu ni Krishto shhɛ?’
ki ŋa, ‘A shi nshwiʼi gɔ̌ moŋ shiŋ ki ndugwi yi nɔ kuʼɔ nu ni Krishto, llɔ moŋ gu?’ ”
Ndɔ a chhu pi ŋa? “Chrà ghɔ pɔ yəɨ ghɔ, a pɔ nchò ghɔ ndɔ mbɔ moŋ njùʼɔ ghɔ,” mbɔ chrà piŋ ŋa pigi chīi nu nɛ
nthɛ ŋa, ɔ̈ nchhu ni nchò yɔ ŋa Jishɔ Taathɔ, mbiŋ moŋ njùʼɔ ghɔ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkuʼɔ ni ju llɔ moŋ gu, kaŋ ɔ shi ndūgu.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ghà mbiŋ pi ni njùʼɔ yi pi chwīe vi a pɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi, a tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhu nu ni nchò, ŋoŋ lūgu.
Nthɛ ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ vi nɛ, mbaʼa pi lɛ ma māʼaŋ lrithɔ thɔ yu.”
Nthɛ ŋa kwrí shi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ shɨna pa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ moŋ shɛndaoŋ kie nu ndūgu, nthɛ ŋa Taathɔ vugu ghao taʼa yi, ŋa a ghà mfɛ ki lɔ ŋgīʼɛ ni ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu gɛ̄ vi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa, “Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a gɛ̄ ligi Taathɔ nɛ shi ndūgu.”
Ti minthɛ pugu kie pi nɛiŋ ŋgɛ̄ vi ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ vi nɛ? Pugu shi mbiŋ vi pi nɛiŋ ŋa pugu lɔ naa njaʼo ŋoŋ ŋa a yie nɛ? Minthɛ pugu kie pi nɛiŋ njaʼo ki ŋoŋ lɔ nchīi ni pugu?
Minthɛ pugu chīi pi nɛiŋ ki ŋoŋ lɔ ntaoŋ vugu? Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ, “Thɔ nu ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu tuo ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ nɛ pwa ti ŋgaʼa.”
Ndɔ a lɔ mbiŋ ŋguoŋ yugu ghao mbiŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghɔ nthɛ ŋa Ishaya chhu ŋa, “Taathɔ, a piŋ gɔ̌ mbiŋ nnu haʼaŋ a yaʼo mbhɔ pigi nɛ?”
Nnɛ piŋ ghà nthɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yaʼo nu, yaʼo nu tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chīi nu chrà Krishto.
Ndɔ m̀bie ŋa, pugu lɔ njiʼi njaʼo ŋkɨ̀nɨ ghɔ? Shishini, pugu yaʼo, nthɛ ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa,
“Ŋggì yugu nyīeŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao, chrà yugu chəɨŋ moŋ ndugwi mbhi.”
Ndɔ, m̀bie ŋa, thɔ ŋgwa Ishrae shini ndɔ nshie? Fǔoŋ yi, Mushi khwɛ̄ ŋa,
“Ǹshi nchwīe pəɨ ghɨ̄ʼə ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ mbɔ ŋgwa taoŋ nɛ,
nchwīe túa yəɨ pɨgɨ ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu pa na nɛ.”
Nnɛ Ishaya ya mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɔ chhu nu ŋa,
“A ka yəɨ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ ntāʼa a nɛ njəɨ a;
ǹōoŋ noŋ a ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mbie a nɛ.”
Ndɔ ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ŋgwa Ishrae, a chhu ŋa,
“Ŋ̀aʼaŋ mbhɔ ma ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ghao nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ pi pa ntɨnɨthɔ ndɔ ndāa a nɛ.”
M̀bie kiʼɛ ŋa, Minnwi lāa ŋgwa pi? Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ mbɔ nɛnnɛ! Nthɛ ŋa mmu nduthɔ a ŋoŋ Ishrae, ndaaŋoŋ Abrahaŋ, mbɔ ŋgia ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Bɛnjamɛiŋ.
Minnwi lɔ njiʼi ndāa ŋgwa pi ŋa a ni nchuʼɔ nɛ. Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji nnu haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nthɛ Elaija nɛ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni ndɨ̄gəɨ Minnwi ŋa a fɛ njɔ́ ni Ishrae nɛ?
“Taathɔ, pugu jwi pa njəɨlɨʼɨ pɔ, nshāʼa pa lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ yɔ, a wuʼɔ mbiʼi mmu təʼɨ a, pugu tāʼa nu njwi a ŋkaa mu.”
Ndɔ Minnwi ni ŋkhwɛ̄ ghɔ pi ŋa? “Ǹūʼɔŋ khwachəɨ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu lɔ njiʼi ŋgaʼo ki ntuʼu noŋ yugu shhɨ nnwi ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Baa nɛ nɔ nyaŋ.”
A wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a pɔ ndwɛ nɛ, mbɨgəɨ ŋgwa pɔ ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ vugu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ yi.
Ndɔ ti nɔ haʼaŋ a tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi nɛ, a lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ nthɛ pi pa fàʼa haʼaŋ pi fāʼa, ä mbɔ nɛnnɛ, paʼa pwapuŋ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi pwapuŋ.
Yie pɔ pi ŋa kiʼɛ? Ŋgwa Ishrae shini ndɔ mfāʼo yaoŋ haʼaŋ pugu ki tāʼa nu nɛ, ndɔ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pi chuʼɔ vugu nɛ fāʼo, ndɔ pi fɨ̄nɨ njùʼɔ pɨgəɨ ŋgwa.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ,
“Minnwi fɛ jijwɛ chōo nu ni pugu,
ni ligi haʼaŋ mbaʼa a yiʼi njəɨ lɨʼɨ pugu pa tə́nə ŋa mbaʼa a yaʼo lɨʼɨ nɛ ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ thɔ pa shiʼa.”
Ndɔ Devi chhu ŋa,
“Naʼaŋ pa lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pugu ghà njɨ maoŋ nɛ gū shìri pugu pa shíʼi,
mbɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ pugu pa yaoŋ ŋa a shi nthɔ ni njɔ́ ŋa a pie ŋa pugu fāʼo nɛ.
Naʼaŋ ligi yugu chri nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pugu yəɨ lɨʼɨ,
naʼaŋ pa lrì pugu chwīe ŋkǔnu yugu ŋaoŋ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao.”

Nɛnnɛ m̀bie ŋa, puoŋ Ishrae ni ŋkɔ̄rɔ nnɛ, pi nɔ gū nu ŋkɨna shhɛ? Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ! Ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ phɨ yugu lūgu nu thɔ ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, nnɛ nɔ chwīe nu pa ŋgwa Ishrae fāʼo kighɨʼə.

Ä mbɔ ŋa phɨ pa ŋgwa Juu thɔ pi ni fàʼo ni ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ä mbɔ ŋa pou yugu moŋ jijwɛ pɔ pi fàʼo ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, kaŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi shi mfāʼo pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ kiʼɛ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu lɨnaoŋ fɨʼɨ pa ŋgwa Juu haʼaŋ Minnwi chuʼɔ ŋa pugu piŋ nɛ.
Ndwɛ ǹchrā pi ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nɛ. Nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi chuʼɔ a nɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nɛ, ŋ̀gaʼo fàʼa a ghɔ,
nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ǹchwīe pa ŋgwa laʼa pigi, mbɔ pa ŋgwa Juu, fāʼo kighɨʼə nnɛ ŋa moŋ yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ shɛndaoŋ minthɛ ŋ̀kwe pichəɨ shɨna pugu.

Nthɛ ŋa ä mbɔ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni ndāa vugu nɛ, Ju, Minnwi, chīni ŋggì pugu pa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi, a shi mbɔ pi nɛiŋ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi shi mbiŋ vugu nɛ? A shi mbɔ chɔmbhi ni pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mbɔ yi khu moŋ Jijwɛ nɛ.
Fǔoŋ thɔ brɛi ŋa pi fɛ nɔ yaoŋ fɛ́ nɛ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ, a nōoŋ ŋa ŋguoŋ brɛi ghɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ, ndɔ ti ŋǐeŋ thɨ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ, kaŋ pa mbhɔthɨ ghɔ pi taoŋtaoŋ.

Ndɔ pichəɨ pa mbhɔthɨ pei llɔ ŋkuoŋ thɨ Abrahaŋ, pi pəʼɨ vugu mfuʼu, mbɔ pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Ishrae. Nchīni vəɨ ŋa pəɨ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, mbɔ pa mbhɔthɨ olive ŋa a ghà ŋkuʼɔ kuʼɔ gha moŋ ŋkǔnu nɛ. Nnɛ ndwɛ, pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ chhɔ mfāʼo mbɔrɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa Abrahaŋ nɔ ghɔ nɛ, nthɔ mfāʼo njru llɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋǐeŋ ŋkiɛŋ thɨ olive Minnwi.
Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, kiʼi nchɨ̄ʼə pa ŋgwa pɛ haʼaŋ pi pəʼɨ vugu nɔ pa mbhɔthɨ mfuʼu nɛ. A nthɛ ɔ kie pi nɛiŋ nōoŋ noŋ yɔ? Ɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ pi mbhɔthɨ, ɔ lɔ njiʼi ntuo ŋǐeŋ thɨ, a tuo ŋǐeŋ thɨ ntuo ghɔ.
Nnɛ kaŋ ɔ shi nchhu ŋa, “Pi ni mbəʼɨ pichəɨ pa mbhɔthɨ mfuʼu nnɛ ŋa pi chīni a ŋkuoŋ thɨ ghɔ.”
Yie ghɔ nnu shini. Pi ni njaʼa vugu mfuʼu nthɛ ki piŋ yugu, ndɔ ɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ yɔ. Nnɛ kiʼi māʼaŋ ntintaʼo, fāʼo pɔ́gɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa ä mbɔ ŋa Minnwi shini ndɔ mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ pa Juu haʼaŋ pugu pɔ nɔ mbhɔthɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ mbɨŋ thɨ llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ, kaŋ mbaʼa a yiʼi mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ ghɔ.

Yəɨ kiʼɛ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ŋgaŋ kwoshɨnɨ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋoŋ tɨtɨnɨ nɛ njəɨ. A ŋoŋ tɨtɨnɨ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu gū moŋ phɨ nɛ, ndɔ nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ vɛ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ moŋ kwoshɨnɨ yi, kiɛŋ nɛnnɛ kaŋ pi shi njaʼa ghɔ mfuʼu ŋkaa ghɔ.
Ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi pugu, pugu mieŋ ki ghə̄ɨ shhɨ moŋ ki piŋ yugu, Minnwi pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchīni vugu, nthɛ ŋa Minnwi fāʼo njɨ nɔ pɨnɨ nu nchīni vugu ŋkamuʼɔŋ.

Nthɛ ŋa ä mbɔ ŋa pi ni njaʼa ghɔ llɔ ŋkuoŋ thɨ olive haʼaŋ a ni ŋkuʼɔ kuʼɔ gha moŋ ŋkǔnu nɛ, nchīni ghɔ ŋkuoŋ thɨ olive haʼaŋ pi pi phi nɛ, mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa a shiʼa njiʼi mbɔ pi nnɛ nɛ, ti ɔ pīʼi ŋa pi shi mbɨnɨ nchīni pa ŋgwa Juu mbɔ ya mbhɔthɨ llɔ ŋkuoŋ thɨ olive phi ghɔ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ?

Ǹtāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ ji nnu lə̄ɨŋ yei ŋa Minnwi nōoŋ nɛ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ shi mbīʼi nu ni noŋ pəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi pa ghaŋ shiethɔ. Pi ni fɨ̄nɨ njùʼɔ pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Ishrae nɔ kuo ndɨɨ, ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ ŋa fɨʼɨ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ haʼaŋ a pie ŋa pugu thɔ njəɨ Minnwi kwo thɔ njəɨ Minnwi nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Ishrae shi mfāʼo lūgu nu, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ ŋa,
“Ŋgaŋ kwe ŋgwa shi ndhɔ Shayaoŋ,
a shi mfuʼu ŋguoŋ pa pɨphɨ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Jakɔ.
Yei shi mbɔ kɨ̀na a ŋa ǹshi ŋgwrā pigi pugu ndɨɨ ŋa ǹshɨ̄gao phɨ yugu nɛ.”
Llɔ nɔ ŋgei pwa pishaʼakhɔ, pa ŋgwa Juu pa mbɨ̄na Minnwi nthɛ vəɨ, mbɔ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ. Llɔ nɔ ŋgei ŋgwa ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ, pugu pa taannu Minnwi nthɛ pi pa ŋkhu tǎa pugu.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi shiʼa mfɛ fɛ́ ni ŋoŋ, ŋgɛ̄ vi mbɨnɨ ŋkwri njùʼɔ yi.
Nthɛ ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ni mbɔ ghaŋ tɨnɨthɔ ni Minnwi yichəɨ ndɨɨ nɛ, ndɔ ndwɛ pi nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ni pəɨ nthɛ tɨnɨthɔ yugu,
nɛnnɛ ndwɛ, pugu ŋkaa pugu ni mfāʼo tɨnɨthɔ nnɛ ŋa ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ŋa pi nōoŋ ni pəɨ nɛ, minthɛ pi nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ni pugu ndwɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi chaʼa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao mfɛ mbhɔ tɨnɨthɔ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ a nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao.
Yo, fɨʼɨ nthɨŋkwo fàʼo pugu shiethɔ ni lɨna Minnwi ghaʼo pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ! A nthɛ a ji gɔ̌ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ghà ndīi nnu nɛ! A nthɛ a ji gɔ̌ pa shɛndaoŋ pi?
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ,
“A kwo ji gɔ̌ nji nnu ŋa Taathɔ pīʼi nu nɛ,
ki a naa mfɛ gɔ̌ mfɛ ntɨ́gɨ ghɔ?”
“Ki a kwo fɛ gɔ̌ fɛ yaoŋ ghɔ nnɛ ŋa
minthɛ a luʼu ghɔ?”
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao llɔ pi mbhɔ yu ndɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu, ndɔ mbɔ pi nɔ fɛ nu ndighaʼo ghɔ. Ndighaʼo pɔ ghɔ ki ndugwi yi! A yie.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ ma pa ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ nthɛ pi fɨʼɨ mmɛ kwoshɨnɨ ŋa Minnwi nōoŋ ni pia nɛ, ŋa p̂əɨ chaʼa noŋ pəɨ mfɛ ni Minnwi nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ maoŋ ŋa a yi taoŋtaoŋ, mbɔ yɛ ŋa a pwa ghɔ nɛ. A yie nja mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ shɛndaoŋ nɔ ghaʼo nu vi.

Kiʼi pəɨ chwīe pa nnu pi nɔ haʼaŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi chwīe nu nɛ. Ndɔ a pie ŋa Minnwi kara vəɨ llɔ moŋ ghɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kwri nu kwāʼa nu məɨ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ ywɛʼi ndɔ nji yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ, mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa a yi shiʼi, pi piŋ ndɔ a pɔ ki ntəɨ nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi ŋa a nōoŋ vəɨ nɛ, ǹchhu ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ ŋa: Kiʼi pəɨ līi noŋ yəɨ ŋa pəɨ ghaʼo nchaa yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ ya mbɔ yie nɛ. P̂əɨ līi noŋ yəɨ pi ni juju, shesheŋoŋ līi pi ni fɨʼɨ piŋ ŋa Minnwi fɛ ghɔ nɛ.
Noŋ taʼa ŋoŋ fāʼo ntou pa yòu pi, ndɔ paʼa pa ghrà noŋ pi pighɔ lɔ mfāʼo pi taʼa ŋkwaŋ fàʼa.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pia ntou yi nɛ, pia pɔ pi taʼa noŋ moŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pia pa Krishto, shesheŋoŋ via pɔ pi mbhɔ vichəɨ.

Nnɛ pia fāʼo pa fɛ́ ŋa a kwri wuʼɔ nɔ fɨʼɨ pwapuŋ ŋa Minnwi nōoŋ ni pia nɛ. P̂ia fāʼa pa fàʼa ni fɛ́ pighɔ. Fɛ́ ghɔ mbɔ chīi nu nnu ŋa Minnwi chhu nɛ, p̂ia wuʼɔ mfāʼa nɔ ghɔ pi ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ piŋ yia nōoŋ nɛ.
Ä mbɔ nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu pa fàʼa moŋ chɔshi, p̂ia fāʼa wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ. Ä mbɔ pi yɛʼi nu, p̂ia yɛʼi wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ.

Ä mbɔ pi māʼaŋ nu ghrɨ́ ŋgwa, p̂ia māʼaŋ wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ. Ŋoŋ ŋa a fɛ pi yaoŋ nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu ŋgwa nduoŋ nɛ, â fɛ ki lɔ ŋgīʼɛ. Ŋoŋ ŋa a pɔ pi nthishɨ nɛ, â chwīe fàʼa yi ni niʼiŋ njùʼɔ. Ŋoŋ ŋa a nōoŋ pi kwoshɨnɨ nɛ, â nōoŋ pi ni pwanjuʼɔ.
A pie ŋa khwǎ pɔ pi yi taʼanjuʼɔ. Pɨ̄na yaoŋ ŋa a phɨ nɛ ŋkiɛŋ yie, nthi a tɨnɨ ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a pwa nɛ.
P̂əɨ khwā noŋ pəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ a pie ŋa pa lǐŋ khwā noŋ nɛ. Ŋ̂oŋ fāʼo niʼiŋ njùʼɔ moŋ ghaʼo nu noŋ vichəɨ.
Kiʼi ndɨ̄ʼə, ka fāʼa pi shishiʼi, fāʼo jijwɛ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ, fāʼa mbhɔ Taathɔ ni taʼanjuʼɔ.
Fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ moŋ kwàʼa, ntīi shii moŋ ŋgəʼɨ, luoŋ Minnwi ki jwɛ.
Fɛ pa yaoŋ nɔ pɨʼɨ nu chà ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ. Nōoŋ pwapuŋ ni pa ghɨ̀nɨ haʼaŋ pugu kra ghɔ nɛ.
Luoŋ mbɔrɔ mfɛ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fɛ ŋgəʼɨ vɛ nɛ, kiʼi nchɔ̄nɔ vugu, luoŋ pi mbɔrɔ mfɛ ni pugu.
Fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ pəɨ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nɛ, ŋkə̄ɨ pəɨ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu kə̄ɨ nu nɛ.
P̂əɨ chhɔ shiʼi ni taʼaŋggi shɨna pəɨ. Kiʼi māʼaŋ ntintaʼo, p̂əɨ chɨ kwò pəɨ pa ŋgwa ŋa yugu lɔ mbɔ nɛ. Kiʼi pəɨ pīʼi ni pa noŋ pəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi pa ghaŋ shiethɔ.
Kiʼi pəɨ luʼu phɨ ni phɨ, ndɔ pəɨ kāa pi nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa a yi chɨɨchɨɨ ligi ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nɛ.
Ä njiʼɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ ŋguoŋ nnu mbɔ pi mbhɔ ghɔ, p̂əɨ chhɔ moŋ taʼaŋggi pəɨ pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao.
Kiʼi pəɨ luʼu phɨ haʼaŋ pi chwīe mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ, ma ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, ndɔ ka mieŋ pi shɨ̀na ni pɨgɨtua Minnwi, nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa,
“Taathɔ chhu ŋa, ‘M̀fāʼo njɨ nɔ fɛ nu njɔ́, ǹshi nthu.’ ”
Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ka chhu pi ŋa,
“Njì njia mbɨ̌na yɔ, ɔ fɛ maoŋ jɨ ghɔ,
ti njùʼɔ yi njaoŋ, ɔ fɛ yaoŋ nnu ghɔ,
moŋ chwīe nu nɛnnɛ, ɔ shi māʼaŋ lrithɔ thɔ yu.”
Kiʼi phɨ ghaʼa ghɔ ndɔ ka ghaʼa phɨ ghaʼa ni shiʼi.
Ŝhesheŋoŋ yaʼo nchò pa thishɨ haʼaŋ pugu shaʼa nu nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ nthishɨ lɔ mbɔ ki lɔ ndhɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi, pɛ haʼaŋ pugu pɔ nɛ nūʼɔŋ Minnwi nūʼɔŋ vugu.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a tɨnɨthɔ ni pa thishɨ nɛ, chhɔ ntɨnɨthɔ pi ni yaoŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi nūʼɔŋ nɛ, ndɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu tɨnɨthɔ nɛ shi mfāʼo njɔ́ mbɨŋ pugu.

Nthɛ ŋa pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu fāʼo mbha nnu shiʼi nɛ shi lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɔ pɔgɔ nu pa ghaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa, ndɔ ghaŋ chwīe nnu pɨphɨ fāʼo nɔ pɔgɔ nu. Ɔ tāʼa nu ki lɔ mbɔgɔ pa ŋgwa pɛ haʼaŋ pugu pa thishɨ nɛ? Ɔ chwīe nɛ nnu haʼaŋ a yi shiʼi nɛ, kaŋ pugu shi mbiŋ ghɔ.

Nthɛ ŋa a ŋgaŋ fàʼa Minnwi nthɛ pɔ nu mɔ shiʼi. Ndɔ ɔ nchwīe nnu haʼaŋ a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɛ, ɔ fāʼo pɔgɔ gu nthɛ vugu, nthɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo njɨ nɔ fɛ nu njɔ́. Nthɛ ŋa a ŋgaŋ fàʼa Minnwi nɔ fɛ nu njɔ́ Minnwi ni pa ŋgwa pɛ haʼaŋ pugu chwīe phɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, â yīʼi ŋa ŋoŋ yaʼo nchò pa thishɨ pighɔ, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ nthɛ pi pɔgɔ njɔ́ Minnwi, mbɨnɨ nthɛ pi yaoŋ ŋa ŋgaŋthɔ yi chhu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a pɔ nthɛ pi yie ŋa pəɨ ghà māʼaŋ taashi, nthɛ ŋa pa thishɨ fāʼa pi mbhɔ Minnwi ndɨɨ ŋa pugu chwīe fàʼa yugu nɛ.

P̂əɨ pe ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa yaoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ pe ni pugu nɛ, p̂əɨ pe taashi ni ŋgaŋ kwe taashi, ä mbɔ taashi ŋkuoŋ pa yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɛ, p̂əɨ pe ni ghaŋ kwe pi, ä mbɔ pi pɔgɔ nu, p̂əɨ pɔgɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ pɔgɔ vi nɛ, ä mbɔ pi ghaʼo nu, p̂əɨ ghaʼo ŋoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ ghaʼo nɛ.
Kiʼi ŋkrù ŋoŋ pɔ puŋ pəɨ, taʼa ŋkrù ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɛ pɔ ŋa pəɨ khwā noŋ pəɨ. Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a khwā pichəɨ ŋgwa nɛ nūʼɔŋ gɨ́.
