Nthɛ ŋa pa kɨ̀na ŋa a chhu ŋa, “Kiʼi ŋgaŋ láŋ kwo shúoŋ, kiʼi njwi ŋoŋ, kiʼi njōo, kiʼi nshɔ̄rɔ yaoŋ ŋoŋ nduoŋ nɛ,” pugu pa pichəɨ gɨ́ nduoŋ nɛ chīri mbɔ moŋ yei taʼa chrà, “Khwā taakuo yɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā noŋ nɛ.”
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo khwǎ nɛ shiʼa nchwīe phɨ mbɨŋ taakuo yi, nthɛ yie ghɔ, khwā nu ŋgwa pɔ pi nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́.
Nɔ pigi nu, pəɨ ji ŋa ndɨɨ kwo ghə̄ɨ. Ndɨɨ thɔ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɔ wūʼu nu lɔ̄gɔ. Nthɛ ŋa lūgu nu yia kwo para ndwɛ nchaa haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni mfǔoŋ mbiŋ nɛ.
Tuʼu kwo ya ŋgə̄ɨ, mbhi kwo laŋ nu. Nɛnnɛ, p̂ia mīʼaŋ ŋguoŋ mbha fàʼa mooŋ njiŋ, māʼaŋ maoŋ nchhɔ̀ líʼɛ.

A pie ŋa p̂ia chhɔ chɔmbhi yia moŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a kāʼo nɛ nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu chhɔ pi moŋ líʼɛ. Ki lɔ mbɔ pi moŋ pa jɨ ki tou pugu pa nnu nu mbaa, ki lɔ mbɔ pi moŋ kwo nu shúoŋ pugu pa mbha nnu tɔtrɔ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi moŋ fɛ̀ʼi pugu kighɨʼə.
Ndɔ p̂əɨ gwɛ Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ, nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ ghà ŋgwɛ ndhwí nɛ, ki lɔ mfɛ sheshe shɨ̀na ni frɛinoŋ yəɨ nɔ chwīe nu nnu yɛ ŋa a khwā nɛ.
P̂əɨ piŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ntɨnɨ moŋ piŋ shiʼi nɛ, ndɔ ki lɔ njiʼi nthɔ mfāʼo pi mindoundou pəɨ pugu nthɛ yugu nnu ŋa pugu ji nɛ.
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ fāʼo piŋ ŋa minthɛ a jɨ sheshe yaoŋ, ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ntɨnɨ moŋ piŋ nɛ kru pi wuʼɔ pa mbɨ̀ga.
Kiʼi ŋoŋ ŋa a jɨ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ nɛ chɨ̄ʼə ŋoŋ ŋa a jī pichəɨ pa yaoŋ nɛ, ndɔ kiʼi ŋoŋ ŋa a jī nɛ līi ŋoŋ ŋa a jɨ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ nɛ nɔ ŋgushaʼa, nthɛ ŋa Minnwi piŋ vi.
Ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌ nɔ tuo nu muuŋ fàʼa ŋoŋ nduoŋ nɔ ŋgushaʼa? A fāʼo taathɔ vi njɨ nɔ chhu nu ŋa a thi a tɨnɨ ki ŋa a shi ŋgū, ndɔ a shi nthi a tɨnɨ nthɛ ŋa Taathɔ fāʼo njɨ nɔ chwīe nu a tithi.
Yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ̄gɔ yichəɨ llɛ́ ŋa a ghaʼo nchaa yichəɨ. Yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ̄gɔ ji ŋa ŋguoŋ llɛ́ pɔ ndɨndɨ. Shesheŋoŋ fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa ji nnu ŋa a pīʼi nɛ kāʼo.

Ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ yichəɨ llɛ́ nɔ mmɛ yi nɛ chwīe nnɛ pi nɔ ghaʼo nu Taathɔ, ŋoŋ ŋa a jɨ maoŋ nɛ jɨ pi nɔ ghaʼo nu Taathɔ, nthɛ ŋa a fɛ tōo nu ni Minnwi. Ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njɨ pichəɨ pa maoŋ nɛ, mieŋ ki jɨ pi nɔ ghaʼo nu Taathɔ, mfɛ tōo nu ni Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ via shiʼa nchhɔ mbhi nthɛ pi noŋ yi ndɔ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ via lɔ ŋkhu nthɛ pi noŋ yi.
Nthɛ ŋa p̈ia nchhɔ mbhi kaŋ pia chhɔ nthɛ pi Taathɔ, ti p̈ia ŋkhu kaŋ pia khu nthɛ pi Taathɔ. Nnɛ kiʼɛ, ki pia chhɔ pi mbhi ki pia kukhu, pia pɔ pi yi Taathɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa a nnu ŋa Krishto ni ŋkhu mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo chɔmbhi nthɛ yie nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ a pɔ Taathɔ pa ŋgwa khu pugu pa ŋgwa maoŋ.
Ɔ wɛ̄iŋ ndǐŋ ghɔ nɔ ŋgushaʼa nthɛ khɔ? Ki gɔ̀, a chwīe khɔ ɔ chɨ̄ʼə ndǐŋ ghɔ? Ŋguoŋ yia ghao lɛ nthi sháʼa shhɨ faaŋ sháʼa Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa,
“Taathɔ chhu ŋa, ‘Shishini, nɔ haʼaŋ ǹchhɔ mbhi nɛ, ŋguoŋ kwɛ́rɛ shi ŋkwi shhɨ mu,
ŋguoŋ ŋgwa fɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi shhɛnte.’ ”
Nnɛ kiʼɛ, shesheŋoŋ via ma mfɛ khwɛ̀ ni Minnwi nɔ pa nnu pɛ ŋa a chwīe nɛ.
Nthɛ yie, kiʼi ŋoŋ līi ndǐŋ vi nɔ ŋgushaʼa. P̂əɨ ka lɔ̄gɔ nthí məɨ pi ŋa mbaʼa pəɨ nuʼuŋ nūʼɔŋ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ki ntàra nɔ shɛndaoŋ ndǐŋ via.
Ntɔgɔ pi nɔ pɔ nu taʼa yi pigi Taathɔ mbɔ Jishɔ, ǹji ndɔ mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa yichəɨ yaoŋ lɔ mbɔ yi fuo ni nduthɔ yi, ndɔ a yi fuo ni ŋoŋ ŋa a pīʼi ŋa a yi fuo nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa n̈jùʼɔ ndǐŋ ghɔ mbɨgɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ ŋa ɔ jɨ nu nɛ, kaŋ ɔ lɔ nuʼuŋ nchhɔ chɔmbhi yɔ pi moŋ khwǎ. Kiʼi mbɨrɨ ŋoŋ ŋa Krishto khu nthɛ vi nɛ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ maoŋ ŋa ɔ jɨ nu nɛ.
Nnɛ kiʼi pəɨ chwīe yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ pi yaoŋ shiʼi ni pəɨ nɛ, pi chrā chrà pɨphɨ nthɛ yie.
Nthɛ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi nnu jɨ nu maoŋ pugu pa nnu nu yaoŋ. Ndɔ a pɔ pi nnu chhɔ nu chɔmbhi ndɨndɨ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ ni pwanjuʼɔ moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Minnwi ghà mfāʼo pwatua, ŋgwamishua pɨnɨ mbiŋ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼa mbhɔ Krishto nɛnnɛ nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, p̂ia kāa nɔ tei nu pi njiŋ yaoŋ ŋa a thɔ ni taʼaŋggi pugu pa ghɛ̄rɛ nu pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ nɔ kuʼɔ nu.
Kiʼi njiʼi mbɨrɨ fàʼa Minnwi nthɛ maoŋ jɨ. Shishini, ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao yi taoŋtaoŋ ndɔ a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo ni shesheŋoŋ nɔ chwīe nu yichəɨ ŋoŋ kɔ̄rɔ nthɛ yaoŋ ŋa a jɨ nu nɛ.
A pwa mieŋ nu ki lɔ ŋkru frɛ̀i, ki nnu làʼo, ki nchwīe sheshe nnu ŋa a shi nchwīe ndǐŋ ghɔ gū nɛ.
Nūʼɔŋ jɔ nthí ŋa ɔ lɔ̄gɔ moŋ nnu pei nɛ shɨna pəɨ Minnwi. Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbīʼi ŋa a gū nthɛ yaoŋ ŋa a piŋ ŋa a kāʼo nɛ.
Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo khuthɔ nɛ kwo pɔ ŋgushaʼa nɔ haʼaŋ a njɨ, nthɛ ŋa jɨ nu mi lɔ njiʼi ndhɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ yi. Nthɛ ŋa sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ndhɔ pi moŋ piŋ nɛ, pɔ pi phɨ.
P̂ia ŋa pia tɨnɨ moŋ piŋ nɛ fāʼo nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ nja ntɨnɨ nɛ pugu tiɛŋ lrì yugu ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi ŋa a pwa yia túa.
Ŝhesheŋoŋ via chwīe pi ŋa túa taakuo yi pwa, nthɛ pɔ nu mi shiʼi, ŋkugwi vi a kuʼɔ moŋ piŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa Krishto shini ndɔ ŋguʼɔ nchwīe pi ŋa túa yi pwa, ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ, “Pa wɛ́ʼi ŋa pi wɛʼi vəɨ nɔ nɛ shwiʼi mbɨŋ mu.”
Nthɛ ŋa sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pi ni nāʼaŋ llɛshhɨ nɛ, pi ni nāʼaŋ pi nɔ tɨgɨ nu via, nnɛ ŋa ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ tiishii pugu pa māʼaŋ njùʼɔ llɔ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi, minthɛ pia fāʼo kwàʼa.
Ǹduoŋ ŋa Minnwi, ŋa tiishii pugu pa māʼaŋ njùʼɔ llɔ mbhɔ yu nɛ, fɛ njɨ ni pəɨ nɔ chhɔ nu moŋ taʼaŋggi, nnɛ nchwīe ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Krishto Jishɔ ni nchwīe nɛ,
ŋa ŋguoŋ yəɨ ghao chīni ni taʼaŋggi mfɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi ndɔ mbɔ Tǎa Taathɔ via Jishɔ Krishto.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ piŋ pa lǐŋ pəɨ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Krishto piŋ vəɨ nɛ. P̂əɨ chwīe nnɛ nɔ fɛ nu ndighaʼo ni Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa Krishto ni ŋgū muuŋ fàʼa nthɛ pa ŋgwa Juu nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa Minnwi ŋgaŋ nnu shini, nɔ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ a ni ŋkāʼa ni pa ŋkhu tǎa,
pugu pa nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ fɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi nthɛ kwoshɨnɨ yi. Nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ,
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshi ŋgaʼo ghɔ shɨna pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ,
ǹshi njrāo ŋkhǐ nɔ ghaʼo nu ligi yɔ.”
Ndɔ a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchhu ŋkamuʼɔŋ ŋa,
“Pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, p̂əɨ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ, pəɨ pa ŋgwa Minnwi.”
Mbɨnɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Ŋguoŋ yəɨ haʼaŋ pəɨ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nɛ, ghaʼo Taathɔ,
ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ghao ghaʼo vi.”
Ndɔ Ishaya pɨ̄nɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Ndǎa yaoŋ Jeshe shi nthɔ,
a shi njrɛi shhɛ nɔ shaʼa nu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ,
pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ fāʼo kwàʼa mbɨŋ yu.”
Minnwi ŋa a ghà mfɛ kwàʼa nɛ lɨnaoŋ vəɨ ni ŋguoŋ pwanjuʼɔ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ piŋ vi nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ kwàʼa yəɨ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ ŋkuʼɔ nu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Mmu nduthɔ a, fāʼo ŋkiɛŋ ntou tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nthɛ vəɨ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ŋa pəɨ ni nduthɔ yəɨ lɨnaoŋ ni shiʼi pugu pa ŋguoŋ lɨna ti minthɛ pəɨ tɨgɨ noŋ pəɨ.
Ndɔ ǹāʼaŋ pichəɨ pa nnu ki lɔ mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu nɛnnɛ nɔ kwiŋ nu vəɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ nthɛ pwapuŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi fɛ vəɨ

nɔ pɔ nu ŋgaŋ fàʼa Krishto Jishɔ ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ. M̀fāʼa nu nɔ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi moŋ chīi nu pwa pishaʼakhɔ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ pɔ yaoŋ fɛ haʼaŋ Minnwi piŋ nɛ, haʼaŋ pi tɛrɛ nūʼɔŋ ni Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Moŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pigi Krishto Jishɔ kiʼɛ, minthɛ ǹtɛnɛ ni fàʼa a nthɛ Minnwi.

Nthɛ ŋa m̀baʼa njiʼi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nɔ chrā nu ŋkuoŋ sheshe nnu ŋkiɛŋ nnu haʼaŋ Krishto fāʼa ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ mu nɔ chwīe nu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ yaʼo nchò Minnwi. Pugu fāʼo yaʼo nchò yei ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nnu ŋa ǹchrā ndɔ nchwīe nɛ,
pugu pa njɨ lì, ni pa nnu ghraoghrao pugu pa njɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi. Nɛnnɛ, m̀īʼɛŋ nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ nthɛ ligi Krishto llɔ Jerushalɛiŋ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ Ilirikuŋ.
Nnɛ, a khwā njùʼɔ a nɔ chīi nu pwa pishaʼakhɔ nɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pi lɔ naa nchīi nnu Krishto ŋgwa yaʼo nɛ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ŋ̀krao ŋkuoŋ kwonda haʼaŋ a niʼiŋ ŋoŋ nduoŋ,
ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ,
“Pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pi shi yaʼa ma nchrā ni pugu nthɛ vi nɛ shi njəɨ,
ndɔ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu shini ndɔ naa ma njaʼo nɛ shi nji.”
Yei nnu haʼaŋ a chwīe m̀fāʼo kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ntou ndɨɨ nɔ thɔ nu njəɨ vəɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ ndwɛ ŋa m̀īʼɛŋ fàʼa a moŋ pei krao ŋgei lɨʼɨ nɛ pugu pa ŋa ŋki kwo yūa nu nɔ ntou ŋgaʼo nɔ thɔ nu njəɨ vəɨ nɛ,
m̀bīʼi nu ŋa ǹshi njəɨ vəɨ nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹshi ntɔgɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu Shipɛiŋ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ ghɛ̄rɛ a nɔ nyìeŋ a ndɨɨ ŋa ŋ̀kwo fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nɔ chhɔ nu pia kaʼa nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ ndwɛ, ŋ̀gə̄ɨ pi Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ fɛ nu ghɛ̀rɛ ni pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ fɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa pa chɔshi Mashedonia pugu Akaya ni mfāʼo pwatua nɔ fɛ nu pa maoŋ, pi ghɛ̄rɛ pa ghaŋ pou shɨna pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ ghɔ.

Nthɛ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnɛ, ndɔ shishini, a yīʼi ni pugu nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu vugu. Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ fāʼo ghrà moŋ mbɔrɔ moŋ Jijwɛ ŋa a yi pa ŋgwa Juu nɛ, pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋkaa pugu fāʼo nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu pa maoŋ pugu haʼaŋ pugu fāʼo nɛ ŋgɛ̄rɛ vugu nɔ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ndɨɨ ŋa ǹshi ŋkwo mīʼɛŋ yei fàʼa nɛ, ŋkwo fɛ maoŋ pighɔ ŋa pi ni māʼaŋ nɛ ni pugu, ǹshi ŋgə̄ɨ Shipɛiŋ, ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ nu, ǹtɔgɔ njəɨ vəɨ.
Ǹji ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa ǹshi nthɔ nu njəɨ vəɨ nɛ, ǹshi nthɔ ni mbɔrɔ lɨnaoŋ llɔ mbhɔ Krishto.
Ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ via, pugu pa khwǎ lɔ mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi, ŋa p̂ia chīri thɔ yia kaʼa ŋkaraʼa moŋ luoŋ Minnwi mfɛ vəɨ,
ŋa kiʼi ŋgwa pɛ haʼaŋ pugu lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ Minnwi Judia nɛ fɛ ŋgəʼɨ vəɨ pugu pa ŋa pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ haʼaŋ pugu pɔ Jerushalɛiŋ nɛ piŋ fàʼa a,
nnɛ ŋa, ni piŋ Minnwi, minthɛ ǹthɔ njəɨ vəɨ moŋ pwanjuʼɔ, mfāʼo māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ shɨna pəɨ.
Minnwi ŋa a ghà mfɛ ghɨghrɨ nɛ pɔ pəɨ pugu ghao. A yie.
M̀biŋ ni pəɨ ŋa Foebe pɔ pi ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ, a ndǐŋ via yi miŋgwɛ ŋa a muuŋ fàʼa chɔshi Keŋkria nɛ.

P̂əɨ tuo vi shiʼi moŋ ligi Taathɔ moŋ ŋkwaŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a kāʼo ni ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ, ŋgɛ̄rɛ vi ni ŋguoŋ pa yaoŋ haʼaŋ a tāʼa nu mbhɔ pəɨ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ju nduthɔ yi kwo ghɛ̄rɛ ntou pa ŋgwa ti mfɛ ni nduthɔ a ŋkaa mu.
P̂əɨ chrā ni Prishika
pugu Akwila mbɔ pakwo fàʼa paŋ moŋ fāʼa nu fàʼa Krishto Jishɔ
pugu ni ntɔgɔ moŋ gu ni chɔmbhi yugu nthɛ a. M̀fɛ tōo nu ni pugu, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi mmu, ŋguoŋ pa chɔshi pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ tōo ŋkaa pugu.
Chrā ni chɔshi haʼaŋ a pɔ nda pugu nɛ ŋkaa pugu.
Chrā ni ŋkiɛŋ ndǐŋ a mbɔ Epainetu ŋa a ni mbɔ fǔoŋ ŋoŋ nɔ piŋ nu Krishto Eshia nɛ.
Chrā ni Meri ŋa a ya mfāʼa nthɛ vəɨ nɛ.
Chrā ni Androniku pugu Junia, mbɔ pa lǐŋ paŋ haʼaŋ pugu pa Juu ndɔ mbɔ pakwo paŋ haʼaŋ pigi pugu ni mbɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ nɛ. Pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ya nji vugu ndɔ pugu ni fǔoŋ mbiŋ Krishto ŋkaoŋ m̀aa mbiŋ.
Chrā ni Ampliatu mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ndǐŋ a moŋ Taathɔ.
Chrā ni Ubanu mbɔ pakwo fàʼa pia moŋ Krishto pugu Shitaki ŋkiɛŋ ndǐŋ a.
Chrā ni Apele, mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ ŋa pi piŋ vi moŋ Krishto nɛ. Chrā ni pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu pɔ moŋ mbaanda Arishtobulu nɛ.
Chrā ni Herodioŋ mbɔ ndǐŋ a ŋoŋ Juu. Chrā ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu piŋ Taathɔ, ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ mbaanda Nakishu.
Chrā ni Trifaina pugu Trifosha mbɔ pa ghaŋ fàʼa moŋ Taathɔ, chrā ni ŋkiɛŋ ndǐŋ via Peshu ŋa a ya mfāʼa shishiʼi moŋ Taathɔ nɛ.
Chrā ni Rufushi, ŋa pi chuʼɔ vi moŋ Taathɔ pugu mǔuŋ vi ŋkaa yu, haʼaŋ a pɔ nɔ mǔuŋ a ŋkaa mu nɛ.
Chrā ni Ashiŋkritu, ni Flegoŋ ni Hemeshi ni Patroba, ni Hema pugu pa pichəɨ pa lǐŋ ŋa pugu pugu pɔ kaʼa nɛ.
Chrā ni Filologu ni Julia, ni Nereu pugu ndǐŋ vi yi miŋgwɛ pugu Olimpa pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ ŋa pugu pugu pɔ kaʼa nɛ.
P̂əɨ chrā ni noŋ pəɨ shishiʼi ni paŋ nu noŋ. Ŋguoŋ pa chɔshi Krishto chrā ni pəɨ.
Ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ chhɔ ndɨna pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu thɔ ni pa minduoŋnduoŋ, nthɔ nūʼɔŋ pa kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ki lɔ nthɔ njɛʼi pi pa nnu haʼaŋ pi ni njɛʼi vəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ, pəɨ ləʼɨ vugu.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa pi nɛ lɔ njiʼi nthɔ mfāʼa pi mbhɔ Krishto Taathɔ via, pugu fāʼa nthɛ pi njì puŋ yugu. Ni pa chrà lɨlɨŋ pugu pa chrà fɨ̄ɨ ŋgwa, pugu fɨ̄ɨ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ nja nji nnu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ji fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ yaʼo nchò nɛ, nnɛ m̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ vəɨ, ndɔ ǹtāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ fāʼo shiethɔ ni pa yaoŋ haʼaŋ a pwa nɛ, ndɔ m̂bhɔ yəɨ pɔ yi wo moŋ chwīe nu nnu ŋa a phɨ nɛ.
Minnwi ŋgaŋ fɛ ghɨghrɨ tɔthɔ nwīʼiŋ thɔ Shata laʼo kwò pəɨ. Pwapuŋ Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto pɔ ni pəɨ ghao.
Timoti mbɔ ŋgaŋ kwò fàʼa a māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ, Lushiɔ pugu Jashoŋ ni Shoshipata mbɔ pa lǐŋ paŋ llɔ moŋ shɨna pa Juu māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ ŋkaa pugu.
Mmu Tetiu, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei nɛ, māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ moŋ Taathɔ.
Gayu, mbɔ ŋoŋ haʼaŋ ndaʼa nu nda yu, chɔshi nii pi nda yu nɛ māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ. Erashitu mbɔ ŋgaŋ lə̄ɨŋ mbɨŋ laʼataoŋ yei pugu ndǐŋ via Kwatu māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ.
[Pwapuŋ Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto pɔ ni pəɨ ghao. A yie.]

Ndwɛ, pia fɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi. A fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chwīe nu ɔ thi a tɨnɨ moŋ piŋ yɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ a ŋa ǹchīi nu nthɛ Jishɔ Krishto pugu pa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi nōoŋ nnu shini ŋa a ni mbɔ yi lə̄ɨŋ nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ nɛ,

ndɔ ndwɛ nnu shini ghɔ taoŋ páa ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa nnu haʼaŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nāʼaŋ nɛ, pugu pa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ gɨ́ Minnwi haʼaŋ a lɔ mfāʼo njɛ̄ yi pugu ndugwi yi chhu nɛ, pi chwīe ŋguoŋ pa taoŋ taoŋ ji, nnɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa piŋ ndɔ mfāʼo yaʼo nchò.
Ndighaʼo ki ndugwi yi tɔgɔ mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ ni taʼa Minnwi ŋa a wuʼɔ ju təʼɨ vi ŋa a fāʼo shiethɔ nɛ! A yie.
I Corinthians: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ pi mbhɔ mu Pɔɔ. Minnwi chuʼɔ a ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ khwǎ njùʼɔ yi nɔ pɔ nu ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Krishto Jishɔ. A llɔ mbhɔ pigi Shoshtene ndǐŋ via,

ŋgə̄ɨ nu ni chɔshi Minnwi ŋa a pɔ laʼataoŋ Koriŋ nɛ, ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Minnwi gɛ̄ vugu ŋa pugu pɔ ŋgwa taoŋtaoŋ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pugu pa Krishto Jishɔ, pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pugu ghà ŋgaʼo Taathɔ mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto ŋa a Taathɔ yugu mbɨnɨ mbɔ yia nɛ.
Pwapuŋ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi mbɔ Tǎa via pugu Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ, pɔ ni pəɨ.
Ǹtōo Minnwi a ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ nthɛ vəɨ, nthɛ fɨʼɨ pwapuŋ ŋa a nōoŋ ni pəɨ moŋ Krishto Jishɔ nɛ.
Moŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pəɨ pa Krishto Jishɔ, pəɨ gū ghaŋ fàʼo moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ghao, moŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ ghà nchrā nɛ pugu pa ji nu nnu məɨ.
Yei ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni nōoŋ ni pəɨ ŋa chrà ŋa pigi ni nchrā ni pəɨ nthɛ Krishto nɛ, nnu shini,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ pou sheshe fɛ́ moŋ Jijwɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ thɔ njwɛrɛ nu ŋa pi nōoŋ Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto nɛ.
Jishɔ Krishto ju ŋa a shi nūʼɔŋ vəɨ, pəɨ thi a tɨnɨ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ nɔ ndugwi yi, ki lɔ mfāʼo krɛ̄i nu moŋ llɛ́ ŋa Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto shi nthɔ nɛ.
Minnwi pɔ pi kàʼa ki fɨ̄ɨ, mbɔ ju ŋa a ni mɛ̄iŋ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ kaʼa pəɨ pa muuŋ vi, Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ, Taathɔ via nɛ.

Ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, pi ni ligi Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto, ŋa ŋguoŋ vəɨ pɔ ni taʼaŋggi, pugu pa ŋa kiʼi minduoŋnduoŋ nuʼuŋ mbɔ shɨna pəɨ, ŋa p̂əɨ pɔ taʼa yi moŋ lɨna pugu pa mbīʼi nu nnu məɨ.
Ǹchhu nɛiŋ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu llɔ nda Kloe kwo chhu vəɨ ŋa fɛ̀ʼi pɔ shɨna pəɨ.
Nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ pɔ pi ŋa shesheŋoŋ vəɨ thɔ nchhu pi ŋa, “Ǹshi njōu nyaŋ pi njiŋ Pɔɔ,” ki ŋa, “Ǹjōu pi njiŋ Apolo,” ki ŋa, “Ǹjōu pi njiŋ Kefa
,” ki ŋa, “Ǹjōu pi njiŋ Krishto.”
Krishto pɔ pi moŋ pa chuʼuchuʼu? Pi ni ŋkwīŋ Pɔɔ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nthɛ vəɨ? Ki ɔ ni ŋkwe ŋkhǐ nɔ ligi Pɔɔ?
Ǹtōo Minnwi nthɛ ŋa ǹshini ndɔ ŋkwe mmu ŋkwe vəɨ ni ŋkhǐ. Ŋ̀ki wuʼɔ ŋkwe pi Krishpu pugu Gayu ni ŋkhǐ.
Nnɛ yichəɨ ŋoŋ nthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi nchhu ŋa a ni ŋkwe ŋkhǐ pi ni ligi a.
(Mi ni mbɨnɨ ŋkwe mbaanda Shitefana ni ŋkhǐ ŋkaa pugu. Ntɔgɔ yie, ǹdɔ nuʼuŋ nji ŋa mi ni mfɛ ŋkhǐ ni yichəɨ ŋoŋ nduoŋ.)

Nthɛ ŋa Krishto shini ndɔ ntaoŋ a pi ŋa ǹthɔ ŋkwe ŋgwa ni ŋkhǐ, a ni ntaoŋ pi ŋa ǹthɔ nchīi chrà pwa pishaʼakhɔ, ki lɔ nchīi pi ni chrà shiethɔ ŋgwamishua, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi gu Krishto ŋkuoŋ wáʼa phɛ ghrɨ́ ŋa a pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋkɨ̀nɨ nthɛ gu Krishto ŋkuoŋ wáʼa pɔ pi nnu na ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu phɛ nu gha nɛ, ndɔ ni pia ŋa pia lūgu nu nɛ, a ghrɨ́ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa,
“Ǹshi mbɨrɨ shiethɔ ghaŋ shiethɔ,
ndāa lɨna ghaŋ ji nnu.”
Ghaŋ shiethɔ pighɔ hɨŋ? Ghaŋ ji ŋwaʼaŋlɨ pighɔ pɔ pi hɨŋ? Ki pa ghaŋ lōu pa nnu ni shiethɔ mbhi hɛiŋ pɔ pi hɨŋ? Minnwi lɔ ŋkwo chwīe shiethɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei taoŋ nnu na?
Ŋa moŋ shiethɔ Minnwi, ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi shini ndɔ nji Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ shiethɔ, Minnwi ni mfāʼo pwatua ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chrà nnu na ŋa pigi chīi nu nɛ, nɔ kwe nu ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu piŋ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa Juu tāʼa pi lì, pa ŋgwa Gri tāʼa yugu pi shiethɔ.
Ndɔ pigi ghà nchīi pi Krishto ŋa pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, mbɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni ŋgwa Juu mbɨnɨ mbɔ nnu na ni ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Ndɔ ni pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pi gɛ̄ vugu nɛ, pa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, Krishto pɔ pi njɨ Minnwi pugu pa shiethɔ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa yaoŋ Minnwi ŋa a pɔ pi nɔ nnu na ni ŋgwamishua nɛ, fāʼo shiethɔ moŋ ghɔ ŋa a chaa yi ŋgwamishua nɛ, ndɔ yaoŋ Minnwi ŋa a pɔ nɔ kɨ̌ʼɨ ni ŋgwamishua nɛ, tɨnɨ nchaa njɨ ŋgwamishua.

Pa lǐŋ paŋ, pəɨ pīʼi yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ ni mbɔ yie ghɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋgɛ̄ vəɨ nɛ. Ŋgwamishua shini ndɔ ndīi ntou yəɨ nɔ pa ghaŋ shiethɔ, paʼa ntou yəɨ lɔ mbɔ pa ghaŋ njɨ, paʼa ntou yəɨ lɔ mbɔ pa ŋgwa liɛŋliɛŋ.
Ndɔ Minnwi chuʼɔ pa ŋgwa ŋa ŋkuoŋ mbhi pīʼi ŋa pugu ŋgwa gha nɛ, nɔ shhū nu pa ghaŋ shiethɔ nɔ ghɔ, Minnwi chuʼɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pa ŋkɨ̌ʼɨ moŋ mbhi nɛ nɔ shhū nu pa ghaŋ njɨ nɔ ghɔ.
Minnwi chuʼɔ pa yaoŋ ŋa nthɨŋkwo yugu lɔ ŋkə̄rə, pi lɔ nchɨ̄ʼə vugu moŋ mbhi nɛ, pa yaoŋ ghagha nɔ shwiʼi, nu pa yaoŋ ŋa ŋkuoŋ mbhi pīʼi ŋa a yi liɛŋ nɛ, shhɛ.
Minnwi chwīe nnɛ ŋa kiʼi yichəɨ ŋoŋ kwēi njùʼɔ yi shhɨ yu.
Ndɔ a chwīe Minnwi ŋa pəɨ pɔ taʼa yi pəɨ pa Krishto Jishɔ. Minnwi chwīe ŋa Krishto pɔ yia shiethɔ, pugu pa ndɨndɨ yia, mbɔ ŋgaŋ chwīe pia pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ndɔ mbɔ njaʼandiʼi yia.
Nɛnnɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ, “Ŝhesheŋoŋ ŋa a kwēi njùʼɔ yi nɛ, kwēi njùʼɔ yi nthɛ pi Taathɔ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki thɔ njəɨ vəɨ nɛ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ǹshini ndɔ nthɔ nchīi nnu shini Minnwi ŋa a ni ndə̄ɨŋ nɛ pi moŋ pa mmɛ chrà pugu pa nōoŋ nu shiethɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa mi ni ndɔ̄gɔ nthí ma ŋa m̀baʼa njiʼi nji sheshe nnu shɨna pəɨ ŋkiɛŋ Jishɔ Krishto pugu pa ŋa pi kwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Mi ni nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ moŋ kɨ̌ʼɨ pugu pa pɔ́gɔ ni ntou wrū nu.
Ndɔ chrà a pugu pa nnu ŋa mi ni nchīi nu nɛ shini ndɔ mbɔ moŋ shiethɔ ŋgwamishua pugu pa mɛmmɛ chrà lɨlɨŋ, ndɔ a ni mbɔ pi moŋ lì Jijwɛ Minnwi pugu pa njɨ,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi piŋ yəɨ pɔ pi ŋkuoŋ shiethɔ ŋgwamishua, â pɔ pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ Minnwi.

Ndɔ pigi ghà nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ shiethɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pa ntɨnɨmmɛ moŋ piŋ nɛ, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ a lɔ mbɔ pi shiethɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei nɛ, ki yi pa ghaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei ŋa a yīʼi ŋa pugu chhɔ ntɔgɔtɔgɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ pigi ghà nchīi shiethɔ Minnwi ŋa a lə̄ɨŋ ki ŋgwa lɔ nji nɛ, mbɔ shiethɔ lə̄ɨŋ ŋa Minnwi ni nchuʼɔ ŋkaoŋ mbhi maa njɛ̄ nɔ ndighaʼo yia nɛ.
Kaŋ taʼa ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei lɔ njiʼi nji shiethɔ yei, nthɛ ŋa pugu kaŋ nji, pugu shi kaŋ ŋkwīŋ Taathɔ ndighaʼo ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa,
“Pa nnu ŋa muuŋ ligi lɔ naa njəɨ nɛ,
paʼa tə́nə lɔ naa njaʼo nɛ,
mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa ŋoŋmishua lɔ naa mbīʼi thɔ yu
mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi pīri ni pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu khwā vi nɛ.”
Minnwi nōoŋ pa maoŋ pei ni pigi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ. Nthɛ ŋa Jijwɛ ghà ntāʼa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao, njiʼi nthɛ pi láʼo pa nnu ŋa Minnwi kāʼa ndɔ ndə̄ɨŋ nɛ.
A gɔ̌ shɨna ŋgwamishua ŋa minthɛ a ji nnu ŋa ŋoŋ pīʼi nu nɛ ŋkiɛŋ jijwɛ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a pɔ mbɨŋ yu nɛ. Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ ŋoŋ lɔ nji nnu ŋa Minnwi pīʼi nu nɛ ŋkiɛŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Pi lɔ njiʼi mfɛ pi jijwɛ ŋkuoŋ mbhi ni pia, pi fɛ pi Jijwɛ ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi nɛ ni pia, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia ji pa yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi fɛ ni pia moŋ pwapuŋ yi nɛ.

Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, pigi lɔ njiʼi nchrā pi ni chrà ŋa pigi yɛʼi llɔ ŋkuoŋ shiethɔ ŋoŋmishua, pigi chrā pi chrà ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi yɛʼi vigi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, nthɔ ntūgu njiŋ nnu shini moŋ jijwɛ ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo Jijwɛ nɛ.

Ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ pa nnu ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pa nnu pighɔ pɔ pi nɔ pa nnu na, nthɛ ŋa minthɛ pi wuʼɔ nji ghɛ̀rɛ nnu pighɔ pi moŋ Jijwɛ.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo Jijwɛ nɛ ghà ntou mooŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao nji, ndɔ minthɛ paʼa shesheŋoŋ lɔ ntou vi.
Nthɛ ŋa,
“A gɔ̌ ŋa a ji pīʼi nu Taathɔ
ti a nthɛ a tɨgɨ vi?”
Ndɔ pia fāʼo pīʼi nu Krishto.

Nɔ chrā nu nnu shini, ma lǐŋ paŋ, a kaŋ ni nthɛ paʼa ǹdɔ nchrā ni pəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹchrā pi ni ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu fāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ, ŋki chrā ni pəɨ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ pɔ pi ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi, nɔ pa puoŋ prɔ moŋ piŋ nu Krishto.
Ŋki fɛ pi pɨnɨ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ nnu, ǹshini ndɔ mfɛ pi maoŋ chiɛŋchiɛŋ ni pəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ shini ndɔ naa ŋkāʼo nɔ yi chiɛŋchiɛŋ. Njiʼi nthɛ pi ndwɛ pəɨ shi lɔ naa njiʼi ŋkāʼo,

nthɛ ŋa pəɨ wuʼɔ mbiʼi nchhɔ chɔmbhi yəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi ghà nchhɔ nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ kighɨʼə pugu pa fɛ̀ʼi wuʼɔ mbɔ nu shɨna pəɨ nɛ, a lɔ nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi, nchhɔ chɔmbhi yəɨ nɔ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi?
Nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa ŋoŋ vəɨ chhu ŋa, “Ǹjōu pi njiŋ Pɔɔ,” yichəɨ ŋa, “Ǹjōu pi njiŋ Apolo,” yie ghɔ shi lɔ nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ thɔ mbɔ pi nɔ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi?
Apolo pɔ pi gɔ̌? Pɔɔ pɔ gɔ̌? Pugu pa puoŋ fàʼa ŋa pəɨ kie pi mbhɔ pugu mbiŋ Taathɔ, nɔ haʼaŋ a fɛ shɨ̀na ni shesheŋoŋ vigi nɛ.
Ŋki phi mbhɛ̌, Apolo shāʼo ŋkhǐ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ. A chwīe Minnwi a kuʼɔ.
Nnɛ, mmɛ nnu shi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a phī nɛ, ki ŋoŋ ŋa a shāʼo ŋkhǐ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ, a pɔ pi Minnwi ŋa a chwīe a khɛ̄ nɛ.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a phī nɛ pugu ŋoŋ ŋa a shāʼo ŋkhǐ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ wuʼɔ taʼa yaoŋ, sheshe ŋgaŋ vi shi mfāʼo kɨ̀nɛiŋ yi wuʼɔ nɔ fɨʼɨ fàʼa yi.
Nthɛ ŋa pigi ghao pɔ pi puoŋ fàʼa Minnwi, pəɨ pɔ pi moŋ nyieŋ Minnwi, mbɨnɨ mbɔ pi nda Minnwi.
Ni fɨʼɨ pwapuŋ ŋa Minnwi fɛ vəɨ, nɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgaŋ krao nda ŋa a ji fàʼa ŋgaʼa nɛ, ŋki nūʼɔŋ kwonda, ŋoŋ nduoŋ krao nda ŋkuoŋ ghɔ. Shesheŋoŋ lɨna nu ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a krao nu ŋkuoŋ kwonda ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ mbɨnɨ nūʼɔŋ yichəɨ kwonda nduoŋ, ŋkiɛŋ yɛ ŋa a kwo pɔ nɛ, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto.
Ndwɛ, s̈hesheŋoŋ ŋkrao nu ŋkuoŋ kwonda ghɔ pi ni laoŋgo, ki tɨ́nɨ, ki pa ŋgùʼɔ tɨnɨnchuoŋ, ki thɨ, ki trǔ yó, ki pi,
kaŋ mbha fàʼa shesheŋoŋ shi nōoŋ noŋ yi, ndɨɨ ŋa mmɛ llɛ́ Krishto shi ntūgu vi ni móŋoŋ nɛ. Móŋoŋ shi njwɛʼi ŋkwaŋ fàʼa ŋa shesheŋoŋ fāʼa nɛ.
Fàʼa ŋa a fāʼa ŋkuoŋ kwonda ghɔ nɛ mieŋ ki kɨɨ, a fāʼo kɨ̀nɛiŋ.
Fàʼa s̈hesheŋoŋ ŋkɨɨ, ŋgaŋ vi shiɛŋ, ndɔ nduthɔ yi lūgu pi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a tei ntaoŋ pi moŋ móŋoŋ.
Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi Nda Minnwi? Pugu pa ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi chhɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ?
S̈hesheŋoŋ mbɨrɨ Nda Minnwi, Minnwi pɨrɨ vi ŋkaa yu. Nthɛ ŋa Nda Minnwi pɔ pi yi taoŋtaoŋ, Nda Minnwi ghɔ ya ndɔ mbɔ pi pəɨ.
Kiʼi shesheŋoŋ fɨ̄ɨ noŋ yi. S̈hesheŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ mbīʼi ŋa a fāʼo shiethɔ moŋ mbhi yei, a pie ŋa a gū na nnɛ ŋa minthɛ a gū ŋkiɛŋ ŋgaŋ shiethɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa shiethɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei pɔ pi nnu na ni Minnwi. Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa,
“A wɛ̄iŋ pa ghaŋ shiethɔ
wuʼɔ ni yugu shiethɔ.”
Ŋkamuʼɔŋ,
“Taathɔ ji kwāʼa nu ghaŋ shiethɔ,
ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ.”
Nnɛ kiʼi ŋoŋ kwēi njùʼɔ yi nthɛ ŋgwamishua nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa yaoŋ ghao pɔ pi yəɨ.
Ki a pɔ pi Pɔɔ, ki Apolo, ki Kefa, ki ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ki chɔmbhi, ki gu, ki mbhi ndwɛ, ki yɛ ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ. Ŋguoŋ yi ghao pɔ pi yəɨ.
Pəɨ pɔ yi Krishto, Krishto pɔ yi Minnwi.
Pəɨ līi vigi pi nɔ puoŋ fàʼa Krishto, pugu pa ŋgwa ŋa pi nūʼɔŋ vugu ŋa pugu lɨna ni nnu lə̄ɨŋ Minnwi.
Nɔ pigi nu, a pie ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pi nūʼɔŋ vugu ŋa pugu lɨna ni pa maoŋ nɛ pɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋoŋ yɨʼə noŋ yi mbɨŋ pugu nɛ.
Ndɔ ni mu, a pɔ pi ŋkiɛŋ muuŋ mi nnu ŋa a shaʼa pəɨ nshaʼa a, ki ŋa a shaʼa sheshe ndashaʼa ŋgwamishua nshaʼa a. Njiʼi nthɛ pi mmu, ǹdɔ njiʼi nshaʼa noŋ a.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nji sheshe nnu ŋa minthɛ ŋ̀krɛ̄i noŋ a nɔ ghɔ, ǹdɔ njiʼi ntɔgɔ shaʼa nthɛ pi yie. A Taathɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nshaʼa a.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, kiʼi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ nɔ ŋgushaʼa ki ndɨɨ lɔ naa ŋkāʼo, ki Taathɔ lɔ naa mbɨnɨ yaʼa. A ju mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a shi nthɔ ni pa nnu ŋa a pɔ moŋ njiŋ ndwɛ nɛ páa, ntūgu pa nnu ŋa a pɔ njùʼɔ ŋgwa nɛ. Nnɛ, shesheŋoŋ fāʼo ndighaʼo yi llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.

Pa lǐŋ paŋ, ǹdɔ̄gɔ nnu pei pi mbɨŋ pigi Apolo nthɛ vəɨ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ yɛʼi mbhɔ pigi nɔ mieŋ nu ki lɔ mfərə fɨʼɨ yaoŋ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ nɛ, ŋa kiʼi shesheŋoŋ vəɨ nōoŋ noŋ yi, nshigi yichəɨ ŋoŋ, nchɨ̄ʼə yichəɨ.
A yəɨ gɔ̌ sheshe kwri mbɨŋ ghɔ? Ɔ fāʼo pi khɔ ŋa pi shi lɔ njiʼi mfɛfɛ vɛ? Ti ä mbɔ ŋa pi fɛfɛ vɛ, a chwīe khɔ ɔ thɔ kwēi njùʼɔ yɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pi lɔ njiʼi mfɛfɛ vɛ?

Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa pəɨ kwo fāʼo ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ tāʼa nu nɛ! Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa pəɨ kwo gū pa ghaŋ fāʼo. Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa pəɨ kwo gū pa fùoŋ ki lɔ mbɔ pi ni ghɛ̀rɛ yigi. Ndɔ shishini, ŋ̀khwā ŋa pəɨ ka ni ŋgū pa fùoŋ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pigi ŋkaa pigi shaʼa fùoŋ pia kaʼa.
A fhi vəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi fɛ ndugwi njiŋ lɨʼɨ ni pigi, mbɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, nɔ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pi fɛ njɔ́ gu ni pugu pi lɨʼɨ wo moŋ mbhi, ligi pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pugu pa ŋgwamishua.
Ŋgwa pīʼi ŋa pigi pa na nthɛ ligi Krishto ndɔ pəɨ pīʼi ŋa pəɨ pa ndɨna moŋ Krishto. Ŋgwa pīʼi ŋa pigi kɨ̌ʼɨ ndɔ pəɨ pīʼi ŋa pəɨ tɨnɨ. Pi tuo vəɨ nɔ pa ŋgwa chɨɨchɨɨ, ndɔ pigi pɔ pa miŋkwasha.
Ti mfɛ ndwɛ, njì yia vigi, njùʼɔ yigi pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ njaoŋ, ndhwí yigi pɔ pa chə̌ʼɨ, pi wie vigi ki tou, pigi pɨnɨ mbɔ pa ŋgwa ki laʼa,
pigi fāʼa ki jwɛ ni mbhɔ miŋi nɔ yōu nu, pigi fɛ mbɔrɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chɔ̄nɔ vigi nɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa pi fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pigi nɛ, pigi wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ paʼa a lɔ mfhi nnu.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi chhu phɨ thɔ pigi nɛ, pigi khwɛ̄ pi ni chrà pɔpɔrɔ, pigi pɔ nɔ pa ŋkuʼu maoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi, pa ndunduʼu ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao ti nchəɨŋ ndwɛ.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi nāʼaŋ pa nnu pei pi nɔ shhū nu vəɨ ndɔ ǹāʼaŋ pi nɔ tɨgɨ nu vəɨ nɔ pa puoŋ paŋ ŋa ŋ̀khwā.

Nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ fāʼo wuŋ ŋkaŋ ghaŋ lɨna nu ni pəɨ moŋ piŋ yəɨ mbɨŋ Krishto nɛ, pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ntou pa tǎa. Ŋ̀ki gū tǎa vəɨ moŋ piŋ nu Krishto Jishɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ŋa ŋki chīi ni pəɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, m̀āʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yəɨ ŋa p̂əɨ pīni mbha nnu paŋ.

Nthɛ yei nnu, ǹtaoŋ Timoti ni pəɨ, mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ muuŋ a ŋa ŋ̀khwā, ndɔ mbɔ muuŋ ŋa a nthɛ ŋoŋ yɨʼə noŋ yi mbɨŋ yu moŋ Taathɔ nɛ. A shi ŋkwiŋ vəɨ ni mbha chɔmbhi a moŋ Krishto wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹjɛʼi ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa chɔshi nɛ.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ tɛnɛ nu, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pīʼi ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ nu nɔ kra nu vəɨ.
Ndɔ moŋ kuo ndɨɨ, ǹshi nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ T̈aathɔ mbiŋ, nnɛ kaŋ ǹshi njəɨ njɨ ŋa ghaŋ titɛnɛ pinɛ fāʼo nɛ, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi chrà ni nchò.
Nthɛ ŋa Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi lɔ njiʼi ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi moŋ chrà ni nchò, a pɔ pi moŋ njɨ.
Pəɨ khwǎ pi yəɨ? Ǹthɔ njəɨ vəɨ pi ni ŋgwàŋ ki ni khwǎ moŋ jijwɛ juju?
Shishini, ǹjaʼo pi chhu ŋa shúoŋ pɔ shɨna pəɨ, ŋkwaŋ kwoshuoŋ ŋa a shiʼa ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ shɨna pa ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi nɛ, ǹjaʼo ŋa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ̄gɔ ŋgwɛ tǎa vi.
Pəɨ ka thɔ ntɛtɛnɛ fiɛŋ ŋa pəɨ kaŋ ni nthɔ ŋkə̄ɨkəɨ. P̂əɨ fuʼu ŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe nnu yei nɛ shɨna pəɨ.
Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pia lɔ njiʼi mbɔ kaʼa moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ, pia pɔ kaʼa moŋ Jijwɛ. Ŋ̀kwo shaʼa ŋoŋ vei pi nɔ haʼaŋ mbɔ pi hɛnɛ.
Moŋ ligi Jishɔ Taathɔ, ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ kɨrɨ pia pɔ kaʼa moŋ jijwɛ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ Taathɔ via, Jishɔ Krishto ŋa pia pugu pɔ kaʼa nɛ,
p̂əɨ fāʼo nɔ chaʼa nu ŋoŋ vei mfɛ mbhɔ Shata a pɨrɨ frɛinoŋ yi, nnɛ ŋa jijwɛ yi lūgu moŋ llɛmbhi Taathɔ.
Titɛnɛ yəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbwa. Pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa muuŋ mi shɨgɛi yaoŋ chwīe prupɨna kuʼɔ ghà nchwīe ŋguoŋ prupɨna kuʼɔ?

P̂əɨ fuʼu ndunu yaoŋ chwīe prupɨna kuʼɔ shɨna pəɨ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ pɔ gwí prupɨna fhi ŋa yaoŋ chwīe prupɨna kuʼɔ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ ya mbɔ nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa pi kwo jwi Krishto mbɔ muuŋ minjɨɨ jɨ Lli Njiʼa nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂ia jɨ jɨ ghɔ ni brɛi ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ndunu yaoŋ chwīe prupɨna kuʼɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, mbɔ phɨ pugu pa nnu tɔtrɔ, ndɔ â pɔ pi ni brɛi ŋa yaoŋ chwīe prupɨna kuʼɔ lɔ mbɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, mbɔ njùʼɔ ndɨndɨ pugu pa nnu shini.
Moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋa mi ni nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ nɛ, ŋki chhu ni pəɨ moŋ ghɔ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ chɨ kwò pəɨ pa ghaŋ kwo shúoŋ.

Ǹshini ndɔ njiʼi nthɔ nchhu pi ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi ŋa pugu pa ghaŋ kwo shúoŋ nɛ, ki pa ghaŋ lúa pugu pa ghaŋ nchìgi, ki pa ghaŋ ghaʼo pa nnwi. Nthɛ ŋa ŋ̀kaŋ nchhu pi nɛnnɛ, a nōoŋ ŋa p̂əɨ taoŋ taoŋ ki lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi ŋkuoŋ mbhi.

Ndɔ ǹāʼaŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ pi ŋa kiʼi pəɨ chɨ kwò pəɨ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu chhu ŋa pugu pa lǐŋ moŋ piŋ ndɔ mbɔ pi ŋkwoshuoŋ, ki ŋgaŋ lúa, ki ŋgaŋ ghaʼo pa nnwi, ki ŋoŋ ŋa a chhu phɨ nthɛ ndǐŋ vi nɛ ki mbaa làʼo, ki ŋgɨna. Kiʼi pəɨ yiʼi ndɔ nchɔchhɔ njɨ maoŋ pəɨ pa ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa pinɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ lɨʼɨ a nɔ shaʼa nu pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ mbhi nɛ. Pəɨ shiʼa nshaʼa pi pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pa ŋgia chɔshi nɛ?
Minnwi shi nshaʼa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu shi lɔ mbɔ ŋgia chɔshi nɛ. Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa, “P̂əɨ fuʼu ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ shɨna pəɨ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa chəɨ taʼa ŋoŋ vəɨ fāʼo fɛ̀ʼi pugu ndǐŋ vi moŋ piŋ nɛ, a kie pi nɛiŋ ŋgāoŋ ti ŋgə̄ɨ mburu pi ni ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi ŋa p̂ugu shaʼa ki lɔ mburu pi ni ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ?
Pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ lɛ nshaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi? Ti ä mbɔ ŋa a shi nshaʼa pəɨ nshaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi, a kie pi nɛiŋ paʼa pəɨ lɔ ŋkāʼo nɔ shaʼa nu pa puoŋ mi sháʼa?
Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji ŋa pia lɛ nshaʼa pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi? Ä mbɔ nɛnnɛ kaŋ pəɨ kāʼo nɔ līi nu pa nnu moŋ chɔmbhi yei!
Nnɛ ti p̈əɨ mfāʼo sháʼa, a chwīe khɔ pəɨ nūʼɔŋ pi shhɨ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋgwa chɔshi nɛ?
A ŋkiɛŋ nnu lrithɔ ni pəɨ. Minthɛ a kiʼi mbɔ ŋa kaŋ taʼa ŋgaŋ shiethɔ lɔ mbɔ shɨna pəɨ ŋa minthɛ a lūgwi sháʼa shɨna ghaŋ piŋ?
Ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, taʼa ŋgaŋ piŋ puru ndǐŋ vi moŋ piŋ ni pa ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi.
Wuʼɔ pɔ nu ŋa pəɨ ni noŋ pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nthi sháʼa nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ kwo ya ŋgū ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ cho ŋkhǐ. A lɔ ŋka pwa ŋa ɔ mieŋ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ ŋa pi fāaŋ nnu mbɨŋ ghɔ, ki mieŋ pi chīgi ghɔ?
Ndɔ pəɨ nduthɔ yəɨ ghà nchwīe pa fàŋ pugu pa nchìgi, ndɔ nchwīe nnɛ pi mbɨŋ pa lǐŋ pəɨ.

Ki pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji ŋa mbaʼa ŋgwa təɨtəɨ fāʼo shɨna moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi? Kiʼi pi fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ: mbaʼa ŋgaŋ kwo shúoŋ, ki ŋgaŋ ghaʼo pa nnwi, ki ŋgaŋ láŋ ŋa a kwo shúoŋ nɛ, ki pimbia ŋa pugu pa shakhɨ nɛ, ki pimbia ŋa pugu lɔ̄gɔ pichəɨ pimbia nɔ ŋgwɛ vugu nɛ,
ki pa ŋgɨna, ki ŋgaŋ lúa, ki pa mbaa làʼo, ki pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu chhu phɨ nthɛ pichəɨ ŋgwa nɛ, ki ghaŋ nchìgi lɛ ma mfāʼo shɨ̀na moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.

Ndɔ pichəɨ ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi nɛnnɛ. Ndɔ pi shɨ̄gao vəɨ, pi ni nchwīe pəɨ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ, pi ni nchwīe pəɨ pɔ yi ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ligi Taathɔ mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto pugu pa Jijwɛ Minnwi yia.

Pichəɨ ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ chhu ŋa, “M̀fāʼo njɨ nɔ chwīe nu sheshe yaoŋ.” Ndɔ a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a fāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ ni pəɨ. Pichəɨ chhu ŋa, “Mfāʼo njɨ nɔ chwīe nu sheshe yaoŋ.” Ndɔ minthɛ paʼa ǹdɔ njiʼi mieŋ sheshe yaoŋ fāʼo njɨ mbɨŋ mu.
Pichəɨ chhu yugu ŋa, “Maoŋ jɨ pɔ pi ni puŋ, puŋ pɔ ni maoŋ jɨ, ndɔ Minnwi shi shiʼi ŋguoŋ vugu yi paa ghɔ.” Ndɔ noŋ ŋoŋ lɔ mbɔ pi nɔ kwo nu shúoŋ, a pɔ pi yi Taathɔ, Taathɔ pɔ yi noŋ.
Minnwi ni ŋkə̄rə Taathɔ mfuʼu moŋ gu, ŋguʼɔ shi ŋkə̄rə via pi nɛnnɛ mfuʼu pi ni ghrɨ́ yi.
Pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa noŋ pəɨ pɔ pi ghrà noŋ Krishto? Minthɛ ǹdɔ̄gɔ ghrà noŋ Krishto nchwīe a pɔ ghrà noŋ shakhɨ? Minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛnnɛ!
Ki pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a tūru noŋ yi pugu shakhɨ nɛ, taʼa noŋ pugu yu? Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa, “Yi paa ghɔ shi nchīni ŋgū taʼa frɛinoŋ.”
Ndɔ ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a chīni noŋ yi mbɨŋ Taathɔ nɛ gū taʼa yi pugu yu moŋ jijwɛ.
P̂əɨ tei kwo nu shúoŋ. Sheshe phɨ nduoŋ ŋa ŋoŋ chwīe nɛ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi moŋ noŋ yu ndɔ ŋgaŋ kwo shúoŋ chwīe phɨ pi mbɨŋ noŋ yi.
Ki pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji ŋa noŋ yəɨ pɔ pi nda Jijwɛ Minnwi ŋa a pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ, ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ ni pəɨ nɛ? A lɔ mfāʼo pəɨ mfāʼo noŋ yəɨ,
Minnwi ni njuoŋ vəɨ ni tɨnɨnchuoŋ. Nnɛ ghaʼo Minnwi moŋ frɛinoŋ yɔ.
Ndwɛ nɔ līi nu pa nnu pɛ ŋa pəɨ ni nāʼaŋ nɛ: “A pwa ni mimbia nɔ chhɔ nu ki lɔ njəɨ miŋgwɛ.”
Ndɔ nthɛ pa mōoŋ nu nɔ gū nu moŋ nnu kwo shúoŋ, ŝheshe mimbia wuʼɔ nji pi ŋgwɛ vi, ŝheshe miŋgwɛ wuʼɔ nji pi ndaoŋ vi.
Mimbia ji ŋgwɛ vi ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwɛ vi tāʼa nu nɛ, miŋgwɛ fɛ noŋ yi ni ndaoŋ vi ndɨɨ ŋa ndaoŋ vi tāʼa nu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo miŋgwɛ mfāʼo noŋ yi, a fāʼo ndaoŋ vi. Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo mimbia mfāʼo noŋ yi, a fāʼo miŋgwɛ.

Kiʼi ŋoŋ lāa vichəɨ, kaŋ a nɛiŋ pəɨ pɔ ni taʼaŋggi nɔ kuo ndɨɨ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ fɛ noŋ yəɨ ni luoŋ Minnwi, ndɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ gha ntɔgɔ p̂əɨ pɨnɨ mbɨnɨ njəɨ noŋ ŋkamuʼɔŋ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi Shata mōoŋ vəɨ nthɛ pou wɛ̄iŋ noŋ.
Ndɔ ǹchhu yei pi nɔ piŋ nu nnu ŋa pəɨ pīʼi nɛ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi gɨ́.
Ŋ̀khwā ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɔ nɔ haʼaŋ m̀bɔ nɛ. Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ fāʼo ji fɛ́ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi. Chəɨ ŋoŋ fāʼo yei ŋkwaŋ fɛ́, yichəɨ fāʼo yini ŋkwaŋ fɛ́.
Ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi ndaŋ nɛ pugu pa kugu, a pwa ŋa pugu kɨna ki lɔ ndaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ m̀bɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ ä mbɔ ŋa minthɛ paʼa pugu lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ noŋ yugu, p̂ugu laŋ. Nthɛ ŋa a pwa laŋ nu nchaa khu nu njì yəɨ nu mimbia ki miŋgwɛ.
M̀fɛ yei gɨ́ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu laŋ nɛ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi nyaŋ gɨ́ a yi Taathɔ. Kiʼi miŋgwɛ shāaŋ láŋ yugu ndaoŋ vi,
ndɔ ti ä nshāaŋ, a kɨna ki laŋ, kiɛŋ nɛnnɛ, a pɨnɨ nchīni ŋggì pugu ndaoŋ vi. Ndɔ kiʼi mimbia fuʼu ŋgwɛ vi.
Ndɔ ni pɨgəɨ ŋgwa, ǹchhu yei, mbɔ pi mmu, ki lɔ mbɔ Taathɔ, ŋa sheshe mimbia ŋa a ŋgaŋ piŋ nɛ, m̈fāʼo ŋgwɛ vi ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ Minnwi, a khwā nɔ chhɔ nu pugu yu, kiʼi a shāaŋ láŋ yugu yu.
Ti sheshe miŋgwɛ mfāʼo ndaoŋ vi ŋa a lɔ mbiŋ Minnwi, a khwā nɔ chhɔ nu pugu yu, kiʼi a shāaŋ láŋ pugu yu.

Nthɛ ŋa pi chwīe ndaoŋ vi ŋa a lɔ mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nthɛ ŋgwɛ vi ŋa a piŋ nɛ, miŋgwɛ ŋa a lɔ mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ŋkaa yu nthɛ ndaoŋ vi ŋa a piŋ nɛ. A kaŋ ni mieŋ ki pɔ pi nɛnnɛ, puoŋ pəɨ shi kaŋ mbɔ pi taoŋtaoŋ, ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, pugu pi taoŋtaoŋ.

Ndɔ ti yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ n̈shāaŋ láŋ, p̂əɨ mieŋ a shāaŋ. Moŋ yie ŋkwaŋ shɨ̀na, ndǐŋ moŋ piŋ ŋa a mimbia ki miŋgwɛ nɛ, lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi moŋ ŋkɨɨ. Minnwi gɛ̄ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ chhɔ moŋ ghɨghrɨ.
Gɔ̀ miŋgwɛ, ɔ ji pi nɛiŋ ŋa minthɛ ndaoŋ ghɔ kie mbhɔ ghɔ ndūgu, ki gɔ̀ mimbia ɔ ji pi nɛiŋ ŋa ŋgwɛ ghɔ shi ŋkie mbhɔ ghɔ ndūgu?
A wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋa ŝhesheŋoŋ chhɔ chɔmbhi yi ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Taathɔ fɛ ghɔ nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi gɛ̄ shesheŋoŋ a pɔ nɛ, â chhɔ chɔmbhi yi nɛnnɛ. Yei pɔ pi gɨ́ ŋa m̀fɛ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa chɔshi nɛ.
M̈innwi ŋga ŋgɛ̄ shesheŋoŋ a kwo nii ŋgunu mbrɛi, kiʼi a fuʼu lì ŋgunu mbrɛi mbiŋ yu. S̈hesheŋoŋ mieŋ ki lɔ naa nii ŋgunu mbrɛi ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋgɛ̄ vi nɛ, kiʼi a paʼo nu nɔ nii nu ŋgunu mbrɛi.
Nthɛ ŋa nii nu ŋgunu mbrɛi ki mieŋ nu ki lɔ nii lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yichəɨ yaoŋ, mmɛ nnu pɔ pi nūʼɔŋ nu kɨ̀na Minnwi.
Ŝhesheŋoŋ kɨna ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni ŋga ŋgɛ̄ vi a pɔ nɛ.
Ä mbɔ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋga ŋgɛ̄ ghɔ ɔ pɔ pi ŋkǔna, kiʼi ɔ wie noŋ yɔ nthɛ yinɛ. Ndɔ ti ɔ mfāʼo shɨ̀na nɔ taoŋ nu moŋ kǔna, ɔ taoŋ moŋ ghɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa Taathɔ ni ŋga ŋgɛ̄ vi a pɔ ŋkǔna nɛ, lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ ŋkǔna mbhɔ Taathɔ. Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ŋoŋ ŋa pi ni ŋga ŋgɛ̄ vi paʼa a lɔ mbɔ ŋkǔna nɛ, ŋkǔna Krishto.
Minnwi ni njuoŋ vəɨ pi ni tɨnɨnchuoŋ, kiʼi pəɨ gū kǔna mbhɔ ŋgwamishua.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, shesheŋoŋ kɨna pugu Minnwi moŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni ŋga ŋgɛ̄ vi a pɔ nɛ.
Ndwɛ, nthɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi ndaŋ nɛ, ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāʼo pi gɨ́ llɔ mbhɔ Taathɔ, ndɔ m̀fɛ nyaŋ pīʼi nu nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa minthɛ pi yɨʼə noŋ mbɨŋ yu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kwoshɨnɨ Taathɔ.
Nthɛ pa ŋgəʼɨ ŋa a pɔ ndwɛ nɛ, m̀bīʼi ŋa a pwa ni ŋoŋ nɔ kɨna nu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ.
Ɔ̈ ndaŋ, kiʼi mbaʼo nɔ shāaŋ nu láŋ pəɨ yu. Ɔ̈ mieŋ ki laŋ miŋgwɛ, kiʼi ntāʼa miŋgwɛ nɔ laŋ nu.

Ndɔ ti ɔ̈ ndaŋ, kaŋ ɔ lɔ njiʼi nchwīe phɨ, ndɔ ti miŋgwɛ ŋa a shi yaʼa laŋ nɛ ndaŋ, kaŋ a lɔ njiʼi nchwīe phɨ. Ndɔ pa ghaŋ láŋ shi mfāʼo pa ŋgəʼɨ moŋ chɔmbhi yei, m̀baʼo pi ŋa kiʼi pəɨ nii moŋ pa ŋgəʼɨ pighɔ.
Yei njiŋ nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, ndɨɨ kwo kwiʼi. Jɛ̄ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, pa ghaŋ láŋ chhɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu lɔ njiʼi ndaŋ.

Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu kə̄ɨ nu nɛ chhɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu lɔ njiʼi ŋkə̄ɨ nu, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nɛ chhɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ, pa ghaŋ yuoŋ maoŋ chhɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yaoŋ yuoŋ,
ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu chwīe pa nnu ni pa maoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ, kiʼi pugu wɛ̄iŋ maoŋ pighɔ nthi nɔ ghɔ. Nthɛ ŋa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei, moŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a pɔ ndwɛ nɛ, chhɔ ntɔgɔtɔgɔ.
Ǹtāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ lūgu mbhɔ ghana njùʼɔ. Ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ndaŋ nɛ ghà ŋgwie noŋ yi pi ni nnu Taathɔ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a shi nchwīe njùʼɔ Taathɔ pwa nɛ.
Ndɔ ŋgaŋ láŋ ghà ŋgwie noŋ yi pi ni pa nnu ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a nthɛ a chwīe túa ŋgwɛ vi pwa nɛ,

njùʼɔ yi pɔ pi paa ŋgei. Miŋgwɛ ŋa a lɔ naa ndaŋ ki nji mimbia nɛ, ghà ŋgwie noŋ yi pi ni pa nnu Taathɔ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a nthɛ a pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ moŋ frɛinoŋ pugu pa jijwɛ. Ndɔ miŋgwɛ láŋ ghà ŋgwie noŋ yi pi ni pa nnu ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a nthɛ a chwīe túa ndaoŋ vi pwa.
Ǹchhu yei pi nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu vəɨ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu sheshe lrì mbɨŋ pəɨ, ǹchhu pi nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu nyīeŋ shiʼi, nnɛ nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu pəɨ fɛ njùʼɔ yəɨ ni Taathɔ ki ghrà yi lɔ mbɔ lɨʼɨ nduoŋ.

S̈hesheŋoŋ mbīʼi ŋa nchwīe nu nnu yi lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo ni muuŋ miŋgwɛ ŋa pugu yu kāʼa láŋ nɛ, njì ji nu miŋgwɛ ghɔ ya ŋgaʼa vi a pīʼi ŋa pugu shi ndaŋ, pugu yu laŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a tāʼa nu nɛ, pugu lɔ njiʼi nchwīe phɨ.
Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ nthí mi moŋ njùʼɔ yu ki pi lɔ ŋɨ vi ŋɨ, ndɔ mfāʼo njɨ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu noŋ yi, ndɔ̄gɔ nthi mi moŋ njùʼɔ yu ŋa mbaʼa a laŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ nɛ, ŋoŋ ghɔ chwīe a pwa.
Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, ŋoŋ ŋa a laŋ miŋgwɛ ŋa pugu yu kāʼa láŋ nɛ chwīe a pwa, ndɔ yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa a lāa ki lɔ ndaŋ nɛ ka chwīe a pwapwa ŋgaʼa.
Láŋ miŋgwɛ pugu ndaoŋ vi krao nɔ haʼaŋ ndaoŋ vi wuʼɔ mbɔ yi maoŋ nɛ. Ndɔ ti n̈daoŋ vi ŋkhu, kaŋ a fāʼo shɨ̀na nɔ laŋ nu mimbia ŋa a khwā nɛ pi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mimbia ghɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ piŋ Taathɔ.
Ndɔ moŋ nyaŋ pīʼi nu, a shi mfāʼo ntou pwatua nɔ haʼaŋ ä ŋkɨna nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ. Ndɔ m̀bīʼi ŋa mmu ŋkaa mu fāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Ndwɛ, nɔ pa maoŋ jɨ
ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, pigi ji ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ nchhu ŋa, “ŋguoŋ yia fāʼo lɨna.” Lɨna ghà nchwīe ŋoŋ fāʼo nōoŋ noŋ, ndɔ khwǎ ghà māʼaŋ ghrɨ́.
S̈hesheŋoŋ mbīʼi ŋa a ji nnu, ŋgaŋ vi lɔ naa nji nɔ haʼaŋ a fāʼo nɔ ji nu nɛ.
Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a khwā Minnwi nɛ, Minnwi ji vi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, nɔ jɨ nu maoŋ ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, pigi ji yinɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ shɨna pəɨ chhu ŋa, “yichəɨ yaoŋ lɔ mbɔ fɔ nɔ nnwi moŋ mbhi” pugu pa ŋa “a wuʼɔ taʼa Minnwi ŋa a pɔ.”
Ä ndɔ mbɔ pi ŋa yaoŋ pɔ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni pa nnwi, ki a pɔ pi po ki shhɛ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ shishini ntou pa “nnwi” pugu pa “taathɔ” pɔ nɛ,

ndɔ ni pia a wuʼɔ mbɔ taʼa Minnwi, mbɔ Tǎa ŋa ŋguoŋ pa yaoŋ llɔ pi mbhɔ yu, pia chɔmbhi nthɛ pi ju, ni taʼa Taathɔ mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto ŋa pi tɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ yu nchwīe ŋguoŋ pa yaoŋ, pia fāʼo chɔmbhi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu nɛ.

Ndɔ a lɔ mfāʼo ŋguoŋ ŋgwa mfāʼo lɨna yei. Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa ni ŋkwo we ni pa nnwi ti nchəɨŋ ndwɛ, nnɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa pugu jɨ maoŋ ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, pugu pīʼi ŋa a pɔ pi ghaʼo nu ya nnwi shini. Nthɛ ŋa ŋgaŋthɔ yugu lɔ ntɨnɨ nɛ, pugu pīʼi ŋa pugu chwīe phɨ.
Mbaʼa a yiʼi nchwīe maoŋ jɨ shɨ̀na yia pia pa Minnwi pɔ shiʼi. Mbaʼa pia yiʼi mbhɛ yichəɨ yaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ p̈ia mieŋ ki jɨ, ki nshei yichəɨ yaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ p̈ia njɨ.
P̂əɨ lɨna nu ŋa kiʼi pɔ nu ŋa pəɨ fāʼo njɨ nɔ chwīe nu sheshe nnu pɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi ntɨnɨ moŋ piŋ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa s̈hesheŋoŋ njəɨ ghɔ ŋa ɔ fāʼo lɨna nɛ, ɔ thɔ njɨ yaoŋ nda pa nnwi, paʼa yie ghɔ lɔ nchwīe vi juju ŋkaa yu, ŋa ŋgaŋthɔ yi lɔ njiʼi ntɨnɨ nɛ, a jɨ maoŋ ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ?
Nɛnnɛ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pɔ nu ŋa ɔ ji, ɔ pɨrɨ ŋoŋ vei ŋa njùʼɔ yi lɔ nja ntɨnɨ nɛ, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa Krishto ni ŋkhu nthɛ vi nɛ.
Pəɨ kie nɛnnɛ mfāaŋ mbɨŋ pa lǐŋ pəɨ, nchhɔ mfɛ fɨ́ ni ŋgaŋthɔ yugu ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ntɨnɨ nɛ, nɛnnɛ mfāaŋ mbɨŋ Krishto.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, m̈aoŋ jɨ nchwīe ndǐŋ a moŋ piŋ chwīe phɨ, paʼa ǹdɔ ma nuʼuŋ ŋkru frɛ̀i, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ndǐŋ a gū moŋ phɨ.
Ǹdɔ mfāʼo njɨ nɔ chwīe nu sheshe nnu ŋa ŋ̀khwā nɛ nɔ shesheŋoŋ nduoŋ? Ǹdɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Krishto? Ǹshini ndɔ njəɨ Jishɔ Taathɔ via? Pəɨ lɔ mbɔ pi mbhɔ fàʼa a moŋ Taathɔ?
A kaŋ mbɔ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Krishto ligi pichəɨ ŋgwa, kaŋ shishini mi ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ vi ligi pəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ nduthɔ yəɨ pa lì nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa mi ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ.
Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ǹshi ntaa noŋ a shhɨ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu shi ntou a nɛ.
A lɔ mbie ŋa pi fɛ maoŋ jɨ pugu pa maoŋ nnu ni pigi ŋkaa pigi?
A lɔ ŋkāʼo ŋa pigi thɔ pigi pa piŋgɛ ŋa pigi laŋ, mbɔ ghaŋ piŋ, nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu pa ndǐŋ Taathɔ pugu pa Kefa chwīe ŋkaa pugu nɛ?
Ki a wuʼɔ pigi Banaba ŋa a yīʼi ŋa pigi fāʼa nɔ fāʼo nu yaoŋ?

A gɔ̌ ŋa a ghà mfāʼa nɔ shoogɛ ndɨna ju ni noŋ yi? A yəɨ ŋgaŋ fāʼa nyìeŋ ŋa minthɛ a phi ntíɛŋ thɨ moŋ nyìeŋ, ndɔ a nthɛ paʼa a lɔ ŋka ntíɛŋ thɨ moŋ nyìeŋ ghɔ njɨ, ki a ghà ŋkɛ̄ʼi gɔ̌ minjɨɨ ki lɔ nnu yichəɨ mbɨnɨ minjɨɨ ghɔ?
Ŋ̀guʼɔ nchrā yei nnu pi nɔ ŋoŋmishua? Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ lɔ ŋguʼɔ nchhu pi nɛnnɛ?
Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ moŋ gɨ́ Mushi ŋa, “Kiʼi ŋkrao nchò fua ndɨɨ ŋa a nyīeŋ nu ŋkuoŋ reshi nɔ kwīe nu nɛ.” Pəɨ pīʼi ŋa Minnwi lɨna pi ni fua nnɛ?
A lɔ nja nchrā nthɛ pi pia? Pi nāʼaŋ nnɛ nthɛ pi pia. Nthɛ ŋa ŋgaŋ fāʼa sho fāʼa nthɔ mfāʼo pi kwàʼa, ŋgaŋ kwōo nthɔ mfāʼo pi kwàʼa nɔ fāʼo nu ghrà maoŋ kwōo ghɔ.
P̈igi mbīgi ntíɛŋ moŋ jijwɛ shɨna pəɨ, a yiɛŋ ti ŋgaʼa nɔ kwōo nu ntíɛŋ, mbɔ maoŋ ŋa minthɛ pigi jɨ ndɔ nnu nɛ llɔ mbhɔ pəɨ?
P̈ichəɨ ŋgwa mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ kwe nu yaoŋ mbhɔ pəɨ, kaŋ pigi lɔ ŋka fāʼo fāʼo nchaa yie ghɔ?
Ndɔ pigi shini ndɔ njiʼi nthi pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ yei, pigi ghà ŋgwɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao nchaa ŋa pigi nūʼɔŋ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni pwa pishaʼakhɔ Krishto.

Pəɨ lɔ njəɨ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi nūʼɔŋ vugu ŋa pugu fāʼa nu moŋ Nda Minnwi nɛ ghà mfāʼo maoŋ jɨ pugu pi Nda Minnwi, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋkuoŋ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɛ fāʼo yichəɨ maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ghɔ nɔ maoŋ jɨ pugu?
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, Taathɔ fɛ gɨ́ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ nɛ fāʼo njru yugu llɔ ŋkuoŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghɔ.
Ndɔ, ǹdɔ njiʼi nthi ŋkuoŋ sheshe njɨ yei, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njiʼi nāʼaŋ nnu pei pi nɔ kie nu mfāʼo pa maoŋ pighɔ. A ka pwa ŋa ŋ̀khu nchaa ŋa m̀ieŋ ŋoŋ tāra a ni nnu ŋa ŋkwēi njùʼɔ nthɛ yie ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa m̈i nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ, paʼa yie lɔ njiʼi nchwīe a ŋ̀kwēi njùʼɔ a. Nthɛ ŋa a yiyiʼi ŋa ǹchīi. Ŋgəʼɨ shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ a nɔ haʼaŋ mi mieŋ ki lɔ nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa m̈i nchwīe pi ki pi lɔ njiʼi mfra a fra, kaŋ ǹshi mfāʼo pe. Ndɔ m̈i mieŋ pi ŋa pi ŋɨ a ŋɨ, kaŋ a wuʼɔ fàʼa ŋa pi fɛ ŋa nchwīe.
Ti pe a pɔ pi khɔ? A fāʼo nu shɨ̀na nɔ chīi nu pwa pishaʼakhɔ ki lɔ ŋkwe pe, ki lɔ nthi pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ a nɔ fāʼo nu pe moŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋkǔna mbhɔ shesheŋoŋ nɛ, ǹdɔ̄gɔ noŋ a mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa mbhɔ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋ̀kara ntou yugu.

Ni pa ŋgwa Juu, ŋ̀kara mbɔ nɔ ŋoŋ Juu nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋ̀kara ntou yugu. Ni pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà mbaʼo pi nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ Mushi nɛ, ŋ̀kara mbɔ taʼa ŋgaŋ nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ (njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a lɔ njīʼi ŋa mmu nduthɔ a nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ nɔ lūgu nu nɛ) nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋ̀kara ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu paʼo pi nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ nɛ.

Ndɨɨ ŋa m̀fāʼa pi pigi pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ nji nnu gɨ́ Mushi nɛ, mummu pɔ nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi nji nnu gɨ́ nɛ (ndɔ ki lɔ mbɔ pi ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ Minnwi, ŋ̀ga mbaʼo nu nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ Krishto) nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋ̀kara ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ nji nnu gɨ́ Mushi nɛ pugu gū ghaŋ piŋ.

Ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ nja ntɨnɨ moŋ piŋ nɛ, mummu pɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹdɔ nja ntɨnɨ moŋ piŋ ŋkaa mu, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋ̀kara ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ ntɨnɨ moŋ piŋ nɛ. Ŋ̀kwo gū ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao nnɛ ŋa moŋ ŋguoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao minthɛ ŋ̀kwe pichəɨ.
Ǹchwīe ŋguoŋ nnu pighɔ ghao nthɛ pi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ, ŋa pigi pugu fāʼo shéi yi kaʼa.
Pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa moŋ lɨʼɨ shɨrɨ tei, ŋguoŋ ghaŋ shɨrɨ tei ghao ghà ntei ndɔ a wuʼɔ mfāʼo taʼa yi ŋgáʼo? Nnɛ, p̂əɨ tei nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ shi mfāʼo ŋgáʼo ghɔ nɛ.

Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a ghà mbɔ moŋ nnu ŋa a pie ŋa pi shɨshɨrɨ nɛ ghà ŋgwɛ̄iŋ noŋ yugu moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu. Pugu ghà nchwīe nɛnnɛ ŋa pi shhɔ̄ vugu ni ŋgáʼo ŋa a ghà ndaʼa mbɨrɨ nɛ, ndɔ yia pɔ pi yɛ ŋa a shiʼa mbɨrɨ nɛ.
Nnɛ, ǹshiʼa njiʼi ntei pi ki lɔ ndīi lɨʼɨ. Nɔ ŋgaŋ chhwi krao, ǹshiʼa njiʼi māʼaŋ krao a pi lɨʼɨ gha.
Ŋ̀ga ŋgwie noŋ a, nchwīe ŋa a yaʼo pi mbhɔ mu, nnɛ ŋa ǹshi ŋga ŋkwo chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pichəɨ ŋgwa, paʼa mummu nduthɔ a lɔ mieŋ ki ŋkāʼo nɔ fāʼo nu ŋgáʼo ghɔ.

Ǹdɔ ntāʼa nu, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ŋa pəɨ mieŋ ki lɔ nji nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ pa tǎa pia ŋa pugu ni nthɔ njōu njiŋ Mushi llɛshhɨ nɛ. Ŋguoŋ yugu ghao ni mbɔ laʼo lúluŋ, nyīeŋ ntiri moŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ ni Ŋkhǐ Pipie nɛ.
Moŋ lúluŋ ghɔ pugu pa ŋkhǐ, pugu ni ŋkwe ŋkhǐ nɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ Mushi.
Ŋguoŋ yugu ghao ni njɨ wuʼɔ taʼa ŋkwaŋ maoŋ jɨ moŋ jijwɛ.
Ŋguoŋ yugu ni nnu taʼa ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ nnu moŋ jijwɛ. Pugu ni nnu ŋkhǐ llɔ moŋ ŋkhǐ moŋ ŋgùʼɔ moŋ jijwɛ ŋa pugu pugu ni nyīeŋ nu nɛ, ŋgùʼɔ ghɔ pɔ Krishto.
Ndɔ, Minnwi ni mfāʼo pɨgɨtua ni yiɛŋ yugu, nnɛ njwi vugu njrā khu yugu moŋ ŋkǔnu njó.
Nnɛ yei nnu ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi nɔ lì ni pia, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pia khwā phɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni nchwīe nɛ.
Kiʼi pəɨ pɔ ghaŋ ghaʼo pa nnwi nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ shɨna pugu ni mbɔ nɛ. Nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni nāʼaŋ nɛ, “Ŋgwa pighɔ ni nchɔchhɔ shhɛ njɨ maoŋ ndɔ nnu, ŋga ndɔllɔ nchwe michwe.”
Kiʼi pia māʼaŋ noŋ yia moŋ kwoshuoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ pugu ni nchwīe nu nɛ, moŋ taʼa llɛ́ pugu gū ŋkhu ti mbɔ paa wuŋ ŋkaŋ ni ŋkaŋ yi trɛi.
Kiʼi pia ywɛʼi Krishto nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ shɨna pugu ni nchwīe, pa mitwɛʼi jwi vugu nɛ.
Kiʼi pia luo nu nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ shɨna pugu ni nduo ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ gu jwi vugu nɛ.
Nnɛ nnu pei ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ pugu nɔ pa lì ndɔ pi nāʼaŋ nɔ tɨgɨ nu via nɔ ghɔ. Nthɛ ŋa pia pɔ yia pi moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa mbhi kwo chhɔ ndugwi nu nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ŝhesheŋoŋ ŋa a pīʼi ŋa a tithi nɛ lɨna nu kaŋ a shi ŋgū.

Yichəɨ ywɛʼi nu lɔ nɛ ŋgaʼa vəɨ, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi yɛ ŋa a ghà nthɔ ni sheshe ŋoŋmishua nɛ. Ndɔ Minnwi pɔ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nūʼɔŋ kàʼa yi nɛ, mbaʼa a yiʼi mieŋ ywɛʼi nu thɔ ni pəɨ nchaa fɨʼɨ ghrɨ́ yəɨ nɔ thi nu thi. Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ywɛʼi nu thɔ ni pəɨ nɛ, a pɨnɨ nchuʼɔ ndaoŋ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ kie ntaoŋ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ tīi shii.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ma ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ ŋa ŋ̀khwā, p̂əɨ tei ghaʼo nu pa nnwi.
Ǹthɔ nchrā nu ni pəɨ pi nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu fāʼo shiethɔ. P̂əɨ pīʼi nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ ŋkaa pəɨ ni thɔ yəɨ.

Ndua mbɔrɔ ŋa pia ghà mfɛ tōo nu nɔ ghɔ, ndɨɨ ŋa pia ghà ŋgrā ndɔ nnu nɛ, chhɔ nōoŋ pi ŋa pia pɔ pi ŋgia chhǐ Krishto. Brɛi ŋa pia ghà mbəʼɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pia kru brɛi ghɔ nɛ, chhɔ nōoŋ pi ŋa pia ŋgia noŋ Krishto.
Nthɛ ŋa a wuʼɔ taʼa brɛi, pia ŋa pia pɔ pi ntou yi nɛ, pia pɔ pi taʼa frɛinoŋ nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yia ghao ghrā pi taʼa brɛi ghɔ.
Pīʼi mbɨŋ ŋgwa Ishrae, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu kru maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɛ shi lɔ mbɔ pi ŋgia fàʼa lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ?
Njiŋ nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ kiʼɛ pɔ pi ŋa? Yie nōoŋ pi ŋa maoŋ jɨ ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ pɔ pi yichəɨ yaoŋ, ki ŋa pa nnwi pɔ pi yichəɨ yaoŋ?
Ŋga! Njiŋ nnu ghɔ pɔ pi ŋa pa ŋgwa ki ji Minnwi ghà ŋga mfɛ̄ʼi ŋgiɛŋ, mfɛ maoŋ pi ni pa miŋwɛiŋ. Pugu shi lɔ mfɛ pi ni Minnwi. Ndɔ paʼa ǹdɔ ntāʼa nu pəɨ chɨ kwò pəɨ pa miŋwɛiŋ.
Minthɛ paʼa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nnu ndua Taathɔ mbɨnɨ nnu ndua pa miŋwɛiŋ. Minthɛ paʼa pəɨ lɔ njɨ maoŋ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi Taathɔ mbɨnɨ njɨ ŋkuoŋ taprɛi pa miŋwɛiŋ.
Ki pia tāʼa nu nchwīe Taathɔ fāʼo thɛ fugu? Pia tɨtɨnɨ nchaa vi?
Pi ghà nchhu ŋa, “Minthɛ ǹchwīe sheshe nnu,” ndɔ a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a fāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ. “Minthɛ ǹchwīe sheshe nnu,” ndɔ a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a ghà nchwīe ŋoŋ kuʼɔ moŋ piŋ.
Kiʼi ŋoŋ wuʼɔ ntāʼa pi ji shéi ni noŋ yi, ŋoŋ tāʼa pi shéi ŋgwa nduoŋ.
Jɨ sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pi fīni nu moŋ taŋ frɛ̀i nɛ, ndɔ ki lɔ njiʼi mbie sheshe píe nthɛ pi ŋgaŋthɔ yɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa, “Ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pugu pa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ ghɔ, nɛ pɔ pi yi Taathɔ.”
Ŋ̈oŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi nji Minnwi nɛ mɛ̄iŋ vəɨ lɨʼɨ jɨ, p̈əɨ khwā nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu, pəɨ ghə̄ɨ, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pi tigi shhɨ pəɨ nɛ, pəɨ jɨ ki lɔ mbie sheshe pie nthɛ ŋgaŋthɔ yəɨ.
Ndɔ ti ŋ̈oŋ nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, “Pi kwo fɛ̄ʼi ŋgiɛŋ ni yaoŋ yinɛ” kiʼi pəɨ jɨ, nthɛ pi ŋgaŋthɔ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a shwei vəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi nchhu pi ŋgaŋthɔ yəɨ, nthɛ pi yi ŋoŋ ŋa a shwei vəɨ nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa, a shi nchwīe khɔ njɨ a nɔ chwīe nu sheshe nnu chhɔ naʼaŋ ŋgaŋthɔ ŋoŋ nduoŋ vəɨ?
M̈i kaŋ njɨ ni tōo nu, ŋoŋ fɛ̄ʼi a nthɛ pi khɔ, nthɛ nnu ŋa Ǹtōo Minnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ?
Nɛnnɛ, ki pəɨ jɨ pi yaoŋ ki nnu nu, ki sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ chwīe nu nɛ, p̂əɨ chwīe ŋguoŋ yi ghao pi nɔ fɛ nu ndighaʼo ni Minnwi.
P̂əɨ chhɔ chɔmbhi yəɨ moŋ ŋkwaŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi mbɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni pa Juu, ki ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ki ni chɔshi Minnwi.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋ̀ga ŋkāa nɔ chwīe nu túa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pwa moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ghao ŋa ǹchwīe nu nɛ, ki lɔ nchhɔ ntāʼa pi nyaŋ shéi nɛ, ǹtāʼa pi yi ntou ŋgwa, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pugu lūgu.
P̂əɨ pīni a wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹchhɔ mbīni Krishto nɛ.
Ndwɛ, m̀biŋ vəɨ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ kwiŋ a moŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ghao. Ndɔ mbɨnɨ nūʼɔŋ pa nùʼɔŋ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki fɛ ni pəɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ ǹtāʼa nu pəɨ ji ŋa thɔ sheshe mimbia pɔ pi Krishto, thɔ miŋgwɛ láŋ pɔ ndaoŋ vi, thɔ Krishto pɔ Minnwi.
Sheshe mimbia ŋa a luoŋ Minnwi, ki njəɨ nnu mbhɔ Minnwi nchhu nu, ni thɔ yi yi pūoŋ nɛ, chɨ̄ʼə thɔ yi.
Sheshe miŋgwɛ láŋ ŋa a luoŋ Minnwi, ki njəɨ nnu mbhɔ Minnwi nchhu ni thɔ sha nɛ, chɨ̄ʼə thɔ yi, a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi taʼa yaoŋ pugu kiri nu thɔ yi.
Nthɛ ŋa m̈iŋgwɛ láŋ mieŋ ki pūoŋ thɔ yi, a ya nɛ ŋkiri thɔ yi a kwiʼi. Ndɔ nthɛ ŋa a nnu lrithɔ ni miŋgwɛ nɔ yaʼa nu ŋgiithɔ yi, ki kiri nu thɔ yi nɛ, a pie ŋa a pūoŋ thɔ yi.
Nthɛ ŋa mimbia lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɔ pūoŋ nu thɔ yi nthɛ ŋa a pɔ pi fhi Minnwi, mbɨnɨ mbɔ ndighaʼo yi. Ndɔ miŋgwɛ pɔ pi ndighaʼo mimbia.
Nthɛ ŋa pi shi ki lɔ nchwīe mimbia pi llɔ mbɨŋ miŋgwɛ, pi ni nchwīe pi miŋgwɛ llɔ mbɨŋ mimbia.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi shini ndɔ nchwīe mimbia nthɛ pi miŋgwɛ, pi ni nchwīe pi miŋgwɛ nthɛ mimbia.
A nnu ŋa a chwīe a pie ŋa miŋgwɛ fāʼo lì thɔ yu nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa a ghaʼo ndaoŋ vi, nnɛ nthɛ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi.
Mbapa nɛnnɛ, moŋ chɔmbhi yia moŋ Taathɔ, miŋgwɛ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ni thɔ yi ki mimbia, ndɔ paʼa mimbia lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ni thɔ yi ki miŋgwɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni nchwīe miŋgwɛ pi llɔ mbɨŋ mimbia nɛ, a wuʼɔ haʼaŋ a phi miŋgwɛ mbhi mimbia. Ndɔ ŋguoŋ nnu ghao llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi.
Pəɨ pīʼi ni thɔ yəɨ ŋa a kāʼo ŋa miŋgwɛ luoŋ Minnwi ni thɔ sha?
Púoŋ mbhi lɔ nōoŋ ŋa a nnu lrithɔ ni mimbia nɔ fāʼo nu ntaaŋ ŋgiithɔ?
Ndɔ ti m̈iŋgwɛ mfāʼo ntaaŋ ŋgiithɔ a pɔ pi ndìpwa ghɔ. Pi fɛ ntaaŋ ŋgiithɔ ghɔ nɔ pūoŋ nu thɔ yi.
Ndɔ ti s̈hesheŋoŋ ntāʼa nu ndōu, kaŋ pigi lɔ mfāʼo yichəɨ nùʼɔŋ nduoŋ ndɔ paʼa pa chɔshi Minnwi lɔ mfāʼo ŋkaa pugu.
Ndɔ moŋ nnu yei ŋa ǹtāʼa nu nchhu ni pəɨ nɛ, ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ mbiŋ vəɨ piŋ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ shi lɔ ŋkɨrɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ pi nɔ shiʼi, pəɨ kɨrɨ pi nɔ phɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ jɛ̄ nu, ǹjaʼo ŋa pa minduoŋnduoŋ pɔ shɨna pəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ kɨrɨ nɔ chɔshi nɛ, ndɔ m̀biŋ ŋa nnu shini pɔ moŋ nnu yei.
Ndɔ khuthɔ lɔ mbɔ, a yiʼi ŋa minduoŋnduoŋ fāʼo nɔ pɔ nu shɨna pəɨ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pi ji pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shɨna pəɨ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ kɨrɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ nɛ, pəɨ lɔ njiʼi njɨ pi maoŋ jɨ Taathɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ pīʼi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ jɨ nu nɛ, shesheŋoŋ ghəɨghəɨ nthɔ njɨ ji ki lɔ nchēi ndǐŋ vi. Njì yia taʼa ŋoŋ ndɔ vichəɨ ŋoŋ ka lɔ ŋkwo paapaa.

Pəɨ lɔ mfāʼo pa laʼa nɔ jɨ nu ndɔ nnu nu fɔ? Ki pəɨ tāʼa nu nchɨ̄ʼə chɔshi Minnwi ndɔ māʼaŋ lrithɔ mbɨŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yaoŋ nɛ? Mi shi nchhu ni pəɨ pi ŋa? Ǹshi mbiŋ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ chwīe a kāʼo moŋ nnu yei? Ŋga, m̀baʼa mōoŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa ntɨ́gɨ ŋa mi ni ŋkwe mbhɔ Taathɔ nɛ, yɛ ŋa m̀fɛ ni pəɨ nɛ: Ŋa ni tuʼu yɛ ŋa pi ni mfīni Jishɔ Taathɔ, a ni ndɔ̄gɔ brɛi,
ŋga ntōo Minnwi, mbəʼɨ nchhu ŋa,
“Yei frɛinoŋ a ŋa a pɔ ni pəɨ. P̂əɨ chwīe nɛiŋ nɔ kwiŋ nu ma.”
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, a lɔ̄gɔ ndua ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni ŋkwo kru nɛ, nchhu ŋa,
“Ndua làʼo yei pɔ pi kɨ̀na fhi ŋa Minnwi wrā moŋ chhǐ a nɛ. Sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ nnu nɛ, pəɨ chwīe nɛnnɛ nɔ kwiŋ nu ma.”
Sheshe ndɨɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ kru brɛi yei ndɔ nnu ndua làʼo yei nɛ, p̂əɨ chīi gu Taathɔ ti a shi nthɔ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kru brɛi ghɔ ki nnu ndua Taathɔ moŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɛ, shi mbɔ ŋgushaʼa nthɛ frɛinoŋ Taathɔ pugu pa chhǐ yi.
Ndɔ a yīʼi ŋa ŋ̂oŋ līi noŋ yi ŋkaoŋ maa ŋkru brɛi ghɔ ndɔ nnu ndua làʼo ghɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ mieŋ ki ji njiŋ frɛinoŋ Taathɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a kru brɛi ghɔ ndɔ nnu llɔ moŋ ndua làʼo ghɔ nɛ, kaŋ a niʼiŋ sháʼa mbɨŋ yu nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ kru ndɔ nnu nɛ.
A chwīe yei ghɔ paʼa ntou pa ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ lɔ ntɨnɨ, pichəɨ fāʼo ghɨ̌nɔ, pichəɨ pɨnɨ ŋkhu.
Pia kaŋ ni nshaʼa noŋ yia shishiʼi paʼa pi lɔ njiʼi nshaʼa via.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Taathɔ shaʼa via nɛ, a yuʼu via yuʼu nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pia ma mbɔ pa ŋgushaʼa pia pa ŋkuoŋ mbhi kaʼa.
Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ kɨrɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ nɔ jɨ nu maoŋ jɨ Taathɔ nɛ, p̂əɨ ywɛrɛ pichəɨ ŋgwa.
N̈jì njia shesheŋoŋ, â jɨ maoŋ laʼa, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ gha ŋkɨrɨ, kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo njɔ́ Minnwi.
Ǹshi mbīri pa pɨgəɨ nnu ndɨɨ ŋa ǹthɔ nɛ.
Ndwɛ, nthɛ pa fɛ́ moŋ Jijwɛ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ǹdɔ ntāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ pɔ moŋ ki ji.
Pəɨ ji ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ shini ndɔ naa mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ, pi ni nchwīe pəɨ fāaŋ ndaoŋ nchhɔ ŋgaʼo pa nnwi ŋa mimfɛ paʼa pugu lɔ nchrā nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, ǹtāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ ji ŋa mbaʼa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chrā pi ni Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ yiʼi nchɔ̄nɔ Jishɔ, ndɔ mbaʼa shesheŋoŋ chhu ŋa Jishɔ Taathɔ ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Ntou pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ fɛ́ moŋ Jijwɛ pɔ fɔ, ndɔ ŋguoŋ yi ghao llɔ pi mbhɔ Taʼa Jijwɛ.
Ntou pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ fàʼa pɔ, ndɔ ŋguʼɔ ndhɔ pi mbhɔ taʼa Taathɔ.
Ntou pa nnu chwīe pɔ fɔ, ndɔ a wuʼɔ taʼa Minnwi ŋa a fɛ njɨ ŋguoŋ yugu ghao ni shesheŋoŋ.
Ndɔ ni shesheŋoŋ, Jijwɛ Minnwi nōoŋ noŋ yi ŋa pugu yu pɔ kaʼa nnɛ nɔ thɔ nu ni ghɛ̀rɛ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.
Jijwɛ ghɔ fɛ chrà ŋkɨ̀nɨ shiethɔ ni taʼa ŋoŋ, ŋga mbɔ ni vichəɨ ŋoŋ, wuʼɔ taʼa Jijwɛ ghɔ fɛ ŋkɨ̀nɨ chrà lɨna.
Wuʼɔ taʼa Jijwɛ ghɔ fɛ piŋ ni yichəɨ ŋoŋ, ŋga mbɔ ni vichəɨ a fɛ njɨ yɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ.

A fɛ ni yichəɨ taʼa ŋoŋ, njɨ nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu ghraoghrao, ni yichəɨ, a fɛ yəɨ nu nnu nchhu. A fɛ ni yichəɨ, njɨ nɔ ji nu ŋa ki ŋkɨ̀nɨ llɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi ki jijwɛ nduoŋ. A pɨnɨ mfɛ ni yichəɨ, njɨ nɔ chrā nu moŋ pa chrà taoŋ ŋa pi lɔ nji nɛ, ni vichəɨ a fɛ njɨ nɔ tūgu nu chrà pighɔ ŋa pi shi lɔ nji nɛ.
Ndɔ wuʼɔ taʼa Jijwɛ ghɔ fāʼa ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei. A thɔ mfɛ pa fɛ́ ni shesheŋoŋ wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a khwā nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ ŋoŋmishua taʼa yi ndɔ mfāʼo ntou pa ghrà pi nɛ, ndɔ ŋguoŋ pa ghrà pi pighɔ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a ntou pi nɛ, pɔ pi taʼa frɛinoŋ, a nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ ni Krishto ŋkaa yu nɛ.
Pi ni ŋkwe via ni ŋkhǐ moŋ taʼa Jijwɛ moŋ taʼa frɛinoŋ, ki pia pɔ pi ŋgwa Juu ki ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ki pia pɔ pi pa kǔna ki ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ mbɔ kǔna, pi ni nchwīe ŋa pia nnu llɔ moŋ taʼa Jijwɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa frɛinoŋ lɔ ŋguʼɔ mfāʼo pi taʼa ghrà yi, a fāʼo pi ntou pi.
Ti k̈wo nchhu ŋa, “Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ mbhɔ nɛ, ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ taʼa ghrà noŋ yɔ,” paʼa yinɛ lɔ nchwīe vi ŋa kiʼi a pɔ taʼa ghrà noŋ ghɔ.
Ti ẗə́nə nchhu ŋa, “Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ muuŋ ligi nɛ, ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ taʼa ghrà noŋ ghɔ,” paʼa yinɛ lɔ nchwīe vi ki a lɔ mbɔ taʼa ghrà noŋ ghɔ.
Ti ŋguoŋ n̈oŋ kaŋ ni mbɔ pi muuŋ ligi, a yaʼo lɨʼɨ pi nɛiŋ? Ti ä kaŋ ni mbɔ pi tə́nə, a yaʼo luŋ yaoŋ pi nɛiŋ?
Ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, Minnwi niʼiŋ ŋguoŋ pa ghrà noŋ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ pi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ntāʼa nu nɛ.
Ŋguoŋ noŋ ŋoŋ ghao kaŋ ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi taʼa ghrà, noŋ ŋoŋ kaŋ mbɔ pi hɨŋ?
Ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, noŋ ŋoŋ fāʼo ntou pa ghrà ndɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi taʼa yi.
Nɛnnɛ minthɛ paʼa muuŋ ligi lɔ nchhu ni mbhɔ ŋa, “Ndɔ njiʼi ntāʼa ghɔ.” Ndɔ mbaʼa thɔ chhu ni kwò ŋa, “Ndɔ njiʼi ntāʼa ghɔ!”
Ndɔ a ka pɔ pi pɛ pa ghrà noŋ ŋa a fhi nɔ haʼaŋ a lɔ nja ntɨnɨ nɛ ŋa mbaʼa noŋ ŋoŋ pɔ ki pie ghɔ.
Pa pɛ ghrà noŋ ŋa pia pīʼi ŋa pugu lɔ mbɔ yaoŋ nɛ, ka pɔ pi pɛ ŋa pia ghà nja ndɨna nɔ ghɔ nɛ. Pɛ ghrà noŋ ŋa mbaʼa ŋgwa yəɨ nɛ, pia ya mbūoŋ vugu shiʼi,
ndɔ pɛ ghrà ŋa pugu chɨ̄ɨ nɛ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbie ŋa pi tuʼɔshə vugu nɛnnɛ. Ndɔ Minnwi chwīe noŋ ŋoŋ moŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pi fɛ ndichɨɨ ni pɛ ghrà ŋa a lɔ nja nchɨɨ nɛ,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi minduoŋnduoŋ pɔ moŋ noŋ, ndɔ taʼa ghrà noŋ lɨna ni yichəɨ wuʼɔ ndɨndɨ.
T̈aʼa ghrà noŋ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ, ŋguoŋ yi yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ kaʼa, p̈i ŋgaʼo taʼa ghrà noŋ, ŋguoŋ yi ghao fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ pugu pa yie ghɔ.
Ŋguoŋ vəɨ ghao pɔ pi noŋ Krishto, shesheŋoŋ ni thɔ yi pɔ taʼa ghrà noŋ yi.

Minnwi nūʼɔŋ pa ŋgwa moŋ chɔshi, fǔoŋ yi pɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, mbra yi pɔ pa ghaŋ chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi, mbra mbra yi pɔ pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa. Pichəɨ kiʼɛ pɔ ghaŋ fāʼa nu pa nnu ghraoghrao, pichəɨ kiʼɛ pɔ pa fɛ́ yɨ̄gɨ nu ghɨ̌nɔ, ni ghɛ̀rɛ nu ŋgwa, ni fɛ́ pɔ nu nthishɨ, ni pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ chrà.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nuʼuŋ mbɔ pi pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ? Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nuʼuŋ mbɔ pi pa ghaŋ chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi? Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nuʼuŋ mbɔ pi pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa? Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghà nuʼuŋ mfāʼa pi pa nnu ghraoghrao?
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nuʼuŋ mfāʼo pi pa fɛ́ yɨ̄gɨ nu ghɨ̌nɔ? Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghà nchrā pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ chrà? A ghà nuʼuŋ ntūgu ŋguoŋ ntūgu ŋgwa pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ chrà?
Pəɨ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ kiʼɛ ŋkuoŋ pa fɛ́ mooŋ Jijwɛ ŋa a mɛmmɛ pi nɛ.
Ǹshi nōoŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a pwa nchaa ŋguoŋ yi nɛ ni pəɨ.
Ä mbɔ ŋa mimfɛ ǹchrā chrà pa ŋguoŋ taoŋtaoŋ pugu pa chrà ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo khwǎ, kaŋ m̀bɔ pi khu tuʼɔ yó ŋa a yɔ̄nɔ nu ki njəɨ ŋa a yɔ̄nɔ nu.
Ti ä mbɔ ŋa m̀fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chīi nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi nɔ ghɔ, ndɔ nji ŋguoŋ pa nnu lə̄ɨŋ ghao, pugu pa ŋguoŋ lɨna ghao, ki mfāʼo piŋ ŋa minthɛ a mūʼuŋ mbra ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo khwǎ, kaŋ mi yaoŋ ghagha.
M̈i mfɛ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa m̀fāʼo nɛ ni pa ghaŋ pou, ndɔ mfɛ noŋ a nnɛ ŋa mimfɛ ŋkwēi njùʼɔ
a nɔ ghɔ ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo khwǎ, paʼa ǹdɔ nshei sheshe yaoŋ.
Khwǎ pɔ pi wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ, ni nōoŋ nu pwapuŋ, khwǎ shiʼa mfāʼo kighɨʼə, ki mfāʼo kwēi njùʼɔ, ki lɔ māʼaŋ ntintaʼo,
ki lɔ nchrā chrà nchɨʼəshə, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ ntāʼa pi ji nnu, ki lɔ njiʼa mbɨgɨ túa, ki lɔ nūʼɔŋ pa fàŋ ŋa pi chwīe nɛ.
Khwǎ shiʼa mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ moŋ ntəɨ, a ghà mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ pi nnu shini.
Khwǎ shiʼa njiʼi ŋkɨna, a ghà mbiŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ghao, mfāʼo kwàʼa ni ŋguoŋ nnu mbɨnɨ ntīi shii moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ghao.
Khwǎ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ndugwi yi. Chhu nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi, shi ma ntɔgɔ, pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ chrà, shi ma ntithi, pa lɨna tɔgɔ ŋkaa pugu.
Pia ji pi ghrà nnu, ndɔ nchhu ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi pi ghrà yi.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa yɛ ŋa a kāʼo thɔ nɛ, kaŋ yɛ ŋa a ghrà yi nɛ shi ntɔgɔ gha.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki pɔ mikəʼɨ nɛ, ŋki chrā nɔ mikəʼɨ, mbīʼi nnu nɔ mikəʼɨ, njwɛrɛ nnu nɔ mikəʼɨ. Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa mi ni ŋgū ntɨnɨmmɛ nɛ, m̀īʼaŋ pa nnu mikəʼɨ.

Nthɛ ŋa ndwɛ, pia yəɨ yaoŋ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ pi moŋ mililigi fuŋfuŋ, ndɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ pia pa Jishɔ shi njəɨ ligi. Yaoŋ ŋa ǹji ndwɛ nɛ wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ghrà yi, ndɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, ǹshi nja nji ŋguoŋ pa nnu ghao wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ya nji a shishiʼi nɛ.
Trɛi nnu pei shi ma ŋkɨna: piŋ, kwàʼa ni khwǎ, ndɔ yɛ ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ yi ghao nɛ khwǎ.
Yōu njiŋ khwǎ, ndɔ nshigi pa fɛ́ Jijwɛ Minnwi llɔ moŋ njùʼɔ ghɔ, mīʼɛŋ mbɔ fɛ́ chhu nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a chrā nu moŋ ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà nɛ lɔ njiʼi nchrā pi ni ŋgwa, a chrā pi ni Minnwi, nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ lɔ nji nnu ŋa a chhu nu nɛ, ndɔ a chrā pi pa nnu lə̄ɨŋ moŋ Jijwɛ.
Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a chrā pi ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi nɛ, chrā pi ni ŋgwamishua nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu vugu pugu kuʼɔ moŋ piŋ, māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yugu, pugu pa njùʼɔ yugu.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a chrā moŋ ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà nɛ ghɛ̄rɛ pi wuʼɔ noŋ yi ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a chhu pi ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi nɛ ghɛ̄rɛ pi chɔshi.

Ndwɛ, ŋ̀khwā ŋa ŋguoŋ yəɨ chrā moŋ ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà ndɔ ŋ̀ka khwā ŋgaʼa pi ŋa pəɨ chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi. Ŋoŋ ŋa a chīi pi ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi nɛ chaa ŋoŋ ŋa a chrā pi moŋ ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà nɛ, kaŋ a nɛiŋ ŋoŋ pɔ nɔ tūgu nu ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà ghɔ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ a ghɛ̄rɛ chɔshi.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, m̈i nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ nchrā ni pəɨ pi moŋ ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà, a ghɛ̄rɛ vəɨ pi ni khɔ, kaŋ a nɛiŋ, ǹtūgu pi yichəɨ nnu ŋa Minnwi nōoŋ nɛ, ki yichəɨ nnu lɨna, ki yəɨ nu nnu nchhu ki yichəɨ yaoŋ yɛʼi?
Njiʼi nthɛ pi pa yaoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ yi maoŋ, nɔ pa mbó, ki miləŋgəɨŋ nɔ paʼo nu lóu, a nthɛ pi ji nnu ŋa maoŋ pighɔ chhu nu nɛ pi nɛiŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pi mieŋ ki lɔ mbaʼo shiʼi?
Ki pi mvāʼa paʼo nu kwěi, a ji gɔ̌ nnu ŋa a chhu nu nɛ nɔ pīri nu noŋ yi nɔ nchhɔ̀?
A wuʼɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ ni pəɨ nɛ. P̈əɨ nchrā moŋ ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà ŋa ŋgwa lɔ njaʼo nu nɛ, ŋoŋ kie pi nɛiŋ nji nnu ŋa ɔ chhu nɛ? Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ shi nthɔ nchrā nu pi moŋ ghanjɨ.
Nnu khuthɔ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ ŋa ntou pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ chrà pɔ moŋ mbhi, ndɔ paʼa kaŋ taʼa yi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo njiŋ yi.
Ä mbɔ kiʼɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nji njiŋ chrà, m̀bɔ shhɨ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a chrā nu nɛ pi nɔ ŋgɨ̀nɨ, juju ŋkaa yu pɔ yəɨ mu pi nɔ ŋgɨ̀nɨ.
A wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ khwā nu nɔ fāʼo nu pa fɛ́ moŋ Jijwɛ nɛ, p̂əɨ paʼo nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu shhɨ moŋ pa fɛ́ ŋa a ghɛ̄rɛ chɔshi kuʼɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ kiʼɛ, ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nchrā moŋ pa ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà nɛ, luoŋ ŋa pi fɛ ghrɨ́ shwei nu njiŋ yi.
Nthɛ ŋa mi nduoŋ Minnwi moŋ ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà, jijwɛ a luoŋ nu ndɔ paʼa ǹdɔ nji njiŋ sheshe nnu ghɔ moŋ lɨna a.
Ti mi shi nchwīe pi nɛiŋ kiʼɛ? Ǹshi nduoŋ ni jijwɛ a, ndɔ mbɨnɨ nduoŋ ni lɨna a. Ǹshi njrāo ŋkhǐ ŋgaʼo Minnwi ni jijwɛ a, ŋguʼɔ mbɨnɨ njrāo ni lɨna a.
Kiɛŋ nɛnnɛ, ɔ̈ mfɛ tōo nu ni jijwɛ yɔ, ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo fɛ́ yei, ŋa pəɨ yu luoŋ nu nɛ, a kie pi nɛiŋ nchhu ŋa, “A yie!” ni tōo nu ghɔ ŋa ɔ fɛ nu nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ a mieŋ ki ji njiŋ yi?
Nthɛ ŋa minthɛ ɔ thɔ nja mfɛ pi tōo nu shini, ndɔ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi nchhɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ yini ŋoŋ.
Ǹtōo Minnwi ŋa ŋ̀ga nchrā moŋ pa ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà nchaa ŋguoŋ yəɨ ghao.
Ndɔ moŋ chɔshi, a lɔ ŋka pwa pi ŋa ǹchrā tiɛŋ ndigi chrà ni lɨna a, nnɛ ŋa ǹtɨgɨ pichəɨ ŋgwa, nchaa ŋa ǹchrā wuŋ ŋkaŋ chrà moŋ pa ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà?
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, kiʼi pəɨ pīʼi nnu nɔ pa puoŋ prɔ. P̂əɨ pɔ pi puoŋ fhu moŋ pa nnu pɨphɨ, ndɔ moŋ pīʼi nu nnu yəɨ, p̂əɨ pɔ pa ntɨnɨmmɛ.
Pi nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ ŋa,
“Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà pugu pa nnu ŋa a taoŋ nchò pa ghɨ̀nɨ nɛ,
ǹshi nchrā ni ŋgwa pei.
Njiʼi nthɛ pi nɛnnɛ mbaʼa pugu yiʼi njaʼo,
a chhu ju Taathɔ.”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pa ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà pɔ pi lì ki lɔ mbɔ pi ni ghaŋ piŋ, a pɔ pi ni ghaŋ ki piŋ, ndɔ yəɨ nu nnu mbhɔ Minnwi nchhu, pɔ pi lì, ndɔ ki lɔ mbɔ pi ni ghaŋ ki piŋ, a pɔ pi ni ghaŋ piŋ.
Ndɔ ti a kaŋ mbɔ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ chɔshi kɨrɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao thɔ nchrā pi ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà, pa ŋgwa mbhi, ki ghaŋ ki piŋ nii njəɨ, paʼa pugu lɔ nchhu ŋa pəɨ chhɔ mbapa?
Ndɔ ti ŋguoŋ ŋgwa kaŋ njəɨ pi nnu mbhɔ Minnwi nchhu nu, ŋgaŋ ki piŋ, ki ŋoŋ mbhi nii, ŋguoŋ nnu ghɔ ŋa pi chhu nu nɛ wɛ̄iŋ vi, ŋguoŋ nnu ghɔ ŋa a yaʼo nɛ shaʼa vi.
Pa nnu lə̄ɨŋ pɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ njùʼɔ yu nɛ taoŋ páa, nnɛ a gū ni puŋ yi shhɛ, ŋgaʼo Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa Minnwi ya mbɔ shɨna pəɨ.

Yei nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ, ma lǐŋ paŋ. Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ kɨrɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ nɛ, taʼa ŋoŋ mfāʼo ŋkhǐ ghaʼo Minnwi, yichəɨ fāʼo yaoŋ nɔ yɛʼi nu, yichəɨ fāʼo nnu ŋa pi nōoŋ ghɔ, ndɔ yichəɨ fāʼo ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà ki tūgu nu ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà ghɔ. P̂əɨ chwīe ŋguoŋ pa nnu pɔ pi nɔ ghɛ̀rɛ nu chɔshi a kuʼɔ.
Ti s̈hesheŋoŋ nchrā nu moŋ ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà, a pie ŋa a pɔ paa ŋgwa, ti a ŋgaʼa a pɔ yi trɛi, taʼa ŋoŋ chrā mfɛ shɨ̀na ni ndǐŋ vi, ndɔ a pie ŋa yichəɨ ŋoŋ tūgu.
Ndɔ ti ŋ̈oŋ mieŋ ki lɔ mbɔ nɔ tūgu nu, a pie ŋa shesheŋoŋ vugu lɛrɛ laŋ moŋ chɔshi, ŋguʼɔ nchrā pi ni noŋ yi pugu Minnwi.
A pie ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pi paa ki pi trɛi chrā, pichəɨ līi nnu haʼaŋ pugu chhu nu nɛ shishiʼi.
Ndɔ ti Taathɔ nōoŋ nnu ni yichəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a chɔchɔ nɛ, a pie ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a chrā nu nɛ lɛrɛ laŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋguoŋ vəɨ, pa taʼa taʼa, chhu ŋkɨ̀nɨ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa yɛʼi yaoŋ ndɔ mfāʼo māʼaŋ njùʼɔ.
Ŋoŋ haʼaŋ a fāʼo fɛ́ chīi nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi nɔ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi fɛ nɛ fāʼo njɨ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu noŋ yi, njwɛrɛ ji shɨ̀na.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi lɔ mbɔ Minnwi vuvuʼu, ndɔ a pɔ pi yi taʼaŋggi, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa chɔshi ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ.
P̂iŋgɛ lɛrɛ laŋ moŋ pa chɔshi, nthɛ ŋa pi lɔ mbiŋ ŋa pugu chrā. A pie ŋa pugu shwiʼi noŋ yugu nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ chhu nɛ.
S̈heshe nnu mbɔ ŋa pugu khwā nɔ yɛʼi nu, a pie ŋa pugu pie ni pa laoŋ pugu laʼa. Nthɛ ŋa a nnu lrithɔ ni miŋgwɛ nɔ chrā nu moŋ chɔshi.
Ki chrà Minnwi ni ndhɔ pi mbhɔ pəɨ nthɔ? Ki a wuʼɔ pəɨ təʼɨ vəɨ ŋa chrà Minnwi chəɨŋ mbhɔ pəɨ?
S̈hesheŋoŋ mbīʼi ŋa a ŋgaŋ chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi, ki mfāʼo fɛ́ llɔ mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi, a fāʼo nɔ ji nu ŋa nnu ŋa ǹāʼaŋ nu ni pəɨ nɛ pɔ pi kɨ̀na llɔ mbhɔ Taathɔ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ mieŋ ki lɔ nji nnu yei, kaŋ pi lɔ nji vi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ ya nshigi nɔ chīi nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi, ndɔ ki lɔ njiʼi ndāa ŋa kiʼi ŋgwa chrā nu moŋ pa ŋgɨ̀nɨ chrà.
Ndɔ a pie ŋa pi chwīe ŋguoŋ pa nnu shishiʼi ndɔ mbɔ moŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a kāʼo nɛ.
Ndwɛ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ǹshi ŋkwiŋ vəɨ ni pwa pishaʼakhɔ ŋa mi ni nchīi ni pəɨ nɛ, ŋa pəɨ ni mbiŋ ndɔ nthi moŋ ghɔ a tɨnɨ nɛ.
A pwa pishaʼakhɔ yei ŋa a kwe vəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ chrà ŋa ŋki chīi ni pəɨ nɛ a tɨnɨ, kiɛŋ nnɛ kaŋ piŋ nu yəɨ ni mbɔ pi ghagha.
Yaoŋ haʼaŋ pi ni mfɛ vəɨ nɛ, ŋki fɛ ni pəɨ nɔ fǔoŋ mmɛ nnu: ŋa Krishto ni ŋkhu nthɛ phɨ yia nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ,
pugu pa ŋa pi ni ntwei vi, pugu pa ŋa a ni ŋga mbɔ trɛi llɛ́ a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ,
pugu pa ŋa a ni nōoŋ noŋ yi ni Kefa, mbra kiʼɛ ni ŋguoŋ paanchrɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi.
Mbɨnɨ nōoŋ noŋ yi ni pichəɨ pa ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ti ntɔgɔ tiɛŋ ŋkɨɨ yugu taʼa kiɛŋ shhɛ, ntou yugu wuʼɔ mbiʼi mbhi, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ kwo khu nɛ.
Mbɨnɨ nōoŋ noŋ yi kiʼɛ ni Jɛiŋ, nōoŋ kiʼɛ ni ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi.
Ndugwi yi, a nōoŋ noŋ yi vəɨ ŋkaa mu nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa pi phi vi pi ki ndɨɨ lɔ ŋkāʼo.
Nthɛ ŋa mi ndugwi njiŋ shɨna ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ghao, paʼa ndɔ ŋkāʼo ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ a ni ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ nthɛ ŋa mi ni mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni chɔshi Minnwi.

Ndɔ, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi, mi yaoŋ ŋa mi yie ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ ti paʼa pwapuŋ yi vəɨ ni ndɔ mbhɛ pi ghagha. Ndɔ ŋki ka fāʼa fāʼa nchaa ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, ndɔ a shini ndɔ nja nthɔ mfāʼa mmu, a ni mfāʼa pwapuŋ Minnwi mbɨŋ mu.
Ki a ni mbɔ pi mmu ki pugu, yei yaoŋ ŋa pigi ni nchīi nɛ, mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ ni mbiŋ nɛ.
Ndwɛ, p̈i nchīi ŋa Krishto pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu, pichəɨ ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ kie pi nɛiŋ nchhu ŋa mbaʼa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu khu nɛ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ?
Ndɔ ti ä mbɔ ŋa mbaʼa ŋgwa khu pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu, kaŋ njiʼi nthɛ pi Krishto lɔ njiʼi ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu,
ndɔ ti ä mbɔ ŋa Krishto lɔ njiʼi ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu, kaŋ nnu ŋa pigi chīi nu nɛ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ, ndɔ paʼa piŋ yəɨ lɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ.

Nɔ pīgi nu, a nōoŋ ŋa pigi chhɔ ndɛʼi pi ŋgiɛŋ nthɛ Minnwi, nthɛ ŋa pigi chhu nu ŋa a ni nchwīe Krishto kuʼɔ moŋ gu, ndɔ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi nchwīe a kuʼɔ shini moŋ gu, nɔ haʼaŋ ä mbɔ nnu shini ŋa mbaʼa ŋgwa khu kuʼɔ moŋ gu.
Ä mbɔ ŋa mbaʼa pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu khu nɛ kuʼɔ, yie nōoŋ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi Krishto shini ndɔ ŋkuʼɔ.
Ndɔ ti ä mbɔ ŋa Krishto shini ndɔ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu, kaŋ piŋ yɔ pɔ pi ghagha ndɔ pəɨ wuʼɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ moŋ phɨ yəɨ.
Nnɛ kaŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khu ndɔ mbɔ ghaŋ piŋ Krishto nɛ phɛ gha.
P̈ia mfāʼo kwàʼa yia mbɨŋ Krishto pi wuʼɔ moŋ yei chɔmbhi hɛiŋ, a pie ŋa pi kwoshɨnɨ yia nchaa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.
Ndɔ shishini, Krishto kuʼɔ llɔ moŋ gu. A fǔoŋ ŋoŋ nɔ kuʼɔ nu nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu kwo khu nɛ shi ŋkuʼɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ntɔgɔ mbhɔ taʼa ŋoŋ, guthɔ nɛ, a wuʼɔ mbɨnɨ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu khu nɛ shi mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ moŋ Adaŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa khu nɛ, wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, moŋ Krishto pi shi nchwīe ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɔ pi maoŋ.
Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ shi ŋkuʼɔ moŋ ji ndɨɨ, Krishto pɔ fǔoŋ yi shɨna ŋguoŋ yi, nnɛ kiʼɛ moŋ ndɨɨ yɛ ŋa a shi nthɔ nɛ, a pɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ pi yi Krishto nɛ.
Nnɛ kiʼɛ ndugwi yi thɔ, ndɨɨ ŋa a shi nchaʼa njɨ shaʼa nu nduʼu ni Minnwi Tǎa, ndɨɨ ŋa a kwo pɨrɨ ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ ŋa pugu shaʼa nu nɛ pugu pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa pugu pa mɛmmɛ ghaŋ njɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa a shi ŋguʼɔ nshaʼa ti nuʼuŋ nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ pa mimbɨna pi laʼo kwò yu.
Ndugwi mimbɨna ni Krishto nɔ shiʼi nu pɔ pi gu.

Nthɛ ŋa, “Minnwi kwo nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao laʼo kwò yu.” Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a chhu ŋa, “Ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao kwo pɔ laʼo kwò yu nɛ,” khuthɔ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋa chrà ghɔ ŋa “ŋguoŋ yaoŋ” lɔ mbɔ pi ŋa Minnwi nduthɔ yi ŋa a nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ laʼo kwò Krishto pɔ shɨna maoŋ pighɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao shi njaʼo pi mbhɔ yu nɛ, kaŋ Muuŋ ŋkaa yu shi njaʼo mbhɔ ju ŋa a nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ laʼo kwò yu nɛ, nnɛ ŋa Minnwi nthɛ a pɔ Taathɔ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ.

Ä mbɔ ŋa mbaʼa pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu khu nɛ yiʼi ŋkuʼɔ, ghɛ̀rɛ yi pɔ pi khɔ kiʼɛ nɔ kwe nu ŋgwa maoŋ ni ŋkhǐ nɔ ligi pa ŋgwa khu? Pi nuʼuŋ ŋkwe vugu ni ŋkhǐ ŋa, nɔ haʼaŋ ä mieŋ ki pɔ ŋa yichəɨ llɛ́ pa ŋgwa khu ma mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu?
Ti a chwīe khɔ kiʼɛ pia pɔ moŋ cho gu ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ?
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, ŋ̀ga ntɔgɔ moŋ gu ŋguoŋ llɛ́ ghao. Titɛnɛ ŋa ŋ̀ga mfāʼo mbɨŋ pəɨ, moŋ chɔmbhi yia ŋa pia fāʼo mbɨŋ Krishto Jishɔ, mbɔ Taathɔ nɛ, chwīe ǹchhu nɛnnɛ.

Mi shi nshei pi khɔ, nɔ chrā nu nɔ ŋoŋmishua nɔ haʼaŋ ä mbɔ ŋa ŋ̀gwie ŋkrɔ̀ pi ghagha pigi pa minyieŋ mooŋ trǔ Ɛfɛshɔ? Ä mbɔ ŋa mbaʼa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu khu nɛ pɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ, “A pie ŋa pia jɨ ndɔ nnu nthɛ ŋa yua shi mbɔ pia khu.”
Kiʼi ŋoŋ fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ: “Taannu pɨphɨ ghà mbɨrɨ mbha nnu shiʼi.”
P̂əɨ pɨ̄nɨ ni lɨna yəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ a pie ŋa pəɨ chwīe nɛ ndɔ mieŋ mbha nnu pɨphɨ yəɨ fɔ. Ǹchhu yei a pɔ nnu lrithɔ ni pəɨ ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ lɔ ndɔ nji Minnwi.
Ndɔ yichəɨ ŋoŋ shi mbie ŋa, “Pa ŋgwa khu ghà mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ pi nɛiŋ? Pugu ghà ŋkuʼɔ pi ni yəɨ ŋkwaŋ noŋ?”
Yaoŋ na yei! Yaoŋ ŋa ɔ phī nɛ nthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkhɛ̄ ŋkuʼɔ ki lɔ mfǔoŋ ŋkhu ŋkaoŋ.
Yaoŋ ŋa ɔ phī nɛ, wuʼɔ mbɔ pi mbia thɨ, kəʼɨchəɨ mbia shíe gɛ, ki mbia yichəɨ yaoŋ nduoŋ ki lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ thɨ ghɔ ŋa a khɛkhɛ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ.
Minnwi ghà mfɛ noŋ ni mbia thɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a khwā nɛ. Minnwi ghà nchwīe sheshe mbia thɨ khɛ̄ mfāʼo ji ŋkwaŋ noŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ frɛ̀i pa yaoŋ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi taʼa ŋkwaŋ. Pa ŋgwamishua fāʼo yugu ŋkwaŋ noŋ, pa minyieŋ fāʼo yugu, pa mishi fāʼo yugu, pa shhu fāʼo yugu.
Pi fāʼo pa ŋkwaŋ noŋ mbɔ yi po, pugu pa noŋ mbɔ yi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ. Ŋkwaŋ noŋ po fāʼo yugu ŋkwaŋ ndìpwa, pa ŋkwaŋ noŋ ŋa a yi shhɛ nɛ fāʼo ji ŋkwaŋ ndìpwa.
Minaoŋ fāʼo ji ŋkwaŋ ndìpwa, fhu fāʼo ji ŋkwaŋ ndìpwa, pa fɨ́nəɨ fāʼo yugu ŋkwaŋ ndìpwa. Pa fɨ́nəɨ kwri pugu pa pichəɨ moŋ ndìpwa.
A haʼaŋ a pɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khu mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɛ. Yaoŋ ŋa pi phī nɛ, yaoŋ ŋa a nthɛ a pɨrɨ nɛ, yaoŋ ŋa a kuʼɔ nɛ nthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mbɨrɨ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi twei nu nɛ, ɔ līi a wuwuru ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a kuʼɔ nu nɛ a kuʼɔ moŋ ndìpwa. Ndɨɨ ŋa pi twei nu nɛ paʼa a lɔ mfāʼo ghrɨ́, ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a kuʼɔ nu nɛ a fāʼo ghrɨ́.
Pi twei nɔ noŋ ŋa pi phi ŋoŋ nɔ ghɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ nɛ, a kuʼɔ nɔ noŋ ŋa a chhɔ Jijwɛ moŋ ghɔ nɛ. N̈oŋ mbɔ ŋa pi phī ŋoŋ nɔ ghɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ, kaŋ noŋ pɨnɨ mbɔ ŋa a chhɔ Jijwɛ moŋ ghɔ.
Nnɛ pi nāʼaŋ ŋa, “Fǔoŋ ŋoŋ, mbɔ Adaŋ, ni mbɔ ŋoŋ maoŋ,” ndugwi Adaŋ ni ŋgū jijwɛ fɛ chɔmbhi.
A shini ndɔ mfǔoŋ yi jijwɛ mbɔ, a ni mfǔoŋ yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei mbɔ ŋkaoŋ yi jijwɛ maa mbɔ.
Fǔoŋ ŋoŋ ni ndhɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, pi chwīe vi pi ni nchíʼa. Mbra ŋoŋ llɔ pi po.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ yei, ni mbɔ nɛ a wuʼɔ haʼaŋ ŋgwa ŋa pi chwīe vugu ni nchíʼa pɔ nɛ. Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a llɔ po pɔ nɛ, a haʼaŋ pa po pɔ nɛ.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pia fāʼo fhi ŋoŋ ŋa pi chwīe vi ni nchíʼa nɛ, a haʼaŋ pia shi ndɛ mfāʼo fhi ŋoŋ llɔ po nɛ.
Nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ pɔ ŋa, ma lǐŋ paŋ, mbaʼa frɛ̀i pugu chhǐ fāʼo shɨ̀na moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi, ndɔ mbaʼa yaoŋ ŋa a ghà mbɨrɨ nɛ fāʼo shɨ̀na moŋ yaoŋ ŋa a shiʼa mbɨrɨ.
Līi njəɨ, ywɛrɛ nnu yei, ŋa a ni mbɔ yi lə̄ɨŋ nɛ, mbaʼa a lɛ ma ŋkhu ŋguoŋ yia ghao, ŋguoŋ yia ghao ma ŋkwri,
nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ nɔ mikwrɛiligi, ndɨɨ ŋa pi shi ntua ndugwi ntàŋ nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa pi shi ntua ntàŋ, pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu kwo khu nɛ kuʼɔ ni noŋ ŋa mbaʼa a ma nuʼuŋ mbɨrɨ, ŋguoŋ yia ghao kwri.
Noŋ yei ŋa a ghà mbɨrɨ nɛ yīʼi ŋa a kara mfāʼo noŋ ŋa a shiʼa mbɨrɨ nɛ, noŋ yei ŋa a ghà ŋkhu nɛ yīʼi ŋa a kara mfāʼo noŋ ŋa a shiʼa ŋkhu nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa noŋ ŋa a ghà mbɨrɨ kara mfāʼo noŋ ŋa shiʼa mbɨrɨ nɛ, noŋ yei ŋa a ghà ŋkhu fāʼo noŋ ŋa a shiʼa ŋkhu nɛ, chrà yei ŋa pi ni nchhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ kiʼɛ.
“Pi mmi gu moŋ ghaʼa nu mi.
Yo! Gu, njɨ yɔ nɔ ghaʼa nu hɨŋ?
Yo! Gu, ŋgò yɔ hɨŋ?”
Ŋgò gu pɔ pi phɨ, njɨ phɨ pɔ gɨ́ Mushi.
Ndɔ pia tōo Minnwi ŋa a fɛ ghaʼa nu ni pia ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ma ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ thi a tɨnɨ, kiʼi pəɨ chɨ̄ʼɨ, ŋguʼɔ nchhɔ ŋgə̄ɨ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ moŋ fàʼa Taathɔ, nji nu ŋa fàʼa yəɨ moŋ Taathɔ shi lɔ nchhɔ mbhɛ pi ghagha.
Ndwɛ, nɔ chrā nu ŋkuoŋ nnu fɛ pa maoŋ pi kɨrɨ nɔ fɛ nu ni pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ
nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki chhu ni pa chɔshi Galashia ŋa pugu chwīe nɛ, p̂əɨ wuʼɔ nchwīe pi nɛnnɛ ŋkaa pəɨ.
Moŋ fǔoŋ llɛmbhi moŋ ŋguoŋ shwiʼi taŋ, ŝhesheŋoŋ vəɨ fāʼo nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu yichəɨ fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ, ŋkɨrɨ nu, wuʼɔ fɨʼɨ nɔ haʼaŋ a fāʼo nɛ, nji ŋa ǹshi ŋga nthɔ paʼa a lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ ŋa pi kwe nu wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ǹshi nchəɨŋ nɛ, ǹshi ntaoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pəɨ piŋ nɛ ni ŋwaʼaŋlɨ pugu tiɛŋ pa maoŋ fɛ́ pighɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ Jerushalɛiŋ.
Ä nshi mbɔ ŋa a pwa ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ ŋkaa mu, kaŋ pugu shi nthɔ pigi pugu ghə̄ɨ kaʼa.
Ǹshi ŋkra vəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋ̀kwo tiri Mashedonia nɛ, nthɛ ŋa mbīʼi nu nɔ tɔgɔ nu Mashedonia,
kəʼɨchəɨ shi nthɔ pia laʼa kaʼa, kəʼɨchəɨ ti mbɔ pia kaʼa moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ pa nàoŋ fɨgəɨ, nji ŋa pəɨ shi ŋgɛ̄rɛ a nɔ nyīeŋ nu sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa ǹshi ŋgə̄ɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ ntāʼa nu njəɨ vəɨ ndwɛ pi wuʼɔ tɔthɨ. Ŋ̀khwā ŋa pia chhɔ kaʼa nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ ndɨɨ nɔ haʼaŋ T̈aathɔ mbiŋ.
Ndɔ shi ndaʼa Ɛfɛshɔ ti ndɨɨ jɨ Pentekɔ kāʼo.
Nthɛ ŋa mmɛ shɨ̀na pɔ vəɨ fɔ nɔ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ fàʼa, ndɔ ntou pa mimbɨna pɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa Timoti shi nthɔ nɛ, p̂əɨ chwīe a fēi noŋ yi shɨna pəɨ, nthɛ ŋa a chhɔ mfāʼa pi fàʼa Taathɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mummu fāʼa nu nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, kiʼi shesheŋoŋ chɨ̄ʼə vi. P̂əɨ ghɛ̄rɛ vi nɔ haʼaŋ a nyīeŋ nu nɛ moŋ ghɨghrɨ nji ŋa a shi ŋkwəɨ njəɨ a, nthɛ ŋa nchhɔ njwɛrɛ vi pugu pa pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ.
Ndwɛ nthɛ ndǐŋ via Apolo, mi ni nja mfra nu tɨtɨnɨ ŋa a thɔ pugu pa pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ ŋkra vəɨ. Ndɔ a shini ndɔ mbɔ pi khwatua yi kaŋ shɨgɛi ŋa a thɔ pi ndwɛ. A shi nthɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a fāʼo shɨ̀na nɛ.
P̂əɨ chhɔ ni lɨna məɨ, nthi a tɨnɨ moŋ piŋ, p̂əɨ chwīe nnu nɔ pimbia, p̂əɨ thi a tɨnɨ.
P̂əɨ chwīe ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa pəɨ chwīe nu nɛ pi moŋ khwǎ.
Pəɨ ji ŋa mbaanda Shitefana ni mbɔ pa fǔoŋ ghaŋ piŋ Akaya pugu pa ŋa pugu fɛ noŋ yugu ni fàʼa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ. Ndwɛ, ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ, ma lǐŋ paŋ,
p̂əɨ yaʼo nchò ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa pei pugu pa ŋguoŋ pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu nii moŋ fàʼa ghɔ ndɔ mfɛ njùʼɔ yugu moŋ ghɔ nnɛ nɛ.
M̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ ŋa Shitefana, ni Fɔtunatu ni Akaiku ni nthɔ, nthɛ ŋa pugu chwīe nnu ŋa pəɨ shini ndɔ mbɔ hɛiŋ nɔ chwīe nu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pugu ni māʼaŋ njùʼɔ a pugu pa yəɨ. Pəɨ līi ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa nɔ pei shiʼi.
Pa chɔshi moŋ Eshia māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ. Akwila pugu Prishika
, pugu pa chɔshi ŋa a pɔ nda pugu nɛ, māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ shishiʼi moŋ Taathɔ.
Ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ piŋ hɛiŋ, māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ. Pəɨ chrā ni noŋ pəɨ shishiʼi ni paŋ nu noŋ.
Mmu, Pɔɔ, ǹāʼaŋ chrā nu yei pi ni nyaŋ mbhɔ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ mieŋ ki fāʼo khwǎ mbɨŋ Taathɔ, nchɔ̀nɔ pɔ mbɨŋ yu. Taathɔ vigi! Thɔ!
Jishɔ, mbɔ Taathɔ, nōoŋ pwapuŋ yi ni pəɨ.
Khwǎ a pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ ghao moŋ Krishto Jishɔ. A yie.
II Corinthians: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ pi mbhɔ mu Pɔɔ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Krishto Jishɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ khwā njùʼɔ Minnwi ndɔ mbɨnɨ ndhɔ mbhɔ Timoti ndǐŋ via, ŋgə̄ɨ ni chɔshi Minnwi ŋa a pɔ laʼataoŋ Koriŋ pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ krao ŋgei Akaya.
Pwapuŋ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, mbɔ Tǎa via, pugu Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ, pɔ ni pəɨ.
Mbɔrɔ yi Minnwi ndɔ mbɔ Tǎa Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ via. A Tǎa pa kwoshɨnɨ ndɔ mbɔ Minnwi ŋguoŋ māʼaŋ njùʼɔ ghao,

ŋa a ghà māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yigi moŋ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgəʼɨ yigi ghao, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pigi fāʼo njɨ nɔ māʼaŋ nu njùʼɔ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ sheshe ŋgəʼɨ ni māʼaŋ njùʼɔ ŋa Minnwi māʼaŋ njùʼɔ nduthɔ yigi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pigi yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ ntou yi nɔ haʼaŋ Krishto ni njəɨ nɛ, wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yigi shi njiɛŋ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Krishto.

Ndɔ p̈igi njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ, a pɔ pi māʼaŋ njùʼɔ pugu pa lūgu nu ni pəɨ, ki pi māʼaŋ pi njùʼɔ yigi, kaŋ a pɔ pi māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ, ŋa a fāʼa mbɨŋ pəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ, ntīi shii moŋ taʼa ŋkwaŋ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa pigi ŋkaa pigi yəɨ nɛ.
Kwàʼa yigi nthɛ vəɨ lɔ njiʼi nchɨʼɨ, nthɛ ŋa pigi ji ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ fāʼo ghrà moŋ ŋgəʼɨ yigi nɛ, pəɨ shi mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo ghrà moŋ māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yigi.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, pigi tāʼa nu nshwei vəɨ ni ŋgəʼɨ ŋa pigi tɔgɔ moŋ ghɔ Eshia nɛ. Pa lrì haʼaŋ pi ni nūʼɔŋ mbɨŋ pigi nɛ ni ŋgāʼo ndɔ ndrī nchaa ghrɨ́ yigi ti chɔmbhi gu nnu gha ni pigi.
Shishini, pigi ni mbīʼi ŋa pi fɛ njɔ́ gu ni pigi. Ndɔ yei ni mbɔ nɔ chwīe nu kiʼi pigi yɨʼə noŋ yigi mbɨŋ pigi, ndɔ pigi yɨʼə pi mbɨŋ Minnwi ŋa a ghà mbɨʼɨ pa ŋgwa khu moŋ gu nɛ.
A ni mfuʼu vigi moŋ yie cho gu pɨphɨ ndɔ shi ŋguʼɔ mbɨnɨ mfuʼu vigi ŋkamuʼɔŋ. Pigi nūʼɔŋ kwàʼa yigi pi mbɨŋ yu ŋa a shi mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkwe vigi ŋkamuʼɔŋ.
Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ fāʼo nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu vigi ni luoŋ Minnwi, nnɛ ŋa ntou ŋgwa shi mfɛ ntōo nu nɔ ligi yigi nthɛ mbɔrɔ ŋa Minnwi fɛ ni pigi nthɛ luoŋ Minnwi ntou ŋgwa nɛ.

Kwēi njùʼɔ yigi pɔ pi yei, ndɔ ŋgaŋthɔ yigi chhu ni pigi ŋa pigi ni nchwīe nnu pigi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei ni taʼanjuʼɔ ndɔ ntɔgɔ ndaoŋ ntou moŋ pɔgɔ Minnwi, ki lɔ mbɔ pi shiethɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei, mbɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi, mīʼɛŋ mbɔ pi ni pəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa pigi lɔ nchhɔ nāʼaŋ pi yichəɨ nnu nduoŋ ni pəɨ ŋkiɛŋ yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ mɛ̄iŋ ndɔ nji nɛ, ndɔ ŋkwāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ shi nja nji ghao,
wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ni nji vigi shɨgɛi nɛ, ŋa moŋ llɛmbhi ŋa Jishɔ Taathɔ via shi mbɨ̄nɨ nɛ, pəɨ shi mfāʼo titɛnɛ nthɛ vigi nɔ haʼaŋ pigi fāʼo nthɛ vəɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa mi ni mfāʼo yei tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɛ, mi ni ntāʼa nu mfǔoŋ nthɔ ŋkra vəɨ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ fāʼo mbɔrɔ mbra ŋgɛ.
Mi ni ntāʼa nu ŋkra vəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ nu Mashedonia nɛ, ndɔ nshi mbɨnɨ njəɨ vəɨ llɔ Mashedonia, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ ghɛ̄rɛ a ŋ̀gə̄ɨ Judia.
Mi ni ŋgə̄ɨ pi shhɨ ŋkwəɨ nu njiŋ ndɨɨ ŋa mi ni ntāʼa nu nchwīe yei nɛ? Ŋ̀ga ŋkāʼa nnu paŋ pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ tāʼa nu nɛ, mbīri nɔ chhu nu ŋa, “Ooŋ, ooŋ” ki ŋa “Ŋga, ŋga” wuʼɔ taʼa ndɨɨ ghɔ?
Shishini, nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nchwīe nɔ haʼaŋ a chhu nɛ, chrà yigi ni pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi Ooŋ pugu Ŋga.
Nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Minnwi mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto ŋa Shaila, ni Timoti ni mmu nduthɔ a chīi nu ni pəɨ nɛ shini ndɔ mbɔ pi Ooŋ pugu Ŋga ndɔ moŋ Krishto a ghà ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi Ooŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa kàʼa Minnwi Ooŋ mbɨŋ yu. A chwīe yie a pɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu ŋa pia chhu ŋa “A pɔ nɛnnɛ” ni Minnwi nɔ ndighaʼo yi.
A chwīe Minnwi pia thi tɨtɨnɨ moŋ Krishto, ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchuʼɔ via nūʼɔŋ nɔ ji,
ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ju mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ lì yi mbɨŋ pia ndɔ mfɛ Jijwɛ yi njùʼɔ pia nɔ miŋkwentie pa nnu pɛ ŋa a kàʼa via nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Ŋ̀gɛ̄ Minnwi nɔ miŋkwentie a ŋa ǹdɔ ndɛʼi pi ŋgiɛŋ, ŋa a ni mbɔ nthɛ pi ŋa ǹshini ndɔ ntāʼa nu mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ ŋa mi ni mieŋ ki lɔ nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ Koriŋ.
A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa pigi kuʼɔ kuʼɔ thɔ pəɨ moŋ piŋ yəɨ, ndɔ pia ghà mfāʼa kaʼa nɔ pwanjuʼɔ yəɨ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ thi a tɨnɨ moŋ piŋ yəɨ.
Nɛnnɛ, mi ni mbīri njùʼɔ a ŋa m̀baʼa nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ǹchwīe pəɨ pɔ moŋ yuʼɔ njùʼɔ ŋkamuʼɔŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa m̈i nchwīe pəɨ fāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ, a shi mbɨnɨ nchwīe gɔ̌ m̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ŋkiɛŋ gɔ̀ ghɔ ŋa ŋ̀kwo chwīe ɔ fāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ nɛ?

Mi ni nāʼaŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋki nāʼaŋ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa ǹshi ŋga nthɔ, paʼa ǹdɔ mfāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ llɔ mbhɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu kaŋ ni nchwīe m̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nɛ. Mi ni mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ ŋa pwanjuʼɔ a shi mbɔ pwanjuʼɔ ŋguoŋ yəɨ ghao.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋki nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ mfɛ ni pəɨ pi moŋ ŋkiɛŋ ntou ŋgəʼɨ pugu pa mmɛ yuʼɔ njùʼɔ, ni ŋkhǐ ligi, paʼa ndɔ ntāʼa pi ŋa pəɨ pɔ moŋ yúʼɔ, ntāʼa pi ŋa pəɨ ji fɨʼɨ ntou khwǎ ŋa m̀fāʼo nthɛ vəɨ nɛ.
Ndwɛ s̈hesheŋoŋ kaŋ ni nchwīe ŋoŋ fāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ, kaŋ a lɔ nchwīe pi mbɨŋ mu nɔ yichəɨ fɨʼɨ, a chwīe pi mbɨŋ ŋguoŋ yəɨ, nɔ chhu nu ki lɔ niʼiŋ nchunchru yi.
Ni ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ yinɛ, njɔ́ ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ yiɛŋ yəɨ nɛ kāʼo.
Nnɛ, a ka pie pi ŋa p̂əɨ līʼɛ phɨ yi ndɔ māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yi, kaŋ minthɛ yuʼɔ njùʼɔ yiɛŋ ŋgaʼa vi.
Nnɛ, ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchwīe a ji ŋa pəɨ khwǎ vi.
Nthɛ ŋa yei nnu ŋa a ni nchwīe ǹāʼaŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ ŋa minthɛ ǹjwɛʼi vəɨ njəɨ ŋa pəɨ ghà njaʼo nchò moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ghao.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa pəɨ līʼɛ phɨ yi nɛ, mummu ŋkaa mu shi ndīʼɛ phɨ yi. Nthɛ ŋa sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa ŋ̀kwo līʼɛ phɨ nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ ä mbɔ ŋa ŋ̀kwo līʼɛ phɨ, kaŋ a pɔ nthɛ pi pəɨ shhɨ Krishto,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi Shata ghaʼa via, nthɛ ŋa pia shi lɔ mbɔ pi pa ghɨ̀nɨ ni pa shìri ŋa a pīri nu nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa mi ni nthɔ nchəɨŋ Troa lɨʼɨ chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Krishto nɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ chonda fàʼa Taathɔ ni mbɔ yi chuʼɔ vəɨ fɔ nɛ,
njùʼɔ a shini ndɔ mbɔ shiʼi nthɛ ŋa ǹshini ndɔ njəɨ Taitu ndǐŋ a fɔ. Nnɛ m̀ieŋ vugu ŋgə̄ɨ Mashedonia.

Ndɔ pia tōo Minnwi, ŋa, moŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pia pa Krishto, a ghà ŋguʼɔ nthi shhɨ ntia via ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɔ ghɔ, nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa, ntɔgɔ mbhɔ pia Minnwi chwīe yaoŋ ŋa Krishto yie nɛ nyīeŋ ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ nɔ luŋ mbwa laminda.
Nthɛ ŋa pia pɔ pi nɔ mbwa luŋ laminda Krishto ni Minnwi shɨna ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lūgu nu nɛ, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ shɨna ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu phɛ nu gha nɛ.
Ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu phɛ nu gha nɛ, a luŋ gu ŋa a thɔ ni gu, ndɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lūgu nu nɛ, luŋ chɔmbhi ŋa a thɔ ni chɔmbhi. Ti a gɔ̌ ŋa nnu pei kāʼo ghrɨ́ yu?

Nthɛ ŋa pigi shi lɔ mbɔ pi nɔ ntou pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ̄gɔ chrà Minnwi nɔ maoŋ taŋ, ndɔ nɔ ghaŋ taʼanjuʼɔ ŋa Minnwi fɛ fàʼa ni pugu nɛ, shhɨ Minnwi, pigi ghà nchrā moŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pigi pa Krishto.
Pigi pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ njɛ̄ nthɔ nōoŋ pi noŋ yigi nɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa ŋkamuʼɔŋ? Ki a pie ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ ŋgwa chwīe nɛ, nɔ chhu nu ŋa pigi ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa mfɛ ni pəɨ, ki llɔ mbhɔ pəɨ?
Nduthɔ yəɨ pɔ pi pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa pigi ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa, ŋa pi nāʼaŋ njùʼɔ pigi, ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ji ndɔ mɛ̄iŋ.

Pəɨ nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi ŋwaʼaŋlɨ llɔ mbhɔ Krishto ŋa pigi fɛ, ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋa pi lɔ njiʼi nāʼaŋ pi ni ŋkhwǎ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ, pi nāʼaŋ pi ni Jijwɛ Minnwi maoŋ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa ŋgùʼɔ prapra, mbɔ pi njùʼɔ ŋgwamishua.
Yie ghɔ ŋkwaŋ tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa pia fāʼo mbɨŋ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Krishto nɛ.
A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa pigi nduthɔ yigi kaʼokaʼo nɔ chhu nu ŋa chəɨ nnu llɔ pi mbhɔ pigi, kāʼo nu yigi llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi,
ŋa a chwīe via pia kāʼo nɔ pɔ nu puoŋ fàʼa kɨ̀na fhi, ki lɔ mbɔ pi yɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ nāʼaŋ nɛ, mbɔ pi yi Jijwɛ. Nthɛ ŋa yɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ nāʼaŋ nɛ ghà nthɔ pi ni gu ndɔ Jijwɛ ghà mfɛ chɔmbhi.

A kaŋ mbɔ ŋa ndunu shɛndaoŋ ŋa a thɔ ni gu nɛ, ŋa pi ni nāʼaŋ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋgùʼɔ nɛ, ni nthɔ ni ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ ndighaʼo ti puoŋ Ishrae kaŋ ni nthɛ paʼa pugu lɔ njiʼi ndīi ligi Mushi nthɛ ndighaʼo yi ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ mbɔ ndighaʼo ŋa a ni nthɔ mɛmmɛ nɛ,
yie ghɔ shi lɔ nōoŋ kiʼɛ ŋa shɛndaoŋ fhi mbɔ yi Jijwɛ ka fāʼo ndighaʼo fāʼo a chaa yie ghɔ?
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ ndighaʼo ni mbɔ moŋ ndunu shɛndaoŋ ŋa a ghà nthɔ ni njɔ́ nɛ, yie ghɔ nōoŋ ŋa shɛndaoŋ fhi ŋa a thɔ ni ndɨndɨ nɛ chaa vi ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ moŋ ndighaʼo.
Shishini, moŋ yei, yaoŋ ŋa a ni ma mfāʼo ndighaʼo lūgwi ki lɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo sheshe ndighaʼo kaŋ shɨgɛi nthɛ ndighaʼo ŋa a chaa vi nɛ.
Nnɛ, ti yaoŋ ŋa a ni ŋkhu nu nɛ mbɔ ŋa a ni mfāʼo ndighaʼo, yie nōoŋ ŋa yaoŋ ŋa a thɔ nu ŋkɨna nɛ fāʼo ndighaʼo nchaa yie ghɔ ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi.
Ŋa pigi fāʼo yei kwàʼa nɛ, pigi ya mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ,
ki lɔ mbɔ pi nɔ Mushi, ŋa a ni mbūoŋ ligi yi ni yaoŋ ndhwí nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pa puoŋ Ishrae chaoŋ ligi yugu ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuokuo mmɛ nu nɛ.
Ndɔ pugu ni nchri njùʼɔ yugu. Nthɛ ŋa nchəɨŋ shiʼa, ndɨɨ ŋa pugu mɛ̄iŋ ndunu kɨ̀na nɛ, ndhwí ghɔ wuʼɔ mbūoŋ njùʼɔ yugu, nthɛ ŋa a wuʼɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Krishto ŋa ndhwí ghɔ ghà mbɔ yi pɨʼɨ.
Ooŋ! Nchəɨŋ shiʼa sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ gɨ́ Mushi nɛ, ndhwí ghɔ kɨna ŋkuru njùʼɔ yugu.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ŋoŋ kara mbara Taathɔ nɛ, pi pɨʼɨ ndhwí ghɔ.
Ndwɛ, Taathɔ pɔ pi Jijwɛ, ndɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa Jijwɛ Taathɔ pɔ nɛ, ŋoŋ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ moŋ kǔna.

Nnɛ ndwɛ, pia ghao chhɔ njəɨ ndighaʼo Taathɔ ni miŋi mia ŋa a lɔ mbɔ yi pūoŋ nɛ, pia chhɔ ŋkara nu mfhi vi, llɔ ŋkuoŋ taʼa nthɨŋkwo ndighaʼo ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ yichəɨ. Yei llɔ pi mbhɔ Taathɔ ŋa a Jijwɛ ghɔ nɛ.
