Nthɛ yie ghɔ, nɔ haʼaŋ pigi fāʼo fàʼa yei, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kwoshɨnɨ Minnwi nɛ, pigi lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo lɨʼənoŋ.

Pigi ni ndɔ̄gɔ nthí miŋi ŋa mbaʼa pigi ma nchwīe pa nnu mooŋ njiŋ pugu pa nnu lrithɔ. Pigi lāa chwīe nu pa nnu mifɨɨ ki kwri nu chrà Minnwi, ndɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chrā nu nnu shini shhɛnte, pigi nōoŋ ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa ŋa pigi yie nɛ ni ŋgaŋthɔ shesheŋoŋ shhɨ Minnwi.
Ä ndɔ mbɔ ŋa pwa pishaʼakhɔ yigi yi kuru, kaŋ a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu phɛ nu nɛ.
Nnwi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei fhɨligi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ mbiŋ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pugu yəɨ líʼɛ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ndighaʼo Krishto mbɔ fhi Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa pigi lɔ njiʼi nthɔ nchīi pi noŋ yigi. Pigi chīi pi Jishɔ Krishto nɔ Taathɔ, ni pigi ŋa pigi pɔ pi puoŋ fàʼa ni pəɨ nthɛ Jishɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchhu ŋa, “Líʼɛ thɛ llɔ moŋ njiŋ nɛ,” kwo thɛ moŋ njùʼɔ pigi nɔ fɛ nu líʼɛ ji nu ndighaʼo Minnwi nɔ miŋi Jishɔ Krishto.
Ndɔ pigi tuo fàʼo yei pi moŋ pa kɨ̌ŋ nchíʼa, nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa mmɛ tɨtɨnɨ njɨ ghɔ pɔ pi yi Minnwi ki lɔ mbɔ pi yigi.
Yúʼɔ nii vigi moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nwīʼiŋ vigi, pigi fāʼo fiŋthɔ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbhɛ kwàʼa.
Pi fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pigi ndɔ paʼa pigi lɔ ŋkɨna təʼɨ vigi, nchhwi vigi māʼaŋ shhɛ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbɨrɨ vigi,
ŋguʼɔ ma nchhɔ ntiɛŋ pi gu Jishɔ nyīeŋ nu nɔ moŋ noŋ yigi nnɛ ŋa chɔmbhi Jishɔ nōoŋ moŋ noŋ yigi.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao pi chaʼa vigi ŋa pigi yi maoŋ nɛ mfɛ nu ni gu nthɛ ligi Jishɔ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ chɔmbhi Jishɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi moŋ frɛinoŋ yigi ŋa a ghà ŋkhu nɛ.
Nnɛ pigi tɔgɔ pi moŋ gu, ndɔ pəɨ chhɔ mfāʼo chɔmbhi mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa “Ŋ̀ki piŋ, a ni nchwīe yie ghɔ ǹchrā.” Ni taʼa ŋkwaŋ piŋ ghɔ, pigi ŋkaa pigi ni mbiŋ nnɛ nchrā,
nji nu ŋa ju ŋa a ni mbɨʼɨ Jishɔ Taathɔ moŋ gu nɛ shi mbɨʼɨ vigi pigi pa Jishɔ Taathɔ, nthɔ ni pia kaʼa shhɨ yu.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yi ghao pɔ nthɛ pi pəɨ, nnɛ ŋa pwapuŋ Minnwi ŋa a thɔ nshɛ̄rɛ nu ni ntountou ŋgwa nɛ, shi nchwīe tōo nu pīgi nɔ fɛ nu ndighaʼo ni Minnwi.
Nnɛ, mbaʼa pigi yiʼi mfāʼo lɨʼənoŋ. Njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ yigi pɨrɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ, noŋ yigi moŋ jijwɛ wuʼɔ nchhɔ ŋgū pi yi fhi pa lɛllɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa puoŋ mi ŋgəʼɨ yīʼɛ yīʼɛ pei nɔ kuo ndɨɨ yei nɛ chhɔ mbīri pi ŋkiɛŋ lilri ndighaʼo ki ndugwi yi ŋa fɨʼɨ yi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa pigi lɔ njiʼi nthɔ nūʼɔŋ njùʼɔ yigi pi ŋkuoŋ pa maoŋ pɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ghà njəɨ ni ligi yi nɛ, pigi nūʼɔŋ njùʼɔ yigi pi ŋkuoŋ pa maoŋ pɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ njəɨ nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa pa maoŋ pɛ ŋa ŋoŋ yəɨ nu nɛ chhɔ ntɔgɔtɔgɔ, ndɔ pa maoŋ pɛ ŋa pi lɔ njəɨ nu nɛ ghà mbɔ pi ki ndugwi yi.
Nthɛ ŋa pia ji ŋa ntǎa yei ŋa a pɔ pi laʼa yia ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ shi ŋga mbɨrɨ, pia fāʼo lɨʼɨ chhɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, mbɔ nda ŋa pi lɔ njiʼi ŋkrao pi ni mbhɔ, mbɔ nda ŋa a shi mbɔ ki ndugwi yi po.
Nthɛ ŋa moŋ yei ntǎa ndwɛ nɛ, pia shɔnɔ nu, njūa nu ŋa pia pɔ moŋ nda yia ŋa a pɔ pi yi po nɛ.
Pigi tāʼa nu mfāʼo frɛinoŋ yei llɔ po nji ŋa mbaʼa pigi nuʼuŋ mbɔ ntii.

Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ pigi wuʼɔ mbɔ moŋ ntǎa yei ndwɛ nɛ, pigi shɔnɔ ni ghana njùʼɔ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa pigi tāʼa nu mfuʼu noŋ yigi yei mīʼaŋ, a pɔ pi ŋa pigi tāʼa nu māʼaŋ noŋ fhi ŋkuoŋ yei, nnɛ ŋa chɔmbhi mmi noŋ yei ŋa minthɛ a khu nɛ.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a pīri via nɔ nnu yei nɛ pɔ pi Minnwi, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a fɛ Jijwɛ yi ni pia nɔ ŋa pia fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ni yaoŋ ŋa a kāʼa via nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pigi ghà ŋguʼɔ ndɨnaoŋ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ. Pigi ji ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa pigi pɔ laʼa moŋ noŋ yei nɛ, kaŋ pigi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yəɨ Taathɔ,
nthɛ ŋa pigi ghà nchhɔ chɔmbhi yigi ntɔgɔ pi moŋ piŋ, paʼa ndɔ mbɔ pi moŋ pa nnu ŋa pigi yəɨ nu nɛ.
Ooŋ! Pigi ya ndɨnaoŋ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ, ŋka khwā pi ŋa pigi mieŋ ki lɔ mbɔ moŋ noŋ yei, nnɛ ndɔ mbɔ laʼa pigi pa Taathɔ kaʼa.
Nnɛ ki pigi pɔ hɛiŋ pi moŋ noŋ yei, ki pigi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ moŋ noŋ yei, pigi ghà mbaʼo pi nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa pigi chwīe túa yi pwa.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yigi ghao ma ŋguʼɔ nthi sháʼa shhɨ faaŋ Krishto, nnɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ nthɛ a fāʼo yaoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa a fāʼo nthɛ nnu ŋa a ni nchwīe moŋ frɛinoŋ yei nɛ, ki a pɔ pi pwa ki phɨ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa pigi ji yaoŋ ŋa pɔ́gɔ Taathɔ yie ghɔ nɛ, pigi chrā nthɛ vi ni pichəɨ ŋgwa mbaʼo nɔ chwīe nu ŋa pugu piŋ. Ndɔ Minnwi ji yaoŋ ŋa pigi yie ghɔ nɛ. M̀bīʼi ŋa pəɨ ji ŋkaa pəɨ moŋ ŋgaŋthɔ yəɨ.

Pigi lɔ njiʼi nchhɔ mbaʼopaʼo nɔ chhu nu yaoŋ ŋa pigi yie nɛ ni pəɨ. Pigi chhɔ fɛ pi shɨ̀na ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ kwēi njùʼɔ nthɛ vigi nji ŋa pəɨ shi mfāʼo khwɛ̀ nɔ fɛ nu ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu kwēi njùʼɔ nthɛ pi pa yaoŋ ŋa pi yəɨ nu nɛ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi yaoŋ ŋa a llɔ moŋ njùʼɔ nɛ.
Ä njiʼi mbɔ pɔ ŋa mooŋ thɔ yigi lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo, kaŋ a pɔ nthɛ pi Minnwi, ä mbɔ ŋa mooŋ thɔ yigi pɔ shiʼi kaŋ a pɔ nthɛ pi pəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa khwǎ ŋa Krishto fāʼo ni pigi yaoŋ ŋa a chhɔ nshaʼa vigi nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pigi kwo lūgwi yei nnu moŋ njùʼɔ pigi ŋa taʼa ŋoŋ khu nthɛ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa, nthɛ yie ghɔ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa khu.
A ni ŋkhu nthɛ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa, nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chɔmbhi nɛ, pugu chhɔ mbhi ki lɔ nthɛ pi nōoŋ yugu. P̂ugu chhɔ nthɛ pi ju ŋa a ni ŋkhu pi kuʼɔ ni ju moŋ gu nthɛ vugu nɛ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, jɛ̄ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, pigi shi lɔ nuʼuŋ ndīi ŋgwa pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋgwamishua ghà ndīi nɛ. Njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pigi ni ndīi Krishto pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋgwamishua ghà ndīi nɛ, mbaʼa pigi yiʼi nuʼuŋ ndīi vi nɛnnɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a taʼa yi pugu Krishto nɛ, pɔ pi yaoŋ puoŋ fhi. Pa ndunu nnu kwo tɔgɔ, līi njəɨ, pa nnu gū pi fhi.
Ŋguoŋ nnu pei ghao llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi ŋa a tɔgɔ mbɨŋ Krishto nchīni ŋggì yia pugu, mfɛ fàʼa chīni nu ŋggì ni pia

yie ghɔ pɔ ŋa moŋ Krishto Minnwi ni nthɔ nchīni ŋggì pugu pa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi pugu pɨnɨ mbara vi, ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nchhɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu nthɛ phɨ ŋa pugu chwīe nɛ, ndɔ nchaʼa ŋkɨ̀nɨ chīni nu ŋggì mfɛ mbhɔ pigi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pigi pa ghaŋ chrà nɔ ligi Krishto, pi nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi chhɔ mfɛ gɛ̀ yi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ pigi. Pigi lɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ nɔ ligi Krishto ŋa p̂əɨ chīni ŋggì pəɨ pa Minnwi.
Nthɛ via Minnwi ni nchwīe vi a pɔ phɨ, mbɔ ju ŋa a shini ndɔ nji phɨ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa moŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi pigi pugu, pigi shi mbɔ ndɨndɨ Minnwi.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pigi pa Minnwi fāʼa nu kaʼa nɛ, pigi lɨ̄gəɨ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ chwīe pwapuŋ Minnwi ŋa a nōoŋ ni pəɨ nɛ phɛ gha.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi chhu ŋa,
“Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ndɨɨ ni ŋkāʼo nɛ, ŋki yaʼo vəɨ,
moŋ llɛmbhi lūgu nu ŋ̀gɛ̄rɛ vəɨ.”
Līi njəɨ, ndwɛ ndɨɨ kāʼo, līi njəɨ, ndwɛ pɔ pi llɛmbhi lūgu nu.
Pigi lɔ nūʼɔŋ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni shesheŋoŋ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi sheshe ntəɨ pɔ ni fàʼa yigi.
Ndɔ nɔ puoŋ fàʼa Minnwi pigi nōoŋ noŋ yigi ŋa pigi ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa ntɔgɔ pi moŋ tiishii, pa ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ, pa ghaghaʼa pugu pa nnu tɨtɨnɨ,
pa wie, pa ghə̄ɨ nu chə́ɨŋ, pa yɔ̀yɔnɔ ghaŋ pɨgɨtua nthɔ nu lɨʼɨ wie vigi, fàʼa ki jwɛ, laʼa ki llɛ pugu pa njì.
Pigi pɨnɨ nōoŋ noŋ yigi ŋa pigi ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pɔ nu yi taoŋtaoŋ, ji nu yigi, wɛ̄iŋ nu njùʼɔ, pwapuŋ, fāʼo nu Jijwɛ Minnwi moŋ chɔmbhi yigi, khwǎ llɔ moŋ njùʼɔ pigi,
chrā nu nnu shini, ni ghrɨ́ Minnwi. Pigi ghà ntuo ndɨndɨ nɔ maoŋ nchhɔ̀ ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ nɔ māʼaŋ nu pugu ŋgei mbhɔ ŋkwrɛi nɔ lɨʼɨ nu.
Pigi ghà mfāʼa mbhɔ Minnwi ki pi ghaʼo vigi ki nshhū vigi, nchhu nnu phɨ thɔ pigi ki mfɛ ndighaʼo ni pigi. Pi lɔ̄gɔ vigi nɔ pa ghaŋ mifɨɨ, ndɔ pigi chrā pi nnu shini.
Pi līi vigi nɔ pa nnu gha, ndɔ pichəɨ ji vigi ti ŋgaʼa, nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu chhɔ ŋkukhu, ndɔ līi njəɨ, pigi yi maoŋ, nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pi fɛ njɔ́ ni pugu ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njwi vugu,

nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu fāʼo pəʼɨ njùʼɔ ndɔ pigi wuʼɔ nchhɔ mfāʼo pi pwanjuʼɔ, nɔ ghaŋ pou ndɔ pigi wuʼɔ nchhɔ nchwīe ntou ŋgwa pɔ ghaŋ fàʼo, nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yaoŋ ndɔ pigi fāʼo ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao.
Pigi chrā ni pəɨ ki lɔ ndə̄ɨŋ vəɨ ni sheshe nnu, ma ŋgwa laʼataoŋ Koriŋ, njùʼɔ yigi yi wo shhɨ pəɨ.
Pigi lɔ njiʼi ndɨʼɨ vəɨ, ndɔ a lɨʼɨ pəɨ ndɨʼɨ noŋ yəɨ moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ.
Ndwɛ, nɔ khwɛ̄ nu, p̂əɨ ŋaʼaŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ ni pigi ŋkaa pigi. Ǹchrā yei ni pəɨ ndwɛ pi nɔ puoŋ paŋ.
Kiʼi nyiaŋ kwò pəɨ pa ghaŋ ki piŋ. Nthɛ ŋa a yəɨ taʼaŋggi ŋa a pɔ shɨna ndɨndɨ pugu pɨphɨ? Ki a yəɨ chɨ nu kwò ŋa a ghà mbɔ shɨna líʼɛ pugu njiŋnjiŋ?
Ki a yəɨ taʼaŋggi shɨna Krishto pugu Shata
? Ki a yəɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋgaŋ piŋ ghà nchɨ pugu ŋgaŋ ki piŋ?
A yəɨ taʼaŋggi ŋa Nda Minnwi fāʼo pugu pa nnwi? Nthɛ ŋa pia pɔ pi Nda Minnwi maoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi chhu ŋa,
“Ǹshi nchwīe lɨʼɨ chhɔ a shɨna pugu nyīeŋ shɨna pugu
m̀bɔ Minnwi vugu,
pugu pɔ pa ŋgwa paŋ.”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, Taathɔ chhu ŋa:
“Pəɨ taoŋ shɨna pugu
mbɔ təʼɨ vəɨ,
Kiʼi pəɨ kāoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a yi fuo nɛ,
kaŋ ǹshi mbiŋ vəɨ,
Ǹdɔ mbɔ Tǎa vəɨ,
pəɨ pɔ pa puoŋ paŋ pi pimbia pugu pa piŋgɛ.
A chhu Taathɔ ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ njɨ nɛ.”
Ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ, nthɛ ŋa pia fāʼo pa kàʼa pei nɛ, p̂ia fuʼu sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a ghà mfuo via nɛ mbɨŋ pia pugu pa jijwɛ yia, mīʼɛŋ pɔ nu yi taoŋtaoŋ moŋ pɔ́gɔ Minnwi.
P̂əɨ ŋaʼaŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ ni pigi, pigi lɔ njiʼi mfāaŋ sheshe nnu mbɨŋ shesheŋoŋ, pigi lɔ njiʼi mbɨrɨ shesheŋoŋ, pigi lɔ njiʼi nchīgi shesheŋoŋ.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi nchrā yei pi nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu vəɨ ŋa pəɨ fāaŋ nnu. Nthɛ ŋa mi ni ŋkwo chhu ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ njùʼɔ pigi, pia khu kaʼa ndɔ nchhɔ mbhi kaʼa.
Ǹthɔ nchwīe pa nnu pi ni ntou tɨnɨnjuʼɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ, m̀fāʼo ntou titɛnɛ mbɨŋ pəɨ. Ǹdɨnaoŋ ni ghrɨnjuʼɔ. Moŋ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgəʼɨ pigi, pwanjuʼɔ a lɨnaoŋ ti ŋkwrī.
Nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi ndɨɨ ŋa pigi ni nchəɨŋ Mashedonia nɛ, pigi shini ndɔ mfāʼo fɛrɛnoŋ, ŋgəʼɨ ni nii vigi moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ shɛndaoŋ, ŋgwa fɛ̄ʼi vigi, pɔgɔ gu pɔ nu njùʼɔ pigi.
Ndɔ Minnwi, mbɔ ju ŋa a ghà mfɛ māʼaŋ njùʼɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo pəʼɨ njùʼɔ nɛ, māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yigi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ thɔ nu Taitu.

Ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ thɔ nu mi, a ni mbɨnɨ mbɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ māʼaŋ njùʼɔ ŋa pəɨ ni māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nshwei vigi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ ni ŋkhwā nu nɔ yəɨ nu ma, ndɔ njūa nu nthɛ nnu ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, ndɔ mfāʼo niʼiŋ njùʼɔ vəɨ, nnɛ ǹja mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ, mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ.

Nthɛ ŋa ä njiʼi mbɔ ŋa ǹchwīe pəɨ fāʼo tuʼuthɔ ni ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋa ŋki nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ nɛ, kaŋ ǹdɔ njiʼi njūa ŋa ŋki nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ nɛ. Mi ni mfǔoŋ njūa nthɛ ŋa mi ni njəɨ ŋa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ chwīe pəɨ fāʼo tuʼuthɔ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ.

Nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, m̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ, ki lɔ nthɛ pi ŋa pəɨ fāʼo tuʼuthɔ nɛ, mi ni mfāʼo nthɛ pi ŋa pəɨ ni mfāʼo tuʼuthɔ, a chwīe pəɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ. Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ni mfāʼo pi tuʼuthɔ llɔ ŋkuoŋ pɔgɔ Minnwi, nnɛ pigi shini ndɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ kaŋ shɨgɛi.
Nthɛ ŋa tuʼuthɔ ŋa a pɔ nthɛ pi pɔgɔ Minnwi nɛ ghà nthɔ ni pāʼa nu ŋkǔnu ni phɨ, ndugwi yi pɔ lūgu nu ki yūa nu lɔ mbɔ. Ndɔ tuʼuthɔ ŋa a pɔ pi yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ ghà nthɔ ni gu.

Līi fɨʼɨ thi nu a tɨnɨ moŋ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ ŋa ŋkwaŋ tuʼuthɔ yei ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ chwīe pəɨ fāʼo, pugu pa fɨʼɨ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɔ taa nu nchò yəɨ nɛ njəɨ! Yei nōoŋ nu ŋa mbhɔ yəɨ yi wo. A pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nthɔ ni fɨʼɨ pɨgɨtua, fɨʼɨ pɔ́gɔ, fɨʼɨ khwā nu pugu pa fɨʼɨ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ, ni fɨʼɨ pīri nu noŋ nɔ fɛ nu njɔ́ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe nnu ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɛ! Moŋ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao, pəɨ nōoŋ noŋ yəɨ ŋa mbhɔ yəɨ yi wo moŋ nnu ghɔ.

Nnɛ njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki nāʼaŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ mfɛ ni pəɨ nɛ, a shini ndɔ mbɔ nthɛ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a fāaŋ nnu ghɔ nɛ, ki nthɛ ŋoŋ ŋa pi fāaŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ. A ni mbɔ nthɛ pi ŋa niʼiŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ mbɨŋ pigi nōoŋ noŋ yi ni pəɨ shhɨ Minnwi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pigi fāʼo ghrɨnjuʼɔ.
A lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi yigi ghrɨnjuʼɔ, pigi pɨnɨ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ mbīgi nthɛ pi pwanjuʼɔ Taitu, nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yəɨ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yi.

Ǹshini ndɔ mfāʼo lrithɔ nthɛ sheshe kwēi njùʼɔ ŋa mi ni ŋkwēi ghɔ nthɛ vəɨ nɛ. Ndɔ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋguoŋ nnu pɛ ŋa pigi ni nchhu ni pəɨ, ni nōoŋ ŋa a nnu shini nɛ, ŋguoŋ kwēi nu njùʼɔ ŋa pigi ni ŋkwēi shhɨ Taitu nɛ nōoŋ ŋa a nnu shini.
Fɨʼɨ khwǎ ŋa a fāʼo ni pəɨ nɛ ka pɨnɨ njiɛŋ yiɛŋ, nɔ haʼaŋ a kwiŋ yaʼo nchò yəɨ ghao nɛ, fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa a thɔ a pwa ni pɔ́gɔ pugu pa wrū nu.
M̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ ŋa m̀fāʼo ŋkiɛŋ tɨnɨnjuʼɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Ndwɛ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, pigi tāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ ji fɨʼɨ pwapuŋ Minnwi ŋa a fɛ ni pa chɔshi moŋ Mashedonia nɛ.
Moŋ mmɛ tɨtɨnɨ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa a mooŋ vugu nɛ, ntou pwanjuʼɔ yugu chwīe pugu fɛ ki lɔ njiʼi ŋgīʼɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ya mbou ŋgaʼa nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa mi miŋkwentie yugu ŋa pugu ni mfɛ nɔ fɨʼɨ njɨ yugu, ti a ka lɔ nchaa njɨ yugu chaa, pugu ni mfɛ pi ni khwā njùʼɔ yugu,
ndɨ̄gəɨ vigi ki jwɛ nɔ fāʼo nu shɨ̀na nɔ pɔ nu ŋgia yaoŋ fɛ nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ.
Yei lɔ mbɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pigi ni njwɛrɛ nu nɛ, ndɔ pugu ni mfǔoŋ mfɛ noŋ yugu ni Taathɔ ŋkaoŋ, mbɨnɨ mfɛ noŋ yugu ni pigi wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ.
Nnɛ pigi ni ŋkɔnɔ Taitu ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkwo jɛ̄ nɛ, â mīʼɛŋ fàʼa pwapuŋ yei shɨna pəɨ.
Ndɔ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nu shhɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu nɛ, moŋ piŋ, moŋ chrà, pugu pa ji nu nnu, pugu pa thi nu tɨtɨnɨ moŋ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ, pugu pa khwǎ ŋa pigi chwīe ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɛ,
p̂əɨ yəɨ ŋa pəɨ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ shiʼi moŋ fàʼa pwapuŋ yei ŋkaa yu.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ mfɛ yei pi nɔ gɨ́ ni pəɨ, ndɔ yei pɔ pi nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa khwǎ yəɨ yi ndɨndɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chwīe nu pəɨ yəɨ tɨtɨnɨ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ ŋgwa nduoŋ.
Pəɨ ji pwapuŋ Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto, ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mfāʼo nɛ, ndɔ nthɛ vəɨ, a ni ŋgū mbou, nji ŋa ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ pou yi, pəɨ shi mfāʼo.
Ndɔ moŋ nnu yei, m̀fɛ nyaŋ pīʼi nu, ŋa yei pɔ pi shéi ni pəɨ, mbɔ pəɨ ŋa shɨna taʼa ŋgaʼo ŋa a tɔgɔ nɛ, pəɨ ni njɛ̄ paʼa ndɔ ŋguʼɔ nchwīe fàʼa yei chwīe, pəɨ ni mbɨnɨ ŋkhwā nɔ chwīe nu fàʼa ghɔ.
Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, p̂əɨ ghə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ shhɨ ti mīʼɛŋ fàʼa ghɔ, nnɛ ŋa pīri nu noŋ nɔ khwā nu nɔ fāʼa nu fàʼa ghɔ nthɛ ŋa a nyīeŋ taʼa kwò pugu pa mīʼɛŋ nu fàʼa ghɔ nɔ fɨʼɨ ghrɨ́ yəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa pīri nu noŋ nɔ fɛ nu mbɔ, pi piŋ yaoŋ fɛ ŋoŋ pi fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a fāʼo nɛ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɛ.
Yei lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi nɔ chwīe nu pichəɨ ŋgwa pɔ shiʼi pəɨ fāʼo lrì, ndɔ a pɔ pi nɔ chwīe nu ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɔ ndɨndɨ.
Fɨʼɨ ntou yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo ndwɛ nɛ shi ŋgɛ̄rɛ vugu moŋ yugu chà, nji ŋa ntou yaoŋ ŋa pugu fāʼo nɛ shi ŋgɛ̄rɛ vəɨ moŋ yəɨ chà, nnɛ ŋguoŋ pa nnu pɔ ndɨndɨ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ: “Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni ŋkɨrɨ ntou yi nɛ shini ndɔ mfāʼo ti a yiɛŋyiɛŋ ŋgaʼa ndɔ paʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a ni ŋkɨrɨ shɨgɛi nɛ lɔ mbou yaoŋ.”
Ndɔ pia tōo Minnwi ŋa a fɛ taʼa ŋkwaŋ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ ŋa pigi fāʼo nɔ lɨna nu ni pəɨ nɛ njùʼɔ Taitu.
Nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ njiʼi ŋguʼɔ mbiŋ pi lɨ̄gəɨ yigi, ndɔ nduthɔ yi thi tɨtɨnɨ moŋ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ, ŋkhwā ni njùʼɔ yi nɔ thɔ nu njəɨ vəɨ.
Pigi taoŋ vi pugu yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ piŋ ŋa pi ya ŋgaʼo vi moŋ ŋguoŋ pa chɔshi nthɛ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a thɔ nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ nɛ.
Ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi yie ghɔ, pa chɔshi pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchuʼɔ vi ŋa pigi pugu nyīeŋ kaʼa nɔ fāʼa nu fàʼa pwapuŋ yei nthɛ ndighaʼo Taathɔ nduthɔ yi, ndɔ mbɨnɨ nōoŋ ŋa pigi khwā nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu.
Pigi tɔgɔ pi yei shɛndaoŋ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ŋoŋ krɛ̄i vigi nthɛ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pigi chhɔ ndīi nnu kwe nu, pugu pa ghrā nu maoŋ pei ŋa pi fɛ ki lɔ ŋgīʼɛ nɛ.
Pigi fāʼo njùʼɔ pigi nɔ chwīe nu nnu yɛ ŋa a lɔ ŋguʼɔ nchɨɨ pi ligi Taathɔ, ndɔ a chɨ̄ɨ ŋkaa yu ligi ŋgwamishua nɛ.

Pigi chhɔ ntaoŋ vugu pugu pa yichəɨ taʼa ndǐŋ vigi moŋ piŋ ŋa pigi mooŋ vi ntou ŋgɛ́ njəɨ ŋa a niʼiŋ njùʼɔ nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu moŋ ntou pa nnu, ndɔ ndwɛ, a ka pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo niʼiŋ njùʼɔ fāʼo mbīgi nthɛ fɨʼɨ ntou tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa a fāʼo mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ ä mbɔ nɔ Taitu, a ŋgaŋ kwò a, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa pigi yu fāʼa nu kaʼa nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu vəɨ. Ŋga mbɔ nɔ pichəɨ pa lǐŋ pigi, pugu ghaŋ ntaoŋ pa chɔshi, mbɔ ndighaʼo Krishto.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ nōoŋ shhɨ pa chɔshi ni ŋgwa pei fɨʼɨ khwǎ yəɨ pugu pa titɛnɛ yigi nthɛ vəɨ.
Ndwɛ, a lɔ nuʼuŋ ndɔ mbie ŋa m̀bɨnɨ nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ nthɛ nnu ghɛ̄rɛ nu ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ.

Ǹji fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ kwo pīri noŋ yəɨ nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu nɛ, mbɔ yie ŋa ŋ̀kwo fāʼo kwēi njùʼɔ nɔ ghɔ nthɛ vəɨ ni pa ŋgwa Mashedonia, nchhu nu ŋa jɛ̄ ŋgaʼo yini, ŋgwa Akaya ni ŋkwo pīri noŋ yugu. Ndɔ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ kwɛ̄nɛ ntou yugu.
Ndɔ ǹthɔ ntaoŋ ghaŋ piŋ pei ni pəɨ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi kwēi nu njùʼɔ yigi nthɛ vəɨ yiʼi ntaoŋ ghagha moŋ nnu pei, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ pīri noŋ yəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ mi ni ŋkwo chhu ŋa pəɨ shi mbɔ nɛ.
Ti ä mbɔ ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa Mashedonia thɔ pigi pugu, njəɨ ŋa pəɨ lɔ naa mbīri noŋ yəɨ, lrithɔ wɛ̄iŋ vigi, ndɔ paʼa yəɨ lrithɔ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ pi nnu chhu nthɛ fɨʼɨ tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa pigi kwo fāʼo nthɛ vəɨ nɛ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, mi ni mbīʼi ŋa a pie ŋa m̀āʼaŋ ghrɨ́ pa ghaŋ piŋ pei pugu ghə̄ɨ shhɨ njəɨ vəɨ nɔ pīri nu yaoŋ fɛ ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkāʼa nɛ ndɨɨ maa kāʼo nu nnɛ ŋa pi kwo pīri maoŋ pighɔ m̀aa nchəɨŋ nu, a pɨnɨ nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ fɛ nthɛ pi ŋa pəɨ khwā nɔ fɛ nu, ki lɔ mbɔ nthɛ pi ŋa pi ŋɨ vəɨ ŋɨ.
Yei nnu ghɔ: Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a phī yaoŋ ŋgīʼɛ nɛ shi ŋkwōo shɨgɛi, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a phī ntou yi nɛ shi ŋkwōo ntou yi.
Shesheŋoŋ fɛ nɔ haʼaŋ a lɔ̄gɔ nthí mi njùʼɔ yu nɛ, ki lɔ mfɛ pi ni kwe thɔ, ki pi nɔ haʼaŋ pi ŋɨ vi ŋɨ, nthɛ ŋa Minnwi khwā ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà mfɛ ni pwanjuʼɔ nɛ.
Minnwi fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ fɛ nu yaoŋ ni pəɨ a yiɛŋ ti nchaa fɨʼɨ yɛ ŋa pəɨ tāʼa nu nɛ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ shi ŋga mfāʼo ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ fāʼo ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao nɛ, pəɨ fāʼa fàʼa shiʼi mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nɛ,
“A ghrā pa yaoŋ ki lɔ ŋgīʼɛ, a fɛ ni pa ghaŋ pou.
Ndɨndɨ yi shi lɔ mfāʼo ndugwi yi.”

Minnwi, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà mfɛ mbhɛ̌ ni ŋgaŋ phī mbhɛ̌ pugu pa maoŋ jɨ nɔ jɨ nu nɛ, shi mbɨnɨ mfɛ ŋguoŋ mbhɛ̌ yɛ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɔ phī nu nɛ ndɔ nchwīe a kuʼɔ pəɨ kwōo ntou yi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ fɛ nu ki lɔ ŋgīʼɛ
Pi shi nchwīe pəɨ fāʼo moŋ ŋguoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ fɛ ki lɔ ŋgīʼɛ moŋ ŋguoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao. Ndɨɨ ŋa pigi fɛ pa yaoŋ fɛ pəɨ nɛ, kaŋ ŋgwa shi ntōo Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa fāʼa nu fàʼa yei lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi pɨʼɨ nu chà ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ, a pɨnɨ nu nchwīe ŋa ntou tōo nu lɨnaoŋ mbhɔ Minnwi.

Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pɔ nu ŋa pugu piŋ fàʼa yei, pugu shi mfɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi nthɛ pi fɛ nu noŋ yəɨ ni pwa pishaʼakhɔ Krishto ŋa pəɨ chhu nɛ, pugu pa pwapuŋ yəɨ nɔ fɛ nu yaoŋ ni pugu pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa nduoŋ.
Nɛnnɛ, pugu shi nduoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ni pəɨ ni mmɛ khwǎ, nthɛ pwapuŋ ki fɨʼɨ ŋa Minnwi nōoŋ ni pəɨ nɛ.
P̂ia tōo Minnwi nthɛ fɛ ki fɨʼɨ yei!
Mmu nduthɔ a, Pɔɔ, ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ juju pugu pa ndipɔrɔ Krishto, mbɔ mmu ŋa pi chhu ŋa ŋ̀ga mbɔgɔ ligi ndɨɨ ŋa pia pɔ kaʼa nɛ, ndɔ mfāʼo tɨnɨ njùʼɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pia lɔ mbɔ kaʼa nɛ!
Ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa ǹthɔ nɛ, kiʼi pəɨ chwīe m̀fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ni pəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ m̀bīʼi ŋa a pie ŋa m̀bɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pīʼi yugu ŋa pigi chwīe pa nnu pi moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pigi wuʼɔ mbɔ moŋ frɛinoŋ yei ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ, pigi lɔ njiʼi nthɔ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ pi nɔ haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ tāʼa nu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pa maoŋ nchhɔ̀ pigi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi maoŋ nchhɔ̀ ŋkuoŋ mbhi. A pɔ pi tɨtɨnɨ maoŋ nchhɔ̀ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi nɔ shāaŋ nu ghrɨ́ mimbɨna ndɔ mbɨnɨ nshāaŋ pa mindoundou mifɨɨ.
Pigi ghà nshāaŋ sheshe mindoundou ŋa a pɔ nɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni ji nu Minnwi nɛ, nchwīe ŋguoŋ pīʼi nu yaʼo pi mbhɔ Krishto.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ yaʼo nchò ti ŋgə̄ɨ mīʼɛŋ nɛ, pigi fɛ njɔ́ ni shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi nthɔ njaʼo nchò nɛ.

Pəɨ līi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pa nnu pɔ ligi pəɨ nɛ. S̈hesheŋoŋ mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ni noŋ yi ŋa a yi Krishto, a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkwiŋ noŋ yi ni yei nnu ŋa, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a yi Krishto nɛ, wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ pigi yi Krishto ŋkaa pigi.
Nthɛ ŋa m̈i njiʼi ndɔ ŋkwēi njùʼɔ ni njɨ nthɛ ghrɨ́ ŋa Taathɔ fɛ ni pigi nɔ chwīe nu pəɨ kuʼɔ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi nɔ pɨrɨ nu vəɨ nɛ, kaŋ m̀baʼa njiʼi mfāʼo lrithɔ.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu a pɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ǹchhɔ ŋgūru vəɨ wūru ni pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋa ǹaʼaŋ mfɛ nu ni pəɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pi chhu ŋa, “Pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ pi lrī ndɔ ntɨnɨ, ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a pɔ ju shhɛ nɛ, paʼa nduthɔ yi lɔ ntɨnɨ, ndɔ chrà yi pɔ nnu gha.”
Ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ ji ŋa yaoŋ ŋa pigi chhu pi moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pigi lɔ mbɔ nɛ, wuʼɔ nnu ŋa pigi chwīe ndɨɨ ŋa pigi pɔ shhɛ nɛ.

A lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa pigi mooŋ nchhɔ nūʼɔŋ noŋ yigi pi moŋ taʼa nthɨŋkwo, ki nthɔ mbīni pi noŋ yigi pigi pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu paʼo nu nɔ nōoŋ nu noŋ yugu ŋa pugu ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa nɛ. Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu lɔ̄gɔ noŋ yugu a pɔ nthɨŋkwo fɨʼɨ pa nnu, ndɔ mbīni ŋgwa pi mbɨŋ pugu nɛ, nōoŋ ŋa ŋgwa pei lɔ njiʼi nji nnu.
Minthɛ paʼa pigi lɔ ŋkwēi njùʼɔ yigi mfərə yei nthɨŋkwo, pigi shi ŋguʼɔ ŋkwēi njùʼɔ yigi ndugwi moŋ fiɛŋ ŋa Minnwi fɛ ni pigi ŋa pigi fāʼa fɔ nɛ, ti nchəɨŋ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa pigi lɔ njiʼi mbīgi pi noŋ yigi pi nɔ haʼaŋ pigi shini ndɔ nchəɨŋ mbɨŋ pəɨ. Nthɛ ŋa a pigi mbɔ fǔoŋ ŋgwa llɔ fie hiŋ nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ ni ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Krishto.
Pigi shiʼa njiʼi ŋkwēi njùʼɔ mfərə nthɨŋkwo moŋ fàʼa ŋa ŋgwa nduoŋ fāʼa nɛ. Ndɔ kwàʼa yigi pɔ pi ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ piŋ yəɨ pīgi nu nɛ, fɨʼɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa pigi shi fāʼa shɨna pəɨ ti nchəɨŋ nɛ, shi mbīgi ntou yi,
nji ŋa pigi shi nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ti mfərə laʼataoŋ yəɨ, pi ki lɔ ŋkwēi pi njùʼɔ nthɛ fàʼa ŋa chəɨ ŋoŋ kwo fāʼa ŋgei nduoŋ nɛ.
“Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kwēi njùʼɔ yi nɛ, kwēi njùʼɔ yi nthɛ pi Taathɔ.”
Nthɛ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a nōoŋ noŋ yi nɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ nɛ ŋa pi piŋ vi, a pɔ pi ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa Taathɔ nōoŋ vi ŋa a ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ nɛ.
Ǹtāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ fāʼo shɨgɛi wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ moŋ muuŋ mi shɨgɛi nnu na. Pəɨ fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ vəɨ.
M̀fāʼo thɛ fugu Minnwi nthɛ vəɨ, mi ni nōoŋ vəɨ nɔ miŋgwɛ fhi, ŋa a lɔ nji mimbia nɛ, ni taʼa mimbia, mbɔ Krishto.

Ndɔ ǹthɔ mbɔgɔ nu ŋa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mitwɛʼi ghɔ ni mfɨ̄ɨ Ive ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ mbha nnu mifɨɨ yi nɛ, njùʼɔ yəɨ shi mfɨ̄ɨ vəɨ ki pəɨ lɔ nuʼuŋ nthi ni taʼanjuʼɔ, pugu pa fɛ nu njùʼɔ yəɨ moŋ taoŋtaoŋ ni Krishto.

Nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ ŋoŋ nthɔ nchīi pa nnu nthɛ yichəɨ Jishɔ ŋkiɛŋ yɛ ŋa pigi chīi nu nɛ, pəɨ piŋ piŋ. Pəɨ piŋ yichəɨ jijwɛ ki lɔ mbɔ yɛ ŋa pəɨ ni mfǔoŋ mbiŋ nɛ piŋ, mbiŋ yichəɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ nduoŋ ki lɔ mbɔ yɛ ŋa pəɨ ni mfǔoŋ mbiŋ nɛ piŋ.
Shishini, ǹdɔ njiʼi mbīʼi ŋa mɛmmɛ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pəɨ pinɛ chaa a chaa.
Ä njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nji chrà, paʼa a lɔ mbɔ pi ŋa ǹdɔ nji nnu. Nɔ chrā nu shini, pigi ni nchwīe pəɨ ji pei pa nnu moŋ ŋguoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao.
Ki mi ni nchwīe pi phɨ nɔ jū nu noŋ a nji ŋa minthɛ pi kə̄rə vəɨ? Nthɛ ŋa mi ni nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Minnwi ni pəɨ ki lɔ ŋkwe pe nɛ.
Mi ni nchīgi pa chɔshi nduoŋ nthɛ ŋa mi ni ŋkwe pe mbhɔ pugu nɔ fāʼa nu mbhɔ pəɨ.

Nɔ pīgi nu, ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni mbɔ kaʼa pa chà pɔ mbɨŋ mu nɛ, ǹshini ndɔ ŋgana shesheŋoŋ vəɨ. Pa ghaŋ piŋ llɔ Mashedonia ni mbɨʼɨ pa chà paŋ. Nnɛ, ǹdāa nɔ pɔ nu lrì ni pəɨ, ndɔ m̀baʼa ndɛ ma mbɔ lrì ni pəɨ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ nnu shini Krishto pɔ njùʼɔ mu nɛ, m̀baʼa njiʼi mieŋ kwēi nu njùʼɔ moŋ pa krao ŋgei Akaya.
Yie pɔ nnɛ nthɛ khɔ? A pɔ nthɛ pi ŋa ǹdɔ ŋkhwā vəɨ? Minnwi ji ŋa ŋ̀khwā vəɨ.
Ǹshi ŋguʼɔ nthɔ nchwīe pa nnu pɛ ŋa ǹthɔ nchwīe nu nɛ, nnɛ nji ŋa ǹshi mfāʼo shɨ̀na nɔ lɨʼɨ nu ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pi lɔ̄gɔ vugu nɔ taʼa yaoŋ pigi pugu moŋ nnu pɛ ŋa pugu kwēi njùʼɔ yugu nthɛ yie nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa pighɔ pɔ pi ghaŋ ntaoŋ mifɨɨ, ghaŋ fàʼa fɨ̄ɨ ŋgwa, ŋa pugu pūoŋ noŋ yugu mbɔ nɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Krishto.
Ndɔ a lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ pi nnu ghrāo nu nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi Shata pūoŋ noŋ yi mbɔ nɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ líʼɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi nnu ghrāo nu nɔ haʼaŋ puoŋ fàʼa pi ŋkaa pugu pūoŋ noŋ yugu mbɔ nɔ puoŋ fàʼa ndɨndɨ. Moŋ ndugwi yi, pugu shi ŋkwōo pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu phī nɛ.
Ǹaʼaŋ mbɨnɨ mbīʼi, kiʼi yichəɨ ŋoŋ pīʼi ŋa m̀bɔ pi na. Ndɔ p̈əɨ ndɔ̄gɔ a nɛnnɛ, pəɨ piŋ a nɛ nɔ na nji ŋa minthɛ ŋ̀kwēi njùʼɔ a shɨgɛi.
Yei nnu ŋa ǹthɔ nchhu nu nɛ, ǹdɔ njiʼi ŋkwe ghrɨ́ pi mbhɔ Taathɔ nchhu nu nɔ ghɔ, ǹchhu pi nɔ na.
Nthɛ ŋa ntou ŋgwa ghà ŋkwēi njùʼɔ nthɛ pi nnu frɛinoŋ nɛ, mummu ŋkaa mu ǹshi ŋkwēi.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà ŋgwɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ ni pa na moŋ pwanjuʼɔ, ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi ghaŋ shiethɔ!
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ghà mfāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋ̈oŋ ndɔ̄gɔ vəɨ nɔ pa ŋkǔna ki njōo mbhɔ pəɨ, ki mfɨ̄ɨ vəɨ, ŋkə̄rə noŋ yi nthi thɔ pəɨ, ki nchrə̄ɨ lrì tə́nə pəɨ.
A nnu lrithɔ vəɨ nɔ chhu nu ŋa pigi ni ŋkɨ̄ʼɨ ŋgaʼa nɔ chwīe nu nnu pighɔ.
Ndɔ ti s̈hesheŋoŋ mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɔ tɛnɛ nu nthɛ yichəɨ nnu (ǹchrā pi nɔ na ŋkamuʼɔŋ), m̀fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɔ tɛnɛ nu nɔ ghɔ ŋkaa mu.
Pugu pa ŋgwa Hibru? Mummu ŋkaa mu yie. Pugu pa ŋgwa Ishrae? Mummu ŋkaa mu yie. Pugu puoŋ Abrahaŋ? Mummu ŋkaa mu yie.

Pugu puoŋ fàʼa Krishto? Ŋ̀ka chaa vugu chaa. Ǹchrā pi nɔ haʼaŋ mbɔ pi lɨ̀lɨŋ, ndɔ ŋ̀ka pɔ pɔ nchaa vugu, moŋ ntou fàʼa, moŋ ghə̄ɨ nu chə́ɨŋ ŋgɛŋgɛ, pi wie a moŋ ŋgɛ́ ki fɨʼɨ, ŋ̀guʼɔ ma ntɔgɔ pi moŋ gu ntou ndɨɨ.
Nɔ tiɛŋ ŋgɛ, pa ŋgwa Juu wie a ni trɛi wuŋ ni ndipuʼu ndigi cho ŋgwàŋ.
Nɔ trɛi ŋgɛ, pi wie a ni muuŋ thɨ, ntuŋ a ni ŋguʼɔ taʼa ŋgɛ, mitu ŋkhǐ kwo chhwi nshɨna kraokrao ni mmu trɛi ŋgɛ, moŋ taʼa tuʼu ni taʼa naoŋchɨ ǹdoo nu ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ thɔ mmɛ ŋkhǐ.

Ŋkuoŋ ntou pa nyìeŋ, ǹtɔgɔ moŋ gu moŋ pa nɨnəɨ, ntɔgɔ moŋ gu mbhɔ pa ŋgɨna minwi, ntɔgɔ moŋ gu mbhɔ pa ŋgwa paŋ, ntɔgɔ moŋ gu mbhɔ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, ntɔgɔ moŋ gu moŋ pa mɛmmɛ laʼataoŋ, ntɔgɔ moŋ gu moŋ ŋkǔnu njó, ntɔgɔ moŋ gu moŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ, ntɔgɔ moŋ gu mbhɔ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu fɨ̄ɨ ŋa pugu pa ghaŋ piŋ nɛ.
Moŋ ŋgəʼɨ pugu pa wie noŋ, ntɔgɔ moŋ ntou pa tuʼu ki lɔ ndhɛ, njì yia a, njùʼɔ a pɨnɨ njaoŋ, mbɔ ki maoŋ jɨ moŋ yiɛŋ ndɨɨ, moŋ fɨgəɨ pugu pa pou kwri ndhwí.
Ndɔ nɔ mieŋ nu ki lɔ ŋgə̄ɨ mfɨ̄ʼɨ pichəɨ pa nnu nduoŋ, moŋ pa lɛllɛ, m̀fāʼo lrì ghana njùʼɔ nthɛ ŋguoŋ pa chɔshi.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋoŋ lɔ ntɨnɨ nɛ, m̀bɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹdɔ ntɨnɨ ŋkaa mu. Ndɨɨ ŋa pi chwīe ŋoŋ gū moŋ phɨ nɛ, ǹdɨnaoŋ ni pəʼɨ njùʼɔ.
Ä mbɔ ŋa n̂tɛnɛ, ǹtɛnɛ pi ni pa maoŋ pɛ ŋa a nōoŋ ŋa ǹdɔ ntɨnɨ nɛ.
Minnwi ndɔ mbɔ Tǎa Jishɔ Taathɔ, mbɔ ju ŋa mbɔrɔ pɔ ji ki ndugwi yi nɛ, ji ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ ndɛʼi pi ŋgiɛŋ.
Moŋ Damashiku, ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nthɔ nshaʼa nu mbhɔ Fùoŋ Areta nɛ, ni nchhɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi mmɛ laʼataoŋ Damashiku nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu ma,
ndɔ pi ni niʼiŋ a moŋ mikuo nshwiʼi cho windu mbɨŋ ŋkaʼa, nnɛ ǹtei ntaoŋ mbhɔ yu.
A pie ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ ŋkwēi njùʼɔ a, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ shéi shi lɔ mbɔ nɔ ghɔ, ǹshi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nɔ chrā nu ŋkuoŋ yəɨ nu nnu pugu pa nnu haʼaŋ Taathɔ nōoŋ nɛ.
Ǹji yichəɨ ŋoŋ moŋ Krishto ŋa a khwɛnchrɔ ŋgaʼombhi nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni njā vi ŋkuʼɔ nɔ ghɔ moŋ trɛi yɛrɛ po, ki a ni mbɔ pi moŋ frɛinoŋ ki a shini ndɔ mbɔ pi moŋ frɛinoŋ, ǹdɔ njiʼi nji, a ji Minnwi.
Ǹji ŋa pi ni njā ŋoŋ vei ŋkuʼɔ nɔ ghɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ pwapwa po, ki a ni mbɔ pi moŋ frɛinoŋ ki a shini ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ moŋ frɛinoŋ, ǹdɔ njiʼi nji, a ji Minnwi.
A ni njaʼo pa nnu ŋa mbaʼa nchò fɨ̄ʼɨ, ŋa pi shi lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ ŋa ŋoŋ chhu.
Ǹshi ntɛnɛ moŋ ligi ŋoŋ vei, ndɔ ni nyaŋ noŋ m̀baʼa ntɛnɛ, ŋkiɛŋ ni pa yaoŋ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi ntɨnɨ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa m̈i ndɔ ŋkhwā nɔ kwēi nu njùʼɔ a paʼa ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi na, nthɛ ŋa ǹshi nthɔ nchrā pi nnu shini. Ndɔ m̀baʼa njiʼi ntɛnɛ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ŋoŋ līi a nɔ yaoŋ ŋa a nchaa fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a yəɨ mbɨŋ mu ki njaʼo llɔ mbhɔ mu nɛ.

Nɛnnɛ, nɔ lɨʼɨ nu ma ŋa kiʼi ǹōoŋ noŋ nthɛ pa mɛmmɛ nnu ghraoghrao ŋa ŋki yəɨ nɛ, pi ni niʼiŋ pa yaoŋ nɔ pa yaoŋ chwɛʼichwɛʼi mbɨŋ mu, ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ llɔ mbhɔ Shata, nɔ fɛ nu ŋgəʼɨ vəɨ, nɔ lɨʼɨ nu ma ŋa kiʼi m̀fāʼo nōoŋ noŋ.
Ǹjūa ni Taathɔ ni trɛi ŋgɛ́ nnɛ ŋa minthɛ yaoŋ yei taoŋ mbɨŋ mu.
Ndɔ a chhu vəɨ ŋa,
“Pwapuŋ a pɔ pi ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa ɔ fāʼo, nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ njɨ a ghà nōoŋ noŋ yi ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ lɔ ntɨnɨ nɛ.”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹja mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ kiʼɛ nɔ tɛnɛ nu moŋ pɔ nu ma ki lɔ ntɨnɨ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ njɨ Krishto kɨna mbɨŋ mu.
Nthɛ ligi Krishto kiʼɛ, m̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ moŋ pɔ nu ki lɔ ntɨnɨ, moŋ wɛ́ʼi, ŋgəʼɨ ghaghaʼa ŋa pi fɛ nu vəɨ pugu pa nnu tɨtɨnɨ. Nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi ntɨnɨ nɛ, ŋ̀kaŋ tɨtɨnɨ kəʼɨ ghɔ.

Ŋ̀kwo pɔ nɔ na, a fra pəɨ mfra a ŋa m̀bɔ nnɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ni mfāʼo pəɨ nɔ chhu nu ŋa mi ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ ndɔ mbiŋ a. Nthɛ ŋa ǹshini ndɔ ŋkɨgəɨ kɨgəɨ nchaa ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu chhu ŋa pugu ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ liɛŋliɛŋ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ǹdɔ mbɔ yichəɨ yaoŋ nɛ.
Mi ni nōoŋ pa lì ŋkiɛŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ shɨna pəɨ ni ŋguoŋ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ ghao, ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ pa lì pugu pa nnu ghraoghrao ni pa mɛmmɛ fàʼa tɨtɨnɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa a pɔ pi moŋ yəɨ shɛndaoŋ ŋa pi ni nchwīe ni pəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ lɔ mbɔ yaoŋ shɨna ŋguoŋ pichəɨ pa chɔshi, ŋkiɛŋ ŋa mmu nduthɔ a, shini ndɔ mbɔ lrì ni pəɨ? Pəɨ līʼɛ phɨ a yei mfɛ a nɔ ghɔ!

Līi njəɨ, ŋ̀kwo pīri noŋ a nɔ thɔ nu ŋkra vəɨ a pɔ trɛi ŋgɛ, ndɔ m̀baʼa mbie vəɨ ni sheshe yaoŋ nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi ntāʼa pi maoŋ pəɨ, ǹtāʼa pi pəɨ. Nthɛ ŋa a lɔ njīʼi ni puoŋ ŋa pugu lə̄ɨŋ maoŋ nthɛ pa tǎa pugu, ndɔ a yīʼi ŋa a lə̄ɨŋ pa tǎa nthɛ puoŋ pugu.
Ǹshi nja ŋkhwā nɔ phɛ nu ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa m̀fāʼo nɛ ti mbhɛ chɔmbhi a nthɛ nchə̌ɨ yəɨ. M̈i ŋkhwā vəɨ ntou yi, a nuʼuŋ mbie ŋa pəɨ khwā a pi shɨgɛi yi?
Pichəɨ shɨna pəɨ piŋ ŋa mmu nduthɔ a shini ndɔ mbɔ lrì ni pəɨ, pichəɨ shɨna pəɨ chhu ŋa mi ni mbɔ pi ŋgaŋ mbe, nchīgi vəɨ ni mifɨɨ.
Ŋkwaŋ nɛiŋ? Ŋki tɔgɔ mbɨŋ shesheŋoŋ ŋa ŋki taoŋ nɛ nchīgi vəɨ?
Ŋki lɨ̄gəɨ Taitu ŋa a ghə̄ɨ, nchuʼɔ taʼa ŋgaŋ piŋ ntaoŋ vugu yu. Taitu ni chīgi vəɨ? Ŋguoŋ yigi pugu shini ndɔ mfāʼo taʼa ŋkwaŋ njùʼɔ ndɔ mbha nnu yigi pɔ taʼa yi?

Pəɨ wuʼɔ nchhɔ mbīʼi nu ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ yei ŋa pigi chhɔ nchhu nnu pei nchhɔ ŋkwe pi noŋ pigi? Pigi chrā nu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Krishto tāʼa nu ŋa pigi chrā shhɨ Minnwi nɛ, ndɔ ŋguoŋ pa nnu haʼaŋ pigi chwīe nu nɛ, pigi chwīe pi nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu vəɨ, ma ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ.

Nthɛ ŋa m̀bɔgɔ nu ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa ǹshi nthɔ nɛ, paʼa ǹdɔ njəɨ vəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋ̀khwā nɛ, ndɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ njəɨ a nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ tāʼa nu nɛ. M̀bɔgɔ nu ŋa kəʼɨchəɨ fɛ̀ʼi shi mbɔ, kighɨʼə pɔ, pɨgɨtua, pugu pa kipɨna, ni chrà pɨphɨ, ni nchú, nōoŋ noŋ pugu ghaghana.

M̀bɔgɔ ŋa ǹshi ŋga mbɨnɨ nthɔ, Minnwi a shwiʼi a shhɛ shhɨ pəɨ, kəʼɨchəɨ ǹshi mfāʼo nɔ kə̄ɨ nu ntou pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋkwo ma nchwīe phɨ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njiʼi mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni pa nnu tɔtrɔ, kwoshuoŋ pugu pa nnu nchhí ŋa pugu chwīe nɛ.
A ŋgɛ́ yi trɛi ndwɛ nɔ haʼaŋ ǹthɔ nu ŋkra vəɨ. “P̈i nchhu sheshe nnu thɔ ŋoŋ, a wuʼɔ mbie ŋa paa miŋkwentie ki yi trɛi wuʼɔ mbɔ ŋkaoŋ nnu ghɔ maa mbɔ ŋa a nnu shini”

Mi ni nshūu tə́nə ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchwīe phɨ nɛ pugu pa ŋguoŋ pichəɨ ŋgwa nduoŋ. Ndɔ m̀bɨnɨ nthɔ nshūu tə́nə yugu ndwɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi mbɔ nɛ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki chwīe ndɨɨ ŋa ŋki thɔ ŋkra vəɨ mbra ŋgɛ́ nɛ, ŋa m̈i mbɨnɨ nthɔ ŋkamuʼɔŋ paʼa ǹdɔ nuʼuŋ mieŋ vugu.
Ǹchhu nɛiŋ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ chhɔ ntāʼa lì nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa Krishto chhɔ nchrā nu ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ mu. Krishto shi lɔ mbou pi ghrɨ́ ni ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ pugu tɔgɔ nu nɛ. A fāʼo ghrɨ́ shɨna pəɨ.

Nthɛ ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ vi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nthɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa a shini ndɔ ntɨnɨ, ndɔ a fāʼo chɔmbhi ndwɛ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ Minnwi. Pigi ŋkaa pigi lɔ njiʼi ntɨnɨ moŋ pɔ nu pigi pugu kaʼa, ndɔ moŋ chwīe nu pa nnu pia kaʼa, pigi fāʼo chɔmbhi pigi pugu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ Minnwi.
P̂əɨ līi noŋ pəɨ njəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ moŋ piŋ! P̂əɨ ywɛʼi noŋ pəɨ, ki pəɨ lɔ nji yei nnu, ŋa Jishɔ Krishto pɔ moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ, kaŋ a nɛiŋ, shishini pəɨ gū ywɛʼi nu ghɔ gū.
Ŋ̀kwāʼa ŋa pəɨ shi njəɨ ŋa pigi lɔ njiʼi ŋgū moŋ ywɛʼi nu ghɔ.

Ndɔ pigi luoŋ ni Minnwi ŋa kiʼi pəɨ fāaŋ sheshe nnu, ki lɔ mbɔ pi ŋa pigi nōoŋ noŋ yigi ŋa pigi kaʼokaʼo moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu. A pɔ pi ŋa pəɨ chwīe nnu yɛ ŋa a kāʼo nɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a shi mbɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pigi gugu.
Nthɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa pigi lɔ njiʼi nchwīe sheshe nnu ŋa a nōoŋ nu ŋa pigi lāa nnu shini lāa. Minthɛ pigi wuʼɔ nchwīe sheshe nnu nthi pi ŋkuoŋ nnu shini.
Pigi fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pigi pou ghrɨ́, ndɔ pəɨ fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɛ. Pigi luoŋ nu ŋa pəɨ pɨnɨ mbɨnɨ mbɔ shiʼi.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹaʼaŋ nnu pei mfɛ ni pəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pia lɔ njiʼi mbɔ kaʼa nɛ, nnɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa ǹthɔ nɛ, m̀baʼa nuʼuŋ nōoŋ nnu ghrɨ́ ŋa Taathɔ fɛ vəɨ nɛ mbɨŋ pəɨ ni njɨ, mbɔ ghrɨ́ ŋa a fɛ vəɨ ŋa ŋ̀kugwi vəɨ nɔ ghɔ ki lɔ nshāaŋ vəɨ shāaŋ nɔ ghɔ nɛ.

Nɔ lūgwi nu, ma lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ. P̂əɨ paʼo nɔ pɨnɨ nu mbɨ̄nɨ mbɔ shiʼi, māʼaŋ njùʼɔ noŋ pəɨ ni noŋ pəɨ. P̂əɨ pɔ ni taʼaŋggi, p̂əɨ chhɔ moŋ taʼaŋggi. Minnwi khwǎ, mbɔ Minnwi taʼaŋggi, pɔ pəɨ pugu.
P̂əɨ chrā ni noŋ pəɨ shishiʼi ni paŋ nu noŋ.
Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ.
Pwapuŋ Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ, pugu pa khwǎ Minnwi pugu pa Jijwɛ Minnwi pɔ pəɨ pugu ghao.
Galatians: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ mbhɔ mu Pɔɔ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, ki lɔ ndhɔ pi mbhɔ ŋgwamishua, ki ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ ŋoŋ. A tɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto, pugu Minnwi, mbɔ Tǎa vi, ŋa a ni ŋkuʼɔ ni ju moŋ gu nɛ.
Pigi pa ŋguoŋ ghaŋ piŋ, ŋa pigi pugu pɔ hɛiŋ kaʼa nɛ, chrā ni pa chɔshi moŋ Galashia.
Pwapuŋ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi mbɔ Tǎa via, pugu Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ pɔ ni pəɨ.
Jishɔ yei ni mfɛ noŋ yi ŋkhu nthɛ phɨ yia, nɔ fuʼu nu via moŋ mbhi pɨphɨ yei, ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ndɔ mbɔ Tǎa via ni ntāʼa nu nɛ,
ŋguoŋ ndighaʼo ghao ki ndugwi yi pɔ ji. A yie.
Ǹja ŋgrāo ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ kwo thɔ ntei Ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a gɛ̄ vəɨ, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Krishto, ŋka thɔ njōu pi njiŋ ŋkwaŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ nduoŋ nɛ.
Yichəɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ nduoŋ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ fɔ, a pɔ pi ŋa pichəɨ pa ŋgwa thɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ, ntāʼa nu ŋkwri pwa pishaʼakhɔ Krishto.
Ndɔ, ä njiʼi nthɔ pigi ki ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi llɔ po, nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ ki a lɔ mbɔ pi yɛ ŋa pigi ni nchīi ni pəɨ nɛ, nchɔ̀nɔ pɔ mbɨŋ yu llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.
Nɔ haʼaŋ pigi ni ŋkwo chhu, m̀bɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchhu ndwɛ ŋkamuʼɔŋ nɛ, ŋa ŋ̈oŋ nthɔ nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pəɨ, ki a lɔ mbɔ pi ŋkwaŋ yɛ ŋa pəɨ ni mbiŋ nɛ, nchɔ̀nɔ pɔ mbɨŋ ŋgaŋ vi, llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.

Mi chhɔ ndwɛ mbaʼo pi ŋa ŋgwamishua piŋ a, ki mi paʼo pi ŋa a piŋ Minnwi mbiŋ a? Ki mi paʼo pi nɔ chwīe nu ŋa túa ŋgwamishua pwa? A kaŋ ni mbɔ ŋa ŋ̀guʼɔ mbaʼo pi nɔ chwīe nu ŋa túa ŋgwamishua pwa, ǹshi kaŋ njiʼi mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa Krishto.
Ǹaʼaŋ nchwīe pəɨ ji, ma lǐŋ paŋ, ŋa pwa pishaʼakhɔ yɛ ŋa a ni nchīi mmu nɛ lɔ ndhɔ pi mbhɔ ŋgwamishua.
Nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ mfɛ sheshe ŋoŋmishua vəɨ, ndɔ paʼa pi lɔ njɛʼi a yɛʼi nɔ ghɔ. A thɔ vəɨ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ nnu ŋa Jishɔ Krishto ni nōoŋ vəɨ nɛ.
Pəɨ ni njaʼo ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ chɔmbhi a ni mbɔ, ndɨɨ ŋa mi ni nthɔ njōu njiŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu Minnwi pa ŋgwa Juu nɛ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋki thɔ mfɛ tɨtɨnɨ ŋgəʼɨ ni chɔshi Minnwi, mbaʼo nu nɔ shiʼi nu vi nɛ.
Ŋki ghə̄ɨ shhɨ moŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu Minnwi pa ŋgwa Juu nchaa ntou pa kuo pigi, nthɛ ŋa ŋki ya mfāʼo ntou niʼiŋ njùʼɔ moŋ nùʼɔŋ pa ŋkhu tǎa paŋ.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ju yɛ ŋa a ni ŋkwo chuʼɔ a llɔ ndɨɨ ŋa mǔuŋ a ni nshūu a nɛ, ndɔ mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋgɛ̄ a ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ yi,
ni mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nɔ nōoŋ nu muuŋ vi vəɨ nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ǹchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ nthɛ vi shɨna pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nɛ, ǹshini ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ mbhɔ shesheŋoŋ nɔ kwe nu ntɨ́gɨ.
Ǹshini ndɔ mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ yəɨ nu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ŋkaoŋ m̀aa mbɔ nɛ. Ŋ̀ki ka ghəɨghəɨ taʼa ŋgɛ́ moŋ laʼataoŋ Arabia, ndhɔ mbɨnɨ mbɨ̄nɨ Damashiku.
Trɛi ŋgaʼo ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, ŋ̀kuʼɔ Jerushalɛiŋ nɔ kra nu Kefa,
pigi yu chhɔ nɔ tiɛŋnchrɔ llɛmbhi.
Ǹshini ndɔ njəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ŋkiɛŋ Jɛiŋ ndǐŋ Taathɔ.
Nnu ŋa ǹaʼaŋ nɛ nnu shini. Minnwi ji ŋa ǹdɔ ndɛʼi pi ŋgiɛŋ.
A gha ndaʼa, ŋ̀gə̄ɨ moŋ pa krao ŋgei Shiria pugu Shilishia.
Moŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ, pa ŋgia chɔshi Krishto moŋ Judia shini ndɔ naa ma njəɨ a,
pugu ni ŋguʼɔ njaʼo yaʼo pi chhu nu ŋa, “Ŋoŋ vɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pia nɛ thɔ nɛ ndwɛ nchīi pi piŋ yɛ ŋa a ni ŋkaa nu nɔ shiʼi nu nɛ.”
Nnɛ, pugu ghaʼo Minnwi nthɛ a.
A ni ŋga ndaʼa khwɛnchrɔ ŋgaʼo, m̀bɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ Jerushalɛiŋ, pigi Banaba ni ŋkuʼɔ kaʼa. Mi ni ndɔ̄gɔ Taitu pigi pugu kuʼɔ kaʼa.

Mi ni ŋgə̄ɨ nthɛ ŋa Minnwi ni nōoŋ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ. Mi ni mfɨ̄ʼɨ ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ yɛ ŋa mi ni nchīi ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ nɛ moŋ kɨrɨ pa thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ təʼɨ vugu. Nnɛ nthɛ ŋa ǹshini ndɔ ntāʼa nu ŋa fàʼa ŋa mi ni ŋkwo fāʼa, pugu pa yɛ ŋa m̀fāʼa nu nɛ tɔgɔ gha.
Ndɔ pugu shini ndɔ njiʼi mfra nɔ niʼiŋ nu Taitu ŋa pigi yu ni mbɔ kaʼa nɛ ŋgunu mbrɛi, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ pi ŋoŋ Gri,

ndɔ pichəɨ ŋgwa ni ntāʼa nu ŋa pi niʼiŋ vi ŋgunu mbrɛi. Ŋgwa pei ni mbɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni mfɨ̄ɨ nu ŋa pugu ghaŋ piŋ, ŋiʼaŋ nii shɨna pigi nɔ pa miyra, nɔ tāʼa nu laʼo taoŋ nu moŋ kǔna mbhɔ gɨ́ pa Juu ŋa pigi taoŋ fɔ nthɛ ŋa pigi pa Krishto Jishɔ taʼa yi nɛ. Pugu ni ntāʼa nu ŋa pigi pɔ moŋ kǔna.
Pigi shini ndɔ mbiŋ chwīe nu nnu ŋa pugu ni nchhu nu nɛ kaŋ shɨgɛi yi, nnɛ ŋa nnu shini pwa pishaʼakhɔ kɨna ni pəɨ.
Ndɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ŋgwa chɨɨchɨɨ shɨna pəɨ nɛ, yaoŋ ŋa pugu yie ghɔ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yichəɨ nnu vəɨ, Minnwi shiʼa nōoŋ shieligi. Pugu shini ndɔ mbīgi sheshe nnu fhi vəɨ.
Pugu ni ŋka yəɨ pi ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ a ŋa ǹchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni ghaŋ ki nii ŋgunu mbrɛi
nɛ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni nchuʼɔ Pita ŋa a chīi ni ŋgwa ŋa pi niʼiŋ vugu ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ Pita mfāʼa ŋa â chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ nɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ni ŋgwa ŋa pi niʼiŋ vugu ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, ghà ŋguʼɔ mfāʼa ju mbɨŋ mu ŋa ǹchīi ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.

Ndɨɨ ŋa Jɛiŋ pugu Kefa, ni Jouŋ ŋa pugu ni mbɔ nɔ pa kwìni ni njəɨ fɨʼɨ pwapuŋ ŋa Minnwi ni nōoŋ vəɨ nɛ, pugu chrā ni pigi Banaba ni mbhɔ nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa pugu piŋ nnu ŋa pigi yɛʼi nu nɛ, ŋa pigi ghə̄ɨ nchīi ni pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, pugu chīi yugu ni ŋgwa ŋa pi niʼiŋ vugu ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋguʼɔ mbɨnɨ nchhu pi ŋa pigi kwiŋ ghaŋ piŋ mbɔ ghaŋ pou Jerushalɛiŋ, ŋguʼɔ mbɔ nnu yɛ ŋa mi ni ŋkwo ya ŋkhwā nu nɔ chwīe nu nɛ.
Nɔ pīgi nu, Kefa ni ŋga mbɔ Antiɔ yichəɨ ndɨɨ, ǹjəɨ ŋa a ni nthɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo nɛ, m̀bɨ̄ga vi shhɨ ŋgwa.

Ŋkāoŋ pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋa Jɛiŋ ni ntaoŋ vugu nɛ maa nchəɨŋ, Kefa ni nthɔ njɨ maoŋ pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, ŋgwa pighɔ gha nthɔ nchəɨŋ, a fuʼu noŋ yi mbɨ̄nɨ njiŋ nthɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ mbɔgɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nthi yugu pi ŋa pi niʼiŋ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ.
Pichəɨ pa ŋgwa Juu, mbɔ ghaŋ piŋ, pīni Kefa moŋ mbha nnu mifɨɨ yei, ti Banaba ŋkaa yu gū moŋ mifɨɨ yugu ghɔ.

Mi ni ŋga njəɨ ŋa mbha nnu pugu lɔ njiʼi ntɔgɔ ndaoŋ ntou ŋkuoŋ nnu shini pwa pishaʼakhɔ, ǹchhu ni Kefa shhɨ pugu ghao ŋa, “Gɔ̀ nduthɔ yɔ ya mbɔ ŋoŋ Juu, ndɔ nchhɔ chɔmbhi yɔ nɔ ŋoŋ taoŋ nduoŋ ki lɔ mbɔ pi ŋoŋ Juu. Ti a kie pi nɛiŋ ɔ fra ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu chhɔ chɔmbhi yugu nɔ pa Juu?”
Pia ni noŋ yia, pi phi via pia pɔ pi ŋgwa Juu, ki lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, mbɔ “ghaŋ phɨ” nɔ haʼaŋ pi ghà mɛ̄iŋ vugu nɛ,
ndɔ pia ji ŋa ŋoŋ shiʼa njiʼi mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́. Ŋoŋ ghà ŋguʼɔ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ piŋ nu Jishɔ Krishto.

Nnɛ pia ŋkaa pia piŋ pi Krishto Jishɔ ŋkaoŋ maa ntɔgɔ sháʼa, ntɔgɔ pi moŋ piŋ ŋa pia fāʼo mbɨŋ Krishto nɛ, ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́. Nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ tɔgɔ sháʼa shhɨ Minnwi nthɛ pi ŋa a ni nūʼɔŋ gɨ́.
Ti p̈ia mbaʼo nɔ pɔ nu ŋgwa ndɨndɨ pi moŋ piŋ nu Krishto, pa Juu līi via nɔ ghaŋ phɨ, yie ghɔ nōoŋ kiʼɛ pi ŋa Krishto pɔ pi ŋgaŋ piŋ nnu phɨ? Ŋga!
Nthɛ ŋa mi mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkrao yaoŋ ŋa mi ni ŋkwo shāaŋ māʼaŋ shhɛ nɛ, yie ghɔ nōoŋ ŋa ǹōoŋ noŋ a ŋa mi ŋgushaʼa.
Nthɛ ŋa mi ni fǔoŋ nchhɔ chɔmbhi, mbaʼo pi nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ ndūgu, ndɔ mi ni ŋga ndūgu mbhɔ gɨ́, mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ chhɔ nu chɔmbhi mbhɔ Minnwi.

Pi kwo kwīŋ vigi Krishto ŋkuoŋ wáʼa kaʼa. A lɔ nuʼuŋ nchhɔ mmu nchhɔ chɔmbhi a, a chhɔ Krishto chɔmbhi yi moŋ chɔmbhi a. Chɔmbhi yɛ ŋa ǹchhɔ nu ndwɛ moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ, ǹchhɔ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ piŋ nu Muuŋ Minnwi, ŋa a ni ŋkhwā a mfɛ noŋ yi nthɛ a nɛ.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi ndāa pwapuŋ Minnwi, nthɛ ŋa a kaŋ mbɔ ŋa ŋoŋ nthɛ a pɔ yi ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́, kaŋ Krishto ni ŋkhu pi gha.
Pa na ŋgwa Galashia, a chɔ̄nɔ gɔ̌ nchɔ̄nɔ vəɨ? A ni mbɔ pi ligi pəɨ ŋa pi ni mfɨ̄ʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi ni ŋkwīŋ Jishɔ Krishto ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nɛ.
Ǹaʼaŋ mbie vəɨ ni yei nnu, pəɨ ni mfāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi moŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ ki ntɔgɔ pi moŋ yaʼo nu chrà Minnwi ndɔ mbiŋ?
A haʼaŋ pəɨ ya na? Pəɨ ni njɛ̄ pi moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi ntāʼa nu ndwɛ mīʼɛŋ pi ni ghrɨ́ ŋgwamishua?
Pəɨ ni ntɔgɔ moŋ ntou ŋgəʼɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ ni mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ pi ghagha? A shini ndɔ mbɔ pi gha!
Minnwi yei ŋa a ni mfɛ Jijwɛ yi ni pəɨ, mfāʼa pa nnu ghraoghrao shɨna pəɨ nɛ ni nchwīe nɛnnɛ nthɛ pi ŋa pəɨ ghà nchwīe nnu ŋa gɨ́ chhu nɛ, ki ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ nu nnu ŋa pəɨ yaʼo nɛ?
A wuʼɔ mbɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Abrahaŋ ni mbiŋ Minnwi, nthɛ piŋ yi, Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ vi nɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nɛ.
P̂əɨ ji nɛ kiʼɛ ŋa a ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghaŋ piŋ nɛ, ŋa pugu puoŋ Abrahaŋ.

Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ni ŋkwo yəɨ nnu yɛ ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ, ŋa Minnwi shi nchwīe pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ pɔ yi ndɨndɨ ligi yu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ yugu. Minnwi ni nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni Abrahaŋ ŋa, “Ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ ghɔ, ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ shi mfāʼo mbɔrɔ.”
Nnɛ, ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghaŋ piŋ nɛ fāʼo mbɔrɔ pugu pa Abrahaŋ mbɔ ŋgaŋ piŋ.

Nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà njɨʼə noŋ yugu pi ŋkuoŋ chwīe nu nnu pɛ ŋa gɨ́ chhu nɛ pɔ pi moŋ nchɔ̀nɔ Minnwi, nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa, “Nchɔ̀nɔ pɔ mbɨŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ nthi ŋkuoŋ ŋguoŋ nnu pɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ ndɔ nchwīe nu nɛ.”
Ndwɛ pi ya nji ŋa mbaʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ pɔ yi ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́, nthɛ ŋa, “Ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shi mfāʼo chɔmbhi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ nu Minnwi.”
Ndɔ gɨ́ lɔ njiʼi nthi pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ka chhu pi ŋa, “Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa gɨ́ chhu nɛ, shi mfāʼo chɔmbhi.”
Krishto ni ŋkwo yuoŋ via mfuʼu moŋ nchɔ̀nɔ llɔ mbhɔ gɨ́ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pɔ nu nchɔ̀nɔ nthɛ via. Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa, “Nchɔ̀nɔ pɔ ni shesheŋoŋ ŋa pi krɛ̄i vi ŋkuoŋ thɨ nɛ.”
Krishto Jishɔ ni nchwīe nnɛ nji ŋa ntɔgɔ mbhɔ yu minthɛ pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ fāʼo mbɔrɔ Abrahaŋ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia fāʼo Jijwɛ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa nɛ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ.

Nɔ māʼaŋ nu fɨʼɨ ni nnu ŋa a ghà ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ shɨna ŋgwamishua nɛ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, ndɨɨ ŋa paa ŋgwa pɔ ni taʼaŋggi ŋkuoŋ nnu ti ŋgwrā kɨ̀na nɛ, mbaʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ nuʼuŋ nchiʼi ki mbīgi sheshe yaoŋ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ.
Ndwɛ, kàʼa ghɔ ni mbɔ pi ni Abrahaŋ pugu taʼa mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ yi. A shini ndɔ njiʼi nchhu pi ŋa, “ni pa mbhɛ̌ ŋgwa pi,” mbɔ ntou ŋgwa, a ni nchhu pi taʼa yi, “mbɔ taʼa mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ yɔ,” mbɔ Krishto.
Yei nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ, gɨ́ ŋa a ni nthɔ pi khwɛ ŋkɨɨ ŋgaʼombhi ni trɛi wuŋ njiŋ nɛ, nthɛ paʼa a lɔ mbəʼɨ kɨ̀na ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkwo wrā pugu Abrahaŋ nɛ, nnɛ nɔ chiʼi nu kàʼa Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa fɛ́ Minnwi kaŋ ni nthi pi ŋkuoŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́, a nōoŋ ŋa a lɔ nuʼuŋ nthi pi ŋkuoŋ kàʼa Minnwi. Ndɔ a ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kàʼa Minnwi ŋa a ni mfɛ fɛ́ ghɔ ni Abrahaŋ.

Ti ghɛ̀rɛ gɨ́ ni mbɔ pi khɔ? Pi ni mfɛ gɨ́ nnɛ ŋa a nōoŋ yaoŋ ŋa phɨ yie ghɔ nɛ, mfāʼa ji ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ Abrahaŋ haʼaŋ pi ni nchwīe kàʼa nthɛ vi shi nthɔ nɛ. Minnwi ni mfɛ gɨ́ ntɔgɔ mbhɔ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi ni Mushi nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ki thi shɨna Minnwi pugu pa ŋgwamishua nɛ.
Ndɔ ndwɛ, ŋgaŋ titri ghà ŋga mbɔ, a nōoŋ ŋa a lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi nnu taʼa ŋoŋ. Ndɔ ndwɛ, Minnwi wuʼɔ mbɔ pi taʼa ŋoŋ.
Yie nōoŋ ŋa gɨ́ pɔ pi kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni kàʼa Minnwi? Ŋga! Nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ gɨ́ kaŋ ni mbɔ ŋa a nthɛ a fɛ chɔmbhi, pɔ nu ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi kaŋ mbɔ shini ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́.
Ndɔ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɔ pi pa kǔna mbhɔ phɨ, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pi fɛ kàʼa yɛ ŋa a llɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ
ŋa Jishɔ Krishto nōoŋ nɛ, ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu piŋ nɛ.
Ndɔ ŋkaoŋ piŋ maa nthɔ, gɨ́ ni ŋkrao vigi niʼiŋ chə́ɨŋ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni nōoŋ piŋ nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, gɨ́ ni mbɔ ŋgaŋ nōoŋ ndaoŋ ni pigi ti Krishto nuʼuŋ nthɔ, nnɛ pigi kie ŋkuoŋ piŋ mbɔ ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi.
Ndɔ ndwɛ nɔ haʼaŋ piŋ kwo thɔ nɛ, a lɔ nuʼuŋ mbie ŋa a thɔ ndɨna gɨ́ ni pigi.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹtɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Krishto Jishɔ, ŋguoŋ vəɨ ghao puoŋ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ.
Pəɨ ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkwe ŋkhǐ nɔ pɔ nu taʼa yi pəɨ pa Krishto nɛ, kwo māʼaŋ Krishto nɔ ndhwí mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Nɛnnɛ, kwrí lɔ mbɔ shɨna pa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, shɨna pa kǔna pugu pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ mbɔ pa kǔna nɛ, shɨna mbia pugu pa piŋgɛ, nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ vəɨ ghao taʼa yi moŋ Krishto Jishɔ.
P̈əɨ mbɔ yi Krishto, kaŋ pəɨ mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ Abrahaŋ, nshi mfāʼo kàʼa ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa Abrahaŋ nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Ǹaʼaŋ māʼaŋ fɨʼɨ ni lì yei, nɔ haʼaŋ muuŋ piʼi mikəʼɨ nda pugu nɛ, ti mfɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ shi ndɛ mbɔ pi ji nɛ, a lɔ njiʼi nchaa ŋkǔna.
A fāʼo nɔ yaʼo nu nchò pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɨna nu ni ju ti a shi nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ ŋgū mmɛŋoŋ ŋkāʼo nɔ ndɨɨ haʼaŋ tǎa vi ni nūʼɔŋ nɛ.
A wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ ni pia ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ puoŋ prɔ nɛ, pia ni mbɔ pa kǔna mbhɔ pa nùʼɔŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ni ŋga ŋkāʼo, Minnwi taoŋ Muuŋ vi, miŋgwɛ phi vi, a fāʼo nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ Mushi,
nɔ yuoŋ nu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa gɨ́ tuo vugu nɛ pugu lūgu, nnɛ ŋa pinthɛ Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ via nɔ puoŋ pi.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pa puoŋ nɛ, Minnwi fɛ Jijwɛ Muuŋ vi njùʼɔ pia, mbɔ Jijwɛ ŋa a yūa ŋa, “Baba, Tǎa a.”
Nɛnnɛ, ɔ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ pi ŋkǔna, ɔ pɔ pi muuŋ. Nthɛ ŋa ɔ pɔ pi muuŋ nɛ, Minnwi fɛ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a fāʼo nɛ vɛ.
A ni mbɔ ndɨɨ shhɨ, mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ shini ndɔ naa nji Minnwi nɛ, pəɨ ni mbɔ pa ŋkǔna mbhɔ pa maoŋ ŋa pugu lɔ ndɔ mbɔ nnwi nɛ.

Ti ndwɛ ŋa pəɨ kwo ji Minnwi nɛ, ki nthɛ pi ŋa Minnwi kwo ji vəɨ nɛ, pinthɛ pəɨ kie pi nɛiŋ mbɨnɨ ŋkara mbɨnɨ ŋkuoŋ nùʼɔŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghrɨ́ ki ghɛ̀rɛ nɛ, pəɨ tāʼa nu mbɨnɨ mbɔ pa ŋkǔna mbhɔ pa nùʼɔŋ pighɔ ŋkamuʼɔŋ?
Pəɨ ghà ndɨna ni nūʼɔŋ nu pichəɨ pa mmɛ llɛ́ pugu pa taŋ, pugu pa ndɨɨ ni pa ŋgaʼo.
M̀fāʼo pɔ́gɔ nthɛ vəɨ ŋa ŋgəʼɨ ŋa ǹjəɨ nthɛ vəɨ nɛ phɛ pi gha.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, m̀baʼo mbhɔ ŋa p̂əɨ pɔ nɔ mmu, nthɛ ŋa mummu kwo pɔ nɔ pəɨ.
Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mfāaŋ nnu mbɨŋ mu.
Pəɨ ji ŋa a ni mbɔ nthɛ pi ŋa noŋ a shini ndɔ nja mbɔ shiʼi nɛ ŋa ŋki chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pəɨ fǔoŋ ŋgɛ.
Ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ noŋ a ni mbɔ nnɛ nɛ, mbɔ nɔ mōoŋ nu ni pəɨ nɛ, pəɨ shini ndɔ ndāa a ki nchɨ̄ʼə a, pəɨ ni mbiŋ a nɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, nɔ Krishto Jishɔ nduthɔ yi.
Ti ndwɛ, a lɔ̄gɔ khɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ni fɨʼɨ pwanjuʼɔ yɛ ŋa pəɨ ni mfāʼo nɛ? Mmu nduthɔ a, minthɛ ǹchhu ŋa pəɨ kaŋ ni nthɛ pəɨ fuʼu muuŋ ligi yəɨ mfɛ vəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ a kaŋ ni njiʼɛ.
Ŋ̀ka pɨnɨ mbɔ pi mbɨ̌na vəɨ ndwɛ nthɛ ŋa ǹchhu nnu shini ni pəɨ nɛ?
Ŋgwa pighɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa pugu fāʼo ndɨɨ yəɨ ntou yi ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbīʼi pi shiʼi nthɛ vəɨ. Pugu tāʼa nu mfɛ̄nɛ vəɨ yəɨ mu, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ kɨna ni ŋguoŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ njiŋ pugu.
Ŋ̈oŋ mfāʼo ntou khwǎ nɔ chwīe nu shiʼi, kaŋ a pwa, ndɔ â chwīe ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ndɨɨ ŋa pia pɔ kaʼa nɛ.
Pa puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ, m̀bɨnɨ nchhɔ ŋgwie noŋ a nɔ miŋgwɛ shūu ŋa a phi nu nɛ, nnɛ ti pəɨ nuʼuŋ ntɨnɨ moŋ Krishto.
Ǹjūa ŋa pia kaŋ ni mbɔ pi kaʼa, ŋ̀kwri ŋkwaŋ ŋggì ŋa ǹchrā nu nɔ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa m̀fāʼo ntou fiŋthɔ nthɛ vəɨ.
Pəɨ shwei a, pəɨ ŋa pəɨ khwā nɔ kɨna nu ŋkuoŋ gɨ́ nɛ, pəɨ shiʼa njwɛrɛ yaoŋ ŋa gɨ́ ghɔ chhu nɛ?
Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa Abrahaŋ ni mfāʼo paa puoŋ pimbia, taʼa yi pɔ mǔuŋ vi pɔ miŋgwɛ ŋkǔna, yichəɨ pɔ muuŋ vɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ mbɔ kǔna nɛ.
Pi ni mbhi muuŋ vɛ ŋa mǔuŋ vi ni mbɔ miŋgwɛ ŋkǔna nɛ, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ mbiʼi nu nnu ŋgwamishua, ndɔ mbhi muuŋ vɛ ŋa mǔuŋ vi miŋgwɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ mbɔ ŋkǔna nɛ, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kàʼa Minnwi.
Ndwɛ, paa piŋgɛ pei thi pi nɔ ligi yaoŋ, pugu pɔ nɔ paa kɨ̀na. Taʼa yi, mbɔ Haga, pɔ nɔ yɛ kɨ̀na ŋa Minnwi ni ŋgwrā pugu pa puoŋ Ishrae ŋkuoŋ Mbra Shinai nɛ. A ni mbhi puoŋ pugu pɔ pa ŋkǔna.
Haga yei pɔ pi nɔ mbra Shinai moŋ laʼataoŋ Arabia, mbɔ nɔ Jerushalɛiŋ shiʼa nthɛ ŋa a pɔ moŋ kǔna pugu pa puoŋ pi.
Ndɔ yɛ Jerushalɛiŋ ŋa a pɔ po nɛ, lɔ njiʼi mbɔ moŋ kǔna ndɔ mbɔ mǔuŋ via.
Nthɛ ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa:
“Fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ, ma ŋkhwɛ̀ ŋa a lɔ mbhi nɛ,
paʼo ŋgòu, ŋkə̄ɨ ni pwatua,
mbɔ gɔ̀ ŋa muuŋ lɔ naa ma naoŋ ghɔ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa puoŋ ju ŋa pi shini ndɔ mfāʼo ndɨɨ yi nɛ
shi njiɛŋ nchaa yi miŋgwɛ
yɛ ŋa a fāʼo mimbia ghɔ nɛ.”
Pəɨ ndwɛ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, pɔ pi puoŋ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kàʼa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Aiji ni mbɔ nɛ.

Ndɔ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ndɨɨ ghɔ muuŋ yɛ ŋa pi ni mbhi vi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pīʼi nu ŋgwamishua nɛ ni mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni yɛ muuŋ ŋa pi ni mbhi vi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi ni ntāʼa nu nɛ, a wuʼɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ ndwɛ nɛ.
Ndɔ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu pi ŋa? A chhu ŋa, “Yōu miŋgwɛ ŋkǔna pugu muuŋ vi, nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa muuŋ miŋgwɛ ŋkǔna ghɔ lɛ ma mfāʼo maoŋ tǎa pugu muuŋ vɛ miŋgwɛ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ ŋkǔna nɛ kaʼa.”
Nnɛ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, pia lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi puoŋ miŋgwɛ ŋkǔna ghɔ, pia pɔ pi yi miŋgwɛ yɛ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ ŋkǔna nɛ.
Nɔ taoŋ nu moŋ kǔna, Krishto kwo fuʼu via moŋ ghɔ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, thi a tɨnɨ ki lɔ nuʼuŋ mfɛ noŋ yɔ ni lrì kǔna.
Līi njəɨ nduthɔ a, Pɔɔ, chhu nu ni pəɨ ŋa p̈əɨ nuʼuŋ mbiŋ nnu nii ŋgunu mbrɛi, kaŋ Krishto lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ ni pəɨ.
Ǹchhɔ nɛ nshūu tə́nə shesheŋoŋ ŋa a wuʼɔ mbiŋ nnu niʼiŋ ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, ŋa a yīʼi ŋa a nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ gɨ́.
P̂əɨ fɛ̄nɛ noŋ yəɨ mbɨŋ Krishto, pəɨ ŋa pəɨ tāʼa nu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ mbɔ yi ndɨndɨ nɛ. Pəɨ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi moŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa ntɔgɔ pi moŋ Jijwɛ, moŋ piŋ, pigi ni noŋ pigi ni pwatua thɔ njwɛrɛ yaoŋ ŋa pigi kwāʼa nu nɛ, mbɔ pɔ nu ŋgwa ndɨndɨ shhɨ Minnwi.
Moŋ Krishto Jishɔ, niʼiŋ nu ŋgwa ŋgunu mbrɛi ki mieŋ nu ki lɔ niʼiŋ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yichəɨ ghɛ̀rɛ. Yaoŋ ŋa a ghɛ̄rɛ nɛ pɔ pi piŋ ŋa a fāʼa ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ khwǎ nɛ.
Pəɨ ni nja ntei tei ghɔ shiʼi, ti a ni mbɨnɨ mbɔ gɔ̌ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ ni pəɨ nɔ yōu nu njiŋ nnu shini?
Yei lɨ̀gəɨ ŋa pəɨ mieŋ nnu shini lɔ ndhɔ pi mbhɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ki gɛ̄ vəɨ nɛ.
Ntɨ́gɨ pɨphɨ yei pɔ pi nɔ muuŋ mi shɨgɛi yaoŋ chwīe prupɨna kuʼɔ ŋa a ghà nchwīe ŋguoŋ prupɨna kuʼɔ.
Ǹja mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ moŋ Taathɔ nthɛ vəɨ ŋa mbaʼa pəɨ yiʼi nthi ŋkuoŋ nnu nduoŋ ntɔgɔ yɛ ŋa ŋ̀gwɛ̄iŋ nɛ. Shesheŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a thɔ mvūʼu vəɨ nɛ shi mfāʼo njɔ́, ki a pɔ pi gɔ̌.

Ndɔ ni mmu, ma lǐŋ paŋ, ŋ̀kaŋ ŋguʼɔ mbɨnɨ nthɔ nchīi pi ŋa a pie ŋa pi niʼiŋ ŋgwa ŋgunu mbrɛi, pi shi kaŋ ndɔ nuʼuŋ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ vəɨ. A kaŋ ni mbɔ pi nɛnnɛ, kaŋ chrà Minnwi ŋa ǹchīi nu nthɛ gu Krishto ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nɛ, shi kaŋ nuʼuŋ mbɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ.
Ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu tāra thɔ yəɨ nɛ ya nɛ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ mbuʼɔ noŋ yugu.

Nthɛ ŋa pi ni ŋgɛ̄ vəɨ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ mbɔ moŋ kǔna, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ndɔ kiʼi pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ yie a pɔ shɛndaoŋ nɔ kie nu fɔ nchwīe pa nnu pɨphɨ ŋa frɛinoŋ yəɨ tāʼa nu nɛ. Ndɔ p̂əɨ ka tɔgɔ pi moŋ khwǎ ŋgɛ̄rɛ noŋ pəɨ.
Ŋguoŋ gɨ́ chīri ntaoŋ moŋ taʼa gɨ́ yei ŋa, “Khwā taakuo yɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā noŋ yɔ nɛ.”
Ti p̈əɨ nthɔ ntāʼa láʼo, ndɔ nshāaŋ noŋ pəɨ, pəɨ lɨna nu kaŋ pəɨ shi njwi noŋ pəɨ.
Ndɔ nnu ŋa ǹchhu nu nɛ pɔ ŋa chhɔ chɔmbhi yɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ chhu nɛ, kaŋ mbaʼa ɔ nuʼuŋ nchwīe nnu ŋa frɛinoŋ tāʼa nu nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa pa nnu ŋa frɛinoŋ khwā nɛ pɔ ni kipɨna pugu Jijwɛ, pa nnu ŋa Jijwɛ tāʼa nu nɛ pɔ ni kipɨna pugu pa frɛinoŋ. Pa nnu pei pɔ pi ni kipɨna, nnɛ minthɛ paʼa ɔ lɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa ɔ khwā nɔ chwīe nu nɛ.
Ndɔ p̈əɨ njaʼo pi nnu ŋa Jijwɛ chhu nu nɛ, paʼa a lɔ nuʼuŋ nshaʼa gɨ́ nshaʼa vəɨ.
Pa mbha nnu ŋa frɛinoŋ ghà nchwīe nɛ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ pi nnu lə̄ɨŋ: shúoŋ, mbha nnu tɔtrɔ, pa nnu shhunoŋ,

ghaʼo nu pa nnwi, lɨ̀ŋ, kipɨna, minduoŋnduoŋ, kighɨʼə, mɛmmɛ pɨgɨtua, tāʼa nu nɔ pɔ nu shhɨ, ki lɔ njaʼo nnu mbhɔ ŋgwa nduoŋ, fuʼu nu noŋ shɨna ŋgwa haʼaŋ pəɨ pugu lɔ mbīʼi nnu taʼa ŋkwaŋ, shɛ̄rɛ nu ntaoŋ puoŋ mi chuʼu,

chwīe nu pa nnu kighɨʼə, paa nu làʼo, ghə̄ɨ nu moŋ pa lɨʼɨ jɨ ki tou pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu pei. Ǹshūu tə́nə yəɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki ŋkwo shūu tə́nə yəɨ nɛ, ŋa mbaʼa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà nchwīe ŋkwaŋ nnu pei nɛ fāʼo shɨ̀na moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi.
Ndɔ ntíɛŋ Jijwɛ pɔ pi khwǎ, pwanjuʼɔ, ghɨghrɨ, wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ, pwapuŋ, mbha nnu shiʼi, taʼanjuʼɔ,
junoŋ, wɛ̄iŋ noŋ, yichəɨ kaŋ taʼa gɨ́ lɔ ndāa ŋkwaŋ nnu pei.
Ndɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yi Krishto Jishɔ nɛ kwo kwīŋ frɛinoŋ yugu ŋkuoŋ wáʼa pugu pa nnu pɨphɨ pi, pugu pa nnu pɛ ŋa a khwā nɛ.
Ŋa pia fāʼo chɔmbhi pi llɔ mbhɔ Jijwɛ nɛ, pia wuʼɔ nchhɔ chɔmbhi yia pi nɔ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ chhu nɛ.
Kiʼi pia māʼaŋ nthìntaʼo, ndɔ ki lɔ nchwīe túa pichəɨ ŋgwa pɨgɨ nu, ki ŋgɨ̄ʼə pichəɨ ŋgwa.
Lǐŋ paŋ, s̈hesheŋoŋ ŋgū moŋ phɨ, p̂əɨ ŋa pəɨ tɨnɨ moŋ jijwɛ nɛ, pɨnɨ njuʼu vi moŋ jijwɛ juju. Lɨna ni noŋ yɔ ŋkaa ghɔ nji ŋa kiʼi ywɛʼi nu nii ghɔ ɔ chwīe phɨ.
Ghɛ̄rɛ ntiɛŋ lrì pichəɨ ŋgwa nnɛ kaŋ ɔ nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ Krishto.
Nthɛ ŋa s̈hesheŋoŋ ndīi noŋ yi ŋa a mmɛŋoŋ ndɔ mbɔ pi muuŋ mi ŋoŋ kaŋ a fɨ̄ɨ pi noŋ yi.
Ndɔ ŝheshe ŋoŋ līi fàʼa yi, nji ŋa ä ntāʼa nu ŋkwēi njùʼɔ yi â pɔ nthɛ pi noŋ yi ki lɔ mbɔ nthɛ pi taakuo yi.
Nthɛ ŋa a pie ŋa shesheŋoŋ tiɛŋ lrì yi.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa pi yɛʼi vi ni chrà Minnwi nɛ ghrā ŋguoŋ maoŋ shiʼi ŋa a fāʼo nɛ mfɛ yi ŋoŋ ŋa a yɛʼi vi nɛ.
Kiʼi pəɨ fɨ̄ɨ noŋ pəɨ, ŋoŋ shiʼa māʼaŋ Minnwi ni kwə̀ɨŋ, sheshe yaoŋ ŋa ŋoŋ phī nɛ a yɛ ŋa a shi ŋkwōo nɛ.
Ɔ̈ mbhī pi maoŋ frɛinoŋ, ɔ kwōo gu llɔ moŋ frɛinoŋ ghɔ, ndɔ ti ɔ̈ mbhī pi maoŋ moŋ Jijwɛ, ɔ kwōo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ moŋ Jijwɛ ghɔ.
Ndɔ kiʼi pia kɨna chwīe nu shiʼi nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ shi ŋga ŋkāʼo pia kwōo shéi, nɔ haʼaŋ pia mieŋ ki yaʼa kuo.
Nnɛ kiʼɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ pia fāʼo shɨna nɛ, p̂ia chwīe shiʼi mbɨŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao. Mīʼɛŋ mbɔ mbɨŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ŋgia ghaŋ piŋ nɛ.
Līi njəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ǹāʼaŋ yei lɨʼɨ ni nyaŋ mbhɔ, ndɔ nāʼaŋ a ghaʼoghaʼo nɛ!
A wuʼɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu tāʼa nu nōoŋ noŋ moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ ŋa pugu fra vəɨ ŋa pi niʼiŋ vəɨ ŋgunu mbrɛi, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pi fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu nthɛ wáʼa Krishto.
Nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi pugu ŋa pugu nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, lɔ njiʼi nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ nduthɔ yugu. Ndɔ pugu tāʼa nu ŋa pi niʼiŋ vəɨ ŋgunu mbrɛi nnɛ ŋa pugu kwēi njùʼɔ yugu ŋa pəɨ nii ŋgunu mbrɛi moŋ frɛinoŋ.

Ndɔ ni mmu, kiʼi a ma mbɔ ŋa ŋ̀kwēi njùʼɔ a ŋkiɛŋ ŋa ŋ̀guʼɔ ŋkwēi njùʼɔ nthɛ pi wáʼa Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ Taathɔ via. Nthɛ ŋa ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ gu Krishto ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, ŋkuoŋ mbhi kwo pɔ yi kwīŋ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa vəɨ, mummu pɔ yi kwīŋ ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nɔ ligi ŋkuoŋ mbhi.
Nthɛ ŋa niʼiŋ nu ŋgwa ŋgunu mbrɛi ki mieŋ nu ki lɔ niʼiŋ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yichəɨ ghɛ̀rɛ. A pɔ nu ŋoŋ fhi mbɔ mmɛ nnu.
Ghɨghrɨ pugu pa kwoshɨnɨ pɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yōu njiŋ chrà yei nɛ, mbɨnɨ mbɔ mbɨŋ Ishrae ŋa a yi Minnwi nɛ.
Jɛ̄ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, kiʼi ŋoŋ tāʼa a ni ndàŋ nthɛ ŋa pa tɨ̀na Jishɔ pɔ mbɨŋ noŋ mu.
Pwapuŋ Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ via, pɔ ni jijwɛ yəɨ ghao, ma lǐŋ paŋ. A pɔ nɛnnɛ.
Ephesians: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ mbhɔ mu Pɔɔ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Krishto Jishɔ, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ khwā njùʼɔ Minnwi, ŋgə̄ɨ ni pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ moŋ laʼataoŋ Ɛfɛshɔ ndɔ mbɔ ŋgwa taʼanjuʼɔ mbɨŋ Krishto Jishɔ.
Pwapuŋ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, mbɔ Tǎa via, pugu Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ, pɔ ni pəɨ.
Mbɔrɔ yi Minnwi, mbɔ Tǎa Taathɔ via, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto, ŋa a fɛ ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ mbɔrɔ moŋ jijwɛ ni pia moŋ mbhi mooŋ jijwɛ ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Krishto.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a chuʼɔ via nthɛ Krishto ŋkaoŋ maa nchwīe mbhi nɛ, ŋa p̂ia pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ki lɔ mfāʼo ntəɨ shhɨ yu. Moŋ khwǎ,
a ni ndɔ̄gɔ nthi mi fie ndɨɨ ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ Jishɔ Krishto nchwīe pia pɔ puoŋ pi, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwanjuʼɔ yi,
nnɛ ŋa pia ghaʼo ndìpwa pwapuŋ yi, ŋa a fɛ ni pia ghagha ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ taʼa Muuŋ vi ŋa a ŋkhwā ŋgaʼa nɛ.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ Krishto,
a yuoŋ via mfuʼu moŋ ghrɨ́ phɨ, nnɛ Minnwi līʼɛ phɨ yia pi wuʼɔ nɔ fɨʼɨ pwapuŋ yi, yi yiɛŋyiɛŋ,
ŋa a shāʼo ni pia ntou yi nɛ pugu pa ŋguoŋ shiethɔ pugu pa ji nu.
Minnwi chwīe nnu ŋa a ni ŋkāʼa njùʼɔ yu ndɔ paʼa ŋgwa lɔ nji nɛ, pia ji, mbɔ pa nnu ŋa a ni ŋkwo lɔ̄gɔ nthí mi nɔ chwīe nu ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Krishto nɛ.

Nnu yei ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa nɔ chwīe nu, ndɔ shi nchwīe ndɨɨ ŋa ndɨɨ kāʼo nɛ, pɔ nɔ thɔ nu ni ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ, nchwīe pugu pɔ taʼa yi, ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ ŋa a pɔ po pugu pa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ, Krishto pɔ Taathɔ vugu.
Ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Jishɔ, Minnwi pɨnɨ nchuʼɔ vigi ŋa pigi pɔ ji llɔ moŋ njɛ̄ yi, wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkāʼa nɛ. Minnwi ghà nchwīe ŋguoŋ nnu pi pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a khwā nɛ,
nnɛ ŋa pigi, ŋa pigi ni mbɔ fǔoŋ ŋgwa nɔ fāʼo nu kwàʼa mbɨŋ Krishto nɛ, shi ŋgaʼo ndighaʼo yi.
Ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu, pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ni ŋga njaʼo ŋkɨ̀nɨ nnu shini, mbɔ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ŋa a thɔ ni lūgu nu ni pəɨ nɛ, pəɨ gha mbiŋ, Minnwi nūʼɔŋ lì yəɨ ni Jijwɛ yi ŋa a ni ŋkāʼa nɛ.
Jijwɛ Minnwi pɔ pi fɛ́ ni pia nnɛ ŋa pia fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa Minnwi shi mfɛ yaoŋ ŋa a kāʼa via nɔ nɛ, ni kwàʼa ŋa a shi ndugwi mīʼɛŋ mfɛ ŋguoŋ maoŋ pighɔ ni pia, nnɛ ŋa pia ghaʼo ndighaʼo yi.
Nthɛ nnu yei, jɛ̄ fie nɔ haʼaŋ ŋki yaʼo fɨʼɨ piŋ yəɨ mbɨŋ Jishɔ Taathɔ pugu pa khwǎ yəɨ mbɨŋ pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ,
ǹshini ndɔ ŋkɨna nɔ tōo nu Minnwi nthɛ vəɨ. Ǹthɔ ŋkwiŋ vəɨ moŋ luoŋ Minnwi a,
ŋa Minnwi, mbɔ Minnwi Taathɔ via Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Tǎa ndighaʼo shi mfɛ jijwɛ shiethɔ pugu pa ji nu nnu nnɛ ŋa ɔ ji vi mbīgi.
Ǹduoŋ ŋa njùʼɔ yəɨ pɨ̄gəɨ ni líʼɛ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ ji kwàʼa ŋa a fɛ ni pəɨ, mbɔ ŋgwa ŋa a gɛ̄ nɛ, ni fɨʼɨ fàʼo ŋa a pɔ moŋ mbwa mbɔrɔ ŋa Minnwi kāʼa ŋgwa pi nɔ nɛ,
ni ghrɨ́ ki fɨ̄ʼɨ ŋa a fāʼa nu mbɨŋ pia ŋa pia piŋ nɛ. Yei ghrɨ́ ŋa a fāʼa nu mbɨŋ pia nɛ, wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nɔ fɨʼɨ mmɛ ghrɨ́ yɛ ŋa
a ni mfāʼa nɔ ghɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mbɨʼɨ Krishto llɔ moŋ gu nchərə vi ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ po nɛ.

Krishto thɔ nshaʼa nu fɔ moŋ nthɨŋkwo kəkərə nchaa ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ ŋa pugu shaʼa nu po nɛ, pugu pa mɛmmɛ ŋgwa pugu pa mɛmmɛ ghaŋ ghrɨ́ pugu pa taathɔ pugu pa nthɨŋkwo ŋa ŋgwa ni ŋkwo ma mfāʼo, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi moŋ yei mbhi ndwɛ nɛ, pugu pa mbhi yɛ ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ.
Minnwi nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao laʼo kwò yu, mfɛ vi ni chɔshi nɔ Taathɔ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao.
Chɔshi pɔ pi noŋ Krishto, a chwīe chɔshi lɨnaoŋ ndɔ ŋkāʼo ni ju yɛ ŋa a lɨnaoŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao ŋguoŋ lɨʼɨ ghao nɛ.
Pəɨ ni mbɔ ŋgwa khu moŋ chɨ̄ʼə nu nchò pugu pa phɨ

ŋa pəɨ ni nchhɔ nu moŋ ghɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei chwīe nu nɛ, mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Shata, mbɔ nthishɨ njɨ moŋ tɔthɨ tāʼa nu nɛ, mbɔ jijwɛ ŋa a fāʼa nu mbɨŋ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu chɨ̄ʼə nchò Minnwi nɛ.

Ŋguoŋ yia ni mbɔ nɔ pugu, nchhɔ chɔmbhi yia ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ yia khwǎ nɛ, nthɔ nchwīe nnu haʼaŋ frɛinoŋ yia pugu pa njùʼɔ yia tāʼa nu nɛ, ŋa púoŋ yia ni mbɔ pi yi phɨ nɛ, pɨgɨtua Minnwi ni mbɔ mbɨŋ pia.
Ndɔ Minnwi, ŋa a fāʼo ntou kwoshɨnɨ, nthɛ khwǎ yi yi tɨtɨnɨ ŋa a khwā via nɔ nɛ,
ti mfɛ pi moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋgwa khu moŋ chɨ̄ʼə nchò nɛ, a ni nchwīe via pia pɔ yi maoŋ pia pa Krishto kaʼa. A tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi ŋa pəɨ lūgu.
A ni ŋkuʼɔ ni pia pa Krishto Jishɔ moŋ gu, nchərə via pugu kaʼa moŋ mbhi mooŋ jijwɛ mbɨŋ Krishto Jishɔ,
nɛnnɛ ŋa moŋ pa ndɨɨ ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ, minthɛ a nōoŋ mmɛ pwapuŋ yi ŋa minthɛ paʼa pi lɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ nɛ, moŋ shiʼi yi ŋa a nōoŋ ni pia ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Krishto Jishɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a chwīe pwapuŋ Minnwi pəɨ lūgu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, ndɔ paʼa yei lɔ ndhɔ pi mbhɔ ghɔ, a pɔ pi fɛ Minnwi,
ki lɔ mbɔ nthɛ pi fāʼa nnɛ ŋa kiʼi shesheŋoŋ kwēi njùʼɔ yi.
Nthɛ ŋa pia pɔ pi mbhɔ fàʼa yi, a chwīe via ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Krishto Jishɔ ŋa p̂ia fāʼa fàʼa shiʼi ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkwo pīri nūʼɔŋ ŋa pia chwīe.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pəɨ ŋa pəɨ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ, ŋa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu nii ŋgunu mbrɛi mɛ̄iŋ vəɨ ni ŋgwa ki nii ŋgunu mbrɛi nɛ, mbɔ ŋgunu mbrɛi ŋa pi niʼiŋ ŋoŋ fɔ pi ni mbhɔ ŋoŋmishua nɛ, p̂əɨ kwiŋ ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ ni mbɔ llɛshhɨ nɛ,

ŋa yichəɨ yaoŋ shini ndɔ nchīni vəɨ pəɨ pa Krishto, pəɨ ni mbɔ pa ghɨ̀nɨ nnɛ paʼa ndɔ mbɔ ŋgwa Minnwi nɔ ŋgwa Ishrae, pəɨ shini ndɔ mfāʼo nnu moŋ pa kɨ̀na llɔ ŋkuoŋ kàʼa Minnwi ni ŋgwa Ishrae, ki lɔ mfāʼo kwàʼa, ndɔ mbɔ ki Minnwi ŋkuoŋ mbhi.
Ndɔ ndwɛ, ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Krishto Jishɔ, pəɨ ŋa pəɨ ni mbɔ pi fie hini nɛ, pi chənə ni pəɨ mbara, ŋkie pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ Krishto.

Nthɛ ŋa a ju nduthɔ yi ŋa a thɔ ni taʼaŋggi shɨna pia, ŋa a chwīe paa ghrà ŋgwa pei, mbɔ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ pugu pa ŋgwa Juu, pugu gū taʼa yi. A ni mbəʼɨ ŋkaʼa ŋa a ni fɛ̄nɛ vugu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ gu yi moŋ frɛinoŋ,
a ni mfuʼu kipɨna ŋa a ni nthɔ nthɛ gɨ́,
pugu pa nnu ŋa gɨ́ chhu nɛ, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ a taoŋ ni taʼa ŋoŋ fhi shɨna kɨrɨ paa ŋgwa pei ŋkie pi mbɨŋ yu, nnɛ nthɔ ni taʼaŋggi,
ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchīni paa kɨrɨ ŋgwa pei pugu pɔ taʼa yi, a chīni vugu pugu pa Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ gu yi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, nnɛ njwi kipɨna ghɔ.
Nɛnnɛ, Krishto ni nthɔ nchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ mbɔ yi taʼaŋggi ni pəɨ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ ŋa pəɨ shi ki lɔ mbara yəɨ Minnwi nɛ, pugu pa ŋgwa Juu ŋa pugu ni mbara nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a tɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Krishto ŋa ŋguoŋ yia ghao mbɔ ŋgwa Juu pugu pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ, fāʼo shɨ̀na moŋ taʼa Jijwɛ nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu shhɨ Tǎa.
Nthɛ yei, pəɨ ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ pa ghɨ̀nɨ ki ghaŋ kra, pəɨ pɔ ndwɛ pi taʼa ŋgwa pəɨ pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ, pəɨ pɔ moŋ mbaanda Minnwi.
Pi krao vəɨ ŋkuʼɔ nɔ ghɔ ŋkuoŋ kwonda ŋa a nūʼɔŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nɛ, Krishto Jishɔ nduthɔ yi pɔ ŋkiɛŋ muuŋ nchíʼa nchini nda ghɔ.
A tɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu ŋa ŋguoŋ nda ghɔ ŋa a kuʼɔ nu nɔ nɛ tithi mbɔ taʼa yi, ŋkuʼɔ nu mbɔ nda Minnwi yi taoŋtaoŋ, mbɔ yi Taathɔ.
Ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Krishto, pi thɔ ŋkrao vəɨ ŋkuʼɔ nu ni pəɨ, pəɨ pɔ nda ŋa Minnwi ghà nchhɔ fɔ moŋ Jijwɛ nɛ.
Nthɛ nnu yei, mmu Pɔɔ, luoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ni pəɨ. M̀bɔ pi ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ nthɛ ligi Krishto Jishɔ, nthɛ vəɨ, ma pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ ä mbɔ yɛ ŋa shishini, pəɨ kwo yaʼo fàʼa yɛ ŋa Minnwi fɛ vəɨ moŋ pwapuŋ yi nthɛ vəɨ nɛ,
ŋa nnu ŋa Minnwi ni ndə̄ɨŋ nɛ, a ni nōoŋ vəɨ, nchwīe ǹji nɔ haʼaŋ ŋ̀kwo nāʼaŋ, ŋkāoŋ thɔ yi ni pəɨ nɛ.
Pəɨ shi ŋga mɛ̄iŋ nnu yei, kaŋ pəɨ shi nji nyaŋ pīʼi nu nthɛ nnu lə̄ɨŋ ŋa Minnwi tūgu nthɛ Krishto nɛ,
yɛ ŋa pi shini ndɔ ntūgu ni pa ŋgwa llɛshhɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nōoŋ ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ pugu pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ.

Nnu lə̄ɨŋ ghɔ pɔ ŋa ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ, pa ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ fāʼo shɨ̀na pugu pa Juu kaʼa moŋ mbɔrɔ yɛ ŋa Minnwi fɛ nɛ. Pugu ŋgia taʼa frɛinoŋ ndɔ nchīri moŋ kàʼa ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Krishto Jishɔ.
Minnwi ni nchwīe a m̀bɔ muuŋ fàʼa pwa pishaʼakhɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fɛ pwapuŋ yi ŋa a ni mfɛ vəɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ njɨ yi fāʼa nu nɛ.
Mmu, ŋa mi ndugwi njiŋ shɨna pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ, pi ni mfɛ pwapuŋ yei vəɨ ŋa ǹchīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ fàʼo Krishto ŋa a chaa lɨna ŋoŋmishua nɔ ji nu nɛ, ni ŋgwa taoŋ nduoŋ,
ndɔ mbɨnɨ nōoŋ kàʼa Minnwi lɨʼɨ wo ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao, mbɔ kàʼa ŋa a ni ndə̄ɨŋ llɔ llɛshhɨ nɛ. Minnwi yei ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchwīe ŋguoŋ yaoŋ.
Nɛnnɛ ŋa ndwɛ, minthɛ chɔshi chwīe pa thishɨ pugu pa mɛmmɛ njɨ moŋ mbhi mooŋ jijwɛ ji shiethɔ Minnwi moŋ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwrà pi.
Yei ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa ŋkaoŋ mbhi maa njɛ̄ nɛ, ŋa a ni nchwīe a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Krishto Jishɔ, mbɔ Taathɔ via nɛ,
mbɔ ju ŋa pia tɔgɔ mbhɔ yu mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ pugu pa ndaoŋ wo moŋ piŋ mbɨŋ yu nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu shhɨ Minnwi nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ fāʼo pəʼɨ njùʼɔ nthɛ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa ǹjəɨ nu nthɛ vəɨ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a pɔ pi nɔ ghaʼo nu vəɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ yei, ŋ̀kwi kwɛ́rɛ a shhɨ Tǎa
ŋa ŋguoŋ ndaaŋoŋ po pugu pa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ fāʼo ligi yugu pi llɔ mbhɔ yu nɛ,
ŋa a shi mfɛ njɨ ni pəɨ, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ Jijwɛ yi, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ tɨnɨ moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ, wuʼɔ pi nɔ fɨʼɨ fàʼo yi moŋ ndighaʼo yi,
nɛnnɛ ŋa minthɛ Krishto chhɔ moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, ŋǐeŋ yəɨ gha ŋkwo tɨnɨ, kwo yəɨ kwò phi moŋ khwǎ,
nthɛ pəɨ pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ ghao fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ ji nu fɨʼɨ fǐgi, pugu pa fɨʼɨ puŋ, ni fɨʼɨ nthi, ni fɨʼɨ shhi nu ŋa khwǎ Krishto fāʼo nɛ.
Ooŋ, ŋa a nthɛ pəɨ ji khwǎ Krishto ŋa a chaa lɨna ŋoŋmishua nɔ ji nu nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ lɨnaoŋ ni fhi nu Minnwi.
Ni ju yɛ ŋa minthɛ a fāʼa nchaa fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pia pie ki mbīʼi nɛ, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ yɛ ŋa a fāʼa nu moŋ noŋ yia nɛ,
ndighaʼo pɔ ghɔ ntɔgɔ mbhɔ chɔshi pugu pa Krishto Jishɔ ŋguoŋ ŋgwrɛiŋgwa ghao, ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao ki ndugwi yi. A pɔ nɛnnɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, mmu, ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ nthɛ ligi Taathɔ, ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ ŋa p̂əɨ chhɔ chɔmbhi moŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a kāʼo nthɛ gɛ̀ yɛ ŋa Minnwi gɛ̄ vəɨ nɔ nɛ.
P̂əɨ shwiʼi noŋ yəɨ shhɛ, mbɔ juju, mfāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ, mfāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ ni fàŋ ŋgwa nduoŋ moŋ khwǎ,
ŋkāa moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao ŋa taʼaŋggi yɛ ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi fɛ ntɔgɔ moŋ ghɨghrɨ ŋa a chīni vəɨ nɛ, kɨna shɨna pəɨ.
A wuʼɔ taʼa noŋ pugu taʼa Jijwɛ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni ŋgɛ̄ vəɨ moŋ taʼa kwàʼa nɛ,
taʼa Taathɔ, taʼa piŋ ni taʼa kwe ŋkhǐ,
pəɨ fāʼo taʼa Minnwi, mbɔ Tǎa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa, ŋa a Taathɔ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa, mfāʼa fàʼa yi ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ndɔ mbɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.
Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ shɨna pia fāʼo fɛ́ wuʼɔ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Krishto fɛ ghɔ nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa,
“A ni ŋga ŋkuʼɔ tɔthɨ,
ndɔ̄gɔ pa mimbɨna pi haʼaŋ a ghaʼa vugu nɛ pugu thɔ njiŋ yu,
a fɛ pa fɛ́ ni ŋgwa.”
Ndwɛ, njiŋ chrà yei ŋa, “A ni ŋkuʼɔ tɔthɨ” pɔ pi ŋa ŋkiɛŋ ŋa a shwiʼi shhɛ?
Ju ŋa a ni nshwiʼi nɛ wuʼɔ ju ŋa a ni mbɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ fie moŋ ndugwi po nɛ, nnɛ ŋa a lɨnaoŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao.
A fɛ pa fɛ́ ni pichəɨ ŋa pugu pɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi, pichəɨ pɔ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi, pichəɨ pɔ ghaŋ chīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ, pichəɨ pɔ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ghà ndɨna ni chɔshi
ndɔ njɛʼi nu nɛ,
nɔ pīri nu ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɔ fāʼa nu fàʼa ju Krishto, nnɛ nɔ kugwi nu noŋ yi a kuʼɔ,
ti pia nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ mbɔ taʼa yi moŋ piŋ pugu pa fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pia ji Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ, ŋkuʼɔ ti mbɔ mɛmmɛ ŋgwa moŋ piŋ, ti nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ ndɨnaoŋ mbɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Krishto pɔ nɛ.

Nɛnnɛ, kaŋ mbaʼa pia nuʼuŋ mbɔ nɔ puoŋ fhu, pi thɔ nchi via mfɛ hɛiŋ, mfɛ nu hiŋ nɔ ŋgwa ŋa mbaʼaŋkhi tiɛŋ vugu, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ yɛʼi llɔ mbhɔ ŋgwa mifɨɨ ŋa pugu ghà nchwīe ŋgwa fāaŋ ndaoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa nnu mifɨɨ ŋa pugu tɨgɨ nu nɛ.
A ka pie pi ŋa ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ chrā nu nnu shini moŋ khwǎ, pia kuʼɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao moŋ ju yɛ ŋa a pɔ nɔ thɔ yəɨ nɛ, mbɔ Krishto.

Krishto chīni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pi ghao moŋ taʼa noŋ, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pia pɔ shǐgi ndiɛŋ ŋa a chīni ŋguoŋ noŋ ŋoŋmishua nɛ. Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋguoŋ ghrà noŋ fāʼa nu shiʼi nɛ, a chwīe ŋguoŋ noŋ kuʼɔ ŋkugwi noŋ yi moŋ khwǎ.
Ǹchhu yei nnu ndɔ mbɔ miŋkwentie moŋ Taathɔ ŋa, kiʼi pəɨ nuʼuŋ nchhɔ chɔmbhi yəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgwa ki piŋ Minnwi ghà nchhɔ nɛ, ŋa kwāʼa nu nnu yugu lɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ
njùʼɔ yugu pɔ pi moŋ njiŋnjiŋ. Pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo shɨ̀na moŋ ŋkwaŋ chɔmbhi ŋa Minnwi ghà mfɛ nɛ, nthɛ ki ji ŋa a pɔ mbɨŋ pugu nɛ, nthɛ tɨnɨthɔ ŋa pugu fāʼo nɛ.
Pugu lɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo lrithɔ, mfɛ noŋ yugu ni pa mbha nnu pɨphɨ, mfāʼo pɨ̀ga nɔ chwīe nu ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu tɔtrɔ mbīgi.
Yinɛ lɔ mbɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ni njɛʼi nthɛ Krishto nɛ.
Shishini, pəɨ yaʼo pa nnu nthɛ vi, pi yɛʼi vəɨ ni nnu shini ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ ju, Jishɔ nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, p̂əɨ mīʼaŋ ndunu noŋ yəɨ, ŋa a ni nchwīe pəɨ chhɔ chɔmbhi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ ni nchhɔ nu nɛ, mbɔ ndunu noŋ yɛ ŋa a ni mbɨrɨ nu nthɛ pa nnu pɨphɨ ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkhwā, a fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ nɛ.
A pie ŋa njùʼɔ yəɨ pugu pa kwāʼa nu
məɨ ya mbɨnɨ mbɔ yi fhi,
p̂əɨ lɔ mbɨnɨ ŋgwɛ noŋ fhi ŋa pi chwīe vi a fhi Minnwi moŋ ndɨndɨ pugu pa taoŋtaoŋ ŋa a llɔ moŋ nnu shini nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ mieŋ lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ fɔ, shesheŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ chrà nnu shini ni taakuo yi nthɛ ŋa pia pɔ pi taʼa yi moŋ Krishto.
P̈əɨ mbɨgɨ túa, kiʼi pəɨ chwīe phɨ, kiʼi pəɨ mieŋ minaoŋ nii pəɨ wuʼɔ mbɔ ni pɨgɨtua.
Ndɔ kiʼi pəɨ fɛ shɨ̀na ni Shata.
Kiʼi ŋoŋ ŋa a ni mbɔ ŋgɨna nɛ nuʼuŋ njōo, a pie ŋa a fāʼa, nthɔ mfāʼa fàʼa shiʼi ni mbhɔ mi, nnɛ ŋa mimfɛ a fɛ yi ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɛ.

Kiʼi sheshe chrà pɨphɨ taoŋ moŋ nchò pəɨ, ndɔ a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋkwaŋ chrà ŋa a pwa nɔ ghɛ̄rɛ nu ŋoŋ a tithi a tɨnɨ moŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ chà ndɨɨ ghɔ pɔ nɛ, nji ŋa minthɛ a ghɛ̄rɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yaʼo chrà ghɔ nɛ.
Kiʼi nchwīe Jijwɛ Minnwi yi taoŋtaoŋ ŋa pi ni nūʼɔŋ lì yəɨ ni ju nɛ, pɔ ni tuʼuthɔ. Pi ni nūʼɔŋ lì yəɨ ni ju nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa moŋ yichəɨ ndɨɨ, Minnwi shi njuoŋ via mfuʼu moŋ ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ phɨ.
P̂əɨ mīʼaŋ chəchɨgəɨ, pugu pa pɨgɨtua, ni yɔyɔrɔ, ni fɛ̄ʼi nu fɛ̀ʼi, ni wɛʼi nu ŋgwa, ni kipɨna.
P̂əɨ ka nōoŋ pi mbha nnu shiʼi ni pa pichəɨ ŋgwa, mfāʼo njùʼɔ pɔpɔrɔ, ndīʼɛ phɨ ŋgwa wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi tɔgɔ mbɨŋ Krishto ndīʼɛ yəɨ phɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pa puoŋ Minnwi haʼaŋ a ya ŋkhwā vugu nɛ, p̂əɨ paʼo nɔ pɔ nu nɔ ju.
P̂əɨ chhɔ moŋ khwǎ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Krishto ni ŋkhwā vəɨ ŋkaa yu ti mfɛ chɔmbhi yi nthɛ vəɨ nɔ yaoŋ fɛ pugu pa yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni Minnwi haʼaŋ luŋ yi fɨgəɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ nɔ pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ, a lɔ njiʼi ŋkāʼo ŋa pi kuʼɔ pa nnu kwoshuoŋ, ki sheshe nnu nchhí ki pɨ̀ga, shɨna pəɨ
ki ŋa pəɨ chrā pa chrà fɛfhɛ pugu pa chrà naa, pugu pa chrà michwe fɛfhɛ, mbɔ nnu ŋa a lɔ ŋkāʼo ni pəɨ nɛ. A ka pie pi ŋa pəɨ thɔ ntōo pi Minnwi.

Pəɨ ya nji yei nnu shiʼi ŋa, mbaʼa ŋgaŋ kwo shúoŋ, pugu pa ŋgaŋ chwīe nnu nchhí, ki ŋgaŋ pɨ̀ga (ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ yei pɔ pi nɔ ŋgaŋ ghaʼo pa nnwi), yiʼi mfāʼo sheshe yaoŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Krishto pugu pa yi Minnwi.
Kiʼi yichəɨ ŋoŋ fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ ni pa chrà ghagha, nthɛ ŋa a tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa nnu pei ŋa pɨgɨtua Minnwi shwiʼi mbɨŋ pa ghaŋ tɨnɨthɔ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, kiʼi ntūru pəɨ pugu nɔ chwīe nu phɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ni mfǔoŋ mbɔ pi moŋ njiŋnjiŋ, ndɔ ndwɛ pəɨ pɔ moŋ líʼɛ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi yi Taathɔ nɛ. Nɛnnɛ, p̂əɨ chhɔ nɔ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu pɔ moŋ líʼɛ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa ntíɛŋ thɨ líʼɛ pɔ ŋguoŋ pa nnu shiʼi pugu pa nnu ndɨndɨ ni nnu shini.
Kāa nɔ yɛʼi nu nnu ŋa a shi mfɛ pwanjuʼɔ ni Taathɔ nɛ.
Kiʼi niʼiŋ mbhɔ yɔ nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu ghagha ŋa a yi moŋ njiŋ nɛ, ka tūgu pi páa,
nthɛ ŋa a nnu lrithɔ nɔ chrà nu ŋkuoŋ pa nnu pighɔ ŋa pugu gha nchwīe lɨʼɨ lə̄ɨŋ nɛ.
Ndɔ líʼɛ ghà ŋga nōoŋ sheshe yaoŋ, ŋgwa yəɨ yaoŋ ghɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa líʼɛ ghà ŋga nthɛ ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ, yaoŋ ghɔ líʼɛ ŋkaa yu. A chwīe yie ghɔ pi chhu ŋa,
“Wūʼu ma ndhɛ lɔ̄gɔ,
ndɔllɔ moŋ gu,
kaŋ líʼɛ Krishto shi nthɛ mbɨŋ ghɔ.”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ lɨna nu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ chhɔ chɔmbhi yəɨ nɛ, ki lɔ nchhɔ pi nɔ pa na, p̂əɨ chhɔ pi nɔ ghaŋ shiethɔ,
mfāʼa fàʼa shiʼi moŋ sheshe muuŋ shɨ̀na ŋa ɔ fāʼo nɛ nthɛ ŋa llɛ́ pei pi pɨphɨ.
Nthɛ yie, kiʼi mbɔ na, ka ji pi yaoŋ ŋa Taathɔ tāʼa nu nɛ.
Kiʼi pəɨ paa làʼo, nthɛ ŋa a shi nchwīe pəɨ chwīe pa nnu ŋa a shi mbɨrɨ vəɨ pɨrɨ nɛ. P̂əɨ ka lɨnaoŋ pi ni Jijwɛ Minnwi,
njrāo nu ni noŋ pəɨ llɔ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Ŋkhǐ, pugu pa ŋkhǐ ghaʼo Minnwi pugu pa ŋkhǐ moŋ Jijwɛ. P̂əɨ yrāo ŋkhǐ mbaʼo lóu ni Taathɔ moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ,
ŋguʼɔ nchhɔ mfɛ tōo nu moŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu ni Minnwi Tǎa moŋ ligi Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto.
P̂əɨ fɛ noŋ pəɨ ni noŋ pəɨ moŋ pɔ́gɔ Krishto.
Piŋgɛ láŋ, p̂əɨ yaʼo nchò laoŋ pəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ yaʼo nchò Taathɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa mimbia pɔ pi taathɔ ŋgwɛ vi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Krishto taathɔ chɔshi nɛ. Ju, Krishto ghɔ, pɔ ŋkwe chɔshi ŋa a noŋ yi nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ chɔshi ghà njaʼo nchò Krishto nɛ, a pie ŋa miŋgwɛ láŋ wuʼɔ njaʼo nchò ndaoŋ vi pi nnɛ moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ghao.
Pimbia, p̂əɨ khwā ŋgwɛ pəɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Krishto ni ŋkhwā chɔshi ndɔ mfɛ chɔmbhi yi nthɛ vi nɛ,
nɛnnɛ ŋa a chwīe vi a pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a kwo shɨ̄gao vi ni ŋkhǐ pugu pa chrà nɛ,
nɛnnɛ ŋa minthɛ a kə̄rə chɔshi nchaʼa mfɛ ni noŋ yi moŋ ŋguoŋ ndipwa yi ki muuŋ mi kɨ́gao ki sheshe kɔ̀rɔ ki sheshe ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ yei lɔ mbɔ mbɨŋ yu, ŋa â pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ki lɔ mfāʼo ntəɨ.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, pimbia fāʼo nɔ khwā nu ŋgwɛ pugu nɔ haʼaŋ pugu khwā noŋ yugu nɛ. Ŋoŋ ŋa a khwā ŋgwɛ vi nɛ, khwā pi noŋ yi,
nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ shiʼa ma mbɨ̄na frɛinoŋ yi, a ghà ŋkugwi ndɔ ndɨna ni noŋ yi, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Krishto ghà nchwīe ni chɔshi nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa pia pa ghrà noŋ yi.
“Nthɛ yei ghɔ, ŋoŋ shi mieŋ tǎa vi pugu mǔuŋ vi, nchīri mbɨŋ ŋgwɛ vi pugu pi paa chīri ŋgū taʼa frɛinoŋ.”
Nnu lə̄ɨŋ yei ŋa pi tūgu nɛ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yi, ndɔ ǹchrā nthɛ pi Krishto pugu chɔshi.
Ndɔ ŝheshe ŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ khwā ŋgwɛ vi nɔ haʼaŋ a khwā noŋ yi nɛ, miŋgwɛ yəɨ ŋkaa yu ŋa a yaʼo ndaoŋ vi.
Puoŋ, p̂əɨ yaʼo nchò pa tǎa pəɨ pugu pa mǔuŋ pəɨ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi yi Taathɔ, nthɛ ŋa a nnu ŋa a kāʼo nɔ chwīe nu nɛ.
“P̂əɨ yaʼo nchò pa tǎa pəɨ pugu pa mǔuŋ pəɨ.” Yei fǔoŋ kɨ̀na ŋa a fāʼo kàʼa nɛ:
“Nnɛ ŋa pa nnu nyīeŋ ni pəɨ shiʼi, pəɨ lɔ mfāʼo ntaaŋ chɔmbhi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ghɔ.”
Pa tǎa, kiʼi pəɨ chwīe túa puoŋ pəɨ pɨgɨ, p̂əɨ kuʼɔ ni pugu pi ni ntɨ́gɨ pugu pa yɛʼi nu vugu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ chrà Taathɔ chhu nɛ.
Pa kǔna, p̂əɨ yaʼo nchò pa taathɔ pəɨ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ ni pɔ́gɔ pugu pa yaʼo nu vugu ni taʼanjuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a kaŋ nì mbɔ Krishto pəɨ yaʼo vi nɛ.
Kiʼi pəɨ wuʼɔ nchwīe nnu pi ndɨɨ ŋa a līi vəɨ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ tāʼa nu ŋa pi piŋ vəɨ, p̂əɨ chwīe pi nɔ puoŋ fàʼa Krishto, nthɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ pi ya llɔ njùʼɔ pəɨ.
P̂əɨ fāʼa fàʼa pi ni njùʼɔ shiʼi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ fāʼa pi mbhɔ Taathɔ ki lɔ mfāʼa pi mbhɔ ŋgwamishua,
nthɔ nji nu ŋa sheshe nnu shiʼi ŋa ŋoŋ chwīe nu nɛ, a shi mbɨnɨ mfāʼo wuʼɔ yie ghɔ llɔ mbhɔ Taathɔ, ki ŋgaŋ vi pɔ pi ŋkǔna, ki ŋoŋ gha.
Pa taathɔ, p̂əɨ wuʼɔ nchwīe pi nɛnnɛ ni pa kǔna pəɨ, ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nyīeŋ ŋgūru vugu. P̂əɨ ji nu ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a Taathɔ yugu pugu pa yəɨ nɛ chhɔ pi po ndɔ ki lɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ mbe moŋ sháʼa yi.
Nɔ lūgwi nu, p̂əɨ thi a tɨtɨnɨ moŋ Taathɔ pugu pa tɨtɨnɨ ghrɨ́ yi.
Gwɛ ŋguoŋ maoŋ prǐ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, nnɛ ŋa mimfɛ ɔ wuʼɔ nthi a tɨnɨ ndɨɨ ŋa Shata thɔ ni ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ shɛndaoŋ mifɨɨ nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa pia shiʼa njiʼi māʼaŋ prǐ pi pia pa ŋgwamishua moŋ frɛinoŋ, pia ghà māʼaŋ pi pia pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ ŋa pugu thɔ nshaʼa nu nɛ, pugu pa mɛmmɛ ghaŋ ghrɨ́ pugu pa ghaŋ njɨ moŋ mbhi njiŋ yei, pugu pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ moŋ mbhi mooŋ jijwɛ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ lɔ̄gɔ ŋguoŋ maoŋ prǐ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi ghao, nji ŋa llɛmbhi pɨphɨ shi ŋga nthɔ, a lɨʼɨ mimbɨna ni ŋguoŋ prǐ ŋa a māʼaŋ vəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ ghao, pəɨ shi ŋga ŋkwo māʼaŋ vi ti ndugwi, nja ŋguʼɔ nthi a tɨnɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ kiʼɛ, p̂əɨ pīri noŋ yəɨ ntithi a tɨnɨ, ŋkrao ntuʼu yəɨ ni ŋkandaŋ nnu shini, chɔmbhi ndɨndɨ pɔ tɨ́nɨ kɨʼɨ njùʼɔ yəɨ,
tra gwɛ nɔ kwò yəɨ pɔ pīri nu noŋ yəɨ nɔ chīi nu pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghɨghrɨ.
Moŋ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao, piŋ yəɨ pɔ ŋgrào prǐ yəɨ, nji ŋa pəɨ shi ŋkɨʼɨ ndɔ mbɨgɛi ŋguoŋ krɛ́i tuoŋtuoŋ ŋa Shata māʼaŋ vəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
P̂əɨ lɔ̄gɔ lūgu nu məɨ nɔ yaoŋ pūoŋ thɔ yəɨ, ni chrà Minnwi nɔ kafa yəɨ llɔ mbhɔ Jijwɛ.

Nduoŋ Minnwi ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao moŋ Jijwɛ, ni ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ luoŋ nu pugu pa pie nu mbhɔ Minnwi. Nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ji nnu pei nɛ, p̂əɨ chhɔ ni lɨna məɨ, ki lɔ mfāʼo lɨʼənoŋ, nduoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ ghao.
Ndɔ nduoŋ mfɛ vəɨ ŋkaa mu, ŋa Minnwi shi mfɛ chrà yi vəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa ǹtāʼa nu nchrā nɛ, ǹchrā ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ, nnɛ ŋa n̂chwīe pi ji ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ŋa a ni mbɔ yi lə̄ɨŋ, ndɔ Minnwi chwīe ŋgwa ji nɛ.
A pɔ nthɛ pi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ yei ŋa ǹchhɔ nɔ ligi Jishɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ. P̂əɨ luoŋ ŋa m̀fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɔ chīi nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ yei nɔ haʼaŋ a pie nɛ.
Nɔ chwīe nu pəɨ ji ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ m̀bɔ nɛ, pugu pa nnu ŋa ǹchwīe nu nɛ, ŋkiɛŋ ndǐŋ via ndɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ fàʼa ni taʼanjuʼɔ mbhɔ Taathɔ, mbɔ Taikiku, shi nshwei vəɨ ni ŋguoŋ nnu.
Ǹtaoŋ vi ni pəɨ nthɛ pi yei nnu, ŋa pəɨ ji ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pigi pɔ nɛ, a lɔ mbɨnɨ māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ.
Minnwi, mbɔ Tǎa, pugu Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ, fɛ ghɨghrɨ pugu khwǎ pugu pa piŋ ni ŋguoŋ ghaŋ piŋ ghao.
Pwapuŋ Minnwi pɔ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khwā Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto ni khwǎ ŋa a shiʼa ma ŋkhu nɛ.
Philippians: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ mbhɔ mu Pɔɔ pigi Timoti, mbɔ puoŋ fàʼa Krishto Jishɔ.
Ǹāʼaŋ mfɛ pi ni pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ moŋ Krishto Jishɔ laʼataoŋ Filipai pugu pa thishɨ moŋ chɔshi pugu pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ghà ŋgɛ̄rɛ fàʼa moŋ chɔshi nɛ.
Pwapuŋ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, mbɔ Tǎa via, pugu Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ, pɔ ni pəɨ.
Ǹtōo Minnwi a ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ŋa m̀bīʼi vəɨ nɛ,
pugu pa moŋ ŋguoŋ luoŋ nu Minnwi a ni pəɨ ŋa ǹduoŋ nu moŋ pwanjuʼɔ,
nthɛ fɨʼɨ ghɛ̀rɛ ŋa pəɨ ghɛ̄rɛ a nɔ ghɔ moŋ fàʼa pwa pishaʼakhɔ nɛ, jɛ̄ fǔoŋ llɛ́ ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ shiʼa.
Ǹja mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa Minnwi, ŋa a ni njɛ̄ fàʼa shiʼi mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ, shi ndɔ̄gɔ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ ti ndugwi ndɨɨ ŋa Krishto Jishɔ lɛ nthɔ nɛ.

A kāʼo vəɨ nɔ pīʼi nu nɛiŋ nthɛ vəɨ ghao nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pɔ njùʼɔ a ŋgaʼa. Nthɛ ŋa ki mi pɔ pi moŋ chɛiŋ, ki ndɨɨ ŋa ǹchhɔ ŋkhwɛ̄ pa chrà nthɛ ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ, ki nōoŋ nu ŋa a nnu shini nɛ, pia wuʼɔ nchhɔ mfāʼo pwapuŋ Minnwi kaʼa.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi miŋkwentie a ŋa ǹshigi vəɨ ni ŋkiɛŋ khwǎ ŋa a llɔ mbhɔ Krishto Jishɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ a pɔ luoŋ Minnwi a ŋa khwǎ yəɨ pīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ njiɛŋ, pugu pa lɨna, ni ŋguoŋ ji nu nnu ghao,
nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ chuʼɔ yaoŋ ŋa a ya ŋkāʼo nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ pɔ ki kɔ̀rɔ ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo sheshe ntəɨ ti nchəɨŋ llɛmbhi ŋa Krishto shi nthɔ nɛ,
ndɨnaoŋ ni ntíɛŋ ndɨndɨ ŋa a ghà nthɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto nɔ fɛ nu ndighaʼo pugu tōo nu ni Minnwi nɛ.
Ǹtāʼa nu pəɨ ji, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ŋa nnu ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ mu nɛ kara ŋgɛ̄rɛ ŋa pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ.
Nnɛ, ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ kɛ̄ʼi lɨʼɨ moŋ ntuʼɔ pugu pa ŋguoŋ pichəɨ pa ŋgwa nduoŋ hɛiŋ ji ŋa m̀bɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ nthɛ pi ŋa mi muuŋ fàʼa Krishto.
Pɔ nu ma moŋ chə́ɨŋ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ ntou pa ghaŋ piŋ mbɨŋ Taathɔ pugu fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɔ chīi nu chrà Minnwi ki lɔ mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu.
Shishini, pichəɨ chīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ Krishto nthɛ kighɨʼə pugu pa mishɨshɨrɨ, ndɔ pichəɨ chīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghɔ llɔ moŋ njùʼɔ shiʼi.
Mbra ŋgwa pei chīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ yei llɔ moŋ khwǎ, nji nu ŋa Minnwi chuʼɔ a nɔ lɨʼɨ nu pwa pishaʼakhɔ.
Fǔoŋ ŋgwa chīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ Krishto llɔ moŋ mishɨshɨrɨ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi llɔ moŋ taʼanjuʼɔ, mbīʼi nu ŋa pugu shi niʼiŋ yúʼɔ mbɨŋ mu moŋ chə́ɨŋ.
Ndɔ a lɔ mbɔ pi yichəɨ nnu. A wuʼɔ mbɔ ŋa moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao, ki a pɔ pi moŋ mbha nnu mifɨɨ, ki moŋ nnu shini, pi chīi pwa pishaʼakhɔ Krishto, nthɛ yie ghɔ m̀fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ.
Ooŋ, ǹshi mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ,
nthɛ ŋa ǹji ŋa ntɔgɔ moŋ luoŋ Minnwi yəɨ pugu pa ghɛ̀rɛ llɔ mbhɔ Jijwɛ Jishɔ Krishto, yei shi ŋkara mfɛ lūgu nu vəɨ.

Khwǎ njùʼɔ a pugu pa kwāʼa nu ma pɔ ŋa m̀baʼa njiʼi mfāʼo lrithɔ kaŋ shɨgɛi yi, ŋa ni ŋguoŋ tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ndwɛ pugu pa ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao, Krishto shi mfāʼo ndighaʼo yi moŋ noŋ a, ki a pɔ pi moŋ chhɔ nu ma mbhi, ki moŋ khu nu ma.
Nthɛ ŋa ni mmu, chhɔ nu ŋkuoŋ mbhi pɔ pi ghaʼo nu Krishto, khu nu pɔ shéi.
Ä mbɔ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ nchhɔ nu mbhi moŋ frɛinoŋ, a nōoŋ ŋa m̀fāʼo nɔ fāʼa nu fàʼa ŋa a shi njuŋ ntíɛŋ nɛ, ndɔ ǹdɔ nji yɛ ŋa ǹshi ntɛrɛ nɛ.
Ǹdɨ nthi moŋ titri paa nnu pei. Ndɔ khwatua a pɔ ŋa ŋ̀gə̄ɨ mbɔ pigi Krishto nthɛ ŋa yie ya mbwa ŋgaʼa.
Ndɔ a pie ŋa ŋ̀kɨna mbɔ yi maoŋ moŋ frɛinoŋ nthɛ vəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹji ŋa yei kāʼo nɛ, ǹji ŋa ǹshi ŋkɨna ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ mbɔ nu pia kaʼa, nthɛ ghə̄ɨ nu shhɨ yəɨ pugu pa pwanjuʼɔ yəɨ moŋ piŋ,
nnɛ ŋa ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ mu, pəɨ shi mfāʼo ntou pa nnu nɔ fāʼo nu ndighaʼo moŋ ghɔ mbɨŋ Krishto Jishɔ, nthɛ thɔ nu ma mbɨnɨ njəɨ vəɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ.

P̂əɨ wuʼɔ nchwīe mbha chɔmbhi yəɨ nyīeŋ ŋkāʼo pugu pa pwa pishaʼakhɔ Krishto, nnɛ ǹji ŋa ki mi tɔthɔ njəɨ vəɨ ki mi lɔ nthɔ, minthɛ ŋ̀guʼɔ njaʼo ŋa pəɨ thi a tɨnɨ nu moŋ taʼanjuʼɔ, pugu pa ŋa ni taʼa kwāʼa nu, pəɨ thɔ mbaʼo nu kaʼa nthɛ piŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ,
ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu nthɛ pa mbɨ̌na pəɨ. Yei shi mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ lì shieshie ŋa pi shi nshiʼi vugu, ndɔ mbɔ lūgu nu ni pəɨ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa pi fɛ shɨ̀na ni pəɨ ŋa, nthɛ Krishto mbaʼa pəɨ yiʼi ŋguʼɔ mbiŋ vi piŋ, pəɨ shi mbɨnɨ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ vi.
Pia pɔ moŋ nchhɔ̀ yei kaʼa. Pəɨ ni ŋkwo yəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ŋki pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ ndwɛ pəɨ yaʼo ŋa ŋ̀guʼɔ mbɔ moŋ ghɔ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, s̈heshe māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ mbɔ llɔ ŋkuoŋ pɔ nu mbɨŋ Krishto, sheshe māʼaŋ njùʼɔ llɔ moŋ khwǎ yi mbɔ, sheshe pɔ nu taʼa yi moŋ Jijwɛ, ŋkiɛŋ khwǎ pugu pa kwoshɨnɨ mbɔ,
p̂əɨ chwīe pwanjuʼɔ a lɨnaoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pɔ nu taʼa yi moŋ pīʼi nu məɨ. P̂əɨ fāʼo khwǎ noŋ, mbɔ ni taʼaŋggi moŋ jijwɛ pugu pa nnu ŋa pəɨ pīʼi nɔ chwīe nu nɛ.
Kiʼi pəɨ chwīe sheshe yaoŋ pi llɔ ŋkuoŋ mishɨshɨrɨ pugu pa nōoŋ nu noŋ, ndɔ moŋ junoŋ pəɨ lɔ̄gɔ ŋgwa nduoŋ ŋa pugu chɨ̄ɨ nchaa vəɨ.
Kiʼi shesheŋoŋ vəɨ wuʼɔ ndīi pi nnu ŋa a shi ŋgɛ̄rɛ pi noŋ yi nɛ, pəɨ līi pi pa nnu ŋa a shi mbɨnɨ ŋgɛ̄rɛ ŋgwa nduoŋ ŋkaa pugu nɛ.
P̂əɨ fāʼo pi ŋkwaŋ mbha nnu yei ŋa Krishto Jishɔ ni mfāʼo nɛ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ Krishto ni mbɔ moŋ púoŋ Minnwi nɛ,
a shini ndɔ ndīi pi ŋa pugu Minnwi pɔ ndɨndɨ,
ŋgwɛ̄iŋ nthi ŋkuoŋ ghɔ.
A ni ŋka mieŋ lɨʼɨ yi mieŋ, nshwiʼi noŋ yi shhɛ,
ndɔ̄gɔ púoŋ muuŋ fàʼa,
pi phi vi a pɔ nɔ ŋgwamishua.
Ŋga mbɔ moŋ ŋgrào ŋoŋmishua,
nshwiʼi noŋ yi shhɛ, njaʼo nchò Minnwi
ti nchəɨŋ moŋ nthɨŋkwo gu, njiʼi nthɛ pi gu ŋkuoŋ wáʼa.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, Minnwi ya ŋkə̄rə vi tɔthɨ,
mfɛ nthɨŋkwo ghɔ ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ nthɨŋkwo.
Nnɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ po pugu pa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pugu pa mooŋ shhɛ shi ŋkwi kwɛ́rɛ yugu ŋgɨnɔ ligi Jishɔ,
ŋguoŋ ŋgwa chhu lɨʼɨ wo ŋa Jishɔ Krishto pɔ pi Taathɔ,
nɔ fɛ nu ndighaʼo ni Minnwi Tǎa.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ma ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, wuʼɔ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ghà ŋguʼɔ njaʼo a ndɨɨ ŋa pia ni mbɔ kaʼa nɛ, a pɨnɨ ŋka ya mbwa mbīgi nɔ yaʼo nu ma ndwɛ ŋa ǹdɔ mbɔ yəɨ pəɨ nɛ. P̂əɨ ghə̄ɨ nchhɔ mfāʼa lūgu nu məɨ ni pɔgɔ pugu pa wrū nu.
Nthɛ ŋa a chhɔ mfāʼa Minnwi mbɨŋ pəɨ nɔ chwīe nu ŋa pəɨ fāʼo khwǎ pugu pa njɨ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa a tāʼa nu nɛ.
P̂əɨ chwīe ŋguoŋ nnu ghao ki lɔ nduo nu, ki ndōu nu,
nnɛ ŋa pəɨ pɔ pa puoŋ Minnwi pi tithi ki lɔ mfāʼo ntəɨ, ki kɔ̀rɔ moŋ mbhi ŋa ŋgwa tɔtrɔ pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ pɔ nɛ. Pəɨ fāʼo nɔ thɛ nu shɨna pugu nɔ líʼɛ ŋa a thɛ nu tɔthɨ,
nchhɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ chrà chɔmbhi a tɨnɨ, nnɛ ŋa moŋ llɛmbhi ŋa Krishto shi mbɨnɨ nthɔ nɛ, minthɛ m̀fāʼo titɛnɛ nthɛ vəɨ, ŋa ŋguoŋ paʼo nu ma pugu pa fàʼa a shini, lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi gha.
Ä njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa chhǐ a kwrī nɔ làʼo fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, mbīgi ŋkuoŋ fɛ nu noŋ yəɨ ni Minnwi, nɔ yaoŋ fɛ̄ʼi ŋgiɛŋ pi llɔ moŋ piŋ yəɨ, njùʼɔ a pwa, ŋguoŋ yia ghao fāʼo pwatua a.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, p̂əɨ ŋkaa pəɨ fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ, pia lɔ mbɨnɨ mbwa túa kaʼa.
Ǹchhɔ mfāʼo kwàʼa ŋa J̈ishɔ mbɔ Taathɔ mbiŋ, ǹtaoŋ Timoti ni pəɨ moŋ kuo ndɨɨ nji ŋa ǹshi mfāʼo māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ ndɨɨ ŋa ǹjaʼo pa nnu nthɛ vəɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yichəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a pɔ nɔ ju, ŋa a fāʼo njùʼɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ shini, ŋa pəɨ pɔ shiʼi.
Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa nduoŋ ghao khu pi wuʼɔ yugu pa nnu, ki lɔ mfāʼo pi ndɨɨ Jishɔ Krishto.
Ndɔ pəɨ ji ŋa Timoti kwo nōoŋ ŋa a ya ŋoŋ, ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ nɔ muuŋ pugu tǎa pigi yu fāʼa kaʼa moŋ fàʼa pwa pishaʼakhɔ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ŋ̀kwāʼa nɔ taoŋ nu vi ndɨɨ ŋa ǹjəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pa nnu nyīeŋ mbhɔ mu moŋ kuo ndɨɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ mummu ji ŋa ni piŋ Taathɔ, ǹshi nthɔ ŋkaa mu moŋ kuo ndɨɨ.

Mi ni mbīʼi ŋa a pie ŋa ǹtaoŋ Epafroditu ndǐŋ a, mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋgaŋ kwò fàʼa a, ni pəɨ. Epafroditu yei ŋoŋ ŋa pigi yu māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ piŋ kaʼa, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ taoŋ vi ŋa a thɔ mfɛ pa maoŋ vəɨ, ndɔ mbɨnɨ ŋgɛ̄rɛ a ŋkaa yu nɛ.
A ni nchhɔ ŋkhwā nu nɔ yəɨ nu vəɨ ghao, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mfāʼo ghana njùʼɔ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ yaʼo ŋa noŋ yi llɔ njiʼi mbwa.
Shishini, a ni ŋgɨ̄nɔ ti ŋkaaŋ ŋkhu, ndɔ Minnwi fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ yu, paʼa ndɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi mbɨŋ yu, mbɨnɨ mfāʼo mbɨŋ a ŋkaa mu kaŋ ŋ̀kaaŋ mfāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ ŋkuoŋ yuʼɔ njùʼɔ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, m̀bɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ntāʼa nu ntaoŋ vi ni pəɨ, nji ŋa pəɨ shi mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nɔ yəɨ nu vi, pugu pa ŋa kiʼi njùʼɔ a ŋkaa mu nuʼuŋ ŋgana a.
Nnɛ, p̂əɨ lɔ̄gɔ vi ni ŋguoŋ pwanjuʼɔ ghao nthɛ piŋ yi mbɨŋ Taathɔ, ndɔ ŋgaʼo ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa pei.
Nthɛ ŋa a ni mbiʼi shɨgɛi ŋkhu nthɛ fàʼa Krishto, ntɔgɔ moŋ pa cho gu nɔ mīʼɛŋ nu nnu ŋa a ni mbiʼi moŋ fàʼa yəɨ nthɛ a nɛ.
Nɔ lūgwi nu ma lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ moŋ Taathɔ. Nɔ pɨnɨ nu nāʼaŋ wuʼɔ taʼa nnu ghɔ ni pəɨ lɔ mbɔ pi nnu pɨphɨ vəɨ, ndɔ a pɔ pi lɨʼɨ nu ni pəɨ.
P̂əɨ chhɔ ndɨna ŋgwa pɛ ŋa mbha nnu pugu yi ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi nɛ,
p̂əɨ chhɔ ndɨna ghaŋ chwīe phɨ, p̂əɨ chhɔ ndɨna pa ghaŋ kəʼɨ ŋgwa.
A pia nja mbɔ ghaŋ nii ŋgunu mbrɛi, pia ŋa pia ghà ŋgaʼo Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ Jijwɛ. Pia ghà mfāʼo ndighaʼo yia pi moŋ Krishto Jishɔ ki lɔ njiʼi njɨʼə noŋ yia ŋkuoŋ frɛinoŋ,

njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ mmu nduthɔ a nthɛ m̀fāʼo nnu nɔ yɨʼə nu noŋ ŋkuoŋ frɛinoŋ nthɛ yie ghɔ nɛ. S̈hesheŋoŋ mbīʼi ŋa a fāʼo nnu nɔ yɨʼə nu noŋ yi ŋkuoŋ frɛinoŋ nthɛ yie ghɔ, kaŋ ŋ̀ka fāʼo a ka yiɛŋyiɛŋ.
Pi ni mbhi a, a gha mbɔ moŋ fúoŋ llɛmbhi pi niʼiŋ a ŋgunu mbrɛi, m̀bɔ ŋoŋ llɔ moŋ ŋgwrɛiŋgwa Ishrae, llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Bɛnjamɛiŋ, ŋoŋ Hibru mbɔ phi Hibru, ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́, m̀bɔ Farashi,
ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ, m̀bɔ pi ŋgaŋ fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni chɔshi, ŋga ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ pɔ nu yi ndɨndɨ moŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́, m̀bɔ ki ntəɨ.
Ndɔ sheshe shéi ŋa ŋki fāʼo nɛ, ǹdɔ̄gɔ nɔ phɛ nthɛ Krishto.
Shishini, ǹdɔ̄gɔ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a phɛ nthɛ yaoŋ ŋa a ya ŋgāʼo ŋgaʼa nɛ, mbɔ ji nu Krishto Jishɔ Taathɔ a. Nthɛ vi, ŋ̀kwo mīʼaŋ ŋguoŋ maoŋ ghao nɔ ŋkuʼu maoŋ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ ǹshei Krishto,

ndɔ ǹja mbɔ taʼa yi pigi yu, ki lɔ mfāʼo ndɨndɨ ŋa a pɔ pi nyaŋ, ŋa a llɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nūʼɔŋ nu gɨ́ nɛ. M̀fāʼo pi yɛ ndɨndɨ ŋa a llɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ moŋ Krishto, mbɔ yɛ ŋa a llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi, nthi pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ nɛ.
