P̂əɨ lɨna nu ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi yichəɨ ŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ fāʼo njùʼɔ ŋa a yi pɨphɨ ki lɔ mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ, nchwīe pəɨ gū ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nthi moŋ piŋ nu Minnwi maoŋ.
Ndɔ pəɨ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ noŋ pəɨ sheshe llɛ́ nɔ haʼaŋ ligi llɛmbhi ghɔ, “shiʼa” nɛ, nnɛ ŋa mbaʼa phɨ fɨ̄ɨ shesheŋoŋ vəɨ a fɨ̄nɨ njùʼɔ yi.
Nthɛ ŋa pia thɔ mbɔ taʼa yi pia pa Krishto kaʼa nɔ haʼaŋ p̈ia nthi ŋkuoŋ tɨnɨnjuʼɔ yɛ ŋa pia ni mfāʼo nɛ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ nɔ ndugwi yi.
Nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ,
“Shiʼa, p̈əɨ njaʼo ŋggì yi,
kiʼi pəɨ fɨ̄nɨ njùʼɔ yəɨ
nɔ haʼaŋ pa ŋkhu tǎa pəɨ ni nchwīe ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni Minnwi nɛ.”
Nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ pa gɔ̌ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo ŋggì Minnwi ndɔ mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ghɔ? A shini ndɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntaoŋ Ijipti, Mushi pɔ nthishɨ vugu nɛ?
Lwillwi Minnwi ni ntɨ̄gəɨ nthɛ pi pa gɔ̌ nɔ khwɛ wuŋ ŋgaʼo? A shini ndɔ mbɔ nthɛ pi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchwīe phɨ, ŋa pugu ni ŋgū ŋkhu ghao moŋ ŋkǔnu njó nɛ?
A ni nshwrɛ̄i nthɛ pi pa gɔ̌ ŋa mbaʼa pugu yiʼi nii moŋ lɨʼɨ fɛrɛ noŋ yi? A shini ndɔ mbɔ pi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntɨnɨthɔ nɛ?
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pia yəɨ ŋa pugu ni nii kie nthɛ ki piŋ.
Nthɛ yie, nɔ haʼaŋ kàʼa nɔ nii nu moŋ lɨʼɨ fɛrɛnoŋ yi wuʼɔ nthi nɛ, p̂ia fāʼo pɔ́gɔ nji ŋa kiʼi yichəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ vəɨ mieŋ ki lɔ ndugwi pi moŋ fɛrɛnoŋ ghɔ.

Nthɛ ŋa pwa pishaʼakhɔ ghɔ ni nthɔ ni pia wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nthɔ ni pugu nɛ, ndɔ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo nɛ shini ndɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ vugu nthɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mfāʼo piŋ ŋkuoŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ ghɔ ŋa pugu ni njaʼo nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pia ŋa pia piŋ nɛ nii moŋ fɛrɛnoŋ ghɔ. Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchhu ŋa,
“Nɔ haʼaŋ mi ni ŋkwo kāʼa ti nshwrɛ̄i moŋ mmɛ pɨgɨtua a nɛ,
mbaʼa pugu ma nii moŋ lɨʼɨ fɛrɛnoŋ a.”
A ni nchhu yei nnu njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkwo mīʼɛŋ fàʼa yi llɔ moŋ njɛ̄ mbhi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a chrā moŋ yichəɨ lɨʼɨ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ nthɛ khwachəɨ llɛ́ ŋa, “Minnwi ni ŋga mīʼɛŋ ŋguoŋ pa fàʼa pi mfɛrɛ moŋ khwachəɨ llɛ́.”
Ŋkamuʼɔŋ, wuʼɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ pighɔ a chhu ŋa, “Mbaʼa pugu ma nii moŋ lɨʼɨ fɛrɛnoŋ a.”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ŋa a kɨna ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa wuʼɔ nii fɔ nɛ, ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mfǔoŋ njaʼo pishaʼakhɔ fɛrɛnoŋ ghɔ shini ndɔ nii fɔ nthɛ tɨnɨthɔ nɛ,
a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nūʼɔŋ yichəɨ llɛ́, pi mɛ̄iŋ llɛ́ ghɔ ni “shiʼa.” A ni ŋga ndaʼa ntou ŋgaʼo a tɔgɔ mbɨŋ Devi, moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pia nì ŋkwo chhu nɛ, nchhu ŋa,
“Shiʼa, p̈əɨ njaʼo ŋggì yi, kiʼi pəɨ fɨ̄nɨ njùʼɔ yəɨ.”
Nthɛ ŋa a kaŋ ni mbɔ ŋa Joshua ni mfɛ fɛrɛnoŋ ni pugu, Minnwi shi kaŋ ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchhɔ nchhu yichəɨ llɛ́ fɛrɛnoŋ ŋkamuʼɔŋ.
Nnɛ kiʼɛ, llɛ́ fɛrɛnoŋ wuʼɔ mbiʼi ni ŋgwa Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a kwo nii moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa Minnwi shi mfɛ fɛrɛnoŋ ghɔ nɛ kwo fāʼo fɛrɛnoŋ nthɛ fàʼa pi, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni mīʼɛŋ fàʼa yi mfɛrɛ ŋkaa yu nɛ.
Pia paʼo nɛ kiʼɛ nɔ nii nu moŋ fɛrɛnoŋ ghɔ, nji ŋa kiʼi shesheŋoŋ gu moŋ ŋkwaŋ tɨnɨthɔ ghɔ.

Nthɛ ŋa chrà Minnwi yi maoŋ ndɔ mfāʼa nu, nchɨgəɨ nchaa kafa paa njiŋ. A ghà nshe ti mfɛ̄nɛ nchə̌ɨ pugu pa jijwɛ, pugu pa younoŋ pugu pa mimbaoŋ mooŋ kwéi, nji kwāʼa nu pugu nnu ŋa njùʼɔ ŋoŋ tāʼa nu nɛ.
Yichəɨ yaoŋ lɔ mbɔ ŋa a lɛ̄rɛ ligi yu. Ŋguoŋ yi ghao pɔ pi ntii shhɨ yu, mbɔ ju ŋa pia lɛ ntaa noŋ yia ghɔ nɛ.
Ŋa pia fāʼo ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ Taathɔ pa Thishɨ Ghaŋ Fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa a ki nii ntiri moŋ pa po nɛ, mbɔ Jishɔ Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ, p̂ia wɛ̄iŋ piŋ yia ŋa pia chhu ŋa pia piŋ nɛ a tɨnɨ.

Nthɛ ŋa pia lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo pi Taathɔ pa Thishɨ Ghaŋ Fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa minthɛ paʼa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ ni pia moŋ pɛ nnu ŋa pia pou ghrɨ́ fɔ nɛ. Pia fāʼo pi yɛ ŋa a kwo tɔgɔ moŋ mōoŋ nu moŋ ŋguoŋ puoŋ shɛndaoŋ ghao nɔ haʼaŋ pia pɔ nɛ, ndɔ ki lɔ nchwīe phɨ.
P̂ia chənə mbara yəɨ faaŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi kiʼɛ ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nji ŋa minthɛ pia fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ pi lɔ nōoŋ pwapuŋ ni pia moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa pia fāʼo pa chà yi nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa sheshe taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pɔ pi ŋoŋ ŋa pi chuʼɔ vi shɨna ŋgwa pi, ŋa a ghə̄ɨ shhɨ Minnwi ni pa nnu nɔ ligi ŋgwa, mfɛ pa maoŋ fɛ́ pugu pa maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nthɛ phɨ ŋgwa pighɔ ni Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa ju ŋkaa yu wuʼɔ ŋoŋmishua ŋa a shiʼa mbou ntəɨ nɛ, minthɛ a tuo ŋgwa ki ji nnu ndɔ mbɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ghà mfāaŋ pa nnu nɛ, ni juju.
Nthɛ yei nnu, a yiʼi ŋa a fɛ̄ʼi ŋgiɛŋ nthɛ ji phɨ ŋkaa yu wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ghà mfɛ̄ʼi nthɛ yi ŋgwa nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ shiʼa njiʼi ndɔ̄gɔ yie ndighaʼo nɔ pɔ nu taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pi ni noŋ yi, a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi mɛ̄iŋ vi, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Ɛroŋ ni mbɔ nɛ.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, Krishto shini ndɔ ŋkə̄rə noŋ yi nɔ pɔ nu taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ. A ni ŋka chhu Minnwi ghɔ ŋa,
“Ɔ Muuŋ a,
shiʼa, ŋ̀gū Tǎa ghɔ.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchhu moŋ yichəɨ lɨʼɨ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa,
“Ɔ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ki ndugwi yi,
moŋ nthɨŋkwo Mekishede.”

Moŋ llɛ́ pɛ ŋa Jishɔ ni mbɔ moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ, Jishɔ ni nduoŋ Minnwi ndɔ njūa chà pi ni kə̄ɨ nu ni njɨ ni ŋkhǐ ligi shhɨ Minnwi, mbɔ ju ŋa minthɛ a kwe vi moŋ gu nɛ. Minnwi ni njaʼo luoŋ yi nthɛ ŋa a ni mfāʼo pɔ́gɔ ghɔ.
Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ, a ni njɛʼi yaʼo nu nchò ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa a ni njəɨ nɛ.
Pi ni ŋga nchwīe vi a pɔ yi kaʼokaʼo, a gū ŋoŋ ŋa a shi ŋkwe ŋguoŋ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu yaʼo nchò yi nɛ. A kwe vugu nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.
Minnwi ni nūʼɔŋ vi ŋa a Taathɔ pa Thishɨ Ghaŋ Fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ moŋ nthɨŋkwo Mekishede.
Ntou nnu pɔ ŋa pigi fāʼo nɔ chhu nu nthɛ pa nnu pei, ndɔ a ghaʼa nɔ kɨ̄gɛi nu ni pəɨ nthɛ ŋa thɔ yəɨ fɨ̄nɨ nɔ yaʼo nu nnu.

Nthɛ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a pie ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi pa ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa ndwɛ nɛ, a pie ŋa ŋoŋ wuʼɔ mbɨnɨ njɛʼi vəɨ ni pa njɛ̄ yaoŋ yɛʼi moŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi ŋkamuʼɔŋ. A wuʼɔ mbɨnɨ mbie nu ŋa pəɨ nuaŋ pi pɨnɨ, ki lɔ njɨ pi maoŋ chiɛŋchiɛŋ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a yru pi ŋkuoŋ pɨnɨ nɛ nōoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi nji thɔ yi ni ntɨ́gɨ ŋkuoŋ nnu ndɨndɨ, nthɛ ŋa a wuʼɔ mbiʼi pi muuŋ mbrɔ.
Ndɔ pa maoŋ chiɛŋchiɛŋ pɔ pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pa ntɨnɨmmɛ nɛ, ŋa pugu tɔgɔ moŋ yɛʼi nu noŋ yugu shiʼi nɔ ji nu nnu, nji kwrí ŋa a pɔ shɨna pwà pugu pa phɨ nɛ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂ia mieŋ yɛʼi nu pa fǔoŋ yaoŋ yɛʼi nthɛ Krishto, ŋkuʼɔ mbɔ pa ntɨnɨmmɛ ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɨnɨ nchhɔ nchrā nthɛ pi pa fǔoŋ yaoŋ yɛʼi, mbɔ pa pāʼa nu ŋkǔnu yia ni pa fàʼa ghagha pugu pa piŋ nu Minnwi,
pugu pa ntɨ́gɨ nthɛ pa nnu wɛ̄iŋ nu ŋkhǐ
, pa nnu nūʼɔŋ nu mbhɔ thɔ ŋgwa, pa nnu pɨnɨ nu ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu pugu pa sháʼa ki ndugwi yi.
Ndɔ pigi shi nchwīe ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei ghao nɔ haʼaŋ M̈innwi mbiŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ shɛndaoŋ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa ligi yugu ni ŋkwo ŋaʼaŋ nɛ, ŋa pugu ni ŋkwo ywɛʼi pa fɛ́ llɔ po nɛ, mfāʼo yugu ghrà moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi,
ŋkwo ywɛʼi njaʼo haʼaŋ chrà Minnwi pwa nɛ, pugu pa njɨ mbhi yɛ ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ,

ndɔ mbɨnɨ ntei nɛ, shɛndaoŋ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ nɔ pɨnɨ nu ŋkwəɨ ni pugu, pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ, ŋa pugu pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchhɔ ŋkwiŋ Muuŋ Minnwi ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nɛ, nnɛ nchhɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ pi yugu noŋ mbɨnɨ nchhɔ māʼaŋ lrithɔ thɔ yu shhɛnte.
Nthɛ ŋa shhɛ ŋa a shwei ŋkhǐ mbɨ̀ yɛ ŋa a ghà ndhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ, maoŋ kuʼɔ nu fɔ ŋa a ghà ŋgɛ̄rɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni mfāʼa maoŋ pighɔ nthɛ vugu nɛ, ghà mfāʼo mbɔrɔ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.
Ndɔ ä ŋkuʼɔ pa trǔ pugu pa michwɛʼichwɛʼi ŋkuoŋ ghɔ, kaŋ a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ, mbara nɔ fāʼo nu nchɔ̀nɔ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, ndugwi yi pɔ ŋa pi tūoŋ vi.
Ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pigi chrā pi nɛiŋ nɛ, ndɔ ni pəɨ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, pigi fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nthɛ pa ŋkiɛŋ nnu nthɛ vəɨ mbɔ pa nnu ŋa a yi lūgu nu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi Minnwi ŋgaŋ mbe nɛnnɛ nɔ līʼɛ nu fàʼa yəɨ pugu pa khwǎ ŋa pəɨ nōoŋ nthɛ ligi yi moŋ fāʼa nu mbhɔ ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ wuʼɔ nchwīe nu nɛ.
Pigi khwā ŋa shesheŋoŋ vəɨ nōoŋ wuʼɔ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ ghɔ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ nɔ ndugwi yi, nɛnnɛ ŋa shishini, Minnwi shi mfɛ yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo kwàʼa ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ ni pəɨ,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ shūu noŋ yəɨ, ndɔ p̂əɨ pīni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu tɔgɔ moŋ piŋ pugu pa wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi kāʼa nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ kàʼa ni Abrahaŋ, nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ mfāʼo ŋoŋ ŋa a chaa vi nɛ, a ni nshwrɛ̄i pi ni noŋ yi,
nchhu nu ŋa, “Shishini, ǹshi mfɛ mbɔrɔ vɛ ndɔ nchwīe ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ yɔ yiɛŋ.”
Nɛnnɛ, Abrahaŋ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yi mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa nɛ.
Ŋgwa ghà nshwrɛ̄i pi yaoŋ ŋa a chaa vugu nɛ, shwrɛ̄i nu ghɔ lūgwi pa ŋguoŋ mindoundou ghao.
Nnɛ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkhwā nɔ nōoŋ nu ki khuthɔ lɔ mbɔ ni pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu shi mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa a kāʼa nɛ, ŋa a shiʼa ma ŋkwri moŋ nnu ŋa a nūʼɔŋ nɔ chwīe nu nɛ, a ni nōoŋ pi ni shwrɛ̄i nu,

nnɛ ŋa ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ paa yaoŋ, mbɔ kàʼa pugu pa shwrɛ̄i nu ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi ŋkwri nɛ, mbɔ pa yaoŋ ŋa mbaʼa Minnwi yiʼi ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ nɔ nɛ, pia ŋa pia tei ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ vi nɔ lɛ̄rɛ nu thɔ yia nɛ fāʼo ntou māʼaŋ njùʼɔ nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu kwàʼa ŋa a pɔ shhɨ pia nɛ a tɨnɨ.
Pia fāʼo kwàʼa yei nɔ yaoŋ ŋa a tuo chɔmbhi yia, mbɔ kwàʼa ŋa mbaʼa yaoŋ kāoŋ ndɔ ti ŋoŋ nthɛ a yɨʼə noŋ yi ŋkuoŋ ghɔ, ŋa a nii moŋ lɨʼɨ taoŋtaoŋ njiŋ ndhwí kɨʼɨ lɨʼɨ Nda Minnwi,
mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa Jishɔ kwo nii fɔ nthɛ via nɔ haʼaŋ a gū Taathɔ pa Thishɨ Ghaŋ Fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ moŋ nthɨŋkwo Mekishede.
Nɔ Mekishede yei, a ni mbɔ fùoŋ Shalɛiŋ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ŋa a chaapifuoŋ nɛ. Nɔ haʼaŋ Abrahaŋ ni nthɔ ŋkwəɨ nchhɔ̀ lɨʼɨ ŋa a ni ŋgaʼa khwɛ pa fùoŋ pichəɨ nɛ, a ni mfɛ mbɔrɔ ni Abrahaŋ.

Abrahaŋ ni ŋgrā maoŋ ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nchhɔ̀ nɛ wuŋ lɨʼɨ mfɛ taʼa lɨʼɨ ni Mekishede. Nɔ kara nu njiŋ ligi yi, fǔoŋ yi pɔ ŋa, “Fùoŋ Ndɨndɨ” ndɔ mbɨnɨ nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ fùoŋ Shalɛiŋ, njiŋ yi pɔ ŋa, “Fùoŋ Pa Taʼaŋggi”.
Pi lɔ njiʼi nji tǎa vi ki mǔuŋ vi ki ndaaŋoŋ yi, paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo llɛ́ ŋa pi ni mbhi vi ki llɛ́ ŋa a ni ŋkhu nɛ. A pɔ nɔ Muuŋ Minnwi, ŋkɨna mbɔ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ki ndugwi yi.
Yəɨ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ vei ni mbɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ njəɨ, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa Abrahaŋ ŋkhu tǎa via ni ŋgrā maoŋ haʼaŋ a ni ŋkwəɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ nchhɔ̀ wuŋ lɨʼɨ, mfɛ taʼa lɨʼɨ ghɔ.

Pa ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Levi pɛ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼa nu Nda Minnwi nɔ pa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi nɛ, gɨ́ ni mfɛ njɨ ni pugu nɔ kwe nu shwéi mbhɔ pa ŋgwa, mbɔ pa lǐŋ pugu, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pa lǐŋ pugu ŋkaa pugu ni mbɔ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Abrahaŋ nɛ.
Ndɔ Mekishede vei ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ndhɔ pi moŋ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ Levi nɛ ni ŋkwe shwéi mbhɔ Abrahaŋ ndɔ mfɛ mbɔrɔ ni ju ŋa a ni mfāʼo kàʼa Minnwi nɛ.
A lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ pi nnu khuthɔ ŋa mmɛŋoŋ ndiɛŋ ghà mfɛ mbɔrɔ ni ŋoŋ kikɛʼi.
Nɔ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi, a ghà ŋkwe ŋgwamishua ŋa pugu ghà ŋkhu nɛ, ndɔ nɔ yi Mekishede, shwéi ghɔ ni ŋkwe ŋoŋ ŋa a shiʼa ma ŋkhu nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu nɛ.
Ŋoŋ nthɛ a chhu ŋa Levi nduthɔ yi ŋa a kwe pa shwéi nɛ ni mfɛ pa shwéi ntɔgɔ mbɨŋ Abrahaŋ,
nthɛ ŋa a ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi moŋ noŋ ŋkhu tǎa vi, mbɔ Abrahaŋ, ndɨɨ ŋa pugu Mekishede ni mbāoŋ nɛ.

Ndwɛ, pi ni mfɛ gɨ́ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Levi ni ŋgwa Ishrae. A kaŋ ni mbɔ ŋa fàʼa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Levi nthɛ a chwīe ŋgwa pɔ ki ntəɨ, a shi kaŋ ni nuʼuŋ mbie ŋa yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ ghrà ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi pɔ, mbɔ yɛ ŋa a pɔ moŋ nthɨŋkwo Mekishede ki lɔ mbɔ pi yi Ɛroŋ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa ŋkwaŋ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ kwri nɛ, a pie ŋa gɨ́ kwri ŋkaa yu.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa pi chrā pa nnu pei nthɛ vi pɔ pi ŋoŋ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ nduoŋ, ndɔ yichəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ llɔ moŋ yugu ndaaŋoŋ lɔ naa ma mfāʼa lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa pi ya nji ŋa Taathɔ via ni ndhɔ pi moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Juda, ndɔ Mushi shini ndɔ nchhu sheshe nnu nthɛ yie ndaaŋoŋ nɔ pa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi.
Nnu ghɔ ya mbɨnɨ nōoŋ ndwɛ shiʼi ndɨɨ ŋa yichəɨ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ nɔ Mekishede nɛ,
a pɔ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ gɨ́ Mushi ŋa a wuʼɔ mbɔ pi nnu llɔ nu moŋ ndaaŋoŋ, a pɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ghrɨ́ chɔmbhi ŋa minthɛ paʼa pi lɔ mbɨrɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pi chhu nthɛ vi ŋa,
“Ɔ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ki ndugwi yi moŋ nthɨŋkwo Mekishede.”
Pi chi ndunu kɨ̀na nūʼɔŋ njiŋ nthɛ ŋa a ni mbou ghrɨ́ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa gɨ́ Mushi shini ndɔ nchwīe sheshe yaoŋ pɔ yi kaʼokaʼo ndɔ ndwɛ pi kwo thɔ ni kwàʼa ŋa a pɨnɨ mbwa mbīgi, mbɔ shɛndaoŋ ŋa pia shi ntɔgɔ fɔ nchənə mbara yəɨ Minnwi.
Minnwi fɛ shɛndaoŋ fhi yei ni shwrɛ̄i nu kɨ̀na. Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mfǔoŋ ŋgū pa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɛ, Minnwi shini ndɔ nshwrɛ̄i nthɛ vugu.
Ndɔ Jishɔ ŋkaa yu ni ŋgū ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kɨ̀na ŋa a ni nshwrɛ̄i ndɨɨ ŋa a ni nchhu ŋa,
“Taathɔ kwo shwrɛ̄i, ti mbaʼa a yiʼi ŋkwri njùʼɔ yi,
‘Ɔ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ki ndugwi yi.’ ”
A chwīe yie Jishɔ pɔ ŋkiɛŋ ŋgaŋ fɛ tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa yei kɨ̀na pɨnɨ mbwa ŋgaʼa.
Pa fǔoŋ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni njiɛŋ, nthɛ ŋa gu ni njaʼa vugu nɔ ghə̄ɨ nu shhɨ ni fàʼa yugu nɔ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi.
Ndɔ Jishɔ kɨna mbɔ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ki ndugwi yi nthɛ ŋa ju nduthɔ yi lɔ mfāʼo ndugwi yi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ndwɛ pugu pa ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao, a fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ kwe nu ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu tɔgɔ mbɨŋ yu nchənə mbara yəɨ Minnwi nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ghà ŋguʼɔ mbɔ yi maoŋ nɔ lɨ̄gəɨ nu Minnwi nthɛ vugu.

Nthɛ ŋa shishini, a ni ŋkāʼo ŋa pia fāʼo Taathɔ pa Thishɨ Ghaŋ Fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ŋa a pɔ nɔ ju, ŋa a yi taoŋtaoŋ, ki lɔ mfāʼo sheshe ntəɨ ki nchhí, mfuʼu noŋ yi shɨna ghaŋ phɨ, pi kə̄rə vi a fərə ndugwi pa yɛrɛ po.

A lɔ njiʼi mbie ŋa a chhɔ mfɛ̄ʼi ŋgiɛŋ lɛllɛ nɔ pa pie taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi, mfǔoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nthɛ ji phɨ maa mbɨnɨ mfɛ̄ʼi nthɛ yi ŋgwa, nthɛ ŋa a ni nchwīe yie wuʼɔ taʼa ŋgɛ́ ndɔ mbɔ ndugwi yi ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mfɛ noŋ yi nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɛ.

Gɨ́ Mushi ghà nchuʼɔ ŋgwamishua ŋa pugu pɔ nɔ sheshe ŋoŋmishua nɛ ŋa pugu pɔ pa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, ndɔ Minnwi ni nchrā ndɔ nshwrɛ̄i ndɨɨ ŋa gɨ́ ni ŋkwo fǔoŋ mbɔ nɛ, ni nchuʼɔ Muuŋ ŋa pi ni nchwīe vi a pɔ ki ntəɨ ki ndugwi yi nɛ.
Ndwɛ, ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa pigi chhu nu nɛ pɔ pi yei: pia fāʼo yɛ ŋkwaŋ Taathɔ pa Thishɨ Ghaŋ Fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa a chhɔ pi ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ Minnwi Chaapifuoŋ po,
muuŋ fàʼa moŋ pa lɨʼɨ taoŋtaoŋ, moŋ ya ŋkiɛŋ ntǎa ŋa a lɔ ŋkrao ŋoŋmishua, a krao Taathɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pi ghà nchuʼɔ sheshe taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa a fɛ pa yaoŋ fɛ́ pugu pɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, nnɛ a pie ŋa yei Taathɔ pa Thishɨ Ghaŋ Fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ fāʼo yaoŋ nɔ fɛ̄ʼi nu ŋgiɛŋ nɔ ghɔ.
Ndwɛ, a kaŋ nì mbɔ pi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, a shi kaŋ njiʼi mbɔ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi kaŋ shɨgɛi nthɛ ŋa pa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi pɔ fɔ ŋa pugu ghà mfɛ pa yaoŋ fɛ́ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ gɨ́ chhu nɛ.

Fàʼa ŋa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pighɔ ghà mfāʼa nɛ pɔ pi fhi pugu pa miliʼi pa nnu ŋa a pɔ po nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa Mushi ni ntāʼa nu ŋkrao ntǎa ghɔ nɛ, Minnwi fɛ ntɨ́gɨ ghɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Paʼo nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa ɔ chwīe ŋguoŋ yaoŋ moŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi ni nōoŋ vɛ ŋkuoŋ mbra nɛ.”
Ndɔ ti nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, Krishto fāʼo fàʼa ŋa a ya mbwa nchaa yugu, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ kɨ̀na ŋa a ju mbɔ ŋgaŋ chīni ŋggì fɔ pwa ŋgaʼa, nthɛ ŋa a yɨʼə pi ŋkuoŋ pa ŋkiɛŋ kàʼa.
Nthɛ ŋa fǔoŋ k̈ɨ̀na kaŋ ni mbɔ pi ki ntəɨ, a shi kaŋ ndɔ mbɔ ŋa pi chhɔ ntāʼa mbra yi.
Nthɛ ŋa a ni njəɨ ntəɨ mbɨŋ pugu ndɨɨ ŋa a ni nchhu ŋa,
“A chhu ju Taathɔ ŋa, līi njəɨ, pa llɛ́ chhɔ nthɔ nu,
ŋa ǹshi ŋgwrā kɨ̀na fhi
pigi pa ŋgwa Ishrae pugu pa ŋgwa Juda.
Mbaʼa yei kɨ̀na yiʼi mbɔ pi nɔ yɛ ŋa ŋki wrā
pigi pa tǎa pugu llɛ́ yɛ ŋa
ŋki wɛ̄iŋ mbhɔ yugu
ntaoŋ ni pugu moŋ laʼataoŋ Ijipti nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na a,
nthɛ yie ghɔ, paʼa ǹdɔ mfāʼo ndɨɨ yugu, a chhu ju Taathɔ.
Nthɛ ŋa yei kɨ̀na ŋa ǹshi ŋgwrā pigi pa mbaanda Ishrae nɛ,
pa llɛ́ pighɔ shi ŋga ntɔgɔ, a chhu Taathɔ,
Ǹshi niʼiŋ gɨ́ paŋ thɔ pugu,
ndɔ mbɨnɨ nāʼaŋ njùʼɔ pugu,
Ndɔ ǹshi mbɔ Minnwi yugu,
pugu pɔ pa ŋgwa paŋ.
Mbaʼa shesheŋoŋ yiʼi njɛʼi taakuo vi ki shesheŋoŋ yɛʼi ndǐŋ vi,
nchhu nu ghɔ ŋa, ‘Ji Taathɔ.’
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yugu ghao shi nji a,
llɔ ŋkuoŋ pa miŋkwasha ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ ŋkuoŋ pa ŋgwa liɛŋliɛŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa ǹshi mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ ni pa fāaŋ pugu,
paʼa ndɔ nuʼuŋ ŋkwiŋ pa phɨ pugu kaŋ shɨgɛi yi.”
Minnwi gha nchrā nu nthɛ kɨ̀na fhi, a chwīe fǔoŋ yi lūnu, ndɔ sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a lūnu ndɔ mbɨrɨ nu nɛ tɔthɔ mbhɛ.
Fǔoŋ kɨ̀na ni mfāʼo pa gɨ́ nɔ nnu ghaʼo Minnwi pugu pa lɨʼɨ ghaʼo Minnwi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.
Pi ni njīgi ntǎa a fāʼo paa njiɛŋ. Moŋ fǔoŋ njiɛŋ, yaoŋ tigi laŋ ni mbɔ fɔ, ni taprɛi ni brɛi ŋa pi fɛ ni Minnwi nɛ. Pi ni mɛ̄iŋ fǔoŋ njiɛŋ yei ni Lɨʼɨ Taoŋtaoŋ.
Njiɛŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Ndugwi Lɨʼɨ Taoŋtaoŋ nɛ ni mbɔ njiŋ mbra ndhwí kɨʼɨ lɨʼɨ,

mfāʼo lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni laoŋgo nɔ tūoŋ nu lěi pugu pa ŋkùŋ nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na, pi pūoŋ ni laoŋgo, kɨ̌ŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni laoŋgo ni mana moŋ ghɔ ni mbɔ moŋ ŋkùŋ ghɔ, ni mbìe Ɛroŋ ŋa a ni ŋkhɛ̄ nɛ, ni ŋgùʼɔ ŋa Minnwi ni nāʼaŋ kɨ̀na yi ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Thɔ ŋkùŋ ghɔ ni mbɔ pa mimaoŋ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo pra yugu nchhɔ nōoŋ ndighaʼo Minnwi, pra yugu kuru faaŋ kwoshɨnɨ. Ndɔ ndwɛ, minthɛ paʼa pigi lɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ ŋguoŋ nnu pei ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ.
Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi ni mbīri pa maoŋ pighɔ nɛ. Pa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi nii moŋ fǔoŋ njiɛŋ sheshe llɛ́ nɔ chwīe nu pa fàʼa pugu.

Ndɔ a wuʼɔ nii taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ təʼɨ vi moŋ mbra njiɛŋ ndɔ ŋguʼɔ nchwīe nnɛ pi taʼa ŋgɛ́ moŋ taʼa ŋgaʼo. A ghà nii ni chhǐ nɔ fɛ nu ni Minnwi nthɛ noŋ yi pugu pa phɨ ŋgwa nduoŋ haʼaŋ pugu chwīe moŋ ki ji nɛ.
Moŋ nnu yei, Jijwɛ Minnwi ni nōoŋ ŋa shɛndaoŋ tɔgɔ nu nii moŋ Lɨʼɨ Taoŋtaoŋ lɔ naa mbɔ yi wo yaʼa nɔ haʼaŋ fǔoŋ njiɛŋ ntǎa ghɔ wuʼɔ nthi fɔ nɛ.
Yei pɔ pi lì nɔ ndɨɨ yei. Yei nōoŋ ŋa pa maoŋ fɛ́ pugu pa minyieŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ haʼaŋ pi fɛ ni Minnwi nɛ nthɛ paʼa a lɔ nchwīe ŋgaŋthɔ pa ghaŋ ghaʼo Minnwi pɔ ki ntəɨ,
nthɛ ŋa pugu wuʼɔ ndīi pi pa nnu maoŋ jɨ pugu pa maoŋ nnu, pugu pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu wɛ̄iŋ ŋkhǐ, mbɔ pa gɨ́ nthɛ frɛinoŋ ŋa a fāʼa ti nthɔ nchəɨŋ moŋ ndɨɨ nnu fhi nɛ.

Ndɔ ndwɛ, Krishto thɔ nɔ Taathɔ pa Thishɨ Ghaŋ Fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ mfɛ pa maoŋ shiʼi ŋa a kwo thɔ nɛ. A nii kiʼɛ moŋ ntǎa liɛŋ ŋa a pɔ ki ntəɨ. Pi shi lɔ njiʼi nchwīe ntǎa yei ni mbhɔ ŋoŋmishua, paʼa ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei haʼaŋ pi chwiechwie nɛ.
A nii taʼa ŋgɛ́ a lɔ mbɔ ŋguoŋ yi moŋ pa Lɨʼɨ Taoŋtaoŋ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ pa mimbhi pugu pa puoŋ nàʼaŋ, ndɔ a ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ yi, nnɛ njuoŋ lūgu nu yia nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.
A kaŋ ni mbɔ ŋa chhǐ mimbhi pugu nàʼaŋ mimbia pugu pa phu muuŋ nàʼaŋ tūoŋ haʼaŋ pi lɔ̄gɔ njrā mbɨŋ ŋgwa nɛ nthɛ a chwīe ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu fāʼo nchhí nɛ pɔ pi taoŋtaoŋ,

a nōoŋ ŋa chhǐ Krishto, ŋa a tɔgɔ mbhɔ Jijwɛ ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo ndugwi yi nɛ, mfɛ noŋ yi ki nchhí lɔ mbɔ mbɨŋ yu ni Minnwi nɛ, shi nshɨ̄gao ŋgaŋthɔ yia a pɔ ki ntəɨ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ llɔ ŋkuoŋ pa fàʼa khu nɔ ghaʼo nu Minnwi maoŋ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, a ju mbɔ ŋgaŋ chīni ŋggì moŋ kɨ̀na fhi, nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa a gɛ̄ vugu nɛ nthɛ pugu fāʼo mbɔrɔ ki ndugwi yi ŋa Minnwi kāʼa nɔ fɛ nu ni pugu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ju Krishto kwo khu nɔ yuoŋ nu ŋgwa mfuʼu moŋ phɨ ŋa pi ni nchwīe ndɨɨ fǔoŋ kɨ̀na nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋoŋ nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ nɔ haʼaŋ pa nnu shi mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a khu nɛ, a pie ŋa pi nōoŋ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ ghɔ nɛ kwo khu,
nthɛ ŋa ŋkwaŋ gɨ́ ghɔ ghà ŋguʼɔ mfāʼa pi ndɨɨ ŋa ŋoŋ ghɔ kwo khu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa gɨ́ ghɔ fāʼa ndɨɨ ŋa ŋoŋ ghɔ wuʼɔ mbiʼi yi maoŋ nɛ.
A ni nchwīe yie ghɔ pi ni nchwīe fǔoŋ kɨ̀na jɛ̄ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ.

Nthɛ ŋa Mushi ni ŋga nchhu ŋguoŋ kɨ̀na ŋa a taoŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ nɛ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao, ndɔ̄gɔ chhǐ puoŋ nàʼaŋ pugu pa mimbhi nyāaŋ ni ŋkhǐ njrā ŋkuoŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ pugu pa ŋgwa, ni yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ muuŋ thɨ pi mɛ̄iŋ ni haisho, pugu pa ŋgì ŋa a taoŋ mbɨŋ minjɨɨ, pi niʼiŋ yaoŋ fɔ a fāʼo ŋgwrà pipie.
A ni ŋga njrā, nchhu nu ŋa, “Yei chhǐ wrā kɨ̀na yɛ ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ gɨ́ ni pəɨ nthɛ yie nɛ.”
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ njrā chhǐ ghɔ ŋkuoŋ ntǎa pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ pɛ ŋa pi ghà ŋgaʼo Minnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Shishini, moŋ gɨ́ Mushi, pi ghà nchwīe yaoŋ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ntɔgɔ pi kúoŋ chhǐ, ti chhǐ mieŋ ki kwri, paʼa līʼɛ nu phɨ lɔ mbɔ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, a ni mbie ŋa pi chwīe pa fhi maoŋ haʼaŋ a pɔ po nɛ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ moŋ shɛndaoŋ yei, ndɔ pa maoŋ po pie ŋa pi chwīe a pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ni pa ŋkiɛŋ maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ a chaa pei.
Nthɛ ŋa Krishto shini ndɔ nii moŋ lɨʼɨ taoŋtaoŋ haʼaŋ pi chwīe pi ni mbhɔ nɛ, ŋa a ni mbɔ fhi ŋkiɛŋ yi nɛ, ndɔ a ni nja nii pi ŋkiɛŋ moŋ po nduthɔ yi, ndwɛ nɔ thi nu shhɨ Minnwi nɔ lɨʼɨ yia.
A shini ndɔ njiʼi mfāʼo nɔ fɛ nu noŋ yi nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋgɛŋgɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa a nii moŋ pa Lɨʼɨ Taoŋtaoŋ sheshe ŋgaʼo ni chhǐ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ji nɛ.

A kaŋ ni mbɔ nɛnnɛ, a kaŋ ni mfāʼo nɔ yəɨ nu ŋgəʼɨ ŋgɛŋgɛ llɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni mbāʼo mbhi nɛ. Ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, a nōoŋ noŋ yi taʼa ŋgɛ, a lɔ mbɔ ŋguoŋ yi moŋ ndugwi ŋguoŋ pa ndɨɨ ghao nɔ fuʼu nu phɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fɛ nu noŋ yi nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ.
Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nūʼɔŋ ŋa ŋoŋmishua shi ŋkhu taʼa ŋgɛ, mbra nnu a thi sháʼa nɛ,

wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, pi fɛ Krishto taʼa ŋgɛ́ nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ kwe nu phɨ ntou ŋgwa, a shi mbɨnɨ nōoŋ noŋ yi mbra ŋgɛ́ ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nthɛ pi shɨ̄gao nu phɨ, ndɔ nthɛ pi kwe nu ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ njwɛrɛ vi ŋkiɛŋ yie nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa gɨ́ ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi miliʼi pa maoŋ shiʼi haʼaŋ a fāʼo nɔ thɔ nu ki lɔ nja mbɔ pi ŋkiɛŋ maoŋ pighɔ nɛ, a kaŋ ni mfɛ paʼa pa yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ haʼaŋ pugu ni mfɛ nu sheshe ŋgaʼo nɛ lɔ nchwīe pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthɔ yəɨ Minnwi nɛ pɔ ki ntəɨ.
A kaŋ ni mbɔ ŋa pi kwo ya nshɨ̄gao phɨ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchhɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi nɛ shishini, pugu shi kaŋ ni nuʼuŋ mbīʼi ŋa pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ, nnɛ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ kaŋ ni ntithi.
Nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, pa maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pighɔ ni mfāʼa nɔ kwiŋ nu ŋgwa ni phɨ yugu sheshe ŋgaʼo.
Nthɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa chhǐ pa nàʼaŋ mimbia pugu pa mimbhi lɔ nshɨ̄gao phɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ndɨɨ ŋa Krishto ni nthɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ, a ni nchhu ŋa,
“Ɔ lɔ njiʼi ntāʼa pa maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa maoŋ fɛ́,
ndɔ ɔ fɛ frɛinoŋ vəɨ.
Ɔ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ
ni pa mimaoŋ haʼaŋ pi tūoŋ pugu pa pichəɨ pa maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nduoŋ nɔ shɨ̄gao nu phɨ.
Nɛnnɛ nchhu ŋa, ‘Līi njəɨ, ǹthɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnu yɛ ŋa ɔ tāʼa nu nɛ ma Minnwi,
wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ nthɛ a moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ gɨ́ nɛ.’ ”

Fǔoŋ yi Krishto chhu ŋa, “Ɔ lɔ njiʼi ŋkhwā ki mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ni fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa maoŋ fɛ́ pugu pa minyieŋ haʼaŋ pi tūoŋ nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɛ pugu pa maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ shɨ̄gao nu phɨ” (pi fɛ maoŋ pei pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ gɨ́ chhu nɛ),
nɛnnɛ, a pɨnɨ mbīgi ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, ǹthɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ ɔ tāʼa nu nɛ.” A ni mīʼaŋ fǔoŋ yi nnɛ nɔ thɔ nu ni mbra yi.
Nthɛ ŋa Jishɔ Krishto chwīe nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu ŋa a chwīe nɛ, pi chwīe pia pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ llɔ moŋ phɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fɛ̄ʼi nu ŋgiɛŋ ŋa a ni mfɛ̄ʼi pi ni ji frɛinoŋ taʼa ŋgɛ́ a lɔ mbɔ ŋguoŋ yi nɛ.
Sheshe ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ghà mfāʼa fàʼa yi sheshe llɛ́ nthɔ fɛ̄ʼi ndɔ nthɔ mbiʼi taʼa ŋkwaŋ fɛ̄ʼi nu ŋgiɛŋ ŋa minthɛ paʼa a lɔ ma nshɨ̄gao phɨ nɛ.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Krishto ni ŋkwo fɛ taʼa yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao nthɛ phɨ nɛ, a ni nchɔchhɔ ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ Minnwi,
nchhɔ njwɛrɛ nu llɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ ti pi shi nuʼuŋ nchwīe pa mimbɨna pi pɔ krɨ́ tigi kwò yi.
Nthɛ ŋa ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ taʼa yaoŋ fɛ́, a chwīe ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu thɔ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ pɔ ki ntəɨ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.
Ndɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi ŋkaa yu pɔ miŋkwentie ni pigi ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ŋkwo chhu ŋa,
“Yei kɨ̀na ŋa ǹshi ŋgwrā pigi pugu
pa llɛ́ pighɔ shi ŋga ntɔgɔ, a chhu Taathɔ:
‘Ǹshi niʼiŋ gɨ́ paŋ moŋ njùʼɔ pugu
ndɔ mbɨnɨ nāʼaŋ moŋ thɔ pugu.’ ”
Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ a pīgi ŋa,
“M̀baʼa shi nuʼuŋ ŋkwiŋ pa phɨ yugu pugu pa sheshe nnu pɨphɨ haʼaŋ pugu chwīe nɛ ŋkamuʼɔŋ.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi kwo līʼɛ pa phɨ pei nɛ, chà yaoŋ fɛ́ nɔ līʼɛ nu phɨ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ.
Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, pia fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ nɔ nii nu moŋ pa Lɨʼɨ Taoŋtaoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ Jishɔ.
A chuʼɔ shɛndaoŋ fhi, ndɔ mbɔ shɛndaoŋ maoŋ ni pia ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ndhwí kɨʼɨ lɨʼɨ, njiŋ yei pɔ pi ŋa a tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ frɛinoŋ yi.
Ndɔ pia fāʼo mmɛ ŋgaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ŋa a lɨna nu ni mbaanda Minnwi.
Nthɛ pa nnu pei, p̂ia chənə nthɔ yəɨ Minnwi ni njùʼɔ nnu shini pugu pa tɨnɨnjuʼɔ moŋ piŋ, ni ŋgaŋthɔ ŋa pi kwo yrā a pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ llɔ moŋ phɨ, ni pa noŋ ŋa pi kwo shɨ̄gao ni ŋkhǐ taoŋtaoŋ nɛ.
P̂ia wɛ̄iŋ kwàʼa haʼaŋ pia chhu ŋa pia fāʼo nɛ a tɨnɨ, nthɛ ŋa minthɛ pia yɨʼə noŋ yia mbɨŋ Minnwi nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu kàʼa yi.
P̂ia pīʼi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a nthɛ pia kwɛ̄nɛ noŋ pia nɔ fāʼo nu khwǎ pugu pa fàʼa shiʼi,
ki lɔ nchhɔ funu paoŋ nu taʼa lɨʼɨ kaʼa nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ pa ŋgwa chhɔ nchwīe nu nɛ. A ka pie pi ŋa pia māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ lǐŋ pia ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ mbīgi nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ yəɨ Llɛmbhi Taathɔ chənə mbara nu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ pia kwo ji nnu shini nɛ, p̈ia mbɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhɔ nchwīe phɨ ndɔ nji nu, paʼa yichəɨ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nthɛ phɨ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi ni pia,
ŋkiɛŋ wuwuru ywɛrɛ nu sháʼa ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ pugu pa tɨtɨnɨ móŋoŋ ŋa a shi mīʼɛŋ pa mimbɨna nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ni ndāa gɨ́ Mushi nɛ, pi ni jwi vi ki lɔ mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ ndɨɨ ŋa paa ŋgwa ki pi trɛi nuʼuŋ mbɔ nɔ pa miŋkwentie nɛ.

Ɔ pīʼi ŋa njɔ́ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu nɨ̄ɨ Muuŋ Minnwi laʼo kwò pugu nɛ, shi mbɔ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ? Mbɔ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu lɔ̄gɔ chhǐ kɨ̀na haʼaŋ pugu kie ŋkuoŋ ghɔ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ nɔ yaoŋ ghagha, ndɔ ŋgwɛʼi Jijwɛ ŋa a nōoŋ pwapuŋ nɛ?
Nthɛ ŋa pia ji vi ŋa a chhu ŋa, “M̀fāʼo njɨ nɔ fɛ nu njɔ́, ǹshi nthu,” mbɨnɨ nchhu ŋa, “Taathɔ shi nshaʼa ŋgwa pi.”
A ŋkiɛŋ nnu wuwuru nɔ gū nu mbhɔ Minnwi maoŋ.
P̂əɨ kwiŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni mfǔoŋ mbɔ ni pəɨ nɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa ligi yəɨ ni ŋkwo ŋaʼaŋ nɛ, pəɨ ni ntīi shii moŋ pa tɨtɨnɨ ŋgəʼɨ.
Pichəɨ ndɨɨ ni mbɔ pi wɛʼi vəɨ lɨʼɨ wo ndɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ, pichəɨ ndɨɨ pəɨ ghɛ̄rɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yəɨ ŋkwaŋ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa pəɨ ghà njəɨ nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ni nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ni pa ghaŋ chə́ɨŋ, ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni nshiri maoŋ pəɨ ŋkwe nɛ, pəɨ piŋ ni pwanjuʼɔ, nji nu ŋa pəɨ fāʼo pa maoŋ haʼaŋ a pwa nchaa pie ghɔ nɛ, mbɔ pɛ haʼaŋ a ma ŋguʼɔ mbɔ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, kiʼi pəɨ mīʼaŋ tɨnɨnjuʼɔ yəɨ, nthɛ ŋa a shi nthɔ ni mmɛ kɨ̀nɛiŋ.
P̂əɨ fāʼo nɔ tīi nu shii, nnɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ kwo chwīe nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ, minthɛ pəɨ fāʼo yaoŋ ŋa a kāʼa vəɨ nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa,
“Moŋ muuŋ mi kuo ndɨɨ,
Ju ŋa a thɔ nu nɛ shi nthɔ ki lɔ njīri.
Ndɔ ŋgwa paŋ pi ndɨndɨ shi nchhɔ chɔmbhi yugu pi moŋ piŋ.
Ndɔ ti s̈hesheŋoŋ vugu nshūʼu mbɨnɨ njiŋ,
paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ mbɨŋ pugu.”
Ndɔ pia lɔ mbɔ ŋgia ŋgwa pɛ haʼaŋ pugu shūʼu mbɨnɨ njiŋ nshiʼi nɛ, pia pɔ pi ŋgia ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo piŋ ndūgu nɛ.
Ndwɛ, piŋ pɔ pi fāʼo nu tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ni pa yaoŋ haʼaŋ ɔ fāʼo kwàʼa ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ, nji nu ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa ɔ shi mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa ɔ lɔ naa njəɨ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, Minnwi piŋ pa ŋgwa llɛshhɨ.
A pɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ ŋa pia ji ŋa Minnwi ni nchwīe mbhi pi ni chrà ŋa a ni ntaoŋ nchò yu nɛ, nnɛ ŋa yaoŋ ŋa pi yəɨ nɛ, pi shini ndɔ nchwīe pi ni pa yaoŋ ŋa pi yəɨ nɛ.

A ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ ŋa Abe ni mfɛ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni Minnwi a pwa nchaa yi Keiŋ, ŋa Minnwi ni mbiŋ vi ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ, mbiŋ vi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ nu ji yaoŋ fɛ́. Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ a kukhu nɛ, ndɔ ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ piŋ yi ghɔ, a wuʼɔ nchrā nu.

A ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ pi lɔ̄gɔ Enoke ŋkuʼɔ nɔ tɔthɨ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi a khu, kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ shini ndɔ njəɨ vi nthɛ ŋa Minnwi ni ndɔ̄gɔ vi. Ndwɛ, ŋkaoŋ pi maa ndɔ̄gɔ vi, pi ni ŋkwo piŋ vi ŋa a ni ŋkwo chwīe túa Minnwi pwa.
Mbaʼa shesheŋoŋ chwīe túa Minnwi pwa ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a thɔ njəɨ Minnwi nɛ, pie ŋa a piŋ ŋa Minnwi pɔ fɔ ndɔ nchhɔ ŋkɨ̄nɛiŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu tāʼa vi nɛ.

Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, Minnwi ni ŋga shūu tə́nə Noa ni pa nnu ŋa a thɔ nu ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a shini ndɔ naa njəɨ nɛ, moŋ pɔgɔ Minnwi, a ni nchwīe mmɛ pie ŋa a pɔ nɔ nda nɛ nɔ kwe nu mbaanda yi nɔ ghɔ. Nthɛ yei, ŋguoŋ mbhi ni mfāʼo njɔ́ gu, Minnwi ni nchhu ŋa Noa ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nthɛ pi piŋ yi.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋgɛ̄ Abrahaŋ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a shi mfɛ ghɔ nɔ ji nɛ, Abrahaŋ yaʼo nchò yi, ntaoŋ ki lɔ nji lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a ni ŋgə̄ɨ nu nɛ.

Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ a ni ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ chhɔ nu moŋ laʼataoŋ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa nɔ fɛ nu ghɔ nɛ, moŋ ŋgɨ̀nɨ laʼataoŋ ghɔ a laʼa fɔ moŋ pa ntǎa, wuʼɔ nɔ ŋa Aiji pugu Jakɔ, ŋa pi ni ŋkāʼa vugu ni shhɛ ghɔ ni ndaʼa moŋ ntǎa ŋkaa pugu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a ni nchhɔ nchēi pi mmɛ laʼataoŋ yɛ ŋa Minnwi ni mbīʼi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a fāʼo nɔ pɔ nu ndɔ ŋkrao nɛ, kwò mmɛ laʼataoŋ ghɔ pɔ ki ndugwi yi.

A ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi Shera ni mfāʼo njɨ nɔ shūu nu, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgaʼombhi yi ni ŋkwo chaa yi ŋoŋ ŋa minthɛ a shūu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ni mbīʼi ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a kāʼa vi nɛ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nɔ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ a kāʼa nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, llɔ mbɨŋ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a ni ŋkwo pɔ nɔ ŋoŋ khu, pi ni mbhi ŋgwrɛiŋgwa ŋa pugu ni njiɛŋ ti mbɔ nɔ fɨ́nəɨ po, mbɨnɨ njiɛŋ ti mbɔ nɔ shíshhɛ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ ŋa minthɛ paʼa pi lɔ nshia nɛ.

Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa pei ni ŋkhu moŋ piŋ ki lɔ naa mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa pi ni ŋkāʼa nɛ, ndɔ pugu ni njəɨ pi fie shhɨ pugu ndɔ mbiŋ maoŋ pighɔ, ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchhu ŋa pugu pɔ pi pa ghɨ̀nɨ ndɔ paʼa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ yei lɔ mbɔ laʼa yugu.
Nthɛ ŋa pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu ghà nchrā ŋkwaŋ nnu pei nɛ chwīe paʼa khuthɔ lɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ ŋa pugu chhɔ ntāʼa laʼataoŋ haʼaŋ a shi mbɔ yugu nɛ, yɛ ŋa pugu ni ndhɔ fɔ nɛ.
Pugu kaŋ ni nchhɔ mbīʼi laʼataoŋ yɛ ŋa pugu ni ndhɔ fɔ nɛ, pugu kaŋ ni mfāʼo shɨ̀na nɔ pɨ̄nɨ nu fɔ.
Ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, pugu chhɔ nshigi pi laʼataoŋ haʼaŋ a pwa nchaa yei nɛ, mbɔ yi po. Nɛnnɛ Minnwi lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo lrithɔ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Minnwi yugu, nthɛ ŋa a kwo pīri mmɛ laʼataoŋ ni pugu.

Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni njwɛʼi Abrahaŋ nɛ, a ni mfɛ Aiji nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ. Abrahaŋ ju ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ kàʼa ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ a ni nthɔ mbīri nu nɔ fɛ nu fiɛŋ muuŋ vi nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ni Minnwi.
Minnwi ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “A shi ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Aiji ŋa ɔ shi mfāʼo ŋgwrɛiŋgwa ŋa mi ni ŋkāʼa nɛ.”
Abrahaŋ ni njwɛrɛ ŋa minthɛ Minnwi pɨʼɨ Aiji moŋ gu, ndɔ nɔ chrā nu, Abrahaŋ ni mbɨnɨ mfāʼo vi llɔ moŋ gu.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ Aiji ni mfɛ mbɔrɔ ni Jakɔ pugu Ɛshɔ nɔ pa nnu ŋa a lɛ ma nthɔ nɛ.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, ndɨɨ ŋa Jakɔ ni ŋkhu nu nɛ, a fɛ mbɔrɔ ni sheshe muuŋ Joshɛ ndɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni njɨʼə noŋ yi thɔ mbìe yi nɛ.
A ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, Joshɛ gha ntāʼa ŋkhu, nchrā ŋkuoŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ puoŋ Ishrae shi ntaoŋ laʼataoŋ Ijipti nɛ, ndɔ mfɛ pa gɨ́ nɔ nnu haʼaŋ pi shi nchwīe ni pa kwéi pi nɛ.
A ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, pi gha mbhi Mushi, pa tǎa pi lə̄ɨŋ vi nɔ trɛi nàoŋ, nthɛ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ ŋa a mbwa muuŋ, ndɔ paʼa pugu lɔ mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu nɔ pəʼɨ nu gɨ́ fùoŋ.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, Mushi ni ŋga ŋgū mmɛŋoŋ ndāa ŋa kiʼi pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa a muuŋ muuŋ fùoŋ Fɛrɔ yi miŋgwɛ.
A ni ŋka chuʼɔ pi nɔ yəɨ nu ŋgəʼɨ pugu pa ŋgwa Minnwi nchaa ŋa a fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ pwatua moŋ phɨ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ.
A ni mbīʼi ŋa fāʼo nu wɛ́ʼi nthɛ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ fāʼo nchaa pa fāʼo moŋ laʼataoŋ Ijipti, nthɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ ndīi pi kɨ̀nɛiŋ ŋa a pɔ shhɨ nɛ.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, a lɔllɔ Ijipti pi ki lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo pɔgɔ gu nthɛ pɨgɨtua fùoŋ. Pi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nthɔ njəɨ Minnwi haʼaŋ pi shiʼa njəɨ vi nɛ, a ni ndāa nɔ shrī nu ŋkǔnu yi mbɨnɨ.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, a ni nūʼɔŋ Jɨ Lli Njiʼa ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchhu ŋa pi mīŋi chhǐ ŋkuoŋ pa chonda, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ŋa pi ni ntaoŋ vi ŋa a jwi pa fǔoŋ phi nɛ kāoŋ vugu.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, pugu ni nshāʼa mmɛ ŋkhǐ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Ŋkhǐ Pipie pi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ yo, ndɔ pa ŋgwa Ijipti gha mōoŋ yugu ŋkhu moŋ ŋkhǐ ghɔ.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, pa ŋkaʼa ŋguʼɔ Jeriko ni mbūo nshāʼo shhɛ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni ŋgɨ̄ŋ mbāoŋ nɔ khwachəɨ llɛ́ nɛ.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, Raha miŋgwɛ shakhɨ shini ndɔ ŋkhu pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntɨnɨthɔ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a ni ntuo pa miyra llɔ laʼataoŋ Ishrae shiʼi.
Ŋ̀guʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ? Nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ shi mbou vəɨ nɔ chrā nu nthɛ pa Gidioŋ, Bara, Shaoŋshi, Jefta, nthɛ Devi pugu Shamuɛ pugu pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi,
haʼaŋ pugu ni ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ piŋ ŋgaʼa pa laʼataoŋ. Pugu ni nchwīe nnu ŋa a kāʼo nɛ ndɔ mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa nɛ. Pugu ni nchri nchò pa paʼo,
mbɨgɛi njɨ móŋoŋ, ndəʼɨ ki pi lɔ njwi vugu ni kafa, mfāʼo ghrɨ́ moŋ pou ghrɨ́, mfāʼo tɨtɨnɨ ghrɨ́ moŋ nchhɔ̀, māʼaŋ ŋgaʼa ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ pa taoŋ nduoŋ pugu tei.
Piŋgɛ ni mbɨnɨ mfāʼo lǐŋ pugu haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋkwo khu nɛ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ kuʼɔ nu moŋ gu.
Pi ni mfɛ wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ ni pichəɨ, pugu lāa ŋa mbaʼa pugu taoŋ chə́ɨŋ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pugu fāʼo ŋkiɛŋ chɔmbhi ndɨɨ ŋa pugu pɨnɨ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ gu nɛ.
Pi ni māʼaŋ pichəɨ ni kwə̀ɨŋ, ndɔ ŋgwie pichəɨ ti ŋkrao ni pa chɛiŋ māʼaŋ moŋ chə́ɨŋ.
Pi ni ntuŋ vugu ni ŋgùʼɔ, nsho vugu pugu taoŋ paa krao
, njwi vugu ni kafa. Pugu māʼaŋ pa ŋgrào minjɨɨ pugu pa mimbhi mbɨŋ pugu nyīeŋ nu, mbou, pi fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu, paʼa ndɔ ntuo vugu shiʼi.
Mbha nnu ŋgwa pei ni nja mbwa ŋgaʼa nɔ pɔ nu ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei, pugu ni nthɔ nyīeŋ nu lɨʼɨlɨʼɨ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó pugu pa ŋkuoŋ mbra nchhɔ nu moŋ pa llù pugu pa pùo.
Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni mbiŋ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pei nthɛ piŋ yugu nɛ, pugu shini ndɔ mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa Minnwi ni nūʼɔŋ yaoŋ ŋa a pwa nchaa yie nɛ ni pia, nnɛ ŋa pia ŋkiɛŋ, paʼa pi lɔ nchwīe pugu pɔ ki ntəɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ŋa pia fāʼo ntou pa miŋkwentie yəɨ pia nɛ, p̂ia mīʼaŋ ŋguoŋ pa lrì pugu pa phɨ ŋa a krɛ̄i mbɨŋ pia nɛ, p̂ia tei ni tiishii, tei ŋa a pɔ shhɨ pia nɛ,

nchhɔ ndīi pi Jishɔ, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa piŋ yia llɔ mbhɔ yu, a lɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe piŋ yia pɔ ki ntəɨ nɛ. Nthɛ pwanjuʼɔ ŋa a ni mbɔ shhɨ yu nɛ, a ni ŋgwɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yi ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ nthɨŋkwo ŋa a ni ŋkhu ŋkuoŋ wáʼa, mbīʼi lrithɔ khu nu ŋkuoŋ wáʼa ghɔ a pɔ nnu gha, pi chərə vi ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ shhɨ faaŋ Minnwi.
Pīʼi mbɨŋ ju ŋa a ni ntīi shii moŋ ŋkwaŋ kipɨna yɛ ŋa a ni nthɔ nu ghɔ llɔ mbhɔ ghaŋ phɨ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi ɔ fāʼo lɨʼənoŋ nshūu mbɨ̄nɨ njiŋ.
Moŋ ŋkrɔ̀ yəɨ pəɨ pa phɨ, pəɨ lɔ naa ndɨʼɨ ti nchəɨŋ moŋ nthɨŋkwo ŋa pi jwi vəɨ
ki pəɨ līʼɛ māʼaŋ njùʼɔ yɛ ŋa a chrā ni pəɨ nɔ pa puoŋ pi nɛ.
“Muuŋ a, kiʼi ndɔ̄gɔ pi ni thɔ mbhɔ ndɨɨ ŋa taathɔ yuʼu ghɔ nɛ,
ki mfāʼo lɨʼənoŋ ndɨɨ ŋa a fɛ̄ʼi ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Taathɔ ghà njuʼu ŋoŋ ŋa a khwā nɛ,
mfɛ njɔ́ ni sheshe muuŋ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ vi nɔ muuŋ vi nɛ.”
A pɔ nthɛ pi yuʼu nu ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu njùʼɔ yəɨ. Minnwi fāʼa nu mbɨŋ pəɨ pi nɔ puoŋ pi. Nthɛ ŋa a yəɨ muuŋ ŋa tǎa vi ghà mieŋ ki lɔ njuʼu vi?
P̈i mieŋ ki lɔ njuʼu vəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ghà njuʼu ŋguoŋ puoŋ nɛ, a nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi nɔ pa puoŋ phi mbhi, ki lɔ mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ pa puoŋ.
Nɔ pīgi nu, pia fāʼo pa tǎa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ ŋa pugu ghà njuʼu via, ndɔ pia wuʼɔ nja njaʼo vugu. Yie lɔ mbie ŋa pia ka pɨ̄nɨ njaʼo nchò Tǎa pa jijwɛ pugu pa chɔmbhi yaʼo mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ?
Pa tǎa ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ ghà njuʼu via nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu līi a kāʼo mbhɔ pugu nɛ, ndɔ A ghà njuʼu via nnɛ ŋa pia pɔ shiʼi, nnɛ ŋa pia fāʼo ŋkwaŋ taoŋtaoŋ yi.
Ŋguoŋ yuʼu nu ghà mfhi nɔ haʼaŋ a thɔ pi ni yúʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ ki lɔ mbɔ pi nnu shiʼi, ndɔ a gha ndara, ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yɛʼi yaoŋ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ, a yuŋ ntíɛŋ mbɔ taʼaŋggi pugu chɔmbhi ndɨndɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, kə̄rə mbhɔ mɔ ŋa a kɨna nɛ tɔthɨ, ndɔ nshwīi kwɛ́rɛ mɔ ŋa a nāna nɛ.
P̂əɨ chwīe shɛndaoŋ haʼaŋ kwò yəɨ tɔgɔ nu fɔ nɛ pɔ yi tithi, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi kwò yəɨ haʼaŋ a lɔ nja ntɨnɨ nɛ tēe nɔ yòu yi, a ka tɨtɨnɨ mbɔ shiʼi.
Kāa nɔ pɔ nu ni taʼaŋggi pəɨ pa shesheŋoŋ ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchhɔ chɔmbhi taoŋtaoŋ ŋa a ŋkiɛŋ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ shi njəɨ Taathɔ nɛ.

P̂əɨ lɨna nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa shesheŋoŋ lɔ nshūu mbɨnɨ njiŋ ntaoŋ moŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi. P̂əɨ lɨna nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa kiʼi shesheŋoŋ pɔ nɔ ŋǐeŋ thɨ lwillwi ŋa a ghà ŋkuʼɔ nthɔ ni ghaghaʼa ntou ŋgwa kie ŋkuoŋ ghɔ mfuo noŋ yugu nɛ.
P̂əɨ yəɨ ŋa kiʼi shesheŋoŋ pɔ miŋkwoshuoŋ, ki ŋoŋ ki pɔgɔ Minnwi nɔ Ɛshɔ ŋa a ni mfīni lɨʼɨ yi nɔ muuŋ shhɨ nthɛ taʼa ŋgɛ́ maoŋ jɨ nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ji ŋa a ni ŋga nuʼuŋ ndaʼa, a tāʼa nu nɔ fāʼo nu mbɔrɔ, pi lāa vi nthɛ ŋa a shini ndɔ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo shɨ̀na nɔ pɨnɨ nu ŋkwri njùʼɔ yi, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a ni ntāʼa shɨ̀na ni ŋkhǐ ligi nɛ.
Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nthɔ pi ŋkɨŋ mbra ŋa minthɛ pəɨ kāoŋ, pugu móŋoŋ ŋa a kɨɨ nu, ni tɨtɨnɨ njiŋnjiŋ pugu pa mmɛ fiŋ,
ni ntàŋ ŋa pi tua pugu pa ŋggì ŋa chrà yi chwīe ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu yaʼo nɛ lɨ̄gəɨ ŋa kiʼi pi nuʼuŋ mbɨnɨ nchrā ni pugu.
Nthɛ ŋa gɨ́ yɛ ŋa pi ni mfɛ ni pugu nɛ ni ŋgaʼa vugu. Gɨ́ ghɔ ni mbɔ ŋa, “Ä njiʼi mbɔ ŋa a kāoŋ minyieŋ ŋkāoŋ mbra ghɔ, pi tuŋ vi ni ŋgùʼɔ a khu.”
Shishini, lɨʼɨ ghɔ ni ŋgūru ti Mushi chhu ŋa, “Ǹdɨnaoŋ ni pɔgɔ gu pugu pa wrū nu.”
Ndɔ pəɨ thɔ pi yəɨ mbra ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Shayaoŋ nɛ, pugu pa mmɛ laʼataoŋ Minnwi maoŋ, mbɔ Jerushalɛiŋ ŋa a llɔ po, shhɨ pa ŋkaŋŋkaŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ŋa pugu kɨrɨ moŋ mmɛ pwatua nɛ,
pəɨ thɔ pi moŋ chɔshi pa fǔoŋ phi haʼaŋ pi nāʼaŋ ligi yugu po nɛ. Pəɨ thɔ pi shhɨ Minnwi ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa, shhɨ pa jijwɛ pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ ŋa pi chwīe pugu pɔ ki ntəɨ nɛ.
Pəɨ thɔ pi shhɨ Jishɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ chīni ŋgwa pugu pa Minnwi moŋ kɨ̀na fhi, shhɨ chhǐ ŋa pi yrā, ŋa a chrā pa nnu shiʼi nchaa chhǐ Abe nɛ.

P̂əɨ lɨna nu ŋa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi ndāa vi ŋa a chrā nu nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa ä mbɔ ŋa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ndāa nɔ yaʼo nu chrà Minnwi mbhɔ ŋoŋ ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ ŋkɨ̀nɨ yi ghɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ nɛ shini ndɔ ntei, pəɨ pīʼi kiʼɛ ŋa minthɛ pia kie pi nɛiŋ ntei, nɔ haʼaŋ p̈ia ndāa ju ŋa a chrā nu pi llɔ po nɛ!
A ni ŋga mbɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, ŋggì yi chɨ̄ʼɨ shhɛ, ndɔ ndwɛ a kāʼa ŋa, “Ndɔ mbaʼa ǹshi ŋguʼɔ mbɨ̄nɨ nchɨ̄ʼɨ pi shhɛ təʼɨ vi ŋkamuʼɔŋ, ndɔ ǹshi nchɨ̄ʼɨ po ŋkaa yu.”
Chrà yei ŋa “ǹshi ŋguʼɔ mbɨ̄nɨ” thɔ, nōoŋ pi fuʼu nu pa maoŋ ŋa minthɛ pi chɨ̄ʼɨ nɛ, mbɔ pa yaoŋ ŋa pi chwīe nɛ, nnɛ ŋa pa maoŋ ŋa minthɛ paʼa pi lɔ nchɨ̄ʼɨ nɛ nthɛ pugu kɨna.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂ia fāʼo tōo nu nthɛ ŋa pia fāʼo Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi ŋa minthɛ paʼa pi lɔ nchɨ̄ʼɨ nɛ. Nthɛ yie ghɔ, pia ghaʼo Minnwi moŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a shi mbwa vi nɛ moŋ yaʼo nchò pugu pa pɔ́gɔ,
nthɛ ŋa Minnwi yia pɔ pi móŋoŋ ŋa a ghà ŋkɨɨ yaoŋ nshiʼi nɛ.
P̂əɨ ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhɔ ŋkhwā noŋ pəɨ nɔ pa ghaŋ piŋ.
Kiʼi pəɨ līʼɛ lɨna nu ni pa ghɨ̀nɨ, nthɛ ŋa moŋ chwīe nu nɛnnɛ, pichəɨ pa ŋgwa lɨna ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ki lɔ nji.
P̂əɨ kwiŋ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu pɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ nɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ pugu pɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ kaʼa, ŋkwiŋ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pi lɔ ntuo vugu shiʼi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ pugu thɔ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ pi kaʼa.
Ŋguoŋ ŋ̂gwa ghao ghaʼo láŋ, kiʼi ŋoŋ nūaŋ pugu ŋoŋ nduoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ ŋgwɛ vi ki ndaoŋ vi nɛ, nthɛ ŋa Minnwi shi nshaʼa pa ghaŋ kwoshuoŋ, pugu pa ghaŋ láŋ ŋa pugu kwoshuoŋ nɛ.
Lɨna nu ŋa kiʼi khwā mbɨŋ pɔ moŋ chɔmbhi yɔ, fāʼo njru ni yaoŋ ŋa ɔ fāʼo nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi ni nchhu ŋa,
“Mbaʼa njiʼi ma mieŋ ghɔ,
ki ma njɨrɨ ghɔ.”
Nɛnnɛ minthɛ pia chhu ni tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa,
“Taathɔ ŋgaŋ ghɛ̀rɛ a, m̀baʼa njiʼi mbɔgɔ gu.
Minthɛ ŋoŋmishua chwīe pi khɔ mbɨŋ mu?”
P̂əɨ kwiŋ pa thishɨ pəɨ, mbɔ pɛ ŋa pugu chhu chrà Minnwi ni pəɨ nɛ. Pəɨ pīʼi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu ni nchhɔ chɔmbhi yugu ti nuʼuŋ ŋkhu nɛ mbīni piŋ yugu.
Jishɔ Krishto pɔ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni mbɔ yua nɛ, ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi nɛnnɛ shiʼa, ndɔ ma ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi nɛnnɛ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.

Kiʼi pəɨ mieŋ pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ ntɨ́gɨ pugu pa ŋgɨ̀nɨ ntɨ́gɨ tiɛŋ vəɨ niʼiŋ moŋ trǔ, a pwa ŋa piŋ ŋoŋ tɨnɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ Minnwi, ki lɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ nūʼɔŋ nu pa nùʼɔŋ nthɛ nnu maoŋ jɨ, pa nùʼɔŋ pei lɔ njiʼi ŋgɛ̄rɛ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu nūʼɔŋ nɛ.
Pia fāʼo lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ
ŋa pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼa nu moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pa ŋgwa Juu ghà ŋgaʼo Minnwi nɛ lɔ mfāʼo njɨ nɔ jɨ nu maoŋ haʼaŋ a llɔ ŋkuoŋ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa frɛinoŋ pa minyieŋ pɛ ŋa taathɔ pa thishɨ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nii ni chhǐ yugu moŋ pa Lɨʼɨ Taoŋtaoŋ Nda Minnwi nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nthɛ phɨ nɛ, pi tūoŋ pi mbhi nɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ ŋgwa lɔ ŋkrao ntǎa nɛ.
Nthɛ yei, Jishɔ ŋkaa yu ni ntaoŋ moŋ laʼa ŋkaoŋ maa njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ ŋkhu, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ a chwīe ŋgwa pɔ pi taoŋtaoŋ ni ji chhǐ.
Nɛnnɛ kiʼɛ, a pie ŋa pia taoŋ moŋ laʼa ŋgə̄ɨ mbhi lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋoŋ lɔ ŋkrao ntǎa nɛ mbara vi, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia fāʼo yia ghrà moŋ shhunoŋ ŋa a ni ntɔgɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pia lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo laʼataoŋ ŋa a shi ma ŋkɨna nɛ hɛiŋ, ndɔ pia thɔ nshigi pi mmɛ laʼataoŋ ŋa a shi nthɔ nɛ.
Ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu kiʼɛ, p̂ia ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ mfɛ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ mbɔ tōo nu ni Minnwi, mbɔ yaoŋ fɛ́ ŋa a ghà mfɛ pa nchò pɛ ŋa pugu chhu páa ŋa a Taathɔ nɛ.
Kiʼi pəɨ wɛ̄iŋ chwīe nu shiʼi ni thɔ mbhɔ pugu pa ghrā nu maoŋ haʼaŋ pəɨ fāʼo nɛ pəɨ pa ŋgwa nduoŋ, nthɛ ŋa pa ŋkwaŋ maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pei ghà mfɛ pwanjuʼɔ ni Minnwi.

P̂əɨ yaʼo nchò pa thishɨ pəɨ mfɛ noŋ yəɨ ni pugu, nthɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ ndɨna nu ni nchə̌ɨ yəɨ nɔ pa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu lɛ mfɨ̄ʼɨ ni Minnwi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pugu fāʼa nɛ. P̂əɨ chwīe nɛnnɛ nthɛ ŋa a pie ŋa pugu chwīe fàʼa yei moŋ pwanjuʼɔ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi ni shɔnɔ nu, nthɛ ŋa mbaʼa yinɛ ghɛ̄rɛ vəɨ.
P̂əɨ luoŋ Minnwi ni pigi, nthɛ ŋa pigi fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa ŋgaŋthɔ yigi yi shieshie, pigi khwā nɔ chwīe nu nnu haʼaŋ a kāʼo nɛ moŋ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao.
Ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi ŋa pəɨ luoŋ ni Minnwi ŋa kiʼi a shɨgashɨga ŋkaoŋ a maa mbɨ̄nɨ ntaoŋ a ŋa mbɨ̄nɨ njəɨ vəɨ.
Ndwɛ, ǹduoŋ ŋa Minnwi ŋa taʼaŋggi ghà ndhɔ mbhɔ yu nɛ, ŋa a kuʼɔ ni Jishɔ Taathɔ via moŋ gu nɛ, mbɔ ju Jishɔ ŋa a mmɛ ŋkɛ̄ʼi pa minjɨɨ nɛ, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ kɨ̀na ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ndugwi yi nɛ,

pīri vəɨ ni ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ shiʼi ghao, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ chwīe nnu ŋa a tāʼa nu nɛ, a fāʼa yaoŋ ŋa a khwǎ nɛ moŋ chɔmbhi yia ntɔgɔ pi mbɨŋ Jishɔ Krishto, ŋa ndighaʼo pɔ pi ji ki ndugwi yi nɛ. Â pɔ nɛnnɛ.
Ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ŋa p̂əɨ ywɛrɛ chrà māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yei ni wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ, nthɛ ŋa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei ŋa ǹāʼaŋ ni pəɨ nɛ lɔ njiʼi nshɨgashɨga.
Ǹtāʼa nu pəɨ ji ŋa pi fuʼu Timoti ndǐŋ via moŋ chə́ɨŋ. Ä shi njiʼɛ nthɔ, kaŋ pigi yu shi nthɔ kaʼa njəɨ vəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa nthɔ nu nɛ.
P̂əɨ chrā ni ŋguoŋ pa thishɨ pəɨ, mbɨnɨ nchrā ni ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ. Pa ŋgwa llɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ Itali chhu ŋa pi chrā ni pəɨ.
Ǹduoŋ ŋa pwapuŋ Minnwi pɔ ni pəɨ ghao.
James: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ mbhɔ mu Jɛiŋ, mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa Minnwi pugu Jishɔ Krishto ŋa a Taathɔ nɛ.
Ǹchrā ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa Minnwi llɔ moŋ paanchrɔ laʼataoŋ Ishrae ŋa pugu sha moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi nɛ.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ lɔ̄gɔ a pɔ nnu pwanjuʼɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ tɔgɔ moŋ ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ mōoŋ nu nɛ,
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ji ŋa p̈iŋ yəɨ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ mōoŋ nu, chwīe pəɨ fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ.
P̂əɨ mieŋ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ mīʼɛŋ fàʼa yi mbɨŋ pəɨ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ kāʼo moŋ piŋ yəɨ ti ndɨnaoŋ ki lɔ nuʼuŋ mbou sheshe yaoŋ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ mbou shiethɔ, â luoŋ mbhɔ Minnwi ŋa a ghà mfɛ ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ki lɔ ŋgīʼɛ, ki lɔ ŋkrɛ̄i ŋoŋ nɛ, kaŋ a shi mfɛ ghɔ.
Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa ɔ luoŋ nɛ, luoŋ moŋ piŋ, ki lɔ mfāʼo khuthɔ. Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa thɔ yi kukhu nɛ pɔ pi nɔ mbaʼaŋkhi thɔ ŋkhǐ ŋa fɨfrəɨ chi vi mfɛ hɛiŋ, mbɨnɨ mfɛ hini.
Kiʼi ŋoŋ ghɔ pīʼi ŋa a shi mfāʼo sheshe yaoŋ mbhɔ Taathɔ,
nthɛ ŋa ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ vei ŋgaŋ paa njùʼɔ, ki lɔ mfāʼo nthi mi moŋ ŋguoŋ mbha nnu pi ghao.
Ŋgaŋ piŋ yɛ ŋa a pɔ pi miŋkwasha nɛ fāʼo ntou pwanjuʼɔ ŋa pi kə̄rə vi,
ŋgaŋ fàʼo fāʼo pwatua ŋa pi shwiʼi vi shhɛ, nthɛ ŋa ju nduthɔ yi shi ntɔgɔ gha nɔ frawa ŋa trǔ fuʼu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa minaoŋ ghà nshaʼa ni tɨtɨnɨ laoŋlaoŋ ntūoŋ trǔ ghɔ, frawa yi gū, ndìpwa yi phɛ gha. A wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgaŋ fàʼo shi ntɔgɔ ghagha moŋ titri maoŋ pɛ ŋa a yōu njiŋ yi nɛ.
Mbɔrɔ yi ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a kɨna ntithi a tɨnɨ moŋ mōoŋ nu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa a shi ŋga nthi a tɨnɨ ti mōoŋ nu ghɔ tɔgɔ, a fāʼo ŋgáʼo chɔmbhi, ŋa Minnwi kāʼa ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khwā vi nɛ.
Kiʼi ŋoŋ chhu ndɨɨ ŋa ywɛʼi nu ŋa a chwīe phɨ thɔ ghɔ nɛ ŋa, “A ywɛʼi Minnwi njwɛʼi a nnɛ,” nthɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa phɨ lɔ njwɛʼi Minnwi ndɔ ti paʼa Ju nduthɔ yi lɔ njwɛʼi ŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe phɨ.
Ndɔ ywɛʼi nu ŋa ŋoŋ chwīe phɨ ghà nthɔ ni ŋoŋ ndɨɨ ŋa a mieŋ pīʼi nu pɨphɨ shūu vi ndwɛrɛ vi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ nɛ.
Nnɛ, ndɨɨ ŋa pīʼi nu pɨphɨ ghɔ shūu nɛ, kaŋ a shi mbhi phɨ, phɨ gha nja ŋkuʼɔ shiʼi, mbhi gu.
Kiʼi pəɨ fɨ̄ɨ noŋ yəɨ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ ŋa ŋ̀khwā.
Ŋguoŋ pa yaoŋ fɛ́ shiʼi pugu pa kɨ̀nɛiŋ ki kɔ̀rɔ, llɔ pi po, nshwiʼi nu shhɛ llɔ mbhɔ Tǎa pa líʼɛ ŋa a shiʼa ma ŋkwri nu nɔ miliʼi ŋa a nyīeŋ nu nɛ.
Nthɛ khwǎ njùʼɔ yi, a chwīe pia pɔ phi ŋkamuʼɔŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chrà yi, mbɔ nnu shini, nnɛ ŋa pia pɔ nɔ yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ fǔoŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ ŋa a puoŋ nɛ.
Ndɔ p̂əɨ ji yei, ma ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ, a pie ŋa shesheŋoŋ vəɨ yīʼɛ njwɛrɛ nnu, ndɔ ki lɔ ŋkɔnɔ chrà nu, ki lɔ njiʼɛ mbɨgɨ túa,
nthɛ ŋa pɨgɨtua ŋoŋmishua shiʼa nthɔ ni ŋkwaŋ ndɨndɨ yɛ ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, fuʼu ŋguoŋ nnu tɔtrɔ pugu pa mbha nnu pɨphɨ moŋ chɔmbhi yɔ, mbiŋ chrà yɛ ŋa Minnwi phī moŋ njùʼɔ ghɔ nɛ ni junoŋ, mbɔ chrà ŋa a fāʼo ghrɨ́ ŋa minthɛ a kwe ghɔ nɛ.
Pəɨ pɔ ghaŋ nūʼɔŋ chrà Minnwi ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ghaŋ yaʼo nu, nnɛ nthɔ mfɨ̄ɨ noŋ yəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋ̈oŋ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋgaŋ ywɛrɛ chrà Minnwi ki lɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ chwīe, kaŋ a pɔ nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ya ndīi ligi yi shishiʼi moŋ mililigi,
ndīi noŋ yi ŋga ndɔllɔ ŋgə̄ɨ, ndīʼɛ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ.

Ndɔ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a līi gɨ́ tithi ŋa a ghà ŋkɨ̄gɛi ŋkɨ̌ɨ mbɨŋ ŋoŋ nɛ, ntīi shii moŋ ghɔ, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋoŋ ŋa a yaʼo ndɔ ndīʼɛ nɛ, mbɔ pi ŋgaŋ fāʼa fàʼa ghɔ ŋa gɨ́ ghɔ chhu nɛ, kaŋ mbɔrɔ shi mbɔ yi ŋoŋ ghɔ.
Ɔ̈ nchhu ŋa ɔ ŋoŋ Minnwi ki lɔ ndɨna ni lɨŋ yɔ, kaŋ ɔ fɨ̄ɨ pi noŋ yɔ, jɔ nnu Minnwi ghɔ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ.
Nnu Minnwi ŋa a yi taoŋtaoŋ ki lɔ mfāʼo nchhí ligi Minnwi Tǎa nɛ pɔ ŋa, ɔ kra pa puoŋ minthi pugu pa piŋgɛ kugu moŋ pa ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ pugu, ndɔ ndɨna ni noŋ yɔ ki ŋkuoŋ mbhi lɔ ntrao ghɔ.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, kiʼi pəɨ nōoŋ shieligi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ thi moŋ piŋ yəɨ mbɨŋ Jishɔ Taathɔ mbɔ Krishto ndɔ mbɔ Taathɔ pa ndighaʼo nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋ̈oŋ ŋgwɛ pa krɛ́i laoŋgo, māʼaŋ ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ ndhwí, nii moŋ nda luoŋ Minnwi yəɨ, ŋgaŋ pou māʼaŋ kukhu ndhwí nii ŋkaa yu,
ɔ̈ mfɛ ndɨɨ pi ni wuʼɔ yɛ ŋoŋ ŋa a māʼaŋ ŋkiɛŋkiɛŋ ndhwí nɛ nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Chhɔ hɛiŋ nɔ lɨʼɨ shiʼi,” nchhu ni ŋgaŋ pou ŋa, “Thi hini ndāa nnɛ ɔ chhɔ shhɛ nda,”
yie ghɔ lɔ nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ shɛ̄rɛ noŋ pəɨ, nōoŋ ŋa pəɨ līi nnu ni mbe mbɔ nnu pɨphɨ?

P̂əɨ ywɛrɛ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ ŋa ŋ̀khwā. Minnwi chuʼɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pou ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ nɛ, ŋa pugu pɔ pa ghaŋ fàʼo moŋ piŋ, ŋa pugu fāʼo shɨ̀na moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi. A kāʼa nɔ fɛ nu Shaʼafuoŋ yi yei ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khwā vi nɛ.
Ndɔ pəɨ chɨ̄ʼə ŋgaŋ pou. A shi lɔ mbɔ ghaŋ fàʼo mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ nɛ? Mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà nshūu vəɨ ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ moŋ sháʼa nɛ?
A lɔ mbɔ pugu mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà nchɨ̄ʼə ligi Jishɔ, mbɔ ligi chɨɨchɨɨ ŋa pi chhɔ̄ thɔ pəɨ nɛ?
P̈əɨ nja nthɔ nūʼɔŋ pi gɨ́ pifuoŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a pɔ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa, “Khwā taakuo yɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ khwā noŋ yɔ nɛ,” kaŋ pəɨ ya mfāʼa nu shiʼi.
Ti pəɨ nthɔ nōoŋ pi shieligi, kaŋ pəɨ thɔ nchwīe pi phɨ, gɨ́ wɛ̄iŋ vəɨ nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ gɨ́ ghao ndɔ ŋgū yichəɨ taʼa yi nɛ, nōoŋ ŋa a gū ghao.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a chhu ŋa, “Kiʼi ŋgaŋ láŋ kwo shúoŋ nɛ,” pɨnɨ ŋguʼɔ nchhu ju ŋa, “Kiʼi njwi ŋoŋ.” Ɔ̈ mbɔ ŋgaŋ láŋ ki lɔ ŋkwo shúoŋ ndɔ njwi ŋoŋ, kaŋ ɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ŋgaŋ pəʼɨ gɨ́ ŋkaa ghɔ.
Nnɛ pəɨ chrā ndɔ nchwīe sheshe nnu nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ji nu ŋa gɨ́ ŋa a ghà ŋkɨ̄gɛi ŋkɨ̌ɨ mbɨŋ ŋgwa nɛ, shi nshaʼa vugu.
Minnwi shi ndɛ nshaʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ nɛ ki kwoshɨnɨ. Kwoshɨnɨ ghà ŋgwɛ̄ ndɨɨ ŋa sháʼa thɔ nɛ.
Lǐŋ paŋ, ghɛ̀rɛ yi khɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ nchhu ŋa a fāʼo piŋ, ki lɔ nōoŋ piŋ ghɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fàʼa yi. Minthɛ piŋ ghɔ kwe vi?
Ä mbɔ ŋa pa lǐŋ pɔ moŋ piŋ pou ndhwí pugu pa maoŋ jɨ,
taʼa ŋoŋ shɨna pəɨ chhu ni pugu ŋa, “P̂əɨ ghə̄ɨ moŋ ghɨghrɨ, noŋ yəɨ lāoŋ, pəɨ fāʼo njrú,” ki lɔ njiʼi mfɛ pi yaoŋ ŋa pugu tāʼa nu nɛ, ghɛ̀rɛ yi pɔ pi khɔ?
Nɛnnɛ, piŋ ŋa a pɔ pi təʼɨ vi ki fàʼa lɔ mbɔ fɔ nɛ khu yi.
Ndɔ yichəɨ ŋoŋ chhu ŋa, “Ɔ fāʼo piŋ, ndɔ m̀fāʼo fàʼa.” Nōoŋ piŋ yɔ vəɨ ki fàʼa lɔ mbɔ, ǹōoŋ piŋ a vɛ ni fàʼa a.
Ɔ piŋ ŋa Minnwi taʼa yi, ɔ chwīe a pwa. Njiʼi nthɛ pi pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ piŋ, ti ŋgrū moŋ pɔgɔ gu.
Yaoŋ na yei! Ɔ tāʼa nu ŋa pi nōoŋ vɛ ŋa piŋ ki fàʼa lɔ fāʼo ghɛ̀rɛ?
Abrahaŋ, ŋkhu tǎa via, shini ndɔ mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ mbhɔ Minnwi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fàʼa yi, ndɨɨ ŋa a ni mfɛ Aiji muuŋ vi nɔ yaoŋ fɛ́ ŋkuoŋ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɛ?
Ɔ yəɨ ŋa piŋ yi pugu pa fàʼa yi ni mfāʼa nu kaʼa, a ni nōoŋ ŋa piŋ yi ŋkiɛŋ yi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fàʼa yi.
Nchò Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ni nchəɨŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchhu ŋa, “Abrahaŋ ni mbiŋ Minnwi, pi lɔ̄gɔ ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ.” Pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi ŋa taannu Minnwi.
Ɔ yəɨ ŋa pi ghà ndɔ̄gɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nthɛ pi fàʼa yi ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ nthɛ pi piŋ yi təʼɨ vi.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, pi shini ndɔ ndɔ̄gɔ miŋgwɛ shakhɨ chəɨ, mbɔ Raha, ŋa a ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nthɛ pi fàʼa yi ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ndɔ̄gɔ pa miyra pighɔ ntaoŋ vugu pugu tɔgɔ moŋ ndaoŋ nduoŋ ŋgə̄ɨ nɛ?
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo jijwɛ yi khu nɛ, a wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ piŋ ŋa pi lɔ nōoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fàʼa yi khu nɛ.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, kiʼi ntou yəɨ paʼo nɔ pɔ nu ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa, nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ji nɛ, pigi ŋa pigi ghaŋ yɛʼi ŋgwa nɛ, yigi sháʼa lɛ mbɨnɨ ntɨnɨ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ yia ghà mfāaŋ nnu, ti s̈hesheŋoŋ mieŋ ki fāaŋ nnu moŋ nnu ŋa a chhu nɛ, kaŋ a ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo ntəɨ, mfāʼo njɨ nɔ tuo nu noŋ yi.
Pia ghà niʼiŋ yaoŋ tɨ́nɨ nchò pa minyieŋləɨ nɔ chwīe nu pugu yaʼo nchò yia, nnɛ ŋa pia fāʼo njɨ nɔ chwīe nu pugu ghə̄ɨ sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa pia khwā nɛ.
Pɛʼi pa mitu ŋkhǐ njəɨ, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ya ŋgaʼo, a tiɛŋ fɨfrəɨ ntiɛŋ vugu nyīeŋ nu nɔ nɛ, ŋgaŋ shūgu vi ghà ŋguʼɔ ŋkara thɔ yi pi ni muuŋ mi prǎ pugu ghə̄ɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ a khwā nɛ.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, lɨŋ ŋoŋ wuʼɔ muuŋ mi ghrà noŋ ŋoŋ, ndɔ a ghà ŋkwēi njùʼɔ ni mɛmmɛ nnu. Muuŋ mi lɨŋ móŋoŋ nthɛ a tūoŋ taʼa mmɛ paʼa!
Ndɔ lɨŋ ŋoŋ pɔ pi móŋoŋ. Lɨŋ mmɛ nda phɨ moŋ noŋ ŋoŋ. A ghà ntrao ŋguoŋ noŋ ŋoŋ ghao, nchwīe ŋguoŋ chɔmbhi yia chəɨŋ móŋoŋ, móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ liɛŋ shhɛ
fɛ móŋoŋ ghɔ.
Ŋgwamishua fāʼo njɨ nɔ puʼɔ nu ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ pa minyieŋ ghao ni pa mishi ni pa miyaoŋ shatei, pugu pa mimaoŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ,
ndɔ minthɛ paʼa kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ mbuʼɔ lɨŋ. A phɨ ŋa a shiʼa mfɛrɛ, ndɨnaoŋ ni njɨʼɨ ŋa minthɛ a jwi ŋoŋ.
Pia ghà ŋgaʼo Taathɔ, mbɔ Tǎa via, pi wuʼɔ ni lɨŋ yia, mbɨnɨ ŋguʼɔ nchɔ̄nɔ ŋgwa haʼaŋ Minnwi puoŋ vugu, pugu fhi vi nɛ, pi wuʼɔ ni lɨŋ ghɔ.
Ghaʼo nu Minnwi pugu pa chɔ̄nɔ nu ŋgwa ghà ŋguʼɔ ntaoŋ pi moŋ taʼa nchò ghɔ. Pa lǐŋ paŋ, yei lɔ mfāʼo nɔ pɔ nu nnɛ.
Ŋkhǐ lɨlɨŋ pugu yi lwillwi nthɛ a taoŋ moŋ taʼa ŋkaʼashɛ?
Lǐŋ paŋ, mimfɛ thɨ chìa yuŋ olive, ki thɨ grape nthɛ a yuŋ chìa? Mbaʼa ŋkhǐ lɨlɨŋ taoŋ moŋ taʼa ŋkaʼashɛ pugu yi lwillwi.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo shiethɔ ndɔ nji nnu shɨna pəɨ nɛ gɔ̌? A nōoŋ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ chɔmbhi yi, yi shishiʼi, pugu pa fàʼa yi moŋ shiethɔ juju.
Ndɔ ɔ̈ mfāʼo kighɨʼə lwillwi, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa ɔ wuʼɔ mbīʼi pi jɔ nnu, kiʼi ŋkwēi njùʼɔ yɔ ndɔ ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ nthɔ ŋkuru nnu shini.
Yie ŋkwaŋ shiethɔ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ yɛ ŋa a llɔ po nɛ, ndɔ a llɔ pi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ, mbɔ yi moŋ frɛinoŋ pugu pa yi Shata.
Nthɛ ŋa moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa kighɨʼə pɔ, ŋoŋ wuʼɔ ntāʼa pi ji nnu nɛ, vuvuʼu shi mbɔ pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ nnu pɨphɨ ghao.
Ndɔ shiethɔ ŋa a llɔ pi po nɛ, fǔoŋ yi pɔ ŋa a yi taoŋtaoŋ, mbɔ yi taʼaŋggi, mbɔ yi juju, ŋkhwā nɔ ywɛrɛ nu nnu, ndɨnaoŋ ni kwoshɨnɨ pugu pa ntíɛŋ shiʼi, ki lɔ mbiŋ mbe, ki mbɔ ni mifɨɨ.
Mbhɛ̌ ŋa a ghà njuŋ ntíɛŋ ndɨndɨ nɛ, phī pa ghaŋ chwīe taʼaŋggi moŋ taʼaŋggi.
A chhɔ nthɔ khɔ ni fɛ̀ʼi pugu pa ŋkrɔ̀ shɨna pəɨ? A lɔ nchwīe pa yəɨ nnu ŋa pəɨ shɔ̄rɔ nu njùʼɔ pəɨ, ŋa pugu thɔ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ moŋ noŋ pəɨ nɛ?

Pəɨ tāʼa pa yaoŋ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo, nɛnnɛ, pəɨ jwi. Pəɨ shɔ̄rɔ pa yaoŋ nɔ fāʼo nu ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo, nɛnnɛ, pəɨ fɛ̄ʼi fɛ̀ʼi ndɔ ŋgwie ŋkrɔ̀. Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ tāʼa nu nɛ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nduoŋ mbhɔ Minnwi.
Pəɨ luoŋ ki Minnwi lɔ mfɛ ni pəɨ, nthɛ ŋa pəɨ luoŋ ni njùʼɔ pɨphɨ, nɔ pɨrɨ nu ŋkuoŋ wuʼɔ yəɨ pa nnu ŋa pəɨ tāʼa nu nɛ.
Pa shakhɨ moŋ piŋ pei! Pəɨ lɔ nji ŋa khwā nu pa nnu ŋkuoŋ mbhi pɔ pi ŋa pəɨ pɨ̄na Minnwi? Nthɛ yie ghɔ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a khwā nɔ chwīe nu taannu pugu pa ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ, chwīe noŋ yi mbɔ mbɨ̌na Minnwi.
Ki pəɨ gɛ̄ ŋa a pɔ pi ghagha ŋa chrà Minnwi chhu ŋa, “Minnwi shigi jijwɛ ŋa a niʼiŋ mbɨŋ pia nɛ ni tɨtɨnɨ shɔ̄rɔ nu”?
Ndɔ Minnwi ya mfāʼo pwapuŋ mbɨŋ pia, a chwīe yie chrà yi chhu ŋa,
“Minnwi lāa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu kə̄rə noŋ yugu tɔthɨ nɛ,
nōoŋ pwapuŋ yi ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu shwiʼi noŋ yugu shhɛ nɛ.”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ fɛ noŋ yəɨ ni Minnwi. P̂əɨ thi a tɨnɨ nɔ māʼaŋ nu devɨ, kaŋ a shi ntei vəɨ.
P̂əɨ chənə mbara yəɨ Minnwi, kaŋ a shi nchənə mbara yəɨ pəɨ. P̂əɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ, ma ghaŋ chwīe phɨ! Pəɨ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo paa njùʼɔ nɛ, p̂əɨ shɨ̄gao njùʼɔ yəɨ!
P̂əɨ fāʼo pəʼɨ njùʼɔ, njwei ndɔ ŋkə̄ɨ, gwɛ̀ yəɨ kara mbɔ kə̄ɨ nu, pwanjuʼɔ yəɨ kara mbɔ yuʼɔ njùʼɔ.
P̂əɨ shwiʼi noŋ yəɨ shhɛ shhɨ Taathɔ, kaŋ a shi ŋkə̄rə vəɨ tɔthɨ.

Lǐŋ paŋ, kiʼi pəɨ chrà nnu pɨphɨ nɔ ligi ŋgwa nduoŋ. Ŋoŋ ŋa a chrà nnu pɨphɨ nɔ ligi ndǐŋ vi nɛ, ki nshaʼa vi nɛ, chrà pi nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ gɨ́, ndɔ nshaʼa gɨ́ ghɔ. Ndɔ ti ɔ̈ nshaʼa gɨ́ shaʼa, a nōoŋ ŋa ɔ lɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ chwīe nu nnu ŋa gɨ́ chhu nɛ, ɔ pɔ pi ŋgaŋ shaʼa nu.
A wuʼɔ taʼa ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà mfɛ gɨ́ ndɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ sháʼa, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a nthɛ a kwe ŋoŋ ki njwi vi nɛ. Ndɔ ɔ pɔ pi gɔ̌ nɔ shaʼa nu taakuo yɔ?
Thɔ hɛiŋ ndwɛ, gɔ̀ ŋa ɔ ghà nchhu ŋa, “Shiʼa ki yua, pigi shi ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ yichəɨ laʼataoŋ, ndaʼa fɔ nɔ taʼa ŋgaʼo, pigi shi mbiʼɛ taŋ fɔ mfāʼo shéi.”
Ɔ ji ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ chɔmbhi yɔ shi mbɔ yua nɛ? Chɔmbhi yɔ pɔ nɔ mbàʼa ŋa a ghà ŋkwrī ni muuŋ tutuʼu nɛ, ŋa a pɔ nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ ndɔ ŋkiʼi mɛmmɛ nɛ.
A ka pie ŋa ɔ chhu pi ŋa, “T̈aathɔ mbiŋ, pigi chɔmbhi, nchwīe yei nnu ki nchwīe yini.”
Ndɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ, ɔ ghà ŋkwēi njùʼɔ yɔ moŋ ntintaʼo, ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ kwēi njùʼɔ pighɔ nnu pɨphɨ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ji nnu ŋa a kāʼo nɔ chwīe nu ndɔ mieŋ ki lɔ nchwīe nɛ, ni ŋoŋ ghɔ, a chwīe pi nnu pɨphɨ.
Ndwɛ, pəɨ ŋa pəɨ ghaŋ fàʼo nɛ, p̂əɨ kə̄ɨ ndɔ mbaʼo ŋgòu nthɛ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa a shi nii vəɨ nɛ!
Fàʼo pəɨ kwo fɔ̄rɔ, shə́ʼɨ kwo kru ndhwí pəɨ.
Wrukiɛŋ kwo kru pa laoŋgo pugu pa mbɨŋ pəɨ, wrukiɛŋ ghɔ lɛ mbɔ miŋkwentie nɔ wɛ̄iŋ nu vəɨ, ŋkru frɛ̀i yəɨ nɔ móŋoŋ. Pəɨ kɨrɨ pa fàʼo moŋ ndugwi llɛ́ pei.
Līi njəɨ, mbɨŋ ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu fāʼa moŋ nyìeŋ pəɨ, ki pəɨ lɔ mbe vugu nɛ, chhɔ nɛ ŋkə̄ɨ nu nthɛ vəɨ, kə̄ɨ pa ghaŋ kwōo maoŋ moŋ nyìeŋ pəɨ kwo chəɨŋ tə́nə Minnwi ŋa a Taathɔ pa shoogɛ po nɛ.
Pəɨ ni nchhɔ chɔmbhi yəɨ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ moŋ mmɛ nchhɔ shiʼi, nchwīe pa sheshe nnu ŋa pəɨ khwā nɛ, ŋkugwi noŋ yəɨ ŋgaʼo, nthɔ njwɛrɛ llɛmbhi ŋa pi shi nsho vəɨ nɛ.
Pəɨ wɛ̄iŋ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nɔ ŋgushaʼa, njwi vi ndɔ paʼa a lɔ ndɨʼɨ vəɨ.

Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ ti Taathɔ shi nuʼuŋ nthɔ. Līi njəɨ, ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ ghaŋ fāʼa nyìeŋ ghà mfāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ ti ŋkiɛŋkiɛŋ maoŋ shhɛ tɨnɨ. Pugu ghà mfāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ njwɛrɛ shhɨ mbɨ̀ pugu pa njiŋ mbɨ̀, a llɔ.
P̂əɨ ŋkaa pəɨ fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ. P̂əɨ tithi ni njùʼɔ yəɨ a tɨnɨ, nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ thɔ Taathɔ kwo para.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, kiʼi pəɨ luo nu ni noŋ pəɨ, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pi shaʼa vəɨ. P̂əɨ līi njəɨ, ŋgaŋ shaʼa sháʼa kwo thi nɛ chonda.
Nɔ lì yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ pugu pa wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, pəɨ līi mbɨŋ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchrā nɔ ligi Taathɔ nɛ.

Līi njəɨ, pigi līi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ntīi shii ntithi a tɨnɨ nɛ, ŋa mbɔrɔ yugu. Pəɨ kwo yaʼo nɔ haʼaŋ Jobo ni ntīi shii ntithi a tɨnɨ nɛ, ndɔ njəɨ nnu ŋa Taathɔ ni ntāʼa nu ŋa a lūgwi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ. Minnwi ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ, ndɨnaoŋ ni pwapuŋ.
Ndɔ yɛ ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ yi ghao nɛ, ma lǐŋ paŋ, pɔ ŋa, kiʼi ma nshwrɛ̄i kɨ̀na, kiʼi nshwrɛ̄i po ki shhɛ ki sheshe ŋkwaŋ kɨ̀na nduoŋ. “Ooŋ” yəɨ pɔ Ooŋ, “ŋga” yəɨ pɔ ŋga, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ pɔ pa ŋgushaʼa.
Shesheŋoŋ pɔ shɨna pəɨ nthɔ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ? A luoŋ Minnwi. Shesheŋoŋ vəɨ fāʼo pwatua? A yrāo ŋkhǐ ŋgaʼo Minnwi.
Shesheŋoŋ vəɨ ghɨ̌nɔ nu? A mɛ̄iŋ pa thishɨ moŋ chɔshi, pugu thɔ nduoŋ Minnwi ghɔ, njuʼɔ vi ni wru nɔ ligi Taathɔ,
luoŋ Minnwi ŋa pi luoŋ moŋ piŋ nɛ shi njɨ̄gɨ ghɨ̌nɔ ŋgaŋ ghɨ̌nɔ, Minnwi pɨʼɨ vi kúoŋ ghɨ̌nɔ, ti ä mbɔ yɛ ŋa a ni nchwīe phɨ nɛ, Minnwi līʼɛ phɨ yi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ kə̄ɨ phɨ yəɨ ni noŋ pəɨ, nduoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ni noŋ pəɨ nnɛ ŋa Minnwi chwīe pəɨ pɔ shiʼi. Luoŋ Minnwi ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ fāʼo ntou ghrɨ́ nɔ chwīe nu ntou nnu lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
Elaija ni mbɔ ŋoŋmishua nɔ pia, a ni nduoŋ Minnwi ki jwɛ ŋa kiʼi mbɨ̀ llɔ, paʼa mbɨ̀ lɔ ndhɔ nɔ trɛi ŋgaʼo ni ntɨgao nàoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.
A pɨnɨ nduoŋ kiʼɛ, po fɛ mbɨ̀, pa maoŋ shhɛ kuʼɔ.
Pa lǐŋ paŋ, taʼa ŋ̈oŋ shɨna pəɨ mfāaŋ ndaoŋ mieŋ nnu shini, yichəɨ ŋoŋ pɨnɨ ŋkwəɨ ni ju ŋkuoŋ nnu shini ghɔ,
â ji nu nɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pɨnɨ mbɨ̄nɨ ni ŋgaŋ phɨ ŋkuoŋ nnu shini nɛ shi ŋkwe nchə̌ɨ ŋoŋ ghɔ moŋ gu, ndɔ shi nchwīe pi līʼɛ ntou phɨ.
I Peter: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ pi mbhɔ mu Pita mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ Krishto.
M̀fɛ pi ni pa ŋgwa Minnwi ŋa a chuʼɔ nɛ. Ŋgwa pei sha, nchhɔ nu nɔ pa ghɨ̀nɨ moŋ ŋgei pa laʼataoŋ Pontu, Galashia, Kapadoshia, Eshia pugu pa Bitinia.
Minnwi Tǎa ni nji vəɨ, ndɔ nchuʼɔ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ Jijwɛ yi, nnɛ nɔ yaʼo nu nchò Jishɔ Krishto ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ yi shɨ̄gao ni chhǐ yi.
Pwapuŋ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ pɔ yəɨ ti nja njiɛŋ.

Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni Minnwi ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ Tǎa Taathɔ via Jishɔ Krishto! Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ mmɛ kwoshɨnɨ yi, a chwīe pia pɔ phi ŋkamuʼɔŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kuʼɔ nu ni Jishɔ Krishto moŋ gu. Yei chwīe pia fāʼo kwàʼa maoŋ,
nchhɔ njwɛrɛ nu nɔ fāʼo nu pa maoŋ shiʼi ŋa Minnwi shi mfɛ nɛ, ŋa a shiʼa ma mbɨrɨ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mfāʼo kɔ̀rɔ, ndɔ mbaʼa a ma ŋkhu, ŋa Minnwi nūʼɔŋ po ni pəɨ nɛ.
Maoŋ pighɔ pɔ pi yəɨ, mbɔ pəɨ ŋa ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ piŋ, Minnwi chhɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi vəɨ ni ghrɨ́ yi, ti pəɨ shi nuʼuŋ mfāʼo lūgu nu ŋa Minnwi shi nōoŋ ni pəɨ moŋ ndugwi llɛ́ nɛ.
Nthɛ pa nnu pei, pəɨ thɔ mfāʼo pwatua, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ nɔ muuŋ kuo ndɨɨ, a pie ŋa pəɨ fāʼo pəʼɨ njùʼɔ nthɛ ntou pa mooŋ nu nɛ,

nnɛ ŋa piŋ yɔ shi nōoŋ noŋ yi ŋa a ŋkiɛŋ yi, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ghà njwɛʼi laoŋgo ni móŋoŋ nɔ chwīe nu a pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ. Ndɔ piŋ yɔ ŋkiɛŋ yi nchaa laoŋgo, nthɛ ŋa laoŋgo ghà mbɨrɨ. Ndɨɨ ŋa piŋ yɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi ŋa a ŋkiɛŋ yi nɛ, kaŋ ɔ shi mfāʼo tōo nu pugu pa ndighaʼo ni ghaʼo nu ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ Krishto shi mbɨnɨ nōoŋ noŋ yi nɛ.
Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ lɔ njəɨ vi nɛ, pəɨ khwā vi. Njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ lɔ njəɨ vi ndwɛ nɛ, pəɨ piŋ vi, mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ni fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ pwatua pwapwa ŋa minthɛ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ,
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ shi mfāʼo kɨ̀nɛiŋ piŋ yəɨ, mbɔ ŋa nchə̌ɨ yəɨ lūgu.
A ni mbɔ nthɛ pi lūgu nu yei ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni ntaʼa, ndɔ mbie pɔpɔrɔ njəɨ, nchrā nthɛ fɛ́ yei ŋa Minnwi shi mfɛ ni pəɨ nɛ.

Pugu ni ŋkāa nɔ ji nu ŋa ndɨɨ ghɔ shi mbɔ pi ndɨɨ khɔ pugu pa ŋa a shi mbɔ pi ŋkwaŋ nɛiŋ. Yei ni mbɔ ndɨɨ yɛ ŋa Jijwɛ Krishto ŋa a pɔ mbɨŋ pugu nɛ ni nthɔ nshwei vugu ni ŋgəʼɨ ŋa Krishto shi ntīi shii moŋ ghɔ nɛ ŋkaoŋ ndɨɨ maa ŋkāʼo pugu pa ndighaʼo ŋa a shi njōu njiŋ yi nɛ.

Minnwi ni nōoŋ ni pugu ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼa nu nthɛ pi noŋ yugu, pugu fāʼa nthɛ pi pəɨ, nɔ haʼaŋ pi kwo chīi ndwɛ ni pəɨ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ ni pəɨ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi ŋa pi taoŋ llɔ po. Pa nnu pei ni mbɔ pa nnu ŋa njiʼi nthɛ pi ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi shigi nɔ pɛʼi nu.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ pīri njùʼɔ yəɨ nɔ fàʼa, nchhɔ ni lɨna, nūʼɔŋ ŋguoŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ ŋkuoŋ pwapuŋ ŋa pi shi nōoŋ ni pəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa Jishɔ Krishto pɨnɨ nōoŋ noŋ yi nɛ.
Nɔ puoŋ yaʼo nchò, kiʼi pəɨ yiʼi mfɛ njùʼɔ yəɨ ni ŋkwaŋ shɔ̄rɔ nu ŋa pəɨ ni mfāʼo ndɨɨ ŋa pəɨ ni mbɔ moŋ ki ji nɛ.
Ndɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ju ŋa a mɛ̄iŋ vəɨ pɔ pi yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ, p̂əɨ ŋkaa pəɨ pɔ taoŋtaoŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ mbha nnu pəɨ ghao,
ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋa, “P̂əɨ pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nthɛ ŋa mi yi taoŋtaoŋ.”

P̈əɨ ŋkə̄ɨ ghɔ nɔ Tǎa ŋa a ghà nshaʼa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao ki lɔ nōoŋ shieligi, nshaʼa pa ŋgwa pi ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ mbha nnu yugu nōoŋ nɛ, a pie ŋa nɔ pa ghɨ̀nɨ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ, p̂əɨ chhɔ pɨgəɨ chɔmbhi yəɨ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ pi ni pɔ́gɔ Minnwi,

mbɔrɔ nthɔ nji nu ŋa pi ni njuoŋ vəɨ mfuʼu moŋ mbha nnu chɔmbhi ki ghɛ̀rɛ ŋa pəɨ ni njɛʼi llɔ mbhɔ pa ŋkhu pa tǎa pəɨ nɛ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi ni pa maoŋ ŋa a ghà ndaʼa mbɨrɨ nɛ nɔ pa maoŋ tɨnɨnchuoŋ pugu pa laoŋgo.
Pi ni njuoŋ vəɨ pi ni mbwa chhǐ Krishto, mbɔ chhǐ ŋa a pɔ nɔ yi muuŋ minjɨɨ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ntəɨ ki kɔ̀rɔ nɛ.
Ŋkaoŋ Minnwi maa nchwīe mbhi, a ni ŋkwo chuʼɔ Krishto, ndɔ nōoŋ vi moŋ ndugwi llɛ́ pei nthɛ pi pəɨ,
ŋa pəɨ tɔgɔ mbhɔ yu mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ. A ni mbɨʼɨ Minnwi ghɔ mbɨʼɨ vi moŋ gu mfɛ ndighaʼo ghɔ, nnɛ ŋa piŋ yəɨ pugu pa kwàʼa yəɨ pɔ pi mbɨŋ Minnwi.
Ndwɛ ŋa pəɨ chwīe noŋ yəɨ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yaʼo nu nnu shini ndɔ nchwīe nɛ, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mfāʼo ŋkiɛŋ khwā noŋ nɔ pa lǐŋ moŋ piŋ nɛ, p̂əɨ khwā noŋ pəɨ shishiʼi ni taʼanjuʼɔ,
ŋa pi phi vəɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ, paʼa ndɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ mbhɛ̌ yaoŋ ŋa a ghà mbɨrɨ nɛ, pi phi vəɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a shiʼa njiʼi mbɨrɨ nɛ, mbɔ chrà Minnwi. Chrà ghɔ yi maoŋ ndɔ ŋkɨna ki ndugwi yi.
Nthɛ ŋa,
“Ŋguoŋ chɔmbhi ŋgwamishua pɔ pi nɔ trǔ,
ŋguoŋ ndighaʼo yugu ghao pɔ pi nɔ frawa trǔ.
Trǔ ghà mbrāo, frawa chuʼɔ ŋgū.
Ndɔ chrà Taathɔ kɨna ki ndugwi yi.”
Ndɔ chrà yei pwa pishaʼakhɔ ŋa pi ni nchīi ni pəɨ nɛ.
Nnɛ, p̂əɨ mīʼaŋ ŋguoŋ mbha nnu pɨphɨ ghao, pugu pa lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, pugu pa mbha nnu mifɨɨ, ni kighɨʼə, pugu pa chhu nu phɨ thɔ ŋgwa.
Nɔ puoŋ prɔ ŋa pi wuʼɔ ŋka phi vugu phi nɛ, p̂əɨ shigi nuaŋ nu ŋkiɛŋ pɨnɨ shiʼi mbɔ yi jijwɛ nnɛ ŋa pəɨ shi ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ lūgu nu.
Ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa, “Pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ni njwɛʼi njəɨ ŋa Taathɔ ya mbwa.”
Nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ thɔ nu njəɨ vi nɔ ŋgùʼɔ ŋa a yi maoŋ, ŋgwamishua lāa, ndɔ ŋga mbɔ ligi Minnwi nɛ, mbɔ pi ŋgùʼɔ ŋa pi chuʼɔ ndɔ mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ yi.

Pəɨ nduthɔ yəɨ pɔ nɔ pa ŋgùʼɔ maoŋ ŋa pi thɔ ŋkrao nu ŋkuʼɔ nu nɔ ghɔ nɔ nda moŋ Jijwɛ nɔ pɔ nu ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi yi taoŋtaoŋ, nɔ fɛ nu maoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa Minnwi piŋ nɛ, mbɔ yi moŋ jijwɛ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto.
Nthɛ ŋa a pɔ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi ŋa,
“Līi njəɨ, ǹūʼɔŋ ŋgùʼɔ chəɨ Shayaoŋ,
mbɔ ŋgùʼɔ nchini nda ŋa nchuʼɔ nūʼɔŋ, mbɔ ŋgùʼɔ pwapwa.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ vi nɛ
mbaʼa a lɛ ma mfāʼo lrithɔ.”
Nnɛ ndighaʼo ghɔ pɔ pi ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ piŋ nɛ, ndɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ nɛ,
“Ŋgùʼɔ yɛ ŋa
ghaŋ krao nda ni ndāa nɛ pɨnɨ mbɔ ju ndugwi ŋgùʼɔ shiʼi,”
mbɨnɨ mbɔ,
“Ŋgùʼɔ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ,
mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋgùʼɔ māʼaŋ ŋgwa shhɛ.”
Pugu kɔ̄rɔ nthɛ ŋa pugu chɨ̄ʼə chrà Minnwi, nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni nūʼɔŋ vugu ŋa pugu chwīe nɛ.

Ndɔ pəɨ pɔ pi ŋgwrɛiŋgwa ŋa pi chuʼɔ, mbɔ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi ndɔ mbɔ pa pifuoŋ, ŋgwa taoŋtaoŋ, ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ pi ji nɛ, ŋa pəɨ chīi ndìpwa Ju ŋa a gɛ̄ vəɨ mfuʼu vəɨ moŋ njiŋ niʼiŋ vəɨ moŋ líʼɛ pwapwa yi.
Yichəɨ ndɨɨ ni mbɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋgwa Minnwi, ndɔ ndwɛ pəɨ ŋgwa pi, yichəɨ ndɨɨ ni mbɔ paʼa pəɨ lɔ nji kwoshɨnɨ Minnwi ndɔ ndwɛ pəɨ fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ yi.
Pa ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, ǹdɨ̄gəɨ vəɨ, pəɨ nɔ pa ghɨ̀nɨ ndɔ mbɔ nɔ ŋgwa ŋa pi yōu vugu nɛ, p̂əɨ ləʼɨ pa nnu khwā nu pa nnu tɔtrɔ ŋa pugu thɔ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ pugu pa nchə̌ɨ yəɨ nɛ.

Mbha nnu pəɨ shɨna pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ pɔ yi chɨɨchɨɨ, nnɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa pugu chrā nthɛ vəɨ nɔ ghaŋ phɨ nɛ, pugu nthɛ pugu yəɨ mbha nnu shiʼi pəɨ ŋgaʼo Minnwi llɛ́ ŋa a lɛ nthɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ pi Taathɔ, p̂əɨ yaʼo nchò ŋguoŋ pa thishɨ ŋa ŋgwamishua nūʼɔŋ nɛ. Yaʼo nchò fùoŋ Roma, mbɔ mmɛ taathɔ,
njaʼo nchò ghaŋ shaʼa ŋgwa nɔ ŋgwa ŋa Minnwi tɔgɔ mbɔ fùoŋ Roma ntaoŋ vugu nɔ fɛ nu njɔ́ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chwīe phɨ nɛ, ndɔ mbɨnɨ ŋgaʼo ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chwīe shiʼi nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ, ŋa pəɨ kie ŋkuoŋ chwīe nu shiʼi, nchri chrà ki ji ŋa pa nàna ghà nchrā nɛ.
P̂əɨ chhɔ chɔmbhi yəɨ nɔ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pa kǔna, ndɔ ki lɔ ndɔ̄gɔ ji nu ŋa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pa kǔna nɛ ŋkuru pi nnu pɨphɨ nɔ ghɔ, pəɨ chhɔ pi nɔ puoŋ fàʼa Minnwi.
P̂əɨ ghaʼo ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao. Ŋkhwā pa lǐŋ moŋ piŋ, mfāʼo pɔgɔ Minnwi, ŋgɨnɔ fùoŋ Roma.
Pa puoŋ fàʼa, p̂əɨ yaʼo mbhɔ taathɔ pəɨ ni ŋguoŋ ghaʼo nu ghao, njaʼo nchò yugu ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi pɛ taathɔ ŋa pugu ŋgwa shiʼi mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋgwa juju nɛ, njiʼi nthɛ pi pi pɨphɨ ŋkaa pugu.
Minnwi shi mfɛ mbɔrɔ ni pəɨ nthɛ yie, nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ntīi shii moŋ ŋgəʼɨ ki mbhɔ yəɨ lɔ mbɔ nɔ ghɔ, nthɛ pi ŋa pəɨ ji nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ shi nshei pi khɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ nchwīe phɨ, pi wie vəɨ, pəɨ tīi shii moŋ ghɔ? Ndɔ ti p̈əɨ nchwīe shiʼi pi wie vəɨ, Minnwi fāʼo pwatua ni pəɨ nthɛ yie.
Nthɛ ŋa pi gɛ̄ vəɨ nthɛ pi yei, nthɛ ŋa Krishto ni njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ vəɨ, mieŋ lì ni pəɨ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ chuʼɔ chhɨkwo yi.
A shini ndɔ nchwīe phɨ, ndɔ paʼa kaŋ taʼa chrà mifɨɨ lɔ mbɔ nchò yu.
Ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni ŋgwɛʼi vi nɛ, a shini ndɔ nduʼu, ndɨɨ ŋa a ni njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nɛ, a shini ndɔ ŋgūru ŋoŋ, a ni ŋguʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ mfɛ noŋ yi ni Minnwi, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nshaʼa ŋgwa ni ndɨndɨ nɛ.
Ju nduthɔ yi ni ntiɛŋ phɨ yia mbɨŋ yu ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nnɛ ŋa pia khu nthɛ phɨ, mbɔ yi maoŋ moŋ ndɨndɨ. Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pa fɨ́ pi, ghɨ̌nɔ yəɨ pɔ yi yɨ̄gɨ.
Pəɨ ni nchhɔ fāaŋ ndaoŋ nɔ pa minjɨɨ, ndɔ ŋkwo pɨ̄nɨ ndwɛ njəɨ ŋkɛ̄ʼi vəɨ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ lɨna ni nchə̌ɨ yəɨ.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, pa piŋgɛ láŋ, p̂əɨ yaʼo nchò laoŋ pəɨ, nji ŋa s̈hesheŋoŋ vugu mieŋ ki lɔ mbiŋ chrà Minnwi, a nthɛ pugu shi ŋkara mbiŋ pi wuʼɔ nɔ yəɨ nu mbha nnu ŋgwɛ pugu, pi ki pəɨ lɔ nchrā nnu,
ndɨɨ ŋa pugu yəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ mbha nnu pəɨ yi yaʼo nchò ndɔ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ.
Kiʼi chwīe nu noŋ yəɨ pɔ pi yi ŋgrào noŋ nɔ pa paʼa nu thɔ, pa gwɛ nu shɨ́ga tɨnɨnchuoŋ, ki ŋkwaŋ ndhwí ŋa pəɨ māʼaŋ nu nɛ.
Chwīe nu noŋ yəɨ mbwa pɔ pi yi moŋ njùʼɔ, mbɔ yɛ ndìpwa ŋa a shiʼa ma mbɨrɨ nɛ, mbɔ yi jijwɛ juju pugu pa yi chichhi. A yie ŋa a pwa ligi Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ piŋgɛ taoŋtaoŋ llɛshhɨ, ŋa pugu ni nūʼɔŋ kwàʼa yugu mbɨŋ Minnwi, ni nchhɔ nchwīe noŋ pugu mbwa, tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yaʼo nu nchò laoŋ pugu,
wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Shera ni njaʼo nchò Abrahaŋ ti nchhɔ mɛ̄iŋ vi pi ni taathɔ. Ndɔ pəɨ pa puoŋ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ nchhɔ nchwīe shiʼi ki lɔ mbɔgɔ sheshe yaoŋ.

Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, pimbia, p̂əɨ chhɔ pəɨ pa gwɛ pəɨ moŋ ŋkwaŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a kāʼo nɛ, ni ji nu ŋa pugu shi lɔ ntɨnɨ nɔ pəɨ. Ŋgaʼo vugu nthɛ ŋa pəɨ pugu shi mfāʼo fɛ́ chɔmbhi ŋa Minnwi shi mfɛ nɛ kaʼa. Pəɨ chwīe nnɛ nji ŋa kiʼi luoŋ Minnwi yəɨ fāʼo kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ.
Nɔ lūgwi nu, p̂əɨ pɔ ni taʼa nchò, mfāʼo kwoshɨnɨ ni noŋ pəɨ, mfāʼo khwā noŋ shɨna pəɨ, ni njùʼɔ pɔpɔrɔ ndɔ mfāʼo jū noŋ.
Kiʼi nduʼu phɨ ni phɨ, ki wɛ́ʼi ni wɛ́ʼi, ndɔ ka luʼu pi ni mbɔrɔ, nthɛ ŋa mbɔrɔ yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkāʼa nɔ fɛ nu vɛ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ŋgɛ̄ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa,
S̈hesheŋoŋ ntāʼa nu mfāʼo nchhɔ́ shiʼi ndɔ njəɨ pa nnu shiʼi ŋa a thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ,
kiʼi pa chrà pɨphɨ taoŋ nchò yu, ki pa chrà lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ,
a pāʼa ŋkǔnu yi ni phɨ ndɔ nchwīe shiʼi,
a shigi ghɨghrɨ ndɔ njōu njiŋ yi.
Nthɛ ŋa ligi Taathɔ pɔ mbɨŋ pa ŋgwa ndɨndɨ a lɔ mbɨnɨ njaʼo luoŋ Minnwi yugu.
Ndɔ Taathɔ ghà mbɨrɨ ligi yi ni pa ghaŋ chwīe phɨ.
A shi mfɛ gɔ̌ ŋgəʼɨ ni pəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ shigi chwīe nu shiʼi?
Ndɔ p̈əɨ njiʼi njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ chwīe nnu ŋa a kāʼo nɛ Minnwi fɛ mbɔrɔ ni pəɨ. Kiʼi pəɨ pɔgɔ shesheŋoŋ, ndɔ kiʼi njùʼɔ yəɨ ghana vəɨ.
Ndɔ p̂əɨ ghaʼo Krishto nɔ Taathɔ moŋ njùʼɔ pəɨ, mbīri noŋ yəɨ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ nɔ fɛ nu khwɛ̀ ni shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pie vəɨ ni nnu nthɛ kwàʼa ŋa pəɨ fāʼo mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ,
ndɔ p̂əɨ chwīe ni juju pugu pa pɔ́gɔ. Ŋ̂gaŋthɔ yəɨ pɔ yi shieshie, nnɛ ŋa pi nchhu nnu pɨphɨ thɔ pəɨ, lrithɔ wɛ̄iŋ ŋgwa pighɔ ŋa pugu wɛʼi mbha nnu shiʼi yəɨ moŋ Krishto nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a pwa nɔ yəɨ nu ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ chwīe nu nnu shiʼi nɔ haʼaŋ a mbɔ nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ, nchaa yəɨ nu ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ nchwīe nu phɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa Krishto ni njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ
ŋkaa yu taʼa ŋgɛ́ nthɛ phɨ, mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nɔ ligi ŋgwa pɨphɨ, nnɛ nɔ thɔ nu ni pia njəɨ Minnwi nɔ ghɔ. Pi ni njwi vi moŋ frɛinoŋ, ndɔ pi chwīe a pɔ yi maoŋ moŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi
Moŋ Jijwɛ ghɔ, a ni ŋgə̄ɨ nchīi chrà ni pa jijwɛ ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ chə́ɨŋ nɛ,

mbɔ pa jijwɛ ŋa pugu ni ma ntɨnɨthɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni nthɔ mfāʼo wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ moŋ llɛmbhi Noa, nɔ haʼaŋ pi ni nthɔ nchwīe ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ pie ŋa pɔ nɔ nda nɛ, ŋa shɨgɛi ŋgwa, mbɔ fúoŋ ŋgwa, ni ndūgu moŋ ghɔ ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ.
Ŋa a ni mbɔ lì nchhɔ nōoŋ kwe ŋkhǐ ŋa a lūgu ni pəɨ ndwɛ, ki lɔ mbɔ pi nɔ yaoŋ fuʼu nchhí mbɨŋ noŋ, ndɔ a pɔ pi píe ni Minnwi nɔ chwīe nu ŋgaŋthɔ yia pɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ
, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kuʼɔ nu Jishɔ Krishto moŋ gu.
Jishɔ Krishto yei ŋoŋ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ po, nchhɔ ŋgei mbhɔ Minnwi yi jɨ, nthɔ nshaʼa pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pugu pa thishɨ moŋ po pugu pa ghaŋ njɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa Krishto ni njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ, p̂əɨ pīri noŋ yəɨ moŋ taʼa ŋkwaŋ pīʼi nu, nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ lɔ nuʼuŋ nchhɔ nu moŋ phɨ.
Llɔ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ, pəɨ chhɔ pɨgəɨ chɔmbhi yəɨ ŋkuoŋ mbhi hɛiŋ ki lɔ nthɔ nchwīe pi nnu haʼaŋ ŋgwamishua shɔ̄rɔ nu nɛ, pəɨ chwīe pi nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa a tɔgɔ nɛ kwo yiɛŋ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa pa ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi khwā nɔ chwīe nu nɛ. Pəɨ ni nchhɔ chɔmbhi tɔtrɔ, nshɔ̄rɔ njùʼɔ, mbaa làʼo, ŋgə̄ɨ nu moŋ pa lɨʼɨ jɨ ki tou, pa lɨʼɨ nnu làʼo, niʼiŋ noŋ yəɨ moŋ wuwuru ghaʼo nu pa nnwi.
Moŋ ŋguoŋ pa nnu pei, pugu ghà ŋgrāo ŋa pəɨ lɔ nuʼuŋ ntūru pəɨ pugu nɔ chwīe nu pa nnu ŋa a shi mbɨrɨ vəɨ pɨrɨ nɛ, nnɛ pugu chhu phɨ thɔ ghɔ,
ndɔ pugu shi ntaa noŋ yugu ni Minnwi, ŋa a pīri noŋ yi nɔ shaʼa nu ŋgwa maoŋ pugu pa ŋgwa khu nɛ.

Nthɛ yei nnu, pi chīi ŋkɨ̀nɨ pwa pishaʼakhɔ njiʼi nthɛ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khu nɛ, ŋa njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pi shaʼa vugu moŋ frɛinoŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pi ghà nshaʼa ŋgwamishua nɛ, minthɛ pugu fāʼo chɔmbhi moŋ jijwɛ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi ghà nchhɔ nɛ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa yaoŋ ghao shi ndugwi nɛ kwo para, nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ fāʼo wɛ̄iŋ noŋ, nchhɔ ni lɨna məɨ nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ luoŋ Minnwi.
Ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ nnu ŋa a nchaa ŋguoŋ yi nɛ pɔ ŋa p̂əɨ khwā noŋ pəɨ ni taʼanjuʼɔ, nthɛ ŋa khwǎ ghà ŋkuru ntou phɨ.
P̂əɨ ghrā maoŋ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nda pəɨ nɛ shɨna pəɨ ki lɔ nduo nu.
Nɔ ŋkiɛŋ pa ghaŋ lɨna ni pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ fɛ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, ŝhesheŋoŋ ghɛ̄rɛ vichəɨ ni ŋkiɛŋ yaoŋ fɛ́ ŋa Minnwi fɛ ghɔ nɛ.

Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chrā nɛ, chrā nɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a chhu pi pa ŋkɨ̀nɨ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼa nu nɛ, fāʼa nɔ haʼaŋ a fāʼa pi ni ghrɨ́ ŋa Minnwi fɛ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa moŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao, Minnwi shi mfāʼo ndighaʼo yi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ ju ŋa ndighaʼo pugu pa ghrɨ́ pɔ pi ji ki ndugwi yi nɛ. A pɔ nɛnnɛ.
Ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ, kiʼi pəɨ ghrāo tɨtɨnɨ mōoŋ nu ŋa a nii vəɨ nɔ mōoŋ nu vəɨ, pi nɔ haʼaŋ a thɔ ndɔ̄gɔ yichəɨ ŋgɨ̀nɨ nnu ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Ndɔ pəɨ ka fāʼo pi pwatua ŋa pəɨ fāʼo yəɨ ghrà ŋgəʼɨ ŋa Krishto ni njəɨ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ fāʼo pwatua pugu pa pwanjuʼɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Krishto shi mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nthɔ moŋ ndighaʼo yi nɛ.
P̈i ŋgwɛʼi vəɨ nthɛ pi ligi Krishto, kaŋ pəɨ fāʼo mbɔrɔ, nthɛ ŋa Jijwɛ ndighaʼo pugu pa yi Minnwi pɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
Ndɔ kiʼi shesheŋoŋ vəɨ yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ pi ŋa a njwi ŋoŋ, ki ŋgɨna, ki ŋgūo nnu mbɨmbhɨ, ki chəɨŋkichini.
Ndɔ ti s̈hesheŋoŋ vəɨ njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ pi ŋa a Krishitɛŋ, kiʼi a fāʼo lrithɔ, a fɛ pi ndighaʼo ni Minnwi ŋa a piŋ ligi Krishto.
Nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ shaʼa kwo kāʼo, ndɔ pi fǔoŋ njɛ̄ shaʼa pi moŋ mbaanda Minnwi. Ti ä njɛ̄ pi ni pia, kaŋ a shi mbɔ pi nɛiŋ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ pwa pishaʼakhɔ Minnwi nɛ?
Nɔ haʼaŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi chhu ŋa,
“Ä ŋgaʼa ni ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nɔ lūgu nu,
kaŋ shwéi yi shi mbɔ pi nɛiŋ ni pa ghaŋ ki ghaʼo Minnwi, pugu pa ghaŋ phɨ?”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ŋgwa pɛ, ŋa pugu yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ ŋa a nnu ŋa Minnwi tāʼa nu nthɛ vugu nɛ, fɛ nchə̌ɨ yugu ni Minnwi mbuoŋ vugu ŋa a kàʼa ki fɨ̄ɨ, nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ghə̄ɨ shhɨ nthɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa a kāʼo nɛ.

Nɛnnɛ, m̀āʼaŋ ghrɨ́ pa thishɨ ŋa pugu thɔ njɛʼi ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ nɛ, nɔ yichəɨ taʼa nthishɨ ŋa a ghà njɛʼi ŋgwa ndɔ mbɔ miŋkwentie pa ŋgəʼɨ Krishto ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a shi mfāʼo ghrà moŋ ndighaʼo ŋa pi shi nōoŋ nɛ,

ŋa p̂əɨ kɛ̄ʼi minjɨɨ Minnwi shɨna pəɨ, ndɨna ni pugu ki lɔ nthɛ pi ŋa pi yīʼi vəɨ yīʼi, ndɔ a pɔ pi moŋ khwā njùʼɔ yəɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi tāʼa nu ŋa pəɨ chwīe nɛ, ki lɔ mbɔ nthɛ pi njùʼɔ mbɨŋ, mbɔ nthɛ pi khwā njùʼɔ nɔ fàʼa.
Ki lɔ nthɔ nshaʼa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pəɨ lɨna nu ni pugu nɛ, pəɨ nōoŋ pi lì ni pa minjɨɨ pighɔ.
Ndɨɨ ŋa Taathɔ pa Ŋkɛ̄ʼi Minjɨɨ thɔ nɛ, pəɨ shi mfāʼo ŋkie ndighaʼo ŋa a shiʼa ma ŋkhu nɛ.

Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, p̂əɨ ŋa pəɨ pa mikəʼɨ nɛ, yaʼo nchò pa thishɨ ŋa pugu yɛʼi ŋgwa nɛ. Ŋguoŋ vəɨ ghao pɔ pa ghaŋ jū noŋ ni noŋ pəɨ nthɛ ŋa, “Minnwi lāa ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu kə̄rə noŋ yugu tɔthɨ nɛ, nōoŋ pwapuŋ yi ni ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu shwiʼi noŋ yugu shhɛ nɛ.”
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ shwiʼi noŋ yəɨ shhɛ shhɨ Minnwi ŋa a fāʼo njɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ nu vəɨ nɛ, nji ŋa ndɨɨ shi ŋga ŋkāʼo, a kə̄rə vəɨ tɔthɨ.
P̂əɨ thɔ nchaʼa ŋguoŋ pa lrì pəɨ mfɛ nu ghɔ nthɛ ŋa a ghà ndɨna ni pəɨ.
P̂əɨ chhɔ ni lɨna məɨ, nchhɔ njra nu. Mbɨ̌na vəɨ, mbɔ devɨ, nyīeŋ nu nɔ paʼo ŋa a wara nu, nthɔ ntāʼa ŋoŋ nshāa vi.
Ndɔ p̂əɨ lɨʼɨ vi, nthi a tɨnɨ moŋ piŋ yəɨ, nji nu ŋa ŋkwaŋ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa pəɨ tɔgɔ nu moŋ ghɔ nɛ, pa lǐŋ pəɨ moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao tɔgɔ nu moŋ ghɔ ŋkaa pugu.

Pəɨ shi ŋga ŋkwo yəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ, Minnwi ŋa a fāʼo ŋguoŋ pwapuŋ, ŋgɛ̄ vəɨ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo yəɨ ghrà ndighaʼo yi ŋa a lɔ mfāʼo ndugwi yi moŋ Krishto nɛ, ju nduthɔ yi shi nchwīe pəɨ kāʼo, ntuoŋ vəɨ, māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yəɨ ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchwīe pəɨ thi shiʼi.
Ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ ghao, ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao pɔ pi ji ki ndugwi yi. A pɔ nɛnnɛ.
Shaila

, ndǐŋ via, ŋa minthɛ ŋoŋ yɨʼə noŋ yi mbiŋ yu nɔ haʼaŋ njəɨ nɛ, ghɛ̄rɛ a nɔ nāʼaŋ nu muuŋ kuo ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei. Ǹthɔ māʼaŋ ghrɨ́ yəɨ ndɔ nchhu nu ni pəɨ ŋa yei pwapuŋ Minnwi shishini. Pəɨ thi moŋ ghɔ a tɨnɨ.
Yichəɨ taʼa chɔshi nɔ yəɨ ŋa a pɔ Babiloŋ nɛ, ŋa pi chuʼɔ vi ŋkaa yu nɛ māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ. Maaku muuŋ a māʼaŋ chrà yəɨ ŋkaa yu.
P̂əɨ chrā ni noŋ pəɨ ni paŋ nu nɔ nōoŋ nu khwǎ ghaŋ piŋ.
Ghɨghrɨ pɔ mbɨŋ ŋguoŋ vəɨ ghao ŋa pəɨ pɔ moŋ Krishto nɛ.
II Peter: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ mbhɔ mu Shemu Pita, mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ Krishto ŋgə̄ɨ nu ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo piŋ ŋa a taʼa ŋkwaŋ pugu pa yigi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ndɨndɨ Minnwi via ndɔ mbɔ ŋkwe via, Jishɔ Krishto nɛ.
Ǹduoŋ ŋa Minnwi pīgi pwapuŋ yi pugu pa ghɨghrɨ yi ni pəɨ moŋ ji nu vi pugu pa Jishɔ Taathɔ via.

Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ njɨ yi nɔ Minnwi, a fɛ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pia fāʼo nɔ chhɔ nu chɔmbhi pɔgɔ Minnwi. Pia fāʼo ŋguoŋ maoŋ pei ghao ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ji nu mi, mbɔ ju yɛ ŋa a gɛ̄ via ŋa pia thɔ njəɨ vi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ndighaʼo yi pugu pa mbha nnu shiʼi.
Ntɔgɔ pi moŋ yei shɛndaoŋ, a fɛ pa mbwa kàʼa pugu pa kàʼa liɛŋ ni pia, nnɛ ŋa ŋkie ŋkuoŋ pa kàʼa pighɔ minthɛ pəɨ tei pɨrɨ nu ŋa a pɔ moŋ mbhi nthɛ khwǎ phɨ nɛ, mfāʼo púoŋ ŋa a pɔ nɔ yi Minnwi.
Nthɛ yei nnu, paʼo ni ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́ yɔ ghao nɔ pīgi nu mbha nnu shiʼi ŋkuoŋ piŋ, ŋkuoŋ mbha nnu shiʼi yɔ pīgi ji nu nnu,
ŋkuoŋ ghɔ pīgi wɛ̄iŋ noŋ, ŋkuoŋ wɛ̄iŋ noŋ pīgi tiishii, ŋkuoŋ tiishii pīgi pɔgɔ Minnwi,
ŋkuoŋ pɔgɔ Minnwi pīgi khwǎ moŋ piŋ, ŋkuoŋ khwǎ moŋ nda piŋ pīgi khwǎ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.
Nthɛ ŋa p̈əɨ mfāʼo pa mbha nnu pei ndɔ ŋkuʼɔ moŋ ghɔ mbīgi ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ, kaŋ pəɨ shi nji Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto moŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa a shi nchwīe pəɨ fāʼa shishiʼi ndɔ njuŋ ntíɛŋ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pou pa mbha nnu pei nɛ, ligi yi thɔ nchri nu ti nchəɨŋ moŋ nthɨŋkwo ŋa a lɔ nuʼuŋ njəɨ lɨʼɨ, ŋkwo līʼɛ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi shɨ̄gao vi moŋ pa phɨ ŋa a ni mbɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ ya mbaʼo nɔ nōoŋ nu ŋa Minnwi gɛ̄ vəɨ ndɔ nchuʼɔ vəɨ nɔ ŋgwa pi shini, nthɛ ŋa p̈əɨ nchwīe pa nnu pei, paʼa pəɨ lɔ ma ŋgū moŋ piŋ yəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa moŋ yei shɛndaoŋ, pi shi mfɛ ghrɨ́ ni pia nɔ nii nu moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ ki ndugwi yi, mbɔ yi Taathɔ ndɔ mbɔ ŋkwe via, Jishɔ Krishto.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ǹshi ŋguʼɔ nchhɔ ŋkwiŋ vəɨ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ni pa mbha nnu pei, njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ji ndɔ ŋkwo ya mbhi kwo yəɨ moŋ nnu shini ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɛ.
M̀bīʼi ŋa a kāʼo vəɨ nɔ kwɛ̄nɛ nu vəɨ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kwiŋ nu vəɨ, nɔ haʼaŋ ŋ̀guʼɔ mbɔ yi maoŋ nɛ,
nji nu ŋa ndɨɨ shrāo frɛinoŋ nchíʼa yei kwo para nɔ haʼaŋ Taathɔ via Jishɔ Krishto ni ŋkwo chwīe ǹji nɛ.
M̀baʼo nu ni ŋguoŋ kāa nu ghao nnɛ ŋa ǹshi ŋga mieŋ mbhi yei, pəɨ kwiŋ pa nnu pei moŋ sheshe ndɨɨ.
Pigi shini ndɔ njōu pi njiŋ mishweishwei ŋa ŋgwa pīʼi ni lɨna thɔ yugu ndɨɨ ŋa pigi ni nchwīe pəɨ ji thɔ nu Taathɔ via, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto, moŋ ghrɨ́, ndɔ ti pigi ni ŋka yəɨ pi ndighaʼo yi.
Ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi Tǎa ni mfɛ ndighaʼo ni Jishɔ Krishto ndɔ nōoŋ vi nɔ ŋoŋ ndiɛŋ nɛ, Ndighaʼo Tɛthɛ ghɔ ni nchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Yei ŋkiɛŋ Muuŋ a ŋa ŋ̀khwā, m̀fāʼo pwatua nthɛ vi.”
Pigi ŋkaa pigi ni njaʼo ŋggì yei llɔ po nthɛ ŋa pigi pugu ni mbɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra Minnwi ghɔ kaʼa, mbɔ mbra taoŋtaoŋ.

Pia fāʼo chrà ŋa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni nchhu nɛ, mbɔ yaoŋ ŋa a nthɛ ŋoŋ fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ, ŋa a pie ŋa pəɨ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɔ laŋ ŋa a kɨɨ nu moŋ njiŋ ti mbhi shi nuʼuŋ ndaŋ, líʼɛ fɨ́nəɨ muuŋ tutuʼu thɛ njùʼɔ pəɨ.
A pwa ŋa pəɨ fǔoŋ nji yei, ŋa ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi ŋa pa Njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi nāʼaŋ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi nɛ lɔ mbie ŋa ŋoŋ tūgu pi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ywɛrɛ ji nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa yichəɨ chrà llɔ mbhɔ njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi shini ndɔ mbɔ fɔ ŋa a llɔ pi moŋ khwā njùʼɔ ŋoŋmishua, ndɔ ŋgwa ni nchrā llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi nɔ haʼaŋ Jijwɛ Minnwi ni mfɛ njɨ ni pugu nɛ.

Ndɔ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ mifɨɨ ni ntaoŋ shɨna pa ŋgwa Ishrae llɛshhɨ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pa masha mifɨɨ shi ntaoŋ shɨna pəɨ nɛ, ŋa pugu shi ŋiʼaŋ nii shɨna pəɨ ni pa ntɨ́gɨ pɨphɨ ŋa a yi pɨrɨ ŋgwa nɛ, nthɔ ndāa Taathɔ ŋa a yuoŋ vugu nɛ, nnɛ Minnwi shi nshiʼi vugu pi ni tei moŋ kwo ndɨɨ.
Ntou ŋgwa shi njōu njiŋ mbha nnu tɔtrɔ yugu, nthɛ vugu, pi chrā nnu pɨphɨ nthɛ shɛndaoŋ nnu shini.
Moŋ shɔ̄rɔ nu njùʼɔ yugu, pugu shi nchīgi vəɨ ni pa chrà mifɨɨ. Minnwi ni ŋkwo pīri njɔ́ yugu ti a kāʼo, ni ŋkwo kāʼa pɨrɨ nu vugu ti a kāʼo.
Minnwi shini ndɔ mieŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi ndɨɨ ŋa pugu ni nchwīe phɨ nɛ. A ni māʼaŋ vugu moŋ móŋoŋ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pi ni nūʼɔŋ vugu moŋ chɛiŋ moŋ lɨʼɨ njiŋnjiŋ nthɔ njwɛrɛ llɛmbhi sháʼa.

Minnwi shini ndɔ mieŋ pa ŋgwa fie llɛshhɨ ŋkiɛŋ Noa ŋa a ni ŋkwe vi, mbɔ ŋgaŋ chīi nnu ndɨndɨ, pugu pa khwachəɨ ŋgwa nduoŋ. Yei ni ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ŋkuru mbhi ŋa ŋgwa ki yaʼo nchò yi ni mbɔ fɔ nɛ ni ŋkhǐ.
A ni ŋga ndaʼa, Minnwi fɛ njɔ́ ni pa laʼataoŋ Shodoŋ pugu Gomora, ntūoŋ vugu ti pugu gu phu. A ni nchwīe pugu pɔ lì nnu ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ mbɔgɔ vi nɛ.
Ndɔ Minnwi ni ŋkwe Lɔti, mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ, ŋa a ni mfāʼo tɨtɨnɨ pɨgɨ njùʼɔ nthɛ mbha nnu tɔtrɔ ŋgwa pɨphɨ.
Lɔti yei ni mbɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ. A ni nchhɔ mfāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ nthɛ pa mbha nnu pɨphɨ ŋa a ni njəɨ nu ndɔ njaʼo nu shɨna pugu lɛllɛ nɛ.
Ä mbɔ nɛnnɛ, ɔ yəɨ kiʼɛ ŋa Taathɔ ji ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a nthɛ a kwe ŋgwa haʼaŋ pugu pɔgɔ vi nɛ moŋ ghaghaʼa ndɔ mbɨnɨ nūʼɔŋ ŋgwa pɨphɨ moŋ ŋgəʼɨ nchhɔ njwɛrɛ llɛmbhi sháʼa,
mīʼɛŋ mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu thɔ nchwīe pa nnu tɔtrɔ ŋa frɛinoŋ yugu tāʼa nu nɛ ndɔ mbɨnɨ nthɔ nchɨ̄ʼə pa njɨ Minnwi nɔ shaʼa nu.
Pugu fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ pugu pa nōoŋ noŋ ndɔ ki lɔ mfāʼo pɔgɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu wɛʼi ghaŋ ndighaʼo nɛ.
Ndɔ njiʼi nthɛ pi ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, ŋa pugu fāʼo ghrɨ́ a yiɛŋ ntou yi nchaa pa masha mifɨɨ pei nɛ, lɔ njiʼi nchhu phɨ thɔ pugu, shhɨ Taathɔ.

Ndɔ ŋgwa pei chwīe nnu pi ki ywɛrɛ, nɔ pa minyieŋ ki lɔ mfāʼo lɨna ŋa pi phi vugu pi ŋa pi wɛ̄iŋ njwi. Pugu ghà nchrā phɨ ŋkuoŋ pa yaoŋ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi nji. Pi shi nshiʼi vugu ŋkaa pugu nɔ pa minyieŋ.

Pugu shi njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ, mbɔ pe ŋgəʼɨ ŋa pugu ni mfɛ nu nɛ. Pugu līi a pɔ nɔ nchhɔ́ shiʼi nɔ chwīe nu sheshe nnu ŋa a shi mfɛ pwanjuʼɔ ni frɛinoŋ yugu nɛ moŋ nthɛ minaoŋ. Pugu ya mbɔ pi ghaŋ fɛ lrithɔ pugu pa shhū noŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu tūru pəɨ pugu lɨʼɨ jɨ maoŋ nɛ, nthɔ nchwīe nchhɔ́ moŋ mbha nnu mifɨɨ pugu.

Ligi yugu shi lɔ ndīi nnu nduoŋ ntɔgɔ tāʼa nu miŋgwɛ ŋa pugu pugu shi nūaŋ nɛ, paʼa pugu lɔ ma njru ni chwīe nu phɨ, mfɨ̄ɨ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi nthi a tɨnɨ nɛ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ moŋ shìri yugu. Pugu fāʼo njùʼɔ ŋa pi yɛʼi vugu ni shɔ̄rɔ nu. Nchɔ̀nɔ pɔ mbɨŋ pugu.
Pugu mieŋ ŋkiɛŋ ndaoŋ, nii moŋ trǔ. Pugu tɔgɔ ŋkwaŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa Balaaŋ, mbɔ muuŋ Beo, ni ntɔgɔ nɛ, a ni ŋkhwā shéi pi ŋkuoŋ tɔgɔ nu shɛndaoŋ ŋa a lɔ ŋkāʼo nɛ.
Ndɔ Minnwi pɨ̄ga vi nthɛ phɨ ŋa a ni nchwīe nɛ, ŋkwɛ́iŋ, mbɔ minyieŋ ŋa a shiʼa nchrā nɛ, chrā ni ŋggì ŋoŋmishua, ndɨʼɨ nnu lɨ̀lɨŋ ŋa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi ni ntāʼa nu nchwīe nɛ.
Ŋgwa pei pɔ nɔ shaʼashhɛ ŋa ŋkhǐ lɔ njiʼi ntaoŋ nu fɔ, pugu pɔ nɔ lúluŋ ŋa fiŋ tiɛŋ nyīeŋ nu nɔ ghɔ. Pi kwo pīri lɨʼɨ ndugwi njiŋnjiŋ nūʼɔŋ ni pugu.

Nthɛ ŋa pugu chrā mɛmmɛ chrà ghagha, ŋkwēi njùʼɔ nɔ ghɔ, mbīri ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu wuʼɔ ŋkakaa nɔ taoŋ nu shɨna ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu wuʼɔ nchhɔ pi moŋ ntəɨ nɛ, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vugu ni fɨ̄ɨ nu vugu ni pa khwā nu shúoŋ.
Pugu kāʼa vugu ŋa pugu shi ntaoŋ moŋ kǔna ndɔ mbɔ pa ŋkǔna nduthɔ yugu moŋ mbha nnu tɔtrɔ. Nthɛ ŋa sheshe yaoŋ ŋa a ghaʼa ŋoŋ nɛ, ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋkǔna mbhɔ yaoŋ ghɔ.

Nthɛ ŋa, ä mbɔ ŋa ŋoŋ kwo tei pa nnu pɛ ŋa a ghà ntrao ŋoŋ moŋ mbhi nɛ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ji nu Taathɔ via, mbɨnɨ mbɔ ŋkwe via, Jishɔ Krishto, mbɨnɨ mieŋ noŋ yugu maoŋ pighɔ krao vugu ŋgaʼa vugu, kaŋ chɔmbhi ŋoŋ ghɔ pɨnɨ mbɨgɨ nchaa ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a ni fǔoŋ mbɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ.
A ni ŋka pwa ŋa pugu shi kaŋ ni ndɔ nji shɛndaoŋ ndɨndɨ, nchaa ŋa pugu ji mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkara ŋkǔnu yugu ni kɨ̀na taoŋtaoŋ ŋa pi fɛ ni pugu nɛ.
Nnu ŋa luʼɔ chrà, mbɔ nnu shini chhu nɛ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ mbɨŋ pugu, “Miŋgu ghà mfuʼu mbɨnɨ njɨ maoŋ fuʼu yi ghɔ” ndɔ “miŋkunyaŋ ghà ŋga ŋkwo shɨ̄gao noŋ yi, mbɨnɨ mbɨnɨ nūaŋ moŋ titwrɛi.”
Yei mbra ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋa ǹāʼaŋ nu mfɛ ni pəɨ ndwɛ, ma ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ. Moŋ ŋguoŋ paa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ pighɔ, ǹchhɔ ŋkwɛ̄nɛ vəɨ nɔ kwiŋ nu vəɨ nɔ fāʼo nu pīʼi nu shiʼi.
Ǹtāʼa nu ŋa p̂əɨ kwiŋ pa nnu ŋa Minnwi ni ŋkwo nōoŋ ni pa njəɨlɨʼɨ pi pi taoŋtaoŋ pugu chhu nɛ, pugu pa gɨ́ Taathɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ Ŋkwe ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Krishto ŋa pugu ni njɛʼi vəɨ nɛ.
P̂əɨ fǔoŋ nji yei nnu, ŋa moŋ pa ndugwi llɛmbhi, ghaŋ māʼaŋ kwə̀ɨŋ shi nthɔ ni māʼaŋ nu kwə̀ɨŋ yugu, nthɔ njōu njiŋ pa nnu pɨphɨ ŋa njùʼɔ yugu chhu ni pugu nɛ.
Pugu shi nchhu ŋa, “A ni ŋkāʼa ŋa a shi mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nthɔ ti a hɨŋ? Jɛ̄ fie ndɨɨ ŋa pa tǎa pia ni ŋkhu nɛ
, pa nnu wuʼɔ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni mbɔ moŋ njɛ̄ mbhi nɛ.”
Pugu līʼɛ nɔ ji nu yei nnu ŋa ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chrà Minnwi, pa po ni ŋkwo pɔ nɔ ntaaŋ ndɨɨ, shhɛ pɔ yi chwīe pi llɔ moŋ ŋkhǐ ndɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ ŋkhǐ.
Ndɔ ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ ŋkhǐ, mbɔ ŋkhǐ mbɨ̀, mbhi yɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ nɛ, ŋkhǐ ni njīe vi ndɔ shiʼi.

Ndɔ pa po pugu shhɛ yɛ ŋa a pɔ ndwɛ nɛ, wuʼɔ mbɔ ti nchəɨŋ ndwɛ nthɛ pi chrà yi ghɔ, nnɛ ŋa pi lɛ mbɨrɨ vi ni móŋoŋ, pi nūʼɔŋ vugu nthɔ njwɛrɛ llɛmbhi sháʼa mbɔ llɛ́ ŋa pi shi mbɨrɨ ghaŋ ki pɔgɔ Minnwi nɛ.
Ndɔ kiʼi pəɨ līʼɛ yei taʼa nnu, ma ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ, taʼa llɛ́ ni Taathɔ pɔ pi nɔ taʼa ŋkaŋ ŋgaʼombhi, taʼa ŋkaŋ ŋgaʼombhi pɔ pi nɔ taʼa llɛ́.

Taathɔ lɔ njiyiri nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa a kāʼa nɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pichəɨ ŋgwa līi yīri nu nɛ, ndɔ a thɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ pi njùʼɔ yi ni pəɨ ki lɔ ntāʼa nu ŋa shesheŋoŋ vəɨ shiʼi, nthɔ ntāʼa pi ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ.

Ndɔ llɛmbhi Taathɔ shi nthɔ pi nɔ haʼaŋ ŋgɨna ghà ŋgwīʼi nthɔ nɛ, pa po shi ntɔgɔ gha ni tɨtɨnɨ yɔ̄nɔ nu, pa maoŋ moŋ po kɨɨ ndɔ nshiʼi, ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pugu pa nnu ŋa ŋgwa ni nchwīe nu nɛ shi ntaoŋ lɨʼɨ wo.
Ti ŋa pi shi nshiʼi ŋguoŋ maoŋ pei moŋ yei ŋkwaŋ shɛndaoŋ nɛ, p̂əɨ pīʼi ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɔ pɔ nu nɛ. P̂əɨ fāʼo nɔ chhɔ nu chɔmbhi taoŋtaoŋ pugu pa chɔmbhi pɔgɔ Minnwi
nthɔ njwɛrɛ nu, ndɔ ŋkɔnɔ thɔ nu llɛmbhi Minnwi, mbɔ llɛ́ ŋa pi shi ntūoŋ pa po ni móŋoŋ a shūgwi, pa maoŋ po shūgwi moŋ kɨɨ nu ghɔ.
Ndɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ kàʼa yi chhu nɛ, pia thɔ njwɛrɛ po fhi pugu pa shhɛ fhi lɨʼɨ ŋa ndɨndɨ Minnwi pɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ yie, ma ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ, ŋa pəɨ thɔ njwɛrɛ nnu pei nɛ, p̂əɨ kāa nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa pəɨ pɔ shhɨ yu ki muuŋ mi tɔtrɔ, ki ntəɨ lɔ mbɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ni taʼaŋggi pəɨ pugu.
Ndɔ mbɨnɨ ndɔ̄gɔ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ Taathɔ via, nɔ shɨ̀na ŋa a fɛ nu ŋa pəɨ lūgu wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Pɔɔ, ŋkiɛŋ ndǐŋ via, ni nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ ŋkaa yu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fɨʼɨ shiethɔ ŋa pi ni mfɛ ghɔ nɛ.

Yei ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a ghà nāʼaŋ ŋguoŋ pa ŋwaʼaŋlɨ pi ghao, ndɨɨ ŋa a chrā nu nthɛ nnu pei nɛ. Pichəɨ pa maoŋ pɔ moŋ ghɔ ŋa a ghaʼa nɔ ji nu ŋa pichəɨ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ nji nnu, ndɔ ki lɔ nthi a tɨnɨ moŋ piŋ, kara nchhu nnu nduoŋ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ghà nuʼuŋ nchwīe ni pichəɨ lɨʼɨ moŋ Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ Minnwi nɛ, nnɛ mbɨrɨ noŋ yugu.
