Ndɔ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ kwo ji yei ni shhɨ nɛ, ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ lɨna nu ŋa kiʼi pi fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ ni pa nnu ntəɨ ŋgwa pɨphɨ, nnɛ mieŋ ki lɔ nuʼuŋ nthi a tɨnɨ.
Ndɔ p̂əɨ kuʼɔ nu moŋ pwapuŋ pugu pa ji nu Taathɔ via mbɨnɨ mbɔ Ŋkwe via Jishɔ Krishto. Ŋguoŋ ndighaʼo ghao pɔ ghɔ ndwɛ ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ llɛmbhi ŋa mbaʼa ndugwi yi pɔ nɛ. A pɔ nɛnnɛ.
I John: Pigi chīi yɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ ni pəɨ, mbɔ yɛ ŋa pigi ni njaʼo, mbɔ yɛ ŋa pigi ni njəɨ. Pigi ni njəɨ yie ni ligi yigi, ŋkāoŋ ni mbhɔ yigi, nthɛ chrà chɔmbhi.
Chɔmbhi ghɔ ni nōoŋ noŋ yi, pigi yəɨ, ndɔ kwe ntie yi ndwɛ, ndɔ nchīi chɔmbhi ki ndugwi yi ghɔ ŋa a ni mbɔ pugu Tǎa nɛ.
Nnu ŋa pigi ni njaʼo ndɔ njəɨ nɛ, pigi pɨnɨ nchīi ni pəɨ nnɛ ŋa pia pɔ nu kaʼa moŋ taʼanjuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pia pa Tǎa ni muuŋ vi Jishɔ Krishto kwo pɔ taʼa yi moŋ taʼanjuʼɔ nɛ.
Pigi
nāʼaŋ pei nnu nnɛ ŋa pwanjuʼɔ yigi lɨnaoŋ.
Yei ŋkɨ̀nɨ yɛ ŋa pigi yaʼo mbhɔ yu ndɔ nchīi ni pəɨ ŋa, Minnwi pɔ pi líʼɛ paʼa kaŋ shɨgɛi njiŋ lɔ mbɔ mbɨŋ yu.
P̈ia nchhu ŋa pia pugu pɔ nu kaʼa moŋ taʼanjuʼɔ ndɔ nyīeŋ nu njiŋnjiŋ, kaŋ pia lɛʼilɛʼi, ki lɔ nthɔ nchwīe pi nnu shini.
Ndɔ p̈ia nyīeŋ pi moŋ líʼɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ Minnwi nduthɔ yi pɔ moŋ líʼɛ nɛ, pia ni noŋ pia pɔ kaʼa, chhǐ Jishɔ Muuŋ vi shɨ̄gao ŋguoŋ phɨ yia ghao.
P̈ia nchhu ŋa pia lɔ mfāʼo phɨ, kaŋ pia fɨ̄ɨ pi noŋ yia, paʼa nnu shini lɔ mbɔ njùʼɔ pia.
Ndɔ ti p̈ia mbiŋ phɨ yia ndɔ njūa ni Minnwi, kaŋ A shi ndīʼɛ phɨ yia ghao ndɔ nshɨ̄gao ŋguoŋ nnu phɨ yia ghao, nthɛ ŋa a shi nūʼɔŋ kàʼa yi ŋa a chhu ŋa a shi ndīʼɛ phɨ yia nɛ, ndɔ mbɔ Minnwi ndɨndɨ.
P̈ia nchhu ŋa pia lɔ nchwīe phɨ, a nōoŋ ŋa pia chhu ŋa a Minnwi ŋgaŋ lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nnɛ paʼa chrà yi lɔ njiʼi mbɔ njùʼɔ pia.
Pa puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ, ǹchhɔ nāʼaŋ pa nnu pei ni pəɨ nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ chwīe phɨ. Ndɔ ti s̈hesheŋoŋ nchwīe phɨ, kaŋ pia fāʼo ŋgaŋ lɨ̄gəɨ ŋa a shi ndɨ̄gəɨ Tǎa mfɛ via nɔ, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ.
A ju nduthɔ yi mbɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa a fuʼu pɨgɨtua Minnwi nthɛ phɨ yia, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi yia təʼɨ via, ndɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ yi ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao ŋkaa pugu.
Minthɛ pia fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa pia ji Minnwi pi nɔ haʼaŋ p̈ia nūʼɔŋ pa kɨ̀na pi.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a chhu ŋa, “Ǹji vi,” ndɔ ki lɔ nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na yi nɛ, pɔ pi ndɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ndɔ paʼa nnu shini lɔ mbɔ njùʼɔ yu,
ndɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghà nūʼɔŋ chrà yi nɛ, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa khwǎ yɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo mbɨŋ Minnwi nɛ ya mbɔ yi kaʼokaʼo. A ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ minthɛ pia ji ŋa pia pa Minnwi taʼa yi nɛ.
P̈ia nchhu ŋa pia kɨna mbɔ pia pa Minnwi taʼa yi, a pie ŋa pia chhɔ chɔmbhi yia ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Jishɔ Krishto ni nchhɔ nɛ.
Ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, ǹdɔ njiʼi nthɔ nāʼaŋ pi kɨ̀na fhi ni pəɨ, a pɔ pi yi ndunu ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkwo fāʼo nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ. Ndunu kɨ̀na ghɔ yɛ ŋa pəɨ ni ŋkwo yaʼo nɛ.
Ndɔ ti ǹchhɔ nāʼaŋ pi kɨ̀na fhi ni pəɨ nthɛ ŋa nnu shini ŋa a pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ pi yəɨ mbɨŋ Krishto mbɨnɨ njəɨ mbɨŋ pəɨ, nthɛ ŋa njiŋnjiŋ thɔ ntɔgɔtɔgɔ, ŋkiɛŋ líʼɛ kwo thɛ nu.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chhu ŋa a pɔ moŋ līʼɛ ndɔ mbɨ̄na ndǐŋ vi nɛ wuʼɔ mbɔ moŋ njiŋ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a khwā ndǐŋ vi nɛ chhɔ pi moŋ līʼɛ, nthɛ yie ghɔ, yichəɨ nnu lɔ mbɔ mbɨŋ pia ŋa a shi nchwīe ŋoŋ nduoŋ chwīe phɨ.
Ndɔ ŋoŋ ŋa a pɨ̄na ndǐŋ vi nɛ pɔ pi moŋ njiŋ nthɔ nyīeŋ pi moŋ njiŋ ghɔ, ki lɔ nji lɨʼɨ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa njiŋnjiŋ ghɔ kwo chri ligi yi.
Ǹthɔ nāʼaŋ nu mfɛ ni pəɨ, ma pa puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ,
nthɛ ŋa pi kwo līʼɛ phɨ yəɨ nthɛ pi Jishɔ.
Ǹthɔ nāʼaŋ nu ni pəɨ, ma pa tǎa,
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ji vi, mbɔ ju yɛ ŋa a ni ŋkwo pɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ.
Nāʼaŋ nu ni pəɨ, ma pa kuoŋoŋ,
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ghaʼa ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ.
Ǹāʼaŋ nu ni pəɨ, ma pa puoŋ
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ji Tǎa.
Ǹāʼaŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ, ma pa tǎa
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ ji vi ŋa a ni mbɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ.
Ǹāʼaŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ, ma pa kuoŋoŋ
nthɛ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo njɨ,
chrà Minnwi kɨna mbɨŋ pəɨ,
ndɔ pəɨ kwo ghaʼa ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ.
Nɛnnɛ, ǹshwei vəɨ, kiʼi pəɨ khwā ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei, ki pa maoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei. S̈hesheŋoŋ ŋkhwā ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei, kaŋ a lɔ mfāʼo khwǎ mbɨŋ Tǎa.

Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi, yaoŋ ŋa frɛinoŋ tāʼa nu nɛ pugu pa yaoŋ ŋa ligi ŋoŋmishua yəɨ ŋkhwā nu nɔ fāʼo nu nɛ, pugu pa kwēi nu njùʼɔ moŋ nōoŋ noŋ nthɛ pa maoŋ ŋa ŋoŋ fāʼo nɛ, kaŋ taʼa nnu yei lɔ ndhɔ pi mbhɔ Tǎa, a pɔ pi yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi.
Ŋkuoŋ mbhi chhɔ ntɔgɔtɔgɔ pugu pa ji yaoŋ ŋa a khwā nɛ, ndɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chwīe nnu ŋa Minnwi chhu nɛ, pugu shi nchhɔ mbhi ki ndugwi yi.
Puoŋ paŋ, ndugwi yi kwo para, nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ni njaʼo ŋa mbɨ̌na Krishto thɔ nu nɛ, nɛnnɛ ntou pi kwo thɔ, nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂ia ji ŋa ndugwi yi kwo para.

Pugu ni mieŋ via ntaoŋ ni vugu, ndɔ pugu shini ndɔ nja mbɔ pi ŋgia yia, nthɛ ŋa pugu kaŋ ni mbɔ ŋgia yia, pugu kaŋ ni ŋkɨna pia pugu, ndɔ pugu ni ntaoŋ shɨna pia, nɛnnɛ, a ya nōoŋ ŋa ŋguoŋ yugu shini ndɔ mbɔ ŋgia yia.
Ju ŋa a yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ shāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi mbɨŋ ghɔ, nɛnnɛ ŋguoŋ vəɨ ji nnu shini.
Ǹāʼaŋ mfɛ ni pəɨ paʼa ndɔ nthɛ pi ŋa pəɨ shi lɔ nji nnu shini, nthɛ pi ŋa pəɨ ji, ndɔ pəɨ ŋkaa pəɨ ji ŋa lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ shiʼa ndhɔ mbhɔ nnu shini.
Ŋgaŋ lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pɔ pi gɔ̌? A ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a lāa ŋa Jishɔ shi lɔ mbɔ Ju yɛ ŋa pi Chuʼɔ vi Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ. Ŋoŋ vei ju mbɔ mbɨ̌na Krishto, mbɔ ju vɛ ŋa a lāa Tǎa mbɨnɨ ndāa Muuŋ nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lāa Muuŋ nɛ lāa Tǎa ŋkaa yu, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ Muuŋ ndɔ nchhu nɛ, piŋ Tǎa ŋkaa yu.
Ni gɔ̀, a pie ŋa yaoŋ ŋa ɔ ni njaʼo nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ kɨna njùʼɔ ghɔ. Yaoŋ ŋa ɔ ni njaʼo llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ ŋ̈kɨna njùʼɔ ghɔ, kaŋ gɔgɔ shi ŋkɨna mbɨŋ Muuŋ pugu Tǎa.
Yei yaoŋ ŋa a kāʼa via nɔ ghɔ nɛ, chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.
Ǹāʼaŋ pa nnu pei mfɛ ni pəɨ nthɛ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu tāʼa nu mfɨ̄ɨ vəɨ nɛ.

Ndɔ ni pəɨ, Jijwɛ Minnwi ŋa Krishto shāʼo mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ kɨna mbɨŋ pəɨ, nnɛ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mfāʼo chà shesheŋoŋ nɔ yɛʼi nu vəɨ. Nthɛ ŋa Jijwɛ yi yɛʼi vəɨ ni ŋguoŋ nnu ghao, yaoŋ ŋa a yɛʼi nu nɛ pɔ pi nnu shini, ki lɔ mbɔ lɛʼiŋgiɛŋ. Wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a yɛʼi vəɨ nɛ, pəɨ kɨna pəɨ pa Krishto kaʼa.
Nnɛ, ma puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ kɨna pəɨ pugu kaʼa, nnɛ ŋa a shi ŋga mbɨnɨ, pia fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ki lɔ nshūʼu mbɨnɨ njiŋ moŋ lrithɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a thɔ nɛ.
P̈əɨ nji ŋa Krishto ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ, pəɨ ji nɛ kiʼɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ghà nchwīe nnu ndɨndɨ nɛ phi Minnwi mbhi vi.
Līi njəɨ fɨʼɨ khwǎ ŋa Tǎa fāʼo mbɨŋ pia nɛ njəɨ, a mɛ̄iŋ via ni puoŋ pi, pia lɔ mbɔ yie shini. Nnu ŋa a chwīe paʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi lɔ nji via nɛ pɔ ŋa ŋkuoŋ mbhi shini ndɔ nji vi.

Ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, pia pɔ pi pa puoŋ Minnwi ndwɛ, ndɔ ti ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ ŋa pia shi mbɔ nɛ, pi lɔ naa nōoŋ ni pia yaʼa, ndɔ pia ji ŋa ndɨɨ ŋa a shi nōoŋ noŋ yi nɛ, pia shi ndɛ mbɔ nɔ ju, nthɛ ŋa pia shi njəɨ vi ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a pɔ nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chhɔ mfāʼo yei kwàʼa mbɨŋ yu nɛ chwīe noŋ yi mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ju nduthɔ yi, yi taoŋtaoŋ nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ chwīe nu phɨ a pɔ mbha nnu yi nɛ, a thɔ nchwīe pi nɔ ŋgūo nnu mbɨmbhɨ nthɛ ŋa phɨ pɔ pi mbha nnu ŋgūo nnu mbɨmbhɨ.
Pəɨ ji ŋa Krishto ni nthɔ pi nɔ shɨ̄gao nu phɨ, ndɔ paʼa phɨ lɔ mbɔ mbɨŋ yu.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a taʼa yi pugu Krishto nɛ shiʼa ndɔ̄gɔ chwīe nu phɨ a pɔ chofaʼa yi, shesheŋoŋ ŋa chwīe nu phɨ fàʼa yi nɛ lɔ naa njəɨ vi ki nji vi.
Puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ, kiʼi shesheŋoŋ fɨ̄ɨ vəɨ, shesheŋoŋ ŋa a thɔ nchwīe nnu ndɨndɨ nɛ pɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nɔ haʼaŋ juju ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa mbha nnu pi pɔ pi chwīe nu phɨ nɛ pɔ pi yi Shata. Nthɛ ŋa Shata ni ŋkwo thɔ nchwīe phɨ llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi. Nnu ŋa a ni nchwīe Muuŋ Minnwi thɔ nɛ, ni mbɔ ŋa a pɨrɨ fàʼa Shata.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a phi Minnwi mbhi vi nɛ shiʼa ndɔ̄gɔ chwīe nu phɨ a pɔ chofaʼa yi, nthɛ ŋa mbha nnu Minnwi pɔ mbɨŋ yu ti minthɛ paʼa a lɔ ŋkɨna nthɔ nchwīe phɨ nthɛ ŋa a phi Minnwi mbhi vi.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yei pinthɛ pi ji puoŋ Minnwi pugu pa yaoŋ ŋa puoŋ Shata yie nɛ. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a shiʼa njiʼi nchwīe nnu ndɨndɨ ki ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ ŋkhwā ndǐŋ vi nɛ, lɔ mbɔ yi Minnwi.
Yei ŋkɨ̀nɨ ŋa pəɨ kwo yaʼo llɔ moŋ njɛ̄ yi nɛ, ŋa p̂ia khwā noŋ pia.
Kiʼi pia pɔ pi nɔ Keiŋ ŋa a ni mbɔ yi ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ, mbɔ Shata, njwi ndǐŋ vi nɛ. A ni njwi vi nthɛ pi khɔ? Nthɛ ŋa fàʼa yi ni mbɔ yi pɨphɨ, ndɔ yi ndǐŋ vi pɔ fàʼa ndɨndɨ.
Kiʼi pəɨ ghrāo, ma pa lǐŋ paŋ, ŋa ŋkuoŋ mbhi pɨ̄na vəɨ.
Pia ji ŋa pia kwo taoŋ moŋ gu nii moŋ chɔmbhi, pia ji nthɛ ŋa pia khwā lǐŋ pia. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo khwǎ nɛ, kɨna moŋ gu.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pɨ̄na ndǐŋ vi nɛ pɔ pi njwi ŋoŋ, ndɔ pəɨ ji ŋa mbaʼa pa ghaŋ jwi ŋgwa fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ moŋ njùʼɔ pugu.
Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pia ghà nji ŋkiɛŋ khwǎ nɛ, ŋa Jishɔ ni ŋkhu nthɛ via, nthɛ yie ghɔ, a pie ŋa pia khu nthɛ pa lǐŋ pia.
Ŋ̈oŋ mfāʼo fɨʼɨ maoŋ ŋa a nthɛ a yru nɔ ghɔ shiʼi ndɔ njəɨ ndǐŋ vi moŋ pou ki lɔ nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ghɔ, kaŋ khwǎ Minnwi pɔ njùʼɔ yu pi nɛiŋ?
Puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ, kiʼi khwǎ yia wuʼɔ mbɔ pi ni nchò ki chrà. P̂ia nōoŋ nnu khwǎ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ fàʼa yia pugu pa nnu shini.
Ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ yie, pia shi nji ŋa pia ŋgia nnu shini ndɔ mfāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ shhɨ Minnwi.
N̈jùʼɔ yia ŋgwɛ̄iŋ via nɔ ŋgushaʼa, pia ji nu ŋa Minnwi chaa njùʼɔ yia ndɔ nji ŋguoŋ nnu ghao.
Ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, n̈jùʼɔ yia mieŋ ki wɛ̄iŋ via nɔ pa ŋgushaʼa, kaŋ pia fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ shhɨ Minnwi.
Ti sheshe yaoŋ ŋa pia pie mbhɔ yu nɛ kaŋ pia shi mfāʼo, nthɛ ŋa pia gha nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na yi ndɔ nchwīe nnu ŋa a pwa vi nɛ.
Kɨ̀na yi pɔ ŋa pia fāʼo piŋ mbɨŋ Muuŋ vi, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto, ndɔ ŋkhwā noŋ pia wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a fɛ gɨ́ ni p̂ia ŋa pia khwā nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na Minnwi nɛ, kɨna mbɨŋ Minnwi, Minnwi kɨna mbɨŋ yu. Pia ji ŋa a kɨna mbɔ taʼa yi pia pugu, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ Jijwɛ yi ŋa a fɛ ni pia nɛ.

Ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, kiʼi njiʼi mbiŋ pi shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chhu ŋa nnu ŋa a chhu nu llɔ pi mbhɔ Jijwɛ Minnwi nɛ, ndɔ ywɛʼi vugu nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa Jijwɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo nɛ llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi. Nthɛ ŋa ntou pa njəɨlɨʼɨ mifɨɨ pɔ moŋ mbhi shiʼa.
Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ minthɛ ɔ kie nji ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi pɔ mbɨŋ pugu nɛ. S̈hesheŋoŋ vugu mbiŋ ŋa Jishɔ Krishto ni nthɔ moŋ frɛinoŋ, kaŋ a llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi.

S̈hesheŋoŋ mieŋ ki lɔ mbiŋ ŋa Jishɔ ni nthɔ moŋ mbhi yei nɔ ŋoŋmishua, kaŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi. Ŋoŋ ghɔ fāʼo pi jijwɛ mbɨ̌na Krishto ŋa pəɨ ni njaʼo ŋa a thɔ nu, ndwɛ a kwo lɔ mbɔ moŋ mbhi nɛ.
Pa puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ, pəɨ pɔ pi yi Minnwi ŋkwo lɔ ŋgaʼa vugu, nthɛ ŋa ju ŋa a chhɔ njùʼɔ pəɨ nɛ chaa vi ŋa a pɔ moŋ mbhi nɛ.
Ŋgwa pighɔ pɔ pi yi ŋkuoŋ mbhi yei, nthɛ yie ghɔ, pugu chrā nnu pugu pi nɔ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi yaʼo vugu.
Ndɔ ti pia pɔ pi yi Minnwi. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ji Minnwi nɛ ghà njaʼo via; shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ yi Minnwi nɛ shiʼa njaʼo via. Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pia ghà ŋkie nji Jijwɛ nnu shini pugu jijwɛ mifɨɨ nɛ.
Pa ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, p̂ia khwā noŋ pia, nthɛ ŋa khwǎ llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a nōoŋ khwǎ nɛ phi Minnwi mbhi vi ndɔ a ji Minnwi.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ nōoŋ khwǎ nɛ lɔ njiʼi nji Minnwi, nthɛ ŋa Minnwi khwǎ.
Minnwi ni nōoŋ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ a khwā via nɛ, pi ni taoŋ nu fiɛŋ Muuŋ vi a thɔ moŋ mbhi, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia fāʼo chɔmbhi ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ yu.
Yei yaoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni khwǎ nɛ, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa pia ni ŋkwo khwā vi, a pɔ pi ŋa a ni ŋkhwā via ntaoŋ Muuŋ vi nɔ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ŋa a pɨʼɨ pɨgɨtua Minnwi nthɛ phɨ yia nɛ.
Pa ŋkiɛŋ lǐŋ paŋ, M̈innwi ŋkhwā via fɨʼɨ yei, a pie ŋa pia pɨnɨ ŋkhwā noŋ pia.
Chəɨ kaŋ taʼa ŋoŋ lɔ naa njəɨ Minnwi, p̈ia ŋkhwā noŋ pia, Minnwi kɨna pia pugu kaʼa, khwǎ yi pɔ yi ndɨnaoŋ njùʼɔ pia.
Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ minthɛ pia ji ŋa pia pugu kɨna kaʼa, juju kɨna pia pugu nɛ, nthɛ pi ŋa a fɛ Jijwɛ yi ni pia.
Pigi yəɨ ndɔ mbɔ pa miŋkwentie ŋa Tǎa taoŋ Muuŋ ŋa â thɔ mbɔ ŋkwe mbhi.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ ndɔ nchhu ŋa Jishɔ Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ, Minnwi kɨna mbɔ pugu yu kaʼa, juju kɨna mbɔ pugu Minnwi.
Nnɛ pia ji ndɔ mbiŋ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Minnwi khwā via nɛ.
Minnwi pɔ pi khwǎ, nnɛ ŋoŋ ŋa a kɨna nchhɔ moŋ khwǎ nɛ kɨna pugu pa Minnwi kaʼa, Minnwi kɨna pugu yu kaʼa.
Moŋ yei shɛndaoŋ pinthɛ pia ji ŋa khwǎ Minnwi lɨnaoŋ shɨna pia, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia fāʼo tɨnɨnjuʼɔ moŋ llɛmbhi sháʼa, nthɛ ŋa nɔ haʼaŋ ju nduthɔ yi pɔ nɛ, a haʼaŋ pia ŋka pia pɔ moŋ mbhi yei nɛ.
Pɔgɔ gu lɔ mbɔ moŋ khwǎ, ndɔ khwǎ ŋa a yi ndɨnaoŋ ghà njōu pɔgɔ gu. Nnɛ khwǎ lɔ ndɨnaoŋ mbɨŋ shesheŋoŋ ŋa a pɔgɔ gu nɛ, nthɛ ŋa pɔgɔ gu ghà nyīeŋ pi pugu njɔ́.
Pia ghà nōoŋ khwǎ nthɛ ŋa Minnwi fǔoŋ ŋkhwā via.
S̈hesheŋoŋ nchhu ŋa, “Ŋ̀khwā Minnwi,” ndɔ mbɨ̄na ndǐŋ vi, kaŋ a ndɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ŋkhwā ndǐŋ vi, mbɔ ŋoŋmishua ŋa yəɨ nu nɛ, nthɛ paʼa a lɔ ŋkhwā Minnwi ŋa lɔ njiʼi njəɨ nɛ.
Yei gɨ́ ŋa a fɛ ni pia: Ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a khwā Minnwi nɛ yīʼi ŋa a khwā ndǐŋ vi.
Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu piŋ ŋa Jishɔ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ phi Minnwi mbhi vugu. Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu khwā Tǎa nɛ khwā ŋoŋ ŋa a phi Tǎa mbhi vugu nɛ.
Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pia ghà nji ŋa pia khwā puoŋ Minnwi nɛ: A ndɨɨ ŋa pia khwā Minnwi nchwīe nnu ŋa pa kɨ̀na pi chhu nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa a yei mbɔ khwǎ Minnwi: ŋa pia nūʼɔŋ pa kɨ̀na pi. Ndɔ pa kɨ̀na pi pighɔ lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi lrì.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋoŋ ŋa a phi Minnwi mbhi vi nɛ, ghaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi. Yei ghaʼa nu ŋa a ghaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ, pɔ pi piŋ yia.
A gɔ̌ ŋa a ghaʼa ŋkuoŋ mbhi? Ŋkiɛŋ ju ŋa a piŋ ŋa Jishɔ pɔ pi Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ.

Yei ju ŋa a ni nthɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ kwe ŋkhǐ moŋ ŋkhǐ pugu pa chhǐ nɛ, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto, ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ ntɔgɔ pi moŋ ŋkhǐ təʼɨ vi, a ni mbɔ pugu pa chhǐ gu yi. Jijwɛ Minnwi pɔ miŋkwentie yi, nthɛ ŋa Jijwɛ Minnwi ghɔ Ju mbɔ nnu shini.
A trɛi pa miŋkwentie:
Jijwɛ, ŋkhǐ ni chhǐ. Ndɔ ŋguoŋ yi trɛi pei pɔ ni taʼaŋggi.
P̈ia mbiŋ ŋgwamishua haʼaŋ pugu pa miŋkwentie nɛ, p̂ia ji nɛ kiʼɛ ŋa Minnwi nɔ miŋkwentie chaa yie ghɔ. Yei kwe nu ntie ŋa Minnwi kwe ntie Muuŋ vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo piŋ mbɨŋ Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ fāʼo miŋkwentie yei njùʼɔ yu. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ Minnwi nɛ chwīe Minnwi pɔ ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ, nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ mbiŋ nnu ŋa Minnwi chhu nthɛ Muuŋ vi nɛ.
Yei nnu ghɔ ŋa Minnwi chhu nɛ: Minnwi fɛ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ ni pia. Chɔmbhi yei pɔ pi mbɨŋ Muuŋ vi.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ fāʼo chɔmbhi. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo chɔmbhi.
Ǹāʼaŋ nnu pei mfɛ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ piŋ Muuŋ Minnwi nɛ, nnɛ ŋa pəɨ ji ŋa pəɨ fāʼo chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.
Yei tɨnɨnjuʼɔ ŋa pia fāʼo mbɨŋ Minnwi nɛ, ŋa p̈ia mbie sheshe yaoŋ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ a tāʼa nu nɛ, kaŋ a shi njaʼo via.
Ŋa p̈ia nji ŋa a ghà njaʼo via moŋ ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa pia pie vi nɔ nɛ, pia pɨnɨ nji ŋa a shi mfɛ yaoŋ ŋa pia pie nu nɛ.

S̈hesheŋoŋ njəɨ ndǐŋ vi a thɔ nchwīe phɨ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ndugwi moŋ gu moŋ jijwɛ nɛ, a luoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ghɔ, Minnwi fɛ chɔmbhi ghɔ, mbɔ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chwīe phɨ ŋa mbaʼa a yiʼi ndugwi moŋ gu nɛ. Yichəɨ phɨ pɔ ŋa a ghà ndugwi pi moŋ gu, ǹdɔ njiʼi mfɛ pi gɨ́ ŋa pi luoŋ Minnwi mfɛ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chwīe ŋkwaŋ phɨ ghɔ nɛ.
Ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa a lɔ ŋkāʼo nɛ pɔ pi phɨ, ndɔ phɨ pɔ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ndugwi moŋ gu jijwɛ.
Pia ji ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a phi Minnwi mbhi vi nɛ shiʼa ŋgə̄ɨ shhɨ nchhɔ nchwīe phɨ, nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Minnwi shi ndɨʼɨ vi, nnɛ mbaʼa ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ, mbɔ Shata, kāoŋ vi.
Pia ji ŋa pia llɔ pi mbɔ Minnwi, ndɔ ŋguoŋ mbhi ghao pɔ pi mbhɔ ŋoŋ mbɨmbhɨ.

Pia ji ŋa Muuŋ Minnwi thɔ ndɔ mfɛ shiethɔ ni pia, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pia ji Minnwi, mbɔ ju ŋa a yi shini nɛ. Pia pɔ moŋ ju ŋa a yi shini nɛ, moŋ Muuŋ vi, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto. A ju mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ Minnwi shini mbɔ chɔmbhi ki mmɛ.
Pa puoŋ mi puoŋ paŋ, pə̂ɨ ləʼɨ ghaʼo nu pa nnwi.
II John: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ pi mbhɔ mu, Jouŋ, mbɔ nthishɨ moŋ chɔshi, ŋgə̄ɨ nu mbhɔ miŋgwɛ yei ŋa pi chuʼɔ vi nɛ, pugu pa puoŋ pi ŋa ŋ̀khwā moŋ nnu shini, ndɔ ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ mbɔ pi mmu təʼɨ a. Ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ŋa pugu ji nnu shini nɛ khwā vəɨ ŋkaa pugu,
nthɛ nnu shini ŋa a kɨna mbɨŋ pia, ndɔ shi mbɔ kaʼa ki ndugwi yi nɛ.
Pwapuŋ ni kwoshɨnɨ ni ghɨghrɨ pɔ ni pia llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi Tǎa pugu Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ muuŋ Tǎa, moŋ nnu shini pugu pa khwā.
Njùʼɔ a pwa ti ŋgaʼa nɔ yəɨ nu ŋa pichəɨ pa puoŋ pɔ chhɔ nu moŋ nnu shini wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ Tǎa ni mfɛ gɨ́ ni pia nɛ.
Ndwɛ ǹchhɔ mbie ghɔ, ma ŋkiɛŋ miŋgwɛ vei, a lɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋa ǹchhɔ nāʼaŋ pi kɨ̀na fhi mfɛ nu ni pəɨ, a wuʼɔ yɛ ŋa pia ni mfāʼo llɔ nɔ njɛ̄ yi nɛ, ŋa p̂ia khwā noŋ pia.
A yei mbɔ khwǎ, ŋa p̂ia chhɔ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ kɨ̀na yi chhu nɛ. Yei kɨ̀na yi, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ni njaʼo moŋ njɛ̄ yi nɛ, ŋa p̂əɨ chhɔ moŋ khwǎ.
Ntou pa ŋgwa mifɨɨ kwo taoŋ moŋ mbhi, mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbiŋ ŋa Jishɔ Krishto thɔ moŋ frɛinoŋ nɛ. Ŋkwaŋ ŋoŋ vei pɔ pi ŋgaŋ mifɨɨ mbɔ mbɨ̌na Krishto.
Pəɨ lɨna ni noŋ pəɨ, nji ŋa mbaʼa pəɨ phɛ yaoŋ ŋa pia kwo fāʼa nɛ, nji ŋa minthɛ pia fāʼo kɨ̀nɛiŋ ti a lɨnaoŋ.
Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ shhɨ ki lɔ ŋguʼɔ ŋkɨna pi ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ ŋa Krishto yɛʼi nɛ, lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo Minnwi. Ŋoŋ ŋa a kɨna moŋ yaoŋ ŋa Krishto yɛʼi nɛ, fāʼo Tǎa pugu muuŋ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ, ki lɔ nthɔ pi ni ntɨ́gɨ yei, kiʼi pəɨ piŋ vi nda pəɨ, ki nchrā ghɔ,
nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chrā ghɔ nɛ, pɔ pi pakwo pi moŋ fàʼa pɨphɨ yi.
M̀fāʼo ntou nnu nɔ shwei nu vəɨ nɔ ghɔ, ndɔ m̀baʼa njiʼi nāʼaŋ nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ, ǹshi ŋka khwā pi nɔ kra nu vəɨ, nchrā ni pəɨ pia thɔ njəɨ ligi, nnɛ ŋa pwanjuʼɔ yia lɨnaoŋ.
Puoŋ ndǐŋ ghɔ yi miŋgwɛ ŋa pi chuʼɔ vi nɛ, māʼaŋ chrà yɔ.
III John: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ pi mbhɔ mu, Jouŋ, mbɔ nthishɨ moŋ chɔshi, ŋgə̄ɨ nu mbhɔ Gayu ŋa ŋ̀khwā shishini nɛ.
Ŋkiɛŋ ndǐŋ a, ǹduoŋ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa nnu tɔgɔ shiʼi, pugu pa ŋa ɔ fāʼo noŋ nyieŋ ntɨnɨ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ pa nnu nyīeŋ nu shishiʼi ni nchə̌ɨ yɔ nɛ.
Mi ni mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ŋkiɛŋ ntou yi ndɨɨ ŋa pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ ni nthɔ nshwei a ni fɨʼɨ niʼiŋ njùʼɔ ŋa ɔ fāʼo ŋkuoŋ nnu shini nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ shishini ɔ chhɔ nu moŋ nnu shini nɛ.
Ǹdɔ njiʼi mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ a yiɛŋ nchaa yei: yaʼo nu ŋa pa puoŋ paŋ chhɔ nu moŋ nnu shini.
Ŋkiɛŋ ndǐŋ a, ɔ ya mfāʼo taʼanjuʼɔ ni fɨʼɨ fàʼa ŋa ɔ fāʼa nu mbɨŋ pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ haʼaŋ pugu pɔ pi pa ghɨ̀nɨ nɛ.
Pugu ni nchīi ni ŋgwa moŋ chɔshi fɨʼɨ khwǎ ŋa ɔ ni nōoŋ ni pugu nɛ. A shi mbɔ nnu shiʼi nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ ŋgɛ̄rɛ vugu nɔ haʼaŋ a nshi mfɛ pwanjuʼɔ ni Minnwi nɛ ndɨɨ ŋa pugu llɔ nyìeŋ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pugu nyīeŋ pi nɔ ligi Taathɔ ki lɔ njiʼi nthɔ mbiŋ ŋkwe sheshe yaoŋ mbhɔ ghaŋ ki piŋ Minnwi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, a pie ŋa pia ghɛ̄rɛ ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa pei, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pia ŋkaa pia pɔ ghaŋ fàʼa moŋ yɛʼi nu nnu shini.
Ŋ̀kwo nāʼaŋ yaoŋ mfɛ ni chɔshi, ndɔ Diotrefɛ ŋa a khwā nɔ nūʼɔŋ nu noŋ yi shhɨ nɛ shiʼa ŋkhwā nɔ yaʼo nu mbhɔ pigi.

Ǹshi ŋga nthɔ hɛnɛ, kaŋ ǹshi ntaoŋ ni pa nnu pɛ ŋa a chwīe nu nɛ páa, pa nnu wuwuru ŋa a chrā nthɛ vigi nɛ. Nɔ haʼaŋ pei nnu wuʼɔ ŋkɨgəɨ kɨgəɨ, a pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ndāa nɔ chhu nu thɔ a pwa ni ghaŋ piŋ, ndɔ mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ndāa ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu tāʼa nchhu ŋa pugu thɔ a pwa ni pugu nɛ, ti mfuʼu vugu fuʼu moŋ chɔshi.
Ŋkiɛŋ ndǐŋ a, kiʼi pəɨ pīni nnu pɨphɨ. P̂əɨ pīni pi nnu shiʼi. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a chwīe nnu shiʼi nɛ, pɔ pi yi Minnwi. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa chwīe nnu pɨphɨ lɔ naa nji Minnwi.

Shesheŋoŋ chrā nnu shiʼi nɔ ligi Demetriu. A gha nchhɔ chɔmbhi yi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ nnu shini Minnwi chhu nɛ, yei nōoŋ ŋa a ŋkiɛŋ ŋoŋ. Pigi ŋkaa pigi, pīgi nchhu yigi nnu shiʼi nthɛ vi, ɔ ji ŋa nnu ŋa pigi chhu nɛ nnu shini.
M̀fāʼo ntou nnu nɔ chhu nu vɛ, ndɔ paʼa ǹdɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu nāʼaŋ nāʼaŋ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ.
Ŋ̀kwāʼa nɔ yəɨ nu ghɔ moŋ kuo ndɨɨ yei, pɔgɔ yəɨ ligi nchrā.
Minnwi fɛ ghɨghrɨ vɛ. Ŋguoŋ pa shuoŋ pɔ hɛiŋ māʼaŋ chrà yɔ. Chrā ni ŋguoŋ pa taannu pɔ, pa taʼa taʼa.
Jude: Ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei llɔ mbhɔ mu Jude, mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa Jishɔ Krishto mbɨnɨ mbɔ ndǐŋ Jɛiŋ, ŋgə̄ɨ nu ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa Minnwi, mbɔ Tǎa, gɛ̄ vugu, ndɔ ŋkhwā vugu, nūʼɔŋ ni Jishɔ Krishto nɛ.
Ǹduoŋ ŋa Minnwi nōoŋ ntou kwoshɨnɨ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ pugu pa khwǎ ni pəɨ.

Ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ mi ni nthɔ ŋkhwā nu nɔ nāʼaŋ nu ŋwaʼaŋlɨ mfɛ ni pəɨ nthɛ taʼa ŋkwaŋ lūgu nu ŋa pia fāʼo nɛ, ŋki yəɨ ŋa a pie ŋa ǹāʼaŋ nɔ māʼaŋ nu ghrɨ́ yəɨ ŋa p̂əɨ wie ŋkrɔ̀ nthɛ piŋ ŋa pi ni mfɛ ni pia, mbɔ ŋgwa Minnwi taʼa ŋgɛ́ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao nɛ.

Nthɛ ŋa pichəɨ ŋgwa ŋiʼaŋ nii ki pi lɔ nji, mbɔ ŋgwa ki pɔgɔ Minnwi ŋa pugu liŋ ŋkɨ̀nɨ nthɛ pwapuŋ Minnwi via nnɛ nɔ lɨʼɨ nu mbha nnu tɔtrɔ yugu. Ŋgwa pei lāa Jishɔ Krishto fiɛŋ Masha via ndɔ mbɔ Taathɔ. Pi ni ŋkwo nāʼaŋ
fie ndɨɨ ŋa ŋgwa pei shi mfāʼo njɔ́.
Ǹtāʼa nu mbɨnɨ ŋkwiŋ vəɨ, njiʼi nthɛ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ji ŋguoŋ nnu yei ŋa Taathɔ
ni ŋga ŋkwo kwe laʼataoŋ Ishrae llɔ moŋ laʼataoŋ Ijipti, ndɔ ŋga ndaʼa, nshiʼi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ mbiŋ nɛ.

Pəɨ kwiŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pɛ ŋa pugu shini ndɔ ŋkɨna moŋ lɨʼɨ yɛ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo njɨ fɔ nɛ, mīʼaŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo nɔ chhɔ nu nɛ, Minnwi krao vugu ni chɛiŋ nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ, nūʼɔŋ moŋ mmɛ njiŋnjiŋ nthɔ njwɛrɛ mmɛ llɛmbhi sháʼa.

Kwiŋ laʼataoŋ Shodoŋ pugu Gomora pugu pa pichəɨ pa laʼataoŋ yəɨ pugu, ŋa pugu ŋkaa pugu ni mfɛ noŋ yugu ni kwoshuoŋ pugu pa mbha nnu tɔtrɔ nɛ, pugu ni njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ njɔ́ móŋoŋ ki ndugwi yi nɔ lì ni ŋguoŋ ŋgwa.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ, ŋgwa pei ŋkaa pugu, yɨʼə noŋ yugu pi kúoŋ nnu ŋa njə̀ɨŋ yugu nōoŋ nɛ, nnɛ mfuo frɛinoŋ yugu ni shúoŋ, nchɨ̄ʼə njɨ ŋa Minnwi nūʼɔŋ nɛ ndɔ ŋgwɛʼi pa ghaŋ ndighaʼo.

Ndɔ ndɨɨ ŋa nthishɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, mbɔ Maikə, ni nshūu nu pugu Shata ndɔ ndōu nu nthɛ khu Mushi nɛ, a shini ndɔ njiʼi mbīʼi nɔ chrā nu chrà nchɨʼəshə nɔ shaʼa nu Shata, ndɔ a ni chhu pi ŋa, “Taathɔ pɨ̄ga ghɔ.”
Ndɔ ŋgwa pei gha ŋgwɛʼi ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi nji nɛ, ndɔ pa nnu pɛ ŋa pugu ji ki lɔ mbīʼi nɔ pa minyieŋ nɛ, pa nnu pighɔ gha mbɨrɨ vugu.

Wuwuru ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pugu. Nthɛ ŋa pugu yōu njiŋ ŋkwaŋ mbha nnu Keiŋ, pugu mīʼaŋ noŋ yugu nchwīe pa ntəɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Balaaŋ ni nchwīe nɛ nɔ fāʼo nu shéi, ndɔ nshiʼi ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ Kora ni shiʼi nɛ nthɛ tɨnɨthɔ.

Pa ŋgwa pei pa thɔ mitwɛʼi njó lɨʼɨ jɨ khwǎ yəɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu jɨ maoŋ pəɨ pugu ki lɔ mfāʼo pɔ́gɔ, ŋguʼɔ ndɨna pi ni noŋ yugu, pa lúluŋ ki mbɨ̀ ŋa fɨfrəɨ tiɛŋ nyīeŋ nu nɔ ghɔ, mbɔ nɔ pa thɨ ŋa a lɔ njuŋ ntíɛŋ moŋ ndɨɨ kwo ntíɛŋ nɛ, pa thɨ ŋa pi kwo shūʼɔ vugu llɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋǐeŋ yugu ti pugu kwo khu.
Pugu pɔ nɔ fiŋ tɨtɨnɨ thɔ ŋkhǐ, pa mbha nnu lrithɔ pugu thɔ nōoŋ noŋ yi nɔ faʼofaʼo fiŋ ghɔ. Pugu pɔ nɔ pa fɨ́nəɨ ŋa pugu fiŋ nu nɛ, Minnwi kwo nūʼɔŋ njiŋnjiŋ ki ndugwi yi ni pugu.
A ni ŋguʼɔ mbɔ nthɛ pi pa nnu pei ŋa Enoke mbɔ khwachəɨ ŋgwrɛiŋoŋ llɔ mbɨŋ Adaŋ ni njəɨ nnu llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi nchhu ŋa, “Līi njəɨ, taathɔ thɔ nu nɛ pugu pa wuŋ ŋkaŋ
ŋgwa pi pi taoŋtaoŋ

nɔ shaʼa nu ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ndɔ mfɛ njɔ́ ni ŋguoŋ pa ghaŋ ki pɔgɔ Minnwi nthɛ pa mbha nnu ki fāʼo pɔ́gɔ Minnwi haʼaŋ pugu chwīe nu nɛ, pugu pa chrà pɨphɨ ŋa pa ghaŋ ki pɔgɔ Minnwi mbɔ pa ghaŋ phɨ chrā nu nthɛ vi nɛ.”
Ŋgwa pei ghà ŋguʼɔ ma nthɔ nduoluo, ghaŋ yūa shwieshwie, nthɔ njōu njiŋ pa nnu pɨphɨ haʼaŋ njùʼɔ yugu tāʼa nu nɛ, pugu chrā ni nōoŋ noŋ nthɔ mfɨ̄ɨ ŋgwa ni chrà lɨlɨŋ nnɛ nɔ tāʼa nu shɨ̀na yugu.
Ndɔ p̂əɨ kwiŋ pa nnu ŋa pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Taathɔ via, mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto, ni nchhu ni pəɨ nɛ.
Pugu ni nchhu ni pəɨ ŋa, “Moŋ ndugwi llɛ́, pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ kwə̀ɨŋ shi mbɔ, nthɔ njōu njiŋ pa nnu ki pɔgɔ Minnwi ŋa pugu shɔ̄rɔ nu nɛ.”
Yei pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu thɔ nthɔ nu ni pa minduoŋnduoŋ nɛ, mbɔ pa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ mbhi, ki lɔ mfāʼo Jijwɛ Minnwi mbɨŋ pugu.
Ndɔ ni pəɨ, ma ŋkiɛŋ pa lǐŋ paŋ, p̂əɨ kɨna nchhɔ ŋkugwi noŋ yəɨ ŋkuʼɔ nu moŋ yaoŋ yɛʼi taoŋtaoŋ ŋa pa ghaŋ piŋ thi ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ nduoŋ nu moŋ ghrɨ́ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
P̂əɨ nūʼɔŋ noŋ yəɨ moŋ khwǎ ŋa Minnwi fāʼo mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ ywɛrɛ kwoshɨnɨ Taathɔ via mbɔ Jishɔ Krishto nɔ fɛ nu chɔmbhi ki mmɛ ni pəɨ nɛ.
P̂əɨ fāʼo kwoshɨnɨ mbɨŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo khuthɔ nɛ.
Ŋkwe pichəɨ ŋgwa, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ jā nu vugu mfuʼu moŋ móŋoŋ, ndɔ nōoŋ kwoshɨnɨ ni pichəɨ moŋ pɔ́gɔ, nchhɔ mbɨ̄na phɨ pighɔ haʼaŋ a trao chɔmbhi yugu nɛ.
Ni ju ŋa a fāʼo njɨ nɔ tuo nu vəɨ ki pəɨ lɔ ŋgū, nthɔ ni pəɨ ki kɔ̀rɔ lɔ mbɔ mbɨŋ pəɨ shhɨ ndighaʼo yi ni ntou pwanjuʼɔ.

Ni fiɛŋ Minnwi Ŋkwe via, ntɔgɔ pi mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto, mbɔ Taathɔ via, pɔ ndighaʼo, ni chɨɨchɨɨ, ni ghrɨ́ pugu pa njɨ, llɔ ndɨɨ ŋa a ni ŋkwo ma ntɔgɔ nɛ pugu pa ndwɛ, ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa ndugwi yi lɔ mbɔ nɛ! A pɔ nɛnnɛ.
Revelation of John: Yei pa nnu ŋa Jishɔ Krishto ni nōoŋ, ŋa Minnwi ni mfɛ ghɔ ŋa a nōoŋ ni pa puoŋ fàʼa pi, mbɔ pa nnu ŋa a tɔthɔ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ nɛ. Jishɔ ni ntaoŋ pi ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nchwīe Jouŋ muuŋ fàʼa yi ji pa nnu pei.
Jouŋ ni nchhu ŋguoŋ nnu ŋa a yəɨ nɛ. Nnu pighɔ ni mbɔ chrà llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi pugu pa nnu ŋa Jishɔ Krishto ni nchhu shishini nɛ.
Mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a mɛ̄iŋ chrà nnu nōoŋ yei ŋggì yi taoŋ nɛ, mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yaʼo ndɔ nchwīe pa nnu ŋa a pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ para.
Ŋkɨ̀nɨ llɔ mbhɔ Jouŋ ŋgə̄ɨ mbhɔ khwachəɨ chɔshi ŋa a pɔ moŋ Eshia nɛ.
Pwapuŋ pugu pa ghɨghrɨ pɔ ni pəɨ llɔ mbhɔ ju yɛ ŋa a pɔ, ndɔ ni mbɔ, ndɔ mbɔ nɔ thɔ nu pugu pa llɔ mbhɔ khwachəɨ jijwɛ ŋa a pɔ yəɨ faaŋ yi nɛ,
pugu pa llɔ mbhɔ Jishɔ Krishto mbɔ miŋkwentie ŋa a ghà ŋguʼɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ pi nɔ haʼaŋ a yəɨ nɛ, mbɔ fǔoŋ ŋoŋ nɔ kuʼɔ nu moŋ gu, mbɔ ŋgaŋ shaʼa ŋguoŋ pa fùoŋ ghao moŋ mbhi.
Ni ju ŋa a khwā via, ŋkwe via llɔ moŋ pa phɨ pia ntɔgɔ pi moŋ chhǐ yi,
ndɔ nchwīe via pia pɔ pa ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ moŋ Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi yi mbɨnɨ mbɔ Tǎa vi nɛ, ŋguoŋ ndighaʼo ghao pugu njɨ ki ndugwi yi pɔ ghɔ. A pɔ nɛnnɛ.
Līi njəɨ, a thɔ nu nɛ moŋ lúluŋ,
ŋguoŋ ligi ghao shi njəɨ vi,
njiʼi nthɛ pi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchwɛʼi vi nɛ,
ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ghao shi mbɔ ni tuʼuthɔ nthɛ vi.
A haʼaŋ a lɛ mbɔ nɛ. A yie.
Minnwi Taathɔ chhu ŋa, “Mi njɛ̄ yi ndɔ mbɔ ndugwi yi, mbɔ ju ŋa a pɔ, ni mbɔ, ndɔ shi nthɔ, ju ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ njɨ nɛ.”

A mmu, Jouŋ ndǐŋ vəɨ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ kwo yəɨ moŋ ŋgəʼɨ pugu pa Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi pugu pa wɛ̄iŋ nu njùʼɔ moŋ tiishii ŋa pia tɔgɔ nu moŋ ghɔ nɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ Jishɔ. Pi ni nūʼɔŋ a ŋkuoŋ muuŋ ŋkǔnu ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Pamo titri ŋkhǐ nthɛ ŋa ŋki chīi chrà Minnwi pugu pa ŋa ǹchhu nnu shini ŋa a pɔ nthɛ Jishɔ nɛ
Mi ni mbɔ moŋ Jijwɛ moŋ llɛmbhi Taathɔ, njaʼo mmɛ ŋggì njiŋ mu nɔ ntàŋ,
a chhu nu ŋa,
“Nāʼaŋ nnu ŋa ɔ shi njəɨ nɛ moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ntaoŋ ni khwachəɨ chɔshi pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ laʼataoŋ Ɛfɛshɔ, ni Shimaina, ni Pegamuŋ, ni Tiatira, ni Shadi, ni Filadefia, ni Laodeshia nɛ.”
Nnɛ ŋ̀kara nɔ yəɨ nu ŋggì ghɔ ŋa a ni nchrā nu vəɨ nɛ. Ŋ̀ga ŋkara, njəɨ khwachəɨ yaoŋ tigi laŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni laoŋgo.
Titri pugu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ ni mbɔ nɔ muuŋ ŋoŋmishua, māʼaŋ mmɛ ntaaŋ ndhwí, ŋgwara laoŋgo a tiri nɔ njùʼɔ yi.
Ŋgiithɔ yi fugu nɔ frǔ fhu, mbɨnɨ mfugu nɔ wěi. Ligi yi pɔ nɔ lɨŋ móŋoŋ.
Kwo mi pɔ nɔ yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ tɨ́nɨ ŋa pi tūoŋ moŋ móŋoŋ ndɔ njuʼɔ a lɨɨ. Ŋggì yi pɔ nɔ ntou ŋkhǐ ŋa a khīi ŋkhɔ̄ nu.
A tuo khwachəɨ ndigi fɨ́nəɨ ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ. Kafa chəchɨgəɨ ŋa a fāʼo paa ŋgei nɛ taoŋ nchò yu. Miŋi mi pɔ nɔ minaoŋ ŋa a ya nthɛ nu shiʼi.
Mi ni ŋga njəɨ, ŋgū shhɨ yu nɔ haʼaŋ ŋkukhu. Ndɔ a nūʼɔŋ mbhɔ yi yi jɨ mbɨŋ mu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Kiʼi mbɔgɔ gu. A mmu mbɔ fǔoŋ yi ndɔ mbɔ ndugwi yi,
mbɔ ju ŋa a yi maoŋ nɛ. Mi ni ŋkhu, ndɔ līi njəɨ, mi yi maoŋ ki ndugwi yi, ndɔ mfāʼo chuʼɔ fɨ̀nɨ gu pugu pa lɨʼɨ ŋgwa khu.
“Nthɛ yie ghɔ, nāʼaŋ pa nnu ŋa ɔ yəɨ nɛ, pa nnu pɛ ŋa a pɔ ndwɛ nɛ, pugu pa nnu ŋa a shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ndɨɨ nduoŋ nɛ.

Ndɔ nɔ pa nnu lə̄ɨŋ nthɛ khwachəɨ fɨ́nəɨ pɛ ŋa ɔ ni njəɨ ŋgei mbhɔ a yi jɨ nɛ, pugu pa khwachəɨ yaoŋ tigi laŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni laoŋgo nɛ, khwachəɨ fɨ́nəɨ pighɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ni khwachəɨ chɔshi pighɔ, khwachəɨ yaoŋ tigi laŋ pɔ khwachəɨ chɔshi pighɔ.”
“Nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chɔshi moŋ Ɛfɛshɔ: ‘Pei pa chrà ju yɛ ŋa a tuo khwachəɨ fɨ́nəɨ ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ, ŋa a thɔ nyīeŋ nu shɨna khwachəɨ yaoŋ tigi laŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni laoŋgo nɛ.

“ ‘Ǹji mbha fàʼa pəɨ, fɨʼɨ wie noŋ yəɨ ni fɨʼɨ wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ yəɨ moŋ tiishii, pugu pa fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ minthɛ paʼa pəɨ lɔ mieŋ shɨ̀na ni ŋgwa pɨphɨ, pəɨ kwo ywɛʼi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu mɛ̄iŋ noŋ yugu ni pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbɔ yie ghɔ nɛ, njəɨ ŋa pugu ghaŋ mifɨɨ.
Ǹji ŋa pəɨ thɔ ntīi shii, ŋgwɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ, njəɨ ŋgəʼɨ nthɛ ligi a, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋkɨna.
“ ‘Ndɔ m̀fāʼo yei nnu nɔ krɛ̄i nu vəɨ nɔ ghɔ. Pəɨ mīʼaŋ khwǎ yɛ ŋa pəɨ ni mfǔoŋ mfāʼo nɛ.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ kwiŋ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ nɔ haʼaŋ pəɨ gū nɛ, mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ, mfāʼa fàʼa yɛ ŋa pəɨ ni mfǔoŋ mfaʼa nu nɛ, kiɛŋ nnɛ kaŋ ǹshi nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ mbɨʼɨ yaoŋ tigi laŋ yəɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ yi.
Ndɔ pəɨ fāʼo yei taʼa nnu: pəɨ pɨ̄na mbha fàʼa pa ghaŋ younjiŋ yaoŋ yɛʼi Nikolou, ŋa mummu pɨ̄na ŋkaa mu nɛ.
“ ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo nnu ŋa Jijwɛ chhu ni pa chɔshi nɛ. Ni ŋoŋ ŋa a māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa nɛ, ǹshi mfɛ njɨ ghɔ nɔ jɨ nu ntíɛŋ llɔ ŋkuoŋ thɨ chɔmbhi, ŋa a pɔ moŋ nyìeŋ Minnwi nɛ.’
“Nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chɔshi moŋ Shimaina: ‘Pei pa chrà fǔoŋ yi ndɔ mbɔ ndugwi yi ŋa a ni ŋkhu mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ ŋkuʼɔ mfāʼo chɔmbhi nɛ.

“ ‘Ǹji pa ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ pəɨ pugu pa pou yəɨ ndɔ pəɨ ghaŋ fàʼo. Ǹji pa nnu pɨphɨ ŋa pi chhu thɔ pəɨ nɛ, mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhu ŋa pugu pɔ pi pa ŋgwa Juu ndɔ paʼa ndɔ mbɔ yie ghɔ nɛ. Pugu pɔ pi kɨrɨ Shata.

Kiʼi pəɨ pɔgɔ ŋgəʼɨ ŋa a thɔ nu nii vəɨ nɛ. Pəɨ līi njəɨ, Shata tāʼa nu māʼaŋ pichəɨ shɨna pəɨ moŋ chə́ɨŋ, ŋa pi ywɛʼi vəɨ, ndɔ pəɨ shi mbɔ moŋ ŋgəʼɨ nɔ wuŋ llɛmbhi. P̈əɨ nthi a tɨnɨ ti nchəɨŋ nthɨŋkwo khu nu, kaŋ ǹshi mfɛ ŋkie chɔmbhi ni pəɨ.
“ ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo nnu ŋa Jijwɛ chhu ni pa chɔshi nɛ. Ŋoŋ ŋa a māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa nɛ, mbaʼa mbra gu kāoŋ vi.’
“Nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chɔshi moŋ Pegamuŋ: ‘Pei pa chrà ju yɛ ŋa a fāʼo kafa chəchɨgəɨ mbɔ yi paa njiŋ nɛ.

“ ‘Ǹji lɨʼɨ ŋa pəɨ chhɔ nɛ, lɨʼɨ ŋa faaŋ Shata pɔ nɛ. Ndɔ pəɨ wuʼɔ ŋkɨna nchhɔ njaʼo nchò. Pəɨ shini ndɔ ndāa piŋ yəɨ mbɨŋ mu njiʼi nthɛ pi moŋ pɨɨ ndɨɨ ŋa pi ni njwi Antipa, mbɔ miŋkwentie a, mbɔ ŋgaŋ taʼanjuʼɔ. Pi ni njwi vi shɨna pəɨ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ Shata chhɔ nɛ.

“ ‘Ndɔ m̀fāʼo shɨgɛi pa nnu nɔ krɛ̄i nu vəɨ nɔ ghɔ. Pəɨ fāʼo pichəɨ pa ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ hɛnɛ ŋa pugu thi pi ŋkuoŋ pa nnu ŋa Balaaŋ ni njɛʼi nu nɛ, ŋa a ni njɛʼi Balake ŋa a nūʼɔŋ kɨʼɨŋgɨnɨ shhɨ pa puoŋ Ishrae, nnɛ ŋa a nthɛ pugu jɨ maoŋ ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, ndɔ mbɨnɨ ŋkwo shúoŋ.
Wuʼɔ nɛnnɛ pəɨ pɨnɨ mfāʼo pichəɨ pa ŋgwa shɨna pəɨ ŋa pugu thɔ njōu njiŋ yaoŋ yɛʼi Nikolou.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, p̂əɨ pāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ. Ndāa nɛnnɛ, kaŋ ǹshi nthɔ njəɨ vəɨ shɨna kuo ndɨɨ, māʼaŋ vugu ni nchhɔ̀ ni kafa ŋa a taoŋ nchò mu nɛ.

“ ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo nnu ŋa Jijwɛ chhu nu ni pa chɔshi nɛ. Ni ŋoŋ ŋa a māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa nɛ, ǹshi mfɛ yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ jɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni mana ŋa pi ni ndə̄ɨŋ nɛ ghɔ. Mbɨnɨ mfɛ muuŋ ŋgùʼɔ fhu ghɔ, ni ligi fhi ŋa pi nāʼaŋ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ ŋa shesheŋoŋ lɔ njiʼi nji ŋkiɛŋ ju ŋa a kwe nɛ.’
“Nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chɔshi moŋ Tiatira: ‘Pei pa chrà Muuŋ Minnwi, ŋa a fāʼo pa ligi a pɔ nɔ lɨŋ móŋoŋ nɛ, kwò mi pɔ nɔ yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ tɨ́nɨ ŋa pi yúʼɔ a lɨɨ nɛ.
“ ‘Ǹji mbha fàʼa yəɨ, fɨʼɨ khwǎ yəɨ, piŋ yəɨ, fàʼa ghɛ̀rɛ yəɨ pugu pa wɛ̄iŋ nu njùʼɔ yəɨ moŋ tiishii, pugu pa ŋa pəɨ fāʼa ndwɛ nchaa haʼaŋ pəɨ ni mfǔoŋ mfāʼa nu nɛ.

“ ‘Ndɔ m̀fāʼo yei nnu nɔ krɛ̄i nu vəɨ nɔ ghɔ, pəɨ mieŋ miŋgwɛ yinɛ mbɔ Jeshebe ŋa a mɛ̄iŋ noŋ yi ni njəɨlɨʼɨ, ndɔ nthɔ njɛʼi nu, ndɔ mfɨ̄ɨ puoŋ fàʼa paŋ ŋa pugu nii moŋ nnu shúoŋ, ndɔ njɨ pa maoŋ ŋa pi fɛ̄ʼi pa nnwi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Mi ni mfɛ ndɨɨ ghɔ ŋa a pāʼa ŋkǔnu yi, ndɔ a lāa pāʼa nu ŋkǔnu yi ni nnu kwoshuoŋ.
“ ‘Līi njəɨ, ǹshi māʼaŋ vi kúoŋ ghɨ̌nɔ, māʼaŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pugu pɔ nu moŋ shúoŋ nɛ moŋ tɨtɨnɨ ŋgəʼɨ, kaŋ a nɛiŋ pugu pāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni mbha fàʼa miŋgwɛ ghɔ.
Ǹshi mbrāo puoŋ pi njwi, ŋguoŋ pa chɔshi ghao ji ŋa a mmu mbɔ ju ŋa a ji ŋguoŋ pīʼi nu ŋgwa, pugu pa njùʼɔ ŋgwa nɛ, ndɔ shi mbe shesheŋoŋ vəɨ wuʼɔ nɔ fàʼa yi ŋa a fāʼa nɛ.
“ ‘Ndɔ ni pɨgəɨ yəɨ moŋ Tiatira ŋa pəɨ lɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ yɛʼi yi ghɔ nɛ, ŋa pəɨ lɔ njɛʼi yaoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni láʼo Shata nɛ, ǹchhu ni pəɨ ŋa ǹshi lɔ nuʼuŋ nūʼɔŋ yichəɨ lrì nduoŋ mbɨŋ pəɨ.
P̂əɨ wɛ̄iŋ pi yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ fāʼo nɛ a tɨnɨ ti ǹshi nuʼuŋ nthɔ.
Ŋoŋ ŋa a māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa nɛ, ju ŋa a nūʼɔŋ pa fàʼa a ti ŋgə̄ɨ nchəɨŋ nɔ ndugwi yi nɛ, ǹshi mfɛ ghrɨ́ ni ŋgaŋ vi nɔ shaʼa nu pa laʼataoŋ.
A shaʼa vugu ni mbìe tɨ́nɨ, nshɨna vugu pa kraokrao nɔ kɨ̌ŋ nchíʼa, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mmu nduthɔ a fāʼo ghrɨ́ llɔ mbhɔ Tǎa a nɛ.
Ǹshi mfɛ fɨ́nəɨ muuŋ tutuʼu ghɔ.
“ ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo nnu ŋa Jijwɛ chhu ni pa chɔshi nɛ.’
“Nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chɔshi moŋ Shadi: ‘Pei pa chrà ju yɛ ŋa a tuo khwachəɨ Jijwɛ ni khwachəɨ fɨ́nəɨ nɛ.
“ ‘Ǹji mbha fàʼa yəɨ. Pəɨ fāʼo ŋkiɛŋ ligi ŋa pəɨ yi maoŋ, ndɔ pəɨ pɔ pi yi khu.
P̂əɨ pɨnɨ njwiŋ, njuʼu yaoŋ ŋa a piʼi nu, ntāʼa nu ŋkhu nɛ. Nthɛ ŋa ǹdɔ njiʼi njəɨ fàʼa yəɨ kāʼo ligi Minnwi a.

P̂əɨ chhɔ nɛ kiʼɛ ŋkwiŋ yaoŋ ŋa pəɨ ni mbiŋ ndɔ njaʼo nɛ. P̂əɨ nūʼɔŋ nnu ghɔ ndɔ mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ. P̈əɨ mieŋ ki lɔ njwiŋ ndɔllɔ, kaŋ ǹshi nthɔ nɔ ŋgɨna, paʼa pəɨ lɔ njiʼi nji ndɨɨ yɛ ŋa ǹshi nshwiʼi mbɨŋ pəɨ nɛ.
“ ‘Ndɔ pi wuʼɔ mfāʼo shɨgɛi ŋgwa moŋ Shadi, mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mfuo noŋ yugu. Pugu shi māʼaŋ mmɛ ndhwí fhu nyīeŋ pigi pugu kaʼa, nthɛ ŋa pugu kāʼo.
Ŋoŋ yɛ ŋa a shi māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa nɛ shi māʼaŋ ndhwí fhu nɔ pugu, nnɛ paʼa ǹdɔ ma mfuʼu ligi yi moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ chɔmbhi. Ǹshi nchhu shhɨ Tǎa a pugu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi ŋa a nyaŋ.
“ ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo nnu ŋa Jijwɛ chhu ni pa chɔshi nɛ.’

“Nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chɔshi Filadefia: ‘Pei pa chrà ju ŋa a yi taoŋtaoŋ ndɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ nnu shini nɛ, a fāʼo chuʼɔ nda ŋa a ni mbɔ yi Devi, ŋa yaoŋ ŋa a chuʼɔ nɛ, minthɛ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ mfɨ̄nɨ, ndɔ ti ä mfɨ̄nɨ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ nchuʼɔ.
“ ‘Ǹji mbha fàʼa pəɨ. Līi njəɨ, ǹūʼɔŋ chonda wo shhɨ pəɨ ŋa pinthɛ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ njiʼi mfɨ̄nɨ. Ǹji ŋa pəɨ fāʼo pi muuŋ shɨgɛi ghrɨ́, ndɔ pəɨ nūʼɔŋ a chrà a, ki lɔ ndāa a.

Līi njəɨ, ǹshi nchwīe pɛ ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ moŋ kɨrɨ Shata, ŋa pugu chhu ŋa pugu ŋgwa Juu ndɔ ki lɔ mbɔ yie ghɔ nɛ, nchhɔ ndɛʼi lɛʼi nɛ, līi njəɨ, shi nchwīe pugu thɔ ntuʼu noŋ yugu shhɨ pəɨ, pugu shi nji ŋa ŋ̀khwā vəɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ nūʼɔŋ chrà a, mbɔ chrà wɛ̄iŋ njùʼɔ pugu tīi nu shii nɛ, ǹshi ndɨna ni pəɨ moŋ ndɨɨ ŋa ghaghaʼa thɔ nu moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi nɛ, nɔ mōoŋ nu ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔ chhɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ.
“ ‘Nthɔ nu moŋ kuo ndɨɨ, wɛ̄iŋ yaoŋ ŋa ɔ fāʼo nɛ a tɨnɨ, nji ŋa mbaʼa ŋoŋ shiri ŋgáʼo yɔ ŋkwe.

Ŋoŋ ŋa a māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa nɛ, ǹshi nchwīe vi a pɔ kwìni Nda Minnwi a. Mbaʼa a lɛ ma nuʼuŋ ntaoŋ fɔ, ǹdɔ mbɨnɨ nāʼaŋ ligi Minnwi a mbɨŋ yu, mbɨnɨ nāʼaŋ ligi laʼataoŋ Minnwi a mbɔ Jerushalɛiŋ fhi, ŋa a taoŋ po nshwiʼi nu shhɛ llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi a, pugu pa ligi a yi fhi nɛ, mbɨŋ yu.
“ ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə, â yaʼo nnu ŋa Jijwɛ chhu nu ni pa chɔshi nɛ.’

“Nāʼaŋ mfɛ ni ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi chɔshi moŋ Laodeshia: ‘Pei pa chrà A yie, mbɔ miŋkwentie yɛ ŋa a ghà ŋguʼɔ nchhu pi nɔ haʼaŋ a yəɨ nɛ, ndɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ chrā nnu shini, mbɔ ŋoŋ ŋa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa Minnwi chwīe llɔ pi mbhɔ yu nɛ.
“ ‘Ǹji mbha fàʼa pəɨ: Pəɨ lɔ njiʼi ŋgrɨ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ntūoŋ. Njūa ŋa pəɨ kaŋ ni ŋgrɨ ki ntūoŋ.
Nnɛ nthɛ ŋa pəɨ kukhu, ki lɔ ntūoŋ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ ŋgrɨ nɛ, ǹshi nthu vəɨ nchò a mfuʼu.
Nthɛ ŋa pəɨ chhu ŋa, “Pigi fāʼo, pigi ya mbɔ shiʼi, pigi lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo chà!” Ndɔ ki lɔ nji ŋa pəɨ pou ŋgaʼa, a pie ŋa pi kwoshɨnɨ yəɨ, pəɨ ghaŋ pou, mbɔ ni chri ligi, ndɔ mbɔ ntii.

M̀fɛ ntɨ́gɨ nɛ ni pəɨ ŋa pəɨ yuoŋ laoŋgo ŋa pi chwīe a tɔgɔ pi moŋ móŋoŋ a ya mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ nɛ mbhɔ mu, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ pəɨ pɔ ghaŋ fàʼo. P̂əɨ yuoŋ mmɛ ndhwí fhu mbhɔ mu, nji ŋa pəɨ shi māʼaŋ mbɨŋ pəɨ ki ŋgwa lɔ nuʼuŋ njəɨ nthīi yəɨ, nthɔ ndrithɔ. Pəɨ yuoŋ fhɔ̌ ligi mbhɔ mu niʼiŋ ligi pəɨ nji ŋa minthɛ pəɨ yəɨ lɨʼɨ.
Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa ŋ̀khwā vugu nɛ, ŋ̀ga mfɛ̄ʼi vugu mbɨnɨ njuʼu vugu, nnɛ, pəɨ fāʼo ntou niʼiŋ njùʼɔ, mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yəɨ ni phɨ.
“ ‘Līi njəɨ! Ǹthi chonda ŋkwēi nu, s̈hesheŋoŋ njaʼo ŋggì a nchuʼɔ chonda, ǹii nda yu, njɨ maoŋ pigi yu, pugu jɨ pigi yu.
Ni ŋoŋ ŋa a māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa nɛ, ǹshi fɛ ghrɨ́ ghɔ a chhɔ yəɨ a ŋkuoŋ faaŋ a, wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ mummu ni māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa nchhɔ yəɨ Tǎa a ŋkuoŋ faaŋ yi nɛ.
“ ‘Ŋoŋ ŋa a fāʼo tə́nə nɛ, â yaʼo nnu ŋa Jijwɛ chhu ni pa chɔshi nɛ.’ ”
Pa nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, m̀bɛʼi, ŋga njəɨ nɛ, njəɨ chonda thi yi wo po! Fǔoŋ ŋggì ŋa mi ni fǔoŋ njaʼo a chrā nu vəɨ nɔ ntàŋ nɛ, chhu ŋa,
“Kuʼɔ hɛiŋ, kaŋ ǹshi nōoŋ pa nnu ŋa a yīʼi ŋa a lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ ndɨɨ ŋa yei ndɨɨ kwo tɔgɔ nɛ.”
Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, m̀bɔ moŋ Jijwɛ. Ǹjəɨ faaŋ thi po, yichəɨ ŋoŋ chhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ.

Ŋgaŋ ŋoŋ ghɔ ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ghɔ nɛ chiachia nɔ pichəɨ ŋkwaŋ ŋgùʼɔ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni jashipa pugu kaneliaŋ. Jijwɛ ŋguŋnnu ŋa a lɨɨ nɔ yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ ŋgùʼɔ ŋa a lɨ̄ɨ nɔ fhɔthɨ pi mɛ̄iŋ ni emera nɛ ghɨ̄ŋ vi.
Paa wuŋ faaŋ ni faaŋ yi khwɛ ghɨ̄ŋ yie faaŋ. Paa wuŋ thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ ni yi khwɛ chhɔ ŋkuoŋ pa faaŋ pighɔ, māʼaŋ pa mɛmmɛ ndhwí fhu ni pa ŋkie laoŋgo thɔ pugu.
Pa sheishei fiembɨ pugu pa miwara mbɨ̀ taoŋ nu ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ghɔ. Khwachəɨ ŋkiʼa móŋoŋ ni nthɔ ŋkɨɨ nu shhɨ faaŋ ghɔ mbɔ khwachəɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi.
Shhɨ faaŋ ghɔ yichəɨ yaoŋ ni mbɔ fɔ nɔ mmɛ ŋkhǐ ŋgrashi, nchīa nu nɔ ŋgùʼɔ chiachia.
Khwɛ mimaoŋ maoŋ ghɨ̄ŋ faaŋ ghɔ mbāoŋ, nɔ sheshe ŋgei faaŋ ghɔ. Pa ligi lɨnaoŋ mbɨŋ mimaoŋ pighɔ, shhɨ, pugu pa njiŋ.
Fǔoŋ miyaoŋ maoŋ ghɔ pɔ nɔ paʼo, mbra yi pɔ nɔ fua, yichəɨ mbra yi pɔ miŋi mi pɔ nɔ yi ŋoŋmishua, yichəɨ mbra yi pɔ nɔ mimbaʼo ŋa a yei nu.
Sheshe khwɛ mimaoŋ maoŋ pighɔ fāʼo ntɨgao pra, pra pighɔ lɨnaoŋ ni pa ligi ŋkuoŋ pugu, pugu pa moŋ pi. Ni naoŋchɨ pugu pa tuʼu paʼa pugu lɔ njiʼi mieŋ chhu nu ŋa,
“Taoŋtaoŋ, taoŋtaoŋ, taoŋtaoŋ, a Taathɔ mbɔ Minnwi
ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ njɨ nɛ, ŋa a pɔ, ndɔ ni mbɔ, ndɔ nthɔ nu nɛ.”
Sheshe ndɨɨ ŋa khwɛ mimaoŋ maoŋ pighɔ fɛ ndighaʼo pugu pa ghaʼo nu ni tōo nu ni ju ŋa a ni chhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ghɔ nɛ, ŋa a yi maoŋ ki ndugwi yi nɛ,
paa wuŋ ni khwɛ thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ pighɔ gū shhɨ yu ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ghɔ nɛ, ŋgaʼo vi, mbɔ ju ŋa a yi maoŋ ki ndugwi yi nɛ. Pugu māʼaŋ pa ŋkie pugu shhɨ faaŋ ghɔ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“A kāʼo gɔ̌, ma Taathɔ yigi, mbɔ Minnwi yigi,
nɔ kwe nu ndighaʼo, ni ghaʼo nu, ni ghrɨ́,
nthɛ ŋa ɔ ni mbuoŋ gɔ̀ mbuoŋ ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ghao,
maoŋ pighɔ wuʼɔ mbɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pwatua yɔ.”
Nnɛ ǹjəɨ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ
ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ ju ghɔ ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ghɔ nɛ. Pi nāʼaŋ yaoŋ moŋ ghɔ pugu pa ŋkǔnu yi, ndia ni khwachəɨ lěi tɨtɨnɨ.
Ǹjəɨ yichəɨ mmɛ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, a chhu ni mmɛ ŋggì ŋa, “A kāʼo gɔ̌ nɔ fēi nu ŋwaʼaŋlɨ yei, ndɔ mbāʼa lěi yei?”
Ndɔ paʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ po, ki ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ki laʼo shhɛ lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo njɨ nɔ fēi nu ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ ki ndīi moŋ yi.
Ndɔ ǹjɛ̄ kə̄ɨ nu ni njɨ nthɛ ŋa pi shini ndɔ njəɨ yichəɨ ŋoŋ ŋa a ŋkāʼo nɔ fēi nu ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ ki ndīi moŋ yi.

Ndɔ yichəɨ taʼa nthishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ ghɔ chhu vəɨ ŋa, “Kiʼi nuʼuŋ ŋkə̄ɨ. Paʼo ŋa a llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Juda, mbɔ Ŋǐeŋ Fùoŋ Devi, kwo māʼaŋ ti ŋgaʼa ti minthɛ a fēi ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ pugu pa khwachəɨ lěi ŋa pi lia nɔ ghɔ nɛ.”

Ndɔ shɨna faaŋ ghɔ pugu pa khwɛ mimaoŋ maoŋ pighɔ, pugu pa thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ pighɔ, mi ni njəɨ Muuŋ Minjɨɨ a tithi, nɔ haʼaŋ pi sho vi sho, ni khwachəɨ ndua pugu pa khwachəɨ ligi, mbɔ khwachəɨ Jijwɛ Minnwi ŋa pi taoŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ shhɛ ghao.
A ghə̄ɨ ŋkwe ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ llɔ ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ ju ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ghɔ nɛ.

A ni ŋga kwo kwe ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ, khwɛ mimaoŋ maoŋ pighɔ pugu paa wuŋ thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ ni yi khwɛ pighɔ gū shhɨ Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ, sheshe taʼa yi tuo yaoŋ paʼo lóu pugu pa kumbu ŋa pi chwīe pi ni laoŋgo, laminda lɨnaoŋ moŋ ghɔ, mbɔ luoŋ Minnwi pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ.
Pugu yrāo ŋkhǐ fhi, nchhu nu ŋa,
“A kāʼo gɔ̀ nɔ lɔ̄gɔ nu ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ
mbāʼa pa lěi ŋa pi lēi nɔ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa pi ni nsho ghɔ, ndɔ ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ yɔ
ɔ yuoŋ ŋgwa mfuʼu mfɛ ni Minnwi llɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ kɨrɨ ndaaŋoŋ pugu pa llɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ chrà taoŋtaoŋ pugu pa kɨrɨ pa ŋgwa pugu pa laʼataoŋ.
Ndɔ mbɨnɨ nchwīe vugu pugu shaʼafuoŋ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ghaŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi yia,
ndɔ pugu lɛ nshaʼa fùoŋ yugu ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.”
Nnɛ m̀bɛʼi njaʼo ŋggì ntou ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, pugu yiɛŋ ti mbɔ shia kie, ti mbɔ pi ŋkaŋŋkaŋ yugu, ŋkɨŋ faaŋ ghɔ pugu pa mimaoŋ maoŋ pugu pa yəɨ pa thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ pighɔ.
Pugu chhu nu ni mmɛ ŋggì ŋa,
“A kāʼo Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ŋa pi ni nsho vi
ŋa a kwe ghrɨ́, pugu pa fàʼo
pugu pa shiethɔ, pugu pa njɨ
ni ghaʼo nu, ni ndighaʼo, pugu pa mbɔrɔ.”
Ndɔ m̀bɨnɨ njaʼo ŋguoŋ mimaoŋ ŋa pi chwīe nɛ po pugu pa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pugu pa laʼo shhɛ pugu pa mooŋ ŋkhǐ pugu pa ŋguoŋ maoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ yugu ghao nɛ chhu nu ŋa,
“Mbɔrɔ, ghaʼo nu pugu pa ndighaʼo ni ghrɨ́ ki ndugwi yi
pɔ ni ju yɛ ŋa a chhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ nɛ,
pugu Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ.”
Khwɛ mimaoŋ maoŋ pighɔ chhu ŋa, “A pɔ nɛnnɛ!” Pa thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ pighɔ gū shhɛ ŋgaʼo vi.
Nnɛ m̀bɛʼi njəɨ ndɨɨ ŋa taʼa Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ ni mbəʼɨ mfēi taʼa lěi shɨna khwachəɨ lěi ghɔ nɛ, ǹjaʼo taʼa miyaoŋ maoŋ ghɔ chhu ni mmɛ ŋggì nɔ mbɨ̀ ŋa a wara ŋa, “Thɔ!”
Nnɛ m̀bɛʼi njəɨ minyieŋləɨ fhu! Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ tuo wùoŋ krɛ́i, pi fɛ ŋkie ghɔ a taoŋ nthɔ māʼaŋ ŋgaʼa nu, ndɔ shi ŋgaʼa.
A ni ŋga mbəʼɨ mfēi mbra lěi ghɔ, ǹjaʼo mbra miyaoŋ maoŋ ghɔ chhu ŋa, “Thɔ!”
Yichəɨ minyieŋləɨ taoŋ nthɔ, mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ yi pipie. Pi ni mfɛ njɨ ni ŋoŋ ŋa a nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ ŋa â fuʼu ghɨghrɨ llɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, nnɛ ŋa ŋgwa sho pichəɨ, pi ni mfɛ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ kafa ghɔ.
A ni ŋga mbəʼɨ mfēi yichəɨ mbra lěi ghɔ a pɔ yi trɛi, ǹjaʼo yichəɨ mbra miyaoŋ maoŋ chhu ŋa, “Thɔ!” M̀bɛʼi, njəɨ minyieŋləɨ shhi! Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ tuo paa yaoŋ fɨ̄ʼɨ yaoŋ mbhɔ yu.
Ǹjaʼo yichəɨ yaoŋ a pɔ nɔ ŋggì, moŋ titri khwɛ mimaoŋ maoŋ pighɔ, chhu nu ŋa, “Pi shi mfīni taʼa kilu
shíe gɛ ki trɛi kilu shíe
ni fɨʼɨ mbɨŋ ŋa ŋoŋ mfāʼa nɔ taʼa llɛ́ pi pe vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ. Ndɔ kiʼi njiʼi mbɨrɨ thɨ olive ŋa pi ghà nduʼu wru ni mbia yi nɛ pugu faaŋ thɨ grape ŋa pi ghà nchwīe làʼo ni ntíɛŋ yi!”
A ni ŋga nchuʼɔ yichəɨ mbra lěi a pɔ yi khwɛ, ǹjaʼo ŋggì yichəɨ miyaoŋ maoŋ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ khwɛ shɨ̀na, chhu ŋa, “Thɔ!”

M̀bɛʼi njəɨ minyieŋləɨ ŋa a lɨɨ nɔ trǔ ŋa a jɛ̄ yaoŋ nu! Ligi ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ pɔ Gu, laʼa pa khushhɛ thɔ nu njiŋ yu. Pi fɛ ghrɨ́ ni pugu nɔ fāʼo nu taʼa kaoŋ moŋ khwɛ kaoŋ mbhi. Pi ni mfɛ ghrɨ́ yei nɔ jwi ŋgwa ni kafa pugu pa njì pugu pa ghɨ̌nɔ pugu pa minyieŋ moŋ trǔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.
A ni ŋga nchuʼɔ yichəɨ mbra lěi a pɔ yi tiɛŋ, ǹjəɨ nchə̌ɨ ŋgwa laʼo lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi, mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni njwi vugu nthɛ chrà Minnwi pugu pa ŋa pugu thi tɨtɨnɨ moŋ pɔ nu pa miŋkwentie.
Pugu kə̄ɨ ni njɨ ni mmɛ ŋggì ŋa, “Yo! Taathɔ ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ ghrɨ́, mbɔ taoŋtaoŋ ndɔ mbɔ ŋgaŋ nnu shini, ɔ shi nchhɔ pi fɨʼɨ yi nɛiŋ ŋkaoŋ maa nshaʼa mfɛ njɔ́ ni ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nthɛ jwi nu vigi?”
Nnɛ pi fɛ mmɛ ndhwí fhu ni shesheŋoŋ vugu, nchhu ni pugu ŋa pugu fɛrɛ nɔ kuo ndɨɨ, ti pi nuʼuŋ njwi pichəɨ pakwo fàʼa pugu, pugu pa lǐŋ pugu ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ pi jwi vugu nɛ, ti fɨʼɨ yugu nuʼuŋ ŋkāʼo.
A ni ŋga mbɨnɨ mbəʼɨ mfēi yichəɨ taʼa lěi ghɔ a pɔ yi ntɨgao, m̀bɛʼi njəɨ shhɛ shɨna ŋkiɛŋ yie, minaoŋ kara nshini nɔ ndhwí shhi, fhu ŋa a kwo lɨnaoŋ nɛ kara mbɔ nɔ chhǐ.
Pa fɨ́nəɨ tɔthɨ taoŋ ŋgū shhɛ wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ thɨ wùnu ghà māʼaŋ ntíɛŋ pi ndɨɨ ŋa tɨtɨnɨ fɨfrəɨ laoŋ chɨ̄ʼɨ vi nɛ.
Po fhu phɛ pi nɔ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋa pi kra nu, sheshe mbra pugu pa muuŋ ŋkǔnu tri ŋkhǐ taoŋ moŋ lɨʼɨ ŋa a ghà mbɔ nɛ.

Nnɛ pa fùoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pugu pa ŋgwa liɛŋliɛŋ, pugu pa mɛmmɛ thishɨ pa shoogɛ, pugu pa ghaŋ fāʼo, pugu pa ghaŋ ghrɨ́, pugu pa sheshe ŋkwaŋ ŋgwa, ŋkǔna pugu ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mbɔ ŋkǔna nɛ, lɛ̄rɛ moŋ pa pùo pugu pa shɨna pa ŋgùʼɔ ŋkuoŋ mbra,
nthɔ mɛ̄iŋ pa mbra pugu pa ŋgùʼɔ ŋa, “Gū mbɨŋ pigi ndə̄ɨŋ vigi mbhɔ ju ŋa a chhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ, pugu pa mbhɔ mmɛ pɨgɨtua Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ,
nthɛ ŋa mmɛ llɛ́ mmɛ pɨgɨtua yugu kwo thɔ, ti minthɛ a tei gɔ̌?”
Yei gha ntɔgɔ, ǹjəɨ khwɛ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi thi ŋkuoŋ khwɛ ghaa shhɛ, ndɨʼɨ khwɛ fɨfrəɨ ghɔ, ŋa kiʼi sheshe fɨfrəɨ tɔgɔ shhɛ ki ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ ki ntuʼɔ thɨ.

Ǹjəɨ yichəɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, a kuʼɔ nu llɔ ŋgei shaʼa minaoŋ ni lì ŋa a yi Minnwi maoŋ nɛ. A mɛ̄iŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pighɔ ni ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ ŋggì, mbɔ ghaŋ ntaoŋ ŋa pi fɛ ghrɨ́ ni pugu ŋa pugu fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pugu pa moŋ ŋkhǐ nɛ.
Nchhu nu ŋa, “Kiʼi pəɨ yiʼi mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pugu pa ŋkhǐ ki pa thɨ, ti pigi nuʼuŋ nūʼɔŋ lì puoŋ fàʼa Minnwi yia nɔ choyei yugu.”
Ǹjaʼo fɨʼɨ ŋgwa ŋa pi ni nūʼɔŋ lì yugu nɛ pɔ taʼa ŋkɨɨ ŋkaŋ ni khwɛ wuŋ ŋkaŋ ni ŋkaŋ yi khwɛ llɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ ndaaŋoŋ Ishrae:
Paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Juda,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Reubɛŋ,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Ga,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Asha,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Naftali,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Manashɛ,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Shimioŋ,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Levi,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Ishaka,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Shɛbuluŋ,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Joshɛ,
paanchrɔ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa fāʼo lì ghɔ llɔ moŋ ndaaŋoŋ Bɛnjamɛiŋ.

Yei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, m̀bɛʼi njəɨ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yú ŋgwa ŋa minthɛ paʼa ŋoŋ lɔ njiʼi shia, llɔ moŋ ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ghao, pugu pa ŋguoŋ kɨrɨ ndaaŋoŋ, pugu pa llɔ moŋ pa chrà taoŋ taoŋ, pugu thi shhɨ faaŋ pugu pa Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ, māʼaŋ pa mmɛ ndhwí fhu, ntuo pa ghia taŋ mbhɔ pugu,
ŋkə̄ɨ nu ni mmɛ ŋggì ŋa,
“Lūgu nu llɔ pi mbhɔ Minnwi yia ŋa a chhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ,
pugu Muuŋ Minjɨɨ!”
Pa ŋguoŋ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ni nthi ŋkɨŋ faaŋ ghɔ pugu pa ŋkɨŋ pa thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ pugu pa khwɛ mimaoŋ maoŋ. Pugu gū ni puŋ yugu shhɨ faaŋ ghɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“A pɔ nɛnnɛ! Mbɔrɔ pugu pa ndighaʼo, ni shiethɔ
ni tōo nu, ni ghaʼo nu,
ni ghrɨ́ pugu pa njɨ pɔ ni Minnwi via
ki ndugwi yi! A pɔ nɛnnɛ!”
Nnɛ chəɨ taʼa nthishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ ghɔ pie a ŋa, “Ghaŋ māʼaŋ mmɛ ndhwí fhu pei pɔ pi pa gɔ̌? Pugu lɔ ndhɔ pi hɨŋ?”
Ǹchhu ghɔ ŋa, “Masha, ɔ ji.” A chhu vəɨ ŋa, “Yei pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu taoŋ moŋ mmɛ ŋgəʼɨ. Pugu shɨ̄gao mmɛ ndhwí fhu yugu nchwīe a fugu pi ni chhǐ Muuŋ Minjɨɨ.
A chwīe yie ghɔ pugu thi shhɨ faaŋ Minnwi
mfāʼa nu mbhɔ yu ni tuʼu pugu pa naoŋchɨ moŋ Nda yi.
Ju ghɔ ŋa a chhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ nɛ
shi ndɨʼɨ vugu ni pɔ nu mi yəɨ pugu.
Mbaʼa njì ma nuʼuŋ njia vugu, ki njùʼɔ yugu ma nuʼuŋ njaoŋ.
Mbaʼa minaoŋ yiʼi nthɛ vugu, ki sheshe yaoŋ tuoŋtuoŋ nuʼuŋ ntūoŋ vugu.
Nthɛ ŋa Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ŋa a pɔ titri faaŋ ghɔ nɛ
shi mbɔ ŋkɛ̄ʼi vugu,
a shi ŋkɛ̄ʼi vugu ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ lɨʼɨ ŋkaʼashɛ ŋa a ŋkhǐ fɛ chɔmbhi nɛ.
Minnwi yɨ̄gɨ ŋguoŋ ŋkhǐ ligi yugu ghao.”
Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ni ŋga mbəʼɨ yichəɨ lěi mfēi a pɔ ndigi yi khwachəɨ, lɨʼɨ lɛrɛ po ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghrà awa.
Nnɛ ǹjəɨ khwachəɨ ghaŋ ntaoŋ ŋa pugu thi shhɨ Minnwi. Pi fɛ khwachəɨ ntàŋ ni pugu.

Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ fɔ thɔ nthi shhɨ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ntuo pɛiŋ niʼiŋ lěi ŋa pi chwīe pi ni laoŋgo, pi fɛ ntou lěi ghɔ ŋa a pigi ŋkuoŋ luoŋ Minnwi ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ nɔ ghɔ ŋkuoŋ yaoŋ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ yɛ ŋa a ni nthi lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ shhɨ faaŋ ghɔ pi chwīe pi ni laoŋgo nɛ.
Ndindhi lěi ghɔ pugu pa luoŋ Minnwi pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ kuʼɔ shhɨ Minnwi llɔ mbhɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ.

Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ kwe pɛiŋ ghɔ ŋa pi chwīe pi ni laoŋgo nɛ niʼiŋ móŋoŋ moŋ ghɔ a lɨnaoŋ llɔ ŋkuoŋ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ghɔ, nchaʼa māʼaŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, wara nu pugu pa luo nu mbɨ̀ lɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ, pa fiembɨ shēi nu, shhɛ chɨ̄ʼɨ shɨna nu.
Nnɛ khwachəɨ ghaŋ ntaoŋ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo khwachəɨ ntàŋ nɛ pīri noŋ yugu nɔ tua nu.

Fǔoŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ tua ji ntàŋ. Wěi pugu pa móŋoŋ ŋa a nyaŋ ni chhǐ nɛ taoŋ, pi māʼaŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ. Ŋkuoŋ shhɛ kɨɨ mbɔ fɨʼɨ ghrà ŋa ɔ ŋgrā shhɛ trɛi lɨʼɨ taʼa yi pɔ nɛ. Pa thɨ wuʼɔ ŋkɨɨ pi fɨʼɨ yie ghɔ, ŋguoŋ trǔ fhɛ kɨɨ ghao.
Mbra ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ tua ji ntàŋ, pi māʼaŋ yichəɨ yaoŋ nɔ mmɛ mbra, a kɨɨ nu ni móŋoŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ, ghrà ŋkhǐ, ŋa ɔ̈ ŋgrā ŋkhǐ trɛi lɨʼɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ pɔ yie ghɔ nɛ, kara ŋgū pi chhǐ.
Mimaoŋ maoŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ ghɔ khu wuʼɔ fɨʼɨ yie ghɔ, pa mmɛ kikuoŋ pɨrɨ wuʼɔ fɨʼɨ yie ghɔ.

Yichəɨ mbra ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ shɨ̀na yi trɛi tua ji ntàŋ, yichəɨ mmɛ fɨ́nəɨ gū llɔ po, ŋkɨɨ nu nɔ ŋkiʼa, ŋgū ŋkuoŋ pa nɨnəɨ mbɔ fɨʼɨ yɛ ŋa ɔ̈ ŋgrā ŋkhǐ trɛi lɨʼɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ pɔ yie nɛ, mbɨnɨ ŋgū ŋkuoŋ pa ŋkaʼashɛ.
Ligi fɨ́nəɨ ghɔ pɔ pi Lwilwi
. Taʼa lɨʼɨ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ̈ ŋgrā ŋkhǐ ghɔ trɛi lɨʼɨ, kara ŋgū yi lwilwi. Ntou ŋgwa khu nthɛ ŋkhǐ ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa pi chwīe a pɔ yi lwilwi.

Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ shɨ̀na yi khwɛ, tua ji ntàŋ pi chwīe fɨʼɨ ghrà minaoŋ ŋa ɔ̈ ŋgrā trɛi lɨʼɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ pɔ yie nɛ, ni wuʼɔ fɨʼɨ ghrà fhu ghɔ, ni fɨʼɨ ghrà fɨ́nəɨ, ghrà líʼɛ yugu ghɔ kara ŋgū njiŋ. Minthɛ pi chwīe fɨʼɨ ghrà naoŋchɨ ghɔ paʼa a lɔ nuʼuŋ ndiʼɛ nu, fɨʼɨ ghrà tuʼu ghɔ ŋkaa yu.

Nnɛ m̀bɛʼi, njaʼo mimbaʼo a kə̄ɨ nu ni mmɛ ŋggì nɔ haʼaŋ a ni njei ntɔgɔ nu thɔ a nɛ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ŋgəʼɨ, ŋgəʼɨ, ŋgəʼɨ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ, nɔ haʼaŋ pi shi ntua pichəɨ pa ntàŋ pighɔ ŋa trɛi ghaŋ ntaoŋ pighɔ tāʼa nu ntua nɛ.”
Nnɛ, yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ tiɛŋ shɨ̀na tua ji ntàŋ. Ǹjəɨ fɨ́nəɨ gū shhɛ llɔ po, pi fɛ chuʼɔ cho shiŋ ki ndugwi yi ghɔ.
A chuʼɔ cho shiŋ ki ndugwi yi ghɔ, ndindhi taoŋ cho ghɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a taoŋ pi moŋ mmɛ lɨʼɨ lìɛŋ, ndindhi llɔ moŋ shiŋ ghɔ chwīe minaoŋ pugu mooŋ gha mbhi shini.
Ŋgwíŋ taoŋ moŋ ndindhi ghɔ nshwiʼi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, pi fɛ ghrɨ́ ni pugu nɔ ghrɨ́ ŋíeŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.

Pi ni nchhu ni pugu ŋa kiʼi pugu fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni trǔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, ki sheshe yaoŋ shhɛ ŋa a yi fhɛ ŋkhɛ̄ nu nɛ, ki sheshe thɨ, ki trǔ, pugu wuʼɔ mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ pi ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo lì Minnwi choyei pugu nɛ.
Pi ni mieŋ vugu ŋa pugu fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni ŋgwa pighɔ nɔ tiɛŋ nàoŋ, ndɔ ki lɔ njwi vugu, yúʼɔ ŋa ŋgwa pighɔ ni mfāʼo nu llɔ ŋkuoŋ ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ nɛ pɔ nɔ yúʼɔ ŋa ŋoŋ ghà mfāʼo ndɨɨ ŋa ŋíeŋ naoŋ vi nɛ.
Moŋ pa llɛ́ pighɔ, ŋgwa shi ntāʼa gu ndɔ paʼa ndɔ njəɨ, pugu shi ntāʼa gu ndɔ gu ntei vugu.
Pa ŋgwíŋ pighɔ ni mbɔ nɔ pa minyieŋləɨ ŋa pi pīri vugu nɔ māʼaŋ nu nchhɔ. Pichəɨ yaoŋ ni mbɔ thɔ pugu nɔ ŋkie ŋa pi chwīe ni laoŋgo, miŋi muŋu pɔ nɔ miŋi ŋgwamishua.
Ŋgiithɔ yugu pɔ nɔ ŋgiithɔ piŋgɛ, shua muŋu pɔ nɔ shua paʼo,
Pugu fāʼo yaoŋ kɨʼɨ njùʼɔ yugu a pɔ pi nɔ tɨ́nɨ, ŋggì pra yugu pɔ pi nɔ ŋggì ntou ŋkwaŋ mitu ŋa a ghà nshūu pa minyieŋləɨ nshūu vugu nɛ, ntei ŋgə̄ɨ nu lɨʼɨ nchhɔ̀.
Shie yugu pugu pa kwēi nu yugu pɔ ni ŋíeŋ. Ghrɨ́ yugu nɔ chwīe nu ŋgwa yaʼo yúʼɔ nɔ tiɛŋ nàoŋ pɔ pi moŋ shie yugu ghɔ.
Fùoŋ vugu ŋa a shaʼa vugu nɛ pɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ shiŋ ki ndugwi yi fɔ. Ligi yi moŋ chrà Hibru pɔ ŋa Abadoŋ
, mbɔ moŋ chrà Gri ŋa Apolioŋ
Fǔoŋ ŋgəʼɨ kwo tɔgɔ, līi njəɨ, yi paa wuʼɔ mbiʼi nthɔ nu.
Yichəɨ mbra ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntɨgao shɨ̀na tua ji ntàŋ. Ǹjaʼo ŋggì llɔ moŋ khwɛ ndua lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ ghɔ ŋa pi chwīe pi ni laoŋgo shhɨ Minnwi nɛ.
A chhu nu ni yichəɨ mbra ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntɨgao shɨna, ŋa a ni mfāʼo ntàŋ ghɔ ŋa, “Kɨ̄gɛi khwɛ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pɛ ŋa pi krao vugu yəɨ mmɛ ŋkhǐ Yufrɛtɛ nɛ.”
Nnɛ pi fēi khwɛ ghaŋ ntaoŋ pighɔ ŋa pi ni ŋkwo pīri vugu nɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, llɛ́ ghɔ, nàoŋ ghɔ, ni ŋgaʼo ghɔ nɛ, ŋa pugu jwi fɨʼɨ ghrà ŋgwa ŋa ɔ̈ ŋgrā ŋguoŋ ŋgwa trɛi lɨʼɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ pɔ yie nɛ.
Mi ni njaʼo fɨʼɨ ghaŋ nchhɔ̀ ŋa pugu ni ŋkuʼɔ nɛ a pɔ paa ŋkɨɨ nchuʼu.

Yei ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ mi ni njəɨ pa minyieŋləɨ moŋ nnu ghɔ ŋa pi ni nōoŋ vəɨ nɛ, pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni ŋkuʼɔ ŋkuoŋ pugu nɛ: Pugu ni ŋgwɛ pa tɨ́nɨ kɨʼɨ njùʼɔ yugu, ŋgwrà yi pɔ nɔ ŋgwrà móŋoŋ. Pugu pa ŋgùʼɔ ŋa a lɨlɨɨ nɛ, pugu pa ŋgwrà fhɔ̌ yaʼo pipie. Pa thɔ minyieŋləɨ pighɔ pɔ nɔ thɔ pa paʼo. Móŋoŋ pugu pa ndindhi ni ŋgùʼɔ mikaŋ taoŋ nu nchò pugu.
Fɨʼɨ ghrà ŋgwa ŋa ɔ̈ ŋgrā ŋgwa trɛi lɨʼɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ pɔ yie nɛ khu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋgəʼɨ pei, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ móŋoŋ, ndindhi, ni móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ mikaŋ ŋa a taoŋ nu nchò pa minyieŋləɨ pighɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa ghrɨ́ minyieŋləɨ pighɔ ni mbɔ pi nchò pugu pugu pa shie yugu. Nthɛ ŋa pa shie pugu pɔ pi nɔ mitwɛʼi ni thɔ pugu, pugu ləɨŋ ŋgwa pi ni yie ghɔ.

Pɨgəɨ ŋgwa ŋa pi shini ndɔ njwi vugu ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋgəʼɨ pei nɛ, shini ndɔ mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu nthɛ mbha fàʼa pugu, ki mieŋ ghaʼo nu pa miŋwɛiŋ pugu pa nnwi ŋa pi chwīe ni laoŋgo pugu pa tɨ́nɨ tɨnɨnchuoŋ pugu pa pichəɨ ŋkwaŋ tɨ́nɨ ŋa a pɔ pi pipie, pugu pa ŋgùʼɔ ni thɨ. Mbɔ pa nnwi ŋa pinthɛ paʼa pugu lɔ njəɨ lɨʼɨ, ki njaʼo lɨʼɨ, ki nyīeŋ.
Pugu shini ndɔ mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu njiʼi nthɛ pi nɔ pa nnu jwi ŋgwa, nnu tou ŋgaŋ, ki nnu shúoŋ pugu pa ŋgɨna.
Ǹjəɨ yichəɨ taʼa tɨtɨnɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi shwiʼi nu shhɛ llɔ moŋ po, ndiŋ moŋ lúluŋ, jijwɛ ŋguŋnnu nnu pɔ tɔthɨ thɔ yu, miŋi mi pɔ nɔ minaoŋ, kwò mi pɔ nɔ ləɨ móŋoŋ.
A tuo muuŋ mi ŋwaʼaŋlɨ mbhɔ yu ŋa a ni mbɔ yi ŋaʼaŋ. A tigi ŋgei kwò yi yi jɨ ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ, yi ŋkwrɛi pɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ,
a kə̄ɨ ni mmɛ ŋggì ŋa a pɔ nɔ yi paʼo ndɨɨ ŋa a phɔ̄ nɛ. A ni ŋga mɛ̄iŋ, khwachəɨ miwara mbɨ̀ wara.
Khwachəɨ pa miwara mbɨ̀ pighɔ ni ŋga ŋgwara, mi ni ŋkwo tāʼa nāʼaŋ, ndɔ njaʼo ŋggì llɔ po a chhu nu ŋa, “Lə̄ɨŋ nnu ŋa khwachəɨ pa miwara mbɨ̀ pighɔ chhu nɛ, ki lɔ njiʼi nāʼaŋ shhɛ.”
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ŋa mi ni njəɨ vi a thi ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ pugu ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ kə̄rə ŋgei mbhɔ yi yi jɨ po,

nshwrɛ̄i ni ligi Minnwi ŋa a yi maoŋ ki lɔ ma ŋkhu nɛ, ŋa a chwīe po pugu pa yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, nchwīe shhɛ pugu pa yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ pugu pa ŋkhǐ ni pa yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ, ŋa, “Mbaʼa yīri nu nuʼuŋ mbɔ.

Ndɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi mbɔ ŋgaŋ khwachəɨ shɨna shi ŋga ntua ntàŋ yi, kaŋ Minnwi shi nchwīe nnu lə̄ɨŋ ŋa a ni ŋkāʼa nɛ. A shi ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ pi wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchīi ni puoŋ fàʼa pi mbɔ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.”
Nɛnnɛ, ŋggì ŋa ŋki yaʼo llɔ po nɛ chrā vəɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ, nchhu nu ŋa, “Ghə̄ɨ ŋkwe ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ŋa a yi ŋaʼaŋ mbhɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ŋa a thi ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ pugu shhɛ nɛ.”
Nnɛ, ŋ̀gə̄ɨ mbara ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ nchhu ghɔ ŋa a fɛ muuŋ mi ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ vəɨ. A chhu vəɨ ŋa, “Kwe ŋkru, a shi nchwīe moŋ puŋ yɔ llwī, ndɔ moŋ nchò yɔ shi ndɨ̄ŋ pi nɔ llɔ̌.”
Ŋ̀kwe muuŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ ghɔ mbhɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ ŋkru. A ni ndɨ̄ŋ pi nɔ llɔ̌ moŋ nchò a, ndɔ ŋ̀ga ŋkwo kru, a chwīe puŋ a llwī.
Pi chhu vəɨ ŋa, “Ɔ shi mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ nchhu ŋkɨ̀nɨ Minnwi nthɛ ntou pa ŋgwa pugu pa taoŋ taoŋ pugu ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ chrà pa taoŋ pugu pa fùoŋ.”
Pi ni mfɛ muuŋ thɨ fɨ̄ʼɨ yaoŋ vəɨ a pɔ nɔ mbìe, yichəɨ ŋoŋ chhu vəɨ ŋa, “Lɔllɔ mfɨ̄ʼɨ Nda Minnwi pugu pa lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ pugu pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu thɔ ŋgaʼo Minnwi moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ kiʼi mfɨ̄ʼɨ yɨna ŋa a pɔ mbhi Nda Minnwi nthɛ ŋa pi kwo fɛ yie ghɔ ni pa laʼataoŋ ndɔ pugu shi nɨ̄ɨ laʼataoŋ taoŋtaoŋ laʼo kwò pugu nɔ khwɛ wuŋ nàoŋ ni nàoŋ yi paa.
Ǹshi mfɛ njɨ ni paa pa miŋkwentie paŋ pugu yəɨ nnu mfɨ̄ʼɨ nɔ taʼa ŋkaŋ ni paa ŋkɨɨ ni ntɨgao wuŋ llɛmbhi. Pugu shi mbɔ moŋ ndhwí ywei gu.”
Yei paa pa thɨ olive pugu pa paa yaoŋ tigi laŋ ŋa a thi shhɨ Taathɔ ŋa a ghà nshaʼa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ ntāʼa nu ndəɨŋ vugu, móŋoŋ taoŋ nchò pugu nshiʼi mimbɨna yugu, moŋ yei shɛndaoŋ, s̈hesheŋoŋ ntāʼa nu nchwīe nnu ŋgəʼɨ mbɨŋ pugu pi jwi vugu nɛnnɛ.

Pugu fāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ fɨ̄nɨ nu po, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi mbɨ̀ llɔ moŋ llɛ́ pighɔ ŋa pugu thɔ nchhu pa nnu ŋa pugu yəɨ nɛ, ndɔ pugu fāʼo njɨ mbɨŋ pa ŋkhǐ nɔ kara nu vugu pugu gū chhǐ pugu pa māʼaŋ nu ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ ŋgəʼɨ ghao ŋkuoŋ shhɛ moŋ sheshe ndɨɨ haʼaŋ pugu khwā nɛ.
Pugu shi ŋga ŋkwo mīʼɛŋ ni chīi nu ŋkɨ̀nɨ yugu, minyieŋ pɨphɨ yɛ ŋa a taoŋ moŋ shiŋ ki ndugwi yi nɛ, māʼaŋ vugu ni nchhɔ̀, ŋgaʼa vugu, ndɔ njwi vugu.
Pa khu yugu nūaŋ shɛndaoŋ moŋ mmɛ laʼataoŋ ŋa nɔ lì, pi mɛ̄iŋ ni “Shodoŋ” ki “Ijipti,” mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi ni ŋkwīŋ Taathɔ vugu ŋkuoŋ wáʼa nɛ.
Nɔ trɛi llɛ́ ni ghrà yi pichəɨ llɔ shɨna kɨ́rɨ pa ŋgwa pugu pa kɨ́rɨ ndaaŋoŋ, pugu pa chrà taoŋ taoŋ, pugu pa laʼataoŋ shi mbɛʼi khu pugu ndɔ ndāa nɔ mieŋ nu pi twei vugu.

Ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ shi mfāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ vugu, nchwīe pa jɨ, ntaoŋ pa yaoŋ fɛ́ ni noŋ pugu, nthɛ ŋa paa pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pei ni mbɔ pa thɔpaʼo ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni nchhɔ nu ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.
Ndɔ trɛi llɛ́ ni ghrà yi ghɔ ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, jijwɛ chɔmbhi llɔ mbhɔ Minnwi nii mbɨŋ pugu, pugu lɔllɔ ntithi ŋkuoŋ kwò muŋu, ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ pɔgɔ gu wɛ̄iŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni njəɨ vugu nɛ.
Nnɛ, ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ ŋggì taoŋ po, nchhu nu ni pugu ŋa, “P̂əɨ kuʼɔ hɛiŋ!” Pugu kuʼɔ po moŋ lúluŋ pa mbɨ̌na pugu pɛʼi nu.

Wuʼɔ ndɨɨ ghɔ, shhɛ chɨ̄ʼɨ ŋkiɛŋ yie ghɔ nshɨna, taʼa ghrà moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ̈ ŋgrā wuŋ lɨʼɨ a pɔ yie ghɔ nɛ, gū shhɛ. Khwachəɨ ŋkaŋ ŋgwa ni ŋkhu nɔ haʼaŋ shhɛ ghɔ ni nchɨʼɨ ŋkaʼa nɛ, pɨgəɨ yugu fāʼo mmɛ pɔgɔ gu, pugu fɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi po.
Mbra ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ kwo tɔgɔ, līi njəɨ, yi trɛi thɔ nu nɔ kuo ndɨɨ.
Nnɛ, ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi mbɔ ŋgaŋ khwachəɨ shɨ̀na tua ji ntàŋ pa mmɛ ŋggì, chhu nu po ŋa,
“Shaʼafuoŋ ŋkuoŋ mbhi gū Shaʼafuoŋ Taathɔ via pugu yi Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ,
a shi nshaʼa nɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao.”
Paa wuŋ thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ ni yi khwɛ ŋa pugu ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ pa faaŋ pugu shhɨ Minnwi nɛ, gū ni miŋi muŋu shhɛ ŋgaʼo Minnwi,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“Pigi fɛ tōo nu vɛ ma Minnwi Taathɔ
ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ njɨ nɛ, ŋa a pɔ, ndɔ ni mbɔ
nthɛ ŋa ɔ kwo kwe mmɛ ghrɨ́ yɔ
ndɔ njɛ̄ shaʼa nu.
Pa laʼataoŋ fāʼo pɨgɨtua,
ndɔ pɨgɨtua yɔ ni nthɔ,
mbɔ ndɨɨ ŋa pi shi nshaʼa ŋgwa ŋa pugu kwo khu nɛ.
Ndɨɨ thɔ nɔ kɨ̄nɛiŋ nu puoŋ fàʼa pɔ,
mbɔ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ pɔ pugu pa ŋgwa pɔ,
mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pɔgɔ ghɔ nɛ,
pa miŋkwasha pugu pa ŋgwa liɛŋliɛŋ.
Ndɨɨ kwo thɔ nɔ pɨrɨ nu ŋgwa pɛ haʼaŋ pugu pɨrɨ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ.”
Nnɛ, Nda Minnwi po chuʼɔ, pi yəɨ ŋkùŋ nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na yi pugu pa ŋgwa moŋ Nda ju Minnwi. Pa fiembɨ ni nshēi nu, ndɔ nduo nu, pa luo nu miwara mbɨ̀ pɨnɨ mbɔ, shhɛ shɨna, mmɛ wěi gū.
Ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ lì nōoŋ noŋ yi po, miŋgwɛ chəɨ ŋa ndhwí yi ni mbɔ pi minaoŋ, fhú pɔ laʼo kwò yu, ni ŋkie ni paanchrɔ fɨ́nəɨ ŋkuoŋ pɔ thɔ yu.
A ni mbɔ ni nshūu, nchhɔ ŋkə̄ɨ nu nthɛ yúʼɔ pugu pa ŋgəʼɨ phi.
Yichəɨ lì pɨnɨ ntaoŋ po, ŋga njəɨ nu, mmɛ mikwokwo pipie, mfāʼo khwachəɨ thɔ ni wuŋ ndua ni khwachəɨ ŋkie thɔ yu.

Shie yi yɨ̄gɨ taʼa ghrà pa fɨ́nəɨ po nɔ haʼaŋ ɔ̈ ŋgrā ŋguoŋ fɨ́nəɨ po a taoŋ trɛi ghrà, māʼaŋ vugu ŋkuoŋ shhɛ. Minyieŋ ghɔ tithi yəɨ miŋgwɛ ghɔ ŋa a ni ntāʼa nu mbhi nɛ, nnɛ ŋa a gha mbhi muuŋ yi ghɔ, a kɛ̄ʼi ŋkrukru.
A phi muuŋ mimbia, mbɔ yɛ ŋa a shi nshaʼa ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ghao ni mbìe tɨ́nɨ nɛ, ndɔ pi kiʼi njā muuŋ ghɔ jā ŋkuʼɔ nɔ yəɨ Minnwi pugu pa faaŋ yi.
Miŋgwɛ ghɔ tei ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ Minnwi ni ŋkwo pīri nūʼɔŋ, mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi shi ŋkugwi vi nɔ taʼa ŋkaŋ ni paa ŋkɨɨ ni ntɨgao wuŋ llɛmbhi.
Nnɛ, nchhɔ̀ gū po. Maikə pugu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi thɔ māʼaŋ mmɛ mikwokwo ghɔ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni dragoŋ nɛ. Mikwokwo ghɔ pugu pa ji pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ māʼaŋ vugu ŋkaa pugu.
Ndɔ pi ghaʼa pa minyieŋ ghɔ, paʼa shɨ̀na lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi ni pugu po.
Pi māʼaŋ mmɛ minyieŋ ghɔ shhɛ, mbɔ mmɛ mitwɛʼi llɛshhɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni devɨ ki Shata nɛ, mbɔ ŋgaŋ fɨ̄ɨ ŋguoŋ mbhi. Pi ni māʼaŋ vi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, māʼaŋ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ pi pugu pugu.
Ǹjaʼo ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ ŋggì po chhu nu ŋa,
“Ndwɛ lūgu nu pugu pa ghrɨ́
pugu pa Shaʼafuoŋ Minnwi via
ni njɨ Ju ŋa Minnwi Chuʼɔ Ntaoŋ nɔ Ŋkwe nɛ kwo thɔ,
nthɛ ŋa pi kwo māʼaŋ ŋgaŋ shwei fàŋ pa lǐŋ pia shhɨ Minnwi shhɛ,
ŋa a ghà nchhu pa fàŋ pa lǐŋ pia
moŋ naoŋchɨ pugu pa tuʼu shhɨ Minnwi yia nɛ.
Pi kwo ghaʼa vi ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ chhǐ Muuŋ Minjɨɨ
pugu pa nnu shini haʼaŋ pugu chīi nɛ,
ndɔ pugu ni ŋkhwā chɔmbhi yugu wuʼɔ shɨgɛi ti nchəɨŋ nthɨŋkwo
ŋa mimfɛ pugu khu nthɛ vi.
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ ma po
pugu pa pəɨ ŋa pəɨ chhɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Ndɔ ŋgəʼɨ pɔ ni pəɨ ma ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pugu pa moŋ ŋkhǐ,
nthɛ ŋa devɨ shwiʼi shhɛ mbara vəɨ moŋ mmɛ pɨgɨtua
nthɛ ŋa a ji ŋa ndɨɨ yi kwiʼi.”
Ndɨɨ ŋa mikwokwo ghɔ ni njəɨ ŋa pi māʼaŋ vi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ, a tei njiŋ miŋgwɛ yɛ ŋa a ni mbhi muuŋ mimbia nɛ.
Ndɔ pi ni mfɛ paa pra mmɛ mimbaʼo ni miŋgwɛ ghɔ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ a yei ntei mitwɛʼi ghɔ ŋgə̄ɨ moŋ ŋkǔnu njó, nɔ lɨʼɨ haʼaŋ pi fāʼo nɔ kugwi nu vi nɔ trɛi ŋgaʼo ni ghrà yi nɛ.
Mitwɛʼi ghɔ shāʼo ŋkhǐ nɔ nɨnəɨ llɔ nchò yu njiŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ nnɛ ŋa a tiɛŋ vi ŋgə̄ɨ nɔ ghɔ.
Ndɔ shhɛ ghɛ̄rɛ miŋgwɛ ghɔ, shhɛ ŋaʼaŋ nchò yi mmi nɨnəɨ ghɔ ŋa minyieŋ ghɔ shāʼo llɔ nchò yu nɛ.
Nɛnnɛ, túa minyieŋ ghɔ pɨgɨ mbɨŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ, a ghə̄ɨ nɔ māʼaŋ nu pɨgəɨ puoŋ miŋgwɛ ghɔ ni nchhɔ̀, mbɔ ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na Minnwi ndɔ ŋgwɛ̄iŋ nnu shini ŋa Jishɔ nōoŋ nɛ.
Ndɔ a thi ŋkuoŋ shíshhɛ ŋkɨŋ ŋkhǐ.
Ǹjəɨ yichəɨ minyieŋ a taoŋ nu moŋ ŋkhǐ ni wuŋ ndua pugu pa khwachəɨ thɔ ni wuŋ ŋkie ŋkuoŋ pa ndua pi, ni pa ligi nchɨʼəshə ŋkuoŋ pa thɔ pi.
Minyieŋ ŋa mi ni njəɨ nɛ ni mbɔ nɔ minchrɔ, kwò mi pɔ nɔ yi miŋaŋieŋ, nchò yi pɔ nɔ nchò paʼo. Mmɛ mikwokwo ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni dragoŋ nɛ fɛ njɨ yi pugu pa faaŋ yi ni mmɛ ghrɨ́ ghɔ.
Yichəɨ taʼa thɔ yi pɔ nɔ haʼaŋ a fāʼo fɨ́ ŋa minthɛ a jwi vi. Ndɔ fɨ́ ghɔ ŋa a kaŋ ni nthɛ a jwi vi nɛ mmɛ, ŋguoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ghao ghrāo nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni njōu njiŋ minyieŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Pugu ni ŋgaʼo mmɛ mikwokwo ghɔ nthɛ ŋa a fɛ ghrɨ́ yi ni minyieŋ ghɔ ndɔ pugu ghaʼo minyieŋ ghɔ, nchhu nu ŋa, “A gɔ̌ nɔ minyieŋ yei, ndɔ a nthɛ a wie pugu gɔ̌ ŋgwie ŋkrɔ̀?”
Nnɛ, pi mieŋ minyieŋ ghɔ a chrā pa chrà nōoŋ noŋ pugu pa chrà nchɨʼəshə nɔ ligi Minnwi. Pi fɛ njɨ ghɔ nɔ chwīe nu nnu ŋa a tāʼa nu nɛ nɔ khwɛ wuŋ nàoŋ ni nàoŋ yi paa.
A ŋaʼaŋ nchò yi nɔ chrā nu pa chrà nchɨʼəshə nthɛ Minnwi, nthɔ nchɨ̄ʼə ligi yi pugu pa lɨʼɨ chhɔ yi, pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ pi po nɛ.
Pi ni mbɨnɨ mieŋ vi ŋa a māʼaŋ pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ ni nchhɔ̀ ndɔ ŋgaʼa vugu, pi fɛ ghrɨ́ mbɨŋ pa ŋguoŋ pa ndaaŋoŋ, pugu pa kɨrɨ ŋgwa, ni pa ŋgwa llɔ moŋ chrà taoŋ taoŋ pugu pa laʼataoŋ.
Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu chhɔ ŋkuoŋ mbhi nɛ shi ŋgaʼo vi, ŋkiɛŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni nāʼaŋ ligi yugu ŋkaoŋ Minnwi maa chwīe mbhi moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ chɔmbhi mbɔ yi Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ŋa pi ni njwi vi nɛ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ mfāʼo tə́nə, â yaʼo.
S̈hesheŋoŋ mbɔ ŋa pi shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ,
kaŋ pi shi ŋgwɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ ŋgaŋ chə́ɨŋ.
S̈hesheŋoŋ mbɔ ŋa pi shi nsho vi ni kafa,
kaŋ pi shi nsho vi ni kafa.
Yei gɛ̀ ni ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɔ tīi nu shii pugu pa piŋ.
Nnɛ, ǹjəɨ yichəɨ minyieŋ a taoŋ nu moŋ shhɛ mfāʼo paa ndua nɔ muuŋ minjɨɨ, nchrā nu nɔ mmɛ mikwokwo ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni dragoŋ nɛ.
A ni nōoŋ ŋguoŋ njɨ fǔoŋ minyieŋ shhɨ yu nchwīe ŋkuoŋ mbhi pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa moŋ ghɔ ghaʼo fǔoŋ minyieŋ ghɔ ŋa mmɛ fɨ́ yi ni ntɨnɨ nɛ.
A ni nōoŋ ntou pa lì, nchwīe ti móŋoŋ llɔ po nshwiʼi shhɛ shhɨ ŋgwa
ntɔgɔ ŋkuoŋ pa lì ŋa pi ni mieŋ ŋa a fāʼa shhɨ minyieŋ ghɔ nɛ, a fɨ̄ɨ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, nshwei vugu ŋa pugu chwīe yaoŋ a fhi minyieŋ yɛ ŋa kafa ni ndəɨŋ vi a lɔ mbiʼi yi maoŋ nɛ.

Pi mieŋ mbra minyieŋ ghɔ ŋa a fɛ jijwɛ ni yaoŋ ghɔ ŋa pi chwīe a fhi fǔoŋ minyieŋ nɛ, nnɛ ŋa minthɛ yaoŋ ghɔ ŋa pi chwīe a fhi minyieŋ ghɔ nɛ a ka chrachra, nchwīe pi jwi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu lāa ŋa mbaʼa pugu ghaʼo yaoŋ ŋa pi chwīe a fhi minyieŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Minyieŋ ghɔ ŋɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa ghao, pa miŋkwasha pugu pa ŋgwa liɛŋliɛŋ, pa fāʼo pugu pa mbou, pa ŋkǔna pugu pa ŋgwa gha, ŋa pi nūʼɔŋ lì nɔ ŋgei mbhɔ jɨ yugu ki nɔ choyei yugu.
Pugu ni nchwīe yei nnu nnɛ ŋa minthɛ paʼa shesheŋoŋ lɔ njuoŋ yaoŋ ki fīni, kaŋ a nɛ a fāʼo lì ghɔ mbɔ ligi minyieŋ ghɔ ki fɨʼɨ ndigi yaoŋ ŋa a thi nɔ ligi yi nɛ.

Yei fɛ gɛ̀ ni shiethɔ. Shesheŋoŋ ŋa a ji nnu nɛ pīʼi njiŋ ligi yaoŋ ŋa a thi nɔ minyieŋ ghɔ nɛ nthɛ ŋa njiŋ yaoŋ shia ghɔ nɛ thi pi nɔ ligi ŋoŋ, yaoŋ shia yei ghɔ pɔ ntɨgao ŋkɨɨ ni ntɨgao wuŋ ni ndigi yi ntɨgao (666).
Nnɛ m̀bɛʼi, ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ, Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ thi ŋkuoŋ Mbra Shayaoŋ pugu pa taʼa ŋkɨɨ ŋkaŋ ni khwɛ wuŋ ŋkaŋ ni ŋkaŋ ŋgwa yi khwɛ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo ligi yi pugu ligi Tǎa vi choyei pugu.
Ǹjaʼo yichəɨ ŋggì llɔ po, a pɔ nɔ ntou pa ŋkhǐ ŋa a wara nu nɔ ŋggì mmɛ miwara mbɨ̀. Ŋggì ŋa mi ni njaʼo nɛ ni mbɔ nɔ ŋggì ntou ŋgwa ŋa pugu thɔ mbaʼo lóu.

Pugu ni nchhɔ njrāo ŋkhǐ fhi shhɨ faaŋ pugu pa shhɨ khwɛ pa miyaoŋ maoŋ pighɔ pugu pa thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ. Yichəɨ ŋoŋ kaŋ ni mfɛ paʼa a lɔ njɛʼi ŋkhǐ ghɔ ŋkiɛŋ taʼa ŋkɨɨ ŋkaŋ ni khwɛ wuŋ ŋkaŋ ni ŋkaŋ yi khwɛ ŋa pi ni njuoŋ vugu shɨna pa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ.

A ŋgwa pei ŋa pugu shi lɔ njiʼi mfuo noŋ yugu ni piŋgɛ, nthɛ ŋa pugu shi yaʼa nūaŋ pugu pa piŋgɛ. A pugu mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu yōu njiŋ Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ sheshe lɨʼɨ ŋa a ghə̄ɨ nu nɛ. Pi yuoŋ pei ŋgwa shɨna pa ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɔ fǔoŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ mbhɔ Minnwi pugu Muuŋ Minjɨɨ.
Pugu shini ndɔ naa ma ndɛʼi ŋgiɛŋ, nthɛ ŋa pugu lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ntəɨ.

Ǹjəɨ yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, a yei ntɔgɔ nu thɔ pigi ni pwa pishaʼakhɔ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi mfāʼo ndugwi yi nɔ chīi nu ni ŋgwa ŋa pugu pɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ, ni ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ, ni kɨrɨ ndaaŋoŋ, ni ŋgwa llɔ moŋ chrà taoŋ taoŋ, ni kɨrɨ ŋgwa.
A chhu ni mmɛ ŋggì ŋa, “Pɔgɔ Minnwi, mfɛ ndighaʼo ghɔ nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ sháʼa kwo thɔ ndɔ ŋgaʼo vi ŋa a chwīe po pugu pa shhɛ nɛ, pa mmɛ ŋkhǐ pugu pa ŋkhǐ ŋkaʼashɛ.”
Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi mbɔ mbra yi pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mbara, nchhu nu ŋa, “A gū, a gū mbɔ mmɛ laʼataoŋ Babiloŋ, a pɔ nɔ miŋgwɛ ŋa a chwīe ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ghao nnu làʼo njùʼɔ kwoshuoŋ yi.”
Yichəɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, mbɔ ŋgaŋ shɨ̀na yi trɛi, yōu njiŋ yugu, nchhu nu ni njɨ ŋa, “S̈hesheŋoŋ ŋgaʼo minyieŋ ghɔ pugu yaoŋ ŋa pi chwīe nɔ fhi yi nɛ, mbiŋ lì ghɔ choyei yu ki ŋkuoŋ mbhɔ yi,

kaŋ ju ŋkaa yu shi nnu làʼo Minnwi, mbɔ làʼo pɨgɨtua yi, ŋa a shāʼo ni ŋguoŋ njɨ moŋ ndua pɨgɨtua yi nɛ. Ŋguoŋ pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu chwīe nnu yei nɛ, pi shi mfɛ ŋgəʼɨ ni pugu moŋ móŋoŋ pugu pa móŋoŋ ŋgùʼɔ mikaŋ ŋa a kɨɨ nu nɛ shhɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ pugu pa shhɨ Muuŋ Minjɨɨ.

Ndindhi móŋoŋ ŋgəʼɨ yugu kuʼɔ tɔthɨ ki ndugwi yi, fɛrɛnoŋ lɔ mbɔ moŋ naoŋchɨ pugu pa tuʼu ni ŋgwa pei ŋa pugu ghaʼo minyieŋ ghɔ pugu pa yaoŋ ŋa pi chwīe nɔ fhi yi nɛ, pugu pa shesheŋoŋ ŋa a piŋ pi nūʼɔŋ lì ligi yi mbɨŋ yu nɛ.
Yei gɛ̀ ni ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ nɔ tīi nu shii, mbɔ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu nūʼɔŋ kɨ̀na Minnwi pugu pa piŋ yugu mbɨŋ Jishɔ nɛ.”

Ǹjaʼo ŋggì llɔ po chhu nu ŋa, “Nāʼaŋ yei: Shishini, mbɔrɔ pɔ ni ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu khu moŋ piŋ mbɨŋ Taathɔ nɛ llɔ ndwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ nu shhɨ.” Jijwɛ Minnwi chhu ŋa, “Shishini mbɔrɔ yugu, nthɛ ŋa pugu shi mfɛrɛ noŋ yugu llɔ ŋkuoŋ fàʼa yugu, nthɛ ŋa fàʼa yugu shi njōu njiŋ yugu!”
Nɛnnɛ ǹdīi, ŋga njəɨ nu nɛ njəɨ lúluŋ fufhu, yichəɨ ŋoŋ chɔchɔ ŋkuoŋ lúluŋ ghɔ nɔ Muuŋ Ŋoŋmishua, ni ŋkie nɔ yi laoŋgo thɔ yu, ni ŋkwaŋ minwi yaʼa reshi mbɔ yi chəchɨgəɨ mbhɔ yu.

Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi taoŋ moŋ Nda Minnwi nchhɔ mɛ̄iŋ ju ghɔ ŋa a chhɔ ŋkuoŋ lúluŋ ghɔ nɛ ni mmɛ ŋggì ŋa, “Lɔ̄gɔ minwi yɔ ŋa a pɔ nɔ yi yaʼa reshi nɛ ŋkwōo maoŋ nɔ ghɔ nthɛ ŋa ndɨɨ kwōo maoŋ kwo thɔ, nthɛ ŋa ya maoŋ kwōo ŋkuoŋ shhɛ kwo ya ntɨnɨ ti ŋkāʼo.”
Nnɛ ju ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ lúluŋ ghɔ nɛ, firi minwi yi ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, ŋkwōo maoŋ kwōo ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.
Nnɛ yichəɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi taoŋ moŋ Nda Minnwi po mfāʼo minwi chəchɨgəɨ mbɔ ŋkwaŋ yi yaʼa reshi ghɔ ŋkaa yu.

Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi taoŋ lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ, mbɔ yɛ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ŋa a ni mfāʼo ghrɨ́ móŋoŋ nɛ, mɛ̄iŋ yɛ ŋa a ni mfāʼo minwi chəchɨgəɨ ghɔ nɛ ni njɨ ŋa, “Lɔ̄gɔ minwi yɔ njaʼa ntíɛŋ thɨ grape moŋ faaŋ grape ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, nthɛ ŋa pa ntíɛŋ thɨ grape pi kwo tɨnɨ.”
Nnɛ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ ghɔ firi minwi yi a tiri ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ŋkwōo pa ntíɛŋ thɨ grape ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, māʼaŋ moŋ mmɛ lɨʼɨ ŋa Minnwi ghà nchwīe làʼo pɨgɨtua yi nɛ.

Pi kiɛŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ grape pighɔ moŋ lɨʼɨ kiɛŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ ŋa a lɔ mbɔ pi moŋ laʼa nɛ, chhǐ khīi ntaoŋ moŋ lɨʼɨ kiɛŋ ntíɛŋ thɨ ghɔ, ti mbɔ taʼa kwò ni ghrà yi nɔ kuʼɔ nu tɔthɨ, ndɔ nshɨga ti nchəɨŋ paa ŋkɨɨ ŋkaŋ ni ndipuʼu wuŋ ŋkaŋ ni ntɨgao ŋkaŋ kwò.
Nnɛ, ǹjəɨ yichəɨ lì po, a pɔ mmɛ yi ndɔ mbɔ yi ghraoghrao, khwachəɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ni khwachəɨ pa ŋkwaŋ ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ, mbɔ pa ndugwi pi nthɛ ŋa a ndugwi njiŋ nōoŋ nu pɨgɨtua Minnwi.

Ǹjəɨ yichəɨ yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ nɔ mmɛ ŋkhǐ ŋgrashi nyaŋ ni móŋoŋ. Mbɨnɨ nuʼuŋ njəɨ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ghaʼa minyieŋ ghɔ pugu yaoŋ ŋa pi chwīe a pɔ nɔ ju nɛ, ni ndigi yaoŋ ŋa a thi nɔ ligi yi nɛ a thi yəɨ ŋkhǐ ŋgrashi ghɔ, ni yaoŋ paʼo lóu Minnwi mbhɔ pugu.
Pugu yrāo ŋkhǐ Mushi, mbɔ muuŋ fàʼa Minnwi pugu pa ŋkhǐ Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Fàʼa pɔ ghaʼo ndɔ mbɔ yi ghraoghrao,
ma Minnwi Taathɔ, ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ njɨ nɛ.
Ɔ nōoŋ fàʼa yɔ yi ndɨndɨ ndɔ mbɔ yi shishini,
ma Fùoŋ pa taoŋ taoŋ!
Yo Taathɔ, a gɔ̌ ŋa a shi mieŋ ki pɔgɔ
ndɔ ŋgaʼo ligi yɔ?
A gɔ̀ təʼɨ ghɔ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ.
Ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ shi nthɔ
ŋgaʼo ligi yɔ
nthɛ ŋa ɔ ni nōoŋ pa mbha fàʼa ndɨndɨ pɔ.”
Nnu pei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, m̀bɛʼi, Nda Minnwi po pɔ yi wo, mbɔ ntǎa ŋa Minnwi ni nūʼɔŋ gɨ́ kɨ̀na yi moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Llɔ moŋ Nda Minnwi ghɔ, khwachəɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ni khwachəɨ pa ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ taoŋ moŋ ghɔ, mbɔ moŋ ya ŋkiɛŋ ndhwí fhu chiachia ni khwachəɨ pa ŋgwara laoŋgo ŋkuoŋ njùʼɔ yugu.
Yichəɨ taʼa yi shɨna khwɛ miyaoŋ maoŋ pighɔ ni mfɛ khwachəɨ kumbu ŋa pi chwīe ni laoŋgo ni khwachəɨ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pighɔ, pɨgɨtua lɨnaoŋ moŋ ghɔ mbɔ pɨgɨtua Minnwi ŋa a chɔmbhi ki ndugwi yi nɛ.
Nda Minnwi ni ndɨnaoŋ ni ndindhi ndighaʼo Minnwi pugu pa ghrɨ́ yi, ti a kaŋ ni nthɛ paʼa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ nii moŋ Nda Minnwi ghɔ ti khwachəɨ pa ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ khwachəɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pighɔ nuʼuŋ mmɛ.
Nnɛ ǹjaʼo yichəɨ mmɛ ŋggì llɔ moŋ Nda Minnwi ghɔ chhu nu ni khwachəɨ ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pighɔ ŋa, “Pəɨ ghə̄ɨ nshāʼo khwachəɨ kumbu pɨgɨtua Minnwi ghɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.”
Nnɛ fǔoŋ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghə̄ɨ nshāʼo ji kumbu ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, wuwuru mbɨ́na yuʼɔ yuʼɔ ntaoŋ mbɨŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu ni mfāʼo lì minyieŋ ghɔ ndɔ ŋgaʼo yaoŋ ŋa pi ni nchwīe a fhi minyieŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Mbra yi shāʼo ji kumbu moŋ mmɛ ŋkhǐ, a kara mbɔ nɔ chhǐ khu ŋoŋ, ŋguoŋ pa mimaoŋ maoŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ ghɔ khu ghao.
Yichəɨ mbra yi, a pɔ yi trɛi, shāʼo ji kumbu ghɔ moŋ nɨnəɨ pugu pa ŋkhǐ ŋkaʼashɛ, pugu gū chhǐ.
Ǹjaʼo ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi yɛ ŋa a ni ndɨna nu ni moŋ ŋkhǐ nɛ chhu ni Minnwi ŋa,
“Yo, Ŋoŋ Taoŋtaoŋ, ɔ ŋoŋ ndɨndɨ, ŋa a pɔ, ni mbɔ,
nthɛ ŋa a thɔ gɔ̌ ni pa njɔ́ pei.
Nthɛ ŋa pugu ni njwi
ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ pugu pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi,
nnɛ ɔ fɛ chhǐ ni pugu ŋa pugu nnu.
A yaoŋ ŋa a pie ŋa pugu fāʼo nɛ.”
Ǹjaʼo, lɨʼɨ fɛʼiŋgiɛŋ Minnwi chhu nu ŋa,
“Ooŋ, ma Taathɔ, mbɔ Minnwi ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ njɨ nɛ,
pa njɔ́ pɔ kāʼo ndɔ mbɔ yi nnu shini!”
Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, mbɔ ŋgaŋ shɨ̀na yi khwɛ, shāʼo ji kumbu ŋkuoŋ minaoŋ, pi mieŋ minaoŋ ghɔ a tūoŋ ŋgwa ni móŋoŋ yi.
Tɨtɨnɨ laoŋlaoŋ ghɔ ni ntūoŋ vugu pugu chɔ̄nɔ ligi Minnwi ŋa a fāʼo njɨ mbɨŋ pa ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ pei nɛ. Pugu shini ndɔ mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni phɨ mfɛ ndighaʼo ni Minnwi.
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi mbɔ ŋgaŋ tiɛŋ shɨna shāʼo ji kumbu ŋkuoŋ faaŋ minyieŋ ghɔ, laʼataoŋ yi gū njiŋ. Pa ŋgwa naoŋ lɨŋ pugu moŋ yúʼɔ,
nchɔ̄nɔ Minnwi po nthɛ yúʼɔ yugu pugu pa mbɨ́na. Pugu shini ndɔ mbāʼa ŋkǔnu yugu ni mbha nnu yugu.
Yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi mbɔ ŋgaŋ ntɨgao shɨ̀na shāʼo ji kumbu ŋkuoŋ mmɛ nɨnəɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni Yufrɛtɛ, ŋkhǐ yi ywiri nɔ pīri nu shɛndaoŋ ni pa fùoŋ llɔ ŋgei lɨʼɨ shaʼa minaoŋ.
Ǹjəɨ trɛi jijwɛ pɨphɨ pugu pɔ nɔ mishɨnɔ. Pugu ni nchhɔ ntaoŋ nu nchò mmɛ ndaoŋ mikwokwo, pugu pa nchò minyieŋ ghɔ, ni nchò njəɨlɨʼɨ mifɨɨ.
Pugu ni mbɔ pa jijwɛ pa miŋwɛiŋ nthɔ nōoŋ pa lì ndɔ ŋgə̄ɨ njəɨ pa fùoŋ moŋ ŋguoŋ mbhi nɔ kɨrɨ nu vugu taʼa lɨʼɨ nɔ nchhɔ̀ moŋ mmɛ llɛ́ Minnwi ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ njɨ nɛ.
Jishɔ Taathɔ ni nchhu ŋa,
“Līi njəɨ, ǹthɔ nu nɔ ŋgɨna! Mbɔrɔ yi ŋoŋ ŋa a lɔ njiʼi ndhɛ lɔ̄gɔ nɛ, ŋa a māʼaŋ ndhwí yi, nnɛ ŋa kiʼi a nyīeŋ ntii, nnɛ mfāʼo lrithɔ lɨʼɨ wo.”
Nnɛ pa jijwɛ pighɔ kɨrɨ pa fùoŋ pighɔ taʼa lɨʼɨ nɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ moŋ chrà Hibru ni Amagedoŋ nɛ.
Nnɛ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi mbɔ ŋgaŋ khwachəɨ shɨ̀na shāʼo kumbu yi moŋ tɔthɨ, mmɛ ŋggì ntaoŋ moŋ Nda Minnwi, llɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ Minnwi, nchhu nu ŋa “A mmɛ!”
Pa fiembɨ ni shēi nu, ndūo nu, ntou pa miwara mbɨ̀, shhɛ shɨna moŋ shɛndaoŋ ŋa ŋoŋ lɔ naa ma njəɨ llɔ nɔ haʼaŋ ŋoŋmishua ni mbɔ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ, yie shɨna nu shhɛ ni mbɔ ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ yi.
Mmɛ laʼataoŋ ghɔ ni nshɨna ntaoŋ trɛi krao, pa moŋ laʼa moŋ pa taoŋ taoŋ gu. Minnwi kwiŋ mmɛ Babiloŋ nchwīe vi a nnu làʼo llɔ moŋ ndua mmɛ pɨgɨtua yi.
Ŋguoŋ pa puoŋ ŋkǔnu titri ŋkhǐ tei, paʼa kaŋ taʼa mbra lɔ nuʼuŋ mbiʼi.
Mɛmmɛ wěi, ŋa lrī nu muŋu ni mbɔ nɔ khwɛ wuŋ kilu ni kilu yi tiɛŋ, gū llɔ po mbɨŋ ŋgwa, pugu chɔ̄nɔ Minnwi nthɛ ŋgəʼɨ wěi nthɛ ŋa ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ ni ŋgaʼa.
Nnɛ, yichəɨ taʼa ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ shɨna khwachəɨ pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi pighɔ ŋa pugu ni ntuo khwachəɨ kumbu nɛ, thɔ nchhu vəɨ ŋa, “Thɔ, ǹshi nōoŋ sháʼa mmɛ shakhɨ ghɔ vɛ ŋa a chhɔ ŋkuoŋ pa ntou ŋkhǐ nɛ.
A ju ŋa pa fùoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ kwo pɔ pugu pugu moŋ shúoŋ nɛ, ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ kwo paa nthɛ nnu nu làʼo kwoshuoŋ yi nɛ.”

A tiɛŋ a moŋ Jijwɛ ŋgə̄ɨ ni mmu moŋ ŋkǔnu njó, ǹjəɨ yichəɨ miŋgwɛ a chɔchɔ ŋkuoŋ minyieŋ pipie ŋa pi nāʼaŋ pa ligi ŋa a wɛʼi Minnwi nɛ ŋkuoŋ ŋguoŋ noŋ yi ghao. Minyieŋ ghɔ fāʼo khwachəɨ thɔ ni wuŋ ndua.

Miŋgwɛ ghɔ ni māʼaŋ ndhwí pipie, nchwīe noŋ yi ni pa shɨ́ga laoŋgo pugu pa ŋgùʼɔ pwapwa pugu pa pichəɨ ŋkwaŋ maoŋ ŋgɨ̀nɔ. A ni ntuo ndua ŋa pi chwīe ni laoŋgo a lɨnaoŋ ni pa nnu pɨphɨ pugu pa tɔtrɔ shúoŋ yi.
Pi ni nāʼaŋ yichəɨ nnu lə̄ɨŋ ŋkuoŋ choyei yi: Mmɛ Babiloŋ mbɔ mǔuŋ pa shakhɨ pugu pa ŋguoŋ pa nnu pɨphɨ ghao ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.
Ǹjəɨ miŋgwɛ ghɔ a paa ni chhǐ pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ, chhǐ pa ŋgwa ŋa pi ni njwi vugu nthɛ Jishɔ nɛ. Mi ni ŋga njəɨ vi, ŋgrāo ŋkiɛŋ yie.
Ndɔ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ chhu vəɨ ŋa, “Ɔ ghrāo pi khɔ? Ǹshi nshwei ghɔ ni nnu lə̄ɨŋ nthɛ miŋgwɛ yinɛ pugu pa minyieŋ ghɔ ŋa a fāʼo khwachəɨ thɔ, ni wuŋ ndua ŋa a tiɛŋ vi nɛ.

Minyieŋ ghɔ ŋa ɔ ni njəɨ nɛ ni mbɔ yi maoŋ ndɔ ki lɔ mbɔ ndwɛ, ndɔ ntāʼa nu ŋkuʼɔ llɔ moŋ tiɛŋ ki ndugwi yi ŋgə̄ɨ pi pɨrɨ vi. Pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu chhɔ nu ŋkuoŋ shhɛ ŋa pi lɔ nāʼaŋ ligi yugu moŋ ŋwaʼaŋlɨ chɔmbhi llɔ ndɨɨ ŋa Minnwi ni nchwīe mbhi nɛ shi ŋgrāo nɔ yəɨ mi minyieŋ ghɔ, nthɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ ndɔ mfāʼo nɔ thɔ nu.
Yei fɛ gɛ̀ ni kwāʼa nu shiethɔ: Khwachəɨ thɔ pighɔ khwachəɨ pa mbra ŋa miŋgwɛ ghɔ chhɔ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Pi pɨnɨ nuʼuŋ mfāʼo khwachəɨ pa fùoŋ, shɨna pugu yi tiɛŋ kwo gū, taʼa yi wuʼɔ nchhɔ shaʼa nu, taʼa yi wuʼɔ mbiʼi nu ma nthɔ, ndɔ shi ŋga nthɔ, a kɨna nɔ kuo ndɨɨ.
Ndɔ ni minyieŋ yɛ ŋa a ni mbɔ yi maoŋ, ndɔ paʼa ndɔ nuʼuŋ mbɔ yi maoŋ nɛ, a pɔ pi ŋgaŋ shɨ̀na yi fúoŋ ndɔ mbɔ pi taʼa yi shɨna yi khwachəɨ pighɔ ndɔ pi shi mbɨrɨ vi.
Wuŋ ndua yɛ ŋa ɔ ni njəɨ nɛ pɔ pi wuŋ fùoŋ ŋa pugu lɔ naa mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ pa pifuoŋ yaʼa, ndɔ pugu shi mfāʼo ghrɨ́ nɔ fùoŋ nɔ taʼa awa pugu pa minyieŋ ghɔ.
Wuŋ fùoŋ pei pɔ pi ni taʼaŋggi, mfɛ njɨ yugu pugu pa ghrɨ́ yugu nɔ shaʼa nu ni minyieŋ ghɔ.

Pugu shi māʼaŋ Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ ni nchhɔ̀, Muuŋ Minjɨɨ ghɔ ghaʼa vugu nthɛ ŋa a Taathɔ pa taathɔ, mbɔ Fùoŋ pa fùoŋ, ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu pugu pɔ nɛ, pɔ pi ŋgwa ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ vugu, nchuʼɔ vugu pugu lɔ mbɨnɨ mbɔ ghaŋ younjiŋ pi ŋa pugu ghà njaʼo vi.”

Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ chhu vəɨ ŋa, “Pa ŋkhǐ pɛ ŋa ɔ ni njəɨ lɨʼɨ ŋa shakhɨ ghɔ ni nchhɔ nɛ, pɔ pi pa ŋgwa pa laʼalaʼa taoŋ, ŋkiɛŋ ntou pa yú ŋgwa, pugu pa ŋgwa pa taoŋ taoŋ, pugu pa ŋgwa llɔ moŋ pa ŋkwaŋ ŋkwaŋ chrà.
Wuŋ ndua pɛ ŋa ɔ ni njəɨ nɛ pugu pa minyieŋ ghɔ shi mbɨ̄na shakhɨ ghɔ. Pugu shi ŋkwe ŋguoŋ yaoŋ mbhɔ yu ghao, mieŋ vi a kɨna ntii. Pugu shi ŋkru frɛinoŋ yi, ntūoŋ vi ni móŋoŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi kwo kāoŋ njùʼɔ yugu ŋa pugu chwīe nnu ŋa ju Minnwi tāʼa nu nɛ, ntɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ pɔ nu ni taʼaŋggi mfɛ ghrɨ́ yugu nɔ pa fùoŋ ni minyieŋ ghɔ, ti pa chrà Minnwi nuʼuŋ ndɔ̄gɔ lɨʼɨ.
Miŋgwɛ yɛ ŋa ɔ ni njəɨ nɛ, a ju mbɔ mmɛ laʼataoŋ ŋa a fāʼo njɨ mbɨŋ pa fùoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ nɛ.”
Yei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, ǹjəɨ yichəɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi, a shwiʼi nu shhɛ llɔ po. A ni mfāʼo ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ ghrɨ́, ŋkuoŋ shhɛ chhɔ shɛiŋ nu nthɛ ndighaʼo yi.
A mɛ̄iŋ ni ŋkiɛŋ mmɛ ŋggì ŋa,
“Mmɛ Babiloŋ gū, a gū!
A gū lɨʼɨ chhɔ pa miŋwɛiŋ,
mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa jijwɛ pɨphɨ ghà ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkra fɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ nɛ,
lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa mishi pɨphɨ ghà ŋgə̄ɨ ŋkra fɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ ghao,
lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa minyieŋ pɨphɨ, minyieŋ ŋa pi lɔ njiʼi ntāʼa nu nɛ ghà ŋgə̄ɨ fɔ ŋguoŋ ndɨɨ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋguoŋ pa laʼataoŋ ghao kwo nnu
làʼo tɨtɨnɨ shɔ̄rɔ nu kwoshuoŋ yi,
pa fùoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ kwo pɔ pugu pugu moŋ shúoŋ,
pa ghaŋ piʼɛ taŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ hɛiŋ kwo gū ghaŋ fàʼo llɔ ŋkuoŋ tɨtɨnɨ pɨ̀ga pugu pa njùʼɔ shúoŋ yi.”
Nnɛ ǹjaʼo yichəɨ ŋggì po, a chhu nu ŋa,
“P̂əɨ taoŋ ni vəɨ moŋ laʼataoŋ ghɔ, ma ŋgwa paŋ,
nnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ yiʼi mbɔ ŋgia phɨ yi,
pugu pa nɛnnɛ ŋa kiʼi pəɨ shi mbɔ ŋgia ŋgəʼɨ yi.
Nthɛ ŋa pi kwo kɨrɨ phɨ yi moŋ gwí ti a kuʼɔ ti mbɔ nɔ po.
Minnwi kwiŋ ŋguoŋ mbha nnu pɨphɨ pi ghao.
P̂əɨ fāʼa mbɨŋ yu wuʼɔ nɔ haʼaŋ juju fāʼa mbɨŋ ŋgwa nduoŋ nɛ.
P̂əɨ luʼu mbha fàʼa yi ghɔ paa lɨʼɨ.
N̂iʼiŋ làʼo moŋ ndua yi a tɨnɨ ti mbɔ paa lɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ haʼaŋ juju ni niʼiŋ yi ŋgwa nɛ.
Nɔ haʼaŋ a ni nchhɔ ŋgaʼo noŋ yi nchhɔ nu moŋ nchhɔ́ shiʼi nɛ,
nnɛ fɛ ŋgəʼɨ ghɔ pugu pa yuʼɔ njùʼɔ pi nɔ fɨʼɨ ŋkwaŋ ghaʼo noŋ pugu pa nchhɔ́ shiʼi ŋa a ni nchhɔ moŋ ghɔ nɛ.
Nthɛ ŋa moŋ njùʼɔ yu a chhu ŋa,
‘Ǹchhɔ pi nɔ ŋgwafuoŋ, ndɔ njiʼi mbɔ pi ŋkugu,
m̀baʼa ma njiʼi mfāʼo yuʼɔ njùʼɔ.’
Nthɛ yie ghɔ, ŋgəʼɨŋgəʼɨ pi,
gu, yuʼɔ njùʼɔ, ni njì shi nthɔ pi taʼa llɛ́ pi lɔ mbɨnɨ ntūoŋ vi ni móŋoŋ
nthɛ ŋa Minnwi Taathɔ, ŋa a shaʼa vi nɛ, fāʼo njɨ.”
Pa fùoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ, ŋa pugu pugu ni mbɔ moŋ nnu kwoshuoŋ, nchhɔ moŋ nchhɔ́ shiʼi pugu pugu nɛ shi ŋkə̄ɨ ndɔ njūa nthɛ vi ndɨɨ ŋa pugu shi njəɨ ndindhi móŋoŋ ŋa a chhɔ ŋkɨɨ vi nɛ.
Pugu shi ntithi fie hini, moŋ pɔgɔ nu yúʼɔ ŋa pi niʼiŋ nu mbɨŋ yu nɛ, nchhu ŋa,
“A nnu wuwuru! A nnu wuwuru!
Gɔ̀ mmɛ laʼataoŋ, gɔ̀ mmɛ laʼataoŋ, mbɔ Babiloŋ!
Wuʼɔ moŋ taʼa awa, ghaʼa nu mɔ thɔ.”
Pa ghaŋ piʼɛ taŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ kə̄ɨ ndɔ njūa vi, nthɛ ŋa shesheŋoŋ lɔ nuʼuŋ njuoŋ kaku pugu ŋkamuʼɔŋ.

Shesheŋoŋ shini ndɔ nuʼuŋ njuoŋ pa laoŋgo, pugu yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ tɨ́nɨ tɨnɨnchuoŋ, shɨ́ga pugu pa ŋgùʼɔ tɨnɨnchuoŋ, pi mɛ̄iŋ ni pəə, pa ndhwí tɨnɨnchuoŋ mbɔ yi frǔ, pichəɨ pa ndhwí ŋa a pie shishini, pugu pa pichəɨ ndhwí tɨnɨnchuoŋ pi mɛ̄iŋ ni shilki, pugu pa ndhwí ŋa a pie nɔ pɨ̀ɨ, pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋkwaŋ thɨ ŋa pugu fāʼo mbwa luŋ nɛ, pa ŋguoŋ pa ŋkwaŋ yaoŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni shua shɨnəɨ nɛ, pugu pa ŋguoŋ yaoŋ ŋa pi chwīe ni thɨ tɨnɨnchuoŋ nɛ, pugu pa yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ tɨ́nɨ mbɔ yi pipie, ni tɨ́nɨ, ni yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ ŋgùʼɔ ŋgwraŋgwra,
pugu pa shinamoŋ,

pugu pa mbhɛ nyiaŋ yaoŋ, pugu pa lěi, pugu pa laminda tɨnɨnchuoŋ ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni məə, pugu fraŋkishɛŋ, pugu pa làʼo, pugu pa wru, pugu pa prupɨna gato, pugu pa shíe gɛ, pugu pa nàʼaŋ, pugu pa minjɨɨ, pugu pa minyieŋləɨ, pugu pa yichəɨ ŋkwaŋ mitu ŋa pi mɛ̄iŋ ni kalɨ, pugu pa kǔna, mbɔ ŋgwamishua.

Pa ghaŋ piʼɛ taŋ pighɔ chhu ŋa, “Pa maoŋ pwapwa pɛ ŋa ɔ khwā ni njùʼɔ yɔ nɛ taoŋ nɛ mbhɛ mbhɔ ghɔ, ŋguoŋ pa maoŋ nchhɔ́ shiʼi pɔ pugu pa maoŋ shiʼi pɔ phɛ nɛ mbhɔ ghɔ ti mbaʼa ɔ ma nuʼuŋ mbɨnɨ njəɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ.”
Pa ghaŋ taŋ pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo taŋ pighɔ nɛ, ŋa pugu ni ŋkie pi mbhɔ yu ŋgū ghaŋ fàʼo nɛ, shi nthi pi fie hini nthɛ ŋa pugu chhɔ mbɔgɔ nūʼuŋ nu ŋa pi nūʼuŋ vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ, ŋkə̄ɨ nu ndɔ njūa nu ni njɨ,
nchhu nu ŋa,
“A nnu wuwuru! A nnu wuwuru ni mmɛ laʼataoŋ ŋa a ni māʼaŋ pi ŋkiɛŋ ndhwí nɛ,
ndhwí ŋa a pie shishini pugu pa ndhwí pipie,
mbūoŋ noŋ yi ni laoŋgo pugu pa shɨ́ga ni pa ŋgùʼɔ tɨnɨnchuoŋ pi mɛ̄iŋ ni pəə!
Nthɛ ŋa moŋ shɨna taʼa awa, ŋguoŋ maoŋ pei ghao shiʼi.”
Ŋguoŋ pa taathɔ moŋ ŋkhǐ ghɔ, pugu pa ŋgwa moŋ ghɔ, ni ghaŋ fàʼa moŋ mitu ŋkhǐ pighɔ, pugu pa ŋgwa pɛ ŋa taŋ yugu pɔ pi ŋkuoŋ ŋkhǐ nɛ, thi pi fie hini.
Pugu ni ŋkə̄ɨ ni njɨ nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni njəɨ ndindhi ŋa a taoŋ nu moŋ móŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkie vi nɛ, ŋa, “A yəɨ laʼataoŋ ŋa a ni mbɔ nɔ mmɛ Babiloŋ?”
Pugu shāʼo pru thɔ pugu nɔ haʼaŋ pugu ni ŋkə̄ɨ nu ndɔ njūa nu nɛ, ŋkə̄ɨ nu ni njɨ ŋa,
“A nnu wuwuru ni mmɛ laʼataoŋ ghɔ,
mbɔ lɨʼɨ ŋa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pugu fāʼo pa mitu ŋkhǐ moŋ ŋkhǐ nɛ,
tɔgɔ pi ŋkuoŋ fàʼo yi ŋgū ghaŋ fàʼo!
Nthɛ ŋa shɨna taʼa awa, a gū gha.”
Fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ nthɛ vi, ma po,
pugu pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ, pugu pa ghaŋ ntaoŋ Jishɔ, ni pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi.
Nthɛ ŋa Minnwi shaʼa vi mfɛ njɔ́ ghɔ nthɛ vəɨ!
Nnɛ yichəɨ tɨtɨnɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi lɔ̄gɔ ŋgùʼɔ nɔ fɨʼɨ mmɛ ŋgùʼɔ wūʼɔ yaoŋ māʼaŋ moŋ ŋkhǐ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“A haʼaŋ pi shi māʼaŋ Babiloŋ pɨphɨ,
mbɔ mmɛ laʼataoŋ ghɔ,
paʼa pi lɔ ma nuʼuŋ njəɨ vi ŋkamuʼɔŋ.
Nnɛ ŋggì lóu ŋa pi ghà ŋkraokrao, pugu pa ghaŋ paʼo lóu, pugu pa yi maoŋ tua, ni ghaŋ tua ntàŋ,
mbaʼa pi ma nuʼuŋ njaʼo shɨna ghɔ ŋkamuʼɔŋ
ki ghaŋ chwīe sheshe ŋkwaŋ maoŋ ni mbhɔ,
mbaʼa pi nuʼuŋ njəɨ vugu shɨna ghɔ ŋkamuʼɔŋ
ki ŋggì ŋgùʼɔ wuʼɔ yaoŋ,
mbaʼa pi nuʼuŋ njaʼo shɨna ghɔ.
Líʼɛ ŋa laŋ ghà mfɛ nɛ,
mbaʼa a ma nuʼuŋ nthɛ shɨna pəɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ.
Ŋggì mimbia láŋ pugu miŋgwɛ fhi,
mbaʼa pi ma nuʼuŋ njaʼo shɨna pəɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ.
Nthɛ ŋa ŋgwa ŋa pugu ni nthɔ mbiʼɛ taŋ nɛ ni mbɔ pugu mbɔ pa mmɛ ŋgwa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ.
Pəɨ ni mfɨ̄ɨ ŋguoŋ ŋgwa laʼataoŋ ghao ni ŋgáŋ yəɨ.
Pi ni mfɛ njɔ́ ni Babiloŋ ghɔ nthɛ ŋa pi ni njəɨ ŋa chhǐ pa njəɨlɨʼɨ Minnwi pugu pa ŋgwa Minnwi pi taoŋtaoŋ,
pugu pa ŋguoŋ ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi ni ŋkwo ma njwi nɛ, pɔ mbhɔ yu.”
Yei ni ŋga ntɔgɔ, ǹjaʼo yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ nɔ mmɛ ŋggì ntou yú po, paʼo ŋgòu, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ghaʼo Yawe!
Lūgu nu pugu pa ndighaʼo pugu pa njɨ pɔ ni Minnwi yia.
Nthɛ ŋa shaʼa nu mi pɔ pi yi nnu shini mbɨnɨ mbɔ yi ndɨndɨ,
nthɛ ŋa a kwo shaʼa mmɛ shakhɨ ghɔ,
ŋa a ni nthɔ mfuo pa ŋkuoŋ shhɛ moŋ pa nnu kwoshuoŋ mi.
Minnwi fɛ njɔ́ ghɔ nthɛ ŋa a ni njwi puoŋ fàʼa ju Minnwi.”
Pugu pɨnɨ ŋkə̄ɨ ni njɨ ŋkamuʼɔŋ ŋa,
“Ghaʼo Yawe!
Ndindhi ŋa a taoŋ mbɨŋ yu nɛ kuʼɔ tɔthɨ ki ndugwi yi.”
Paa wuŋ thishɨ chɨɨchɨɨ ni yi khwɛ ghɔ pugu pa khwɛ mimaoŋ maoŋ pighɔ gū shhɛ ŋgaʼo Minnwi ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“A pɔ nɛnnɛ. Ghaʼo Yawe!”
Yichəɨ ŋggì taoŋ ŋkuoŋ faaŋ ghɔ, nchhu nu ŋa,
“Ghaʼo Minnwi yia,
ŋguoŋ yəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔ pi puoŋ fàʼa pi ghao,
pəɨ ŋa pəɨ pɔgɔ vi nɛ,
pa miŋkwasha pugu pa ŋgwa liɛŋliɛŋ.”
Ǹjaʼo yaoŋ ŋa a pɔ nɔ ŋggì mmɛ yú nɛ, nɔ khɔ nu ntou ŋkhǐ, pugu pa ŋggì mmɛ wara nu mbɨ̀, kə̄ɨ nu ni njɨ ŋa,
“Ghaʼo Yawe!
Nthɛ ŋa Taathɔ, mbɔ Minnwi yia, mbɔ chaa ŋguoŋ njɨ, shaʼa.
P̂ia fāʼo pwanjuʼɔ, pugu pa mmɛ pwatua mfɛ ndighaʼo ghɔ,
nthɛ ŋa láŋ Muuŋ Minjɨɨ kwo thɔ.
Ŋgwɛ vi kwo lɔ mbīri noŋ yi.
Pi fɛ ŋkiɛŋ ndugwi ndhwí pwapwa ghɔ ŋa a māʼaŋ,
ni mbɔ ndhwí shɛiŋshɛiŋ, ndɔ mbɔ yi taoŋtaoŋ.” Nthɛ ŋa ŋkiɛŋ ndugwi mbwa ndhwí ghɔ pɔ pi fàʼa ndɨndɨ ŋgwa Minnwi.
Ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi ghɔ chhu vəɨ ŋa, “Nāʼaŋ yei: Mbɔrɔ yi ŋgwa pɛ ŋa pi gɛ̄ vugu lɨʼɨ jɨ tini Muuŋ Minjɨɨ nɛ.” Mbɨnɨ nchhu vəɨ ŋa, “Yei ya mbɔ pi pa chrà Minnwi shishini.”

Ŋ̀gū shhɛ laʼo kwò yu nɔ ghaʼo nu mi. Ndɔ a chhu vəɨ ŋa, “Kiʼi nchwīe nnɛ! Mummu wuʼɔ ŋgaŋ fàʼa nɔ gɔ̀ pia pa pichəɨ ghaŋ piŋ nduoŋ ŋa pugu wɛ̄iŋ nnu shini ŋa Jishɔ chhu nɛ. Ghaʼo Minnwi. Nthɛ ŋa nnu shini ŋa Jishɔ chhu nɛ yaoŋ ŋa a ghà ŋkāoŋ pa ŋgwa pugu yəɨ nnu mbhɔ Minnwi nchhu nɛ.”
Nnɛ ǹjəɨ po ŋaʼaŋ, ǹjəɨ minyieŋləɨ fhu thi fɔ! Ŋoŋ ŋa a ni nchhɔ̀ ŋkuoŋ ghɔ nɛ pi mɛ̄iŋ vi ni Kàʼa Ki Fɨ̄ɨ ndɔ mbɔ Nnu Shini. A ghà nshaʼa ndɔ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ moŋ ndɨndɨ.
Ligi yi pɔ nɔ lɨŋ móŋoŋ. Ntou pa ŋkie pɔ thɔ yu. A fāʼo ligi ŋa pi nāʼaŋ mbɨŋ yu ŋa yichəɨ ŋoŋ lɔ njiʼi nji ŋkiɛŋ ju nduthɔ yi.
A māʼaŋ mmɛ ndhwí ŋa pi ni nchru moŋ chhǐ, ligi ŋa pi ni mɛ̄iŋ vi nɔ ghɔ nɛ pɔ Chrà Minnwi.
Pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ po yōu njiŋ yi. Nyīeŋ nu ŋkuoŋ pa minyieŋləɨ fhu, māʼaŋ ndhwí fhu taoŋtaoŋ.
Kafa chəchɨgəɨ taoŋ nchò yu ŋa a shi ŋgwie pa taoŋ taoŋ nɔ ghɔ. A shi nshaʼa vugu ni mbìe tɨ́nɨ. A shi nɨ̄ɨ grape moŋ lɨʼɨ kiɛŋ làʼo, mfuʼu làʼo mbɔ yi wuwuru pɨgɨtua Minnwi ŋa a chaa ŋguoŋ njɨ nɛ.
Pi ni nāʼaŋ ligi ŋkuoŋ ndhwí yi pugu pa ntaʼo yi ŋa, Fùoŋ pa fùoŋ pugu Taathɔ pa taathɔ.
Nnɛ ǹjəɨ ŋgaŋ ntaoŋ Minnwi a thi moŋ minaoŋ, mɛ̄iŋ pa mishi ŋa pugu yei nu moŋ tɔthɨ nɛ ni njɨ ŋa, “Pəɨ thɔ ŋkɨrɨ taʼa lɨʼɨ nɔ mmɛ jɨ Minnwi,

nɔ kru nu frɛ̀i pa fùoŋ pugu pa thishɨ pa shoogɛ, frɛ̀i pa mɛmmɛ ghaŋ njɨ, frɛ̀i pa minyieŋləɨ pugu pa ghaŋ kuʼɔ pi, pugu pa frɛ̀i ŋguoŋ ŋgwamishua pa ŋgwa ŋa pugu lɔ mbɔ pa ŋkǔna nɛ pugu pa ŋkǔna. Pa miŋkwasha pugu pa ŋgwa liɛŋliɛŋ.”
Ǹjəɨ minyieŋ ghɔ pugu pa fùoŋ ŋkuoŋ shhɛ pugu pa ghaŋ māʼaŋ nchhɔ̀ pugu kɨrɨ nɔ māʼaŋ nu vi ni nchhɔ̀ mbɔ ju ŋa a ni nchhɔ ŋkuoŋ minyieŋləɨ nɛ pugu pa ghaŋ nchhɔ̀ pi.
